bofm-title 0:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Mormon[/font_size][/center]

Poadoapoad ehu me ntingda sang Pein Pehn Mormon nan Pileit akan me Kohsang ni Pileit en Nihpai kan

Eri, iei met oaralap en poadoapoad en aramas en Nihpai kan, oh pil Mehn Leimen kan—Ntingda ong Mehn Leimen kan, me wia kisehn luhwen peneinei en Israel; oh pil ong mehn Suhs oh Mehn Liki kan—Ntingda sang ni kosonned, oh pil sang ni ngehn en kokohp oh kaudiahl—Ntingdahr oh katengetengpenehr, oh nekineklahr rehn Kauno, pwe re sohte pahn kak ohla—pwe kawehwehpe en kohdo sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Koht—Pein pehn Moronai katengetengpenehr, oh nekineklahr rehn Kauno, pwe en kohdo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan ni ahnsou me pahn koasondi—Kawehwehpehu pahn sang ni kisakis en Koht.

Pil ehu oaralap en poadoapoad me kohsang nan Pwuhk en Ihder, me wia poadepen nein Sared aramas akan, me kohkohla ni ahnsou me Kauno ketin wekidala ahn aramas akan lokaia, ahnsou me irail kaukawada douliko pwe re en kohdahla nanleng—Me pahn kasalehiong luhwen peneinei en Israel soahng kesempwal akan me Kaunoketin wiahiongehr arail pahpa ko; oh pwe irail en ese sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, pwe irail en dehr lekidekla kohkohlahte—Oh me pahn pil kamehlelehiong mehn Suhs oh Mehn Liki kan me Sises iei Krais, Koht Soutuko, me ketin kasalehiong wehi koaros pein ih—Oh met, ma mie sapwung a e pahn wia sapwung en aramas akan; eri, dehr soikala soahng kan sang Koht, pwe kumwail en kak dierek mwakelelkel ni mwoalen kopwung en Krais.

Sosep Smith, Jun, me tepin kawehwehdi sang nan pileit ko ong lokaiahn wai
introduction 0:
[center][font_size=26]Mehn Kapehse[/font_size][/center]

Pwuhk en Mormon iei ehu pwuhk sarawi me rasohng Paipel. Iei poadoapoad ehu me pid duwen sapwellimen Koht doadoahk kan ong mehn kawahko nan wehin Amerika oh audaudiki unsek en rongamwahu poatoapoato.

Pwuhk wet ntingdier sang rehn soukohp tohto ni duwen ngehn en kokohp oh kaudiahl. Mormon me wia soukohp oh soupoad men me ntingihdi oh oaralapiada arail mahsen kan pohn kohl pileit kan. Poadoapoad wet kasalehda duwen pwihn en aramas riau. Ehu kohdo sang nan Serusalem nan pahr 600 Mwohn Krais oh mwuri tohrohrpeseng wiahda wehi riau, me adaniki Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen. Ehu pwihno kohdo mwowehsang ni ahnsou me Kauno ketin kapingada lokaiah kan ni Doulik en Papilon. Pwihn wet kin adaniki Mehn Sared akan. Mwurin sounpar kid kei, koaros kamwomwala ihte me luhwehdi Mehn Leimen kan, oh irail iei kisehn kadaudoken mehn Indian kan nan Amerika.

Poadoapoad me keieu kesempwal nan Pwuhk en Mormon iei ahnsou me Kauno Sises Krais ketin pwarohng oh kalohkehng mehn Nihpai kan mwurinte E ketin iasadao. E ketin kasalehda padahk kan en rongamwahuo, duwen koasondi en komourla, oh mahsanihong aramas akan dahme irail pahn anahne wia pwe irail en alehdi popohl nan mour wet oh komour soutuk nan mour me pahn kohdo.

Mwurin Mormon eh kaimwseklahr eh nting kan, e ahpw kihongehr poadoapoado rehn nah pwutak Moronai, me kapatahiongehr ekei pein eh koasoi kan oh ekihla pileit kan ni Aul en Kumora. Nan Septempe 21, 1823, Moronaiohte, me wialahr aramas lingaling oh iasada, pwarohng Soukohp Sosep Smith oh kaweidiki duwen poadoapoad en kawao oh duwen e pahn kawehwehdiong ni mahsen en wai.

Pileit ko ahpw kohieng Sosep Smith, me kawehwehdier sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Koht. Poadoapoad wet ntingdahr nan lokaia tohto nin duwen eh wia kadehde kapw oh kapatapat me Sises Krais iei Sapwellimen Koht ieiaso oh me koaros me pahn kohdo Reh oh peikiong kosonned kan oh tiahk sarawi kan en Sapwellime rongamwahu pahn komourla.

Soukohp Sosep Smith koasoia duwen poadoapoad wet ni eh nda: “I ndaiong riei kan me Pwuhk en Mormon iei pwuhk me keieu pwung nan sampah, oh wia takai poahsoan en atail lamalam, oh aramas pahn karanihala Koht sang ni ar pahn momouriki padahk en kaweid kan me mih loale sang [padahk en] pwuhk teikan.”

Pwe en patehng Sosep Smith, Kauno ketin piladahr aramas ehk-emen en pein kilang kohl pileit ko oh wia sounkadehde kesempwal kei ong mehlel oh sarawi en Pwuhk en Mormon. Ntingdi en arail kadehdeh kan iang patehng met ni oaralape “Kadehde en meh Silimeno” oh “Kadehde en meh Welimeno.”

Se luke aramas koaros sang wasa koaros en wadek Pwuhk en Mormon, oh en doandoaropwe nan mohngiongarail kan rohng me mih loale, oh peki rehn Koht, Sahm Soutuk, ni mwaren Krais ma pwuhk wet mehlel. Irail me idawehn kaweid wet oh peki ni pwoson pahn alehda kadehdepen eh mehlel oh manaman sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawio. (tehk Moronai 10:3–5.)

Irail kan me pahn alehda kadehde sarawi wet sang Ngehn Sarawi pahn pil esehda sang ni manamanohte me Sises Krais iei Soukomour en sampah, me Sosep Smith iei Sapwellime sounkaudiahl oh soukohp ni imwin rahn akan, oh me Mwomwohdiso en Sises Krais en Souleng en Imwin rahn akan iei wehin Kauno me pwurehngehr wiawihda pohn sampah, kaukaunopohng Ketido Keriau en Mesaiao.
three 0:
[center][font_size=26]Kadehde en meh Silimeno[/font_size][/center]

En wehwehiong wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros, ong me doadoahk wet pahn lellohng: Me sang ni kalahngan en Koht Sahmo, oh atail Kaun Sises Krais, se kilangehr pileit kan me audaudiki poadoapoad wet, me wia poadoapoad en aramas en Nihpai, oh pil Mehn Leimen kan, riarail kan, oh pil aramas en Sared kan, me kohdo sang ni douliko me koasoiepe wiawiher. Oh se pil ese me e kawehwehdahr sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Koht, pwe pein kepitie me mahsanihong kiht; eri se ese ni mehlel me doadoahko mehlel. Oh se pil kadehdehki me se kilangehr nting kan me mih pohn pileit kan; oh e kasansalohng kiht sang ni manaman en Koht, oh kaidehn aramas. Oh se kalohngki sang ni koasoi mehlel, me tohnleng en Koht patohdihdo sang nanleng, oh e patohwando oh pwilikihdi mwohn mesat kat, kahrehda se kilang oh kadehde pileit kan, oh nting kan powe; oh se ese me iei sang ni kalahngan en Koht Sahmo, oh atail Kaun Sises Krais, me se kilangki oh kadehdehki me mepwukat mehlel. Oh e wia mehkot kapwuriamwei nan masat. Ahpw, kepitien Kauno mahsanihong kiht me sen kadehdehki; eri, pwe sen peikiong sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, se kadehdehki mepwukat. Oh se ese me ma se pahn loaloapwoatehng Krais, se pahn kamwakelsang ntahn aramas koaros pohn aht likou kan, oh dierek mwakelekel mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais, oh pahn mihmihla reh nanleng kohkohlahte. Oh wahu koaros ong Sahmo, oh Sapwellime Iehros, oh Ngehn Sarawi, me iei Kohtehmen. Ahmen.

Oliver Cowdery

David Whitmer

Martin Harris
eight 0:
[center][font_size=26]Kadehde en meh Welimeno[/font_size][/center]

En wehwehiong wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros, ong me doadoahk wet pahn lellohng: Me Sosep Smith, Jun., me kawehwehdier doadoahk wet, kasalehiongehr kiht pileit kan me koasoiepe wiawiher, me mih ni mwomwen kohl; oh nin duwen tohtohn tehn pileit kan me Sosep Smith kawehwehdier, se doahkehkier peht kan; oh se pil kilangehr lipwen nting kan powe, soahng koaros kasalehda doadoahk en keilahn aio, oh e kaselehda doadoahk en aramas koahiek. Oh met se wiahki aht kadehde ni koasoi mehlel, me Sosep Smith kasalehiong kiht, pwe se kilangehr oh kolehr, oh ese ni mehlel me Sosep Smith alehdier pileit kan me se koasoiahier. Oh se kasalehiong sampah adat akan, pwe en kadehdehiong sampah me se kilangehr pileit ko. Oh se sohte likamw, Koht ketin mwahngih mehlel.

Christian Whitmer

Jacob Whitmer

Peter Whitmer, Jun.

John Whitmer

Hiram Page

Joseph Smith, Sen.

Hyrum Smith

Samuel H. Smith
js 0:
[center][font_size=26]Kadehde en Soukohp Sosep Smith[/font_size][/center]

Pein ehn Soukohp Sosep Smith koasoi kan ong duwen kohdahn Pwuhk en Mormon iei duwe met:

“Ni soutik en … Septempe rieisek-ehu [1831] … I pein kapakap oh pekipeki ni karakarahk rehn Koht Wasa Lapalahpie. …

“Ni ahnsou me I wie kapakapiong Kauno, I diaradahr marain ehu pwaradahr nan ei pereo, me wie maramarainla lao e marain sang marain en souwas, ni ahnsouo aramas emen mwadangete pwarada limwahn ei pehto, keskesihnen nan wehwe, nehkan sohte sair nan tahto.

“E likouki likou puhp ehu me keieu pwetepwet. Me inenen pwetepwet sang mehkoaros me I kilangehr nan sampah; oh I sohte kamehlele me mie mehkot nan sampah me kin pwetepwetala oh linganla duwehte met. Patapa ten pehkan sansal, oh pil peh kan, ekiste pohn angin tepin tupwengen peh; oh pil paten nehkan me pil wie sansal, oh pil duwehte ekiste keidahsang ni koakon en pateneh kan. Moange oh tepinwere pil wie sansal. I kak kilang me sohte ehu likou me e likauih ihte likou puhp wet, nin duwen eh sansal, I kak kilang nan mwarmwarehu.

“Kaidehnte eh likou puhpo me pwetepwet mehlel, ahpw paliwere pwon me lingan sang mehkoaros oh ni mehlel pohn mesehu duwehte lioal. Nan pereo marainla mehlel, ahpw sohte duwehte marain me wie kapkapil ohlo. Ahnsou me I tepin kilangada ohlo; I ahpw masakada, ahpw ahnsou mwadang ei masako sohrasang ie.

“E likweri kin ie edei oh padahkiong ie me ih iei meninkeder men me pedekerdohng ie sang rehn Koht, oh ede iei Moronai; oh e koasoia me mie spawellimen Koht doadoahk ehu me I pahn wia; oh me edeiet pahn kin mwahu oh suwed nan wehi koaros, keinek koaros, oh lokaia koaros, de me aramas akan pahn kin koasoiahki mehkot mwahu oh suwed.

“E koasoia me mie pwuhk ehu serdier, nting kan mihmi pohn pileit kohl kan me audaudiki poadoapoad en tohn sahpwo keilahn aio oh wasa me irail tepisang ie. E pil kosoia me Rongamwahuo poatoapoat unseko mihmi loale, nin duwen Sounkomouro e ketikihongehr tohn wasao keilahn aio;

“Pil mie takai riau me mih pohn mehn iroir ehu me wiawihkihda silper ni mwomwen kesiketieu—oh takai riau wet, katengetengieng mehn perepen nan mwaramware ieu, me wiahda Urim oh Dummim—me seridier iangahki pileit ko; oh mehmen me pahn kolokol oh doadoahngki takai pwukat ih me kin wia ‘ohl sarawi’ keilahn aio de nan mwein kawa; oh me Koht ketin kaunopadahr ong kawehwehdi en pwuhko. …

“E pil pwurehng indahiong ie, me ahnsou me I pahn alehda pileit ko me e koasoiahier—pwe ahnsou me re pahn alahldi saikinte lelledo—I sohte pahn kasalehiong emen aramas; pil iangahki mehn perehpen nan mwaramwaro iangahki Urim oh Dummimo; ihte ong irail kan me I pahn mweimweiong en kasalehiong irail; ma I pahn wia I pahn kamwomwala. Ni ahnsou me e wie koasoakoasoiahiong ie duwen pileit ko, kaudiahl ehu pwarada nan ei madamadau kahrehda I kak kilang wasa me pileit ko seridi ie, oh I ese wasahu ni marain oh sansal mehlel ahnsou me I kohla wasahu.

“Mwurin aht koasoi pene, I diaradahr me marain en nan pereo tepier kohpene limwahn ohlo me wie koasoakoasoi ong ie, oh e wiwiahte mwo lao pereo pwurehng rotorotala, ihte limwah me sohte iang rotorotala; ni ahnsouohte I mwadangete kilangada ahl ehu pa ritpeseng nanleng, ih eri kokohdahla lao e sohrala douluhl, oh nan pereo pwuralahng ni mwomwehu mwohn marain en nanleng wet e pwarada.

“I wendi oh medemedewe duwen dahme I kilangehr, oh I medemedewe laud dahme meninkeder kesempwal menet kasalehiongehr ie; oh nan werengen ei wie medemedewe, I mwadangete diarada me ei pereo pil pwurehng wie maramarainda, oh ni ahnsouohte, meninkederohte pil pwurehng miher mpen ei pehto.

“E tepihada, oh pil pwurehng koasoiahdo soahngohte me wiahier ni eh tepin pwarohng ie, sohte kisin wekila ieu mie, eri ni ahnsou me nekiero, e ahpw padahkihong ie duwen kalokolok lap akan me pahn pwarada nan sampah, me pahn sang kahpwal lap akan en lehk, mahwin, oh soumwahu; oh me kalokolok apwal pwukat pahn kohdohng pohn sampah nan dih wet. Mwurin eh koasoiahier mepwukat, e ahpw pwurehng pwuradahla ni mwohmwohte me e wiahier mwowe.

“Sang ni ahnsou wet, I wendier oh pwuriamweikilahr mehlel duwen me I kilangehr oh rongehr nin duwen dahme wiawiher me inen loal nan ei madamadau me kahrehda I sohte kak meirkihla. Ahpw I pwuriamweikihla ahnsou me I pil pwurehng kilangada meninkederohte limwahn ei pehto, oh rong eh pwurehng kasalehda de kapwurehiong irehkohte me e kasaledahr mwowe; oh kapatahiong peneu en kaparkinie, me Sehdan pahn song en kasongosonge ie (pwehki irair en semwemwe me ei pahpa eh peneinei ahneki), en alehdi pileit kan pwe en kepwehpwehkihla. Met e keinapwih sang ie, ndinda me I sohte pahn medewe ehu soang en madamadau nan ei pahn ale pileit kan liki kalinganahla Koht, oh sohte pahn mwekidiki ehu soang tohrohr liki kaukauwada sapwellime wehi; ma soh, I sohte pahn kak alehdi.

“Mwurin kesilipak en eh pwarek ie, e pil pwuradahla nanleng duwehte me e wiahier mahso, oh ngei pwurehng kelehpwla oh medemedewe irair kapwuriamwei me I aptehn lellohng; mwurin ahnsouohte ni en meninkedero eh kesilipak en pwuradala sang rehi, maleko pa koakorot, oh I diaradahr me ni sohrahnehr, eri aht wie kosoakoasoipene udahn pahn mihmi ni erein pwohngo pwon.

“Mwurinte ei piridahsang pohn ei pehto, oh I kolahr pwe I en wia doadoahk kan me I kin kalapw wia nan ehu ehu rahn, ahpw ni ei song en wia ei doadoahk me I kin wia kan, I diaradahr me ei kehl solahr mie oh I ahpw solahr kak [wia ei doadoahk]. Ei pahpao, me wie doadoahk limwahi, diaradahr me mie mehkot sapwung rehi, ih eri ndahng ie I en kohla nihmwo. I ahpw tepida kohkohla nihmwo; ahpw, ni ei song kotehieila kehlo sang nan mwetuwelo wasa me se mihe, ei kehl koaros sohrasang ie, I ahpw pwupwidiongehr pohn pwehlo, oh ni ahnsou kis I sohla kehn mehkot.

“Tepin mehkot me I kak tamanda iei ngihl ehu me peidohng ie, ekehker edeie. I ahpw saradahr, oh kilangadahr meninkederohte me wie kesikesihnen pohn moangei, marain kapilpene duwehte mwowehsang. E ahpw padahkihong ie mehkoaros me e padahkihong ie pwohngo, oh kehkehlikihong ie me I en kohla rehn ei pahpao oh ndaiong ih sansal oh kosonned akan me I alehdahr.

“I peikiong ih; ngehi eri pwurala rehn ei pahpao nan mwetuwelo, oh padahkihongehr ih mehkoaros. Ih eri sapengki me met iei kupwuren Koht, oh e koasoia me I en kohla oh doadoahngki duwen kehkehlik en meninkedero. I ahpw mweseldahsangehr nan mwetuwelo, oh kolahng wasa me meninkedero padahkihong ie me pileitko seridi ie; I ese wasahu ni ahnsouohte me I lel mwo pwehki eh sansal mwahu nan kaudiahlo me I alehdi.

“Mie dohl ehu me saise mwahu oh me keieu ileile nan kousapwo, me karanihte kahnihmw en Manchester, New York. Ni pali kapi en aulo, pahnanginte koadokehu, pileitko seridihte nan kohpwahn takai ehu, pahn takai sais mwahu ehu. Takai wet me mosul oh pwonopwon nan werengehu wasa me pwerpwerda, oh menipinipla kohiei ni keileh kan, kahrehda nan werengehu me sansal pohn pwehlo, ahpw pwehlo saripidi ni keileh kan koaros.

“Mwurin ei oarehsang pwehlo, I ahpw ale lepin tuhke ehu, oh katengehiong pahn keilen takaio, oh pwisikada. I ahpw kilenglong loale, ngehi ahpw kilangada pileit ko, Urim oh Dummimo, oh mehn perehpen nan mwaramwaro, nin duwen meninkedero eh koasoia. Kohpwa me dipwsou ko mih loale wiawihkihda koaskoasok en takai me katengetengkipene soangen siment ehu. Nan kapin kohpwahu takai riau koasoansoandier, oh pileit ko oh soahng teikan koasoansoandier pohn takai pwukat.

“I song en kihsang dipwsou pwukat loale, ahpw meninkedero sohte mweidehng ie, oh pwurehng ndaiong ie me ahnsou en ale dipwsou pwukat saikinte lel, oh e sohte pahn wiawi, lao lel mwurin sounpar pahieu sang ahnsouo; ahpw e ndaiong ie me I pahn kohdo wasahu mwurin sounpar ehu sang ahnsouo, oh me e pahn tuhwong ie, oh me I pahn wiahte soahngo lao lel ahnsou me I pahn alehda pileit ko.

“Nin duwen kehkehlik me wiawihong ie, I kohla wasahu ni imwin ehu ehu pahr, oh nan ehu ehu ahnsou ko I kin tuhwon meninkederohte mwo, oh alehdi kaweid oh kamarain sang reh nan ehu ehu tuhpene ko, duwen dahme Kauno pahn ketin wia, oh ia pahn oh mwomwen sapwellime wehi eh pahn doadoahk ni imwin rahn akan. …

“Kedekedeo ahnsou en alehda pileit ko, Urim oh Dummimo, oh mehn perehpen nan mwaramwaro ahpw lel. Ni Septempe rieisek-riau, kid welipwiki rieisek-isuh, mwurin ei kin pwurupwure wasa me dipwisou ko seridi ie ni imwin ehu ehu pahr, meninkeder en nanlengohte ahpw kihong ie I en apwalih: me I pahn pwukoahki dipwisou ko; me ma I pahn mweidala ni sohte keneinei, de sang ni ei soukautih, I pahn lekidekla; ahpw ma I pahn doadoahngki ei kak koaros en apwalih mwahu, lao, meninkedero, pahn pwurehng ale irail, re udahn pahn silasildi.

“Ahnsou mwadang I esehda kahrepen ei alehdi kehkehlik kehlail me I en apwalih mwahu dipwisou ko, oh kahrepen meninkedero e nda me ahnsou me I pahn neksang dahme anahnepe I pahn wia, e pahn pwurehng ale irail. Pwe sohte pwand koaros esehier me I kolokol dipwisou ko, kahrehda irail doadoahngki arail kehlail unsek pwe irail en kihsang ie. Soangen koasondi koaros me kin kak wiawihda re song en doadoahngkihong pwe re en kihsang ie. Kalokolok en kailoko kamedekla oh doarasang mwowe, oh aramasoko kin wie songosong en kihsang ie ma kak. Ahpw sang ni eripit en Koht, dipwisou ko wie ekiek mwahu rehi, lao I kanekehla dahme anahnepe sang rehi. Nin duwen koasondi kan, ahnsou me meninkedero malipe I en wahla, I ahpw wahla dipwisou ko reh; oh ih me pwukoaki kolokol dipwisou ko lel rahn wet, ni keriau en rahn en May, kid welipwiki silisek-waluh.”

Ong soiepe me ekis unsek sang met, tehk Sosep Smith—Poadoapoad nan Takai Kesempwal Ehu.

Poadoapoad en keilahn aio me kohsangehr nan pwehl rasohng ngihl en aramas ehu me koasoakoasoi sang nan pwehl, oh kawehwehdiongehr ni mahsen en ahnsou wet sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Koht me pein Ihr ketin mahsaniher, tepin ntingda ong sampah ni lokaiahn wai nan pahr 1830 nin duwen The Book of Mormon.
explanation 0:
[center][font_size=26]Kawehweh Oaralap Duwen Pwuhk en Mormon[/font_size][/center]

Pwuhk en Mormon iei ehu poadoapoad sarawi en aramas akan nan Amerika keilahn aio oh ntingdier pohn pileit mete kei. Pileit kan me poadoapoad pwukat kohsang iei me mih pah:

Pileit kan en Nihpai, me wia soahng riau: pileit tikitik kan oh pileit laud kan. Me tepo audaudki soahng kan me doke palingehn oh kalohk oh padahngkan en soukohp kan, ah me keriau audaudki pali laud soang poadoapoad en momour en aramas akan (1 Nihpai 9:2–4). Ahpw, sang ni mwehi en Mosaia, pileit laud ko pil audaudiki soahng kan me kesempwalohng palingehn.

Pileit en Mormon, me audaudiki oaralap ehu sang rehn Mormon me kohsang nein Nihpai pileit laud ko, iangahki peineh madamadau tohto kan. Pileit pwukat pil audaudiki peuspen poadoapoad sang rehn Mormon oh kapatahieng sang rehn nah pwutak Moronai.

Pileit en Ihder, me kasaledahr duwen poadoapoad en Mehn Sared kan. Moronai oaralapiadahr poadoapoad wet, oh kapatahieng pein eh madamadau kan oh kapatahieng ntingko nan poadoapoad pwon nan pwuhk me adaniki “Pwuhk en Ihder.”

Prahs Pileit kan me nein Lihai aramas akan wahdo sang Serusalem nan pahr 600 Mwohn Krais. Mepwukat audaudiki “Pwuhk en Moses limauo, … oh pil poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan sangete ni tapio, … kohdi lel ni tepidahn mwehi en Sedekaia, nanmwarki en Suhda; oh pil kokohp akan en soukohp sarawi ko” (1 Nihpai 5:11–13). Tohto iren mahsen kan me kohsang nan pileit pwukat, kosoia mahsen en Aiseia oh ekei soukohp kan me ntingdi nan Paipel oh pil sohte ntingdi loale, me pwaradahr nan Pwuhk en Mormon.

Pwuhk en Mormon wiawikihdahr pali eisek-limau me sansal, ihte ehu me soh, ehu ehu pwuhk kan kohieng ede sang eden aramaso me ntingihda. Pali keieu (pwuhk weneu me tepin irekdi lel Omnai) iei kawehwehda sang nan nein Nihpai pileit tikitik ko. Nan pwungen pwuhk kan en Omnai oh Mosaia iei Mahsen en Mormon me e kapatahieng. Kapatapat wet kadokepene poadoapoad me ntingdi pohn pileit tikitik ko iangahki oaralap en pileit laud ko me Mormon wiahda.

Pali me keieu reirei, sang Mosaia lel Mormon iralaud 7, iei kawehwehdahn ehn Mormon oaralapih pileit en Nihpai laud ko. Pali me kaimsekalao, sang Mormon iralaud 8 lel ni imwin pwuhko pwon, ntingda sang Moronai nein Mormon pwutak, me, mwurin eh kanekehla nting en poadoapoad en eh pahpao, e ahpw wiahda oaralap en poadoapoad en Mehn Sared (me adaniki pwuhk en Ihder) oh mwuhr ahpw kapatahiong pali me kahdaniki pwuhk en Moronai.

Mwein ele nan pahr 421 mwurin ipwidi en Krais, Moronai, me wia lahs en Mehn Nihpai soukohp-sounpoad, katengepene poadoapoado oh ekihla rehn Kauno, pwe en kohdo ni imwin rahn akan, nin duwen kepitien Koht eh ketin mahsanih sang rehn Sapwellime soukohp en kawa ko. Nan pahr 1823 mwurin iwpidi en Krais, ihte Moronaio, me wialahr aramas iasada, pwarohng Soukohp Sosep Smith oh mwuhr ahpw kihong ih pileit me ntingda ko.

Duwen pwuhk me. Tepin teh oaralapo, me kohdo mwurin tehn audepen kan, kohsang nan pileit ko oh e wia kisehn nting sarawio. Mehn kapehse kan me sohte mih ni nting italic, me duwehte 1 Nihpai oh mwurinte Mosaia iralaud 9, pil iang wia kisehn nting sarawio. Mehn kapehse kan me mih ni nting en italic, me duwehte nan oaralap en iralaud kan, e sohte wia kisehn tepin ntingko ahpw e wia mehn sawas ong onop pwe en sewese ni ahnsou en wadawad.

Mie ekei kisin sapwungala kan me mih nan Pwuhk en Mormon me wiawidahr mwowe kan me ntingdahr ni lokaian wai. Wiawihda wet audaudiki kopwungupwungla kan me konehng pwe en kak kapahrekihong ntingko me wiawihda mwohn e kohieng nan pwuhk oh pil kapahrekihong me Soukohp Sosep Smith kapwungala mwowe kan.
1-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Keieu en Pwuhk en Nihpai[/font_size][/center]

Ah Mwehi oh Doadoahk

Duwen Lehi oh ah werek Sariah, oh nah pwutak pahmen, oh iet adarail kan, (tepsang me laud) Leimen, Lemuel, Sam, oh Nihpai. Kauno kapariki Lihai en kohkohlahsang nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwehki e kohpada suwed en aramas ako oh irail song en kawehla ah mour. E wahda ah peneinei oh seiseiloangki rahn siluh nan sapwtehno. Nihpai kahrehda rie pwutak kau oh pwurala nan sahpw en Serusalem pwe re en ale poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan. Duwen arail lokolok kan. Irail pwoudkihda nein Isimael serepein kan. Irail wahda arail peneinei kan oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno. Arail lokolok kan oh kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno. Ahl me irail seiseiloak loalle. Irail lella ni sehdo. Rien Nihpai pwutak kau akupwungieng. E katokeirahdi, oh wiahda sohp pwoat. Irail kahdaniki wasahu Paundipul [de Sapwen Rahk]. Irail kotehla sehdo oh kolahng nan sahpw en inouo, oh pil soahng teikan. Met iei duwen ahn Nihpai nting; me wehweki ngehi, Nihpai, me ntingihdi poadoapoad wet.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai tapiada ntingihedi poadoapoad en nah aramas akan—Lihai kilangada nan kaudiahl uhr en kisiniei ehu oh wadekasang nan pwuhk en kokohp ehu—E kepinga Koht, kohpada ketidohn Mesaiao, oh kohpada kamwomwalahn Serusalem—Mehn Suhs akan kailongkihla. Ele Sounpar 600 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ngehi, Nihpai, ipwidisangehr nohno oh pahpa mwahu, I esehlahr mehkoaros me ei papaho kaskuhlikinie; oh I kilangehr kahpwal tohto nan ei mour, ahpw, pwehki ei kenikenlamehlel rehn Kauno rahn koaros; iei, pwehki ei wehwehkihla laud duwen sapwellimen Koht kalahngan oh me rir kan, kahrehda I wiahda poadoapoaden ei wiewia kan nan ei mwehi.

2 Iei, I wiahda ehu poadoapoad ni lokaia me ei pahpa kin doadoahngki, me audaudki kaskuhl en mehn Suhs akan oh lokaiahn mehn Isip kan.

3 Oh I ese me poadoapoad me I ntingiada e mehlel; oh I pein wiahkihda pehi kat; oh I wiahda nin duwen ei loalekeng.

4 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn keieun pahr en mwehi en Sedekaia, [me wia] nahnmwarki en Suda, (ei pahpao, Lihai, kin koukousoan erein pahr tohto kei nan Serusalem); oh nan pahrohte soukohp tohto kohdo, kokohp ong aramas akan me irail anahne koluhla, pwe ma soh a kahnimw en Serusalempahn kamwomwomwla.

5 Eri kedekedeo ei pahpao, Lihai, ni eh patohla, e ahpw kapakap ong Kauno, mehlel, sang nan ah mohngiong unsek, pwehki nah aramas akan.

6 Kedekedeo ni eh kapakap ong Kauno, uhr en kisiniei ehu pwarada oh mih pohn paip ehu mwohwe; oh soahng tohto e kilangada oh rongada; oh pwehki soahng kan me e rongehr oh kilangehr kahrehda e mwekidida oh rerer kouwahlap.

7 Oh kedekedeo e pwurala ni imweo nan Serusalem; oh wendi pohn dowe pehto, pwehki eh inenen direkihla Ngehno oh soahng kan me e kilangadahr.

8 Oh pwehki [ah] direkihla Ngehno, e mihla nan kaudiahl ehu, ih eri kilangada nanleng eh ritpeseng, oh e medewe me e kilangada Koht ketiket pohn mwoaleo, oh tohnleng ngedehriekapelpene oh wie kokoul oh kepikepinga arail Koht.

9 Kedekedeo e kilangada Emen eh ketiketdihdohsang nanleng, oh e kilangada me sapwellime maraino lingan sang marain en ketipin nisouwas.

10 Oh e pil kilangada meh ehk-riemen ar ideidawehn ih, oh marainparail lingan sang marain en usu kan nanleng.

11 Oh irail ketdihdo oh ketiketseli pohn sampah; oh me keieuo ketido oh uh mwohn ei pahpao, oh ketikihong pwuhk ehu, oh mahsaniheng en wadek.

12 Kedekedeo nindoken eh wie wadwadek, e ahpw direkihla Ngehn en Kauno.

13 Oh e wadek, ketihtihki: Meid suwed, meid suwed, ong Serusalem, pwehki I kilangadahr ahmw suwed akan! Ei, oh soahng tohto me ei pahpao wadekadahr me pid duwen Serusalem—me e pahn kamwomwomwla, iangahki towe kan me kin koukouson wasao; tohto me pahn kamakamkihla kedlahs, oh tohto me pahn sellahng Papilon.

14 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ei pahpao wadekehr oh kilangehr soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei tohto, e ahpw kepingahki Kauno soahng tohto; me duwehte; Sapwellimahr doadoahk kan me kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei mehlel, Maing Kaun Koht Wasa Lapalahpie! Mwoalemwi me ileile nanleng, oh sapwellimahr manaman, oh kupwur sapan, oh kupwur kalahngan kohieng aramas koaros pohn sampah; oh, pwehki sapwellimomwi kalahngan, Re sohte pahn ketin mweidohng irail akan me kohdo rehmwi irail en kamwomwomwla!

15 Oh ih mwomwen koasoai me ei pahpao kepikepingahkihong Koht; pwehki palingenio uhdahn pereperen, oh ah mohngiong direkihla Ngehno, pwehki soahng kan me e kilangehr, iei, me Kauno ketin kasalehiong ih.

16 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte ntingihdi soahng koaros me ei pahpao ntingiedier, pwe e ntingiedier soahng tohto me e kilangada nan kaudiahl oh ouraman kan; oh e pil ntingiedi soahng tohto me e kohpadahr oh kaweidiki nah seri kan, ihme kahrehda I sohte pahn ntingiedi ni unsek.

17 Ahpw I pahn ntingiedi duwen ei wiewia kan nan ei mwehi. Kilahng, I pahn wiahda poadoapoadmwotomwot en ei pahpao, pohn pileit kan me I pein wiahkihda pehi kat; eri, mwurin ei pahn wiahda poadoapoad mwotomwot en ei pahpao I ahpw pahn uhd ntingiedi duwen pein ei mour.

18 Eri, I men kumwail en ese, me mwurin Kauno eh ketin kasalehiongehr ei pahpa, Lihai, soahng kopwuriamwei tohto, iei, duwen kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem, kilang e kohla rehn aramas akan, oh tepda kokohp oh kasalehiong irail duwen soahng kan me e kilangehr oh rongehr.

19 Kedekedeo mehn Suhs akan ahpw kepitki pwehki soahng kan me e kadehdehiongehr irail; pwe e kadehdehiong irail ni mehlel duwen arail wiewia suwed akan oh arail sapwung kan; oh e kadehdehki me soahng kan me e kilangehr oh rongehr, oh pil soahng kan me e wadekehr nan pwuhko kasaledahr ni sansal duwen ketidohn Mesaia men, oh pil poadoandoarlahn sampah.

20 Oh ahnsou me mehn Suhs akan rongehr mepwukat irail ahpw lingeringerda pah; ei, duwehte dahme wiawihongehr soukohp en mahs oko, me irail kausalahr, oh koastakaier, oh kemelahr; oh irail pil rapahki wiepen arail pahn kemehla ih. Ahpw kilang, ngehi, Nihpai, pahn kasalehiong kumwail me sapwellimen Kauno limpoakkalahngan kan miehr rehn koaros me E ketin piladahr, pwehki arail pwoson, pwe en kihong irail en kehlail pwe irail en kak komourla.
1-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai wahla ah peneinei nan sapwtehno limwahn Sehd Weitahta—Irail kohkohlahsang arail dipwisou kan—Lihai wiahda meirong ong Kauno oh padahkihong nah pwutak kan re en kapwaiada kosonned akan—Leiman oh Lemuel kaulimki arail pahpao—Nihpai peik oh kapakap ni pwoson; Kauno mahsenieng ih, oh e pilipildahr en kaunda rie pwutak kan. Ele Sounpar 600 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe kilang, kedekedeo Kauno mahsenieng ei pahpao nan ouraman ehu, oh mahsanih: Mehd pai kowe, Lihai, pwehki soahng kan me ke wiadahr; oh pwehki ahmw loaloapwoat oh ahmw kalohkiheng aramas akan soahng kan me I padahkihong uhk, kilang, irail songosong kemeiukala.

2 Kedekedeo Kauno mahsaniheng ei pahpao, nan ouramano, me e uhdahn pahn wahda ah peneinei oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

3 Kedekedeo ohlo ahpw peikieng mahsen en Kauno, ih eri kapwaiada dahme Kauno mahsaniheng en wia.

4 Kedekedeo e ahpw mweselahngehr nan sapwtehno. Oh e kohkohlahsang imweo, oh sapwe sahpw me e sohsohki, oh nah kohl, oh nah silper, oh ah dipwisou kesempwal akan, oh e sohte wahda mehkot, ihte ah peneinei, oh kenerail mwenge, oh imwarail impwal akan, oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

5 Oh e kohdihla limwahn oaroahr en Sehd Weitahtao; oh e seiseiloak ni irepen saptehno limwahn Sehd Weitahtao; oh ah peneinei iang seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, ei nohno, Saraia, oh riei pwutak laudko, Leimen, Lemuel, oh Sam.

6 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e seiloangkiher rahn siluh nan sapwtehno, e ahpw kauwada imwe impwalo nan wahu ehu ni keilen pillapo.

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw wiahda pehi sarawi ehu, oh wia meirong ehu ong Kauno, oh kaping kalahngan ong Kauno aht Koht.

8 Kedekedeo e ahpw kihengehr eden pillapo, Leimen, oh e kin pwilipwilla nan Sehd Weitahta; oh wahuo mihte limwahn irepen sahpwo karanihte ewen pillapo.

9 Oh ahnsou me ei pahpao kilangada me pillapo pwilipwilla nan Sehd Weitahtao, e patohwanohng Leimen, ketihtihki: O [I men] ke en kak duwehte pillap pwoatet, me kin pwilipwilwei ahnsou koaros nan utuhnpil en pwung koaros!

10 Oh e pil ndahieng Lemuel: O [I men] ke en kak duwehte wahu wet, me tengetengedi oh kehlail, oh tengediong kolokol sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan!

11 E koasoia met pwehki Leimen oh Lemuel ara keptakai; pwe kilang soahng tohto me ira kaulimahki ara pahpao, pwehki e wia ohl en kaudiahl men, oh e kahluwairail sang nan Serusalem, sang nan sapwerail sahpw en sohso, oh neirail kohl, oh neirail silper, oh arail dipwisou kesempwal akan, pwe re en mehla nan sapwtehno. Oh ira koasoaia me e wia met pwehki madamadau likamw akan en ah mohngiongo.

12 Oh met Leimen oh Lemuel, me keieu laud, kaulima ara pahpao. Oh ira kaulima pwehki ira sohte ese duwen wiewia kan en Kohto me ketin kapikirahda.

13 Ira pil sohte kamehlele me Serusalem, kahnimw kehlailo, kak kamwomwomwla nin duwen mahsen en kokohp en soukohp oko. Oh ira duwehte mehn Suhs akan me mihmi Serusalem, me song kihsang mour en ei pahpao.

14 Kedekedeo ei pahpao ahpw panawihrahier nan wahu en Lemuel, sang ni manaman, pwehki eh direkihla Ngehno, lao paliwarara ko rerada mwowe. Oh ira pwuriamweikihla eh penouo, ihme kahrehda ira masak akipwungieng ih; kahrehda, ira wia dahme e ndahieng ira en wia.

15 Oh ei pahpao kin kousoan nan impwal ieu.

16 Kedekedeongehi, Nihpai, ime pwulopwul mehlel, ahpw paliwereiet me lapala, oh pil inangih mehlel esehla duwen merir en Koht akan, eri, ngehi peki rehn Kauno; oh kilang e ketin pwarohngie, oh ketikihdo popohl nan ei mohngiong kahrehda I kamehlele koasoai koaros me ei pahpao koasoaiahier; eri, I sohte kahngohdihong duwehte riei pwutak ko.

17 Oh I koasoaiong Sam, kehsehki soahng kan me Kauno ketin kasalehongie sang rehn sapwellime Ngehn Sarawio. Kedekedeo e ahpw kamehlelehla ei koasoai kan.

18 Ahpw, kilang, Leimen oh Lemuel sohte men rong ei koasoi kan; oh pwehki ei nsensuwedikihla uwen ara keptakai, I kapakapikinira ong Kauno.

19 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsendohngie, mahsanih: Mehd pai kowe, Nihpai, pwehki ahmw pwoson, pwehki ahmw nannantihong rapahkinie, ni mohngiong karakarahk.

20 Oh sang ni ahmwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, kumwail pahn pweida, oh [I] pahn kaluwaikumwailahng nan sahpw en inouo; iei, sahpw ehu me I kaunopadahng kumwail; iei, sahpw ehu me wia sahpw pilipil nan pwungen sahpw koaros.

21 Oh ma riomw kan pahn kahngohdihenguhk, irail pahn lekideklahsang mwohn silangin Kauno.

22 Oh sang ni omw pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, ke pahn wiahla kaun oh sounpadahk ong riomw pwutak kan.

23 Pwe kilang, ni rahno me re pahn kahngohdihongie, I pahn keriahkinirailla keriahkalok ehu, oh irail sohte pahn ahniki manaman en kaunda kadaudokemw kan ihte ma irail pil pahn kahngohdiongie.

24 Oh ma irail kahngohdihongie, irail pahn kaloke kadaudokemw kan, pwe en kamwakid irail en tamanda koasoandi kan.
1-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nein Lihai pwutak ko pwurala Serusalem pwe re en ale pirahs pileit ko—Leipen kahng kiheng irail pileit ko—Nihpai kangoange oh kakehlaka rie pwutak ko—Leipen pirapahsang arail dipwsou ko oh song en kemeirailla—Leimen oh Lemuel woakih Nihpai oh Sam oh tohnleng men lipwoare ira. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, pwurasang ei koasokoasoi ong Kauno, pwuralahng ni imwen ei pahpao impwalo.

2 Kedekedeo e koasoaiong ie, ndinda: Kilang I ouramankihda ouraman ehu, [nan ouramano] Kauno poahngokihong ie me kowe oh riomw pwutak kan anahne pwurala Serusalem.

3 Pwe kilang, Leipen kolokol poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan oh pil ntingdi en kadaudok en ei pahpa kahlap ako, oh re ntingdi pohn pileit prahs ko.

4 Eri, Kauno pahngokihong ie me kowe oh riomw pwutak kan pahn kohla ni imwen Leipen, oh rapahki poadoapoad kan, oh wahdihdo wasaht nan sapwtehne.

5 Ahpw met, kilang riomw pwutak ko kaulimalahr oh ndinda me mehkot apwal ehu me I anahne sang ira; ahpw kilang kaidehn ngehi me anahne sang ira, ahpw iei kosonned en Kauno.

6 Eri kohla, samwa, oh ke ahpw pahn kenikenla mehlel rehn Kauno, pwehki ke sohte kin kaulim.

7 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ndahieng ei pahpao: I pahn kohla oh wia soahng kan me Kauno pahngokih, pwe I ese me Kauno sohte kin ketkihdo kosonned rehn aramas akan, ihte ma e pahn ketin kaunopada wiepen arail pahn kapwaiada dahme e pahngokihong irail.

8 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ei pahpao rongada koasoi pwukat e udahn perenda mehlel, pwe e ese me Kauno kapaiedahr.

9 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, oh riei pwutak wahda imwat impwal akan oh seiloakla nan sapwtehno, pwe sen kohdahla nan sahpw en Serusalem.

10 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me se lelladahla nan sahpw en Serusalem, ngehi oh riei pwutak ko kapwungada nan pwungat.

11 Oh se ahpw usuhski—ihs nanpwungat me pahn kohla ni imwen Leipeno. Kedekedeo Leimen ahpw uhsada; oh Leimen kohlongala nan imwen Leipeno, oh mwohndi nan imwehu oh koasoaieng ih.

12 Oh e peki rehn Leipen poadoapoadakan me ntingdi pohn pirahs pileit kan, me audaukihda ntingdi en kadaudok en ei pahpao.

13 Oh kilang, kedekedeo Leipen lingeringerda, oh kausasang ih nan imwehu; oh e sohte men mweidehng en ale poadoapoad ko. Eri, e ndahieng: Kilang kowe lipirap men, oh I pahn kemeiukala.

14 Ahpw Leimen tangasang reh, oh kohdo ndahieng kiht soahng kan me Leipen wiahieng. Oh se ahpw pahtoukihla mehlel, oh riei pwutak ko ahpw pahn pwuralahr rehn ei pahpao nan sapwtehno.

15 Ahpw kilang I kahukihong irail me: Ni mehlel pwehki Kauno eh ieias, oh kitail momour, kitail sohte pahn kohdihla rehn atail pahpao nan sapwtehno lao kitail kapwaiada dahme Kauno pahngokihong kitail.

16 Eri, kitail loalloapwoationg kapwaiada kosonned akan en Kauno; eri kitail kohdihla nan sapwen atail pahpao sahpw en sohsou, pwe kilang e pwilikihdi kohl oh siliper, oh soahngen dipwsou en pai kei. Oh e wiahier soahng pwukat koaros pwehki kosonned akan en Kauno.

17 Pwehki e ese me Serusalem pahn kamwomwomwla, pwehki suwed en aramas akan.

18 Pwe kilang, irail soikalahr mahsen en soukohp akan. Eri, ma ei pahpao pahn mihmihte nan sahpwo mwurin eh pahngokehng en kohkohlahsang nan sahpwo, kilang, e pahn kamakamala. Eri, e konehng en tangasang nan sahpwo.

19 Oh kilang, iei Sapwellimen Koht eripit me kitail en alehdi poadoapoad kan, pwe kitail en kak kolokolehng neitail seri kan ehn atail pahpa kahlap oko arail lokaia;

20 Pwe kitail en pil kak peusehieng irail mahsen akan me miehier sang nan dawesen soukohp sarawi kan, me kohdohng irail sang Ngehno oh manaman en Koht, sangete ni tepdahn sampah, lelledohr ahnsou wet.

21 Kedekedeo I nantihong I en panawih ira ni soahngen wiepen koasoi pwukat, pwe ira en kak loalloapwoationg kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

22 Kedekedeo se kohdihla nan sapwat sahpwo, oh kiht eri kihpene nait kohl, nait silper, oh aht dipwsou kesempwal akan.

23 Oh mwurin aht kihpene mepwukat, se pwurehng pwuradahla ni imwen Leipeno.

24 Kedekedeo se aphw pidolongalahr rehn Leipen, oh peki reh ma e kak kiheng kiht poadoapoad kan me ntingdi pohn prahs pileit kan, a se pahn kawelialihkihong nait kohl, oh silper, oh aht dipwsou kesempwal akan.

25 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Leipen kilangada aht dipwsou kan, oh pwehki eh inenen tohto mehlel, e noahrokehda, kahrehda e kauskit, oh kadar nah ladu kan re en kemeikitala, pwe en kak kihsang aht dipwsou kan.

26 Kedekedeo se tangasangehr nein Leipen ladu ko, oh se pwilikihdi aht dipwsou ko pwehki sohte aht ahnsou mwahu en wahda, oh Leipen ahnekilahr.

27 Kedekedeo se ahpw tangalahr nan sapwtehno, oh nein Leipen ladu ko sohte kolkihtdi, oh se rukila nan pwoahr en paip ehu.

28 Kedekedeo Leimen lingeringerida pahi, oh pil pahn ei pahpao; oh Lemuel pil iangala, pwehki e kin rongala ehn Leimen koasoi kan. Eri Leimen oh Lemuel wiahier koasoi sapwung tohto ong kiht riara pwutak tikitik kan, oh ira woktuhkehihkit.

29 Kedekedeo nindoken ara wokwokkihkinkiht tuhke, kilang, tohnleng en Kauno men ahpw pwaredo oh kesihnenda mwora, oh patohwanong ira, ketihtihki: Dahme kumwa kemekemehki riomwa pwutak tikitik kan lepin tuhkehn? Kumwa sehse me Kauno pilada pwe en wiahla amwa kaun, oh met pwehki amwa wiewia suwed akan? Kilang kumwail pahn pwurehng pwuradahla Serusalem, oh Kauno ahpw pahn ketkiheng kumwail Leipen.

30 Oh mwurin tohnlengo e patohieng kiht, e ahpw patpatohla.

31 Oh mwurin tohnlengo eh patpatohla, Leimen oh Lemuel pwurehng tepda kaulim oh nda: Ia mwomwen Kauno e pahn kak kiheng kitail Leipen? Kilang, e wia ohl kehlail men, oh e kak ruwese meh limehk, mehlel, e kak kemehla meh limehk; a dahme kitail sohki?
1-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno mahsanihong Nihpai en kemehla Leipen oh alehdi prahs pileit ko ni wiepen pilahn—Sohram pilada en patehng ahn Lihai peneineio nan sapwtehno. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo I ahpw ndaiong riei pwutak ko: Kitail pwuradahla Serusalem, oh kitail loaloapwoatieng kapwaiada Sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan; pwe kilang Kauno manaman sang sampah pwon, a dahme e sohte pahn manaman sang Leipen oh nah aramas limehko, ei, de pil nah aramas nen ko?

2 Eri kitail kohdahla; kitail alasang Moses me kehlail; pwe ni mehlel e lokaiahiengete pihl en Sehd Weitahtao eri sehdo ahpw pwalpeseng wiahda riau palimeing oh palimaun, oh atail pahpa kahlap oko kotehla ni arail keid pohn ngalangal, oh pitsang mour en kaludu, oh sapwellimen Parao sounpei ko eri pwakihirailla oh duhla nan Sehd Weitahtao.

3 Kilang met kumwa ese me e mehlel; oh kumwa ese me tohnleng men mahseniong kumwa; eri dahme kumwa peikasaliki? Kitail kohdahla; Kauno pahn ketin doareikitailla, duwehte atail pahpa kahlap ako, oh kemehla Leipen, duwehte mehn Isip ko.

4 Ni ahnsou me I koasoaia mepwukat, ira wie lingeringerte, oh pil doulahte kaukaulim; ahpw ira pil idawehniedahla lao se lel likin kelen Serusalem.

5 Oh e nihpwongdi ni aht lella mwo; ngehi eri ndaiong irail me re pahn rukila maslikin kehlo. Oh mwurin arail rukilahr, ngehi, Nihpai, wailong nan kahnihmwo oh kohla ni ihmwen Leipeno.

6 Oh Ngehno kahluwa ie, ni ei sohte ese soahng koaros me I pahn anahne wia.

7 Ahpw I kohlahte, oh ni ei karenlahng ihmwen Leipeno I kilangada ohl emen, oh e pwupwidier nan pwehlo mwohi, pwehki e sakaukilahr wain.

8 Oh ni ahnsou me I lella reh I diarada me Leipen mwo.

9 Oh I kilangada nah kedilahso, ngehi eri usadahsang nan kidipeo; oh mangileo wiawihkihda kohl tohr, oh mwomwen wiawihdahn kedilahso uhdahn kaselel mehlel, oh I kilang me paliweren kedilahso wiawihkihda mete sdihl me keieu mwahu.

10 Kedekedeo Ngehno eri ketin idingohng ie I en kemehla Leipen; ahpw nan ei mohngiong nda: Saik pak ehu I kemehla aramas emen. Oh I pweiek sang oh sohte men kemehla.

11 Oh Ngehno pwurehng mahsanihong ie: Kilang Kauno me ketikihenguhk ohl menet. Iei, oh I pil ese me e song en kihsang ei mour; ei, oh e sohte men kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan; oh e pil kihsangehr aht dipwisou ko.

12 Kedekedeo Ngehno pwurehng mahsanihong ie: Kemehla, pwe Kauno me ketikihonguhk ohl menet;

13 Kilang Kauno kin ketin kemehla me suwed kan pwe sapwellime koasoandi pwung kan en kak pweida. Emen aramas en kamakamala mwahusang wehi ehu eh pwupwidi oh kamwomwomwla nan arail soupwoson.

14 Oh met, ahnsou me ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr mahsen pwukat, I tamanda mahsen en Kauno me e ketin mahsanihong ie nan sapwtehno, ketihtihki: Ma kodoudokemwail kan pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, irail pahn pweida nan sahpw en inouo.

15 Mehlel, oh I pil medewehla me irail sohte pahn kak kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan nin duwen kosonned en Moses, ihte ma kosonnedo miehier rehrail.

16 Oh I pil ese me kosonned ko ntingdi pohn pileit pirahs ko.

17 Oh pil ehu, I ese me Kauno me ketikihong ie Leipen pwehki kahrepe wet—pwe I en kak alehdi poadoapoad kan nin duwen sapwellime kosonned akan.

18 Kahrehda I peikieng kepitien Ngehno, oh koledi pitenmoangen Leipeno, oh I ahpw lupungkihsang moangeo nah kedilahso.

19 Oh mwurin ei lupungkihsang moangeo nah kedilahso, I kihsang ahn Leipen likouo oh likawiada; iei, mehkoaros; oh ngehi likawiada ah tehtehn mahwino oh katengehdi ni lukopeie.

20 Oh mwurin ei wiahier met, I kohla wasahn nekid ahn Leipen dipwisou kesempwal akan. Oh ahnsou me I kohkohlahng wasahn nekid ahn Leipen dipwisou kesempwal ko, kilang, I kilangada nein Leipen soun papah me kin kol kih en wasahn nekineko. Oh ngehi eri ruwese ni ngilen Leipen, me en iangie kohla wasahn nekid dipwisou kesempwal oko.

21 Oh e wiahki me ngehi ah kauno, Leipen, pwe e kilang likou ko oh pil kedilahso me katengetendi ni lukopeie.

22 Oh e koaskoasoaiong ie me pid soumas en mehn Suhs akan, pwehki e ese me ah kauno, Leipen, kohla rehrail nisoutiko.

23 Oh I koasoaiong ih duwehte ngehi me Leipen.

24 Oh I pil ndaiong me I pahn wahla nting ko, me ntingdi pohn pileit prahs ko, rehn riei ohl laud kau, me mihmi likin kehlo.

25 Oh I pil ndaiong en idawehnie.

26 Oh e, medemedewe me I koasoakoasoaia ohl en nan mwomwohdiso, oh mehlel ngehi Leipen me I kemehlahro, eri e ahpw idawehnie.

27 Oh e koasoaiong ie pak tohto duwen soumas en mehn Suhs akan, ni ei kohkohlahng riei pwutak ko, me mihmi maslikin kehlo.

28 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Leimen kilangiehdao e inenen masepwehkada, oh pil Lemuel oh Sam. Oh irail tangasangie; pwe irail wiahki me ngehi Leipen, oh me e kemeiehlahr oh pil raparapahkinirail pwe en kemeirailla.

29 Kedekedeo I lukuwerirail, oh irail ahpw rongada ngileie; irail eri sohla tangasangie.

30 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nein Leipen laduo kilangada riei pwutak ko e ahpw masepwehkada, oh e kerenieng tangasangie oh pwurala nan kahnihmw en Serusalem.

31 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, pwehki paliwareiet lapala, oh pil Kauno ketin kakehlailihie, ngehi eri parokedi nein Leipen laduo, oh koledi, pwe en dehr tang.

32 Kedekedeo I kawehwehiong, me ma e pahn rong ei koasoai kan, nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias, oh ei momour, iei ma e pahn rong ei koasoai kan, se sohte pahn kemehla.

33 Oh I ndahieng, ni ei kahukihla, me e sohte anahne periki mehkot; me e uhdahn pahn wia aramas saledek men duwehte kiht ma e pahn iang kiht kohdihla nan sapwtehno.

34 Oh ngehi pil ndahieng: Mehlel Kauno me mahsanihong kiht sen wia met; oh kitail sou pahn loaloapwoat ong kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned kan? Eri, ma komw pahn iang kiht kohdihla nan sapwtehno rehn ei pahpao e pahn mie dewemw reht.

35 Kedekedeo Sohram koapworopworkihla koasoai kan me I koasoaia. Sohram iei eden laduo; oh e inoukihda me e pahn iang kohdihla nan sapwtehno rehn aht pahpao. Iei, oh e pil kahukihong kiht me e pahn mihmihla reht sang ahnsouwo kohkohla.

36 Met se inangih mehlel me en mihmihla reht pwehki kahrepe wet, me mehn Suhs akan en dehr ese duwen aht kohkohlahr nan sapwtehno, pwe irail dehr pwakih kiht oh kemeikitala.

37 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sohram kahulahr ong kiht, se ahpw sohla pwunodiki ih.

38 Kedekedeo kiht eri wahda pileit prahs ko oh nein Leipen laduo, oh mweselahng nan sapwtehno, oh seiloaklahng ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.
1-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seraia kaulimohng Lihai—Ira koaros perenkihda pwurodohn neira pwutak ko—Irail eri wia meirong—Pileit pirahs ko audaudkihda ahn Moses oh soukohp akan nting kan—Nan pileit ko kasalehda me Lihai wia kadaudoken Sosep—Lihai kohpada duwen kadaudoke kan oh nekineklahn pileit ko. Ele Sounpahr 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin aht pwuredihdo rehn aht pahpao nan sapwtehno, kilang, e direkihla peren, oh pil ei nohno, Seraia, perenda mehlel, pwe e wie mwahmwahieikin kiht.

2 Pwe e lemehieng me se mehlahr nan sapwtehno; oh e pil kaulimkihong ei pahpao, ndaiong me ih ohl en kaudiahl men; ndinda: Kilang ke kahreikitail sang nan sapwetail sahpwen sohso, oh solahr nei pwutak ko, oh kitail pahn mehla nan sapwtehne.

3 Oh iei koasoai wet me ei nohno kaulimkihong ei pahpao.

4 Kedekedeo ei pahpao eri koasoaiahong, patohwan: I ese me ngehi emen ohl en kaudiahl; pwe ma I sohte kin kilang soahng kan me pid duwen Koht nan kaudiahl I sohte pahn ese kalahngan en Koht, ahpw I pahn mihmihte nan Serusalem, oh iang rieiko kamakamala.

5 Ahpw kilang, I aledier ehu sahpw en inou, me kapereniehda; ei, oh I ese me Kauno pahn ketin doarehla nei pwutak kan sang nan pehn Leipen, oh pwurehng kapwureiraildihdo rehta nan sapwtehne.

6 Oh ih mwomwen lokaia me ei pahpa, Lihai, koaloalamwahuieki ei nohno, Saraia, me pid duwen kiht, ni ahnsou me se seiseiloak kohdalahng nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwe sen alehdi poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan.

7 Oh ahnsou me se pwurodohr ni imwen ei pahpao impwalo, kilang irail perenda mehlel, oh ei nohno pil nsenamwahula.

8 Oh e koasoaia: Met I esehier ni mehlel me Kauno me ketin mahsaniheng ei pwoudo en kohdo nan sapwtehn; ei, oh I pil esehier ni mehlel me Kauno me ketin sinsile nei pwutak kan, oh doareirailsang nan pehn Leipen, oh ketikiheng irail manaman en kak kapwaiada dahme Kauno ketin pahngokihong irail. Oh met iei duwen lokaia me e koasoaia.

9 Kedekedeo irail eri perenda mehlel, oh wia meirong oh meirong isihs ong Kauno; oh irail eri kapingkihong Koht en Israel.

10 Oh mwurin arail kaping kalahnganongehr Koht en Israel, ei pahpao, Lihai, eri ale poadoapoad kan me ntingdier pohn pileit pirahs kan, oh wadeksang ni tapio.

11 Oh e kilangada me re audaudkihda pwuhk limau en Moses, me koasoaiahda duwen kepikipikdahn sampah, oh pil duwen Adam oh Ihp, me wia tepin atail pahpa oh nohno;

12 Oh pil poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan sangete ni tapio, lelledo ni tepidahn mwein Sedekaia, nahnmwarki en Suda;

13 Oh pil kokohp kan en soukohp sarawi kan, sangete ni tapio, leledo ni tepidahn mwein Sedekaia; oh pil kokohp tohto me Seremaia kohpadahr.

14 Kedekedeo ei pahpao, Lihai, pil diarada nan pileit pirahs ko kadaudok en ah pahpa kahlap oko; ih eri esehda me e wia kisehn kodoudok en Sosep; iei, ih Sosep me wia nein Seikop pwutak, me netila pwe en wisiklahng Isip, oh mepoadoandoarla ni limen Kauno, pwe en kak doarehla ah pahpao, Seikop, oh ah peneinei koaros pwe re en pitisang mehkihla lehk.

15 Oh irail pil pitsang selidi oh kohkohsang nan sapwen mehn Isip kan, ih Kohtohte me pil doareiraila.

16 Oh iei me ei pahpao, Lihai, diaradahr nan ntingdi en kadaudok en ah pahpa kahlap ko. Oh Leipen pil iang wia kadaudok en Sosep, eri ih oh ah pahpa kahlap ko kolokol poadoapoad kan.

17 Oh met ahnsou me ei pahpao kilangehr mepwukat koaros, e direkihla Ngehno, oh tepda kohpada duwen kadaudoke kan—

18 Me pileit pirahs pwukat uhdahn pahn kowohng wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas akan me wia kadaudoke.

19 Eri, e koasoaia me pileit pirahs pwukat sohte pahn ohla; oh me re sohte pahn sohrala mwurin ahnsou. E pil kohpada soahng tohto me pid kadaudoke kan.

20 Kedekedeo ahnsouo ngehi oh ei pahpao eri kapwaiadahr kosonned akan me Kauno pahngokihong kiht.

21 Oh se alehdier poadoapoad kan me Kauno ketin pahngokihong kiht, oh se rapahkier nan kosonned pwukat oh diarada me re kesempwal; mehlel, kesempwal ong kiht, ihme kahrehda se kak kadakadaurekihdo kosonned akan en Kauno ong nait seri kan.

22 Eri, e wia erepit en Kauno me se uhdahn pahn weuwa, ni aht pahn seiseiloak nan sapwtehno kohkolahng nan sahpw en inouo.
1-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai ntingihdi soahng kan me pid duwen Koht—Kahrepen ahn Nihpai nting iei pwe en sewese aramas akan en kohdo rehn Koht en Eipraam oh komourla. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte pahn ntingihdi irekidi en kodoudok en ei pahpa kahlap ko nan ei poadoapoad wet. Sang met kohla I pil sohte pahn ntingihdi pohn pileit me I wie ntingting powe; pwehki e ntingdier nan poadoapoad me ei pahpao kin apwalih; eri, I sohte pahn ntingihdi nan poadoapoad wet.

2 Pwe e itarete I en nda me se wia kisehn kadaudok en Sosep.

3 Oh e sohte katapan ongie ma I oaritikih koasoaiepen soahng koaros me pid ei pahpao, pwe re sohte pahn ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat, pwe I men en mie dewen soahng kan me I pahn ntingihdi me sang rehn Koht.

4 Pwe uhdahn kahrepen ei wia met iei I en kak kamantiki aramas akan en kohdo rehn Koht en Eipraam, oh Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, oh komourla.

5 Eri, I sohte pahn ntingihdi soahng kan me kaperen ong sampah, ahpw I pahn ntingihdi soahng kan me kin kaperanda kupwur en Koht oh irail akan me sohte wia kisehn sampah.

6 Eri, I pahn kiheng kadaudokei kan kosonned, me irail sohte pahn audehki pileit pwukat soahng kan me sohte kesempwal ong aramas akan.
1-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nein Lihai pwutak ko pwurala Serusalem oh luke Ismael oh ah peneinei en iangirailda nan arail seiloako—Leimen oh ekei irail uhongada—Nihpai kangoange rie ohl oko en pwoson Kauno—Irail saliekihdi sahl oh lemehda re en kemehla—E saledekla sang ni manaman en pwoson—Rie ko pekmahk—Lihai oh ienge ko wiahda meirong oh meirong isihs. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met I men kumwail en ese, me mwurin ei pahpao, Lihai, eh kaimwsakalahr ah kokohp me pid duwen kadaudoke kan, kedekedeo Kauno ahpw pwurehng mahseniong, ketihtihki me e sohte konehng Lihai en kelehpw wahla ah peneinei nan sapwtehno; ahpw nah pwutak kan anahne wahda ekei serepein re en wia arail pwoud, pwe irail en kak apwaliada sapwellimen Kauno aramas nan sahpw en inouo.

2 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsani me ngehi, Nihpai, oh riei pwutak ko, anahne pwurehng pwuradahla nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh wahdihdo Ismael oh ah peneinei nan sapwtehno.

3 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, iangahki riei pwutak ko ahpw pwurehng kohla nan sapwtehno pwe sen pwuradahla Serusalem.

4 Kedekedeo se ahpw lelladahlahr ni imwen Ismaelo, oh se ahpw masamasala mwohn Ismael, kahrehda aht kak koasoaikiheng mahsen en Kauno.

5 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw ketin kamalailaiedi mohngiong en Ismael, oh pil tohn imweo, kahrehda arail iangkitada nan aht seiloak oh pwuredihla nan sapwtehno ong ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.

6 Kedekedeoahnsou me se wie seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, kilang Leimen oh Lemuel, oh riemen nein Ismael serepein ko, oh riemen nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail peneinei ko, peliankitada; mehlel, uhwong ngehi, Nihpai, oh Sam, oh arail pahpao, Ismael, oh ah pwoud, oh nah serepein silimen teiko.

7 Kedekedeo irail peliankitada pwehki arail inangih pwurala nan sahpw en Serusalem.

8 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, nsensuwedkihla pwehki keptakain mohngiongarail kan, ngehi eri koasoai ong irail, ei, mehlel ong Leimen oh Lemuel: Kilang kumwa riei pwutak laud, oh ia mwomwen mohngiongimwa kan eh nohn keptakai, oh amwa lamalam akan nohn masukun, me kahrehda kumwa anahnehki, riamwa pwutak me tikitik, en kaweid kumwa, mehlel, oh wia ehu mehn kahlamangi ong kumwa?

9 Ia mwomwen amwa sohte kak peikiong sapwellimen Kauno mahsen?

10 Ia duwen amwa kak manokehla me kumwa kilangehr emen tohnleng en Kauno?

11 Mehlel, oh ia duwen amwa kak monokehla soahng kopwuriamwei kan me Kauno ketin wiahiong kitailehr, ni eh ketin kapitkitail sang nan pehn Leipen, oh pil me kitail uhdahn anahne alehdi poadoapoado?

12 Mehlel, oh ia duwen amwa kak monokehla me Kauno kak ketin wia soahng koaros me e kupwurki, ong aramas akan, ma iei irail kin kasalehda arail pwoson Ih? Eri, kitail loaloapwoat ong Ih.

13 Oh ma kitail kin loaloapwoat ong Ih, kitail pahn alehdi sahpw en inouo; oh kumwa pahn ese me nan ahnsou me kohkohdo mahsen en Kauno pahn pweida me pid kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem; pwe mehkoaros me Kauno mahsaniher me pid kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem uhdahn pahn pweida.

14 Pwe kilang, Ngehn en Kauno kereniengehr sola ieiang irail; pwe kilang, irail soikalahr soukohp akan, oh irail kesehlongehr Seremaia nan imweteng. Oh irail song kemehla ei pahpao, kahrehda arail koakoahk sang nan sahpwo.

15 Met kilang, I ndaiong kumwa me ma kumwa pahn pwurala Serusalem kumwa pahn iang irail mehla. Oh met, ma iei me kumwa pilada, kumwa kohla nan sahpwo, oh tamataman dahme I ndaiong kumwa, me ma kumwa pahn kohla kumwa pil pahn mehla; pwe ih met me Ngehn en Kauno ketin kangoangehkinie I en koasoaia.

16 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ngehi, Nihpai, koasoaiahier koasoai pwukat ong riei pwutak ko, ira lingeringerda pahi. Kedekedeo ira ahpw koliehdi, pwe kilang, ira inenen mwehl, oh ira salihkiniehdi sahl kei, pwe ira men kemeiehla, pwe ira pahn keseiehla nan sapwtehno pwe mahn lawalo kan en kangiehla.

17 Ahpw kedekedeo ngehi eri kapakap ong Kauno, patohwanohng: Maing Kaun, nin duwen ei pwoson komwi, komw ketin doareiehsang nan pehn riei pwutak ko; ei, ketikihdo kehl pwe I en kak mweidpeseng sahl pwukat me salihiepenehr.

18 Kedekedeo ahnsou me I koasoaiahier koasoai pwukat, kilang, sahl oko sapwedekda oh kohsang ni pehi oh nehi kan, oh I ahpw kesihnenda mwohn riei pwutak ko, oh ngehi pwurehng koasoaieng ira.

19 Kedekedeo irail pwurehng lingeringerda pahi, oh song koliehdi; ahpw kilang, emen nein Ismael serepein kau, ei, oh pil ah nohno, oh emen nein Ismael pwutak ko, peki mahk rehn riei pwutak ko, lao irail kameleileidi ara mohngiong ko; oh ira eri sohla men kemeiehla.

20 Kedekedeo ira eri pahtoula, pwehki ara wiadahr mesuwed, lao ira poaridi mwohi, oh peki rehi I en mahkohng ira pwehki sapwung me ira wiahiengie.

21 Kedekedeo ngehi eri mahngkihengira soahng koaros me ira wiahier, oh ngehi eri kangoangehkinira en kapakap ong Kauno ara Koht pwe en ketin mahkohng ira. Kedekedeo ira eri wia. Oh mwurin ara kapakapohngehr Kauno se ahpw pwurehng douluhla nan aht seiloaklahng ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.

22 Kedekedeo se ahpw leledihdo ni ihmwen aht pahpao impwalo. Oh mwurin ngehi oh riei pwutak ko oh tohn imwen Ismael koaros kohdihdohier ni imwen ei pahpa impwalo, irail kapingkihong Kauno arail Koht; oh wiahda meirong oh meirong isihs ong Ih.
1-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai kilangada ehu kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro—E tungoale wahn tuhkeo oh mwahuki ah peineinei en pil iang tungoale—E kilangada reil reirei pwoat, ahl ehu me inen oh tehtikitik, oh pwoaik rotorot me kipehdi aramas akan—Saraia, Nihpai, oh Sam tungoale wahn tuhkeo, ahpw Leimen oh Lemuel soikala. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo se ahpw kihpene soangoasoangen werentuhke koaros, soangen weren werentuhke koaros, oh pil soangen weren wahn tuhke koaros.

2 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ei pahpao mihmiher nan sapwtehno, e ndahieng kiht: Kilang, I ouramanda ouraman ehu; de, me wehwehki, I kilangada kaudiahl ehu.

3 Oh kilang, pwehki ei kilangehr soahng wet, mie kahrepen I en kapingahki Kauno pwehki Nihpai oh pil Sam; pwe mie kahrepen I en kamehlele me ira, oh pil tohto kadaudokera, pahn komourla.

4 Ahpw kilang, Leimen oh Lemuel, I pwunodada mehlel pwehki kumwa; pwe kilang, I leme me I kilangada nan ei ouramano, ehu sapwtehn me rotorot oh kansensuwed.

5 Kedekedeo ngehi eri kilangada ohl emen, oh e likawih likou pwetepwet oh reirei ehu; oh e kohdo oh kesihnenda mwohi.

6 Kedekedeo ih eri koasoaidohngie, oh peki rehi I en idawehn ih.

7 Kedekedeo ni ei wie ideidawehn ih I ahpw tehkada me I mihmi wasa kis me rotorot oh kansensuwed.

8 Oh mwurin ei seiseiloangki awa tohto nan rotoroto, I tepda kapakap ong Kauno pwe en ketin mahkohngie, nin duwen sapwellime kalahngan limpoakkan.

9 Kedekedeo mwurin ei kapakapohngehr Kauno I kilangada lapalahn mohs tehlap ehu.

10 Kedekedeo I ahpw kilangada tuhke pwoat, me wah ko mas iou oh kak kaperenda emen aramas.

11 Kedekedeo ngehi eri kohla oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo; oh I diarada me e inenen mem sang soahng koaros me I tungoaledahr. Mehlel, oh I kilang me wahn tuhkeo pwetepwet, oh pwetepwet sang douluhl soahng koaros me I kilangehr.

12 Oh ni ahnsou me I tungoale wahn tuhkeo palingeniet direkihla peren kouwahlap; eri, I ahpw mentehn ei peneinei en pil iang tungoale; pwe I ese me e inenen iou sang wahntuhke teikan koaros.

13 Oh ni ei kilengseli, ma I sou pahn kak pil kilangada ei peneinei, I kilangada pillap pwoat; oh e pwilipwildo, oh e karanih tuhke me I wie tungtungoale waho.

14 Oh I kilengla pwe I en kilang wasa me e pwilipwildohsangieo; oh I kilangada me utuhnpilo ekis doh; oh I kilangada ahmw nohno Saraia, oh Sam, oh Nihpai ni utuhn pihlo; oh irail kesikesihnen likamwete re sehse wasa me re pahn kohlaie.

15 Kedekedeo I ahpw oaleirail; oh I pil lukwerihrail ni ngihl laud pwe irail en kak kohdo rehi, oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo, me inenen iou sang wahn tuhke koaros.

16 Kedekede oh irail ahpw kohdo rehi oh pil iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

17 Kedekede oh I ahpw mentehn Leimen oh Lemuel en pil kohdo oh iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo; eri, I kilengla wasa me pillapo pwilipwilsangieo, ma I pahn kak kilangirahda.

18 Kedekede oh I ahpw kilangirahda, ahpw ira sohte men kohdo rehi oh iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

19 Oh I kilangada reil reirei pwoat, oh e peiante keilen pillapo, oh uhdohng ni tuhke me I kesikesihnenieo.

20 Oh I pil kilangada ahl inen oh tehtik pwoat, me peiandohte reil reireio lel ni tuhke me I keskesihnenieo; oh e pil peiando pillapo oh lel ni tuhkeo, kohlahng nan mohs lapala oh tehlap ehu, me duwehte sampah ehu.

21 Oh I kilangada aramas ngedehrie, me tohto irail wie nannantihlahte mwowe, pwe irail en kak lella nan ahl me uhla ni tuhke me I wie kesikesihnenieo.

22 Kedekedeo irail eri kohdo, oh tepda keid nan ahl me uhla ni tuhkeo.

23 Kedekedeo pwoaik rotorot ehu ahpw kohda; iei, pwoaik rotorot ehu me inenen mosul mehlel, kahrehda irail akan me tepida keid nan ahlo ahpw salongala, irail keidila ekis wasa tohrohr oh salongala.

24 Kedekedeo ngehi eri pil kilangada ekei me nannantihla mwohrail, oh irail kohdo oh koledi imwin reil reireio; oh irail nantihla mwohrail nan pwoaik rotoroto, kolokol reil reireio, lao irail lelodo ni tuhkeo oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

25 Oh mwurin arail tungoalehier wahn tuhkeo irail kilengseli mwomwen me irail namenekda.

26 Oh I pil kilengseli, oh kilangada, me palio pillapo, mie ihmw kalaimwon oh lapala ehu; oh duwehte e mihmi nan wehwe, ilehdahsang pohn sampah.

27 Oh e diren aramas mihmi loale, me mah oh pwulopwul, ohl oh lih, oh mwomwen arail likou ko me inenen kaselel; oh irail kin wie kepikepitikioh idihdihki sendinpehrail kan irail akan me kohdohr oh tungetungoale wahn tuhkeo.

28 Oh mwurin arail songehr wahn tuhkeo irail ahpw namenekda, pwehki irail akan me kepikepitkinirail; oh irail eri pwupwidilahng nan ahl keinepwi kan oh salongala.

29 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte koasoaiahda mehkoaros me ei pahpao ndahngie.

30 Ahpw, ni nting mwotomwot, kilang, e kilangada pokon en aramas ekei arail nannantihla mwohrail; oh irail kohdo oh koledi imwin reil reireio; oh irail eri nantihla mwowe, wie kolokol teng reil reireio, lao irail kohdo oh poaridi oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

31 Oh e pil kilangada ekei pokon en aramas me dedehmseli alarail kohkohlahng ni ihmw kalaimwun oh lapalao.

32 Kedekedeo tohto me duhla nan wasa loal en pihlo; oh tohto irail me solahr sansal mwohn meseo, sansalongseli nan ahl ehusoahng kei.

33 Oh lapalahn pokon me pidelong nanihmw ehusoahngo. Oh mwurin arail pidelong nan ihmwo irail ahpw ididohng ie oh kepitkinie oh irail akan me iang tungtungoale wahn tuhkeo; ahpw se sohte rong irail.

34 Mepwukat me ei pahpao koasoaia: Pwe koaros me kin rong irail, kin pwupwudi.

35 Oh ei pahpao koasoaia me Leimen oh Lemuel sohte tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

36 Kedekedeo mwurin ei pahpao eh koasoaiadahr soahng koaros me pid ah ouramano de kaudiahlo, me uhdahn audapan, e ndahieng kiht, me e inenen salohki Leimen oh Lemuel pwehki soahng kan me e kilangada nan kaudiahlo; ei, e periki ira de lekideksang mwohn silangin Kauno.

37 Oh e ahpw kangoangehkin ira pepehm koaros en pahpa men me limpoak, me ira en rong ah kaweid kan, pwe Kauno en kak ketin mahkohng ira, oh sohte ketin lakidirahla; iei, ei pahpao padahkohng ira.

38 Oh mwurin eh padahk ong ira, oh pil kohpada soahng tohto ong ira, e peki ira en kolokol kosonned akan en Kauno; oh e ahpw kairala ah koasoaieng ira.
1-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai wiahda kepen poadoapoad riau—Koaros ahdaniki pileit en Nihpai—Pileit me laud ko audaudki poadoapoad en sampah; me tikitik ko pid mehlel duwen soang kan me sarawi. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh mepwukat koaruhsie ei pahpao kilangehr, oh rongehr, oh koasoaiahier, ahnsou me e kin mihmi nan impwalo, nan wahu en Lemuel, oh pil soahng tohto kei, me sohte kak ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat.

2 Oh met, nin duwen ei koasoaiahier me pid pileit pwukat, kilang kaidehn pileit pwukat me I pahn ntingihdi poadoapoad unsek en nei aramas akan; pwe pileit kan me I pahn ntingihdi unsek duwen nei aramas akan, I kiheng adarail Nihpai; eri, re adaniki pileit en Nihpai, sang ni pein edei; oh pileit pwukat pil pahn adaniki pileit en Nihpai.

3 Ahpw, I alehdier kosonned en Kauno me I uhdahn pahn wiahda pileit pwukat, ong kahrepe kesempwal me e uhdahn pahn mie ehu nting me pid duwen doadoahk sarawi ong nei aramas akan.

4 Pohn pileit teiko uhdahn pahn ntingidi duwen mwehin nanmwarkih kan, oh mahwin kan oh pingiping en nei aramas akan; eri pileit pwukat me ongete pali laud en doadoahk sarawi kan; oh pileit teikan ongete duwen pali laud en mwehin nanmwarki kan oh mahwin kan oh pingiping kan nanpwungen nei aramas akan.

5 Eri, Kauno ketin kehkehlingkihongie I en wiahda pileit pwukat ong kahrepe kesempwal ehu reh, me kahrepe I sohte wehwehki.

6 Ahpw Kauno ketin mwahngih soahng koaros sangete ni tepin kawa; eri, e ketin kaunopada wiepen kaunsakala sapwellime doadoahk koaros rehn aramas akan; pwe kilang, e sapwellimaniki manaman koaros en kapwaiala sapwellime mahsen koaruhsie. Oh iei met me mehlel. Ahmen.
1-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai kohpada me mehn Suhs akan pahn sella rehn mehn Papilon kan—E koasoaiahda ketidohn Mesaia, Sounkomour, Soundoar rehn mehn Suhs akan—Lihai pil koasoaiahda ketdohn emen me pahn pepdaisi Sihmpwul en Koht—Lihai koasoaiahda duwen pwoulahu oh iasadahn Mesaiao—E karasahieng kapwurpwurpenehn mehn Israel tuhkehn olihp—Nihpai koasoaia duwen Sapwellimen Koht, duwen kisakis en Ngehn Sarawi, oh anahnepen en mie pwung. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, pahn doula oh ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat ei wiewia kan, oh ei mwei en kaun oh doadoahk en kalohk; eri, pwe I en kak doula nan ei nting, I anahne ntingihdi soahng kan me pid duwen ei pahpao, oh pil riei ohl kan.

2 Pwe kilang, e wiawiher me mwurin ei pahpao kanekelahr ah koasoaiahda audepen ah ouramano, oh pil [kanekelahr ah] kangoangehki irail en lalloapwoat, e patowan ong irail duwen mehn Suhs akan—

3 Me mwurin arail pahn kamwomwala, iei kahnimw lap en Serusalemo, oh tohto irail pahn sellahng nan Papilon, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno ahnsou, irail pahn pwurehng kopwuropwurodo, iei, irail pahn kopwurupwurdohsang wasa irail sella ie; oh mwurin arail pahn kopwurupwurdo sang arail selidi irail pahn pwurehng sapwanikihla sahpwerail sahpw en sohsohu.

4 Iei, sounpar wenepwiki mwurin ei pahpao mweselsang Serusalem, Soukohp men me Kauno Koht pahn apwaliada rehn mehn Suhs akan—iei Mesaiao, de pil ehu ahd, Sounkomour en sampah.

5 Oh e pil koasoaia duwen soukohp akan, duwen tohtohn irail me kadehdehkier mepwukat, duwen Mesaiao, me e patohwanehr, de Soundoar en sampah.

6 Eri, aramas koaros me mih nan mour wet salongalahr oh pwupwidier, oh ihte me irail pahn komourkihla ma irail idawehn Soundoaro.

7 Oh e koasoaia duwen soukohp men me pahn kohdo mwohn Mesaiao, pwe en kaunopada mwohn Kauno—

8 Ei, e pahn kohwei oh kalohk ki nan sapwtehn: Kumwail kaunopada ahl en Kauno, oh kainenehla ahl akan wasa me e pahn keid ie; pwe mie ohl emen me pahn ketido mwuri, me lapalapasang ie mehlel; me pirapir en sapwellime suht I sohte warohng en sapwadada. Oh ei pahpao koasoakoasoaia laud duwen met.

9 Oh ei pahpao patohwan me e pahn pepdaisla nan Pedapara, palio Sordan; oh e pil patohwan me e pahn pepdaiski pihl; iei e pahn pepdaisihkihla Mesaiao pihl.

10 Oh mwurin eh pahn pepdaisihkihla Mesaiao pihl, e pahn kilangada oh kadehdeh me e pepdaisihla Sihmpwul en Koht, me pahn ketkihsang dihp en sampah.

11 Kedekedeo mwurin ei pahpao eh patohwanehr koasoi pwukat e ahpw patohwanohng riei pwutak ko duwen rongamwahu me pahn kalohkehng rehn mehn Suhs akan, oh pil duwen mehn Suhs akan arail pahn pwupwikihdi arail soupwoson. Oh mwurin arail pahn kemehla Mesaiao, me pahn ketido, oh mwurin eh pahn ketin kamakamala e pahn iasadahsang mehla, oh ketin pwarohng Mehn Liki kan sang Ngehn Sarawi.

12 Iei, ei pahpao pil koasoia duwen Mehn Liki kan, oh pil duwen peneinei en Israel, me irail pahn rasohng tuhkehn olihp pwoat, me rah kan pahn tipwasang oh pahn kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros ni sampah.

13 Eri, e mahsanih me e pahn konehng kitail en ehupene kohla nan sahpw en inouo, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno mahsen, me kitail pahn kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah.

14 Oh mwurin peneinei en Israel ar pahn kamweremwerpeseng irail pahn pwurehng kopwurupwurpene; de, ni oarelap, mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn alehdi rongamwahuo ni unsek, uhdaken rahn tuhkehn olihpo, de luhwen peneinei en Israel kan, pahn pwurehng poadehng tuhkehu, de wewehkihda udahn Mesaiao, arail Kaun oh arail Soundoar.

15 Oh ih mwomwen koasoai kan me ei pahpao kohpada oh patohwanohng riei pwutak ko, oh pil soahng tohto me I sohte ntingihdi nan pwuhk wet; pwe I ntingihdi tohto irail me kesempwal ongie nan nei pwuhk teio.

16 Oh me pwukat koaros, me I koasoaiadahr, wiawiher ahnsou me ei pahpao mihmi nan impwal, nan wahu en Lemuel.

17 Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr ahn ei pahpao koasoai kan koaros, duwen dahme e kilangada nan kaudiahl, oh pil soahng kan me e pil koasoaia sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, manaman me e alehdi sang ni eh pwoson Sapwellimen Kohto—oh Sapwellimen Kohto iei Masaiao me pahn ketdo—Ngehi, Nihpai, inangih I en pil kak iang kilang, oh rong, oh ese mepwukat, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, me iei kisakis en Koht ong koaros me loalloapwoatehng rapahki ih, duwehte mahso pil duwehte ahnsou me e pahn kapwarahieng pein ih ong aramas akan.

18 Pwe e ketin duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte; oh ahlo kaunopdahngehr aramas koaros sangete ni tepin sampah eh koasoansoandi, ma irail pahn koluhla oh kohdo reh.

19 Pwe mehmen me pahn loalloapwoatieng rapahki pahn diar; oh me rir kan en Koht pahn kasansalieng irail, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, duwehte rahn pwukat e pahn pil duwehte mahso, oh duwehte mahso e pahn pil duwehte ahnsou kohkohdo kan; eri, sapwellimen Kauno koasondi de ahl kin duduhwehte kokohlahte.

20 Eri tamataman, maing ohl, pwe ahmw wiewia koaros pahn sansalada nan ahnsou en kopwungo.

21 Eri, ma kumwail kin wiewia suwed nan rahn en amwail kaunopadahu, kumwail pahn dierekda samin mwohn mwoalen-kopwung en Koht; oh sohte mehkot samin kak mihmi rehn Koht; eri, kumwail pahn lekidekla kohkohlahte.

22 Oh Ngehn Sarawi me ketkihongie mweimmwei en koasoaia mepwukat, oh sohte kahmahmki.
1-ne 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai kilangada Ngehn en Kauno oh kasansalieng kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro—E kilangada inen Sapwellimen Kohto oh wehwehkihda duwen Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih—E kilangada pepdais, doadoahk en kalohk, oh kalohpwualahn Sihmpwul en Koht—E pil kilangada malipilip oh doadoahk en kalohk en sapwellimen Sihmpwulo Wahnparon Ehk-riemeno. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe kedekedeo, mwurin ei inangihada I en esehla dahme ei pahpao kilangehr, oh pwehki ei kamehlele me Kauno kak kasalehiengie, ni ahnsou me I wie mwomwohd oh medemedewe nan ei mohngiong, Ngehn en Kauno ahpw tiada pohi, ei, oh ketin weiehla pohn nahna ieu me ileile mehlel, me ehdin ei kilang, oh ehdin ei sokedi powe.

2 Oh Ngehno mahsanihongie: Kilang, dahme ke inangih?

3 I ahpw nda: I inangih kilang soahng kan me ei pahpao kilangehr.

4 Oh Ngehno mahsanihongie: Ke kamehlele me ahmw pahpao kilangada tuhke me e koasoaiadahro?

5 Oh I sapengki: Ei, komw mwahngih me I kamehlele ahn ei pahpao koasoai koaros.

6 Oh mwurin ei nda koasoai pwukat, Ngehno kapitie laudida, mahsanih: Kepinga ong Kauno, Koht wasalapalahpie; pwe ih me iei Koht en sampah pwon, iei, me lapalapasang koaros. Oh meid pai kowe, Nihpai, pwehki ahmw kamehlele Sapwellimen Koht wasalapalahpie; eri, ke pahn kilang soahng kan me ke inangih kilang.

7 Oh kilang ape wet pahn kasansalehnguhk ni kilel ehu, me mwurin ahmw pahn kilang tuhke me ahm pahpao songehr wahu, ke pahn pil kilang emen ohl ketketdihdo sang nanleng, oh ke pahn kadehde ih; oh mwurin ahmw pahn kadehdehda ih ke pahn kin kadehdehki me ih iei Sapwellimen Kohto.

8 Kedekedeo, Ngehno ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilengla oh kilangada tuhkehieu; oh e duwehte tuhke me ei pahpao kilangadahu; oh linganih udahn lingalingsang lingan koaros; oh pwetepwetih pwetepwetsang pwetepwet en sinoh.

9 Kedekedeo, mwurin ei kilangehr tuhkehu, I ndahieng Ngehno: I ese me komw kasalehiongie tuhke me keieu kesempwalasang koaros.

10 Oh e kalelapak rehi: Dahme ke inangih?

11 Oh ngehi sapengki: I en esehla kawehwehpe—pwe I koasoaieng duwehte aramas ar kin koasoakoasoaipene; pwe I kilang me paliware duwehte aramas; ahpw, I ese me ih iei Ngehn en Kauno; oh e koasoaiong ie duwehte aramas ar kin koasoakoasoaipene.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilenglahng pwe I en kilang ih, oh I sohte kilangada; pwe e sohrasang ie.

13 Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada kahnimw lap en Serusalemo, oh pil ekei kahnihmw kan. Oh I kilangada kahnihmw en Nahsared; oh nan kahnihmw en Nahsared I kilangada lih meipwon men, oh e pwetepwet oh lingan mehlel.

14 Kedekedeo I kilangada nanleng ritida; oh tohnleng men ketdihdo oh uh mwohi; oh mahsanihongie: Nihpai, dahme ke kilangadahro?

15 Oh ngehi sapengki: Meipwon men, me keieu masamwahu oh kaselel sang meipwon koaros.

16 Oh e mahsanihongie: Komw wehwehki Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih?

17 Oh ngehi sapengki: I ese me e ketin poakohng sapwellime seri kan; ahpw, I sohte ese wehwehn soahng koaros.

18 Oh e mahsanihongie: Kilang, meipwon me ke kilangada iei inen Sapwellimen Kohto, ni paliwar en uduk.

19 Kedekedeo I kilangada me Ngehno wahsang; oh mwurinte ahnsou kis me Ngehno wahsang, tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang!

20 Oh I kilengla oh pwurehng kilangada meipwono, kolokol seri men nan pehko.

21 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang Sihmpwul en Koht, ei, iei Sapwellimen Sahm Soutuk! Ke ese wehwehn tuhke me ahmw pahpao kilangadahu?

22 Oh I sapeng ih oh koasoaia: Ei, E wia limpoak en Koht, me e ketin kihong nan mohngiong en aramas akan; eri, ih me keieu anahnepe nan soahng koaros.

23 Oh e mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ei, oh me keieu kaperen ong palingehn.

24 Oh mwurin e mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsenihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilengla, oh I kilangada Sapwellimen Kohto e ketketseli rehn aramas akan; oh I kilangada tohto me kin poaridiong ni alualuwe kan oh pwongih ih.

25 Kedekedeo I kilangada me reil reirieo, me ei pahpao kilangadahu, iei mahsen en Koht, me kahluhwahla ni utun pihl en komouro, de tuhkehn komouro; pihl wet me wehwehki limpoak en Koht; oh I pil kilang me tuhkehn komouro wehwehki limpoak en Koht.

26 Oh tohnlengo pwurehng mahsanihongie: Kilengla oh kilang Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih!

27 Oh I kilengla oh kilangada Soundoar en sampah, me ei pahpao koasoaiadahr; oh I pil kilangada soukohp me pahn kaunopada mwowe. Oh Sihmpwul en Koht ketla oh pepdaisla reh; oh mwurin eh pepdaisla, I kilangada nanleng ritida, oh Ngehn Sarawi ketdihdo sang nanleng oh ketket powe ni mwomw en mwuroi.

28 Oh I kilang me e ketketseli kalkalohkehng aramas akan, ni manaman oh lingan lapalahpie; oh pokon tohto kohpene pwe irail en rong ih; oh I kilang me irail kausasang ih nan pwungarail.

29 Oh I pil kilangada meh ehk-riemen ideidawehn ih. Kedekedeho Ngehno pil wairailsang mwohn meseie, oh I sohla kilang irailda.

30 Kedekedeo, tohnlengo pwureng mahsandohngie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla, oh kilangada nanleng pwurehng ritpeseng, oh I kilangada tohnleng kei ketketdihdo rehn aramas akan; oh irail kalohkehng irail.

31 Oh e pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla, oh I kilangada Sihmpwul en Koht ketketseli rehn aramas akan. Oh I kilangada lapalahn pokon en aramas me soumwahu, oh lokolongki soangoasoangen soumwahu, oh tepil kan oh ngehn saut akan; oh tohnlengo mahsanih oh kasalehongie mepwukat koaros. Oh irail kamwahula sang ni manaman en Sihmpwul en Kohto; oh tepil kan oh ngehn saut akan pekeusla.

32 Kedekedeo tohnlengo pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh I kilengla oh kilangada Sihmpwul en Koht, me aramasako wahsangehr; ei, sampah kadeikadahr Sapwellimen Koht Soutuk Ieroso; oh I kilang oh kadehdehki.

33 Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, kilang me e kalohpwuala pohn lohpwuo oh kamakamkihla dipen sampah.

34 Oh mwurin eh kamakamala I kilangada pokon kan en sampah, arail kohpene pwe irail en pelian wahnpoaron en Sihmpwulo; pwe tohnleng en Kauno kahdanikinirail meh ehk-riemeno.

35 Oh pokon en sampah kapokonpene; oh I kilangada me irail mih nan ihmw lapala oh tehlap ehu, duwehte ihmw me ei pahpao kilangada. Oh tohnleng en Kauno pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang sampah oh eripitih; ei, kilang peneinei en Israelkan kapokonpenehr pwe irail en peiong wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.

36 Kedekedeo I kilangada oh kadehdehki, me ihmw kalaimwon oh tehlapo iei kahngohdi en sampah; oh e pwupwidi, oh eh pwupwidio udahn lepelepen pwupw. Oh tohnleng en Kauno pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ih pahn mwomwen kamwomwalahn wehi kan, keinek kan, lokaia kan, oh aramas akan, me pahn peiong wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.
1-ne 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai kilangada nan kaudiahl sahpw en inouo; wiewia mwahu, suwed, oh pwupwulahn towe kan; ketidohn Sihmpwul en Kohto rehrail; duwen Tohnpadahk Ehk-Riemeno oh Wahnpoaron Ehk-Riemeno arail pahn kadeikada Israel; oh duwen samin oh kanamenek en irail akan arail pwupwidieng nan sohpwoson. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo tohnlengo ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilengla, oh kilang kadaudokemw kan, oh pil kadaudoken riomw ohl akan. Ngehi eri kilengla oh kilangada sahpw en inouo; oh ngehi kilangada aramas ngederie, iei, me tohto rasehng pihk en nan sehd.

2 Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada pwihn kei me pokonpene pwe irail en mahwin, ehu pwihn pelian ehu; oh I kilangada mahwin kei, oh rohng en mahwin kei, oh me tohto nei aramas me kamakamkihla kedlahs.

3 Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada dih tohto mehla, pwehki mahwin oh pingiping en nan sahpwo; oh I kilangada kahnihmw tohto, iei, me I sohte kak wadekeda.

4 Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada rotorot mosul ehu pohn sahpw en inouo; oh I kilangada lioal kei, oh I rongada nansapwe ar posopos, oh rerrer en sahpw, oh soangsoangen ngihl katairong kei; oh I kilangada pwehl oh takai kan me pwalpeseng; oh I kilangada nahna kan ar rengkidi; oh I kilangada wasa patapat akan en sampah ar ohla; oh I kilangada kahnihmw tohto ar kihrla; oh I kilangada me tohto ar mwasingkihla kisiniei; oh I kilangada kidalap ar pwupwidieng pohn pwehl, pwehki rerrer en sahpwo.

5 Kedekedeo mwurin ei kilangehr mepwukat, I kilangada edied en rotorot, me kohsang pohn sampah; oh kilang, I kilangada aramas ngeder ar sohte iang pwupwikihdi sapwellimen Kauno kalokolok laud oh kamasepwehk en Kauno.

6 Oh I kilangada nanleng eh ritpeseng, oh Sihmpwul en Koht ketiketkohdi sang nanleng; oh e ketdihdo oh kasalehiong irail pein ih.

7 Oh I pil kilangada oh kadehdehki me Ngehn Sarawio ketin tiada pohn aramas ehk riemen; oh irail pilipilda oh kasarawihla rehn Koht.

8 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang irail tohnpadahk ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, me pilipilda pwe irail en sewese kadaudokemw kan.

9 Oh e mahsanihongie: Ke tamataman wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo? Kilang iei irail me pahn kadeik keinek eisek-riaun en Israel ko; eri, tohnpadahk ehk-riemen en kadaudokemw kan pahn kadeik rehrail; pwe kumwail iei mehn en Israel.

10 Oh irail sounsawas ehk-riemen me ke kilangehro pahn kadeik kadaudokemw kan. Oh, kilang, re pahn mour pwung kohkohlahte; pwehki arail pwoson Sihmpwul en Koht arail likou kan pahn pwetepwetkihla sapwellime ntao.

11 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh ngei eri kilengla, oh kilangada dihen aramas siluh me mehla ni ar mour pwung; oh arail likou kan pwetepwetala duwehte Sihmpwul en Kohto me pwetepwet. Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Mepwukat pwetepwetkihla ntahn Sihmpwulo, pwehki arail pwoson ih.

12 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, pil kilangada kidelepen aramas en dih kapahieu me melahr ni mour pwung.

13 Kedekedeo I kilangada kidelepen aramas en sampah ar pokonpene.

14 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang kadaudokemw kan, oh pil kadaudoken riomw pwutak ko.

15 Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada kisehn kadaudokei kan ar pokonpene pwe re en uhwong kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh irail pokonpene pwe re en mahwin.

16 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang utuhn pihl samin me ahmw pahpao kilangadahro; iei, pihl me e koasoaiahiero; oh uwen loalih iei uwen loal en nan ehl.

17 Oh pwoaik kan en rotoroto iei kasongosong kan en tepilo, me kin karotongala mahs akan, oh kakeluwakiala mohngiong en aramas akan, oh kahluweirailahng nan ahl tehlap akan, pwe irail en mehla oh salongala.

18 Oh ihmw kalaimwun oh tehlap, me ahmw pahpao kilangadao, iei lamalam mwahl akan oh pohnmwahso en aramas akan. Oh wahu kalaimwun oh keper ieu ireirailpeseng; iei, duwehte mahsen en pwuhng en Koht Soutuko, oh Mesaiao me iei Sihmpwul en Koht, me Ngehn Sarawi kadehdehkiher, sangete ni tepin sampah oh lelodo ahnsouet, oh sang met kohla oh kohkohlahte.

19 Oh ni ahnsou me tohnlengo mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, I kilengla oh kilangada me kadaudoken riei pwutak ko pil uhwong kadaudokei ko, nin duwehn dahme tohnlengo mahsaniher; oh pwehki pohnmwahso en kadaudokei ko, oh kasongosong kan en tepilo, I kilangada me kadaudoken riei pwutak ko kalewehdier kadaudokei ko.

20 Kedekedeo I kilengla, oh kilangada kisehn kadaudoken riei pwutak ko arail kalowedier kadaudokei ko; oh tohto irail audehlahr pohn sahpwo.

21 Oh I kilangada arail kin pokonpene; oh I kilangada mahwin kei oh rohng en mahwin kei nanpwungarail; oh nan mahwin kan oh rohng en mahwin kan I kilangada dihen aramas tohto mehla.

22 Oh tohnglengo mahsanihongie: Kilang irail pwukat pahn pwupwidi nan arail sohpwoson.

23 Kedekedeo I kilangada, mwurin arail pwupwidier nan arail sohpwoson irail ahpw wiahla aramas rotorot, oh kanamanek, oh samin, direkihla pohnkahke oh soangsoangen wiewia suwed kan.
1-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai kilangada nan kaudiahl mwomwohdiso en tepilo eh kokouda rehn mehn liki kan, tepin Amerikca eh dierekda oh aramas tepda kousoanlaie, salonglahn kedelepen ire mengei oh kesempwal akan nan Pwuhk Sarawi, imwilahn ahn mehn liki kan pwupwulao, kopwurupwurodohn rongamwahuo, pwaradahn pwuhk sarawi en imwin-rahn akan, oh kokoudahn Saion. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo, tohnlengo mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla oh kilangada wehi oh sahpw tohto.

2 Oh tohnglengo mahsanihong ie: Dahme ke kilangada? Oh I sapengki: I kilangada wehi oh sahpw tohto.

3 Oh e mahsanihongie: Wehi oh sahpw pwukat iei wehin mehn Liki kan.

4 Kedekedeo I kilangada wiawidahn mwomwohdiso kehlail ehu rehn mehn liki kan.

5 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang wiawihdahn mwomwohdiso me keieu suwed sang mwomwohdiso koaros, me kemehla souleng kan en Koht, iei, oh kaloke irail oh salihraildi, oh katoutouwiekinirail mehn wesik mete, oh kaluduwihrailla.

6 Kedekedeo I kilangada mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwed wet; oh I kilangada tepil me tepin wiahdao.
