7 Oh I pil kilangada kohl, oh silper, oh silik kan, oh likou weitahta kan, oh likou linen kaselel kan, oh soangoasoangen likou kesempwal koaros; oh I kilangada kidelepen lih en nenek.

8 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang kohl, oh silper, oh silik kan, oh likou weitahta kan, oh likou kaselel, oh likou kesempwal, oh lih en nenek kan, iei me mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwed wet kin mwahuki.

9 Oh pil pwehki sampah eh kin kepinga irail iei me irail kemehkihla souleng kan en Koht, oh kaluduwihrailla.

10 Kedekedeo, I kilengla oh kilangada sehd tohto; oh re irepeseng mehn liki kan oh kadaudoken riei pwutak ko.

11 Kedekedeo tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang engieng en Koht kipedier kadaudoken riemw pwutak ko.

12 Oh I kilengla oh kilangada ohl emen nan pwungen Mehn Liki kan, me sehdo irepeseng ih oh kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh I kilangada Ngehn en Koht, me ketidihdo oh tiada pohn ohlo; oh e kotehla sehdo, kolahng rehn kadaudoken riei ko, me kin koukousoan nan sahpw en inouo.

13 Kedekedeo I kilangada Ngehn en Koht, me tiadahr pohn ekei Mehn Liki kan; oh irail eri saledeklahr oh seiloakla pohn sehd akan.

14 Kedekedeo I kilangada kidelepen Mehn Liki nan sahpw en inouo; oh I kilangada Koht eh ketin engiengda pahn kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh re kamweremwerpeseng rehn Mehn Liki kan oh kalokolok.

15 Oh I kilangada Ngehn en Kauno, me ieiang Mehn Liki kan, oh irail pweida oh alehdi sahpwo pwe en wia arail sohso; oh I kilangada me irail pwetepwet, oh kaselel mehlel oh masamwahu, duwehte nei aramas oko mwohn arail kamakamala.

16 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me Mehn Liki ko me saledek sang arail selidi karakarahkala mwohn Kauno; oh manaman en Kauno ieiangirail.

17 Oh I kilangada inoandehn wehi laud en Mehn Liki ko arail pokonpene pohn sehdo, oh pil pohn sahpwo, pwe re en mahwiniong irail.

18 Oh I kilangada me manaman en Koht ieiang irail, oh pil Koht ketin engiengda pahn irail koaros me kohpene pwe re en mahweniong irail.

19 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me Mehn Liki kan me saledeksangehr arail sensel, irail kasaledekla sang nan pehn wehi teikan sang ni manaman en Koht.

20 Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me irail pweida nan sahpwo; oh I kilangada pwuhk ehu, oh irail kin weuwa pwuhko.

21 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Ke ese ia wehwehn pwuhko?

22 Oh I sapengki: I sehse.

23 Oh e mahsanih: Kilang e kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs. Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kilanganda; oh e mahsanihongie: Pwuhk me ke kilangadahro iei pwuhk en mehn Suhs akan, me audaudkihda sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, me E ketin wiahiongehr peneinei en Israel; oh e pil audaudkihda kokohp tohto en soukohp sarawi ko; oh audepe kan me duwehte nting kan me ntingdi pohn pileit me pirahs ko, ihte me malaulau; ahpw, e audaudkihda sapwelllimen Kauno inou kan, me E ketin wiadahr ong peneinei en Israel kan; eri, re kesempwalohng Mehn Liki kan.

24 Oh tohnleng en Kauno ahpw mahsanihongie: Ke kilangehr pwuhk me kohsang rehn mehn Suhso; oh ni ahnsou me e kohsang rehn mehn Suhso e audaudkihda rongamwahu unsek en Kauno, me wahnpoaron ehk-riemeno kadehdehkiher; oh irail kadehdehki nin duwen dahme mehlelo me iei Sihmpwul en Koht.

25 Eri, e unsek ni eh kohwei sang rehn mehn Suhs akan ong rehn Mehn Liki kan, nin duwen me mehlel me iei sang rehn Koht.

26 Oh mwurin arail kohwei sang rehn wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, sang mehn Suhs akan kolahng Mehn Liki kan, ke kilangehr wiawihdahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me keieu suwed sang mwomwohdiso koaros; pwe kilang, irail kihsang nan rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo soahng tohto me keieu kesempwal oh sansal; oh irail pil kihsang sapwellimen Kauno inou tohto.

27 Oh irail wia mepwukat pwehki irail me kasapwungehla koasoandi pwung kan en Kauno, pwe irail en kak karotongehla mesen aramas akan oh kekelwakiala mohngiongarail kan.

28 Eri, ke kilangehr me mwurin pwuhko eh kolahr nan pehn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, nting kesempwal oh sansal tohto kohsang nan pwuhko, me iei pwuhk en Sihmpwul en Koht.

29 Oh mwurin ire kesempwal oh sansal pwukat kohsangehr nan pwuhko eri kohieng wehi koaros en Mehn Liki kan; oh mwurin eh kolahng nan wehi koaros en Mehn Liki kan, iei, pil kotehla madau tohto wasa me ke kilangehr Mehn Liki kan ar saledekla ie, ke kilangehr—pwehki ire kesempwal oh sansal tohto me kohsangehr nan pwuhko, me mengei ong aramas en wehwehki, nin duwen padahk sansal kan me sang Sihmpwul en Koht—pwehki mepwukat eh kohsang nan sapwellimen Sihmpwulo rongamwahuo, aramas ngeder kin pwupwikihdi, mehlel, kahrehda Sehdan ahneki manaman kehlail pohrail.

30 Ahpw, ke kilang me Mehn Liki ko me saledeksangehr arail sensel, oh manaman en Koht ketin kapairailda sang wehi kan koaros, pohn sahpw me wia sahpw pilipilda nan pwungen sahpw kan koaros, sahpw me Kauno Koht ketin inoukihongehr ahmw pahpao me kadaudoke kan pahn sohsohki; eri, ke kilang me Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan en kamwomwala douluhl kadaudokemw kan, me iangala riomw kan.

31 Oh e pil sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan en kamwomwala kadaudoken riomw kan.

32 Oh pil Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan re en mihmihte nan rotorot kohkohlahte, me ke kilang irail mihmi loale, pwehki ire kesempwal oh sansal kan en rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo me kohsangehr sang ni mwomwohdiso suwedo, me ke kilangehr eh wiawihdao.

33 Sihmpwul en Koht ahpw mahsanih: I pahn mahkohng Mehn Liki kan, ni ei pahn kalokehki kisehn kadaudoken peneinei en Israel kan kalokolok mwuledek.

34 Kedekedeo tohnleng en Kauno ahpw mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang, Sihmpwul en Kohto mahsanih, mwurin ei pwarekehr kisehn kadaudoken en Israel kan—oh kadaudok wet me I koasoiahier me wia kadaudoken ahmw pahpao—eri, mwurin ei pahn kadeikirailda, oh kalokeirail sang rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn dipekelekel, Kauno mahsanih, pwehki mwomwohdiso suwedo, me wia nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar, eh ekihla ire kesempwal oh sansal kan en rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo—I pahn mahkohng Mehn Liki kan ni rahno, lao I pahn wahdohng irail rongamwahuo, sang ni pein ei manaman, me pahn kesempwal oh sansal, Sihmpwulo me mahmahsen.

35 Sihmpwulo mahsanih, kilang: I pahn pwarohng kadaudokemw kan, oh irail pahn ntingihdi soahng tohto me I pahn padahkihong irail, me pahn sansal oh kesempwal; oh mwurin kadaudokemw kan arail pahn kamwomwomwla, oh pwupwidi nan arail sohpwoson, oh pil iangahki kadaudoken riomw ko, kilang, mepwukat pahn ekiekla, pwe en uhd kohdohng Mehn Liki kan, sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Sihmpwulo.

36 Oh ei rongamwahuo pahn ntingdi loale, oh ei paipalap oh ei komour, Sihmpwulo me mahmahsen.

37 Oh meid pai irail akan me pahn kin nantihong kaukauwada Saion ni rahno, pwe irail pahn alehdi kisakis oh manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; oh ma irail pahn dadaur lel ni imwi, irail pahn kesepwilda ni imwin rahno, oh pahn komourla nan wehi poatopoat en Sihmpwulo; oh mehmen me pahn kalohki popohl, iei, rohng kaperen, meid lingan pohn nahna me irail pahn miheo.

38 Kedekedeo I kilangada luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko, oh pil Sapwellimen Sihmpwul en Koht pwuhko, me kohdo sang rehn men Suhs, oh kohdo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan oh kohieng luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko.

39 Oh mwurin eh kodohng irail I kilangada pil ekei pwuhk, me kohdo sang ni manaman en Sihmpwulo, sang rehn Mehn Liki kan kodohng rehrail, pwe en padahkihong Mehn Liki kan oh luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko, oh pil mehn Suhs akan me kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah, me nting kan en soukohp akan oh wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo me mehlel.

40 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Keimwiseklahn nting pwukat, me ke kilangehr rehn Mehn Liki kan, pahn kadehdehda mehlel en [nting] keieuo, me sang rehn wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, oh pahn kasalehda soahng kan me sansal oh kesempwal me kohsang irail; oh pahn sansalada ong keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros, me Sihmpwul en Kohto iei ih Sapwellimen Sahm Soutuko, oh Soundoar en sampah; oh me aramas koaros anahne kohdo reh, ma soh, irail sohte kak komourla.

41 Oh irail pahn kohdo nin duwen mahsen me pahn koasoandi sang nan douwas en Sihmpwulo; oh mahsen en Sihmpwulo pahn sansalda nan nting en kadaudokemw kan, pil iangahki nan nting en wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo; eri ira koaros pahn kin utuhtpene; pwehki Koht metehmen mie oh Silepen Sihpw metehmen mie ong sampah pwon.

42 Oh ahnsou pahn kohdo me e pahn ketin pwarohng wehi kan koaros, ong mehn Suhs kan oh pil ong Mehn Liki kan; oh mwurin eh pahn ketin pwarohng mehn Suhs akan oh pil mehn likih kan, e pahn uhd pwarohng Mehn Liki kan oh pil mehn Suhs akan, oh me mi mwuhr pahn uhd mihla mwowe, oh me mi mwowe pahn uhd mihla mwuhr.
1-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Tohnleng men mahsanihong Nihpai duwen kapai kan oh keria kan me pahn kohieng Mehn Liki kan—Mwomwohdiso riaute me mie: Mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto oh mwomwohdiso en tepilo—Souleng kan en Koht nan wehi koaros kin lokolok pahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo—Wahnpoaron Sohn pahn ntingihda duwen imwiseklahn sampah. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh ahnsouo pahn lelledo, me ma Mehn Liki kan pahn idawehn Sihmpwul en Kohto ni rahno me e pahn ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih sang ni sapwellime mahsen, oh pil sapwellime roson, oh pil wiwiah kan, pwehn ketikihsang mwohrail arail takain dipekelekel kan—

2 Oh dehr keptakaiala mohngiongarail kan mwohn Sihmpwul en Kohto, irail pahn iang wiahla kisehn en kadaudoken ahmw pahpao; iei, irail pahn iang wiahla peneinei en Israel; oh irail pahn wia aramas pai kei pohn sahpw en inouo kohkohlahte; irail sohte pahn pwurehng selidi; ohp eneinei en Israel sohla pahn namenekla.

3 Oh lapalahn pwoahro, me mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo weiradahng irail, iei mwomwohdisou me tepilo oh nah seri kan wiahdao, pwe en kak kahluwahdilahng aramas akan nan ehl—iei, lapalahn pwoahro me weiweida ong kamwomwalahn aramas pahn uhd audaudkihda irail akan me weiradao, ong kasohrala mehlel en pein irail, [nin duwen] Sihmpwul en Kohto eh mahsanih; kaidehn kasohralahn aramas, ahpw lekideklahng nan kisinieio me sohte imwi.

4 Pwe kilang, met iei duwen tepilo eh kin kalowehdi aramas, oh pil nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kopwung, [me pahn wiawi] ong irail kan me kinwia doadoahk en mwersuwed oh dipan mwohn silahngi.

5 Kedekedeo tohnlengo eri mahsanihong ngehi, Nihpai, ketihtihki: Ke kilangehr me ma Mehn Liki kan pahn koluhla e pahn mwahu ong irail; oh ke esehier duwen inou kan en Kauno ong peneinei en Israel; oh ke pil rongehr me mehmen me sohte pahn koluhla e uhdahn pahn mehla.

6 Eri, meid suwed ong Mehn Liki kan ma iei mohngiongarail kan pahn keptakaila mwohn Sihmpwul en Koht.

7 Sihmpwul en Koht mahsanih, ahnsouo kohkohdo me I pahn wiahda doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei nan pwungen aramas akan; doadoahk ehu me pahn poatoapoat, ong pali koaros—pwehn kahreiraillahng popohl oh mour soutuk, de ong arail selidiong keptakain mohngiongirail kan oh rotalahn arail lamalam pwehki arail lohdieng nan kaludu, oh i hen kamwomwomwla, ni paliwar oh ni palingehn, nin duwen selidi en tepilo, nin duwen me I mahsaniher.

8 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me tohnglengo mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihongie: Ke tamatamante sapwellimen Sahmo inou i hen peneinei en Israel? I ahpw sapeng patohwan, Ei maing.

9 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilengla, oh kilang mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me iei nohnohn suwed akan koaruhsie, me tepilo wiahdahro.

10 Oh e mahsanihongie: Kilahng mwomwohdiso riaute me mie; ehu iei mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto, a mehteio iei mwomwohdiso en tepilo; eri, mehmen me sohte iang mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto kin iang towe mwomwohdiso suwedo, me iei nohnohn suwed koaros; oh ih me wia lih suwed en sampah unsek.

11 Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada i hen netiki paliwar en sampah pwon, oh e mih pohn sehd tohto; oh e i hen wasa koaros pohn sampah, nan wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros.

12 Kedekedeo I kilangada mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto, oh towe kan me malaulau, pwehki wiewia suwed akan en i hen netiki paliwere me mih pohn pihl akan; ahpw, I kilangada mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwulo, me iei souleng kei en Koht, arail pil iang mihseli pohn sampah; oh wasa me re i hen kan me tikitik, pwehki uwen mwersuwed en i hen netiki paliwar ndand me I kilangadao.

13 Kedekedeo I kilangada nohno ndand suwedo kihpenehr kidelepen aramas pohn sampah, nan wein Mehn Liki kan, pwe irail en pelian Sihmpwul en Kohto.

14 Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada manaman en Sihmpwul en Kohto, eh kohkohdi pohn souleng kan en mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwulo, oh pohn sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inou kan, me kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah; oh irail tehtehki mour pwuhng oh manaman en Koht ni lingan kowahlap.

15 Kedekedeo I kilangadahr me engieng en Koht kipehdier mwomwohdiso ndand suwedo, kahredahr mahwin kan oh rohng en mahwin kan nan pwungen wehi kan koaros oh keinek kan en sampah.

16 Oh ni ahnsou me mahwin oh rohng en mahwin kan tepda wiewiawi nan pwungen wehi kan koaros me iangih nohno suwedo, tohnlengo eri mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang, engieng en Koht miher pohn nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar kan; oh kilang, ke kilangehr mepwukat koaruhsie—

17 Oh ni ahnsou me rahno pahn leledo me engieng en Koht pahn kipehdi nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar kan, me iei mwomwohdiso ndand suwedo en sampah pwon, me tepilo wiahdao, eri, ni rahno, sapwellimen Sahmo doadoahk pahn tepida, pwe en kaunopdahng ahlo ong pweidahn sapwellime inou kan, me e ketin wiahiongehr sapwellime aramas akan me iei peneinei en Israel.

18 Kedekedeo tohnlengo eri mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Kilahng!

19 Oh ngehi kilengla oh kilangada aramas emen, oh e likawih likou pwetepwet ehu.

20 Oh tohnlengo eri mahsanihongie: Kilang emen wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.

21 Kilahng, e pahn kilahng oh ntingihda luhwen mepwukat; ei, oh pil soahng tohto me wiawiher.

22 Oh e pahn pil ntingihda duwen imwiseklahn sampah.

23 Eri, soahng kan me e pahn ntingihda e pwung oh mehlel; oh kilang e ntingdier nan pwuhk me ke kilangehro me kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs; oh ni ahnsou me e kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs, de, ni ahnsou me [mahsen en] pwuhko kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs, soahng kan me ntingdier sansal oh unsek, oh keieu kesempwal oh mengei ong aramas koaros en kak wehwehki.

24 Oh kilang, soahng kan me wahnpoaron en Sihmpwul menet pahn ntingihdi iei soahng tohto me ke kilangehr; oh kilahng, luhwe kan me ke pahn kilang.

25 Ahpw soahng kan me ke pahn kilang sang met kohla ke sohte pahn ntingihdi; pwe Kauno Koht ketin kasarawialahr wahnpoaron en Sihmpwul en Kohto me ih me pahn ntingihdi.

26 Oh pil ekei me kohdo mahs, ong irail e ketin kasalehiengehr soahng koaros, oh irail ntingihdier; oh nting ko katengetengdier pwe re en kohdo ni unsek, nin duwen me mehlelo me mih rehn Sihmpwulo, ahnsou me Kauno pahn ketin koasoanehdi, ong peneinei en Israel.

27 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr oh kadehdehki, me eden wahnpoaron en Sihmpwulo iei Sohn, nin duwen me tohnlengo mahsanih.

28 Oh kilang, Ngehi, Nihpai, sohte mweimweieng I en ntingihdi luhwen soahng kan me I kilangehr oh rongehr; eri soahng kan me I ntingihdier I itariki; oh I ntingihdi ekiste duwen soahng kan me I kilangehr.

29 Oh I kadehdehki me I kilangehr soahng kan me ei pahpao kilangehr, oh tohnleng en Kauno me ketin kasalehiongie mepwukat.

30 Oh met I kaimwsakalahr ei koasoai me pid soahng kan me I kilangehr ni ahnsou me Ngehno waiehsangehr; oh ma soahng koaros me I kilangehr sohte ntingdi, a soahng kan me I ntingihdier pwung. Oh met mehlel. Ahmen.
1-ne 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kadaudoken Lihai kan pahn alehdi rongamwahuo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan ni imwin rahn akan—Kopwurupwurpenehn mehn Israel kan rasohng tuhke olihp me uhdahn rahn tuhke kan pahn pwurehng kapatapatohng paliweren tuhkeo—Nihpai kawehwehdi duwen kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro oh koasoaia duwen sapwellimen Koht pwuhng ni eh pahn ketin katohrepeseng me suwed sang me mwahu. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, mwurin Ngehno tiada pohi, oh [I] kilangehr mepwukat koaros, I pwurodo ni imwen ei pahpao impwalo.

2 Kedekedeo I kilangada riei pwutak ko, oh irail wie mwoaroamwoarongkipene duwen soahng kan me ei pahpao koasoaiahengirailehr.

3 Pwe e koasoaiahiong irailehrni mehlel soahng kesempwal tohtoh, me apwal [aramas] en wehwehki, ihte ma aramas pahn peki rehn Kauno; oh mohngiongirail kan keptakai, kahrehda ar sohte kin kilenglahng Kauno nin duwen me irail konehng wia.

4 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, nsensuwed pwehki keptakai en mohngiongirail kan, oh pil, pwehki soahng kan me I kilangehr, oh ese me re uhdahn pahn wiawi pwehki uwen suwed me aramas kan kin wiahda.

5 Kedekedeo ngehi eri luwetla pwehki ei kahpwal akan, pwe I leme me ei kahpwal akan laud sang mehkoaros, pwehki kamwomwalahn nei aramas akan, pwe I kilangehr arail pwupwilao.

6 Kedekedeo mwurin ei kehlaildahro I koasoaieng riei pwutak kan, pwe I men esehda mehlel kahrepen arail mwoarmwoarong.

7 Oh irail nda: Kilang, se sohte kak wehwehki soahng kan me aht pahpao koasoaiahier me pid rahn tuhke olihpo, oh pil duwen Mehn Liki kan.

8 Oh I kalelapakrehrail: Kumwail pekier rehn Kauno?

9 Oh irail sapengkinie: Soh; pwe Kauno sohte kin ketin kasalehiong kiht mepwukat.

10 Kilang, I ndahieng irail: Ia duwen amwail sohte kin kapwaiada kosonned en Kauno? Ia duwen amwail pahn lekidekla, pwehki mohngiongimwail kan kekeluwakalahr?

11 Kumwail sohte tamataman soahng kan me Kauno ketin mahsaniher?—Ma kumwail sohte pahn kekeluwakiala mohngiongimwail kan, oh peki rehi ni pwoson, kamehlele me kumwail pahn alehdi, iangahki kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, ni mehlel kumwail pahn wehwehkihla mepwukat koaruhsie.

12 Kilang, I ndahieng kumwail, me peneinei en Israel rasohng tuhke olihpo, sang ni Ngehn en Kauno me mie rehn atail pahpao; oh kilang kitail seu tipwasangehr peneinei en Israel, oh kitail seu wia apwoat rahn tuhkehn peneinei en Israelo?

13 Oh met, wehwehn dahme atail pahpao koasoiadahr me pid rahntuhke mehlel kan ar kapatapatehng ni tuhkeo sang ni unseklahn Mehn Liki kan, iei, me nan imwin rahn akan, ahnsou me kadaudoketail kan pahn pwupwikihdi ar sohpwoson, iei, erein sounpar tohto, oh dih tohto mwurin Mesaia eh pahn ketin pwarohng aramas akan ni paliwar, eri rongamwahu unsek en Mesaiao pahn kohieng Mehn Liki kan, oh sang rehn Mehn Liki kan e ahpw pahn uhd kohieng kadaudoketail kan me luwehdi—

14 Oh ni ahnsouo kadaudoketail kan me luwehdi pahn esehda me irail iei kisehn peneinei en Israel, oh me irail iei sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inouo; oh irail ahpw pahn esehda oh wehwehkihda duwen arail pahpa kahlap oko, oh pil wehwehkihla rongamwahu en arail Soundoaro, me pein ih ketin padahkihong arail pahpa kalahp oko; eri, irail pahn wehwehkihla duwen arail Soundoaro oh uhdahn karepen sapwellime padahk, pwe irail en kak ese duwen arail pahn kohdohng reh oh komourla.

15 Oh ni rahno irail seu pahn perenda oh kapingahki arail Koht soutuk, arail paipalap oh komourparail? Iei, ni rahno, irail sou pahn ale kakehlaparail oh ketihnaparail sang ni tuhkehn wain me mehlelo? Iei, irail sou pahn kohdohng nan udahn sapwellimen Koht kehl mehlelo?

16 Kilang, I ndahieng kumwail, Mehlel; irail pahn pwurehng tamanirailda nan pwungen peneinei en Israel kan; irail pahn poadehng tuhkehn olip mehlelo, pwehki arail wia rahn tuhke mehlel en olipo.

17 Oh iei met me atail pahpao kawehwe; oh e kawehwe me e sohte pahn wiawi lao lel mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn kamwereirailpeseng; oh e kawehwe me e pahn kohdo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh Kauno kak ketin kasalehieng Mehn Liki kan sapwellime manaman, pwehki mehn Suhs akan, de peneinei en Israel arail soikala.

18 Eri, atail pahpao sohte koasoiahte kadaudoketail kan, ahpw pil peneinei en Israel koaros, nin duwen inouo eh pahn pweida nan imwin rahn akan; inouo me Kauno ketin wiahieng samatail Eipram, mahsanih: Nan kadaudokemw kan seri koaruhsie nan sampah pahn kapaida.

19 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, koasoaiahiong irail soahng tohto me pid duwen mepwukat; mehlel, I koasoaiahiong irail duwen kopwurupwurdohn mehn Suhs akan ni imwin rahn akan.

20 Oh I wadekohng irail mahsen akan en Aiseia, me mahsanih duwen kopwurupwurodohn mehn Suhs akan, de peneinei en Israel; oh mwurin arail pahn pwurodo re sohlahr pahn pwurehng namanekla, de re solahr pahn pwurehng mwerpeseng. Kedekedeo I koasoaiahieng riei pwutak ko soahng tohto, kahrehda re meleileidi oh akitikitikla mwohn Kauno.

21 Kedekedeo irail pwurehng koasoaiong ie, ndinda: Ia wehwehn soahng wet me atail pahpao kilangada nan ouramano? Ia wehwehn tuhke me e kilangadao?

22 Oh ngehi eri ndaiong irail: E wehwehki tuhkehn koumouro.

23 Oh irail ndaiong ie: Ia wehwehn reil mete me atail pahpao kilangadahro, me uhlahng ni tuhkeo?

24 Ngehi ndahng ira me iei mahsen en Koht; oh mehmen me pahn rong mahsen en Koht, oh koledi teng, irail sohte pahn lekidekla; oh pil sohte lohdi pahn manaman en arail kasongosong kan oh kesik ketieu kan en soun kasongosongo, me pahn kahluwairaillang mehla.

25 Eri, Ngehi, Nihpai, kangoangehkinirail re en rong mahsen en Kauno; mehlel, I kangoangehkinirail sang ni kehl en palingeni koaros, oh sang ni koahiek koaros me I ahneki, pwe irail en kak rong mahsen en Koht oh tamataman re en kin kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan ahnsou koaros ni mehkoaros.

26 Oh irail kalelapak rehi: Ia wehwehn pillap me atail pahpao kilangadao?

27 Oh I ndaiong irail me pihl me atail pahpao kilangadahro me inenen samin; oh uwen ah madamadau eh direkihla soahng teikan karehda e sohte kilang uwen samin en pihlo.

28 Oh I ndaiong irail me iei wahu kamasepwehko mwo, me katohrehsang me suwed kan tuhkehn komouro oh pil sapwellimen Koht souleng kan.

29 Oh I ndaiong irail me e wehwehki ehl kamasepwehko, me tohnlengo mahsanihong ie me [e] kaunoupdahr ong me suwed akan.

30 Oh I ndaiong irail me aht pahpao pil kilangada me sapwellimen Koht pwuhng me katohrepeseng me suwed kan sang me mwahu kan; oh marainpeo duwehte marain en mpwul en kisiniei, me kin kohkohdahla rehn Koht kohkohlahte, oh sohte imwi.

31 Oh irail pil kalelapak rehi: Soahng wet wehwehki kalokolok en paliwar nan mour wet, de e wehwehki dahme ngehn pahn wiahla mwurin mehlahn paliwar, de e koasoakoasoaia duwen soahng kan me pid sampah?

32 Kedekedeo I ndahieng irail me e wehwehki mehkan me pid paliwar oh palingehn; pwe rahno pahn lelledo me irail pahn pakadeingki arail wiewia kan, iei, wiewia kan me [irail] wiahda ni arail momour ni sampah nan arail ahnsou nan erein mour wet.

33 Eri, ma irail pahn mehla nan arail suwed akan irail pahn pil iang lekidekla, pwehki soahng kan me sang palingehn, me pid duwen [mour de wiewia] pwung; eri, irail pahn udahn uh mwohn silangin Koht, pwe irail en pakadeingki arail wiewia kan; oh ma arail wiewia kan samin re uhdahn pil pahn samin; oh ma irail pahn samin re sohte pahn kak kousoan nan wein Koht; pwe ma soh, a wein Koht pil pahn samin.

34 Ahpw kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, wein Koht sohte samin, oh sohte mehkot samin kak pidelong nan wein Koht; eri e pahn mie wasa samin me kaunopdahngehr me samin kan.

35 Oh mie wasa me kaunopdahr, iei, nan ehl kamasepwehko me I koasoaiahiero, oh tepilo me kaunopadahr wasao; eri wasa me mour en aramas men pahn lel iei nan wehin Koht, de lekidekla pwehki pwuhng me I koasoaiahier.

36 Eri, me suwed kan pahn posoikla sang rehn me mwahu kan, oh sang ni tuhkehn komouro, me wah kan inenen kaselel oh mwahu sang wahn tuhke koaros, iei, oh ih me keieu mwahu nanpwungen sapwellimen Koht kisakis kan. Oh ih met me I ndaiong riei pwutak kan. Ahmen.
1-ne 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Me suwed kan kin apwaliki padahk mehlel—Nein Lihai pwutak kan pwoudikihda nein Ismael serepein kan—Liahona kasalehda wasa re pahn keidie nan sahpwtehno—Ekei ahnsou mahsen en Kauno kin ntingdi pohn Liahona—Ismael mehla; ah peneinei kaulim pwehki arail kahpwal akan. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri kanekelahr ei koasoai ong riei pwutak ko, kilang ira ndaiong ie: Ke ndahng kiht soahng kei me inenen apwal ong kiht en rong.

2 Kedekedeo I ndaiong ira me I ese me I koasoaia soahng apwal akan ong me suwed akan, nin duwen padahk mehlel; oh me pwung kan I ale iraildahr, oh kadehdehki me irail uhdahn pahn pwekipwekda ni keimwseklahn rahno; eri, me sapwung kan pahn apwaliki me mehlelo, karehiong arail lingeringerda kowahlap.

3 Oh met riei ohl oko, ma kumwa pwung oh inangih rong me mehlelo, oh idawehn, pwe kumwa en kak weid ni pwung mwohn Koht, a kumwa sohte pahn kaulimkihla me mehlelo, oh nda: Ke koasoaiahieng kiht soahng apwal ekei.

4 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri kangoange riei ohl oko, sang ni ngoang koaros, pwe [ira] en kak kapwaiada kosonned en Kauno.

5 Kedekedeo ira eri karakarahkala mwohn Kauno; kahrehda I perenkihda oh ahneki koapworopwor laud ong ira, me ira pahn weid nan ahl en mour pwung.

6 Met, mepwukat koaros wiwiawi nan ahnsou me ei pahpao kin koukousoan nan impwal nan wahu me e kahdanki Lemuel.

7 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri pwoudikihda emen nein Ismael serepein ko; oh pil, riei pwutak ko pwoudikihda nein Ismael serepein teiko; oh Soram pil pwoudkihda nein Ismael serepein me keieu laudo.

8 Oh met ei pahpao kapwaiadahr sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan me kohiengehr. Oh pil, ngehi, Nihpai, kapaidahr mehlel sang rehn Kauno.

9 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahseniong ei pahpao nihpwongo, oh kehkehlingkiheng me lakapw e pahn seiloaklahng nan sapwtehno.

10 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ei pahpao pwourda ni mensengo, oh kohla ni wenihmw en impwalo, e pwuriamweikihla eh kilangada nan pwehlo mpwei pwonopwon ehu me wiawihkihda doadoahk lingan; oh e wiawihkihda pirahs. Oh nan mpweio mie kisin arep mete riau; oh ehu kin idilahng wasa se pahn keidla ie nan sapwtehno.

11 Kedekedeo kiht eri kihpene soahng kan koaros me se anahne wa kohla nan sapwtehno, oh mwenge oh dipwsou koaros me luhwehdi me Kauno ketikihong kiht; oh se wahda soangsoangen weren tuhke koaros me se kak wa kohla nan sapwtehno.

12 Kedekedeo se ahpw wahda imwat impwal oko oh mweselahng nan sapwtehno, palio pillap en Leimen.

13 Kedekedeo se seiseiloangkiher erein rahn pahieu, kohkohlahng pali eir de pali eir en pali mese, oh se ahpw pwurehng kauwada imwat impwal akan; oh se kiheng eden wasao Saser.

14 Kedekedeo se ahpw ale nait kesik ketieu ko oh arep ko, oh kohla nan sapwtehno pwe sen kasikihdi kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge; oh mwurin aht kasikihdier kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge, se pwurala rehn aht peneinei ko nan sapwtehno, wasa me adaniki Saser. Oh se ahpw douluhla nan sapwtehno, weweidlahte nan ahl me se keid loaleo, kekeidte wasa me keieu pwelmwahu nan sapwtehno, me iei wasa kan me mihte limwahn Sehd Weitahtao.

15 Kedekedeo se ahpw seiseiloangkiher erein rahn kei, kasikasikiekihdi kanat mwenge nait kesik ketieu kan oh arep kan oh nait pahi kan oh takai kan nan aht seiseiloako.

16 Oh se ahpw kin ideidawehn kaweid kan en mpweio, me kin kahluwaikit wasa kan me keieu pwelmwahu nan sapwtehno.

17 Oh mwurin aht seiloangkiher erein rahn tohto, se ahpw kauwada imwat impwal akan nan erein ahnsou kis, pwe sen kak pwurehng koammoal oh alehdi kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge.

18 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw kohlahn kasikiedi kanat sali, ahpw, I kawehla nei kesik ketieuo, me wiawihkihda mete; oh mwurin ei kawehla nei kesik ketieuo, kilang, riei pwutak ko lingeringerda pahi pwehki nei kesik ketieuo eh ohla, eri se sohte koledi kanat sali.

19 Kedekedeo kiht eri pwurala rehn aht peneinei kan oh sohte wa sali, oh irail pwangada, pwehki arail seiseiloak, re alehkihdi apwal uwen arail duhpekla.

20 Kedekedeo Leimen oh Lemuel oh nein Ismael pwutak ko eri tepda kaulim kouahlap, pwehki arail lokolok kan oh kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh ei pahpao pil tepida kaulime Kauno ah Koht; mehlel, oh irail koaruhsie inenen nsensuwedla, lao irail koaruhsie ahpw kaulime Kauno.

21 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri iangehr riei ko lokolongkiher kahpwalo pwehki nei kesik ketieuo eh ohlao, oh sahl en neirail kesik ketieu ko pil mweipeseng, e ahpw tepda apwal kowahlap, mehlel, kahredahr aht sohla kak alehdi kanat sali.

22 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaieng riei ohl oko, pwehki mohngiongarail ko pwurehng keptakaila, lao irail kaukaulime Kauno arail Koht.

23 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw wiahkihda kesik ketieu ehu tuhke pwoat, oh oapwoat arep sang ni tuhke inen pwoat; eri, I wahda nei kesik ketieuo oh arepo, iangahki ehu pahi oh takai kei. Oh ngehi kalelapak rehn ei pahpao: Ia wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kaskihdi kanatail sali?

24 Kedekedeo e ahpw peki rehn Kauno, pwe irail karakarahkalahr pwehki ei koasoai ong irail; pwe I padahkieng irail soahng tohto sang ni kehl en palingeni.

25 Kedekedeo kepitien Kauno ahpw peidohng ei pahpao, oh e lokolok ki mehlel eh kaulime Kauno, ih eri pahtoukihla.

26 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihong ih: Kilang pohn mpweien, oh tehk soahng kan me ntingdier powe.

27 Kedekedeo ahnsou me ei pahpao kilangada soahng kan me ntingdi nan mpweio, ih oh pil riei ohl oko oh nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail pwoud ko masepwehkada oh rerrer kowahlap.

28 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada kisin arep mete ko nan mpweio ar kin doadoahk ma se pahn kin pwoson oh loaloapwoat oh peikiong.

29 Oh pil mie nting kapw ntingdi powe, me mengein aramas en wadek, me kawehwehiong kiht duwen sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan; oh e ntingdi oh kin weliweliali, ma se pahn kin pwoson oh loaloapwoatieng kaweido. Oh se kilang me sang ni wiewia tikitik kan Kauno kin ketin wiahkihda [doadoahk] kapwuriamwei kan.

30 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri idawehn kaweid kan me kohsang nan mpweio oh kohdahla pohn nahnao.

31 Kedekedeo ngehi eri kaskihdi mahn lawalo kan, ngehi eri alehdi kenen aht peneinei kan sali.

32 Kedekedeo I ahpw pwuralahng ni imwat mpwal oko, wahla mahn akan me I kaskihdi; oh ni ahnsou me re kilangada me I koledier kanat sali, irail inenen perenda kowahlap! Kedekedeo irail karakarahkala mwohn Kauno oh wia arail kaping kalahngan ong ih.

33 Kedekedeo kiht eri pwurehng wenla nan aht seiloako, kekeid nan ahlohte me se keid ie nin tapio; oh mwurin aht seiloangkiher erein rahn tohto se ahpw pwurehng kauwada imwat impwal akan, pwe sen kak koammoal erein ahnsou ieu.

34 Kedekedeo Ismael eri mehla, oh seridi nan sahpw ehu me adaniki Neiom.

35 Kedekedeo nein Ismael serepein ko ahpw mwahiei ki kowalap arail pahpao eh melahr, oh arail kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh irail kaulim ki ei pahpao eh wairailsang nan sahpw en Serusalem oh ndinda: Aht pahpao mehlahr; ei, oh kitail wie kohkohseliher nan sapwtehnet, oh kitail lokolongkiher kahpwal laud, duhpek, men nimpil, oh pwangadahr; oh mwurin lokokok pwukat kitail uhdahn pahn mehkihla duhpek nan sapwtehnet.

36 Oh met irail kaulime ei pahpao, oh pil ngehi; oh irail men pwurehng pwuralahng Serusalem.

37 Oh Leimen eri ndaiong Lemuel oh pil nein Ismael pwutak ko: Ser, kitail kemehla atail pahpao, oh pil rietail Nihpai, me wiahkilahr me ih me pahn wia atail kaun oh atail sounpadahk, kitail me wia rie pwutak laud akan.

38 Met, e nda me Kauno mahseniong ih, oh tohnleng kan pil sewese ih. Ahpw kilang, kitail ese me e kin pitipitih kitail; oh e ndaiong kitail mepwukat, oh e kin wiewia doadoahk likamw, pwe en kak pitiekinkitaildi, pwe mwein e medemedewe, me e pahn kahluwaikitailahng wasa kei nan sapwtehn me kitail sehse; oh mwurin eh pahn kahluwakitaila, e medewedahr me e pahn wiahla atail nahnmwarki oh kaunkitailda, pwe en kak wiahiong kitail nsene oh dahme e men wia. Oh iei mwohmw wet me riei pwutak Leimen kin koasoaia me kahrehieng arail lingeringerda.

39 Kedekedeo Kauno eri ketin ieiang kiht, iei, kepitien Kauno ahpw peido oh mahsanihong irail mahsen tohto, oh angiangih irail kouwalahp; oh mwurin arail rongehr ngilen engieng sang ni kepitien Kauno, irail ahpw meleileidi, oh koluhkihla diperail kan, kahrehda Kauno pwurehng ketin kapaiahkinkitada kanat mwenge, pwe sen dehr mehla.
1-ne 17:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Poahngoak kohieng Nihpai en wiahda sohp pwoat—Rie ko uhwong—E kangoange ira sang ni eh padokada duwen sapwellimen Koht wiewia kan ong Israel—Nihpai direkihla manaman en Koht—Rie pwutak ko irairdi ira en dehr doahke, pwe ira de mengidi duwehte ahlek pwoat me mengilahr. Ele Sounpar 592–591 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo se ahpw douluhla nan aht seiloak nan sapwtehno; oh se ahpw kohlahng palimese sang ahnsouo kohla. Oh se ahpw lellohng kahpwal tohto nan aht seiseiloak nan sapwtehno; oh aht pwoud kan naitikiedi seri nan sapwtehno.

2 Oh sapwellimen Kauno kapai laud kin kodohng kiht, oh ni aht kin momouriki uduk me amas nan sapwtehno, aht pwoud kan kin kadihdi mwahu neirail seri kan, oh irail kehlail, mehlel, duwehte ohl akan; oh irail tepdahr sohla kaulimki arail seiloak.

3 Oh kitail kak kilang me sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan uhdahn pahn pweida. Oh ma aramas pahn kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan e uhdahn pahn apwalih irail, oh kakehlaka irail, oh ketikihong irail wiepen arail pahn kak kapwaiada soahng kan me e kin ketin kehkehlingkiheng irail; eri, e ketin apwalih kiht erein aht seiseiloak nan sapwtehno.

4 Oh se ahpw seiseiloangki erein soupar tohto, iei, sounpar waluh nan sapwtehno.

5 Oh se ahpw kohdo nan sahpw me se kahdankihla Sahpwen Rahk, pwehki e diren wahn tuhke oh pil sukehn loangalap; oh Kauno me ketin kaunopada mepwukat koaros pwe se en dehr mehla. Oh se kilangada sehdo, me kahdaniki Iriandom, me wehwehki pihl tohto.

6 Kedekedeo se ahpw kauada imwat impwal akan ni keilen oaroahro; oh mehndahte aht lokolok laud nan kahpwal akan oh kasongosong kan, iei, me tohto me se sohte kak ntingihdi, ahpw se ahneki peren laud ni ahnsou me se lelledo ni oaroahro; oh se kahdanihkihla wasao Sahpwen Rahk, pwehki e diren wahn sahpw.

7 Kedekedeo mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei mihmihkiher nan Sahpwen Rahk erein rahn tohto, I rong kepitien Kauno eh peidohng ie, mahsanih: Pwourda, oh kohdahla pohn nahnao. Oh ni ahnsouohte I pwourda oh kohdahla pohn nahnao, oh lukuweriong Kauno.

8 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Ke pahn wiahda sohp pwoat, ni wiepe me I pahn kasalehienguhk, pwe I en kak wahla noumw aramas akan kotehla sehd wet.

9 Oh ngehi eri patohwan: Maing Kaun, ia wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kak diar takai me mete me I pahn inimada lao peipeseng, pwe I en kak wiahda dipwisou kan me pahn doadoahkohng wiahda sohp me komw mahsanihongieo?

10 Kedekedeo Kauno mahsanihongie wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kak diar takai me mete, pwe I en kak wiahkihda dipwisoun doadoahk kan.

11 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw wiahda mehn pepeuk me I pahn peuk ki kisinieio, [mehn pepeuko wiawikihda] kilin mahn; oh mwurin ei wiahda mehn pepeuko, pwe I en kak peungki kisinieio, I ale takai riau oh idingpene pwe I en kak saunda kisiniei.

12 Pwe Kauno sohte kupwurki sen kalapw saunda kisiniei, ni aht wie seiseiloak nan sapwtehno; e ketin mahsanih: I pahn wiahieng kenemwail mwenge kan en memla, pwe kumwail en dehr kukih;

13 Oh ngehi me pahn wia kamarainpamwail nan sapwtehno; oh I pahn kaunopada ahlo mwohmwail, ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan; eri, ni amwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan [I] pahn kahluwaikumwaillahng nan sahpw en inouo; oh kumwail pahn ese me ngehi me kahluwaikumwail.

14 Eri, Kauno pil mahsanih: Mwurin amwail pahn lella nan sahpw en inouo, kumwail pahn ese me ngehi, Kauno, iei Koht; oh me ngehi, Kauno, me kapitkumwailla sang kamwomwala; ei, I waikumwaildo sang sahpw en Serusalem.

15 Eri, ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw nantihong kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan, oh I ahpw koangoangehki riei ohl akan en mehlel oh loaloapwoat.

16 Kedekedeo I ahpw wiahda dipwisoun doadoahk kan sang ni takai me mete me I inimada lao peipeseng.

17 Oh ni ahnsou me riei ohl akan kilangada me I pahn wiahda sohp pwoat, irail tepda kaulimeie oh nda: Riatail pwutako pweipwei, pwe e lemehieng me e kak wiahda sohp; ei, oh e pil lemehieng me e kak kotehla lapalahn madau kat.

18 Oh riei ohl akan eri kaulimahkinie, oh sohte men iang wia doadoahk, pwe irail sohte kamehlele me I kak wiahda sohp pwoat; oh irail pil sohte kamehlele me Kauno me ketin mahsanihong ie dahme I pahn wia.

19 Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, pahtoukihla mehlel pwehki keptaikai en mohngiongarail kan; oh met ahnsou me irail kilangada ei tepda pahtou irail perenda nan mohngiongarail kan, lao irail kouruhrkinie oh ndinda: Se ese me ke sohte kak wiahda sohp pwoat, pwe se eseier me ahmw madamadau sohte itar; eri, ke sohte kak wiahda soahngen doadoahk laud duwehte men.

20 Oh ke duwehte atail pahpao, me mihla pan madamadau likamw en ah mohngiongo; mehlel, e kahluwaikitail sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh kitail kokohseli mwahl nan sapwtehn erein sounpar tohto; oh atail pwoud kan wiahier doadoahk laud, ni ar liseiandahr; oh irail naitikihdi seri nan sapwtehno oh lokolongki soahng koaros, ihte re sohte mehla; oh e pahn mwahute ma re mehla mwohn arail kohkohlahsang Serusalem oh wie lokolongki kahpwal pwukat.

21 Kilang, erein sounpar tohto kitail wie lokolok nan sapwtehn erein ahnsouo kitail kak wie nsensenamwahuki atail dipwisou kan oh sapwatail sahpwo; ei, oh mwein kitail pahn pereperen.

22 Oh kitail ese me aramas akan me mihmi nan sahpw en Serusalem wia aramas pwung kei; pwe irail kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan oh kopwung kan, oh sapwellime kosonned akan koaros, nin duwen kosonned en Moses; eri, kitail ese me irail wia aramas pwung kei; oh atail pahpao kadeik irail, oh kahluwaikitailsang pwehki atail kin rong eh koasoai kan; mehlel, oh riatail pwutako pil duwehte ih. Oh ih mwomwen koasoai me riei pwutak kan kaukaulimkihong kiht.

23 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaieng irail oh nda: Kumwail kamehlele me atail pahpa kahlap oko, me wia seri en Israel akan, kak pitisang mehn Isip kan ma irail sohte rong mahsen en Kauno?

24 Mehlel, kumwail medemedewe me irail kak pakahrlahsang arail wia lidu ma Kauno sohte mahsanihong Moses en kahluwairail sang arail wia lidu?

25 Met kumwail ese me seri en Israel wia lidu; oh kumwail ese me irail kin wiewia doadoahk laud, me uhdahn kansensuwed mehlel; eri, kumwail ese me e wia mehkot mwahu ong irail, me irail en kasaledeksang mour en kalidu.

26 Met kumwail ese me Kauno kehkehlikieng Moses pwe en wia doadoahk kesempwal wo; oh kumwail ese me sang ni sapwellime mahseno Sehd Weitahtao pwalpeseng, oh irail eri kotehla, keid pohn ngalangal.

27 Ahpw kumwail ese me mehn Isip ko, me wia nein Parao sounpei kan ahpw duhla nan Sehd Weitahtao.

28 Oh kumwail pil ese me [Kauno] ketin katungoalehkinirail manna nan sapwtehno.

29 Mehlel, oh kumwail pil ese me Moses, sang ni eh mahsen nin duwen manaman en Koht me mihmi reh, [e] poakih paipo oh pihl ahpw kusieisang loale, pwe seri en Israel kan en kak nimpil.

30 Oh mendahte Kauno arail Koht, arail Sounkomour, eh ketin kahluwairail oh ketiket mwohrail, kahkahluwa irail nirahn oh kamkamarainih irail nihpwong, oh kin ketin wiahiong irail soahng koaros me kesempwal ong aramas en alehdi, irail ahpw keptakaila oh karotongala arail madamadau kan, oh lahlahwe Moses oh Koht mehlel oh ieiaso.

31 Kedekedeo nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin kamwomwirailla; oh nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin kahluwa irail; oh nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin wiahieng irail soahng koaros; oh sohte mehkot kin wiawi ihte sang ni sapwellime mahsen.

32 Oh mwurin arail kotehla pillap en Sordan e ketin kakehlairailda pwe irail en pwakihpeseng tohn sahpwo, ei, pwe irail [tohn sahpwo] en mwerpeseng oh mehla.

33 Oh met, kumwail medemedewe me tohn sahpwet, me mihmi nan sahpw en inouo, me atail pahpa kahlap oko kasareirailao, kumwail leme me irail aramas pwung kei? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh.

34 Kumwail wiahki me atail pahpa kahlap oko kesempwalasang irail ma irail aramas pwung kei? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh.

35 Kilang, Kauno kin ketin kesempwaliki aramas koaros; mehmen me pwungkin kenikenla rehn Koht. Ahpw kilang, aramas pwukat soikala mahsen en Koht koaros, oh irail kin wiewia me suwed; oh engieng en Koht mihla pohrail; oh Kauno ahpw keriahla sahpwo ong irail, oh kapaiahkihda atail pahpa kahlap oko sahpwo; mehlel, e ketin keriairaila pwehn kamwomwirailla oh kapaiahkihda atail pahpa kahlap oko irail ensapwenikihla.

36 Kilang, Kauno ketin kapikada sampah pwe aramas en kousoanlaie; oh e ketin kapikada sapwellime seri kan pwe re en sapwenikihla.

37 Oh e kin ketin apwaliada wehi pwung, oh kawehla wehi suwed akan.

38 Oh e kin ketin kahluwahla me pwung kan nan sahpw en inou kan, oh kamwomwala me suwed kan, oh keriahla sahpw akan ong irail.

39 E kin ketin kakaun nanleng wasa ileilehie, pwehki iei wasa me mwoahle kin mih ie, oh sampah iei utupen aluweluwe kan.

40 Oh e ketin poakohng irail akan me men wiahki ih arail Koht. Kilang, e ketin poakohng atail pahpa kahlap oko, oh e ketin inoukihong irail, iei, Eipraam, Aisek, oh Seikop; oh kin ketin tamataman inou kan me e ketin wiadahr; eri, e ahpw ketin wairailsang nan Sahpw en Isip.

41 Oh e ahpw ketin kainenehkinirailla sapwellime sokono nan sapwtehno; pwe irail kakeptaikaila kapehdarail kan, duwehte dahme kumwail wiahier; oh Kauno kaineneirailla pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan. E ketin kadarala sinek pwoisin kei rehrail; oh mwurin sinek ko eh keirailpenehr e ahpw ketin kaunopada wiepen arail pahn kak mwahula; oh doadoahk me irail anahne wia iei kilenglahng; oh pwehki koasoandio eh nohn mengei, de pwehki wiepeo eh mengei, tohto irail ahpw mehla.

42 Oh irail kin kakeptakaila mohngiongirail kan ekei pak, oh irail kin lahlahwe Moses, oh pil lahlahwe Koht; ahpw, kumwail ese me sapwellime manamano me ketin kahluwairaillahng nan sahpw en inouo.

43 Oh met, mwurin mepwukat koaros, ahnsouo eri lelledo me irail suwedla, iei, suwedla mehlel; oh I sehse ahpw ahnsou wet irail nektehn kamwomwomwala; pwe I ese me rahno uhdahn pahn lelledo me irail pahn kamwomwomwala, ihte ekei me pahn kalipilipala oh selidi.

44 Eri, Kauno poahngokihong ei pahpao me e pahn kohkohla nan sapwtehn; oh mehn Suhs akan pil song kemehla ih; ei, oh kumwail pil song kemehla ih; eri, nan kapehdemwail kan kumwail wia soun kamaramas kei oh kumwail duwehte irail.

45 Kumwa kin mwadang wia me suwed ahpw pwand en tamanda Kauno amwa Koht. Kumwa kilangehr tohnleng men, oh e mahsenieng kumwa; ei, mie ahnsou me kumwa rongehr kepitien [Kauno]; oh e mahsanihong kumwa ni ngihl tikitik, ahpw kumwa sohte nsenohki, kahrehda kumwa sohte kak kehn sapwellime mahsen akan; eri, e ketin mahsaniong kumwa duwehte ngihl en nansapwe, me kahredahr sampah eh rerrer oh mwomwen me e pahn pwalpeseng.

46 Oh kumwail ese me sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahseno e kak kahrehda imwilahn sampah; mehlel, oh kumwail ese me sang sapwellime mahsen e kak ketin wiahieng wasa sapahrek kan en pahrekla, oh wasa pahrek kan en ohla. Eri, dahme kahrehda, kumwa kakeptakaila nan kapehdamwa kan?

47 Kilang, palingeniet okihlahr ei lokolok pwehki kumwa, oh mohngiongiet medengki; I periki kumwa de lekidekla kohkohlahte. Kilang, I direkihla Ngehn en Koht, kahrehda paliwereiet sohla angih.

48 Oh met mwurin ei ndaiong irail soangen koasoai pwukat irail ahpw lingeringerda pahi, oh men keseiehlahng nan wasa loal nan kepin madau; oh ahnsou me irail kohdohng koliehdi I koasoai ong irail, nda: Ni mwaren Koht Wasa Lapalap, I ndaiong kumwail en dehr doahkeie, pwe I direkihla manaman en Koht, me kipehdi paliwereiet; oh mehmen me pahn doahkeie e pahn mengila duwehte ahlek pwoat memengilahr; oh e pahn mwamwahlla mwohn manaman en Koht, pwe Koht pahn ketin kaloke.

49 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ndaiong irail me irail re en dehr kaulime arail pahpao; oh re en dehr peikasaliki ar pahn sewese ie, pwe Koht me poahngoakihiengie I en wiahda sohp pwoat.

50 Oh I ndaiong irail: Ma Koht mahsanihongie I en wia soahng koaros, I kak wia. Ma e pahn mahsanihongie I en ndaiong pihlet, en wiepwella, e pahn wiepwella; oh ma I pahn nda, e pahn wiawi.

51 Oh met, ma Kauno sapwellimaniki soangen manamano, oh ketin wiahiongehr aramas akan manaman kopwuriamwei tohto, ia mwomwen e sohte pahn kak ketin kaweid ie, pwe I en kak wiahda sohp?

52 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaiahieng riei ohl oko soahng toht, kahrehda arail pwonla oh sohla kak akamaiong ie; irail pil sohte kak koliehdi de doahkehkinie sendinpehrail kan, erein rahn ekei. Irail sohte men wia pwe irail en dehr mengidi pwehki manaman kehlail en Ngehn en Koht; oh e ketin ieiang ie.

53 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihongie: Kapahwei pehmwen rehn riomw ohl akan, a irail sohte pahn mengidi, ahpw I pahn kamedekihrahla, Kauno mahsanih, oh met I pahn wia, pwe irail en ese me ngehi iei Kauno ara Koht.

54 Kedekedeo ngehi eri kapahla pehiet rehn riei ohl oko oh ira sohte mengidi mwohi; ahpw Kauno ketin itik ira, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e mahsaniher.

55 Oh met, ira nda: Se esehier me Kauno ketin ieianguhk, pwe se ese me manaman en Kauno me itingkitada. Oh ira pwupwidi mwohi, oh pahn pwongih ie, ahpw I sohte mweidehng ira oh I ndaiong ira: Ngehi riamwail pwutak, iei, riamwail me keieu tikitik; eri, pwongih Kauno amwa Koht, oh kahkahki semomw oh inomw, pwe kumwa en kak mour werei pohn sahpw me Kauno amwa Koht pahn ketikihong kumwa.
1-ne 18:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sohpo nekier—Ipwidi en Seikop oh Sosep sansaladahr—Pwihno mweselahng nan sahpw en inouo—Nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail pwoud kan alehda peren en sampah oh kahngohdi—Nihpai eri selidi, oh kisinieng kehlail ehu eri kapwurehla sohpo—Nihpai saledekla, oh sang ni ah kapakap kisiniengo ahpw meleileidi—Aramas oko eri lella nan sahpw en inouo. Ele Sounpar 591–589 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pwongiala Kauno, oh patehngie wenla mwowe; oh kiht ahpw koadoahke tuhke oh wiahda doadoahk me kapwuriamwei kaselel. Oh ekei ahnsou Kauno ketin kasalehiongie duwen ei pahn doadoahngki tuhke ko oh wiahkihda sohpo.

2 Met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte doadoahngki tuhke ko ni wiepe me semen kan wehwehki, de ni wiepe me aramas kin wiahda sohp; ahpw I wiahda ni wiepe me Kauno ketin kasalehiongie; eri, e sohte wiawi ni wiepe me aramas kin doadoahngki.

3 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kin kalapw kohla pohn nahna, oh I kin kalapw kapakap ong Kauno; Kauno eri ketin kasalehiongie soahng kapwuriamwei tohto.

4 Kedekedeo mwurin ei kanekelahr sohpo, nin duwen mahsen en Kauno, riei pwutak ko eri kilangada me e uhdahn mwahu, oh me wiepen doadoahko me kaselel mehlel; eri, irail pil pwurehng karakarahkala mwohn Kauno.

5 Kedekedeo kepitien Kauno ahpw peido rehn ei pahpao, me se en pwourda oh kodihla nan sohpo.

6 Kedekedeo mandahn rahno, mwurin aht kaunopadahr soahng koaros, wahn tuhke oh uduk tohto sang nan sapwtehno, oh lapalahn sukehn loangalap, oh soahngen mwenge kan me Kauno ketin mahsanihong kiht, se ahpw kohdihla nan sohpo, iangahki aht wisik kan oh werentuhke kan, oh soahng koaros me se wahda, nin duwen ahn emen emen sounpar; eri, se ahpw kohdihla nan sohpo, iangahki aht pwoud kan oh nait seri kan.

7 Oh met, ei pahpao ahpw nainikihdahr pwutak riemen nan sapwtehno; me laudo adaniki Seikop oh me tikitiko andaniki Sosep.

8 Kedekedeo mwurin aht pwonte kohdihla nan sohpo, oh wahdahr dipwsou kan oh soahng kan me [Kauno] mahsanih ong kiht, se ahpw tepiada seiloak nan madau oh kisiniengo ahpw ipirkihtalahng sahpw en inouo.

9 Oh mwurin kisiniengo eh ipirkihtalahr erein rahn tohto, kilang, riei ko oh nein Ismael pwutak ko oh pil arail pwoud ko ahpw tepda pereperen mwahl, kahrehda ar tepda kahlek, oh koul, oh lokaia lemei, ei, lao irail manokehla soangen manaman da me kahkahluwa irail; iei, irail ahpw lemeila douluhl.

10 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw salohkihda mehlel Kauno de ketin engiengda paht, oh kalokehkinkiht aht sapwung kan, oh e pahn kahrehiong aht kihrla nan kepin madau; eri, ngehi, Nihpai, tepda koasoai maledek ong irail; ahpw kilang irail lingeringerda pahi oh nda: Se sohte pahn mweidohng riat pwutak tikitiko en kaunkitada.

11 Kedekedeo Leiman oh Lemuel ahpw koliehdi oh pirehkiniehdi sahl kei, oh ira sarlemei ong ie; ahpw, Kauno sohte kapweiekirahdi pwe en kak ketin kasalehda sapwellime manaman, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e ketin mahsaniher me pid me suwed akan.

12 Kedekedeo mwurin ara salihiehdi ngehi eri solahr kak mwekid, kamposo, me Kauno ketin kaunopadahro, sohla doadoahk.

13 Eri, re sehsehla wasa re pahn ilihlihalaie sohpo, kahrehda melimel kehlail ehu ahpw wiawi, ei, kisinieng kehlail oh keper ehu, oh se peila mwuri nan erein rahn siluh; oh irail tepda masepwehkada kowahlap pwe re de mwowihdi oh duhla nan sehdo; ahpw ira sohte sapwadiehda.

14 Oh kapahieu en rahno, me se wie peipeila mwuri, melimelo ahpw kehlailla mehlel.

15 Kedekedeo se ahpw kerenieng kihrdihla nan kepin madauo. Oh mwurin aht wie peipeilahr mwuri nan erein rahn pahieu, riei ohloko tepida kilang me engieng en Koht mih pohra, oh ira uhdahn pahn mehla ma ira sohte pahn koluhkihla ara wiewia suwed kan; eri, ira kohdo rehi, oh lapwadadasang sahl oko ni kumwut en pehi kat, oh kilang pehi kat inenen mpwosada mehlel; oh tikelen nehi kat pil mpwosada mehlel, oh e inenen kamedek.

16 Ahpw, I kilenglahng ei Koht, oh I kepinga ih rahno pwon; oh I sohte kaulimahkihong Kauno ei kahpwal akan.

17 Met ei pahpao, Lihai, ndahieng ira soahng tohto, oh pil iangahki nein Ismael pwutak ko; ahpw, kilang, ira kamasakada koaros me pahn koasoaiahiong ira duwen ngehi; oh ei pahpa oh nohno pil mahlahr, oh lokolongkiher pahtou laud pwehki neira seri kan, ira luwetekihla, ei, lao ira wenohniki pohn dewera peht oko.

18 Pwehki ara nsensuwed oh pahtou laud, oh wiewia suwed en riei pwutak ko, kahrehdahr ara kerenieng mehla oh tuhong ara Kohto; ei, ira moangepwetalahr oh nektehn mehla; ei, kereniong ira en nekinekidi nansedo pwehki ara pahtou.

19 Oh pil Seikop oh Sosep, pwehki ara wie pwulopwulte, oh ira anahne epwelpen ara nohno, ira pil pahtoula pwehki kahpwal akan en ara nohno; oh ei pwoud pil wie sengiseng oh kapakap, oh pil nei seri ko, irail sohte kak kameleileidi mohngiong en riei ohl oko pwe ira en sapwadiehla.

20 Oh sohte mehkot ahpw ihte manaman en Koht kelehpw me kameleileidi mohngiongira kan, sang ni eh ketin kamasangkinirahda ara pahn kamwomwala; eri, ahnsou me ira kilangada me ira kereniengehr mwowihdi wasa loal nan madauo ira koluhkihla soahng suwed me ira wiadahro, ira eri sapwadiehda.

21 Kedekedeo mwurin arail sapwadiehdahro, kilang, I ale kompaso, oh e ahpw doadoahk nin duwen dahme I men en wia. Kedekedeo I ahpw kapakap ong Kauno; oh mwurin ei kapakapiero kisiniengo ahpw tokedi, oh melimelo meleileidi, oh lapalahn eh mwelehdi.

22 Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw ilihlihier sohpo, se ahpw pwurehng sereklahng ni sahpw en inouo.

23 Kedekedeo mwurin aht wie senserengkiher erein rahn tohto, se ahpw lella ni sahpw en inouo; oh se keradahla nansapwo, oh kauwada imwat impwal akan; oh kiht eri kahdanekihla wasao sahpw en inou.

24 Kedekedeo se ahpw tepda dei pwehl, oh padokedi werentuhke kan; mehlel, se padokedi werentuhke koaros me se wahdo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem. Kedekedeo re ahpw kekeirda mehlel; eri, se ahpw kapaikihda reken wahnsahpw.

25 Kedekedeo ni aht kohlongala nan sapwtehno nan sahpw en inouo, se ahpw diarada me mie soangsoangen mahn kei nanwel en sahpwo, mie kow ohl oh lih, oh ahs oh oahs, oh kuht oh kuht lawalo, oh soangsoangen mahn lawalo koaros, me aramas kak doadoahngki. Oh se ahpw diarada soangsoangen mete kan, kohl, oh silper, oh koaper.
1-ne 19:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai wiahda pileit mete oh ntingihdi poadepen nah aramas akan—Koht en Israel pahn ketido sounpar wenepwiki mwurin Lihai eh mweselsang Serusalem—Nihpai kohpada duwen sapwellime lokolok oh kalohpwuala—Mehn Suhs akan pahn sekenikenla oh mwerpeseng lao lel ni imwin rahn akan, ahnsou me irail pahn pwurala rehn Kauno. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihongie, eri I ahpw wiahda pileit mete pwe I en kak ntingihdi pohrail poadepen nei aramas akan. Oh I ntingihdi duwen poadoapoad en ei pahpao pohn pileit akan me I wiahda, oh I pil ntingihdi pohwe duwen aht seiseiloakseli nan sapwtehno, oh kokohp kan en ei pahpao; oh pil pein ei kokohp tohto I pil ntingihdi pohwe.

2 Oh ahnsou me I wiahda [pileit ko] Isehse me Kauno pahn mahsanihongie I en wiahda pileit pwukat; eri, poadoapoad en ei pahpao, oh pil irekidien peneinei en ah pahpa kahlap oko, oh pali laud en aht wiewia kan nan sapwtehno ntingdi pohn keieun pileit ko me I koasoaiadahr; eri, soahng ko me pwaradahr mwohn ei wiahda pileit pwukat iei, ni mehlel, ntingdier pohn keieun pileit ko.

3 Oh mwurin ei wiadahr pileit pwukat sang ni koasoandi, ngehi, Nihpai, alehdi kehkehlik ehu me doadoahk sarawi oh kokohp akan, me keieu kesempwal oh sansal, pahn anahne ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat; oh soahng kan me pahn ntingdi anahne nekinekla pwe re en wia mehn kaweid nei aramas akan, me uhdahn pahn sapwenikihla sahpwo, oh pil ong kahrepe kesempwal teikan, me Kauno kelehpw ketin mwahngi.

4 Eri, ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw ntingihdi pohn pileit teiko, me wia koasoaiepen, de pali laud en koasoaiepen mahwin kan, pingiping kan oh mwomwlahn nei aramas akan. Oh met I wiadahr, oh padahkihong nei aramas akan dahme irail uhdahn pahn wia mwurin ei pahn sohla mie rehrail; oh me pileit pwukat pahn kohieng ehu ehu dih en mwuhr akan, de sang rehn emen soukohp kolahng rehn emen, lao Kauno ketikihong irail ekei koasoandi tohrohr.

5 Oh koasoaipen ei wiahda pileit pwukat pahn ntingdi mwuhr; oh met, kilang, I pahn doulahng nan dahme I koasoaiahier; oh met I pahn ntingihda pwe soahng kan me sarawi en kak nekinekla ong kamarainpen nei aramas akan.

6 Ahpw, soahng sarawi kei te me I ntihngihdi pohn pileit kan. Oh met, ma I sapwungala, e pil duwehte irail akan me kin sapwungala mahs; I sohte peikidiki ei sapwung kan pwehki aramas teiko, ahpw pwehki pein ei soakoahiek, nin duwen aramas, iei me I peikidiki.

7 Pwe soahng kan me ekei aramas kin kesempwaliki, ong paliwar oh palingehn, ekei sohte kin katapaniki oh re kin tiakpeseng. Mehlel, me duwehte aramas akan arail tiakidi Koht en Israel; I nda, tiakidi me wehwehki—re sohte katapaniki, oh sohte men rong sapwellime kaweid akan.

8 Oh kilang e pahn ketido, nin duwen mahsen en tohnlengo, sounpar wenepwiki mwurin ei pahpao eh mweselsang Serusalem.

9 Oh, E pahn wiemwahlla rehn tohn sampah pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; eri irail pahn kaloke ih, oh e pahn ketin lokolongki; oh irail pahn woakih ih, oh e pahn lokolongki. Mehlel, irail pahn kandipih ih, oh e pahn lokolongki, pwehki sapwellime limpoak kalahngan oh sapwellime kanengamahong aramas akan.

10 Oh Koht, en atail pahpa kahlap oko, me kahluweirail sang Isip, sang nan kalidu, oh pil ketin kamakamaur irail nan sapwtehno, iei, Koht en Eipraam, oh Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, me ketin mweidala pein ih, nin duwen me tohnlengo mahsanih, ni eh ketin wia aramas emen, nan pehn aramas suwed akan, nin duwen Sihnok eh mahsanih, oh pahn ketin kalohpwuhla, nin duwen kokohp en Nehum, oh pahn ketin nekinekidi nan sousou, nin duwen mahsen en Sihnos, me e koasoaia me pid duwen rahn siluh me pahn rotorot, me pahn wia kilel en sapwellime pwoulao ong irail akan me pahn towehda deke kan en nansed, ahpw mehlel ong irail akan me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel.

11 Pwe iei me soukohpo mahsanih: Kauno Koht uhdahn pahn ketila rehn peneinei en Israel koaros ni rahno, ekei irail pahn rong kepitie, pwehki arail pwung, ong komourparail oh arail peren laud, oh ekei pahn rong posopos en nahnsapwe oh kilang lioal en sapwellime manaman, sang ni melimel, kisiniei, oh ediniei, oh rotorot moasul, oh pwalpeseng en sampah, oh sang nahna kan me pahn ileilehda.

12 Oh soukohp Sinos mahsanih me mepwukat koaruhsie uhdahn pahn wiawi. Oh paip akan en sampah pahn pwalpeseng; oh pwehki mwahiei en sampah, nahnmwarki tohto pohn deke kan en nansed Ngehn en Koht pahn ketin sair irail, re en werikihda: Koht en sampah ketin wie lokolok.

13 Oh soukohpo mahsanih, irail akan me mihmi Serusalem pahn lokolok rehn aramas koaros, pwehki arail kalohpwuala Koht en Israel, oh wekidala mohngiongarail kan, soikala manaman oh kilel kopwuriamwei kan, oh manaman oh lingan en Koht en Israel.

14 Oh soukohpo mahsanih, pwehki arail wekidala mohngiongarail kan, oh kailongki Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail pahn wie saruaruseli, oh mwomwala, oh aramas pahn kepitikinirail oh kapailokeirail, oh wehi koaros pahn kailongkinirail.

15 Ahpw, soukohpo mahsanih, ni ahnsou me rahno pahn lelledo, me irail solahr pahn wekidala mohngiongarail kan sang Me Sarawi en Israel-o, e pahn ketin tamanda inou kan me e ketin wiahiongehr arail pahpa kahlap oko.

16 Ei, e pahn ketin tamanda sahpw deke kan; mehlel, Kauno mahsanih, e pahn ketikihpene aramas koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah, nin duwen mahsen en soukohp Sihnos.

17 Ei, soukohpo mahnsanih, sampah pwon pahn kilang komourlahn Kauno; wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros pahn kapaida.

18 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ntingihdier mepwukat ong nei aramas akan, pwe I en kak kamantikih irail re en tamataman Kauno arail Soundoar.

19 Eri, I koasoaiongehr peneinei en Israel koaros, ma iei irail pahn alehdi soang pwukat.

20 Pwe kilang, palingeniet doadoahk laud, me kapwangaiehda kahrehda nan koakonei kat luwetala, pwehki irail akan me mihmi Serusalem; pwe ma sohte kalahngan en Kauno, me kasalehiongie duwen irail, duwehte eh ketin wiahiong soukohp en mahs oko, I pil pahn iang mehla.

21 Oh e ketin kasalehiong soukohp en mahs oko soahng koaros me pid irail; oh e pil ketin kasalehieng [soukohp] tohto duwen kitail; eri, e kesempwal kitail en ese duwen irail pwehki e ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko.

22 Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw padahkihong riei pwutak ko mepwukat; kedekedeo ngehi wadek ong ira soahng tohto, me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko, pwe ira en kak ese duwen sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk nan sahpw teikan, rehn aramas en mahs oko.

23 Oh I wadek ong ira soahng tohto me ntingdier nan pwuhk kan en Moses; ahpw I en kak koangoange ira ni unsek ira en kamehlele Kauno ara Soundoar, I wadek ong ira nting kan me Soukohp Aiseia ntingiadahr; pwe I kin karasahiong kitail pwuhk sarawi koaros, pwe en kak wia kamwahupatail oh kamarainpatail.

24 Eri I koasoaieng ira, nda: Kumwail rong mahsen kan en soukohpo, kumwail me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel, ehu rah me tipwsangehr; kumwail rong mahsen kan en soukohpo, me ntingdier ongpeneinei en Israel koruhsie, oh kumwail momourki, pwe kumwail en kak ahneki koapworopwor duwehte riamwail ko me kumwail tipwasangehr; pwe ih duwen koasoai me soukohpo ntingihdier.
1-ne 20:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno ketin kasalehiong Israel Sapwellime koasoandi kan—Israel pilipildahr nan kisiniei en lokolok oh en kohkohlahsang Papilon—Tehk Aiseia 48. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kumwail rong met, kadaudok en Seikop, me kin adaniki Israel, oh me kohsang nan pihl en Suda, de sang nan pihl en pepdais, me kahukihla ni mwaren Kauno, oh kosekose Koht en Israel, ahpw irail sohte kin kahukihla mehlel de pwung.

2 Ahpw, irail kin koasoaia me irail iei towe mehlel en kahnimw sarawio, ahpw irail sohte kin koapworopworki Koht en Israel, me iei Kauno Wasa Lapalap; me mware iei Kauno Wasa Lapalap.

3 Kilang, I kalohkidahr dahme pahn wiawi sangete ni tapio; oh e kepwilipwilwei sang nan douwaseiet, oh I kasaleiraildahr. I mwadangete kasalehda.

4 Oh I wia met pwehki I ese me ke keptakai, oh tepinweremwen kekeluwak rasehng mete, oh tomwemwen rasehng pirahs.

5 Oh I kadehdedahr sang nin tapio dahme pahn lelohnguhk; mwohn eh leledo I kasalehienguhkehr; oh I kasalehienguhk pwe ke en dehr koasoaia—Ei dikadik en eni me wia, oh ei sansal likamw, oh dikadik eni mete me elehda mepwukat eh pweida.

6 Ke kilangehr oh rongehr mepwukat koaruhsie; oh ke sohte pahn dehdehki? Oh me I kasalehienguhkehr soahng kapw akan me pahn wiawi, de pil soahng rir kan, oh ke sohte ese duwen soahng pwukat.

7 Re ahpwtehn sansalada ahnsouet, oh kaidehn e sangete ni tapio, de pil mwohn rahno meke saik rong duwen met, pwe ke en dehr nda—Kilang I esehier duwen mepwukat.

8 Ei, oh ke sohte rong duwen met; ei, ke, sohte wehwehki; ei, sang ahnsouo sohte rohng ehu lelohnguhk; pwe I ese me sohte me kak likihiuk, oh ke wia aramas kahngohdi men sangete ni omw ipwidio.

9 Ahpw, pwe [aramas] en kepinga mwarei kahrehda ei kolokol ei engieng, oh I pahn kolokol oh sohte kaweiukala.

10 Pwe, kilang, I kamwakeleiukadahr, I piluhkadahr nan kisiniei en lokolok.

11 Ong pein kamwahupei, iei, ong pein kamwahupei I pahn wia met, pwe I sohte pahn mweidohng mwarei en sohla wahuwi, oh I sohte pahn mweidohng emen en iang ahneki lingan me ei kelehpw.

12 Rong ie, kowe Seikop, oh Israel me I malipedohr, pwe ngehi iei ih; Ngehi me tapi, oh ngehi me pil imwi.

13 Nin limei kat me pil wiadahr poahsoan en sampah, oh palimaun en pehi kat me sohngedi pahnlahng. I malipe sampah oh lahng oh ira eri patpene uhda.

14 Kumwail koaruhsie, pokonpene, oh rong; ihs nanpwungarail me kalohkihengirailehr mepwukat? Kauno ketin poakehng ih; ei, oh e pahn ketin kapwaiada sapwellime mahsen me e ketin kasalehdahr sang rehrail; oh e pahn ketin wiahiong Papilon dahme e ketin kupwurki, oh e pahn ketin kaloke mehn Kaldea kan.

15 Kauno pil mahsanih; Ngehi Kauno, ei, I mahsanihier; ei, I malipehdo pwe en kalohk, I kahluhwa, oh e pein dipwirawihda en pweida.

16 Keido limwahi; I sohte kin mahsen rir; sangete nin tapio, ngehi me mahsen sangete ahnsou me e kalohkdao; oh Kauno Koht, oh sapwellime Ngehno, me ketin kadariehdo.

17 Oh Kauno, amwail Soundoar, me Sarawien Israel mahsanih; Kauno amwail Koht me ketin padahkihonguhk ke en keirda, me ketin kaweiduhk nan ahl me ke pahn keidie, iei ngehi me wiahier met.

18 Ma ke peikieng ei kosonned akan—ahmw popohl pahn rasehng pillap pwoat, oh ahmwpwung pahn rasehng ilok kan en nan madau.

19 Kadaudokomw kan pahn tohto rasehng pihk [en ni oaroahr]; noumw seri kan rasehng rahr [en ni oaroahr]; edeo sohte pahn manoknokla de mwomwla mwohi.

20 Kumwail kohkohweisang nan Papilon, kumwail tangasang mehn Kaldea kan, kumwail kalohki ni amwail kokoulseli nin sampah; kumwail ndinda: Kauno ketin doarehlahr sapwellime ladu Seikop.

21 Oh irail sohte men nimpilda; e ketin kahluwa irail nan sapwtehno; e ketin kupwurehda pihl en kusieisang nan paip ehu ong irail; e pil ketin pwalangpeseng paipo oh pihl kusieisang loale.

22 Oh mehndahte eh ketin wiahdahr mepwukat koaros, oh pil soahng kapwuriamwei teikan, Kauno mahsanih, me suwed akan sohte pahn ahneki popohl.
1-ne 21:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Masaiao pahn ketin wia kamarainpen Mehn Liki kan oh pahn ketin kasaledakala irail kan me sensel nan imweteng—Ni imwin rahn akan Israel pahn kapwurupwurkipene manaman—Nahnmwarki kan pahn apwalih irail duwehte arail pahpa—Tehk Aiseia 49. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met: Kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, rong ie, kumwail koaruhsie me lekideklahroh pakasaralahr pwehki wiewia suwed en kaun kan en nei aramas akan; iei, kumwail koaruhsie me lekideklahr, me kamweremwerpesengehr wasateikan, me wia nei aramas, kumwail peneinei en Israel. Kumwail me kin koukousoan ni deke kan oh wasa doh kan, kumwail rong ie; Kauno ketin piliedahr mwohn ei ipwidi; E ketin malipehkinie edeiet ni ei nohno eh liseiankinie.

2 Oh e ketin wiahda eweiet duwehla kedilahs keng pwoat; nan mwetehn ni limeo e ketin nekidiehla, oh wiakiniehla arep kaselel pwoat; nan sapwellime deupen arep e ketin nekidiehla;

3 Oh mahsanihong ie: Israel, kowe me nei ladu me I pahn linganikihda.

4 I ahpw patohwan, I wie doadoahkehr ni soh katepe, I wia uwen ei kak oh sohte lipwe oh sohte katepe; mehlel, Kauno me pahn ketin pahkiniehda, oh ei doadoahk rehn Koht.

5 O met, Kauno—me ketin piliehda nan kapehd en inei me I en wiahla sapwellime ladu, pwe I en kapwurehdo Seikop reh—tehn Israel sohte pahn pwurpene, ahpw I pahn kelinganla mwohn silangin Kauno, oh ei Koht pahn ketin wia kakehlepei.

6 Oh e ketin mahsanih: Mehkot mengei ehu me kowe nei ladu me pahn kasapwilada kadaudok en Seikop akan, oh kapwurehdo mehn Israel kan me luwehdi. I pil pahn wiahkinuhkala kamarainpen Mehn Liki kan, pwe ke en kak wia komourpei wasa koaros ni sampah.

7 Kauno, Soundoar en Israel, me Sarawio, me aramas kin mwamwahliki, me wehi kan kin kailongki, [ketin mahsanih] ong ladu en kaun akan: Nahnmwarki kan pahn mahsanihukada oh ketida, sohpeidi kan pahn pil pwongihuk, pwehki Kauno me ketin loalopwoat.

8 Eri Kauno ketin mahsanih: Kumwail deke kan en nansehd, I kin rong kumwail oh ni rahn en komour eh pahn leledo I pahn seweseikumwail; oh I pahn doareikumwailla, oh kiheng kumwail nei ladu en wiahda inou ehu ong aramas akan, pwe kumwail en pwurehng soandi nan sapwamwail me ahnsouet olahr;

9 Pwe ke en kak patohwanohng irail me sensel kan: Kumwail saledekla; irail kan me mihmi nan rotorot: Kumwail kohdo nan marain. Irail pahn mwengemwengeseli, oh arail mohs akan pahn mihla wasa kan me ileile.

10 Re sohte pahn duhpekla de men nimpilda, karakar en ketipin pil sohte pahn kamadakirailla; pwe ih me kin ketin poakohngirail pahn ketin kaluhwairallahng ni pwarer en pihl kan.

11 Oh I pahn wiahkihla ei nahna kan koaruhsie ahl lap pwoat, oh elei kan pahn lapalapala.

12 Kilang, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, mepwukat pahn kohdo sang wasa doh kan; oh re pahn kohdo sang paliepeng oh palikapi; oh re pahn kohdo sang nan sahpw en Sinim.

13 Kumwail [tohn] nanleng kan, kumwail koul; oh sampah, kumwail perenda; pwe patenehn irail akan me mih palimese pahn pwurehng pwurodo; oh nahna kan, kumwail tepda kokoul; pwe re sohlahr pahn kalokolok; pwe Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahwiala sapwellime aramas akan, oh pahn ketin kupwurkalahngan ong sapwellime kan me wie lokolok.

14 Ahpw, kilang, Saion koasoaiahier: Kauno ketin keseielahr, oh ei Kauno ketin likidmelieielahr—ahpw [Kauno] pahn ketin kasalehda me e sohte ketin wia met.

15 Pwe lih emen kak moanokehla nah seri pwelel me kin dihdi, me e sohte pahn poakpoake wahn edio? Ei, re kak manokehla, ahpw I sohte pahn manokeikumwailla, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan.

16 Kilang, I ntingihkumwaildier nan pei kat; amwail kehl akan wie mihmihte mwohi ahnsou koaros.

17 Noumwail seri kan pahn powehdi amwail imwintihti kan; oh irail akan me kamwomwkumwaillahr pahn pokousla.

18 Sarada oh kilang dahme wiewiawi; irail koaruhsie pokonpenehr, oh irail pahn kohdo rehmw. Oh nin duwen Ngehi, Kauno ketin mahsanih, ke pahn kapwatkihda likou kaselel, oh katengehdi duwehte lih kamwohd emen eh kin kapwatikihda.

19 Pwe sapwemwet olahr oh tehnlahr, oh sahpwemw ohlao, pahn koaitilahr ong kumwail koaros en kousoanlaie; oh irail akan me kamwomwkumwaillahr pahn lekidekila dohlahsangkumwail.

20 Mwurin tepin noumw [seri] eh mehla, seri kan me ke pahn nainekihda, pahn pwurehng ndahienguhk: Sahpwet nohn tikitik ong ie; kitail anahne sahpw laud me kitail en kousoanie.

21 Kowe eri pahn mengimengiloalki: Ihs me kaipwiedi ong ie [seri] pwukat, pwe I solahr neitik, oh I depwenlahr, sella liki, oh sansaruwaruseli? Oh ihs me apwalihada [seri] pwukat? Kilang, I kin wie kalakalapwukte; irail pwukat, ia wasa re kohsangie?

22 Kauno Koht eri mahsanih: Kilang, I pahn kapahla limeiet rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh ketikihong irail ei koasoandi; oh irail pahn wahdo noumw pwutak kan, oh noumw serepein kan pahn mi pohn pwopwerail ko.

23 Oh nanmwarki kan pahn apwalihiuk duwehte pahpa men, oh lih nanmwarki kan pahn katungoaleiuk duwehte nohno men; irail pahn kin poaridi mwohmw, oh kamwakelehsang pwehl ni patehn nehmw kan; oh ke ahpw pahn dehdehkihla me ngehi meKauno; pwe irail akan me kin koapworopworkinie, sohte pahn sarohdi.

24 Pwe mie me kak adiasang [aramas] kehlail men dipwisou ehu me e koledi, de kapitala kalapwuhs men me kolkoldi pahn kosonned?

25 Ahpw Kauno ketin mahsanih, me kalapwuhs kan pahn pehdsang rehn me kehlail kan, oh dipwisou me alahldi pahn kapwurupuwrsang rehn me lemei meno; pwe I pahn uhwong oh pelianda irail akan me pahn uwohng uhk, oh I pahn kapitala noumw seri kan.

26 Oh irail akan me kin kalokeikumwail I pahn kamwengehkin irail pein udukarail; irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntahrail duwehte ar pahn nim wain mem; oh aramas koaros eri ahpw pahn dehdehkihla me iei ngehi Kauno, amwail Sounkomour oh amwail Soundoar, me ketin wia Wasa Lapalap en Seikop.
1-ne 22:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Israel pahn mwarahkpeseng wasa koaros nan sampah—Mehn Liki kan pahn apwalieki oh sewesehki Israel rongamwahuo nan imwin rahn akan—Israel pahn kopwurupwurpene oh komourla, oh me suwed kan pahn isihsla duwehte dihpw meng—Wein tepilo pahn kamwomwomwala, oh Sedan pahn selidi. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met e wiawiher me mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei wadekehr mepwukat me ntingdier pohn pileit pirahs ko, riei ohl oko ahpw kohdo rehi oh kalelapak rehi: Ia wehwehn mepwukat me ke wadekehr? Kilang, re pahn kak wehwehki duwen soahng kan me pid palingehn, me pahn wiawi nin duwen palingehn oh kaidehn ni paliwar?

2 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ndahieng ira: Kilang ire pwukat kasansalohngehr soukohpo sang kepitien Ngehno; pwe sang rehn Ngehno me soahng koaros me kin kodohng aramas kin kasansalohng soukohp kan.

3 Eri, soahng kan me I wadekehr pid duwen koaros mour en sampah oh mour en palingehn; pwe e sansal me ahnsou keren peneinei en Israel kan pahn mwarahkpeseng wasa koaros ni sampah oh nan wehi kan koaros.

4 Oh kilang, mie aramas tohto me mehn Serusalem ko sehselahr. Ei, pali laud en kadaudok en Israel ko pakahrlahr; oh irail mwarahkpesengehr pohn sahpw deke kan; oh kitail sohte ese wasa me re mihmi ie, ihte me kitail ese me irail pakahrlahr.

5 Oh pwehki arail pakahrlahr, mepwukat kokohpdahr pid duwen irail, oh pil duwen irail koaros me pahn kohdo mwuhr pahn kamweremwerpeseng oh salongala, pwehki Me Sarawi en Israelo; pwe mohngiongirail kan pahn keptakaila oh uhongada ih; eri, irail pahn kamweremwerpeseng nan wehi kan oh aramas koaruhsie pahn kailongkinirail.

6 Ahpw, mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn apwalih irail, oh Kauno ketin kapahlahr limeo pohn Mehn Liki kan oh wiahda sapwellime koasoandio, oh irail wahda [nein mehn Israel] seri kan, oh irail pwekadahr oh wa [nein mehn Israel] serepein kan pohn pwopwerail kan, kilang mepwukat wia mehkot me pid sampah. Ih duwen inou sarawi kan me Kauno ketin wiahiongehr atail pahpa kahlap oko; oh e wehwehki kitail nan rahn kohkohdo kan, oh pil riatail koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel.

7 Oh e wehwehki me ahnsouo pahn leledo me mwurin peneinei en Israel kan koaros arail pahn kamweremwerpesengehr oh salongalahr, Kauno Koht pahn ketin wiahda wehi kehlail ehu rehn Mehn Liki kan, iei, e pahn wiawihda pohn sahpwet; oh irail pahn kamwarakpeseng kadaudoketail kan.

8 Oh mwurin kadaudoketail kan arail pahn kamweremwerpesengehr, Kauno Koht pahn ketin usehlahte oh wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei rehn Mehn Liki kan, me pahn kesempwalong kadaudoketail kan; eri, met rasehng Mehn Liki kan arail apwahpwali irail oh weuwairail nan pehrail oh pohn pwopwerail kan.

9 Oh met pil pahn kesempwal ong Mehn Liki kan; oh kaidehn Mehn Liki kan te ahpw ong peneinei en Israel kan koaros, me pahn kasalehda inou kan me Sahm nanleng ketin wiahiengehr Eipraam, me mahsanih: I pahn kapaiahkihda aramas en sampah koaros kadaudokemw.

10 Oh riei ko, I men kumwa en ese me keinek kan koaros en sampah sohte kak kapaida lao [Kauno] pahn ketin kasalehieng wehi kan wiepen nin limeo.

11 Eri, Kauno Koht uhdahn pahn ketin kasalehiong wehi koaros wiepen nin lime kan, ni eh pahn ketikihengpeneinei en Israel kan sapwellime inou kan oh rongamwahuo.

12 Eri, e pahn kapitirailla sang selidi, oh irail pahn pwurehng pwurpene nan sahpw en sohso; oh irail pahn kohsang nan kepikirot oh rotorot; oh irail pahn ese me Kauno iei arail Sounkomour oh arail Soundoar, Koht manaman en Israelo.

13 Oh ntahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me iei lih suwed en sampah pwono, pahn uhwongada pein irail; pwe irail pahn mahwinpene nanpwungarail, oh pein neirail kedilahs kan pahn kemeirailla, oh irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntarail.

14 Oh wehi koaros me pahn mahwinieng kumwail, peneinei en Israel, pahn moromorada nanpwungarail, oh irail pahn pwupwidiong nan pwoahr me irail weiradao pwe re en lidipieki sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan. Oh irail koaruhsie me pahn peieng Saion pahn kamwomwala, oh lih suwed lapo, me kapirakialahr sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi pwung kan, me iei, mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, pahn rengkpeseng oh lapalahn pwupwidi pahn wiawi.

15 Pwe kilang, soukohpo mahsanih, ahnsou pahn lelledo mwadang me Sehdan pahn sohte ahneki manaman nan mohngiong en aramas akan; pwe rahno pahn lelledo me koaros me pohnmwahso oh irail akan me kin wiewia suwed pahn duwehla tuhke me sohte wah; oh rahno pahn lelledo me irail pahn isihsla.

16 Pwe ahnsouo pahn mwadang leledo me sapwellimen Koht engieng unsek pahn mwerediong pohn aramas koaros; pwe e sohte pahn ketin mweidehng me suwed akan en kamwomwala me pwung kan.

17 Eri, e pahn ketin doarehkihla me pwung kan sapwellime manaman, ma iei mie anahnepen sapwellime engieng unsek pahn wiawi, oh me pwung kan pahn poadoandoarla, arail imwintihtih kan pahn kamwomwkihla kisiniei. Eri, me pwung kan en dehr masak; pwe iei me soukoupo mahsanih, irail pahn komourla, ma iei irail pahn komourkihla kisiniei e pahn wiawi.

18 Kilang, riei ohl oko, I ndaiong kumwa, me mepwukat pahn mwadang wiawi mwurin ahnsou kis; iei, kamaramas pahn wiawi, oh kisiniei, oh ediniei moron pahn mie; oh e pahn kipehdi sampah; oh e pahn sansal ong aramas ma re pahn kakeptakaiala ar mohngiong kan ong Me Sarawi en Israelo.

19 Pwe kilang, me pwung kan sohte pahn kamwomwomwla; pwe ahnsouo pahn leledo me irail me kin peieng Saion pahn kalipilipala.

20 Oh Kauno pahn ketin kaunopadahng sapwellime aramas akan ahlo, pwe mahsen en Moseso en kak pweida, me ketihtihki: Kauno amwail Koht pahn ketikihong kumwail soukohp men, me duweiehte; kumwail pahn rong soahng koaros me e pahn padahkihong kumwail. Oh e pahn wiawi ma mehmensohte pahn rong soukohp menet pahn kalipilipasang nan pwungen aramas akan.

21 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, kalohkihong kumwail, me soukohp menet me Moses mahsaniher iei ih me Sarawi en Israelo; eri, e pahn ketin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung.

22 Oh me pwung kan sohte anahne masak, pwe irail me sohte pahn namenekla. Ahpw wehin sehdano, me pahn wiawihda nan pwungen aramas akan, iei wehio me kokouda ong irail me mih nan pali uduk—

23 Pwe ahnsou pahn mwadang leledo me mwomwohdiso koaros me wiawihda pwe re en kepwepwehla, oh koaros me wiawihda pwe re en ahneki manaman pohn aramas, oh irail akan me wiawihda pwe re en ndandla mwohn sampah, oh irail me kin rapahkihte ineng en paliwararail oh dipwisou en sampah, oh kin wiewia soangoasoangen wiewia suwed kan; iei, ni mehlel, irail koaros me iang wehin tepilo me uhdahn pahnmasapwekada, oh saloh, oh rerrer; irail me pahn lekidekdi nan pwelpar; iei irail me pahn isihsla duwehla dihpw meng; oh met iei duwen mahsen en soukohpo.

24 Oh ahnsou pahn mwadang leledo me aramas pwung kan pahn kahluhla sang nan kehl duwehte koupwul kan, oh me Sarawi en Israelo pahn ketin kaunda sang ni mweimwei en kaun, oh kehl, oh manman, oh lingan mehlel.

25 Oh e pahn ketin kapokonepene sapwellime seri kan sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah; oh e pahn ketin wadekedi sapwellime sihpw kan, oh irail pahn ese ih; oh e pahn mie ehute pelen sihpw oh emente silepe; oh e pahn ketin kamwenge sapwellime sihp kan, oh irail pahn kin diar kenerail mwenge reh.

26 Oh pwehki wiewia mwahu en sapwellime aramas akan, Sehdan pahn sohla ahneki manaman; eri, e sohte pahn lapwada erein sounpar kei; pwe e sohte pahn ahneki manaman en kaunda mohngiong en aramas akan, pwe irail pahn momourki mour pwung, oh me Sarawi en Israelo pahn ketin kakaun irail.

27 Oh met kilang, ngehi, Nihpai, ndaiong kumwail me mepwukat koaruhsie pahn wiawi nin duwen paliuduk.

28 Ahpw, kilang, wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros pahn padoandoarla rehn me Sarawi en Israelo ma irail pahn koluhla.

29 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, kairalahr ei koasoi; pwe I sohte pahn doula koasoakoasoia duwen mepwukat.

30 Eri, riei ko, I men kumwa en kamehlele me soahng koaros me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko mehlel; oh re kadehdehki me aramas anahne peikieng sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

31 Eri, kumwail dehr medewe me ngehi oh ei pahpao kelehpw me kadehdehki mepwukat, oh pil padahkihong kumwa. Eri, ma kumwa pahn peikieng kosonned akan, oh dadaurete lel imwi, kumwa pahn komourla ni imwin rahn akan. Oh met mehlel. Amen.
2-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Keriau en Pwuhk en Nihpai[/font_size][/center]

Koasoaiepen mehlahn Lihai, rien Nihpai ohl oko uhongada ih. Kauno ketin kehkehlingkihong Nihpai en kohkohla nan sapwtehno. Ah seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, oh pil soahng teikan.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai kohpada duwen sahpw en saledek—Kadaudoke kan pahn kamweremwerpeseng oh kamakam ma irail soikala me Sarawien Israelo—E koangoangehki nah pwutak ko irail en pwuhrieng nan tehtehn mahwen en pwung. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei kaimwiseklahr ei padahk ong riei ohl oko. Aht pahpao, Lihai, pil koasoaiahieng irail soahng tohto, oh padahkiheng irail, uwen soahng tohto me Kauno ketin kupwurmwahuieki irail ni e ketin kaluhwairail sang nan sahpw en Serusalem.

2 Oh e padahkiheng ira duwen arail kahngohdi nansedo, oh sapwellimen Koht kalahngan me doarehla arail mour, kahrehda arail sohte mwowihdi nansedo.

3 Oh e padahkihong irail duwen sahpw en inouo, me irail sapwenkihla—ia uwen kalahngan en Kauno ni eh ketin kehkehlingkihong kiht sen mweselsang nan sahpw en Serusalem.

4 Pwe, kilang, e koasoaia, I kilangadahr kaudiahl ehu, me kahrehda I esehier me Serusalem kamwomwomwlahr; oh ma kitail mihmihte nan Serusalem kitail uhdahn pahn pil mehla.

5 Ahpw, e koasoaia, mendahte atail kahpwal akan, kitail sapwenkihlahr sahpw en inou ehu, sahpw ehu me wia sahpw kaselel sang sahpw teikan; sahpw ehu me Kauno Koht ketin inoukihong ie me e pahn wia ehu sahpw en sohso ong kadaudokei kan. Ei, Kauno ketin inoukihong ie sahpw wet, oh ong nei seri kan kohkohlahte, oh pil koaros me Kauno pahn ketin kahluwahdo sang nan wehi teikan.

6 Eri, ngehi, Lihai, kohpadahr nin duwen Ngehno eh kin ketin doadoahk loaleiet, me sohte me pahn kohdo nan sahpw wet ihte ma limen Kauno me ketikiniraildo.

7 Eri, sahpwet kasarawihongehr irail akan me e pahn ketikihdo. Oh ma irail pahn papahnin duwen kosonned akan me ketkihong irail, sahpwet pahn wia sahpw en saledek ong irail; eri, irail sohte pahn kin lohdi; ma ehng, a pwehki arail dihp me kahrehda; pwe ma diparail akan pahn mie a sahpwet pahn keriahla pwehki irail, ahpw ong me pwung de mwahu kan e pahn wia sahpw kapai kohkohlahte.

8 Oh kilang, e mwahu ma sahpwet pahn wie ekiek pwe wehi teikan en dehr ese; pwe kilang, wehi tohto pahn sahpwenikihla sahpwet, me pahn kak kahrehda sohla wasahn sohso.

9 Eri, ngehi, Lihai aledier inou ehu, ma aramas akan me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihdo sang nan sahpw Serusalem pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan, irail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh re pahn tohrohrasang wehi teikan koaruhsie, pwe irail en kak sapwaniki sahpw wet. Oh ma re pahn peikiong sapwellime kosonned akan irail pahn kapaida pohn sahpw wet, oh sohte me pahn kak tiahksuwedihrail, de kihsang sapwarail sahpw en sohsohu; oh irail pahn koukousoan ni onekpek kohkohlahte.

10 Ahpw kilang, ahnsouo pahn leledo me irail pahn pwupwikihdi ar sohte pwoson, mwurin arail alehier kapai laud tohto sang ni limen Kauno—[irail] marainkidahr duwen kepikipikdahn sampah, oh aramas koaros, esehlahr sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan sangete ni tapio; manaman kohiengirailehr pwe re en wia mehkoaros sang ni pwoson; re ese kosonned akan koaros sangete ni tapio, oh sang ni sapwellime kalahngan poatoapoat ong nan sahpw en inou kesempwal wet—kilang, I nda, ma rahno pahn lelodo me irail pahn soikala Me Sarawi en Israelo, Mesaia mehlelo, arail Soundoar oh arail Koht, kilang, irail pahn pakadeikada rehn sounkopwung pwungo.

11 Ei, e pahn wahdo ekei wehi kan rehrail, oh e pahn kiheng irail manaman, oh e pahn kihsang irail sapwarail sahpw en sohso kan, oh e pahn kamarakirailpeseng oh kalokeirail.

12 Ei, mahwin pahn wiwiawi mwurin ehu ehu dih kan, oh kilel tohto pahn pwarohng irail; eri, nei pwutak ko, I men kumwail en tamataman; mehlel, I men kumwail en rong mwahu ei kaweid kan.
