13 Kumwail menlao pwourda; pwourdahsang amwail meirkelik, ei, sang nan amwail memeir nan ehl, oh itikasang selmete kan me salihkumwailpenehr, me wia selmete kan me kin saliedi aramas akan, me kin waikiraildilahng nan wahu en lokolok soutik oh pahtou poatoapoat.

14 Pwourda! oh kesihnenda sang nan pwehl, oh rong kaweid en amwa pahpa oh nohno me likeilapalahr, me kumwa pahn kereniongehr saripidi nan sousou me kopou oh meleilei, wasa me sohte aramas en seiloak kak pwurasang; mwurinte ahnsou kis I pahn pwuralahng nan pwehl.

15 Ahpw kilang, Kauno ketin doareiehsangehr nan ehl; I kilangehr sapwellime lingan, oh sapwellime limpoak kipeiedier kohkohlahte.

16 Oh I koapworopworki me kumwa pahn tamataman oh kolokol sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan oh kosonned akan; kilang, met kapwunode nan ei mour sangete ni tapio.

17 Ekei pak mohngiongiet kin toutoukihla nsensuwed, pwe I periki, engieng en Kauno amwa Koht de kohdi pohmwa ni unsek pwehki keptakai en amwa mohngiong kan, kumwa eri pahn lekidekla oh kasohrala kohkohlahte;

18 De, keria ehu uhdahn pahn kohieng kumwa nan erein dihen aramas ngeder; oh kumwail pahn kin mahwin, oh lelohng nan lehk laud, oh aramas pahn kailokinkumwail, oh tepilo pahn kin sansalih oh kakahluwa kumwail ni nsene.

19 Nei pwutak ko, ele mepwukat sohte kak wiawihong kumwail, ahpw kumwail en wia aramas pilipil oh keniken rehn Kauno. Ahpw kilang, kupwure pahn pweida; pwehki sapwellime koasoandi kan kin pwung kohkohlahte.

20 Oh e mahsaniher me: Nin duwen amwail pahn kin kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; ahpw ma kumwail sohte pahn kin kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekidekla sang mwohn sihlangi.

21 Oh met palingeni en kak perenikinkumwa, oh ei mohngiong en kak mweselsang sampah ni peren pwehki kumwa, pwe I en dehr seridi nan ei sousou ni nsensuwed oh pahtou, kesihnendahsang nan pwehl, nei pwutak ko, oh wiahla ohl, oh nantihong ahneki lamalam ehu oh mohngiong ehu, ehupene ni mehkoaros, pwe kumwail en dehr wiahla lidu;

22 Pwe kumwa en dehr riahkihla keriah kalok ehu; oh pil, kumwa de kahrehda engieng en Koht pwungo eh pahn kamwomwkumwahla, iei, kamwomwalahn palingehn oh paliwar.

23 Pwourda, nei pwutak kan; pwuhriong nan tehtehn mahwin en pwuhng. Itikasang selmete kan me salihkumwaildier, oh pidohisang nan mour likamw, oh kesihnendahsang nan pwehl.

24 Kumwa tokedihsang amwa kahngohdi ong riamwa pwutak, me kin lamalam mwahu, oh kin peikiong kosonned kan sangete ahnsouo me kitail mweselsang Serusalem; oh me wia dipwisou en doadoahk ni limen Koht, pwe en waikitaildohng nan sahpw en inou; pwe ma sohte ih, kitail mekilahr dupek nan sahpwtehno; ahpw, kumwa song kihsang ah mour; ei, oh e lokolok laud pwehki kumwa.

25 Oh I salohda kowahlap oh perikihda pwehki kumwa, pwe e de pwurehng lokolok; pwe kilang, kumwa kin karaun likamwih me e kin song en ahneki manaman pohmwa oh kaunkumwahda; ahpw I ese me e sohte kin song en ahneki manaman pohmwa oh kaunkumwahda, ahpw e kin rapahki lingan en Koht, oh kamwahupamwa kohkohlahte.

26 Oh kumwa kin lingeringer pwehki e kin koasoi inen ong kumwa. Kumwa kin nda me e kin ngihl kehlail ong kumwa; kumwa kin nda me e lingeringer pahmwa; ahpw kilang, ngihl kehlailo me iei kehlail en manaman en mahsen en Koht, me kin ieiang ih; oh dahme kumwa kahdaneki lingeringer wia koasoi mehlel, nin duwen dahme kohsang rehn Koht, me e sohte kak ekihla, me kin kasalehda ni eimah amwa wiewia suwed kan.

27 Oh e konehng manaman en Kohto en ieiang ih, iei ni ahnsou me e pahn ruwese kumwa en peikiong. Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ih [me ruweseikumwa], ahpw Ngehn en Kauno mwo me kin ketin ieiang ih, me kin ketin kasarapeseng ewe oh ketin kalokaia karehda e sohte kak nennenla.

28 Oh met nei pwutak, Leimen, oh pil Lemuel oh Sam, oh pil nei pwutak kan me wia nein Ishmael, kilang, ma kumwail pahn rong mwahu ahn Nihpai kaweid kan kumwail sohte pahn mwomwala. Oh ma kumwail pahn rong ih mwahu I pahn kihong kumwail kapai, iei, keieu en ei kapai.

29 Ahpw ma kumwail sohte pahn rong ih mwahu I pahn kihsang kumwail keieu en ei kapaio, iei, ei kapaio, oh e pahn uhd kohieng ih.

30 Oh met, Sohram, I men padahkihong uhk: Kilang, ke wia nein Leipen ladu; ahpw, ke pil iang pakahriei sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh I ese me ke wia kompoakepah mehlel men ong nei pwutak, Nihpai, kohkohlahte.

31 Eri, pwehki ahmw loalopwoat, kadaudokemw kan pahn kapaida rehn kadaudoke kan, irail pahn paiamwahu ahnsou reirei pohn sahpwet; oh sohte mehkot pahn kawehla de kerempwa arail paiamwahu pohn sahpwet kohkohlahte ihte wiewia suwed nan pwungarail me pahn kahrehda.

32 Eri, ma ke pahn peikiong kosonned akan en Kauno, Kauno pahn kasarawiala sahpwet pwe en wia kapaipen kadaudokemw kan iangahki kadaudoken nei pwutako.
2-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Komourla kin wiawi sang rehn Mesaia Sarawio—Saledek en pilipil (nsenen aramas) kesempwalong mour oh keirda—Adam pwupwidi pwe aramas en kak miehla—Aramas ahneki saledek en pilada mour soutuk oh maiauda. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, Seikop, I pahn koasoai ong uhk: Nan rahn en ei kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno kowe me tepin ipwidi. Oh kilang, ke lokolongki apwal akan oh pahtou laud ni ahmw pwulopwul, pwehki lemei en riomw pwutak kan.

2 Ahpw, Seikop, nei seri me tepin ipwidi nan sapwtehno, ke wehwehkiher duwen lapalap en Koht; oh e pahn kasarawihla ahmw lokolok kan pwe en wiahla kamwahupemw.

3 Eri, palingenomw pahn kapaiada, oh ke pahn koukousoan rehn riomw pwutak, Nihpai, nan popohl; oh erein ahmw mour ke pahn kin papah ahmw Koht. Eri, I ese me ke pahn komourla, pwehki ieias pwung en ahmw Soundoaro; pwe ke kilangehr me ni unseklahn ahnsou e pahn ketido pwe en ketikihong aramas komourparail.

4 Oh ni ahmw pwulopwul ke kilangehr sapwellime lingan; eri, meid pai kowe duwehte irail akan me e pahn ketin pwarohng oh kapaiada ni paliwar; pwe Ngehno kin duduwehte, aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte. Oh ahlo kaunopdahr sangete pwupwudi en aramas, oh komourla mweimweidahr.

5 Oh aramas akan aledier kaweid me itarong irail en kak ese me mwahu sang me suwed. Oh kosonnedo kohiengehr aramas akan. Oh sang ni kosonnedo sohte war ehu me pwung; de, sang ni kosonnedo aramas akan kalipilipalahr. Ei, sang ni kosonned en sampah irail kalipilipalahr; oh pil, sang ni kosonned en palingehn irail irairdisang me mwahuo, oh pahn paisuwed kohkohlahte.

6 Eri, Mesaia Sarawio me kin ketin komourala aramas; pwehki e mediren kalahngan oh mehlel.

7 Kilahng, e meirongkihla pein ih pwehki dihp, pwe en kak kapwaiada kaimwseklahn kosonnedo, ong irail akan me pahn ahneki mohngiong karakarahk oh ngehn peik; oh ihte me kak kapwaiada kaimwseklahn kosonnedo.

8 Eri, ia uwen kesempwalpen mepwukat en kak sansalohng aramas koaros nan sampah, pwe irail en kak ese me sohte aramas emen kak pato mwohn silangin Koht, ihte sang ni wiewia pwung kan, oh mahk, oh kalahngan en Mesaia Sarawio, me ketin tohnmeteikihla pein ih nin duwen mehlahn paliwar, oh pwurehng iasada sang ni manaman en Ngehno, pwe en kak ketin kaiasada me melahr akan, pwe ih me tepin iasada.

9 Eri, ih me ketin wia tepin meirong ong Koht, nin duwen eh pahn ketin wia weliepen aramas koaruhsie; oh irail koaros me pahn pwosonla ih pahn komourla.

10 Oh pwehki e wia weliepen aramas koaros, aramas koaros pahn kohdo rehn Koht; eri, irail pahn kesihnen mwohn silangi, pwe re en pakadeikda reh nin duwen mehlel oh sarawi me e sapwellimanki. Eri, pwehki pweidahn imwilahn kosonnedo me [Ih] me Sarawio ketikidahr, kahrehda kalokoloko me wia kisehn kosonnedo, kalokoloko me wia kisehn kosonnedo kin uhwong pereno me pil wia kisehn kosonnedo, [oh pereno] me kin kapwaiada imwilahn tomwo.

11 Pwe e konehng en mie pelien soahng koaros. Ma soh, nei pwutak me tepin ipwidi nan sapwtehno, mour pwung sohte kak mie, pil duwehte mour suwed, pil duwehte mour sarawi de paisuwed, duwehte mwahu oh sakanakan. Eri, soahng koaros kin anahne patpene oh wiahla ehu; eri, ma [e pahn] wartehieu, e duwehte me e mehla, me sohte mour de pil sohte mehla, sohte kasuwedpe de pil kamwahupe, sohte kaperenpe de paisuwedpe, de pil wehwehpe de sawehwehpe.

12 Eri, e pahnwiawihda ni eh wia mehkot memwahl; eri e pahn sohte kahrepen eh kepikipikda. Eri, met pahn kawehla erpit en Koht oh kahrepen sapwellime doadoahk poatopoat kan, oh pil manaman, oh kalahngan, oh pwuhng en Koht.

13 Oh ma ke pahn nda me sohte kosonned, ke pahn pil nda me sohte dihp. Ma ke pahn nda me sohte dihp, ke pahn pil nda me sohte pwung. Oh ma sohte pwung eri e pahn pil sohte peren. Oh ma sohte pwung de peren, eri e pahn sohte kalokolok de nsensuwed. Oh ma sohte mepwukat, e pil pahn sohte Koht. Oh ma sohte Koht sohte kitail, oh pil sampah; pwe e sohte pahn mie kepikipikdahn soahng kan, de pil saledek en pein mwekid de mwekidiki mehkot; eri, soahng koaros sohte pahn mie.

14 Oh ahnsouet, nei pwutak kan, I padahkihong kumwail mepwukat pwe en wia kamarainpamwail oh kamwahupamwail; pwe mie Koht emen, oh e ketin kapikadahr soahng koaros, nanleng oh sampah, oh audapara koaros, soahng koaros me kin pein mwekid oh soahng koaros me kin kamwakidada.

15 Oh pwe en kak kapwaiada kaimwsekpen kahrepen sapwellime [doadoahk] poatoapoat kan ong aramas, mwurin eh ketin kapikada tepin samatail oh inatail, oh mahn en nan mohs oh menpihr kan, oh ni mehlel, soahng koaros me kepikipikda, e konehng en mie pelien mehkoaros; duwehte wahntuhke me keinepwio eh pelian tuhkehn komouro; me ehu mem a ehu katik.

16 Eri, Kauno Koht ketin mweidehng aramas en pein wia nsene. Eri, aramas sohte kak pein wia nsene ihte ma e pahn alehdi kasongosong sang emen de mehteio.

17 Oh ngehi, Lihai, nin duwen soahng koaros me I wadekehr, nin duwen dahme ntingdier, me mie tohnleng en Koht men, me pahn anahne pwupwudisang nanleng; eri, e wialahr tepil men, sang ni e wiahda me suwed mwohn silangin Koht.

18 Oh pwehki eh pwupwudihsang nanleng, oh nsensuwedla mehlel kohkohlahte, e kin songosongen kansensuwediala aramas koaros. Eri, serpent en kawaho, me iei tepilo, me wia pahpahn likamw koaros, ndahieng Ihp: Tungoale wahntuhke me sohte mweimweien, a ke sohte pahn mehla, ahpw ke pahn duwehla Koht, me mwahngih me mwahu oh me suwed.

19 Oh mwurin Adam oh Ihp ara tungoalehda wahntuhke me sohte mweimweio, ira ahpw pokouslahsang nan mwetuwel en Iden, pwe ira en koadoahke pwehlen sampah.

20 Oh ira nainekihda seri kei; mehlel, peneinei en sampah pwohn.

21 Oh ahn aramas ahnsou kareireila, nin duwen kupwur en Koht, pwe irail en kak koluhla ni arail momour; eri, arail ahnsou wialahr ahnsoun kasongosong, oh arail ahnsou kareireila, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno Koht kosonned akan me e ketikihongehr sapwellime aramas akan. Pwe e ketikidahr kosonned pwe aramas koaros en koluhla; pwe e ketin kasalehiengehr aramas koaros me irail salongalahr, pwehki sapwungalahn arail nohno oh pahpao.

22 Oh met, kilang, ma Adam sohte sapeik e sohte pahn pwupwudi, ahpw e pahn mihmihte nan mwetuwel en Iden. Oh soahng koaros me kepikipikda pahn duduwehte ni mwomwen ar kepikipikdao; oh re pahn duwehwehte kohkohlahte, oh sohte imwi.

23 Oh ira sohte pahn nainekihda seri; eri ira pahn mihmihte nan mour me mwakelekel, sohte ahniki peren, pwe ira sohte ese nsensuwed; sohte wiewia mwahu, pwe ira sohte ese dihp.

24 Ahpw kilang, soahng koaros wiawidahr nin duwen erpit en Ih me mwahngih soahng koaros.

25 Adam pwupwidi pwe aramas en kak miehda; oh aramas mie, pwe irail en kak peren.

26 Oh Mesaiao pahn ketido ni unseklahn ahnsou, pwe en ketin doarehla aramas akan sang ni pwupwilao. Oh pwehki arail mwakelekeladahr oh pitisangehr pwupwilao irail saledeklahr kohkohlahte, esehlahr me mwahu sang me suwed; kakehr pein wia nsenerail oh sohte anahnepen mwekidiki nsenen emen, ihte sang ni kalokolok en kosonnedo me [pahn wiawi] ni keimwseklahn rahn lapalapo, nin duwen kosonned akan me Koht ketikidohr.

27 Eri, aramas akan ahneki saledek en momour; oh soahng koaros me aramas anahne kohiengirailehr. Oh irail ahneki saledek en pilada mour saledek oh mour soutuk, sang ni sawasepen Sounsawas lapalapo me wia sounsawas en aramas koaros, de irail ahneki saledek en pilada mour selidi oh mehla, nin duwen tepilo eh kin saliedi oh powehdi; pwe e kin nannantihong aramas koaros en nsensuwedla mehlel duwehte ih.

28 Oh met, nei pwutak kan, I men kumwail en kilenglahng Sounsawas lapalapo, oh rong mwahu sapwellime kosonned kesempwal akan; oh loaloapwoatieng sapwellime mahsen akan, oh pilada mour soutuk, nin duwen kupwur en sapwellime Ngehn Sarawio.

29 Oh dehr pilada mehla soutuk, nin duwen ineng en paliwar oh me suwedo me kin ieiang, me kin kiheng ngehn en tepilo manaman en kalowehdi, pwe en waikuhkedihla nan ehl, pwe en kaunuhkada nan pein eh wehi.

30 I koasoia kaweid mwotomwot pwukat ong kumwail koaruhsie, nei pwutak kan, ni imwilahn ei mour; oh I pilada palien kaweid me kesempwalo, nin duwen mahsen akan en soukohp. Oh sohte ehu soahng tohrohr me I mwahuki ihte kamwahupen palingenimwail kan kohkohlahte. Ahmen.
2-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sosep nan Isip kilangada nan kaudial mehn Nihpai ko—E kohpada duwen Joseph Smith, ohl sarawi en imwin rahn; duwen Moses, me pahn kapitala Israel; oh duwen Pwuhk en Mormon eh pahn kohdo. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met I pahn koasoaienguhk, Sosep, nei me keieu tikitik. Ke ipwidi nan ahnsou me diren kahpwal nan sapwtehno; ei, ahmw nohno naitikihiukedi nan ahnsou me I ahneki kapwal laud.

2 Oh Kauno en pil ketin kasarawihkinuhkala sahpw wet, me wia sahpw ehu me keieu kesempwal, ong kadaudokemw kan oh kadaudok en riomw pwutak kan en iang sohsohki, pwe ke en nsenamwahuki kohkohlahte, ma ke pahn kin kapwaiada kosonned akan en Me Sarawi en Israelo.

3 Oh met, Sosep, nei pekindihdi, me tikada nan sapwtehn ahn ei kahpwal akan, Kauno en kupwuramwahwihiuk kohkohlahte, pwe kadaudokomw kan en dehr kamwomwomwla douluhl.

4 Pwe kilang, ke wia kadaudokei; oh ngehi emen kadaudoken Sosep me wisikla nan Isip ni eh wia lidu. Oh inou kan me Kauno ketin wiahiongehr Sosep inenen kesempwal mehlel.

5 Eri, Sosep kilangehr mehlel atail mwehi. Oh e aledier ehu inou sang Kauno, me sang nan kadaudoke kan Kauno Koht pahn ketin kasapwilada ehu kadaudok pwung en Israel; kaidehn Mesaia, ahpw ehu kadaudok me katohrohrala, ahpw, re en tamatamante me nan sapwellimen Kauno inou kan Mesaia pahn pwarohng irail ni imwin rahn akan, sang ni manaman en ngehno, ni eh pahn wairailsang nan rotorot kolahng nan marain—mehlel, sang nan rotorot oh mour en lidu kolahng nan mour saledek.

6 Pwe Sosep kadehdehki mehlel, ketihtihki: Kauno ei Koht pahn ketin kasapwilada ohl sarawi men, me pahn ketin wia ohl sarawi kesempwal men ong kadaudokei kan.

7 Ei, Sosep ketihtihki ni mehlel: Ih met mahsen en Kauno ongie: Ohl sarawi pilipilda men I pahn kasapwilada sang nan kadaudokemw kan; oh e pahn kenikenla rehn kadaudokemw kan. Oh I pahn kehkehlingkiheng me e pahn wiahda doadoahk ehu ong kadaudokemw kan, rie ohl akan, me pahn katapan mehlel ong irail, mehlel pwe en sewese irail re en esehla inou kan me I wiahiengehr ahmw pahpa kahlap oko.

8 Oh I pahn kiheng kosonned ehu me e sohte pahn wia ehu doadoahk tohrohr, ihte doadoahk me I pahn kehkehlingkihong ih. Oh I pahn wiahieng en lapalapala mwohn meseiet; pwehki e pahn wia ei doadoahk.

9 Oh e pahn lapalapala duwehte Moses, me I koasoaiahier me I pahn kasapwilada ong kumwail, pwe en kapitala nei aramas akan, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan.

10 Oh I pahn kasapwilada Moses pwe en kapitla nei aramas akan sang nan sahpw en Isip.

11 Ahpw I pahn kasapwilada ohl sarawi men sang nan kadaudokomw kan; oh I pahn kihong manaman en kalohki ei mahsen ong kadaudokomw kan—Kauno pil mahsanih, oh kaidehn kalohkihte ei mahsen, ahpw pil koangoangehkin irail ei mahseno, me pahn kalohkehng irailehr.

12 Eri, kadaudokemw kan pahn nting; oh kadaudoken Suda kan pahn nting; oh soahng kan me kadaudokemw kan pahn ntingiedi, oh pil soahng kan me kadaudoken Suda kan pahn ntingihdi, pahn ehupene, ni ahr pahn kapwungala padahk likamw kan oh kameleileiedi pingiping kan, oh wiahda meleilei nanpwungen kadaudokemw kan, oh sewesei irail re en esehla duwen arail pahpa kahlap oko ni imwin rahn akan, oh pil ei inou kan, Kauno me mahmahsen.

13 Oh e pahn kehlailla sang ni powehdi luwet, ni rahno me ei doadoahk pahn tepda rehn nei aramas akan koaros, pwehn onehda sapahl, kumwail peneinei en Israel, Kauno me mahmahsen.

14 Oh iei met kokohp en Sosep, me ketihtihki: Kilang, Kauno pahn ketin kapaiada ohl sarawio; oh irail akan me pahn song kemehla pahn lohdi; pwe inou wet, me I aledier sang rehn Kauno, ong kadaudokei kan pahn pweida. Kilang, I ese mehlel duwen inou wet eh pahn pweida;

15 Oh edeo pahn duwehte edeiet; oh e pahn duwehte eden ah pahpao. Oh e pahn duweiehte; pwe dahme Kauno pahn ketikihdo sang ni limeo, sang ni manaman en Kaunopahn kamourala nei aramas akan.

16 Iei, ih met me Sosep kohpadahr: I kamehlele met, duwehte ei kamehlele inou en Moses; pwe Kauno me ketin mahsanihongie, I pahn kolokol kadaudokemw kan kohkohlahte.

17 Oh Kauno mahsanih: I pahn kasapwilada Moses; oh I pahn kiheng ah manaman nan sokon pwoat; oh I pahn kiheng ih ei koasoandi en tenek ni nting. Ahpw I sohte pahn lapwahda lewe, pwe en kalapw lokolokaia, pwe I sohte pahn wiahieng en wiahla aramas kadek lokaia. Ahpw I pahn ntingieng ei kosonned, sang ni pein sendinpehi; oh I pahn kihong emen uhneipwa.

18 Oh Kauno ahpw pil mahsanihongie: I pahn kasapwilada emen kadaudokemw kan; oh I pahn kiheng emen uhneipwa. Oh ngehi, kilang, I pahn kiheng en ntingihda nting kan en kadaudokemw kan, me pahn kohieng kadaudokemw kan; oh wiliepe uhneipwa en kadaudokemw kan pahn pakairki.

19 Oh mahsen kan me e pahn ntingiedi pahn iei mahsen kan en ei erepit me I kesempwaliki pahn kalohk ong kadaudokemw kan. Oh e pahn duwehte kadaudokemw kan arail lukulukuwer sang nan pwelpar; pwe I ese arail pwoson.

20 Oh irail pahn lukuwer sang nan pwelpar; iei, mehlel ong riarail ohl akan, mendahte dih tohto melahr mwohrail. Oh e pahn wiawi me mwurin arail lukuwer pahn kohwei, nin duwen arail koasoai sansal kan.

21 Pwehki arail pwoson arail koasoai kan pahn peiwei sang nan eweiet ong riarail ohl akan me wia kisehn kadaudokemw; oh arail soakoahiek en koasoai kan I pahn kakehlakahla nan arail pwoson, ni arail pahn tamataman inou kan me I wiahiong arail pahpa kahlap oko.

22 Oh met, kilang, nei pwutak Sosep, iei duwen me ei pahpa kahlap oko kohpadahr.

23 Eri, ke kapaidahr pwehki inou wet; pwe kadaudokemw kan en dehr kamwomwomwla, pwe irail pahn rong mahsen kan en pwuhko.

24 Oh mie emen me kehlail nanpwngarail pahn sansalada, me pahn wiahda doadoahk mwahu, ni koasoai oh ni wiewia, e pahn wiahla dipwisoun doadoahk ni limen Koht, ni pwoson kehlail, pwe en wiahda doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan, oh wia soahng kan me kesempwal mwohn silangin Koht, pwehn kapwaiada onohnsapahl en peneinei en Israel kan, oh kadaudoken riomw kan.

25 Oh met, meid pahi kowe, Sosep. Kilang, ke pwulopwul; eri rong mwahu kaweid en riomw pwutak, Nihpai, oh mahsen kan me I ndahieng uhk pahn pweiong uhk. Tamataman mahsen kan en ahmw pahpa me pahn nektehn mehla. Ahmen.
2-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai kaweid oh kapaiada nah seri kan—E kapilsalehdala oh seridi—Nihpai kapinga kalahngan en Koht—Nihpai likih Kauno kohkohlahte. Nan Pwungen pahr 588–570 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, Ngehi, Nihpai me koskoasoaia duwen kokohp akan me ei pahpao koasoaiahier, duwen Sosep, me wisiklahngehr nan Isip.

2 Pwe kilang, e kohpada mehlel duwen kadaudoke kan. Kokohp malaulau me kesempwal sang dahme e ntingihdier. Oh e kohpada duwen kitail, oh neitail dih en mwuhr akan. Oh irail ntingdier nan pileit pirahs akan.

3 Eri, mwurin ei pahpao eh kaimwsekala ah koskoasoaia duwen ahn Sosep kokohp akan, e ekeralanein Laman seri kan, nah pwutak kan oh nah serepein kan, oh patohwanohng irail: Kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, me wia nein nei mesenih seri kan, I men kumwail en rong ei kaweid.

4 Pwe Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih: Nin duwen amwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh nin duwen amwail sohte pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekdeksang mwohn sihlahngi.

5 Ahpw kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, I sohte kak kohdihla nan ei sousou lao I pahn kihong kumwail kapai. Pwe kilang, I ese me ma kumwail kaiahnda ni pwungin momour kumwail sohte pahn salongasang.

6 Eri, ma kumwail riahla, kilang, I kihong kumwail kapai, pwe amwail keriao en kohsang pohmwail oh mihla rehn amwail nohno oh pahpa kan.

7 Eri, pwehki ei kapaio, Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng kumwail en kamwomwomwla; eri, e pahn ketin mahk ong kumwail oh kadaudokemwail kan kohkohlahte.

8 Kedekedeo mwurin ei pahpao eh kaimwsakalahr ah kaweid ong nein Laman pwutak kanoh serepein kan, e ahpw lukweriala reh nein Lemuel pwutak ko oh serepein ko.

9 Oh e patohwanohng irail, ketihtihki: Kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, me wia nein nei keriemen en pwutak nah seri kan; kilang I kihong kumwail kapaiohte me I kihongehr nein Laman pwutak kooh serepein ko; eri, kumwail sohte pahn uhdahn kamwomwomwla; ahpw ni imwilao kadaudokemwail kan pahn kapaida.

10 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ei pahpao kaimwsakala eh kaweid ong irail, kilang, e uhd koasoaiehng nein Ismael nah pwutak ko, iei, oh tohn ihmweo koaros.

11 Oh mwurin eh kaimwsakalahr ah patohieng irail, e uhd patohwanohng Sam, ketihtihki: Meid pai kowe, oh kadaudokemw kan; pwe ke pahn sohsohki sahpwo duwehte riomw pwutak Nihpai. Oh kadaudokemw kan pahn kapatapatehng kadaudoke ko; oh ke pahn duwehte riomw pwutako, oh kadaudokemw kan pahn duwehte kadaudoke ko; oh ke pahn paiamwahu erein ahmw mour.

12 Kedekedeo mwurin ei pahpa Lihai, eh koasoaiengehr tohn imweo koaros, nin duwen pepehm en ah mohngiong oh Ngehn en Kauno me ketiket reh, e ahpw likeilapalahr. Kedekedeoh e kapilsalehdalahr, oh e ahpw seridi.

13 Kedekedeo mwurinte rahn kei me e kapilsalehdalao, Laman oh Lemuel oh nein Ismael pwutak ko ahpw lingeringerda pahi pwehki sapwellimen Kauno kaweid kan.

14 Pwe Ngehi, Nihpai, itoitehng I en kawehwehong irail duwen sapwellimenKauno mahsen; eri I kawehwehongirailehr soang tohto, oh ei pahpao pil koasoai ong irail mwohn eh kapilsalehdalao. Tohto dahme e ketihtihki ko ntingdi pohnnei pileit teiko; pwe pali laud en aht poadoapoad ntingdi pohn nei pileit teiko.

15 Oh pohn mehkan I ntingihdi soahng kan mepid palingeni, ohiren pwuhk sarawi tohtoh me ntingdier pohnpileit prahs kan. Pwehki palingeni kin perenki iren pwuhk sarawi kan, oh ei mohngiong kin doandoanropwe ire kan, oh I ntingihdi pwe nei seri kan en kak esehla oh paieki.

16 Kilang, palingeniet kin perenki soahng kan me sang rehn Kauno; oh ahnsou koaros I kin doandoaropwe nan ei mohngiong mehkoaros me I kilangehr oh rongehr.

17 Ahpw, mendahtekalahngan en Kauno eh kin ketin kasalehongie sapwellime doadoahk kaselel oh kapwuriamwei kan, nan mohngiongiet kin weriweriki: Ngehi aramas paisuwed men! Ei, mohngiongiet pahtou pwehki paliwereiet; palingeni nsensuwed pwehki ei sapwung kan.

18 Pwehki kasongosong kan oh dihp akan me kin mengei en kaluweteiehla eh kipeiehdier.

19 Oh ahnsou me I kin inangih peren, mohngiongiet kin mwahiei pwehki dipei kan; ahpw, I ese ihs me I pahn kopworopworki.

20 Ei Koht me wia kakehlepei; ih me ketin kahluwaie sang nan ei kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh ketin doandoareie pohn sehd en nan madauo.

21 E ketin audehkinie sapwellime limpoak, lao ekipehdi paliwereiet.

22 E ketin kalowehdi ei imwintihtih kan, karehieng arail masepwehkada.

23 Kilang, e ketin karongehier ei pekipek nihrahn, oh e ketkihongiehier erepit nan ei ouraman kan nihpwong.

24 Oh nihrahn I kin eimahki ei kapakap mwohn silangi; iei, ngileiet kin leladahla powe; oh tohnleng kan ahpw kohdihdo oh seweseie.

25 Oh pohn pehnpihr kan en sapwellime Ngehno me e ketin wahkiniehdahla pohn nahna me uhdahn ileile kan. Oh meseikat kilangehr soahng kapwuriamwei kei, iei, me kapwuriamwei sang dahme aramas kak kilang; eri I keinepwdihsang I en ntingihraildi.

26 Eri maingko, ma I kilangehr soahng kapwuriamwei kan, ma Kauno ni eh ketdihdooh ketkihdi pein ih rehn aramas akan oh kasalehongirailkupwurkalahngan, dahme ei mohngiong pahn mwahieiki oh palingeni nsensuwedki, oh paliwereiet wiakaula, oh ei kehlail luwetkihla, pwehki ei kahpwal akan?

27 Oh dahme I pahn lohdihkinan dihp, pwehki paliwereiet? Iei, dahme I pahn mweidehngki kasongosong kan, en wiahda dowen me suwedo nan ei mohngiong pwehn kawehla ei onopek oh kahpwalihala palingeniet? Dahme ei imwintihtih kan pahn kahrehkihda ei lingeringer?

28 Palingeni, pwourda! Dehier pwurehng luwetla nan dihp. Mohngiongi, perenda oh dehier wiahda dewen imwintihti en palingeniet.

29 Dehr pwurehng lingeringer pwehki ei imwintihti kan. Dehr kaluwetehla ei kehl pwehki ei kahpwal akan.

30 Ei mohngiong perenda oh lukwerlahng Kauno, oh patohwan: Maingahi Kaun, I pahn kapinga komwi kohkohlahte; iei, palingeniet pahn pereperenkin komwi, maing Koht, komwi me wiaahi paipalap en komour.

31 Maing Kaun, komw kak ketin doarehla palingeniet? Komw kak ketin kapitiehsang ei imwintihti kan? Komw kak ketin seweseie pwe I en kak masak sansal en dihp?

32 Ewen kehl en ehl en kin ritidi mwohiahnsou koaros, pwehki mohngiongiet karakarahk oh ngehniet peik! Maing Kaun, komw dehr ketin ritingedihsangie ewen kehl en omwi pwung mwohi, pwe I en kak keid nan ahl en wahu karakarahk, pwe I en kak inenweite nan ahl patapat!

33 Maing Kaun, komw ketin kapelkiniepene sapwellimomwi likoun pwung! Maing Kaun, komw ketin kaunopada ahl me pahn kapitiehsang ei imwintihtih kan! Komw ketin kainenehla wasa I pahn weidie! Komw dehr ketin mweidehng takai en dipekelekel mwohi—ahpw komw ketin kamwakelehda mwohi, oh dehr ketin kerempwahla ei ahl, ahpw ahl en ei imwintihti kan.

34 Maing Kaun, Komwi me I kin likih, oh I pahn likih komwi kohkohlahte. I sohte pahn likih kehl en aramas; pwe I ese me mehmen me kin likialakehl en aramas ekin riahkihla. Iei, mehmen me kin likiala aramas de kehlkihla aramas e kin riahkihla.

35 Iei, I ese me mehmen me pahn peki, Koht pahn kupwur sapan oh ketkiheng ih. Iei, ei Koht pahn ketkihengie, ma I peki ni pwung; eri ngileiet pahn sansal ong komwi; iei, I pahn lukuwerwih komwi, ei Koht, me wia paipalap en ei pwung. Kilang, ngileiet pahn peidahwei rehmwi kohkohlahte, ei paipalap oh ei Kohtpoatoapoat. Ahmen.
2-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai ko tohrohrsang mehn Laman ko, kolokol kosonned en Moses, oh kauada tehnpas sarawi—Pwehki mehn Laman ko arail soupwoson, irail pahn lekdeksang mwohn sihlang en Kauno, oh riahla, oh wiahla kalokepen mehn Nihpai kan. Nan Pwungen Pahr 588–559 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, Ngehi, Nihpai, likuweriongehr Kauno Koht, pwehki riei pwutak ko ara lingeringer.

2 Ahpw kilang, ara lingeringer pahi ahpw laudla, kahrehong ara songen kemeiehla.

3 Iei, ira kaulimahkinie, ketihtihki: Riata pwutak tikitiko kin leme me e pahn kaunkitailda; oh kahpwal laud kitail ahneki pwehki ih; eri, kitail kemehla, pwe kitail en dehr nohn lokolongki ah koasoi kan. Pwe kilang, kitail sohte pahn wiahki ih atail kaun; pwehki kitail me laud, kitail me ahneki pwuhng en kaunda aramas kat.

4 Met I sohte anahne ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat koasoai en kaulim koaros me ira wiahiengie. Ahpw e itarete I en nda, me ira song en kemeiehla.

5 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw kaperkinie, me I en kohkohlahsang irail oh sopohla nan sapwtehno, oh irail koaros me men iangie.

6 Eri, kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, wahda ei peneinei, oh iangahki Sohram oh ah peneinei, oh riei pwutak laud me adaniki Sam oh ah peneinei, oh riei pwutak tikitik riemen me adaniki Seikop oh Sosep, oh iangahki riei serepein kan, oh irail koaros me men iangie. Oh koaros me men iangie ko iei irail me kamehlele sapwellimen Koht kehkehlik kan oh kaudiahl kan; eri, irail peikiong ei koasoai kan.

7 Oh se wahda imwat impwal kan oh soahng koaros me se kak wahda, oh seiloangki erein rahn tohto kei nan sapwtehno. Oh mwurin aht seiseiloangkiseli erein rahn tohto kei se kauwada imwat impwal akan.

8 Oh nei aramas akan pwungkihda me se pahn kiheng eden wasao Nihpai; eri, wasao adankihla Nihpai.

9 Oh irail koaros me iangiedohu kahdankinirailla aramas en Nihpai.

10 Oh se nantiheng kolokol sapwellimen Kauno kadeik pwung kan, oh koasoandi kan, oh kosonned akan ni mehkoaros, nin duwen kosonned en Moses.

11 Kauno eri ketin ieiang kiht; oh se ahpw tepda pweida kouwahlap; pwe se padokedi weren tuhke, oh se ahpw dolung wah tohto. Oh se tepda apwalihda polohnsihpw kan, oh kou kan, oh soangen mahn teikan.

12 Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, pil wahdo rekohd kan me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs kan; oh iangahki mpwei, de kompas, me kaunopdahrsang ni limen Kauno ong ei pahpao, nin duwen dahme ntingdiero.

13 Kedekedeo se ahpw tepda pweida kouwahlap, oh kaparaparala nan sahpwo.

14 Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, ale nein Leipen kedlahso, oh ahpw wiahda kedlahs tohto me duwehte naho, pwe aramas me ahnsou wet kahdanikilahr mehn Laman kande kohdo oh kemeikitala; pwe I esehier arail kailongkinie oh nei seri kan oh irail akan me wia nei aramas.

15 Oh I padahkiheng nei aramas akan irail en kauadaihmw akan, oh irail en koadoahke tuhke, oh airon, kapa, prahs, sdihl, oh kohl, oh silper, oh mete kesempwal akan, me rekla wasao.

16 Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kauada tehnpas sarawi ieu; oh I kauada ni mwomwen tehnpas sarawi en Solomon ihte e sohte wiawihkihda kidelapen dipwsou pweilaud; pwe soangen dipwsou pweilaud ko sohte kak dierek nan sahpwet, eri, e sohte kak kokouda duwehte tehnpas sarawi en Solomono. Ahpw wiepen doadoahk en kauwadao rasehngete tehnpas en Solomono; oh koasoandi en doadoahko lingan kouwalahpie.

17 Kedekedeoh Ngehi, Nihpai, kaweidkiheng nei aramas akan re en kin pwersek, oh doadoahngki pehrail kan.

18 Kedekedeoh irail ahpw men I en wiahla arail nahnmwarki. Ahpw ngehi, Nihpai, sohte pwungki en mie nahnmwarki; ahpw, I kapwaieng irail nsenerail sang ni manman me I kolokol.

19 Oh kilang, mahsen en Kauno pweidahr rehn riei ko, nin duwen me e mahsanier, me I pahn wiahla ara kaun oh soun padahk. Eri, I wiaier ahr kaun oh soun padahk, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan, lao lel ahnsou me re song en kemeiehlao.

20 Eri, mahsen en Kauno pweidahr me e ketin mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ma irail sohte pahn rong ahmw kaweid kan, irail pahn lekidek sang mwohn silangin Kauno. Oh kilang, irail ahpw lekideksangehr mwohn sihlangi.

21 Oh e ketin keriakinirail keria ieu me inenen kalok, pwehki arail suwed. Pwe kilang arail mohngiong kan keptakai ong ih, ihme kahrehda arail duwehla takai kekeluwak; eri, nin duwen arail pwetepwet, oh masamwahu oh lingan mehlele, Kauno me ketin kahrehda kilirail akan e tontonla pwe nei aramas akan en dehr men patehng irail.

22 Oh Kauno Koht mahsanih: I pahn kahrehda noumw aramas akan pahn kailongkinirail, ma irail sohte pahn kohluhkihla arail mour suwed akan.

23 Oh mehmen me pahn pwoudikihda emen kadaudokerail kan e pahn riahkihla; pwe re pahn alehdi soangen keriaohte. Oh e pweidahr pwehki Kauno me ketin mahsanih.

24 Oh pwehki keria me milahr pohrailo irail wialahr aramas pohnkahke kei, audaudki tiahk suwed oh widing, oh kin kohla nanwel rapahki mahn lawalo kan.

25 Oh Kauno Koht mahsanihongie: Irail pahn kin kaloke kadaudokemw kan, pwe kadaudokemw kan en kin tamatamanie; oh ma kadaudokemw kan pahn manokeiehla, oh sohte kapwaiada ei mahsen kan, re pahn kalokeirail lao irail kamwomwomwla.

26 Kedekedeoh Ngehi, Nihpai, kasarawihla Seikop oh Sosep, pwe ira en wiahla samworou oh soun padahk ong nei aramas akan nan sahpwo.

27 Kedekedeoh se nsenamwahu nan aht mour.

28 Oh sounpar silihsek ahpw douer powe mwurin aht mweselsang Serusalem.

29 Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, ntintingih rekohd kan pohn nei pileit kan, me I wiahda, duwen nei aramas akan lelodo met.

30 Kedekedeoh Kauno Koht mahsanihongie: Wiahda ekei pileit; oh ke pahn ntingihdi soahng tohto powe me mwahu mwohn sihlangi, pwe en wia kamwahupen noumw aramas.

31 Eri, Ngehi, Nihpai, kohla oh wiahda pileit kan me I ntingihdier mepwukat powe pwe I en peikieng sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan.

32 Oh I ntingihdier soang kan me Koht kupwur pereniki. Oh ma nei aramas akan perenki kupwur en Koht akan irail pahn perenki ei nting kan me ntingdi pohn pileit kat.

33 Oh ma nei aramas akan inangih esehla duwen poadepenmehn mahs oko re anahne rapahki nan nei pileit teiko.

34 Oh I kak koasoaia me sounparehr pahisek douer powe, oh se mahweniongehr oh nanpwungsuwediong riat ko.
2-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop soiahda poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan: Arail lohdi pahn mehn Papilon kan oh kopwurupwurla; doadoahk oh kalohpwualahn Me Sarawi en Israel; sawas me mehn liki kan sewesehkin irail; oh kopwurupwurdohn mehn Suhs akan ni imwin rahn akan ma irail pahn kamehlele Mesahiao. Nan pwungen pahr 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Mahsen en Seikop, rien Nihpai, me e kaweidkihong aramas en Nihpai kan:

2 Kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, Ngehi, Seikop, Koht ketin malipeie, oh kasarawielahrni wiepen sapwellime koasoandi sarawio, oh kamanamanla sang rieio, Nihpai, me kumwail kin wiahki amwail nahnmwarki de silepemwail, oh me kumwail kin koapworopworki en wia doarepemwail, pwe kilang kumwail ese me I kaweidkinkumwailehr soangen kaweid tohtoh kouwalahpie.

3 Ahpw, I pwurehng kaweid kumwail; pwe kamwahupen palingenimwail akan me I nsenohki. Iei, I inenen pwunodkin kumwail; oh kumwail esehier met. Pwe I kin ngoangkipanawi kumwail; oh I padahkihong kumwail mahsen en ei pahpao; oh I padahkiheng kumwail duwen soahngkan koaros me ntingdier, sangete ni kepikipikdahn sampah.

4 Oh met, kilang, I pahn kaweidkin kumwail duwen soahng koaros me wiewiawi met, oh me pahn wiawi mwuhr; eri, I pahn wadekehng kumwail mahsen en Aiseia. Oh mahsen pwukat me riei pwutako mwahuki I en kaweidkin kumwail, pwe en wia kamwaupemwail, pwe kumwail en kak esehla oh kawauwieki mwaren Koht.

5 Oh met, mahsen me I pahn wadekada kan iei mahsen kan me Aiseia ketihtihki duwen peneinei en Israel kan; eri, kumwail en karasahiong pein kumwail, pwe kumwail wia kisehnpeneinei en Israel. Oh soahng tohto me Aiseia ketihtihkier me kumwail me kumwail kak karasahiong pein kumwail, pwe kumwail iei peneinei en Israel.

6 Oh Iet mahsen oko: Kauno Koht mahsanih: Kilang, I pahn kapahwei limeiet pohn wein mehn liki kan, pwehn kasalehda ei koasoandi sansal kan ong aramas akan; oh irail ahpw pahn kol pehn noumwail pwutak kan oh kahreirail, oh pahn wa noumwail serepein kan pohn pwopwerail akan.

7 Oh nahnmwarki kan pahn kinapwalih kumwail duwehte pahpa kan, oh lih nahnmwarki kan pahn kin apwalih kumwail duwehte nohno kan; irail pahn poaridi mwohmmwail, oh kamwakelehsang pwelipar en patehn nehmmwail kan; oh kumwail pahn dehdeki me ngehi me Kauno; pwe mehmenme kasikasikie sohte pahn namenekla.

8 Oh met Ngehi, Seikop, pahn kawehwehda duwen mahsen kat. Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin kasalehongie irail ko me mehn Papilon ko kemelahr oh salihdier, me mih Serusalem, iei, wasa me se kohsangie.

9 Ahpw, Kauno ketin kasalehongie me irail pahn pwurehng pwurodo. Oh e pil ketin kasalehongie me Kauno Koht, Me Sarawi en Israelo, pahn ketin pwaredohng irail ni paliwar; oh mwurin eh pahn pwaredohng irail, irail pahn kaloke oh kalohpwuala ih, nin duwen dahme tohnlengo padahkihongie.

10 Oh mwurinarail pahn kasalehong Me Sarawi en Isrealo arail keptakai oh pohnmwahso, kilang, e pahn ketin kadeik irailda. Rahno pahn kohdo me irail pahn lokolok oh ahneki kahpwal.

11 Eri, mwurin arail pahn pekousla, tohnlengo mahsanih, tohto irail pahn lokolongki, ahpw sohte pahn mehkihla, pwehki ahn me loaloapwoat kan arail kapakap akan; irail pahn mwerpeseng, oh kamakam, oh kailok; ahpw, Kauno pahn ketin mahkohng irail, ma irail pahn kamehlele arail Sounkomouro, irail pahn pwurehng pwurpene nan sapwerail sahpw akan me re sohsohki.

12 Oh meid pahi mehn Liki Kan, me soukohpo ntingihdier duwe; pwe kilang, ma re pahn koluhla oh sohte mahwiniong Saion, oh dehr iangala mwomwohdisolahlahwe lapo, irail pahn komourla; pwe Kauno Koht pahn ketin kapwaiala sapwellime inouo me e ketin inoukihongehr sapwellime seri kan; oh kahrepe wet me soukohpo ntingiekihdi mepwukat.

13 Eri, irail me pahn mahwiniong Saion oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inouo pahn kamwakelehsang pwelipar en patehn nehnrail akan; oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan sohte pahn namenekla. Pwe aramas me kin kasikasik Kauno iei irail sapwellime; pwe irail me kin kaskasikte ketdohn Mesaiao.

14 Oh kilang, nin duwen mahsen en soukohpo, Mesaiao pahn ketdo keriau pwehn ketin kapwurepene sapwellime aramas akan; eri, e pahn ketin pwarohng irail ni manaman oh lingan kouwahlap, oh kamwomwala arail imwintihti kan, eri ni ahnsou me rahno pahn lelodo irail ahpw pahn kamehlehla; oh e sohte pahn kamwomwala irail akan me kamehlele.

15 Oh irail me sohte kamehlele pahn kamwomwomwla, nan kisiniei, oh melimel, oh rerrer en sahpw, oh kakerehdi nta, oh soumwahu, oh lehk. Oh irail ahpw pahn dehdehki me Kauno Koht, iei Me Sarawi en Israel.

16 Dipwisou kan pahn kapwurupwursang me lapalap, de me sensel kan pahn lapwada?

17 Kauno me Mahmahsen: Irail akan me sensel pahn me lapalap akan pahn saledekla, oh dipwisou lohdi kan me aramas lemei kalowehdi pahn kopwurupwursang; pwe Koht Wasa Lapalahpie pahn kapitala sapwellime aramas en inouo. Kauno me Mahmahsen: I pahn pelian irail akan me pahn pelian kumwail—

18 Oh irail me kin kalokeikumwail, I pahn kamwengehkin irail pein udukerail; oh irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntahrail rasehng wain me iou; oh koaros pahn dehdehki me Ngehi Kauno iei ahmwail Sounkomour oh Soundoar, Wasa Lapalahpie en Seikop.
2-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop peusehla wadewadek sang nan Aiseia: Aiseia karasaraski mesaiao—Mesaiao pahn sapwellimaniki koaiek en koasoakoasoi—E pahn ketin sohpeisang soun kamakam akan—E sohte pahn likamwada—Karasahiong Aiseia 50.[/i]

1 Ei, Kauno mahsanih: ia duwe, I kadarkumwailahr, de I keseikumwailahr douluhl? Iei met Kauno mahsanih: Ia nein amwail nohno kisinlikoun kamweid? Ihs me I mweidkumwailahng, de ihs me I pweipwandeng me I netkinkumwailahng? Ei, ihs me I netkinkumwailehng? Kilang, pwehki dipemwail akan me kumwail pein netkinkumwailla, oh pwehki amwail sapwung kan amwail nohno mweisang.

2 Eri, ahnsou me I kohdo, sohte aramas; ahnsou me I lukuwer, mehlel, sohte me sapeng. Kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, ia duwe, limei kat sohte kak lellewei rehmwail pwe en doareikumwailla, de I sohte ahneki manman en kapitkumwaila? Kilang, I kak kamadahkihda nan madau ei mahsen, I kawekala pilap akan ong sapwtehn oh arail mwahmw akan matala pwehki pihl akan ar madada, oh irail mehkihla arail men nimpil.

3 I kin karotongehla pahnlahng, oh I kin perehkihla likoun nsensuwed.

4 Kauno Koht ketkihongie ewen aramas semen, pwe I en kak ese ia mwomwen ei pahn koasoai ong kumwail, Peneinei en Israel kan. Ni ahnsou me kumwail kin luwet e kin pangipaninginie I en sangkenei. E kin ketin panginiehda pwe I en rong duwehte me semen men.

5 Kauno Koht ketin ritingadahr salengeiet, oh I sohte kahngohdiong, de pil sohpeisang.

6 I mweideng irail en wokih pohnseweie, oh sohte irehdi ar lahlaweie. I sohte kin ruksang ar kandipih meseie oh kanamenekihe.

7 Ar lahlaweie sohte pahn kamedekeiehla, pwe Kauno Koht pahn soweseie. Eri I pahn kanengamahiong duwehte takai kehlail ehu, pwe I ese me I sohte pahn namenekla.

8 Oh Kauno ketin karanih ie, oh e kin ketin doareiehla. Ihs me pahn pelian ie? Mweidehng sen kesihnen pene. Ihs me kin wiahiong ie kahpwal? Mweidehng en keido, pwe I pahn kemehki ei koasoai kehlail.

9 Pwe Kauno Koht pahn ketin sowese ie. Oh irail koaros me pahn uhwong ie, kilang, irail koaros pahn sohrala duwehte likou me kul kan pahn kangala.

10 Ihs rehmwail me kin wauneki Kauno, me kin peikiong mahsen en sapwellime ladu, me kin kekeid nan rotorot oh sohte marain?

11 Kilang kumwail koaros me kin sounda kisiniei, me kin kapikapil kin kumwail dimwamwahi kan, kekeid nan pein amwail marain en kisiniei oh nan dimwamwahi kan me kumwail pein parada. Met kumwail pahn alehsang ie—kumwail pahn mehla nan amwail nsensuwed.
2-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop usehla wadawadek sang nan Aiseia: Ni imwin rahn akan, Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahuih Saion oh kapwurehdo Israel—Me aleier kamaiauparail pahn kohdo Saion ni peren laud—Karasapene Aiseia 51 oh 52:1–2. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Rong ie mwahu, kumwail akan me kin wiewia me pwung. Kilenglahng paipalap me kumwail paldihsang ieo, oh nan pwoahr me kumwail weiweidahsang ieo.

2 Kilenglahng amwail pahpa kahlap Eipram oh Sara me kaipwihkumwaildi; pwe I malipehda ih kelehpw oh kapaiada.

3 Pwe Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahuih Saion, ong koaros me kousoan nan mohn ihmw kan; oh e pahn ketin wekidalasapwtehno en duwehla Ihden, oh e pahn duwehla sapwellimen Kauno mwetuwelo. Peren oh nsenamwahu pahn mie wasao, kaping kalahngan oh ngihlen koul en kaping.

4 Kumwail rong ie, nei aramas akan; oh rong ei mahsen kan, Kumwail tohn ei wehi; pwe I pahn kadarewei kosonned ehu, oh I pahn wiahiong ei koasoandi en wia kamarainpen aramas akan.

5 Ei pwung me keren; I kadarewehr komour, oh limei kat pahn kadeik aramas akan. Deke kan pahn awiawih ie, oh irail pahn kin koapworopworki limei kat.

6 Kilengdagla nanleng, oh kilengdihla pohn sampah; pwe nanleng pahn sohrasang duwehte ediniei, oh sampah pahn meringla duwehte likou mering; oh irail kan me kin mihmi loale pahn mehla pil duwehte. Ahpw ei komour pahn kohkohlahte, oh ei pwung sohte pahn sohrala.

7 Kumwail rong ie, kumwail akan me kin mour pwung, aramas akan me I ntingihdier ei kosonned akan nan ar mohngiong kan, kumwail dehr masak ma aramas kasarowei kumwail, de pil masak arail wiewia suwediong kumwail.

8 Pwe loangenmwet kan pahn kangirailla duweht likou ehu, oh mwahs pahn kangirailla duwehte ar kin kang winen sihpw. Ahpw ei pwung pahn kohkohlahte, oh ei komour pahn sang ehu dih lel ehu dih.

9 Maing Kaun, komw ketin opala wasa! Ketikihda sapwellimomwi manaman; Duwehte mahso. Kaidehn komwi me ketin doakoapeseng Rahap, oh kawehla drakono?

10 Kaidehn komwi me ketin kamadahda sehd loallo; me ketin wiahda ahl ong irail me komw ketin doarehla kau pwe irail en keidloale?

11 Eri, irail akan me Kauno ketin kamaiaudahr pahn pwurodo oh wie kokoul kohdo nan Saion; oh re pahn peren poatopoat oh wiahla aramas sarawi kei; oh re pahn alehdi nsenamwahu oh peren; pahtou oh nsensuwed pahn sohrala.

12 Ngehi iei Ih me ketin koaloalamwahwih kumwailo. Kilang, ihs kumwail me kumwail pahn masangki aramas, me uhdahn pahn mehla, me wia nein aramas, me uhdahn pahn duwehla dihpw?

13 Oh [kumwail] moanokehla Kauno me ketin wiaikumwailda, me ketin sohngedier nanleng, oh koasoanedier poahsoan kan en sampah, oh [kumwail] usehlahte masepwehk rahn koaros, pwehki [amwail masak] lingeringer mwuledek en imwintihtio, me mwomwen me e onopadahr en keweikumwailla? Oh ia ahn imwintihtio lingeringeren?

14 Me selidi kan pahn kasaledekla ahnsou mwadang, oh re sohte pahn mehla nan imweteng, oh re sohte pahn men mwengehda.

15 Ahpw ngehi me Kauno amwail Koht, me kupwurehda iloak kan en pwungupwungidek; mwarei iei Kauno, Wasa Lapalap.

16 Oh ngehi me kin kihong kaweid nan awamwail akan, oh perehkin kumwail mwetehn ni limei kat, pwe I en kak sohngedi pahn lahng oh koasoanehdi poahson kan en sampah, oh mahsanihong Saion: Kilang, kumwail iei nei aramas.

17 Serusalem pirida, pwourda, oh kesihnenda, ke nimalahr kep en lokolok me Kauno ketikihonguhkehr nan sapwellime engieng—ke nimalahr mwoahrok en nan kepo oh wasaskiseli.

18 Oh nanpwungen nah pwutak kan me e naitikihdier, sohte me kak kahluwa; nanpwungen nah pwutak kan me e apwaliada sohte me kak kolada peh.

19 Noumw pwutak riemen pwukat me samwodohr rehmw, ihs me pahn poakeiukala—ke ohla oh kamwomwalahr, oh lehk oh mahwin lelohnguhk—oh ihs me I pahn kansenamwahuiekin uhk?

20 Noumw pwutak kan lipwongmasalahr, ihte meh riemenet me saik; irail kin wonohn ni ewen ahl akan koaros; duwehte kouwol lawalo men eh lohdi nan uhk ehu, re kehnehr engieng en Kauno, oh omw Koht ketin angiangihrailda.

21 Eri kumwail rong met, kumwail wie lokolok, oh sakaulahr, ahpw kaidehn wain me kahrehda.

22 Kauno ketin mahsanih, Kauno oh amwail Koht pahn ketin kasalehda pwung en sapawellime aramas akan; kilang, I ketikihsangehr nan pehmwail kan kep en lokoloko, mwoarok en nan kep en ei engieng; kumwail solahr pahn pwurehng nim.

23 Ahpw I pahn kiheng nan pehn irail kan me kahpwalihiukalahr; me kin ndaiong uhk: Dairukedi, pwe se en kak sok pohmw—oh ke kin wendieng nanial oh re kin sok pohmw likamwete kowe pwehl.

24 Saion, pirida, pwourda oh kehlailada; pwuhrieng nan ahmw likou kaselel kan, kowe Serusalem, kahnimw sarawi: pwe sang met kohla me samin kan solahr pahn pidolong nan omw kahnimw.

25 Serusalem, sipedasang rehmw pwelipar akan; kesihnenda, mwohndieng nan dewemwen; sapwadasang sahl me pire tepinweremwen, kowe serepein lidu en Saion.
2-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop kawewehda me mehn Suhs akan pahn pwurpene nan sapwerail sahpw en inou kan—Tomwo pwaindahr aramas sang ni Pwupwidio—Paliwar en me melahr akan pahn iasadahsang nan sousou, oh ngenerail akan sang nan ehl oh sang paradais—Irail pahn pakadeikda—Tomwo doarehla sang mehla, ehl, tepilo, oh lokolok soutuk—Me pwung kan pahn komourla nan wehin Koht—Kalokolok en me dipan akan koasoandier—Me Keieu Sarawi en Israel me wia silepen ewen kehlo. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I wadekadahr mepwukat pwe kumwail en kak ese duwen inou kan me Kauno ketin inoukihongehr peneinei en Israel kan koaros—

2 Me e ketin mahseniongehr mehn Suhs akan, sang rehn sapwellime soukohp sarawi kan, sangete nin tapio, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih, lao lel ahnsouo me irail pahn kapwuredohng nan mwomwohdiso mehlel oh sapwellimen Koht kehl; ahnsou me irail pahn kapwurupwurodohng nan uhdakarail kan, oh soandieng nan sapwerail sahpw en inou kan.

3 Kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I ndahieng kumwail mepwukat pwe kumwail en perenda, oh sarada kohkohlahte, pwehki kapai kan me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihong noumwail seri kan.

4 Pwe I ese me tohto rehmwail raparapahkiher en ese soahng kan me pahn kohdo; eri I ese me kumwail ese me paliwaratail kan uhdahn pahn mehla oh sohrala; ahpw, nan paliwaratail kan kitail pahn kilahng Koht.

5 Ei, I ese me kumwail ese me e pahn ketin pwarohng irail ni paliwar nan Serusalem, wasa me kitail kohsang ie; pwe e konehng en uhdahn ketido rehrail; pwe e koasoandi me Soun Kepikipik lapalapo pahn ketin mweidala pein kahlapeo pahn manaman en aramas, oh pwoukihla aramas koaros, pwe aramas koaros en mihla pahn sapwellime manaman.

6 Pwehki aramas koaros uhdahn pahn mehla, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellimen Soun Kepikipik lapalapo koasoandi kalahngano, e konehng en mie manaman en iasada, oh iasadao konehng en wiawihong aramas pwehki pwupwidio; oh sapwung me kahrehda pwupwidio; oh pwehki aramas ar pwupwulahr irail kalipilipasangehr mwohn silangin Kauno.

7 Eri, e konehng en wia tomw me poatopoat—ma e sohte pahn wia tomw me poatopoat, soahng me kin mwerepeseng sohte kak kieweklahng ni soahng me sohte kak mwerepeseng. Eri, keieun kopwung me wiawihong aramas pahn duweduwehte kohkohlahte. Oh ma ih met me wiawi, paliwar pahn wonohn oh matala oh mweredieng pohn sampah, oh sohla kak pwourda.

8 Eri [ia uwen kaselel en] sapwellimen Koht erepit, sapwellime kalahngan oh mahk! Pwe kilang, ma paliwar pahn sohla kak pwourda, palingnitail kan pahn duwehla tohnleng me pwupwidihsang mwohn silangin Koht Soutuk, oh wiahla tepilo, oh sohla kak pwourda.

9 Oh ngenitail kan uhdahn anahne duwehla ih, oh kitail wiahla tepil kei, tohnleng en tepil, ritidihsang mwohn silangin atail Koht, oh mihla pahn pahpahn likamw akan, nan nsensuwed, duwehte pein ih; ei, ong ih me pitiedi tepin atail nohno oh pahpa, me kin kawekala pein ih en duwehte tohnleng en marain, oh kamwakidada aramas akan en wia doadoahk en mwersuwed rir kan en kamaramas oh soangoasoangen doadoahk rotorot rir koaros.

10 Eri ia uwen kaselel en kalahngan en atail Koht, me ketin kaunopadadahr ahl pwe kitail en pitisang nan pehn eni kamasepwehk menet; iei, enio, mehla oh ehl, me I kin kahdaniki mehlahn paliwar, oh pil mehlahn palingehn.

11 Oh pwehki duwen sapwellimen atail Koht ahl en komourlao, Me Sarawi en Israel, mehlahn paliwar wet, me I koasoaiao, pahn kapwurehda mehlahu; me iei mehlahn nan sousou.

12 Oh mehla me I koasoaiao, me iei mehlahn palingehn, pahn kapwurehda mehlahu; me iei mehlahn nan ehl; eri, mehla oh ehl pahn kapwurehda ara mehla ko, oh ehl pahn kapwurehda ngehn me e kalewehdi ko, oh sousouo pahn kapwurehda paliwar akan me e kalewehdi, oh paliwar oh ngehn en aramas akan pahn pwurehng pwurpene; oh met pahn wiawi sang ni manaman en iasadahn Me Sarawi en Israelo.

13 Ia uwen kaselel en sapwellimen atail Koht koasoandio! Pwe pil ehu kahrepe, paradais en Koht pahn kapwurehda ngehn en me pwung kan, oh sousou pahn kapwurehda paliwar en me pwung; oh ngehno oh paliwaro pahn pwurehng pwurpene, oh aramas koaros pahn sohla kak mwerpeseng, oh solahr kak mehla kohkohlahte, oh irail wialahr aramas mour kei, ahneki marain unsek duwehte atail ese ni paliwar, ihte atail marain [nan mour poatoapoat] pahn unsek.

14 Eri, kitail pahn wehwehki ni unsek atail sapwung kan, oh atail samin kan, oh atail kilisou; oh me pwung kan pahn wehwehki unsek arail peren kan, oh arail wiewia pwung kan, oh kapwatkihda likou mwakelekel, iei, likou en wiewia pwung.

15 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me aramas koaros pahn powehdi keieu en mehla wet oh mourda, pwehki ar sohlahr kak mehla, irail uhdahn pahn uh mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Me Sarawi en Israelo; oh kopwungo ahpw pahn wiawi, oh irail udahn pahn pakadeikda nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kadeik sarawi.

16 Oh ni mehlel, nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias, Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih, oh iei sapwellime mahsen poatoapoat, me sohte kak sohrala, me iei irail akan me pwung pahn dadaurete ar pwung, oh irail akan me samin pahn samisaminte; eri, me samin kan ieitepelo oh nah tohnleng kan; oh irail pahn kohla nan kisiniei poatoapoat, me kaunopadahng irailehr; oh arail lokolok duwehte lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me mpwulen kisinieio kin lullul poatoapoat oh sohte kak uhdi.

17 Ia uwen kaselel oh pwuhng pahrek en atail Koht! Pwe e kin ketin kalelehla sapwellime mahsen kan koaros, oh mahsen ko kin pwilido sang nan douwaseo, oh sapwellime kosonned uhdahn pahn pweida.

18 Ahpw, kilang, me pwung kan, iei souleng en Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail akan me kin kamehlele Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail akan me kin kanengamahieng lohpwu kan en sampah, oh mehndahkihla kanamenekpe, irail me pahn sohsohki wehin Koht, me kaunopadahng irailehr sangete ni tepdahn poahsoan en sampah, oh irail pahn pereperen kohkohlahte.

19 Ia uwen kaselel en kalahngan en atail Koht, me Sarawi en Israelo! Pwe e ketin doarehsangehr sapwellime souleng kan eni kamasepwehko me iei tepilo, oh mehla, oh ehl, oh lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me iei lokolok sohte imwi.

20 Ia uwen kaselel en sarawi en atail Koht! Pwe e ketin mwahngih soahng koaros, oh sohte mehkot me e sohte mwahngih.

21 Oh e ketidihdo sampah pwe en kak ketin kamaurala aramas koaros ma irail pahn rong mwahu kepitie; pwe kilang, e ketin lokolongkiher ahn aramas koaruhsie medek, mehlel, medek en aramas koaros me ipwidi, ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan, me wia kisehn peneinei en Adam.

22 Oh e ketin lokolongkiher met pwe iasada en kak wiawihong aramas koaruhsie, pwe koaros en kak kesihnenda mwowe ni rahn en kadeik lapalapo.

23 Oh e ketin mahsanihongehr aramas koaros me re anahne koluhla, oh pepdaisla ni mware, ahneki pwoson unsek ni Me Sarawi en Israelo, ma soh re sohte kak komourla nan wehin Koht.

24 Oh ma re sohte pahn koluhla oh kamehlele mwareo, oh pepdaisla ni mwareo, oh dadaur lel imwi, re pahn kalipilipla; pwe Kauno Koht, Me Sarawi en Israelo, me ketin mahsaniher.

25 Eri, e ketikidahr kosonned ehu; oh ma sohte kosonned e sohte pahn mie kalokolok; oh ma sohte kalokolok e sohte pahn mie kadeikpen kalokolok; oh ma sohte kadeikpen kalokolok, kalahngan en Me Sarawi en Israelo me pahn apwalih irail, pwehki tomwo; pwehki sapwellime manaman me ketin doareiraillahr.

26 Pwe tomwo kaitaralahr pwung en sapwellime pwuhng pahrek rehn irail akan me sohte iang alehdi kosonnedo, irail pitisangehr eni kamasepwehko, mehla oh ehl, oh tepilo, oh lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me iei lokolok poatopoat; oh irail kopwurupwurlahng rehn Koht me ketikihong irail esingek, iei Me Sarawi en Israelo.

27 Ahpw meid suwed ong ih me alehdi kosonnedo, ei, me alehdi sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan koaros, duwehte kitail, oh dipikihda, oh kawehla mwahl ah rahn en kaunopada, pwe meid apwal ong aramaso!

28 Ia uwen widing en koasoandi en me suwedo! Ia uwen noahrok, oh luwet, oh pweipwei en aramas! Ahnsou me re kin esehla re kin lemehieng me re loalekeng, oh re kin sohla rong mwahu kaweid en Koht, pwe re kin pohnsehsehla, oh medemedewe me re esehier soang koaros, eri, arail loalekengo kin likamwala oh e sohte pahn sewese irail. Oh irail pahn lekidekla.

29 Ahpw loalekengla mwahu ma re pahn rong kaweid en Koht.

30 Ahpw meid suwed ong me kepwehpwe kan, me kepwehpwehki soahng kan en sampah. Pwehki arail kepwehpwe irail kailongkihla me semwehmwe kan, oh irail kaloke me opampap kan, oh irail poakehng arail dipwisou kan; eri, re kin wiahki ar koht ar dipwisou kan. Oh kilang, arail dipwsou kan pahn pil iang irail lekidekla.

31 Oh meid suwed ong me salengepon kan me sohte pahn rong; pwe irail pahn lekidekla.

32 Meid suwed ong me masukun kan me sohte pahn kilang; pwe irail pil pahn lekidekla.

33 Meid suwed ong me sohte sirkumsaisla ni mohngiongarail, pwe wehwehki pein diparail kan pahn kalokeirail ni imwilahn rahn.

34 Meid suwed ong aramas likamw men, pwe e pahn lekidekidihla nan ehl.

35 Meid suwed ong soun kamaramas emen me kin kemehla aramas ni pein nsene, pwe e pahn mehla.

36 Meid suwed ong irail me kin kamwahl, pwe irail pahn lekidekidihla nan ehl.

37 Ei, meid suwed ong irail akan me kin pwongih dikadik en eni kan, pwe tepil en tepil koaros kin perenikinirail.

38 Oh, ni oaralap, meid suwed ong irail kan me kin mehla nan diparail kan; pwe irail pahn pwurala rehn Koht, oh udiahl silangi, oh mihmihte nan diparail kan.

39 Oh, riei ohl kesempwal akan, tamataman uwen kamasepwehk en wiahda sapwung ong Koht Sarawio, oh pil uwen kamasepwehk en lohdieng pahn kasongosong en me keieu widingo. Tamataman, [imwilahn nsenohki] momour en sampah iei mehla, oh [imwilahn nsenohki] momour en palingehn iei mour soutuk.

40 Oh, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kumwail rong ei kaweid kan. Tamataman kalahngan lapalap en Me Sarawi en Israelo. Dehr nda me I koasoai apwal ong kumwail; pwe ma kumwail pahn wia met, kumwail pahn uhwongada me mehlelo; pwe I koasoaiahieng kumwailehr mahsen akan en amwail Sounkapikadao. I ese me mahsen mehlel kan kin apwal ong soangen samin koaros; ahpw aramas pwung kan sohte kin masak, pwe re poakohng me mehlelo oh re sohte kin rerada.

41 Oh, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kohdo rehn Kauno, Me Sarawio. Tamataman me sapwellime ahl akan me pwung. Kilang, ahl me aramas pahn keidieo me tehtikitik, ahpw inen kohwei mwowe, oh me wia silepen ewen kehlo iei Me Sarawi en Israelo; oh e sohte kin ketin kadoadoahkih ladu wasao; oh sohte ehu ahl tohrohr likin ewen kehlo; pwe sohte me kak pitiedi, pwe mware iei Kauno Koht.

42 Oh mehmen me pahn letelet, e pahn ketin ritingadahng; ah me erepit, oh me loalokonglahr, oh irail akan me kepwehpwe, me pohnmwahsohki arail loalokong, arail erepit, oh arail kepwehpwe—iei, e kin ketin kalahdikinirail; oh ma irail sohte pahn kesehla mepwukat, oh wiahkinirail aramas pweipwei kei mwohn Koht, oh ma re sohte pahn karakarahkala mehlel, e sohte pahn ketin ritingadahng irail.

43 Ahpw soahng kan me pid me erepit oh loalekeng pahn ekiekla sang irail kohkohlate—iei, pereno me kaunopdahngehr souleng kan.

44 Oh, riei ohl kesempwal kan, [kumwail] tamataman ei kaweid kan. Kilang, I pahn kapwuhrasang ei likou, oh siped mwohmwail; I kapakapkihong Koht me ketin wia komourpei, me ketin kasawih ie ni eh kin mahsanih ie; eri, kumwail pahn ese ni imwilahn rahno, ni ahnsou me aramas koaruhsie pahn pakadeingki arail wiewia kan, pwe Koht en Israel en ketin kadehde me I sipedasangehr dipamwail kan sang ei mour, oh I ahpw kesihnenda mwowe ni mwakelekel, oh I sohte pahn pwukoahki ntahmwail.

45 Oh, riei ohl kesemwpwal akan, [kumwail] sohpeisang dipamwail akan; kamweidpeseng nein [tepil] selmete me pahn mwadang salihkumwaildi; kohdo rehn Koht me iei paipalap en komourpamwail.

46 Kaunopada amwail mour kan ong rahn lingano ni ahnsou me pwuhng pahrek pahn wiawihong irail me pwung kan, me iei rahn en kadeiko, pwe kumwail en dehrroikikipene amwail masakapwehkda mehlel; pwe kumwail en dehr tamataman dipamwail kan, oh itoitieng en wehkada [oh koasoia]: [Komwi me] sarawi, sapwellimomwi kadeik me sarawi, Maing Kaun Koht Wasa Lapalap—ahpw I ese ei sapwung kan; I kasapwungelahr sapwellimomwi kosonned, oh I en pein pwukoahki ei sapwung kan; oh tepilo kaleweiedier, pwe I lohdiengehr pahn ah kalokolok mwuledek.

47 Ahpw kilang, riei ohl oko, e kesempwal I en kasalehiong kumwail duwen soahng kamasepwehk kan me uhdahn pahn wiawi? Ia duwe I anahne kamwakidkumwailda ma amwail madamadau kan mwakelekel? Ia duwe I anahne lokaia sansal ong kumwail ni duwen padahk mehlel kan ma sohte dipamwail?

48 Kilang, ma kumwail aramas sarawi kei I pahn koasoaiahieng kumwail duwensarawi; ahpw pwehki amwail sohte sarawi, oh kumwail kin wiahkinie amwail sounpadahk men, e konehng I en padahkihong kumwail duwen pwukoahkihdi dihp.

49 Kilang, ei mour kin sautiki dihp, oh mohngiongi kin pereniki soahng pwung kan; oh I pahn kepinga mwar sarawi en ei Koht.

50 Kohdo, riei ohl oko, kumwail koaros me men nimpil, kumwail kohdo ni wasahn nimpihlo; oh kumwail me sohte noumwail mwohni, kohdo pwain oh mwenge; mehlel, kohdo pwain wain oh melik me sohte anahne mwohni oh sohte pweipwei.

51 Eri, kumwail dehr netiki mwahl noumwail mwohni kan ong me sohte katepe, de koadoahke mehkot me sohte pahn kaitarahla amwail anahn. Nantihong rong ie mwahu, oh tamataman mahsen kan me I koasoaiahier; oh kohdo rehn Me Sarawi en Israelo, oh kamadipwki soahng me sohte kak mehla, de pil [sohte] kak ohla, oh mweidehng amwail mour en nsenamwahukihla amwail mworouroula.

52 Kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, [kumwail] tamataman mahsen akan en amwail Koht; [kumwail] kapakap ong ih ahnsou koaros nirahn, oh kaping kalahngankihong mware sarawio nihpwong. Mweidehng amwail mohngiong kan en pereperen.

53 Oh kilang uwen kaselel en sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, oh uwen kaselel en eh ketikihdi pein ih rehn aramas akan; oh pwehki sapwellime manaman, oh sapwellime kalahngan oh mahk, e ketin inoukihong kitail me kadaudoketail kan sohte uhdahn pahn kamakamala, nin duwen paliwar, ahpw e pahn doareirailla; oh irail pahn wiahla ehu rah me pwung en peneinei en Israel nan dih en mwuhr akan.

54 Oh met, riei ohl oko, I men padahkihong kumwail laudsang mepwukat; ahpw lakapw me I pahn kanekehla luhwen ei kaweid ong kumwail. Ahmen.
2-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop kawehwehda me mehn Suhs akan pahn kalohpwuala arail Koht—Irail pahn kamweremwerpeseng lao irail tepda kamehlele Ih—Amerika pahn wia sahpw en saledek wasa me sohte nahnmwarki pahn kaunda—Kumwail en ehuong Koht oh komourla sang ni sapwellime Kalahngan. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Seikop, pwurehng koasoaieng kumwail, riei ohl kesempwal oko, duwen rah pwung wet me I koasoaiadahr.

2 Pwe kilang, inou kan me kitail alehdier iei inou kei ong kitail nan mour wet; eri, nin duwen dahme I kilangehr me kidelepen neitail seri pahn mehla pwehki arail sohpwoson, ahpw, Koht pahn ketin kupwurehla me ngeder; oh neitail seri kan pahn kopwurupwurodo, pwe irail en kak alehdi dahme pahn kamarainiekin irail duwen mehlel en arail Soundoaro.

3 Eri, ni duwen ei koasoaiahieng kumwail, e kesempwal me Krais—pwe tohnlengo padahkihong ie pwohng me met iei pahn mware—[e] pahn ketido rehn mehn Suhs akan, rehn irail akan me inenen suwed nan sampah; oh irail pahn kalohpwuala ih—pwe iei me konehng atail Koht [pahn kalohpwuala], oh sohte ehu wehi nan sampah me pahn kak kalohpwuala arail Koht.

4 Pwe ma manaman kapwuriamwei kan pahn wiawihong wehi teikan re pahn koluhla, oh ese me ih iei arail Koht.

5 Ahpw pwehki prihskrap kan oh wiewia suwed kan, irail akan nan Serusalem pahn uhwong ih, pwe en kalohpwuhla.

6 Eri, pwehki arail wiewia suwed akan, kamwomwomwala kan, lehk kan, soumwahu lusulus kan, oh mahwin pahn wiawihong irail; oh irail akan me sohte pahn kamakamala pahn kamweremwerpeseng nan wehi kan koaros.

7 Ahpw kilang, Kauno Koht mahsanih: Ni ahnsou me rahno pahn leledo me irail pahn kamehlele ie, me ngehi iei Krais, eri inou me I wiahiongehr arail pahpa kahlap oko pahn pweida nan mour wet, pohn sampah, pwe irail en [alehdi] sapwerail sahpw en sohso.

8 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pahn kopwurupwurpene sang nan [wehi kan] me irail soulahngehr ie, sang pohn dekehn nan sehd akan, oh sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah; oh Kauno mahsanih me wehin Mehn Liki kan pahn linganla mwohn silangi ni arail pahn kapwureirailahng nan sapwerail sahpw en sohso.

9 Mehlel, nahnmwarki en Mehn Liki kan pahn kin apwalih irail duwehte pahpa men, oh arail lih nahnmwarki kan pahn apwalih irail duwehte nohno men; eri, inoun Kauno kan ong Mehn Liki kan inenen kesempwal, pwe ih me ketin mahsanih, oh ihs me kak uhwong?

10 Ahpw kilang, Koht mahsanih, sahpwet pahn wia ehu sapwemwail sahpw en sohso, oh Mehn Liki kan uhdahn pahn ale kupwuramwahu pohn sahpwet.

11 Oh sahpwet pahn wia sahpw en saledek ong Mehn Liki kan, oh sohte nahnmwarki men pohn sahpwet, me pahn kaunda Mehn Liki kan.

12 Oh I pahn kakehlahda sahpwet pwehn doarehsang wehi teikan.

13 Oh Koht mahsanih, mehmen me pahn mahwinieng Saion pahn kamwomwomwla.

14 Pwe mehmen me pahn kasapwilada emen nahnmwarki pwehn pelian ie pahn kamala, pwe ngehi, Kauno, nahnmwarki en nanleng, me pahn wia arail nahnmwarki, oh I pahn wia kamarainpen irail akan me kin rong ei mahsen kan kohkohlahte.

15 Eri, iei kahrepe wet, me pahn kaunsakala ei inou kan me I inoukihongehr aramas akan, me I pahn wiahiong irail nan mour wet. I pahn kawehla doahk en rotorot rir kan, oh kamaramas, oh wiewia suwed kan.

16 Eri, irail me pahn mahwinieng Saion, koaros mehn Suhs oh Mehn Liki, koaros me sensel oh me kalidu, koaros ohl oh lih, pahn kamwomwomwala; pwe iei irail me rasohng lih en netin paliwar en sampah pwon; pwe atail Koht ketin mahsanih me irail me sohte kin uhpalihkinie kin pelian ie.

17 Pwe I pahn kaunsakala ei inou kan me I inoukihohngehr aramas akan, me I pahn kapwaiong irail nan mour wet—

18 Eri, riei ohl kesempwal oko, atail Koht ketin mahsanih: I pahn kaloke kadaudokemwail akan sang ni ei pahn doadoahngki Mehn Liki kan; ahpw, I pahn kamwuterekehla ahn Mehn Liki mohngiong kan, pwe irail en kak duwehla pahpa men ong irail; eri, Mehn Liki kan pahn ale kupwur mwahu oh iang wadawadieng nan peneinei en Israel.

19 Eri, I pahn kasarawiala sahpwet ong kadaudokemwail kan, oh ong irail me pahn iang patehng wadawadieng kadaudokemwail kan nan sahpw en arail sohso kohkohlahte; pwe Koht mahsanihong ie me sahpwet iei sahpw me keniken sang sahpw koaruhsie, eri Koht mahsanih, I men aramas koaros me pahn kousoanla [nan sahpwo] en pwongih ie.

20 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal oko, [kumwail] esehier me atail Koht kalahngano ketikihongkitailehr kamarain en soahng kopwuriamwei pwukat, kitail tamataman ih, oh pwilikihdi dipatail kan, oh dehr nsensuwed, pwe kitail sohte lekidekla; mendahte, atail pokous sang nan sapwetail sahpw en inouo; ahpw kitail kahluhlahngehr sahpw mwahu, pwe Kauno ketin kaunopadahr eletail nansed, oh kitail mihmiher pohn dehkehn nansed.

21 Ahpw mehd kapwuriamwei sapwellimen Kauno inou kan ong irail akan me mihmi pohn deke kan; eri pwehki eh mahsanih deke kan, uhdahn mie [deke] me tohtohsang met, oh riatail teikan pil wie koukousoan wasa ko.

22 Pwe kilang, Kauno Koht kin ketin kahluwahsang peneinei en Israel kan ekei ahnsou, nin duwen kupwure oh sapwellime koasondi. Oh met kilang, Kauno ketin tamataman irail koaruhsie me tipwsangehr, eri e pil ketin tamataman kitail.

23 Eri, mohngiongimwail kan en perenda, oh tamataman me kumwail ahneki saledek en pein pilada nsenemwail—en pilada ahl en mehla poatopoat de ahl en mour soutuk.

24 Eri, riei ohl kesempwal oko, kumwail kompoakepahki kupwur en Koht, a kaidehn ong nsenen tepilo oh paliwar; oh tamataman, mwurin amwail kompoakepahki Koht, [kumwail en ese] me ihte sang ni kalahngan en Koht me kumwail kak komourla.

25 Eri, sang ni manaman en iasadao, Koht en ketin kaiasada kumwail sang mehla, oh sang ni manaman en tomwo, en pil ketin komourkumwailla sang mehla poatopoat, pwe kumwail en kak pidelong nan wehi soutuk en Koht, pwe kumwail en kak kapingkihong ih sapwellime kalahngan sarawi. Ahmen.
2-ne 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop kilangada ah Soundoar—Kosonned en Moseso kasalehda duwen Krais oh kadehdehda me E pahn ketido. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, Seikop padahkihong nei aramas akan soahng tohto ni ahnsouo; ahpw ihte mepwukat me I koasoanedi me pahn ntingdi, pwe I itariki soahng kan me I ntingihdier.

2 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, ntingihdi pil ekei ahn Aiseia koasoai kan, pwe loaleiet uhdahn pereniki ah koasoai kan. Pwe I pahn karasahiong ah koasoai kan nei aramas akan, oh I pahn kadaralahng rehn nei seri kan koaruhsie, pwe e kilangehr ei Soundoaro, duwehte ei kilangehr ih.

3 Oh riei pwutak, Seikop, pil kilangehr Soundoaro duwehte ei kilangehr ih; eri, I pahn kadarala rehn nei seri kan ara koasoai kan pwe en kadehdehiong irail me ei koasoai kan mehlel. Eri, sang ni kadehde kan en [aramas] silimen, Koht ketin mahsanih, ei mahsan kan pahn pweida. Ahpw, Koht kin ketin kadarodohr soun kadehde tohto, oh e kin ketin kadehdehda sapwellime mahsen koaros.

4 Kilang, loaleiet kin pereniki kadehdehiong nei aramas akan duwen mehlel en ketidohn Krais; pwehki, kahrepe wet me kosonned en Moses wiawihkihda; oh soahng koaros me Koht ketikihongehr aramas sangete ni tepin sampah, kin kasalehda duwen ih.

5 Oh loaleiet pil kin perenikihda sapwellimen Kauno inou kan me e ketin wiahongehr atail pahpa kahlap oko; mehlel, loaleiet kin perenikihda sapwellime kalahngan, oh nan sapwellime pwuhng pahrek, oh manaman, oh mahk [me mih] nan koasoandi soutuk oh kesempwal en powehdi mehla.

6 Oh loaleiet pereniki kadehdehiong nei aramas akan me ma Krais sohte pahn ketido, aramas koaros uhdahn pahn mehla.

7 Pwe ma sohte Krais sohte Koht; oh ma sohte Koht sohte kitail, pwe kepikipikda sohte pahn wiawi. Ahpw mie Koht men, oh ih iei Krais, oh e pahn ketido ni unseklahn pein sapwellime ahnsou.

8 Oh met I pahn ntingihdi ekei ahn Aiseia koasoai kan, pwe nei aramas akan me pahn kilang mahsen pwukat en perenda kouahlap oh nsenamwahu pwehki aramas akan koaros. Oh met iei mahsen akan, oh kumwail en karasahiong irail kumwail oh aramas koaros.
2-ne 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aiseia kilangehr tehnpas sarawi en imwin rahn akan, kopwurupwurpene en mehn Israel, oh kopwung oh popohl en nan milenia—Me pohnmwahso oh suwed kan pahn karakarahkala ni Ketdo Keriauo—Karasahiong Aiseia 2. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Mahseno me Aiseia, nein Amoz, kilangada me pid Suda oh Serusalem:

2 Oh nan keimwseklahn rahn akan me pahn kohdo, ni ahnsou me sapwellimen Kauno tehnpas [sarawio] pahn kokouda pohn nahna kan, oh pahn ilehsang dohl akan, oh wehi koaros pahn kin pokondohng ie.

3 Oh aramas tohto pahn kohla oh nda, Kumwail kohdo, oh kitail kohdahla pohn nahna en Kauno, ong ni tehnpas en Koht en Seikop; oh e pahn ketin mahsaniheng kitail sapwellime koasoandi kan, oh kitail pahn keid nan sapwellime ahl akan; pwe kosonnedo pahn kohsang Saion, oh sapwellimen Kauno mahsen sang Serusalem.

4 Oh e pahn ketin kopwung wehi kan, oh ketin angiangih aramas tohto: oh irail pahn wekidohng mehn deipwel neirail kedilahs akan, oh neirail ketieu kan ong naipokos—sohte ehu wehi pahn pelianda ehu wehi, oh re sohlahr pahn kaunop ong mahwin.

5 Kumwail kadaudoken Seikop kan, kumwail kohdo oh kitail keid nan marain en Kauno; ei, kumwail kohdo, kumwail koaruhsie me salongalahr nan amwail wiewia suwed akan.

6 Eri, Maing Kaun, komw ketin likidmelielahr sapwellimwomwi aramas akan, kadaudoken Seikop kan, pwehki re audaudkilahr koasoandi en mehn palimese kan, oh idawehnlahr soun kosetipw kan duwehte mehn Pilisdia kan, oh irail kin perenki wiewia tiahk en aramas en liki kan.

7 Sapwerailo pil direkilahr silper oh kohl, oh sohte me kak wadekada uwen tohtohn arail dipwisou kesempwal akan; sapwerailo pil direkihla oahs, oh wararail werennansapw en mahwin kan pil tohto mehlel.

8 Sapwarailo pil direkihla dikadik en eni kan; irail kin pwongih mehkan me pein perail kin wiahda, me pein sendinpehrail kan wiahda.

9 Oh aramas lemei men sohte kin kanengamah, oh aramas lapalap men sohte kin karakarahkala, eri, komw dehr mahkohng irail.

10 Kumwail me suwed kan, kumwail pidolong nan pwoahr en paip akan, oh kumwail rukula nan pwehl, pwe lemwiki Kauno ohlingan en sapwellime roson lapalap pahn kalokeikumwail.

11 Oh ehu rahn pahn leledo me aklapalap en aramas pahn imwisekla, oh pohnmwahso en aramas pahn sohrala, oh Kauno kelehpw me pahn ketin lapalapala ni rahno.

12 Pwe rahn en Kauno Wasa Lapalap kerendohongehr wehi koaros, ei, wehi koaros; ei, me pohnmwahso oh aklapalap, oh aramas koaros me lapalap pahn tikitkla.

13 Ei, oh rahn en Kauno pahn leledohong pohn tuhke sidar koaros en Lepanon, me reireilahr oh lapalalahr; oh pohn tuhke ohk koaros en Pasan;

14 Oh pohn nahna ileile koaros, oh pohn kisin dohl akan, oh pohn wehi kan koaros me aklapalapalahr, oh pohn aramas koaros;

15 Oh pohn wasahn doulik ile koaros, oh kehl en mahwin koaros;

16 Oh pohn sohp koaros en nansed, oh pohn sohp koaros en Darsis, oh pohn wasa lingan koaros.

17 Oh aklapalap en aramas pahn imwisekla, oh pohnmwahsohn aramas pahn sohrala; oh Kauno kelehpw me pahn ketin lapalapala ni rahno.

18 Oh dikadik en eni kan e pahn ketin kasohrehla douluhl.

19 Oh irail pahn rukula nan pwoahr akan nan takai kan, oh nan pwoahr en paip akan en sampah, pwehki [arail] lemwiki Kauno pahn kipeiraildi oh lingan en sapwellime roson lapalap pahn ketin kaloke irail, ni ahnsou me e pahn ketido oh itikada sampah.

20 Ni rahno aramas emen pahn kesehla ah dikadik en eni silper, oh ah dikadik en eni kohl, me e pein wiahda pwe en pwongih, [re pahn keselahng] pwehk oh kelumwud kan;

21 [Oh re pahn] duwallong nan pwoahr en takai kan, oh nan paip pohn dohl takai kan, pwehki lemw en Kauno eh pahn kipeiraildi oh sapwellime lingan lapalap pahn kalokeirail, ni ahnsou me e pahn ketido oh itikada sampah.

22 Dehr [koapworopworki] aramas, me kin mourki ar esingek; pwe dahme re kak wia?
2-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Suda oh Serusalem pahn kalokolok pwehki ara sapeik—Kauno pahn ketin peki mahngki oh tenekih Sapwellime aramas akan—Serepein en Saion kan pahn riahkihla oh lokolongki arail mwekid en sampah—Tehk Aiseia 3. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe kilang, Kauno, Kaun Wasalapalap, pahn ketkihsang Serusalem, oh Suda, mehn komouro oh tungoal en komouro, iei pilawahn tungoalo pwon, oh pihl en komouro pwon—

2 Aramas kehlail kan, oh sounpei kan, arail sounkopwung kan, oh soukohp akan, oh me loalokong kan, oh neirail aramas mah kan;

3 Arail kaun en [sounpei kan], oh kaun en aramas akan, oh sounsawas akan, oh aramas semen nan doadoahk en peh, oh aramas kadek koasoai kan.

4 Oh I pahn kasapwilda serihkan en wiahla arail nanmwarki oh kaun irailda.

5 Oh aramas akan pahn lokolok, emen emente widiwinge emen; serio pahn aklapalapiong me mahu, oh aramas mwahl akan pahn uhwong arail kaun akan.

6 Ahnsou me ohl emen pahn pekihda rehn emen rie ohl sang nan peneinei en ah pahpa, oh ndaiong: Kowe me mie ahmw likou, wiahla aht kaun, oh dehr mweidehng kahpwal wet en lellohng kitail—

7 Ni rahno e pahn kahmahmki oh ndinda: I sohte kak wia sounkamwahuiala; pwe nan imweio sohte pilawa de likou; dehr piliehda I en kaunda aramas akan.

8 Pwe Serusalem olahr, oh Suda pwupwidier, pwehki lewarail kan oh arail wiewia kan kin uhwong Kauno, me pahn kahrehda silangi engiengda.

9 Pohn masarail akan pahn kadehdehda oh kasalehda diperail akan duwehte mehn Sodom, oh irail sohte kak ekihla. Meid suwed ong arail mour, pwehki irail me pein kahrehiong irail nan apwal wet.

10 Padahkihong aramas pwung kan me irail mwahu; pwe irail pahn iang tungoale wahn arail wiewiah kan.

11 Meid suwed ong me suwed akan, pwe irail pahn mehla; pwe wahn arail doadoahk pahn pwurehng irail!

12 Oh nei aramas akan, serihkan me kin kalokei kumwail, oh lih akan me kin kaun kumwailda. Kumwail nei aramas oko, amwail kaun akan me kin kaweid kumwail me kahrehda amwail sapwungala oh kawehla wasa me kumwail pahn weidie.

13 Kauno ketin kaunopadahr pwe en peki mahngki aramas akan oh tenekih irail.

14 Kauno pahn kadeik sapwellime aramas en mahs oko oh arail kaun akan; pwe irail kangalahr nan imwarail akan kenen me semwehmwe kan mwengeh kan oh wahn tuhkeh kan.

15 Kauno Koht Wasalapalap mahsanih, Ia wewehn amwail wia met? Kumwail kin kaloke nei aramas akan, oh widwidinge me semwehmweh kan.

16 Kauno pil ketin kapatahiong mahsanih: Pwehki serepein en Saion kan arail aklapalap, oh kin alu mas ile oh mesen wanded, kakahk tikitik kohwei, oh ngilen luhwou kin sekesek ni nehrail kan kohwwei—

17 Eri Kauno pahn ketin kalokehki medek ehu nan moangen serepein en Saion kan, oh Kauno pahn ketin kapwarahda wasa me rir ni paliwararail kan.

18 Ni rahno Kauno pahn ketkihsang arail kapwat me kin sekesek kan, oh kapwat en pohn moangerail kan, oh kapwat en tepinwarerail akan me duwehte maram pwul;

19 Kapwat sein kan oh luhwou kan, oh koaduhpwel kan;

20 Mehn kidim moangerail akan, oh kapwat en neirail akan, oh moangerail akan, oh lehnwai kan, oh tiatihn salengerail akan;

21 Rihng kan, oh kapwat en tumwerail akan;

22 Likou en wiliali kaselel kan, oh likouli kan, oh likou puhp kan, oh mehn kateng moang; kan;

23 Klahs en irongin kan, oh likoun liki kaselel kan, oh angkasi kan, oh koaduhpwel menipinip kan.

24 Oh ahnsouo pahn leledo, [re pahn] pwohsuwedla oh sohla kapwohtik; oh [arail] likou pahn tei oh sohte kateng; oh [irail] pahn moangamadala; oh likou deipin me re pahn perehki mwaremwarerail akan; [arail] lingan pahn wekidekiong mehkot kamedek.

25 Noumwail ohl akan me keieu kehlail pahn kamakamala nan mahwen.

26 Oh ewen kelen kahnihmwo pahn mwahiei oh sengiseng; oh e pahn sohla towe, oh duwehte lih emen mwomwohd pohn pwehl.
2-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Saion oh nah serepein kan pahn komourla oh mwakelekelda in rahn en meleniao—Tehk Aiseia 4. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh ni rahno, lih isimen pahn koledi emen ohl oh indinda: Se pahn pein tungoale kanat pilawa, oh likawih pein aht likou; ihte komw menlau mweidehng kiht sen iang adaniki edemwen pwe sen dehr namekla.

2 Ni rahno sapwellimen Kauno rah pahn kaselel oh lingan; wahn sampah [pahn] kaselel oh mwahuong irail mehn Israel me pitilahkan.

3 Oh ahnsou pahn leledo, irail akan me pahn mihmi nan Saion oh mihmi nan Serusalem pahn adankihla [aramas] sarawi, koaros me ntingdi momour nan Serusalem—

4 Ahnsou me Kauno pahn ketin widensang samin en serepein en Saion, oh kamwakelehda ntahn nan werengen Serusalem sang ni tenek en ngehno oh sang ni isihs en ngehno.

5 Oh Kauno pahn ketin wiahda depwek oh ediniei ni rahn oh marain en kisiniei ni soutik pohn wasahn kousoan koaros ni nahnahn Saion; pwe e pahn mie perehre pohn mehkoaros me lingan nan Saion.

6 Oh e pahn mie wasahn komoal me mwete me pahn perehsang karakar en ni rahn, oh wia wasahn komoal, oh wasahn ruksang melimel oh kotou.
2-ne 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sapwellimen Kauno mwetin waino (Israel) pahn sohla kanenge, oh Sapwellime aramas akan pahn mwerpeseng—Meid suwed pahn lelehng irail nan arail pahn salongala oh mwerpeseng—Kauno pahn kalahngahda kilel ehu oh kapwurepene Israel—Tehk Aiseia 5. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh ngehi ahpw pahn koulkiheng me I kin poakpoakeu apwoat koul duwen ih, me pid sapwellime mweten waino. Maing komwi me I kin poakohng me sapwellimanki mwetin wain ehu pohn dohl pwelmwahu ehu.

2 Oh e ketin kelehda, oh akerasang takai kan loale, oh ahpw padokedieng loale tuhkehng wain me keieu kaselel, oh pil kauwada wasahn doulik ehu nanwerengeo; oh pil wiahda wasahn tiak kreip kan; e ahpw kin kasikasik kreip kaselel kan sang tuhkehn wain kan, ahpw e wah kreip katik kei.

3 Oh met, kumwail mehn Serusalem, oh ohl en Suda kan, kumwail menlau tehk mwahu nan pwungen ngehi oh ei mwetin waino.

4 Dahme anahnepen wiawihong nan mwetin waino me I sohte wia loale? Eri, ahnsou me I kasikasik en wah kreip e ahpw wahda kreip katik kan.

5 Oh met kumwail kohla; I pahn ndaiong kumwail dahme kumwail pahn wia nan ei mwetin waino—I pahn kihsang kelepe, oh e pahn mwongehla; oh I pahn kawehla kehl kan, oh e pahn tiatipeseng;

6 Oh I pahn kawehla; e pahn kin mwetida de uhpwel; ahpw dihpw suwed oh tekatek kan me osada; I pahn pil koasonehdi depweng kan en dehr kamwerehdi kotou powe.

7 Israel iei sapwellimen Kauno Wasalapalap mwetin waino, oh ohl en Suda kan [iei] sapwellime tuhkeh ko.

8 Meid suwed ong kumwail me kin alialehda ihmw kan oh [sahpw tohto], lao sohla wasahn ehn ekei arail kousoan!

9 I rongehr, Kauno Wasalapalap mahsanih, ni mehlel tohto ihmw pwukat pahn tehnla, oh kahnihmw lap oh kaselel kan pahn sohla kanenge.

10 Ei, mwetin wain en sahpw eiker eisek pahn wiahda ehu pad [de uwen kalon en wain limau elep], oh ehu ohmer en weren tuhke [de kapakap en weren tuhke eisek riau elep] pahn wiada ehu epah [de eisek kis ehu en ohmer].

11 Meid suwed ong irail me kin pirida nimenseng, pwe irail en nim sakau, lao lel nihpwong, oh irail parikihla sakau!

12 Oh nan arail kamadipw kan irail kin kemwekemweitki keseng arp, oh paiol, damporin, oh kesen pepeuk, oh niminim wain; ahpw re sohte kin kilang doadoahk en Kauno, de pohnese doadoahngkan me e ketin wiadahr.

13 Eri, nei aramas akan samwalahr nan kaludu, pwehki arail sohte kak wehwehki; oh arail kaun akan duhpeklahr, oh neirail aramas akan lokolongki ar men nimpildahr.

14 Eri, ehl kalaudelahr pein ih, oh sarapesengehr; oh arail lingan, oh neirail aramas akan, arail pweidah kan, oh me pahn perenda, pahn kohdihla loale.

15 Oh ohl lemeio pahn dairukedi, oh ohl kehlailo pahn karakarahkala, oh me aklapalap akan pahn aktikitikla.

16 Ahpw Kauno Wasa Lapalap pahn ketin lapalapala nan mwoale, oh Koht me sarawi pahn ketin sarawikihla wiewia pwung kan.

17 Sihmpwul kan ahpw pahn mwonge ni wiepen arail kin mwonge, oh mehn liki kan pahn monge wasa me mworourou kan kin mwonge ie.

18 Meid suwed ong irail akan me kin urahdekehki arail wiewia suwed akan sahl soh katepe, oh dihp akan rasohng wawaingki sahl kirima ehu.

19 Me pahn nda: mweideng en ketin karuwaruhdo, en ketin mwadangodohng sapwellime doadoahk, pwe kitail en kak kilang; oh mweidehng sapwellimen Me Sarawi en Israelo kaweid en kohdo, pwe kitail en esehla.

20 Meid suwed ong irail akan me kin kahdaniki suwed me mwahu, oh mwahu me suwed, me kin wekidohng rotorot ni marain, oh marain ong ni rotorot, me kin wekidala mehkot katik ong me mem oh mem ong me katik!

21 Meid suwed ong irail akan me kin kosekose me irail loalokong oh koahiek!

22 Meid suwed ong irail akan me kin kehlail en nim wain [de sakau], oh ohl kehlail kan me kin doaloapene sakau kehlail kan;

23 Me kin pilada me suwedo pwe en ale kisakis, oh soikala ehn me pwungo eh wiewia pwung!

24 Eri, duwehte kisiniei eh pahn isikada ahlek, de isikala dipenihd, iei duwen kalewemwail akan e pahn mwoasoahngotala, oh amwail mpwek pahn kohda rasohng pwelpar; pwehki arail keselahr spawellimen Kauno Wasa Lapalap kosonned akan, oh soikalahr sapwellimen Me Sarawi en Israelo mahseno.

25 Eri, Kauno ahpw pahn engiengda pahn sapwellime aramas akan, oh e kitin kapalahng irail lime kan, oh ketin kaloke irail; dohl akan pahn rerer, oh paliweren me melahr akan pahn mwerpeseng nan wereng ahl akan. Mendahte soahng pwukat wiawi sapwellime engiengo sohte pahn tokedi, ahpw e pahn kapahweite limeo.
