26 Oh e pahn ketin langahda kilel ehu ong wehi doh kan, oh e pahn malipehkinirail kepitie pwe irail en kohdo sang keimw en sampah; oh kilang, irail pahn mwadangete kohdo; sohte emen rehrail pahn pwangada de dipekelekel.

27 Sohte me pahn sohla kehn wasa de meirla; sohte me arail katin pahn mwer, de sahl en arail suht ohla;

28 Me neirail arep kan pahn keng, oh neirail kesik ketieu kan koaros onopadahr en kesik, oh pahn nehn neirail oahs akan kehlail duwehte takai plint, oh neirail daiahkan pahn [marahra] duwehte kisinieng kehlail, ngilarail pahn duwehte ngilen laion.

29 Irail pahn ngiringir duwehte laion pwulopwul men; mehlel, irail pahn ngiringir, oh kalowehdi kenerail mahn, oh wahlahng wasa me sohte me kak kihsang.

30 Oh ni rahno irail pahn ngiringiriong irail duwehte ngilen nan madau; oh ma irail pahn kilenglahng nan sahpwo, kilang, irail pahn kilangada rotorot oh pahtou, oh marain en nanleng pahn rotorotala.
2-ne 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aiseia kilangada Kauno—[Kauno] mahkohng dipen Aiseia kan—E malipilipda pwe en wia kokohp—E kohpada mehn Suhs akan arail pahn soikala sapwellimen Krais padahk kan—Ekei pahn pwurodo—Tehk Aiseia 6. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ni sounpar me nahnmwarki Usaia pwoula, I kilangada Kauno ketket nan mwoahl ileile, oh sapwellime likou reireidihla nan tehnpas sarawio.

2 Serepim kei kapkapil mwoahlo; emenemen irail ahneki pehnpihr weneu; riau mehn perehla masarail kan, oh riau mehn perehla nehrail kan, oh riau arail mehn pihr.

3 Oh emen kin werkihlahng emen, oh ndinda: Sarawi, sarawi, sarawi, Kauno Wasalapalap; sampah pwon direkilahr sapwellime lingan.

4 Oh dihd en wenihmwo kin itikek pwehki arail kin wie weriwerki, oh tehnpaso direkihla ediniei.

5 I ahpw patohwan: Meid suwed pahn lel ong ie! pwe I pahn mehla; pwehki eweiet ewen aramas samin; oh I kin mihmi nanpwungen aramas au samin; pwe meseiet kilangadahr Nahnmwarkio, Kauno Wasalapalap.

6 Eri emen serepim ko pihrdo rehi, wa mwoalis ingkingken ehu, me e tihpwiada sang pohn pei sarawio;

7 Oh e kihieng ni eweiet, oh patohwan: Kilang, met sairehr keilen ewemwen; oh ahmw wiewia suwed kan kohsanguhkehr, oh dipom kan kamwakelsangehr.

8 I pil rongada kepitien Kauno, mahsanih: Ihs me I pahn kadarala, oh ihs me pahn wiliankitailla? Ngehi eri nda: Iet ngehi; komw ketin poaroneiehla.

9 Oh e mahsanih: Patohla oh kairehki aramas pwukat—Kumwail rong mwahu, ahpw re sohte pahn wehwehki; oh kumwail kilang mwahu, ahpw re soht pahn kak kasawihada.

10 Kamworourouihala mohngiong en aramas pwukat, oh katoutouihla salengarail kan, oh perehla meserail kan—pwe irail de kilangki mesarail kan, oh rongki salengarail kan, oh wehwehki nan mohngiongarail kan, oh weliakapwala oh mwahula.

11 Ngehi eri patohwan: Maing Kaun, ia uwen werei? E ahpw mahsanih: Lao kahnihmw kan ohla oh sohla kanenge, oh sohla aramas nan ihmw akan, oh sahpwo pwon wiahla sapwtehn;

12 Oh Kauno pahn ketin kadohwanwei aramas akan, pwe nan sahpwo pwon e pahn sohla kanenge.

13 Ahpw e pahn mie eisek kis ehu [en aramas] pahn pwurodo, oh re pahn mwongehla, duwehte tuhke deil ehu, oh duwehte tuhke ohk ehu me momour oh teh kapw akan kin masalpeseng; kadaudok sarawio pahn rasohng [tuhke] momouro.
2-ne 17:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ipram oh Siria mahwiniong Suda—Meipwon men pahn kaipwidi Krais—Tehk Aiseia 7. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan mwein nahnmwarki en Suda, Ahas nein Sodam, nein Usaia. [Nan mwehio] Resin, nahnmwarki en Siria, oh Peka nein Remalaia, nahnwarki en Israel, kohdahla Serusalem pwe re en mahwiniong, ahpw re sohte kak kalowehdi.

2 Oh rohng ehu lelohng kadaudoken Depito, me ketihtihki: Siria ehuongehr Ipram. Ih oh sapwellime aramasoko ahpw salohkihda, duhwehte tuhkekan ahr kin mwekid nan kisinieng.

3 Kauno eri mahsanihong Aiseia: Kowe oh noumw pwutak Searsasup kohwei oh tuhwong Ahas, [kumwa pahn tuhwong] ni imwin warawar me uhdihdohsang ni lehn powe nan ahl en sounwia likou kan.

4 Oh ndaiong ih: Mwasamwasahn, oh meleilei; dehr masak, de nan kapehd tikitikla pwehki engieng en Resin iangahki Siria, oh nein Remalaia pwutakrasohng imwin mehn ser riapwoat me ediniei laud.

5 Pwehki Siria, Ipram, oh nein Remalaia pwutak, wiadahr inou suwed ehu en pelian uhk, [re] koasoakoasoia:

6 Kitail kohdahla pelianda Suda oh kawehla, oh kitail kaloweiraildi, oh koasonehdi emen nahnmwarki rehrail, iei, nein Tapeel pwutako.

7 Kauno Koht mahsanih: E sohte pahn pweida, de pil wiawi.

8 Pwe Damaskus me moangmoange Siria, oh Resin me moangmonage Damaskus; oh mwurin sounpar weneisek limau Ipram pahn mwomwala oh sohla aramas.

9 Oh Sameria me moangmoange Ipram, oh nein Remalaia pwutak me moangmonage Sameria. Ma kumwail sohte pahn kamehlele a kumwail udahn pahn sohte soandi.

10 Kauno ahpw pwurehng mahsanihong Ahas, ketihtihki:

11 Peki kilel ehu sang rehn Kauno ahmw Koht; peki mehnda ma e loal, de ileilehda powe.

12 Ahpw Ahas patohwan: I sohte pahn peki, de pil song Kauno.

13 Oh e patohwan: Kumwail rong mahs, kumwail kadaudoken Depit kan; kumwail sohte itarki amwail kapwangahdahr aramas, ahpw kumwail pil men kapwangahda ei Koht?

14 Eri, pein Kauno pahn kasalehiong kumwail kilel ehu—Kilang, meipwon men pahn liseianda, oh naitikihada pwutak emen, oh e pahn kiheng mware Emanuel.

15 Pwete oh sukehn longalap me e pahn kin sakan, pwe en kak soikala me suwed oh pilada me mwahu.

16 Pwe mwohn seri menet e pahn esehla soikala me suwed oh pilada me mwahu, nahnmwarki en sahpw me kumwail kin kailongki pahn tehnla.

17 Kauno pahn ketkihdo pohmw, oh pohn noumw aramas akan, oh pohn peneinei en ahmw pahpao, rahn [apwal] kei me sohte kin pwarada ni ahnsou me Ipram tohrohrsang Judah, nahnmwarki en Asiria.

18 Oh ni rahno e pahn lelledo me Kauno pahn ketin malipehdo loahng me mih wasa doh kan koaros nan Isip, oh loahngalap en nan sahpw en Asiria.

19 Oh irail pahn kohdo, oh koaros irail pahn koamoaldi nan wahu tehnla kan, oh nan pwoar en paip kan, oh pohn [tuhke] tekatek kan, oh pohn tuhke kan.

20 Ni rahnohte Kauno pahn ketin [doadoahngki] sounseisei men, me sang irail me kin mih palio pilapo, limwahn nahnmwarki en Asiria, en koakoahsang pitenmoangerail kan, oh wunen nehrail kan; oh e pahn pil kihsang alis kan.

21 Oh ni rahno, aramas emen pahn apwalih kou pwul men oh sihpw riemen;

22 Oh ni ahnsouo, e pahn sakan pwete pwehki diren milik me re pahn kihong; pwehki koaros me luhwehdi nan sahpwo pahn kin tungoalehte pwete oh sukehn longalap.

23 Oh ni rahno, wasa koaros me mie tuhkehn wain kid me uwen pweine silper kid, e pahn dipwidipwkihla dihpw tekatek oh dihpw suwed kan.

24 Aramas akan pahn kohdo wasahu wa neirail kesik ketieu oh arep kan, pwehki nan sahpwo pwon dipwidipwkihla dihpw tekatek oh dihpw suwed kan.

25 Oh dohl koaros me uhpwelkihda mehn deipwel kan, dihpw tekatek oh dihpw suwed kan pahn osada wasahu; ahpw kou kan pahn wiahkihla arail wasahn mwonge, oh sihpw oh kuht kan pahn wiahkihla arail wasahn kokohseli.
2-ne 18:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Krais pahn wia takain kadipekelekel oh paip en kansensuwed—Rapahki Kauno, kaidehn sounkosotipw kan—Sohpeilahng kosonnedo oh kadehdeh kan pwe en kaweid—Karasahiong Aiseia 8. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri, Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ie: Ale ehu doaropwe laud, oh ntingihdiong loale, duwen Maer-salal-as-pas.

2 Oh I ahpw pilada sounkadehde loalloapwoat kan me pahn kadehde, samworo Uraia, oh Sakaraia nein Seperekaia pwutak.

3 Oh I ahpw kohla rehn lih soukohpo; oh e ahpw liseianda oh naitikiada pwutak emen. Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ie: Kihong ede, Maer-salal-as-pas.

4 Pwe kilang, serio pahn saikinte ese weriwerki [nda], Pahpa, oh nohno, a nahnmwarki en Asiria pahn kuliasang dipwisou en Damaskus oh kepwehn Sameria kan.

5 Kauno ahpw ketin pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki:

6 Pwehki aramas pwukat ar soikala pihl en Siloa me kin pwilipwilwei ni keneinei, oh [ar] perenkihdahr Resin oh nein Remalaia pwutako;

7 Eri met, kilang, Kauno pahn kadaredo nahnmwarki en Asiria oh sapwellime kan koaros me pahn rasohng pilap me lapakehda kehlail oh laud; oh e pahn kohda pohn angin keile kan.

8 Oh e pahn kohwei nan Suda; e pahn kadirehla oh widekla, e pahn lel ni tepin were; oh e pahn kadangpeseng ah pehnpihr kan pwehn perehkihla sapwemw sahpwo, Maing Immanuel.

9 Kumwail aramas akan pahn ehupene, oh e pahn kamwereikumwailpeseng; oh kumwail wehi dohkan kumwail rong; katengeikumwaildi, oh e pahn kamwereikumwailpeseng; katengekumwaildi, oh e pahn kamwereikumwailpeseng.

10 [Kumwail] ehupene kaweid, oh e pahn sohte katepe; [kumwail] pahn koasoaia koasondi en kaweido, oh e sohte pahn kak pweida; pwe Koht kin ketket reht.

11 Pwe Kauno mahsanihongie rasohng peh kehlail ehu, oh kaweidkinie me I sohte pahn keid nan koasondi en aramas pwukat, e ketihtihki:

12 Ke sohte pahn nda, kitail ehu, ong irail koaros me aramas pwukat pahn ndaiong, kitail ehu; ke pil sohte pahn masak dahme irail masak.

13 Kepingahte Kauno Wasalapalapie, oh kumwail mweidehng ihte me kumwail pahn masak, oh mweidehng ihte me kumwail pahn lemwiki.

14 Oh e pahn wia wasa kumwail pahn pwongih; ahpw [e pahn wia] takain kadipekelekel oh paip en kansensuwed ong peneinei en Israel kan, oh e pahn wia lidip ong mehn Serusalem.

15 Oh tohto irail me pahn dipekelekel oh pwupwidi, oh ohla, oh lohdi nan lidip, oh wisik sang.

16 Katengehdi kadehdeh oh kosonnedo rehn nei tohnpadahk kan.

17 Oh I pahn awiawih Kauno, me solahr kin pwarohng keinek en Seikop kan, oh I pahn rapahki ih.

18 Kilang, ngehi oh serihkan me Kauno ketkidohngie e wia kilel kei oh [doadoahk] kapwuriamwei kei nan Israel sang Kauno Wasalapalapie, me kin ketiket pohn Nahna Saion.

19 Oh ni ahnsou me irail pahn ndaionguhk: Rapahki rehn sounwunani kan, oh sounketieni kan me kin wedwedei mwahl—e sou konehng aramas akan en rapahki rehn Koht pwe irail me momour en kak rong sang me melahr akan?

20 [Rapahki] nan kosonnedo oh kadehdehu; oh ma irail sohte kosoia nin duwen mahsen wet, a pwehki sohte marain loale.

21 Oh irail pahn kohwei nan kahpwal laud oh duhpek; oh ni ahnsouo me irail pahn duhpekla, irail pahn lingeringerda, oh keriahla arail nahnmwarki oh arail Koht, oh saradalahng nanleng.

22 Oh irail pahn kilang nan sampah oh kilangada kahpwal, oh rotorot, rotidi en lokolok, oh pahn kohlahng nan rotorot.
2-ne 19:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aiseia karasaraski Mesaia—Aramas me mih nan rotorot pahn kilangada marain lapalap ehu—Seri men ipwidi ong kitail—E pahn wia Nahnmwarki en Popohl oh pahn kaunda mwolen Depit—Karasahiong Aiseia 9. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ahpw, rotidio sohte pahn duwehte ah lokolok, ni ahnsou me [nahnmwarki en Asiria] tep ekis kaloke sahpw en Sepulon, oh sahpw en Napdali, oh mwuhr ahpw kaloke laud irail me mihmi nan ahl en kohlahng Sehd Weitahta palio Sordan nan wein Kalili.

2 Aramas akan me kin weweid nan rotorot kilangehr marain lapalap ehu; irail me kin mihmi nan sahpw en soukoapworopwor, maraino kamarainih iraildahr.

3 Komwi katohtowehlahr tohn wehi, oh kalaudehla arail peren—irail perendahr mwohmwi duwehte peren en ahnsou en rahk, oh duwehte aramas arail kin peren ni arail nehkpeseng dipwsou kan.

4 Pwe komwi kawelahr arail mehn wisik toutou kan, oh tuhkehn pohn pwopwerail kan, arail mehn kamakam kan.

5 Pwe nan mahwin koaros e kin mie ngihl kapingiping, oh likou kan ntahla; ahpw met e pahn wia isihs oh kahs en isihs.

6 Pwe seri kis ipwidiongkitailehr, kisin pwutak emen kohiengkitailehr; oh e pahn wiahla atail kaun; oh e pahn mwareniki, Kopwuriamwei, Sounkaweid Kupwurokong, Koht Wasalapalapie, Sahm Poatopoat, Nahnmwarki en Popohl.

7 [Sapwellime doadoahk en] kaun oh popohl sohte pahn imwila, nan mwoal en Depit, oh sapwellime kaweid nan wehio, oh e pahn koasoanehdi tenek pwung oh pwung pahrek sang met kohkohlahte. Sapwellimen Kauno Wasalapalap loaloapwoatme pahn kahrehda.

8 Kauno ketin kadaredohngehr Seikop sapwellime mahseno oh e kamaraindahr Israel.

9 Oh aramas koaros pahn ese, iei Ipram oh mehn Sameria kan, me kin nda nan mohngiongarail pohnmwahso oh aklapalap:

10 Takain koaskoasok kan pwupwidier, ahpw kitail pahn pwurehng koasokehkihda takai pweilaud kan; tuhke sikamohr kan tupwidihsangehr, ahpw kitail pahn wiliankihdi tuhke sihdar kan.

11 Eri Kauno pahn koasonehdi kahpwal ong Resin, oh kapatapene ah imwintihtih kan;

12 Mehn Siria kan mwowe oh mehn Pilisdia kan mwuri; oh irail pahn kapwonehla mehn Israel kan. Eri pwehki soang pwukat koaros sapwellime engieng saikinte uhdihsang irail, ahpw e kin ketin kapahweite lime kan.

13 Pwe aramas akan sohte kin sohpeidohng ih me kin kaloke irail, re pil sohte kin rapahki Kauno Wasalapalap.

14 Eri Kauno pahn ketin lupukasang Israel moange oh pwadaiki, rah oh koadoke nan rahn ehute.

15 Me mah, iei ih me moangehu; oh soukohp me kin padahk likamw, iei ih me pwadaikio.

16 Pwe kaun akan en aramas pwukat kahredahr arail sapwungala; oh irail akan me re kin kaweid kamwomwalahr.

17 Eri Kauno sohte pahn perenki neirail pwutak pwulopwul kan, oh sohte pahn kupwur kalahnganohng neirail seri sepwoupwou kan oh lihodi kan; pwe irail koaros kin liksansalmwahu oh wiewia suwed, oh irail koaros kin lokaia mwahl. Eri pwehki soang pwukat koaros sapwellime engieng saikinte uhdisang irail, ahpw e kin ketin kapahweite lime kan.

18 Pwe wiewia suwed kan duwehte isihs en kisiniei; e pahn kapwonehla dihpw tekatek kan, oh dihpw en nanwel kan, oh re pahn kohda duwehte ediniei me kin kohkohda.

19 Sang engieng en Kauno Wasalapalap sahpwo pahn rotala, oh aramas akan pahn rasohng kahs en kisinieio; sohte emen pahn kak kamaurala rie ohl.

20 Oh e pahn porki peh pali koaiek oh men mwonge; oh e pahn mwongehki peh pali soakoaiek oh sohte itarki; irail pahn pein kangkang pein pehrail—

21 Manase, Epraim; oh Epraim, Manase; irail patpene oh uhwong Suda. Eri pwehki soang pwukat koaros sapwellime engieng saikinte uhdisang irail, ahpw e kin ketin kapahweite lime kan.
2-ne 20:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kamwomwalahn Asiria iei mwomwen kamwomwalahn me suwed akan nan Ketdo Keriauo—Malaulau aramas pahn luhwehdi mwohn ketdo sapahl en Kauno—Kadaudok en Seikop kan pahn pwurehng pwurodo ni rahno—Karasahiong Aiseia 10. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Meid suwed ong irail akan me kin kalohki kosonned sapwung kan, oh me kin ntingihda kosonned katoutou kan;

2 Me kin sohla tehk kopwung pahrek en me anahn akan, oh kin kihsang pwuhng en nei aramas semwemwe kan, pwe irail en kak kulih lihodi kan, oh irail en kak pirapa me sopwoupwou kan!

3 Oh dahme kumwail pahn wia ni rahn en ketdou, oh nan apwal me pahn kohdo sang wasa doh? Ihs me kumwail pahn tangala ale sawas reh? oh ia wasa me kumwail pahn pwilikihdi amwail kepwe kan?

4 Ma sohte ngehi irail pahn wie lokolok pahn me sensel kan, oh irail pahn mehla rehn me kamakamala kan. Eri pwehki soang pwukat koaros sapwellime engieng saikinte uhdisang irail, ahpw e kin ketin kapahweite lime kan.

5 Kumwail mehn Asiria kan, [kumwail me wia] nei tuhkehn kamakam, oh sokon me kumwail kin wiahki mehn kamakam.

6 I pahn kaderewei ih pwe en pelianda wehi liksansalamwahu, oh I pahn padahkihong en kulihasang ahn aramas me kin kahrehda ei engieng ar dipwsou kan, oh wahsang dipwsou kan, oh tiakpene duwehte nan ahl pwelmatak kan.

7 Ahpw nan ah mohngiong e sohte medemedewehte en wia met; ahpw e koasonehdi me e pahn kawehla oh kauhdihsang wehi tohto.

8 Pwe e koasoaia: Nei pwutak kan koaros sou wia nahnmwarki kei?

9 Kalno sou [lohdi] duwehte Karkemis? Amad sou [lohdi] duwehte Arpad?

10 Duwehte pehi kat eh koasonehdi wein dikadiken eni kan, oh neirail sensel takai kan kaselel sang ahn mehn Serusalem oh mehn Sameria;

11 I sou pahn wiahiong Serusalem oh ah dikediken eni kan duwehte dahme I wiahiong Sameria oh ah dikediken eni kan?

12 Ahpw mwurin ahnsou me Kauno pahn kanekehla sapwellime doadoahk koaros pohn Nahna Saion oh pohn Serusalem, I pahn kawehla doadoahk en nahnmwarki pohnmwahso en Asiria, oh ah suwei kan koaros.

13 Pwe e kosoaia: Sang pein kehlail en pehi kat oh ei loalokong me I wiahkihda mepwukat; pwehki ei eripit; oh I katehlapahla sahpw en nei aramas akan, oh I pirapahda arail dipwsou kesempwal akan, oh I kalowehdi towe kan duwehte aramas loalloapwoat men;

14 Oh pehiet diaradahr ahn aramas kepwe kan duwehte wasahn pahs ehu; oh I pahn kihpene sampah duwehte [aramas] emen eh kin rikpene luhwen kitohr kan; oh sohte me pahn kamwakid pehn pihr ehu, de kihpeseng ewe, de wiahda ngihl ehu.

15 Kakete sile pwoat en nda me e kehlailsang [aramas] me silehkio? Kakete rasaras pwoat en kesempwalasang [aramas] me rasaraskio? Pil duwehte apwal lepin tuhke pwoat en kamwakid [aramas] me pwokadahu, de sokon pwoat en pein kesihnenda duhwehte e sohte wia tuhke!

16 Eri Kauno, Wasa Lapalap, pahn ketin kadaredo kalokolok ehu rehn me insenamwahu kan; oh [Kauno] pahn isikada loallerail kan duwehte kisiniei lullul ehu.

17 Oh marain en Israel pahn rasohng kisiniei ehu, oh arail Kaun Sarawio pahn rasohng lullul en kisinieio, oh e pahn isikada dihpw tekatek oh suwed koaros nan rahn ehu;

18 Oh pahn kamwomwala sapwellime tuhke kan, oh sapwellime mwaht wawahn kan, ni paliwar oh palingehn koaros; oh irail pahn [pingida] duwehte ahnsou me soun kol pilaik nan mahwin kin pwupwidi.

19 Oh sapwellime tuhke kan me pahn luhwehdi pahn malaulau, kahrehda seri tikitik men kak ntingihdi.

20 Oh ni rahno e pahn lelledo, ahnsou me kadaudok en Israel, oh irail akan kadaudoke en Seikop me pitila kan, sohla pahn koapworopworki ih me kin kalokeirail, ahpw irail pahn koapworopworki Kauno, Me Sarawi en Israel, ni mehlel.

21 Irail akan me luhwehdi, iei, irail luhwen kadaudok en Seikop, irail pahn pwurodohng rehn Koht me manaman.

22 Mehndahte aramas en Israel kan ar rasohng tohtohn pihk en ni oaroahr, e pil pahn mie ehu kadaudok me pahn pwurodo; kahpwal me wiawihero pahn kahrehda wiewia pwung mehlel pahn mie.

23 Pwe Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap pahn ketin wiahda kamwomwomwla ehu, iei e pahn wiawi nan sahpwo pwon.

24 Eri, Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap mahsanih: Kumwail nei aramas akan me mihmi nan Saion, kumwail dehr masak mehn Asiria kan; irail pahn kemehkin kumwail tuhken kamakam, oh arail sokon kan, duwehte mehn Isip kan.

25 Pwe mwurin ahnsou kis, oh engieng pahn uhdi, oh ei lingeringer [pahn uhdi] sang kamwomwirailla.

26 Oh Kauno Wasa Lapalap pahn wiahda kahpwal ehu ong ih duwehte kamakamalahn mehn Midian ni paip en Orep; oh duwehte sapwellime sokono eh kolada mwohn sehdo ih pil mwomwen eh pahn ketin kolada duwehte mwohn mehn Isip ko.

27 Oh ni rahno pahn lelledo me ah toutou kan pahn kohsang pohn pwopwe, ah mehn wisiko pahn kohsang ni tepinwere, oh mehn wisiko pahn ohla pwehki keidi sarawio.

28 E pahn kohdo Ai, e pahn kotehla Mikron; e pahn nekidala were kuruma kan nan Mikmas.

29 Irail kotehlahier ahlo; irail pahn pweidi nan Kepa; Ramad masepwehkdahr; Kipea en Sohl tangehrdoui.

30 Kumwail weriwerda, serepein en Kalim; wiada pwe Lais en kak rong, Anadod me lokolok.

31 Madmena mweseldahier; tohn nan Kepim kohpenehier pwe re en tang.

32 Met e pahn mihmi nan Nop rahno; e pahn roakoaroak kumwut ong nahnahn serepein en Saion, iei uluhl en Serusalem.

33 Kilang, Kauno, Kaun Wasa Lapalap pahn lipukiraidi rasohng rahn tuhke me palasang; oh irail sohpeidi kan pahn paldihsang; oh me aklapalap kan pahn karakarahkala.

34 Oh e pahn ketin lupukiniraildi [sile] mete rasohng tuhkehn wel kan ar paldi, oh Lepenon pahn pwupwidi pahn me keieu kehlailo.
2-ne 21:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kahlepen Sesi (Krais) pahn kadeik ni pwung—Nan Melenium sampa pwon pahn esehla duwen Koht—Kauno pahn kihda kilel ehu oh kapwurepene Israel—Karasahiong Aiseia 11. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh tuhke pwot pahn osesang kahlepen Sesi, oh rah pwot pahn osedahsang ni kalewe kan.

2 Oh Ngehn en Kauno pahn ketket reh, [me iei] ngehn en eripit oh kupwurokong, ngehn en kaweid oh kehl, ngehn en marain oh lemwiki Kauno;

3 Oh [Ngehn en Kauno] pahn ketin wiahiong en mwadangete esehla lemwiki Kauno; oh e sohte pahn tenek nin duwen dahme mese kan kin kilang, de pil kapwungala nin duwen dahme salenge kan rong.

4 Ahpw me semwehmwe kan e pahn ketin teneki ni pwung, oh ong me mpahi en sampah e pahn ketkihong irail kopwung pahrek; oh e pahn ketin woakihki sampah sapwellime mahsen, oh e pahn ketin kemehkihla me suwed kan engin dawese.

5 Oh e pahn kin katengehki lukope pwung, oh e [pil pahn] katehngki lukope loaloapwoat.

6 Kidi en wel pahn kousoan rehn sihmpwul, oh lepard pahn wendi rehn kisin kuht, oh koupwul oh laion pwulopwul kan oh mahn mand akan pahn kousoanpene; oh seri men me pahn apwali irail.

7 Oh kou kan oh pehr kan pahn mwengepene; neirail me tikitik kan pahn pweidipene; oh laion kan pahn kang dihpw duwehte kou lekelek kan.

8 Oh seri pwelel men pahn mwadong limwahn sinek pwoisin men [e sohte pahn ohla], oh seri men pahn kiheng peh nan pesen sinek [oh e sohte pahn ohla].

9 Irail sohte pahn medekila de mehla nan ei nahna sarawi kan koaros, pwe sampah pwon pahn direkihla ar marainki duwen Kauno, duwehte pihl akan ar audehla nan sehd.

10 Oh rahno, e pahn mie ehu kalou en Sesi, me pahn wiahla kilel ehu ong aramas akan; Mehn Liki kan pahn kin rapahki [kilel wet]; oh sapwellime wasahn komoal me lingan mehlel.

11 Oh rahno pahn leledo, me Kauno pahn ketin pwurehng kihwei lime kan keriapak pwe en kapwurepene luhwen sapwellime aramas akan me pahn luhwehdi, sang Asiria, oh sang Isip, oh sang Padros, oh sang Koas, oh sang Elam, oh sang Amad, oh sang pohn dekehn nan sehd akan.

12 Oh e pahn ketin kihda kilel ehu [de pilaik ehu] ong wehi kan, oh ketikipene mehn Israel me pekousla kan, oh ketin kapwurepene mehn Suda me mwerpeseng kan sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah.

13 Epraim sohla pahn peirin, oh kahpwal en Suda pahn uhdisang; Epraim sohla pahn peiriniong Suda, oh Suda sohla pahn kahpwali Epraim.

14 Ahpw irail pahn pihr pohn pwopwen mehn Pilisdia kan kohlahng palikapi; irail pahn kihsang ahn aramas me kin kousoan palimese arail dipwsou kan; irail pahn kalowehdi sahpw en mehn Idom oh Mohap; oh mehn Ammon kan pahn peikiong irail.

15 Oh Kauno pahn ketin kamwomwala lowen sehd en Isip; oh sang sapwellime kisinieng kehlail e pahn ketin itik lime kan pohn pilap, oh pahn wiahda piletik isipwoat, oh aramas akan pahn kotehla nan ngalangal.

16 Oh e pahn mie ahl lap ehu ong luhwen sapwellime aramas akan me pahn luhwehdi, sang Asiria, duwehte rahno me mehn Israel kan pwurodohsang nan sahpw en Isip.
2-ne 22:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ni rahn en milenia, aramas koaros pahn kapinga Kauno—E pahn ketket rehrail—Karasahiong Aiseia 12. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh ni rahno kumwail pahn nda: Maing Kaun, I pahn kapinga komwi; komwi ketin engieng pahi, ahpw met omwi engieng solahr, oh komwi ketin kansenamwahuihehla.

2 Kilang, Koht iei komourpei; I pahn koapworopworki, oh sohte masak; pwe Kauno Siowa iei kakehlepei oh me I pahn koulki; e pil wialahr komourpei.

3 Eri, sang ni ei peren I pahn idipil nan pwarer en komour.

4 Oh ni rahno kumwail pahn nda: Kapinga Kauno, eker ni mware, kalohki sapwellime wiewiah kan rehn aramas akan, padahngki duwen mwarehu eh ketin lapalapala.

5 Koul ong Kauno; pwe e ketin wiadahr soahng kan me kaselel; mepwukat pahn sansalada nan sampah pwon.

6 Werkihda peren, kumwail tohn Saion; pwe me Sarawi en Israel me ketiket rehmwail me lapalap.
2-ne 23:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kamwomwomwlahn Papilon e pahn rasohng kamwomwomwlahn ni ahnsou en Ketido Keriauo—E pahn wia rahn en engieng oh kalokolok—Papilon (sampah) pahn pwupwidi kohkohlahte—Karasahiong Aiseia 13. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 [Met iei] kahpwal en Papilon, me Aiseia nein Eimwos kilangadahr.

2 Kumwail apihada noumwail pilaik pohn nahna ile, lukuweri irail, oalekinirail pehmwail, pwe irail en kohlongala nan ewen kehl en sohpeidi kan.

3 I ruwesehier nei me kasarawilahr akan, I pil malipehier nei me kehlail kan, pwehki ei engieng sohte mih pohn irail akan me kin wahunki ei lapalap.

4 [Rohng] en ngihl en pokono pohn nahna kan duwehte [ngihlen] aramas kehlail, ngilen mwoarong en wei kan pokopokonpene, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin kaukaunopada sapwellime sounpei en mahwen kan.

5 Irail kohdo sang nan sahpw doh kan, sang wasa keieu doh pah lahng, ei, Kauno, oh sapwellime dipwsou en mahwen en eh engieng, pahn kamwomwala sahpwo pwon.

6 Kumwail weriwer, pwe rahn en Kauno leledohr; e pahn kohdo duwehte kamwomwomwla ehu sang me Lapalapo.

7 Eri peh kan koaros pahn mwoatoredi, nan kapehden aramas akan pahn luwetala;

8 Oh irail pahn masepwehkada; irail pahn ahnekdi medek mwuledek oh nsensuwed; irail pahn pwurupwuriamweipene; pohn mesarail akan pahn duwehla lulul en kisiniei kan.

9 Kilang, rahn en Kauno pahn leledo, [rahn] kamasepwehk en kalokolok oh engieng mwuledek, sahpwo pahn tehnla; oh e pahn ketin kamwomwala me dipan akan koaros.

10 Pwe usu kan koaros nanleng pahn sohla lingerail; ketipino pahn rotorot ni eh pahn dakadak, oh maram pahn sohla marain.

11 Oh I pahn kaloke sampah pwehki suwed, oh me suwed akan pwehki arail dipan; I pahn kauhdi aklapalap en pohnmwahso kan, oh kauhdi lemei en aramas kamasepwehng kan.

12 I pahn wiahda aramas en kesempwalasang kohl; iei e pahn kohl en Opihr.

13 Eri, I pahn karerehda nanleng, oh sampah pahn pwupwisang nan dewe, ni rahno me Kauno Wasa Laplap pahn engiengda.

14 E pahn duwehte ahnsou me tie men kin tangasang soun kesik, oh duwehte sihpw me sohte silepe; oh koaros aramas pahn pwuralahng neirail aramas, oh pein sapwarail.

15 Koaros me pohnmwahso pahn dokidi; ei, oh koaros me pahn iangala me suwed akan pahn mehkihla kedlahs.

16 Neirail seri kan pahn kamakam mwohn mesarail akan; pirap pahn wiawiong imwarail akan oh ahngkehlail pahn wiawiong arail pwoud kan.

17 Kilang, I pahn kamwakidada mehn Media kan en uhwong irail, re sohte pahn katapaniki silper oh kohl, de pereniki.

18 Neirail kesik ketieu kan pahn kaskihdi pwutak pwulopwul kan; oh irail sohte pahn poakehla seri pwelel; meserail akan sohte pahn men kamaurala seri kan.

19 Oh Papilon, me wia linganpen wehi kan, me wia kaselelpen mehn Kaldia kan, [e] pahn duwehte ahnsou me Koht kamwomwala mehn Sodom oh Gomorrah.

20 Sohla me pahn men kousoan mwo, oh sohla me pahn mihmi wasahu mwurin dih kei: oh mehn Arepia kan sohte pahn wiahda arail impwal wasao; oh silepen sihpw kan sohte pahn wahla neirail pelen sihpw akan wasao.

21 Ahpw mahn lawalo kan en nan sapwtehn pahn pweidi wasao; oh imwarail akan pahn direkihla mahn kamasepwehk kan; oh lukoht kan me pahn kin kousoan wasao, oh kuht ohl kan pahn kahkahlek wasao.

22 Oh ngilen mahn lawalo kan en pohn deke kan pahn kohsang nan imwarail ihmw tehnla kan, oh dirahken kan sang nan tehnpasarail akan; oh eh ahnsou kerendohr, oh eh rahno sohte pahn kareireila. Pwe I pahn kamwomwala ahnsou mwadang; ei, pwe I pahn mahkohng nei aramas akan, ahpw me suwed kan pahn mehla.
2-ne 24:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Israel pahn pwurpene oh perenki komoal en melenia—Luhsiper lekidekisang nanleng pwehki akipwung—Israel pahn powehdi Papilon (sampah)—Karasahiong Aiseia 14. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe Kauno pahn mahkohng Seikop, oh pahn pilada mehn Israel, oh koasoaneiraildi nan pein sapwerail, oh mehn liki kan pahn patohdo oh iang irail kousoan wasao, oh irail pahn wiahla kisehn peneinei en Seikop.

2 Oh aramas [en liki kan] pahn ale irail oh wa iraildohng nan arail wasa; ei, sang wasa doh kan ni keimw en sampah pwon; oh irail pahn pwurodohng nan sapwarail sahpw en inou kan. Oh peneinei en Israel pahn sapwankihla, oh sapwellimen Kauno sahpwo pahn mie ladu ohl oh lih akan; oh irail pahn kalewehdi irail akan me kaloweiraildi; oh irail pahn kaunda irail me kin kaloke irail.

3 Oh ni rahno e pahn lelledo Kauno pahn ketin kakomoaleiuk, sang ahmw pahtou, oh sang ahmw masak, oh sang kaludu apwal me [soun kalokoloko] kin wiahiong uhk.

4 Oh ni rahno e pahn lelledo, me ke pahn alehda lepin kahswet oh kahskihong nahnmwarki en Papilon, oh patohwan: Ia mwomwen soun kalokoloko eh uhdi, kahnihmw kohlo e uhdi?

5 Kauno ketin kawelahr nein me suwedo nah tuhkehu, [E ketin kawelahr] nein kaun akan reirieso kan.

6 Mehmen me kin lingeringer oh kalapw kemekeme aramas, oh mehmen me kin angkehlailih wehi kan me e kakaun, e pahn kalokolok, oh sohte me pahn kauhdi.

7 Sampah pwon wie komkomoal, oh meleilei; irail wiakintehiu kokoul.

8 Ei, tuhke pir kan perenkinuhkadahr, oh pil tuhke sidar kan en Lepanon, ndinda: Pwehki omwi mehlahr sohte me pahn kohdo peleikihtdi.

9 Nan ehl onopadahr en kasamwoiuklong ni omw pahn lella; e kapiradahr me melahr akan ong komwi, iei soumas akan koaros en sampah; e kapwaurdahr sang nan mwolerail akan nahnmwarki koaros en wehi kan.

10 Koaros irail pahn mahsenihong komwi: Komwi pil luwetala duwehte kiht? Komwi pil duwehla kiht?

11 Omwi lingan seridi nan sousou; ngihlen keseng [en omw kamadipw] sohla ronge; mwahs pahn doupeseng pahmw, oh mwahs pahn kipeiukedi.

12 Ia mwomwen ahmw pwupwidihsang nanleng, Luhsiper, usuhn rahn lingan! Komwlekidekdi nan pwehl, komwi me kaluwetelahr wehi kan!

13 Pwe komwi patohwan nan omwi mohngiong: I pahn kohdahla nanleng, I pahn kalapalapiala mwoleiet mwohn sapwellimen Koht usu kan.

14 I pahn kihehda ileilehsang depwek ileile kan; I pahn duwehla me Keieu Lapalapo.

15 Ahpw komwi pahn lekidekdihla nan ehl, wasa keieu loalo.

16 Irail akan me pahn kilang komwi pahn kadehdei komwi, oh pahn kasawi komwi, oh pahn nda: Ih ohl me kin kahrehda sampah eh kin rerer, me kin itikada wehi kan?

17 Oh wekidohng sampah en duwehte sapwtehn, oh kawehla kahnihmw kan, oh sohte ritingada imwen me sensel kan?

18 Nahnmwarki kan koaros en wehi kan, ei, irail koaros, nekinekidi nan lingan, emen emente nan pein imwe.

19 Ahpw komwi lekidekieisang nan omwi sousou duwehte rah suwed ehu, oh luwen irail akan me kamakamalahr, dongkihdi kedlahs, me kohdihla pohn takain nan pwoaro; rasohng paliwar mehla ehu me tiatipeseng.

20 Komwi sohte pahn patehng irail nan wasahn nekinekidi, pwehki omwi kawehla sapwomw sahpw oh kemehla noumw aramas akan; wahn wiewia suwed akan e sohte pahn mie wahupe.

21 Kaunopada kamakamalahn sapwellime seri kan pwehki dipen arail pahpa ko, pwe irail en sohte pweida, de sapwaniki sahpw, de pil kadirehkihla sampah arail kahnihmw kan.

22 Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, pwe I pahn engiengda pahrail oh lepukasang Papilon ahdo, oh luhwehkan, oh pwutak, oh pwutak me re pahn nainiki kan, Kauno mahsanih.

23 I pil pahn wiahiong en wiahla dowen mehn pihr en pohn pihl, oh lehpwel; oh I pahn kamwomwala duwehte koakoahngki kepennok, Kauno Wasa Lapalap me ketin mahsanih.

24 Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin kahulahr, mahsanih: Mehlel nin duwen ei medewehda, ih pahn mwomwen e pahn pweida; oh nin duwen ei koasonehdi, e udahn pahn pweida—

25 Me I pahn wahdo mehn Asiria nan sapwei, oh tiakpeseng ih pohn ei nahna kan; e ahpw pahn kihsang mehn wisiko pohrail, oh ah katoutouo pahn kohsang pohn pwopwe kan.

26 Met iei kahrepehu me koasondi ong sampah pwon; oh met iei limehu me kapahweiehr pohn wei kan koaros [pwehn kaloke].

27 Pwe Kauno Wasa Lapalap me ketin koasonehdi, oh ihs me pahn kak kasapwungehla? Oh lime kan kapakapahweite [pwehn kaloke], oh ihs me pahn katokihedi?

28 [Rohng] katoutouwet [lohkdahr] nan pahr me nahnmwarki Ahas ketin sipalla.

29 Mehn Palisdia pwon, kumwail dehr perenkihda tuhkehn kamakamo eh ohla; pwe sinek men eh kin mehla emen sinek me suwed sang kin wiliandi, oh wah kan pahn wia ehu soangen sinek kamasepwehk.

30 O mesenih en me semwemwe kan pahn mwonge, oh me anahn akan pahn wendi nan onepek mwahu; oh I pahn kemehkihla kalewemwail [mehn Pilisdia] lehk lapalap ehu, oh e pahn kamwomwala luwomwail kan.

31 Kowe ewen kehl, werwerda; Kowe kahnihmw, weriwer; kumwail, mehn Palisdia pwon, mwerpesengehr; pwe mie depwek en pwelipar ehu kohkohdohsang paliepeng, oh sohte emen pahn kelehpwla nan ahnsou me koasondi kan.

32 Soangen pasapeng dah me meninkeder en wehi kan pahn wia? Me Kauno ketin koasonedier Saion, oh sapwallime aramas semwemwe kan pahn koapworopworki.
2-ne 25:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai perenkihda mehkan me kin inen oh sansal—Aramas pahn wehwehki kokohp akan en Aiseia ni imwin rahn akan—Mehn Suhs akan pahn pwurodo sang nan Papilon, kalohpwuwala Meseiao, oh kamweremwerpeseng oh ale kalokolok—Re pahn kapwurupwurdo ni ahnsou me re kamehlele Mesaiao—Tepin e pahn ketido sounpar wenepwiki mwurin Lihai eh mweselsang Serusalem—Mehn Nihpai kan kin kapwaiada kosonned en Moses oh kamehlele Krais, me iei Me Keieu Sarawi en Israel. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met ngehi, Nihpai, pahn kawehwehda duwen mahsen kan me I ntingihdier, me Aiseia kohpadahier. Pwe kilang, Aiseia kohpadahr soahng tohto me nei aramas tohto apwal en wehwehki; pwe re sohte wehwehki kokohp en Mehn Suhs akan.

2 Pwe ngehi, Nihpai, sohte padahkiong irail soahng tohto me pid koasoandi en Mehn Suhs akan; pwe arail wiewia kan iei wiewia rotorot kei, oh arail mwekid kan wia mwekid suwed kei.

3 Eri, I pahn ntingwohng nei aramas akan, iei irail koaros me pahn alehdi mepwukat mwuhr me I pahn ntingihdi, pwe irail en kak esehla sapwellimen Koht kadeik kan, pwe re pahn lelohng wehi kan koaros, nin duwen mahsen kan me e ketin mahsaniher.

4 Eri, kumwail nei aramas akan, rongie, [kumwail] me wia peneinei en Israel, oh rong mwahu ei kaweid kan; pwehki mahsen en Aiseia kan ar sohte wehwe ong kumwail, ahpw re kin wehwe ong irail kan koaros me kin direkihla ngehn en kokohp. Ahpw I pahn kihong kumwail ehu kokohp, nin duwen ngehno me kin ketiket loaleiet; eri I pahn kohpada nin duwen me sansal me I kin wehweki sangete ahnsou me I iang ei pahpa mweselsang Serusalem; pwe kilang, palingeniet kin pereniki [padahk] sansal akan ong nei aramas akan, pwe irail en kak esehla.

5 Ei, oh palingeniet pereniki mahsen kan en Aiseia, pwe I kohsang Serusalem, oh mesei kat kilangehr soahng kan me kohsang rehn Mehn Suhs akan, oh I ese me Mehn Suhs akan wehwehki soahng kan me kohsang rehn soukohp akan, oh sohte ekei aramas wehwehki soahng kan me kalohkohngehr Mehn Suhs duwehte pein irail, ihte ma re ale padahk nin duwen soahng kan me kohsang rehn Mehn Suhs akan.

6 Ahpw kilang, ngehi, Nihpai, sohte kaiahnehda nei seri kan nin duwen mehn Suhs akan; ahpw kilang, pein ngehi, kousonehr nan Serusalem, eri I ese duwen wasa kan me kapelpene [kanihmwo]; oh I padahkihongehr nei seri kan duwen sapwellimen Koht kadeik kan, me wiawiher ong Mehn Suhs akan, ong nei seri kan, nin duwen [soahng] koaros me Aiseia kohpadahr, oh I sohte pahn ntingiedi.

7 Ahpw kilang, I pahn doulahng pein ei kokohp, nin duwen me sansal sang rehi; me I ese me sohte aramas emen pahn sawehwehki; ahpw, ni rahn akan me kokohp en Aiseia kan pahn pweida aramas akan pahn wehwehkihda ni mehlel, ni ahnsou me kokohp akan pahn sansalada.

8 Eri, re uhdahn kesempwal ong aramas akan, oh mehmen me pahn medewe me re sohte kesempwal, I pahn koasoaiong irail ni sansal, oh [pil] kainenehiongete nei aramas akan ei koasoai kan; pwe I ese me [kokohp kan] pahn uhdahn kesempwal ong irail ni imwin rahn akan; pwe ni ahnsouo irail uhdahn pahn wehwehkihda; eri, I ntingiedi ong ni kamwahuparail.

9 Oh ni ehu dih en Mehn Suhs akan ar pahn kamwomwala pwehki arail wiewia suwed, iei pil mwomwen arail pahn kamwomwala nan ehu ehu dih nin duwen arail wiewia suwed kan; oh saikinte emen irail kamwomwala ihte ma soukohp kan en Kauno kohpada ong irail.

10 Eri, e kokohpdahr ong irail duwen kamwomwomwla me pahn wiawi ong irail, mwurinte ei pahpao e mweselsang nan Serusalem; ahpw, ar mohngiong kan keptakailahr; oh nin duwen ei kokohp re kamwomwlahr, ihte me luwehdi, irail akan me lohdier oh wesiklahr nan Papilon.

11 Oh met I koasoaiawei pwehki ngehno me mihmi loaleiet. Oh mendahte ar wisiksangehr re udahn pahn pwurehng pwurala, oh sapwenkihla sahpw en Serusalem; eri, re pahn pwurehng kopwurupwurdohng nan sapwarail sahpw en sohso.

12 Ahpw, kilang, re pahn kin mahwin, oh e pahn mie rohng en mahwin kan; oh ni ahnsou me rahno pahn lelodo me sapwellimen Sahmo Iehroso, iei Sahm en nanleng oh sampah, pahn ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih ni paliwar, kilang, re pahn soikala ih, pwehki ar wiewia suwed akan, oh keptakain ar mohngiong kan, oh lamalam kesihnen.

13 Kilang, irail pahn kalohpwuala ih; oh mwurin eh pahn nekinekdi nan sousou erein rahn siluh, e pahn ketin iasadahsang mehla, iangahki [manaman en] kamwahuiala nan sapwellime pehn pihr kan; oh irail koaros me pahn kamehlele mware pahn komourla nan wein Koht. Eri, palingeniet pereniki kohpada duwen ih, pwe I kilangehr ah mwehi, oh mohngiongi kin kepikepinga mware me sarawio.

14 Oh kilang [ahnsou] pahn leledo me mwurin Mesaiao eh pahn ketin iasadahsang mehla, oh ketin kasalehda pein ih ong sapwellime aramas akan, ong koaros me pahn kamehlele mwareo, kilang, Serusalem pahn pwurehng kamwomwala; pwe meid suwed ong irail me pahn pelianda Koht oh aramas akan en sapwellime mwomwohdiso.

15 Eri, mehn Suhs akan pahn kamweremwerpeseng nan wehi kan koaros; ei, oh Papilon pil pahn kamwomwala; eri, ekei wehi teikan pahn kamwerepeseng mehn Suhs akan.

16 Oh mwurin arail pahn mwerpeseng, oh Kauno Koht ketin kalokehkinirail wehi teikan erein dih kei, ei, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih lao irail tepida pwoson Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, oh tomwo, me poatopoat ong aramas koaruhsie—oh ni ahnsouo me rahno pahn leledo me re pahn pwoson Krais, oh pwongih Sahmo ni mwareo, sang nan mohngiong mehlel, oh peh mwakelekel, oh solahr kasik emen Mesaia, eri, ni ahnsouo, rahno pahn leledo me e pahn konehng me re pahn kamehlele mepwukat.

17 Oh Kauno pahn ketin pwurehng ketikihwei limeo pwe en kapwurehdo sapwellime aramas akan sang arail salongala oh mour pwupwilao. Eri, e pahn ketin doula wia doadoahk kapwuraimwei oh lingan rehn aramas akan.

18 Eri, e pahn ketin kapwarehda sapwellime mahsen akan ong irail, iei mahsen akan me pahn kadeikirailda ni imwin rahno, pwe irail pahn alehdi [mahsen ko] pwe en kak kadehdehiong irail duwen Mesaia mehlelo, me irail soikalao; oh en kadehdehiong irail me re solahr anahne kasikasik emen Mesaia me pahn ketido, pwe e sohte pahn wiawi, ihte Mesaia likamw me pahn pitiedi aramas akan; pwe emente Mesaia me soukohp akan kokohpkidahr, oh Mesaia wet iei ih me Mehn Suhs akan soikalahro.

19 Pwe nin duwen mahsen akan en soukohp akan, Mesaiao pahn ketido sounpar wenepwiki sang mwurin ei pahpao mweselsang Serusalem; oh nin duwen mahsen akan en soukohp akan, oh pil mahsen en tohnleng en Kohto, e pahn mwareniki Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto.

20 Oh met, riei ohl akan, I koasoaiadahr ni sansal pwe kumwail en dehr sapwungala. Oh nin duwen Kauno Koht e ketin ieias me kahluwa Israel sang nan sahpw en Isip, oh ketkihong Moses manaman pwe en kak kamwahuiala tohn wehi kan [en Israel] mwurin sineik poisin kan ar ngalisiraildi, ma re pahn kilenglahngete sineik me e kihda mwohrailo, oh pil ketkihong ih manaman pwe en poakih paipo oh pihl ahpw pahn kusieisang; mehlel, kilang I ndaiong kumwail, me mepwukat mehlel, oh nin duwen Kauno Koht e ketin ieias, e sohte pahn mie ehu mwahr tohrohr pohn sampah likin Sises Krais, me I koasoaiahier, me aramas pahn kak komourkihla.

21 Eri, iei kahrepewet me Kauno Koht inoukihong ie me mepwukat me I ntingihdi pahn kolkoldi oh nekinekla, kohieng kadaudokei kan, sang ehu dih kohlang ehu dih, pwe inouo en kak pweida ong Sosep, me kadaudoke kan sohte pahn mehla erein sampah eh pahn mimiehte.

22 Eri, mepwukat pahn kohwei sang nan ehu dih kolahng ehu dih erein sampah eh pahn mimiehte; oh re pahn kohkohwei nin duwen kupwur oh koasondi en Koht; oh wehi kan me pahn kolokol pahn pakadeingki nin duwen mahsen akan me ntingdi.

23 Pwe se kin loaloapwoationg [aht] doadoahk en nting, pwe se en koangoangehki nait seri kan, oh pil riat akan, re en kamehlele Krais, oh re en kompoakepahki Koht; pwe se ese me iei sang kalahngan [en Koht] me kitail komourkihla, mwurin [soahng kan] koaros me kitail kak wia.

24 Oh, mendahte aht kamehlelehier Krais, se kin kapwaiada kosonned en Moseso, oh kasikasik Krais ni loalopwoat, lao kosonnedo pahn kaimwsekla.

25 Pwehki kahrepe wet me kosonnedo wiawihkihda; eri ong kiht, kosonnedo sohralahr, oh se momourki Krais pwehki aht pwoson; ahpw se kin kapwaiadahte kosonnedo pwehki koasoandi kan.

26 Oh se kin koasoaia Krais, se kin perenki Krais, se kin kalohngki Krais, se kin kohpada duwen Krais, oh se kin ntingihdi nin duwen aht kokohp akan, pwe nait seri kan en kak ese mehnia mehn sawas me re pahn alehki lapwepen diparail akan.

27 Eri, se koasoaia duwen kosonnedo pwe nait seri kan en ese duwen sohralahn kosonnedo; oh irail en ese me sang sohralahn kosonnedo, [re] en kilenglahng mouro me sang rehn Krais, oh ese kahrepen kosonnedo eh wiawihda. Oh mwurin kosonnedo eh pahn pweida rehn Krais, re sohte pahn kakeptaikaiala mohngiongarail kan ong ih ahnsou me kosonnedo pahn sohrala.

28 Oh met kilang, nei aramas akan, kumwail wia aramas tepinwar kekeluwak; I koasoiong kumwail ni sansal, pwe kumwail en sohte pwonopwonki. Oh mahsen akan me I koasoaiadahr pahn wia mehn kadehde ong kumwail; pwe re itarohng kaweid aramas sohte lipilipil nan ahl pwungo; pwe ahl pwungo iei en kamehlele Krais oh dehr kahmahmkihla; pwe ma kumwail kahmahmki a kumwail pil kahmahmkihla soukohp ko oh kosonnedo.

29 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me ahl pwungo iei en kamehlele Krais, oh dehr kahmahmkihla ih; oh Krais iei me Keieu Sarawi en Israel; eri kumwail anahne poaridi mwowe, oh pwongih sang nan amwail kehl unsek, madamadau, oh roson, oh palingenemwail usek; oh ma kumwail pahn wia met kumwail sohte pahn lekidekla.

30 Oh, erein eh pahn konehng, kumwail pahn kolokolete sapwellimen Koht doadoahk kan oh tiahk sarawi kan lao kosonnedo me kohieng Moses pahn pweida.
2-ne 26:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Krais pahn wia doadoahk en papah ong mehn Nihpai kan—Nihpai kilangada kamwomwomwlahn nah aramas akan—Irail pahn lokaia sang nan pwelpar—Mehn Likih kan pahn wiahda mwomwohdiso likamw akan oh pwihn suwed rir kan—Kauno ketin irehdi aramas akan en wia doadoahk en prihskrap. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh mwurin Krais e pahn iasadahsang mehla e pahn ketin pwarodohng kumwail, nei seri kan, oh riei ohl kesempwalakan; oh mahsen akan me e pahn ketin mahsanihong kumwail pahn wiahla kosonned me kumwail pahn kapwaiada.

2 Pwe kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me I kilangadahr dih tohto pahn mehla, oh e pahn mie mahwen laud oh moromor kei nanpwungen nei aramas akan.

3 Oh mwurin Mesaiao e pahn ketido e pahn mie kilel kei pahn sansalehng nei aramas akan duwen sapwellime ipwidio, oh pil duwen sapwellime pwoula oh iasadao; oh rahno pahn wia rahn lapalap oh kamasepwehk ong me suwed akan, pwe irail pahn mwomwala; oh re pahn mwomwala pwehki arail kausala soukohp akan, oh souleng kan, oh katehkin irail takai, oh kemeirailla; eri ngilen ntahn souleng kan pahn kohdahsang nan pwehl kohdahla rehn Koht pwe en kedipei irail.

4 Eri, irail koaros me pohnmwahso, oh me kin wia me suwed, rahno me pahn kohdo pahn isikirailla, Kauno Wasa Lapalap me ketin mahsanih, pwe re pahn rasehng mwutin dihpw meng.

5 Oh irail me kemehla soukohp akan, oh souleng kan, pahn suhrla wasa loal nan sampah, Kauno Wasa Lapalap me ketin mahsanih; oh nahna kan pahn pwainiraildi, oh elipip kan pahn wairailsang, oh ihmw kan pahn rehngkidi pohrail oh kamwuteirailpene oh idangirailpene lao re wiahla pehs.

6 Oh posopos en nansapwe, oh lioal, oh rerrer en sahpw, oh soahngen kahpwal koaros pahn lellohng irail, pwehki kisiniei en engieng en Kauno pahn lellohng irail, irail pahn duwehte mwuten dihpw meng, oh rahn me pahn kohdo pahn isikirailla, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsenih.

7 Ia uwen ngeniet kin medek, oh pwunod pwehki kamakamalahn nei aramas akan! Pwe ngehi, Nihpai, kilangadahr, oh met katoutouwihielahr mwohn silangin Kauno; ahpw I patohwan likwerih ei Koht: Sapwellimwomwi koasoandi kan me pwung.

8 Ahpw kilang, me pwung kan me pahn rong mwahu mahsen en soukohp akan, oh sohte kemeirailla, ahpw poadidi ong ar kasikasik Krais ong kilel kan me pahn sansalda, mendahte kalokeparail kan koaros—kilang, iei irail me sohte pahn lekidekla.

9 Ahpw Iehros Pwungo pahn ketin pwarohng irail; oh e pahn kamwahuirailla, oh irail pahn ahneki popohl reh, lao dih siluh pahn mehla, oh tohtohn dih kapahieu pahn mehla nan arail mour pwung.

10 Oh mwurin ahnsou me mepwukat pahn imwisekla, nei aramas akan pahn mwadangete kamwomwomwla; I kilangadahr, mendahte lokolok en palingeniet; met, I ese me e uhdahn pahn wiawi; oh re kin pangala pein irail; eriar pahn kamwomwomwala me pahn wia katingpen arail pohnmwahso oh arail pweipwei; pwehki arail dukiong tepilo oh pilada wiewiatiahk en rotorotlaudsang [tiahk en] marain, eri irail uhdahn pahn kohdihla nan ehl.

11 Pwe Ngehn en Kauno sohte pahn ketin ieiang aramas ahnsou koaros. Oh ahnsou me Ngehno solahr pahn ketin ieiang aramas a kamwomwomwla pahn mwadangetewiawi, oh met kansensuwedihada palingeniet.

12 Oh ni ei koasoia duwen mehn Suhs akan ahr anahne kamehlele, me Sises iei ih me Krais mehlelo, e pil konehng Mehn Liki kan en kamehlele me Sises iei ih me Krais, Koht Soutuko;

13 Oh e kin ketin kasalehda pein ih ong irail koaros me kin kamehlele ih, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; ei, ong wehi kan, keinek kan, lokaia kan, oh aramas akan, [oh] ketin wiewia doadoahk me kapwuriamwei kan, kilel kan, oh manaman kan, nanpwungen aramas nin duwen arail pwoson.

14 Ahpw kilang, I pahn kohpadahng kumwail duwen imwin rahn akan; duwen rahno ahnsou me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihdo mepwukat rehn aramas akan.

15 Mwurin kadaudokei kan oh kadaudoken riei ohl akan arail pahn pwupwudi nan arail soupwoson, oh pahn kamakam rehn Mehn Liki kan; ei, mwurin Kauno Koht e pahn ketin kapilirailpene, oh pahn mahweniong irail, oh kauwada kehl en kaloweiraildi; oh mwurin arail pahn [kamakamala oh] wonohn nan pwelpar, mehnda ma irail sohrala, ahpw ngilen me pwung kan pahn ntingdi, oh kapakap en me loalopwoat kan pahn peipeido, oh irail koaros me pwupwudi nan arail soupwoson sohte pahn monokonokla.

16 Pwe irail akan me pahn kamwomwala pahn koasoi ong irail sang pahn pwehl, oh ngilerail peipeido sang nan pwelpar, oh ngilarail pahn duwehte ngil en emen soun katieni; pwe Kauno Koht pahn ketkihong manaman, pwe en kak koasoaiduwen irail ni ngiletik, duwehte ngihl me peido sang nan pwehl; oh arail lokaia pahn peipeido sang nan pwelpar.

17 Pwe Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih: Re pahn ntingihdi soahng kan me pahn wiawi nanpwungarail, oh re pahn ntingdi oh katengetengpene nan ehu pwuhk, oh irail akan me pwupwudi nan ar souwposon sohte pahn ale, pwe irail pahn rapahki en kawehla sapwellimen Koht koasoandi kan.

18 Eri, duwen kamwomwalahn irail akan me kamwomwalahr, e wiawimwadang; oh neirail karihs kan pahn duwehte kilin wahn pilawa me mengila—ei, Kauno Koht me ketin mahsanih: E pahn mwadangete wiawi—

19 Oh e pahn wiawi, me irail akan me pwupwidi nan arail peikasal pahn kamakam rehn Mehn Liki kan.

20 Oh Mehn Liki kan direkilahr ar pohnmwahso nan masarail akan, oh dipekelekelier, pwehki lapalapen arail takain kadipekelekelo, kahrehda re wiahda mwomwohdiso tohto; ahpw, irail pwilikihdi sapwellimen Koht manaman oh doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan, oh kalohki pein arail eripit oh pein arail loalokong, pwe irail en kak kepwehpewhkihla oh korehdasang ahn me semwehmwe kan.

21 Oh mwomwohdiso tohto me wiawihda me kahrehda noahrek, oh akupwung, oh lamalam oh ineng en kauwehla meteikan.

22 Oh pil mie pwihn mwersuwed rir kan, duwehte nan mwein kawao, nin duwen en tepilo tiahk suwed kan, pwe ih me wiahda mepwukat koaros; ei, me tapiada kamaramas, oh doadoahk rotorot kan; ei, oh e kin kahrehkinirail kisin sahl me pirapiriong ni tepinwararail kan, lao e katengehkiniraildi sahl kehlail kohkohlahte.

23 Pwe kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I ndaiong kumwail me Kauno Koht sohte kin wia doadoahk rotorot kan.

24 Soahng koaros me e kin ketin wia kin wiawi ong kamwahupen sampah; pwe e ketin poakohng sampah, kahrehda e ketin mweidala pein eh mour pwe aramas koaros en kak kohdo reh. Eri, sohte me e ketin irehdihsang re en alehda sapwellime komouro.

25 Kilang, mie me e mahsanihong, ketihtihki: Kohkohweisang ie? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; ahpw e ketin mahsanih: Kohdo rehi kumwail koaros me mih pohn sampah, pwainda milik oh sukehn loangalap, ni sohte anahepen mwohni oh sohte isepe.

26 Kilang, mie me e mahsanihong re en kohkohlahsang nan imwen kapakap akan, de wasahn kaudok kan? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh.

27 Mie ahnsou me e mahsanihong aramas en dehr alehda sapwellime komouro? Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; ahpw e ketikihong aramas koaros ni sohte pweipwei; oh e ketin mahsanihong sapwellime aramas akan re en koangoangehki aramas koaros en koluhla.

28 Kilang, mie aramas me Kauno ketin mahsanihiong me re sohte pahn alehda sapwellimekupwuramwahu? Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; ahpw mie en aramas koaros ar pai me duwepenehte, oh sohte me irairdihsang.

29 E ketin mahsanih me sohte me pahn wia doadoahk en prihskrap; pwe, kilang, prihskrap iei aramas me kin kalohk, oh wiahkinirail kamarainpen sampah, pwe irail en kepwehpwehla oh sampah en kepinga irail; ahpw re sohte kin nsenohki sawasepen Saion.

30 Kilang, Kauno ketin irehdi soahng wet; eri, Kauno Koht ketikidahr kosonned ehu me aramas koaros anahne ahneki limpoak unsek, limpoak unseko iei limpoak. Oh ma re sohte pahn ahneki limpoak unsek sohte kateparail. Eri, ma re pahn ahneki limpoak unsek re sohte pahn mweidehng tohn doadoahk en Saion en mehla.

31 Ahpw tohn doadoahk en Saion pahn doadoahk ong ni kamwahupen Saion; pwe ma mwohni me kin kahrehda ar doadoahk re pahn mehla.

32 Oh pil, Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniher me aramas akan sohte pahn kam aramas; me re sohte pahn likamw; me re sohte pahn pirap; me re sohte pahn kasaminehla mwaren Kauno arail Koht; me re sohte pahn noahrok; me re sohte pahn ahneki lamalam de ineng en kauwehla meteikan; me re sohte pahn akamaipene; me re sohte pahn netiki paliwararail akan; oh me re sohte pahn wia mepwukat; pwe mehmen me pahn wia mepwukat pahn mehla.

33 Pwe sohte ehu wiewia suwed pwukat kin kohsang rehn Kauno; pwe e kin ketin kupwur mwahu ong aramas akan; oh e sohte kin wia mehkot me sohte kin sansal ong aramas akan; oh e ketin lukehier irail koaros en kohdo reh oh alehda sapwellime kupwur mwahu; oh e sohte kin ketin soikala mehmen me kohdo reh, me toantoal oh pwetepwet, me sensel oh saledek, ohl oh lih; oh e kin ketin tamataman aramas rotorot akan; oh koaros duwepene rehn Koht, mehn Suhs oh Mehn Liki kan koaros.
2-ne 27:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Rotorot oh salongala pahn kipehdi sampah ni imwin rahn akan—Pwuhk en Mormon pahn kohdo—Soun kadehde silimen pahn kadehdehki pwuhko—Ohl loalokong men pahn nda me e sohte kak wadek pwuhk katengetengo—Kauno pahn ketin wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei oh lingan—Karasahiong Aiseia 29. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ahpw, kilang, ni imwin rahn akan, de nan mwehin Mehn Liki kan—iei, wehi koaros en Mehn Liki kan oh pil mehn Suhs akan, irail koaros me pahn kohdo sahpwet oh pil irail me pahn mihmi nan sahpw teikan, iei, sahpw koaros pohn sampah, kilang, irail pahn sakaukihla wiewia suwed oh soangsoangen doadoahk suwed koaros.

2 Oh ahnsou me rahno pahn lelledo Kauno Wasa Lapalap pahn ketidohng irail, posopos en nansapwe oh rerrer en sahpw, oh e pahn ngihl laud, oh kisinieng, oh melimel, oh kisiniei kehlail.

3 Oh wehi kan koaros me pahn mahweniong Saion, oh kin kaloke, pahn [sohrala] rasehng ouraman en nihpwong ehu; ei, e pahn lelohng irail, duwehte aramas duhpeklahr men me ouramandahr me e wie mwongemwonge e ahpw pirida ni eh duhpek; de pil rasehng aramas emen me mehkilahr eh men nimpil, e ahpw ouramanda me e wie nimnimpil, e ahpw pirida nan kepinwere ngalangaladahr oh e men nimpil; iei, met me pahn wiawi ong karihs en wehi kan koaros me pahn mahweniong Nahnahn Saion.

4 Pwe kilang, kumwail koaros me kin wiewia suwed, kumwail uhdi oh pwuriamweikihla, pwe kumwail pahn weriwer laud, oh peki sawas; ei, kumwail pahn sakaula ahpw kaidehn sang wain, kumwail pahn wasasseli ahpw kaidehn sang sakau kehlail.

5 Pwe kilang, Kauno pahn ketin kupwuredahr kumwail en meirkelikla. Pwe kilang, kumwail meirpenehr, oh kumwail soikalahr soukohp akan; oh e ketin perehsangkumwailehr amwail kaun akan oh ohl sarawi kan pwehki amwail wiewia suwed.

6 Oh e pahn wiawi me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihong kumwail mahsen akan en pwuhk ehu, oh re pahn wia mahsen akan en me memeir.

7 Oh kilang pwuhko pahn katengetengpene; oh pwuhko audaudki kaudiahl sang rehn Koht, sangete ni tepin sampah lel ni imwi.

8 Eri, pwehki soahng kan me katengetengpene, soahng kan me katengetengpene sohte pahn kohda ni ahnsou me aramas akan suwedlahr oh wiewia dihp akan. Eri pwuhk ko sohte pahnkohieng irail.

9 Ahpw pwuhko pahn pekederlahng ohl emen, oh e pahn patowahnda mahsen akan en pwuhko, me wia mahsen en me memeir nan pwehl, oh e pahn kadaralahng emen [aramas] mahsen akan en pwuhko;

10 Ahpw mahsen akan me katangetengpene sohte pahn pekederla, oh pil pwuhko sohte pahn pekederla. Pwehki pwuhko pahn katengetengkipene manaman en Koht, oh kaudiahl me katengetengpene kan pahn mihmihte nan pwuhk ko lao lel ahnsou me Kauno ketin kupwuriki, me re pahn kohda; pwe kilang, re kasalehda soahng kan koaros sangete ni tepin sampah lel ni imwin sampah.

11 Oh rahno pahn kohdo me mahsen akan en pwuhko me katengetengpene pahn wadawada sang pohn ihmw koaros; oh re pahn kin wadawad sang ni manaman en Krais; oh soahng koaros me wiawihongehr aramas akan pahn kasansalohng aramas akan, oh me pahn pil wiawi lao lel imwin sampah.

12 Eri, ni ahnsouo me pwuhko pahn pekederlahng ohl emen me I koasoaiahier, pwuhko pahn wie ekiek sang mwohn mesen sampah, pwe sohte pwoaren mas ehu pahn kilangidi ihte irail meh silimen soun kadehde kan me pahn kilang, sang ni manaman en Koht, likin ih me pwuhko pahn kohieng; oh irail pahn kadehdehki ni mehlel duwen pwuhko oh audepe kan.

13 Oh sohte me pahn iang kilang, ihte ekei me Koht ketin kupwuriki, pwe re en kadehdehki duwen sapwellime mahsen ong aramas akan; pwe Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniher me kadehde kan en me pwoson kan pahn koasoaiwei duwehte sang rehn me melahr akan.

14 Eri, Kauno Koht pahn ketin doula ketikihdo mahsen kan en pwuhko; oh nan ewen soun kadehde tohto me e ketin kupwuriki e pahn ketikihda sapwellime mahsen; oh meid suwediong me pahn kasohwe mahsen en Koht!

15 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou pahn kohdo me Kauno Koht pahn ketin mahsanihong ih me e ketin kadarehng pwuhko: Ale mahsen pwukat me sohte katengetengpene oh kiheng emen, pwe en kasalehiong emen me kak wadek, [oh] ndahieng: Komw menlau wadekehng ie met. Oh me kak wadeko pahn nda: Wahdo pwuhko, I ahpw pahn wadek.

16 Oh met, pwehki kalinganpen sampah oh kepwepwehla me re pahn nda ki met, ahpw kaidehn ong nikalinganpen Koht.

17 Oh ohlo pahn nda: I sohte kak wahdo pwuhko, pwehki e katengetengpene.

18 Eri me ese wadeko pahn nda: I sohte kak wadek.

19 Eri ahnsouo pahn leledo, me Kauno Koht pahn ketin pwurehng ketikihong pwuhko oh mahsen ko ong ih me sehse wadawad; oh ohl me sehse wadawado pahn nda: I sehse wadawad.

20 Kauno Koht ahpw pahn mahsanihong: Me ese wadek sohte pahn wadek, pwe re soikalahr, oh I kak pein wia ei doadoahk; eri ke pahn wadek mahsen akan me I pahn kihong uhk.

21 Dehr doahke soahng kan me katengetengpene, pwe I pahn kapwarehdaahnsou ehu me I pahn koasoanehdi; pwe I pahn kasalehiong aramas akan me I kak pein wia ei doadoahk.

22 Eri, ahnsou me ke pahn neksang wadek mahsen akan me I pahn ketkihong uhk, oh alehdi kadehdehn sounkadehdeh kan me I inoukihong uhk, ke ahpw pahn pwurehng katengepene pwuhko, oh nekidala rehi, pwe I pahn nekidala mahsen akan me ke saik wadek, lao lel ahnsou me I koasoanehdi sang ni ei eripit me e pahn kasansaliong aramas akan soahng kan koaros.

23 Pwe kilang, Ngehi iei Koht; oh Ngehi iei Koht me kin wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan; oh I pahn kasalehiong sampah me I duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte; oh I sohte kin wia doadoahk ong aramas akan ihte sang ni arail pwoson.

24 Oh pil ahnsouo pahn kohdo me Kauno pahn mahsanihiong ih me pahn wadek mahsen akan me pahn pekederlareh:

25 Ma aramas pwukat pahn karanih ie sang ni arail koasoai, oh arail lokaia kan kin waunekinie ahpw mohngiongirail akan dohsang ie oh arail lemwikin ie kin sang padahk en aramas akan—

26 Eri, I pahn doula oh wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei ehu rehn aramas pwukat, mehlel, doadoahk kapwuriamwei oh lingan ehu, pwe eripit en neirail aramas loalokong oh koahiek kan pahn mwomwala, oh marain en neirail aramas koahiek kan pahn ekiekla.

27 Oh meid suwediong irail akan me kin soang en karirihala arail koasoandi kan sang Kauno! Oh arail doadoahk kan kin mih nan rotorot; oh irail kin nda: Ihs me kak kilang kiht, oh ihs me pahn esei kiht? Oh irail pahn pil nda: Mehlel, ahmw pahn wekidada soahng kan pahn rasohngete pwehl wiahda einpwoat? Ahpw kilang, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, I pahn kasalehiong irail me I ese arail doadoahk kan koaros. Pwe mie doadoahk ehu me kak ndahieng ih me wiahda, kaidehn kowe me wiaiehda? De dahme wiawihda kak ndahieng me wiahdao, ke sohte ese dahme ke wiewia?

28 Ahpw kilang, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih: I pahn kasalehieng aramas akan me mwurin ahnsou kis oh Lepenan pahn wiahla mwetuwel wahn ehu; oh mwetuwel wahno pahn kesempwal duwehte nanwel ehu?

29 Oh ni ahnsouo irail me salengepon kan pahn rongada mahsen en pwuhko, oh pwoaren mesen me maskun kan pahn kilangada wasa sang nan wasa rotorot akan.

30 Oh me mpai kan pahn keirda, oh arail peren pahn pwilisang Kauno, oh me semwehmwe rehn aramas akan pahn perenkihda me Sarawi en Israelo.

31 Pwe nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias irail pahn kilang me kamasepwehko e pahn sohla katepe, oh me kin kauwe e pahn isihsla, oh kasarehla koaros me kin tetehkete ahnsou en wiahda tiahk suwed;

32 Oh irail me kin karaunlikamwih aramas pwehki ar koasoai, oh kaunopada lidip pwe en lidipiheki me kin kapwungirailla, oh sohte katapaniki mehkot pwung.

33 Eri, Kauno me ketin doarehla Eipram, ketin mahsanih, duwen peneinei en Seikop: Seikop sohte pahn namenekla, de pohn mese ahnsou wet sohte pahn reidi.

34 Ahpw ahnsou me e pahn kilangada nah seri kan, iei doadoahk en nin limei kat reh, re pahn sarawihkihla mwareiet, sarawihkihla Me Sarawi en Seikop, oh pahn masak Koht en Israel.

35 Irail me pil kin salongala nan palingehn pahn esehla wehwehki, oh irail me kin akupwungkan pahn esehla padahk mehlel.
2-ne 28:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mwomwohdiso likamw tohto pahn wiawihda ni imwin rahn akan—Re pahn padahk ki padahk sapwung, padahk mwahl, oh padahk likamw akan—Pwupwila [tohto] pahn wiawi pwehki sounpadahk likamw kan—Tepilo pahn kawehla nan mohngiong en aramas akan—E pahn padahk ki soangsoangen padahk likamw koaros. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, riei ohlakan, kilang, I koasoi ong kumwail, nin duwen Ngehno e ketin koangoahngehkin ie; eri, I ese me re udahn pahn wiawi.

2 Oh soahng kan me pahn ntingda sang nan pwuhko pahn kesempwal mehlel ong aramas akan, ahpw mehlel ong kadaudokatail akan, me ieikisehn luhwen peneinei en Israel.

3 Pwe ahnsouo pahn leledo me mwomwohdiso kan me wiawihda, ahpw kaidehn ong Kauno, ahnsou me emen pahn kin ndahieng ekei: Kilang, ngehi, ngehi me sapwellimen Kauno; oh mehtei kan pahn kin nda: ngehi, ngehi me sapwellimen Kauno; oh ih met me mwomwohdiso koaros me wiawihda pahn kin ndinda, ahpw kaidehn ong Kauno—

4 Oh irail pahn kin akamaipene nan pwungarail; oh neirail samworo kan pahn kin akamaipene; oh irail pahn kin padahk ki pein arail loalokong, oh soikala Ngehn Sarawio, me kin ketikihla kaweid.

5 Oh irail soikala manaman en Koht, Me Sarawi en Israelo; oh irail ndahieng aramas akan: Kumwail rong kiht, oh rong aht padahk; pwe kilang sohte Koht rahnwet, pwe Kauno oh Soundoaro ketin kaimwsekalahr sapwellime doadoahk, oh e ketikihongehr sapwellime manaman ong aramas akan;

6 Kilang, kumwail rong [aht] padahk; ma re pahn nda me mie manaman kapwuriamwei ehu wiawi sang ni limen Kauno, dehr kamehlele; pwe rahnwet Koht solahr wia manaman kapwuriamwei; e ketin kaimwsekalahr sapwellime doadoahk.

7 Ei, oh me tohto pahn kin nda: [Kitail] kamadipw, sakau, oh pereperen, pwe lakapw pali kitail pahn mehla; oh e pahn mwahu ong kitail.

8 Oh me tohto pil pahn nda: Kitail kamadipw, sakau, oh pereperen; ahpw, kitail anahne masak Koht—e pahn ketin mahkohng kisin dihpatail kan; ei, kitail kak ekis likamw, kulih mehteikan pwehki arail koasoi kan, weirada pwoar en lidip ong mehn mpomw; pwe sohte kasuwedpe; oh kitail wia mepwukat koaros, pwe lakapw kitail pahn mehla; oh ma mehlel kitail sapwung, Koht pahn ekiste kemeikitail, oh mwuri kitail pahn komourla nan wein Koht.

9 Ei, oh me tohto pahn kin wiewia padahk ni mwomw wet, padahk sapwung, mwahl, oh likamw, oh pahn pohnmwahso nan mohngiongarail kan, oh pahn kin song en kaririala arail koasoandi kan sang Kauno; oh arail doadoahk kan pahn mihmi nan rot.

10 Oh ntahn souleng kan pahn likwer sang nan pwehl pwehn kedipa irail.

11 Ei, irail koaros salongasangehr ahlo; irail wialahr aramas sapwung.

12 Pwehki pohnmwahso, oh pwehki sounpadahk likamw kan, oh padahk likamw, arail mwomwohdiso kan sapwungalahr, oh arail mwomwohdiso kan aklapalapalahr; pwehki arail pohnmwahso irail aklapalap mehlel.

13 Irail kin pirapa me semwehmwe kan pwehki arail wasahn sarawi kaselel kan; irail kin pirapa me semwehmwe kan pwehki arail likou kaselel kan; oh irail kin kaloke me mpai kan oh me nan mohngiong karakarak kan, pwehki arail pohnmwahso re kin aklapalap.

14 Re keptakai oh re mas ile; mehlel, pwehki pohnmwahso, oh dihp, oh wiewia suwed kan, oh tiahken netiki paliwar, irail koaros salongala ihte me malaulau, me kin karakarahk ideidawehn Krais; ahpw, pwehki kaweid me re kin alehsang padahk en aramas, kahrehda re kin kalapw sapwung.

15 Kumwail me erpitlahr, oh me loalokonglahr, oh me kepwepwelahr, me aklapalapalahr nan amwail mohngiong kan, oh koaros me kalohngki padahk likamw kan, oh koaros me kin netiki paliwararail kan, oh wekidalahr koasoandi pwung en Kauno, meid suwed, meid suwed, meid suwed ong kumwail, Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap me ketin mahsanih, pwe kumwail pahn lekdekla nan ehl!

16 Meid suwediong irail me pahn sohpeisang me pwung kolahng me sohte katepe oh uhwong me mwahu, oh nda me [mwahuo] sohte katepe! Pwe rahno pahn leledo me Kauno Koht pahn ketin mwadangete pwaredohng aramas en sampah; oh rahno me re pahn dipanla mehlel, re pahn kamakamala.

17 Ahpw kilang, ma aramas en sampah pahn kohluhkihla diparail kan oh arail wiewia suwed kan irail sohte pahn kamwomwala, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

18 Ahpw kilang, mwomwohdiso kehlail oh suwedo, lih me kin netiki paliwar en sampah pwon, pahn pwupwudinin sampah, oh lapalahn pwupwudi ieu pahn wiawi.

19 Pwe wehin tepilo pahn itikekda, oh irail akan me kin patehng pahn anahne kamwakidada pwe re en koluhla, pwe tepilo de katengehkiniraildi nah selmete poatoapoat kan, oh kamwakidadaren lingeringer, oh mehla;

20 Pwe kilang, ni ahnsouo e pahn kawehla nan mohngiong en aramas akan, oh kamwakidadaren lingeringerda pahn me mawahu.

21 Oh e pahn kaperenih ekei, oh kahluwairaillahng nan onepek en momour en sampah, pwe irail pahn nda: Soahng koaros mwahu nan Saion; ei, Saion kekeirda, soahng koaros mwahu—oh iei duwen tepilo eh pitihiraildier, oh kakahluwairaildilahng nan ehl ni keneinei.

22 Oh kilang, e kahluwahsang ekei sang ni eh koasoi en lidipih irail, oh ndaiong irail me sohte ehl; oh e kin ndaiong irail: Kaidehn ngehi tepil, pwe sohte tepil—oh iei met me e kin mwengininginkihong nan salengerail kan, lao e kolkinirailpene nah selmete kamasepwek kan, wasa me sohte me kak pitisang.

23 Ei, irail katengetengidi nan mehla, oh ehl; oh mehla, oh ehl, oh tepilo, oh koaros me kolkoldi wasao anahnepato mwohn mwoalen Koht, oh pakadeingkihda arail wiewia kan, sang mwo irail pahn kohla nan wasa me kaunopadahngirailehr, iei nan lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me iei lokolok poatoapoat.

24 Eri, meid suwediong aramas me kin komkommoal nan Saion!

25 Meid suwediong aramas me kin ndinda: Soahng koaros mwahu!

26 Ei, meid suwediong aramas me kin rongala ehn aramas padahk kan, oh soikala manaman en Koht, oh kisakis en Ngehn Sarawio!

27 Ei, meid suwediong aramas me kin nda: Se alehdier, oh se sohlahr anahne kapatahieng!

28 Oh ni mehlel, meid suwed ong koaros me rerrer, oh lingeringerki mehlel en Koht! Pwe kilang, mehmen me kokouda pohn paipo e pahn alehdi [mehlelo] ni peren; oh mehmen me kokouda pohn poahsoan en pihk pahn rerrer pwe e de pwupwidi.

29 Meid suwediong ih me pahn nda: Se alehdier mahsen en Koht, oh se sohlahr anahen ekei mahsen en Koht, pwe se itarikier!

30 Pwe kilang, Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniher: I pahn kihong aramas akan ehu ehu ire, ehu ehu padahk, ekis wasaht oh ekis wasahu; oh meid pai irail me pahn rong mwahu ei padahk kan, oh kin rong ei kaweid, pwe irail pahn marainkihla erpit; pwe mehmen me pahn alehda I pahn kapatahieng ekei; oh me pahn kin nda, Se solahr anahne, soahng kan me mih rehrail pahn kopwurupwursang.

31 Mehmen me kinlikiala kehl en aramas e kin riahkihla, de kehliki pein ah kehlail, de pahn rongala padahk en aramas akan, ihte ma arail padahk kan kohsang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawio.

32 Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, meid suwediong Mehn Liki kan! Pwe mendahte ei kin kapahwei pehikat ong irail rahn koaros, irail kin soikiehla; ahpw, I pahn mahkohng irail, Kauno Koht mahsanih, ma irail pahn koluhla oh kohdo rehi; pwehki ei kapkapahweite pehikat rahn ehu pwon, Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap me mahmahsen.
2-ne 29:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Liki tohto pahn soikala Pwuhk en Mormon—Irail pahn nda, Se sohte anahne pil ehu Paipel—Kauno ketin mahseniong wehi tohto—E pahn kadeikada sampah sang nan ehu ehu pwuhk kan me ntingidier. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ahpw kilang, aramas tohto—ni rahno me I pahn usehla wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei nanpwungarail, me I pahn tamanda ei inou kan me I wiahiongehr aramas akan, pwe I pahn pwurehng kihwei pehi kan keriapak pwe en kihpene nei aramas akan, me iei peneinei en Israel;

2 Oh pil, me I pahn tamataman inou kan me I wiahiong kowe, Nihpai, oh pil ong ahmw pahpa, me I pahn tamataman kadaudokomw kan; oh me mahsen en kadaudokomw kan pahn kohwei sang nan aweiet ong kadaudokomw akan; oh ngilen ei mahsen akan pahn kohwei ni imwin sampah, pwe en wia kilel ehu ong nei aramas akan, me iei peneinei en Israel kan;

3 Oh pwehki ngihlen ei mahsen akan pahn kohwei—Mehn Liki tohto pahn nda: Paipel! Paipel! Miehier nait Paipel, oh sohte kak en mie pil ehu Paipel tohrohr.

4 Ahpw Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih: Irail pweipwei kei, e pahn mie neirail Paipel; oh e kohsang rehn mehn Suhs akan, nei aramas en inou en mahso. Oh ia mwomwen arail kalahngan ong mehn Suhs akan pwehki Paipel me re alehdier sang rehrail? Ei, dahme mih nan ehn Mehn Liki kan arail madamadau? Irail kin tamataman kahpwal akan, oh doahdoahk kan, oh medek en mehn Suhs akan, oh arail loaloapwoatohng ie, wewahdo komour ong Mehn Liki kan?

5 Kumwail Mehn Liki kan, kumwail tamataman mehn Suhs oko, nei aramas en inou en mahso? Soh; ahpw kumwail keriairailla, oh kailongkin irail, oh sohte men kapwureirailpene. Ahpw kilang, I pahn kapwukoahkin kumwailmepwukat koaros; pwe ngehi Kauno sohte pahn moanokehla nei aramas akan.

6 Kumwail pweipwei, me kin nda: Paipel, miehier nait Paipel, oh se sohte anahne pil ehu Paipel. Mie ehu Paipel kumwail alehdi likin me kohsang rehn mehn Suhs akan?

7 Kumwail sehse me mie wehi tohto akaidehn ehute? Kumwail sehse me ngehi, Kauno amwail Koht, me ketin kapikada aramas koaros, oh me I tamataman irail akan me kin mihmi pohn dekehn kan nansed; oh I kin kakaun nanleng oh sampah; oh I kin kihwei ei mahsen ong aramas koaros, mehlel, wehi kan koaros pohn sampah?

8 Dahme kumwail kaulim ki amwail pahn alehdi ekei ei mahsen? Kumwail sehse me kadehdehn wehi riau e kasalehiong kumwail me ngehi iei Koht, me I tamataman ehu wehi duwehte mehteio? Eri, I kihwei ei mahsen akan ong ehu wehi duwehte mehteio. Oh ni ahnsou me wehi riau pwukat pahn ehupene ara kadehde kan pahn pil ehupene.

9 Oh I wia met pwe I en kak kasalehiong aramas tohto me I duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte; oh I kihwei ei koasoai sang ni pein nsenei. Oh pwehki ei nda ehu mahsen a kumwail sohte anahne medemedewe me I sohte kak pil ehu mahsen tohrohr; pwe ei doadoahk saikinte imwsekla; oh e sohte pahn [imwisekla] lao lel imwilahn aramas, de pil sang ahnsouo kohkohlahte.

10 Eri, pwehki eh mie Paipel rehmwail kumwail sohte anahne medewe me e audaudkidahr ei mahsen kan koaros; de pil medewe me I sohte pahn ketikihwei ekei me pahn ntingdi.

11 Pwe I mahsanihong aramas koaros, ni palimese oh ni palikapi, oh ni paliepeng, oh ni palieir, oh pohn dekehn nan sed akan, me irail pahn ntingihdi mahsen akan me I pahn mahsanihong irail; pwe sang nan pwuhk kan me pahn ntingihda I pahn kadeik ki sampah, emen emen aramas nin duwen ah wiewia kan, nin duwen dahme ntingdi.

12 Pwe kilang, I pahn mahsanihong mehn Suhs akan oh irail pahn ntingihdi; oh I pahn pil mahsanihong mehn Nihpai kan oh irail pahn pil ntingihdi; oh I pahn pil mahsaniong ekei keinek en peneinei en Israel, me I pil kahluwahla, oh irail pahn ntingihdi; oh I pahn pil mahsanihong wehi kan koaros pohn sampah oh irail pahn ntingihdi.

13 Oh kedekedeo mehn Suhs akan pahn alehdi mahsen en mehn Nihpai kan, oh mehn Nihpai kan pahn alehdi mahsen en mehn Suhs akan; oh mehn Nihpai kan oh mehn Suhs akan pahn alehdi mahsen en ekei keinek en Israel me salongalahr kan; oh keinek en Israel me salongalahr kan pahn alehdi mahsen en mehn Nihpai oh mehn Suhs akan.

14 Oh kedekedeo nei aramas akan, me iei kisehn peneinei en Israel, pahn kopwurupwurpene nanuhdakarail nan sapwarail sahpw en sohso kan; oh ei mahsen akan pahn kohpene wiahla [mahsen] ehute. Oh I pahn kasalehiong irail akan me kin uhwong ei mahsen oh uhwong nei aramas akan, me wia peneinei en Israel, me ngehi iei Koht, oh I inoukihong Eipraam me I pahn tamatamante kadaudoke kan kohkohlahte.
2-ne 30:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Liki kan me weliakapw mehlel pahn iangala aramas en inouo—Tohto mehn Leimen kan oh mehn Suhs akan pahn kamehlele mahseno oh wiahla aramas mwahu—Israel pahn kopwurupwurdo oh me suwed kan pahn kamwomwala. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I pahn koasoai ong kumwail; pwe ngehi, Nihpai, sohte pahn mweidehng kumwail en medewe me kumwail mwahusang Mehn Liki kan. Pwe kilang, ma kumwail sohte pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan a kumwail pahn pil mehla duwehte irail; oh pwehki mahsen akan me kapwilewei kumwail sohte anahne medewe me Mehn Liki kan koaros kamwomwala.

2 Pwe kilang, I pahn ndaiong kumwail me Mehn Liki kan koaros me pahn koluhla, pahn wia sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inouo; oh mehn Suhs koaros me sohte pahn koluhla pahn lekidekla; pwe Kauno sohte kin ketin wiahda inouong aramas, ihte irail akan me kin koluhla oh kamehlele Sapwellimeo, me iei me Sarawi en Israelo.

3 Oh met, I pahn kohpada ekis duwen mehn Suhs akan oh Mehn Liki kan. Pwe mwurin pwuhko me I koasoiadahro eh pahn kohda, oh pahn ntingda ong Mehn Liki kan, oh pwurehng katengtengidi ong Kauno, tohto me pahn kamehlele mahsen kan me ntingdi; oh irail pahn walahng kadaudokatail akan me luwehdi.

4 Oh kadaudokatail me luwehdi kan ahpw pahn esehda duwen kitail, me kitail kohsang nan Serusalem, oh me irail wia kisehn kadaudoken mehn Suhs.

5 Oh rongamwahu en Sises Krais ahpw pahn kalohki ong irail; eri, irail pahn wehwehkihda duwen arail pahpa kahlapako, oh pil wehwehkihda duwen Sises Krais, me arail pahpa kahlapako wehwehki.

6 Oh irail ahpw pahn perenda; pwe irail pahn ese me e wia kapai ehu ong irail sang nin limen Koht; oh rotorot me perehla meserail akan pahn tepda sohrala; oh dih tohto sohte pahn mehla, lao irail pahn wiahla aramas mwakelekel oh mwahu.

7 Oh kedekedeo mehn Suhs akan me mwerpeseng kan pahn tepida kamehlele Krais; oh irail pahn tepida pwurpene pohn sahpwo; oh koaros me pahn kamehlele Krais pahn pil wiahla aramas mwahu kei.

8 Oh kedekedeo Kauno Koht ahpw pahn tapiada sapwellime doadoahk ong wehi kan koaros, keinek kan, lokaia kan, oh aramas akan, pwe en kapwurehdo sapwellime aramas akan pohn sampah.

9 Oh Kauno Koht pahn kadeik me semwemwe kan ni pwung, oh kapwung pahrek ong me mpai en sampah. Oh e pahn woakieki sampah angin mahsen en dawaseo; oh angin dawaseo pahn kemehla me suwed akan.

10 Pwe ahnsou pahn mwadang lelledo me Kauno Koht pahn ketin katohrepeseng sapwellime aramas akan, oh me suwed akan e pahn ketin kamwomwala; oh e pahn ketin kamaurala sapwellime aramas akan, ei, oh ma e pahn anahne kemehkihla me suwed akan kisiniei e pahn wiawi.

11 Oh e pahn katengehki lukepe pwung, oh loaloapwoat pahn wia katengpen sapwellime manaman en kaunda wasa.

12 Oh kidi en wel pahn kousoan rehn sihmpwul; oh lepard pahn wendi rehn kisin kuht, oh koupwul, oh laion pwulopwul kan, oh mahn mand akan pahn kak kousoanpene; oh seri men me pahn kahluwa irail.

13 Oh kou oh pehr kan pahn mwengepene; neirail me tikitik kan pahn kin wendipene; oh laion kan pahn kin kang dihpw duwehte kou kan.

14 Oh seri pwelel men pahn mwadong limwahn sinek pwoisin men [e sohte pahn ohla], oh seri men pahn kiheng peh nan pesen sinek [oh e sohte pahn ohla].

15 Irail sohte pahn medekila de mehla nan ei nahna sarawi kan koaros; pwe sampah pwon pahn direkihla marain en Kauno duwehte nan sehd eh kin direkihla pihl.

16 Eri, audepen wehi kan koaros pahn sansalada; ei, soahng koaros pahn kasansalohng aramas akan.

17 Sohte mehkot me pahn rir pwe e pahn sansalada; sohte doadoahk en rotorot pahn wiawi pwe e pahn kadierekda nan marain; oh sohte mehkot pahn katengetengidi pohn sampah pwe e pahn mwerada.

18 Eri, soahng koaros me kasansalohngehr aramas akan pahn sansalohng irail ni rahno; oh Sehdan sohla pahn ahneki manaman nan mohgiong en aramas akan, ereinahnsou reirei. Oh met riei ohl kesempwal oko, I pahn kaimwsekalahr ei koasoai kan.
2-ne 31:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 31[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai koasoiahda kahrepen Krais eh pepdaisla—Aramas anahne idawehn Krais, pepdaisla, alehdi Ngehn Sarawi, oh dadaurete lel ni imwi pwe re en komourla—Koluhla oh papidais iei wenihmw en kehl en kohlahng nan ahl inen oh tehtiko—Mour soutuk pahn kohieng irail akan me kapwaiada kosonned akan mwurin ar papidaisla. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, kaimwsekalahr ei kokohp ong kumwail, riei ohl kesempwal akan. Oh kisin soahng keite me I pahn ntingih, me I ese me udahn pahn pweida; a I pahn ntingi ekeite kaweid kan me sang riei pwutak Seikop.

2 Eri, I itarki soahng kan me I ntingihediehr I itariki, ihte ekei mahsen me I pahn koasoia duwen padahk mehlel en Krais; eri, I pahn koasoi ong kumwail ni sansal, nin duwen ei kokohp sansal akan.

3 Pwe palingeniet kin pereniki [padahk] sansal akan; pwe ih mwomwen Kauno Koht kin wia sapwellime doadoahk rehn aramas akan. Pwe Kauno Koht kin ketikihdo marain pwe [aramas] en kak wehwehki; pwe e kin ketin mahsaniong aramas nin duwen arail lokaia, pwe irail en kak wehwehki.

4 Eri, I men kumwail en tamataman me I koasoiahiong kumwailehr duwen soukohpo me Kauno ketin kasalehiong ie, me pahn papidaisihla Simpwul en Koht, me pahn ketikihsang dihp en sampah.

5 Oh met, ma Sihmpwul en Koht, me ketin sarawi, anahne en papidaiskihla pihl, pwe en kapwaiada me pwung koaros, Eri ia duwe, e sou pahn konehng kitail, me sohte sarawi, en papidaisla, iei, papidaiskihla pihl!

6 Oh met, I pahn kalelapak rehmwail, riei ohl kesempwal oko, ia mwomwen Sihmpwul en Koht e ketin kapwaiada pwung koaros ni eh ketin papidaiskihla pihl?

7 Kumwail sohte ese me e ketin sarawi? Ahpw mehndahte e wia aramas sarawi men, e ketin kasalehong aramas akan me, ni pali uduk e karakarahkala mwohn Sahmo, oh kadehdehiong Sahmo me e pahn peikiong ih ni e pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan.

8 Eri, mwurin e papidaiskilahr pihl Ngehn Sarawi ketididohng poweni mwomwen muroi men.

9 Oh met, e kasalehiong aramas akan uwen ahlo eh inen, oh tehtik en wenihmw en kehlo, wasa me re pahn pidelong ie, ih me ketin wiadahr karasaraso mwohrail.

10 Oh e ketin mahsanih ong aramas akan: Kumwail idawehn ie. Eri, riei ohl kesempwal oko, kitail kak idawehn Sises ma kitail sohte pahn inangih kapwaiadasapwellimen Sahmo kosonned akan?

11 Oh Sahmo ketin mahsanih: Kumwail koluhla, kumwail koluhla, oh papidaisla ni mwaren nei Pwutak Kesempwalo.

12 Oh pil, kepitien Iehroso peidohng ie, mahsanih: Mehmen me pahn papidaisla ni mwarei, Sahmo pahn ketikihong Ngehn Sarawi, duweiehte; eri, idawehn ie, oh wia soahng kan me kumwail kilangehr I wia.

13 Eri, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I ese me ma kumwail pahn idawehn Sapwellimeo, sang nan mohngiong unsek, sohte wiewia liksansalamwahu oh sohte widing mwohn Koht, ahpw sang ni ineng mehlel, kolkoluhkihla dipamwail kan, kadkadehdehiong Sahmo me kumwail inengieng alehda mwaren Krais, sang ni papidais—iei, sang ni amwail idawehnla amwail Kaun oh amwail Sounkomour kohdihla nan pihlo, nin duwen sapwellime mahseno, eri, kumwail ahpw pahn alehdi Ngehn Sarawi; iei, papidais en kisiniei oh Ngehn Sarawi; oh kumwail ahpw pahn kak koasoi rasohng tohnleng kan, oh weriweriki kaping ong Me Sarawi en Israelo.

14 Ahpw, kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kepitien Iehroso pil peidohng ie, mahsanih: Mwurin amwail pahn koluhkihla dipamwail akan, oh kadehdehiong Sahmo me kumwail inahngih mehlel kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, sang ni amwail papidaiskihla pihl, oh alehdi papidais en kisiniei oh Ngehn Sarawi, oh kak lokaiahki lokaia kapw, ei, duwehte lokaiahn tohnleng kan, oh mwurin met kumwail ahpw sohpeisang ie, e pahn mwahute ma kumwail sohte esei ie.

15 Oh I ahpw rongadahr kepitien Sahmo, mahmahsanih: Ei, mahsen akan en nei [Pwutak] Kesempwale me mehlel oh pwung. Mehmen me pahn dadaurete lel ni imwi, e pahn komourla.

16 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I ese me sang met ma aramas emen sohte pahn dadaurete lel ni imwi, ideidawehn karasaras en Iehros en Koht ieiaso, e sohte kak komourla.

17 Eri, [kumwail] wia soahng kan me I padahkihong kumwail me I kilangehr amwail Kaun oh amwail Soundoar pahn ketin wia; pwe, kahrepe wet me soahng pwukat kasansalohngiehier, pwe kumwail en kak ese wenihmw en kehl me kumwail pahn pidelong loale. Pwe ewen kehl me kumwail pahn pidelong loale iei koluhla oh papidaiski pihl; oh lapwapen dipamwail akan ahpw pahn wiawi sang kisiniei oh sang Ngehn Sarawi.

18 Oh kumwail ahpw pahn mih nan ahl inen oh tehtik me kahluwalahng mour soutuk; iei, kumwail ahpw pidelongehr ni ewen kehlo; kumwail kapwaiadahr kosonned akan en Sahmo oh Sapwellimeo; oh kumwail alehdier Ngehn Sarawio, me kin kadehdehki Sahmo oh Sapwellimeo, ong pweidahn inouo me e ketin wiadahr, me ma kumwail pidelong nan ahlo kumwail pahn alehdi.

19 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, mwurin amwail pidelong nan ahl inen oh tehtiko, I pahn kalelapak rehmwail ma soahng koaros mwahuer? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; pwe kumwail saikinte leledo wasao, ahpw e pahn sang ni mahsen en Krais iangahki amwail tengediong pwoson ih, oh koapwkoapworopworkihte kapai kan me kohsang wiewia pwung kan en ih me ketin sapwellimaniki manaman en kamourala.

20 Eri, kumwail anahne wenlahte mwowe ni amwail pahn tengediong Krais, ahneki koapworopwor unsek, oh poakehng Koht oh aramas koaros. Eri, ma kumwail pahn wenlahte mwowe, kamakamadipwiki mahsen en Krais, oh dadaurete lel ni imwi, kilang, Sahmo mahsaniher: Kumwail pahn ahneki mour soutuk.

21 Oh met, kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, iei met ahlo; oh sohte ehu ahl tohrohr de mwahr ehu me wiawihda pahn lahng me aramas kak komourkihla nan wein Koht. Oh met, kilang, iei met padahk mehlel en Krais, oh ihte oh udahn padahk mehlel en Sahmo, oh Sapwellimeo, oh Ngehn Sarawi, me wia Koht tehmen, kohkohlahte. Ahmen.
2-ne 32:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 32[/font_size][/center]

[i]Tohnleng kan kin mahsen sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi—Aramas akan anahne kapakap oh pein alehdi marain sang Ngehn Sarawi. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]
