1 Oh met, kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I kamehlele me kumwail wie medemedewe nan amwail mohngiong kan duwen dahme kumwail pahn wia mwurin amwail pidelong nan ahlo. Ahpw, kilang, dahme kumwail medemedewehki mepwukat nan amwail mohgngiong kan?

2 Kumwail sohte tamataman me I ndaiong kumwail me mwurin amwail alehdi Ngehn Sarawi kumwail kak lokaiahki mahsen en tohnleng kan? Oh met, ia mwomwen amwail pahn kak lokaiahki mahsen en tohnleng kan ma e sohte kohsang Ngehn Sarawi?

3 Tohnleng kan kin mahsen sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; eri, irail mahsenki mahsen en Krais. Eri, I ndaiong kumwail, kamadipwki mahsen en Krais; pwe kilang, mahsen en Krais kan pahn padahkihong kumwail soahng koaros me kumwail pahn wia.

4 Eri, met mwurin ei koasoaiahier mahsen pwukat, ma kumwail sohte kak wehwehki [mahsen akan] a pwehki amwail sohte peki, depil sohte letelet; eri, [Koht] sohte pahn ketikihong kumwail nan marain, ahpw kumwail uhdahn pahn mehla nan rotorot.

5 Pwe kilang, I pwurehng ndaiong kumwail me ma kumwail pahn pidelong ni wenihmwo, oh alehdi Ngehn Sarawi, e pahn kasalehiong kumwail soahng koaros me kumwail pahn wia.

6 Kilang, met iei padahk mehlel en Krais, oh sohte pil ehu padahk likin met me pahn kohwei lao lel ahnsou me e pahn ketin kasalehiong kumwail pein ih ni paliwar. Oh ni ahnsou me e pahn ketin kasalehiong kumwail pein ih ni paliwar, soahng kan me e pahn mahsenihong kumwail me kumwail pahn nantihong kapwaiada.

7 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, solahr kak koasoia me I kak kapatahiong; Ngehno katokehdier ei koasoai, oh I kin sengiseng pwehki me soupwoson, oh pwehki me wiewia suwed kan, oh me pohnmwahso, oh keptakai en aramas akan; pwe re sohte men rapahki kamarain, de pil wehwehkihla kamarain kesempwal kan, ni ahnsou me mahsen kan kin kohieng irail ni sansal, nin duwen mahsen me kin sansal.

8 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, I kamehlele me kumwail wie medemedewehte nan amwail mohngiong kan; oh I pahtoukihla me I pahn anahne koasoia duwen soahng wet. Pwe ma kumwail pahn rong Ngehno me kin padahkihong aramas en kapakap, kumwail pahn ese me kumwail uhdahn anahne kapakap; pwe ngehn suwedo kin padahkihong aramas en dehr kapakap.

9 Ahpw kilang, I pahn ndaiong kumwail me kumwail anahne kapakap ahnsou koaros, oh sohte luwetala; mwohn amwail pahn wia mehkot ong Kauno kumwail pahn kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Krais, pwe e pahn kasarawihong kumwail amwail doadoahk kan, pwe amwail doadoahk kan en kak wia kamwahupamwail.
2-ne 33:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 33[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ahn Nihpai koasoai kan mehlel—Re kadehdehki Krais—Irail akan me kamehlele Krais pahn kamehlele ahn Nihpai koasoai kan, me pahn wia mehn kadehde mwohn mwoalen kopwungo. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte kak ntingihdi soahng koaros me padahk ong nei aramas akan; I pil sohte koahiek ni nting, duwehte koasoakoasoi; pwe ahnsou me aramas kin koasoai sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawio, manaman en Ngehn Sarawio kin wahwei nan mohngiong en aramas akan.

2 Ahpw kilang, me tohto kin kakeptakiala arail mwohngiong kan ong Ngehn Sarawio, ihme kin kahrehda eh sohte dewe loalerail; eri, irail kin kesehla soahng tohto me ntingdi oh kin wiahki mehkot mwahl.

3 Ahpw ngehi, Nihpai, ntingihdi dahme I ntingihdi, oh I kin kesempwaliki mehlel, ahpw ni mehlel ong nei aramas akan. Pwe I kin kapakapkin irail ahnsou koaros ni rahn, oh ulungei pil kin wisekesengkihla pilen mesei nihpwong koaros; oh I kin likwerih ei Koht sang ni pwoson, oh I ese me e pahn ketin karonge ei likwer.

4 Oh I ese me Kauno Koht pahn kasarawihala ei kapakap kan pwe en wia kamwahupen nei aramas akan. Oh mahsen akan me I ntingihdi sang ni ei soakoahiek e pahn wiahla mehn kakehlail ong irail; pwe e pahn kamantikih irail en wia me mwahu; e pahn kasalehiong irail duwen arail pahpa kahlap ko; oh e kin koasoakoasoaia duwen Sises, oh kamantikihong irail en kamehlele ih, oh dadaurete lel imwi, me iei mour soutuk.

5 Oh e kin ketin kalahdiki dihp, nin duwen padahk mehlel me sansal; eri, sohte aramas pahn lingeringerki mahsen kan me I ntingihdi ihte ma irail audaudki ngehn en tepil.

6 I kin pereniki [padahk] sansal kan; I kin pereniki padahk mehlel; I kin pereniki Sises, pwehki eh ketin doarehsang palingeniet sang ehl.

7 I ahneki limpoak unsek ong nei aramas akan, oh pwoson laud Krais me I pahn tuhwongdi aramas mwakelekel tohto ni mwoahl en kopwungo.

8 I ahneki limpoak unsek ong mehn Suhs akan—I nda mehn Suhs, me wehwehki irail akan me mihwasa me I kohsang ie.

9 I pil ahneki limpoak unsek ong Mehn Liki kan. Ahpw kilang, ei koapworopwor sohte pahn mie ong irail ma irail sohte pahn ehuong Krais, oh pidelong nan ewen kehl tehtiko, oh keid nan ahl ineno me kahluwahlahng mour, oh kekeidlahte nan ahlo lao lel imwin ahnsou en songosongo.

10 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, oh pil mehn Suhs kan, oh kumwail koaros me mih ni keimw en sampah, [kumwail] rong mahsen pwukat oh kamehlel Krais; oh ma kumwail sohte kamehlel mahsen pwukat [a kumwail] kahmehlele Krais. Oh ma kumwail pahn kamehlele Krais a kumwail pahn kamehlele mahsen pwukat, pwe re wia mahsen en Krais, oh e ketikihong ie mahsen pwukat; oh re kin padahkihong aramas me re pahn wia me mwahu.

11 Oh ma mahsen pwukat kaidehn mahsen en Krais, a kumwail tenekih—pwe Krais pahn kasalehiong kumwail, sang ni manaman oh lingan lapalap, me e wia sapwellime mahsen, ni imwin rahn; oh kumwail oh ngehi pahn kesihnen oh kilengpene mwohn mwoaleo; oh kumwail pahn ese me e ketin mahsenihong ie I en ntingihdi mepwukat, mehndahte ei soakoahiek.

12 Oh I kapakapiong Sahmo ni mwaren Krais maaramas tohto nanpwungatail, ma kaiden koaros, en kak komourla nan sapwellime wehi ni imwilahn rahn kesempwalo.

13 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kumwail koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel, oh kumwail koaros me mih ni imwin sampah, I koasoiong kumwail duwehte ngihlehu me peido sang nan pwelpar: Kaselel [ong kumwail] lao lel ni rahn kesempwalo.

14 Oh ong kumwail me sohte pahn alehda sapwellimen Koht kalahngan, oh wauniki mahsen kan en mehn Suhs akan, oh pil ei mahsen akan, oh pil mahsen akan me pahn pwilipwilsang nindauwasen Sihmpwul en Koht, kilang, I rahnmwahuihkin kumwail rahn mwahu poatoapoat, pwe mahsen pwukat pahn kadeik kumwailda ni imwilahn rahno.

15 Pwe dahme I pahn katengehdi pohn sampah wet, pahn kadeik kumwail ni mwoahl en kopwungo; pwe ih met me Kauno ketin mahsanih, oh I pahn kapwaiada. Ahmen.
jacob 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Seikop Rien Nihpai Ohl[/font_size][/center]

Mahsen kan me e kalkalohkihong riehkan. E kasarewehdi ohl emen me kin songosong en kauwehla padahk mehlel en Krais. Ekei iren mahsen me pid duwen poadoapoad en aramas en Nihpai kan.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop oh Sosep nantihong kamahntikih aramas akan en kamehlele Krais oh kapwaiada Sapwellime kosonned akan—Nihpai kepelsalehdala—Wiewia suwed wie lalaudlahr rehn mehn Nihpai kan. Ele Sounpar 544–420 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe kilang, kedekedeo sounpar limeisek limau mwurin ahnsou me Lihai mwesel sang Serusalem; eri, Nihpai kihong ngehi, Seikop, kosonned ehu me pid duwen pileit tikitik kan, me mepwukat ntingdier powe.

2 Oh e kihong ngehi, Seikop, kosonned ehu me I pahn ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat duwen ire kan me I medewe me keieu kesempwal; a I sohte pahnnohn sair, ihte ekiste, duwen poadoapoad en aramas pwukat me kahdaniki aramas en Nihpai.

3 Pwe e ndaiong ie me poadoapoad en nah aramas akan pahn ntingedi pohn nah pileit teiko, oh me I pahn kanaiehng pileit pwukat oh kihong kadaudokei kan, sang nan ehu dih kohlahng nan ehu dih.

4 Oh ma mie padahk me sarawi, de kaudiahl me kesempwal, de kokohp, a I pahn ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat soahng kan me keieu kesempwal, oh ntingihdi uwen me kak koaros, me pid duwen Krais, oh pwe en wia kamwahupen aramas akan.

5 Pwehki [aht] pwoson oh pwunod laud, ni mehlel e kasansalongkiht duwen nait aramas akan, soahng kan me pahn wiawi ong irail.

6 Oh se pil alehdier kaudiahl tohto, oh ngehn en kokohp laud; eri, se esehier duwen Krais oh sapwellime wehi, me pahn kohdo.

7 Eri se kin pwerisekiong doadoahk rehn nait aramas akan, pwe sen kak kangoangehkin irail en kohdo rehn Krais, oh alehda sapwellimen Koht kalahngan, pwe irail en kak pidelong oh kommoaldi reh, pwe e en dehr kahukihla nan sapwellime engieng me irail sohte pahn pidelong, duwehte seri en Israel ko arail pelianda [Koht] nan sapwtehno oh kasongosonge.

8 Eri, se men Koht en ketin seweseikiht se en kak kangoangehki aramas koaros en dehr kahngohdiong Koht, pwe e de pahnengiengda, ahpw aramas koaros en kamehlele Krais, oh medemedewe sapwellime pwoulao, oh iang lokolongki sapwellime lohpwuo oh kanamenek en sampah; eri, ngehi, Seikop, koasonehdi me I pahn kapwaiada koasondi en riei ohl Nihpai.

9 Met Nihpai mahlahr, oh pwehki e esehier me e kereniongehr pahn mehla, ih eri kasarawiala ohl men en wia arail nahnmwarki oh kaun en nah aramas akan ahnsouo, nin duwen mwehin nanmwarki kan.

10 Pwehki aramas akan ar kin inenen poakpoake Nihpai, pwehki e wia soun silepe mwahu men ong irail, pwehki e kin kolokol nein Leipen kedlahso pwe en wiedoandoare irail, oh pwehki e kin pwerisek en doadoahk rahn koaros nan ah mour ong epwelparail—

11 Kahrehda, aramas akan mwahuki katakataman mwareo. Oh mehmen me kin wiahla arail kaun mwuri, aramas akan kin kahdankin irail, keriau en Nihpai, kesiluh en Nihpai, oh kadakadaur kohla, nin duwen mwehin nanmwarki kan; oh ih mwohmw wet me aramas akan kin ekerkinirail, sohte lipilipil ia udahn mwararail akan.

12 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw kepelsalehdala.

13 Met, aramas akan me sohte wia Mehn Leimen, re wia Mehn Nihpai; ahpw, irail kin kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai, Mehn Seikop, Mehn Sosep, Mehn Soram, Mehn Leimen, Mehn Lemuel, oh Mehn Ismael.

14 Ahpw ngehi, Seikop, sohte pahn kapisetikiedi ni adarail akan, ahpw I pahn ekerkinirailte Mehn Leimen kan me kin songosong en kawehla aramas en Nihpai kan, oh irail akan me kempoakepahki Nihpai, I pahn ekerkinirail Mehn Nihpai kan, de aramas en Nihpai, nin duwen mwehin nanmwarki kan.

15 Oh met kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan apw tepida keptakaila nan mohngiongarail kan, pahn keriau en arail nanmwarki, oh re tepida pereniki wiewia tiahk kan me suwed, me duwehte Depit en kawao me kin inengieng pwoudiki lih tohto oh pekehi tohto, oh pil sapwellime pwutak Solomon.

16 Ei, oh irail pil tepida rapahki kohl oh silper oh tepida aklapalapala.

17 Eri ngehi, Seikop, patohwan ong irail mahsen pwukat ni ahnsou me I padahk ong irail nan tehnpas sarawio, mwurinte ei alehdi pwukoah sang rehn Kauno.

18 Pwe ngehi, Seikop, oh riei pwutak Sosep kasarawihongehr samworo oh sounpadahk en aramas pwukat, sang ni pehn Nihpai.

19 Oh se kapwaiada aht pwukoah doadoahk ong Kauno, ni aht alehda pwukoah, me se pahn dipaniki dihp en aramas akan ma se sohte pahn padahkihong irail mahsen en Koht sang ni uwen aht kak koaros; eri, se kin pwerisek en doadoahk pwe ntahrail de kasaminehla aht likou kan; pwe ma soh, ntahrail pahn kasaminehla aht likou kan, oh se pahn sohte kak mwakelekel ni imwin rahno.
jacob 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop koasoaia uwen suwed en noahroke mwohni, pohnmwahso, oh sohte mour mwakelekel—Aramas akan kak nantiengkepwehpwehla pwe re en sewese kempoakeparail—Kauno mahsanih ong Mehn Nihpai kan me sohte ohl emen me pahn pwoudiki lih tohto ahpw lih tehmen—Kauno kin kupwur pereniki mour mwakelekel en lih akan. Ele Sounpar 544–422 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Mahsen kan me Seikop, rien Nihpai pwutak, padahkihong aramas en Nihpai kan, mwurin mehlahn Nihpai:

2 Riei kesempwal oko, met ngehi, Seikop, nin duwen pwukoa me I ahneki ong Koht, en kapwaiada ei pwukoah doadoahk ni mehlel, oh pwe I en kak kamwakelehsang dipamwail akan sang ei likou kan, I kohdo nan tehnpas sarawi rahn wet pwe I en kak kalohkihong kumwail mahsen en Koht.

3 Oh kumwail pein esehier me I kin loaloapwoat nan malipilip en ei pwukoa doadoahk; ahpw rahn wet I toutouki mehlel ei kin nsenohki oh pwunodiki epwelpen palingenamwail kan laud sang mwoweo.

4 Pwe kilang, lel met, kumwail kin peikiong mahsen en Kauno, me I padahkihong kumwail.

5 Ahpw kilang, kumwail rong ie mwahu, oh ese me sang ni sawas en Sounkepikipik en nanleng oh sampah me ketin manaman en wia mehkoaros, I kak ndaiong kumwail duwen amwail madamadau kan, duwen amwail tepidahr wiewia dihp, iei dihp ehu me I suwedki mehlelie, iei, oh Koht kin kupwursuwedkihla.

6 Ei, e kansensuwediala palingeniet oh kahrehda ei roingkipene ei namenek mwohn silangin Sounwiepeio, me I anahne kadehdehiong kumwail duwen suwedlahn amwail mohngiong kan.

7 Oh e pil kansensuwed ong ie, me I anahne doadoahngki koasoai en eimah ong kumwail, mwohn amwail pwoud kan oh noumwail seri kan, pali tohtohn irail me arail pepehm kan mwuterek oh mwakelekel oh keneinei mwohn Koht, me wia mehkot kesempwal ong Koht;

8 Oh I medewe me irail kohdahdo pwe irail en rong mahsen kesempwal en Koht, ei, mahsen me kin kamwahuwiala palingehn me kin ohla.

9 Eri, e katoutouialahr palingeneiet dahme I idihdiong en wiapwehki kosonned kehlailme I alehdi sang rehn Koht, ien padahkihong kumwail duwen amwail wiewia suwed kan, e pahn kalaudehla ohlahn mehteikan me olahr, kaidehn kakehlaka oh kamwauiala arail ohla kan; oh irail akan me saikinte ohla, [e pahn] doakoahki kisin naip palingenerail kan oh kawehla arail madamadau keneinei kan ahpw kaidehn kamakamadipwki mahsen kesemwpwal en Koht.

10 Ahpw, mendahte apwal en pwukoa wet, I pahn wia nin duwen kosonned kehlail inen en Koht, oh ndaiong kumwail duwen amwail suwed oh sakanakan kan, mwohn mesen irail me mohngiong mwakelekel, oh mohngiong karakarahk, oh mwohn silangin Koht Wasa Lapalap.

11 Eri, I anahne ndaiong kumwail ni mehlel nin duwen mahsen sansal en Koht. Pwe kilang, ni ahnsou me I wie kapakapohng Kauno, e ngihl ehu ahpw mahsaniong ie: Seikop, kohdahla nan tehnpas sarawio lakapw, oh kalohkihmahsen me I pahn kihong aramas pwukkat.

12 Oh met kilang, riei ko, met iei mahsen me I pahn kalohngki ong kumwail, me tohto kumwail tepdahier rapahki kohl, oh silper, oh soahngen mete kesempwal koaros, me rek nan sahpwet, me iei sahpw en inou ong kumwail oh kadaudokemwail kan.

13 Oh limen kupwurokong kin poloulikin kumwail mehlel, me kahrehda amwailkepwehpwelahr; oh pwehki ekei kumwail amwail paiamwahu sang ekei riemwail kan, a kumwail pohnmwahsolahr nan mohngiongomwail kan, oh kumwail keptakailahr oh masilehda pwehki amwail likou pweilaud kan, oh kumwail kin kaloke riomwailkan pwehki kumwail kin medewe me kumwail mwahu sang irail.

14 Oh met, riei ko, kumwail lemeleme me Koht ketin kupwurki soahng wet me kumwail kin wiewia? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me, Soh. Ahpw e pahn ketin kerieikumwailla, oh ma kumwail pahn wenlahte nan soahng pwukat, sapwellime kadeik kan pahn madangete kohdohng kumwail.

15 Oh e pahn ketin kasalehiong kumwail me e kak ketin kaweikumwailla, oh sihlangi pahn kadarlangih kumwailte, a kumwail pahn wiepwella!

16 E pahn mwahu ma E pahnketin soikeweisang rehmwail wiewia suwed oh wiewia sapwung wet. Oh, e pahn mwahu makumwail pahn rong mahsen en sapwellime kosonned kan, oh dehr mweidohng pohnmwahsohn nan kapehdomwail kan en kawehla palingenamwail kan!

17 Kumwail medewe riomwail akan duwehte pein kumwail, oh eseirailla koaros oh mweidehng irail amwail dipwsou kan, pwe irail en kak kepwehpwehla duwehte kumwail.

18 Ahpw mwohn amwail pahn rapahki kepwehpwe kan en sampa, kumwail rapahki mahs wein Koht.

19 Oh mwurin amwail pahn koapworopworkihla Krais kumwail pahn alehdi dipwsou en kepwehpwe kan, ma kumwail pahn rapahki; oh kumwail pahn rapahki pwe kumwail en doadoahkihong wiewia mwahu—kalikawime kilisou kan, oh kamwenge me semwehmwe kan, oh kasaledekihala me sensel kan, oh sewesehda me soumwahu oh lokolok kan.

20 Oh met, riei ko, I koasoaiahiong kumwailehr duwen pohnmwahso; oh kumwail me kin kahpwalehla mehn mpamwail kan, oh kalokeirail pwehki amwail pohnmwahsohla nan kapehdamwail kan, soahng kan me Koht ketkihong kumwail, dahme kumwail kak koasoia duwe?

21 Kumwail sohte medemedewe me ih me ketin kapikada mour koaros kin kupwursuwedkihla soahng pwukat? Oh uwen kesempwal en aramas men mwohn silangi pahrekiongmehteio. Oh mour koaros wiawihda sang pwehl; a ih kahrepehute me e ketin kapikinirailda, pwe irail en kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan oh kalinganahla ih kohkohlahte.

22 Oh met I pahn kaimwsekala ei koasoai ong kumwail duwen pohnmwahso. Oh ma I sohte pahn anahne koasoaiahiong kumwail duwen wiewia sapwung laud ehu, mohngiongi pahn perenda mehlel pwehki kumwail.

23 Ahpw mahsen en Koht katoutowihiehla pwehki amwail wiadahr sapwung laud kan. Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih: Aramas pwukat tepidahr kalaudehla arail wiewia susuwed kan; irail sohte kin wehwehki pwuhk sarawi kan, pwe re kin songisong en peikidki arail wiewia tiahk en kamwahl akan, pwehki soahng kan me ntingihedi duwen Depit, oh sapwellime pwutak Solomon.

24 Kilang, Depit oh Solomon pwoudiki lih tohto oh pekehi kei, a I kupwursuwedkihla mwekid wet, Kauno me mahmahsen.

25 Eri, Kauno ketin mahsanih, I kahluwahsang aramas pwukat nan sahpw en Serusalem, sang ni manaman en pehi kat, pwe I en kak kakairada kadaudok pwung ehu sang ni wahn kadaudok en Sosep.

26 Eri, ngehi Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidohng aramas pwukat en duwehte aramas en mahsoko.

27 Eri, riei ohl oko, rong ie, oh rong mwahu mahsen en Kauno: Sohte ohl nan pwungamwail me pahn pwoudiki lih tohto, ahpw e pahn pwoudki lih tehmen; oh e sohte pahn ahneki pekehi men;

28 Pwe ngehi, Kauno Koht, kin pereniki mwakelekel en lih akan. Oh I kin kupwursuwedkihla tiahk en kamwahl; Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

29 Eri, aramas pwukat pahn anahne kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, Kauno ketin mahsanih, ma soh a sahpw wet pahn keriahla pwehki irail.

30 Kauno ketin mahsanih, ma I pahn kupwurki katohtohwehla kadaudoken nei aramas akan, I pahn kin pahngokiong nei aramas akan; ma soh, irail pahn kin rong oh kapwaiada mepwukat.

31 Pwe kilang, ngehi, Kauno, kilangadahr pahtou, oh rongehr mwahiei en serepein kan en nei aramas akan nan sahpw en Serusalem, ei, oh sahpw en nei aramas akan koaros, pwehki wiewia suwed oh sapwung kan en ar pwoud kan.

32 Oh Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, I sohte pahn mweidohng nein aramas pwukat serepein kan, me I kahluwaieisang nan sahpw en Serusalem, en wie sengiseng, oh ngilarail akan kedikedipanein nei aramas akan ohl akan, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

33 Pwe irail sohte pahn kahluwahlang nein nei aramas akan serepein kan en lohdi pwehki ar mpai, ma iei, I pahn pwarek kin irail keria kalok ehu, iei lao irail kamwomwla; pwehki irail sohte pahn kin wia mwekid en tiahk en nenek, duwehte mehn mahs ako, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

34 Oh met kilang, riei ko, kumwail ese me kosonned pwukat kohiengehr atail pahpao, Lihai; eri, kumwail esehier mwoweo; oh kumwail lelohngehr kalokolok laud; pwe kumwail wiadahr mepwukat me kumwail sohte konehng en wia.

35 Kilang, kumwail wiadahr dihp laudsang riatailMehn Leimen ko. Kumwail kamedekalahr mohngiongen amwail pwoud mpai kan, noumwail seri kan solahr koapworopworkin kumwail, pwehki amwail karasaras suwed akan mwohrail; oh nsensuwed en mohngiongarail kan kin leldahla rehn Koht pwe en uhwong kumwail. Oh pwehki sapwellimen Koht mahsen kehlail, me lelohng kumwail, mohngiong tohto melahr, nan ar ohkihla ohla loal akan.
jacob 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Me Nan kapehd mwakelekel kin alehdi sapwellimen Koht mahsen kaselel—Wiewia mwahu en Mehn Leimen kan daulialahr en Mehn Nihpai kan. Seikop kaparkin irail nenek, tiahk en ineng suwed, oh dihp koaros. Ele Sounpar 544–421 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ahpw kilang, ngehi, Seikop, pahn koasoai ong kumwail akan me nan kapehd mwakelekel. [Kumwail] en tengeteng rehn Koht nan amwail madamadau, oh kapakap ong ih sang ni pwoson kehlail, oh e pahn ketikihong kumwail popohl nan amwail kahpwal kan, oh e pahn ketin karonge amwail anahn, oh kadaridihdo kalokopen irail akan me pahn song en kaweikumwailla.

2 Kumwail koaros me nan kapehd mwakelekel, kumwail sarada oh alehdi mahsen kaselel en Koht, oh kamadipwiki sapwellime limpoak; pwe ma amwail madamadau kan tengeteng, kumwail kak kohkohlahte.

3 Ahpw, meid suwed, meid suwed, ong kumwail me sohte nan kapehd mwakelekel, me samin mwohn silangin Koht rahn wet; pwe ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla sahpwet pahn keriahla pwehki kumwail; oh Mehn Leimen kan, me sohte samin duwehte kumwail, mendahte arail riahkihla keria kalok ehu, irail pahn kalokeikumwail lao kumwail kamwomwomwla.

4 Oh ahnsou pahn lelledo mwadang, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla irail pahn sapwenikihla sapwamwail sahpw en sohso, oh Kauno Koht pahn kahluwahsang kumwail me mwahu kan.

5 Kilang, riamwail Mehn Leimen kan, me kumwail kin kailongki pwehki arail samin oh keria me kohdohng pohn kilirail kan, irail mwahu sang kumwail; pwe re saikinte monokehla kosonned en Kauno, me kohieng atail pahpao—me re pahn pwoudikihte lihtehmen, oh sohte pahn pekehikihda emen lih tohrohr, oh sohte tiahk en kamwahl pahn wiawi nanpwungarail.

6 Oh met, irail nantihong kapwaiada kosonned wet; eri, pwehki arail momouriki met, ni arail kin kapwaiada kosonned wet, Kauno Koht sohte pahn kamwomwirailla, ahpw pahn ketin kupwurmahk ong irail; oh ehu rahn irail pahn wiahla aramas meid pai kei.

7 Kilang, ohl pwopwoud kan poakohng arail werek kan, oh lih pwopwoud kan poakohng arail werek kan; ohl oh lih pwopwoud kan poakohng neirail seri kan; oh kahrepen arail soupwoson oh arail kailongkin kumwail pwehki sang wiewia suwed en arail pahpa kahlap ako; eri, ia uwen amwail mwahu sang irail, mwohn silangin Soun Kepikipik lapalapo?

8 Kumwail riei ko, I perki ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhkihla dipamwail kan, pohn kilirail ko pahn pwetepwet sang kilimwail kan, ni ahnsou me kumwail pahn kahluwahla mwohn mwoahl en Koht.

9 Eri, kosonned ehu I pahn kihong kumwail, me iei mahsen en Koht, me kumwail en dehr kauwe irail pwehki pohn kilirail toantoal; de pil kauwe irail pwehki arail samin, ahpw kumwail en tamataman pein amwail samin, oh tamataman me arail samino kohieng irail pwehki arail pahpa kahlap ako.

10 Eri, kumwail pahn tamataman noumwail seri kan, mwomwen amwail kansensuwediala mohngiongarail kan pwehki karasaras me kumwail kasalehiong irail; oh pil, tamataman me pwehki amwail samin, kumwail kakete kahrehiong noumwail seri kan ar pahn mehla, oh diparail akan pahn kohdahng pohmwail ni imwin rahno.

11 Kumwail riei ohl oko, kumwail rong mwahu ei kaweid kan; kapirada pepehm en palingenamwail akan; itik kumwail pwe kumwail en kak pwourda sang nan amwail meir kelik en mehla; oh kumwail sapwadada sang lokolok en ehl pwe kumwail de wiahla tohnleng kan en tepilo, oh lekideklahng nan lehn kisiniei oh suwepwel me iei mehla keriau.

12 Oh met ngehi, Seikop, ndahiongehr aramas en Nihpai kan soahng tohto, kaparkinirail nenek oh tiahk en ineng suwed kan, oh soahngen dihp teikan koaros, ndindahiong irail duwen kalokepen suwed pwukat.

13 Oh epwiki kis ehu en kemwekid enaramas pwukat, me tepidahr ngederla, sohte kak ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat; ahpw arail kemwekid tohto me ntingidi pohn pileit laud ko, oh arail mahwen kan, oh arail pingiping kan, oh mwehi en arail nanmwarki kan.

14 Pileit pwukat kahdaniki pileit kan en Seikop, oh re wiawihda sang pehn Nihpai. Oh I kaimwisekalahr koasoakoasoia duwen mahsen pwukat.
jacob 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Soukohp akan koaros pwongih Sahmo ni mwaren Krais—Sapwellimen Eipraam meirong en Aiseko e wia karasaras en Koht oh Sapwellime Iehroso—Aramas akan anahne ehuong Koht sang ni Tomwo—Mehn Suhs akan pahn kasohwe takai poahsoano. Ele Sounpar 544–421 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met kilang, kedekedeo ngehi, Seikop, kalohk kehlail ong nei aramas akan, (ohekeite ei mahsen kan me I kak ntingihdi, pwehki doahk laud en ntingihdi aht lokaia kan pohn pileit) ahpw se ese me soahng kan me se ntingihdi pohn pileit kan pahn mihmihte;

2 Ahpw ma se sohte pahn kin ntingihdi soahng kan pohn pileit kan re uhdahn pahn ohla oh sohrala; ahpw se kin ntingihdi ekeite mahsen kan pohn pileit kan, me pahn kamarainih nait seri kan, oh pil riat me kesempwal akan, duwen kiht, de duwen arail pahpa kahlap ko—

3 Met soahng wet me se pereniki; oh se kin loaloapwoatohng aht doadoahk en ntingihdi mahsen pwukat pohn pileit kan, ni aht koapworopworki me riat kesempwal akan oh nait seri kan pahn alehdi ni kaping nan mohngiongarail kan, oh wadek pwe re en en kak esehla sang ni peren, duwen tepin arail nohno oh pahpa kan, a kaidehn nsensuwedki de mwamwahliki.

4 Pwe, iei kahrepe wet me se ntingihkihdi soahng pwukat, pwe irail en kak ese me se ese Krais, oh se kin koapworopworiki sapwellime lingan sounpar epwiki kei mwohn eh pahn ketido; oh kaidehn kiht kelehpw me koapworopworkihte sapwellime lingano, ahpw pil soukohp sarawi koaros me kohdo mwoht.

5 Kilang, irail kin kamehlele Krais oh pwongih Sahmo ni mware, oh se pil kin pwongih Sahmo ni mware. Oh ih kahrepe wet me se kin kolokolete kosonned en Moses, me kin kainenehiongpalingenaht reh; oh iei kahrepe wet me [kosonnedo] kasarawihlahr ong aht pahn mour pwung, duwehte me wiawihong Eipraam nan sahpwtehno en peikiong poahngok en Koht pwe en meirongkihla nah pwutak Aisek, me iei karasepen Koht oh sapwellime Iehroso.

6 Eri, se kin rapahki [mahsen en] soukohp akan, oh se kin alehdi kaudiahl tohto oh ngehn en kokohp; oh pwehki kadehde pwukat koaros, se ahneki koapworopwor, oh aht pwoson ahpw inenen kehlailla, lao se kak lokaiahte ni mwaren Sises ah tuhke kan pahn peikiong kiht, de nahna kan, de iloak en nansed akan.

7 Ahpw, Kauno Koht ketin kasalehiongehr kiht aht luwet akan pwe sen kak ese me sang ni sapwellime kalahngan, oh sang ni e ketikihdi pein ih rehn aramas akan, me kahrehda se kak ale manaman en wia soahng pwukat.

8 Kilang, sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk kan me lapalap oh kapwuriamwei. Ia uwen apwal en diar wasa loal en sapwellime rir kan; oh e pahn apwal ong aramas en diarada sapwellime koasoandi kan koaros. Oh sohte aramas emen kak ese sapwellime koasoandi kan e lao pahn ketin kasalehiong ih; eri, riei ko, kumwail dehr soikala kaudiahl kan en Koht.

9 Pwe kilang, sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahsen, aramas pwarada pohn sampah, iei sampah me pil kepikipikda sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahsen. Eri, ma Koht kak mahsente oh sampah ahpw miehda, oh mahsente oh aramas miehda, Eri, dahme e sohte pahn kak mahsenkihongete sampah, de pil soahng kan me wipen nin lime kan nin [sampah], nin duwen kupwure?

10 Eri, riei ko, kumwail dehr song en kaweid Kauno, ahpw ale kaweid sang reh. Pwe kilang, kumwail pein esehier me e kin ketin kaweid sang ni eripit, oh pwuhng, oh kalahngan lapalap, ong wiepen nin lime kan koaros.

11 Eri, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kumwail ehuong ih sang ni tomwpen Krais, sapwellime Iehroso, oh kumwail ahpw pahn iang iasada, nin duwen manaman en iasadao me sang rehn Krais, oh wiahla tepin wahn Krais ong Koht, ahneki pwoson, oh alehdi koapworopwor nan sapwellime lingan mwohn eh pahn ketin kasalehda pein ih ni paliwar.

12 Oh met, kempoakepai ko, kumwail dehr pwuriamweiki soahng pwukat me I ndaiong kumwail; pwe dahme kitail sohte pahn koasoaiahki tomwpen Krais, oh nantihong esehla mehlel duwen ih, oh pil nantihong esehla duwen iasadao oh sampah me pahn kohdo mwuhr?

13 Kilang, riei ko, mehmen me pahn kokohp, en kohpkihdadahme aramas akan kak wehwehki; pwe Ngehno kin ketin mahsen mehlel oh sohte likamw. Eri, e kin mahsanih soahng kan me uhdahn mie, oh soahng kan me uhdahn pahn mie; eri, soahng pwukat kin kasansal ong kitail ni sansal, ong komourpen palingenatail kan. Ahpw kilang, kitail sohte wia soun kadehde kelepw nan soahng pwukat; pwe Koht ketin mahseniongehr soukohp en kawa kan.

14 Ahpw kilang, mehn Suhs akan wia aramas keptakai kei; oh re kailongki mahsen sansal kan, oh kemehla soukohp akan, oh rapahki soahng kan me re sohte kak wehwehki. Eri, pwehki arail maskun, oh re maskunkilahr arail kilikilengla daulih kilello, re uhdahn pahnpwupwudi; pwe Koht ketikihsang irail me sansal akan, oh ketkihong irail soahng tohto me re sohte kak wehwehki, pwehki ihme irail inangih. Oh Koht ketin wia met pwehki arail inangih, pwe irail en dipekelekel.

15 Oh met ngehi, Seikop, alehdier kaweid sang Ngehno I en wia kokohp; pwe I kasawihada sang doadoahk kan en Ngehno me kin mih loaleiet, pwehki mehn Suhs akan arail pahn pwupwudi, irail pahn kasohwe takaio me re kak poahsoanki oh kokouda powe.

16 Ahpw kilang, nin duwen me ntingdi nan pwuhk sarawi kan, me takai wet pahn wiahla poahsoan keieu lapalap, oh kaimwseklahn poahsoan, oh poahsoan keieu mehlel, me mehn Suhs akan kak kokouda powe.

17 Oh met, kempoakepai ko, ia mwomwen soahng wet eh kak pweida, me mwurin arail kasohwe poahsoan mehlelo, arail pahn kak kokouda powe, pwe en kak wiahla arail takaien pwukakeimw?

18 Kilang, riei kempoakepahi ko, I pahn kasalehiong kumwail me rir wet; masohte mehkot me pahn kahrehiong ie Ien luwetala sang ei kin miniminiong Ngehno, oh dipekelekel pwehki sang ni ei pwunodikin kumwail mehlel.
jacob 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Seikop koasoaiahda ehn Sihnos karasaras en tuhkehn olip me epwel mwahu kan oh [tuhkehn olip] en nanwel kan—Re rasohng Israel oh Mehn Liki kan—Kamweremwerpeseng oh kopwurupwurpenehn Israel kasansalada—Koasoaiepen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan oh peneinei en Israel koaros—Mehn Liki kan pahn kapatapatehng Israel—E ahpw pahn lel ahnsou me mwahto pahn isihsla. Ele Sounpar 544–521 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, riei ko, kumwail sohte tamataman wadek mahsen akan en soukohp Sihnos, me e mahsanihong peneinei en Israel, ketihtihki:

2 Rong mwahu, kumwail peneinei en Israel, oh rong ei lokaia kan, [ngehi] soukohp en Kauno.

3 Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih, Kumwail peneinei en Israel, I pahn karasahiong kumwail tuhkehn olip pwoat me epwel mwahu, me aramas emen ale oh apwaliada nan eh mwaht; e ahpw osada, oh mahla, oh tepida mengila.

4 Kedekedeo soumas en nan mwahto ahpw kohla, ih ahpw diarada me nah tuhkehn olipo tepier mengila; e ahpw mahsanih: I pahn kamwakele, oh uhpwelih, oh apwalih mwahu, ma e sou pahn kawosehda kisin rah pwulopwul oh kahpw kan, oh sohte mehla.

5 Kedekedeo e ahpw kamwakele, oh uhpwelih, oh apwalih mwahu nin duwen sapwellime mahsen.

6 Kedekedeo mwurin rahn kei e ahpw tepida kadarala ekei kisin rah pwulopwul oh kahpw kan; ahpw kilang, paliweren tuhkeo tepida mengila.

7 Kedekedeo soumas en nan mwahto ahpw ketin kilangada, oh mahsanihong sapwellime ladu: E kansensuwed ong ie me tuhke pwoatet pahn mehsang ie; eri, kohwei oh parasang ekei rahn tuhkehn olip en nanwel, oh wahdohng ie; oh kita pahn parasang uhdahn rah kan me tepidahr mengila, oh kita pahn kesehlong nan kisiniei pwe re en isihsla.

8 Oh kilang, Kaun en mwahto ketin mahsanih, I pahn kihsang tohto kisin rah pwulopwul oh kapw pwukat, oh I pahn kapatairailla wasa sohte lipilipil me I mwahuki; oh e sohte katepe ma kalewen tuhke pwoatet pahn mehla, ihte I en kak kamourala wahn tuhke ko ong pein ngehi; eri, I pahn ale kisin rah pwulopwul oh kapw pwukat, oh I pahn kapatairailla wasa sohte lipilipil me I mwahuki.

9 Ke pahn ale rahn tuhkehn olip en nanwel kan, oh kapatahiehng ni uhdahn [tuhkehn olipo] pwehn wiliandi rah teiko; oh rah kan me I parasang I pahn kesehla nan kisiniei oh isikirailla, pwe re en dehr kawehla mwahl pwehl en ei mwetuwel.

10 Kedekedeo ladu en Kaun en mwahto ahpw wia nin duwen mahsen en Kaun en mwahto, oh kapatahieng rahn tuhkehn olip en nanwel ko.

11 Oh Kaun en mwahto mahsanih me e pahn anahne uhpwelih, kamwakele, oh apwali mwahu, [e ketin] mahsanih ong sapwellime laduo: E kansensuwed ong ie me tuhke pwoatet pahn mehsang ie; eri, I wia met pwe I en kak kamourala kalewe kan pwe re en dehr mengila, oh pwe I en kak nekidohng pein ngehi.

12 Eri, kohwei; tetehk tuhkehn, oh apwalih mwahu, nin duwen ei mahsen akan.

13 Oh [rah] pwukat I pahn kihla wasa doh kan nan ei mwetuwel, wasa sohte lipilipil me I men kihla ie, e sohte katepe ong uhk; oh I pahn wia met pwe I en kak kamourala uhdahn rahn tuhke ko; oh pil, pwe I en kak nekidohng pein ngehi wah kan ahnsou en rahk; pwe e kansensuwed ong ie me I pahn luhs sang tuhke pwoatet oh wah kan.

14 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw kohla, oh padokedi rahn tuhke mehlel en olipo wasa me doh kan nan mwahto, ekei nan ehu wasa oh ekei nan ekei wasa tohrohr, nin duwen nsene oh wasa me e kupwurki.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin ahnsou reirei eh douer powe, oh Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanih ong sapwellime laduo: Kohdo, kita pahn kohdihla nan mwahto, pwe kita en kak doadoahk nan mwahto.

16 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto, oh pil laduo, kohdilahng doadoahk nan mwahto. Kedekedeo laduo ahpw patohwanohng eh soumaso: Maing, komw ketin k wasaht; kilang tuhkeo.

17 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsaniada tuhkehn olipo me rahn tuhkehn nanwel ko kapatapatehng; oh e wosadahr oh tepier kadarala wah. Oh e mahsaniada me e mwahu; oh wah kan duwehte udahn wah ko me kin wah ni tuhkeo.

18 E ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Kilang, rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan koledier lemwulemwur en kalewe kan, oh kalewen tuhkeo kehlaildahr; oh pwehki kalowehu eh kehlaildahr, rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan wiahda wah mwahu. Eri met, ma kita sohte kapatahieng rah pwukat, tuhkeo pahn mehla. Oh met, kilang, wahn tuhkeht I pahn kak nekidala ong pein ngehi nan ahnsou en rahk.

19 Kedekedeo Kaun en nan mwahto ahpw mahsanihong laduo: Kohdo, kita pahn kohla nan wasa doh kan nan mwahto, oh kilang ma rahn tuhke mehlel ko sou pil kadarala wah tohto, pwe I en kak nekidala wah kan ong pein ngehi nan ahnsou en rahk.

20 Kedekedeo ira ahpw kohla wasa kan me soumaso ekihla ie rahn tuhke mehlel ko, oh e mahsanihong laduo: Kilang mehkan; e ahpw kilangada me keieuo eh kadarala wah tohto; oh e pil kilang me e mwahu. Oh e ahpw mahsanihong laduo: Dolungasang wah kan, oh kaunopada ong ahnsou en rahk, pwe I en kak nekidala ong pein ngehi; e ketin mahsanih, pwe kilang ahnsou werei me I apwalih mwahu, oh e kadarala wah tohto.

21 Kedekedeo laduo ahpw patohwanohng soumaso: Dahme komw ketikido oh padokedi tuhke pwoatet, de rahn tuhkeht wasaht? Pwe kilang, ih wasa me keieu sakanakan nan mwahte pwon.

22 Oh Kaun en nan mwetuwelo ahpw mahsanihong ih: Ke dehr kaweid ie; I eseier me wasaopwel sakanakan; eri, I pahn ndaiong uhk, me I apwalih mwahu ahnsou werei, oh ke kilang me e kadaralahr wah tohto.

23 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Kilang wasaht; kilang I pil poadokedi apwoat rahn tuhkeo; oh ke esehier me pwehl en wasah sakanakan sang me tepo. Ahpw, kilang tuhkeo. I apwalih mwahu ahnsou werei, oh e kadaralahr wah tohto; eri, dolungedi, oh kaunopada ong ahnsou en rahk, pwe I en kak nekidala ong pein ngehi.

24 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Kilang wasaht, oh pil kilang apwoat rah, me I poadokedier; kilang pwe I pil apwaliher, oh e pil kadaralahr wah tohto.

25 Oh e ahpw mahsanih ong laduo: Kilang wasaht oh kilang me kaimwseklahn poad. Kilang, met I poadokedi nan pwehl mwahu; oh I apwalih mwahu ahnsou werei, oh ekeite wasa nan tuhkeo me kadarala wah mwahu, oh ekei wasa nan tuhkeo kadarala wah suwed; kilang, I apwalih mwahu tuhkeht duwehte metei ko.

26 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong laduo: Parasang rah kan me sohte kadarala wah mwahu, oh kesehlong nan kisiniei.

27 Ahpw kilang, laduo patohwanohng ih: Kita sou kamwakele, oh uhpwelih, oh apwalih mwahu ekis werei sang met, ma e sou pahn kadarala wah mwahu ong komwi, pwe komwi en kak kaunopada ong ahnsou en rahk.

28 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto oh sapwellime laduo doula apwalih mwahu wahn mwahto pwon.

29 Kedekedeo mwurin ahnsou reirei, oh Kaun en mwahto mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Kohdo, kita en kohdihla nan mwahto, pwe kita en kak doadoahk nan mwahto. Pwe kilang, imwin ahnsou kerendohr me nektehn leledo; eri, I pahn anahne kaunopadahng rahko, ong pein ngehi.

30 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto oh laduo ahpw kohdihla nan mwahto; oh ira kohlahng tuhkehn olip me rahn tuhke mehlel kan tipwasangehr, oh rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan kapatapatehngehr; oh kilang soangsoangen wah kei katauridier tuhkeo.

31 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw song wahn tuhkeo, ehu ehu soangen wah kan nin duwen ar tohto. Oh Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanih: Kilang, ahnsou werei kita apwalih mwahu tuhke pwoatet, oh I nekid ong pein ngehi wah tohto ahnsou en rahk.

32 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou wet e kadarala wah tohto, oh sohte me mwahu. Oh kilang, mie soangoasoangen wah suwed; oh sohte mwahn katep ehu pahn kohieng ie, mehndahte doadoahk koaros me kitail wiahiongehr; oh met e kansensuwed ong ie me I pahn luhsang tuhke pwoatet.

33 Oh Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanih ong laduo: Dahme kita pahn wiahiong tuhke pwoatet, pwe en kak pwurehng wah mwahu me I kak nekidohng pein ngehi?

34 Oh laduo ahpw patohwanohng soumaso: Kilang, pwehki omwi kapatahiong rahn tuhkehn olip en nanwelo re ahpw kakehlailihala kalowe kan, kahrehda re momour oh re saikinte mehla; eri komw mahsaniher me re mwamwahute.

35 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Tuhke pwoatet sohte mwahn katepe ong ie, oh kalowe kan sohte katepe ong ie ma e pahn kin kadarala wah suwed.

36 Ahpw, I ese me kalowe kan mwahu, oh kahrepe wet me I kin apwapwalihkinirailte; oh pwehki arail kehlail mehlel me kahrehda arail kak kadarala wah mwahu sang ni rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan.

37 Ahpw kilang, rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan keirda oh kehlail sang kalowe kan; oh pwehki rahn tuhkehn nanwel kan arail kehlail sang kalowe kan, ihme kahreda e kadaralahr wah suwed tohto; oh pwehki e kadaralahr wah suwed tohto ke kilangehr me e tepidahr pahn mehla; oh e pahn kereniongehr mahla, kahrehda e pahn lekdekiong nan kisiniei, ihte ma kita kak wia mehkot me pahn kamourala.

38 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime laduo: Kita kohdihla wasa doh kan nan mwahto, oh kilang ma rah kan me wia rahn tuhke mehlel ko pil kadaralahr wah suwed.

39 Kedekedeo ira ahpw kohdihla wasa doh kan nan mwahto. Kedekedeo ira ahpw pil kilangada wahn rahn tuhke mehlel ko pil sakanakanlahr; ei, me keieuo oh keriauo oh me pil mehn mwuhr; oh irail koaros pil sakanakanla.

40 Oh wah suwed en mehn mwuhro powehdi wasa mwahu en nan tuhkeo me kin kadarala wah mwahu, lao raho mengila oh mehla.

41 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw tentenihr, oh mahsanihong laduo: Dahme I anahne wiahiong ei mwetuwele?

42 Kilang, I ese wahn mwetuwelet pwon sakanakanla, ahpw kaidehn mehkan. Oh met mehkan me kin kadarala wah mwahu pil iangehr sakanakanla; oh met tuhke kan koaros nan ei mwetuwel sohte katepe ihte ar pahn palapaldi oh lekdekiong nan kisiniei.

43 Oh kilang mehn mwuhre, me raho mengilahr, I poadokedi nan pwel mwahu; ei, mehlel wasa me I kesempwalki sang wasa koaros nan sahpw en ei mwetuwel.

44 Oh ke kilangehr me I lupukidihsang [tuhke] me kapwekapwe wasakiset, pwe I en kak wiliankihdi tuhke pwoatet nan dewe.

45 Oh ke kilangehr me mie wasa kis me kadaralahr wah mwahu, oh pil ekis wasa me kadaralahr wahu suwed; oh pwehki ei sohte katipwasang rah kan [me suwed] oh keseirailla nan kisiniei, kilang, re tohto sang me mwahuo kahrehiong e mengilahr.

46 Oh met, kilang, mendahte epwel mwahu koaros me kita wiahiongehr ei mwetuwel, tuhke kan koaros sakanakanlahr, kahrehda re sohte wah mwahu; oh mepwukat I koapworopworkihla me I pahn nekidala mwurin ahnsou en rahk, ong pein ngehi. Ahpw, kilang, re pil duwehlahr tuhkehn olip en nanwel, oh re sohlahr katepe ihte re konehng paldihsang oh lekidekilong nan kisiniei; oh e kansensuwed ong ie me I pahn luhsang irail.

47 Ahpw dahme I kak wiahiong ei mwetuwel me I sohte wia? E sohte itar doadoahk enpehi kat me kahrehiong ie en sohte apwalih mwahu? Soh, I apwalih mwahu, oh I uhpwelih, oh I kamwakele, oh I koiasih; oh I kapakapahwei pehi kat kereniong rahno pwon, oh imwio kerendohr. Oh e kansensuwed ong ie me I pahn lupukidihsang tuhkehn ei mwetuwel pwon, oh lekdekiong nan kisiniei pwe re en isihsala. Ihs me kasapwungehla ei mwetuwele?

48 Kedekedeo laduo ahpw patohwanohng eh soumaso: Kaidehn pwehki [tuhke kan] en omw mwetuwel eh reireila—rah kan sou kehlail sang kalowe kan me mwahu? Oh pwehki rah kan ar kehlail sang kalowe kan, kilang re keirada mwadang sang kehlail en kalowe kan, oh wie kehkehlaila. Kilang, I nda, kaidehn ih kahrepe wet me kahrehda tuhkehn nan sapwellimwomwi mwetuwel sapwungkilahr?

49 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwahto ahpw mahsanihong laduo: Kita kohla oh pelehdihsang tuhke kan en mwahto oh kesehlong nan kisiniei, pwe irail dehr kawehla mwahl pwehl en ei mwaht, pwe I wiahier soahng koaros. Dahme I kak wiahiong ei mwetuwel me I sohte wia?

50 Ahpw, kilang, laduo ahpw patohwanohng Kaun en mwetuwelo: [Komwi] mweidehng ekis ahnsou.

51 Oh Kauno ketin mahsanih: Ei, I pahn mweidehng ekis ahnsou, pwe e kansensuwed ong ie ma I pahn luhs sang tuhkehn ei mwetuwel.

52 Eri, kita ale rah kat me kita poadokedi wasa doh kan nan ei mwaht, oh kita kapwurehiong ni tuhke me re kohsang ie; oh kita parasang rah kan me wah keieu suwed ni tuhkeo, oh kapatahieng rahn tuhke mehlel ko pwe en weliandi.

53 Oh I pahn wia met pwe tuhkeo en dehr mehla, pwe I en kak kamourala kalowe kan ong pein ei koasondi.

54 Oh, kilang, kalowen rahn tuhke mehlel ko, me I poadokseli wasa kan me I men poadok ie, re momourte; eri, pwe I en kak kamourirailla ong pein ei koasondi, I pahn ale rah kan en tuhke pwoatet, oh I pahn kapatahieng ni tuhke ko. Ei, I pahn kapatahieng rah kan en tuhkeo me re tepin wosasang ie, pwe I enkak kamourala kalowe kan ong pein ngehi, pwe ahnsou me re pahn kehlailla re pahn kak kadarala wah mwahu ong ie, oh I pahn pereperenkihte wahn ei mwetuwel.

55 Kedekedeo ira kihsang ni uhdahn tuhkeo [rah kan] me sakanakanla, oh kapatapatehng ni tuhke kan [me kohsang uhdahn tuhkeo], me pil sakanakanla.

56 Oh irail pil ale [rahn kan en] tuhke kan me sakanakanlahr, oh kapatapatehng ni tuhkeo me re tepin wosasang ie.

57 Oh Kaun en nan mwahto mahsanihong laduo: Ke dehr parasang rah sakanakan kan ni tuhke kan, ihte rah kan me keieu suwed; oh ke pahn kapatahieng irail nin duwen dahme I pahn ndaionguhk.

58 Oh kita pahn pwurehng apwalih mwahu tuhkehn nan mwetuwelet, oh kita kamwakele rah kan; oh kita pahn parasang ni tuhke kan rah me mahlahr kan, me uhdahn pahn mehla, oh kesehlahng nan kisiniei.

59 Oh met I pahn wia, pwe kalowe kan en kak kehlailla pwehki arail mwahu; oh pwehki wekideklahn rah kan, pwe me mwahu en kak powehdi me suwed.

60 Oh pwehki ei kamourala rahn tuhke mehlel ko oh kalowe kan, oh rahn tuhke mehlel kan me I kapatahieng ni tuhke me re tepin wosasang ie, oh kamourala kalowen tuhkeo me re tepin wosasang ie, pwe tuhke kan en ei mwetuwelet en kak pwurehng kadar wah mwahu; oh pwe I en kak ahniki peren pwehki wahn ei mwetuwel, oh pwe I en kak pereniki mehlel ei kamourala kalowe kan oh tepin wah en rah kan—

61 Eri, kohwei, oh likwerih ekei ladu, pwe kitail en doadoahk loalloapwoat nan mwahtet, pwe kitail en kak kaunopada ahlo, pwe I en kak pwurehng kapwurehdo uhdahn wahn tuhkeo, me wia wahn tuhke mwahu oh keieu kesempwal sang wah koaros.

62 Eri, kitail kohla oh kaimwisengkihla atail doadoahk kehlail, pwe kilang imwilah kerendohr, oh iei met kaimwiseklahn ei pahn kamwakele ei mwetuwel.

63 Kapatahieng rah kan; tepkihda me ikmwurio pwe re en kak tihengala, oh me tihengalao pahn ikmwurihla, oh uhpwelih tuhke kan, me mah oh me pwulopwul, me tihengo oh ikmwurio; oh me ikmwurio oh me tihengo, pwe koaros en kak kaimwisengkihla ar pahn pwurehng epwel mwahu.

64 Eri, kaimwisengkihla uhpwelih irail, kamwakele irail, koiasih irail, pwe imwilah kerendohr. Oh ma kaimwiseklahn doadoahk en kapatapat pwukat pahn keirda, oh kadareiei uhdahn wahn tuhkeo, eri kumwail pahn kaunopada mwohrail, pwe re en kak keirda.

65 Oh ni arail pahn tepida keirda kumwail pahn kamwakelehsang rah kan me kin kadarala wah suwed, nin duwen kehlail en rah mwahuo oh ia uwe; oh kumwail sohte pahn wiahkinteieu kamwakelehsang koaros me sakanakan, pwe kalowe kan de nohn kelail sang me kapatapatehngo, oh me kapatapatehng pahn mehkihla, oh I ahpw luhsang tuhke kan en ei mwetuwel.

66 Pwe e kansensuwed ong ie me I pahn luhs sang tuhkehn ei mwaht; eri kumwail pahn kamwakelehsang [rah] sakanakan kan nin duwen [rah] mwahu eh pahn kekeirida, pwe kalowe oh powe en kak ahneki soahngen kehlailteieu, lao [rah] mwahu kan pahn powehdi [rah] sakanakan kan, oh me sakankan kan pahn palidi oh lekidekiong nan kisiniei, pwe re en dehr kawehla mwahl pwehl en ei mwetuwel; oh I pahn koakoahkehsang me suwed kan sang nan ei mwetuwel.

67 Oh rahn tuhke mehlel ko pahn pwurehng kapwurehiong nan tuhke mehlelo;

68 Oh I pahn ale rahn tuhke mehlel ko oh kapatahieng ni rahn tuhke kan ni tuhke mehlelo; oh met iei wiepe me I pahn pwurehng kapwurehkinirailpene, pwe irail en kak pwurehng kadareiei uhdahn wahn tuhkeo, oh re pahn wiahla ehu.

69 Oh [rah] sakanakan pahn lekidekla, ei, sang wasa koaros nan sahpw en ei mwetuwel; pwe kilang, ih kaimseklahn ei pahn kamwakele ei mwetuwel.

70 Kedekedeo Kaun en mwetuwelo ahpw kadarala sapwellime laduo; oh laduo ahpw kohla oh wia nin duwen dahme Kauno mahsanihong, oh wahdo ekei ladu; oh irail malaulau.

71 Oh Kaun en mwetuwelo mahsanihong irail: [Kumwail] kohwei, oh doadoahk nan mwetuwelo uwen amwail kak. Pwe kilang, met iei kaimwiseklahn ei pahn apwalih mwahu ei mwetuwel; pwe imwilah kerendohr, oh ahnsou en rahk pahn nektehn leledo; oh ma kumwail pahn iang ie doadoahk uwen amwail kak kumwail pahn perenki wah kan me I pahn nekidohng pein ngehi nan ahnsou keren.

72 Kedekedeo ladu kan ahpw kohla oh wia doadoahk uwen arail kak; oh Kaun en mwetuwelo iang irail doadoahk; oh irail peikiong kosonned akan en Kaun en mwetuwelo ni soahng koaros.

73 Oh e pwurehng tepida mie uhdahn wahn tuhke kan en nan mwahto; oh rah tuhke mehlel kan tepida keirada oh pweida mehlel; oh rah sakanakan kan tepida perpersang oh lekidekla; oh re kin apwalih pwe kalowe kan oh rah kan en pahrek, nin duwen kehlailih koaros.

74 Oh irail ahpw pwerisekiong doadoahk nin duwen mahsen akan en Kaun en mwetuwelo, lao [rah] sakanakan akan lekidekiei sang nan mwetuwelo, oh Kauno ahpw kamourala tuhkeo ong pein ih oh wah kan pwuralahng uhdahn wahn tuhkeo; oh re wiahla warteieu; oh wah kan duwepenehte; oh Kaun en mwahto nekidohng pein ih wah ko, met iei me keieu kesempwal ong ih sangete ni tapio.

75 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Kaun en mwahto kilangada me sapwellime wahn tuhke ko mwahu, oh sapwellime mwetuwelo solahr sakanakan, e ahpw ekerpene sapwellime ladu ko, oh mahsanihong irail: Kilang, ni kaimwiseklahn atail apwalih mwahu ei mwetuwel; oh kumwail dehdehkier me I wiahiong nin duwen nsenei; oh I kamouralahr uhdahn wahn tuhkeo, me mwahuo, duwehte nin tapio. Oh meid pai kumwail; pwehki amwail iang ie wia doadoahk pwerisek nan ei mwaht, oh kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, oh pwurehng wadohng ie uhdahn wahn tuhke ko, oh ei mwetuwel solahr sakanakan, oh me suwed lekideklahr, kilang kumwail pahn iang ie pereperen pwehki wahn ei mwetuwel.

76 Pwe kilang, ahnsou reirei I pahn nekidohng pein ngehi wahn ei mwetuwelmwurin ahnsou en rahk, me pahn mwadang lelledo; oh pwehki kaimwseklahn ahnsou me I pahn apwalih mwahu ei mwetuwel, oh kamwakele, oh uhpwelih, oh kesehiong koiasi loale; Eri I pahn nekidohng pein ngehi wahn tuhke ko, erein ahnsou werei, nin duwen dahme I koasoaiahier.

77 Oh ni ahnsou me wah suwed ko pahn pwurehng pwarada nan ei mwetuwel, I ahpw pahn kihpene me mwahu oh me suwed; oh me mwahu kan I pahn nekidohng pein ngehi, oh me suwed kan I pahn kesehlahng nan dewe. Oh ahnsou en rahko oh imwio pahn lelledo; oh I pahn isikalla ei mwetuwel.
jacob 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno pahn ketin kapwurehdo Israel ni imwin rahn akan—Sampah pahn mwasingkihla kisiniei—Aramas akan pahn anahne idawehn Krais pwe re en kak pitsang lehn kisiniei oh suwepel. Ele Sounpar 544–421 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kilang, rieiko, nin duwen ei ndaiong kumwail me I pahn kohpada, kilang, iet ei kokohpen—me soahng kan me soukohp Sihnos mahsanih uhdahn pahn pweida, ninduwen peneinei en Israel, e karasahiong irail tuhkehn olip me epwel mwahu.

2 Oh rahno me e pahn pwurehng ketikihdo lime kan, keriapak en ahnsou, pwe en kapwurehdo sapwellime aramas, ieiih rahno me wia kaimiseklahnahnsou, me sapwellimen Kauno ladu kan pahn kohwei sang ni sapwellime manaman, pwe re en apwalih mwahu oh kamwakele sapwellime mwetuwelo; oh mwuri imwilao ahpw pahn leledo.

3 Oh ia uwen kapai ong irail akan me pahn pwerisekiong doadoahk nan sapwellime mwetuwelo; oh ia uwen keriah ong irail akan me pahn lekidekila sang nan pein dewerail! Oh sampah pahn mwasingkihla kisiniei.

4 Oh ia uwen kupwur kalahngan en atail Koht ong kitail, pwe e kin ketin tamataman peneinei en Israel, kalowe kan oh rah kan koaros; oh e kin ketin kapahwei nin lime kan ong irail koaros rahno pwon; oh irail kin keptakai oh wia aramas aklapalap; ahpw irail akan me pahn sohte ahneki mohngiong keptakai pahn komourla nan wein Koht.

5 Eri, riei kesempwal ko, I peki rehmwail ni ngidingid sang ni lokaia mehlel, me kumwail pahn koluhla, oh kohdo sang nimohngiong unsek, oh mehlelong Koht duwehte e pahn ketin mehleliong kumwail. Ohsang nisapwellime kalahngan e ketin kapkapahweite lime ong kumwail ni marain en rahn, kumwail dehr kakeptakaila amwail mohngiong kan.

6 Ei, rahn wet, ma kumwail pahn rong kepitiehu, dehr kakeptakaila amwail mohngiong kan; pwe dahme kumwail pahn mehkihla?

7 Pwe kilang, mwurin amwail pahn momourki mahsen en Koht ahnsou koaros, dah, kumwail pahn kin wah suwed, pwe kumwail en palidi oh lekidekiong nan kisiniei?

8 Kilang, dah, kumwail pahn soikalahte mahsen pwukat? Kumwail pahn soikalahte mahsen en soukohp akan; kumwail pahn soikalahte mahsen kan koaros me pid duwen Krais, mwurin mwurin aramas tohto ar kalohngkier duwen ih; oh soikala mahsen mwahu en Krais, oh manaman en Koht, oh kisakis en Ngehn Sarawi, oh kawehla pepehm en Ngehn Sarawi, oh lahlahwe koasoandi lap en poadoandoarlao, me kasansaldahr mwohmwail?

9 Kumwail sohte ese me ma kumwail pahn wia mepwukat, manaman en poadoandoarlao oh iasadao, me kohsang rehn Krais, pahn kapwureikumwaildo en kesihnenda mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Koht ni amwail pahn namenek oh pwukoahkidi amwail sapwung kan?

10 Oh nin duwen manaman en pwuhng pahrek, pwehki kopwung pahrek sohte kak en sohte pweida, kumwail uhdahn pahn kohla nan lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me lullulih sekehkun, oh me edinieih kin kohkohda kohkohlahte, lehn kisiniei oh suwepel me iei lokolok soutuk.

11 Eri, riei kempoakepai ko, kumwail koluhla, oh pidelong nan ewen kehl ineno, oh douluhlahte nan ahl tehtiko, lao kumwail pahn alehdi mour soutuk.

12 Eri kumwail loalokongla; dahme I pahn pil kak koasoia?

13 Eri, I pahn kamwurkumwailla, lao I pahn tuhwong kumwail ni mwoalen kopwung mwahu en Koht me wia wasa kamasepwehk oh kasaloh ong aramas suwed kan. Ahmen.
jacob 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Serem kahmahmki Krais, akamaiong Seikop, oh men kilangmanaman kapwuriamwei, oh Koht ahpw kaloke—Soukohp akan koaros kadehdehdahr duwen Krais oh Sapwellime Tomwo—Mehn Nihpai kan kin sansaruwarusel erein arail mour, ipwidi nan apwal, oh mehn Leimen kan kailongkin irail. Ele Sounpar 544–421 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin sounpar kei douwehr powe, mie ohl emen kohdo rehn aramas en Nihpai kan, me adaniki Serem.

2 Kedekedeo e ahpw tepida kalohkehng aramas akan, oh padapadahngkihong irail me sohte Krais. Oh e kalohngki soahng tohto me pitihedi aramas akan; oh met e wia pwe en kak kawehla padahk mehlel en Krais.

3 Oh e pwerisekiong doadoahk pwe en kak kahluwahsang mohngiong en aramas akan, lao e ahpw kahluwahsang mohngiong [en aramas] tohto; oh e ese me ngehi, Seikop, kin pwoson Krais me pahn ketido, eri e kin nantihong rapahki ahnsou mwahu me e pahn kak kohdo rehi.

4 Oh e wia aramas loalokong men, pwehki e marainiki unsek wiepen koasoakoasoi en aramas akan; eri, e kin doadoahngki koasoi en lidip kan, oh kadek lokaia, nin duwen manaman en tepilo.

5 Oh e kaskasik me e pahn kawehla ei pwoson, mehndahte kaudiahl tohto oh soahng tohto me I kilangehr me pid duwen mepwukat; pwe ni mehlel I kilangehr tohnleng kei, oh irail sewese ie. Oh I pil rongehr kepitien Kauno mahsanihong ie mahsen pwukat, ekeiahnsou; eri, I sohte kak itikekda.

6 Oh kedekedeo e ahpw kohdo rehi, oh iet mwomwen eh koasoi ong ie, ndinda: Riei ohl Seikop, I pwangalahr rapahki ahnsou mwahu me I pahn kak koasoi ong komwi; pwe I kin rong oh ese me komw kin kokohseli, kalakalohngkiseli dahme komw kin kahdaniki rongamwahu, de padahk mehlel en Krais.

7 Oh ke kahluwahsangehr aramas tohto me kahrehda arail sapwungala katiasang nan sapwellimen Koht ahlo, oh solahr kin kapwaiada kosonned en Moses kan me iei ahl pwungo; oh wekidalahr kosonned en Moses ong pwongih aramas emen me komw nda me pahn kohdo sounpar epwiki kei mwuhr. Oh met kilang, ngehi, Serem, ndaiong komwi me met iei [padahk] lahlahwe; pwe sohte aramas emen kak ese soahng pwukat; pwe komwi sohte kak esehda soahng kan me pahn kohdo. Oh ih mwomwen koasoi me Serem peliankin ie.

8 Ahpw kilang, Kauno Koht ketikihongehr loaleiet sapwellime Ngehno, I ahpw kasarowehdi nan ah lokaia koaros.

9 Oh ngehi kalelapak reh: Ke kahmahmiki Krais me pahn ketido? E ahpw sapengki: Ma e pahn mie Krais I sohte pahn kahmahmiki; ahpw I ese me sohte Krais, oh saikinte mie, oh sohte douluhl pahn mie.

10 I ahpw kalelapak reh: Ke kamehlele pwuhk sarawi kan? E ahpw sapengki, Ei.

11 Oh I ndaiong ih: Eri ke sohte wehwehki; pwe re kadehdehki mehlel duwen Krais. Kilang, I ndaiong uhk me sohte soukohp men me wiahda nting, de kokohp, ihte irailkin koasoakoasoia duwen Krais.

12 Oh kaidehn ihte met—e pil kasansaldahr ong ie, pwe I rongehr oh kilangehr; oh e kasansaldahr ong ie sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; eri, I ese ma tomw sohte wiawihda, aramas koaros pahn salongala.

13 Kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong ie: Kasalehiong ie ehu manaman kapwuriamwei sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, duwen me ke kin inenen wehwehki.

14 Oh I ahpw kalelapak reh: Ihs ngehi pwe I en kasongosonge Koht en ketin kasalehiong uhk ehukilel pid duwen mehkot me esehier me mehlel? Ahpw ke pahn kahmahmki, pwehki kowe nein tepilo. Eri, kaidehn nsenei en pweida; ahpw ma Koht pahn kalokeiuk, a en wia ehu kilel ong kowe me e ketin sapwellimaniki manaman, nanleng oh ni sampah; oh pil, Krais pahn ketido. Oh kupwuromwihte en pweida, Maing Kaun, kaidehn insenei.

15 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ngehi, Seikop, koasoaiahier koasoai pwukat, manaman en Kauno ketidihdo powe, e ahpw pwupwidiong nan pwehlo. Kedekedeo mie meapwapwalihki erein rahn kei.

16 Kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong aramas akan: Kumwail kohpene lakapw, pwe I pahn mehlahr; eri, I men koasoi ong aramas akan koaros mwohn ei pahn mehla.

17 Kedekedeo mandahn rahno pokono ahpw pokonpene; e ahpw koasoi sansal ong irail oh kapwungala soahng kan me e padahkihong irail, oh kadehdehki Krais, oh manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, oh doadoahk en tohnleng kan.

18 Oh e ndaiong irail ni sansal, me e lohdi pahn manaman en tepilo. Oh e koasoia duwen ehl, oh mour soutuk, oh lokolok soutuk.

19 Oh e nda: I masepwehk pwe mwein I wiadahr dihpo me sohte mahkpe, pwe I wiahda likamw ong Koht; pwe I kahmahmiki Krais, oh nda me I kamehlele pwuhk sarawi kan; ahpw re kadehdehki mehlel duwen ih. Oh pwehki ei likamw ong Koht I masepwehngkihda kowahlap me ei repenpwung pahn apwal; ahpw I wehkada ong Koht.

20 Kedekedeo mwurin eh ndahier koasoai pwukat e ahpw solahr kak koasoai, oh e kadarala ngene.

21 Oh ahnsou me pokono kadehdehier mepwukat me e koasoiadahr mwohn e pahn mweidalahr ngeneo, irail pwuriamweikihla mehlel; lao manaman en Koht ketidihdo pohrail, oh tiada pohrail kahrehda arail pwupwidi nan pwehlo.

22 Eri, soahng wet kaperen ong ie, Seikop, pwe I peki rehn Semeio me ketiket nanleng; pwe e ketin karonge ei pekipek oh sapengala ei kapakap.

23 Kedekedeo popohl oh limpoak en Koht pwurehng kopwurupwurdo rehn aramas akan; oh irail onopki pwuhk sarawi kan, oh solahr rong padahk kan en ohl suwed menet.

24 Kedekedeo soahngen wiepe tohto wiawi pwe en sewese mehn Leimen kan en alehdi oh kapwurehdohng mehn Leimen kan kamarain en padahk mehlelo; ahpw e sohte katepe, pwe irail pereniki mahwin oh kakerehdi nta, oh irail ahneki kailok poatoapoat ong kiht riarail akan. Oh irail kin nantiheng uwen arail kak koaros en kaweikitala ahnsou koaros.

25 Eri, aramas en Nihpai kan kin sinsilehkin irail neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh arail kehlail koaros, koapwkoapworopworki Koht oh paip en komourparail; eri, irail kin doudoulahte, powehdi arail imwintihti kan.

26 Kedekedeo ngehi, Seikop, ahpw mahlahr; oh poadoapoad en aramas pwukat kin ntingdi nan pileit en Nihpai teiko, eri, I pahn kaimwisekalahr poadoapoad wet, oh kadehdehki me I ntingihdier nin duwen marain koaros me I ese, sang ni ei koaskoasoia me ahtahnsou pil sohralahr, oh aht mour pil sohrala rasehng ouraman ehu, pwehki aht wia aramas me kelehpwlahr oh mehlel kei, sansaruwaruseli, pekeus sang nan Serusalem, ipwidi nan apwal, nan sapwtehn, oh riat akan kailongkinkiht, me kin kahrehda mahwin oh pingiping; eri, se kin mwahmwahiei erein aht ahnsou.

27 Oh ngehi, Seikop, kilangada me I nektehn kohdihlahng nan ei sousou; eri, I ndaiong nei pwutak Inos: Ale pileit pwukat. Ngehi eri padahkihong soahng kan me riei pwutako, Nihpai, kehkehlingkihong ie, oh e inoukihong ie me e pahn peikiong kehkehlik wet. Oh I kaimwseklahr ei nting pohn pileit pwukat, me iei nting mwotomwot; oh ei rahn mwahu ong mehmen me pahn wadek, a I koapworopworki me riei tohto pahn wadek ei koasoai kat. Riei ko, kaselehlia.
enos 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Inos[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Inos kapakap ni ngidingid oh alehdi mahkpen dipe kan—Kepitien Kauno kohdohng nan ah madamadau, inoukihong me ehu rahn mehn Leimen kan pahn komourla—Mehn Nihpai kan nantihong kapwurehdo mehn Leimen kan—Inos pereniki ah Soundoar. Ele Sounpar 420 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, kedekedeo ngehi, Inos, sang ni ei ese me ei pahpa wia ohl pwung men—pwehki e padahkihong ie ni pein ah lokaia, oh pil duwen kaiahn mwahu oh kaweid en Kauno—oh meid pai mwaren ei Koht pwehki kahrepe wet—

2 Oh I pahn ndaiong kumwail duwen poadoar me I wia mwohn Koht, mwohn ei alehdi mahkpen dipei kan.

3 Kilang, I kolahng kesik mahn nanwelo; oh mahsen akan me I kin rong sang rehn ei pahpa me e kin koasoia duwen mour soutuk, oh peren en souleng kan, kihpehdi nan ei mohngiongi.

4 Oh palingeniet duhpeklahr; oh I kelipwikihdi mwohn silangin Sounwiepeio, oh I ahpw likweriong ni kapakap ngidingid oh kehlail pwehki palingeniet; oh rahno pwon I wie kapakapiki; ei, oh ni eh wasapwongidier I pil ngihl laudida lao ngiliet leldahla nanleng.

5 A ngihl ehu apw peido rehi, ketihtihki: Inos, dipwomw kan lapwadahr, oh meid pai kowe.

6 Oh ngehi, Inos, ese me Koht sohte kin likamw; eri, nan kapehd toutou me I ahniki apw sohrasangieier.

7 Oh I nda: Maing Kaun, ia mwomwen met kak wiawi?

8 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong ie: Pwehki ahmw pwoson Krais, me ke saikinte rong de kilang. Oh sounpar tohto mwohn eh pahn ketin kasalehda pein ih ni paliwar; eri, kohkohwei, pwe ahmw pwoson kaunsekeiukalahr.

9 Eri, mwurin ei rongehr mahsen pwukat I tepida kehn ei inengieng en sewese riei, mehn Nihpai kan; ngehi eri tepida kapakapkin irail ong Koht ni ngidingid sang loaleiet pwon.

10 Oh ni ahnsou me I wie nannanti ni palingehn, kilang, kepitien Kauno ahpw pwurehng peidohng ie nan ei madamadau, mahsanih: I pahn pwarek riomw kan nin duwen arail pahn loalopwoatohng kapwaiada ei kosonned akan. I kihong irailehr sahpw wet, oh sahpw sarawi ieu met; oh I pahn keriahla ma wiewia suwed pahn wiawi; eri, I pahn pwarek irail nin duwen dahme I kosoiahier; oh arail wiewia sapwung kan me I pahn kalokekinirail pahtou.

11 Oh ngehi, Inos, mwurin ei rongehr mahsen pwukat, ei pwoson Kauno tepida kehlaila; oh I ahpw nantihlahte ahnsou reirei wie kapakapkihong riei, mehn Leimen kan.

12 Kedekedeo mwurin ei kapakapehr oh wia uwen ei kak koaros, Kauno mahsanihong ie: Pwehki omw pwoson, I pahn kapwaiong uhk nin duwen me komw kin inengieng.

13 Oh met kilang, iet dahme I inengieng sang reh—Ma e peien wiawi, me nei aramas akan, Mehn Nihpai kan, pahn pwupwudiong nan diparail akan, oh ma irail pahn kamwomwomwla, ah Mehn Leimen kan en deh kamwomwomwla, pwe Kauno Koht en ketin nekidala poadoapoad en nei aramas akan, Mehn Nihpai kan; sang ni manaman en nin lime sarawi kan, pwe [poadoapoado] en kak kohieng Mehn Leimen kan ehu rahn, pwe re en kak alehdi mour soutuk—

14 Pwehki ahnsou wet aht nannantiheng kapwureiraildohng pwoson mehlelo sohte katepe. Oh ni arail lingeringer, re kahukihlahr, me re pahn song, re en kaweikitala oh kauwehla aht poadoapoad akan, oh pil tiahk koaros en aht pahpa kahlap ako.

15 Eri, Pwehki ei esehier me Kauno Koht pahn kak ketin nekidala aht poadoapoad akan, eri I doulahte ngidingidki ei kapakapohng ih, pwe e mahsanihongiehier: Soahng koaros me ke pahn peki ni pwoson, ni ahmw kamehlele me ke pahn alehdi ni mwaren Krais, ke ahpw pahn alehdi.

16 Oh I ahneki pwoson, oh I kapakapohng Koht pwe en kak nekidala poadoapoad akan; oh e ketin inoukihong ie me e pahn ketikiheng Mehn Leimen kan ni ahnsou me e pahn kupwurki.

17 Oh ngehi, Inos, ese me e pahn pweida nin duwen inou me e ketin wiadahr; eri loaleiet meleileidier.

18 Oh Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie: Ahmw pahpa ko pil pekiher rehi soahng wet; oh e pahn pweida nin duwen arail pwoson; pwe arail pwoson duwehte ahmw pwoson.

19 Oh met e wiawiher me ngehi, Inos, kohla rehn aramas en Nihpai kan, kohkohpada soahng kan me pahn wiawi, oh kadkadehdehki duwen soahng kan me I rongehr oh kilangehr.

20 Oh I kadehde me aramas en Nihpai kan wia uwen arail kak pwe re en kapwurehdo Mehn Leimen kan ong pwoson mehlel en Koht. Ahpw aht doadoahk kan sohte katepe; irail koasoanehdi me re pahn kailongkin kiht, oh re weweidiki arail mwekid suwed kan me kahrehda irail wiahla aramas lawalo kei, oh keper, oh mwahuki kakerehdi nta, mour en pwongih dikadik en eni oh tiahk samin; kangkang mahn lawalo kan; koukousoan nan impwal, oh kokohseli nanwel, pirehki lukoperail lepin likou me wiawikihda kilin mahn oh moangerail akan moang koikoi; oh irail semen nan doadoahngki kesik ketieu, oh naipokos kan, oh sile. Oh me tohtohn irail kin kangete uduk amas; oh re kinnannantihongeteren kemeikitala.

21 Kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan ahpw deipwelihada sahpwo, oh padokedi soangsoangen weren tuhke, oh wahn tuhke, oh apwaliada soangen mahn kei, oh soangsoangen pelin kou, oh kuht, oh kuht lawalo, oh pil oahs tohto.

22 Oh mie soukohp tohto reht. Oh aramas pwukat me keptakai, kin apwalki wehwehkihla.

23 Oh ihte me re wia, ngihl kehlail, padapadahk oh kokohpki duwen mahwen, oh pingiping, oh kamwomwala, oh katakatamankiongirailte duwen mehla, oh uwen werei en mour kohkohlahte, oh Sapwellimen Koht kadeik oh manaman, oh soahng pwukat koaros—kin kamwakamwakid irail ahnsou koaros pwe re en kin lemmwiki Kauno. Ihte me I kak koasoiat, oh padahk me uhdahn sansal mehlel, pwe re en dehr mwadang en kamwomwomwla. Oh ihmwomwen me I ntingihedi duwen irail.

24 Oh I kilang mahwen kan nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan nan ei rahn akan.

25 Kedekedeo I tepida mahlahr, oh sounpar epwiki isihsek duwau dauliher ahnsou me aht pahpa Lihai mweselsang Serusalem.

26 Oh I kilang, kereniongehr I pahn mehla, oh I alehdier pepehm sang ni manaman en Koht me I pahn anahne padahki oh kokohp ong aramas pwukat, oh kalohngki mahseno nin duwen me mehlelo me mih rehn Krais. Oh I kalohngki nan ei rahn akan, oh pereniki laudsang soahng kan en sampah.

27 Oh kereniongehr I pahn kohla wasahn ei kommoal, me iei rehn ei Soundoar; pwe I ese me I pahn kommoal reh. Oh I pahn perenda ni ahnsou me ei mour en sampah pahn uhd wekideklahng mour poatoapoat, oh I pahn uh mwowe; I ahpw pahn perenda ni ei pahn kilang silangi, oh e pahn mahsanihong ie: Kohdo rehi, kowe me meid pai, mieier wasa me kaunopdahnguhkehr nan tehnpas en Semeio. Ahmen.
jarom 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Serom[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan kolokol kosonned en Moses, kasikasik ketidohn Krais, oh pweida nan sahpwo—Soukohp tohto doadoahk pwe re en sewese aramas akan en weweidkiahl pwungo. Ele Sounpar 399–361 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kilang, ngehi, Serom, ntingihdilepin mahsen kei nin duwen kosonned en ei pahpa, Inos, pwe sen kak kolokolete kodoudoupen aht peneinei.

2 Oh pwehki pileit pwukat eh tikitik, oh pwehki soahng pwukat ar ntingdi pwe en sewese riat akan Mehn Leimen kan, eri, e konehng me ei nting pahn mwotomwot; ahpw I sohte pahn ntingih duwen soahng kan me I kohpadahr, de pil ei kaudiahl kan. Pwe dahme I pahn kak ntingih me pahn kak laudsang dahme ei pahpa ko ntingihdier? Pwe re soh kasalehdahier duwen koasoandi en komouro? I ndaiong kumwail, Ei; oh met I itarkiher.

3 Kilang, e konehng me [doadoahk] laud anahne wiawi ong aramas pwukat, pwehki kekeluwak en mohngiongarail kan, salengerail kan ponlahr, oharail madamadau kan rotala, oh irail keptakailahr; ahpw, Koht kin ketin kuwpurkalahngan kowalahpie ong irail, oh saikintekoakoairailsangnan sahpwo.

4 Oh mie aramas tohtoreht me kin alehdi kaudiahl tohto, pwe kaidehn irail koaros me keptakai. Oh irail akan me sohte keptakai oh ahneki pwoson, kaminimin en Ngehn Sarawi kin ieiang irail, me kin kasalehda ni sansal ong aramas akan, nin duwen arail pwoson.

5 Oh met, kilang, sounpar riepwiki lao imwiseklahr, oh aramas en Nihpai kan kehlailla nan sahpwo. Irail nantihong kapwaiada kosonned en Moses oh rahn en sapad kasarawihong Kauno. Oh re sohte kin koasoai mwahl; de pil lahlahwe. Oh kosonned en sahpwo me kehlail mehlel.

6 Oh irail mihseli pohn sahpwo pwon, oh pil Mehn Leimen kan. Oh irail tohto sang Mehn Nihpai kan; oh irail pereniki kamaramas oh kin nim ntahn mahn akan.

7 Kedekedeo irail kin kohdohng mahweniong kiht, mehn Nihpai kan, pak tohto. Ahpw aht nanmwarki kan oh aht kaun akan wia aramas kehlail kei ni arail pwoson Kauno; oh irail kin padahkihong aramas akan sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan; eri, se kin pelianda Mehn Leimen kan oh koakoairailsang nan sahpwat akan, oh tepida wiahda kelen mahwen ong aht kahnihmw kan, de wasahkan me se sohsohki.

8 Oh se kaparaparala mehlel, oh kohpeseng nan sahpwo, oh re kepwehpwekihla mehlel kohl, oh silper, oh soahng kesempwal kei, oh arail koahiek en doadoahngki tuhke, kauwada ihmw, ohmisihn, oh pilmete oh kapa, oh prahs oh sdihl, [se kin] wiahda soangsoangen dipwisou en doadoahk en deipwel, oh dipwisou en mahwen—ei, kengkeng en arep, oh doupe, oh arep en kos, oh ketieu, oh mehn kaunop en mahwen koaros.

9 Oh pwehki aht kaunopadahr pwe se en tuhwong Mehn Leimen kan, arail pelian kiht sohte pweida. Ahpw mahsen en Kauno pweidahr, me e ketin mahsanihong aht pahpa ko, me ketihtihki: Nin duwen amwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo.

10 Kedekedeo soukohp en Kauno kapariki aramas en Nihpai kan, nin duwen mahsen en Koht, ma irail sohte pahn kolokol kosonned akan, ahpw pwupwidiong nan dihp, irail pahn kamwomwala sang pohn sahpwo.

11 Eri, soukohp akan, oh samworo kan, oh sounpadahk kan, pwerisekiongdoadoahk, panapanawih aramas akan ni kanengemah re en kin nannanti; padapadahngki kosonned en Moses, oh kahrepen eh wiawihda; kangoangehkiong irail re en kasikasik Mesaiao, oh kamehlele ih ni eh pahn ketido duwehte me e ketidohier. Ohni mwohmw wet me re padapadahkihong irail.

12 Kedekedeo nin duwen arail wia met irail koliraildihsang kamwomwasang pohn sahpwo; pwe irail doakoahki mohngiongarail kan mahseno, katakatamankin irail en koluhla.

13 Kedekedeo sounpar riepwuki silihsek waluh daulih—mwurin mahwen kan, oh pingiping kan, oh kahngohdikan, erein ahnsou werei.

14 Oh ngehi, Serom, sohlahr pahn nting pwe pileit pwukat me tikitik. Ahpw kilang, riei ko, kumwail kak kilang nan pileit en Nihpai teiko; pwe kilang, mie poadopen aht mahwen kan ntingdi loale, nin duwen nting en nanmwarki kan, de soahng kan me irail mahsanih en ntingidi.

15 Oh I pahn kihong pileit pwukat nan pehn nei pwutak Omnai, pwe re en kak nekinekila nin duwen koasoandi kan me sang ei pahpah ko.
omni 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Omnai[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Omnai, Amaron, Kemis, Apinadom, oh Amalekai, emen emen alehdi ahnsou en nekid poadoapoad ko—Mosaia diarada aramas en Saraemla, me kohsang Serusalem nan mwehi en Sedekaia—Mosaia wiahla arail nanmwarki—Kadaudoken Miulek kan nan Saraemla diarada Koriandomer, me wia kaimwiseklahn mehn Sared kan—Nahnmwariki Pensamin wiliandi nanmwarki Mosaia—Aramas akan anahne meirongkiheng Krais palingenarail akan. Ele Sounpar 323–131 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, kedekedeo ngehi, Omnai, alehdi kehkehlik sang ei pahpa, Sarom, me I pahn anahne ntingihedi ekei padahk pohn pileit pwukat, pwe en kak kolokolete kodoudoupen aht peneinei—

2 Eri, nan ei ahnsou, I men kumwail en ese me I kalapw iang mahwenki kedlahs pwe en kak doarehla nei aramas akan, Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re en dehr lohdieng nan pehn arail imwintihti kan, Mehn Leimen kan. Ahpw kilang, ngehi aramas suwed men, oh I sohte kin kalapw kolokol koasoandi kan oh kosonned akan en Kauno nin duwen me I konehng en kin wia.

3 Kedekedeo sounpar riepwiki isihsek wenou douwer powe, oh se ahnekipopohl erein irair en ahnsou tohto; oh se pil ahneki irair en ahnsou tohto mehlel en mahwen oh kakerehdi nta. Ei, oh ni oaralap, sounpar riepwiki welihsek riau douwer powe, oh I nekinekid pileit pwukat nin duwen kosonned en ei pahpa ko; oh I pahn kihong nei pwutak Amaron. Oh I kaeralahr.

4 Oh met ngehi, Amaron, ntingihedi soahng kei me I pahn ntingih, a audepen [ei nting] me malaulau, nan nein ei pahpa pwuhk.

5 Kilang, kedekedeo sounpar silipwiki rieisek douwer powe, oh pali laud en Mehn Nihpai kan me suwed, kamakamalahr.

6 Pwe Kauno sohte mweidehng, mwurin eh kahluwaieisang irail nan sahpw en Serusalem oh sinsile oh doandoare irail pwe re en dehr lohdiong pahn arail imwintihti kan, ei, e sohte pahn mweidehng mahsen akan en sohte pweida, me e ketin mahsanihong aht pahpa ko, me ketihtihki: Nin duwen amwail sohte pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail sohte pahn pweida nan sahpwo.

7 Eri, Kauno kin ketin kalokeirail; ahpw, e kin ketin doarehla me mwahu kan sang mehla, oh doareirailsang nan pehn arail imwintihti kan.

8 Kedekedeo ngehi eri wahlahng pileit ko rehn riei pwutak Kemis.

9 Met ngehi, Kemis, ntingihedi ekei kisin nting, nan pwuhkohte me riei pwutako nting loale; pwe kilang, I kilang kaimwiseklahnah nting, me pein peh me ntingihedi; oh e ntingihdi rahnohte me e kiheng ie. Oh ih mwomwen aht nekinekidpoadoapoad kan, pwehki met duwen kosonned en aht pahpa ko. Oh met I kaeralahr.

10 Kilang, ngehi, Apinadom, nein Kemis pwutak. Kilang, kedekedeo I kilahngehr mahwen oh pingiping tohto nanpwungen nei aramas akan, mehn Nihpai oh mehn Leimen; oh ngehi, kemehkilahr Mehn Leimen tohto nei kedlahs pwe I en doarehla riei kan.

11 Oh kilang, poadoapoad en aramas pwukat ntingdier pohn pileit kan me nannmwarki kan kin kolokol, nin duwen koasoandien dih kan; oh I ihte kaudiahl kan me I ese me ntingdier [powe], de pil kokohp; eri, soahng kan me kesempwal ntingdier. Oh I kaeralahr.

12 Kilang, ngehi Amalekai, nein Apinadom pwutak. Kilang, I pahn koasoiong kumwail ekis duwen Mosaiah, me wiahla nanmwarki nan sahpw en Saraemla; pwe kilang, Kauno ketin kaparkiong en sopohsang nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh aramas koaros me pahn rong kapitien Kauno pahn anahne iang ih kohkohsang nan sahpwo, kohlahng nan sapwtehno—

13 Kedekedeo e ahpw kapwaiada nin duwen Kauno e ketin mahsanihong. Oh irail mweselsang nan sahpwo kohlang nan sapwtehn, iangahki irail koaros me rong kapitien Kauno; oh re kin weweidki padahk oh kokohp tohto. Oh re kin aliale kaweid sang ni mahsen en Koht ahnsou koaros; ohmanaman en nin lime kan me kahluwa irail nan sapwtehno lao irail kohdihdo nan sahpw me kahdaniki sahpw en Saraemla.

14 Oh irail diarada aramas akan, me kahdaniki aramas en Saraemla. Eri met, aramas en Saraemla kan perenda mehlel; oh pil Saraemla perenda kouwahlap, pwehki Kauno kadaredohr sapwellimen Mosaia aramas akan iangahki pileit prahs kan me audaudikida poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan.

15 Kilang, kedekedeo Mosaia diarada me aramas en Saraemla kohieisang Serusalem ni ahnsou me Sedekaia, nahnmwariki en Suda, sellahng nan Papilon.

16 Oh irail seiloak nan sapwtehn, ohsang nin limen Kauno re kotehla madau kan, kohdohng nan sahpw me Mosaia ketin diarirailda; oh irail kin koukousoan wasao sang ahnsouo kohdo.

17 Oh ni ahnsou me Mosaia ketin diarirailda, irail inenen ngederlamehlel. Ahpw, re pil wiaier mahwen tohto oh pingping laud, oh mie me kamakamkihla kedlahs ekei ahnsou; oh arail lokaia wekilahr; oh irail sohte wahdo neirail poadoapoad; oh irail kahmahmkihla ieias en arail Sounkipikipiko; oh Mosaia, oh sapwellime aramas akan, sohte kak wehwehki arail lokaia.

18 Ahpw kedekedeo Mosaia koasoanehdi me irail anahne ale padahkpen sapwellime mahsen. Oh kedekedeo mwurin arail padahngkier sapwellimen Mosaia mahsen, Saraemla padokada wadawad en peneinei en ah pahpa ko, nin duwen eh tamataman; oh re ntingdi, ahpw kaidehn pohn pileit pwukat.

19 Kedekedeo aramas akan en Saraemla, oh Mosaia, ehupene; oh Mosaia kileldi en wiahla arail nanmwarki.

20 Kedekedeo nan mwehin Mosaia, mie lapalahn pelien takai me mie nting powe wisikdohng reh; oh e kawehwehda nting kan sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Koht.

21 Oh e kasalehda duwen ohl emen ede Koriandamer, oh duwen kamakamalahn nah aramas akan. Oh aramas en Saraemla kan diaradahr Koriandamer; oh e koukousoan rehrail erein wadepen maram duwau.

22 E pil kasalahdahr ekis duwen koasoiepen ah pahpa ko. Oh tepin ah pahpa oh nohno me kohdo sang ni imwen doulik [nan Papilon], ahnsou me Kauno ketin kapingada en aramas arail lokaia; oh kalokolok me Kauno ketikihong irail nin duwen sapwellime kadeik, me pwung; oh tihn paliwararail kan mihseli ni paliepeng en nan sahpwo.

23 Kilang, ngehi, Amalekai, ipwidi nan mwehin Mosaia; oh I momour oh kilangidi sapwellime pwoula; oh sapwellime pwutak, Pensamin, weliandi wiahla nahnmwarki.

24 Oh kilang, I kadehdehier, nan ahnsou en nahnmwariki Pensamin, mahwen kehlail oh kakerehdi nta laud wiawi nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan. Ahpw kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan kaloweiraildi; mehlel, kahrehda nahnmwariki Pensamin kasareirailsang nan sahpw en Saraemla.

25 Kedekedeo I tepida mahlahr; oh, sohte wahwahi seri, oh pwehki ei ese me nahnmwariki Pensamin wia ohl pwung men mwohn Kauno, eri, I pahn wahla reh pileit pwukat, [I] koangoangehki aramas koaros re en kohdo rehn Koht, me Sarawi en Israel-o, oh kamehlele kokohp, oh kaudiahl akan, oh doadoahk en tohnleng kan, oh kisakis en lokaiaki mahsen kapwonopwon, oh kisakis en kawehwehda mahsen kan, oh soahng koaros me mwahu; pwehki soahng koaros me mwahu kin pwilisang rehn Kauno; oh me suwed kan kin pwilisang rehn tepilo.

26 Oh met, riei kesempwal ko, I men kumwail en kohdo rehn Krais, me Sarawi en Israelo, oh alehda sapwallime komouro, oh sapwellime manaman en doarehlao. Ei, kohdo reh, oh meirongkihong ih palingenemwail ni unsek, oh nantihong kasihsol oh kapakap, oh daudaurete lel ni imwi; oh nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias kumwail pahn komourla.

27 Oh met I men koasoia ekis duwen ekei [aramas] me kohdahla nan sapwtehn oh pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai; pwehki aramas ngeder men pwurala oh sapwasapw nan sapwarail sahpw en sohso.

28 Eri, irail kohdahla nan sapwtehno. Oh arail kauno emen ohl kehlail oh kommwad, oh ohl keptakai men, eri e kahrehda pingiping nanpwungarail; oh irail koaros kamakamala, ihte meh limehk me luhwehdi, nan sapwtehno, oh irail pwurehng pwurodo nan sahpw en Saraemla.

29 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kahluwahla aramas ngeder, oh pwurehng seiloaklahng nan sapwtehno.

30 Oh ngehi, Amalekai, rianiki pwutak emen, me pil iangirailda; oh lel met I saikinte ese dahme wiawi ong irail. Oh kereniongehr I pahn seridi nan ei sousou; oh pileit pwukat diralahr. Oh I pahn kaimwiseklahr ei koasoi.
w-of-m 1:
[center][font_size=26]Mahsen kan en Mormon[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon oaralapihada pileit en Nihpai me laud ko—E kapatahieng pileit tikitingko pileit tei kan—Nahnmwariki Pensamin kauwada popohl nan sahpwo. Ele Sounpar 385 Mwurin Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, kereniongehr I pahn kihong nei pwutak Moronai poadoapoad pwukat me I wiwiahda, kilang I wia sounkadehdepen nei aramas akan en Mehn Nihpai ar kereniongehr kamwomwala.

2 Oh sounpar epwiki kei mwurin Krais e ketido me I kihong poadoapoad pwukat rehn nei pwutak; oh I medemedewe me ih me pahn wia sounkadehde en kamwomwomwla unsek en nei aramas akan. Ahpw Koht en ketin mweidohng ih en pitsang irail, pwe en kak ntingihedi ekis duwen irail, oh duwen Krais, pwe en kak wia kamwahuparail ehu rahn.

3 Oh met, I pahn koasoia duwen me I ntingihedier; pwe mwurin ei pahn oaralapihada sang nan pileit en Nihpai kan, lao lel nan mwehin nanmwarki Pensamin, me Amalekai koasoiaier, I rapahki nan poadoapoad akan me kodohr rehi, oh I diarada pileit pwukat, me audaudkihda lepin nting en soukohp akan, sang Seikop kohdo lel nan mwehin nanmwarki Pensamin, oh pil mahsen tohto en Nihpai.

4 Oh audepen pileit pwukat kapereniehda mehlel, pwehki kokohp akan me pid duwen ketidohn Krais; oh ei pahpa kan eseier me [kokohp] tohto pweidahr; ei, oh I pil ese me soahng tohto me kokohpdahr duwen kiht lelledo rahn wet pil pweidahr, oh koaros me pahn wiawi mwurin rahn wet uhdahn pahn pweida—

5 Eri, I piladamehpwukat, pwe I en kanekehla poadoapoad me I ntingihedi powe, a luhwen poadopoad me I ntintingih me I pahn kihsang nan pileit en Nihpai; oh I sohte kak ntingihedi epwiki kis ehu en irair kan me wiawiong nei aramas akan.

6 Ahpw kilang, I pahn ale pileit pwukat, me audaudkihda kokohp akan oh kaudiahl akan, oh kapatahieng luhwen poadpoapoad me I ntintingih, pwe re kesempwal ong ie; oh I ese me re pahn kesempwal ong riei kan.

7 Oh I pahn wia met pwehki kahrepe kesempwal ehu; eri, nin duwen kamwekid en Ngehn en Kauno me kin doadoahk rehi, e mwenginingin ong ie. Oh met, I sohte ese soahng koaros; ahpw Kauno me ketin mwahngih soahng koaros me pahn kohdo; eri, e kin ketin doadoangkinie nin duwen kupwure.

8 Oh ei kapakap ong Koht kin doke riei kan, pwe irail en kak pwurehng pwurodohng marain en Koht, mehlel, komour en Krais; pwe irail en kak pwurehng wiahla aramas mwahu kei.

9 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, pahn kanekehla poadoapoad me I ntintingih, me I kihsang nan pileit en Nihpai; oh I pahn wiahda nin duwen kupwurokong oh erpit me Koht ketikihong ie.

10 Eri, kedekedeo mwurin Amalekai eh kihongehr nanmwarki Pensamin pileit pwukat, e alehda oh kapatahieng pileit teikan, me audaudkihda poadoapoad kan me kadakadaur kohdosang nanmwarki kan, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih lao lel mwehin nanmwarki Pensamin.

11 Oh re kadakadaurete sang nanmwarki Pensamin, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih lao ar lelledo rehi. Oh ngehi, Mormon, kapakap ong Koht pwe re en kak nekinekla sang met kohla. Oh I ese me re pahn nekinekla; pwehki mie soahng kesempwal kei ntingdi loale, sang mepwukat nei aramas akan oh riarail kan pahn pakadeingkihda ni imwilahn rahn kesempwalo, nin duwen mahsen en Koht me ntingdier.

12 Oh met, duwen nanmwarki Pensamin—mie kisin pingiping wiewiawi nanpwungen sapwellime aramas akan.

13 Kedekedeo sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohdihdohsang nan sahpw en Nihpai, pwe rehn mahweniong sapwellime aramas akan. Ahpw kilang, nanmwarki Pensamin ketin kapokonepene sapwellime sounpei kan, oh e ahpw pelianirailda; oh e peiki nein Leipen kedlahso sang ni pein eh kehl.

14 Oh sang ni roson en Kauno irail pelianda arail imwintihtih kan, lao irail kemehla kidalap en Mehn Leimen ko. Kedekedeo irail ahpw mahweniong Mehn Leimen ko lao re kasarehsang nan sapwarail sapwen sohso.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin Krais likamw kei pwarada, oh ewerail akan kuhpene, oh irail ahpw ale kalokepen diparail kan;

16 Oh mwuri mie soukohp likamw kei, oh sounkalohk oh sounpadahk likamw akan nanpwungen aramas akan, oh irail koaros ale kalokepen diparail kan; oh mwuri, mie pingiping laud oh aramas tohto iangala Mehn Leimen kan, kilang, kedekedeo nanmwarki Pensamin, sang ni sawas en soukohp sarawi kan me kin mihmi nanpwungen sapwellime aramas akan—
