17 Pwe kilang, nanmwarki Pensamin wia ohl sarawi men, oh e ketin kaunkihda sapwellime aramas akan mour pwung; oh mie ohl sarawi tohto nan sahpwo, oh irail padahngki mahsen en Koht sang ni manaman oh mweimwei; oh irail kin koasoi inen pwehki keptakai en aramas akan—

18 Eri, sang ni sawas pwukat, nanmwarki Pensamin, sang ni e kin ketin doadoahngki sapwellime kehl en paliwar oh palingen unsek, oh pil soukohp akan, e ahpw pwurehng kauwada popohl nan sahpwo.
mosiah 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Mosaia[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Pensamin padahkihong sapwellime pwutak kan duwen en ah pahpa kahlap ako arail lokaia oh kokohp kan—Mour en arail pelien lamalam oh mwekid en mour marain sohte salongala pwehki poadoapoad kan me re ntingihedi nan pileit kan—Mosaia pilipilda pwe en wiahla nanmwarki oh e kileldi en pwukoahki poadoapoad kan oh soahng teikan. Ele Sounpar 130–124 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met solahr pingiping wiawi nanpwungen Sapwellimen Pensamin aramas akan nan sahpw en Saraemla pwon, eri iei me mie popohl pahn nanmwarki Pensamin erein eh wie ieias.

2 Kedekedeo e sapwellimaniki pwutak silimen; oh e kahdanikin irail Mosaia, oh Ilorum, oh Ilemen. Oh e ahpw kupwurehda pwe irail en kin esehla lokaiahn arail pahpa kahlap ako, pwe irail en kak wiahla aramas kupwurokong kei; oh pwe irail en kak esehla duwen kokohp akan me arail pahpa kahlap ako kohpadahr, me kohieng irailehr sang nin limen Kauno.

3 Oh e pil ketin padahkiong irail duwen poadopoad akan me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs kan, ni eh mahsanih: Samwa ko, I men kumwail en tamataman pwe ma sohte pileit pwukat, me audaudkihda poadopoad pwukat oh kosonned pwukat, kitail pahn mihmihte nan rotorot, iei lel nan ahnsou wet, kitail pahn sohte wewehki sapwellimen Koht rir kan.

4 Pwe e pahn apwal ohng atail pahpa Lihai, en kak tamatamante mepwukat koaros, pwehn kak padahkihong nah seri kan, ma sohte sawas en pileit pwukat; pwehki eh kaskuhlkihdahier lokaiahn Isip ihme e kak wadengki nting pwukat, oh padahkihong nah seri kan, pwe irail en kak padahkihong neirail seri kan, oh kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, iei me doudoulahte lel ahnsou wet.

5 Samwa ko, I ndaiong kumwail, me ma sohte mepwukat, me kin wie nekinek kohdo sang nin limen Koht, pwe kitail en kak wadek oh wehwehki sapwellime, me rir kan, oh sapwellime kosonned akan me kin sansal mwohn mesetail ahnsou koaros, iei atail pahpa kahlap ako kakete pil pwupwukihdi nan soupwoson, oh kitail pahn kakete duwehte riatail kan, Mehn Leimen kan, me sohte ese duwen soahng pwukat, de pil sohte kamehlele ma e pahn padahk ong irail, pwehki tiahk en arail pahpah kahlap ako, me sohte pwung.

6 Samwa ko, I men kumwail en tamataman me mahsen pwukat me mehlel, oh pil nting pwukat mehlel. Oh kilang, pil pileit en Nihpai kan, me audaudkihda poadopoad kan oh mahsen kan en atail pahpa kahlap ako sangete ahnsou me re mweselsang Serusalem lao lel rahnwet, oh audepe kan mehlel; oh kitail ese me audepe kan mehlel pwehki e mihte mwohn masatail kan.

7 Oh met, samwa ko, I men kumwail en tamataman en kin wadek ni loalopwoat, pwe kumwail en kak paieki; oh I men kumwail en kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, pwe kumwail en kak pweida nan sahpwo nin duwen inou kan me Kauno ketin inoukihongehr atail pahpa kahlap ako.

8 Oh soahng tohto me nanmwarki Pensamin padahkihong sapwellime pwutak ko me sohte ntingdi nan pwuhk wet.

9 Kedekedeo mwurin nanmwarki Pensamin kaeralahr padahk ong sapwellime pwutak ko, nan e likeilapalahr, oh e esehier me eh ahnsou kerendohr ni eh pahn wiapwella; iei me, e medewe me e konehngehr en kasapwilada emen sapwellime pwutak ko en wiahla kaunen wehio.

10 Eri, e ahpw ketin malipehdo Mosaia mwowe; oh iet mahsen kan me e ketin mahsanihong ih, ketihtihki: Samwa, I men ke en wiahda pakair pwoat me pahn lelpeseng nan sahpwet pwon rehn aramas akan koaros, de nein Saraemla aramas akan, oh nein Mosaia aramas akan me kin koukousoan nan sahpw wet, pwe irail en pokonpene; pwe lakapw I en pakairkihong nei aramas akan sang pein ewei, me ke wialahr nanmwarki oh kaun en aramas pwukat, me Kauno atail Koht ketikihong kitailehr.

11 Oh I pil pahn kiong ahd pwoat ehu ong aramas pwukat, pwe irail en kak wekisang aramas koaros me Kauno Koht kahluwaieisang nan sahpw en Serusalem; oh I wia met pwehki arail wia aramas loalopwoat nan arail kin kapwaiada kosonned kan en Kauno.

12 Oh I kihong irail ahd ehu me sohte pahn manoknokla, ihte ma re pahn wiahda dihp.

13 Ei, oh I pahn pil ndaiong uhk, ma aramas pwukat me keniken mehlel rehn Kauno pahn pwupwidi nan dihp, oh wiahla aramas suwed oh aramas en kamwal, Kauno pahn likidmelieirailla, oh re pahn luwetala duwehte rierail akan; oh e sohla pahn ketin doarehkinirail sapwellime manaman me sohte pelie oh kapwuriamwei, nin duwen eh kin ketin doarehla atail pahpah kahlap ako.

14 Iei me I ndahkiong uhk, ma e sohte ketikihwei lime kan pwe en doarehla atail pahpa kahlap ako, irail uhdahn pahn lohdiong pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan, oh mihla pahn lokolok en arail kailok.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin nanmwarki Pensamin eh kaimwsekalahr eh mahsen ong sapwellime pwutako, e ahpw ketikihong pwukoa koaros en apwalih doadoahk kan en wehio.

16 Oh e pil ketikihong pwukoah en apwalih poadoapoad akan me ntingdi pohn pileit prahs kan; oh pil pileit en Nihpai kan; oh pil, nein Leipen kedlahso, oh mpweio de mehn kaweido, me kin kakahluwa atail pahpa kahlap ako nan sapwtehno, me wiawihda sang nin limen Kauno pwe en kahluwa irail koaros, nin duwen arail pahn kin peikiong oh loalopwoatohng ih.

17 Eri, pwehki arail saloalopwoat irail sohte pweida de doula nan arail seiloak, ahpw rekin wie pwurupwurla mwuri, oh kahrehiong Koht eh ketin engiengda pahrail; oh iei me irail lokolongki ar duhpek oh apwal laud, pwehn kamwekidihkinirail en tamanda dahme arail pwukoah.

18 Kedekedeo Mosaia ahpw patohla oh wia dahme ah pahpa poahngokiong, oh lohkihong aramas koaros me kin kousoan nan sahpw en Saraemla pwe irail en pokonpene, oh kohdahla ni tehnpas sarawio pwe irail en rong mahsen kan me seme pahn ketin mahsanih ong irail.
mosiah 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Pensamin wia sapwellime sakarada ong sapwellime aramas akan—E ketin kawehwehda duwen sapwellime mwehi eh pahrek, pwung oh deila ni palingehn—E ketin kaweidkinirail re en papah arail Nanmwarki Nanleng—Irail akan me pahn kahngohdiong Koht pahn lokolongki medek en pwunod rasehngete kisiniei sekehkun. Ele Sounpar 124 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin Mosaia eh wiahierdahme seme padahkiengo, oh lohkiseli nan sahpwo pwon, aramas akan ahpw pokonpenehr sang nan sahpwo pwon, pwe irail en kak kohdahla ni tehnpas sarawio oh rong mahsen kan me nanmwarki Pensamin pahn mahsanih ong irail.

2 Oh mie pokon kalaimwun ehu, iei uwen arail tohto irail sohte wadekedi; pwe irail kaparaparala mehlel oh kehlailla nan sahpwo.

3 Oh irail pil wahdo mesenih en neirail mahn akan, pwe irail en kak meirongki arail mehn meirong isihs kan oh soahngen meirong teikan nin duwen kosonned en Moses;

4 Oh pwe irail en pil kak wia arail kalahngan ong Kauno arail Koht, me ketin kahreiraildo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh me kin ketin doareirail sang pahn manamana en arail imwintihti kan, oh koasonehdier ohl pwung kan en wia arail sounpadahk, oh pil ohl pwung men en wiahla arail nanmwarki, me ketin wiadahr meleilei nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh me padahkihong irail en kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, pwe irail en kak perenda oh direkihla limpoak ong Koht oh aramas koaros.

5 Kedekedeo mwurin arail kodahdo ni tehnpas sarawio, irail ahpw kauwada imwarail impwal akan kapilpene wasao, emen emen ohl nin duwen eh peneinei, me iei eh pwoud, oh nah pwutak kan, oh nah serepein kan, oh neirail pwutak kan, oh neirail serepein kan, sang me keieu laud kohdi lel me keieu tikitik, ehu ehu peneinei tohrohr sang meteikan.

6 Oh re kauwada imwarail impwal akan kapilpene tehnpas sarawio, ohl koaros kin kasohpeilahng arail wenihmw kan ni tehnpas sarawio, pwe irail en kak mihte nan imwarail impwal akan oh rong mahsen akan me nanmwarki Pensamin pahn mahsanihong irail;

7 Pwehki uwen kalaimwun en pokono, nanmwarki Pensamin sohte kak padahk ong koaros sang ni masloalen kelen tehnpas sarawio, eri e ahpw kupwurehda re en kauwada wasahn doulik ehu, pwe sapwellime aramas akan en kak rong mahsen akan me e pahn mahsanihong irail.

8 Kedekedeo e ahpw tepida mahseniong sapwellime aramas akan sang pohn douliko; oh ekei sohte kak rong sapwellime mahsen kan pwehki uwen pokono laud; eri e ketin kupwurehda pwe irail en ntingihedi mahsen akan me e pahn mahsanih oh kadarohng irail akan me sohte kak rong kapitieo, pwe irail en pil kak alehdi sapwellime mahsen akan.

9 Oh iet akan me e mahsanih oh kupwurehda en ntingdi, me ketihtihki: Riei ko, kumwail koaros me pokonpenehier met, kumwail me kak rong ei pato kan me I pahn patohwanohng kumwail rahnwet; pwe I sohte patohwan ong kumwail en patohdahdo met pwe kumwail en soukautihong dahme I pahn patohwanohng kumwail, ahpw kumwail en rong ie mwahu, oh rongki salengamwail kan pwe kumwail en kak rong mwahu, oh langahda mohngiongamwail kan pwe kumwail en kak wehwehki, oh ritingada amwail madamadau kan pwe sapwellimen Koht me rir kan en kak sansalda ong kumwail.

10 I sohte patohwanohng kumwail en patohdahdo pwe kumwail en masak ie, de kumwail en wiahkinie me I lapalapasang aramas en sampah.

11 Ahpw I duwehte kumwail, me kak soumwahuki soangen soumwahu kan koaros en paliwar oh madamadau; ahpw I pilipildahr rehn aramas pwukat, oh semeio kasarawiehlahr, oh I mweimweidahr pahn kupwur en Kauno pwe I en kak wia amwail kaun oh nanmwarki; oh E ketin sinsile ie oh nekinekid ie sang ni sapwellime manaman kowahlap, pwe I en kak papah kumwail sang ni kehl unsek, lamalam unsek oh roson unsek me Kauno ketikihong ie.

12 I ndaiong kumwail me I mweidala ei mour pwe I en kin papah kumwail, lao lel ahnsou wet, oh I sohte kin song en adihasang kumwail noumwail kohl de silper de amwail pai kan;

13 I pil sohte mweidohng kumwail en selidi nan kalapwus, de kumwail en kaliduwih emen, de kumwail en kamaramas, de widenge aramas, de pirap, de kamwahl; I pil sohte mweidohng kumwail en wiahda soahng suwed teikan, ahpw I kin padahkihong kumwail en kapwaiada kosonned akan en Kauno, ni mehkoaros me e ketin mahsanihong kumwail—

14 Oh pein ngehi, kin doadoahngki pehi kat pwe I en kak papah kumwail, oh pwe kumwail en dehr toutouki pwain daksis, oh sohte wisik toutou me pahn kohieng kumwail—oh soahng pwukat koaros me I ndaiong kumwail, pein kumwail kadehdehier rahnwet.

15 Ahpw, riei ko, I sohte wia soahng pwukat pwe I en aksuweiki, de I pil sohte patohwan mepwukat pwe I en kedipeikumwailda; ahpw I patohwanohng kumwail soahng pwukat pwe kumwail en ese me I kak pato ni kapehd oh lamalam mwakelekel mwohn silangihn Koht rahnwet.

16 Kilang, I men kumwail en ese me pwehki I ndaiong kumwailehr me I papahier kumwail erein ei mour, I sohte ndahki pwe ien aksuweiki, pwe I wie papah Koht.

17 Oh kilang, I ndaiong kumwail soahng pwukat pwe kumwail en esehla erpit; pwe kumwail en esehla me ahnsou me kumwail kin papah meteikan kumwail kin wie papah amwail Koht.

18 Kilang, kumwail kin wiahkinieamwail nanmwarki; oh ma ngehi, me kumwail kin wiahki amwail nanmwarki, kin doadoahk pwe ien papah kumwail, e sou pahn konehng kumwail en kin doadoahk pwehn uhpahpene nanpwungamwail?

19 Oh pil kilang, ma ngehi, me kumwail kin wiahki amwail nanmarki, me papahkin kumwail erein ei mour, oh pil wie papahte Koht, ma I warohng ale kaping sang rehmwail, Ia uwen amwail anahne kapingkalahngan ong Nanmwarki en nanleng!

20 I ndaiong kumwail, riei ko, ma kumwail pahn wia amwail kaping kalahngan oh kepinga sang ni palingenemwail unsek, Kohto me ketin wieikumwailda, oh kin sinsile oh nekinekid kumwail, oh ketin kupwurehda pwe kumwail en perenda, oh ketikihong kumwail en mourpene ni meleilei—

21 I ndaiong kumwail ma kumwail pahn kin papah ih me ketin wieikumwailda sangete nin tapio, oh me kin ketin nekinekid kumwail rahn koaros, sang ni eh ketin sewesehkin kumwail angin amwail esingek, pwe kumwail en kak momour oh mwokid oh wia mehkan nin duwen pein nsenamwail, oh pil kin utung kumwail ahnsou koaros—I nda, mehnda ma kumwail pahn papah ih sang ngehnomwail unsek, kumwail pahn pil wiewiahte sounpapah soh katepe kei.

22 Oh kilang, ihte me e ketin kupwurki sang rehmwail iei kumwail en kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan; oh e ketin inoukihong kumwail ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh dahme e ketin mahsaniher sohte kin wekidekla; eri, ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan e pahn ketin kupwuramwahwih kumwail oh pahn kapaiada kumwail.

23 Oh kilang, keieu, e ketin wiaikumwailda, oh ketikihong kumwail mour, me kumwail pweipwandkihong.

24 Oh keriau, e ketin kupwurki kumwail en kin kapwaiada dahme e ketin mahsanihong kumwail; apw ni amwail kin wia, e kin mwadangete kapaiada kumwail; eri e pil pwainkumwaildahr. Oh kumwail pweipwandohngete, oh pahn wie pweipwandte ereinkohkohlahte; eri, dahme kumwail pahn aksuweiki?

25 Oh met I pahn kalelapak mahs rehmwail mie mehkot me kumwail kak koasoia duwen pein kumwail? I sapengkin kumwail, sohte. Kumwail sohte kak ndahte me kumwail pahrekiong pwehl; ahpw kumwail wiawihda sang pwehl; pwe kilang, Ih me sapwellimaniki pwehl me ketin wieikumwailda.

26 Oh ngehiet, me kumwail kin wiahkin ie amwail nanmwarki, sohte weksang kumwail; pwe I pil wiawidahsang pwehl. Oh kumwail dehdehkier me I mahlahr, oh kereniongehr paliwareiet pahn kommoaldi oh pwurehng wiepwella.

27 Eri, I ndaiong kumwailehr me ni ei kin papah kumwail, I kin weweidki madamadau mwakelekel mwohn Koht, ih kahrepe wet me I kapokoneikumwailpene, pwe en dehr pwukoahki (amwail sapung kan), oh ntahmwail sohte pahn kohdo pohi, ni ahnsou me I pahn kesihnen mwohn Koht pwe I en pakadeingkihda soahng kan me e ketin mahsanihong ie duwen kumwail.

28 I ndaiong kumwail me I kapokoneikumwailpene pwe I en kak kamwakelehsang ntahmwail pohn ei likou, ahnsou wet me I nektehn kohdihla nan ei sousou, pwe I en kak mehla ni popohl, oh ngeniet me poatopoat en kak patehng pwihn en koul powe wie kokoulki koul en kapikapinga Koht pwung men.

29 OhI pil ndaiong kumwail me Ikapokoneikumwailpene pwe I en kak pakairkihong kumwail me I solahr pahn wia amwail sounpadahk, de amwail nanmwarki;

30 Pwe ahnsou wet, paliwereiet pwon kin wie rerrer mehlel ni ei songosong en koasoi ong kumwail; ahpw Kauno Koht ketin utung ie, oh mweidohng ie I en koasoi ong kumwail, oh mahsanihong ie I en pakairkihong kumwail rahn wet, me nei pwutak Mosaia iei amwail nanmwarki oh amwail kaun.

31 Oh met, riei ko, I men kumwail en peusehla wiewiahte dahme kumwail kin wia. Nin duwen amwail kin kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, oh pil ehn ei pahpao kosonned akan, oh kumwail pweidahr, oh sohte lohdi pahn manaman en amwail imwintihti kan, oh e pahn pil duwehte ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada ehn nei pwutako kosonned akan, de sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan me e pahn ketikihong kumwail sang ih, kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo, oh amwail imwintihti kan sohte pahn ahneki manaman pohmwail.

32 Ahpw kumwail, nei aramas akan, kumwail kalekeikumwailsang akamai kan nanpwungamwail, oh kalekeikumwailsang pilada peikiong ngehn suwedo, me ei pahpao Mosaia koasoaiadahro.

33 Pwe kilang, mie keriah ehu ong mehmen me pahn pilada peikiong ngehno; pwe ma e pahn peikiong ih, oh kin wiewiahte dihp lao mehla nan dipe kan, e duwehte e nimala kadeik en lekideklahn palingene; pwe e alehdier pweine me iei lokolok soutuk, sang ni kasapwungehla kosonned en Koht me e marainikier.

34 I ndaiong kumwail, me sohte emen nanpwungamwail me sohte padahngki duwen soahng pwukat, ihte me soh, noumwail seri tikitik kan, ahpw dahme kumwail ese me kumwail pweipwandkiong Samamwail nanleng kohkohlahte, kumwail en meirongkihong ih mehkoaros me amwail oh pein kumwail; oh pil amwail padahngkier duwen poadopoad kan me audaudki kokohp kan me soukohp sarawi kan mahsaniher sang mahs kohdo lel ahnsou me atail pahpa, Lihai, mweselsang Serusalem;

35 Oh pil, mehkoaros me atail pahpa kahlap ako koasoiadahr lao lel ahnsou wet. Oh kilang, irail pil koasoia dahme Kauno ketin poahngokihong irail; eri, re pwung oh mehlel.

36 Oh met, I ndaiong kumwail, riei ko, mwurin amwail esehier oh padangkiher soahng pwukat, ma kumwail pahn kasapwungehla oh uhwongada dahme koasoiadahr, ma kumwail pahn sohpeisang Ngehn en Kauno, me pahn kahrehda sohte dowe rehmwail pwe en kaweidkin kumwail ahl en erpit kan pwe en kak kupwuramwahwih kumwail, kapaiakumwailda, oh nekinekid kumwail—

37 I ndaiong kumwail, mehmen me pahn wia met, kin kahngohdiong Koht; eri e piladahr en peikiong ngehn suwedo, oh wiahla imwintihti en pwung koaros; eri, Kauno sohte kak ketiket reh, pwe e sohte kin ketiket nan tehnpas me sohte sarawi kan.

38 Eri ma aramas menet sohte pahn koluhla, oh wiewiahte dihp oh mehla ni eh wialahr imwintihti ong Koht, pwunglahn kopwung en Koht pahn kapirada palingene me poatopoato pwe en kehn ni sansal pein eh sapwung kan, me pahn kahrehda eh pahn rungkipene mwohn silangin Kauno, oh nan mwarmware pahn toutoukihla soansuwed, oh medek, oh pwunod, me pahn rasehng kisiniei sekehkun, me kin lulluldahla kohkohlahte.

39 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail, me mahk sohte kak sewese aramaso; eri imwilahn eh lokolok e pahn lokolongki kalokolok kohkohlahte.

40 Kumwail, koaros ohl mah kan, oh pil me pwulopwul kan, oh kumwail seri kan me kak wehwehki ei koasoi kan, pwe I koasoiong kumwail ni sansal pwe kumwail en kak wehwehki, I kapakapki pwe kumwail en tamanda kahpwal kamasepwehk en irail akan me pahn pwupwudiong nan dihp.

41 Oh I pil men kumwail en medemedewe uwen pai oh peren en irail akan me kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan. Pwe kilang, re inenen paiamwahu ni mehkoaros, ni paliwar oh palingehn; oh ma irail pahn loalopwoate lel ni imwio irail pahn kasamwolong nanleng, pwe irail en kak kousoanla rehn Koht nan mour peren kohkohlahte. Kumwail tamataman, tamataman me soahng pwukat me mehlel; pwe Kauno Koht me mahmahsen.
mosiah 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Pensamin ketin usehla sapwellime sakarada—Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie pahn ketin wia sapwellime doadoahk rehn aramas akan ni paliwar en sampah—Nta pahn keredihsang ni pwoahr en kili pwon ni Eh pahn tomwki dipen aramas koaros—Mwareo iei ihte mwahr me komourla pahn kak pweikihda—Aramas akan kak pwilikihdi ahneperail oh wiahla Souleng kei sang ni Tomwo—Lokolok en me suwed kan pahn rasehngete lehn kisiniei oh suwepel. Ele Sounpar 124 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh pil ehu, kilang rie ko, I peki rehmwail kumwail en rong mwahu, pwe miehte mehkot me I men patohwanohng kumwail; pwe kilang, mie soahngkei me I men patohwanohng kumwail duwen dahme pahn kohdo.

2 Oh duwen mehkan me I pahn patohwanohng kumwail, tohnleng men sang rehn Koht me kasalehiong ie. Oh e mahsanihong ie: Pirida; oh I ahpw pwourda, oh kilangada e kesikesihnen mwohi.

3 Oh e mahsanihong ie: Pirida, oh rong mahsen kan me I pahn padahkihong komwi; pwe kilang, I pwarodo pwe I en pakairkihong komwi rohng kaperen mehlel pwoat.

4 Pwe Kauno ketin karongehier omwi kapakap akan, oh ketin tenekiher omwi wiewia mwahu, oh ketin poaroneiehdo pwe I en kairehkin komwi en perenda; oh komw kak pakairkihong sapwellimomwi aramas akan, pwe irail en pil kak iang direkihla peren.

5 Pwe kilang, ahnsou me pahn nektehn leledo, me sang ni manaman, Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie me ketin kakaun oh ketiketier sang mwohn tepin kawa oh pil kohkohlahte, pahn ketidihdohng rehn aramas akan sang nanleng, oh pahn ketin kousoan nan paliwar en sampah, oh pahn ketiketseli rehn aramas akan, oh ketin wiewia manaman kapwuriamwei kan, duwehte kakehlahda me soumwahu kan, kamaurada me mehlahr akan, kamwahwihala me nehtuk kan pwe re en alu, me masukun re en kilangada wasa, oh me salengepon kan en rongada wasa, oh kamwahwihala soangen soumwahu tohto.

6 Oh e pahn ketin kausasang tepil kan, de ngehn suwed kan me kin mie nan mohngiong en aramas akan.

7 Oh kilang, e ahpw pahn lokolongki kasongosong, oh medek en paliwar, duhpek, men nimpil, oh e pahn pwangada, iei lokolok laudsang dahme aramas kak lokolongki, pwe e pahn mehkihla; pwe kilang, nta keresang nan pwoar en kilio pwon, e pahn ketin ihrmwell kowahlappwehki wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed en sapwellime aramas akan.

8 Oh e pahn mwareniki Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, Sahm en nanleng oh sampah, Sounkepikipik mehkoaros sangete nin tapio; oh ine pahn mwareniki Mery.

9 Oh kilang, e pahn ketidohng rehn sapwellime kan, pwe komour en kak lelohng aramas akan sang ni ar pwoson mwareo; oh mwurin soahng pwukat koaros irail pahn wiahkihte me ih aramas emen, oh nda me tepil tiada powe, oh re pahn kaloke, oh pahn kalohpwuwehla.

10 Oh e pahn ketin iasada sang mehla ni kesiluh en rahn; oh kilang, e pahn ketin kadeikada sampah; oh kilang, soahng pwukat koaros wiawi pwe kadeik pwung en kak wiawihong aramas akan.

11 Pwe kilang, oh sapwellime nta pahn wia meirong en tomwki dipen irail akan me pwupwukihdi dipen Adamo, me mehla ahpw sohte wehwehki kupwur en Koht ong irail, de me sawehwe oh wiahda sapwung kan.

12 Ahpw meid suwed, meid suwediong aramaso me wehwehki me e kahngohdiong Koht! Ihte ma e pahn koluhla oh pwoson Kauno Sises Krais, me e pahn komourkihla.

13 Oh Kauno Koht ketin poaronehdo sapwellime soukohp sarawi kan rehn aramas akan koaros, pwe re en kairehki soahng pwukat rehn keinek koaros, wehi koaros, oh lokaia koaros, pwe irail akan me pahn kamehlele me Krais pahn ketido, re pahn alehdi mahkpen diparail akan, oh pereperenikiperen kowahlap, duwehte me e ketidohr rehrail.

14 Ahpw Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniadahr me sapwellime aramas akan arail keptakai, oh e ketikihong irail kosonned ehu, iei kosonned en Moseso.

15 Oh e ketin kasalehiong irail kilel tohto oh manaman kapwuriamwei kan, oh soahng kei me kin wia karasaras, oh duwen mehkan me kin kasalehda me e pahn ketido; oh pil soukohp sarawi kan arail kin kokohpkiong irail duwen eh pahn ketido; ahpw re kin kakeptaikaialahte nan kapehdarail kan, oh re sohte wehwehki me kosonned en Moseso sohte katepe ihte sang ni tomw en sapwellime ntao.

16 Mendahte ma kisin seri kan kak wiahda dihp irail sohte kak komourla; ahpw I ndaiong kumwail me irail meid pai; pwe kilang, sang Adam, de sang uhdahn ahnepen mour, irail pwupwudier, ahpw ntahn Krais tomwkilahr diparail akan.

17 Oh I pil ndaiong kumwail, me sohte mwar ehu de ehu ahl tohrohr de ehu wiepe me komour pahn kak lelohng aramas akan, ihte sang reh oh ni mwaren Krais, Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie.

18 Pwe kilang e pahn ketin kadeik, oh sapwellime kadeik me pwung; oh kisin seri me mehla ni arail pwelel sohte pahn lekidekla; ahpw aramas akan kin nimala kadeik en lekidekla ong pein irail ma re sohte pahn karakarahkala oh duwehla kisin seri kan, oh kamehlele me sangete mahs, leledo ahnsou wet, oh pil ahnsou kohkohdo komouro kin kohsangete ni meirong en tomw en ntahn Krais, Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie.

19 Pwe ahnepen aramas e wia imwintihti ong Koht, oh ih duwen sangete ni pwupwudi en Adamo, oh e pahn wia met, kohkohlahte, e lao pahn peikiong kaweid en Ngehn Sarawio, oh pwilikihdi ahnepen aramaso oh wiahla souleng men sang ni tomw en Krais Kauno, oh duwehla seri men, me kin mweidala nsene, mpai, karakarahk, kanengamah, direkihla limpoak, inangih idawehn soahng koaros me Kauno mwahngih pahn konehng en ketikihong, duwehte seri men e kin idawehn eh pahpa.

20 Oh I pil ndaiong kumwail, me ahnsouo pahn leledo me marain en Sounkomouro pahn kipehdi wehi koaros, rehn keinek koaros, ni lokaia koaros, oh rehn aramas koaros.

21 Oh kilang, ni ahnsouo e pahn leledo, sohte aramas me pahn dierekda me sohte dipe mwohn silangin Koht, ihte kisin seri kan, oh ihte sang ni koluhla oh pwoson mwaren Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalahpie.

22 Oh mehlel ahnsou wet, ni amwail pahn padahkihong noumwail aramas akan soahng kan me Kauno amwail Koht mahsanih ong kumwail, iei ahnsouo irail pahn dierekda me sohte diparail mwohn silangin Koht, nin duwen mahsen kan me I padahkihongkumwailehr.

23 Oh met I padahkihongkumwailehr mahsen kan me Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih ong ie.

24 Oh Kauno ketin mahsanih: e pahn wia kadehde sansal ong aramas pwukat, ni rahn en kadeiko; eri aramas koaros pahn pakadeikda, nin duwen ar wiewia kan, ma wiewia mwahu desuwed.

25 Oh ma wiewia suwed re pahn dehdehki uwen laud en diparail kan oh arail wiewia suwed kan, me pahn kahrehda arail pahn runkusang mwohn silangin Kauno kohlahng nan mour apwal oh lokolok soutuk, wasa me re sohte pahn kak pwurasang ie; eri irail nimalahr pilen kadeik ong pein irail.

26 Eri, irail nimasangehr nan delen engieng en Koht, me wia kopwung me uhdahn pahn wiawi ong irail duwehte eh wiawi ong Adam ni ahnsou me e pwupwudio pwehki e tungoale wahntuhke sohte mweimweio; eri, mahk sohte kak sewesei irail kohkohlahte.

27 Oh arail lokolok pahn duwehte lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me kin sekehkun, oh me kin ediedida erein kohkohlahte. Iei me Kauno ketin mahsaniong ie. Ahmen.
mosiah 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Pensamin ketin usehla sapwellime sakarada—Komourla miehda pwehki Tomwo—Kamehlele Koht pwe ke en kak komourla—Kolokolete lapwepen dipamwail akan sang ni loalopwoat—Sowesehki me semwehmwe kan amwail dipwisou kan—Wia soahng koaros ni erpit oh nin duwen koasoandi. Ele Sounpar 124 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, mwurin ahnsou me nanmwarki Pensamin mahsaniher mehkan me tohnleng en Kauno kairehkiong, e ahpw ketin mahsenseli pohn pokono, oh mahsaniada arail pwupwudiong nanpwel, pwehki ar lemmwikidahr Kauno.

2 Re kasawiadahr pein irail nan arail mour dihp, me suwedsang pwelipar en sampah. Oh irail koaros ehupene oh ndinda ni ngihl laud: Maing komw kupwurkalahngan, oh doadoahngki tomw en ntahn Krais pwe sen kak alehdi mahkpen dipat akan, oh mohngiongat kan en kak mwakelekelda; pwe se kamehlele Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, me kapikada nanleng oh sampah, oh audapara koaros; me pahn ketidihdo rehn aramas akan.

3 Kedekedeo mwurin arail ndahla koasoi pwukat Ngehn en Kauno ahpw tiahda pohrail, oh irail ahpw direkihla peren, oh alehdi mahkpen diparail akan, oh alehdi popohl nan arail madamadau, pwehki arail pwoson Sises Krais me pahn ketido, nin duwen mahsen akan me nanmwarki Pensamin mahsanihong irailehr.

4 Oh nanmwarki Pensamin apw pwurehng mahsanihong irail, ketihtihki: Kempoakepahi ko oh riei ohl ako, ei peneinei kan oh nei aramas akan, I men pwurehng peki rehmwail en rong ie, pwe kumwail en rong oh wehwehki mwahu kaimwiseklahn ei tungoal sakarada me I pahn patohwanohng kumwail.

5 Pwe kilang, ahnsou wet ma amwail marainiki kupwurmwahu en Koht panginkin kumwail en ese duwen amwail sohte mehkot, oh amwail sohte katepe oh amwail mour en aramas pwupwudi kei—

6 I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail marainikidahr kupwurmwahu en Koht, oh sapwellime manaman me sohte pelie, oh sapwellime erpit, oh sapwellime kanengamah, oh duwen eh kin ketin dadaurete sapwellime kanangamah ong aramas akan; oh pil, tomwo me kaunopadahr sangete ni poahsondahn sampah, pwe aramas en kak komourla ma e pahn koapworopworiki Kauno, oh pahn nantihong kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan, oh loalopwoatohngete eh pwosono lao lel imwin eh mour, met wehwehki mour en paliwar—

7 I patohwan, me iei ih aramas menet me pahn alehdi komour, sang ni tomwo me kaunopdahr sangete nin tepin sampah eh wiawihda ong aramas koaros, sangete pwupwulahn Adamo, de aramas me momour ahnsou wet, de me pahn ipwidi mwuhr, lao lel ni imwilahn sampah.

8 Oh iei met wiepen elen komour. Oh sohte ehu soangen komour likin dahme koasoiadahr; oh sohte ehu koasoandi me aramas kak komourkihla likin koasoandi me I patohwan ong kumwail.

9 Kumwail kamehlele Koht; kumwail kamehlele me ih me Koht, oh me e ketin kapikada soahng koaros, nanleng oh nin sampah; kumwail kamehlele me e ketin sapwellimaniki eripit koaros, oh manaman koaros, nanleng oh nin sampah; kumwail kamehlele me aramas sohte kak wehwehki soahng kan koaros me Kauno ketin mwahngih.

10 Oh kumwail en pil kamehlele me kumwail anahne koluhkihla dipamwail kan oh pwilikihdi, oh karakarahkala mwohn Koht; oh peki ni mohngiong mehlel pwe en ketin mahkohng kumwail; oh met, ma kumwail kamehlele mepwukat koaros ah kumwail nsenohki kapwaiada.

11 Oh I pil pahn kapwurehieng dahme I patohwanohng kumwailehr mwoweo, pwe ni amwail pahn marainkihda lingan en Koht, de ma kumwail esehier sapwellime kupwuramwahu oh kehnehr sapwellime limpoak oh alehdier mahkpen dipamwail akan, me kin kahrehda peren laud mehlel nan amwail mour, I pil men kumwail en tamataman, oh ahnsou koaros katengehdi nan amwail mehn kataman akan, me Koht me lapalap, oh kumwail sohte mehkot, oh sapwellime kupwuramwahu oh kanangamah ong kumwail, aramas souwar akan, oh kumwail en aktikitikla mehlel, likilikweriong mwaren Kauno rahn kaoros, oh uh tengeteng ni amwail pwoson dahme pahn kohdo, me tohnlengo mahsaniher.

12 Oh kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me ma kumwail pahn wia met kumwail pahn pereperen ahnsou koaros, oh kin direkihla limpoak en Koht, oh ahnsou koaros kumwail pahn kin ale lapwepen dipamwail akan; oh amwail pahn marainkihla lingaling en ih me ketin wieikumwailda pahn lalaudla, de marainkihla dahme pwung oh mehlel.

13 Oh kumwail sohte pahn ahneki madamadau en kamedekehla emen, ahpw momour ni popohl, oh kihong emen emen aramas uhdahn pwaise.

14 Oh kumwail sohte pahn mweidehng noumwail seri kan re en duhpekla, de kilisouda; de kumwail sohte pahn mweidehng irail en kawehla kosonned akan en Koht, oh pei oh akamaipene nanpwungarail, oh papah tepilo, me iei soumas en dihp, de iei ngehn suwedo me atail pahpa kahlap ako koasoiahier, me wia imwintihtien soahng koaros me mwahu.

15 Ahpw kumwail pahn padahkihong irail en weweidki mour mehlel oh maledek; kumwail pahn padahkihong irail en limpoakpene, oh uhpahpene nanpwungarail.

16 Oh pil, pein kumwail me pahn sewese irail akan me kin anahne amwail sawas; kumwail pahn apwalihkihong amwail dipwisou kan ong me anahne sawas; oh kumwail dehr pohnsehse pekpek en me kin peksawas, oh dehr kadarala pwe en mwomwla.

17 Ele mwein kumwail pahn nda: Aramaso me kahpwalihala pein ih; eri I pahn nennenlahte, oh sohte pahn kisekisehkiong kenei mwonge, de pil kihong ei dipwisou pwe en deh lokolok, pwe eh kalokolok kan me pwung—

18 Ahpw I pahn ndaiong kumwail, oh ni mehlel, mehmen me pahn wia met e pahn anahne koluhla; oh ma e sohte pahn koluhkihla dahme e wiadahr e pahn lekdekla kohkohlahte, oh sohte dewe nan wehin Koht.

19 Pwe kilang, kaidehn kitail koaros sou wia soun lipekipek kei? Kaidehn kitail koaros sou kin koapworopworki Kohtohte, ong ni mehkoaros me kitail ahneki, kanatail mwenge oh atail likou, oh neitail kohl, oh silper, oh pai kan koaros me kitail ahneki?

20 Oh kilang, ahnsou wet, kumwail pil kin wie likilikwerih mwareo, oh pekipeki lapwepen dipamwail akan. Ah dah, e ketin mweidohng amwail pekipek kan en sohte pweida? Soh; ahpw e ketikihong sapwellime Ngehn pohmwail, oh kahrehda mohngiongimwail kan en direkihla peren, oh kahrehieng awemwail kan eh nennenla oh sohte kak koasoi pwehki amwail peren mwuledek.

21 Oh met, ma Koht, me ketin wieikumwailda, me kumwail kin kehlikihong amwail mour oh soahng koaros me kumwail ahneki oh wia, me ketikihong kumwail mehkoaros me kumwail kin peki me pwung, sang ni pwoson, ni amwail kamehlele me kumwail pahn alehdi, eri, ia uwen amwail anahne kisekisehki mehteikan amwail dipwisou kan.

22 Oh ma kumwail kadeik aramas men me peki amwail dipwisou kan pwe e de mehla, oh kumwail wiakauwe, ia uwen pwung en amwail pahn pakadeingkihda amwail kahng kisekisehki amwail dipwisou kan, me kaidehn amwail ahpw sapwellimen Koht, me pil ketin sapwellimaniki amwail mour kan; oh kumwail sohte wie amwail pekipek, de koluhkihla dahme kumwail wiadahr.

23 I ndaiong kumwail, meid suwediong aramaso, pwehki ih oh eh dipwisou kan pahn mwomwala; oh met, I koasoia mehpwukat ong irail akan me kepwehpwehkihla dipwisoun sampah kan.

24 Oh met, I ndaiong kumwail me semwehmwe kan, kumwail akan me sohte amwail dipwisou ahpw itarete dahme mie pwe kumwail en momour ehu ehu rahn; I koasoakoasoiaiong kumwail akan me kin soikala me wie pekipeko, pwehki sohte amwail dipwisou; I men kumwail en kin nda nan mohngiongimwail kan: I sohte kisekise pwehki sohte ei dipwisou, ah ma mie I uhdahn pahn kihla.

25 Oh met, ma kumwail pahn nda met nan mohngiongimwail kan kumwail pahn mwakelekelte, ma soh a kumwail pahn pakadeikda; oh amwail pakadeik pahn pwung pwehki amwail noahreke dahme sohte amwail.

26 Oh met, pwehki soahng pwukat me I koasoiaiong kumwail—me iei, kumwail en kin ale lapwepen dipamwail akan nan rahn koaros, pwe kumwail en kak mour mwakelekel mwohn Koht—I men kumwail en kin kisekisehki me semwehmwe kan amwail dipwisou kan, aramas koaros nin duwen dahme wia uhdahn arail, iei kamwenge irail akan me duhpeklahr, kalikawihada me sohte ar likou kan, pwarek me soumwahu oh apwalih arail anahn akan, ni pali ngehn oh paliwar, nin duwen dahme re mwahuki.

27 Oh kilang me soahng pwukat koaros wiawi ni eripit oh nin duwen koasoandi; pwe e sohte konehng aramas emen en tang marahrahsang uwen eh kak. Oh pil ehu, e konehng me e pahn pwersek, pwe en kak ale kisakis; eri, soahng koaros anahne wiawi nin duwen koasoandi.

28 Oh I men kumwail en tamataman, mehmen nanpwungamwail me pekihsang rehn mehn mpe mehkot e pahn anahne kapwurehla dahme e pekio, nin duwen dahme e koasoanehdi, ma soh e pahn dipikihda; oh ke pil kakete kahrehda mehn mpemomwo e pahn pil dipikihda.

29 Eri, I sohte kak ndaiong kumwail soahng koaros me kumwail kak dipikihda; pwe mie soangen wiepe oh mwohmw kei, iei me I sohte kak wadekedi pwehki ar nohn tohto.

30 Ahpw iei met me I kak ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail sohte pahn kanaiehng pein kumwail, oh amwail madamadau kan, oh amwail koasoi kan, oh amwail wiewia kan, oh kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh nantihong ni pwoson dahme kumwail rongehr duwen ketidohn Kauno, iei lao lel imwin amwail mour, kumwail uhdahn pahn mehla. Oh met, kumwail, tamataman, oh dehr mehla.
mosiah 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Souleng kan wiahla sapwellimen Krais pwutak oh serepein kei sang ni arail pwoson—Irail ahpw pahn kahdanekihla mwaren Krais—Nanmwarki Pensamin ketin koangoangehkin irail en loalopwoat oh tengediong nan doadoahk mwahu kan. Ele Sounpar 124 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo ni ahnsou me nanmwarki Pensamin mahseniongehr sapwellime aramas akan, e ahpw ileklahng nan pwungerail pwe e men mwahngih sang sapwellime aramas akan ma irail kamehlele mahsen kan me e mahsanihong irailehr.

2 Oh irail koaros wiahkinteieu werda, ndinda; Ei, se kamehlele mahsen koaros me komwi ketin mahsanihong kiht; oh se pil ese me dahme komw kasaledahr me uhdahn mehlel, pwehki Ngehn en Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie, me ketin kawiliakapwala mehlel loalat, de nan mohngiongat kan, me kahrehda se sohlar inengieng wia me suwed, ahpw pahn wiwiahte me mwahu ahnsou koaros.

3 Oh pein kiht, pil, sang ni kupwuramwahu poatopoat en Koht, oh wiewia kapwuriamwei en sapwellime Ngehno, se wehwehkiehr duwen dahme pahn kohdo; oh ma e konehng, se pahn kak en kohpada duwen soahng koaros.

4 Oh iei sang ni aht pwoson mahsen kan me aht nanmwarki mahsanihong kihtehr me karehieng aht marainkidahr, iei me se inenen pereniki mehlel ni peren mwuledek.

5 Oh se inengieng wiahda inou ong aht Koht me se pahn kapwaiada kupwure, oh peikiong sapwellime kosonned akan ni mehkoaros me e pahn ketin mahsanihong kiht, erein aht mour, pwe se en dehr kihong kiht kalokolok me sohte imwi, nin duwen me tohnlengo mahsaniher, pwe se en dehr nimasang nan kepen sapwellimen Koht engieng.

6 Oh met, iet mahsen akan me namwariki Pensamin ketin kupwurki sang irail; eri e mahsanihong irail: Kumwail ndahier dahme I perenki rong; a inou me kumwail wiadahr iei inou pwung ehu.

7 Oh met, pwehki inou me kumwail wiadahr kumwail pahn kahdaniki sapwellimen Krais seri kei, sapwellime pwutak kei oh sapwellime serepein kei; pwe kilang, rahnwet e sapwellimankin kumwaillahr ni palingehn; pwe kumwail nda me amwail mohngiong kan wiliakapwala sang amwail pwoson mwareo; eri, kumwail ipwisangehr ih oh wialahr sapwellime pwutak kei oh sapwellime serepein kei.

8 Oh sang ni lengileng wet me pahn kasaledengkumwailla, oh sohte ehu lengileng me pahn kak kasaledengkumwailla. Sohte ehu mwar me wiawihda me komour pahn kokihdo; eri, I men kumwail en alehda mwaren Krais, kumwail koaros me wiadahr inou ehu ong Koht pwe kumwail en peikiong lao lel ni imwin amwail mour.

9 Oh ahnsowo pahn leledo me mehmen me kin kapwaiada met e pahn iang mih ni pali maun en Koht, pwehki e esehier mwaro me e kahdanekihlahr; pwe e pahn kahdaneki mwaren Kraiso.

10 Eri ni ahnsowo eh pahn leledo mehmen me sohte pahn alehda mwaren Krais pahn kahdaneki ni ehu soangen mwar tohrohr; eri, e pahn dierek ni palimeing en Koht.

11 Oh I men kumwail en pil tamataman, me iei mwar wet me I ndaiong kumwail me I pahn kihong kumwail me sohte mwahn pahn koakoahsang kumwail, ihte ma kumwail dipada; eri, kumwail rong pwe kumwail dehr dipada, pwe mwaro en dehr koakoahsang nan mohngiongimwail kan.

12 I ndaiong kumwail, I men kumwail en tamataman kolokolte mwareo en kin wie ntintingte nan mohngiongamwail kan ahnsou koaros, pwe kumwail en dehr uhd mihla ni palimeing en Koht, ahpw kumwail en kin kak rongada oh ese kepitieo me pahn ketin malipeikumwail, oh pil, mwaro me e pahn ketin eker kin kumwail.

13 Pwe ia mwomwen aramas emen eh pahn ese soumas emen me e sohte kin papah, oh me soumaso pahn wiahkihla aramas en liki men, oh e dohsang lamalam oh ineng en nan kapehde?

14 Oh pil, mie me kin doadoahngki nein mehn mpe nah ahs, oh nainekihla? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; e sohte pahn mweidohng en iang nah mahn akan mwonge, ahpw e pahn karawansang, oh pwakihala. I ndaiong kumwail, me iei met me pahn wiawihong kumwail ma kumwail sohte pahn ese mwaro me kumwail mwarasang.

15 Eri, I men kumwail en loalopwoat oh tengeteng, oh kin wia doadoahk mwahu ahnsou koaros, pwe Krais, Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalahpie, en kak sapwellimanikinkumwailla, pwe kumwail en kak kopwurupwurdo nanleng, pwe kumwail en kak sosohki mour poatoapoat oh mour soutuk, sang ni kupwurokong, oh manaman, oh pwuhng, oh kalahngan en ih me ketin kapikada soahng koaros, nanleng oh pohn sampah, me iei Koht me lapalapasang koaros. Ahmen.
mosiah 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Pensamin ketin ntingihdi eden aramas akan oh idihadahr samworo kei re en kin padahki irail—Mosaia wia nanmwarki mwahu men nan eh mwehi. Ele Sounpar 124–121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri, mwurin nanmwarki Pensamin eh kaimwisekalahr sapwellime mahsen ong sapwellime aramas akan, e ahpw kupwurehda me e konehng en alehdi mwaren aramas koaros me wiadahr inou ong Koht me re pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan.

2 Kedekedeo irail koaros wiahda inou oh alehda mwaren Krais, ihte kisin seri tikitik kan me soh.

3 Oh kedekedeo ahnsou me nanmwarki Pensamin kaimwisekala mepwukat koaros, oh kasarawialahr sapwellime pwutak Mosaia en wiahla kaun oh nanmwarki en aramas akan, oh ketikihong pwukoa en apwalih wehio, oh pil idihada samworo kei pwe re en kin padahki aramas akan, pwe irail en kak rong oh esehla sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh kin katakatamankin irail kahula me re wiadahr, e ahpw ketin kadarpeseng pokono, oh irail koaruhsie, wad peneinei, pwuralang ni imwarail kan.

4 Oh Mosaia ahpw wiliandi seme oh uhd wiahla nanmwarki. Oh e sounpar silihsek ni ahnsou me e wiahla nanmwarki, ele sounpar pahpwiki isihsek weneu sang ni ahnsou me Lihai mweselsang Serusalem.

5 Oh nanmwarki Pensamin momourki sounpar siluh oh e ahpw pwoula.

6 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Mosaia ahpw kin weweidki sapwellimen Kauno ahl akan, oh kin peikiong sapwellime kosonned akan oh koasoandi kan, oh kin kapwaiada sapwellime mahsen kan koaros me e kin ketin mahsanihong.

7 Oh nanmwarki Mosaia kupwurehda sapwellime aramas akan en koadoahke pwehl en sampah. Oh e pil pein koadoahke pwehl en sahpw, pwe e dehr katoutouwih sapwellime aramas akan, pwe en kak kalemengih karasepe mwahu koaros en seme. Oh sapwellime aramas akan sohte nanpwungsuwedpene erein soupar siluh.
mosiah 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amon diarada sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai, wasa me Limahi wia nanmwarki men—Sapwellimen Limahi aramas akan kaliduhla pahn mehn Leimen kan—Limahi padokada duwen poadeparail—Soukohp men (Apinadai) kadehdehki me Krais iei Koht oh Sahm en soahng koaros—Irail akan me pahn padok samin pahn dolung melimel, oh irail akan me pahn koapworopworki Kauno pahn mourla. Ele Sounpar 121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo mwurin nanmwarki Mosaia, e sapwellimankier popohl erein sounpar siluh, e ahpw kupwurehda en ese duwen aramas ako me kohdalahn kousoanla nan sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai, de kahnihmw en Lihai-Nihpai; pwehki sapwellime aramas akan saikinte rongasang irail sangete mwurin arail mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla; eri, sapwellime aramas akan katoutouwihalahr nan kupwure pwehki ar kin kalapw patohwan kalelapak reh duwen irail.

2 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Mosaia ahpw pilada neirail ohl kehlail meh ehk wenemen re en kohdahla nan sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai, pwe re en diarada duwen rierailko.

3 Kedekedeo mandahn rahno irail ahpw mwesel kohdahla, emen irail adaniki Ammon, me wia ohl kehlail oh komwad men, oh e wia kadaudok en Saraemla; oh ih me pil kaun arail pwihno.

4 Oh met, irail sohte ese ahl me irail pahn keidla ie nan sapwtehno pwe re en leldalahng nan sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai; eri erein rahn tohto irail kokohseli nan sapwtehno, iei rahn pahisek me irail wie kokohseli.

5 Oh mwurin arail kokohkiseli erein rahn pahisek irail ahpw lel pohn dohl ehu, me mihte paliepeng en sahpw en Sailom, oh irail ahpw kauwada imwarail impwal kan wasao.

6 Oh Amon kahrehda rie ohl silimen, oh adarail akan iei Amalekai, Ilem, oh Em, oh irail ahpw kohdihla nan sahpw en Nihpai.

7 Oh kilang, irail tuhwongidi nanmwarki en aramas akan me kin kousoan nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh nan sahpw en Sailom; oh sapwellimen nanmwarikio soun silasil kan kol iraildier, oh irail wisiksangehr, oh pirapirdier, oh selidi nan imweteng.

8 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail mihmihkier nan imweteng rahn riau, re ahpw pwurehng wisikdohng mwohn nanmwarkio, oh sahl akan me pireirail penehr ahpw sapwadekdahr; irail ahpw uh mwohn nanmwarkio, oh mweimweiongehr, de nanmwarki mahsanihong irail en sapeng kalelapak kan me e pahn ketin keinemwe rehrail.

9 E ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, Ngehi iei Limahi, nein Noha pwutak, me wia nein Sihnep, me kohdahdosang nan sahpw en Saraemla pwe en kak sapwankihla sahpwet, me wia sahpw en arail pahpa kahlap ako, me wiahla nanmwarki sang ni pilipil en aramas pwukat.

10 Oh met, I men ese dahme kahrehda kumwail nohn kommwadki en keido limwahn kehl en aht kahnihmw, ni ahnsou me ngehi oh silepei kan wie patpatoseli maslikin kehlo?

11 Oh met, ih kahrepen ei mweidehng kumwail en mourla, pwe I en kak kalelapak rehmwail, pwe ma soh I ndahiongehr silepei ko re en kemeikumwaila. Kumwail mweimweiongehrkoasoi.

12 Oh met, ni ahnsou me Amon kilangadahr me e mweimweiohngehr pato, e patohla oh poaridi mwohn nanmwarkio; oh patohda oh patohwan: Maing nanmwarki, I inenen kapingkihong Koht rahnwet pwehki ei momourte, oh ei mweimweidahr I en pato; oh I pahn song pato ni eimah;

13 Pwe I kamehlele ma komwi mwahngih ie komw sohte pahn mweidohng I en pirapirkihdi sahl pwukat. Pwe ngehi iei Amon, oh ngehi emen kadaudok en Saraemla, oh I patohdahdo sang nan sahpw en Saraemla pwe se en kak diarada duwen riat akan, me Sihnep kahluwa sang nan sahpwo.

14 Oh met, kedekedeo mwurin Limahi e karongehier en Amon koasoi kan, e uhdahn perenda, oh ketihtihki: Met, I esehier ni mehlel me riei kan me mihmi nan sahpw en Saraemla wie momourte. Oh met, I pahn pereperen; oh lakapw I pahn kupwurehda nei aramas akan re en pil iang pereperen.

15 Pwe kilang, se wialahr lidu kei pahn mehn Leimen kan, oh kin wie pwapwain uwen daksis me udahnkansensuwed mehlel. Oh met, kilang, riatail ohl akat pahn kapitkitailla sang nan mour en kalidu, de sang nan pehn Mehn Leimen kan, oh kitail pahn wiahla neirail lidu; pwe e pahn mwahu ma kitial liduhla rehn Mehn Nihpai kan sang atail pahn nohnohpweieng nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan.

16 Oh met, nanmwarki Limahi padahkiong sapwellime sounpei kan me re pahn sapwadada Amon oh rie ko, ahpw e ketin kupwurehda irail en kohla ni dohl me mih paliepeng en Sailom, oh kahrehdo iengarail ohl akan nan kahnihmwo, pwe irail en kak mwenge, oh nimpil, oh kommoal sang doadoahk en arail seiloako; pwe irail lokolongkier soahng tohto; irail lokolongki ar men mwenge, ar mennimpil, oh ar pwangadahr.

17 Oh met, kedekedeo mandahn rahno nanmwarki Limahi ahpw kadarpeseng pakair ehu ong sapwellime aramas koaros, irail en pokonpene ni tehnpas sarawio, pwe irail en karonge dahme e pahn ketin mahsanihong irail.

18 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail pokonpenehr e ahpw mahsanihong irail, ketihtihki: Kumwail, nei aramas akan, kumwail sarada oh ahneki koapworopwor; pwe kilang, ahnsowo leledohr, de e sohte pahn pwand ni ahnsou me kitail sohla pahn mih pahn manaman en atail imwintihti kan, mendahte lokolok laud me kitail ahnekier, me sohte katepe; ahpw I kamehlele me miehte doadoahk apwal me kitail anahne wia.

19 Eri, kumwail sarada, oh perenda, oh kumwail koapworopworki Koht, iei Koht en Eipraam, oh Aisek, oh Seikop; oh pil, Kohto me ketin kahluwa mehn Israel kan sang nan Isip, oh ketin kupwurehda irail en kotehla Sehd Weitahtao pohn ngalangal, oh kamwengehkin irail mana pwe irail en dehr mehla nan sahpwtehno; oh pil soahng tohto me e ketin wia ong irail.

20 Oh pil, Kohtohte me ketin kahluwa atail pahpa kahlap ako sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh ketin kolokol oh doandoare sapwellime aramas akan lao lel rahnwet; oh kilang, met iei pwehki atail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan me kahreda e ketin mweidohng kitail en mihla pahn apwal en mour en lidu.

21 Oh kumwail koaros wiahier sounkadehde rahnwet, me Sihnep, me wiahla nanmwarki en aramas pwukat, pwehki e nohn loalenohng sohsoki sahpw en eh pahpa kahlap ako, kahrehda e lohdi pahn widing oh mwersuwed en nanmwarki Leimen, me wiahdainou ehu ong nanmwarki Sihnep, oh mweidohng en sapwanikihla wasa kei nan sahpwe, de iei kahnihmw en Lihai-Nihpai, oh kahnihmw en Sailom; iangahki sahpw me kapilpene—

22 Oh e ketin wia mepwukat koaros pwe aramas pwukat en mihla pahn sapwellime manaman de mihla pahn mour en lidu. Oh kilang, ahnsou wet se kin nohpweikihong nanmwarik en Mehn Leimen kan, ni uwen elep en aht kohn, oh aht parli, oh pil iangahki aht wahn soangsoangen werentuhke kan koaros, elep en tohtohlahn nait pelinmen kan; nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan pil kin pehdsang kiht elep en mehkoaros me se ahneki, de aht mour kan.

23 Oh kilang, met sou udahn kansensuwed mehlel? Oh kaidehn mehkot laud ieu met, atail kahpwal kan? Met kilang, ia uwen atail ahneki kahrepe laud en mwahiei.

24 Ei, I ndaiong kumwail, me lapalahn kahrepe kei me kitail en sengisengki; pwe kilangriatail depehier me kamakamalahr, oh kakerehdien ntarail kan wiawi mwahl, oh mepwukat wiawi pwehki wiewia suwed.

25 Pwe ma aramas pwukat sohte pwupwudi nan dihp Kauno sohte pahn mweidohng suwed laud wet en wiawihong irail. Ahpw kilang, irail sohte men rong sapwellime mahsen kan; pingiping ahpw wiawi nanpwungerail, iei uwen laud irail kakerehdi nta nanpwungarail.

26 Oh irail kemehla soukohp en Kauno men; ei, ohl en Koht pilipilda men, me patohwanohng irail duwen arail wiewia suwed oh tiak suwed kan, oh kohpadahr soahng tohto me pahn kohdo, ei, iei pil ketidohn Kraiso.

27 Oh pwehki e patohwanohng irail me Krais iei Koht, Sahm en soahng koaros, oh patohwan me e pahn ketin pwaredo ni mwohmw en aramas, oh e pahn mih ni mwohmw en aramas me kepikipikda nin tapio; me pil wehwehki, e patohwan me aramas wiawihda rasehng Koht, oh me Koht pahn ketidihdo rehn aramas akan, oh ketin alehda paliwar uduk oh nta, oh ketket pohn sampah—

28 Oh met, pwehki e patohwanohng irail mehpwukat, irail kemehla ohlo; oh soahng tohto me irail wiahda me kahrehdahr engieng en Koht lelong irail. Eri, e soh sansal kahrepen arail mihla nan mour apwal en kalidu, oh kin wie lokolongki kahpwal laud akan?

29 Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih: I sohte pahn sewese nei aramas akan ahnsou me irail wiewia suwed; ahpw I pahn karompwahsang irail pwe irail en dehr pweida; oh arail wiewia kan pahn duwehte takain dipekelekel mwohrail.

30 Oh e pil ketin mahsanih: Ma nei aramas akan pahn wiewia me suwed irail pahn dolung wahn melimelo; oh kasuwedpe kan me pwoisin.

31 Oh e pil mahsanih: Ma nei aramas akan pahn wiewia me suwed irail pahn dolung kisinieng en palimese, me kin mwadangete kamwomwala wasa.

32 Oh met, kitail kilangehr, sapwellimen Kauno inou pweidahr, oh kumwail lelohng nan apwal oh lokolok.

33 Ahpw ma kumwail pahn sohpeiong Kauno sang ni mohngiong unsek, oh koapworopworki ih, oh papah ih sang ni loalopwoat mehlel, ma kumwail pahn wia met, e pahn ketin kapitkumwailsang nan mour en lidu nin duwen kupwure.
mosiah 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amon padahkih sapwellimen Limai aramas akan—E esehda duwen pileit rieisek pahieu en Mehn Sared kan—ohl sarawi kan kak kawehwehdi poadopoad en kawa kan—Sohte kisakis me lapalapasang kohwa doadoahk en ohl sarawi men. Ele Sounpar 121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin nanmwarki Limai, eh mahseniong sapwellime aramas akan, pwe soahng tohto me e mahsanihong irail oh ekeite me I ntingihdi nan pwuhk wet, e mahsaniong sapwellime aramas akan soahng kan koaros duwen riarail kan me mih nan sahpw en Saraemla.

2 Oh e mahsaniong Amon en pahtohda mwohn pokono, oh pwurehng koasoiahda soahng koaros me wiawihongehr riarail kan sang ni ahnsou me Sihnep kohdahdo sang nan sahpwo lao lel ahnsou me pein ih kohdahdo sang nan sahpwo.

3 Oh e pil pwurehng koasoiahda keimseklahn mahsen en nanmwarki Pensamin me e ketin mahsanihong irail, oh kawehwehiong sapwellimen nanmwarki Limai aramas akan, pwe irail en kak wehwehki mahsen kan koaros me e ketin mahsaniher.

4 Kedekedeo mwurin eh wiahier soahng pwukat koaros, namwariki Limai ahpw ketin kadarpeseng pokono, oh mahsaniong irail en pwuralahng pein imwarail kan.

5 Kedekedeo e ahpw ketin kupwurehda me pileit kan me audaudki poadopoad en sapwellime aramas akan sangete ni ahnsou me irail mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla, en wisikdo rehn Amon pwe en kak wadek.

6 Met, ni ahnsou me Amon wadekehr poadopoado, nanmwarkio ahpw kalelapak reh ma e kak kawehwe mahsen kan, ah Amon sapengki me e sohte kak.

7 Nanmwarkio apw mahsanihong: Pwehki ei pahtoukihla lokolok kan me nei aramas akan mihla loale, I kadarala nei aramas pehk silimen en seiloakwei nan sapwtehno, pwe irail en kak diarada sahpw en Saraemla, pwe se en kak pekihda rehn riat akan en kohdo doareikitasangnan mouren lidu.

8 Ahpw re salongala nan sahpwtehno erein rahn kei, ahpw re nannantihongete, oh re sohte diarada sahpw en Saraemla re ahpw pwurodo nan sahpwet a ni arail kotehla sahpw me diren pihl, irail ahpw diarada sahpw ehu me direkihla tihn aramas, oh tihn mahn kei, oh wasao pil direkihla mohn kahnimw kei, re diarada sahpw ehu me aramas ngeder koukousoan ie mwoweo me duwehte uwen tohtohn mehn Israel.

9 Oh pwe en wia kadehdepen soahng kan me irail koasoia me e mehlel, irail wahdo pileit rieisek pahieu me audaudkihda nting kan, oh pileit pwukat uhdahn mehlel en kohl kei.

10 Oh kilang, irail pil wahdo mehn sansar kei, oh re me lapala, oh re wiawihda sang mete prahs oh kapa, oh re kekehlailte.

11 Oh kilang, irail pil wahdo kedlahs kei, mangile kan ohla, oh wasa me kin keng ie kan merila; oh sohte emen nan sahpwet me kak kawehwehda lokaia de nting kan me mih pohn pileit pwukat. Eri I men idek rehmw mehkot: Ke kak kawehwe?

12 A pil ehu: Mie me ke ese me kak kawehwe? Pwe I men poadopoad pwukat en kawehwehdi ni atail lokaia; pwe mwein ele kitail pahn uhd wehwehki duwen luhwen aramas akan me kamwomwomwlahr, wasa me poadopoad pwukat kohsang ie; de, ele, e pahn kahrehiong kitail en wehwehki duwen aramas pwukat me kamwomwomwlahr; oh I men diarada dahme karehda arail kamwomwomwla.

13 Eri Amon ahpw ndaiong ih: Ehi, I kak patowanohng komwi, Maing nanmwarki, duwen ohl emen me kak kawehwehda poadopoad kan; pwe e sapwellimaniki dipwisou ieu me e kak kilenglongte loale oh kawehwehda poadopoad kan koaros me sang mwein kawa; oh met iei kisakis ehu sang rehn Koht. Oh dipwisou wet kahdaniki mehn kawehwe kan, oh sohte aramas emen kak kilenglong loale ihte ma e ale mweimwei sang Koht, pwe e de pahn kilangada dahmesohte konehng oh mehkihla. Oh mehmen me kileldiong en kilenglong loale, iei aramas menet me kin adaneki ohl sarawi.

14 Oh kilang, nanmwarki en tohn Saraemla iei ih ohl me kileldiongehr en wia mepwukat, me sapwellimaniki kisakis kesempwal wet sang rehn Koht.

15 Oh nanmwarkio mahsanih me ohl sarawi men lapalapasang soukohp men.

16 Oh Amon patohwan me ohl sarawi men iei sounkaudiahl oh pil soukohp; oh aramas sohte kak ale kisakis ehu me lapalap sang met, ihte ma e kolokol sapwellimen Koht manaman, asohte emen me kak kolokol sapwellime manaman; ahpw Koht kak ketkihong aramas manaman laud.

17 Ahpw ohl sarawi men kak ese duwen soahng kan en ahnsou samwalahr ako, oh pil soahng kan me pahn kohdo, oh irail kak kasalehda soahng koaros, de, soahng rir kan pahn sansalada, oh soahng kan me ekiekla pahn sansalda nan marain, oh re pahn kawehwehda soahng kan me aramas sehse, oh pil mie soahng kei me re pahn kasalehda, pwe ma soh, soahng kosohte pahn sansal.

18 Koht kin ketin kaunopada wiepe kan me aramas, sang ni arail pwoson, re kak wiahda doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan; eri aramaso pahn doadoahk ong ni kamwahupen aramasteikan.

19 Eri, mwurin Amon koasoiahda mepwukat, nanmwarkio kupwurperenda kowahlap, oh kapikapingkalahng on Koht, mahsanih: Pwe mehlel me audepen pileit pwukat audaudiki padahk rir kesempwal ehu, oh e sansal me mehn kawehwe kan kaunopadahr pwe en kasalehda me rir kan ong aramas akan.

20 Ia uwen kapwuriamwei en sapwellimen Kauno wiewia kan, oh ia uwen werei en eh kin ketin kanekanengamahiong sapwellime aramas akan; ei, oh ia uwen maskun oh apwal en aramas akan en wehwehki; pwe irail sohte kin men rapahki marain, re pil sohte men momourki maraino me pahn kaunda nsenarail!

21 Ei, irail rasehng pelin sihpw lawalo me kin tangasang silepeo, oh mwarahkpeseng, oh kasarepeseng wasah kan, oh mahn en nanwel kan ahpw kang irailla.
mosiah 9:
Poadopoad En Sihnep—Koasoiepen sapwellime aramas akan, sang ni ahnsou me irail mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla lao lel ahnsou me irail saledeksang pahn manaman en mehn Leimen kan.

Audaudki iralaud 9 lel 22.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sihnep kahluwahsang pwihn ehu nan Saraemla pwe irail en kohla oh kousoanla nan sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai—Nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan mweidehng irail en sapwankihla sahpwo—Mie mahwen nanpwungen Mehn Leimen ko oh nein Sihnep aramas akan. Ele Sounpar 200–187 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ngehi Sihnep, sang ni ei kaskuhlkidahr lokaiahn Mehn Nihpai kan, oh ni ei wehwehkier duwen sahpw en Nihpai, de sahpw me aht pahpa kahlap ako tepin sapwasapw ie, oh sang ni ei pekederla rehn Mehn Leiman kan, nin duwen lipoahrok men, pwe I en kak lipoahroke neirail karis kan, pwe nait sounpei kan en kak kaloweiraildi oh kamwomwirailla—ahpw ni ahnsou me I kilangada soahng kan me mwahu rehrail I sohte mwahuki irail en kamakamala.

2 Eri, ngehi oh iengei ohl ako ahpw akamaikihda nan sahpwtehno, pwehki I men aht kaun en pwihn en wiahda inou en miniminiongirail; ahpw pwehki eh wia ohl keptakai oh mwahuki kam aramas, e ahpw ruwese me I en kamakamala; ahpw I mourla oh pitkihla kakeredien nta laud; pwe pahpa kan peipene, oh pwutak kan peipene, lao pali laud en nait sounpei kan kamakamala nan sapwtehno; oh kiht akan me mourla ahpw pwuralahng nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh ehukiong arail pwoudkan oh neirail seri kan soi [me re wiahdao].

3 Ahpw, pwehki ei loalenohng sohsohki sahpw en atail pahpa kahlap ako, I ahpw kihpene koaros me inengieng kohdahla sapwasapw nan sahpwo, oh se ahpw pwurehng tepida seiloak nan sapwtehno pwe se en kak kohdahla nan sahpwo; ahpw se lelohng nan apwal laud oh lokolok; pwehki at kin seukautihong taman Kauno at Koht.

4 Ahpw, mwurin rahn tohto ni aht wie kakahnseli nan sapwtehno, se ahpw kauwada imwat impwal kan ni wasa me iangat ohl akan kamakamala ie, me kerenlahngete sahpw en aht pahpa kahlap ako.

5 Kedekedeo I ahpw pwurehng pwurala nan kahnihmwo iangahki nei ohl pahmen, eri, se patohlongala rehn nanmwarkio, pwe I en kak esehda kupwur en nanmwarkio, oh pwe I en kak ese ma I kak patohla iangahki nei aramas akan oh sapwankihla sahpwo ni meleilei.

6 Oh I patohlongala rehn nanmwarkio, oh e ketin inoukihong ie me I kak sapwasapw nan sahpw en Lihai-Nihpai oh nan sahpw en Sailom.

7 Oh e pil mahsanihong sapwellime aramas akan re en pidohi sang nan sahpwo, oh ngehi oh nei aramas akan patohla nan sahpwo pwe se en kak sapwanikihla.

8 Oh se ahpw tepida kawada ihmw kan, oh onehda sapahl kehl en kahnihmwo, iei, kehl en kahnihmw en Lihai-Nihpai, oh kahnihmw en Sailom.

9 Oh se tepida deipwelihada sahpwo, ei, se padokedi soangsoangen weren tuhke, weren kohn, oh wihd, oh parli, oh iangahki nehas, oh iangahki seum, oh iangahki soangsoangen weren wahn tuhke kan; oh se tepida kaparaparala oh pweida nan sahpwo.

10 Ahpw met iei widing oh koasoandi mwersuwed en nanmwarki Leimen, en kaliduwihala nei aramas akan, ihme e mweidkihong kiht se en sapwanikihla sahpwo.

11 Eri kedekedeo, mwurin aht koukousoankier nan sahpwo erein sounpar eisek riau, nanmwarki Leimen perkidahr nei aramas akan arail pahn kehlailla nan sahpwo, oh irail pahn solahr kak kalohweiraildi oh kaliduwihirailla.

12 Pwe irail aramas pohnkahke kei oh kin mwahuki pwongih dikedik en eni; pwe re men se en wiahla neirail lidu, pwe irail en kak kepwepwehkihla wahn aht doadoahk kan oh pwe irail en kak kamakamadipwki uduk en nait pelinmen akan en aht mohs kan.

13 Eri kedekedeo nanmwarki Leimen tepida kamwakidada sapwellime aramas akan pwe irail en uhwong oh pelianda nei aramas akan; eri mahwen oh pingiping ahpw tepida wiawi nan sahpwo.

14 Pwe, nan pahr kaeisek siluh en ei kakaun sahpw en Nihpai, ni palieir en sahpw en Sailom, ahnsou me nei aramas akan wie kanikanimpile oh kamwekamwenge neirail pelin mahn akan, oh deideipwelih sahpwarailo, karis kalaimwun en Mehn Leimen kan kohdo mahweniong irail oh tepida kemeirailla, oh neirail pelinmen kan, oh kohn en arail mwaht akan ahpw pehdsang irail.

15 Ei, oh kedekedo irail koaros me sohte lohdi ahpw sopolahng nan kahnihmw en Nihpai, oh peki rehi I en doareirailla.

16 Kedekedeo I ahpw kihong irail kesik ketieu kan, oh arep kan, iangahki kedlahs kan, ohnaipokos kan, oh mehn wowoki kan, oh pahi kan, oh iangahki soangsoangen dipwisoun mahwen me se kak wiahda, oh ngehi oh nei aramas akan kohla mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan.

17 Ei, sang ni roson en Kauno se ahpw mahwenkihong Mehn Leimen ko; pwe ngehi oh nei aramas akan pekipeki ni ngidingid ong Kauno pwe en doareikitasang at imwintihti kan, pwe se pirkidahr aht tamanda kasaledeklahn at pahpa kahlap ako.

18 Oh Koht ahpw ketin karonge aht pekipek kan oh ketin sapeng aht kapakap kan; oh se wonlahte mwowe ni sapwellime roson lapalap; ei, se kolahng peiong Mehn Leimen kan, oh ni rahnteieu oh pwohngteieu se kemehla aramas silikid pehk silimen; se kemekemeirailla lao se pwakirailieisang nan sapwato.

19 Oh pein ngehi iang sarepedi arail mehla kan. Oh kilang, se inenen nsensuwed mehlel oh mwahmwahieiki kamakamalahn riat me riepwiki isiakan duwemen.
mosiah 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Leimen pwoula—Sapwellime aramas akan kin mour kamasepwehk oh keper oh kin kamehlele tiahk likamw kan—Sihnep oh sapwellime aramas akan poweiraildi. Ele Sounpar 187–160 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo se ahpw pwurehng tepida koasoanehdi wehio oh pwurehng kousoanla nan sahpwo ni popohl. Oh I koasoanehdi me soangsoangen dipwisoun mahwen kan en wiawihda, pwe en kak mie nein nei aramas akan dipwisoun mahwen mehn onopada ong Mehn Leimen kan ahnsou me irail pahn pwuredo oh mahweniong nei aramas akan.

2 Oh I koasoanehdi sounsilasil kan en kapilpene sahpwo, pwe Mehn Leimen kan en dehr pwuredohng kiht ni aht pahn sasairiki oh kaweikitala; oh ih kahrepen ei silehdi nei aramas akan oh nei pelinmen kan, oh kasilehsang irail re en dehr lohdiong pahn aht imwintihti kan.

3 Kedekedeo se ahpw sohsohkihla sahpw en aht pahpa kahlap ako erein sounpar tohto, ei, erein sounpar rieisek riau.

4 Oh ngehi patohwanohng ohl akan re en deipwelihada sahpwo, oh padokedi soangsoangen werentuhke oh soangsoangen wahn tuhke kan.

5 Oh I pil koasoanehieng lih akan irail en deidei, oh re en kin pwersekieng arail doadoahk, oh wiahda soangsoangen likou linen kaselel kan, ei, oh pil soangsoangen likou kei, pwe se en kak likawih oh dehr kilisou; oh se ahpw pweida nan sahpwo—se ahpw ahneki popohl nan sahpwo erein sounpar rieisek riau.

6 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Leimen ahpw pwoula, oh sapwellime pwutak me uhd weliandi wiahla nanmwarki. E ahpw tepida kamwoarongehda sapwellime aramas akan en uhwong nei aramas akan; irail eri tepida kaunopadahng mahwen, oh pwe irail en kohdahdo oh peiong nei aramas akan.

7 Ahpw I kadaralahr nei lipoahrok kei nan sahpw en Semlon, pwe I en kak diarada arail koasoandi kan oh pwe I en kak onopadahng irail, pwe irail en dehr kohdohng nei aramas akan oh kamwomwirailla.

8 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohdo ni paliepeng en sahpw en Sailom, iangahki neirail karis en sounpei kan, ohl wisik kesik ketieu iangahki arep kan, kedlahs kan, oh naipokos kan, oh takai kan, oh pahi kan; oh irail sihpihsang piten moangerail kan kahrehda irail moang koikoi; oh irail katengehdiong nin lukeperail kan kisin likoutei me wiawihkihda kilin mahn.

9 Kedekedeo I ahpw patohwanohng lih akan oh seri kan irail en rukula nan sapwtehno; oh I pil patohwanohng ohl me mah kan koaros me kak wisik dipwisoun mahwen oh pil pwutak pwulopwul kan koaros me kak pil wisik dipwisoun mahwen kan, irail en ehupene oh mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan; oh I koasoaneiraildi nan pwihn kei, emen emen irail nin duwen arail sounpar.

10 Kedekedeo se ahpw kohdahla oh mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan; oh ngehiet, nan ei malahret, I pil iang kohla oh mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan. Kedekedeo se ahpw mahwenki roson en Kauno.

11 Ahpw kilang, Mehn Leimen kan sohte kin ese duwen Kauno, de pil sapwellimen Kauno roson, eri irail kin kehlkihte pein arail kehlail. A irail aramas kehlail kei, nin duwen kehlail en aramas.

12 Irail wia aramas me mour kamasepwehk oh keper, oh kin pereniki kam aramas, re kin kamehlele tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, nin duwe met—Re kamehlelehte me arail peukeussang nan sahpw en Serusalemo pwehki wiewia sapwung en arail pahpa kahlap ako, oh me riarail ohl ako wiahiong irail sapwung nan sahpwtehno, oh sapwung pil wiawihong irail ni ahnsou me irail kotehla sehdo;

13 Oh irail pil sapwung ni ahnsou me irail mihmi nan tepin sahpw me irail sohsohkio, mwurin arail kotehdo sehdo, oh soahng pwukat koaros pwehki Nihpai kin loaloapwoationg kapwaiada kosonned akan en Kauno—kahrehda e kenikenla rehn Kauno, pwe Kauno karongehr eh kapakap akan oh sapengala ih, oh e kaunda arail seiloako nan sapwtehno.

14 Oh rie ko lingeringerda pah pwehki arail sohte wehwehki sapwellimen Kauno wiewia kan; irail pil lingeringerda pah nan sehdo pwehki arail nohn keptakai ong Kauno.

15 Oh irail pil lingeringerida pah ni ahnsou me irail lelledo nan sahpw en inouo, pwehki irail nda me e kihsang arail manaman en kaunda aramas akan; oh re pil song en kemehla.

16 Oh irail pil lingeringerda pah pwehki e kohkohla nan sapwtehno nin duwen Kauno e ketin mahsanihong en wia, oh dene me e wahsang poadopoad kan me ntingdi pohn pileit prahs kan, oh me dene me e pirapahsang irail.

17 Eri ihme irail kin padahkihong neirail seri kan me irail pahn kin kailongkin irail, oh me irail pahn kemeirailla, oh me irail pahn kulihasang ar dipwisou kan oh pirapahla, oh wia uwen arail kak koaros en kaweirailla; iei me irail kin ahneki kailok poatoapoat wet ong kadaudok en Nihpai kan.

18 Ih kahrepe wet me nanmwarki Leimen, sang ni widing oh mwersuwed likamw, oh sapwellime inou likamw, pitihiehdi, eri I kahluwahdo nei aramas akat sahpwet pwe re en kak kaweirailla; oh se lokolongkier nan sahpwet erein sounpar tohto.

19 Oh met ngehi, Sihnep, mwurinei koasoia mepwukat koaros ong nei aramas akan duwen Mehn Leimen kan, I koangngoangehkin irail en kohla mahwenkihong irail uwen arail kehlail koaros, ni ar koapworopworki Kauno; eri, se salpene oh pelianirailda.

20 Kedekedeo se ahpw pwurehng kasareirailla sang nan sapwato; oh se kemehla me ngederrehrail, iei uwen tohto me se sohte kak wadekiraildi.

21 Kedekedeo se ahpw pwurodo nan pein sapwat, oh nei aramas akan pwurala apwali neirail pelin mahn akan, oh koadoahki sapwarail kan.

22 Oh met pwehki ei mahlahr, I kihong manaman en kaunda wehi ong emen nei pwutak ko; eri, erehr ei koasoi. Oh Kauno en ketin kupwuramwahwih nei aramas akan. Ahmen.
mosiah 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Noha kaunda ni suwed—E pereniki mour suwed oh tiahk suwed rehn eh pwoud kan oh eh pekehi kan—Apinadai kohpada me aramas akan pahn kaliduhla—Nanmwarki Noha song en kemehla. Ele Sounpar 160–150 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo Sihnep ketikihongehr manaman en kaunda wehio ong Noha, emen sapwellime pwutak ko; eri Noha weliandi seme oh wiahla nanmwarki; oh e sohte kalemengih wiewiahn semeo.

2 Pwe kilang, e sohte kin kapwaiada sapwallimen Koht kosonned akan, ahpw e kin idawehn ineng en nan kapehde. Oh e pwoudki oh pekehiki lih tohto. Oh e kin kupwurehda sapwellime aramas akan en wiahda dihp, oh wia dahme suwed mwohn silangin Kauno. Ei, oh irail wiadahr tiahk kanamenek kan oh soangen mour suwed kan koaros.

3 Oh e koasoanehdi limakis ehu en daksis ong soahng koaros me irail ahneki, limakis ehu en neirail kohl oh neirail siliper, oh limakis ehu en neirail sip, oh neirail kapa, oh neirail prahs oh neirail airon; limakis ehu en neirail mahn akan; oh pil limakis ehu en arail weren tuhke koaros.

4 Oh e ale mepwukat koaros pwe en kamouriki pein ih, oh sapwellime werek kan oh pekehi kan; oh pil sapwellime samworo kan, oh arail tungoal werek kan oh pekehi kan; eri e wekidalahr koasoandi en nan wehio.

5 E kakommoalehdi samworo kan me semeo kasarawialahr, oh weliankiniraildi me kapw akan nan dewerail kan, irail akan me kin direki pohnmwahso nan kapehdirail.

6 Ei, oh re kin aliale sawas nan arail mour pohnkahke, oh nan arail pwongih dikedik en eni, oh nan arail kamwahl kan, sang ni daksis me nanmwarki Noha ketikihong sapwellime aramas akan; eri, aramas akan kin wie doadoahk mwuledek ong ni epwelpen mour suwed.

7 Ei, oh irail pil tepda pwongih dikediken eni, pwehki arail lohdiongehr pahn widing oh likamw en nanmwarkio oh samworo kan; pwe irail kin kadek koasoi ong irail.

8 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Noha ahpw kauwada ihmw tohto me kaselel oh lapala; oh e kapwatahki tuhke kaselel, oh soangen dipwisou kesempwal kan koaros, kohl, oh siliper, oh mete, oh prahs, oh sip, oh kapa;

9 Oh e pil kauwada tehnpese kalaimwun ehu, oh mwoahl ehu nan werenge, soahng koaros wiawihkihda tuhke kaselel oh kapwatki kohl oh siliper oh iangahki dipwisou kesempwal akan.

10 Oh e pil ketin kupwurehda sapwellime tohn doadoahk kan en wiahda soangsoangen doadoahk kaselel kan nan masloalehn tehnpas sarawio, sang ni tuhke kaselel, oh kapa, oh prahs.

11 Oh sehr kan me wiawihdahr ong samworo lapalap ako, ileilehdasang sehr teikan, oh kapwatki kohl tohr; oh e pil wiahda wasahn idengekwei mwowe, pwe irail en kak idengek oh pwil pehrail kan powe ni ahnsou me irail pahn kin koasoi likamw oh pitipitih sapwellime aramas akan.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw kauwada wasahn iroir ehu karanih tehnpas sarawio; ei, wasahn iroir ileile ehu, iei ileile mehlel me e kak ketida powe oh iroirlahng nan sahpw en Sailom, oh pil nan sahpw en Semlon, wasa Mehn Leimen kan sapwasapw ie; oh e kak kilang nan sahpwo pwon me kapilpene.

13 Kedekedeo e ahpw ketin kupwurehda irail en kauwada ihmw tohto nan sahpw en Sailom; oh e kupwurehda me imwen iroir laud ehu en koukouda pohn dohl en paliepeng en sahpw en Sailom, wasa me mehn Nihpai ko kin kohpene ie nan ahnsou me irail sopohsang nan sahpwo; oh met iei ihme e wiahkihong dipwisou kan me e alehdi sang daksis en sapwellime aramas akan.

14 Nan kupwure kin uhlahng sapwellime reken kepwe, oh e kin pereniki mour suwed oh tiahk suwed rehn eh pwoud kan oh eh pekehi kan; oh sapwellime samworo kan pil kin pereniki ieiang lihen netiki paliwararail kan.

15 Kedekedeo e ahpw padokedi mwetin wain kei nan sahpwo; oh e wiahda wasahn tiak wain, oh wiahda reken wain; ih eri tepda kamam sakau, oh pil iangahki sapwellime aramas akan.

16 Kedekedeo mehn Leimen kan ahpw tepida kokohlongodohng sapwellime aramas akan nan arail mwaht akan pwe re en pelian aramas malaulau kei oh kemeirailla nan arail mwaht akan ni ahnsou me irail wie apwapwalih neirail pelin mahn akan.

17 Oh nanmwarki Noha ketin poaronehla soun silasil kei en kapilpene sahpwo pwe irail en deh kolongodo; ahpw uwen me e kadarala ko sohte itar, a Mehn Leimen kan kodohng irailte oh kemeirailla, oh katangapeseng neirail pelin mahn tohto sang nan sahpwo; eri mehn Leiman kan tepier kauweirailla, oh kasalehda arail kailok ong irail.

18 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Noha ahpw ketin kadarala sapwellime sounpei kan, oh mehn Leimen ko pakasarala, de re kasarehsang irail nan sahpwo erein ahnsou kis; irail eri pwurodo oh wie perepereniki arail kaloweiraildi.

19 Oh met, pwehki arail poweiraildio, irail pohnmwahsohkihda nan kapehdirail kan; oh suhsuweiki uwen arail kehlail, ndinda me neirail sounpei limehk kak powehdi kidalap en Mehn Leimen kan; oh iei met me irail kin suweiki, oh kin pereniki nta, oh kakerehdi ntahn riarail kan, oh mepwukat pwehki suwed en arail nanmwarki oh samworo kan.

20 Kedekedeo mie ohl emen nanpwungerail me adaniki Apinadai; oh e kohla nanpwungerail, oh tepiada kokohp ong irail, patowahn: Kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih, oh e ketin mahsanih ong ie, Kohwei, oh patohwanohng aramas pwukat, Kauno me mahmahsen—Meid suwediong aramas pwukat, pwe I kilangehr arail wiewia suwed akan, oh arail mour suwed akan, oh arail tiahk kanamenek kan; oh ma re sohte pahn koluhla I pahn kaloke irail nan ei engieng.

21 Oh ma irail sohte pahn koluhla oh sohpeilahng Kauno arail Koht, kilang, I pahn mweidirailahng pahn manaman en arail imwintihti kan; ei, oh irail pahn kaliduhla; oh irail pahn lokolok pahn arail imwintihti kan.

22 Oh ni ahnsouo, ih arail pahn esehki me ngehi iei Kauno arail Koht, oh ngehi iei Koht luwakahk emen, me kin kalokehki nei aramas akan diparail kan.

23 Oh ni ahnsouo ma aramas pwukat sohte pahn koluhla oh sohpeilahng Kauno arail Koht, irail pahn kaliduhla; oh sohte me pahn kak doareirailla, ihte Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap.

24 Ei, oh ni ahnsouo me irail pahn kin likwerih ie I pahn pwand en karonge arail pekipek kan; ei, oh I pahn mweidohng irail en kamakam pahn arail imwintihti kan.

25 Oh I sohte pahn karonge arail kapakap akan, de pil doareirailsang nan arail lokolok kan; ihte ma irail pahn pwuhrieng nan likoun nsensuwed oh pehs kan oh koluhla, oh pekpeki ni ngidingid ong Kauno arail Koht, oh iei met me e ketin poahngok ong ie.

26 Eri ni en Apinadai patohwanohng irail mahsen pwukat, irail ahpw lingeringerda pah, oh song en kemehla; ahpw Kauno ketin kapitasang ih rehrail.

27 Ni en nanmwarki Noha eh karongehda dahme Apinadai patohwanohng aramas akan, e pil engiengda; oh mahsanih: Pwe ihs me Apinadai, pwe en kadeikiehda oh nei aramas akan, de ihs Kauno, me pahn ketkihong nei aramas akan soahngen kalokolok wet?

28 Kumwail pitipit karedohngie Apinadai ahnsou wet, pwe I en kemehla, pwe e koasoiaier soahng kan me pahn kamwoarongehda nei aramas akan irail en uhpene nanpwungarail, oh en kahrehda pingiping nanpwungen nei aramas akan; eri I pahn kemehla.

29 Pwe kilang, mesen aramas pwukat maskunlahr; re keptakaila nan ar sohte men rong dahme Apinadai mahsanihong irail, oh sang ahnsouo kohla irail kin song en koledi ih. Oh nanmwarki Noha kakeptakailahr eh mohngiong nan eh uhwong mahsen en Kauno, oh e sohte koluhkihla eh wiewia suwed kan.
mosiah 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Apinadai selkihdi eh kohpada duwen kamwomwalahn aramas akan oh kamakamlahn Nanmwarki Noha—Samworo likamw kan wadekada iren pwuhk sarawi kei oh mwomwehda me irail kin kapwaiada kosonned en Moses—Apinadai tepida padahkihong irail Kosonned Eiseko. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin sounpar riau, Apinadai eri wekidala mwomwe oh pwurodo rehn aramas akan, ni ar sohte ese me ih, oh e tepida kokohpong irail, ketihtihki: Iei met me Kauno ketin mahsanih ong ie, ketihtihki—Apinadai, kohwei oh kokohp ong nei aramas akan, pwemohngiongirail kan kekeluwakalahr oh uhwong ei mahsen akan; irail sohte koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan; eri I pahn sohpeiong irail nan ei engieng, iei, nan ei engieng kowahlap I pahn kalokehkinirail arail wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan.

2 Mehlel, meid suwediong dih wet! Oh Kauno ketin mahsanihongie: Kapahwei pehmwen oh kokohp ong irail, nda: Kauno ketin mahsanih, ahnsouo pahn leledo me dih wet, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan, re pahn kaliduhla, oh popohrdi ni mesarail kan; ei, oh aramas pahnkasareirailpeseng, oh irail pahn kamakamala; oh mahn pihr puldur kan, oh kidi kan, ei, oh mahn lawalo kan, pahn kangasang uduk en paliwararail kan.

3 Oh ahnsouo pahn kohdo me mour en nanmwarki Noha pahn rasehngete likou nan kisiniei mwehl; pwe e pahn esehla me ngehi iei Kauno.

4 Oh ahnsouo pahn leledo me I pahn kalokehki nei aramas pwukat kalokolok mwuledek, iei, sang ni lehk oh soumwahu lusulus; oh I pahn kahrehda arail pahn wie mwahmwahieiki rahno pwon.

5 Ei, oh I pahn kihong irail wisik toutou pohn pwopwerail kan; oh irail pahn pakahrweiduwehte ahs lohteng men.

6 Oh ni ahnsouo I pahn kadaridi keteu aihs takai pohrail, oh e pahn kaloke irail; oh I pil pahn kalokehkin irail kisinieng en palimese; oh pil menin kau kan pahn kawehla sapwarail, oh kangala arail weren tuhke kan.

7 Oh irail pahn lokolongki soumwahu lusulus laud ehu—oh I pahn wia mepwukat koaros pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan.

8 Oh ahnsouo pahn kohdo ma irail sohte pahn koluhla I pahn kamwomwasang irail pohn sampah; ahpw irail pahn kihdi poadoparail, oh I pahn nekidala ong ekei wehi me pahn sapwankihla sahpw wet; mehlel, met I pahn wia pwe I en kak kasalehiong ekei wehi kan duwen wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat. Oh soahng tohto me Apinadai kohpada ong aramas pwukat.

9 Kedekedeo irail ahpw lingeringerda pah; oh irail koledi oh salihedi oh wahlahng rehn nanmwarkio, oh patowanohng nanmwarkio: Kilang, se patowahn wahdohng komwi ohl emen me kin kokohpada duwen sapwellimomwi aramas akan, oh patohwan me Koht pahn ketin kamwomwirailla.

10 Oh e pil patohwan kohpadahr mehkot suwed duwen omwi mour, oh patohwan me omwi mour pahn duwehte likou ehu me mih nan kisiniei mwehl.

11 Oh e pil patohwan me komwi pahn rasehng ahlek pwoat, iei duwehte ahlek meng en nan mohs, me mahn lapala kan pahn tiakedi oh kamwutepene.

12 Oh pil, e patohwan me komw pahn rasehng masal en dihpw tekatek kan, me, ni ahnsou e kin mengila, ma kisinieng kin ipirete, e kin pihpirseli pohn sampah. Oh e kin kinehda me Kauno me mahmahsen. Oh e patohwan me soahng pwukat koaros pahn wiawi ma komwi sohte koluhla, oh met pwehki sapwellimomwi wiewia suwed kan.

13 Oh met, Maing nanmwarki, soangen suwed laud dah me komwi wiadahr, de soangen dihp laud dah me sapwellimomwi aramas akan wiadahr, me kitail pahn pakadeingkihda rehn Koht de ale kadeik rehn ohl menet?

14 Oh met, Maing nanmwarki, kilang, sohte dipatail, oh komwi, Maing nanmwarki, sohte wiahda dihp; eri, ohl menet karaunlikamwohng komwi, oh e wiadahr kokohp likamw.

15 Oh kilang, kitail kehlail, kitail sohte pahn kaliduhla, de lohdiong pahn atail imwintihti kan; ei, oh komwi pweidahr nan sahpw wet, oh komwi pahn pil pweida.

16 Kilang, iet ih ohlo, se patohwandohng ih nin limwomwi kan; komwi kak wiahiong ih dahme komw kupwurki.

17 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Noha ahpw ketin kupwurehda Apinadai en lekdekiong nan imweteng; oh e ketin pahngok samworo kan en pokondohng reh pwe re en kak wie kupwuriong dahme e pahn ketin wiahiong ih.

18 Kedekedeo irail ahpw patohwanohng nanmwarkio: Komw kupwure pwe en pakahrdo mwohtail pwe kitail en kalelapak reh; oh nanmwarkio ahpw mahsanih en pakahrdo mwohrail.

19 Oh irail tepda kalelapak reh, pwe re en song en lidipihedi, pwe en kak mie kahrepen ar pahn kedipahki; ahpw e sapeng irail ni eimah, oh sapengala arail kalelapak koaros, mehlel, irail pwuriamweikihla; pwe e sapengala arail kalelapak kan koaros, oh kapingirailda nan arail koasoi kan koaros.

20 Kedekedeo emen irail ahpw kalelapak reh: Ia wehwehn mahsen kan me ntingdi, oh me atail pahpa kahlap ako kin padapadahng ki, me ketihtihki:

21 Meid lingan oh kaselel patenehn meninkedero pohn nahna kan me weuwa rongamwahu; me kin pakairki popohl; me kin wahdo rohng mwahu; me kin pakairki duwen komourla; oh ndaiong Saion, Omwi Koht me ketin kakaun;

22 Sapwellimomwi silepen kahnimwo kan pahn werda; re pahn wiahkinteieu ngihl laudidakoul; pwe irail pahn kilangki masarail kan ahnsou me Kauno pahn kasapahldo Saion;

23 Ngisingiski amwail peren; wasa ohla kan en Serusalem kumwail ehupene kokoul; pwe Kauno ketin kaloalamwahwihalahr sapwellime aramas akan, e ketin doarehlahr Serusalem.

24 Kauno pahn ketin kasalehiong wehi koaros wiepen nin lime sarawi kan, oh sampah pokon pahn dehdehkihla sapwellimen Koht manaman en komour?

25 Apinadai ahpw patohwan ong irail: Kumwail samworo kei, a kumwail kin mwomwehda padahki aramas pwukat, oh kinehda me kumwail wehwehki ngehn en kokohp, oh met kumwail inengieng esehla sang rehi wehwehn mepwukat?

26 I ndaiong kumwail, meid suwediong kumwail pwehki amwail kin kasapwungehla koasoandi kan en Kauno! Pwe ma kumwail wehwehkier mepwukat ahpw kumwail sohte mwahn kin padahngki; eri, kumwail kasapwungelahr koasoandi kan en Kauno.

27 Kumwail sohte koasoanehdi nan kapehdomwail kan pwe kumwail en kak wehwehki; eri, kumwail sohte kin marain. Eri, dahme kumwail kin padahkihong aramas pwukat?

28 Oh irail sapeng patohwan: Se kin padahngki kosonned en Moses.

29 Oh e ahpw kalelapak rehrail: Ma kumwail padahngki kosonned en Moses dahme kumwail sohte kin peikikihong? Dahme kahrehda kumwail kin kesempwaliki kepwe kan? Dahme kumwail kin wiewiahki tiahk en nenek kan oh perenki ieiang lihen netiki paliwere kan, ei, oh kahrehda aramas pwukat arail kin wiahda dihp, ih kahrepe wet me Kauno ketin kadariehdo pwe I en wia kokohp me uhwong aramas pwukat, iei, kohpada duwen suwed laud me pahn uhwong aramas pwukat?

30 Kumwail sohte ese me I kin koasoi mehlel? Ei, kumwail ese me I koasoi mehlel; oh kumwail anahne rerrer mwohn silangin Koht.

31 Oh ahnsouo pahn kohdo me kumwail pahn lokolongki amwail wiewia suwed kan, pwe kumwail nda me kumwail padahngki kosonned en Moseso. Oh dahme kumwail ese duwen kosonned en Moseso? Dah, komour kin pwilisang ni kosonned en Moseso? Dahme kumwail pahn nda?

32 Oh irail patohwan sapeng me komour kin pwilisang ni kosonned en Moseso.

33 Ahpw met Apinadai ndaiong irail: I ese ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan kumwail pahn komourla; ei, ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada kosonned akan me Kauno ketikihong Moses pohn nahna en Sainai, me ketihtihki:

34 Ngehi me Kauno amwail Koht, me kahluwaikumwailsang nan sahpw en Isip, wasa me kumwail kaliduhla ie.

35 Kumwail sohte pahn ahneki emen Koht tohrohr mwohi.

36 Kumwail sohte pahn wiahiong kumwail dikedik en eni, de sansal en mehkot me mi pahnlahng, de nin sampah, de nan pihl kan pahn sampah.

37 Apinadai ahpw kalelapak rehrail, Kumwail kapwaiadahr soahng pwukat koaros? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, kumwail sohte kapwaiada. Oh kumwail padahkiongehr aramas pwukat me irail pahn kapwaiada mepwukat? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, kumwail sohte padahkiong irail.
mosiah 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Manaman en nanleng kin wie sinsile Apinadai—E padahngki Kosonned Eiseko—Komour sohte kin pwilisangete ni kosonned en Moses—Pein Koht pahn ketin wia tomw oh komourala Sapwellime aramas akan. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]
