1 Eri ahnsou me nanmwarkio karongehda mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime samworo ko: Mehmenen en pekeusweisang met oh kamakamala; pwe dahme kitail pahn wiahiong ih, pwe e iahkalahr.

2 Oh irail kesihnenda oh song en koledi ih; ahpw e kauiraildi, oh patohwan ong irail:

3 Dehr doahke ie, pwe Koht pahn ketin kaweikumwailla ma kumwail pahn doahke ie, pwe I saikinte ndaiong kumwail dahme Kauno kupwurki ien padahkiong kumwail; oh I pil saikinte sapengala kalelapak me kumwail peki rehi I en padahkihong kumwail; eri, Koht sohte pahn mweidohng ie en kamakamala ahnsou wet.

4 Ahpw I pahn kapwaiada mahs dahme Koht kupwurki I en wia; oh pwehki ei padahkihong kumwail me mehlelo kumwail lingeringerda pahi. Oh pil, pwehki ei patohwan duwen mahsen en Koht, kumwail nda me I iahkalahr.

5 Met kedekedeo, mwurin Apinadai patohwanda mahsen pwukat, karehiong sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha aramas ako masak koledi ih, pwe Ngehn en Kauno ketin tiadahr powe; oh pohn meseo lingaling kowahlap, iei duwehte Moses e patopato pohn nahna Sainai, ni ahnsou me e patopatohieng Kauno.

6 Oh e pato sang ni manaman oh mweimwei en Koht; oh e ahpw usehla patohwan:

7 Kumwail kilangehr me kumwail sohte ahneki manaman en kemeiehla, eri I pahn kanekehla ei padahk. Ei, oh I pehm me e kamedekehla mohngiongamwail kan pwehki ei kasalehiong kumwail duwen mehlel en amwail wiewia suwed akan.

8 Ei, oh ei koasoi kat audehkin kumwail pwuriamwei oh wahpwon, oh pil lingernger.

9 Ahpw I pahn kanekehla mahs ei padahk; oh mwuri, I sohte katapaniki wasa me I pahn kohla ie, ma I pahn komourla.

10 Ahpw iet me I pahn kaselehiong kumwail mahs, dahme kumwail pahn wiahiong ie mwurin met, e pahn wia kamwomwada kei en mehkan me pahn wiawi.

11 Oh met I pahn kanekehla ei wadekong kumwail sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, pwe I kak kasawiada me e sohte ntingdiong nan mohngiongimwail kan; I kasawiadahr me pali laud en amwail mour kumwail kin onohnopkihte oh padapadangki wiewia suwed.

12 Eri, kumwail taman dahme I pahn ndaiong kumwail: Kumwail sohte pahn wiahiong kumwail dikedik en eni, de sansal en mehkot me mi pahnlahng, de nin sampah, de pahn pihl nan madau.

13 Oh Kumwail pil sohte pahn poaridiong dikedik en enimen, de pwongih; pwe iei ngehi me Kauno amwail Koht, ngehi Koht luwakahk emen. Aramas akan me kin kailongkin ie, I kin kaloke nair seri kan lel dih kesiluh oh kapahieu;

14 Oh I kin kasalehda ei kalahngan rehn kidalap en aramas me kin poakohng ie oh kapwaiada ei kosonned akan.

15 Kumwail sohte pahn kasaminehla mwaren Kauno amwail Koht; pwe mehmen me kasaminehla mware, e sohte pahn mwakelekel mwohn silangin Kauno.

16 Kumwail tamataman rahnen sapad, oh wiahki rahn sarawi.

17 Erein rahn weneu kumwail pahn kin doadoahk, oh wia amwail doadoahk koaros;

18 Ahpw ni keisuhwen rahn, rahn en sapad en Kauno amwail Koht, kumwail sohte pahndoadoahk, kumwail, oh noumwail pwutak kan, oh noumwail serepein kan, oh noumwail lidu ohl oh lih kan, oh noumwail mahn akan, oh mehn keiru kan me koukousoan rehmwail;

19 Pwe erein rahn weneu Kauno wiahda nanleng oh sampah, oh madau kan, oh audepahr koaros; eri Kauno ketin kasarawihala rahnen sapad, oh wiahkihla rahn sarawi.

20 Kumwail wauneki samamwail oh inamwail kan, pwe kumwail en mour werei nan sahpw me Kauno amwail Koht pahn ketikihong kumwail.

21 Kumwail sohte pahn kemehla aramas.

22 Kumwail sohte pahn kamwahl. Kumwail sohte pahn pirap.

23 Kumwail sohte pahn karaunlikamwohng aramas emen.

24 Kumwail sohte pahn noahroke imwen emen, kumwail sohte pahn noahroke en emen eh pwoud, de eh lidu ohl de lidu lih, de nah kou, de nah ahs, de mehkot me uhdahn ah.

25 Kedekedeo mwurin Apinadai e kaimwisekalahr koasoi pwukat e ahpw kalelepak rehrail: Kumwail padahkihongehr aramas pwukat me irail anahne tetehk mepwukat koaros pwe re en kapwaiada kosonned pwukat?

26 I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; pwe ma kumwail wiahier met, Kauno sohte pahn kadariehdo pwe I en kohpada duwen suwed en aramas pwukat.

27 Oh met kumwail nda me komour kin pwilisang ni kosonned en Moseso. I ndaiong kumwail me e konehng kumwail en kin kapwaiada kosonned en Moses ansou wet; ahpw I pahn ndaiong kumwail, me ahnsou pahn kohdo me e sohla pahn konehng kumwail en kapwaiada kosonned en Moseso.

28 Oh pil ehu, I ndaiong kumwail, me komourla sohte kak pwilisang ni kosonnedohte; pwe ma sohte tomwo, me pein Koht pahn ketin tomwkihla ong dihp oh wiewia suwed en sapwellime aramas akan, irail uhdahn pahn mehla, mehndahte ma mie kosonned en Moseso.

29 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail me e mwahu me e pahn mie kosonned kohieng kadaukok en Israel kan, mehlel, kosonned inen; pwehki irail aramas keptakai kei, mwadang en wia me suwed, oh seukautih en taman Kauno arail Koht.

30 Eri mie kosonned me kohieng irail, ei, kosonned en doadoahk sarawi oh tiahk sarawi kan, iei kosonned ehu me irail pahn kin ngoangki kapwaiada rahn koaros, re en medemedewe duwen Koht oh arail pwukoa ong ih.

31 Ahpw kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me mepwukat koaros e wia kamwomwada kei en uhdahn mehkan me pahn wiawi.

32 Eri, irail kin wehwehki audepen kosonnedo? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, irail sohte wehwehki kosonnedo; oh met pwehki arail keptakailahr; pwe irail sohte wehwehki me sohte aramas emen kak komourla ihte sang ni poadoandoar en Koht.

33 Pwe kilang, Moses soh kohpada duwen ketidohn Mesaiao, oh me Koht pahn ketin komourala sapwellime aramas akan? Ei, oh iei soukohp kan koaros me wiahier kokohp sangete tepin sampah—irail soh mahsaniher duwen mepwukat?

34 Irail soh mahsaniher me pein Koht pahn ketidihdo rehn aramas akan, oh ketin wia-aramasala, oh ketketseli pohn sampah ni manaman kehlail?

35 Ei, oh irail soh pil mahsanih me pwehki ih, me melahr akan pahn kakehr iasada, oh me pein ih, pahn ketin lokolok oh wiemwahlla pahn aramas?
mosiah 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aiseia karasaraski Mesaiao—Sapwellimen Mesaiao sarohdi oh lokolok sansalehr—E tounmeteikihla Sapwellime mour pwehki dihp oh e pahn ketin sewese me dipan akan—Karasahiong Aiseia 53. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ei, Aiseia sou mahsanih: Ihs me pahn kamehlele dahme kitail pakairki, oh ihs me pahn dehdehkihla wiepen nin limen Kauno?

2 Pwe e pahn keirda mwohn [Kauno] rasehng kisin tuhke kis, oh kalewe kan wosadasang nan pwehl madekeng; sohte wahu ehu de lingan ehu me mie reh; oh ahnsou me kitail pahn kilang, sohte lingan me kitail pahn linganki reh.

3 Aramas akan pahn mwamwahliki oh soikala; ih aramas en lokolok men, oh e ahnlahr soahngen medek koaros; oh kitail sohte kin men kilang; oh aramas kin mwamwahliki likamwete ih sohte mwahn katepe;

4 Ahpw e ketin lokolongki atail lokolok, oh weuwa atail pahtou kan; ahpw kitail medemedewe me Koht me ketkihong kalokolok wet.

5 Ahpw dipatail kan me e ketin ohkihla, atail wiewia suwed kan me e ketin lipwalipwkihda; lokolok me e ketin sapwellimaniki me kihong kitail popohl; oh lipwen ohla kan ni paliwere me kaunsekeikitailla.

6 Kitail koaros, rasehng sihpw kei me salongalahr; emenemen kitail wiewia pein nsene; ahpw Kauno ketin pwukoakidier dipatail kan koaros.

7 E kamwamwahla pahn aramas, oh lokolok, ahpw sohte mwahn kisin kaulim kis kohsang nan dawase; e rasehng sihmpwul men me pakahrlahng kamakamala, oh rasehng sihpw men ni ahnsou me wune kan pahn seiseisang ahpw e sohte mwahn mahsanih mehkot.

8 E ketisang nan kalapwus oh pakadeikadahr; eri ihs me kak koasoia kadaudoke? Pwe e pahn kamakamala sang sapwen me momour kan; pwe e lokolongki dipen nei aramas akan.

9 Oh e seridi rehn me dipan akan, oh e ahpw nekinekidi nan sousoun me kepwepwe; mehndahte e sohte wiahda mehkot sapwung, de likamw ehu kohsang nan ewe.

10 Ahpw Kauno me ketin kupwurehda en kalipwelipwehda; ih me ketin kahrehda en lokolok; ni ahnsou me komwi pahn meirongkihla eh mour pwehki dihp e pahn kilangada kadaudoke kan, e pahn kareireila eh ahnsou, oh koasoandien kupwur en Kauno pahn pweida nin lime kan.

11 Mwurin sapwellime lokolok, oh pahn kupwurperenki; sang ni eh kupwurokong nei ladu loaloapwoat menet pahn kapitala aramas tohto; pwe e pahn ale kalokpen diparail akan.

12 Eri I pahn ketikihong nan dewe rehn me lapalap akan, oh e pahn patehng me kehlail kan nehkpeseng dipwsou kan; pwehki e ketin mweidala eh mour en mehla; oh e ketin wadawad ong me dipan akan; oh ale kalokpen dipen aramas ngeder, oh ketin sewese me dipan akan.
mosiah 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ia mwomwen Krais eh kak wia Sahmo oh Sapwellimeo—E pahn wilianla Sapwellime aramas dipan akan oh ketin kasakaskin irail rehn Koht—Irail oh soukohp sarawi koaros iei Sapwellime—E pahn ketikihda Iasadao—Kisin seri kan ahneki mour soutuk. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri Apinadai mahsanih ong irail: I men kumwail en wehwehki me pein Koht pahn ketidihdo rehn aramas akan, oh pahn komourala sapwellime aramas akan.

2 Oh pwehki e kousoan nan paliwar en uduk e pahn kahdaniki Sapwellimen Kohto, oh pwehki e powehdi paliwar ong kupwur en Sahmo, e ketin wia Sahmo oh Sapwellimeo—

3 E wia Sahmo, pwehki E ipwikihdi manaman en Koht; oh e wia Sapwellimeo, pwehki paliwar; eri ihme e wiakilahr Sahmo oh Sapwellimeo—

4 Oh re wia Koht tehmen, iei, Sahm Soutuk en nanleng oh sampah.

5 Oh paliwar mihlahr pahn manaman en Ngehno, de Sapwellimeo ong Sahmo, me wia Koht tehmen, lokolongki kasongosong kan, oh sohte dukiong kasongosong kan, ahpw mweidohng pein ih en kamwamwahlla, oh kalokolok, oh lekdekla, oh sosoikla sang rehn kiseh kan.

6 Oh mwurin mepwukat koaros eh pahn wiawi, mwurin eh doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan rehn aramas akan, e pahn pakahrla, iei, nin duwen me Aiseia mahsanih, e pahn rasehng sihpw men me nektehn seiseisang wune kan ahpw sohte mwahn nda mehkot.

7 Ei, e pahn pakahrwei, kalohpwuwala, oh kamakamala, paliwaro ahpw pahn mehla, kupwur en Sapwellimeo pahn duhla pahn kupwur en Sahmo.

8 Oh iei met me Koht pahn kamweidkipeseng selin mehla, pwehki eh ketin powehdi mehla; kahrehda Sapwellimeo eh sapwellimaniki manaman en ketin kasakaski aramas akan Reh—

9 Oh e ketdalahr nanleng, oh e ketin sapwellimaniki kupwur kalahngan; ohe ketin sapwellimaniki limpoak ong aramas akan; oh e ketin uh nanpwungen irail oh kopwungo; oh kamweidpesengehr selin mehla, pein ih wilianla me dipan akan, ni eh ketin doareiraillahr, oh kapwungalahr anahn en kopwungo.

10 Oh met I pahn ndaiong kumwail, eri ihs me kak koasoia kadaudoke? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me ni ahnsou me e pahn ketin meirongkihla eh mour pwehki dihp, e pahn ketin mahsanihada sapwellime kan. Oh met dahme kumwail pahn nda? Oh ihs me pahn wiahla sapwellime?

11 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, me irail akan me rongehr mahsen en soukohp akan, ei, soukohp sarawi kan koaros me kohpadahr duwen ketidohn Kauno—I ndaiong kumwail, me irail akan koaros me rohngehr irailoh kin kamehlele me Kauno pahn ketin kamourala sapwellimearamas akan, oh kin kasikasik rahno ong lapwepen diparail akan, I ndaiong kumwail, iei ih irail akan me pahn wiahla sapwellime, de irail me pahn sohsohki wein Koht.

12 Pwe iei ih irail pwukat me e ketin lokolongki diparail akan; iei irail pwukat me e ketin pwoukihla, pwe en kamaurirail sang diparail akan. Eri, kaidehn irail me wia sapwellime kan?

13 Ei, oh kaidehn soukohp koaros me kihpesengehr ewerail kan pwehn kokohp, me sohte kin pwupwidiong nan dihp, ei soukohp sarawi ko koaros sangete ni tepin sampah? I ndaiong kumwail me iei irail me sapwellime kan.

14 Oh ih irail pwukat me kin kalokalohki popohl, me kin wahdo rongamwahu, me kin kalohki duwen komourla; oh ndaiong Saion: Omwi Koht me ketin kakaun!

15 Oh meid lingan oh kaselel pohn nahna kan en paten nehn irail akan!

16 Oh pil, meid lingan oh kaselel pohn nahna kan en paten nehn irail akan me kin wie kalkalohkihte popohl!

17 Oh pil, meid lingan oh kaselel pohn nahna kan en paten nehn irail akan me pahn kalohki popohl mwurin ahnsou wet, ei, sang met kohkohlahte!

18 Oh kilang, I pahn ndaiong kumwail, kaidehn ih koaros met. Meid lingan oh kaselel pohn nahna en paten nehn ih me wahdo rongamwahuo, me ketin koasoanehdi popohl, iei, Kauno, me komouralahr sapwellime aramas akan; ei, ih me ketin kamanalahrkomour ong sapwellime aramas akan;

19 Pwe ma sohte poadoandoar me e ketin wiadahro ong sapwellime aramas akan, me kaunopadahr sang ni tepin sampah, I ndaiong kumwail, ma sohte koasoandi wet, aramas koaros uhdahn pahn mehla.

20 Ahpw kilang, selin mehla pahn kamweimweipeseng, oh Sapwellimeo pahn kaunda, oh e pahn sapwellimaniki manaman en powehdi mehla; eri, e ketikihda iasadahn me melahr akan.

21 A mwuri iasadao apw pahn wiawi, iei tepin iasada; ehi, iasadahn irail akan me melahr, oh me momour met, oh me pahn ipwidi kan, lao ahnsou en iasadahn Kraiso—pwe ih me e pahn mwareniki.

22 Oh met, iasadahn soukohp akan koaros, oh irail akan koaros me kin kamehlele mahsen en soukohp akan, de irail akan koaros me kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, re pahn iasada nan keieu en iasadao; iei ih irail me pahn tepin iasada.

23 Irail iasadahn kousoanla rehn Koht me ketin komourirailla; eri irail alehdi mour soutuk sang Krais, me kamweidpesengehr selin mehla.

24 Oh ih irail pwukat me pahn iang tepin iasadao; oh irail pwukat me mehlahr Mwohn Krais eh ketido, nan arail sawehwe, sohte iang alehdi padahk en komourlao. Eri Kauno pahn ketin kapwureiraildo; oh irail pahn iang tepin iasadao, de alehdi mour soutuk oh komourla sang Kauno.

25 Oh kisin seri kan pahn pil iang ahneki mour soutuk.

26 Ahpw kilang, oh masak, oh lemwiki Koht, pwe uhdahn kumwail pahn rerrer; pwe Kauno sohte kin komourala me kin kahngohdiong ih oh mehla nan diparail kan; iei, irail koaros me melahr nan diparail akan sangete tepin sampah, me peliandahr Koht sang pein nsenrail, me kin ese sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ahpw sohte men kapwaiada; ih irail pwukat me sohte pahn iang tepin iasadao.

27 Eri kumwail soh pahn wie rerrerki? Pwe komourla sohte kin kohieng soangen aramas pwukat; pwe Kauno sohte kin komourala soangen aramas pwukat; ei, de pil kamwakeleirailda; pwe e sohte kak pein likamw; pwe e sohte kak kapweiekidirepenpwung en pwuhng pahrek.

28 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail me ahnsouo pahn leledo me sapwellimen Kauno komour pahn kalohkseli wasa koaros en nan wehi kan, oh keinek kan koaros, oh lokaia koaros, oh sahpw koaros.

29 Maing ei Kaun, sapwellimomwi soun silepen kahnimwo kan pahn werkihda; ni ngihl ehu te re pahn koul; pwe irail pahn kilangki pein meserail kan ahnsou me Kauno pahn kapwurehdo Saion.

30 Ngisingiski amwail peren; oh koulkipene, wasa apwal kan en Serusalem; pwe Kauno ketin koaloalamwahwihala sapwellime aramas akan, e ketin doarehla Serusalem.

31 Kauno pahn ketin doadoahngki lime kan mwohn mesen wehi kan koaros; oh wasa koaros nin sampah pahn kadehdehda komour en atail Koht.
mosiah 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Koht ketin doarehla aramas akan sang arail mour salongala oh mour pwupwula—Irail akan me mouriki mour en sampah pahn duduwehte oh sohte pahn poadoandoarla—Krais me ketin kahrehda iasadahng mour kohkohlahte de lekdekla kohkohlahte. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo mwurinte Apinadai eh koasoiahier mahsen pwukat e ahpw kapahwei peh oh patohwan: Ahnsouo pahn leledo me koaros pahn kilang sapwellimen Kauno manaman en komour; ahnsou me wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh sahpw koaros pahn kilangki masarail Koht oh wehkada me sapwellime kadeik me pwung.

2 Oh me suwed kan pahn lekdekla liki, oh irail pahn weriwerki ar nsensuwed, oh sengiseng, oh mwahiei, oh ngihrail kan tehtehrek; oh met pwehki irail sohte men rong kepitien Kauno; eri Kauno sohte pahn doareirailla.

3 Pwehki irail kisehn sampah oh kisehn tepil, oh tepilo ahneki manaman pohrail; iei, serpent en kawao me pitihedi tepin atail nohno oh pahpao, me kahrehda ara pwupwudi; me kahrehda aramas koaros momourki mour en sampah, ineng en paliwar, re kisehn tepil, esehla me suwed sang me mwahu, oh mweidehng pein irail pahn manaman en tepilo.

4 Kahreda aramas koaros salongalahr; oh kilang, irail uhdahn pahn salongala douluhl ma Koht sohte doarehla sapwellime aramas akan sang nan arail mour salongala oh mour pwupwula.

5 Ahpw tamataman, mehmen me pahn wonlahte mwowe nan eh mour en sampah, oh uselahte nan eh wiewia dihp oh kahngohdiong Koht, e pahn mihmihte nan ah mour pwupwulao oh tepilo ahneki manaman koaros powe. Eri e pahn duwehte me sohte poadoandoarla wiawihong ih, oh e wia imwintihti ong Koht; oh pil duwehte tepilo me imwintihti ong Koht.

6 Oh met ma Krais sohte ketido sampah, a [I] koasokoasoia soahng kan me pahn wiawi ni mwomwen me re wiawiher, poadoandoarla sohte pahn mie.

7 Oh ma Krais sohte iasada sang mehla, de kamweidpeseng selin mehla pwe sousou en dehr powehdi, oh sohte en mehla tehtehn meninkau, eri sohte me pahn kak iasada.

8 Ahpw mie iasada, eri sousou sohte kak powehdi, oh Krais powehdier tehtehn meninkau en mehla.

9 Iei ih me marain oh ih me mour en sampah; ei, kamarain poatopoat, me sohte kak rotala; ei, oh pil mour poatopoat, me sohte pahn kak pwurehng mehla.

10 Iei mour en sampah me pahn kieweklahng mour me sohte kak mehla, oh me kin mwerpeseng pahn kieweklahng me sohte kak mwerepeseng, oh aramas pahn kesihnen mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Koht, pwe en pakadeingkihda arail wiewia kan ma e mwahu de e suwed—

11 Ma re mwahu, re pahn iasadahng mour kohkohlahte oh peren kohkohlahte; oh ma re suwed, re pahn iasadahng mour lekdekla kohkohlahte, kohlahng rehn tepilo, me me kakaun irail, me iei lekdekla—

12 Irail idawehnlahr pein nsenarail kan nan mour oh ineng en sampah; irail sohte kin men likweri Kauno ni ahnsou me sapwellime kalahngan en nin lime kan kin kapahdo rehrail; pwe kalahngan en nin lime kan kapkapahieng irail, ahpw irail sohte men alehda; kaparpen diparail akan kohieng irail, ahpw irail sohte men uhdihsang; oh e koasoanediong irail en koluhla ahpw re sohte men kapwaiada.

13 Eri, kumwail soh pahn anahne masapwekada oh koluhkihla dipamwail akan, oh tamataman me ihte rehn Krais oh sang Krais me kumwail pahn kak komourkihla?

14 Eri, ma kumwail pahn padahngki kosonned en Moses, kumwail pil padahngki me e wia kamwomwada ehu en mehkan me uhdahn pahn wiawi—

15 Padahkiong irail me komour kin pwilisang rehn Kauno Krais, me iei Sahm Soutuko. Ahmen.
mosiah 17:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kamehlele oh ntingihedi mahsen en Apinadai kan—Apinadai isihsla lao mehla—E kohpada me irail akan me kemehla pahn mehkihla kisiniei oh soumahu. Ele Sounpar 148 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin Apinadai kaimwseklahr pato pwukat, nanmwarkio ahpw ketin poaronehla sapwellime samworo ko en koledi ih eri pakahrlahng kamakamala.

2 Ahpw mie emen nanpwungarail me adaniki Alma, e pil wia emen kadaudok en Nihpai. Oh e wia ohl pwulopwul men, oh e kamehlele mahsen akan me Apinadai mahsaniher, pwe e ese duwen wiewia suwed kan me Apinadai kadehdehdahr duwen irail; eri e tepida patohwan peki rehn nanmwarkio en dehr engiengda pahn Apinadai, ahpw en ketin mweidala en patopatohwei ni popohl.

3 Ahpw nanmwarkio engiengda kouwahlap, oh kupwurehda Alma en lekdekiei sang rehrail, oh ketin kadarala sapwellime ladu kan mwuri pwe irail en kemehla.

4 Ahpw e tangasang mwohrail oh rukila wasa me irail sohte kak diar. Oh ni eh rukurungki rahn tohto, e ahpw ntingihedi mahsen kan koaros me Apinadai mahsaniher.

5 Kedekedeo nanmwarkio ahpw kupwurehda sapwellime soun silasil kan irail en kapilpene Apinadai oh koledi; oh irail pirehdi oh kesehlong nan imweteng.

6 Oh mwurin rahn siluh, mwurin eh wiekupwurehngehr sapwellime samworo ko, e ahpw kupwurehda me e pahn pwurehng wisikdo mwowe.

7 Oh e mahsanihiong ih: Apinadai, se diaradahr sapwung me ke wiadahr, oh ke warohng kamakamala.

8 Pwe ke nda me pein Koht pahn ketidihdo rehn aramas akan; oh met, iei kahrepen ahmw pahn kamakamala ihte ma ke pahn kapwure koasoai kan koaros me ke koasoaiaki me suwed duwen ngehi oh nei aramas akan.

9 Apinadai ahpw patohwanohng ih: I patohwanohng komwi, I sohte pahn kapwurehieng pato kat me I patohwaner duwen aramas pwukat, pwe pato mehlel; oh pwe komwi en kak ese me pato pwukat mehlel I mweidehng pein ngehi en lohdi nin limomwi kan.

10 Ei, oh I pahn lokolok lao lel mehla, oh I sohte pahn kapwurehiong ei pato kat, oh re pahn wia mehn kadeikpomw. Oh ma komw pahn kemeiehla, komwi kemelahr aramas pwung, oh met pahn pil wia mehn kadehdehpen dipomw ni imwin rahno.

11 Oh met nanmwarki Noha pahn kadaralahier, pwehki e masak eh koasoi kan; pwe e masak e de lohdiong pahn kadeik en Koht.

12 Samworo ko ahpw ngihl laudida werikihda, oh tepida kedipa ih, ndinda: E kauwe nanmwarki. Eri nanmwarkio pwurehng engiengda pah, oh e ahpw ketkihong irail en kemehla.

13 Kedekedeo irail ahpw koledi oh saliedi ih, oh wowokihki kilio tuhkehn isihs, ei, lao eh mehla.

14 Oh met ni ahnsou me e tepda mwasingkihla kisinieio, e ahpw werikilahng irail, ndinda:

15 Kilang, nin duwen amwail wiahiong ie, e pahn leledo ahnsou me kadaudokemwail kan pahn kalokehki aramas tohto soangen lokolok me I lokolongki, iei lokolok en mehkihla kisiniei; oh met pwehki arail kamehlele komour en Kauno arail Koht.

16 Oh ahnsouo pahn leledo me kumwail pahn lokolongki soangsoangen soumwahu pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan.

17 Ei, oh kumwail pahn kamakam wasa koaros, oh pahn pakasarpeseng oh ikiparala wasa koaros, iei duwehte mahn lawalo oh kommwad eh kin pwakihpeseng pelinmen lawalo kan.

18 Oh ni ahnsouo amwail imwintihtih kan pahn pwakih kumwail oh kolkumwaildi, oh kumwail pahn lokolok, duwehte ei lokolongki medek en mehkihla kisiniei.

19 Iei met me Koht pahn ketin dupukong irail akan me pahn kemehla sapwellime aramas. Maing Koht, komw ketin ale ngeniet.

20 Oh met, ni ahnsou me Apinadai patohwanehr mepwukat, e pwupwudi, ni eh mehkihlahrkisiniei; ei, kamakamala pwehki e sohte men kahmahmkihla sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, e ahpw katengehkihdi mehlel en eh mahsen kan sang ni eh kamakamala.
mosiah 18:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kalkalohk ni rir—E kawehwehda inou en papidais oh wia papidais ni pihl en Mormon—E koasoanehdi Mwomwohdiso en Krais oh kasarawiala samworo kan—Irail pein apwalih arail anahn oh padahki aramas akan—Alma oh nah aramas akan tangasang Nanmwarki Noha kohla nan sapwtehno. Ele Sounpar 147–145 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo Alma, me tangasang sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha sounpapah ko, koluhkilahr dipe kan oh wiewia suwed kan, oh ahpw kohseli rehn aramas akan ni rir, oh tepida padahkihong irail mahsen kan en Apinadai—

2 Ei, duwen dahme pahn kohdo, oh pil duwen iasadahn me mehlahr, oh komourlahn aramas akan, me pahn pwilisang ni manaman, oh lokolok kan, oh pwoulahn Krais, oh sapwellime iasada oh sapwellime ketdahla nanleng.

3 Oh e padahkihong aramas koaros me men rong eh padahk. Oh e padahkih irail ni rir, pwe nanmwarkio de esehda. Oh aramas tohto me kamehlele eh padahk kan.

4 Kedekedeo irail koaros me kamehlele ih, kohla wasa ieu me kahdaniki Mormon, me iei nanmwarkio ketikihong eden wasao, me mi ni keilen sahpw me kin direkihla mahn lawalo, ni ahnsawi.

5 Met, mie utuhnpihl mwakelekel ehu mi wasa me adaniki Mormon, oh Alma kin kohla wasao, oh mie kahn tuhke tikitik kei limwahn wasao me e kin rukula ie nirahn ni ahnsou me nanmwarki kin rapahkiseli.

6 Kedekedeo koaros me kamehlele ih kin pokonpene wasao oh rong eh padahk kan.

7 Kedekedeo mwurin rahn kei pokon laud ehu kohpene wasa me adaniki Mormon, pwe re en rong en Alma eh padahk kan. Ei, irail koaros me kamehlele eh padahk kohpene pwehn rong ih. Oh e ahpw kin padahk ong irail, oh kalohkihong irail duwen koluhla, oh komourla, oh pwoson Kauno.

8 Kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong irail: Kilang, iet pihl en Mormon (pwe iei me re kin kahdaniki) oh met, nin duwen amwail inangih iangala sapwellimen Koht pwihn, oh kahdanikihla sapwellime aramas, oh inangih sawaskipene amwail wisik toutou kan, pwe en kak marahrahda;

9 Ei, oh kumwail pahn men iang mwahiei rehn me kin mwahiei kan; ei, oh koaloalamwahwih irail akan me anahne koaloalamwahu, oh wia sounkadehdehn Koht ahnsou koaros oh nan soahng koaros, oh wasa koaros me kumwail pahn mi ie, lao lel mehla, pwe kumwail en kak komourla rehn Koht, oh iang wadawadedi rehn irail akan me pahn iang keieu en iasadao, pwe kumwail en kak alehdi mour soutuk—

10 Met I ndaiong kumwail, ma iei met ineng en mohngiongimwail kan, dah, kumwail pahn uhwong papidaisla ni mwaren Kauno, me pahn wia mehn kadehde mwohn silangi me kumwail inoukihongehr ih me kumwail pahn papah ih oh kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan, pwe en ketin kapwilodohng pohmwail reken sapwellime Ngehno?

11 Oh met ahnsou me aramas akan rongehr mahsen pwukat, re lopwolopwki ar peren, oh werkihla: Iei met ineng en at mohngiong kan.

12 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw ale Ihlam, me iang sang ni tapi, oh kohla oh kesihnenda nan pihlo, oh nda ni ngihl laud: Maing Kaun, komw ketikihdo sapwellimahr Ngehno pohn sapwellimomwi sounpapah, pwe en kak wia doadoahk wet sang ni mohngiong mwakelekel.

13 Oh ni ahnsou me e ndahier mepwukat, Ngehn en Kauno tiada powe, ih eri nda: Ihlem, I papidaisihuk, sang ni mweimwei en Koht Wasa Lapalap, pwehn wia kadehde me ke pahn wiahda inou en papah ih lao lel mehla; oh Ngehn en Kauno en ketiket rehmw; oh en ketikihonguhk mour soutuk, sang ni komour en Krais, me e ketin kaunopadahr sang ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda.

14 Oh mwurin Alma e ndahier mepwukat, Alma oh Ihlem koaros koduhdihla nan pihl; oh ira pwurada oh kohda sang nan pihlo wie pereperen, pwehki ara direkihla Ngehno.

15 Oh Alma ale emen oh pwuredihla keriapak nan pihlo, oh papidaisihla ih duwehte me keieuo, ihte e sohte pwurehng koduhdi nan pihlo.

16 Oh ni mwohmw wet me e papidaisikihla emen emen me kohdo nan sahpw en Mormon; oh uwen irail me wadawadedi ele aramas meh riepwiki pahmen; ei, oh irail papidaisla ni pihl en Mormon, oh direkihla kalahngan en Koht.

17 Oh irail kahdanekihla mwomwohdiso en Koht, de mwomwohdiso en Krais, sang ni anhsouo kohla. Kedekedeo koaros me papidaisla sang ni mweimwei oh manaman en Koht wiahla tohn sapwellime mwomwohdiso.

18 Kedekedeo Alma, sang ni mweimwei en Koht me e tungoalenki, ahpw kasarawihla samworo kei; iei emen samworo kasarawihong en kalohkihong aramas meh limehk, oh en padahkihong irail soahng kan me pid duwen wein Koht.

19 Oh e kihong irail kosonned me irail sohte pahn padahngki padahk tohrohr likin soahng kan me e padahngkier, oh me soukohp sarawi kan mahsaniher.

20 Iei, e kihong irail kosonned me irail sohte pahn kalohki mehkot, ihte koluhla oh pwoson Kauno, me komourala sapwellime aramas akan.

21 Oh e kihong irail kosonned me irail sohte pahn akamaipene, ahpw irail en ehukipene arail koapworopwor, ahneki pwosonteieu oh papidaisteieu, katengepene ar mohngiong kan oh limpoakpene.

22 Oh ih me e koasoanehdi irail pahn kalohki. Oh irail wiahla seri en Koht.

23 Oh e kihong irail kosonned me irail pahn wauneki rahn en sapad, oh wiahki rahn sarawi, oh pil rahn koaros irail pahn kapingkalahngan ong Kauno, arail Koht.

24 Oh e pil padahkiong irail me samworo kan me e kasarawilahr pahn pein koadoahkihada epwelparail.

25 Oh mie rahn ehu nan wihk koaros me koasoandier me irail pahn kin kohpene oh padahki aramas akan, oh pwongih Kauno, arail Koht, oh pil nindokon eh mie arail ahnsou, re kin pokonpene.

26 Oh samworo kan sohte pahn kin momouriki sawas en aramas akan; ahpw sang nan arail doadoahk irail pahn kin alehdi kalahngan en Koht, pwe irail en kak kehlailla ni pali Ngehn, ni arail marainki kupwurokong en Koht, pwe irail en kak padahk sang ni manaman oh mweimwei en Koht.

27 Oh Alma pil kihong irail kosonned me aramas en nan mwomwohdiso pahn kin sawaski arail dipwisou kan, emen emen irail nin duwen dahme e ahneki; mehmen me ahneki reken dipwisou pahn sawaskihda laud; oh mehmen me ahneki ekis, eri ekis me pahn anahnepe; oh mehmen me sohte ah ih me pahn alehdi.

28 Oh re pahn kin kisekisehki arail dipwisou kan sang ni pein nsenarail oh ar lamalam mwahu ong Koht, oh ong samworo kan me kin anahne, ei, oh ong aramas koaros me semwehmwe oh sohte ar likou.

29 Oh met e ndaiong irail, sang ni kosonned me Koht ketikihong; oh irail ahpw weweidkimour pwung mwohn Koht, kisekisehki mehtei kan nin duwen arail anahn oh ineng kan en paliwar oh palingehn.

30 Kedekedeo soahng pwukat koaros wiawiher nan Mormon, ei, limwahn pihl en Mormon, nanwel me karanihte pihl en Mormon; ei, nan sahpw en Mormon, pihl en Mormon, nanwel en Mormon, ia uwen lingan en wasao mwohn masarail kan me wehwehkida arail Soundoaro; ei, oh meid pai irail, pwe irail pahn koulki koul en kaping ong ih kohkohlahte.

31 Oh mepwukat koaros wiawi ni irepen sahpwo, pwe nanmwarkio de mwahngihada dahme irail wiewia.

32 Ahpw kilang, kedekedeo nanmwarkio, mwahngihada mwekid en aramas oko, ih eri kadarala sapwellime sounpapah ko en mwasahn irail. Eri rahno me irail kohkohpene pwe irail en rong mahsen en Kauno, nanmwarikio ahpw ketin diarirailda.

33 Oh met nanmwarkio mahsanih me Alma kamwoarongehda aramas oko irail en uhwong ih: ih eri kadaralahng sapwellime sounpei ko pwe re en kemeirailla.

34 Kedekedeo Alma oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan esehda me sapwellimen nanmwarkio sounpei ko kohkohdo; eri irail ale imwarail impwal akan oh arail peneinei kan oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

35 Oh uwen tohtohn irail aramas, meh pahpwiki limehk.
mosiah 19:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kidion song en kemehla Nanmwarki Noha—Mehn Leimen kan pedolong nan sahpwo—Nanmwarki Noha mehkihla kisiniei—Limai kaunda ni arail wialahr wehin nohpwei. Ele Sounpar 145–121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo sapwellimen nanmwarkio sounpei ko pwurodo, ni arail raparapahki ahpw sohte kak diar sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan.

2 Oh met kilang, sapwellimen nanmwarkio sounpei kan malaulaulahr, oh aramas me luhwehdi ko ahpw tohrohrpeseng oh uhpene nanpwungarail.

3 Oh ekei irail ahpw tepida kamasak nanmwarkio, oh pingiping laud tepida mie nanpwungarail.

4 Oh met mie ohl emen rehrail me adaniki Kidion, oh e wia ohl kehlail men oh imwintihti ong nanmwarkio, eri e ahpw usada nah kedlahso, oh kahukihla ni eh lingeringer me e pahn kemehla nanmwarkio.

5 Kedekedeo e ahpw peieng nanmwarkio; oh ni ahnsou me nanmwarkio mwangiadahr me ohlo pahn kalowehdi ih, e ahpw ketin tangasang oh ketidahla pohn wasahn iroir ehu me karanih tehnpas sarawio.

6 Oh Kidion pwakih oh pahn doudalahng pohn wasahn iroiro pwe en kemehla nanmwarkio, a nanmwarkio ahpw mahsenlahng ni sahpw en Semlon, oh mahsaniada sounpei en Leimen kan mihmiher ni irepen sahpwo.

7 Eri met nanmwarkio ahpw ketin werikihla sang ni eh masepwehk, mahmahsanih: Kidion, komw dehr kemeiehla, pwe mehn Leimen kan kohkohdohng kitail, oh irail pahn kamwomwkitailla; ei, irail pahn kamwomwala nei aramas akan.

8 Ahpw met nanmwarkio sohte mwahn katapaniki sapwellime aramas akan ihte pein eh mour; ahpw, Kidion mweidohng en mourla.

9 Oh nanmwarkio ahpw poahngok aramas akan re en tangasang Mehn Leimen kan, oh pein ih ketiketla mwohrail, oh irail sopohla tangalahng nan sapwtehno, iangahki arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan.

10 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan pwakih irail, oh koliraildi oh tepida kemeirailla.

11 Kedekedeo nanmwarkio ahpw mahsanih me ohl koaros pahn pwilikihdi arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan, oh sopohsang Mehn Leimen kan.

12 Ahpw tohto me sohte men kohkohsang irail, ahpw irail itariki mihmi oh iang irail mehla. Oh luhwe ko koaros tangasang arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan oh tangdoaui.

13 Kedekedeo irail akan me mihmihte rehn arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan ilakihala neirail serepein masamwahu kan en kesihnen mwohn Mehn Leimen kan oh peki ni ngidingid re en dehr kemeirailla.

14 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw poakeirailla, pwehki arail lelikihda lingan en neirail serepein kan.

15 Eri Mehn Leimen kan sohte kemeirailla, oh koliraildi oh kapwureirailla nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh mweidohng irail en sapwasapw nan sahpwo, ma re pahn wahdo nanmwarki Noha nan pehn Mehn Leimen kan, oh kihong irail arail dipwisou kan, iei elepen soahng koaros me irail ahneki, elepen neirail kohl, oh silper, oh neirail dipwisou kesempwal akan koaros, oh irail pahn kin nohpweiong nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan nan ehu ehu pahr.

16 Oh met mie emen sapwellimen nanmwarkio pwutak me iang irail kolkoldi, me adaniki Limai.

17 Oh met Limai sohte men eh pahpa en kamakamala; ahpw, Limai wehwehki wiewia suwed me eh pahpa wia, pwe pein ih e wia aramas mwahu men.

18 Kedekedeo Kidion kadarala ohl ekei nan sapwtehno ni rir, pwe irail en rapahki nanmwarkio oh irail ako me iang ih. Kedekedeo irail diar aramas oko koaros nan sapwtehno, ihte me soh, nanmwarkio oh sapwellime samworo ko.

19 Met irail inoukidahr nan ar mohngiong kan, ma re pahn pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh ma arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan kamakamalahr, oh pil irail akan me mihmihte rehrail, irail pahn dupuk, oh pil iang irail mehla.

20 Oh nanmwarkio ahpw mahsanih me irail sohte mwahn pahn pwurala; oh irail lingeringer pahn nanmwarkio, oh koasoanehdi me e pahn kalokolok, iei e pahn kamakamkihla kisiniei.

21 Oh irail apwtehn pahn ale samworo ko oh kemeirialla, ahpw irail tangehrdoaui.

22 Kedekedeo irail apwtehn pahn pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh irail tuhwong nein Kidion ohl oko. Oh nein Kidion ohl oko ndaiong irail soahng koaros me wiawihong arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan; oh me Mehn Leimen kan kamanahiong irail en mihmi nan sahpwo sang ni arail pahn kin nohpweiki elepin soahng koaros me irail ahneki ong Mehn Leimen kan.

23 Oh aramas oko ahpw ndaiong nein Kidion ohl oko me irail kemelahr nanmwarkio, oh sapwellime samworo ko tangasang irail kokohla nan sapwtehno.

24 Kedekedeo mwurin arail kaimwsekala tuhpeneo, irail pwuralahng nan sahpw en Nihpai, pereperen, pwehki arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan ar sohte kamakamala; oh irail ndaiong Kidion dahme irail wiahiong nanmwarkio.

25 Kedekedeo nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kahukihong irail, me sapwellime aramas akan sohte pahn kemeirailla.

26 Oh pil Limai, pwehki eh wia sapwellimen nanmwarki seriso, e alehdier manaman en kaunda wehio sang aramas akan, oh kahukihong nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan me sapwellime aramas akan pahn kin nohpweiong, iei elepen soahng koaros me irail tungoaleniki.

27 Kedekedeo Limai ahpw ketin koasoanehdi wehio oh popohl rehn sapwellime aramas akan.

28 Oh nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw ketin koasoanehdi sounsilasil kan en kapilkipene sahpwo, pwe en ketin koledi sapwellimen Limai aramas akan nan sahpwo, pwe irail en dehr kohkohla nan sapwtehno; oh epwelpen sapwellime sounsilasil kan kin kohsang ninohpwei me e kin ale sang mehn Nihpai kan.

29 Oh met nanmwarki Limai ahpw ahneki popohl nan sapwellime wehio erein sounpar riau, me Mehn Leimen kan sohte peiong irail de song en kemeirailla.
mosiah 20:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sapwellimen Noha Samworo ko kawaisang nein Mehn Leimen kan serepein kei—Mehn Leimen kan mahweniong Limhi oh sapwellime aramas akan—Sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan kapweiekdi oh meleileidi. Ele Sounpar 145–123 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Mie wasa ehu nan sahpw en Semlon, me nein Mehn Leimen serepein kan kin kohpene oh koul, oh kahlek, oh wie pereperen.

2 Kedekedeo ehu rahno ekei irail kohpene pwe irail en koul oh kahlek.

3 Oh met pwehki sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha samworo ko ar namenengki pwurodo nan kahnihmw en Nihpai, ei, oh pil masak aramas oko de kemeirailla, irail eri sohte men pwurala rehn arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan.

4 Oh pwehki arail mihmi nan sapwtehno, oh ni arail diaradahr nein Mehn Leimen serepein kan, irail ahpw rukurukih oh mwasamwasahn irail;

5 Oh ni ahnsou me ekeite irail me kohpene pwe re en kahlek, irail ahpw kohieisang wasahn arail rukula kan oh parokiraildi oh wairailahng nan sapwtehno; ei, serepein en Mehn Leimen meh riehk pahmen me irail wahlahng nan sapwtehno.

6 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan diaradahr me neirail serepein kan solahr mie, irail lingeringerda pahn sapwellimen Limai aramas akan, pwe irail leme me sapwellimen Limai aramas akan me wia met.

7 Eri irail kadaralahng neirail sounpei kan; iei, pein nanmwarkio ketila mwohn sapwellime aramas akan; oh irail kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai pwe irail en kemehla sapwellimen Limai aramas akan.

8 Oh met Limai ahpw mahsanihada irail sang pohn wasahn iroiro, iei e masanihada arail kaukaunop koaros en mahwen; ih eri kapokonepene sapwellime aramas akan, oh awihiraildi nan mohs kan oh nan tuhke kan.

9 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kohdahdo, sapwellimen Limai aramas akan ahpw pwaradahsang wasa kan me re rukuruk ie, oh tepida kemeiralla.

10 Kedekedeo mahweno ahpw uk mehlel, pwe irail pei rasehng laion ni eh poar pohn seike.

11 Kedekedeo sapwellimen Limai aramas akan tepida pwakihsang Mehn Leimen kan; ahpw irail malaulausang Mehn Leimen kan. Ahpw irail mahwenki arail mour kan, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan; eri irail wia uwen arail kak oh pei duwehte drakon.

12 Kedekedeo irail diarada nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan nanpwungen neirail aramas me melahr akan; ahpw e sohte mehla, pwehki e ohla oh pwupwudi nan pwehlo, sapwellime aramas akan pwururdahtetangdoaui.

13 Oh irail koledi oh kidimala eh ohla kan, oh patohwanla mwohn Limai, oh patohwan: Kilang, iet nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan; pwehki e ohla laud e pwupwudi nanpwungen neirail me melahr akan, oh irail tangasang; oh kilang, se patohwando mwohmwi; oh met kitail en kemehla ih.

14 Ahpw Limai mahsanih ong irail: Kumwail sohte pahn kemehla ih, ahpw kumwail patohwando pwe I en kak kilang ih. Irail ahpw patohwando. Oh Limai mahsanih ong ih: Ia kahrepen amwail kohdoh mahwen ong nei aramas akan? Kilang, nei aramas akan saikinte kauwehla inou me I wiahiong komwi; eri, dahme kahreda komw pahn kawehla inou me komw wiahiong nei aramas akan?

15 Oh met nanmwarkio mahsanih: I kauwehla inouo pwehki sapwellimahr aramas akan wahsang nein nei aramas akan serepein kei; eri, sang nan ei lingeringer I ahpw kamwakidida nei aramas akan se en kohdo mahweniong sapwellimahr aramas akan.

16 Oh met Limai sohte ese duwen kahpwal wet; ih eri mahsanih: I pahn rapahki nanpwungen nei aramas akan oh mehmen me wia met pahn kamakamala. Ih eri kupwurehda roporop en wiawi nanpwungen sapwellime aramas akan.

17 Ni ahnsou me Kidion rongehr soahng pwukat, pwehki eh wia sapwellimen nanmwarkio kaun en sounpei, e patohla oh patohwanohng nanmwarkio: I peki rehmwi komwi en dehr rapahki nanpwungen aramas pwukat, oh dehr kapwukoakin irail.

18 Pwe komwi sohte tamataman sapwellimen sememwi samworo ko, me aramas pwukat song en kemehla? Oh irail soh mihmi nan sapwtehno? Oh kaidehn irail me pirapahsangehr nein Mehn Leimen serepein ko.

19 Oh met, kilang, oh mahsanihong nanmwarkien mepwukat, pwe en kak mahsanihong sapwellime aramas akan pwe irail en kak meleilei ong kitail; pwe kilang irail wie kaukaunop en kohdohng kitail; oh kilang kitail malaulaulahr.

20 Oh kilang, irail pahn kohkihdo kidelap en neirail karihs en sounpei kan; oh ma nanmwarkien sohte pahn kameleileirialdi kitail uhdahn pahn mehla.

21 Pwe mahsen en Apinadai kan soh pweidahr, me e kohpadahr duwen kitail—oh mepwukat koaros pwehki kitail sohte men rong mahsen kan en Kauno, oh kapweiekdi sang atail wiewia suwed kan?

22 Oh met kitail anahne kameleileidi nanmwarkien, oh kapwaiada inou me kitail wiahiong ih; pwe e pahn mwahu ma kitail mour lidu sang atail pahn mehla; eri, kitail kauhdi kakerehdi nta laud.

23 Oh met Limai mahsenihong nanmwarkio soahng koaros duwen semeo, oh samworo kan me tang kohla nan sapwtehno, oh kapwukoahnkin irail me wahsang neirail serepein ko.

24 Kedekedeo nanmwarkio ahpw meleileidi oh kupwurehla sapwellime aramas ko; oh e mahsanihong irail: Kitail kohwei oh tuhwong nei aramas akan, sohte wa dipwisou pei; oh I kahukihong kumwail sang ni ehu inou me nei aramas akan sohte pahn kemehla sapwellimwomwi aramas akan.

25 Kedekedeo irail idawehnla nanmwarkio, oh sohte wa dipwisou en mahwen kohla tuhwong Mehn Leimen kan. Kedekedeo irail ahpw tuhwongdi Mehn Leimen kan; oh nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw poaridi mwohrail, oh pekimahngki sapwellimen Limai aramas akan.

26 Oh ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr sapwellimen Limai aramas akan sohte wa dipwisou en mahwen, irail ahpw poakeirailla, oh iangih arail nanmwarkio pwuralahng nan pein sapwarail ni popohl.
mosiah 21:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen kan peiong oh kalowehdi sapwellimen Limai aramas akan—Sapwellimen Limai aramas akan tuhwongidi Amon oh weliakapwala—Irail ndaiong Amon duwen nein Mehn Sared pileit rieisek-pahieuo. Ele Sounpar 122–121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Limai oh sapwellime aramas akan ahpw pwurala nan kahnihmw en Nihpai, oh pwurehng tepida mihmi nan sahpwo ni popohl.

2 Kedekedeo mwurin rahn kei a Mehn Leimen kan pil pwurehng lingeringerda pahn Mehn Nihpai kan, oh irail ahpw tepida karisdahdo ni irepen sahpwo pwon.

3 Ahpw met irail sohte kak kemeirailla, pwehki kahula me arail nanmwarkio ketin wiahiongehr Limai; ahpw re kin pohr masarail kan, oh doadoahngki arail manaman pohrail; oh kin koadoadoahkih irail ong wisik toutou kan, oh ruweseseli irail duwehte me irail ahs me sehse lokaia—

4 Ei, mepwukat koaros wiawi pwe mahsen en Kauno en kak pweida.

5 Oh met ahn Mehn Nihpai kan lokolok kan me inenen laud mehlel, oh e apwal en pitsang pahrail, pwehki Mehn Leimen kan arail kapilirailpenehr wasa kaoros.

6 Kedekedeo aramas akan tepida kaulimkiong arail nanmwarkio pwehki lokolok apwal me re mihmi loale; oh re tepier men mahweniong irail. Oh kin wie kapwkapwunodehki arail nanmwarkio duwen arail kaulim kan; ih eri ketin mweidohng irail dahme irail inengieng en wia.

7 Oh irail pwurehng kapokonepene pein irail, oh pwuhrieng nan arail tehtehn mahwen kan, oh samwalah mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan pwe irail en kasareirailla sang nan sapwerail.

8 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kaloweiraildi, oh pwakihiraillahng arail wasa, oh me tohto me irail kemehla.

9 Oh met sapwellimen Limai aramas akan wie mwahmwahiei oh pahpahtou mehlel, lihodi mwahieiki eh pwoud, pwutak oh serepein mwahieiki arail pahpa, oh ohl akan mwahieiki riarail ohl akan.

10 Eri lihodi tohto mehlel me mih nan sahpwo, oh re kin wie mwahmwahieiki erein rahn kei, pwehki ar inenen masepwehngkihda kowahlap Mehn Leimen kan.

11 Kedekedeo pwehki arail kin wie sengisengkio uhd kamwakidada luhwen sapwellimen Limai aramas akan en lingeringerda pahn Mehn Leimen kan; oh irail pwurehng pwurala mahweniong, irail eri tangdoaui pwepweki pwuredo, ahpw lokolongki arail ohla laud kan.

12 Ei, irail pwurehng pwurala kesilipak, oh lokolongki soahngohte; oh irail akan me sohte kamakamala pwurehng pwurala nan kahnimw en Nihpai.

13 Oh irail ahpw karakarahkdiong nan pwehl oh mweidirailla pahn kalokolok en kalidu, mweidohng pein irail en kamakam, oh wiemwahlla, oh lokolongki wisik toutou kan, nin duwen dahme arail imwintihti kan inengieng.

14 Oh irail akitiktikla mehlel; oh tepda kapakapohng Koht ni ngidingid; iei, pil nan rahn ehu pwon irail kin wie kapakapiong arail Koht en kapitirail sang nan arail lokolok apwal akan.

15 Oh met Kauno pwand en karonge arail kapakap pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan me kahrehda; ahpw Kauno ketin karongehte arail kapakap akan, oh tepida kasohrehsang nan kapehd kekeluwak en Mehn Leimen kan kahrehda irail eri tepda kamarahrahda arail katoutou kan; ahpw Kauno saik mahsanih me e konehngehr en kapitirail sang nan mouren kalidu.

16 Kedekedeo irail eri tepida ekis wie pwepweida nan sahpwo, oh arail werentuhkekan tepda wie rekla mehlel, oh neirail pelin sihpw akan, oh pelin kou kan pil tohtohla, oh irail sohte lokolongki duhpek.

17 Oh met pwehki tohtolahn lih akan, tohtohsang ohl akan; nanmwarki Limai eri kupwurehda meohl akan koaros en sewesehda lihodi kan oh neirail seri kan, pwe irail en dehr mehkihla ar duhpek; oh re wia met pwehki kidalap en irailme kamakamalahr.

18 Eri aramas en Limai kan kin mihpenehte ni minimin en pwihn ehute ahnsou koaros, oh silehdi mwahu arail werentuhke kan oh neirail pelinmen kan;

19 Oh pein nanmwarkio sohte kin koapworopworiki kelehpw alu maslikin kelen kahnihmwo, ihme e kin kahreki sapwellime soun silasilko, pwe e kin perki Mehn Leimen kan de koledi ni soangen wiepe ieu.

20 Oh e kupwurehda sapwellime aramas akan en tetehk nan sahpwo pwon, pwe ma mie soangen wiepe ieu me irail en kak koledi samworo ko me tangala nan sapwtehno, me kawaisang nein Mehn Leimen kan serepein ko, oh me kahrehiong irail nan lokolok apwal.

21 Pwe re men koliraildi oh kaloke irail; pwe irail kin waido nihpwong nan sahpw en Nihpai kan, oh kawai werentuhke kan oh arail dipwisou kesempwal tohto; eri re kin wie rukrukih irail.

22 Kedekedeo sohla pingiping wiawi nanpwungen Mehn Leimen kan oh sapwellimen Limai aramas akan, lao lel ni ahnsou me Amon oh ienge ko leledo nan sahpwo.

23 Oh ni ahnsou me nanmarikio iang sapwellime soun silasil kan ketiketseli likin kahnihmwo, e ahpw diarada Amon oh riehkan; oh e ketin medewehiong me irail samworohn Noha ko, ih eri ketin pahngok me re en kolkoldi, oh pirapirdi, oh lekideklong nan imweteng. Oh ma irail iei samworohn Noha ko e pahn ruwese me irail pahn kamakamala.

24 Ahpw ni e diarada me kaidehkin irail mwo, ahpw diarada mwuhr me kiseh ko, me patohdahdohr sang nan sahpw en Saraemla, e ahpw direkihla peren kowahlap.

25 Ahpw mwohn Amon e leledo, nanmwarki Limai kadarala ohl ekei re en rapahkihla sahpw en Saraemla; ahpw re salongala nan sapwtehno oh sohte diaredi.

26 Ahpw, irail diarada sahpw ehu me aramas kousoan loale mahs; ei, sahpw ehu me direkihla tihn aramas; ei, sahpw ehu me mie aramas oh irail ahpw kamwomwomwlahr; oh irail, lemehkiong me sahpw en Saraemla mwo, irail eri pwurodo nan sahpw en Nihpai, irail leledo nan sahpwo rahn kei mwohnte Amon eh leledo.

27 Oh irail wahdo ntingen poadopoad kei, iei poadopoad en tohn wasao me tihrail dierek ie; oh nting kan nting pohn pleit mete kei.

28 Oh Limai pwurehng direkilahr peren ni ahnsou me e esehda sang Amon me nanmwarki Mosaia sapwellimaniki kisakis sang rehn Koht, en kak kawehwe soangen nting kan; ei, oh Amon pil iang perenda.

29 Ahpw Amon oh ienge ko pil pahtoula mehlel pwehki tohtohn rierail akan me kamakamala.

30 Oh pil pahtoukihla duwen nanmwarki Noha oh sapwellime samworo kan kahrehiong aramas akan en wiahda dihp tohto oh wiewia suwed kan ong Koht; oh irail pil mwahieiki mehlahn Apinadai; oh pil Alma oh aramas ako me iangih sopohla sang wasao, me wiahda mwomwohdiso en Koht sang ni arail kehlail oh manaman en Koht, oh pwoson mahsen akan me Apinadai mahsaniher.

31 Ei, irail mwahieiki arail kohkohlao, pwehki arail sehse wasa irail sopohla ie. Pwe met irail mentehnoh patehng irail, pwe irail pein aledahr inou ong Koht en papah ih oh kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan.

32 Oh met sang ni ahnsou me Amon leledo, nanmwarki Limai pil iangehr alehda inou ong Koht, oh pil iangahki sapwellime aramas tohto, re en papah ih oh kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan.

33 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Limai oh sapwellime aramas tohto inengieng papidaisla; ahpw sohte emen nan sahpwo me kolokol mweimwei sang Koht. Oh Amon soikala wia doadoahk wet, pwehki e medewe me e wia ladu sohte warohng.

34 Eri, ahnsouo irail sohte wiahda ehu mwomwohdiso, ihte awiawihte Ngehn en Kauno. Oh met irail inangih duwehla Alma oh rie ko, me sopohla nan sapwtehno.

35 Irail inengieng papidaisla pwe en wia ehu kadehde me irail inangih papah Koht sang nan mohngiongarail unsek; ahpw irail kanekanengamahiong; oh soipen arail papidaislao pahn kasansalda mwuhr.

36 Oh met onop koaros me Amon oh ienge aramas akan, oh nanmwarki Limai oh sapwellime aramas kaukaunopohng, iei wiepen arail pahn kapitirail sang pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan oh sang nan kalidu.
mosiah 22:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Koasoandi kei wiawihda ong aramas ako pwe irail en pitsang mouren kalidu pahn Mehn Leimen kan—Irail kasakauwiala Mehn Leimen kan—Aramas akan pitila, pwurala nan Saraemla, oh mihla pahn manaman en Nanmwarki Mosaia. Ele Sounpar 121–120 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo Amon oh nanmwarki Limai tepida wehwehkihong aramas ako duwen arail pahn kapitirailsang nan mouren kalidu; oh re kapokonepene aramas koaros; oh re wia met pwe irail en tuhkipene oh rongehn aramas pwukat pilipilong duwen koasoandi wet.

2 Kedekedeo irail sohte kak diar wiepe ehu me irail en kak kapitirailsang nan kalidu, pwe irail men wahda arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan, oh neirail pelin sihpw kan, oh neirail pelin kou kan, oh imwarail impwal akan kolahng nan sapwtehno; oh Mehn Leimen kan me nohn tohto, oh e pahn inenen apwal ong aramas en Limai kan re en pelian irail nan madamadau en peiki kedlahs pwe irail en kak pitsang nan mour en kalidu.

3 Eri Kidion ahpw patohla oh uh mwohn nanmwarkio, oh patohwanohng: Maing nanmwarki, pak tohto komwi kin ketin karonge ei kaweid ni ahnsou me kitail kin mahweniong riatail kan, Mehn Leimen kan.

4 Oh maing nanmwarki, ma komwi sohte wiakinie ladu sohkatepe men, de ma komw kin ketin karongehte ekis ei iren kaweid, oh ma emwahu ong komwi, iei ahnsou wet me I men peki komwi en ketin karonge ie ahnsou kiset, oh I pahn wia sapwellimwomwi ladu oh I pahn kapitala sapwellimwomwi aramas akan sang nan mour en kalidu.

5 Oh nanmwarkio ahpw mweidohng en kak pato. Oh Kidion ahpw patohwanohng:

6 Kilang ahl en pedolong oh pedoi, me mih ni kehl en mwurio, me mih nan tihsewenkahnimw wet. Mehn Leimen kan, de neirail sounsilasil kan kin sakaula nihpwong; eri kitail pakairkipeseng rehn neitail aramas akan koaros irail en kihpene neirail pelin sihpw kan oh pelin kou kan, pwe irail en kak kahluwairaillahng nan sapwtehno nihpwong.

7 Oh I pahn kohla nin duwen sapwellimahr poahngok oh wahla kaimwiseklahn nohpwei en wain ong Mehn Leimen kan, oh irail pahn sakaukihla; oh kitail ahpw pahn waieila nan ahl rir me mih pali meing en arail kahnimpwal ko ni ahnsou me re pahn sakaula oh memeir.

8 Kitailpahn kahrehdaatail pwoud kan oh neitail seri kan, oh neitail pelin sihpw kan, oh neitail pelin kou kan; kohieila nan sahpwtehno oh kitail pahn keidla pidakih sahpw en Sailom.

9 Kedekedeo nanmwarikio ahpw karongehla kaweid en Kidion.

10 Oh nanmwarki Limai ahpw kupwurehda spawellime aramas akan en kihpene neirail pelnmen akan; oh e ahpw kadarala nohpwei en wain ong Mehn Leimen kan; oh e ahpw pil kadarala ekei wain, nin duwen kisakis ehu ong irail; oh re ioukihda oh sakaukihlawain me nanmwarki Limai kadaralahng irail ko.

11 Kedekedeo sapwellimen nanmwarki Limai aramas akan ahpw mweselda nihpwongo kohla nan sapwtehno iangahki neirail pelinmen kan, oh irail keidla pidakih sahpw en Sailom kohla nan sapwtehno, oh kaineneiraillahng sahpw en Saraemla, pahn kaweid en Amon oh ienge kan.

12 Oh irail wahda neirail kohl koaros, oh silper koaros, oh arail dipwisou kesempwal koaros, me irail kak wahda, oh pil iangahki kenerail mwenge kan, kohlahng nan sapwtehno; oh irail wenlahte nan arail seiloako.

13 Oh mwurin arail seiloakier rahn tohto nan sapwtehno, irail ahpw lella nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh ehuong sapwellimen Mosaia aramas akan, oh mihla pahn sapwellime manaman.

14 Kedekedeo Mosaia ahpw kasamwo irail ni peren; oh e pil alehdi arail poadopoad kan, oh pil poadopoad kan me sapwellimen Limai aramas akan diarada.

15 Oh met ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan diaradahr me sapwellimen Limai aramas akan mweselsang nan sahpwo nihpwongo, irail ahpw kadarala sounpei kei nan sapwtehno pwe re en pwakihiraildi;

16 Oh mwurin arail pwakpwakih irail rahn riau, irail sohla kak kilang lipwarail; irail eri salongala nan sapwtehno.
mosiah 23:
Duwen Alma oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan, me sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha aramas akan pwakiala nan sapwtehno.

Audaudki iralaud 23 oh 24.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kasohwe eh pahn wiahla nanmwarki men—E papah nin duwen samworo lapalap men—Kauno ketin kaloke Sapwellime aramas akan, oh Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi sahpw en Helam—Amulon, me wia kaun en sapwellimen Nanmwarki Noha samworo suwed ko, kaunda pahn manaman en nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 145–121 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met Kauno ketin kaparki Alma me sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha sounpei ko kohkohdohng irail, oh e ahpw padahkihong nah aramas akan, eri irail kihpene neirail pelin mahn akan, oh wahda arail werentuhke kan, oh mwesellahng nan sapwtehno mwohn sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha sounpei kan ar pahn koanoairaildi.

2 Oh Kauno ahpw kakehlakairailda, pwe sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha aramas akan sohte pahn koliraildi oh kemeirailla.

3 Oh irail sopohla seiseilongki erein rahn waluh nan sapwtehno.

4 Oh irail lel nan sahpw ehu, iei, sahpw lingan oh kansenamwahu ehu, sahpw en pihl mwakelekel.

5 Oh irail kauwada imwerail impwal akan, oh tepida deipwelihada pwehlo, oh tepida kauwada ihmw kan; mehlel, irail me koahiek nan doadoahk, oh kin pwerisek.

6 Oh aramas ako men Alma en wiahla arail nanmwarki, pwe nah aramas ako kinpoakepoake.

7 Ahpw e patohwan ong irail: Kilang, e sohte mwahu ong kitail en ahneki nanmwarki; pwe Kauno ketin mahsanih: Kumwail sohte pahn medewe emen aramas kesempwal sang emen, de aramas men sohte pahn medewe me e mwahusang emen; eri I pahn ndaiong kumwail me e sohte mwahu ong kumwail en mie amwail nanmwarki.

8 Ahpw, ma e kak wiawi ma ohl emen me pahn kin mehlel ahnsou koaros en wia amwail nanmwarki, eri e pahn mwahu en mie amwail nanmwarki.

9 Ahpw tamataman wiewia suwed en nanmwarki Noha oh sapwellime samworo ko; oh pein ngehi iang lohdi nan lidip, oh wia soahng tohto me suwed mwohn silangin Kauno, me kiohng ie kalokepen ei kolukihla dipei kan;

10 Ahpw, mwurin ei lokolok laud, Kauno karonge ei pekipek, oh sapeng ei kapakap kan, oh wiahiong ie I en wia wiliepen nin lime pwe en kak wahdo tohtohn kumwail pwe kumwail en marainkihda sapwellime mehlelo.

11 Ahpw, met I sohte pohliki, pwe ngehi I sohte warohng pohliki pein ngehi.

12 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail lokolokehr pahn nanmwarki Noha, oh iangehrkaliduhla pahn ih oh sapwellime samworo kan, oh irail karehieng kumwail nan wiewia suwed; kumwail eri selikihdi sahl en wiewia suwed.

13 Oh met pwehki amwail saledeksangehr sahl pwukat sang ni manaman en Koht; iei, sang nin limen nanmwarki Noha oh sapwellime aramas akan, oh pil sang ni sahl en wiewia suwed kan, iei I pil men kumwail en tengeteng nan amwail saledek me kumwail alehdier, oh kumwail dehr koapworopworiki emen aramas en wiahla amwail nanmwarki.

14 Oh pil dehr likih emen en wia amwail sounpadahk de soun kaweid, ihte ma e wia aramas en Koht emen, weweidki sapwellime koasoandi kan oh kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan.

15 Eri iet me Alma padahkihong nah aramas akan, me emen emen aramas pahn poakohng mehn impe kan duwehte pein ih, oh sohte pingiping pahn mie nanpwungarail.

16 Oh met, Alma wia arail samworo lapalap, pwehki ih me wiahda arail mwomwohdiso.

17 Kedekedeo sohte me kin mweimweiong en kalohk de padahk ihte ma e alehdi mweimwei sang rehn Koht. Eri e kasarawiala arail samworo koaros oh arail sounpadahk koaros; oh sohte me kin kasarawihla ihte ma e wia aramas pwung men.

18 Eri irail kin wie sinsile neirail aramas akan, oh apwalihkin irail ni mehkoaros me pwung.

19 Kedekedeo irail eri tepida inenen pweida nan sahpwo; oh irail kihong edensahpwo Ihlem.

20 Kedekedeo irail kaparaparala oh inenen pweida nan sahpw en Ihlem; oh irail kauwada kahnimw ehu, me irail kihong eden kahnihmwo, kahnimw en Ihlem.

21 Ahpw Kauno kin ketin mweidohng sapwellime aramas akan nan lokolok; ei, e kin ketin song arail kanengamah oh arail pwoson.

22 Ahpw—mehmen me pahn likih ih e pahn kasapwilda ni imwin rahno. Ei, ohihme wiawi ong aramas pwukat.

23 Pwe kilang, I kadehdehkiong kumwail me irail lohdiongehr nan kalidu, oh sohte me kak kapitirailla ihte Kauno arail Koht, iei, Koht en Eipraam oh Koht en Aisek oh Koht en Seikop.

24 Kedekedeo e ahpw kapitirailla, oh e ketin kasalehiong irail sapwellime manaman lapalap, oh irail pereperenikihda kowahlap.

25 Pwe kilang, ni ahnsou me irail mihmi nan sahpw en Ihlem, ei, nan kahnihmw en Ihlem, ni ahnsou me irail wie deideipwelih nan sahpwo, kilang sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan lelledohr oh kipehdi sahpwo pwon.

26 Eri kedekedeo nein Alma aramas akan ahpw tangasang nan arail mwaht akan, oh kohpene nan kahnimw en Ihlem; oh irail uhdahn masepwehkada pwehki Mehn Leimen kan ar pwarada.

27 Ahpw Alma kesihnenda nanpwungarail, oh koangoangoahkin irail me irail deh masepwehk, ahpw irail en tamataman Kauno arail Koht oh e pahn ketin doareirailla.

28 Irail eri meleileidi nan arail masepwehk, oh tepida peki rehn Kauno en ketin wekidala mohngiong en Mehn Leimen kan, pwe irail en mahkohng kapitirailla, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan.

29 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw wekidalahr mohngiong en Mehn Leimen kan. Oh Alma oh sapwellime aramas akan kohla oh mweidohng irail pahn arail manaman; oh Mehn Leimen kan sapwankihla sahpw en Ihlem.

30 Eri met sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan, me raparapahki sapwellimen nanmwarki Limai aramas ako, irail salsalongseli nan sapwtehno erein rahn kei.

31 Oh kilang, irail diaradahr sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha samworo ko, nan sahpw ehu me re kahdaniki Amulon; oh irail tepida sapwasapw nan sahpw en Amulon oh tepida deipwelihada pwehlo.

32 Eri eden kaun en samworo ko iei Amulon.

33 Kedekedeo Amulon pekipeki rehn Mehn Leimen kan oh e pil kadaralahng irail arail pwoud kan, me nein Mehn Leimen serepein kan, re en peki ni ngidingid rehn riarail akan, pwe irail en dehr kemehla arail pwoud kan.

34 Oh Mehn Leimen kan ahpw poakehla Amulon oh ienge kan, oh sohte kemeirailla, pwehki arail pwoud kan.

35 Oh Amulon oh ienge ko iangala Mehn Leimen kan, oh irail seiseiloak nan sapwtehno raparapahki sahpw en Nihpai ni ahnsou me irail diarada sahpw en Ihlem, wasa Alma oh ienge kan wie sapwasapw ie.

36 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan inoukihong Alma oh ienge kan, ma irail pahn padahkihong irail ahl en kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, irail pahn mweidala arail mour oh arail saledek.

37 Ahpw mwurin Alma eh kasalehiong irail ahl en kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, Mehn Leimen kan sohte kapwaiada arail inouo; ahpw irail koasoanehdi sounsilasil en kapilpene Alma oh ienge kan nan sahpw en Ihlem.

38 Oh luhwedi ko en irail pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai; oh ekei irail pwurodo nan sahpw en Ihlem, oh pil iangahki en sounsilasil me mihmi nan sahpwo arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan.

39 Oh nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan kamanahieng Amulon en wia nanmwarki oh kaun en nah aramas akan, me mih nan sahpw en Ihlem; ahpw e sohte pahn ahneki manaman en wia mehkot me uhwong kupwur en nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan.
mosiah 24:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amulon kaloke Alma oh nah aramas akan—Irail pahn kamakamala ma irail pahn kapakap—Kauno ketin kamarahrahla arail wisik kan—E ketin doarehsang irail nan mouren kalidu, oh irail pwurala nan Saraemla. Ele Sounpar 145–120 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Amulon ahpw masamasala mwohn silangin nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan; eri, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan kamanahieng ih oh rieh kan me irail pahn wiahla sounpadahk ong sapwellime aramas akan, iei, aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en Semlon, oh nan sahpw en Sailom, oh nan sahpw en Amulon.

2 Pwe Mehn Leimen kan sapwanikilahr sahpw pwukat koaros; eri, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ketin idihadahr nanmwarki kei nan sahpw pwukat koaros.

3 Oh met mwaren nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan iei Leimen, me mwareniki mwaren semeo; eri e kin mwarenkihla nanmwarki Leimen. Oh e wia nanmwarki en aramas ngeder.

4 Oh e ketin pilada iengen Amulon ko en wia sounpadahk nan sahpw koaros me sapwellime aramas akan koukousoan ie; eri ahnsouo me lokaiahn Mehn Nihpai kan kasukuhliong Mehn Leimen kan koaros.

5 Oh irail wia aramas kadekpene nanpwungarail; ahpw irail sohte ese Koht; oh pil rien Amulon ko sohte padahkihong irail duwen Kauno arail Koht, de pil kosonned en Moses; de pil padahkihong irail mahsen en Apinadai kan;

6 Ahpw irail padahkihong irail me re anahne ntingihedi ar poadopoad, oh me irail en kak ntingpene nanpwungarail.

7 Oh met Mehn Leimen kan tepdahr kepwepwehla, oh tepida netinetpene nanpwungarail oh kehkehlailla, oh tepida wia aramas widing oh loalokong, nin duwen erpit en sampah, mehlel, aramas loalokong mwersuwed, me kin pereniki soangsoahngen wiewia suwed oh kulih aramas, ihte me soh, nanpwungarail.

8 Oh met Amulon tepida song eh manaman en kaunda Alma oh rie kan, oh tepida kaloke, oh wiahiong nah seri kan re en kaloke neirail seri kan.

9 Pwe Amulon kin ese Alma, me e wia emen sapwellimen nanmwarkio samworo, oh me iei ih me kamehlele mahsen en Apinadai ko oh pekeuss ang mwohn nanmwarkio, eri e kin lingeringer pah; pwe e mih pahn manaman en nanmwarki Leimen, ahpw e kin doadoahngki eh manaman kaun irail, oh itonehng irail nan doadoahk apwal, oh koasoanediong arail kaunen doadoahk kan.

10 Kedekedeo arail lokolok kan doarala, kahrehda arail tepida kapakap kehlail ong Koht.

11 Oh Amulon kihong irail kosonned me irail pahn uhdihsang arail kapakap kan; oh e koasoanehdi soun silasil me pahn sile irail, pwe mehmen me pahn dierek wie kapakapohng Koht e pahn kamakamala.

12 Oh Alma oh nah aramas sohte kapakap ni ngihl laud ong Kauno arail Koht, ahpw irail kasalehiong ih sang nan mohngiongarail unsek; oh e ketin mwahngih audepen mohngiongarail kan.

13 Kedekedeo kepitien Kauno ahpw peidohng irail nan arail kahpwal akan, ketihtihki: Kumwail sarada oh ahneki popohl, pwe I tamatante inou me kumwail wiahiong ie; oh I pahn wiahda inou ehu ong nei aramas akan oh kapitirailsang nan mouren lidu.

14 Oh I pahn pil kamarahrahda wisik toutou kan me kin katoutouwih pohn pwopwomwail kan, pwe kumwail sohte pahn kehn pohn tihnsewemwail kan, ni ahnsou me kumwail kin wia lidu; oh met I pahn wia pwe kumwail en kak wia soun kadehdeh kei ong ie mwurin met, oh kumwail en kak ese ni mehlel me ngehi, Kauno Koht, kin pwarek nei aramas akan nan arail lokolok kan.

15 Oh kedekedeo wisik toutou kan me kohiengehr Alma oh rie kan ahpw marahrahda; mehlel, Kauno ketin kakehlakahla irail kahrehda irail kak wahda arail wisik toutou kan ni ar marahrahda, oh irail ahpw mweidohng kupwur en Kauno sang ni arail peren oh kanengamah.

16 Kedekedeo arail pwoson oh arail kanengamah kehlailla mehlel kahrehda kepitien Kauno ahpw pwurehng peidohng irail, ketihtihki: Kumwail ahneki popohl, pwe lakapw I pahn kapitkumwailsang nan kalidu.

17 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong Alma: Ke pahn kahluwa aramas pwukat, oh I pahn ieianguhk oh kapitasang aramas pwukat nan mouren kalidu.

18 Eri, kedekedeo Alma oh nah aramas akan ahpw kihpene neirail mahn akan nihpwongo, oh pil kenerail weren tuhke kan; iei, pwohngo pwon re kihkihpene neirail mahn akan.

19 Oh ni mensengo Kauno ahpw ketin wiahda Mehn Leimen kan re en meirkelikla, ei, oh arail kaunen doadoahk kan koaros uhdahn memeirkelik.

20 Oh Alma oh nah aramas akan mwesella nan sapwtehno; oh mwurin arail seiloangki rahn ehu pwon, irail ahpw kauwada arail impwal akan nan wahu ehu, oh irail kahdaniki wahuo Alma, pwehki eh kahluwa irail nan sapwtehno.

21 Ei, oh nan wahu en Alma irail kapingkalahngankihong arail Koht pwehki sapwellime kupwur kalahngan ong irail, oh kamarahrahla arail wisik toutou kan, oh kapitirailsang nan mouren lidu; pwe irail mih nan mouren lidu, oh sohte me kak kapitirailla ihte Kauno arail Koht.

22 Oh irail wia arail kapingkalahngan ong Koht, ei, neirail ohl koaros oh neirail lih koaros oh neirail seri kan koaros me ese lokaia ahpw ngihl laudida kapkapinga arail Koht.

23 Oh met Kauno mahsanihong Alma: Nna, kowe oh aramas pwukat en mwadangete kohkohsang nan sahpwet, pwe Mehn Leimen kan piridahr oh pwakpwakih kumwail; eri kumwail kohkohla sang nan sahpwet, oh I pahn kauhdi Mehn Leimen kan nan wahu wet pwe irail sohte pahn daulih wasaht nan ar pwakih aramas pwukat.

24 Kedekedeo irail ahpw mweselsang nan wahuo, oh seiloakla nan sapwtehno.

25 Oh mwurin rahn eisek riau me irail kakahnseli nan sapwtehno irail ahpw lella nan sahpw en Saraemla; oh nanmwarki Mosaia pil kasamwo irail ni peren.
mosiah 25:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kadaudok en Miulek kan nan Saraemla wiahla Mehn Nihpai—Irail esehda duwen nein Alma oh Sihnep aramas akan—Alma papidaisihla Limai oh nah aramas akan—Mosaia kamanahieng Alma en wiahda Mwomwohdiso en Koht. Ele Sounpar 120 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met nanmwarki Mosaia ahpw ketin kupwurehda me sapwellime aramas akan koaros en pokonpene.

2 Met, seri en Nihpai kan sohte nohn tohto, de irail akan me wia kadaudok en Nihpai sohte dir, duwehte aramas en Saraemla kan, me wia kadaudok en Miulek, oh irail akan me iang ih kohdo nan sapwtehno.

3 Oh aramas en Nihpai oh aramas en Saraemla kan sohte tohto duwehte aramas en Mehn Leimen kan; ei, re malaulausang elep en Mehn Leimen kan.

4 Oh met aramas en Nihpai kan kohpene, oh pil aramas en Saraemla koaros, irail pokonpene wiahda pwihn riau.

5 Kedekedeo Mosaia ahpw wadek, oh kupwurehda en wadawadada poapopoad en Sihnep kan ong sapwellime aramas akan; ei, e wadek poadopoad en aramas en Sihnep, sangete ahnsou me re mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla lao lel ahnsou me re pwurodo.

6 Oh e pil wadekada soiepen Alma oh rie kan, oh arail lokolok kan koaros, sang ni ahnsou me irail mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla lao lel ahnsou me re pwurodo.

7 Oh met, ni ahnsou me Mosaia kaimwseklahr wadwadek poadopoad kan, sapwellime aramas akan me mihmi nan sahpwo pwuriamweikihla oh wahpwonla.

8 Pwe irail sohte ese dahme re pahn medewehki; pwe ni ahnsou me re kilang irail kan me pitsangehr nan mouren lidu, irail direkihla peren kouwahlap.

9 Oh pil, ni ahnsou me irail medewehda rierail kan me kamakamala rehn Mehn Leimen kan, irail pil direkihla pahtou, oh pil sengisengki pwehki ar pahtou.

10 Oh pil, ni ahnsou me irail medewehdo kupwur kalahngan en Koht e kin mwadangete lel irail, oh sapwellime manaman en kapitala Alma oh rie kan sang pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan oh sang nan mouren lidu, irail pil ngihl laudida wia arail kapingkalahngan ong Koht.

11 Oh pil, ni ahnsou me irail medewehda Mehn Leimen kan, me wia kisehrail, nan arail momouriki mour dipan oh mour samin, re pil direkihla medek oh pwunod pwehkipalingenerail.

12 Kedekedeo irail seri kan me nein Amulon oh rie ko, me pwoudkihda nein Mehn Leimen kan serepein kan, sohte pwungki en arail pahpa kan wiewia kan, oh irail sohla mehn adaneki eden arail pahpa kan, eri irail adanekilahr eden Nihpai, pwe irail en kak kahdaniki seri en Nihpai oh wadawadohng irail akan me kin kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai kan.

13 Oh met aramas en Saraemla koaros iang wadawadohng Mehn Nihpai kan, oh met pwehki manaman en kaunda wehio kin kohiengete kadaudok en Nihpai kan.

14 Oh met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Mosaia kaimwisekalahr sapwellime mahsen oh wadawad ong aramas akan, e luke Alma en uhd koasoi ong aramas akan.

15 Oh Alma ahpw koasoi ong irail, ahnsou me irail pokonpene wiahda pwihn kei, oh e kohsang ni ehu pwihn kolahng ehu, kalokalohkihong aramas akan duwen koluhla oh pwoson Kauno.

16 Oh e koangoangehki aramas en Limai oh rie kan, irail koaros me kapitsang nan mouren lidu, me irail en tamataman me Kauno me ketin kapitirailla.

17 Kedekedeo mwurin Alma e padahkihong aramas akan soahng tohto, oh kaimwiseklahr koasoakoasoiong irail, nanmwarki Limai inangihada en papidaisla; oh sapwellime aramas koaros pil inangih re en iang papidaisla.

18 Eri, Alma kohla nan pihlo oh papidaisirailla; ei, e papidaisihla irail ni wiepe me e wiahieng rie kan ni pihl en Mormon; ei, oh koaros me papidaisla wiahla tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht; oh met pwehki irail kamehlele en Alma padahk kan.

19 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Mosaia kamanahiong Alma en wiahda mwomwodiso kan nan sahpw en Saraemla koaros; oh kihong manaman en kasarawihla samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan nan mwomwohdiso koaros.

20 Met e wiawi pwehki aramas tohtohlahr oh irail sohte kak ahneki sounpadahk metehmen; de irail koaros sohte kak rong mahsen en Koht nan ehute kapokon;

21 Eri irail kin pokonpene nan pwihn kei, ni ar kahdaniki mwomwodiso kei; ehu ehu mwomwohdiso mie pein neirail samworo oh sounpadahk kan, oh emen emen samworo kalokalohki mahseno nin duwen eh rong sang ni ewen Alma.

22 Oh met, mendahte mwomwohdiso tohto ahpw irail koaros wiamwomwohdiso teieu, iei, mwomwohdiso en Koht; pwe sohte ehusongen mehkot kin kalohkda nan mwomwodiso ko koaros ihte duwen koluhla oh pwoson Koht.

23 Oh met mie mwomwohdiso isuhnan sahpw en Saraemla. Kedekedeo mehmen me kin inangih en alehda mwaren Krais, de Koht, irail kin iangala mwomwodiso en Koht;

24 Oh irail wiahla aramas en Koht. Oh Kauno ketin kamwerediong pohrail sapwellime Ngehno, oh irail kapaidahr, oh pweidahr nan sahpwo.
mosiah 26:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Tohn Mwomwohdiso tohto dipada sang ni ar idawehn aramas sohpwoson kan—Alma alehdi inou en mour soutuk—Irail akan me koluhla oh papidaisla ale mahkpen diparail kan—Tohn Mwomwohdiso me mih nan dihp ahpw koluhla oh wehkadahng Alma oh ong Kauno pahn ale mahkpen dipe; ma soh, irail sohte pahn iang wadawadohng aramas en nan Mwomwohdiso. Ele Sounpar 120–100 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Ahnsouo mie aramas tohto nan dih me kekeirada me sohte wehwehki sapwellimen nanmwarki Pensamin mahsen akan, pwehki ar wia kisin seri kei ni ahnsou me e ketin mahseniong sapwellime aramas akan; oh re sohte kamehlele en arail pahpa kahlap ako tiahk.

2 Irail sohte kamehlele padahk kan me pid duwen iasadahn me melahr akan, oh pil sohte kamehlele duwen ketidohn Krais.

3 Oh met pwehki arail sohte kamehlele, kahrehda arail sohte kak wehwehki mahsen en Koht; oh mohngiongarail kan kekeluwakalahr.

4 Oh irail sohte men papidaisla; de pil men iangala mwomwohdiso. Oh irailtohrohrala nan arail pelien lamalam oh re tohrohr sang ahnsouo kohla, iei nan arail mour en sampah oh mour dipan; pwehki irail sohte men kapakap ong Kauno arail Koht.

5 Oh met nan mwehin Mosaia irail inenen malaulausang aramas akan en Koht; ahpw pwehki akamaipene nanpwungen ekei tohn mwomwohdiso kan kahrehda irail wie tohtohla.

6 Pwe kedekedeo irail kin ketewehdi aramas tohto me wia tohn mwomwohdiso sang ni ar lokaian widing, oh kahrehiong irail en wiahda dihp tohto; eri e konehng me irail akan me wiahda dihp, me wia tohn mwomwohdiso, pahn ale kapwungpe sang mwomwohdiso.

7 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pakahrdo mwohn samworo kan, oh sounpadahk kan me kin kahreiraillahng samworo kan; oh samworo kan ahpw kahreiraillahng rehn Alma, me wia samworo lapalap.

8 Met nanmwarki Mosaia ketikihongehr Alma mweimwei en apwalih mwomwohdiso.

9 Kedekedeo Alma sohte ese duwen irail; ahpw mie soun kadehde tohto me uhwong irail; ei, aramas akan kesihnenda oh kadehdehda duwen arail wiewia suwed tohto.

10 Soangen irair wet saikinte wiawi nan mwomwohdiso; eri e kapwunodehda palingenen Alma, eri, e ahpw kahluwa irail en pakahrlahng mwohn nanmwarkio.

11 Oh e ahpw patohwanohng nanmwarkio: Kilang, iet irail akan me se patohwando rehmwi, me riarail akan kedipairaildahr; ei, oh irail wiahdahr soangsoangen dihp tohto. Oh irail sohte koluhkihla diparail kan; eri se patohwaniraildo mwohmwi, pwe komwi en kadeik irail nin duwen diparail akan.

12 Ahpw nanmwarki Mosaia mahsanihong Alma: Kilang, I sohte pahn kadeik irail; ahpw I patohwanohng irail pahn omw manaman pwe ke en kadeikirailda.

13 Oh met pwurehng kapwunodehda palingenen Alma; oh e patohla oh peki rehn Kauno dahme e pahn wiahiong kahpwal wet, pwe e perki e de wiahda me sapwung mwohn silangin Koht.

14 Kedekedeo mwurin eh kasalehiong Koht sang ni palingeni unsek, kepitien Kauno ahpw peidohng ih, mahsanih:

15 Meid pai kowe, Alma, oh meid pai irail akan me papidaislahr nan pihl en Mormon. Meid pai kowe pwehki omw pwoson mehlel mahsen akan en nei ladu Apinadai.

16 Oh meid pai irail pwehki arail pwoson mehlel mahsen akan me ke padahkihong irail.

17 Oh meid pai kowe pwehki omw koasoanehdi mwomwohdiso ehu rehn aramas pwukat; oh re pahn soandi, oh re pahn wiahla nei aramas.

18 Ei, meid pai aramas pwukat me pein nsenki alehda mwarei; pwe irail pahn kin adanikihla mwareiet; oh ieiirail nei aramas.

19 Oh pwehki omw peki rehi duwen me dipan akan, meid pai kowe.

20 Ke wia nei ladu men; oh I inoukihong uhk me ke pahn alehdi mour soutuk; oh ke pahn papah ie oh kohwei ni mwarei, oh pahn kihpene nei sihpw kan.

21 Oh mehmen me pahn rong ngileiet pahn wiahla nei sihpw; oh ih me ke pahn alehda nan ei mwomwohdiso, oh ih me I pahn pil alehda.

22 Pwe kilang, ei mwomwohdiso met; mehmen me pahn papidaisla en papidaisla pwehn kasalehda eh koluhla. Oh mehmen me ke pahn alehda pahn kamehlele mwarei; oh ih me I pahn mahkohng ni saledek.

23 Pwehki iei ngehi me pahn ale kalokepen dipen sampah; pwehki ngehi me kapikirailda; oh iei ngehi me pahn kamanahiong irail akan me kin kamehlele ie nan dewe ni pali mauni.

24 Pwe kilang, aramas pahn ekerkin irail mwarei; oh ma irail pahn ese ihs ngehi irail pahn kohdo, oh pahn ale dewerail ni palimauni kohkohlahte.

25 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ngihlen keriaun sowi pahn pepeuk, irail akan me sohte ese ie pahn kohdo oh kesihnenda mwohi.

26 Oh irail ahpw pahn ese me ngehi iei Kauno arail Koht, me ngehi iei arail Soundoar; ahpw irail sohte pahn poadoandoarla.

27 Oh ngehi ahpw pahn kasalehieng irail me I sohte ese irail; oh irail ahpw pahn kohkohla nan kisiniei soutuk me kaunopdahr ong tepilo oh nah tohnleng kan.

28 Eri I pahn ndaionguhk, me mehmen me sohte pahn rong ngilei, kumwail sohte pahn alehda nan ei mwomwohdiso, pwe I sohte pahn alehda ih ni imwin rahno.

29 Eri I pahn ndaionguhk, Kohwei; oh mehmen me pahn wiahda dihp ong ie, ih me ke pahn kadeingkihda dipe kan me e dipkidahr; oh ma e wehkada dipe kan mwohmw oh rehi, oh koluhla sang nan mohngiong mehlel, ih me ke pahn mahkohng, oh I pahn pil mahkohng ih.

30 Ei, oh ahnsou koaros me nei aramas akan pahn koluhla, I pahn mahkohng diparail kan me re wiahdahr ong ie.

31 Oh kumwail uhdahn pahn mahkpene nanpwungamwail; pwe kilang I pahn ndaiong kumwail, mehmen me sohte pahn mahkikihong mehn mpe sapwung kan me e wiahiong ahpw nda me e koluhla, e pahn pakadeingkihda dipe.

32 Met I ndaionguhk, Kohwei; oh mehmen me sohte pahn koluhkihla dipe kan e sohte pahn iang wadawadohng nei aramas akan; oh met pahn tepida wiawi sang met kohla.

33 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma rongehr mahsen pwukat e ahpw ntingihedi pwe en kak kolokol, oh pwe en kak kadeik aramas en mwomwohdiso nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

34 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw kohla oh kadeik irail akan me wiadahr wiewia suwed, nin duwen mahsen en Kauno.

35 Oh mehmen me koluhkihla dipe kan oh kansenohkihla, irail me e kilelehdi en wadawadohng aramas en mwomwohdiso;

36 Oh irail akan me sohte wehkada diparail akan oh koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan, iei irail me sohte kileldi en wadawadohng aramas en mwomwohdiso, oh adarail akan irihrsang wadawad en towe kan.

37 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw koasoanehdi koasoandi kan koaros nan mwomwohdiso; oh irail pwurehng tepida ahneki popohl oh pweida kowahlap nan koasoandi kan en mwomwohdiso, oh re kanakanaiehng kohwei mwohn Koht, oh re kasamwo oh papidaisihala aramas tohto.

38 Oh met, mepwukat koaros, Alma oh ienge tohn doadoahk kan me mih nan mwomwohdiso kin wia, weweid ni loalopwoat, padapadahngki mahsen en Koht nimekoaros, lokolongki soangsoangen kalokolok kan koaros, sang ni kailok en irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht.

39 Oh re kin kaweid riarail kan; oh emenemen irail alehdi kaweid sang ni mahsen en Koht, nin duwen dipe kan, de pwehki dipe kan me e wiadahr, oh Koht ketin mahsanihong irail me re uhdahnpahn poaden kapakap, oh wia ar kapingkalahnganki mehkoaros.
mosiah 27:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mosaia ketin keinapwihdi kaloke aramas oh koasoanehdi mour pahrek—Alma me pwulopwulo oh sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak pahmen song en kauwehla Mwomwohdiso—Tohnleng men pwarada oh mahsanihong irail en uhdisang arail wiewia suwed kan—Alma sohla kak lokaia—Aramas koaros anahne ipwsapahl pwe re en kak komourla—Alma oh sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak kan kalohki rongamwahuo. Ele Sounpar 100–92 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo mwekid en kalokolok kan me kin wiawihong mwomwohdiso sang irail akan me sohpwoson tepdahr ukla mehlel me kahrehkihong mwomwohdiso tepida kaulim, oh kaulimakihong arail kaun akan duwen kahpwalo; oh irail kaulimaki Alma. Alma ahpw patohwanla iren kahpwal wet mwohn nanmwarki Mosaia. Mosaia eri tuhkihong sapwellime samworo kan.

2 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Mosaia ahpw ketin kadarpeseng kalohk ehu nan sahpwo pwon duwen me sohpwoson kan en dehr kalokalokei irail akan me tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht.

3 Oh mie kosonned kehlail ehu nan mwomwohdiso kan koaros me keinapwihdi en dehr mie kalokolok nanpwungarail, ahpw aramas koaros en pahrekpene;

4 Irail sohte pahn mweidohng pohnmwahso de aklapalap en kauwehla arail popohl; koaros en kesempwaliki mehn mpe duwehte pein ih, koadoakoadoahke epwelpen pein ar anahn.

5 Ei, oh neirail samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan koaros pahn pein koadoahkehda epwelpen ar anahn, ni mehkoaros ihte ahnsou en soumwahu, de nan anahn laud; oh sang ni ar pahn kapwaiada mepwukat, irail pahn direkihla kalahngan en Koht.

6 Oh popohl laud ahpw pwurehng miehda nan sahpwo; oh aramas akan tepida tohtohla, oh tepida mwarahkpeseng pohn sampah, ei, paliepeng oh palieir, palimese oh palikapi, koukoudahn kahnimw laud kan oh kousapw akan nan sahpwo pwon.

7 Eri Kauno kin ieiang irail oh kin kapaiairailda, oh re wie tohtohla oh kepwehpwehla.

8 Oh met sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak kan kin patehng aramas sohpwoson kan; oh emen nein Alma pwutak pil kin patehng irail, e adaniki Alma, sang eden eh pahpao; ahpw, e wiahla emen aramas me kin pereniki wiewia suwed oh pwongih dikadiken eni. Oh kin kadek koasoi, oh kin wia koasoi en widinge aramas akan; ih eri kahluwa aramas tohto en idawehnla eh wiewia suwed kan.

9 Oh e wia kapwal laud ong kekeirdahn mwomwohdiso en Koht; pitipitihedi mohngiong en aramas akan; kahrehda akupwung nanpwungen aramas akan; met kahrehda imwintihtien Koht en kak doadoahngki eh manaman pohrail.

10 Oh met ni ahnsou me e kohkohseli pwe en kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht, pwe e kin kohseli ni rir, ih oh sapwellimen Mosaia pwutangko, kin songosong en kauwehla mwomwohdiso, oh kasalongehla sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan, ni mwohmw ehu me kin uhwong sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, de pil nanmwarkio—

11 Oh nin duwen ei ndaiong kumwailehr, ni arail wie kohkohseli pwehn kahngohdiong doadoahk en Koht, kilang, tohnleng en Kauno men pwarohng irail; oh e mwomwen ketidihdo sang nan depwek; oh eh mahsen duwehte ngihl en nansapwe, me kahrehiong nan pwehlo, wasa me re keskesihnen ie, rerada;

12 Oh uwen arail pwuriamwei laud, irail pwupwudi nan pwehlo, oh sohte wehwehki mahsen kan me e mahsanih ong irail.

13 Ahpw e pwurehng likwer, mahsanih: Alma, pwourda oh kesihnenda, dahme ke kalokalokehki mwomwohdisohn Koht? Pwe Kauno ketin mahsanih: Ei mwomwohdiso met, oh I pahn kauwada; oh sohte mehkot pahn kesehdi, ihte wiewia suwed en nei aramas akan.

14 Oh tohnlengo ahpw pwurehng mahsanih: Kilang, Kauno ketin karongehier kapakap en sapwellime aramas akan, oh pil kapakap en sapwellime ladu, Alma, omw pahpa; pwe sang ni eh pwoson laud, e wie kapakapki pwe ke en kak esehda me mehlelo; eri, pwehki kahrepe wet me I kohkihdo pwe I en kasalehionguhk manaman oh mweimwei en Koht, pwe kapakap en sapwellime ladu kanen pweida pwehki arail pwoson.

15 Oh met kilang, kumwail kak pelian manaman en Koht? Pwe kilang, ngileiet soh itikada sampah? Oh pil kumwail soh kak kilang ie mwohmwail? Oh I pekederdo sang rehn Koht.

16 Met I ndaiong uhk: Kohwei, oh tamataman kaliduhlahn ahmw pahpa ko nan sahpw en Ihlem, oh nan sahpw en Nihpai; oh tamataman sapwellime kalahngan lap akan me e ketin wiahiong irailehr; pwe irail wie sensel, oh e ketin kapitirailla. Oh met I ndaiong uhk, Alma, kohkohweisang met, oh dehr rapahki ke en kauwehla mwomwohdiso, pwe arail kapakap akan en pasapengla, oh met iei ma ke sohte men omw mour en lekidekila.

17 Eri, kedekedeo ih kaimwseklahn dahme tohnlengo mahsanihong Alma, ih ahpw ketin mweselda.

18 Oh met Alma oh me ienge ko ahpw pwurehng pwupwudiong nan pwel, pwehki arail pwuriamwei kowahlap; pwehki arail kilangkihda tohnleng en Kauno pein meserail kan; oh kepitie duwehte ngilen nansapwe, me itikada nan pwehl; oh irail ese me sohte ehu mehkot likin manaman en Koht me kak itikada pwehl oh wiahiong en rerrer ni mwomwen me e pahn pwalpeseng.
