19 Oh met uwen en Alma eh pwuriamweila e lohtengala kowahlap e aupwonkihla, kahrehda e sohte kak kihpeseng ewe; iei, oh e luwetkihla, kahrehda e sohte kak kamwakid peh kan; eri irail akan me iangih ale ih, oh wahda ni eh sohte kak wia mehkot, lao e lella mwohn eh pahpa.

20 Ienge ko eri koasoaiahiong eh pahpao mehkoaros dahme wiawihong irail; oh eh pahpao perenda, pwehki e ese me iei manaman en Koht met.

21 Oh e ahpw kapokonepene pokon ehu pwe irail en kak kadehde dahme Kauno ketin wiahiongehr nah pwutako, oh ienge ko me mih reh ahnsouo.

22 Oh e kupwurehda samworo kan irail en patohpene; oh eri irail tepida kaisihsol, oh kapakap ong Kauno arail Koht en lapwahda ewen Alma, pwe en kak koasoi, oh pwe peh oh neh kan en kak kehlailda—pwe aramas akan en kak kilang oh ese kalahngan oh lingan en Koht.

23 Kedekedeo mwurin arail kaisihsol oh kapakapki erein rahn riau oh pwohng riapwohng, pehn Alma oh nehkan ahpw kehlailda, oh e kesihnenda oh tepida koasoi ong irail, ndindahiong irail en ahneki popohl:

24 Pwe, e nda, I koluhkilahr dipei kan, oh pitikilahr komour en Kauno; kilang I ipwikiher Ngehno.

25 Oh Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie: Ke dehr pwuriamweiki me aramas koaros, ei, ohl oh lih akan, wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros oh sahpw koaros, pahn anahne pwurehng ipwsapahl; ei, ipwisang rehn Koht, wekideksang arail mour en sampah oh mour pwupwula, kolahng mour pwung, poadoandoarkihla Koht, wiahla sapwellime pwutak oh serepein kei;

26 Oh irail wialahr aramas kapw kei; oh ma re sohte pahn wia met, irail sohte kak sohsohki wehin Koht.

27 Oh I ndaiong uhk, ma met sohte pahn wiawi, irail pahn lekdekila; oh met I ese, pwe kereniong I pahn lekdekila.

28 Ahpw, mwurin lokolok laud me lelohng ie, I koluhla ni ei kereniong mehla, Kauno sang ni sapwellime kalahngan, ketin mahsanihada me konehng en kapitiesang nan kisiniei me kin kamwakamwasik wasa kohkohlahte, oh ngehi ipwisangehr rehn Koht.

29 Palingeniet komourlahr sang nan kalokolok en pahtou mehlel oh selidi en dihp. I mih nan wasa keieu rotorot; ahpw met I kilangehr marain en Koht kapwuriamwei. Palingeniet lokolongki kalokolok soutuk; ahpw I pitila, oh palingeni sohla medek.

30 I kasohwe ei Sounkomouro, oh pohnsese dahme atail pahpa ko koasoiadahr; ahpw met pwe irail en kak kilang me e pahn kohdo, oh me e ketin tamataman soahng koaros me e ketin kapikadahr, e pahn ketin kasalehiong aramas koaros pein ih.

31 Ei, aramas koaros pahn kelepwikihdi, oh loh koaros pahn kadehdehda mwowe. Iei, ni imwin rahno, ahnsou me aramas koaros pahn kesihnen pwe re en pakadeikda reh, irail ahpw pahn kadehdehda me iei ih Koht; eri irail me sohte kin momouriki ieias en Koht nan sampah, ahpw pahn kadehdehda me kopwung en kalokolok soutuko e pwungohng irail; oh irail pahn mwekidada, oh rerrer, oh roingkipene mwohn sihlangihr me kin ireirong-wasa koaros.

32 Oh met sangete ni ahnsouo kohla Alma tapiada kin wie padapadahki aramas akan, oh irail akan me iangih Alma ni ahnsou me tohnlengo pwarohng irail, seiseiloakseli nan sahpwo pwon, kalkalohkihong aramas koaros soahng kan me irail rongehr oh kilangehr, oh kalkalohngki mahsen en Koht nan kahpwal laud, pwehki arail kalokolok laud sang rehn me sohpwoson kan, oh pwehki tohto me sohpwoson kan kin kamedekeirailla.

33 Ahpw mehndahte mepwukat koaros, irail kin koaloalamwahuih mwomwohdiso, kakehlaka arail pwoson, oh koangkoangoangehkin irail kanengamah nan lokolok oh nannanti kapwaiada kosonned en Koht.

34 Oh pahmen irail iei sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak; oh adarail akan iei Amon, oh Aron, oh Omner, oh Imnai; ih eden sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak kan.

35 Oh irail kohseli wasa koaros nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh rehn aramas koaros me mih pahn manaman en nanmwarki Mosaia, kin loalenohng ar nanantihong kamwahuiala sapwung kan koaros me irail wiahdahr ong mwomwohdiso, wehkada diparail akan koaros, oh kapakapahrengki soahng koaros me irail kilangehr, oh kawekawehwehda kokohp akan oh pwuhk sarawi kan ong irail koaros me men rong.

36 Oh met irail wia wiliepen nin limen Koht pwehn wadohng [aramas] tohto nan marain en me mehlelo, ei, marain en arail Soundoaro.

37 Oh meid pai irail! Pwe irail kalohki popohl; irail wahdo rongamwahu; oh irail kalohkihongehr aramas akan me Kauno me iei nanmwarki.
mosiah 28:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak ko kohla kalohk ong Mehn Leimen kan—Mosaia ketin doahdoahngki takai sarawi riau oh kawehwehdi pileit en Mehn Sared kan. Ele Sounpar 92 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met kedekedeo mwurin sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak ko ar wiahier mepwukat koaros, irail kahrehda ekei oh pwurala rehn samarail nanmwarkio, oh peki reh ma e kak kamanahieng irail, iangahki me re pilada kan, en kak kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai pwe re en kak kalohki soahng kan me re rongehr, oh pwe re en kak padahkihong riarail Mehn Leimen kan, mahsen en Koht—

2 Pwe re en kak wahlahng irail marain en Kauno arail Koht, oh kawekirailla duwen dipen arail pahpa ko; oh ele mwein re pahn kak kamwahuiala arail kin kailongki Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe irail en pil kak iang pereperenki Kauno arail Koht, pwe re en kak kadekpene nanpwungarail, oh pwe en kak sohla mie pingiping nan sahpwo me Kauno arail Koht ketikihong irail.

3 Met irail inangih me padahk en komourla pahn kalohkohng aramas koaros, pwe irail sohte kak medewehiong mweidala ngenen aramas emen en mehla; iei, medemedewe me ngehn emen pahn wie lokolongki kalokolok kohkohlahte kahrehda arail mwekidida oh rerada.

4 Iei met me Ngehn en Kauno kapehmihkin irail, pwe irail wia uhdahn aramas dipan ekei. Oh Kauno sang ni sapwellime kupwurkalahngan poatopoat e ketin mwahngih me e konehng doareirailla; ahpw irail lokolongki pwunod kowahlap pwehki diparail kan, lokolok laud oh masak pwe irail de lekdekla kohkohlahte.

5 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pekipeki rehn arail pahpa erein rahn ekei pwe irail en kak kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai.

6 Oh nanmwarki Mosaia ahpw ketla oh peki rehn Kauno ma e pahn konehng en mweidohng sapwellime pwutak kan en kohdahla rehn Mehn Leimen kan oh kalohki mahseno.

7 Oh Kauno ahpw ketin mahsanihong Mosaia: Mweidohng irail en kohdahla, pwe tohto me pahn kamehlele arail padahk kan, oh irail pahn alehdi mour soutuk; oh I pahn doarehsang noumw pwutak kan sang pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan.

8 Kedekedeo Mosaia ahpw kapwaiong nsenarail en kohla oh wia nin duwen dahme irail peki.

9 Oh irail ahpw doula nan arail seiloak kohla nan sapwtehno pwe re en kohdala kalohki mahseno rehn Mehn Leimen kan; oh I pahn wiahda poadoapen arail wiewia kan mwurin met.

10 Eri met solahr me nanmwarki Mosaia pahn ketikihong manaman en kaunda wehio, pwe sohte emen sapwellime pwutak ko men ale pwukoa en kaunda wehio.

11 Eri e ale poadopoad kan me ntingdi pohn pileit en prahs kan, oh pil pileit en Nihpai kan, oh mehkoaros me e kolokol oh nekinekid nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, mwurin eh ketin kawehwehdi oh kupwurehda en ntingihedi poadopoad akan me ntingdi pohn pileit en kohl me sapwellimen Limai aramas akan diarada, me pein Limai wahdohng reh;

12 Oh met e ketin wia pwehki ineng laud me sapwellime aramas tungoalenki; pwe irail inangih kehlail en esehda duwen aramas akan me kamakamalahr.

13 Oh met e kawehwehdi sang ni eh doadoahngki takai riau me katengepene ni dipwisou en iroir ehu.

14 Met mepwukat kaunopdahr sangete ni tapio, oh kadakadaur kohdo sang ehu dih lel ehu dih, pwe en doadoahk ong kawehwehdi lokaia kan;

15 Oh mepwukat wie nekinek oh kadakadaur kohdo sang nin limen Kauno, pwe en kak kadierekada ong aramas koaros me pahn sapwaniki sahpwet duwen wiewia suwed oh mour suwed en sapwellime aramas akan;

16 Oh mehmen me kolokol mepwukat e kin kahdaniki ohl sarawi, nin duwen koasoandi en mahs oko.

17 Met mwurinte Mosaia e kawehwehdier poadopoad pwukat, kilang, e kasalehda soiepen aramas akan me kamwomwalahr, sang ni ahnsou me irail kamwomwala pwuralahng ahnsou me doulik lapalapo wie kokouda, ni ahnsou me Kauno ketin wekidala en aramas akan ar lokaia oh kamarakirailpeseng pohn sampah, iei, oh sang ni ahnsouo kohla lao lel ni kepikipikdahn Adam.

18 Met, poadopoad wet kahrehda sapwellimen Mosaia aramas akan ar mwahieiki mehlel, ei, irail pahtoukihla; ahpw e pil kamarainihrailda laud, me kahrehda arail peren.

19 Oh poadopoad wet pahn ntingdi mwuhr; pwe kilang, e konehng aramas koaros pahn ese duwen soahng kan me ntingdi nan poadopoad wet.

20 Oh met, nin duwen ei ndaiong kumwail, me mwurin nanmwarki Mosaia e ketin wiahier mepwukat koaros, e ale pileit en prahs kan, oh mehkoaros me e wie nekinekid, oh ketikihong Alma, me wia nein Alma; ei, poadopoad koaros, oh e pil ketkihong mehn kawehwe ko, oh kehkehlingkihong me e pahn kolokol oh nekinekid dipwisou pwukat, oh pil ntintingih poadopoad en aramas akan, oh kadakadaur sang ehu dih kohlahng ehu dih, duwehte ar kadakadaur kohdo sang ni ahnsou me Lihai mwesel sang Serusalem.
mosiah 29:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mosaia kamwomwadahr sounkopwung kan en pilipilda oh wiliandi nanmwarki—Nanmwarki suwed kin kahluwahla sapwellime aramas nan dihp—Aramas akan pilada Alma me pwulopwulo en wiahla sounkopwung lapalap—E pil wia samworo lapalap nan mwomwohdiso—Alma me laudo oh Mosaia kepinsalehdala. Ele Sounpar 92–91 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri ahnsou me Mosaia ketin koasoanehdier koasandi wet, e ahpw ketin kadarpeseng [pakair ehu] wasa koaros nan sahpwo, ong aramas koaros, pwe en ketin mwahngihada duwen arail pepehm ong ihs me pahn wia arail nanmwarki.

2 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw ehupene, patpatohwan: Se men sapwellimomwipwutak Aron en wiahla aht nanmwarki oh aht kaun.

3 Ahpw Aron samwadalahr nan sahpw en Nihpai, eri nanmwarkio sohte kak ketikihong manaman en kaunda wehio; oh pil Aron sohte men ale pwukoahn kaunda wehi; oh pil emen emen sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak ko sohte inangih ale pwukoahn kaunda wehi.

4 Eri nanmwarki Mosaia pwurehng ketin kadarpeseng kalohk ehu rehn aramas akan; iei, e kadarewei kisin likou ehu rehn aramas akan. Oh iet mahsen akan me ntingdi, ketihtihki:

5 Kilang, kumwail nei aramas akan, de kempoakepahi kan, pwe I wiahkin kumwail riei, I inangih kumwail en medemedewe koasoandi wet me I men peki rehmwail—pwe kumwail men ahneki nanmwarki.

6 Met I men pakairkihong kumwail me aramas meno me uhdahn ahneki pwung en kaunda wehiet soikalahr, oh e sohte men alehda pwukoahn wehio.

7 Oh met ma mie emen tohrohr me pahn idihdida pwe en wiliandi, kilang, I periki pingiping de pwarada nanpwungamwail. Ele mwein nei pwutako, me ahneki pwuhng en kaunda wehiet, pahn nsensuwedkihla oh kahluwahsang apali aramas pwukat, me pahn uhd kahrehda mahwen oh pingiping nanpwungamwail, me pahn kahrehda kamaramas oh kasapwungehla koasoandi en Kauno, ei, oh kamwomwala palingenen aramas tohto.

8 Met I ndaiong kumwail kitail en doadoahngki madamadau loalokong oh medemedewe mepwukat, pwe kitail sohte ahneki pwuhng en kauwehla nei pwutako, de pil ahneki pwuhng en kauwehla emen ma e pahn weliandi ih.

9 Oh ma nei pwutako pahnpwuralahng eh mour pohnmwahso oh aklapalap e pahn kapwure dahme e ndahier, oh alehda eh repenpwung en kaunda wehiet, me pahn kahrehda ih oh pil nah aramas akan en wiahda dihp laud.

10 Oh met kitail kiheng kitail en doadoahngki madamadau loalokong oh kasikasik mepwukat, oh wiahda koasoandi mwahume pahn kahrehiong aramas pwukat en soanamwahu.

11 Eri I pahn wia amwail nanmwarki lao imwin ei mour; ahpw, kitail pilada sounkopwung kei, pwe re en kapwung aramas pwukat nin duwen atail kosonned; oh kitail pahn wiahda ehu koasoandi kapw ong aramas akan, pwe kitail pahn idihada ohl loalokong kan re en wia sounkopwung, me pahn kapwung aramas pwukat nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

12 Met, e kin mwahu ma aramas men pahn kin pakadeikda rehn Koht sang pakadeikda rehn aramas, pwe sapwellimen Koht kadeik kan me kin pwung ahnsou koaros, ahpw en aramas kadeik kan sohte kin pwung ahnsou koaros.

13 Eri, ma ohl pwung kan kak wia amwail nanmwarki kan, me pahn kin padokada kosonned kan en Koht, oh kadeik aramas pwukat nin duwen sapwellime kosonned akan, ei, ma ohl me pahn wia amwail nanmwarki kak wia duwen me semei, Pensamin ketin wiahiong aramas pwukat—I pahn ndaiong kumwail, ma met kak wiawi ahnsou koaros, eri e pahn mwahu ong kumwail en mie amwail nanmwarki ahnsou koaros me pahn kakaun kumwail.

14 Oh ngehi pil doadoahk sang ni pein ei manaman oh kehlail koaros, pwe I en padahkihong kumwail sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh koasoanehdi popohl nan sahpwet pwon, pwe en dehr mie mahwen de pingiping, sohte pirap, de adihasang en aramas ar dipwisou, de kamaramas, de pil soangen wiewia suwed teikan;

15 Oh mehmen me pahn wiahda dihp, ih me I kalokehki eh wiewia suwedo me e wiahdahr, nin duwen kosonned me kohieng kitail sang atail pahpa kahlap ako.

16 Met I ndaiong kumwail, pwehki kaidehn aramas koaros kin pwung e sohte mwahu ong kumwail en ahneki emen nanmwarki de nanmwarki kei en kaunkumwailda.

17 Pwe kilang, ia uwen wiewia suwed me emen nanmwarki suwed kak wiahda, ei, oh ia uwen laud en kamwomwomwla pahn wiawi!

18 Ei, tamataman nanmwarki Noha, eh wiewia suwed oh eh mour suwed, oh pil weiwia suwed oh mour suwed en sapwellime aramas akan. Kilang ia uwen laud en kamwomwomwla me wiawihong irail; oh pil pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan kahrehiong irail en lohdiong nan mouren lidu.

19 Oh ma sohte sawas en arail Sounkepikipik me kupwurokong-unseko, oh met pwehki arail koluhla mehlel, irail uhdahn pahn lohdihte nan mouren lidu lao lel ahnsou wet.

20 Ahpw kilang, e ketin kapitirailla pwehki arail karakarahkala mwowe; oh pwehki arail pekipek kehlail reh en ketin kapitirailsang nan mouren lidu; eri Kauno kin ketin doadoahngki sapwellime manaman nan irair koaros rehn aramas akan, oh e kin ketin kupwurkalahngan ong irail akan me kin koapworopworki ih.

21 Oh kilang, met I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail sohte kak kasapwildi nanmwarki suwed menihte sang ni uhpene laud, oh kakerehdi nta laud.

22 Pwe kilang, e pahn mie kompoakepah me suwed kan, oh silepe kan pahn ieiang ih ahnsou koaros; oh e pahn kauwehla kosonned kan me koasoandier sang irail akan me kaun mwahu mwowe; oh e pahn tiakpeseng sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan;

23 Oh e pahn kin wiahda kosonned kan, oh kadarohng aramas akan, ei, kosonned akan me pahrekiong eh wiewia suwed kan; oh mehmen me sohte pahn kin kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akanpahn kamakamala; mehmen me pahn kahngohdiong ih e pahn kadarohng sapwellime sounpei kan re en mahweniong, oh ma ekak pweida e pahn kemeirailla; oh met ih duwen nanmwarki suwed kin kasapwungehla koasoandi pwung kan koaros.

24 Oh met kilang I nadaiong kumwail, e sohte konehng soangen mour suwed wet en kohdohng kumwail.

25 Eri, kumwail pilada sang ni pilipil en aramas pwukat, sounkopwung kan, pwe kumwail en kak pakadeikda nin duwen kosonned akan me kohieng kumwailehr sang atail pahpa kahlap ako, me pwung, oh me kohieng irail sang nin limen Kauno.

26 Met e sohte kin kalapw wiawi me pali moron en aramas akan kin pilada mehkot me uhwong dahme mwahu; ahpw e kin kalapw wiawi me ekei aramas kin pilada me sapwung; eri met kumwail en kapwaiada oh wiahiong en wia amwail koasoandi—en koasoanehdi nin duwen pilipil en aramas akan.

27 Oh ma ahnsou pahn leledo me aramas akan pahn pilada me suwed, eri iei ahnsou meKoht pahn ketin kadeingkumwailda; ei, eri iei ih ahnsou me e pahn ketin ahngiahngihkin kumwail kamwomwomwla laud ehu duwehte me eh ketin wiahier nan sahpwet.

28 Oh met ma mie amwail sounkopwung kan, oh irail sohte kadeik kumwail nin duwen kosonned me kohieng kumwailehr, kumwail kak wiahiong re en pakadeikda rehn sounkopwung lapalap.

29 Ma amwail sounkopwung lapalap akan sohte pahn wia kadeik pwung, kumwail pahn wiahda me ekei sounkopwung titikit kan pahn kohpene, oh irail pahn kadeik sounkopwung lapalap akan, nin duwen pilipil en aramas akan.

30 Oh I kehkehlingkihong kumwail en wia mepwukat koaros ni amwail lemwiki Kauno; oh I kehkehlingkihong kumwail en wia mepwukat, oh en dehpa ahneki nanmwarki; pwe ma aramas pwukat pahn wiahda dihp oh wiewia suwed kan irail pahn pein pwukoaki diparail akan.

31 Pwe kilang I ndaiong kumwail, dipen aramas tohto tepisang ni wiewia suwed en arail nanmwarki kan; eri arail nanmwarki kan pahnpwukoahkihdi arail wiewia suwed akan.

32 Oh met I kin men koasoandi sapahrek wet en sohrasang nan sahpw wet, ahpw mehlel rehn nei aramas akan; ahpw I pwungki me sahpw wet en wia sahpw en mour saledek ehu, oh aramas koaros en kak perenki ar pwuhng kan oh kapai kan ni soangen pahrekteieu, ma Kauno ketin kupwuriki kitail en momour oh sohsohki sahpwet, iei, erein ahnsou me kadaudoketail kan pahn mihmihte sahpwet.

33 Oh pil soahng tohto me nanmwarki Mosaia ntingihda ong irail, kaskasalehiong irail soangen kasongosong oh kahpwal akan koaros en nanmwarki pwung men, ei, lokolok koaros en palingehne pwehki neirail aramas akan, oh pil en aramas akan kaulim kan ong arail nanmwarki; oh e kawehwehiong irail mehkoaros.

34 Oh e padahkihong irail me mepwukat sohte konehng; ahpw me aramas koaros pahn sawaskipene wisik toutou, pwe emen emen aramas en pwukoaki eh pali.

35 Oh e pil kawehwehiong irail duwen kahpwal kan koaros me re pahn mihla pah mananmwarki suwed men pahn kakaun irail;

36 Ei, eh wiewia suwed kan oh mour suwed kan koaros, oh mahwen kan, oh pingiping kan, oh kamaramas, oh pirap, oh adihasang en aramas ar dipwisou kan, oh mouren nenek, oh wiepen wiewia suwed kan koaros me sohte kak wadawadda—e ketin padapadahkihong irail me mepwukat sohte mwahu, oh me re uhwong douluhl kosonned en Koht.

37 Kedekedeo, mwurin nanmwarki Mosaia e ketin kadarpesengehr mepwukat rehn aramas akan, irail ahpw kamehlele me sapwellime mahsen akan mehlel.

38 Eri irail sohla pwungki en mie arail nanmwarki, oh kasik mehlel me aramas koaros pahn ahneki mour pahrek wasa koaros nan sahpwo; ei, oh aramas koaros kasalehda arail mwahuki en pein pwukoaki pein diparail akan.

39 Eri, kedekedeo irail ahpw kapokonepene wiahda pokon kei nan sahpwo, pwe re en pilada ihs me pahn wia arail sounkopwung kan, me pahn kapwung irail nin duwen kosonned me kohieng irailehr; oh irail perenda kowahlap pwehki saledek me kamanamanlahr ong irail.

40 Oh re poakepoake mehlel Mosaia; ei, irail kin kesempwaliki ih laudsang aramas teikan; pwe irail sohte kin wiahki ih kaun lemei men me songosong en kepwehpwehla, ei, pwe mwohnio me kin kauwehla palingehn; pwe e sohte kin noahroake arail dipwisou kan, de pil perenki kakerehdi nta; ahpw e wiahda popohl nan sahpwo, oh kamanahiong aramas koaros irail pahn maiaudahsang soangen mouren lidu koaros; eri irail kin kesempwaliki kouwahlap, ei, laud mehlel.

41 Kedekedeo irail pilada sounkopwung kei en kaunirailda, de en kin kapwung irail nin duwen kosonnedo; oh met me irail wia nan sahpwo pwon.

42 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw pilipilda en wia tepin sounkopwung lapalap, ni eh pil wia samworo lapalap, pwehki ah pahpao me kasapwiladahng ih nan eh pwukoa, oh kihong ih en kohwahki doadoahk kan koaros nan mwomwohdiso.

43 Oh kedekedeo Alma ahpw kin weweidki sapwellimen Kauno ahl akan, oh e kin kapwaiada sawepwellime kosonned akan, oh e kin kapwung ni kadeik pwung; oh mie popohl nan sahpwo.

44 Oh met tapiadahr mwein sounkopwung kan nan sahpw en Saraemla pwon rehn aramas akan koaros me kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai kan; oh Alma me tepin wia sounkopwung lapalap.

45 Oh kedekedeo ah pahpao ahpw kepinlsalehdala, ni ah lel sounpar welihsek riau, ni eh kapwaiadahr sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ni e momour.

46 Kedekedeo Mosaia ahpw pil pwoula, ni eh kakaunkier sounpar silihsek siluh, nan sounpar weneisek siluh; oh e lelehr sounpar limepwiki duwau sang ni ahnsou me Lihai mwesel sang Serusalem.

47 Oh met kaimwiseklahr mwein nanmwarki ong aramas en Nihpai kan; oh met kaimwiseklahr mwehin Alma, me tapiada arail mwomwohdiso.
alma 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Alma Nein Alma Pwutak[/font_size][/center]

Soiepen Alma, me wia nein Alma pwutak, me wia tepin sounkopwung lapalap ong aramas en Nihpai kan, oh pil wia samworo lapalap ong Mwomwohdiso. Soiepen mwein sounkopwung kan, oh mwahwin kan oh pingiping kan rehn aramas akan. Oh pil soiepen mahwin kan nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan, nin duwen poadoapoad en Alma, me wia tepin sounkopwung lapalap.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihor padahngki padahk likamw kan, wiahda ehu mwomwohdiso, tapiada prihskrap [Tepin kalohk en widinge aramas akan en kak alepweipweiki eh pwarada], oh kemehla Kidion—Nihor kamakamkihla dipe kan—Doadoahk en prihskrap kan oh kehnaudok doupesengehr rehn aramas akan—Samworo kan kin pein kamakamour pein irail, aramas akan sewese me semwehmwe kan, oh Mwomwohdiso kekeirda. Ele Sounpar 91–88 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo ni tepin pahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, sang ahnsouo kohla, nanmwarki Mosaia eh pwoulahr, oh e ketin wiahier uwen eh kak nan mour wet, oh e ketin weweidki mour pwung mwohn Koht, oh e sohte mweidohng emen en weliandi nan dewe; ahpw e ketin wiahda kosonned kei, oh aramas akan pwungki; eri irail inengieng momouriki kosonned kan me e ketin wiahda.

2 Kedekedeo ni tepin pahr en mwehin Alma nan eh wia sounkopwungo, mie ohl emen me wisikdohng reh pwe en pakadeikda, ohl men me paliwar lapala, oh e sansal me e wia ohl kehlail men.

3 Oh e kohseliher rehn aramas akan, kalokalohkihong irail dahme e kin kosekose me iei mahsen en Koht, oh kin pelipelian mwomwohdiso; kalokalohkihong aramas akan me samworo oh sounpadahk koaros anahne ndahndla; oh irail sohte konehng koadoahke pein arail mour, ahpw aramas akan me anahne sewese apwalih arail anahn.

4 Oh e pil kadehdehiong aramas akan me aramas koaros pahn komourla ni imwin rahno, oh me irail sohte anahne masak de rerrerki, ahpw irail en sarada oh perenda; pwe Kauno ketin kapikada aramas koaros, oh pil pahn komourala aramas koaros; oh, ni imwio, aramas koaros pahn alehdi mour soutuk.

5 Kedekedeo e ahpw kin kapwukapwurehiong padahngki mepwukat kahrehda tohto me kamehlele eh koasoai kan, iei uwen tohto kahrehda irail tepida utungada ih oh kihong mwohni.

6 Oh e ahpw tepida pohnmwahsohda nan eh mohngiong, oh likawih likou pweilaud, ei, oh tepida wiahda mwomwohdiso nin duwen dahme e kin padahngki.

7 Kedekedeo ni e wie kohkohlang kalohk ong irail akan me kin kamehlele eh padahk, e ahpw tuhwongdi ohl emen me tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht, iei, emen arail sounpadahk ko; oh e tepida akamaiong ih, pwe en kak kahluwahsang aramas en mwomwohdiso; ahpw ohlo pelianda, kapwungkihong mahsen en Koht akan.

8 Met eden ohlo iei Kidion; oh iei ih me wia weliepen nin limen Koht ong kahluwahsang aramas en Limai kan sang nan kalidu.

9 Eri, pwehki en Kidion e pelianki mahsen akan en Koht, e lingeringerida pahn Kidion, oh usada nah kedlahso oh tepida pele ih. Met pwehki Kidion eh likeilapalahr oh luwetilahr, e sohte kak pelian ah palapal ko, eri e ahpw mehkihla kedlahs.

10 Oh aramas en mwomwohdiso koledi ohl me kemehlao, oh wahla rehn Alma, pwe en pakadeingkihda dihp me e wiadahro.

11 Kedekedeo e ahpw uh mwohn Alma oh akupwungki pein ih ni eimah.

12 Ahpw Alma mahsanihong ih: Kilang, met iei tepin prihskrap e pwarada rehn aramas pwukat. Oh kilang, ke sohte dipanikihte prihskrap, ahpw ke pil song en kamanahkihla noumw kedlahs; oh ma prihskrap pahn kamanamanla rehn aramas pwukat e pahn kahrehda arail pahn kamwomwomwla douluhl.

13 Oh ke pil kakerehdi ntahn aramas pwung men, ei, ohl emen me wiadahr doadoahk mwahu me inenen laud rehn aramas akan; oh ma se pahn doareiukala kiht me pahn uhd alehkihdi kalokepen eh mehla.

14 Eri ke uhdahn pahn kamakamala, nin duwen kosonned me kohieng kitail sang Mosaia, kaimwiseklahn atail nanmwarkio; oh aramas pwukat wehwehki; eri aramas pwukat uhdahn pahn kapwaiada kosonnedo.

15 Kedekedeo irail ahpw koledi ohlo; oh ede iei Nior; oh wahdahla pohn kumwen dohl Mandai, oh wasao me re wiahiong, de e kasalehda, mwohn nanleng oh sampah, me dahme e padahkihong aramas akan uhwong mahsen en Koht; oh wasao e lokolongki mehla kanamenek.

16 Ahpw, met sohte kauhdi doupeseng en prihskrap nan sahpwo; pwe tohto me poakehng soang kan me mwahl en sampah, oh irail kohwei padapadahngki padahk likamw akan; oh met irail wia pwe irail en kepwehpwehla oh aramas en kepingairail.

17 Ahpw, irail sohte kak likamw, ma e pahn sansal, pwehki irail masak kosonnedo, pwe me likamw akan pahn kalokolok; eri irail kin mwomwehda me re kalohki mehkot me re kamehlele; oh pwe kosonnedo sohte kin ahneki manaman ong dahme aramas emen kamehlele.

18 Oh irail sohte kak pirap, pwe re masak kosonnedo, pwehki soahngen mwekido kin ale kalokpe; irail pil sohte men kulih, de pil kamaramas, pwe mehmen me pahn kamaramas e pahn kamakamkihla.

19 Ahpw kedekedeo mehmen me sohte iang mwomwohdiso en Koht tepida kaloke irail akan me iangala tohn mwomwohdisohn Koht, oh me kin alehda mwaren Krais.

20 Ei, re kalokalokei irail, oh re wiahiong kapweikeng tohto, oh met pwehki arail kin mpai; pwehki arail sohte kin pohnmwahso nan masarail akan, oh pwehki arail kin ehukipene mahsen en Koht nanpwungarail, ni sohte isais de mwohni.

21 Eri mie kosonned kehlail ehu rehn aramas en nan mwomwohdiso, me koasonehdi me sohte aramas emen me towe mwomwohdiso pahn mas ilehda oh kaloke irail akan me sohte towe mwomwohdiso, oh sohte uhpene pahn kin wiawi nanpwungarail.

22 Ahpw, tohtohla nanpwungerail me tepida pohnmwahsohda, oh tepida akamaiong arail imwintihtih kan, lao re peipene; ei, irail kin pakerpene nanpwungarail.

23 Met iei keriau en pahr en mwehin Alma, oh e kahrehda kahpwal laud ong mwomwohdiso; mehlel, e kahrehda apwal mwuledek en kohieng mwomwohdiso.

24 Pwe me tohto keptakailahr, oh adarail kan irihrsang nan mwomwohdiso, pwe irail sohla iang wadawadohng sapwillimen Koht aramas akan. Oh tohto me pil pein pwilikihdi oh pedoisang irail.

25 Met e wia songosong laud ong irail akan me kehlail nan ar lamalam; ahpw, irail tengedi oh sohte mwekid sang kapwakapwaiada kosonned en Koht, oh irail kanekanengamahiong lokolok me aramas kalokehkin irail.

26 Oh ni ahnsou me samworo kan kin uhdisang arail doadoahk pwe re en kalohki mahsen en Koht ong aramas akan, aramas akan pil kin uhdisang arail doadoahk pwe re en rong mahsen en Koht. Oh ahnsou me samworo kin kanekehla kalohkihong irail mahsen en Koht irail kin pwuralahng arail doadoahngkan ni loaloapwoat; oh samworo sohte kin wiahki me e lapalapasang irail akan me rongorong, pwe sounkalohko sohte mwahusang me kin wie rongorong, pil duwehte sounpadahko sohte mwahusang tohnskuhlo; oh irail koaros duwepenehte, oh irail koaros doadoahk, emen emen irail nin duwen arail koahiek.

27 Oh irail kin kisakiskihwei arail dipwsou kan, emen emente kin kisakiski dahme e ahneki, ong me semwehmwe kan, oh me anahn akan, oh me soumwahu, oh me apwal; oh irail sohte kin likauwih likou pweilaud, ahpw irail mwakelekel oh mwohmw mwahu.

28 Oh met irail koasoanehdi koasoandi kan en mwomwohdiso; oh irail tepida pwurehng ahneki popohl, mehndahte aramas kalokalokei irail.

29 Oh met, pwehki kehlail en mwomwohdiso, irail tepida kepwehpwehla kowahlap, kepwehpwehki soahng kan koaros me irail kin anahne—kepwehpwehki pelin kou oh sihpw kan, oh soangen mahn wih koaros, oh pil kepwehpwehki werentuhke, oh kohl, oh silper, oh soahng kesempwal kan, kepwehpwehki soangen likou silik oh likou kaselel kan, oh soangsoangen likou mwahu kan.

30 Oh met, nan arail kepwehpwelahr, irail sohte kin pohnsehse me sohte arail likou kan, de me men mwengedahr akan, de me men nimpildahr akan, de me luhmwuhmw kan, de me sohte epwelperail kan; oh irail sohte kin noahrek en dipwsou; eri irail kin kadek ong aramas koaros, ong me mah oh me pwulopwul kan koaros, me sensel oh saledek, ohl oh lih koaros, me sohte iang mwomwohdiso de me iang mwomwohdiso, ni ar sohte lipilipiliki aramas koaros me mie anahn.

31 Oh met irail pweida oh kepwehpwehsang irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso.

32 Pwe irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso kin momouriki mour en wunahni, oh mour en dikadik en eni, oh koasoi mwahl, oh noahrek oh kalapw mwoarong; likilikawih likou pweilaud; re kin medemedewe me re inenen mwahu; kalokaloke aramas, likilikamw, mwermwersuwed, piripirap, wiewia tiahk en nenek kan, oh kemkemehla aramas, oh soangsoangen mwekid suwed koaros; ahpw, kosonnedo kin doadoahk ong koaros me kin kauwehla, nin duwen eh kak koaros.

33 Kedekedeo ni ansou me kosonnedo kin doadoahk ong irail, emen emen aramas kin lokolongki dahme e kauwehlao, irail ahpw kin meleileidi, oh sohte men wiahda ehu mwekid suwed ma e pahn sansal; eri, mie popohl laud rehn aramas en Nihpai kan lao lel ni pahr kelimau en mwehin sounkopwung kan.
alma 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amilisai song en wiahla nanmwarki oh aramas akan soikala—Irail akan me kin idawehn ih kasapwiladahng wia arail nanmwarki—Mehn Amilisai kan mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan oh lohdi—Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Amilisai kan ehupene oh lohdi—Alma kemehla Amilisai. Ele Sounpar 87 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr kelimau en arail mwehio, e tepida mie pingiping nanpwungen aramas akan; pwe ohl emen, me kahdaniki Amilisai, ih ohl widingan emen, ei, ohl emen me loalokongki erpit en sampah, e kin idawehn mwekid en ohl me kemehkihla Kidion kedlahso, me kamakamala nin duwen kosonnedo—

2 Amilisai menet, sang ni eh widing e kahluwahsangehr aramas tohto me idawehnla ih; iei uwen arail tohto irail tepida kehlailla; oh irail tepida song koasoanehdi Amilisai en wiahla arail nanmwarki.

3 Met uhdahn kapwuriamwei ong aramas en nan mwomwohdiso, oh pil irail akan koaros me sohte iang kainangiong idawehnla Amilisai; pwe re wehwehkier me nin duwen arail kosonnedo soahng wet pahn koasoandi sang ni pilipil en aramas akan.

4 Eri, ma aramas akan pahn kak pilada Amilisai, ni eh wia ohl suwed men, e pahn irehdisang arail pwuhng kan oh pai kan en mwomwohdiso; pwe iei ih me e mwahuki en kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht.

5 Kedekedeo aramas akan pokonpene wasa kan nan sahpwo pwon, emen emen aramas nin duwen pein eh lamalam, ma e pahn utungada de uhwong Amilisai. Irail ahpw tohrohpeseng nan arail pwihn kan, oh wie akaakamai oh mwoaroamwoaroangpene me kapwuriamwei.

6 Oh met irail pokonpene pwe re en usuhski koasoandi wet; oh irair pwukat sansalehr mwohn sounkopwung kan.

7 Kedekedeo en aramas akan ar pilipil uhwong Amilisai, kahrehda e sohte kak wia nanmwarki en aramas akan.

8 Met kahrehda peren laud nan mohngiong en irail akan me uhwong ih; ahpw Amilisai kamwakidada irail akan me utung ih en lingeringerda pahn irail akan me sohte utung ih.

9 Kedekedeo irail pein pokonpene, oh kasarawihla Amilisai en wiahla arail nanmwarki.

10 Ni ahnsou me Amilisai wiahla arail nanmwarki e ahpw ruwese irail en ale neirail dipwisou en mahwen oh mahweniong riarail akan; oh met e wia pwe re en kak mihla pahn eh manaman.

11 Met aramas en Amilisai kan tohrohrkihlahr ahd en Amilisai, ni ar kahdanikihla Mehn Amilisai kan; oh luhwe kan kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai kan, de aramas en Koht.

12 Eri Mehn Nihpai kan wehwehkier koasoandi en Mehn Amilisai kan, eri irail kaunopada pwe re en pelian irail; ei, irail kaunopada neirail kedlahs kan, oh neirail naipokos kan, oh kesik ketieu kan, oh arep kan, oh takai kan, oh pahi kan, oh soangen dipwisou en mahwen koaros.

13 Oh met irail kaunopadahr pwe re en pelian Mehn Amilisai kan ni ahnsou me re pahn kohdo. Oh mie kaun en sounpei kei me pilipilda, oh kaun en sounpei ile kan, oh kaun lapalap en sounpei akan, nin duwen wadepen irail.

14 Kedekedeo Amilisai pil kihong nah ohl akan en wah soangen dipwisou en mahwen koaros; oh e pil pilada kaun akan oh kaun akan en nah aramas akan, me pahn kahluwa irail kohlahng mahweniong riarail akan.

15 Kedekedeo Mehn Amilisai kan ahpw kohdo pohn dohl en Amnaihu, me mih palimeseen pillap Saidon, me pwilipwilwei ni keilen sahpw en Saraemla, wasao irail tepida mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

16 Pwehki Alma e wia sounkopwung lapalap oh kepinahn aramas en Nihpai kan, eri e ahpw kohdahla iangahki nah aramas akan, ei, iangahki nah kaun en sounpei kan, oh kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, ei, kaunda oh tihengala mwohn nah sounpei kan, kohweng peiong Mehn Amilisai kan.

17 Oh irail tepida kemehla Mehn Amilisai kan pohn dohlo ni palimesen Saidon. Oh Mehn Amilisai kan peiong Mehn Nihpai kan sang ni arail kehlail koaros, kahrehda tohtohn Mehn Nihpai kan kamakamala pahn Mehn Amilisai kan.

18 Ahpw Kauno kakehlakahla pehn Mehn Nihpai kan, kahrehda irail kemehkihla Mehn Amilisai lapalahn kamaramas ehu, kahrehda re tepida tangasang mworail.

19 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw pwepweki Mehn Amilisai kan rahno pwon, oh kemehkinirailla mwomwla ehu me inenen laud, kahrehda Mehn Amilisai me mehla kan me iei aramas meh nen riekid limepwiki siliakan riemen; oh uwen Mehn Nihpai me kamakamala me iei aramas meh wenekid limepwiki wenehk riemen.

20 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma tokedihsang pwakipwakihi Mehn Amilisai kan e kauhdi nah aramas akan re en wiahda arail impwal akan nan wahu en Kidion, eden wahuo kohsang ni eden Kidion me Nior kemehkihla eh kedlahs; oh iei nan wahu wet me Mehn Nihpai kan kauwada imwarail impwal akan pwe re en pweidi.

21 Oh Alma ahpw kadarala ekei lipoahrok pwe en idawehnla luhwen Mehn Amilisai kan, pwe en kak ese arail pilahn oh koasoandi kan, pwe en kak siledih ih sang irail, pwe en kak doarehla nah aramas akan sang kamwomwomwla.

22 Eri irail akan me e kadarewei re en mwasahn kahnimwpwal en Mehn Amilisai kan, adarail akan iei Seram, oh Amnor, oh Mandai, oh Limer; irail pwukat me kohwei iangahki ingarail ohl akan pwe re en mwasahn douwen Mehn Amilisai kan.

23 Kedekedeo mandahn rahno irail mwadangete pwurodohng nan kanihmwpwal en Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki ar pwuriamwei, oh masapwehkada mehlel, ndinda:

24 Kilang, se idahwehnla Mehn Amilisai kan wasa re pweidi ie, oh se ahpw pwuriamweiki, pwe nan sahpw en Mainon, pohnangin sahpw en Saraemla, ni ahl me kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, se kilangada karis en Mehn Leimen kan; oh kilang, Mehn Amilisai kan ehuwongirailehr;

25 Oh irail pwakipwakihpeseng riatail akan nan sahpwo; oh re tangatangasang mwohrail iangahki neirial pelinmen akan, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, kohkohdohng atail kahnimwo; oh ma kitail sohte pahn mwadang re pahn kalowehdi atail kahnimwo, oh atail pahpa kan, oh atail pwoud kan, oh neitail seri kan pahn kamakamala.

26 Kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan ahpw wahda imwarail impwal akan, oh mweselsang nan wahu en Kidion kolahng nan arail kahnihmwo, me iei kahnimw en Saraemla.

27 Oh kilang, ni arail wie kotkotehla pillap Saidon, Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Amilisai kan, kodohng irail ni uwen tohto me kereniong duwehte pihk en ni oaroahr kan, pwe re en kemeirailla.

28 Ahpw, sapwellimen Kauno manaman ketin kakehlakahda Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki arail ngidingidki ar kapakap ong ih en doarehsang pahn manaman en arail imwintihtih kan, eri Kauno ketin karonge arail pekipek kan, oh kakehleirailda, oh Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Amilisai kan ahpw pwupwudi mwohrail.

29 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw palapalehngada Amilisai ni ara uhpene; oh ira peipene kehlail nanpwungara.

30 Kedekedeo Alma, pwehki ih ohl en Koht emen, pwehki eh mwekidkihda sang ni pwoson laud, e ahpw kapakap patohwan: Maing Kaun, komw kupwure ie oh doarehla ei mour, pwe I en kak wia wiliepen nin limomwi pwehn doarehla oh kapitala aramas pwukat.

31 Eri met ni ahnsou me Alma patohwan mepwukat e ahpw pwurehng peiong Amilisai; e ahpw kehlaildahr, oh e kemehkihla Amilisai nah kedlahso.

32 Oh e pil peiong nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan; ahpw nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan sopohsang mwohn Alma oh kadarohng silepe sounpei kan en pelian Alma.

33 Ahpw Alma, iangahki silepe ko, peiong sapwellimen nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan sounsilasil ko lao e kemekemeirailla oh pwakihirailpeseng.

34 Oh e ahpw akerasang mehla ko me wonohn nanpwehl, de ni keilen pihlo, me mih palikapi en pillap Saidon, keskesehdiong paliwar en Mehn Leimen kan me kamakamala nan pihl en Saidon, pwe nah aramas akan en kak mie wasa re pahn keid ie oh peiong Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Amilisai kan me mi ni palikapi en pillap en Saidon.

35 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me irail koaros kotehla pillap en Saidon Mehn Leimen ko oh Mehn Amilisai ko tepida tangdoaui, mehndahte uwen arail tohto mehlel me sohte me kak wadekedi.

36 Oh irail tangasang Mehn Nihpai kan kohkohlahng nan sapwtehno me mih palikapi oh palieir, kohkohla palilahsang irepen sahpwo; oh Mehn Nihpai kan wia uwen arail kak koaros pwehn pwakipwakihirail, oh ahpw kemekemeirailla.

37 Ei, irail tuhwong [Mehn Nihpai kan] pali koaros, oh kamakamala oh pakasarala, lao irail mwerpeseng ni palikapi, oh ni palieir, lao re lelehr nan sapwtehno, me kahdaniki Ermoun; oh ih wasao nan sapwtehno me diren mahn lawalo oh mahn keper kan.

38 Kedekedeo irail tohto mehla nan sapwtehno pwehki arail ohla kan, oh mahn lawalo kan kangirailla oh pil menpihr puldur kan; oh tihrail kan dierekdahr, oh re koasoakoasoakpene pohn pwehl.
alma 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Amilisai kan wiadahr kilel ehu pohn kilirail nin duwen mahsen en kokohpo—Mehn Leimen kan riahkihla arail kahngohdi—Aramas akan pein keriahla pein irail—Mehn Nihpai kan pilehu powehdi sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 87–86 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan me sohte kamakamkihla dipwsou en mahwen kan, mwurin arail sarepedi me kamakamalahr akan—met me kamakamala kan sohte kak wadawadedi, pwehki uwen arail kidalap—mwurin arail sarepedi arail mehla kan, irail koaros pwuralahng nan sapwarail kan, ni imwarail akan, rehn arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan.

2 Met, lih oh seri tohto me pil kamakamkihla kedlahs, oh pil neirail pelin sihpw oh kou tohto pil kamakamala; oh pil arail mwetuwel en werentuhke tohto pil ohla, pwehki kidalap en karis en sounpei kan tiakedi oh kumutepene.

3 Oh met, Mehn Leimen oh Mehn Amilisai tohto me kamakamala ni keilen pillap Saidon lekdekdihlahte nan pihl en Saidon; oh kilang tihrail akan mihmi wasa loal kan en nansed, oh re me tohto.

4 Oh Mehn Amilisai weksang Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re kaweitahtala pohn tomwerail akan ni mwohmw en Mehn Leimen kan; ahpw irail sohte sehkasang piten moangerail akan duwehte Mehn Leimen kan.

5 Pwe piten moangen Mehn Leimen kan kin seiseisang; oh irail sohte kin likou, ihte kisin kilin mahn me kin pirapiriong lukoperail kan, oh pil arail tehtehn mahwen, me katengetengdiong nin lukeparail, oh neirail kesik ketieu kan, oh arep kan, oh neirail takai kan, oh neirail pahi kan, oh soahng teikan.

6 Oh kilin Mehn Leimen kan toantoal, nin duwen kilel me kohiengehr arail pahpa ko, me wia keriah ehu pohrail pwehki arail wiahda dihp oh kahngohdi ong riarail akan, me iei Nihpai, Seikop, oh Sosep, oh Sam, me wia ohl sarawi oh pwung kei.

7 Oh riarail kan song en kauweirailla, kahrehda irail riahla; oh Kauno Koht ketikihong pohn kilirail kilel ehu, mehlel, pohn Leimen oh Lemuel, oh pil nein Ismael pwutangko, oh pil lih akan me wia kisehn Ismael.

8 Oh met e wiawi pwe kadaudokerail akan en kak weksang kadaudok en riarail kan, pwe Kauno Koht en kak doarehla sapwellime aramas akan, pwe irail en dehr pwopwoudpene oh kamehlele tiahk sapwung kan me pahn kahrehda arail kamwomwomwla.

9 Kedekedeo ma mehmen me pahn kapwopwoudipene kadaudoke rehn Mehn Leimen kan, kadaudoke kan pahn pil iang ale keriape.

10 Eri, mehmen me mweidala pein ih en idawehnla Mehn Leimen kan kin kahdanikihla ahdohte, oh kilelo pil kin mihla reh.

11 Kedekedeo mehmen me sohte kin kamehlele tiahk en Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw kamehlele poadopoad kan me wisikdo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh pil tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, me pwung, me kamehlele sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan oh kin kapwaiada, re kin adaniki Mehn Nihpai, de aramas en Nihpai, sang ahnsouo kohla—

12 Oh iei irail me kin kolokol poadopoad mehlel en neirail aramas akan, oh pil aramas en Mehn Leimen kan.

13 Met kitail pahn kapwurelahng Mehn Amilisai kan, pwe irail pil alehdier kilel ehu poh kilirail; ei, irail kilelehki pein irail kilelo, iei, kilel weitahta me mih ni temwarail kan.

14 Eri met mahsen en Kohto pweidahr, pwe iet mahsen akan me e ketin mahsanihong Nihpai: Kilang, Mehn Leimen kan me I keriairaillahr, oh I pahn kihong irail kilel ehu me irail oh kadaudokerail akan pahn katohrohrsang uhk oh kadaudokomw kan, sang met kohla oh kohkohlahte, ihte ma irail pahn koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan oh sohpeido rehi pwe I en kak mahkong irail.

15 Oh pil: I pahn kihong kilel ehu pohn kilirail kan me pahn patehng kadaudoken riomw kan, pwe irail en pil iang riahla.

16 Oh pil: I pahn kihong kilel ehu pohn mehmen me pahn peiong uhk oh kadaudokomw kan.

17 Oh pil, I ndaionguhk me mehmen me pahn kohkohsanguhk pahn sohla wia kadaudokemw; oh I pahn kapaiukada, oh mehmen me pahn wiahla kadaudokemw, sang met kohla oh kohkohlahte; oh mepwukat iei sapwellimen Kauno inou ong Nihpai oh kadaudoke kan.

18 Met Mehn Amilisai kan sohte ese me mahsen en Koht pweidahier rehrail ni ahnsou me irail tepida kihong kilel pohn temwerail kan; ahpw re saledengki ar kahngohdiong Koht; eri e konehng me keriao pahn kohieng irail.

19 Met I men kumwail en kilang me pein irail me kihong irail keriah wet; oh iei pil duwehte aramas koaros me riahla kin pein kihong irail arail lokolok.

20 Met kedekedeo e saik lel rahn tohto kei mwurin arail mahwen ong Mehn Leimen oh Mehn Amilisai kan nan sahpw en Saraemla, a mie pil ehu pwihn en sounpei en Mehn Leimen kei me kohdohn peiong aramas en Nihpai kan, wasaohte me tepin sounpei ko tuhwong ie Mehn Amilisai kan.

21 Kedekedeo mie sounpei kei me pekederla pwe re en pwakihrailsang nan sapwarail.

22 Met, pwehki Alma eh sousoumwahuki eh ohla, e sohte iang kohla mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan ahnsou wet;

23 Ahpw e kadaradalahng irail karis en sounpei ehu; oh irail kohdahla oh kemehla tohtohn Mehn Leimen kei, oh pwakihasang irail me luwehdi ni irepen sahpwo.

24 Oh irail eri pwurodo oh pwurehng ahneki popohl nan sahpwo, sohla ahneki kapwunod en arail imwintihti kan nan ahnsou kis.

25 Met mepwukat koaros wiawiher, ei, mahwen pwukat koaros oh pingiping pwukat koaros tepida oh uhdi nan pahr kelimau en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

26 Oh nan pahr ehuo aramas kid kei oh nen kei pekederlahng nan wasahn mour poatopoato, pwe irail en kak ale ketingpen arail wiewia kan, ma re mwahu de ma re suwed, en ale peren poatopoat de pahtou poatopoat, nin duwen ngehno me irail peikiong, ma ngehn mwahu de me suwed.

27 Pwe emen emen aramas pahn alehdi isepe sang ih me e pilada peikiong, oh met iei duwen mahsen akan en ngehn en kohkohp; eri e pahn pweida nin duwen me mehlelo. Oh met kaimwsekelahn pahr kelimau en mwehin sounkopwung kan.
alma 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma papidaisiala kiden aramas me weliakapwala—Wiewia suwed lel nan Mwomwohdiso, oh kekeiridahn Mwomwohdiso pweiek—Nihpaia wiahla sounkopwung lapalap—Alma, ni eh wia samworo lapalap, poadidiong wia doadoahk en kalohk. Ele Sounpar 86–83 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met kedekedeo nan kewenou en pahr en mwehi en sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, sohte pingiping de mahwin nan sahpw en Saraemla;

2 Ahpw aramas akan ahneki lokolok, ei, lokokol laud pwehki riarail akan me mehla, oh pil neirail pelin sihpw oh kou kan me mehla, oh pil ohlahn arail mwetuwel en werentuhke kan, me Mehn Leimen kan tiakpeseng oh kawehla.

3 Oh uwen arail lokolok laud aramas koaros wie mwahmwhiei; oh irail kamehlele me iei kalokolok en Koht me kohdong irail pwehki arail wiewia suwed oh arail mour suwed kan; eri irail piridahng tamataman arail pwukoa.

4 Oh irail tepida koasoanehdi mwomwohdiso unsek; ei, oh tohto me papidaisla nan pihl en Saidon oh iangala mwomwohdiso en Koht; ei, irail papidaisla rehn Alma, me kasarawihong en wia samworo lapalap nan mwomwohdiso, sang pehn eh pahpao, Alma.

5 Kedekedeo nan keisuh en pahr en mwehi en sounkopwung kan aramasa meh silikid limepwiki iangala mwomwohdiso en Koht oh papidaisla. Oh met me kaimsekala keisuh en pahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan en aramas en Nihpai kan; oh popohl mie nan erein ahnsouo pwon.

6 Kedekedeo nan kawaluh en pahr en mwehi en sounkopwung ko, aramas en nan mwomwohdiso tepida pohnmwahsohla, pwehki arail kepwehpwe kouwahlap, oh arail likou silik kan, oh arail likou kaselel kan, oh pwehki tohtolahn neirail pelin sihpw oh kou kan, oh neirail kohl oh neirail siliper, oh soahngen dipwisou kesempwal akan koaros, me re alehdi sang arail doadoahk loalaopwoat; oh nan mepwukat koaros irail tepida pohnmwahsohkihda nan masarail akan, pwe irail tepida likawih likou pweilaud kan.

7 Met me elehda kahpwal laud ong Alma, ei, oh ong aramas tohto me Alma kasarawihong re en wia sounpadahk kan, oh samworo kan, oh silepe kan en nan mwomwohdiso; ei, tohto irail pahtoukihla mehlel pwehki wiewia suwed me irail kilang tepida mie rehn neirail aramas akan.

8 Pwe irail kilangehr oh pahtouki ni ar kilang aramas en mwomwohdiso ar tepidahr ahneki pohnmwahso nan masarail akan, oh katengehdi nan mohngiongarail kan dipwisou kan oh soahng mwahl akan en sampah, kahrehda irail tepida kauwe, emen emen nanpwungarail, oh re tepida kailongki irail akan me sohte kin kamehlele nin duwen pein nsenrail oh arail kansanamwahu.

9 Oh pwehki met, nan kewaluh en pahr en mwehi en sounkopwung kan, pingiping laud tepida mie rehn aramas en mwomwohdiso; ei, mie noahrok, oh akamai, oh mwekid en lemei, oh kailok, oh pohnmwahso, iei ar pohnmwahso daulih ahn irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht.

10 Oh met kaimsekala kewaluh en pahr en mwehi en sounkopwung kan; oh wiewia suwed en mwomwohdiso wia takai en dipekelekel ong irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso; oh met kahrehda mwomwohdiso tepida pweiek nan ah kekeirida.

11 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn keduwau en pahro, Alma kilangada wiewia suwed en mwomwohdiso, oh e pil kilangada karasaras en mwomwohdiso ah tepida kahluwalahng me sohpwoson kan sang nan ehu dihp kohlahng ehu, eri met pahn kahrehiongehr kamwomwomwlahn aramas akan.

12 Ei, e kilangada sapahrek en aramas akan, ekei kihrailda nan arail pohnmwahso, popohnsehse mehtei kan, sohsohpeisang me anahn akan oh me sohte arail likou kan oh me mehn mwonge kan, oh irail kan me men nimpil, oh irail me soumwahu oh lokolok kan.

13 Eri met lapalahn ah wiahda pahtou laud rehn aramas akan, ahnsou me ekei wie nannantiong karakarahk, sewesewese me anahne arail sawas akan, me rasohng kihong me semwehmwe oh me anahn akan arail dipwisou kan, kamwonge me men mwonge kan, oh kanekanengamah nan soahngen lokolok koaros, pwehki Krais, me pahn ketido nin duwen ngehn en kokohp;

14 Kasikasik rahno, kahrehda re nannantiong irail en mwakelekelsang diparail akan; oh irail audaukihda peren laud pwehki iasadahn me melahr akan, nin duwen kupwur oh manaman oh komour en Sises Krais sang sahl en mehla kan.

15 Oh met kedekedeo Alma, pwehki ah kilangehr lokolongkan en irail akan me kin idawehn Koht ni karakarahk, oh mwekid en kailok me mih rehrail sang nah aramas teikan, oh pwehki ah kilangehr mwekid en sapairair, e ahpw tepida pahtoukihla; ahpw Ngehn en Kauno sohte uhdihsang sowese.

16 Oh e pilada ohl loalokong men me iang wia silepen nan mwomwohdiso, oh kihong manaman nin duwen pilipil en aramas akan, pwe en kak ahneki manaman en wiahda kosonned akan nin duwen poahson en kosonned akan me wiawidahr, oh pwe en kapwungki aramas akan nin duwen arail wiewia suwed oh dihparail kan.

17 Eri eden ohl menet iei Nihpaia, oh e pilipilda en wiahla sounkopwung lapalap; oh e mih nan sehr en mwoalen kopwungo pwe en kapwung oh kaweid aramas akan.

18 Ahpw Alma sohte kihong ih manaman en ohpis en wia samworo lapalap ong nan mwomwohdiso, ahpw e kolokolete ohpis en samworo lapalap ong pein ih; ahpw e patohwanong Nihpaia pwukoahn sounkopwungo.

19 Oh met e wia pwe en kak pein kohwei rehn nah aramas akan, de rehn aramas en Nihpai kan, pwe en kak kalohkihongirail mahsen en Koht, pwe en kamwakidada re en tamanda arail pwukoa, oh pwe en kak kalohngki mahsen en Koht me pahn kauhdi pohnmwahso koaros oh widing koaros oh pingiping koaros me mih rehn nah aramas akan, pwehki e kilang me sohte ehu ahl me e kak pwurehng kapwurehkiniraildo ihte sang ni kangong en kadehde mehlel ong irail.

20 Oh met ni tepidahn pahr keduwau en mwehi en sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Alma kihongehr Nihpaia sehr en sounkopungo, oh loaloapwoationgete papah nan prihsduhd lapalap en koasoandi sarawi en Koht, ong kadehdehki mahseno, nin duwen kaudiahl oh ngehn en kokohp.
alma 5:
Mahsen kan en Alma, Samworo Lapalapo nin duwen koasoandi sarawi en Koht, padahkihong aramas akan nan arail kahnihmw oh kousapw akan nan sahpwo pwon.

Tepida nan iralaud 5.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aramas anahne koluhla oh kapwaiada kosonned akan, ipwsapahl, kamwakelehda arail karmend kan sang ni ntahn Krais, karakarahk oh kihsang irail pohnmwahso oh noahrok, oh wia doadoahk pwung kan pwe irail en kak komourla—Silepen Sihpw Mwahuo ekehker Sapwellime aramas akan—Irail akan me kin wia doadoahk en tepil iei seri en tepilo—Alma kadehdehki duwen mehlel en eh padahk oh luke aramas akan en koluhla—Eden [aramas] me kin mour pwung kan pahn ntingdi nan pwuhk en komouro. Ele Sounpar 83 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri, kedekedeo Alma ahpw tepida padahngki mahsen en Koht ong aramas akan, tepikida nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh sang mwo kohpeseng nan sahpwo pwon.

2 Oh mahsen pwukat me e padahkihong aramas akan nan mwomwohdiso me wiahwihda nan kahnihmw en Saraemla, nin duwen dahme e pein ntingihdi, me ketihtihki:

3 Ngehi, Alma, kasarawihongehr samworo lapalap sang ei pahpa, Alma, ong nan mwomwohdiso en Koht, pwehki e alehdi manaman oh mweimwei sang rehn Koht en wia mepwukat, kilang, e tepida wiahda mwomwohdiso nan sahpw me mih ni irepen sahpw en Nihpai; ei, sahpw me kahdaniki sahpw en Mormon; ei, oh e papidaisihla rieh kan nan pihl en Mormon.

4 Oh kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, re poadoandoarasang pahn manaman en sapwellimen nanmwarki Noha aramas akan, sang ni kalahngan oh manaman en Koht.

5 Oh kilang, mwurin mwo, irail lohdi nan mouren kalidu pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan nan sapwtehno; ei, I ndaiong kumwail, irail wie sensel, oh Kauno ahpw pwurehng doareirailsang nan mouren kalidu sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahsen; oh se kohdo nan sahpwet, oh wasaht se pil pwurehng tepida wiahda mwomwohdiso en Koht nan sahpwet pwon.

6 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, riei kan, kumwail me wia tohn mwomwohdiso, kumwail kin kalapw tamatamante kaliduhlahn amwail pahpahko? Ei, oh kumwail kin kalapw tamatamante sapwellime kalahngan oh kanengamah ong irail? Oh pil kapatahiong, kumwail kin kalapw tamatamante me e ketin doarehla palingenerail sang nan ehl?

7 Kilang, e ketin wekidala ar mohngiong kan; ei, e ketin panginirailda sang nan arail meir kelik, oh irail pirida rehn Koht. Kilang, irail mihmi nan werengen rotorot; ahpw, palingenerail kan marainkihda marain en mahsen poatoapoato; ei, selin mehla kapilirailpene, oh sel metehn ehl, oh kamwomwomwla poatoapoato awiawih irail.

8 Oh met I kalelapak rehmwail, riei ko, irail kamwomwala? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, soh, irail sohte kamwomwala.

9 Oh I pwurehng kalelapak, selin mehla ko olahr, oh sel metehn ehl me kapikapil irailo, e mweradahr? I ndaiong kumwail, Ei, e mweradahr, oh loalerail akan direkihlahr limpoak oh peren, oh irail ahpw kin koulki limpoak en komour. Oh I ndaiong kumwail me irail komourlahr.

10 Oh met I kaledapak rehmwail dahme kahrehda irail komourkihla? Ei, dahme wia poahson en arail koapworopworki komouro? Dahme kahreda irail kak saledek sang selin mehla, ei, oh pil sel metehn ehl?

11 Kilang, I kak ndaiong kumwail—ei pahpa Alma sou kamehlele mahsen kan me kalohk sang ni ewen Apinadai? Oh e sou wia soukohp sarawi men? E sou padahngki mahsen en Koht, oh ei pahpa Alma kamehlele mahsen akan?

12 Oh sang ni ah pwoson mie weliakapw mehlel wiawi nan ah mohngiong. Kilang I ndaiong kumwail me met akan koaros mehlel.

13 Oh kilang, e kalohngki mahseno ong amwail pahpa kan, oh nan mohngiongarail kan weliakapw mehlel, oh irail karakarahkala oh koapworopworiki Koht ieias mehlelo. Oh kilang, irail loaloapwoat lao lel imwi; eri irail komourlahr.

14 Oh met kilang, I kalelapak rehmwail, riei kan nan mwomwohdiso, kumwail ipwisangehr rehn Koht ni palingenamwail? Kumwail kak kilang ieiasih nan amwail mour? Kumwail kehnehr weliakapw mehlelo nan mohngiongamwail kan?

15 Kumwail kin pwoson komour en ih me ketin kapik kumwailda? Kumwail kin kasikasik sang ni amwail kilikilengwei ni pwoson, oh medewe me paliwar wet pahn iasadahng mour poatoapoat, oh paliwar wet me kin mwerpeseng pahn iasadahng paliwar me sohte kak mwerpeseng, pwe en kesihnen mwohn Koht pwe en ale kadeik nin duwen wiewia kan me wiwiawi nan mour wet?

16 I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail kak pein medewehdohng kumwail ni rahno me kumwail pahn rong kepitien Kauno, mahsanihong kumwail: Kohdo rehi, kumwail me kapaida kan, pwe kilang, amwail doadoahk kan wia doadoahk en mour pwung pohn sampah?

17 De kumwail kin medewehiong me kumwail kak pitih Kauno ni rahno, oh nda—Maing, aht doadoahk kan wia doadoahk pwung kei pohn sampah—oh me e pahn kamour kumwailla?

18 De pil, kumwail kak medewehiong amwail pahn pakahrdohng mwohn mwoahlen kopwung en Koht oh loalemwail akan direkihla pepehm en dihp oh pahtou, ni amwail pahn tamanda dipamwail kan koaros, ei, ni amwail ese ni unsek amwail wiewia suwed kan, ei, ni amwail tamanda me kumwail kasohwe sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan?

19 I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail kak kilenglahng Koht ni rahno oh ahneki mohngiong mwakelekel oh peh mwakelekel? I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail kak kilengdahng, oh kilang ieias en Koht nan amwail mour?

20 I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail kak medewe me kumwail komourla ma kumwail mweidehng pein kumwail pahn manaman en tepilo?

21 I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail pahn ese ni rahno ma kumwail pahn kak komourla; pwe sohte emen aramas kak komourla ma ah karmend sohte pahn kamwakelda oh pwetepwetla; ei, ah karmend kan pahn anahne kamwakelda lao re mwakelekelsang samin kan, sang ni ntahn ih me atail pahpah ko koasoiahier, me pahn kohdo oh kamaurala sapwellime aramas akan sang diparail akan.

22 Oh met I kalelapak rehmwail, rieiko, ia mwomwen amwail pepehm, ma kumwail pahn kesihnen mwohn mwolen kopwung en Koht, ni amwail karmend kan eh saminki nta oh soangen samin koaros? Kilang, dahme mepwukat pahn kadehdehda ong kowe?

23 Kilang re sou pahn kadehdehda me kumwail soun kam aramas, ei, oh kumwail pil dipaniki soangsoangen wiewia suwed koaros?

24 Kilang, rieikan, kumwail sou kin medemedewe me soangen aramas wet kak mwohndi nan wein Koht, iang Eipram, iang Aisek, oh iang Seikop, oh pil koaros soukohp sarawi kan, me arail karmend kan kamwakeldahr oh sohte mwahi kis, mwakelekel oh pwetepwet?

25 I ndaiong kumwail, soh; ihte ma kumwail kak wiahiong Sounkepikipiko en likamw sang ni tapio, de medewe me e likamw sang ni tapio, kumwail sohte kak nda me e pahn kak mie dowen sohngo nan wein nanleng; ahpw re pahn lekidekila liki pwe irail iei seri en wehin tepilo.

26 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, riei kan, ma kumwail kehnehr weliakapw mehlelo nan mohngiongamwail kan, oh ma kumwail kehnehr amwail men koulki koul en limpoak en komouro, I pahn kalelapak, kumwail kak kehn ahnsou wet?

27 Kumwail kin weweid, ni amwail kin mwakmwakelekel mwohn Koht? Kumwail kak nda loalemwail kan, ma kumwail pahn malipilipiong mehla ahnsou wet, me kumwail karakarahkalahr? Me amwail karmend kan mwakelekeldahr oh pwetepwelahr sang ni ntahn Krais, me pahn ketido kamourala sapwellime aramas akan sang diparail akan?

28 Kilang, kumwail kihsangehr amwail pohnmwahso? I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail saikinte kumwail saik onopadahng tuhwong Koht. Kilang kumwail anahne kaunopada ahnsou karwaru; pwe wehin nanleng kerendohr, oh soangen aramaso sohte kak alehdi mour soutuk.

29 Kilang, I idek, mie emen rehmwail me saikinte kihsang reh noahrok? I ndaiong kumwail me soangen aramaso saikinte onopada; oh I men kumwail en kaunopada ahnsou karwaru, pwe awahu kerendohr, oh kumwail sohte ese ahnsouo me pahn lelledo; pwe soahngen aramaso sohte kak en sohte dipe.

30 Oh I pil kalelapak rehmwail, mie emen rehmwail me kin kauwe rie ohl, de kalapw wiahiong mwekid en kailok kan?

31 Meid suwediong soangen aramaso, pwe e saikinte onopada, oh ahnsouo kerendohr me e pahn anahne koluhla ma soh e sohte pahn komourla!

32 Iei, meid suwediong kumwail koaros me kin wiewia tiahk suwed kan; koluhla, koluhla, pwe Kauno Koht me ketin mahsaniher!

33 Kilang, e ketin kadarewei sapwellime luhk ong aramas koaros, pwe pwe kalahngan en nin lime kan e ketin kapahwei rehrail, oh mahsanih: Koluhla, oh I pahn aleikumwailda.

34 Ei, e ketin mahsanih: Kohdo rehi oh kumwail pahn tungoale wahn tuhkehn komouro; ei, kumwail pahn kang pilawa oh nim pihl en komour ni saledek;

35 Ei, kohdo rehi oh wahdo doadoahk en mour pwung kan, oh kumwail sohte pahn paldi oh lekideklong nan kisiniei—

36 Pwe kilang, ahnsouo kerendohr me mehmen me pahn wahdo wah sohte mwahu, de mehmen me sohte kin wia doahdoahk en mour pwung kan, pein ih kahrehiong eh pahn weriwer oh mwahiei.

37 Kumwail me kin wiewi doadoahk suwed kan; kumwail me aklapalapkihda soahng mwahl akan en sampah, kumwail me kin nda me kumwail ese koasondi pwungkan ahpw salongalahr, duwehte sihpw me sohte silepe, mehndahte silepen sihpwo eh lukuweriher kumwail oh pil wie lukulukuwerihte kumwail, ahpw kumwail sohte men rong kepitiehu!

38 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me silepen sihpw mwahuo wie ekeeker kumwail; ei, oh sang ni mware e kin ketin ekerkin kumwail, me iei mwahren Krais; oh ma kumwail sohte pahn rong kepitien silepen sihpw mwahuo, me iei mwarehu me kumwail wie luklukwerki, kilang, kumwail sohte wia sihpw en silepen sihpw mwahuo.

39 Oh met ma kumwail kaidehn sapwellimen silepen sihpw mwahuo, a mehnia pelin sihpw kumwail iang? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me tepilo iei silepamwail, oh kumwail wia nah; oh met, ihs me kak kelikamwe met? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, mehmen me kelikamwe met e wia aramas likamw oh seri en tepilo.

40 Pwe I ndaiong kumwail me soahng koaros me mwahu kohsang rehn Koht, oh soahng koaros me suwed kohsang rehn tepilo.

41 Eri, ma aramas emen pahn wia doadoahk mwahu kan, e rongehr kepitien silepen sihpw mwahuo, oh e idahwen ih; ahpw mehmen me pahn wia doadoahk suwed kan, e wialahr seri en tepilo, pwe e rongehr ngilehu, oh idawehn ih.

42 Oh mehmen me pahn wia met, e pahn ale isepe sang ih; eri, isepehu e pahn ale mehla, nin duwen eh sohte momourpwung, sohla kak wiada doadoahk mwahu kan koaros.

43 Oh met, riei kan, I men kumwail en rong ie, pwe I koasoi sang loaleiet unsek; pwe kilang, I ndaiong kumwail ni sansal pwe kumwail en dehr sapwungala, de koasoiahier nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

44 Pwe I malipilipieng en koasoi ni mwohmw wet, nin duwen koasondi sarawi en Koht, me sang Krais Sises; ei, I alehdi kosonned ien kesihnenda oh kadehdehiong aramas pwukat soahng kan me atail pahpahko koasoiahier duwen soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

45 Oh kaidehng ih mehkoaros met. Kumwail sohte medewe me I pein esehdahr mepwukat? Kilang, I kadehdehkihong kumwail me I ese me mepwukat me I koasoiadahr e mehlel. Oh ia mwomwen amwail medewe me I ese me mepwukat mehlel?

46 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me mepwukat kasansal ong ie sang ni sapwellimen Koht Ngehn Sarawio. Kilang, I kaisihsolki oh kapakapki erein rahn kei pwe I en kak pein esehda mehlelpen mepwukat. Oh met pein ngehi esehier me mepwukat mehlel; pwe Kauno Koht ketin kasalehiong ie sang sapwellime Ngehn Sarawi; oh iei met ngehn en kaudiahl me mih rehi.

47 Oh pil patehng, I ndaiong kumwail me e kasansal ongie, me mahsen akan me atail pahpahko koasoiahier e mehlel, iei nin duwen ngehn en kokohp me mih rehi, me iei pil sang ni kasansaladahn Ngehn en Koht.

48 I ndaiong kumwail, me I pein esehier me dahme I pahn ndaiong kumwail, me pid dahme pahn kohdo, e mehlel; oh I ndaiong kumwail, me I ese me Sises Krais pahn ketido, ei, Sapwellimeo, Iehros en Sahmo, me diren kalahngan, oh mahk, oh mehlel. Oh kilang, iei ih me pahn ketido oh ketikihsang dipen sampah, ei, dihp akan en aramas koaros me tengediong kamehlele mwareo.

49 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail me iei ih koasoandi me I malipilipiong, ei, en kalohk ong riei ohl kesempwal akan, ei, oh aramas koaros me koukousoan nan sahpwe; ei, en kalohk ong koaros, me mah oh me pwulopwul kan, me sensel oh saledek; ei, I ndaiong kumwail akan me likeilap, me mah, oh dih me kekeirdah kan; ei, en kalohkihong irail me re anahne koluhla oh ipwsapahl.

50 Ei, Ngehno ketin mahsaniher: Koluhla, kumwail koaros pohn sampah, pwe wehin nanleng kerendohr; ei, Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido ni linganih, ni sapwellime kehl, wahu, manaman, oh mweimwei en kaun. Ei, riei kempoake kan, I ndaiong kumwail, me Ngehno mahsanih: Kilang lingan en Nanmwarki en sampah; oh pil Nanmwarki en nanleng pahn kereniongehr kamarainwei rehn aramas akan koaros.

51 Oh Ngehno pil mahsanihong ie, ei, eker ie ni ngihl kehlail, ketihtihki: Kohwei oh ndaiong aramas akan—Koluhla, pwe ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla kumwail sohte pahn sohsohki wehin nanleng.

52 Oh I pil ndaiong kumwail, Ngehno mahsanih: Kilang, silehu miher ni kalewen tuhkehu; eri tuhke koaros me sohte pahn kihla wah mwahu pahn palidi oh lekidekla nan kisiniei, ei, nan kisiniei me sohte kak ohla, iei kisiniei me sohte kak kunla. Kilang, oh tamataman, Me Sarawio me ketin mahsaniher.

53 Oh met riei kempoakeko, I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail kak kasohwe mahsen pwukat; ei, kumwail kak pohnsehsemepwukat, oh tiakidi pahn patenehmwail akan Me Sarawio; ei, kumwail kak kihda pohnmwahsohn amwail mohngiong kan, ei, kumwail pahn wenwenlahte nan amwail likawih likou pweilaud kan oh katengehdi nanmohngiongamwail kan mehkot mwahl akan en sampah, oh amwail kepwe kan?

54 Ei, kumwail pahn nannantihongete medewe me kumwail mwahu sang ekei; ei, kumwail pahn nannantihongete wia mwekid en kailok ong riomwail akan, me karakarahkalahr oh ideidawehn koasoandi sarawi en Koht, me kahrehda arail iangala mwomwohdiso wet, ni arail kasarawialahr sang Ngehn Sarawio, oh irail wiahier doadoahk kan me kasalehda arail koluhla—

55 Ei, oh kumwail pahn wenlahte sohpeisang me semwehmwe kan, oh anahn kan, oh sohte kihong irail amwail dipwisou kan?

56 Oh ni mehlel, kumwail koaros me pahn wenlahte nan amwail wiewia suwed kan, I ndaiong kumwail, me irail pwukat, ma re sohte pahn koluhla ahnsou mwadang irail pahn palidi oh lekidekiong nan kisiniei.

57 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail koaros me inangih idawehn kepitien silepen sihpw mwahuo, kumwail kohdo sang rehn me suwed kan, oh kumwail tohrohrla, oh dehr doahke arail dipwisou samin kan; oh kilang, adarail akan pahn lekidekila, pwe eden me suwed kan sohte pahn iang wadawadieng eden me mwahu kan, pwe mahsen en Koht en kak pweida, me ketin mahsani: Eden me suwed kan sohte pahn patehng eden nei aramas akan;

58 Pwe eden me mwahu kan pahn ntingdi nan pwuhk en komouro, oh ong irail I pahn kamanahiong irail arail sohso ni pali maun en pehi. Oh met, rieiko, mie mehkot kumwail kak nda me pahn kasapwunge met? I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail pahn uhwong met, e sohte katepe, pwe mahsen en Koht pahn udahn pweida.

59 Pwe dah, mie silepen sihpw rehmwail me nainiki sihpw tohto oh sohte kin tetehk irail, pwe kidi en wel kan dehr kohdo oh kangala nah pelin sihpwo? Oh kilang, ma kidi en wel men pahn kohdong nan pelin sihpw kan e sou pahn pwakiala? Ei, oh ni imwila, ma e kak, e pahn kemehla.

60 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail me silepen sihpw mwahuo wie lukulukweri kumwail; oh ma kumwail pahn rong kepitiehu e pahn ketin waikumwaildo nan sapwellime kehlo, oh kumwail pahn wia sapwellime sihpw; oh e pahn mahsanihong kumwail me e sohte pahn mweideng kidi en wel men pahn pidelong rehmwail, pwe kumwail en dehr kamwomwala.

61 Oh met ngehi, Alma, patohwanohng kumwail nin duwen mahsen en ih me ketin mahsenihong ie, me kumwail en tehk me kumwail kapwaiada mahsen akan me I padahkihong kumwailehr.

62 I koasoi wei nin duwen kosonned ehu ong kumwail me iang tohn mwomwohdiso; oh ong kumwail me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso I koasoi ong kumwail ni duwen luhk ehu, oh I nda: Kohdo oh papidaisla sang ni koluhla, pwe kumwail en pil kak tungoale wahn tuhkehn komouro.
alma 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mwomwohdiso nan Saraemla kamwakelda oh koasoansoandi—Alma kohla nan Kidion pwe en kalohk. Ele Sounpar 83 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin Alma e kaimwsekalahr eh koasoakoasoiong aramas en mwomwohdiso, me wiahwihda nan kahnimw en Saraemla, e kasarawihla samworo kan oh silepe kan, sang ni pwilidieng pehkan nin duwen koasoandi en Koht, pwe en kaunda oh apwali mwomwohdiso.

2 Kedekedeo mehmen me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso ahpw koluhkihla diparail akan papidaisla sang ni ar koluhla, oh tohwehla mwomwohdiso.

3 Oh pil kedekedeo mehmen me iang towe mwomwohdiso ahpw sohte koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan oh karakarahkala mwohn Koht—I koasoia irail kan me pohnmwahsohla nan mohngiongarail kan—re kin sosoikla, oh adarail akan kohsang, pwe adarail kan de iang wadawadiong rehn me mwahu kan.

4 Oh met irail tepida koasonehdi koasondi en mwomwohdiso nan kahnihmw en Saraemla.

5 Met I men kumwail en wehwehki me mahsen en Koht e saledekiong koaros, pwehki sohte aramas emen me sohte ahneki pwuhng en patehng mehtei kan rong mahsen en Koht.

6 Ahpw sapwellimen Koht seri kan e wia kosonned ehu me irail en kin kapokonpene ahnsou koaros, oh ehukipene kaisihsol oh kapakap kehlailki ong palingenen irail akan me sohte ese Koht.

7 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Alma wiadahr koasoandi pwukat e ahpw mweselsang rehrail, ei, sang ni mwomwohdiso me mih nan kahnihmw en Saraemla, oh kohla ni pali mese en pilap en Saidon, kohlahng nan wahu en Kidion, wasahu mie kahnihmw ehu wiawihda, me kahdaniki kahnihmw en Kidion, me mih nan wahu me kahdaniki Kidion, me adaniki eden ohl me Nior kemehkihla kedlahs.

8 Oh Alma kohla oh tepida kalohngki mahsen en Koht ong mwomwohdiso me wiawihda nan wahu en Kidion, nin duwen kaudiahl en mahseno eh mehlel me ah pahpau koasoiahier, oh nin duwen ngehn en kokohp me kin ieiang, nin duwen kadehde en Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, me pahn ketido kamourala sapwellime aramas akan sang diparail akan, oh nin duwen koasoandi sarawi me e malipilipiong. Oh iei met me ntingdier. Ahmen.
alma 7:
Mahsen kan en Alma me e padahkihongehr aramas en Kidion, nin duwen pein ah poadoapoad.

Audaudki iralaud 7.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Krais pahn ipwidisang Mery—E pahn ketin sapwadada sahl en mehla oh ketikihda dipen Sapwellime aramas akan—Irail akan me koluhla, papidaisla, oh kapwaiada kosonned akan pahn alehdi mour soutuk—Me samin sohte kak sohsohki wehin Koht—Momouriki karakarahk, pwoson, koapworopwor, oh limpoak unsek anahnepe. Ele Sounpar 83 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang riei kesempwaloko, pwehki ei mweimweiongehr en kohdo rehmwail, eri I pahn song kaweid kumwail sang pein ei lokaia; ei, sang pein eweiet, oh pwehki ehdin ei pahn koasoikihong kumwail koasoi me sang ni pein eweiet, pwehki ei kin kedikediropkihte pwukoahn sehr en sounkopwung, oh pwehki ei kin wiewia pwukoa me kahreda I sohte kak kohdo rehmwail.

2 Oh I sohte pahn pil kak kohdo ahnsou wet ma sehr en sounkopwungo sohte kohieng emen aramas tohrohr, me welianiehdi uhd kakaun; oh Kauno sang ni sapwellime kalahngan me ketin mweidohng ie I en kak kohdo rehmwail.

3 Oh kilang, I kohdo ni ei ahneki koapworopwor laud oh inangih me I pahn diar me kumwail karakarahk mwohn Koht, oh me kumwail kin kalapw wie pekipeki sapwellime kalahngan, oh me kumwail mwakelekel mwowe, me kumwail sohte mih nan irair sakanakan me riomwail akan nan Saraemla mih loalle.

4 Ahpw meid pai mwaren Koht, pwe e ketin mwedehngehr I en ese, ei, e ketikihongie peren laud kowahlap en ese me re pwurehngehr koasoneiraildi ni wiepen sapwellime ieias en mour pwung.

5 Oh I koapworopworiki, nin duwen Ngehn en Koht me kin ketiket rehi, me I pahn pil ahneki peren rehmwail; ahpw I sohte men ei peren rehmwail en sang ni kahpwal oh pahtou laud me I ahneki rehn rietail akan nan Saraemla, pwe kilang, ei perenkinirail mwurin ei wiahier doadoahk me wia kahpwal laud oh pahtou laud.

6 Ahpw kilang, I koapworopworiki me kumwail sohte mih nan kahpwal en soupwoson duwehte riomwailko; I koapworopworiki me kumwail sohte pohnmwahsohla nan mohngiongimwail kan; ei, I koapworopworiki me kumwail sohte katengehdi nan mohngiongamwail kan dipwisou kan oh mehkot mwahl en sampah; ei, I koapworopworiki me kumwail sohte kin pwongih dikedik en eni kan, ahpw kumwail kin pwongih Koht mehlel oh ieiaso, oh me kumwail kasikasik kamwakelpen dipamwail akan, sang ni pwoson poatoapoat, me pahn kohdo.

7 Pwe kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me soahng tohto pahn kohdo; oh kilang, mie ehu me keieu kesempwalasang koaros—pwe kilang, ahnsou kerendohr me Soundoaro ieias oh e pahn ketido rehn sapwellime aramas akan.

8 Kilang, I sohte nda me e pahn ketido rehtail ni ahnsou me e pahn ketiket nan paliwar en mour wet; pwe kilang, Ngehno sohte mahsanihong ie me ih met me pahn wiawi. Met I sohte wehwehki soahng wet; ahpw I uwen me I wehwehki me, me Kauno Koht sapwellimaniki manaman en wia soahng koaros nin duwen sapwellime mahsen.

9 Ahpw kilang, iet uwen me Ngehno ketin mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Kalohngkihong aramas pwukat, oh ndindahiong irail—Kumwail koluhla, oh kaunopada ahl en Kauno, oh weid nan sapwellime ahl kan, me inen; pwe kilang, wehin nanleng kerendohr, oh Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido pohn sampah.

10 Oh kilang, e pahn ipwidisang rehn Mery, nan Serusalem me wia sahpw en atail pahpa kahlapoko, liho wia meipwon men, e rasehng dahl kesempwal oh pilipida ehu, me manaman en Ngehn Sarawi pahn kipehdi oh kaliseianda, oh kaipwiedi pwutak, iei, Sapwellimen Kohto.

11 Oh e pahn ketiwei, oh ketin lokolongki medek kan oh kahpwal akan oh kasongosong kan koaros; oh met pwehki mahseno en kak pweida me ketihtihki me e pahn ketin alehdamedek koaros oh soumwahu koaros me sapwellime aramas akan pahn tungoalenki.

12 Oh e pahn pwoula, pwe en kak sapwadada selin mehla me saliedi sapwellime aramas akan; oh e pahn ketin alehda arail luwet akan, pwe nan kapehde en ketin audaudiki kupwur kalahngan, nin duwen paliwar, pwe en mwahngi nin duwen paliwar mwomwen eh pahn ketin sowese sapwellime aramas akan nin duwen arail luwet akan.

13 Met Ngehno mwahngi soahng koaros; ahpw Sapwellimen Kohto ketin lokolok nan paliwar pwe en kak ketikihda dihp en sapwellime aramas akan, pwe en kak ketikihsang arail dihp akan sang ni sapwellime manaman en kapitala; oh met kilang, iei kadehde wet me mih rehi.

14 Met I ndaiong kumwail me kumwail anahne koluhla, oh ipwsapahl; pwe Ngehno ketin mahsanih ma kumwail sohte pahn ipwsapahl kumwail sohte kak sohsohki wehin nanleng; eri, kohdo oh papidaisla sang koluhla, pwe dipamwail akan en kak kamwakelsang, pwe kumwail en kak pwosonla Sihmpwul en Kohto, me ketikihsang dihp akan en sampah, me sapwellimanki kehl en kamaurala oh kamwakelehsang mour en wiewia suwed kan.

15 Ei, I ndaiong kumwail kohdo oh dehr masak, oh pwilikihdi dihp koaros, me kin mengei en kaluwetehla kumwail, me saliehdi kumwail ong kamwomwomwla, ei, kohdo oh kohwei, oh kasalehiong amwail Koht me kumwail inengieng koluhkihla dipamwail akan oh inoukihong me kumwail pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan, oh kadehdehiong ih rahnwet ni amwail pahn kohdihla nan pihl en papidais.

16 Oh mehmen me pahn wia met, oh kolokol kosonned en Koht akan sang ahnsou wet kohla, aramas pahn tamataman me I ndaiong ih, ei, e pahn tamataman me I ndaiong ih, me e pahn ahneki mour soutuk, nin duwen kadehde en Ngehn Sarawi, me kadehdehiong ie.

17 Oh met riei kesempwaloko, kumwail kamehlele mepwukat? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, ei, I ese me kumwail kamehlele; oh mwomwen ei ese me kumwail kamehlele iei sang ni kadehde en Ngehno me ketiket rehi. Oh met pwehki amwail pwoson kehlail met, ei, duwen soahng kan me I koasoiahier, I ahneki peren laud.

18 Pwe nin duwen ei ndaiong kumwail nin tapio, me I ahneki kapwoaroapwoar laud me kumwail sohte mihmi nan irair en apwal me riomwail akan mih loale, eri I diaradahr me ei koapworopwor pweidahr.

19 Pwe I kasawiadahr me kumwail mih nan ahl mwahu kan; I kasawiadahr me kumwail mih nan ahl me kohla nan wehin Koht; ei, I kasawiadahr me kumwail kakainenehla sapwellime ahl akan.

20 I kasawiadahr me e sansalehng kumwailehr, sang ni kadehde en sapwellime mahsen, me e sohte kak keid nan ahl pirek kan; de pil wekid dahme e mahsaniher; de pil mwomwen men wetsang pali meing kohla pali maun, de sang dahme mwahu kohlahng dahme sapwung; eri, sapwellime ahl kin wie pidipidek kohkohlahte.

21 Oh e sohte kin ketiket nan tehnpas me sohte sarawi kan; oh pil sohte mehkot samin de soahng kan me sohte mwakelekel alahldi nan wehin Koht; eri I ndaiong kumwail me ahnsou pahn kohdo, ei, oh e pahn wiawi ni imwin rahno, me mehmen me samin pahn pil samsaminte.

22 Oh met riei kesempwal akan, I ndaiong kumwailehr mepwukat pwe I en kak kapirkumwailda ong amwail pwukoa ong Koht, pwe kumwail en kak alialu ni mwakelekel mwowe, pwe kumwail en kak weweid nan ahl en koasoandi sarawi en Kohto, nin duwen me kumwail malipilipiongehr.

23 Oh met I men kumwail en karakarahk, oh mpai oh kadek; mengei en alehda kaweid; diren kanengamah oh nannati nan apwal; kin kaunda nsenemwail kan nan soahng koaros; kin loalloapwoat kolokol kosonned en Koht akan ahnsou koaros; kin kapakapki soahng koaros me kumwail anahne, nan pali ngehn oh paliwar; kin kapikapingkihong Koht ahnsou koaros soahng kan koaros me kumwail alehdi.

24 Oh tehk mwahu me kumwail ahneki pwoson, koapworopwor, oh limpoak unsek, oh kumwail ahpw pahn kin kalapw wiewia doadoahk mwahu kan.

25 Oh Kauno en ketin kapai kumwail, oh kolokol mwakelekel en amwail karmend kan, pwe kumwail en kak iang mwohndi rehn Eipram, Aisek, oh Seikop, oh soukohp sarawi kan me kohdohier sangete ni tepin sampah, ni amwail karment kan pahn mwakelekel duwehte arail karmend kan, nan wehin nanleng oh sohte pahn pwurehng pidohi.

26 Oh met riei kesempwal akan, I koasoiahiong kumwail mahsen pwukat nin duwen Ngehno en ketin kadehdeh ong ie; oh palingeniet perenda kowahlap, pwehki ahmwail loalloapwoat mehlel oh amwail kin rongorong ei kaweid.

27 Oh met, popohl en Koht en ieiang kumwail, oh nan imwamwail akan oh sapwemwail akan, rehn noumwail pelin sihpw oh kou kan, oh soahng koaros me kumwail ahneki, amwail pwoud kan oh noumwail seri kan, nin duwen amwail pwoson oh doadoahk mwahu kan, sang met oh kohkohla. Oh iei met me I koasoiahier. Ahmen.
alma 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kalohk oh wia papidais nan Mihlek—Mehn Amonaia kan soikala oh ih kohkohla—Tohnleng men mahnsanihiong en pwurala oh kalohngkihong aramas akan en koluhla—Amulek kasamwo ih, oh ira riemen kalohk nan Amonaia. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo Alma pwurasang nan sahpw en Kidion, mwurin eh padahkihongehr aramas en Kidion kan soahng tohto me sohte kak ntingdi, oh e koasonedier koasondi en nan mwomwohdiso, nin duwen eh wiadahr nan sahpw en Saraemla, ei, e ahpw pwurala nan pein imwe nan Saraemla pwe en komoal pwehki doadoahk me e wiahier.

2 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr keduwau en mwehi en sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

3 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr keisek en mwehi en sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Alma mweselsang mwo oh seiloakala nan sahpw en Mihlek, pali kapi en pilap en Saidon, me mih pali kapi karanihte irepen sapwtehno.

4 E ahpw tepida padahkih aramas akan nan sahpw en Mihlek nin duwen koasoandi sarawi en Koht, me e malipilipiong; oh e tepida padahkih aramas akan nan sahpw en Mihlek pwon.

5 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw kohdo reh sang ni irepen sahpwo wasa me salahng sapwtehno. Oh irail tohn wasa ko ahpw papidaislahr nan sahpwo;

6 Eri ni ahnsou me e kaimwsekala ah doadoahk nan Mihlek e ahpw mweselsang, oh seilongki erein rahn siluh ni paliepeng en sahpw en Mihlek; oh e kohdo nan kahnihmw ehu me kahdaniki Amonaia.

7 Met e wia tiahk en aramas en Nihpai kan en kin kahdaniki eden sapwerail akan, oh arail kahnihmw kan, oh arail kousapw akan, ei, arail kousapw tikitik koaros, eden aramas me tepin sapwasapw wasahu; oh iei met me wiawihong sahpw en Amonaia.

8 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Alma kohdo nan kahnihmw en Amonaia e ahpw tepida kalohngki mahsen en Koht ong irail.

9 Met Sehdan koledi kehlail mohngiong en aramas en nan kahnihmw en Amonaia; eri irail sohte men rong mahsen akan en Alma.

10 Ahpw Alma doadoahk laud ni palingeni, nannantihong kapakap kehlail ong Koht, pwe en ketin ketikihong sapwellime Ngehno rehn aramas akan me mih nan kahnihmwo; pwe en pil kak mweidehng en papidaisirailla sang ni ar koluhla.

11 Ahpw, irail kakeluwakala mohngiongarail kan, oh ndaiong ih: Kilang, se ese me kowe Alma; oh se ese me ke wia samworo lapalap nan mwomwohdiso me ke wiahda wasa tohto nan sahpw akan, nin duwen amwail tiahk; oh se sohte iang ahmw mwomwohdiso, oh se sohte kamehlele tiahk mwahl akan.

12 Oh met se ese me pwehki aht sohte iang ahmw mowomwohdiso se ese me sohte ahmw manaman reht; oh ke kihongehr sehr en sounkopwungo rehn Nihpaia; eri ke sohte wia aht sounkopwung.

13 Eri ni ahnsou me aramas akan ndahier met, oh pelianda ah koasoai koaros, oh kauwe, oh kandipih, oh wiahda en pakasarasang nan arail kahnihmwo, e mweselda oh kohkohlahng kahnihmw me kahdaniki Aron.

14 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e wie kohkohla, nan eh toutoukilahr ah pahtou, seiseiloak nan kahpwal oh lokolok ni palingehn, pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas me mih nan kahnihmw en Amonaia, kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma toutoukilahr eh pahtou, kilang tohnleng en Kauno men pwarohng, mahsanih:

15 Meid pai kowe, Alma; eri, sarada oh perenda, pwe mie kahrepe lap me ke pahn pereniki; pwe ke kin loaloapwoatieng kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan sangete ahnsou me ke tepin alehdi rohng sang ih. Kilang, ngehi me wahdo rohngo rehm.

16 Oh kilang, I pekederido pwe I en ndaionguhk ke en pwurowei nan kahnihmw en Amonaia, oh pwurehng kalohk ong aramas en kahnihmwo; ei, kalohk ong irail. Ei, ndaiong irail, ma re sohte pahn koluhla Kauno Koht pahn kamwomwirailla.

17 Pwe kilang, irail wie koaskoasoneahnsou wet me irail pahn kawehla saledek en noumwail aramas akan, (pwe Kauno me ketin mahsanih) met kin uhwong koasondi kan, oh kopwung kan, oh kosonned akan me e ketikihongehr sapwellime aramas akan.

18 Met kedekedeo mwurin Alma eh alehdier rohngo sang tohnleng en Kauno e ahpw mwadangete pwurala nan sahpw en Amonaia. E ahpw pidelong nan kahnihmwo ni ehu ahl, ei, ni ahl me mih pali eir en kahnihmw en Amonaia.

19 Oh ni ahnsou me e pidelong nan kahnihmwo e udahn men mwonge, ih ahpw ndaiong ohl emen: Komw kak sowesehki sapwellimen Koht ladu karakarahket ekis kisin tungoal?

20 Ohlo ahpw patohwanohng ih: Ngehi emen Mehn Nihpai, oh I ese me komwi sapwellimen Koht soukohp sarawi, pwe komwi ohl me tohnlengo mahsanih nan auramano: Ke pahn kasamwoh. Eri, iang ie kohla nan imweio oh I pahn patohwanehng komwi kenei mwonge kan; oh I ese me komw pahn kapaiehda oh imweio.

21 Kedekedeo ohlo kasamwohlong ih nan imwehu; oh ohlo adaniki Amulek; e ahpw patohwandohng Alma pilawa oh uduk pwe en tungoale.

22 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw tungoalehier pilawa oh medila; oh e ahpw kapaiada Amulek oh imwehu, oh e kaping kalahngankihong Koht.

23 Oh mwurin eh mwongehier oh medila e ahpw ndaiong Amulek: Ngehi Alma, oh ngehi me wia samworo lapalap nan mwomwohdiso en Koht nan sahpw akan.

24 Oh kilang, I malipilipiong I en kalohngki mahsen en Koht rehn aramas pwukat koaros, nin duwen kaudiahl oh ngehn en kokohp; oh I kohdo nan sahpw wet oh irail sohte kasamwo ie, ahpw re kausiehla oh ngehi eri pahn sohpeisangehr sahpw wet kohkohlahte.

25 Ahpw kilang, I alehdi rohng me I pahn anahne pwurehng pwurodo oh kokohpehng aramas pwukat, ei, oh kadehdehiong irail duwen arail wiewia suwed kan.

26 Oh met, Amulek, pwehki ahmw kamwenge ie oh kasamwo ie, meid pai kowe; pwe I men mwongehda, pwehki ei kaisihsolki rahn tohto kei.

27 Oh Alma mihmi erein rahn kei rehn Amulek mwohn e tepida kalohk ong aramas akan.

28 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw kalaudehla arail wiewia suwed kan.

29 Oh mahsen ahpw kohdohng Alma, ketihtihki: Kohwei; oh pil ndaiong nei ladu Amulek, kohwei oh kokohpikihong aramas pwukat, ndinda—Kumwail koluhla, pwe Kauno me ketin mahsanih, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla I pahn pwarek aramas pwukat nan ei engieng; ei, oh I sohte pahn wekid ei engieng.

30 Oh Alma oh pil Amulek ahpw kohwei rehn aramas akan, kalkalohngkihong irail mahsen akan en Koht; oh Ngehn Sarawi ketin ieiang ira.
