31 Oh manaman kohieng ira, kahrehda ira sohte kak katengetengidi nan wasahn selidi me mih pahn pwehl; oh pil sohte aramas kak keirahla; ahpw ira sohte kin doadoahngki ara manaman lao lel ahnsou me re kin selidi oh lekideklong nan imweteng. Eri, met e wiawi pwe Kauno en kak kasalehda sapwellime manaman rehra.

32 Kedekedeo ira ahpw kohwei oh tepida kalohk oh kokohp ong aramas akan, nin duwen ngehno oh manaman me Kauno ketikihong ira.
alma 9:
Mahsen en Alma, oh pil mahsen en Amulek, me kalohkda ong aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en Amonaia. Oh ira pil lekideklong nan imweteng, oh pitila sang ni manaman kapwuriamwei en Koht me mih rehra, nin duwen poadoapoad en Alma.

Audaudki iralaud 9 lel 14.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma mahsanihong aramas en Amonaia re en koluhla—Kauno pahn mahkohng Mehn Leimen kan ni imwin rahn akan—Ma Mehn Nihpai kan pahn soikala maraino, irail pahn kamwomwomwla pahn Mehn Leimen kan—Sapwellimen Kohto kereniongehr ketido—E pahn kamaurala me pahn kohluhla, oh papidaisla, oh pwoson Mwarehu. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh ngehi, Alma, alehdier mahsen en Koht me I pahn kahrehda Amulek oh kohla oh pwurehng kalohk ong aramas pwukat, de aramas akan me mih nan kahnihmw en Amonaia, kedekedeo I ahpw tepida kalohkehng irail, irail ahpw tepida akamai ong ie, ndinda:

2 Ihs kowe? Ke medewe me se pahn kamehlele ahn emen aramas ah kadehde, ni eh pahn padahkihongkiht me sampah pahn sohrala?

3 Met irail sohte wehwehki mahsen kan me re koasoia; pwe irail sohte ese me sampah pahn sohrala.

4 Oh irail pil koasoia: Se sohte pahn kamehlele ahmw koasoi kan ma ke kohpada me kahnihmw kehlail wet pahn kamwomwomwla nan rahn ehu.

5 Met irail sohte wehwehki me Koht kak wia soangen doadoahk kapwuriamwei, pwe irail wia aramas mohngiong keptakai oh tepinwar kekeluwak.

6 Oh irail nda: Ihs Koht, me kadaredo aramas emente me sohte ah manaman rehn aramas pwukat, oh en kalohkihong irail mehlel en soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan?

7 Oh irail ahpw kesihnenda pwe irail en koliehdi; ahpw kilang, irail sohte kak. Oh I eimah nan ei kesihnen oh kalohkehng irail, ei, I kadehde ong irail ni eimah, ndinda:

8 Kilang, Kumwail dih suwed oh keptakai kei, ia duwen amwail kak monokehla tiahk en amwail pahpahko: ei, ia uwen mwadang en amwail kak monokehla sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

9 Kumwail sohte tamataman me atail pahpa, Lihai, wisikdo sang nan Serusalem sang nin limen Koht? Kumwail sohte ese me e ketin kahluwa irail koaros nan sapwtehno?

10 Oh kumwail mwadangen monokehla pak depe me e ketin doarehla atail pahpahko sang pahn manaman en arail imwintihti kan, oh doarehsang irail kamwomwala, iei pil sang pahn manaman en pein riarail kan?

11 Ei, oh ma sohte sampwellime manaman kehlailo, oh spawellime kalahngano, oh sapwellime kanengamah nan lokolongkinkitail, kitail sohte pahn pitsang kamakamalahsang pohn sampah mahso mwohn ahnsou wet, oh ele kohlahngehr nan mour en pahtou poatoapoat oh meid suwed.

12 Kilang, met I ndaiong kumwail me e ketin mahsanihong kumwail en koluhla; oh ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla, kumwail sohte pahn sohsohki wehin Koht. Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ih koaros met—e ketin mahsanihong kumwail en koluhla, ma soh e pahn udahn ketin kemeikumwail sang pohn sampah; ei, e pahn pwarek kumwail nan sapwellime engieng, oh nin sapwellime engieng e sohte pahn sohpeisang.

13 Kilang, kumwail sohte tamataman mahsen akan me e mahsanihong Lihai, ketihtihki: Nin duwen amwail pahn kin kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo? Oh e pil mahsanih me: Ahpw ma kumwail sohte pahn kin kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekidekla sang mwohn sihlangi.

14 Met I men kumwail en tamataman, me nin duwen Mehn Leimen kan ar sohte kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, irail lekidekla sang mwohng silangin Kauno. Met kitail kilang me mahsen en Kauno pweidahier ni mahsen wet, oh Mehn Leimen kan lekideksangehr mwohn sihlangi, sang ni tepin arail wiahda diparail kan nan sahpwet.

15 Ahpw I ndaiong kumwail, me e pahn ekis mengei ong irail ni rahn en kopwungo sang kumwail, ma kumwail pahn mihmihte nan dipamwail kan, ei, oh pahn pil ekis mengei ong irail nan mour wet sang kumwail, ihte ma kumwail koluhla.

16 Pwe mie inou tohtoh kan me pahn kohieng Mehn Leimen kan; pwehki tiahk en arail pahpahko me kahrehda arail mihmihte nan mour en sawehwe; eri Kauno pahn mahkehng irail oh kareireiala arail momour pohn sahpwo.

17 Oh nan ehu ahnsou irail pahn kamehlelehda sapwellime mahseno, oh esehda tiahk sapwung kan en arail pahpahko; oh irail tohto pahn komourla, pwe Kauno pahn kahkehng irail me pahn kapakapiong ni mware.

18 Ahpw kilang, I ndaiong kumwail ma kumwail pahn wenlahte nan amwail wiewia suwed kan amwail rahn akan pahn sohte reirei nan sahpwe, pwe Mehn Leimen kan pahn kohdohng kumwail; oh ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla re pahn kohdohng kumwail nan ahnsou me kumwail sohte ese, oh kumwail udahn pahn kamwomwomwala; oh e pahn sang nin engieng en Kauno.

19 Pwe e sohte pahn mweidehng kumwail e momour nan amwail wiewia suwed kan, pwe kumwail en kawehla sapwellime aramas. I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; e pahn mweidehng Mehn Leimen kan en kamwomwla sapwellime aramas en Nihpai kan koaros, ma irail pahn pwupwidieng nan dihp akan oh kaukauwehla kosonned akan, mwurin arail pahn alehdier marain laud oh loalokong laud kohieng irail sang Kauno arail Koht;

20 Ei, mwurin arail wia aramas keniken laud rehn Kauno; ei, mwurin arail kenikenlahsang wehi teikan koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros; mwurin soahng koaros e sansalehng irailehr, nin duwen insenerail kan, oh arail pwoson, oh kapakap akan, ong dahme wiawiher, oh me wiwiawi, oh me pahn kohdo;

21 Mwurin Ngehn en Koht eh pwarek irailehr; mwurin arail koasoiengehr tohnleng kan, oh mwurin kepitien Kauno mahseniong irailehr; oh irail alehdier ngehn en kokohp, ngehn en kaundiahl, oh pil kisakis tohto kan, kisakis en koasoakoasoiki lokaia teikan, oh kisakis en kalkalohk, oh kisakis en Ngehn Sarawi, oh kisakis en kawehwehdi lokaia;

22 Ei, oh mwurin Koht e ketin wairailsang nan sahpw en Serusalem, sang nin limen Kauno; mwurin arail kamourla sang lehk, oh sang luhmwuhmw, oh soangsoangen soumwahu kan koaros; oh irail kakehlailla nan mahwin, pwe irail en dehr kamakamala; mwurin arail kapitsangehr nan mour en kalidu nan ahnsou kan, oh mwurin arail silasildi oh poadoandoarla lel met; oh irail pweida lao irail kepwehpwehla nan soahngen dipwisou koaros—

23 Oh met kilang I ndaiong kumwail, ma aramas pwukat, me alehdier kapai tohto kan sang nin limen Kauno, pahn wiahda dihp ong marain oh loalokong me irail alehdier, I ndaiong kumwail ma met pahn wiawi, ma re pahn pwupwidi nan dihp, e pahn ekis mwahuong Mehn Leimen kan sang irail.

24 Pwe kilang, sapwellimen Kauno inou kan kaunopehngehr Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw e sohte pahn kohieng kumwail ma kumwail wiahda dihp; pwe Kauno sou kin inouki ni sansal oh mahsanih ni inen, me ma kumwail pahn uhwong ih kumwail udahn pahn kamwomwalahsang pohn sampah?

25 Eri pwehki kahrepe wet, me kumwail sohte pahn kamwomwkihla, Kauno ketin kadaredo sapwellime tohnleng en pwarek sapwellime aramas tohto, kalkalohkihong irail me re pahn anahne kohwei oh kalohk kehlail ong aramas pwukat, ndinda: Kumwail koluhla, pwe wehin nanleng kerendohr;

26 Oh ahnsou kerendohr me Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido nan sapwellime lingan; oh sapwellime lingan pahn sang lingan en Iehros en Sahmo, diren kalahngan, pahrek, oh mehlel, diren kanengamah, mahk, oh kanengamah nan lokolok, kin mwadang en rong pekipek en sapwellime aramas akan oh sapeng arail kapakap akan.

27 Oh kilang, e pahn ketido pwe en kamaurala irail akan me pahn papidaisla sang ni ar koluhla, pwehki ar pwoson mwareo.

28 Eri, kumwail kaunopada ahl en Kauno, pwe ahnsou kerendohr me aramas koaros pahn ale isepen arail doadoahng kan, nin duwen dahme irail wia—ma irail wiewia pwung irail pahn ale komourla ong palingenerail akan, nin duwen manaman oh komour en Sises Krais; oh ma irail wiewia suwed irail pahn ale lekideklahn palingenerail akan, nin duwen manaman oh kalidu en tepilo.

29 Met kilang, iet kepitien tohnlengo, me kalikalohngkihong aramas akan.

30 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, pwe kumwail iei riei, oh kumwail kesempwal, oh kumwail anahne kohdo wia doadoahk kan me konehng ong koluhla, pwehki amwail mohngiong kan udahn keptakaila ong mahsen en Koht, oh pwehki kumwail aramas salongala oh pwupwidi.

31 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me ngehi, Alma, koasoiahier mahsen pwukat, kilang, aramas ko lingeringerda pahi pwehki ei ndaiong irail me re wia aramas mohngiong keptakai oh tepinwar kekeluwak.

32 Oh pil pwehki ei ndaiong irail me re wia aramas salongala oh pwupwidi irail udahn lingeringer pahi, oh song en koliehdi, pwe irail en kak keseiehlong nan imweteng.

33 Ahpw kedekedeo Kauno sohte mweidehng irail en aleie ahnsouo oh keseiehlong nan imweteng.

34 Kedekedeo Amulek kohla oh kesihnenda, oh pil tepida kalohk ong irail. Oh met mahsen kan en Amulek sohte ntingdi ni unsek, ahpw ekei eh mahsen kan me ntingdi nan pwuhk wet.
alma 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihai wia kadaudok en Manase—Amulek koasoiahda mahsen en tohnlengo me e pahn sewese Alma—Kapakap en me mour pwung kan kin doarehla aramas akan—Sounsawas en kosonned oh sounkopwung mour mwersuwed kan kin wiewiahda poahsoan en kamwomwomwlahn aramas akan. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri iet mahsen kan me Amulek kalohkihong aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en Amonaia, me ketihtihki:

2 Ngehi Amulek; Ngehi iei nein Kidona pwutak, me wia nein Ismael pwutak, me wia kadaudok en Aminadai; oh Aminadai me kawehwehda ntingko me ntingdi ni dihd en tehnpas sarawio, me ntingdi sang nin limen Koht.

3 Oh Aminadai wia kadaudok en Nihpai, me wia nein Lihai pwutak, Lihai me kohdo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, me wia kadaudok en Manase, me wia nein Sosep pwutak, Sosep me rie ko netikihla nan Isip.

4 Oh kilang, ngehi I pil wia aramas me ndand rehn aramas koaros me kin ese ie; ei, oh kilang, ei peneinei oh kempoakepahi me tohto, oh I pil ahneki kepwe tohto sang pein ei koahiek en doadoahk.

5 Ahpw, mehndahte soahng pwukat koaros, I sohte kin wehwehki mwahu sapwellimen Kauno ahl akan, oh sapwellime me rir kan oh manaman kapwuriamwei kan. I koasoia me I sohte wehwehki mwahu mepwukat; ahpw kilang, I sapwung, pwe I kilangehr sapwellime me rir kan oh sapwellime manaman kapwuriamwei; iei, ong ni poadoandoarlahn mour en aramas pwukat.

6 Ahpw, I kakeptakaiala mohngiongi, pwe I kin alehdi malipilip pak tohto oh I sohte kin rong; eri I wehwehki duwen mepwukat, ahpw I sohte kin men ese; eri I kin wie kahkahngohdiong Koht, nan ei mohngiong eh kin suwed, lao lel kapahieu en rahn en sounpwung keisuh wet, me iei keisek en pahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

7 Ni ei wie kohkohlahng mwomweit rehn emen kisehi ko me keren, kilang tohnleng en Kauno men ahpw pwarohng ie oh mahsanih: Amulek, pwurowei ni pein imwomwo, pwe ke pahn kamwenge soukohp en Kauno men; ei, ohl sarawi men, me wia sapwellimen Koht ohl pilipilda; pwe e wie kaikaisihsolki erein rahn kei pwehki dipen aramas pwukat, oh e men mwengedahr, oh ke pahn kasamwohlong nan imwomw oh kamwenge, oh e pahn kapaiaiukada oh tohn imwomwo; oh kapai en Kauno pahn ieianguhk oh tohn imwomwo.

8 Kedekedeo I ahpw peikiong kepitien tohnlengo, oh pwuralahng imweio. Oh ni ei wie kohkohlahng wasao I diarada ohl me tohnlengo mahsanihong ie: Ke pahn kasamwohlong nan imwomw—oh kilang ihte ohlohte met me wie mahmahsenihiong kumwail duwen mehkan me pid Koht.

9 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihong ie me ih iei ohl sarawi men; eri I ese me ih iei ohl sarawi men pwehki tohnleng en Koht me mahsanih.

10 Oh pil, I ese me mehkan me e kadehdehkier kan me mehlel; pwe kilang I ndaiong kumwail, me nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, e pil ketin kadaredohr sapwellime tohnleng en kasalehiong ie mepwukat; oh e ketin wiahier ni ahnsou me Alma wie ketiket ni imweio.

11 Pwe kilang, e kapaiahdahr tohn imweio, e kapaiehda, oh nei lih akan, oh nei seri kan, oh semei oh ei peneinei kan; iei, ei keinek koaros e kapaiahda, oh sapwellimen Kauno kupwuramwahu mihmiher poht nin duwen mahsen akan me e mahsaniher.

12 Eri, ahnsou me Amulek koasoia mepwukat aramas akan tepida pwuriamwei, pwehki irail kilangehr me soun kadehde tohtohsang emen me kadehdehier soahng kan me irail dipkihdahr, oh pil kadehdehkier soahng kan me pahn kohdo, nin duwen ngehn en kokohp me mih rehra.

13 Ahpw, mie ekei rehrail me medewehda re en song kapeideki ira, pwe re en song en doadoahngki arail koasoandi en mwersuwed kan pwe re en lidipihirahdi nan ara koasoi kan, pwe re en kak wiahki mehn kedipa ira, pwe re en kak pangala rehn arail sounkopwung kan pwe ira en kak pakadeingkihda kosonnedo, oh pwe ira en kak kamakamala de lekdeklong nan imweteng, nin duwen dihp me irail pahn song en wiahiong ira de kedipahkin ira.

14 Eri ih irail aramas pwuko me songosong en kauweirahla, iei sounsawas en kosonned akan, me kin wia doadoahk de aramas akan kin pilada pwe re en katanga kosonnedo ahnsou en arail karongorong kan, de ahnsou en karongorong en dipen aramas akan mwohn sounkopwung kan.

15 Met sounsawas en kosonned pwukat loalokongkilahr wiepen widing oh pitiehdi aramas; oh met pwe en elehiong irail en kak koahiek nan arail doadoahk.

16 Kedekedeo irail ahpw tepida peidek rehn Amulek, pwe re en kak wiahiong en sapwungala nan eh koasoi, de kasapwungepeseng mahsen akan me e pahn koasoia.

17 Ahpw irail sohte ese me Amulek kak wehwehki arail koasoandi widing kan. Ahpw ni ahnsou me irail tepida peidek reh, eh wehwehki arail madamadau kan, e ahpw ndaiong irail: Kumwail dih mwersuwed oh dipan, kumwail sounsawas en kosonned oh aramas liksansalamwahu kei, pwe kumwail wiewiahda poahsoan en tepilo; pwe kumwail wiwiahda lidip kan oh nsar akan pwehn koledi me sarawi kan en Koht.

18 Kumwail kin koasoanehdi koasoandi kan pwehn kasapwunge koasoandi pwung kan, oh pahn kahrehiong engiengin Koht eh pahn kohdiong pohmwail, lao aramas pwukat uhdahn pahn kamwomwomwla.

19 Ei, e pwung dahme Mosaia, me wia kaimwiseklahn atail namwarikio, mahsanihero, ni ansou me e pahn pwilikihdi pwukoahn wehio, pwehki sohte me e pahn kasapwiliong, oh e koasonehdi me aramas pwukat en mih pahn manaman en arail pilipil—ei, e pwung ni eh mahsanih me e pahn lel ahnsou me aramas akan pahn tepida pilada wiewia suwed, iei me, ma ahnsouo pahn leledo me aramas pwukat pahn pwupwudiong nan dihp, irail pahn nektehn kamwomwomwla.

20 Oh met I ndaiong kumwail me Kauno kin ketin kadeik amwail wiewia suwed kan nin duwen me pwung; e kin ketin kapitie laudida mahsanih ong aramas pwukat, sang ni mahsen en sapwellime tohnleng kan mahsanih: Kumwail koluhla, koluhla, pwe wehin nanleng kerendohr.

21 Ei, e pwung eh ketin kapitie laudida, sang ni mahsen en sapwellime tohnleng kan mahsanih: I pahn kohdihwei nanpwungen nei aramas akan, oh kapwungki pahrek oh pwung nan ei manaman.

22 Ei, oh I ndaiong kumwail ma sohte kapakap en aramas me mour pwung kan, me kin mihmi nan sahpwet, kumwail pahn kamwomwomwlahr ahnsou wet; ahpw e sohte pahn sang ni nohlik, duwehte me wiawihong aramas nan mwehin Noha, ahpw e pahn sang ni lehk, oh soumwahu lusulus, oh mahwen.

23 Ahpw sang ni kapakap en me mour pwung kan me kin doandoarei kumwail; eri met, ma kumwail pahn kasarehla me mour pwung kan rehmwail, eri sohte me kak pelianda kupwuren Kauno; ahpw e pahn ketin kaloke kumwail nan sapwellime engieng kowahlap; kumwail ahpw pahn lokolongki lehk, oh soumwahu lusulus, oh mahwen; oh e kereniongehr pahn wiawi ihte ma kumwail kohluhla.

24 Oh met aramas ako uhdahn lingeringerda pahn Amulek, oh irail werikihla, ndinda: Ohl menet kauwe atail kosonned akan me pwung, oh kauwe neitail sounsawas en kosonned loalokong kan me kitail piladahr.

25 Ahpw Amulek kapahwei peh kan, oh ngihl laudidi werkihong irail: Kumwail dih mwersuwed oh dipan, dahme kahrehda Sehdan koledi teng nan mohngiongamwail kan? Dahme kumwail men mweidohng Sehdan en ahneki manaman pohmwail, en karotongehla masamwail kan, pwe kumwail en dehr wehwehki mahsen kan me kumwail kin rongrong, nin duwen eh mehlel?

26 Pwe kilang, dah, I kadkadeik amwail kosonned? Kumwail sohte wehwehki; kumwail nda me I kadkadeik amwail kosonned; ahpw kaidehn me I wia, ahpw ei koasoi utungada amwail kosonned, a kumwail pahn pakadeingkihda.

27 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me poahsoan en kamwomwomwalahn aramas pwukat e tepier wiewiawihda sang noumwail sounsawas en kosonned oh sounkopwung mwersuwed kan.

28 Oh met ni ahnsou me Amulek koasoiahier mahsen akan, aramas ako werkihong, ndinda: Met kitail esehier me ohl menet seri en tepilo, pwe e likamw; pwe eh kadkadeik atail kosonned. Oh met e nda me eh koasoi sohte uhwong.

29 Oh pil, e lahlahwe neitail sounsawas en kosonned akan, oh atail sounkopwung kan.

30 Kedekedeo sounsawas en kosonned akan koasoanehdi nan mohngiongarail kan me re pahn tamataman mepwukat pwe re pahn kedipahki ih.

31 Oh mie emen rehrail me adaniki Sihesrom. Met ih me keieu song en kedipa Amulek oh Alma, pwehki e wia emen me keieu semen nan pwungarail, oh pwehki e kin kalapw wia doadoak rehn aramas akan.

32 Eri kahrepen sounsawas en kosonned ar kin wia arail doadoahk iei pwe irail ale isais; oh irail kin alehkihdi isais sang nin duwen ar doadoahk me re wia.
alma 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Koasoandi en Mwohni en Mehn Nihpai kan kawehwehda—Amulek akamaiong Sihesrom—Krais sohte pahn kamourala aramas akan nan diparail akan—Ihte me pahn sohsohki wehin nanleng me pahn komourla—Aramas koaros pahn iasadahng mour poatopoat—Sohte mehla mwurin Iasadao. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri e mi nan kosonned en Mosaia me emen emen aramas me pahn wia sounkopwung en kosonnedo, de me pilipilda en wia sounkopwung, e pahn kin ale isepe nin duwen ahnsou me e pahn wia doadoahk en kapwung irail akan me pahn kin kohdohng kopwung.

2 Met ma aramas men pahn pweipwand ong emen, oh e sohte kapwungala eh pweipwando, e pahn kedipada rehn sounkopwungo, oh sounkopwung kin doadoahngki eh manaman, oh kadarala pilismen kan rehn aramaso pwe en pakahrdo reh ni mwoahlo; oh e pahn kadeik aramaso nin duwen kosonnedo oh kadehde kan me kedipahda ih, oh aramaso pahn idihdiong en pwainla dahme e pweipwandkio, de eh kepwe kan pahn kohsang, de e pahn kasarehsang rehn aramas akan nin duwen lipirap men de mehn kulih.

3 Oh sounkopwungo kin ale isepe nin duwen ansou me e doadoahngki—sihnain en kohl ong rahn ehu, de sihnum en silper, me pahrekiong sihnain en kohl; oh met iei nin duwen kosonnedo me wiawihda.

4 Eri iet eden ehu ehu neirail kohl kan, oh neirail silper kan, nin duwen uwen pweine. Oh Mehn Nihpai kan me wiahda ahd akan, pwe re sohte kin doadoahngki wiepen wadawad en mwohni en mehn Suhs akan nan Serusalem; de pil sosohngpen dipwisou nin duwen en mehn Suhs akan; ahpw re wekidala wiepen arail wadawad oh sosohng, nin duwen madamadau oh irair en aramas akan, nan ehu ehu dih, loa lel mwehin sounkopwung kan, re ahpw koasoansoandier sang nanmwarki Mosaia.

5 Eri wiepen wadawad en mwohni—sihnain en kohl, sihon en kohl, soam en kohl, oh limna en kohl.

6 Sihnum en silper, amnor en silper, esrom en silper, oh ondai en silper.

7 Sihnum en silper ehu pahrekiong sihnain en kohl ehu, oh koaros kak alehda sosohng ehu en parli, oh pil sosohng ehu en werentuhk koaros.

8 Met uwen sihon en kohl ehu pahrekiong sihnain en kohl riau.

9 Oh soam en kohl ehu pahrekiong sihon en kohl riau.

10 Oh limna en kohl ehu pahrekiong koaros patpene.

11 Oh amnor en silper ehu pahrekiong sihnum en silper riau.

12 Oh esrom en silper ehu pahrekiong sihnum en silper pahieu.

13 Oh ondai en silper ehu pahrekiong koaros patpene.

14 Met iei wadawad en nempe tikitik kan en arail wadawad en mwohni—

15 Siplon ehu uwehte elep en sihnum en silper; eri, siplon ehu kak alehda elep en sosohng en parli.

16 Oh siplum ehu uwehte elep en siplan.

17 Oh luh ehu wehte elep en siplum.

18 Iei met nerail nempe kan, nin duwen arail kin wadawad mwohni.

19 Eri andian en kohl ehu uwehte siplon siluh.

20 Eri, uhdahn kahrepeteieu iei pwe irail en kepwehpwehla, pwe re kin ale iseparail nin duwen arail doadoahk, eri, irail kin kamwakidada aramas akan re en moromorada, oh wia soangen pingiping oh wiewia suwed koaros, pwe re en kak ahneki diren doadoahk, pwe re en kak ale mwohni nin duwen aramas kin leleki emen ni mwoalen kopwong me kin pwarada mwohrail; eri irail kin kamwakamwakid aramas akan re en uhwong Alma oh Amulek.

21 Oh Sihesrom menet tepida peidek rehn Amulek, ndinda: Ke kak sapeng ekei kalelapak me I pahn idek rehmw? Met Sihesrom emen ohl koahiek nan wiepen doadoahk en tepilo, pwe en kak kauwehla dahme mwahu; eri, e idek rehn Amulek: Ke kak sapeng kalelapangkan me I pahn kihong uhk?

22 Oh Amulek sapengkihong: Ei, ma iei kupwur en Ngehn en Kauno, me ieiang ie; pwe I sohte pahn nda mehkot me uhwong Ngehn en Kauno. Oh Sihesrom ahpw ndaiong ih: Kilang, iet ondai en silper weneu, oh mehkan koaros I pahn kihong uhk ma ke pahn lahlahwe ieias en Enihlap.

23 Amulek ahpw nda: Kowe seri en ehl, dahme ke kasongosongehkin ie? Ke sohte ese me aramas mour pwung sohte kin dukieng soangen kasongosongen?

24 Ke kamehlele me mie Koht? I ndaionguhk, Soh, ke ese me mie Koht, ahpw pwehki ke poakohng mwohni laudsang ih.

25 Oh met ke pitipitih ie mwohn Koht. Ke ndaiong ie—Kilang iet ondai weneu, me uwen mwohni laud, I pahn kihonguhk—ni omw koasoanehdier nan mohngiongomw me ke sohte pahn kihong ie; oh ihte me ke mwahuki me I en lahlahwe Koht mehlel oh ieiaso, pwe ke en kak kawehkiniehla. Oh met kilang, ke pahn ale isepen omw wiewia suwed lap wet.

26 Oh Sihesrom idek reh: Ke nda me mie Koht mehlel oh ieias men?

27 Oh Amulek nda: Ei, Mie Koht mehlel oh ieias men.

28 Sihesrom ahpw idek: Mie Koht tohtohsang emen?

29 Oh e sapengki, Soh.

30 Sihesrom eri pwurehng idek reh: Ia mwomwen omw ese mepwukat?

31 Oh e nda: Tohnleng men me kasalehiong ie.

32 Oh Sihesrom pwurehng nda: Ihs ih me pahn kohdo? Iei ih Sapwellimen Kohto?

33 E ahpw sapeng nda, Ei.

34 Oh Sihesrom pwurehng idek: E pahn komourala sapwellime aramas akan nan diparail akan? Oh Amulek sapeng oh nda: I pahn ndaionguhk me e sohte kak, pwe e apwal ong ih en kasapwungehla sapwellime mahsen.

35 Sihesrom eri ndaiong aramas akan: Kumwail kilang oh tamataman mepwukat; pwe e nda me mie Koht emen; ahpw e nda me Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido, ahpw e sohte pahn kamourala sapwellime aramas akan—duhwete me e ahneki manaman en ruwese Koht.

36 Eri met Amulek pwurehng ndaiong: Kilang ke likamw, pwe ke nda me I koasoia me I ahneki manaman en ruwese Koht pwehki I nda me e sohte pahn komourala sapwellime aramas akan nan diparail akan.

37 Oh I ndaionguhk me e sohte kak kamourirailla nan diparail akan; pwe I sohte kak kasapwungehla sapwellime mahsen, oh e ketin mahsanih me sohte mehkot samin kak sohsohki wehin nanleng; eri, ia mwomwen omw pahn kak komourla, ma ke pahn sohsohki wehin nanleng? Eri, kumwail sohte kak komourla nan dipamwail akan.

38 Met Sihesrom pwurehng nda: Sapwellimen Kohto iei ih Sahm Soutuko?

39 Oh Amulek ahpw sapengkihong: Ei, ih me iei Sahm Soutuk en nanleng oh sampah, oh audapara koaros; ih me iei tapi oh imwi, me tepin oh me imwilahn mehkoaros;

40 Oh e pahn ketidihdo pohn sampah oh doarehla sapwellime aramas akan; oh e pahn kapwukoahki ih diparail akan me kamehlele mwareo; oh irail pwukat me pahn alehdi mour soutuk, oh komourla sohte pahn kohdo likin met.

41 Eri me suwed kan pahn duduwehte ni sohte poadoandoarla wiawihong irail, ihte me re pahn iang pitsang sahl en mehla; pwe kilang, ahnsou pahn kohdo me koaros pahn iasada sang mehla oh kesihnen mwohn silangin Koht, oh pakadeingkihda arail doadoahk kan.

42 Eri, mie mehla ehu me kahdaniki mehlahn paliwar; oh mehlahn Krais pahn sapwadada selipen mehlahn paliwar, kahrehda koaros pahn iasada sang mehlahn paliwar.

43 Ngehno oh paliwaro pahn pwurpene ni mwohmw unsek; peh oh neh koaros oh kakon kan pahn kopwurupwurlahng nan dewe, iei duwehte mwomwetail ahnsou wet; oh kitail pahn kohdo uh mwohn silangin Koht, oh kitail pahn ese duwehte atail ese ahnsou wet, oh tamataman ni sansal dipatail kan koaros.

44 Eri, kopwurupwurpenehn paliwar wet pahn wiawi ong aramas koaros, ong me mah oh me pwulopwul, me sensel oh me saledek, ong ohl oh lih, ong me suwed kan oh me mwahu kan; oh iei sohte apwoat pitenmoangerail akan pahn salongala; ahpw soahng koaros pahn kopwurupwurlahng nan dewe ni unsek, duwehte ansou wet, de nan paliwar, oh pahn kohdo oh kopwung mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais Iehroso, oh Koht Sahmo, oh Ngehn Sarawi, me iei Koht Soutuk tehmen, pwe re en pakadeingkihda arail wiewia kan, ma wiewia mwahu de ma wiewia suwed.

45 Met, kilang, I ndaiong kumwailehr duwen mehlahn paliwar, oh pil duwen iasadahn paliwar wet. I ndaing kumwail me paliwaratail kan pahn iasadahng mour poatopoat, me iei sang mehla, iei sang tepin mehla kolahng mour, pwe re en sohla kak pwurehng mehla; ngenerail akan pwurehng patehng paliwarerail kan, sohte pahn pwurehng tohrohrpeseng; eri waro kieweklahng palingehn oh poatopoat, me sohte pahn kak pwurehng mwerpeseng.

46 Eri met, ahnsou me Amulek kanekelahr mahsen pwukat aramas akan pwurehng tepida pwuriamweiki, oh pil Sihesrom tepida rerrer. Oh met kaimwisekalahn mahsen en Amulek, de ih uwen koaros me I ntingihedi.
alma 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma koasoiong Sihesrom—Sapwellimen Koht me rir kan kin kohiengete me loalopwoat kan—Aramas pahn pakadeikda sang ni arail madamadau kan, dahme re kamehlele kan, koasoi kan, oh wiewia kan—Me suwed kan pahn lokolongki mehlahn palingehn—Mour wet iei ahnsou en kounopada—Koasoandi en poadoandoarlao me kahrehiong Iasadao oh, sang ni pwoson, lapwepen dihp akan—Me koluhla kan pahn ale mahk sang Iehroso. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri met Alma kilangehr me en Amulek koasoi kan katokehdier Sihesrom, pwe e kilang me Amulek kalowedier ih nan eh likamw oh widing pwe en kauwehla ih, oh ni ahnsou me e kilang me e masepwehkada ni eh wehwehkidahr dipe kan, e ahpw tepida lokaiaiong ih, oh kalipwelipwe mahsen en Amulek kan, oh ekis kawehwehda laud soahng kei, de kawehwe iren pwuhk sarawi kan ni oaretik sang dahme Amulek wiahier.

2 Eri met aramas koaros me kapilpene wasao rong en Alma eh koasoi kan ong Sihesrom; pwe pokono me tohto mehlel, oh iet duwen eh koasoi:

3 Eri met Sihesrom, ke kilang omw dierekdahr nan ahmw likamw oh widing kan, pwe kaidehn ke wiahda likamw ongete aramas pwukat ahpw ke pil likamw ong Koht; pwe kilang, e ketin mwahngih omw madamadau kan, oh ke kilang me sapwellime Ngehno ketin kasalehiong kiht omw madamadau kan;

4 Oh ke kilang me se ese me omw koasoandi iei koasoandi en widing, duwehte widing en tepilo, pwe e kin likamw oh e kin pitih aramas pwukat pwe en kak wiahda re en uhwong kiht, lahlahwe kiht oh kasareikitala—

5 Met iei koasoandi en omw imwintihtio, oh e doahdoahngkier eh manaman rehmw. Met I men ke en tamataman me dahme I pahn ndaionguhk I ndaiong koaruhsie.

6 Oh kilang I ndaiong kumwail koaros me met mwekid en nsar en me suwedo, me e koasoanehdi pwe en lidipiheki aramas pwukat, pwe en kak kaloweikumwaildi pahn eh manaman, pwe en kak kapilkinkumwailpene nah selmete kan, pwe en kak salihkumwaildi kohlahng mehla soutuk, nin duwen eh manaman en kaliduwihla aramas.

7 Eri met, ni en Alma koasoiahier mahsen pwukat, Sihesrom tepida rerrer kowalahpie, pwe e tepier kamehlelehda manaman en Koht; oh e pil kamehlelehda me Alma oh Amulek ese duwen ih, pwe e kamehlelehda me ira wehwehki eh madamadau kan oh ineng kan en nan eh mohngiong; pwe manaman kohieng ira pwe re en kak ese duwen mepwukat nin duwen ngehn en kokohp.

8 Oh Sihesrom ahpw peki rehra ni ngidingid, pwe en kak esehla laud duwen wehin Koht. Ahpw idek rehn Alma: Ia wehwehn met me Amulek koasoia duwen iasadahn me mehla, me koaros pahn iasadahsang mehla, koaros me mwahu oh sohte mwahu, oh kesihnenda mwohn Koht pwe en ale kadeikpen arail doadoahng kan?

9 Oh met Alma tepida kawehwehiong ih mepwukat, koaskoasoia: E kin kohieng me tohto re en ese soahng rir kan en Koht; ahpw re kin mih pahn kehkehlik kehlail me re sohte pahn kasalehda ihte sang nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e pahn ketin mweidohng aramas akan, sang ni ar pahn rongorong oh loalopwoatohng ih.

10 Eri, mehmen me pahn mohngiong keptakai, e pahn alehdi pali tikitik en mahseno; oh mehmen me sohte pahn mohngiong keptakai, ong ih e pahn alehdi pali laud en mahseno, lao e pahn mweimweiong ih en esehla me rir kan en Koht lao e esehla koaros ni unsek.

11 Oh irail akan me pahn kakeptakaila mohngiongirail akan, re pahn ale pali tikitik en mahseno lao irail sohte ese duwen sapwellime me rir kan; oh tepilo pahn kaloweiraildi oh kaluwahkinirail nsene kohdilahng mehla. Met iei wehwehn selmetehn ehl.

12 Oh Amulek koasoiahda ni sansal duwen mehla, oh iasada sang nan mour wet kohlahng mour poatapoat, oh wisikdo mwohn mwoalen Koht, pwe en pakadeida nin duwen atail wiewia kan.

13 Eri ma mohngiongitail kan pahn keptakai, ei, ma kitail pahn kakeptakaila mohngiongitail kan ong mahseno, eri e pahn sohla mih loaletail, atail mour pahn sakanakanla, pwe kitail pahn lekdekla.

14 Pwe atail koasoi kan me pahn kedipei kitail, ei, atail wiewia kan koaros pahn kedipei kitail; kitail sohte pahn dierek mwakelekel; oh pil atail madmadau kan pahn kedipei kitail; oh nan mour sakanakano kitail pahn sohte men kilangdahng atail Koht; oh kitail pahn men ma kitail kak, ruwese takai kan oh nahna kan en pwupwudiong pohtail oh karukih kitail sang mwohn silangi.

15 Ahpw met sohte kak; kitail anahne kohdo oh kesihnenda mwohn silangin sapwellime lingan, oh sapwellime manaman, oh sapwellime roson, wahu, oh mweimwei en kaun, oh pohnese atail saroh poatoapoat me sapwellime kopwung koaros pwung; me e pwung nan sapwellime doadoahk koaros, oh me sapwellime kalahngan ong aramas koaros, oh me e ketin sapwellimaniki manaman en kamourala aramas koaros me kamehlele mware oh wiahier soang kan me kesempwal ong koluhla.

16 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail eri mehla ahpw pahn wiawi, iei mehla keriau, me iei mehlahn palingehn; eri ahnsouo ahpw pahn lel me irail akan me mehla nan dihperail kan, ni mehlahn paliwar, pahn pil mehkihla mehlahn palingehn; ei, e pahn mehla nin duwen soahng kan me pid mour pwung.

17 Eri ahnsouo irail me arail lokolok pahn duwehte lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me kin sekehkun wie lulul kohkohlahte; oh iei ansouo me re pahn pirapirdkihdi sel mete nan mehla soutuk, nin duwen manaman oh kalidu en Sehdan, pwehki e koliraildier nin duwen nsene.

18 Eri, met I ndaiong kumwail, ong irail e pahn duwehte me poadoandoarla sohte wiawihong irail; pwe re sohte kak komourla nin duwen spawellimen Koht pwuhng; oh re sohte kak mehla, pwehki re solahr kak mwerpeseng.

19 Eri kedekedeo mwurin en Alma eh mahsenier mepwukat, aramas ako tepida pwuripwuriamweila;

20 Ahpw mie emen me adaniki Andaiona, me keieu lapalap rehrail, kohdo oh ndaiong ih: Dahkot met me ke nda, me aramas pahn iasada sang mehla oh soangen mour en ahnsou wet pahn kieweklahng mour poatopoat, me ngehno sohla pahn kak mehla?

21 Ia wehwehn pwuhk sarawio, me mahsanih me Koht ketkiong serepim oh kedilahs lulul ni palimese en mwetuwel en Ihden, pwe tepin atail pahpa oh nohno ko de pedilong oh tungoale wahn tuhkehn komouro, oh momour kohkohlahte? Oh nan eh sansalehr me ira sohte kak en momour kohkohlahte.

22 Alma ahpw sapengki: Ih met me I pahn apwtehn kawehwehda. Met kitail kilang me Adam pwupwudi pwehki eh tungoalehda wahn tuhke me sohte mweimweio, nin duwen mahsen en Koht; oh met kitail kilang, me sang ni eh pwupwula, aramas koaros wiahla aramas salongala oh pwupwulahkei.

23 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me ma Adam kak en tungoale wahn tuhkehn komouro nan ahnsouo, e sohte pahn mie mehla, oh mahseno pahn sohla katepe, e pahn kahrehkihong Koht eh likamw, ni eh mahsaniher: Ma kumwa pahn tungoalehda kumwa uhdahn pahn mehla.

24 Oh kitail kilang me mehla kohiengehr aramas koaros, ei, mehla me Amulek koasoiadahr, me iei mehlahn mour wet; ahpw met mie ahnsou mweimweidahr ong aramas pwe re en kak koluhla; eri mour wet wialahr ahnsou en kaukaunop; ahnsou en kaunopada en tuhwong Koht; ahnsou en kounopadahng mour sohte imwio me se koasoiadahr; me iei mwurin iasadahn me mehlahr akan.

25 Met, ma e sohte pahn mie koasoandi en poadoandoaralao, me wiawihda sang ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda, e sohte pahn mie iasadahn me mehla; ahpw mie koasoandi en poadoandoarala wiawihda, me pahn kahrehda iasadahn me mehla, me se koasoiadahr.

26 Oh met kilang, ma tepin atail nohno oh pahpa kak kohla oh tungoalehda wahn tuhkehn komouro ira pahn pahtou kohkohlahte, ni ara sohte pahn ahneki ahnsou en kounopada; oh koasoandi en poadoandoaralao pahn sohte pweida, oh mahsen en Koht pahn sohla katepe.

27 Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ih mwomweo mwo; ahpw e koasoandi me aramas akan uhdahn pahn mehla; oh mwurin ar mehla, re pahn ale kadeik, iei kadeikohte me se koasoiadahr, me iei me pahn ni imwilao.

28 Oh mwurin Koht eh ketin koasoanehdi me mepwukat pahn kohieng aramas, kilang, eri e ketin mwahngih me e pahn konehng aramas en ese duwen soahng kan me e ketin koasonehdi ong irail;

29 Eri e ketin kadaralahng irail tohnleng kan pwe re en mahseniong irail, me kahrehda aramas akan kilangada sapwellime lingan.

30 Oh irail tepida sang ahnsouo kohla, kapakap ong ni mware; eri Koht ketin mahseniong aramas akan, oh ketin kasalehiong irail koasoandi en poadoandoaralao, me kaunopadahr sang ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda; oh met e kin ketin kasalehiong irail nin duwen arail pwoson oh koluhla oh arail doadoahk sarawi kan.

31 Eri, e ketikihong aramas akan kosonned akan, pwehki arail kauwehla tepin kosonned akan nin duwen soahng kan me kin mie ahnsou kis, oh re duwehla koht kei, duwen ar esehla me mwahu sang me suwed, kihong pein irail nan irair en pein mwekid, de mihla nan mour en kak pein mwekid sang ni pein nsenerail oh pein arail ineng kan, ong ma wia me suwed de wia me mwahu—

32 Eri Koht ketikihong irail kosonned akan mwurin eh ketin kasalehiong irail koasoandi en poadoandoaralao, me re sohte pahn wia me suwed, a kalokepe iei mehla keriauo, me iei mehla poatoapoat nin duwen soahng kan me doke mour pwung; pwe ong soahng wet koasoandi en poadoandoarlao sohte ahneki manaman powe, pwe doadoahk en pwuhng sohte kak en ohla, nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kupwur kadek.

33 Ahpw Koht ketin mahsanih ong aramas akan, ni mwaren Sapwellime Iehroso, (met iei koasoandi en poadoandoarala me wiawidahro) ketihtihki: Ma kumwail pahn koluhla, oh sohte ahneki mohngiong keptakai, eri I pahn mahkehng kumwail, sang rehn nei Iehroso;

34 Eri, mehmen me pahn koluhla, oh sohte ahneki mohngiong keptakai, e pahn alehdi mahk sang rehn nei Iehroso, ong kamwakelpen dipeh kan; oh irail me pahn pidelong wasahn ei kommoal.

35 Oh mehmen me pahn keptakaila eh mohngiong oh wiewia me suwed, kilang, I kahukihla nan ei lingeringer me e sohte pahn pedilong nan wasahn ei kommoal.

36 Oh met, riei ko, kilang I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail pahn kakeptakaila mohngiongimwail kan kumwail sohte pahn kak pedilong nan sapwellimen Kauno wasahn kommoal; eri amwail wiewia suwed kan pahn kahrehda eh pahn ketin kadaredo sapwellime engieng pohmwail duwehte ni tepin sapeiko, ei, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen ni imwiseklahn sapeiko, ei, duwehte ni tapio, ong kamwomwomwla poatopoat en amwail mour; eri, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen, ong mehla me pahn kaimwiseko, oh pil me pahn tapi.

37 Oh met, riei ko, pwehki atail ese mepwukat, oh eh mehlel, kitail koluhla, oh dehr kakeptakaila mohngiongitail kan, pwe kitail en dehr kahreda Kauno atail Koht en kadaredo sapwellime engieng pohtail nan sapwellime kosonned keriau akan me ketikiheng kitailehr; ahpw kitail pedilong nan sapwellimen Koht wasahn kommoal, me kaunopadahr nin duwen sapwellime mahsen.
alma 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ohl akan kin malipilipda nin duwen samworo lapalap pwehki arail pwoson mehlel oh arail doadoahk mwahu kan—Irail pahn kin padahngki kosonned akan—Sang ni arail mour pwung irail pahn sarawihkila oh pidelong nan sapwellimen Kauno wasahn kommoal—Melkisedek iei emen irail—Tohnleng kan wie kalokalohngki rongamwahu nan sahpw akan—Re pahn pakairkihda ahnsou en ketidohn Krais. Ele Sounpar 82 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh, riei ohl ako, I men amwail madamadau kan en medewe mahso ni ahnsou me Kauno Koht ketikihong sapwellime serihkan kosonned pwukat; oh I men kumwail en tamataman me Kauno Koht ketin kasarawiala samworo kan, nin duwen sapwellime koasoandi sarawio, me wia koasoandi en Sapwellimeo, pwe en padahkih mepwukat ong aramas akan.

2 Oh samworoko kin kasarawiala nin duwen koasoandi en Sapwellimeo, ni wiepe me aramas akan pahn kak esehki dahme irail pahn kasikasik sang rehn Sapwellimeo ong ni komourala.

3 Oh iet wiepe me irail kasarawihong—Irail malipilipda oh kaunopda sangete ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda nin duwen kupwurokong en Koht me ketin mwahngi mehkoaros, pwehki sang ni arail pwoson mehlel oh doadoahk mwahu kan; ni tapio irail ahneki saledek en pilada me mwahu de me suwed; eri irail pilada me mwahu, oh pwehki arail doadoahngki arail pwoson lap mehlel, irail malipilipiong nan malipilip sarawi, ei, sang ni malipilip sarawio me kaunopdahr iangahki kaunop en poadoandoarparail, oh nin duwe.

4 Eri irail malipilipdahr ong malipilip sarawi wet sang ni arail pwoson, a ekei irail kasohwe Ngehn en Koht sang ni arail keptakai en mohngiongarail oh lamalam rotorot, ma irail sohte wia met irail kak iang ahneki kapai laud duwehte riarail kan.

5 De ni mehlel, irail mih nan soangen irair ehute rehn riarail akan sangete ni tapio; eri malipilip sarawi wet kaunopdahr sang ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda ong irail me sohte pahn ahneki mohngiong keptakai, nin duwen oh sang ni tomw en Sapwellime Ieroso, me kaunopdahro—

6 Oh eri irail malipilipda sang ni malipilip sarawi wet, oh kasarawihongehr nan prihsduhd ileile en koasoandi sarawi en Koht, pwe en padahngki sapwellime kosonned akan ong aramas akan, pwe irail en pil kak iang pidelong nan sapwellime wasahn kommoal—

7 Prihsduhd lapalap wet iei ih koasoandi en Sapwellime Iehros, me wia koasoandi ehu me sangete ni tepin sampah eh wiawihda; met wehwehki, me sohte tapi de imwi, e kaunopda sang mwohn kawa oh pil kohkohlahte, nin duwen sapwellime kupwurokong ong soahng kan koaros me pahn kohdo—

8 Eri irail kasarawihalahr ni wiepe wet—sang ni arail malipilipkihda malipilip sarawi ehu, oh kasarawihkihla tiahk sarawi ehu, oh alehda prihsduhd lapalap en koasoandi sarawio, me wia malipilip, oh tiahk sarawi, oh prihsduhd lapalap, me sohte tapi de imwi—

9 Eri irail wiahla samworo lapalap kohkohlahte, nin duwen koasoandi en Sapwellimeo, Iehros en Sahmo, me sohte tapi de imwi, me diren kalahngan, pahrek, oh mehlel. Oh iei ih duwehn met. Ahmen.

10 Eri, nin duwen ei koasoia koasoandi sarawio, de prihsduhd lapalap, me tohto me kasarawihala oh wiahla samworo lapalap en Koht; oh e kin sang ni arail pwoson mehlel oh koluhla, oh arail mour pwung mwohn Koht, irail pilada en koluhla oh wia doadoahk en mour pwung sang mehla;

11 Eri irail malipilipda nin duwen koasoandi sarawi wet, oh sarawihkihla, oh arail likou kan pwetepwetkihla ar kamwakelda sang ni ntahn Sihmpwulo.

12 Eri mwurin arail sarawikilahr Ngehn Sarawi, oh arail likou kan pwetepwetalahr, mwakelekelahr oh sohte samin kis mwohn Koht, re sohte kak medewe dihp ihte kailongki; oh irail me tohto mehlel, me mwakelekella oh pidelong nan wasahn kommoal en Kauno arail Koht.

13 Oh met, riei ohl ako, I men kumwail en karakarahkala mwohn Koht, oh wahdo wahn amwail koluhla, pwe kumwail en pil kak pidelong nan wasahn kommoalo.

14 Ei, aktikitikla duwehte aramas akan nan mwehin Melkisedek, me pil wia samworo lapalap nin duwen koasoandi wet me I koasoiadahr, me pil alehdahr prihsduhd lapalapo kohkohlahte.

15 Oh ihte Melkisedeko me Eipraam pwainohng meirong; iei, atail pahpa Eipraam pwainehng meirong en eisek kis ehu en soahng kan koaros me e ahneki.

16 Eri tiahk sarawi pwukat kin wiawi ni wiepe wet, pwe aramas akan en kak kasikasik Sapwellimen Kohto, ni e wia kilel en sapwellime koasoandio, de iei ih sapwellime koasoandio, oh met pwe irail en kak kasikasik ih pwe re en ale lapwepen diparail akan, pwe re en kak pidelong nan wasahn kommoal en Kauno.

17 Eri Melkisedek menet wia nanmwarki men nan sahpw en Seilem; oh sapwellime aramas akan kehlailla nan arail wiewia suwed oh mour suwed; ei, irail koaros salongala; irail direkihla soangen wiewia suwed koaros;

18 Ahpw pwehki Melkisedek eh doadoahngki pwoson kehlail, oh alehdi ohpis en prihsduhd ileilehu nin duwen koasondi sarawi en Koht, padahngki koluhla ong sapwellime aramas akan. Oh kilang, re koluhla; oh Melkisedek kahrehiong popohl nan sahpwo nan eh mwehi; eri e pil kahdaniki nanmwarki en popohl, pwehki e wia nanmwarki en Seilem; oh e kakaun pahn manaman en seme.

19 Eri, mie me tohto me kohdo mwowe, oh pil aramas tohto me kohdo mwuri, ahpw sohte me lapalap sang; eri, ih me re ntingihdi duwe ni sansal.

20 Eri I sohte anahne pwurehng koasoia duwe; dahme I koasoiahier e itar. Ahpw, pwuhksarawi kan mih mwohmwail; ma kumwail pahn wekidala wehwe kumwail pahn kamwomwomwkihla.

21 Oh met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma ndaiong irail mahsen pwukat, e ahpw kapahwei peh pohrail oh ngihl laudida werikihla, ndinda: Met iei ahnsou en koluhla, pwe rahn en komouro kerendohr;

22 Ei, oh kapitien Kauno, sang ni ewen tohnleng kan, kalokalohkiong wehi kan koaros; ei, kalokalohki, pwe irail en kak ahneki rohng kaperen en peren lap; ei, oh e kin ketin pakapakairiki rohng kaperen pwukat rehn sapwellime aramas koaros, iei, koaros me parpeseng wasa koaros nan sampah; eri irail kohdo rehtail.

23 Oh re kin sansalohng kitail ni nting de lokaia sansal, pwe kitail en kak wehwehki, pwe kitail en dehr sapwungala; oh met pwehki atail sansalongseli nan ehu sahpw; eri, kitail kenikenla mehlel, pwe kitail alehdi rohng kaperen me kalohkohng kitail wasa koaros nan atail mwaht.

24 Pwe kilang, tohnleng kan wie kalokalohkihong aramas tohto ahnsou wet nan sapwatail; oh kahrepe wet pwe en kaunopada mohngiong en aramas akan pwe re en alehdi sapwellime mahsen ni ahnsou me e pahn ketido nan sapwellime lingan.

25 Eri met kitail awiawihete pwe kitail en rong rohng kapereno eh pahn pakair ong kitail sang rehn tohnleng kan, duwen sapwellime ketido; pwe ahnsouo kohkohdo, kitail sohte ese ia uwen keren. I mentehn Koht en wia nan ei rahn akan; ahpw ma e pil wiawi anhsou keren de pwand, I pahn pereperenkihte.

26 Oh e pahn kasansalohng ohl pwung oh sarawi kan, sang rehn tohngleng kan, ni ahnsou en sapwellime ketido, pwe mahsen akan en atail pahpa kahlap ako en kak pweida, nin duwen dahme re koasoiadahr duwen ih, me sang nin duwen ngehn en kokohp me kin ieiang irail.

27 Oh met, riei ohl ako, I inengieng sang nan kapehdiet unsek, ei, sang ni ei pwunod laud me kaweikek, pwe kumwail en rong ei koasoi kan, kesehsang kumwail dipamwail akan, oh dehr kasakasaula rahn en amwail koluhla;

28 Ahpw kumwail en aktikitikla mwohn Kauno, oh ekerki ni mware sarawio, oh kalapw mwasamwasahn oh kapakap, pwe kumwail en dehr ahneki koasongosong laud sang uwen me kumwail kakohng, oh Ngehn Sarawi en kahluwa kumwail, pwe kumwail en wiahla aramas aktikitik, mpai, me kin mweidala nsene, kanengamah, diren limpoak oh nannanti nan apwal koaros;

29 Oh pwoson Kauno; ahneki koapworopwor me kumwail pahn alehdi mour soutuk; ahneki limpoak en Koht ahnsou koaros nan mohngiongamwail kan, pwe kumwail en kak kohdahla ni imwin rahno oh pidelong nan sapwellime wasahn kommoal.

30 Oh Kauno en ketin mweidehng kumwail en koluhla, pwe kumwail en dehr elehda sapwellime engieng pohmwail, pwe kumwail en dehr lohdi nan selmete en ehl, pwe kumwail en dehr mehkihla mehla keriauo.

31 Oh Alma koasoiahiong aramas akan mahsen tohto, me sohte ntingdi nan pwuhk wet.
alma 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma oh Amulek selidi oh kamakam—Aramas pwoson kan oh neirail pwuhk sarawi kan isihsla—Kauno ketin alehda irail akan me kamakamkihla ar kadehde nan sapwellime lingan—Dihd en imwetengo pwalpeseng oh mweredi—Alma oh Amulek kasaledekla, oh sounkaloke ira kan kamakamala. Ele Sounpar 82–81 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin eh kaimwsekala eh koasoakoasoiong aramas akan tohto me kamehlele, oh tepida koluhla, oh wadek pwuhk sarawi kan.

2 Ahpw pali laud en irail men kauwehla Alma oh Amulek; pwe re lingeringer pahn Alma, pwehki eh koasoi kan me inen ong Sihesrom; oh re pil nda me Amulek pitih irail, oh kauwe arail kosonned oh pil uhwong arail sounsawas en kosonned akan oh sounkopwung kan.

3 Oh re pil lingeringer pahn Alma oh Amulek; oh pwehki ara kadehdehda ni sansal duwen arail wiewia suwed kan, re songosong en kemeirahla ni rir.

4 Ahpw kedekedeo irail sohte wia; ahpw irail koledi ira oh pirehkinirahdi sahl kehlail, oh wairahla mwohn sounkopwung lapalap en sahpwo.

5 Oh aramas ako kohla oh kedipa ira—kadkadehdehki me ira kauwe kosonnedo, oh arail sounsawas en kosonned akan oh sounkopwung kan en nan sahpwo, oh pil aramas koaros me mih nan sahpwo; oh pil kadehdehki me Koht tehmen, oh me e pahn ketin kadaredo Sapwellimeo rehn aramas akan, ahpw e sohte pahn kamaurirailla; oh pil soahng kei me aramas ako kedkedipahki Alma oh Amulek. Met wiawi mwohn sounkopwung lapalap en sahpwo.

6 Kedekedeo Sihesrom ahpw pwuriamweikihla mahsen kan me e rongadahr; oh e pil wehwehki duwen lamalam rotorot, me e kahrehiong aramas akan sang ni eh lokaia likamw kan; oh palingene tepida lokolongki eh esehdahier pein eh sapwung kan; ei, e tepier lokolongki medek en ehl.

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw tepida koasoiahiong aramas akan, ndinda: Kilang, ngehi me sapwung, oh ohl pwukat mwakelekel mwohn Koht. Oh e ahpw tepida peki rehrail sang ahnsouo kohla; ahpw re kauwe, ndinda: Ke pil iang katieni? Oh irail kandipih ih, oh kausala sang nanpwungarail, oh pil irail koaros me kamehlele mahsen kan me Alma oh Amulek mahsaniher; oh re kesehirailla liki, oh kadarala ekei ohl re en kostakai irail.

8 Oh re wahdo arail pwoud kan oh patehng neirail seri kan, oh mehmen me kamehlele de alehdi padahk en kamehlele mahsen en Koht re wiahda me re pahn keseirailong nan kisiniei; oh re pil wahdo arail poadopoad kan me audaudki pwuhk sarawi kan, oh pil kesehlong nan kisinieio, pwehn isihsla oh ohkihla kisiniei.

9 Kedekedeo irail ale Alma oh Amulek, oh wairahla wasa me aramas akan wie kamakamala pwehki arail kadehde, pwe re en kak kilang kamwomwalahn irail ko me isihsla nan kisinieio.

10 Oh ni ahnsou me Amulek kilangehr lokolok en lih akan oh seri kan me mwasikalahr nan kisiniei, e pil iang lokolongki; oh e ahpw ndaiong Alma: Ia uwen werei en ata pahn kilikilang mwekid sakanakan wet? Eri kita kapahwei pehta kan, oh doadoahngki manaman en Koht me ketiket rehta, oh doareirailla sang nan kisinieio.

11 Ahpw Alma ndaiong ih: Ngehno ketin keinapwi ie me I sohte pahn kapahwei pehi; pwe kilang Kauno ketin alehdahr irail, ni lingan; oh e ketin mweidohng re en wia soahng wet, de me aramas akan kak wiahiong irail met, nin duwen mohngiongarail keptakai, pwe kopwung me e pahn wiahiong irail sang ni sapwellime engieng e pahn pwung; oh ntahn me mwakelekel kan pahn wia mehn kadehde ong irail, ei, oh kadeikirailda ni mehlel ni imwin rahno.

12 Met Amulek ndaiong Alma: Kilang, mwein re pahn pil kamwasikakitahla.

13 Oh Alma nda: Mweidohng nin duwen kupwur en Kauno. Ahpw, kilang, ata doadoahk saikinte imwisekla; eri re sohte pahn kamwasikakitahla.

14 Met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me paliwar en irail akan me lekideklong nan kisinieio isihsla, oh pil poadoapoad akan me iang irail lekideklong, sounkopwung lapalap en sahpwo ahpw kohdo oh kesihnenda mwohn Alma oh Amulek, ni ara sensel; oh e ahpw pohrki peh ni marasa kan, oh ndaiong ira: Mwurin dahme kumwa kilangehr, kumwa pahn pwurehng kalohkohng aramas pwukat, pwe irail en lekdeklong nan lehn kisiniei oh suwepel?

15 Kilang, kumwa kilang me kumwa sohte ahneki manaman en kapitala irail akan me lekdeklong nan kisiniei; de pil Koht kapitirailla pwehki arail iang amwa pelien lamalam. Oh sounkopwungo pwurehng pohr sepera kan, oh nda: Dahme kumwa pahn nda?

16 Eri, sounkopwung menet wia kisehn pwihn en koasoandi oh pelien lamalam en Nior, me kemehla Kidion.

17 Kedekedeo Alma oh Amulek sohte sapengkihong mehkot; oh e pwurehng pohr ira, oh kihrahla rehn opiser kan pwe re en keseirahlong nan imweteng.

18 Oh mwurin ara mihmihki nan imweteng erein rahn siluh, irail me kin kamehlele padahk en Nior kan kohdo, iei, tohto sounsawas en kosonned akan, oh sounkopwung kan, oh samworo kan, oh sounpadahk kan; oh re pidelongodo nan imwetengo pwe re en kilang ira, oh pwe re en kapeidek rehra soangen mahsen tohto; ahpw ira sohte sapeng irail.

19 Kedekedeo sounkpwungo uh mwohra, oh nda: Dahme kumwa sohte sapengki en aramas pwukat peidek? Kumwa sohte ese me I ahneki manaman en keseikumwahlong nan kisiniei? E ahpw itonehkinira re en lokaia; ahpw ira sohte sapengki mehkot.

20 Kedekedeo irail ahpw mweselpeseng, oh mahnda irail pil pwurodo; oh sounkopwungo pil pwurehng pohr seperah kan. Oh tohto me pil iang kohdo, oh pohr ira, ndinda: Kumwa pahn pwurehng kesihnenda oh kadeik aramas pwukat, oh kauwe aht kosonned? Ma kumwa ahneki soangen manaman kehlail dahme kumwa sohte kak kapitkihla pein kumwa?

21 Oh soahng tohto me re ndaiong ira, tehtehrengki ngihrail kan pohra, oh kakandipi ira, oh ndinda: Ia mwomwen kiht ahnsou me se pahn lekdekla?

22 Oh ih soangen koasoi koaros me re ndaiong ira; oh re wie kapakapailoke ira erein rahn kei. Oh re sohte kihong ira mwenge pwe re en duhpekla, oh sohte kihong ira pihl pwe ira en men nimpilda; oh re pil kihsang ara likou kan pwe ira en kilisou; oh re pirapirkihdi sahl kehlail kan, oh selidi nan imweteng.

23 Kedekedeo mwurin ara lokolongki erein rahn kei, (oh iei ni keisek riau en rahn, nan keisek en sounpwung, nan pahr keisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai) me sounkopwung lapalap en nan sahpw en Amonaia oh arail sounpadahk tohto, arail sounsawas en kosonned akan kohla nan imwetengo wasa me Alma oh Amulek wie senselki sahl kan.

24 Oh sounkopwung lapalapo kesihnenda mwohra, oh pwurehng pohr ira, oh ndaiong ira: Ma kumwa ahneki manaman en Koht a kumwa kapitkumwahsang nan sahl akan, oh se pahn kamehlele me Kauno pahn kamwomwala aramas pwukat nin duwen amwa koasoi kan.

25 Kedekedeo irail koaros kohla oh pohr ira, ndinda soangen lokaiakohte, lao lel me lahso; oh ahnsou me lahso koasoiong ira, manaman en Koht tihda pohn Alma oh Amulek, oh re ahpw pwourda oh kesihnenda.

26 Oh Alma werkihla, inda: Maing Kaun, ia uwen werei en aht pahn wie lokolongki kalokolok pwukat? Maing Kaun, komw ketikihong kiht roson nin duwen aht pwoson Krais, pwe sen kak pitila. Re ahpw mweidpeseng sahl akan me ira selkihdi; oh ni en aramas akan arail kilangada met, irail tepida tang, pwe irail masakadahr irail de kamwomwomwla.

27 Eri, uwen arail masepwehkada irail pwupwudiong nan pwehlo, oh sohte lella ni wenihmw en maslikin imwetengo; oh sapwo rerrada kehlail, oh dihd en imwetengo pwalpeseng, kahrehda e rengkidi nan pwehlo; oh sounkopwung lapalapo, oh sounsawas en kosonned akan, oh samworo kan, oh sounpadahk kan, me pohr Alma oh Amulek, kamakamkihla pwupwudien dihdo.

28 Oh Alma oh Amulek pidohi sang nan imwetengo, oh ire sohte medekila; pwe Kauno ketikihong ira manaman, nin duwen ara pwoson Krais. Oh ira mwadangete pidohi sang nan imwetengo; oh ira saledekla sang sahl me pireirapene; oh imwetengo mwerediong nan pwehlo, oh aramas koaros me mih loale kamakamala, ihte Alma oh Amulek me soh; oh ira mwadangete kohla ni kahnimwo.

29 Eri, aramas akan rongada ngihl laud ehu re ahpw tangpene wiahda pokon ehu pwe irail en esehda dahme wiahda ngihlo; oh ahnsou me re kilangada Alma oh Amulek kohkohieido sang nan imwetengo, oh dihd kan pwupwudier nan pwehlo, irail uhdahn masepwehkada, oh tangasang mwohn Alma oh Amulek duwehte kuht men oh wah kan ar tangasang mwohn laion riemen; oh irail tangasang mwohn Alma oh Amulek.
alma 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma oh Amulek kohla Saidon oh wiahda mwomwohdiso—Alma kakehlahda Sihesrom, me iangala Mwomwohdiso—Tohto me pepdaisla, oh Mwomwohdiso keirda—Alma oh Amulek kohla Saraemla. Ele Sounpar 81 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mahsen ahpw kohieng Alma oh Amulek, ira en mweselsang nan kahnimwo; ira ahpw mweselda, oh kohla nan sahpw en Saidom; oh kilang, wasao irail ahpw tuhwongdi aramas akan koaros me mweselsang nan sahpw en Amonaia, me pekouslahr oh kostakaidier, pwehki arail kamehlele padahk kan en Alma.

2 Oh ira ahpw koasoiahiong irail duwen soahng koaros me wiawihong arail pwoud ko oh neirail seri ko, oh me pil wiawihong ira, oh manaman me kapitirahla.

3 Oh pil Sihesrom wonohnkier eh soumwahu nan Saidom, iei soumwahu karakar, me kohsang ni eh lokolok laudki eh medemedewe duwen eh wiewia suwed kan, pwe e wiahki me Alma oh Amulek solahr mie; oh e wiahki me ira kamakamala pwehki eh wiewia sapwung. Oh dihp lap wet, oh dipe me tohto kan, kahrehda eh lokolok nan eh madamadau lao e wiahla medek laud kowahlap, oh sohte poadoandoarepe; eri e ahpw tepida lokolongki karakar laud.

4 Oh met, ni eh rongada me Alma oh Amulek mih nan sahpw en Saidom, e ahpw kehlailda nan eh mohngiong; ih eri madangete kadaralahng ira pekpek, pwe e men ira en patohla reh.

5 Ira eri mwadangete pwarala reh, kapwaiada pekpek me e kadaralahng irahu; oh ira pidelongala nan ihmwo rehn Sihesrom; oh e wie wonohn pohn eh peht, soumwahu, luhluwetki eh soumwahu karakar laud; oh nan moange pil medek kowahlap pwehki eh wiewia suwed kan; oh ahnsou me e kilangirahda e kapahwei peho, oh pekpeki ira en kamwahuwihala.

6 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw koledi peho oh ndaiong ih: Ke kamehlele sapwellimen Krais manaman en komourla?

7 E ahpw sapeng oh nda: Ei, I kamehlele mahsen kan koaros me ke padahngki.

8 Alma ahpw nda: Ma ke kamehlele poadoandoar en Krais ke kak mwahula.

9 Oh e nda: Ei, I kamehlele nin duwen omw mahsen kan.

10 Oh Alma ahpw kapakap ong Kauno, ndinda: Maing Kaun aht Koht, komw ketin kupwurehla ohl menet, oh kamwahuwiala eh soumwahu nin duwen eh pwoson Krais.

11 Oh ahnsou me Alma ndahier mahsen pwukat, Sihesrom ahpw kesihnenda, oh tepida alu; oh met wiawiher oh aramas kan koaros pwuriamweikihla mehlel; oh rohng en irair wet kohpeseng nan sahpw en Saidom pwon.

12 Oh Alma papidaisihla Sihesrom ong Kauno; oh e ahpw tepida iang padahkih aramas akan sang ahnsouo kohla.

13 Oh Alma wiahda mwomwohdiso nan sahpw en Saidom, oh kasarawihala samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan nan sahpwo, pwe irail en papidaisihala aramas akan me inengieng papidais ong Kauno.

14 Kedekedeo irail wie tohtohla; pwe irail kohdohsang nan arail kousapw kan koaros me kapilpene Saidom, oh papidaisla.

15 Ahpw ong aramas akan me kin mih nan sahpw en Amonaia, irail wiwiahte aramas nan kapehd kekeluwak oh aramas ketptakai; oh irail sohte koluhkihla diparail kan, koskose me en Alma oh Amulek manaman koaros kohsang rehn tepilo; pwe irail kin kamehlelehte padahk kan en Nior, oh re sohte kin kamehlele koluhlahn diparail akan.

16 Kedekedeo Alma oh Amulek, pwehki Amulek eh meirongkilahr nah kohl, oh nah silper, oh eh dipwisou kesempwal kan koaros, me mih nan sahpw en Amonaia, pwehki mahsen en Koht, kahrehiong kompoakepah kan oh pil eh pahpa, oh peneinei kan kailongkilahr;

17 Eri, mwurin Alma eh wiadahr mwomwohdiso nan Saidom, oh kilangehr me e mwahula mehlel, ei, e kilangehr aramas akan arail mwahula sohla pohnmwahso nan mohngiongarail kan, oh tepida karakarahkala mwohn Koht, oh kin tepida pokonpene wasahn arail sarawi kan oh pwongih Koht mwohn pei sarawio, kalapw mwasamwasahn oh kin wie kapkapakap, pwe irail en kak poadoandoarla sang Sehdan, oh sang mehla, oh sang kamwomwomwla—

18 Eri met ni ei ndahiero, pwehki Alma eh kilangehr mepwukat, eri e ahpw kahrehda Amulek oh kohla nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kahrehla ni pein imweo, oh sewesehda nan eh kahpwal akan, oh kakehlaka eh pwoson Kauno.

19 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr keisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai.
alma 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen kan kamwomwala Mehn Amonaia kan—Soram kahluwa Mehn Nihpai kan oh kalowehdi Mehn Leimen kan—Alma oh Amulek oh [aramas] tohto kalohngki mahseno—Irail padahngki me mwurin Sapwellimen Krais Iasadao e pahn ketin pwarohng Mehn Nihpai kan. Ele Sounpar 81–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan keisek ehu en pahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai, ni rahn kelimau en nan keriau en sounpwungo, mwurin arail ahnekier popohl nan sahpw en Saraemla, sohte mahwen de pingiping erein sounpar kei, lao lel ni rahn kelimau en nan keriau en sounpwung en pahr eisek ehu, a mie rohng en mahwen nan sahpwo.

2 Pwe kilang, sounpei kan en Mehn Leimen kohdo sang ni pali me sallahng sapwtehno, ni irepen sahpwo, oh pidelong nan kahnihmw en Amonaia, oh tepida kemehla aramas akan oh kauwehla kahnihmwo.

3 Oh met kedekedeo, mwohn Mehn Nihpai kan ar kak kihpene sounpei pwe en itar en kak pwakihirail sang nan sapwo, irail kemehla aramas akan me kin koukousoan nan kahnihmw en Amonaia, oh pil ekei me mih ni irepen shapw en Noha, oh koledi ekei oh wahsang kohla nan sapwtehno.

4 Met kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan men kohla oh kapitala irail akan me wisiksang kohla nan sapwtehno.

5 Eri, me pilipilda me pahn wia kaun lapalap en sounpei en Mehn Nihpai kan, (ede iei Soram, oh nah pwutak riemen, Lihai oh Eia)—eri pwehki Soram oh nah pwutangko, ar ese me Alma wia samworo lapalap nan mwomwohdiso, oh pwehki ar rongehr me e kin alehdi ngehn en kokohp, eri irail kohla reh oh peki ma e kak esehda kupwur en Kauno duwen wasa me re pahn kohla ie nan sapwtehno rapahki riarail ko, me Mehn Leimen kan koledier oh wahsang.

6 Kedekedeo Alma ahpw kapakapkihong Kauno duwen irair wet. Oh Alma pwurodo oh ndaiong irail: Kilang, Mehn Leimen kan pahn kotehla pillap en Saidon ni palieir en sapwtehno, kodahla palilahsang irepen sahpw en Mandai. Oh kilang, kumwail pahn tuhwongiraildi wasao, ni palimesehn pillap en Saidon, oh wasao Kauno pahn ketin kapwurehiong kumwail riomwail akan me Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi.

7 Kedekedeo Soram oh nah pwutangko kotehla pillap en Saidon, iangahki neirail sounpei kan, oh karis kohla palilahsang irepen sahpw en Mandai kolahng ni palieir en sapwtehno, me mih ni palimese en pillap Saidon.

8 Oh irail tuhwongdi sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan, Mehn Leimen kan ahpw ikiparala oh pwepwekihla nan sapwtehno; oh irail ale riarail ko me Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi, oh sohte emen irail salongala. Oh riarail ohl akan kapwureiraildo nan pein sapwarail akan.

9 Eri met kaimwsekala pahr eisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Mehn Leimen kan pwepwekihsang nan sapwarail, oh aramas en Amonaia kan kamwomwomwla; ei, aramas koaros me momour me wia Mehn Amonaia kan kamwomwomwla, oh pil arail kahnimw kehlailo, me re nda me Koht sohte kak kauwehla, pwehki e kehlail.

10 Ahpw kilang, rahn teieu e tehnla; oh kidih kan oh mahn lawalo en nanwel kan kangala paliwererail kan.

11 Ahpw, mwurin rahn kei kahlep en arail mehla kan koaskoasokda pohn pwehl, oh ekiste seridi. Oh met pwehki pwowe me kehlail mehlel, kahrehda aramas sohte kak kohla sapwasapw nan sahpw en Amonaia erein soupar kei. Oh e kahdaniki Tehnlahn Nior kan; pwe irail wia semen en Nior, me kamakamala; oh sapwarailo kin wie tetehnte.

12 Oh Mehn Leimen kan sohte pwurehng kohdo mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan lao lel pahr eisek pahieu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan. Oh met erein sounpar siluh me aramas en Nihpai kan ahneki popohl nan sahpwo pwon.

13 Oh Alma oh Amulek kohwei kalokalohngki koluhla ong aramas akan nan arail tehnpas sarawi kan, oh arail ihmw sarawi kan, oh pil arail sinokoke kan, me koukouda duwehtete wiepen en mehn Suhs kan.

14 Oh irail kin wie doudoulahte kalohki mahsen en Koht rehn aramas koaros me men rong arail padahk kan, ni arail kin doudoulahte sohte lipilipilki aramas emen.

15 Oh iei me Alma oh Amulek kohwei, oh pil aramas tohto me iang pilipilda ong doadoahko, pwe en kalohki mahseno nan sahpwo pwon. Oh mwomwohdiso wiahwihda wasa koaros nan sahpwo, kapilpene nan sahpwo pwon, nanpwungen aramas en Nihpai kan koaros.

16 Oh sohte sapahrek nanpwungarail; Kauno ketin kapwilidiong wasa koaros nan sahpwo sapwellime Ngehno pwe en kaunopada madamadau en aramas akan, de en kaunopada mohngiongarail kan pwe en alehdi mahseno me pahn padahk ong irail ni ansou me e pahn ketido—

17 Pwe irail en dehr keptakai ong mahseno, pwe irail en dehr soupwoson, oh uhd mihla nan ahl en kamwomwala, ahpw re en kak pereniki alehdi mahseno, oh nin duwen ar wia ehu rah, irail pahn kapatapationg ni inondehn tuhkeo, pwe re en kak pidelong nan wasahn kommoal en Kauno arail Koht.

18 Met samworo kan me kohweiehr rehn aramas akan ahpw kin padahkihong irail re en uhdihsang likamw koaros, oh mwekid en ketewehdi koaros, oh noahrok koaros, pingiping koaros, kailok koaros, kauwe koaros, oh pirap, kawai, kulih, kam aramas, kamwahl, oh soangen mour suwed koaros, irail kalkalohngkihong irail me mepwukat sohte konehng wiawi—

19 Kasakasalehiong irail soahng kan me pahn kohdo; ei, kasakasalehiong irail duwen ketidohn Sapwellimen Kohto, sapwellime lokolok kan oh pwoula, oh pil iasadahn me mehla kan.

20 Oh aramas tohto kin wie kalekalelapak duwen wasa me Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido ie; oh irail alehdi padahk me e pahn pwarodo rehrail mwurin eh pahn iasadao; oh met aramas akan rong ni arail peren oh nsanamwahu.

21 Oh met mwurin mwomwohdiso eh wiawidahr nan sahpwo pwon—mwurin arail powehdier tepilo, oh mahsen en Koht wie kalokalohk ni pwung nan sahpwo, oh Kauno ketin kamwerehdiong sapwellime kapai kan rehn aramas akan—met kaimwisekalahr pahr eisek pahieu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.
alma 17:
Duwen nein Mosaia pwutak kan, me soikala arail pwuhng en kaunda wehio pwehki ar pilada mahsen en Koht, oh kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai pwe re en kalohk ong Mehn Leimen kan; arail lokolok kan oh poadoandoarla—nin duwen poadoapoad en Alma.

Audaudki iralaud 17 lel 27.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nein Mosaia pwutangko ahneki ngehn en kokohp oh kaudiahl—Irail kohpeseng kekeid nan ahl akan pwe re en kalohki mahseno ong Mehn Leimen kan—Amon kohla nan sahpw en Ismael oh wiahla ladu en Nanmwarki Lemonai—Amon doarehla sapwellimen nanmwarkio pelin mahn kan oh kemehla eh imwintihtih kan ni pihl en Sihpus. Sang ire tikitik 1–3, ele sounpar 77 Mwohn Krais; ire tikitik 4, ele sounpar 91–77 Mwohn Krais; oh sang ire tikitik 5–39, ele sounpar 91 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma wie kohkohsang nan sahpw en Kidion kolahng palieir, kohkolahng sahpw en Mandai, kilang, e ahpw pwuriamweiki, e tuhwongdi nein Mosaia pwutangko arail kohkohdohng nan sahpw en Saraemla.

2 Nein Mosaia pwutangko me iang Alma ahnsou me tohnlengo tepin pwarohngo; eri Alma uhdahn perenkihda kowahlap eh kilangda rie ko; oh me pil kalaudehla eh peren, pwehki irail wie loaloapwoatete ong Kauno; ei, oh irail kehlailla nan arail marainki mehlelo; pwe irail wia ohl marain kei oh irail kin loalopwoatohng onopiki pwuhk sarawi kan, pwe irail en kak esehla mahsen en Koht.

3 Ahpw kaidehn ihte met akan; irail kin poaden kapakap, oh kaisihsol; eri irail ahneki ngehn en kokohp, oh ngehn en kaudiahl, oh ahnsou me re kin padahk, irail kin padahk sang ni manaman oh mweimwei en Koht.

4 Oh irail padapadahngkiher mahsen en Koht erein sounpar eisek pahieu rehn Mehn Leimen kan, oh arail doadoahk pweida nan ar wahdohng aramas tohto en marainkihda me mehlelo; ei, sang ni manaman en arail koasoi kan aramas tohto kohkihdo ni pei sarawi en Koht, pwe re en kapakapiong ni mware oh wehkada diparail akan mwohn sihlangi.

5 A iet irair akan me lelohng irail nan arail seiloak kan, pwe irail lelohng kahpwal tohto; irail lokolok laud, ni paliwar oh madamadau koaros, me duwehte duhpek, men nimpil oh pwangada, oh pil doadoahk laud ni palingehn.

6 Eri iet mwomwen arail seiloako: Mwurin arail kohkohsang semerailo, Mosaia, ni tepin pahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan; mwurin arail kasohwehier alehda manaman en kaunda wehio me samarail kupwurki ketikihong irail, oh iei me pil aramas akan mwahuki;

7 Re ahpw mweseldahsang nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh wahda neirail kedlahs kan, oh neirail ketieu kan, oh neirail kesik ketieu kan, neirail arep kan, oh neirail pahi kan; oh re wia met pwe re en kak saikedi kenerail mwonge ni arail pahn mihmiseli nan sapwtehno.

8 Oh irail ahpw mweselahng nan sapwtehno iangahki irail akan me re piladahr, en kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai, pwe irail en padahki mahsen en Koht ong Mehn Leimen kan.

9 Kedekedeo irail seiseiloangki erein rahn kei nan sapwtehno, oh irail kin poaden kaisihsol oh kapakap pwe Kauno en mweidohng irail ekis sapwellime Ngehno en ketin iang irail, oh ketiket rehrail, pwe irail en kak wia wiliepen nin limen Koht ong sewese, ma e kak, rierail Mehn Leimen kan, en marainkihda me mehlelo, oh marainkihda kasuwedpen tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, me sohte pwung.

10 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw pwarohng irail ni pali Ngene, oh mahsanihong irail: Kumwail nsenemwahula. Irail eri nsenemwahula.

11 Oh Kauno ahpw pil mahsanihong irail: Kumwail kohwei rehn riomwail Mehn Leimen kan oh padahkihong irail ei mahsen; ahpw kumwail pahn kanengamahiong lokolok oh kahpwal akan, pwe kumwail en kak kasalehda karasaras mwahu ong irail sang rehi, oh I pahn wiahiong kumwail en wia wiliepen nin limei kat ong ni komourpen aramas tohto.

12 Kedekedeo nan mohngiong en nein Mosaia pwutak ko, oh pil irail akan me iang irail, kehlailda pwe re en kohla rehn Mehn Leimen kan oh kalohkihong irail mahsen en Koht.

13 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me re lel nan irepen sahpw en Mehn Leimen kan, irail tohrohrpeseng oh kohkohpeseng, koapwkoapworopworki Kauno me irail pahn pwurehng tuhpene ni imwin arail doadoahko; pwe re medewe me doadoahk me re pahn wia uhdahn kesempwal kowahlap.

14 Oh mehlel me doadoahko kesempwal kowahlap, pwe irail alehda pwukoa en kalohki mahsen en Koht ong aramas lawalo oh kekeluwak oh sakanakan; aramas me kin perenki kemehla Mehn Nihpai, oh pirapa oh kulih irail; oh nan kapehdarail kan tengedieng arail dipwisou kan, de arail kohl oh silper, oh takai kesempwal kan; ahpw re kin nantihong alehdi mepwukat sang ni ar kamaramas oh kulih aramas, pwe re en dehr doadoahngki pehrail kan de pein koadoahkehda arail mour.

15 Karehda irail wia aramas inenen dangahnga, pali laud en irail kin pwongih dikedik en eni kan, oh keria en Koht kohieng irail pwehki tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako; ahpw sapwellimen Koht inou kan kin awiawih irail ma irail pahn koluhla.

16 Eri, iei kahrepe wet me nein Mosaia pwutak kan alehkihda pwukoahn doadoahk wet, pwe mweinele re pahn kahrehiong irail en koluhla; pwe mweinele re pahn sewese irail en marainkihda koasoandi en poadoandoarlao.

17 Irail eri tohrohrpeseng nanpwungarail, oh kohwei rehn aramas akan, emen emente kelehpw, nin duwen mahsen oh manaman en Koht me kohieng irail.

18 Eri pwehki Amon eh wia kaun men nanpwungarail, de ih me kaweid irail, e mweseldahsang irail, mwurin eh kapaiairailda nin duwen arail pwukoa kan, mwurin eh ehukihong irail mahsen en Koht, de kaweid irail mwohn eh mweselda; oh met irail seiloakla nan arail ahl akan nan sahpwo.

19 Oh Amon kohla nan sahpw en Ismael, eden sahpwo wiawihda sang nein Ismael pwutangko, me pil wiahla Mehn Leimen.

20 Oh ni ahnsou me Amon lel nan sahpw en Ismael, Mehn Leimen ko koledi oh pirehdi, pwe nin duwen arail tiahk re pahn kin pirehdi Mehn Nihpai koaros me re kin koledi, oh wahla mwohn nanmwarkio; oh kupwuren nanmwarkio ma e men kemeiraila, de kaliduhwirailla, de kesehiraillong nan imweteng, de kausirail sang nan sahpwo, nin duwen kupwure oh dahme e nsenki.

21 Oh met Amon wisiklahr mwohn nanmwarki me kaun sahpw en Ismael; oh ede Lemonai; oh e wia emen kadaudok en Ismael.

22 Oh nanmwarkio keinemwe rehn Amon ma e inengieng kousoan nan sahpwo rehn Mehn Leimen kan, de rehn nah aramas akan.

23 Oh Amon ahpw sapengki: Ei, I mwahuki kousoan rehn aramas pwukat erein ahnsou ehu; ei, de lao lel ahnsou me I pahn mehla.

24 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Lemonai ahpw kupwur perenkihda Amon, oh mahsanihong re en sapwadasang selipe kan; oh e ahpw kupwuredahr Amon en ale emen sapwellime serepein ko oh pwoudkihda.

25 Ahpw Amon ndaiong ih: Soh, ahpw I pahn wia sapwellimomwi ladu. Eri Amon wiahla ladu en nanmwarki Lemonai. Kedekedeo e ahpw iangala ekei ladu ko pwukoaki kilikilang sapwellimen Lemonai pelin mahn akan, nin duwen tiahk en Mehn Leimen kan.

26 Oh mwurin eh wie papahki nanmwarkio erein rahn siluh, ni eh iang laduhn Mehn Leimen kan kahkahrewei neirail pelin mahn akan wasahn kanimpil, me kahdaniki pihl en Sihpus, oh Mehn Leimen koaros kin kahrehla neirail pelin mahn akan wasao, pwe re en kak nimpil—

27 Eri, ahnsou me Amon oh sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu kan wie kahkahrehla neirail pelin mahn akan ni wasahn kanimpilo, kilang, ekei Mehn Leimen, me kahrelahr neirail mahn akan pwe re en kanimpile, ahpw kesihnenda oh pwakihpeseng pelin mahn me Amon oh laduhn nanmwarkio kahkahrehko, oh re pwakihpeseng lao irail tangpeseng wasa koaros.

28 Sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu ko eri tepida kaulim, ndinda: Met nanmwarkio pahn kemeikitailla, duwehte eh wiahiongehr riatail ko pwehki ohl suwed pwukat ar pwakihpeseng neirail pelin mahn ko. Oh re ahpw tepida sengiseng kowahlap, ndinda: Kilang, neitail pelin mahn kan tangpesengehr.

29 Met re sengisengki pwehki arail masak kamakamala. Ahpw ni ahnsou me Amon kilangada nan kapehde direkihla peren; pwe, e nda, I pahn kasalehiong iengei ladu kan ei koaihek, de koaihek me mih rehi, ong ei pahn kapwurehdo sapwellimen nanmwarkio pelin mahn akan, pwe iengei ladu kan en kak koapworopworkinie, pwe I en kak kahluwa irail en kamehlele ei padahk kan.

30 Oh met, iei en Amon madamadau, ahnsou me e kilangada kahpwal en irail kan me e kin wiahki kempoakepah.

31 Kedekedeo e ahpw kakehlaka irail sang eh koasoi kan, ndinda: Riei ko, kumwail perenda oh kitail rapahki mahn akan, oh kitail pahn kihrailpene oh kapwureiraildohng wasahn nimpihl; oh kitail pahn doarehla sapwellimen nanmwarki pelin mahn akan oh e sohte pahn ketin kemeikitailla.

32 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohla rapahki pelin mahn akan, oh irail idawehn kaweid en Amon, oh irail mwadang kohla oh sopukala sapwellimen nanmwarkio pelin mahn akan, oh pwurehng kihrailpenehng wasahn kanimpihlo.

33 Oh ohl ako pwurehng kesihnenda pwe re en pwakih neirail pelin mahn ko; ahpw Amon ndaiong ienge ko: Kumwail kapilpene pelin mahn akan pwe irail de tang; oh I pahn kohla oh peiong ohl akan me kin pwakihpeseng neitail pelin mahn akan.

34 Eri, irail kapwaiada dahme Amon patohwan ong irail, oh e ahpw kohla oh kesihnenda pwe en peiong irail akan me kesihnen ni pihl en Sihpus; oh irail me tohto.

35 Eri irail sohte masak Amon, pwe re medewe me emente neirail ohl oko kak kemehla nin duwen me re mwahuki, ahpw re sohte ese me Kauno ketin inoukihong Mosaia me e pahn ketin doarehla nah pwutak kan sang nan pehrail; oh re pil sohte ese mehkot duwen Kauno; eri irail kin perenki kamakamalahn riarail akan; oh ih kahrepe wet me re kin kesihnenki mwo pwe re en pwakihpeseng sapwellimen nanmariki pelin mahn akan.

36 Ahpw Amon kesihnete oh tepida katehkin irail takai en nah pahio; ei, sang ni ah roson kehlail e kin katehkiniraildi takai en pahio; oh e kemehla ekei irail kahrehda re tepida pwuriamweiki uwen eh roson; ahpw re uhdahn lingeringer pwehki riarail me mehla kan, oh re koasoanehdi me e uhdahn pahn kamala; ahpw, pwehki arail kilang me re sohte kak katehkihdi neirail takai kan, irail tangkidohng mehn pok kan pwe re en pokihedi.

37 Ahpw kilang, ohl koaros me kihda peh pwe en poakih Amon, e pelehkihsang pehrail kan nah kedlahso; pwe e kauhdi arail pok kan sang ni eh pelehkihsang pehrail kan wasa keng en nah kedlahso, kahrehda irail tepida pwuriamwei, oh tepida tangasang; ei, oh irail me tohto; ahpw kehlail en peho kahrehda arail tangasang.

38 Met meh wenemen e katehkihdi nah pahio, ahpw sohte me e kemehkihla nah kedlahso ihte arail kauno; oh e pelehsang pehn irail tohto me kihda peh pwe en poaki ih, oh irail me tohto.

39 Oh ni ahnsou me e pwakihirailla sang wasao, e ahpw pwurala oh irail kanimpile neirail pelin mahn akan oh kapwureirailla nan sapwellimen nanmwarkio mohso, oh eri kohlongala rehn nanmwarkio, weuwa pehn irail akan me song kemehla Amon, me e pelehkihsang nah kedlahso, oh re wahlongala rehn nanmwarkio pwe en wia mehn kadehdepen soahng kan me re wiadahr.
alma 18:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nanmwarki Lemonai wiahki me Amon iei Eni Lapo—Amon padahkihong nanmwarkio duwen Kepikipiko, Sapwellimen Koht doadoahk ong aramas, oh poadoandoarala me pahn sang Krais—Lemonai kamehlele oh pwupwudi nan pwehlo ni momwen me e mehla. Ele Sounpar 90 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Lemonai mahsanihong sapwellime ladu kan re en kesihnenda oh kadehdehda soahng koaros me irail kilang wiawi nan irair en ansouo.

2 Oh ni ahnsou me irail kadehdehier soahng kan me irail kilang, oh e ahpw mwahngiadahr en Amon eh loalopwoat en doarehla sapwellime pelin mahn akan, oh pil eh koahiek kehlail en peiong irail akan me song en kemehla, e pwuriamweikihla kowahlap, oh mahsanih: Mehlel, met kaidehn aramas men. Kilang, kaidehn ih Enihlapo met me kin kadarodo kalokolok laud ong aramas pwukat, pwehki arail kin kemehla aramas akan?

3 Oh irail sapeng nanmwarkio, oh patohwan: Ma ih Enihlap de aramas emen, se sohte ese; ahpw ih uwen met me se ese, me e sohte kak kamakamala pahn sapwellimen mwohnsapwoko imwintihti kan; oh pil re sohte kak pwakihpeseng sapwellimen mwohnsapwoko pelin mahn akan ma e pahn ieiang kiht, pwehki e koahiek oh kehlail mehlel; eri, se patohwan me e wia kempoakepahn mwohnsapwoko. Oh met, maing mwohnsapwoko, se sohte kamehlele me aramas emen tungoalenki soangen manaman lap wet, pwe se patohwan me e sohte kak kamala.

4 Eri, met ni ahnsou me nanmwarkio karongehier mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Met I esehier me iei Enihlapo met; oh e ketidihdo ahnsou wet pwe en doarehla amwail mour kan, pwe I en dehr kemeikumwailla nin duwen ei wiahiongehr riomwail akan. Eri met iei Enihlapo me atail pahpa kahlap ako kin koasoia.

5 Met iei tiahk en Lemonai, me e alehdi sang semeo, me dene mie Enihlap men. Mehndahte arail kamehlele Enihlap, irail kin medewe me mehkoaros me irail kin wia me pwung; ahpw, Lemonai tepida masepwehk kowahlap, e masepwehngki e kin wiahda sapwung ni ahnsou me e kemehla sapwellime ladu ko;

6 Pwe e ketin kemehlahr tohto irail pwehki riarail akan ar kin pwakihpeseng neirail pelin mahn akan wasahn kanimpilo; oh pwehki neirail pelin mahn akan ar kin tangpeseng a irail kin kamakamala.

7 Met e kin wia ehu mwekid en Mehn Leimen pwukat en mih limwahn pihl en Sihpus pwe re en pwakihpeseng nein aramas pelin mahn akan, pwe re en kak karawanpeseng me tohto me kin uhd tangalahng nan sapwarail akan, ih mwomwen arail kin kulih irail.

8 Kedekedeo nanmwarki Lemonai keinemwe rehn sapwellime ladu ko, ketihtihki: Ia ohl menet me ahneki soangen manaman kehlail wet?

9 Oh irail patohwanohng ih: Kilang, e wie kamkamwenge sapwellimahr oahs akan. Nanmwarkio ketin mahsanihongehr sapwellime ladu ko, mwohn arail kohla kanampile neirail pelin mahn oko, me irail pahn kaunopada sapwellime oahs akan oh werennansapw akan, oh wahla ih nan sahpw en Nihpai; pwe semen Lemonai, me wia nanmwarki en sahpwo pwon koasoanehdier me kamadipw lap ehu pahn wiawi nan sahpw en Nihpai.

10 Met ni ahnsou me nanmwarki Lemonai rongada me Amon wie kaukaunopada sapwellime oahs kan oh sapwellime werennansapw akan e pil pwuriamweila mehlel, pwehki en Amon loalopwoat, e ahpw mahsanih: Mehlel me sohte emen nei ladu nanpwungen nei ladu kan me loalopwoat mehlel duwehte ohl menet; pwe e tamataman en kapwaiada ei kosonned kan koaros.

11 Met I esehier me Enihlapo met, oh I men en ketilongodo rehi, ahpw I saloh.

12 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Amon kaunopadahr sapwellimen nanmwarikio oahs kan oh werennansapw kan oh sapwellime ladu kan, e ahpw patohlongala rehn nanmwarkio, oh kilangada me pohn wasa ilehn nanmwarkio wekilahr; eri ni ah pahn pidohilahsang wasahu.

13 Oh emen sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu ko ndaiong ih, Rapana, me wehwehki, me lapalap de nanmwarki lap, nin duwen arail kin medewe me arail nanmwarki kan me lapalap; eri e ahpw ndaiong ih: Rapana, nanmwarkio kupwuriki ke en mihmi.

14 Eri Amon sohpeilahng nanmwarkio, oh patohwanohng ih: Dahme komwi kupwuriki I en wia ong komwi, Maing wasalapalap? Oh nanmwarkio sohte ketin sapeng ih erein awa ehu, nin duwen arail wadek ansou, pwe e sohte mwahngih dahme e pahn keinemwe reh.

15 Eri, Amon ahpw patohwanong ih: Dahme komw kupwuriki sang rehi? Ahpw nanmwarkio sohte ketin sapeng ih.

16 Kedekedeo pwehki Amon audaudkihda Ngehn en Koht, eri e ahpw kasawihda sapwellimen nanmwarkio madamadau kan. E ahpw patohwanohng ih: Kaidehn pwehki omw karongehda me I doarehla sapwellimahr ladu kan oh sapwellimahr pelin mahn akan, oh kemehkihla riarail meh isimen nei pahi oh kedlahs, oh pelehsang pehn ekei irail, pwe I en kak doarehla sapwellimahr pelin mahn kan oh sapwellimahr ladu kan; kilang, iei met me kahrehda omwi pwuriamwei?

17 I ndaiong komwi, ia duwe, dahme komw nohn pwuriamweiki? Kilang, ngehi aramas men, oh ngehi iei sapwellimahr ladu; eri, I pahn kapwaiada mehkoaros me komwi kupwuriki me pwung.

18 Ni ansou me nanmwarkio karongehier koasoi pwukat, e pwurehng pwuriamweiki, pwe e kilang me Amon kak kasawih eh madamadau kan; ahpw mehndahte met, nanmwarki Lemonai mahsenda, oh keinemwe reh: Ihs komwi? Komwi iei Enihlapo, me mwahngih soahng kan koaros?

19 Amon ahpw sapeng oh patohwanohng ih: Kaidehn ngehi ih.

20 Eri nanmwarkio mahsanih: Ia mwomwen omw mwahngih pepehm kan en nan ei mohngiong? Komw mahsen ni eimah, oh mahsanihong ie duwen mepwukat; oh pil mahsanihong ie duwen sang ni manaman dah me komwi pelehsang pehn riei kan me kin pwakihpeseng nei pelin mahn kan—

21 Eri, ma komw pahn kak mahsanihong ie duwen mepwukat, I pahn kihonguhk soahng koaros me komw kupwuriki; oh ma komw anahne, I pahn silehkin komwi nei sounpei kan; ahpw I ese me komw kehlail sang irail koaros; ahpw, I pahn mweidohng komwi soahng koaros me komw kupwurki.

22 Eri, met pwehki Amon eh loalokong, ahpw sohte keper, e ahpw patohwanong Lemonai: Komw pahn karonge ei koasoi kan ma I pahn ndaiong komwi sang ni manaman dah me I kak wiahki mepwukat? Oh met iei dahme I mwahuki sang rehmwi.

23 Oh nanmwarkio ahpw ketin sapeng ih, oh mahsanih: Ei, I pahn kamehlele omw mahsen kan koaros. Oh met e ahpw lohdier nan koasondio.

24 Eri, Amon tepida koasoi ong ih ni eimah, oh ndaiong ih: Komw kamehlele me mie Koht?

25 E ahpw sapeng, oh mahsanih ong ih: I sohte ese ia wehwehn men.

26 Amon ahpw nda: Komw kamehlele me mie Enihlap?

27 Ih eri sapeng, Ei.

28 Oh Amon nda: Met iei Koht. Oh Amon pwurehng potowanong ih: Komw kamehlele me Enihlap, me iei Koht, me ketin kapikada soahng koaros me mih nanleng oh nin sampah?

29 E ahpw mahsanih: Ei, I kamehlele me e ketin kapikada soahng koaros nan sampah; ahpw I sohte ese duwen nanleng.

30 Oh Amon ahpw patohwanohng ih: Nanleng iei wasa me Koht kin ketiket ie oh pil sapwellime tohnleng sarawi kan.

31 Oh nanmwarki Lemonai keinemwe: E mih pohnangin sampah?

32 Oh Amon nda: Ei, oh e kin ketin mahmahsendiong pohn aramas akan koaros; oh e mwahngih madmadau oh ineng en mohngiong koaros; pwe sang nin lime me soahng koaros kepikipikihda sang ni tapio.

33 Oh nanmwarki Lemonai mahsanih: I kamehlele mepwukat koaros me ke koasoiahier. Ke pekederdo sang rehn Koht?

34 Amon ahpw patowanong ih: Ngehi aramas men; oh aramas kepikipikda ni mwohmw en Koht sang ni tapio, oh I alehdi malipilip sang sapwellime Ngehn Sarawi, I en padahkihong mepwukat aramas akat, pwe irail en kak wehwehkihda dahme pwung oh mehlel;

35 Oh kisehn Ngehno kin ketiket rehi, me kin ketikihong ie marain, oh pil manaman sang ni ei pwoson oh ineng kan me mih rehn Koht.

36 Eri met, ni ahnsou me Amon ndahier mahsen pwukat, e tepida padahk sangete ni kepikipikdahn sampah, oh pil kepikipikdahn Adam, oh ndaiong ih duwen soahng kan koaros me pid pwupwudi en aramas, oh koasoiahda oh kasalehiong ih poadopoad kan oh pwuhk sarawi kan en aramas akan, me soukohp akan mahsaniher, lao lel ahnsou me arail pahpa, Lihai mweselsang Serusalem.

37 Oh e pil koasoiahiong irail (pwe e koasoieng nanmwarkio oh sapwellime ladu ko) duwen seiloak me arail pahpa ko wia nan sapwtehno, oh arail lokolok en men mwenge oh men nimpihl koaros, oh arail nsensuwed, oh soahng teikan.
