38 Oh e pil koasoiahiong irail duwen kahngohdi kan en Leimen oh Lemuel, oh nein Ismael pwutak kan, ei, arail kahngohdi kan koaros e padahkiong irail; oh e kawehwehiong irail poadoapoad koaros oh pwuhksarawi kan sang ni ahnsou me Lihai mweselsang Serusalem lel ansou wet.

39 Ahpw kaidehn ih koaros met; pwe e kawehwehiong irail duwen koasoandi en poadoandoarlao, me kaunopdahr sangete ni kapikipikdahn sampah; oh e pil padahkiong irail duwen ketidohn Krais, oh sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk koaros e padahkiong irail.

40 Kedekedeo mwurin eh koasoiahier mepwukat koaros, oh kawehwehiongehr nanmwarkio, nahnmwarkio ahpw kamehlele ah koasoi kan koaros.

41 Oh e ahpw tepida kapakap ong Kauno, ketketihtihki: Main Kaun, komw ketin kupwure kalahngan; nin duwen sapwellim reken kalahngan akan me komw ketikihongehr aramas en Nihpai kan, [komw] ketikihong ie, oh nei aramas akan.

42 Oh met, ni ahnsou me e mahsaniher met, e ahpw pwupwudi nan pwehlo, duwehte e mwomwen mehla.

43 Kedekedeo sapwellime ladu ko ahpw ale ih oh patohwanla rehn sapwellime likend, oh kaunehdi pohn pehto; oh e wonohn duwehte me e pwoulahr erein rahn riau oh pwohng riau; oh likendo, oh sapwellime pwutak kan, oh sapwellime serepein kan mwamwahieiki nanmwarkio, nin duwen tiahk en Mehn Leimen kan arail kin mwahieiki arail mehla.
alma 19:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lemonai alehdi kamarain en mour poatopoat oh kilangada Soundoaro—Tohn tehnpese koaros lupungmasala oh irail tohto kilangada tohnleng kan—Amon poadoandoarala sang ni manaman kapwuriamwei—E ahpw papidaisihla aramas tohto oh wiahda mwomwohdiso rehrail. Ele Sounpar 90 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin rahn riau oh pwohng riau irail ahpw pahn ale ereksohu oh kaunehdi nan sousou ehu, me irail wiahda ong wasahn nekinekidi en arail mehla.

2 Eri, met pwehki lih nanmwarki e rongehr duwen wiewiahn Amon, e ahpw pekihda oh kupwuriki en patohdo reh.

3 Kedekedeo Amon ahpw kapwaiada kupwure, oh patohla rehn lih nanmwarkio, oh kalelapak reh dahme e kupwurki me e pahn wia.

4 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong ih: Nein ei pwoud ladu kan padahkiong ie me komwi iei soukohp en Koht sarawi men, oh me komw tungoaleniki manaman en wia soahngen doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan ni mware;

5 Eri, ma ih mwomwehn met, I men komwi en patohlongala oh patohwan ei pwoud, pwe e wie wonohnehr pohn eh pehto erein rahn riau oh pwohng riapwohng; oh ekei nda me e sohte mehla, ahpw ekei nda me e mehla oh mie pwowe, oh me e pahn anahne nekinekidier nan sousouo; ahpw ong ie e sohte pwowe.

6 Eri, met iei me Amon inengiong, pwe e wehwehki me nanmwarki Lemonai mihmi pahn manaman en Koht; e wehwehki me kahdeng rotorot en soupwoson me e sapwellimaniki wie kohkohsang nan eh madamadau, oh maraino me kamarainiada sapwellime madmadau, me iei marain lingan en Koht, me wia marain kaselel en sapwellime kalahngan—ei, marain wet kihongehr soahngen peren wet ni palingene, ei, pwehki depwek rotorot sohrasangehr, oh marain en mour poatopoat oakada ni palingene, ei, e wehwehki me met powehdier uhdahn paliwere, oh pali ngene patopato pahn kupwur en Koht—

7 Eri, dahme lih nanmwarikio kupwuriki sang reh pil duwehte eh inengo. Eri, e pidelongala pwe en kilang nanmwarkio nin duwen lih nanmwarkio eh kupwuriki; oh e kilangehr nanmwarkio, oh e wehwehki me e sohte mehla.

8 E ahpw patohwan ong lih nanmwarkio: E sohte mehla, e seiseimwok pahn kuwpur en Koht, oh lakapw e pahn pwurehng ketida; eri dehr sarepedi.

9 Oh Amon patohwan kalelapak reh: Komw kamehlele met? Oh e sapeng ih: Sohte ei kadehde ihte omw koasoi, oh en nait ladu kan koasoi; ahpw mendahte I kamehlele me e pahn wiawi nin duwen dahme komw mahsanih.

10 Oh Amon patohwanohng: Komw meid pai pwehki omw pwoson kowahlap; I patohwanong komwi, Maing, sohte soangen pwoson laud wet rehn Mehn Nihpai kan koaros.

11 Kedekedeo e ahpw tepda wie mwasamwasahnte eh pwoudo mpen eh pehto, sangete ahnsouo lao mandahn rahno awiawihete e pahn ketida nin duwen me Amon patohwan.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw ketida, nin duwen mahsen en Amon; oh ni e ketida, e kapahwei lime ong liho, oh mahsanih: Meid pai mwaren Koht, oh meid pai komwi.

13 Pwe ni ei ese me ke wie momour, kilang, I kilangehr ei Soundoaro; oh e pahn ketido, oh lih emen pahn kaipwihdi, oh e pahn kamourala aramas koaros me kamehlele mware. Eri, mwurin eh mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, nan kupwure direkihla peren oh ih pwurehng pwupwudi; oh lih nanmwarkio pil iang pwupwudi, pwehki eh direkihla Ngehno.

14 Eri ni ahnsou me Amon kilangehr Ngehn en Kauno kapwilewei nin duwen eh kapakapiki rie Mehn Leimen kan, me kin kahrehda Mehn Nihpai kan arail kin wie lokolok, de sapwellimen Koht aramas akan pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk kan, e ahpw kelipwikihdi, oh tepida kapakap ni palingene unsek oh kapikapingkalahngankihong Koht dahme e ketin wiahiongehr rie kan; oh e pil iang lupungimaskihla peren; oh irail meh silimeno pwupwudier nan pwehl.

15 Eri, ni ahnsou me ladu kan en nanmwarkio kilangehr me irail pwupwudier, irail pil iang tepida kapakap ong Koht, pwe lemwin Kauno pil kohdohng irailehr, pwe irail me kesihnen mwohn nanmwarkio oh kadehdehiong ih duwen manaman kapwuriemwei en Amon.

16 Kedekedeo irail ahpw eker mwaren Kauno, ni uwen arail kak koaros, lao irail koaros pil pwupwudi nan pwehlo, ihte lih en Leimen men me soh, me adaniki Eipis, me weliakapwalahr ong Kauno erein sounpar kei, sang ni ouraman sansal kapwuriamweio me eh pahpao kilangadao—

17 Eri, pwehki eh weliakapwalahr ong Kauno, oh kin ekiekihte, eri, ni ahnsou me e kilangada ladu kan en Lemonai pwupwudiong nan pwehlo, oh nah lih laduh kan, lih nanmwarkio, oh nanmwarkio, oh Amon, arail ulpesengehr nan pwehlo, e esehier me manaman en Koht met; oh e medewehda me ih eh ahnsou mwahu met, ni eh pahn kasalehiong aramas akan dahme wiawihong irailo, oh ma re pahn kilang dahme wiawio e pahn kak kahrehiong irail en kamehlele manaman en Koht, eri e ahpw tangala ni ehu ehu ihmw akan, pakapakairkihong aramas koaros.

18 Oh irail tepida pokonpene ni tehnpas en nanmwarkio. Oh pokon ehu ahpw kohdo, oh re ahpw pwuriamweikihla, re kilangada nanmwarkio, oh lih nanmwarkio, oh neira ladu kan ulpesengehr nan pwehlo, oh irail koaros wonohn likamwete re mehla; oh irail pil kilangada Amon, oh kilang, Mehn Nihpai men ih.

19 Ahnsou wet aramas akan tepida kaulimki nanpwungarail; ekei ndinda me lapalahn suwed ehu me kohdohng pohrail, de pohn nanmwarkio oh tehnpese, pwehki eh mweidohng Mehn Nihpaio en mihmihte nan sahpwet.

20 Ahpw ekei lupwoare irail, ndinda: Nanmwarkio wahdo kahpwal suwed wet nan tehnpese, pwehki e kemehla sapwellime ladu kan me kin mweidong neirail pelin mahn akan en mwarakpeseng ni pihl en Sihpus.

21 Oh irail ohl akan me mih ni pihl en Sihpus oh pwakihpeseng sapwellimen nanmwarkio pelin mahn akan lupwoare irail, pwe irail lingeringer pahn Amon pwehki uwen tohtohn riarail kan me e kemehla ni pihl en Sihpus, ni ahnsou me e doarehla sapwellimen nanmwarkio pelin mahn kan.

22 Eri met, emen irail, me rie pwutak me Amon kemehkihla nah kedlahso, pwehki e lingeringer kowahlap pahn Amon, e usada nah kedlahs oh kohlahn kemehla Amon; oh ni ahnsou me e kawada nah kedlahso pwe en pele ih, kilang e pwupwudihte mehla.

23 Eri, met kitail kilang me sohte me kak kemehla Amon, pwe Kauno mahsanihongehr Mosaia, eh pahpao: I pahn silehdi, oh e pahn wiawihong ih nin duwen omw pwoson—eri, Mosaia koapworopwoki Kauno.

24 Kedekedeo ansou me pokono kilangehr ohlo me kihda nah kedlahs pwe en kemehla Amon, e pwupwudier mehla, irail koaros pa masepwekada, oh re sohte men kihla pehrail oh doahke ih de emen irail akan me pwupwudi; oh irail tepida pwuriamwei nanpwungarail dahme kahrehda soahngen manaman wet, de ia wehwehn mepwukat koaros.

25 Kedekedeo aramas tohto nanpwungarail nda me Amon iei Eni Lap, oh ekei nda me Eni Lap me ketin kadarodo;

26 Ahpw ekei lupwoare irail koaros, ndinda me ih eni kamasepwek men, me Mehn Nihpai kan kadarodohng irail pwe en kaloke irail.

27 Oh mie ekei nda me Amon pekederdo sang Eni Lap pwe en kaloke irail pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; oh me Eni Lap me kin kalapw ieiang Mehn Nihpai kan, me kin kalapw doare irail sang pahn arail manaman; oh irail nda me ih Eni Lapo me kamwomwala tohtohn riarail Mehn Leimen kan.

28 Eri met, mwoarongo tepidahr kehlaila nanpwungarail. Oh ni ahnsou me re wie mwoaromwoarong, lih laduo me kahrehda pokono arail pokonpene, oh ahnsou me e kilangada arail wie mwoaroamwoarong nanpwungarail e inenen pahtoukihla kowahlap, oh pilen mese keredi.

29 Kedekedeo e ahpw patohla oh ale pehn lih nanmwarkio, pwe en kak kapwourda sang nan pwehlo; oh ni ansouohte me e doahke peho e pwourda oh kesihnenda, oh nda ni ngihl laud, ketihtihki: Meid pai Sises, me doarehiesang nan ehl wasa sakanakan! Meid pai Koht, komw ketin kupwure aramas pwukat!

30 Oh ni ahnsou me e mahsanih mepwukat, e ahpw ketikipene limeh kan teng, pwehki eh direkihla peren, e ahpw mahsanih mahsen tohto me sohte emen kak wehwehki; Oh ahnsou me e kaimwisekala sapwellime mahsen, e ahpw doahke limen nahnmaraikio, oh kilang e ketin pwourda oh ninlengihda.

31 Eri, e mwadangete, kilangada aramas ako arail wie mwoaramwoarong, e ahpw ketila oh tepida angiangih irail, oh ketin padahkihong irail mahsen akan me e rongehr sang Amon; oh koaros me men rong sapwellime mahsen akan kamehlele, oh weliakapwala ong Kauno.

32 Ahpw irail tohto me sohte men rong sapwellime mahsen akan; irail eri kokohsang wasao.

33 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Amon pwourda e pil iang padahkih irail, oh pil sapwellimen Lemonai ladu kan koaros; oh irail koaros kalohkihong aramas akan soahng ehute—oh mohngiongirail kan wekidekila; kahrehda irail sohlahr inengieng wia me suwed.

34 Oh kilang, tohto irail kalohngkihong aramas akan me irail kilang tohnleng kei oh re koasoi ong irail; oh irail padahkihong irail soahng kan duwen Koht, oh sapwellime pwung kan.

35 Kedekedeo aramas tohto kamehlelehda arail mahsen akan; oh koaros me kamehlelehda papidaisla, oh irail wiahla aramas mour pwung, oh irail koasoanehdi ehu mwomwohdiso rehrail.

36 Eri sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk tepdahr rehn Mehn Leimen kan; met Kauno ketin tepier kamwerehdi sapwellime Ngehno pohrail; oh kitail kilang me e kin keting kapahla lime kan rehn aramas akan koaros me pahn koluhla oh kamehlele mwareo.
alma 20:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno ketin kadaralahng Amon nan Midonai pwe en kapitala rie kan me selidi—Amon oh Lemonai tuhwongidi semen Lemonaio, me wia nanmwarki en nan sahpwo pwon—Amon idingohng nanmwarkio en mweidada kapedoi rie kan sang imweteng. Ele Sounpar 90 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me irail wiahdahr mwomwohdiso nan sahpwo, nanmwarki Lemonai ketin kupwurki me Amon pahn iang ih kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, pwe en ketin kapehsehiong ih semeo.

2 Oh kapitien Kauno ahpw peidohng Amon, ketihtihki: Ke sohte pahn kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, pwe kilang, nanmwarkio pahn song en kemeiukala; ahpw ke pahn kohla nan sahpw en Midonai; pwe kilang, Aron riomwo, oh pil Mulokai oh Amah re mihmi nan imweteng.

3 Eri kedekedeo ahnsou me Amon rongada duwen met, e ahpw ndaiong Lemonai: Kilang, rieio oh riei ohl akan mihmi nan imweteng nan Midonai, oh I pahn kohla pwe I en kak doareirailla.

4 Lemonai eri ndaiong Amon: I ese, me sang ni kehl en Kauno ke kak wia soahng koaros. Ahpw kilang, I pahn iang komwi kohwei nan sahpw en Midonai; pwe nanmwarki en sahpw en Midonai, me mwareniki Andiomno, e wia kempoakepahi men; eri I pahn kohwei nan sahpw en Midonai, pwe I en kak kaperenda nanmwarki en sahpwo, oh e pahn kapedoi sang riomw kan nan imweteng. Lemonai ahpw kalelapak reh: Ihs me patohwanohng komwi me riomw kan patpato nan imweteng?

5 A Amon sapengki: Sohte me ndaiong ie, ihte Koht; oh e ketin mahsanihong ie—Kohwei oh doarehla riomw kan, pwe irail mihmi nan imweteng nan sahpw en Midonai.

6 Met ahnsou me Lemonai karongehier met, e mahsanihong sapwellime ladu kan re en kaunopada sapwellime oahs kan oh werennansapw akan.

7 Oh e mahsanihong Amon: Kohdo, I pahn ianguhk kohdihla nan sahpw en Midonai, oh wasao I pahn peki rehn nanmwarkio pwe en kapedoi riomw kan sang nan imweteng.

8 Kedekedeo Amon oh Lemonai ahpw wie seiseiloak kohla, ira ahpw tuhwongedi semen Lemonaio, me wia nanmwarki en sahpwo pwon.

9 Oh kilang, semen Lemonai mahsanihong ih: Dahme ke sohte kohkihdo ni kamadipw en rahn kesempwalo me I koasoanehdi kamadipw ehu ong nei pwutak kan, oh ong nei aramas akan?

10 Oh e ahpw mahsanih: Ia wasa ke kahkahrehla ie Mehn Nihpai menet, me wia emen seri en aramas likamw?

11 Kedekedeo Lemonai ahpw patohwanohng ih ia wasa re kohkohla ie, pwehki e masak ede engiengda pah.

12 Oh e pil ndaiong kahrepe koaros me e mihmihki nan eh wehio, me e sohte pwarekihla ni kamadipw me semeo ketin kaunopadao.

13 Oh met ahnsou me Lemonai koasoiahiongehr mepwukat koaros, kilang, e pwuriamweiki, eh pahpao e engiengida pah, oh mahsanih: Lemonai, ke pahn pitipitte kapwurehla Mehn Nihpai pwukat, me wia seri en aramas likamwo. Kilang, e pirapa atail pahpa kahlap ako; oh met nah seri kat pil kohdo rehtail pwe sang ni arail likamw kan oh mwersuwed, irail pahn keteweikitaildi, pwe irail en kak pwurehng pirapahsang dahme atail.

14 Eri semen Lemonaio ahpw mahsanihong en kemehkihla Amon kedlahso. Oh e pil mahsanihong ih me e sohte pahn kohla nan sahpw en Midonai, ahpw e pahn iangihda pwurala nan sahpw en Ismael.

15 Ahpw Lemonai mahsanih ong ih: I sohte pahn kemehla Amon, de pil pwurala nan sahpw en Ismael, ahpw I pahn kohla nan sahpw en Midonai pwe I en kak kapitala rien Amon kan, pwe I ese me irail wia ohl pwung kei oh soukohp sarawi en Koht mehlelo.

16 Eri ni eh karongehda met, e ahpw engiengida pah, oh usada sapwellime kedlahso pwe en pelehdiong nan pwelo.

17 Ahpw Amon patohda oh ndaiong ih: Kilang, komw sohte pahn kemehla sapwellimomwi pwutaken; ahpw e pahn mwahu ma ih me mehla sang komwi, pwe kilang, e koluhkilahr dipe kan; ahpw ma komwi me pahn mehla ahnsou wet, nan omwi engieng, palingenomwen sohte kak komourla.

18 Oh pil, e pahn konehng komwi en ketin pweieksang; pwe ma komw pahn ketin kemehla sapwellimomwi pwutak, ni e wia aramas mwahu men, ntah pahn kedipaikomwi rehn Kauno eh Koht sang nan pwehl, pwe en dupukiong komwi; oh komw pahn kakete mehla ni palingenomw.

19 Eri ni ahnsou me Amon koasoiahiong mepwukat, e ahpw sapeng ih, ketihtihki: I ese ma I pahn kemehla nei pwutak en, I pahn kemehla aramas mwahu; pwe kowe me song en kauwehla ih.

20 Oh e ahpw ngapalahng kemehla Amon. Ahpw Amon sarek eh palapal kan, ih eri pil pelehiong peho pwe en sohla kak doadoahngki.

21 Eri ahnsou me nanmwarkio mahsanihdahr me e sohte kak kemehla Amon, e ahpw tepida pekmahk rehn Amon me en menlau dehr kemehla.

22 Ahpw Amon ngapkipeseng nah kedlahso, oh ndaiong ih: Kilang, I pahn pelei komwihdi ma komw sohte pahn mweidala riei kan sang nan imweteng.

23 Met nanmwarkio, masakada pwe ede kamakamala, e ahpw mahsanih: Ma komw sohte pahn kemeiehla I pahn kamanahiong komwi soahng koaros me komw pahn patohwanohng ie, iei kak elep ei wehi.

24 Eri ahnsou me Amon kilangadahr me e kamasakadahr mwohnsapw likeilapo en mweidohng nin duwen nsene, e ahpw ndaiong ih: Ma komw pahn mweidala riei kan re en kapidoi sang nan imweteng, oh pil mweidohng Lemonai en kolokolete sapwellime wehio, oh me komw sohte pahn nsensuwed pah, ahpw mweidohng en momour nin duwen nsene nan pein eh saledek en madamadau, eri I sohte pahn kemeikomwihla; ma soh, a I pahn peleikomwihdiong nan pwehlen.

25 Met ahnsou me Amon patohwanda mepwukat, nanmwarkio tepida peren pwehki eh ieias.

26 Oh eri ni nanmwarkio kilang me Amon sohte inengieng en kemehla, oh e pil kilang Amon eh poakepoake mehlel nah pwutak Lemonai, e pwuriamweiki kowahlap, oh mahsanih: Pwehki ihte met me komw kupwuriki, I pahn kapidoi riomw kan, oh mweidohng nei pwutak Lemonai en wie kolokolete eh wehio, kilang, I pahn kamanahieng komwi me nei pwutak en pahn kolokolete eh wehio sang ahnsou wet oh kohkohlahte; oh e sohla pahn mih pahn ei manaman—

27 Oh I pahn pil kamanahiong komwi me riomw kan pahn saledeksang nan imweteng, oh komwi oh riomw ohl akan en patohdo rehi, nan ei wehio; pwe I udahn men tuhwong komwi. Pwe nanmwarkio pwuriamweila mehlel sang ni koasoi kan me e koasoia, oh pil koasoi kan me e koasoia mpen sapwellime pwutako Lemonai, eri e kupwuriki esehla.

28 Kedekedeo Amon oh Lemonai douluhla nan ara seiloak patpatohla nan sahpw en Midonai. Oh Lemonai kenikenla pahn nanmwarki en sahpwo; eri rien Amon kan kapidoi sang nan imweteng.

29 Oh ahnsou me Amon tuhwong irail e uhdahn pahtoukihla kowahlap, pwe kilang irail kilisou, oh kilirail kan tepwala kowahlap pwehki arail pirapirkihdi sahl kehlail. Oh irail pil lokolongki arail men mwenge, men nimpil, oh soahngen lokolok koaros; ahpw irail kanengamahiengete nan arail lokolok kan koaros.

30 Oh, met wiawi, pwehki arail usuhso inenehdi rehn aramas me keieu kahngohdi oh keptakai; eri irail sohte men rong arail padahk kan, oh kausirailla, oh kaloke irail, oh pwakih irail sang ni ehu ehu ihmw kan, oh sang ehu wasa kohla ehu wasa, lao lel arail kohdo nan sahpw en Midonai; oh wasao me irail kolkoldi ie oh lekdeklong nan imweteng, oh pirapirkihdo sahl kehlail, oh sensel nan imweteng erein rahn kei, oh Lemonai oh Amon kasaledekiraillahr.
alma 21:
Duwen ahn Aron, oh Mulokai oh riarail kan kalkalohk ong Mehn Leimen kan.

Audaudki iralaud 21 lel 25.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aron padahkihong Mehn Amelekai kan duwen Krais oh Sapwellime Tomwo—Aron oh riekan selidi nan Midonai—Mwurin arail kasaledekla, irail padahk nan sinakoke kan oh karehiong me tohto weliakapwala—Lemonai mweidada saledek en pelien lamalam ong aramas akan nan sahpw en Ismael. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri ni ahnsou me Amon oh riekan arail kohpeseng nan irepen sahpw en Mehn Leimen kan, kilang Aron pilada seiloaklahng nan sahpw me Mehn Leimen kan me kin kahdaniki, Serusalem, me kohsang ni eden sahpw me wia udahken arail pahpa kahlap ako; oh e mihte ni irepen sahpw en Mormon.

2 Eri Mehn Leiman kan oh mehn Amelekai kan oh nein Amulon aramas akan kauwadahier lapalahn kahnihmw ehu, iei me kahdaniki Serusalem.

3 Eri Mehn Leimen kan, re wia aramas keptakai kei, ahpw Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Amulon kan uhdahn keptakai sang irail; eri irail kin wiahng Mehn Leimen kan irail en kakeptakaila nan mohngiongarail kan, pwe re en kak kehlail nan arail wiewia suwed oh arail tiahk suwed kan.

4 Kedekedeo Aron kohla nan kahnihmw en Serusalem, oh tepida padahk ong Mehn Amelek kan. Oh e tepida padahk ong irail nan arail sinakoke kan, pwe irail wiahda arail sinakoke ni wiepen koasondi en Neor; pwe tohto mehn Amalek kan oh Amulon kan kin idawehn koasondi en Neor kan.

5 Eri, ahnsou me Aron pidelong nan ehu arail sinakoke ko pwe en padahk ong aramas akan, oh ni eh wie koasokoasoi ong irail, kilang emen Mehn Amelek kesihnenda oh tepida akamai ong ih, ndinda: Dahme ke kadkadehdehki? Ke kilangehr tohngleng men? Dahme kahrehda tohnleng kan sohte pwarohng kiht? Kilang nait aramas akat soh pil mwahu duwehte noumwail aramas akan?

6 Ke pil nda, ma se sohte pahn koluhla se pahn mwomwla. Ia mwomwen omw ese lamalam oh ineng en nan kapehdat kan? Ia mwomwen omw ese me se pahn anahne koluhla? Ia mwomwen omw ese me se sohte wia aramas pwung kei? Kilang, se kauwada ihmw sarawi kan, oh se kin kohpene pwe se en kaudokiong Koht. Se kamehlele me Koht pahn kamourala aramas koaros.

7 Aron eri kalelapak reh: Ke kamehlele me Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido oh doarehla aramas akan sang diparail akan?

8 A ohlo ahpw ndaiong ih: Se sohte kamehlele me ke ese soahngen. Se sohte kamehlele soahng tiahk en pweipwei kan. Se sohte kamehlele me ke ese soahng kan me pahn kohdo, oh se pil sohte kamehlele me amwail pahpahko oh pil atail pahpahko ese duwen soahng kan me irail koasoia, duwen soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

9 Met Aron tepida pahkohng irail iren pwuhk sarawi kan me pid duwen ketidohn Krais, oh pil duwen iasadahn me mehla, oh me aramas sohte kak komourla ihte sang ni spawellimen Krais pwoula oh lokolok kan, oh tomw en ntao.

10 Kedekedeo e ahpw tepida kawehwehiong irail mepwukat, irail eri lingeringerda pah, oh tepida kauwe; oh irail sohte men rong koasoi kan me e pahn koasoia.

11 Eri, ahnsou me e kilang me irail sohte men rong eh koasoi kan, e mwesel sang nan arail sinakokeo, oh kohdo nan kousapw me kahdaniki Ani-Andai, oh wasao e tuhwongidi Mulokai kalokalohkihong irail mahseno; oh pil Amah oh rie kan. Oh irail pelipelianki aramas tohto mahseno.

12 Kedekedeo irail kilang aramas akan arail kin kakeptakaih mohngiongirai kan, eri irail kohkohla oh kohdo nan sahpw en Midonai. Oh irail padahkihong aramas tohto mahseno, oh malaulau me kamehlele mahsen kan me irail wie padpadahngki.

13 Ahpw, Aron oh ekei rierail kan kolkoldi oh lekdeklong nan imweteng, oh luhwe ko tangasang nan sahpw en Midonai kohla nan sahpw teikan me kapil wasao.

14 Oh irail akan me lekdeklong nan imweteng lokolongki soahng tohto, oh irail saledekla sang ni sawas en Lemonai oh Amon, oh kohieng kenerail mwenge oh arail likou.

15 Irail eri pwurehng doula oh kalohki mahseno, oh met keieu en arail kasaledeksang nan imweteng; eri irail lokolongki.

16 Oh irail kohla wasa koaros me Ngehn en Kauno pahn kaweidkin ihr, kalkalohngki mahsen en Koht nan ehu ehu sinakoke en Mehn Amelek kan, de nan en Mehn Leimen kan arail pokon koaros me re kak mweimweiong loale.

17 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw tepida kapairailda, iei me irail sewesehda aramas tohto en marainkihda me mehlelo; ei, irail kasalehiong aramas tohto en wehwehkihda pein diparail akan, oh tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, me sapwung.

18 Kedekedeo Amon oh Lemonai pwurala nan sahpw en Midonai ong nan sahpw en Ismael, me wia sahpw en arail sohso.

19 Oh nanmwarki Lemonai sohte men mweidohng Amon en papah ih, de wia sapwellime ladu.

20 Ahpw e kupwurehda irail en wiahda sinakoke kan nan sahpw en Ismael; oh e kupwurehda sapwellime aramas, de aramas akan me mih pahn eh manaman, re en kin kapokonepene.

21 Oh e ahpw kerekeremwelikin irail, oh e ahpw padahkihong irail soahng tohto. Oh e ahpw kalohkihda me irail wia aramas me mih pahn eh manaman, oh me re wia aramas saledek kei, me irail saledek sang mour kehnaudek pahn nanmwarkio, semeo; pwehki semeo kamanahiengehr en kaunda aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en Ismael, oh nan sahpwo pwohn me kapilpene.

22 Oh e pil kasalehda me irail ahneki saledek en pwongih Kauno arail Koht nin duwen nsenarail, ni wasa koaros me re mih ie, ma pil mih nan sahpw me mih pahn manaman en nanmwarki Lemonai.

23 Oh Amon padahkiong aramas akan en nanmwarki Lemonai; oh kedekedeo e ahpw padahkihong irail soahng kan koaros me pid duwen mour pwung. Oh e koangoange irail rahn koaros, sang ni loalopwoat; oh irail kin rong eh padahk, oh irail kin loalenohng kapwaiada kosonned en Koht akan.
alma 22:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aron padahkihong semen Lemonaio duwen Kepikipikdao, Pwupwudi en Adam, oh koasoandi en poadoandoarlao me pahn kohsang Krais—Nanmwarkio oh tohn tehnpese koaros weliakapwala—Katohrohrpeseng en sahpw nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan kawehwehda. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri, ni ahnsou me Amon kin padapadahkih sapwellimen Lemonai aramas akan, a kitail pahn uhd pwuralahng duwen koasoipen Aron oh rie kan; pwe mwurin e mweselsang nan sahpw en Midonai, Ngehno kahluwahla nan sahpw en Nihpai, iei kohla nan tehnpas en nanmwarki me kaunda sahpw koaros ihte sahpw en Ismael me soh; oh iei ih semen Lemonai.

2 Kedekedeo e ahpw patohlongala nan tehnpas en nanmwarkio, iangahki rie kan, oh poaridi mwohn nanmwarkio, oh patohwanohng: Kilang, Maing nanmwarki, kiht rien Amon, me komwi doarehsangehr nan imweteng.

3 Oh met, Maing nanmwarki, ma komw mweidohng se en mour, se kak wia sapwellimahr ladu. Nanmwariko ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kumwail patohda, pwe I pahn mweidohng kumwail en mour, oh I sohte pahn mweidohng kumwail en wia nei ladu; ahpw I pahn uhdahn anahne kumwail en sewese ie; pwe I ahneki pwunod nan ei madamadau pwehki en Amon koasoi kadek oh kesemwpal akan; oh I men ese dahme kahrehda e sohte iang kumwail patohdahdo sang nan Midonai.

4 Aron ahpw patohwan ong nanmwarkio: Kilang, Ngehn en Kauno poaronehla en kohla ekis wasa; e kohla nan sahpw en Ismael, pwe en padahkih nein Lemonai aramas akan.

5 Met nanmwarkio keinemwe rehrail: Dahkot met me ke apwtehn nda duwen Ngehn en Kauno? Kilang, ih met me I wie pwonopwoniki.

6 Oh pil, ia duwen met me Amon patohwan—Ma ke pahn koluhla ke pahn komourla, oh ma ke sohte pahn koluhla, ke pahn lekdekla ni imwin rahno?

7 Eri Aron ahpw sapeng oh patohwan ong ih: Komw kamehlele me mie Koht? Oh nanmwarkio mahsanih: I ese me Mehn Amelek kan kin nda me mie Koht, oh I mweidohng irail en kauwada ihmw sarawi kan, pwe irail en kak kohpene oh pwongih ih. Oh ma ahnsou wet komw pahn nda me mie Koht, kilang I pahn kamehlele.

8 Oh met ni ahnsou me Aron rongehr met, nan kapehde tepida peren, oh e ahpw patohwan: Maing nanmwarki, kilang, nin duwen omwi ieias, mie Koht.

9 Nanmwarkio ahpw keinemwe: Ih Koht me wia Eni Lap me wahdo atail pahpa kahlap ako sang nan sahpw en Serusalem?

10 Oh Aron ahpw sapeng ih: Ei, iei ih Eni Lapo, oh ih me ketin kapikada soahng koaros nanleng oh nan sampah. Komw kamehlele met?

11 E ahpw mahsanih: Ei, I kamehlele me Eni Lap me ketin kapikada soahng koaros, oh I men ke en padahkiohng ie duwen mepwukat koaros, oh I pahn kamehlele dahme ke pahn nda.

12 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Aron kasawihdahr me nanmwarkio pahn kamehlele eh koasoi kan, e ahpw tepida wadekohng nanmwarkio iren pwuhk sarawi kan sang ni kepikipikdahn Adam—duwen Koht e ketin kapikada aramas ni mwomwe, oh me Koht ketikihong ih kosonned akan, oh pwehki dihp aramas pwupwudi.

13 Aron ahpw kawehwehda ni pisetik ong ih duwen kepikipikdahn Adam sang nan pwuhk sarawi kan, kakawehwehiong ih duwen pwupwulahn aramas, oh arail mour en sampah oh pil koasoandi en poadoandoarlao, me kaunopada sang ni kapikpikdahn sampah, sang rehn Krais, ong koaros me pahn kamehlele mware.

14 Oh pwehki aramas ar pwupwulahr sohte pein arail manaman en alehdi kapai; ahpw lokolok oh pwoulahn Krais tomwkihla diparail akan, sang ni pwoson oh koluhla, oh soahng teikan; oh pwehki eh mweidpesengehr sahl en mehla, pwe sousou kan sohte pahn pweida, oh medek en mehla pahn sohrala pahn lingan en koapworopworo; oh Aron kawehwehda ni pisetik mepwukat koaros ong nanmwarkio.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin Aron eh kawehwehdahr mepwukat, nahnmwariko ahpw mahsanih: Dahme I pahn wia pwe I en kak alehdi mour soutuk wet me ke koasoiadahr? Eri, dahme I pahn wia pwe I en kak ipwisang rehn Koht, oh usadahsang ngehn suwed wet nan kapehdiet, oh alehdi sapwellime Ngehno, pwe I en kak direkihla peren, pwe I en dehr lekdekila ni imwin rahno? Kilang, I pahn kesehla soahng koaros me I ahneki, ei, I pahn pwilikihdi ei manaman en kaunda wehi, pwe I en kak alehdi peren lap wet.

16 Ahpw Aron ndaiong ih: Ma komw kupwuriki soahng wet, ma komw pahn poaridi mwohn Koht, iei, ma komw pahn koluhkihla dipomw kan koaros, oh poaridi mwohn Koht, oh eker mwareo ni pwoson, kamkamehlele me komw pahn alehdi, eri komwi ahpw pahn alehdi koapworopwor me komwi kupwuriki.

17 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Aron koasoiahier koasoi pwukat, nanmwarkio ahpw kelipwikihdi oh poaridi mwohn Kauno; iei, wendi nan pwehlo, oh loulou kehlail ni ngil laud, ketketihtihki:

18 Maing Koht, Aron patohwan padahkihong ie me mie Koht; oh ma mie Koht, oh ma komwi me Koht, komw menlau ketin kasalehiong ie duwen komwi, oh I pahn kesehla dipei koaros pwe I en kak esehla komwi, oh pwe I en kak iasada sang mehla, oh komourla ni imwin rahno. Oh met ni ahnsou me nanmwarkio mahsaniher koasoi pwukat, e ahpw pwonla likamwete e mehla.

19 Kedekedeo sapwellime ladu kan ahpw tangala oh ndaiong lih nanmwarkio soahng koaros me wiawihong nanmwarkio. E ahpw kohdo rehn nanmwarkio; oh ni ahnsou me e kilangada eh wonohn mwomwen mehla, oh pil Aron oh rie kan wie keskesihnen mwomwen irail me kahrehiong eh pwupwudier, e ahpw engiengda pahrail, oh mahsanihong sapwellime ladu kan, de sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu kan, re en koleiraildi oh kemeirailla.

20 Ahpw ladu ko kilangehr kahrepen nahnmwariko eh pwupwudi, eri irail sohte men doahke Aron oh rie kan; oh irail peki rehn lih nanmwarkio patohwan: Dahme komw mahsanihki se en kemehla ohl pwukat, ni aht kilang me emente irail me kehlail sang kiht koaros? Eri se uhdahn pahn kamala pahrail.

21 Eri ni ahnsou me lih nanmwarkio kilangadahr ladu kan ar masepwehk e pil tepida masepwehk kowahlap, pwe mehkot suwed de wiawihong ih. E ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime ladu kan en kohla oh ekeredo aramas akan, pwe irail en kak kemehla Aron oh rie kan.

22 Met ni ahnsou me Aron kilangadahr koasoandi en lih nanmwarkio, oh pwehki ih e wehwehki keptakai en nan mohngiong en aramas akan, e periki pokono de pokonpene wiahda pingiping lap oh uhpene nanpwungarail; eri e kihla peho oh kapwourda nanmwarkio sang nan pwehlo, oh patohwanohng: Komw ninlengida. Ih ahpw ninlengihda, oh kehlailda.

23 Met e wiawiher mwohn lih nanmwarkio oh ladu tohto. Oh ni ahnsou me re kilangehr irail pwuriamweikihla mehlel, oh tepida masepwehk. Eri nanmwarkio ahpw ninlengida, oh tepida kalohkihong irail. Eri, e ahpw ketin kalohkong irail, lao towe koaros nan tehnpese wiliakapwalahng Kauno.

24 A met mie pokon lap ehu pokonpene pwehki lohk me lih nanmwarkio mahsaniho, oh e tepida mie kaulim mehlel nanpwungen aramas ako pwehki Aron oh rie kan.

25 Ahpw nanmwarkio ninlengida mwohrail oh ketin sewese kaweidihirail. Irail ahpw meleileidi ong Aron oh irail akan me iang ih.

26 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me nanmwarkio kilang me aramas akan meleileidi, e kupwuriki Aron oh rie kan en kesihnenda nanpwungen pokono, pwe irail en padahkihong pokono mahseno.

27 Kedekedeo nanmwarkio ahpw ketin kadarpeseng kalohk ehu nan sahpwo pwon, rehn sapwellime aramas akan koaros me mih nan sapwellime sahpw koaros, me mih ni irepen sapwo, me pil kohlahng ni sehd, sang ni palimese lel palikapi, me irepesengki sahpw en Saraemla sapwtehn tehtikitiko, me kohsang ni sehd en palimese kolahng ni sehd en palikapi, oh ni irepen oaroahr akan, oh ni irepen sapwtehn me mih ni paliepeng en sahpw en Saraemla, kokohlahng ni irepen Mandai, karanih wasa me pillap en Saidon pwilidohsang ie, kerekeredohsang palimese kolahng palikapi—oh ih mwomwen Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Nihpai kan ar tohrohrpeseng.

28 Eri, pali laud en Mehn Leimen me kin dangahnga kin kousoan nan sapwtehno, oh re kin mih nan impwal; oh irail mihseli palikapi en nan sapwetehno, nan sahpw en Nihpai; ei, oh pil palikapi en sahpw en Saraemla, ni irepen oaroahr en sehdo, oh pil palikapi en sahpw en Nihpai, wasa me arail pahpa kahlap ako tepin sohsohki, me kokohlahng ni irepen oaroahr en sehdo.

29 Eri, pil Mehn Leimen kan tohto me mih palimesehn oaroahr en sehdo, wasa me Mehn Nihpai kan kalipeiraillang. Oh met Mehn Leimen kan kereniong kapilpene Mehn Nihpai; ahpw Mehn Nihpai kan sapwanikihla sahpw akan koaros me mih paliepeng en sahpwtehno, wasa me pillap en Saidon pwildohsang ie, sang ni palimese kohla ni palikapi, kapil apali sapwtehno; ni paliepeng, lao irail kolahng ni sahpw me re kahdaniki Sahpwen Rahk.

30 Oh e peiante sahpw me re kahdaniki Sahpwen Tehnla, pwehki eh dohdahla paliepeng eri e lella nan sahpw me aramas koasounla ie mahs ahpw kamwomwomwlahr, me tihrail kan koasoiepe wiawiher, me aramas en Saraemla kan diarada, pwehki wasao wia wasa me re tepin peidi ie.

31 Oh irail kohsang wasao kohdahla ni palieir en sapwtehno. Eri sahpw en paliepengo kahdaniki Sahpwen Tehnla, oh sahpw en palieir kin kahdaniki Sahpwen Rahk, pwehki e wia sahpwtehn me diren soangsoangen mahn lawalo kan, ekei irail kohsang nan sahpw en paliepeng pwehki repen mwenge.

32 Eri met, uwen dohn wasao Mehn Nihpai kin seiloangki rahn ehu elep, ni lain me katohrepeseng Sahpw en Rahk oh Sahpw en Tehnla, sang palimesen nansed kohla paliepeng en nansed; oh pihl eri kereniong kapilpene sahpw en Nihpai oh sahpw en Saraemla, oh mie sahpw tehtikitik ehu me katohrepeseng sahpw en paliepengo oh sahpw en palieiro.

33 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan kousoanlahr nan Sahpw en Rahk, sang ni palimese kohla ni sehd en palikapi, oh met sang ni loalokong en Mehn Nihpai kan, neirail sounsilasil kan oh sounpei kan, silehdi Mehn Leimen kan ni palieir, pwe irail en dehr iang sapwasapw ni paliepeng, pwe irail en de sapwanikihla sahpw en paliepeng kan.

34 Eri Mehn Leimen kan sohte kak sapwasapw ihte nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh pil wasa kan nan sapwtehno. Met iei loalokong en Mehn Nihpai kan—pwehki Mehn Leimen kan ar wia arail imwintihti, re sohte pahn mweidohng arail kahpwal akan en mih pali koaros, oh pil en mie ehu wasa me re pahn kak tangala ie, nin duwen arail ineng kan.

35 Eri, mwurin ei koasoiahdahr met, I pahn pwuralahng koasoiepen Amon oh Aron, Omner oh Himnai, oh riarail kan.
alma 23:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Saledek en lamalam kalohkda—Mehn Leimen kan nan sahpw isuh oh kahnimw kan wiliakapwala—Irail kahdanikin irail Andai-Nihpai-Lihai oh saledek sang keriao—Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Amulon kan kasohwe mehlelo. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, kedekedeo nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan kadarpeseng kalohk ehu rehn sapwellime aramas akan koaros, me irail sohte pahn koledi Amon, de Aron, de Omner, de Himnai, de emen riarail akan me pahn kohwei kalokalohngki mahsen en Koht, nan wasa koaros me re pahn kohla ie nan sapwarail kan.

2 Ei, e kadarohng irail kalohk wet, pwe irail en dehr koliraildi oh salihiraildi, de keseirailong nan imweteng; de pil kandipi irail, de pohr irail, de kausirail sang nan arail sinakoke kan, de kaloke irail, de kostakai irail, ahpw me irail en mweidohng irail nan imwarail akan, oh pil nan arail tehnpas sarawi kan, oh ihmw sarawi kan.

3 A met pwe irail en kak kohwei oh kalohki mahseno nin duwen nsenarail kan, pwe nanmwarkio wiliakapwalahr ong Kauno, oh tohn tehnpese koaros; eri e kadarpeseng sapwellime kalohko nan sahpwo ong sapwellime aramas akan, pwe en dehr kapweiekdi mahsen en Koht, ahpw en kak kohwei nan sahpwo pwon, pwe sapwellime aramas kan en kak esehda duwen tiahk suwed kan en arail pahpa kahlap ako, oh pwe re en kak esehda me irail koaros pirien, oh pwe re en dehr kam aramas, de kulih aramas, de pirap, de kamwahl, de wia soahngen wiewia suwed kan.

4 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nanmwarkio kadaralahr kalohk wet, Aron oh rie kan kohlahng ehu kahnihmw uhd kohlahng ehu kahnihmw, oh sang nan ehu wasahn kaudok kohla nan ehu, kauwada mwomwohdiso kan, oh kaskasarawihla samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan nan sahpwo rehn Mehn Leimen kan, pwe re en kalohk oh padahngki mahsen en Koht rehn aramas akan; oh met kahredahr arail tepida pweida mehlel.

5 Oh aramas kid kei esehla duwen Kauno, ei, aramas kid kei kamehlelehda tiahk kan en Mehn Nihpai kan; oh irail esehda duwen poadopoad kan oh kokohp akan me kadakadaur kohdo lel ansou wet.

6 Eri, nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, oh nin duwen tohtohn irail me kamehlelehda, de tohto me wehwehkihda me mehlelo, sang ni en Amon oh rie kan ar padahk, nin duwen ngehn en kaudiahl oh kokohp, oh sapwellimen Koht manaman wiwiahda doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan rehrail—ei, I ndaiong kumwail, nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, tohto mehn Leimen kan kamehlelehda arail padahk kan, oh wiliakapwalahng Kauno, sohla pwurehng pwupwula.

7 Pwe irail wiahla aramas pwung kei; irail pwilikihdi neirail dipwisoun mahwen en arail kahngohdi, kahrehda irail sohla pwurehng pelianda Koht, de pil uhwong riarail akan.

8 A iet irail akan me wiliakapwala ong Kauno:

9 Mehn Leimen kan me mih nan sahpw en Ismael;

10 Oh pil Mehn Leimen kan me mih nan sahpw en Midonai;

11 Oh pil Mehn Leimen kan me mih nan kahnimw en Nihpai;

12 Oh pil Mehn Leimen kan me mih nan sahpw en Sailom, oh me mih nan sahpw en Semlon, oh pil nan kahnimw en Lemuel, oh nan kahnihmw en Simnilom.

13 A iet eden kahnimw kan en Mehn Leimen kan me weliakapwala ong Kauno; oh ih irail pwukat me pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin en arail kahngohdi, ei, neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan koaros; oh irail koaros Mehn Leimen kei.

14 Eri, Mehn Amelek kan sohte wiliakapwala, ihte mehmen; de pil irail Mehn Amulon kan; ahpw arail mohgniong kan keptakaila, oh pil mohngiong en Mehn Leimen kan me mih nan sahpw teikan wasa re kin kousoan, ie, oh nan arail kousapw kan oh arail kahnimw kan.

15 Eri, se kasaledahr eden kahnihmw kan en Mehn Leimen kan me irail koluhla oh marainkihda mehlelo, oh wiliakapwala.

16 Oh met kedekedeo nanmwarkio oh irail akan me wiliakapwala mwahuki me irail en wiahda ehu adarail, pwe irail en kak sansal me re tohrohrsang riarail kan; eri nanmwarkio ahpw wiekupwur rehn Aron oh neirail samworo tohto kan, pid duwen adarail me irail konehng kadahnekihla, pwe irail en kak sansal me re tohrohrsang irail.

17 Kedekedeo irail kahdanikin irail Andai-Nihpai-Lihai; oh irail kin adaniki ahd wet oh solahr kahdaniki Mehn Leimen kan.

18 Oh irail tepida wia aramas koahiek en doadoahk; ei, irail kin kadek ong Mehn Nihpai kan; eri, irail tapiada wehwehiong irail, oh sapwellimen Koht keriao sohla mih pohrail.
alma 24:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen kan kohdohng mahweniong sapwellime Koht aramas akan—Mehn Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan perenki Krais oh tohnleng kan pwarohng irail—Irail pilada mweidala irail en mehla sang arail pahn doarehla pein irail—Tohto Mehn Leimen kan pil wiliakapwala. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Amulon kan oh Mehn Leimen kan me mihmi nan sahpw en Amulon, oh pil nan sahpw en Ihlem, oh me mihmi nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh ni oaralap, koaros me kapilpene sahpwo pwon, me saikinte wiliakapwala oh alehda ahd en Adai-Nihpai-Lihai, ahpw lingeringerida pahn riarail akan pwehki Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Amulon kan me kamwakidada irail en lingeringer.

2 Oh arail kailokong irail doarala kowahlap, lao irail tepida pelianda arail nanmwarkio, lao irail sohla men en wia arail nanmwarki; eri, irail ale neirail dipwisou en mahwen pwe re en peiong aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai.

3 A met nanmwarkio ketkihong manaman en kaunda wehio sapwellime pwutak, oh kihong ede Andai-Nihpai-Lihai.

4 Oh nanmwarkio pwoula nan pahrohte me Mehn Leimen kan tepida kaunop ong mahweniong aramas en Koht.

5 A ni ahnsou me Amon oh rie kan oh irail koaros me iang ih kohdahdo kilangadahr en Mehn Leimen kan ar kaukaunopong kamwomwala riarail akan, irail kohdo nan sahpw en Midian, Amon ahpw tuhwongidi rie kan wasao; oh sang mwo irail kohlahng sahpw en Ismael pwe irail en kak wielamalam rehn Lemonai oh pil rieo Andai-Nihpai-Lihai, dahme irail pahn wia pwe irail en doarehsang Mehn Leimen kan.

6 A met sohte emen irail nan pwungen aramas akan koaros me weliakapwala ong Kauno me men ale neirail dipwisou en mahwen oh peiong riarail akan; soh, irail sohte mwahn wia kaunop ong mahwen; ei, oh pil arail nanmwarkio mahsanihong irail me irail sohte pahn wia.

7 Eri, iet mahsen akan me e ketin mahsenihong aramas akan nin duwen irair wet: I kapingkihong ei Koht, nei aramas kesempwal akan, me sang ni sapwellimen atail Koht kalahngan me e ketin kadarikihdo riatail pwukat, Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re en padahk ong kitail, oh en kamehlelehiong kitail tiahk en atail pahpa kahlap suwed ko.

8 Oh kilang, I kapingkalahngankihong ei Koht lapalap pwehki e ketikihdo ekis sapwellime Ngehno pwe en kameleileidi atail mohngiong kan, pwe kitail en kak tepida wehwehiong riatail, Mehn Nihpai kan.

9 Oh kilang, I pil kapingkalahngankihong ei Koht, me sang ni wehwehpene wet dipatail akan, oh pil kam aramas tohto me kitail wiahier sansaldahr.

10 Oh I pil kapingkalahngankihong ei Koht, iei, ei Koht lapalap, pwehki e ketin mweidong kitail en kak koluhkihla mepwukat, oh pil ketin kupwurelahr dipatail tohto kan oh kam aramas akan me kitail wiahier, oh ketikihsang lokolok en dihp nanmohngiongitail kan, sang ni kapai kan me kohsang wiewia pwung kan en Sapwellimeo.

11 Eri met kilang, rieiko, pwehki ih, mehkoaros me kitail kak wia (ni atail wia aramas keieu salongala) en koluhkihla dipatail kan koaros oh kam aramas tohto me kitail wiahier, oh patowanong Koht en ketin ketikihsang irailehr nan atail mohngiong kan, pwe iei ih mepwukat koaros me kitail kak wia pwe en kak itarohng koluhla mwohn silangin Koht pwe en kak ketikihsang mwahi en dipatail akan—

12 Eri met, riei kesempwal akan, pwehki Koht eh ketikihsangehr atail mwahi en dipatail kan, oh neitail kedlahs kan mwakelekeldahr, eri ieremen kitail pwurehng kasaminehkihla neitail kedlahs kan ntahn riatail akan.

13 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, kitail koledi neitail kedlahs kan pwe en sohte saminkihla ntahn riatail kan; pwe kilang, ma kitail pahn pwurehng kasaminehla neitail kedlahs kan re pahn sohla kak pwurehng kamwakelda sang ni ntahn Sapwellimen Koht lapalapo, me pahn kapwilpwilkihdi tomwpen dihp kan.

14 Oh Koht lapalap ketikihong kitailehr sapwellime kalahngan, oh ketin kasalehiong kitail mepwukat pwe kitail en dehr mehla; ei, oh e ketin kasalehiong kitail mepwukat mwowe, pwehki e sapwellimaniki limpoak ong kitail oh pil limpoak ong neitail seri kan; eri, nin duwen sapwellime kalahngan e ketin kadaredohng kitail sapwellime tohnleng kan, pwe koasoandi en komouro en kak sansal ong kitail on pil ong dih en mwuhr akan.

15 Eri, ia uwen kalahngan en atail Koht! Oh met kilang, pwehki ih uwen met me kitail kak wia pwe atail mwahi en dihp kan en kohsang kitail, oh neitail kedlahs kan mwakelekeldahr, kitail ekihla pwe en kak wie mwakmwakelekelte, pwe en wia mehn kadehdeh ong atail Koht ni imwin rahno, de ni rahno me kitail pahn patowanda mwowe pwe en ale kadeik, me kitail sohte kasaminehkihla neitail kedlahs kan ntahn riatail kan pwehki sang ni e ketikidohr sapwellime mahseno rehtail oh kamwakelehkin kitaildahr.

16 A met, riei kan, ma riatail kan pahn kohdohng kemeikitailla, kilang, kitail pahn ekihla neitail kedlahs kan, iei, kitail pahn sarepedi wasa loal nan pwehl, pwe re en kak wie mwakmwakelekelte, oh wia kadehdehpen atail sohte pwurehng doadoahngki, ni imwin rahno; oh ma riatail kan kemeikitailla, kilang, kitail pahn pwurala rehn atail Koht oh pahn komourla.

17 Eri met kedekedeo ahnsou me nanmwarkio kaimwisekalahr mahsen pwukat, oh aramas akan koaros pokonpenehier, irail ale neirail kedlahs kan, oh dipwisou en mahwen koaros me re kin doadoahngkihong kam aramas, oh irail sarepidi wasa loal nan pwehl.

18 A met me irail wia, pwe en wia arail kadehde ong Koht, oh pil aramas akan, me irail sohte pwurehng doadoahngki dipwisou en mahwen ong kam aramas; oh met irail wia, kehkehlingki oh inoukihong Koht, me re sohte pahn kemehla riarail akan ahpw re pahn mweidala pein arail mour kan; oh sohte kihsang riarail ahpw re pahn kihong; oh re sohte pahn momourki mour ponkahke ahpw irail pahn pwerisek en nan doadoahk.

19 Eri, met kitail kilang me ahnsou me Mehn Leimen pwukat kamehlelehdahr oh esehdahr me mehlelo, irail poadidiong, oh pahn mweidala re en mehla sang arail pahn wiahda dihp; oh kitail kilangehr me irail sarepidi neirail dipwisoun mahwen en kameleileidi wasa, de irail sarepidi neirail dipwisou en mahwin ong kameleileidi nanpwungen aramas.

20 Kedekedeo riarail Mehn Leimen kan, kaunopadahng mahwen, oh kohdahdo nan sahpw en Nihpai pwe re en kemehla nanmwarkio, oh kasapwilada emen nan dewe, oh pil kamwomwala aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan sang nan sahpwo.

21 A ni ahnsou me aramas ako kilangada arail kohkohdo irail kohieila pwe re en tuhwong irail, oh poaridi mwohrail nanpwehlo, oh tepida kapakapong Kauno; oh met ih mwohmw me irail wiewia ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan tepida peiong irail oh tepida kemehkinirailla neirail kedlahs kan.

22 Eri, ni eh sohte me pelian irail, re kemehla meh kid limen; oh se ese me meid pai irail, pwe re samwalahr patopato rehn arail Koht.

23 A met, ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr me riarail akan sohte pahn tangasang kedlahso, de pil sohpeila ni palimaun de palimeing, ahpw irail kin poaridi oh mehla, oh kin kepinga Koht ni arail kin wie kamakamkihla kedlahs—

24 Eri, ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr met irail uhdihsang kemehirailla; oh irail tohto me arail mohngiong kan pahtoukihla riarail akan me mehkihla kedlahs, pwe irail koluhkihla soahng kan me irail wiahda.

25 Kedekedeo irail kesehdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh irail sohte men pwurehng pwokada, pwe irail nsensuwedki kam aramas me irail wiadahro; oh irail poaridi duwehte riarail akan, oh wie koapwoaroapwoariki kalahngan en irail kan me wie kemekemeirailla.

26 Kedekedeo aramas me iangala aramas en Koht rahno tohtohsang aramas akan me kamakamala; oh irail akan me kamakamala wia aramas me mour pwung kei, eri sohte kahrepehieu me kitail pahn peikasalki ahpw kitail kamehlele me re komourla.

27 Oh sohte aramas suwed men me iang irail kamakamala; ahpw aramas tohtohsang kid me marainkihda mehlelo; eri kitail kilang me Kauno kin doadoahk ni soang ahl tohto ong komourlahn sapwellime aramas akan.

28 A met palilaud en Mehn Leimen kan me kemehla tohtohn riarail akan, irail wia Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Amulon kan, palilaud en irail kin idawehn koasoandi en Neor kan.

29 Eri, irail akan me iangala aramas akan en Kauno, sohte emen irail me wia Mehn Amelek de Mehn Amulon, de me kin idawehn koasoandi en Neor, ahpw irail uhdahn kadaudoken Leimen oh Lemuel.

30 A met kitail kak kasawih ni sansal, me mwurin aramas akan arail kin kamarainkidahr Ngehn en Koht, oh marainkihda laud soahng kan me pid duwen mour pwung, oh pwupwudiong nan dihp oh wiewia sapwung, irail kin keptakaila, oh arail mour kin suwedlahsang ma irail sohte ese mepwukat.
alma 25:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mwekid keper kan en Mehn Leimen kan doupesengehr—Kadaudok en samworo en Noha kan kamakamala nin duwen me Apinadai kohpadahiero—Mehn Leimen tohto wiliakapwala oh towehla Mehn Andai-Nihpai-Lihai—Irail kamehlele Krais oh kapwaiada kosonned en Moses. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kilang, kedekedeo Mehn Leimen ko lingeringerkihda kowahlap pwehki arail kemelahr riarail kan; irail eri kahukihla me re pahn dupukiong Mehn Nihpai kan; eri irail uhdihsang arail song en kemehla aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan ahnsouo.

2 Ahpw irail kahre neirail sounpei kan oh kohla ni irepen sahpw en Saraemla, oh mahweniong aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en Amonaia oh kamwomwirailla.

3 Oh mwurin mwo, irail wia mahwen tohto ong Mehn Nihpai kan, iei me irail pekeusla oh kamakamala.

4 Oh nanpwungen Mehn Leimen kan me kamakamalahr akan kereniong irail koaros me wia kadaudok en Amulon oh rie kan, me wia samworo en Noha kan, oh irail kamakamala pahn Mehn Nihpai kan;

5 A me luhwehdi kan, uhd tang kohla palimese en sapwtehno, mwurin arail mwersuwed kihsang Mehn Leiman kan manaman oh mweimwei en kaun, irail kemehkihla Mehn Leimen tohto kisiniei pwehki dahme irail kamehlele—

6 Pwe me tohto irail, mwurin arail lokolok laud oh ahneki kahpwal tohto, irail tepida tamanda mahsen en Aron oh rie kan duwen dahme irail kalohkihong irail nan sahpwarailo; irail eri tepida kelikamwe tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, oh tepda kamehlele Kauno, oh me e ketikihong Mehn Nihpai kan manaman laud; oh tohto me wiliakapwala nan sapwtehno.

7 Kedekedeo, luwehdien kaun akan en keinek en seri en Amulon, karehda arail kamakamalah, mehlel, irail koaros me kamehlele mepwukat.

8 Eri kamakamala wet en irail akan me pwoson kahrehkiong me tohto lingeringerkihda; oh tepida mie lapalahn pingiping nan sapwtehno; oh Mehn Leimen kan tepida pwakihedi kadaudok en Amulon kan oh rie ko oh tepida kemeirailla; oh irail tangdoaui kohla ni palimese en sapwtehno.

9 Oh kilang Mehn Leimen kan kin raparapahkin irailte leledo rahn wet. Karehda mahsen en Apinadai kan pweidahier, me e ketin mahsanihki duwen kadaudok en samworo ko me kahrehda eh mehkihla kisiniei.

10 Pwe e mahsanihong irail: Dahme kumwail pahn wiahiong ie e pahn wia kasalepen soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

11 Oh met Apinadai me tepin kamakamkihla kisiniei pwehki eh kamehlele Koht; met iei wehwehn dahme e mahsanih, me aramas tohto pahn mehkihla kisiniei, duwehte mwomwen dahme e lokolongkier.

12 Oh e mahsanihong samworo en Noha ko me kadaudokerail kan pahn wiahiong aramas tohto en mehkihla kisiniei, duwehte eh wiawihiong ih, oh me irail pahn mwerpeseng oh kamakamala, duwehte sihpw men me sohte silepe oh mahn lawalo kan pwakihala oh kemehla; oh met kilang, mahsen pwukat pweida mehlel, pwe Mehn Leimen kan pwakihrailpeseng, oh raparapahkin irail, oh kemeirailla.

13 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilang me irail sohte kak powehdi Mehn Nihpai kan irail pwurala nan pein sapwarail; oh tohto me kohdo oh kousoanla nan sahpw en Ismael oh sahpw en Nihpai, oh patehngala aramas akan en Koht, me Mehn Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan.

14 Oh irail pil sarepidi neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan, duwehte riarail akan ar wiahier, oh irail tepida wia aramas mour pwung; oh irail weweidki koasoandi en Kauno, oh kin nantihong kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan oh sapwellime koasoandi kan.

15 Ei, oh irail kin kapwaiadahte kosonned en Moseso; pwe e konehng irail pahn kapwaiada kosonned en Moseso nan ahsouo, pwe kosonnedo saikinte unsekla. Ahpw mehndahte kosonned en Moseso, irail kin kasikasik ketidohn Krais, pwehki irail medewe me kosonned en Moseso wia kilel en kasalepen eh pahn ketido, oh re kamehlele me re uhdahn anahne kapwaiada doadoahk sansal en kosonnedo lao lel ahnsou me e pahn ketin pwarohng irail.

16 Eri irail sohte kamehlele me komour pahn pwilisang ni kosonned en Moseso; ahpw irail kamehlele me kosonned en Moseso kin sewese kakehlaka arail pwoson Krais; oh met irail ahneki koapworopwor sang arail pwoson, ong komour soutuk, oh koapworopworkihte ngehn en kokohp, me kin kasalehda soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

17 Oh met kilang, Amon, oh Aron, oh Omner, oh Imnai, oh riarail akan perenda kowahlap, pwehki ar doadoahk pweida rehn Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki irail kilang me Kauno ketin sapeng irail nin duwen arail kapakap kan, oh me e ketin kamehlelehiong irail sapwellime mahsen nan mehkoaros ni pisetik.
alma 26:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amon kin peniki Kauno—Kauno kin ketin kakehlakahla me loalopwoat kan oh ketikihong irail marain—Sang ni pwoson aramas kak sowese aramas kid en koluhla—Koht sapwellimaniki manaman oh mwahngih soahng koaros. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri, iet ehn Amon koasoi kan ong rie ko, me ketihtihki: Riei ohl akan oh kempoakepahi kan, kilang I ndaiong kumwail, mie kahrepe laud me kitail kak pereniki; pwe ia duwe, kitail kak medewe ni ahnsou me kitail mweseldahsang sahpw en Saraemla me Koht pahn ketikihong kitail soahngen kapai laud pwukat?

2 A met, I men idek, soahngen kapai laud dah me e ketikihong kitailehr? Kumwail kak koasoiada?

3 Kilang, I pahn sapengkin kumwail; pwehki riatail, Mehn Leiman kan, mihmi nan rotorot, iei, wasa keieu rotorot, ahpw kilang, irail meh depe me kitail sowesedahr en kilangada marain kesempwal en Koht! Oh met iei kapai me Koht ketikihongkitailehr, pwe kitail wiahla wiliepen nin limen Koht pwehn kapwaiada doadoahk kesempwal wet.

4 Kilang, irail meh kid kei wie pereperen, oh pakahrdohngehr nan sapwellimen Koht kehl.

5 Kilang, wahn mwetuwelo mahier ahnsouo, oh meid pai kumwail, pwe kumwail doadoahngki noumwail kama kan, oh kumwail en dolung wah kan sang ni amwail kak, ei, kumwail doadoahk pwerisek rahno pwon; oh kumwail kilang uwen tohtohn amwail kapakap kan! Oh re pahn rikirikpene nan ihmwen nahko, pwe re sohte pahn ohla mwahl.

6 Ei, melimel en imwin rahno sohte pahn keseiraildi; ei, de re sohte pahn pihrda nan elipip kan; ahpw ahnsou me melimelo pahn kohdo re pahn kohpene nan dewerail akan, pwe melimelo sohte pahn kak kaweirailla; ei, de pil sohte kisinieng kehlail pahn ipir iraillahng wasa me imwintihtiho men wairailla ie.

7 Ahpw kilang, irail pahn mih pahn manaman en limen Kaunen rahko, oh irail wia sapwellime; oh e pahn ketikiniraildahla ni imwin rahno.

8 Meid pahi mwaren atail Koht; kitail kapingahki koul, ei, kitail kapinga ni mware sarawio, pwe e kin ketin wia doadoahk pwung kohkohlahte.

9 Pwe ma kitail sohte kohdahdo sang nan sahpw en Saraemla, irail pwukat me wia kempoakepatail kesempwal me pil poakepoake kitail mehlel, pahn kakete audaudki kailok ong kitail, ei, oh irail pahn pil sehse Koht.

10 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Amon koasoiahier koasoi pwukat, rie pwutako Aron uhd kapwung ih, oh ndinda: Amon, I salohki me omw peren en kahrehdahr omw aksuwei.

11 Amon ahpw ndaiong ih: I sohte aksuweiki pein ei kehlail, de pein ei erpit; ahpw kilang, I me peren unsek, ei, ei mohngiong direkihla popohl, oh I pahn kaping ong ei Koht.

12 Ei, I ese me kaidehk ngehi mehkot; nin duwen ei kehl I me luwet; eri I sohte pahn aksuweiki pein ngehi, ahpw I pahn kapingahki ei Koht, pwe sang sapwellime rosonlap I kak wia soahng koaros; ei, kilang, doadoahk kapwuriamwei tohto me kitail wiahda sahpwet, oh kitail pahn kapikapingahki mware kohkohlahte.

13 Kilang, ia uwen kid kei en riatail kan me e ketin lapwadahsangehr medek en ehl; oh kahrehiong irail en koulki komour en limpoak, oh met pwehki manaman en sapwellime mahseno me mih rehtail, eri e soh mie kahrepen atail pahn peren laud?

14 Ei, mie kahrepe me kitail pahn kapinga ih kohkohlahte, pwe ih iei Koht Wasa Lapalap, oh e ketin lapwadahsangehr riatail akan sang selmete kan en ehl.

15 Ei, rotorot oh mwomwala soutuk kapilirailpenehr; ahpw kilang, e ketin wairaildohngehr nan sapwellime marain soutuko, ei, nan komour soutuk; oh re kapilkihpenehr sapwellime limpoak kohwalap; ei, oh kitail wia mehn doadoahk nin lime kan ong wiewia doadoahk lap oh kesempwal wet.

16 Eri, kitail pereperen, ei, kitail pahn kapinga Kauno; ei, kitail pahn kapingahki atail peren diralahr; ei, kitail pahn kapinga atail Koht kohkohlahte. Kilang, ihs me pahn kak kapingahki mehlel Kauno? Ei, ihs me kak koasoi laudki mehlel duwen sapwellime manaman, oh sapwellime kalahngan, oh sapwellime kanengamah ong aramas akan? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, I sohte kak kasalehda ekiste uwen dahme I kehn.

17 Ihs me kak medewehiong uwen kalahngan en atail Koht ni e ketin mwadangete adihkitailsang nan atail mour sakanakan, dipan, oh samino?

18 Kilang, kitail kohkihla nan kapehdatail kan diren kailok, iangahki lokaia tohto pwe en kauwehla sapwellime mwomwohdiso.

19 O ia duwe, dahme kahrehda e sohte mweidkitailangete en kamwomwala, ei, dahme kahrehda e sohte mweidohngete kedlahs en sapwellime pwungo en kaloke kitail, oh keseikitailla nan pahtou soutuk?

20 O, palingeniet kin kereniong sohrkihla madamadau wet. Kilang, e sohte ketin doadoahngki sapwellime kalokoloko pohtail, ahpw ni sapwellime kalahngan lapo e ketikihsang kitail nan lehn mehlao oh pahtou soutuko, oh ketikinkitaillahng komourpen palingenetail kan.

21 Oh met kilang, riei ko, dah, mie aramas emen me kin momourki mour en sampah me kak ese mepwukat? I ndaiong kumwail soh, sohte me kak ese mepwukat, ihte me kin koluhla kan.

22 Ei, ih me kin koluhla oh doadoahngki pwoson, oh wiahda doadoahk mwahu kan, oh sohte kin tokedihsang kalapw kapakap—ong soahngen aramas menet e kohieng en esehla sapwellimen Koht rir kan; ei, ong soahngen aramas wet e pahn kin mweimweiong en kasalehda soahng kan me sohte kin kasansalada; ei, e pahn kohieng soangen aramaso en wahdo aramas kid kan ong koluhla, iei duwehte eh wiawihongkitailehr en wahdo riatail pwukat en koluhla.

23 A met, rieiko, kumwail tamataman ansou me kitail ndaiong riatail akan nan sahpw en Saraemla, me kitail pahn kohdahdo nan sahpw en Nihpai, en padahk ong riatail, Mehn Leimen kan, oh irail kouruhrkin kitail?

24 Pwe irail ndaiong kitail: Kumwail medewe me kumwail kak kahrehiong Mehn Leimen kan re en marainkihda me mehlelo? Kumwail medewe me kumwail kak kamehlelehiong Mehn Leimen kan tiahk sapwung kan en arail pahpa kahlap ako, ni ar wia aramas keptakai; me mohngiongarail kan pereniki kam aramas; me kin wiewia tiahk suwed kasaut kan rahn koaros; me arail wiewia kan kin duwehte aramas me kin kauwehla kosonnedo sangete ni tapio. Met riei ko, kumwail taman ih mwomwen arail lokaia ko met.

25 Oh irail pil nda: Kitail mahweniong irail, pwe kitail en kamwomwirailla oh arail wiewia suwed kan sang nan sahpwet, pwe irail de powehkitaildi oh kamwomwkitailla.

26 Ahpw kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kitail kohdo nan sahpwtehn ni atail sohte medemedewe kamwomwala riatail kan, ahpw sang ni atail ingangih ma kitail sou pahn kak kamourala ekei irail.

27 Eri ni ahnsou me atail mohngiong kan pahtoula, oh kitail medewehda pwurala, kilang, Kauno kaloalamwahui kitail, oh ketin mahsanih: Kohwei rehn riomwail, Mehn Leimen kan, oh kanengamah nan amwail lokolok kan, oh I pahn ketikihong kumwail en pweida.

28 Oh kilang, kitail kohdohier, oh miher rehrail; oh kitail kanengamah nan atail lokolok kan, oh kitail lokolongkier soangen anahn koaros; ei, kitail kolahngehr ehu ehu ihmw, koapworopworki kalahngan en sampah—kaidehnte kalahngan en sampah ahpw kalahngan en Koht.

29 Oh kitail pidelong nan imwarail akan oh padahki irail, oh kitail padahki irail nan arail ahl akan; ei, oh padahki irail pohn dohl akan; oh kitail pil pidelongehr nan arail tehnpas sarawi kan oh arail sinakoke kan oh padahki irail; eri kitail lekdekiei, oh re kapailoke kitail, oh kandipih kitail, oh pohr masatail akan; oh re kostakai kitail, oh ale kitail oh pirehkihdi sahl kehlail kan, oh keseikitailong nan imweteng; oh sang ni manaman oh kupwurokong en Koht kitail pwurehng saledekla.

30 Oh kitail lokolongki soahngen kalokolok koaros, oh kitail wia mepwukat koaros, pwe kitail en kak kamourala ekei aramas; oh kitail medewe me atail peren uhdahn pahn unsek ma kitail pahn kak sewese kamourala ekeite.

31 Eri kilang, kitail kak kilengla oh kilang wahn atail doadoahk kan; ia duwe, re malaulau? I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, mie wah tohto; ei, oh kitail kak dehdehki arail mehlel, pwehki arail limpoak ong riarail akan oh pil ong kitail.

32 Pwe kilang, irail men mweidala arail mour sang arail pahn kemehla arail imwintihti; oh irail sarepidier neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan wasa loal nan pwehl, pwehki arail limpoak ong riarail akan.

33 Oh met kilang, I men idek rehmwail, mie soahngen limpoak lap wet nan sahpwo pwon? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh, saikinte mie, pil lel rehn Mehn Nihpai kan.

34 Pwe kilang, irail pahn mahweniong riarail kan; re sohte pahn mweidohng pein irail en kamakamala. Ahpw kilang ia uwen tohtohn irail akan me pwilikihdi arail mour kan; oh kitail ese me irail kohla rehn arail Koht, pwehki arail limpoak oh arail kailongki dihp.

35 Eri e sou mie kahrepen atail perenda? Ei, I ndaiong kumwail, sohte aramas men me ahneki kahrepen ar pahn perenda duwehte kitail, sangete ni tepin sampah; ei, oh ei peren doulihala, iei ong aksuweiki ei Koht; pwe e ketin sapwellimaniki manaman koaros, erpit koaros, oh kupwurokong koaros; e ketin mwahngih soahng koaros, oh ih iei Koht kalahngan men, ong komourpen, irail akan me pahn koluhla oh kamehlele mware.

36 Eri ma iei aksuwei met, a I uhdahn pahn aksuwei; pwe ih ei mour met oh ei marain, ei peren oh ei komour, oh ei poadoandoarla sang me suwed poatopoat. Ei, meid pai mwaren ei Koht, me kin ketin loaloale aramas pwukat, me wia ehu rahn tuhkehn Israel, oh salongasang uhdake oh sansalongseli nan sahpw liki; ei, I nda, meid pai mwaren ei Koht, me kin ketin loaloale kitail, aramas kakahnseli nan sahpw liki.

37 Eri met riei kan, kitail kilang me Koht ketin loaloale aramas koaros, sohte lipilipil sahpw me irail kin mih ie; ei, e ketin wadekedier sapwellime aramas akan, oh sapwellime kupwur kalahngan mih wasa koaros nan sampah. Iei met ei peren, oh ei kapingkalahngan mehlel; ei, oh I kapingkihong ei Koht kohkohlahte. Ahmen.
alma 27:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno mahsanihong Amon en kahrehlahng aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai wasa onepek mwahu—Ansouo me re tuhwongidi Alma, ahn Amon peren daulihla uwen e kehl—Mehn Nihpai kan kihong Mehn Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan sahpw en Terson—Irail kin kahdaniki aramas en Amon. Ele Sounpar 90–77 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan me kohla mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai pwehki arail apwaliki kemeirailla, oh me sohte katepe arail songosong en kamwomwirailla.

2 Kedekedeo pwehki Mehn Amelekai kan ar pehrdi, irail lingeringerda mehlel. Oh ni ahnsou me re kilang me irail sohte kak dupukohng Mehn Nihpai kan, re tepida kamwakidada aramas akan re en lingeringerda oh uhwohng riarail akan, aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan; eri irail pwurehng tepida kamwomwirailla.

3 Eri, aramas pwukat kahng peiong irail, oh irail kin mweidala pein irail en kamakamala nin duwen ineng en arail imwintihti kan.

4 Eri, ni ahnsou me Amon oh rie kan kilangehr kamwomwalahn aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai akan me irail poakepoake mehlel, oh aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan poakohng mehlel irail—pwe re kin kesempwalkin irail duwehte tohnleng kei me pekederdosang rehn Koht pwe en doareirailsang kamwomwala soutuk—eri, ni ahnsou me Amon oh rie kan kilangadahr doadoahk en lapalahn kamwomwala wet, irail poakepoakeirailda, oh irail ndaiong arail nanmwarkio:

5 Kitail kapokonepene sapwellime Kauno aramas pwukat, oh kitail kohdihla nan sahpw en Saraemla rehn riatail Mehn Nihpai kan, oh sopohsang atail imwintihtih kan, pwe kitail en dehr kamakamala.

6 A nanmwarkio ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan pahn kemeikitala, pwehki aht kamaramas tohto oh dihp me se wiahiong irail.

7 Eri Amon patowan: I pahn kohla oh kalelapak rehn Kauno, oh ma e pahn mahsaniong kitail, kohdihla rehn riatailko, komwi pahn ketla?

8 Nanmwarkio ahpw mahsaniong: Ei, ma Kauno ketin mahsanih se en kohla, se pahn iang kohdihla rehn riatail kan, oh se pahn wie liduhla pahrail lao se kapwungala aht kamaramas tohto oh dihp me se wiahiong irail.

9 Amon sapeng, patowanohng: E uhwong en riatail ko arail kosonned, me semeio koasonehdi, me irail pahn kin kaliduwih aramas nanpwungarail; eri kitail kohdihla oh liki kalahngan en riatail akan.

10 Nahnmwariko ahpw mahsanihong: patohwan kalelapak rehn Kauno, oh ma e ketin mahsanihong kitail en kohla, kitail pahn kohla; ma soh eri se pahn mehla nan sahpwet.

11 Kedekedeo Amon ahpw kohla oh patohwan kalelapak rehn Kauno, oh Kauno ketin mahsanihong ih:

12 Kahluwa sang aramas pwukat nan sahpwet, pwe irail en dehr mehla; pwe Sehdan koledier mohngiong en Mehn Amelek kan, me kin koamwoarongehda Mehn Leimen kan ren lingeringer pahn riarail akan oh kemeirailla; eri kohkohlahsang nan sahpwet; oh meid pahi aramas pwukat nan dih wet, pwe I pahn doareirailla.

13 Kedekedeo Amon kohla oh patowanohng nanmwarkio mahsen koaros me Kauno ketin mahsanihong.

14 Eri irail kapokonepene neirail aramas akan koaros, ei, sapwellimen Kauno aramas koaros, oh kihpene neirail pelin sihpw oh kou kan koaros, oh mweselsang nan sahpwo kohlahng nan sapwtehno wasa me irepeseng sahpw en Nihpai sang sahpw en Saraemla, oh kohdo karanih irepen sahpwo.

15 Kedekedeo Amon ndaiong irail: Kilang, ngehi oh riei kan pahn kohla nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kumwail pahn awih kiht wasaht lao se pwurodo; oh se pahn kasawiada audepen mohngiong en riatail kan, ma re pahn kak mweidohng kumwail en kohdo nan sahpwet.

16 Kedekedeo, ni ahnsou me Amon wie kohkohla nan sahpwo, ih oh rie ko ahpw tuhwongidi Alma, wasa me koasoiepe wiawiher; oh kilang, irail peren mehlel ni ar tuhpene.

17 Eri Amon direkilahr peren laud mehlel; iei, eh audaudkidahr peren pwehki eh Koht lao e solahr angi; ih ahpw pwupwukihdi nan pwehlo.

18 Eri, kaidehn ih peren kowahlap met? Kilang, soahngen peren wet pahn kohwohngete irail akan me kin rapahki peren sang ni ar men koluhla mehlel oh opampap.

19 A met en Alma peren ni eh tuhwong rie kan inenen laud mehlel, oh pil en Aron peren, Omner, oh Imnai; ahpw kilang ar peren sohte kihsang angirail.

20 Eri kedekedeo, Alma kahrehla rie ko ni imwe nan sahpw en Saraemla; Oh irail kohla oh patowanohng sounkopwung lapalapo soahng koaros me wiawihong irail nan sahpw en Nihpai, rehn riarail akan, Mehn Leimen kan.

21 Kedekedeo sounkopwung lapalapo ahpw kadarpeseng kalohk ehu nan sahpwo pwon, pwe en esehda en aramas akan ar pilipil pid duwen arail pahn mweidelong riarail akan, me wia aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai.

22 Kedekedeo, aramas akan ahpw ehukihda ar koasoandi, me dene: Kilang, se pahn mweidala sahpw en Terson, me mih palimese karanih sehdo, me kadokepene sahpw en Rahk, me mih palieir en sahpw en Rahk; oh sahpw en Terson iei sahpw me se pahn kihong riat akan pwe irail en sapwankihla.

23 Eri, met se pahn kadarahla nait sounpei kan nanpwungen sahpw en Terson oh sahpw en Nihpai, pwe se en kak sile riatail akan nan sahpw en Terson; oh met se pahn wiahiong riatail kan, pwehki arail salohki ale neirail dipwisou en mahwen oh pelian riarail akan pwe irail de dipada; oh re salohda kowahlap pwehki kamedek en koluhla mehlel me re wiahier, pwehki arail kamaramas tohto oh arail mwekid suwed mwuledek.

24 Eri kilang, ih met me se pahn wiahiong riat kan, pwe irail en kak sapwenkihla sahpw en Terson; oh se pahn sile irail sang arail imwintihti kan, ni arail pahn kihdo ekei arail dipwisou kan pwe en kak sewese kiht apwalih nait sounpei kan.

25 Eri, kedekedeo me ni ahnsou me Amon rongehr met, e ahpw pwurala rehn aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai ko, oh Alma pil iang ih kohla nan sapwtehno, wasa me irail kauwada ie arail impwal akan, oh kasalehiong irail mepwukat koaros. Oh Alma pil koasoiaiong irail duwen eh weliakapwalao, ni eh iang Amon, Aron, oh riarail kan.

26 Kedekedeo, met ahpw kahrehda peren laud rehrail. Oh irail kohdihla nan sahpw en Terson, oh sapwankihla sahpw en Terson; oh Mehn Nihpai kan kin kahdanikin irail aramas en Amon; eri irail kin sansalki ahdwet sang ahnsouo kohla.

27 Eri, irail ahpw patehng aramas en Nihpai kan, oh pil iang wadawadohng aramas akan me wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht. Oh irail pil kin sansalki arail kin loalonohng Koht, oh pil ong aramas akan; pwe irail kin mehlel ni unsek oh inen nan soahng koaros; oh irail tengeteng nan arail pwoson Krais, lao lel ni imwi.

28 Oh irail kin wiahki kakerehdien ntahn riarail akan mehkot me irail kailongki mehlel; oh sohte me kak itonehng irail en mahwenong riarail akan; oh irail sohte kin masak mehla, pwehki arail koapworopworki oh marainki Krais oh iasadao; eri, ong irail mehla sohte wia mehkot pwehki Krais powehdier.

29 Eri, irail kin lokolongki soangen mehla me keieu kamedek oh kalokolok me kin wiawi sang riarail akan, mwohn arail kin ale neirail kedlahs de naipakos oh peleiraildi.

30 Oh met irail wia aramas loalopwoat oh kesempwal kei, iei sapwellimen Kauno aramas keniken mehlel kei.
alma 28:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen kan lohdi nan lapalahn mahwen—Aramas nen kei kamakamala—Me suwed kan kolahng nan mour en paisuwed me sohte imwi; me pwung kan alehdi mour peren kohkohlahte. Ele Sounpar 77–76 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin aramas en Amon kan ar soandi nan sahpw en Terson, oh mwomwohdiso pil wiawihdahr nan sahpw en Terson, oh nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan silehdi sahpw en Terson, ei, oh pil ni irepen sahpw en Saraemla pwon; kilang nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan pwakiedo riarail kan nan sapwtehno.

2 Lapalahn mahwen ehu ahpw wiawi; iei, mahwen ehu me sohte kin wiawi nanpwungen aramas akan nan sahpwo sangete ahnsou me Lihai mweselsang Serusalem; ei, oh nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei nen kei kamakamala oh tangpeseng.

3 Ei, oh pil tohto me pil kamakamala nanpwungen aramas en Nihpai kan; ahpw, Mehn Leimen kan pakasarala oh tangpeseng, oh aramas en Nihpai kan pwurala nan sapwarail.

4 Oh ahnsou wet wia ansou ehu me aramas mwahmwahiei oh wie sengiseng nan sahpwo pwon, rehn aramas en Nihpai kan—

5 Ei, lihodi kan mwahieiki arail pwoud kan, oh pil pahpa kan mwahieiki neirail pwutak kan, oh neirail serepein kan sengisengki riarail pwutak kan, ei, pwutak kan sengisengki pahpa kan; oh ngihl en mwahiei wiawi rehrail koaros, mwamwahieiki arail peneinei kan me kamakamala.

6 Eri met iei rahn kapahtou ehu; ei, ahnsou en pahtou mehlel, oh ahnsou en kaisihsol oh kapakap laud.

7 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr eisek limau en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

8 Eri met iei duwen Amon oh rie kan, arail seiseiloak nan sahpw en Nihpai, arail lokolok kan nan sahpwo, arail pahtou kan, oh arail kahpwal akan, oh arail peren laud me apwal en kawehwehda, oh duwen koasoamwoasoamw oh onopek mwahu en riarail akan nan sahpw en Terson. Oh met Kauno, Soundoar en aramas koaros, ketin kapaiada palingenerail kohkohlahte.

9 Oh met iei duwen mahwen kan oh uhpene kan nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan, oh pil mahwen kan nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen; oh pahr keisek limau en mwehin sounkopwung kan imwisekla.

10 Oh sang ni keieu en pahro lel ni keisek limau kamwomwalahn aramas kid kei wiawiher; ei, e wia ahnsou me kamaramas kamasepwehk wiawiher.

11 Oh paliwar kid kei seridier nan pwehl, ah paliwar kid kei mweremweredi wasa re koasokoasokpene nan pwehl; ei, oh kid kei wie mwahmwaieiki arail peneinei me mehla, pwehki irail salohki, nin duwen inou kan en Kauno, me irail pahn kohla nan mour paisuwed kokohlahte.

12 Mehndahte aramas kid kei ar mwahieiki mehlel arail peneinei kan me mehla, ahpw re pil peren oh kapingki ar koapworopwor, oh wehwehki, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, me re pahn iasadahng palimaun en limen Koht, nan mour peren poatopoat.

13 Oh met kitail kilang ia uwen sapahrek en aramas pwehki dihp oh wiewia sapwung, oh manaman en tepilo, me kohdo sang ni koasoandi widing me e wiahda pwe en lidipieki mohngiong en aramas akan.

14 Eri met kitail kilang malipilip lap en aramas pwersek en doadoahk nan sapwellimen Kauno mwahto; oh met kitail kilang kahrepen pahtou, oh pil pereperen—pahtou pwehki mehla oh kamwomwala kan rehn aramas akan, oh peren pwehki marain en Krais ong mour.
alma 29:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma inangih kalohki koluhla duwehte tohnleng men eh kin loalenohng—Kauno kin ketikihong wehi koaros sounpadahk kan—Alma perenki sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk oh pweidahn Amon oh rie kan. Ele Sounpar 76 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh Ia duwen ma ngehi tohnleng men, oh ma I kak alehdi ineng en nan kapehdiet, pwe I en kak kohwei oh lokaiaki ngilen sapwellimen Koht sowi, ni soangen ngihl me pahn itikada sampah, oh kalohki duwen koluhla ong aramas koaruhsie!

2 Ei, I pahn kalohkihong aramas koaros, ni ngihl laud, duwehte ngilen nansapwe, duwen koluhla oh koasoandi en poadoandoarlao, me irail anahne koluhla oh kohdo rehn arail Koht, pwe pahtou laud pohn sampah pwon en sohrala.

3 Ahpw kilang, ngehi aramas men, oh I dipkihda ineng wet; pwe I anahne itarikihla soahng kan me Kauno ketikihong ie.

4 E sohte mwahu ei pahn kasapwungehla sapwellimen Koht koasoandi pwung kan pwehki ei ineng kan, pwe I ese me e kin ketin mweidohng aramas nin duwen arail ineng, ma ong mehla de ong mour; ei, I ese me e kin ketin mweidohng aramas, ei, koasoanehiong irail koasoandi me sohte kak wekidek, nin duwen ar ineng kan, ma ong komourla de kamwomwala.

5 Ei, oh I ese me mwahu oh suwed kin lellohng aramas koaros; mehmen me sohte ese mwahu sang me suwed e saledeksang dihp; ahpw mehmen me ese mwahu oh suwed, ong ih e pahn ale nin duwen nsene, ma e pahn inangih mwahu de suwed, mour de mehla, peren de nan kapehd nsensuwed.

6 Eri, pwehki ei kilangehr oh wehwehki mepwukat, dahme I pahn pil inangihki mehkot laud sang wia doadoahk me I malipilipiongehr?

7 Dahme I pahn inangihki I en duwehla tohnleng men, pwe I en kak koasoi ong sampah pwon?

8 Pwe kilang, Kauno kin ketin mweidohng wehi koaros en padahngki sapwellime mahseno nan pein arail wehi oh lokaia, ei, sang ni erpit, soahng koaros me e ketin mwahngih me pahn konehng irail en alehdi; eri kitail kilang me Kauno ketin kaweid sang ni erpit, nin duwen dahme pwung oh mehlel.

9 I ese me dahme Kauno ketin poahngokihong ie, oh I kapingahki. I sohte kapinga pein ngehi, ahpw I kapingki dahme Kauno ketin poahngokihong ie; ei, oh met iei ei kaping, me I en kak wia mehn doadoahk nin limen Koht ong wahdo ekei aramas en koluhla; oh met iei ei peren.

10 Oh kilang, ahnsou me I kilang riei me tohto kohluhla mehlel, oh kohdo rehn Kauno arail Koht, eri palingeniet ahpw direkihla peren; ngehi ahpw tamanda dahme Kauno ketin wiahiong ie, iei, nin duwen eh ketin sapeng ei kapakap; ei, I ahpw tamanada kalahngan en nin lime kan me e ketikidohng ie.

11 Ei, oh I pil tamanda kaliduhlahn ei pahpa kahlahp ako; pwe I ese ni mehlel me Kauno me ketin doareirailla sang nan mouren kalidu, oh sang met e ketin kauwada sapwellime mwomwohdiso; ei, Kauno Koht, Koht en Eipram, Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, me doareirailsang nan mour en kalidu.

12 Ei, I kin kalapw tamatamante kaliduhlahn ei pahpa kahlahp ko; oh Kohtohte me ketin doareirailla sang pahn manaman en Mehn Isip kan me pil doareirailla sang nan mour en kalidu.

13 Ei, oh ih Kohtohte me pil kauwada sapwellime mwomwohdiso rehrail; ei, oh ih Kohto me pil ketin malipe ie nan malipilip sarawi wet, pwe I en kalohki mahseno ong aramas pwukat, oh pil kupwure I en pweida mehlel, me kahrehda ei peren mehlel.

14 Ahpw I sohte perenkihte pein ei pweida, ahpw ei peren pil laudkihla mehlel pwehki pweidahn riei ohl akan, me kohdahla nan sahpw en Nihpai.

15 Kilang, irail pwerisek ong doadoahk mehlelo, oh irail dulung wah tohto; oh ia uwen ketingparail eh pahn laud mehlel!

16 Eri, ahnsou me I kin medewe pweidahn riei ohl pwukat palingeniet kin kohieisang ie, lao e kin tohrohsang paliwar, ni duwen eh kin wiawi, pwehki ei peren laud.

17 A met Koht en ketin mweidong riei ohl pwukat, pwe re en kak iang patohdi nan wehin Koht; ei, oh pil irail koaros me wia wahn arail doadoahk pwe irail en sohla pwurehng kohla liki, ahpw irail en kapinga ih kohkohlahte. Oh Koht en ketin mweidohng pwe e kak wiawi nin duwen ei koasoi kat, iei nin duwen ei koasoiahier. Ahmen.
alma 30:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Korior, imwintihtien Krais, kepitiki Krais, Tomwo, oh ngehn en kaudiahl—E padahngki me sohte Koht, sohte pwupwudi en aramas, sohte kalokepen dihp, oh sohte Krais—Alma kadehdehki me Krais pahn ketido oh mehkoaros kasalehda me mie Koht—Korior ngidingidki en kasalehda ehu kilel oh ih eri lohtenglaTepilo pwarohng Korior ni mwomwen tohnleng men oh padahkihong soahng kan me e pahn nda—[Mehn Sorom kan] tiakpene Korior oh kemehla. Ele Sounpar 76–74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekede mwurin nein Amon aramas akan ar soandi nan sahpw en Terson, ei, oh pil mwurin Mehn Leimen kan ar pwepwekihsang nan sahpwo, oh aramas en sahpwo sarepedi arail mehla kan.

2 Met irail sohte kak wadekedi arail mehla kan pwehki uwen arail tohto; pil duwehte ehn Mehn Nihpai kan mehla sohte kak wadawad—ahpw kedekedeo mwurin arail sarepedi arail mehla kan, oh pil mwurin rahn en arail kaisihsol, oh mwahmwahiei, oh kapakap, (oh met iei pahr eisek weneu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan) nan sahpwo pwon tepida popohl.

3 Ei, oh aramas akan nantihong kapwaiada kosonned akan en Kauno; oh irail kin poadidiong kapwaiada tiahk sarawi kan en Koht, nin duwen kosonned en Moses; pwe re padahngkiher duwen ar pahn kolokol kosonned en Moses kan lao e pahn pweida.

4 Oh met sohte pingiping nanpwungen aramas akan nan pahr eisek weneuo pwon en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

5 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr eisek isuh en mwehin sounkopwung kan, popohl pepeuslahte.

6 Ahpw kedekedeo ni imwiseklahn pahr eisek isuhwo, mie ohl emen me kohdo nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh e wia Imwintihtien Krais men, pwe e tepida kalohngkihong aramas akan soangen padahk me uhwong kokohp kan me soukohp akan kohpadahr duwen ketidohn Krais.

7 Met sohte kosonned ehu me kin uhwong dahme aramas men kamehlele; pwe e pahn uhdahn kasapwungehla mahsen en Koht ma e pahn mie kosonned ehu me kahrehda aramas akan ar pahn sapahrek.

8 Pwe pwuhk sarawi mahsanih: Pilada rahnwet, ihs me kumwail pahn papah.

9 Eri, ma aramas emen inangih papah Koht, e pahn wia kamwahupe; de ma e kamehlele Koht e pahn pil wia kamwahupe pwehki sang eh papah ih; ahpw ma e sohte kamehlele ih a sohte kosonned ehu me e pahn kalokolongki.

10 Ahpw ma e pahn kamaramas e pahn ale kalokolok en kamakamala; oh ma e pahn kulih aramas e pahn ale kalokolokpe; oh ma e pahn pirap e pahn pil ale kalokolokpe; oh ma e pahn kamwahl e pil pahn ale kalokolokpe; ei, pwe wiewia suwed pwukat koaros irail pahn alehki kalokolokperail.

11 Pwe mie kosonned ehu me aramas pahn kin pakadeingkihda diparail kan. Ahpw, sohte kosonned me kin uhwong dahme aramas kin kamehlele; eri, aramas emen kin kalokolongki dipe kan me e wiahda; eri aramas koaros pahrek.

12 Oh Imwintihtien Krais menet, me adaniki Korior, (oh kosonnedo sohte manaman powe) tepida kalohkihong aramas akan me e sohte pahn mie Krais. Eri iet mwomwen eh kin padahk oh koasokosoaiaseli:

13 Kumwail akan me sensel pahn koapworopwor likamw oh soh katepe, dahme kumwail katengehkinkumwaildi pahn soahng likamw pwukat? Dahme kumwail kin kasikasingki Krais men? Pwe sohte aramas kak ese duwen soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

14 Kilang, mepwukat me kumwail ndahki kokohp, me kumwail nda me kadakadaur kohdo sang soukohp sarawi kan, kilang, mepwukat tiahk likamw tohr en amwail pahpa kahlap ako.

15 Ia mwomwen amwail ese me re mehlel? Kilang, kumwail sohte kak ese duwen soahng kan me kumwail sohte kin kilang; eri kumwail sohte kak ese ma mehlel e pahn mie Krais.

16 Kumwail kin kasikasik oh kin kosekose me dene dipamwail kan eh lapwadahr. Ahpw kilang, met iei lipwen amwail madamadau ping; oh madamadau sahliel wet pwilisang tiahk en amwail pahpa kahlap ako, me kin kahrehda amwail kin kamehlele soahng kan me sohte mwahn kak wiawi.

17 Oh soahng tohto me e ndaiong irail, ndindahiong irail me sohte tomwpen dipen aramas kak wiawi, ahpw emen emen aramas kin lellong mour mwahu de suwed nin duwen epwelpen pein ih; eri emen emen aramas kin pweida nin duwen eh loalokong, oh emen emen aramas kin kalowehdi nin duwen eh kehlail; oh dahme aramas men kin wia sohte kin kauwehla kosonned.

18 Oh ih met me e kalokalohkihong irail, kakahluwa mohngiong en aramas tohto ong nan ahl sapwung, kahrehda arail pohnmwahsohki arail wiewia suwed, ei, kakaluhwa lih tohto, oh pil ohl, re en iang wiewia tiahk en nenek kan—ndindahiong irail me ahnsou me aramas kin mehla, ih imwilahn eh mour.

19 Eri ohl menet pil lellahng nan sahpw en Terson, pwe en kalohngki mepwukat rehn aramas en Amon kan, irail me wia aramas en Mehn Leimen kei mahso.

20 Ahpw kilang, re me marain sang Mehn Nihpai tohto; pwe re koledi, oh salihedi, oh walahng rehn Amon, me wia arail samworo lapalap.

21 Kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong irail en wahieisang nan sahpwo. Oh e ahpw pil kohla nan sahpw en Kidion, oh pil tepida kalohkihong irail; oh wasao e pil sohte pweida, pwe e pil kolkoldi oh pirapirdi oh wisiklahng mwohn arail samworo lapalapo, oh pil arail sounkopwung en nan sahpwo.

22 Kedekedeo samworo lapalapo ahpw mahsaniong ih: Dahme ke wie kohkohkiseli oh wie kaskasapwungehla koasoandi en Kauno? Dahme ke padahkihkihong aramas pwukat me sohte pahn mie Krais, pwe en kauwehla arail pereperen? Dahme ke uhkihong kokohp koaros en soukohp sarawi kan?

23 Met mwaren samworo lapalapo iei Kidona. Oh Korior ndaiong ih: Pwehki I sohte kin padahngki tiahk likamw en amwail pahpa kahlap ako, oh pwehki I sohte kin padahkihong aramas pwukat pwe re en katengeiraildi pahn tiahk oh koasoandi likamw akan me samworohn mahs akan koasoanehdier, pwe re en kaunirailda oh ahneki manaman pohrail, pwehn kolokol irail en mihmi nan rotorot, pwe irail en dehr pohnmwahso, ahpw re en karakarahk nin duwen omwi mahsen kan.

24 Kumwail kosekose me aramas pwukat iei aramas saledek kei. Kilang, I nda me re mihmi nan kalidu. Kumwail kosekose me kokohp en mahs akan mehlel. Kilang, I nda kumwail sohte kak ese ma re mehlel.

25 Kumwail kosekose me dene aramas pwukat iei aramas dipan oh aramas pwupwudi kei, pwehki dipen arail pahpa oh nohno. Kilang, I nda me seri men sohte dipaniki dipen eh pahpa oh nohno kan.

26 Oh kumwail pil kosekose me Krais pahn ketido. Ahpw kilang, I nda me kumwail sohte kak ese ma e pahn mie Krais men. Oh kumwail pil kosekose me e pahn kamakamkihla dipen sampah—

27 Oh iei ih mwomwen amwail kin kahluwasang aramas pwukat re en idawehn tiak likamw en amwail pahpa kahlap ako, oh nin duwen pein inengamwail; oh kumwail kin kiheng irail pahn amwail manaman, duwehte re mihmi nan kalidu, pwe kumwail en kak paiamwahukihla arail doadoahk kan, pwe irail en dehr ahneki eimah, oh irail sohte kak pereniki arail pwuhng kan oh pai kan.
