28 Ei, irail sohte kak doadoahngki dahme pein arail pwe irail dehr kamwakarahda arail samworo kan, me kin kalidukin irail dahme re mwahuki, oh kahrehda arail kamehlele, sang ni arail tiahk kan oh arail ouraman kan oh audepen nsenarail kan oh arail kaudiahl kan oh padahk rir me re kin kinehda kan, ma re sohte pahn wia nin duwen dahme irail nda, a re uhdahn pahn kamwakarahda mour ehu me sarawi me aramas sohte kin ese, me irail kin kosekose me Koht—mour ehu me sarawi men me aramas saik kilang de ese duwe, me saikinte mie oh me sohte pahn mie.

29 Met ni ahnsou me samworo lapalap oh sounkopwung lapalap kilangehr keptakai en ah mohngiong, ei, ahnsou me re kilang me e lahlahwe Koht, irail sohte men sapeng ah koasoi kan; ahpw re salihedi; oh wisiklahng rehn ohpi kan, oh kadaralahng nan sahpw en Saraemla, pwe en kak wisiklahng rehn Alma, oh sounkopwung lapalap me wia kepina en sahpwo pwon.

30 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e wisikdohng mwohn Alma oh samworo lapalapo, e pwurehng wia soangen koasoiohte me e wia nan sahpw en Kidion; ei, e ahpw doula nan eh koasoi en lahlahwe.

31 Oh e ngihl laudida ni eh koasoi mwohn Alma, oh kauwe samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan, kedkedipahkin irail me re kin kakahluwa aramas akan en idawehn tiahk likamw en arail pahpah kahlap ako, pwe re en kak paiamwahukihla ahn aramas akan doadoahk.

32 Eri Alma ndaiong ih: Ke wehwehki me se sohte kin paiamwahkihla ehn aramas pwukat doadoahk; pwe kilang I kin doadoahk iei sangete ni tepin mwehin sounkopwung kan lao lel ahnsou wet, I kin mourki sang ni pein ei doadoahk, mehndahte ei kin kalapw seiloakseli nan sahpwet pwe I en kalohki mahsen en Koht ong nei aramas akan.

33 Oh mehndahte doadoahk tohto me I kin wia nan mwomwohdiso, sohte kisin sihnain kis me I kin alehdi sang ni ei doadoahk; pil duwehte riei kan, ihte ansou me se kin wia doadoahk en nan sehr en kopwungo; oh se kin alehdi isepen uwen ansou me se kin doadoahngki nin duwen kosonnedo.

34 Oh met, ma se sohte kin alehdi mehkot nan aht doadoahk nan mwomwohdiso, soangen pai dah me se kin paiki nan aht doadoahk nan mwomwohdiso, ihte aht kin kalohki mehlelo, pwe se en kak perepereniki peren en riat akan?

35 Eri dahme ke kin ndahki me se kin kalohk ong aramas pwukat pwe sen ale isais, ni ahmw pein ese me se sohte kin ale isais? Eri, ke kamehlele me se kin pitih aramas pwukat, me kin kahrehda peren nan mohngiongirail kan?

36 Oh Korior sapengki ih, Ei.

37 Oh Alma ahpw ndaiong ih: Ke kamehlele me mie Koht?

38 Oh e sapengki, Soh.

39 Eri Alma ndaiong ih: Ke pahn pwurehng kahmahmki me mie Koht, oh pil kahmahmki Krais? Pwe kilang, I ndaiong uhk, I ese me mie Koht, oh me Krais pahn pil ketido.

40 Eri soahngen kadehde dah me ke ahneki me kasalehda me sohte Koht, de Krais sohte pahn ketido? I ndaiong uhk me sohte, ihte pein ahmw koasoi kan.

41 Ahpw, kilang, soahng koaros kadehdeda me mepwukat mehlel; oh ke pil ese soahng koaros kadehdehiong uhk me re mehlel; oh ke pahn kahmahmki? Ke kamehlele me mepwukat mehlel?

42 Kilang, I ese me ke kamehlele, ahpw ngehn likamw mihmi rehmw, oh ke pwilikihdi Ngehn en Koht kahrehde e sohte kak ketiket rehmw; ahpw tepilo ahneki manaman pohmw, oh e kakahreiukseli, wiewia doadoahk kan me e pahn kauwehkihla sapwellimen Koht seri kan.

43 Oh met Korior ndaiong Alma: Ma ke pahn kasalehiong ie ehu kilel, pwe I en kak kamehlele me mie Koht, ei, kasalehiong ie me ke ahneki manaman, oh I ahpw pahn kamehlele me ahmw koasoi kan mehlel.

44 Ahpw Alma ndaiong ih: E itarehr kilel kan me ke kilangehr; ke pahn pil kasongosonge ahmw Koht? Ke pahn pil nda, kasalehiong ie ehu kilel, ni ahmw kilangehr kadehdeh kan en riomw kan, oh pil kadehdehn soukohp sarawi kan koaros? Pwuhk sarawi kan miher mwohmw, ei, soahng koaros kasalehda me mie Koht; iei, sampah, oh audepe kan koaros, ei, eh kin mwekimwekid, ei, oh pil sampah teikan me kin mwekimwekid nin duwen ar koasoandi kin kadehdehda me mie Sounkepikpik Lapalap men.

45 Oh met ke wie kohkohseli, kakahluwa mohngiong en aramas pwukat nan ahl sapwung, kadekadehdehiong irail me sohte Koht? Oh ke pahn pil kahmahmkihla kadehde pwukat koaros? Oh e ahpw sapeng nda: Ei, I pahn kahmahmkihla, ihte ma ke pahn kasalehiong ie kilel ehu.

46 Eri kedekedeo Alma ndaiong ih: Kilang, I nsensuwedkihla pwehki keptakai en ahmw mohngiong, ei, me kahrehda amw wie kaskasohwehte ngehn en mehlelo, me pahn kahrehda palingenomwen pahn mwomwala.

47 Ahpw kilang, e pahn mwahu ma palingenomwen me pahn salongala sang ma ke pahn kahrehda palingehn en aramas tohto en kamwomwomwla, sang ni ahmw likamw kan oh sang ni ahmw lokaian widing kan; eri ma ke pahn pwurehng kahmahmki, kilang Koht pahn kalokeiuk, me ke pahn lohtengla, kahrehda ke sohla pahn kak lokaia, pwe ke en dehr pwurehng pitihdi aramas pwukat.

48 Met Korior ndaiong ih: I sohte kahmahmki me mie Koht, ahpw I sohte kamehlele me mie emen Koht; oh I pil nda, kumwail sohte kak ese ma mie Koht; oh ihte ma kumwail kasalehiong ie ehu kilel, I sohte pahn kamehlele.

49 Met Alma ndaiong ih: Iet me I pahn kihong uhk en wiakilel ehu, me ke pahn lohtengla, nin duwen ei koasoi; oh I patohwan, ni mwaren Koht, ke pahn lohtengla, pwe ke en sohla kak lokaia.

50 Met ni ahnsou me Alma koasoaia mepwukat, Korior lohtengla, kahrehda e sohla kak lokaia, nin duwen dahme Alma koasoiaier.

51 Eri ahnsou me sounkopwung lapalap udiahlehr met, e kapahla lime oh nting ong Korior, mahsanih: Met ke kamehlele manaman en Koht? Me ke inangih Alma en kasalehiong uhk sapwellime kilel? Ke men en pil kaloke mehtei kan, pwe en kasalehionguhk kilel? Kilang, e kasalehionguhkehr ehu kilel oh met ke pahn pil akakpwungte?

52 Oh Korior kapahla peho oh ntingihedi: I ese me I lohtenglahr, pwe I sohte kak lokaia; oh I ese me manaman en Kohtohte me kak kihong ie kahpwal wet; ei, oh I uhdahn kin ese me mie Koht.

53 Ahpw kilang, tepilo pitiehdi; pwe e pwarohng ie ni mwohmw en tohnleng, oh ndaiong ie: Kohwei oh kapwungala aramas akan, pwe irail koaros salongalahr, raparapahki Koht emen me sohte me ese. Oh e ndaiong ie: Me sohte Koht; ei, oh e padahkihong ie dahme I pahn nda. Oh I padahngkier eh koasoi kan; oh I padahngki pwehki e ngoaramwahu ong aramas me mour en sampah; oh I padahngkiseli lao I pweida mehlel, lao I kamehlele me re mehlel; oh kahrehkiong ie ei pelian me mehlelo, lao I lohdiong pahn keria mwuledek wet.

54 Mwurin eh koasoia mepwukat, e peki rehn Alma ma e kak kapakapkihong Koht, pwe en kapwurehsang keriao.

55 Ahpw Alma ndaiong ih: Ma keria wet pahn kohsang uhk ke pahn pwurehng kahluwa mohngiong en aramas pwukat nan ahl sapwung; eri, dahme pahn wiawihong uhk me kupwur en Kauno.

56 Kedekedeo keriao sohte kohsang rehn Korior; ahpw e lekdekiei sang wasao, oh e kin pekipekiseli kene mwenge ni ehu ehu ihmw kan.

57 Met rohngen dahme wiawihong Korior mwadangete lolohkseli nan sahpwo pwon; ei, kalohko pekederla sang rehn sounkopwung lapalap en aramas akan en nan sahpwo, kalokalohkihong irail akan me kamehlele ahn Korior koasoi kan pwe irail en mwadangete koluhla, pwe soangen pakadeikohte dehr lellohng irail.

58 Kedekedeo irail pwon kamehlele duwen wiewia suwed en Korior; eri irail koaros pwurehng weliakapwalahng Kauno; oh met kaimwiseklahr mwekid en wiewia suwed en Korior. Oh Korior kin pekipeki sawasepen kene mwenge ni ehu ehu ihmw kan.

59 Kedekedeo ni eh kohkolahng rehn aramas akan, ei, rehn aramas akan me katohreirailsang rehn Mehn Nihpai kan oh kahdaniki pein irail Mehn Soram, me ohl emen adaniki Soram me kaunirailda—oh ni eh kokolahng rehrail, kilang, irail tangada powe oh idangidi, lao e mehla.

60 Oh met kitail kilang imwilahn aramas me kin kaskasapwungehla koasoandi en Kauno; oh met kitail kilang me tepilo sohte pahn sewese nah seri kan ni imwin rahno, ahpw e pahn mwadangete waikiraildihla nan ehl.
alma 31:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 31[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kaunda doadoahk en misin ehu ong kapwurehdo Mehn Soram me salongalahr kan—Mehn Soram kan kahmahmki Krais, irail kamehlele padahk likamw ehu me irail aramas pilipilda kei, oh kin kaudongki kapakap me re wadlikihla—Misineri kan direkihla Ngehn Sarawi—Arail perenkihda Krais powehdi arail lokolok kan. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo mwurinte imwilahn Korior, Alma ahpw alehdi rohng me Mehn Soram kan kasapwungehlahr sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan, oh Soram, me wia arail kaun, wie kahkahluwa mohngiong en aramas akan pwe re en kin poaridi mwohn sansal takai kan, e ahpw pwurehng tepida pahtoukihla mehlel nan eh mohngiong pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas akan.

2 Pwe ih soangen mwekid pwukat me kin kahrehkiong Alma eh kin pahtouki laud ni eh kin esehda wiewia suwed me kin mihla rehn nah aramas akan; eri eh mohngiong uhdahn pahtoukila mehlel pwehki Mehn Soram kan ar tohrohrsangehr Mehn Nihpai kan.

3 Mehn Soram kan kin pokonpene nan sahpw ehu me re kahdaniki Andionum, me mih ni palimese en sahpw en Saraemla, me karanihte irepen ni oaroahro, me mih palieir en sahpw en Terson, me pil mihte ni irepen palieir en sapwtehno, wasa me diren Mehn Leimen kan.

4 Eri met Mehn Nihpai kan perikidahr Mehn Soram kan de ehuwongada Mehn Leimen kan, oh me pahn kakete kihong Mehn Nihpai kan kahpwal laud.

5 Eri met, pwehki ong ni kalohki mahseno eh kin kalapw kaluwa aramas en wia dahme pwung—ei, e kin mie lipwe laud nan en aramas madamadau kan sang ni arail pahn doadoahngki kedilahs, de soahng teikan, me kin wiawihong irail—eri ihme Alma medewekihda me e konehng irail en songkihong manaman en mahsen en Koht.

6 Eri e kahrehda Amon, oh Aron, oh Omner; oh e kihong Imnai en pwukoahki mwomwohdiso nan Saraemla; ahpw e kahrehda meh silimeno, oh iangahki Amulek oh Sihesrom, me mih nan Melek; oh e pil kahrehda nah pwutak riemen.

7 Eri nah me keieun laudo e sohte kahrehda, edeo iei Ihlemen; ahpw eden irail kan me e kahrehda en iangih iei Siplon oh Koriandon; oh ih eden irail akan me iangih kohla rehn Mehn Soram kan, pwe en kalohkihong irail mahseno.

8 Eri Mehn Soram pwukat irail alehier mahsen en Koht mwoweo oh ahpw pwupwulahr; solangalasangehr rehn Mehn Nihpai kan.

9 Ahpw irail pwupwudiong nan lapalahn sapwung ehu, pwe irail sohte kin nantihong kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh sapwellime koasoandi kan, nin duwen kosonned en Moses.

10 De pil kapwaiada tiahk en doadoahk en mwomwohdiso, ong ni ar pahn poaden kapakap oh pwongih Koht rahn koaros, pwe irail en dehr lelohng nan kasongosong.

11 Ei, ni mehlel, irail kasapwungelahr koasoandi kan en Kauno nan irair tohto; eri, pwehki kahrepe wet, Alma oh rie kan kohla nan sahpwo pwe re en kalohkiong irail mahseno.

12 Eri, ni ahnsou me re leledo nan sahpwo, kilang, irail pwuriamweikihla ar kilangada Mehn Soram kan ar wiahda sinokoke kan, oh irail kin pokonpene pak ehu nan ehu wihk, me irail wiahki rahn en Kauno; oh irail kin kaudok ni wiepe ieu me Alma oh rie kan sohte kin kilang;

13 Pwe irail wiahda wasahn kesihnen ehu nanwerengen arail sinakoke kan, me ileilehsang moangen aramas; oh aramas emente me kak kesihnenda powe.

14 Eri, mehmen me inengieng kapakap e pahn kin kohla oh douda powe, oh kawadahwei peh kan nanleng, oh werikihla ni ngihl laud, ndinda:

15 Maing Koht sarawi, komwi me sarawi; se kamehlele me komwi Koht, oh se kamehlele me komwi me sarawi, oh me komw wia ngehn emen, oh komw pahn wia ngehn kohkohlahte.

16 Maing Koht sarawi, se kamehlele me komw ketin katohreikiht sang rehn riat kan; oh se sohte kamehlele tiahk en riat kan, me pepeusdo rehrail sang rehn arail pahpa kahlap ako me mwomwen seri; ahpw se kamehlele me komw pilkihtda pwe se en wia sapwellimwomwi seri sarawi; oh komwi pil kasalehiong kiht me e sohte pahn mie Krais.

17 Ahpw komw ketin duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte; oh komw piladahr kiht me se pahn komourla, a irail akan me kapilkihtpene pilipildahr me re pahn lekdekla nan ehl; pwehki sarawi wet, maing Koht, se kapingki ong komwi; oh se pil kapingki ong komwi pwehki omwi ketin pilkihtadar, pwe se en dehr idawehn tiahk likamw en riat kan, me katengeiraildi ong kamehlele Krais, me kahrehdahr mohngiongirail kan salongasang komwiehr, aht Koht.

18 Oh se pwureng kapinga komwi, maing Koht, pwehki aht wia aramas pilipilda oh sarawi. Ahmen.

19 Eri kedekedeo mwurin Alma oh ienge ohl akan oh nah pwutangko ar rongehr kapakap pwukat, irail ahpw malamalawangkihla.

20 Pwe kilang, emen emen aramas kin kohdahla wademen oh wia soangen kapakapohte.

21 Eri wasao e kahdaniki Ramiemdom, me wehwehki, pei sarawi.

22 Eri, sang pohn pei wet emen emen aramas kin kesihnenda powe oh wia soahngen kapakapohte ong Koht, kapkapingkihong Koht me e ketin pilirailda, oh me e sohte ketin kahluwa iraillahng tiahk en riarail akan, oh me mohngiongirail kan sohte kin iang kamehlelehda soahng kan me pahn kohdo, me irail sohte wehwehki duwe.

23 Met, mwurin aramas akan koaros ar kin wia arail kaping kan ni mwomw wet, irail kin pwurala ni imwarail akan, oh sohte pwurehng koasoia duwen arail Koht lao irail kin pwurehng pwurpene ni pei sarawio, pwe re en pwurehng wia arail kaping ni soangen mwohmwo.

24 Eri ni ahnsou me Alma kilangada duwen mwekid wet, e inenen pahtoukihla nan eh mohngiong; pwe e kilang me irail wia aramas suwed oh kahngohdi kei; ei, e kilang me mohngiongirail kan kin inengiengte kohl, oh silper, oh soahngen dipwisou kaselel kan koaros.

25 Ei, oh e pil kilangada me irail kin mas ilehki ar aksuwei, nan arail pohnmwahso.

26 Oh e ahpw ngihl laudida ong nanleng, oh weriweriki, patohwan: Maing, ia uwen werei, Maing Kaun, me komw pahn mweidohng sapwellimomwi ladu kan re en momour nan paliwar, oh kilang soahngen suwed mwuledek pwukat rehn aramas akan?

27 Kilang, Maing Koht, irail kin kapakap ong komwi, ahpw arail pohnmwahso powehdier mohngiongarail kan. Kilang, Maing Koht, irail kin kapakap ong komwi sang ni ewerail akan, ahpw irail aklapalapkihla mehlel soahng mwahl akan en sampah.

28 Maing ei Koht, komw mahsanih, arail likou pweilaud kan, oh neirail rihng kan, oh neirail luwou kan, oh arail mehn kapwat kohl kan, oh neirail dipwisou kesempwal akan me irail kin kapwatiki; oh komw mahsanih, mohngiongirail kan kin uhlahng wasa me arail kepwe kan mi ie, oh ahpw met irail kin kapakap ong komwi oh ndinda—Se kapingkiong komwi, maing Koht, pwe kiht aramas pilipilda kei ong komwi, nindoken mehteikan ar pahn melahr.

29 Ei, oh re pil nda me komwi kasalehiong irail me e sohte pahn mie Krais.

30 Maing Kauno Koht, ia uwen werei omwi pahn mweidohng soangen wiewia suwed wet oh soaloalopwoat wet en mie rehn aramas pwukat? Maing ei Kaun, komw kak ketkihong ie kehl, pwe I en kak powehdi ei luwet kan. Pwe I me luwet, oh soangen wiewia suwed wet rehn aramas pwukat kin kamedekehla palingeniet.

31 Maing ei Kaun, mohngiongiet inenen toutoukilahr; komw ketin kaloalamwahwih palingeni rehn Krais. Maing ei Kaun, komw ketin mweidohng ie pwe I en kak ahneki kehl, pwe I en kak ahneki kanengamah ni ei pahn lokolongki kahpwal akan me pahn kohdohng ie, pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat.

32 Maing ei Kaun, komw kak kaloalamwahwih palingeni, oh kupwure ie en pweida, oh pil iengei tohn papah pwukat me ieiang ie—ei, Amon, oh Aron, oh Omner, oh pil Amulek oh Sihesrom, oh pil nei pwutak riemenet—ei, irail pwukat komw kak ketin kaloalamwahwih irail, Maing ei Kaun. Ei, komw kak kaloalamwahwih palingenerail kan rehn Krais.

33 Komw kak ketin mweidohng irail en ahneki kehl, pwe ren kak kanengamah nan arail kahpwal akan me pahn kohdo pohrail pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat.

34 Maing Kaun, komw ketin mweidohng kiht se en kak pweida ni aht pahn kapwureiraildohng komwi rehn Krais.

35 Kilang, Maing Kaun, palingenerail kan me kesempwal, oh tohtohn irail me riat; eri, komw ketkihong kiht, Maing Kaun, manaman oh erpit pwe se en kak kapwurehdo riat pwukat ong komwi.

36 Eri kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Alma ndahier mahsen pwukat, e ahpw pwil peh kan pohn irail kan koaros me iang ih. Oh kilang, ni ahnsou me e pwil pehkan pohrail, irail direkihla Ngehn Sarawi.

37 Oh mwurin mwo irail ahpw kohpeseng, ni arail sohte medewe dahme irail pahn tungoale, de dahme irail pahn nim, de dahme irail pahn likawih.

38 Kauno ahpw ketin sewese irail kahrehiong arail sohte men mwenge, de men nimpil; ei, oh e pil ketikihong irail kehl, kahrehda irail sohte kehn soangen lokolok kan, ahpw irail direkilahr popohl en Krais. Met sang nin duwen en Alma kapakap; oh met pwehki e kapakap ni pwoson.
alma 32:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 32[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma padahkih me semwehmwe kan me karakarahkalahr pwehki arail kahpwal akan—Pwoson iei koapworopworiki dahme ke sohte kin kilang ahpw mehlel—Alma kadehdehda me tohnleng kan kin pwarohng ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan—Alma karasahieng mahseno kisin weren tuhke ehu—E pahn anahne poadidi oh epwelda—E ahpw pahn osada wiahla tuhke me ke pahn dolung wahn mour soutuk. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohla, oh tepida padahkihong aramas akan sapwellimen Koht mahseno, pidelong nan arail sinokoke kan, oh nan imwarail akan; ei, oh irail pil padahngki mahseno pohn arail ahl akan.

2 Kedekedeo mwurin arail doadoahk laud rehrail, irail tepida pweida rehn aramas semwehmwe kan; pwe kilang, me semwehmwe kan lekdekiei sang nan arail sinokoke kan pwehki arail likou kan e sakanakan—

3 Eri irail sohte mweimweida re en pidelong nan ar sinokoke kan pwe re en kaudokiong Koht, pwehki arail kin wiahkin irail aramas samin; eri irail wia aramas semwehmwe kei; ei, riarail akan kin wiahkinirail aramas samin kei; eri irail semwehmwe ni dipwisou en sampah; oh irail pil nan kapehd karakarahk.

4 Eri, ahnsou me Alma wie padapadahk oh koasokoasoi ong aramas akan pohn dohl en Onaida, pokon ehu ahpw kohdo reh, irail iei aramas pwuko me kitail wie koasokoasoia, me ahneki mohngiong karakarahk, pwehki arail semwehmweh mehlel nan dipwisou en sampah.

5 Oh irail kohdo rehn Alma; oh emen me tieng mwohrail ahpw kalelapak reh: Kilang, dahme riei pwukat pahn wia, pwehki aramas koaros kailongkin irail pwehki ar semwehmwe, ei, ahpw mehlel rehn aht samworo kan; pwe irail kauskiht sang nan aht sinokoke kan me se doadoahk laud oh wiahkihda pein peht kan; oh irail kauskihtala pwehki aht semwehmwe mehlel; oh sohte wasa me se pahn kak kaudokiong aht Koht; oh kilang, dahme se pahn wia?

6 Eri ni en Alma eh karongehda met, e mwadangete pirekekla, oh sohpeila reh, oh e kilangada ni peren; pwe e kilang me re karakarahngkihlahr arail kahpwal akan, oh irail onopadahngehr en rong mahseno.

7 Eri e uhdihsang koasoi ong pokon teio; e ahpw kapahwei peh, oh ngihl laudida ong irail akan me e kilangada, me kohluhla mehlel, oh ndaiong irail:

8 I kilang me kumwail karakarahkalahr; ma met mehlel, meid pai kumwail.

9 Kilang riomwail ohlen nda, Dahme se pahn wia?—pwe se lekdeksangehr nan aht sinokoke kan, kahrehda se sohte kak kaudokiong aht Koht.

10 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail lemeleme me nan sinokokehte me kumwail pahn kin kaudokiong Koht ie?

11 Oh pil ehu, I pahn idek rehmwail, kumwail lemeleme me pakete ehu nan wihk kan me kumwail pahn kaudokiong Koht?

12 I ndaiong kumwail, e mwahu amwail lekdeksang nan amwail sinakoke kan, pwe kumwail en kak karakarahkala, oh pwe kumwail en kak loalokongla; pwe e konehng kumwail en loalokongkihla, pwehki sang amwail pekausieisang nan sinakoke kan, sang riomwail kan ar kailongkin kumwail pwehki amwail semwehmwe mehlel, me kahrehieng amwail aktikitikla; pwe e konehng kumwail en karakarahkala.

13 Eri, pwehki amwail itoitehngehr karakarahkala, oh meid pai kumwail; pwe ekei pak ma aramas kin itoitehng karakarahkala, a re kin rapahki koluhla; oh met ni mehlel, mehmen me kin koluhla re kin diar kalahngan; oh mehmen me pahn diar kalahngan oh dadaurete lel ni imwi e pahn komourla.

14 Eri, ni ei ndaiong kumwail, meid pai kumwail pwehki amwail itoitehng karakarahkala, kumwail sohte kin medemedewe me kapai laud ong irail akan me kin mehlel en karakarahkiala pein irail pwehki mahseno?

15 Ei, mehmen me pahn pein karakarahkala ni mehlel, oh koluhkihla dipe kan, oh dadaur lel ni imwi, meid pai ong ih—ei, meid pai laudsang irail akan me kin itoitiong en karakarahkala pwehki arail semwehmwe mehlel.

16 Eri, meid pai irail akan me kin pein karakarahkala oh sohte itoitehng karakarahkala; de met wehwehki, meid pai mehmen me pahn kamehlele mahsen en Koht, oh papidaisla oh sohte ahneki mohngiong keptakai, ei, ni e sohte me kahrehiong en esehla mahseno, de itoitehng en esehla, mwohn eh pahn kamehlele.

17 Ei, tohto me kin nda: Ma komw pahn kasalehiong kiht kilel ehu sang nanleng, a se pahn ese ni mehlel; oh se pahn kamehlele.

18 Met I kalelapak rehmwail, pwoson ieu met? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; pwe ma aramas men pahn ese mehkot ehu e sohte anahne kamehlele, pwe e esehier.

19 Eri, ia uwen keria laud ong aramas men me esehier kupwuren Koht ahpw sohte kin kapwaiada, sang aramas me kin kamehlelehte, de aramas me men kamehlelehte, oh pwupwudi nan dihp?

20 Soahng wet kumwail pahn anahne tenekih. Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me ih pahn duwen ehu irair pahn weksang ehu irair tohrohr; oh dahme pahn wiawihong emen emen aramas pahn wiawi pwehki eh wiewia kan.

21 Oh met nin duwen ei koasoiaier pwoson—pwoson iei sohte marainki duwen soahng kan ni unsek; eri ma ke ahneki pwoson ke pahn koapworopworiki soahng kan me sohte kin sansal, ahpw mehlel.

22 Oh met, kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, oh I men kumwail en tamataman me Koht kin ketin mahkohng aramas koaros me kin kamehlele mwareo; eri, mwohn mehkoaros, e ketin kupwuriki me kumwail en kamehlele, iei, sapwellime mahsen.

23 Oh met, e kin ketikihdo sapwellime mahsen rehn ohl akan sang rehn tohnleng kan, ei, kaidehnte ohl akan ahpw pil lih akan; pak tohto kisin seri kan pil kin alehdi mahsen kan, me kin kapwungala aramas erpit oh loalokong.

24 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan, pwehki amwail inengieng en esehsang ie dahme kumwail pahn wia pwehki amwail lokolok oh lekdeklahr—met I sohte men kumwail en medmedewe me I songosong en kadeik kumwail nin duwen dahme mehlel—

25 Pwe I sohte koasoia me kumwail koaros itoitehng en karakarahkiala pein kumwail; pwe I kamehlele me mie ekei kumwail me pahn kak pein karakarahkala, mendahte soangen irair sohte lipilipil me irail mih loale.

26 Eri, duwen pwoson me I koasoiahiero—e sohte wehwehki me kumwail ahneki marain unsek—oh e pil pahn duwehte ei koasoi kan. Kumwail sohte kak tepte ese mehlelih ni unsek, ma e pahn laudsang pwoson a wialahr marain unsek.

27 Ahpw kilang, ma kumwail pahn kapirada oh kamwekidada amwail mehn kapehm kan, iei song ei koasoi kan oh doadoahngki ekis diperen pwoson, iei, ma kumwail kak inangiete kamehlele, mweidohng inengwet en doadoahk loalomwail, lao kumwail kamehlele pwe kumwail en kak kihong ekis dewen ei koasoi kan.

28 Ahnsou wet, kitail pahn karasahiong mahseno kisin weren tuhke ehu. Eri, ma kumwail pahn kihong dewe, pwe kisin weren tuhkeo en kak poadidi nan mohngiongamwail kan, kilang, ma e pahn wia weren tuhke mehlel, de weren tuhke mwahu, ma kumwail sohte pahn kesehiei pwehki amwail soupwoson, me pahn kahrehda amwail uhwong Ngehn en Kauno, kilang, e pahn tepida mpwospeseng nan mwaremwaramwail kan; oh ni ahnsou me kumwail pahn tepida kehn mwekimwekid en mwpwospesenget, kumwail pahn tepida nda nan loalomwail kan—E uhdahn wia weren tuhke mwahu ehu, de me mahseno mwahu, pwe e tepier katehlapahla palingeniet; ei, e tepier kamarainiehda, ei, e tepier iou ong ie.

29 Eri kilang, e sou pahn kalaudehla amwail pwoson? I ndaiong kumwail, Ei; ahpw e saikinte keirdahng marain unsek.

30 Ahpw kilang, ni ahnsou me weren tuhkeo pahn mpwospeseng, oh keirda, oh tepida lalaudla, eri kumwail pahn nda me weren tuhkeo mwahu; pwe kilang e mpwospeseng, oh keirda, oh tepida lalaudla. Oh met, kilang, e sou pahn kakehlakahla ahmwail pwoson? Ei, e pahn kakehlakahla amwail pwoson: pwe kumwail pahn nda I ese me weren tuhke wet mwahu; pwe kilang e kekeirdahr oh tepida lalaudla.

31 Oh met, kilang, kumwail ese ni mehlel me weren tuhkeo mwahu? I ndaiong kumwail, Ei; pwe weren tuhke koaros kin kadarala wah ni soangenmwomwen wahohte.

32 A ma weren tuhke pwoat pahn keirda, eri weren tuhke mwahu ieu, ahpw ma e sohte keirda, kilang e sohte mwahu, eri e kin lekdekla.

33 Oh met, kilang, pwehki amwail songehr, oh poadokedi weren tuhkeo, oh e mpwospesengehr oh kekeirda, oh tepida lalaudla, kumwail anahne ese me weren tuhkeo mwahu.

34 Oh met, kilang, amwail maraino unseklahr? Ei, kumwail marainkihdahr unsek dahme kumwail songo, oh amwail pwoson solahr doadoahk; oh met pwehki kumwail esehier, pwe kumwail esehier me mahseno katehlapahlahr palingenamwail kan, oh kumwail pil ese me e kekeirda, pwehki amwail wehweh tepier maramarainpeseng, oh amwail madamadau tepier tehlappeseng.

35 Eri, mpwukat sou mehlel? I ndaiong kumwail, Ei, pwehki e wia marain; oh mehkot me kin wia marain, e mwahu, pwehki e kin sansal, eri kumwail pahn kak ese ma e mwahu; oh met kilang, mwurin amwail songehr marain wet, amwail maraino unseklahr?

36 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; kumwail sohte pahn pwilikihdi amwail pwoson, pwe kumwail doadoahngkihte amwail pwoson ong padokedi weren tuhkeo pwe kumwail en kak song ma weren tuhkeo mwahu.

37 Oh kilang, ni en tuhkeo e pahn tepida kekeirda, kumwail pahn nda: Kitail apwalihki epwel mwahu, pwe en kak kadarala kalowe, pwe en kak keirda, oh kadarala wah ong kitail. Oh met kilang, ma kumwail pahn apwalih mwahu e pahn kadarala kalowe, oh kekeirda, oh kadarala wah.

38 Ahpw ma kumwail pahn pohnsehse tuhkeo, oh sohte medewe apwalih, kilang e sohte pahn kadarala kalowe; oh ahnsou me ketipino kin karakar oh kamawasikahla tuhkeo, e pahn mengila pwehki sohte kalowe, oh kumwail pahn usada oh kesehla.

39 Met, kaidehn pwehki weren tuhkeo sohte mwahu, de pwehki sohte me pahn inangih tungoale wahn tuhkeo; ahpw iei pwehki amwail pwehlo me sakanakan, oh kumwail sohte men apwalih tuhkeo, eri kumwail sohte kak alehdi waho.

40 Oh met, ma kumwail sohte pahn apwalih mahseno, kasikasik waho sang ni pwoson, kumwail sohte kak dolung wahn tuhkehn komouro.

41 Ahpw ma kumwail pahn apwalih mahseno, ei, apwalih tuhkeo ni e tepida kekeirda, sang ni amwail poadidiong pwoson laud, oh kanengamah, kasikasik waho, e pahn kadarala kalowe; oh kilang e pahn wia tuhke me kekeirdahng mour soutuk.

42 Oh pwehki amwail loalopwoat oh amwail pwoson oh amwail kanengamahiong apwahpwalih mahseno, pwe en kak kadarala kalowe, kilang, ahnsou keren kumwail pahn dolung wah, me keieu kesempwal, me mem sang mem koaros, oh me pwetepwet sang pwetepwet koaros, ei, oh mwakelekel sang mwakelekel koaros; oh kumwail pahn kamadipwki waho lao kumwail pahn medila, kahrehda kumwail sohte pahn men mwenge, de pil men nimpilda.

43 Eri, riei ko, kumwail pahn dolung ketingpen amwail pwoson, oh amwail loalopwoat, oh kanengamah, oh nannanti nan ahnsou apwal, awiawih ahnsou me tuhkeo pahn kadarala wah ong kumwail.
alma 33:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 33[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sihnos padahngki me aramas anahne kapakap oh kaudok wasa koaros, oh me kalokolok en kopwungo kin uhdi pwehki Sapwellimehu—Sihnok padahngki me sapwellimen Kohto me ketikihda kupwur kalahngan—Nan sapwtehno Moses kolada kilel en karasaras ehu me kasalehda Sapwellimen Koht Iehroso. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri mwurin Alma eh koasoiadahr mahsen pwukat, irail ahpw kalkalelapak reh ma irail konehng kamehlele Kohtehmen, pwe irail en kak alehdi wahn tuhkeho me e koasoiadahro, de ia mwomwen arail pahn padokedi weren tuhkeho, de mahseno me e koasoiadahro, me e nda me anahnepen padokedi nan mohngiongirail kan; de ia mwomwen arail pahn tepida doadoahngki arail pwoson.

2 Alma ahpw ndaiong irail: Kilang, kumwail nda me kumwail sohte kak kaudokiong amwail Koht pwehki amwail lekdekiei sang nan amwail sinakoke kan. Ahpw kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail medewe me kumwail sohte pahn kak kaudokiong Koht, lapalahn amwail sapwungalahr, oh kumwail anahne onopki pwuhksarawi kan; ma kumwail medewe me pwuhksarawi kan padahkihong kumwail met, eri kumwail sohte wehwehki.

3 Kumwail tamataman wadek dahme soukohp en mahso, Sihnos, mahsanih duwen amwail pahn kapakap oh kaudok?

4 Pwe e ketihtihki: Komwi me diren kupwur kalahngan, Maing Koht, pwe komw ketin karonge ei kapakap, iei ni ahnsou me I mihmi nan sapwtehno; ei, komwi kupwur kalahngan ong ie ni ahnsou me I kapakapki duwen ei imwintihti kan, oh komwi ahpw ketin wekidirailla re en uhd mwahu ong ie.

5 Ei, Maing Koht, komw kupwureielahr ni ahnsou me I wie pekipek ong komwi nan ei mwahto; ni ei wie ngidingidki ei kapakap, oh komwi ahpw karonge ie.

6 Oh pil, Maing Koht, komwi kin ketinkaronge ei kapakap ni ei pwurala ni imweio.

7 Oh Maing Koht, komw kin karonge ie ni ei kin kapakapohng komwi ni rir nan ei kisin pere.

8 Ei, komw ketin kupwurehla sapwellimomwi seri kan ni arail wiepekipek rehmwi, pwe irail en rong komwi ah kaidehn aramas, oh komw ketin karonge irail.

9 Ei, Maing Koht, komwi ketin kupwureiehlahr, oh karongehier ei wie pekipek nanpwungen sapwellimomwi pokon en aramas akan.

10 Ei, oh komw ketin karongeiehier ni ahnsou me I lekideklao oh ei imwintihti kan kin kailongkinie; ei, komw karongehier ei pekipek kan, oh engiengda pahn ei imwintihti kan, oh komwi mwadangete kamwomwirailla nan sapwellimomwi engieng.

11 Komwi ahpw ketin karonge ie pwehki ei kahpwal akan oh ei ngoang; oh met iei pwehki Sapwellimomwi Iehroso me kahrehda omw kupwur kalahngan ong ie, eri I pahn ngidingidki ei pekipek ong komwi nan ei kahpwal koaros, pwe komwi me kaperenpei; pwehki omwi ketikihsang ie sapwellimomwi kalokolok, pwehki Sapwellimomwi Iehroso.

12 Eri Alma ndaiong irail: Kumwail kamehlele mahsen en pwuhksarawi kan me mehn mahs oko ntingihedi?

13 Kilang, ma kumwail kamehlele, a kumwail pahn kamehlele dahme Sihnos mahsanih; pwe, kilang e ketihtihki: Komwi ketikihsang ie sapwellimomwi kalokolok pwehki Sapwellimomwi Iehroso.

14 Eri kilang, riei ko, I pahn kalelapak ma kumwail wadekehr pwuhksarawi kan? Ma kumwail kamehlele, a ia mwomwen amwail sohte kak kamehlele Sapwellimen Kohto Iehroso?

15 Pwe e sohte ntingdi me Sihnos kelehpw me mahsanih mepwukat, ahpw Sihnok pil iang mahsanih duwen mepwukat—

16 Pwe kilang, e ketihtihki: Maing Kaun, komwi engiengda pahn aramas pwukat, pwehki irail sohte wehwehki sapwellimomwi kalahngan kan me komw ketikihong irail pwehki sapwellimomwi Iehroso.

17 A met, riei ko, kumwail kilang me keriemen en soukohp en mahs kadehdehda duwen Sapwellimen Kohto Iehroso, oh pwehki aramas sohte men wehwehki sapwellime mahsen kan irail kostakai ih oh kemehla.

18 Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ih koaros met; kaidehn irahte me koasoiada duwen Sapwellimen Kohto.

19 Kilang, Moses koasoia duwen ih; ei, oh kilang mehn karasepe ehu me e kasalehda nan sapwtehno, me mehmen me pahn kilang e pahn mourla. Oh aramas tohto kilang oh mourla.

20 Ahpw malaulau me wehwehki duwen soahng pwuko, oh met pwehki ar mohngiong keptakai kan. Ahpw me tohto irail me keptakai sohte men kilang, eri irail mehla. Eri kahrepen ar sohte men kilang pwehki re sohte kamehlele me e pahn kamwahwihirailla.

21 Riei ko, ma kumwail pahn kamwahula sang ni amwail pahn kilangkihte masamwail kan me pahn kak kahrehda amwail kak mwahula, kumwail soh pahn mwadangete kilang, de kumwail men kakeptakaila amwail mohngiong kan nan amwail seupwoson, oh pwahngahki, kahrehda amwail sohte kilang, me pahn kahrehda amwail mehla?

22 Ma ei duwen met, meid suwed ong kumwail; ahpw ma soh, eri kumwail kilangki masamwail kan oh tepida kamehlele Sapwellimen Kohto, me e pahn ketido oh doarehla sapwellime aramas akan, oh me e pahn lokolongki oh pwoula pwe en tomwkihla diparail akan; oh me e pahn iasada sang me melahr akan, me pahn tapiada iasadao, pwe aramas koaros pahn uh mwowe, pwe re en pakadeikda ni imwin rahno iei rahn en kadeik, nin duwen ar wiewia kan.

23 Eri met, riei ko, I men kumwail en padokedi mahsen wet nan mohngiongimwail kan, oh ni eh pahn tepida wosada a kumwail apwalihki amwail pwoson. Oh kilang, e pahn wiahla tuhke pwoat, kekeirda loalomwail ong mour soutuk. Oh Koht en ketin mweidohng kumwail pwe amwail toutou kan en kak marahrahda, sang ni peren en Sapwellimeo. Oh soahng pwukat koaros kumwail kak wia ma kumwail inangih. Ahmen.
alma 34:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 34[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amulek kadehdehki me mahseno me kin pwilisang rehn Krais kin komourala aramas—Ma tomwo sohte wiawi, aramas koaros pahn mwomwla—Kosonned en Moseso pwon kasalehda meirong en Sapwellimen Koht Iehroso—Koasoandi soutuk en poadoandoarlao poahsoanki pwoson oh koluhla—Kapakapki kapai en paliwar oh palingehn—Mour wet iei ahnsou me aramas pahn kaunopada en tuhwong Koht—Kumwail koadoahke komourpamwail ni amwail lemmwiki Koht. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin Alma e koasoiadahr mahsen pwukat e ahpw mwohndi, oh Amulek ahpw kesihnenda oh tepida padahkihong irail, nda:

2 Riei ko, I medewe me e pahn apwal kumwail en pohnsehse soahng kan me sansalohng kitailehr duwen ketidohn Krais, me se padahngkier me iei Sapwellimen Koht Iehros; ei, I ese me mepwukat padahkohng kumwail pak tohto mwohn amwail kahngohdiong kiht.

3 Oh pwehki amwail men riei ohl kesempwalet en kasalehiong kumwail dahme kumwail pahn wia, pwehki amwail kahpwal akan; oh e song en koasoi ong kumwailehr pwe en kaunopada nan amwail madamadau kan; ei, oh e koangoangehkin kumwailehr kumwail en pwoson oh kanengamah—

4 Ei, ma kumwail pahn kak ahneki pwoson laud duwehte mahseno en kak poadidi nan mohngiongimwail kan, pwe kumwail en kak song kamwahupe.

5 Oh met se kak wehwehki kalelapak kesempwal nan amwail madamadau kan, ma iei mahseno mi rehn Sapwellimen Koht Iehroso, de ma pahn mie Krais de soh.

6 Oh kumwail pil kilangehr me riei ohl menet kawehweiong kumwailehr, pak tohto, me mahseno me pwilisang rehn Krais kin kamourala aramas.

7 Riei ohl menet koasoiadahr mahsen kan en Sihnos, me poadoandoarlao pahn pwilisang rehn Sapwellimen Koht Iehroso, oh e pil koasoiadahr mahsen en Sihnok kan; oh e pil kasaledahr duwen Moses, pwe en kasalehda me mepwukat koaros mehlel.

8 Oh met, kilang, pein ngehi pahn kadehdehiong kumwail me mepwukat mehlel. Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me I ese me Krais pahn ketido oh ket nanpwungen aramas akan, pwe en tounmeteikihla dipen sapwellime aramas akan, oh me e pahn tomwkihla dihp en sampah; pwe Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniher.

9 Pwe e konehng me tomw uhdahn pahn anahne en wiawi; pwe nin duwen sapwellimen Koht Soutuk koasoandi lapo, uhdahn e pahn mie anahnepen tomw en wiawi, ma soh, aramas koaros uhdahn pahn mwomwla; ei, pwehki koaros keptakailahr; ei, koaros pwupwudier oh salongalahr, oh koaruhsie pahn mwomwla ma tomw me uhdahn anahnepehu, sohte wiawi.

10 Pwe e konehng en mie meirong lapalap ehu oh me pahn keimwisekla meirong koaros; ei, kaidehn meirong en aramas ehu, de pil mahn, de soangen menpihr kan; pwe e sohte pahn wia ehn aramas meirong ehu; ahpw e uhdahn pahn anahne wia meirong ehu me soutuk oh poatopoat.

11 Oh kilang, sohte aramas emen me kak meirongkihla pein ih pwe en wia tomwpen dipen emen. Eri, ma aramas emen pahn kemehla aramas emen, kilang atail kosonnedo, me wia kosonned pwung, e kin kapwukoanki rien me kam aramaso? I ndaiong kumwail, me Soh.

12 Ahpw koasoandi en kosonnedo iei lahp me kemehla aramaso uhdahn pahn kamakamkihla; eri tomw poatopoat kelehpw me pahn kak itarohng en tomwkihla dipen sampah.

13 Eri, e konehng en mie meirong lapalap ehu oh me pahn kaimwisekla meirong koaros, oh e ahpw pahn mie, de e pahn konehng en mie, imwiseklahn meirong en nta; eri kosonned en Moseso ahpw pahn pweida; ei, mengihtik koaros en kosonnedo pahn pweida, oh sohte mengihtik kis pahn sohrala mwohn e pahn pweida.

14 Oh kilang, met iei wehwehn kosonnedo pwon, audepe pisetik koaros kasalehda kaimwiseklahn meirong lapalapo; oh kaimwiseklahn meirong lapalapo pahn iei Sapwellimen Kohto, ei, me poatopoat oh soutuk.

15 Eri e pahn ketikihong komourpen irail koaros me pahn kamehlele mwareo; oh kahrepen kaimwiseklahn meirong wet, pwe sapwellime kupwur kalahngan en pweida, me pahn powehdi pwuhng en kosonnedo, oh kahrehiong aramas akan en kak ahneki pwoson me kahrehiong ar koluhla.

16 Eri met kalahngano pahn kak kapwaiong anahn en pwuhngo, oh kapilkinirailpene perehrehn nin lime kan, ahpw mehmen me sohte pahn ahneki pwoson me kahrehiong eh koluhla e pahn mih pahn kalokepen kosonnedo pwon oh kapwaiong anahn en pwuhng en kosonnedo; eri irailte me ahneki pwoson me kahrehiong ar koluhla me pahn alehdi poadoandoarlahn koasoandi lap soutuko.

17 Eri, rieiko, Koht en ketin mweidohng kumwail en tepida doadoahngki amwail pwoson me kahrehiong amwail koluhla, pwe kumwail en tepida likweriong ih ni mware sarawio, pwe en ketikihong kumwail sapwellime kalahngan;

18 Ei, peki reh sapwallime kalahngan; pwe e ketin sapwellimaniki manaman en kamourla.

19 Ei, kumwail karakarahkala, oh poaden kapakap ong ih.

20 Kapakap ong ih ahnsou me kumwail mi nan amwail mohs kan, ei, kapakapki noumwail pelin mahn akan.

21 Kapakap ong ih nan imwamwail kan, ei, kapakapki tohn imwamwail kan koaros, ni menseng, ni souwas, oh ni soutik.

22 Ei, kapakap pwe kumwail en kak powehdi amwail imwintihti kan.

23 Ei, kapakap pwe kumwail en kak powehdi tepilo, me wia imwintihti en mour pwung koaros.

24 Kapakapki amwail wahn sahpw akan, pwe kumwail en kak pweida loale.

25 Kapakapki noumwail pelin mahn en nan amwail mohs kan, pwe re en kak tohtohla.

26 Ahpw kaidehn ihte met; kumwail anahne ngidingidki amwail kapakap nan amwail pere tikitik kan, oh nan amwail wasa rir kan, oh nan amwail sapwtehn kan.

27 Ei, apw ma ahnsou me kumwail sohte kapakap ong Kauno, a mohngiongimwail kan en kin direkihla kapakap ong ih ahnsou koaros ong sawaspamwail, oh pil sawaspen mehn mpamwail kan.

28 Oh met kilang, riei ohl kesempwal ako, I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail dehr medmedewe me ihte met; pwe ma mwurin amwail pahn kapwaiada mepwukat koaros, ma kumwail pahn pohnsehse me anahn akan, oh me sohte ar likou kan, oh sohte pwarek me soumwahu oh me mih nan apwal akan, oh kisekisehkiong irail ekei amwail dipwisou kan, ma mie amwail dipwisou, ong irail me anahn akan—I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail sohte pahn wia mepwukat, kilang, amwail kapakap akan mwahl oh e sohte pahn mie katepe ong kumwail, oh kumwail duwehte aramas liksansalmwahu kan me kin kahmahmki pwosono.

29 Eri, ma kumwail kin monokehla kasalehda limpoak unsek, kumwail rasehng mete mer, me soun inihn mete men kin kesehla, (pwehki e sohlahr katepe) oh e kin kesepwekehdi wasa me aramas kin tiakpeseng.

30 Eri met, riei ko, I men kumwail en kohdo oh wahdo wahn koluhla, mwurin amwail alehdier kadehde tohto oh kumwail kilangehr me pwuhk sarawi kan kadehdehkier duwen mepwukat.

31 Ei, I men kumwail en kohdo oh dehr kakeptakaila mohngiongimwail kan; pwe kilang, met iei ih ahnsou oh rahn en amwail pahn komourla; eri, ma kumwail pahn koluhla oh dehr kakeptakaila mohngiongimwail kan, koasoandi lap en poadoandoaro pahn mwadangete wiawihong kumwail.

32 Pwe kilang, nan mour wet iei ahnsou me aramas kan pahn kaunopada en tuhwong Koht; ei, kilang rahn en mour wet iei rahn ong aramas akan re en wia arail doadoahk kan.

33 Oh met, duwehte ei ndaiong kumwailehr mwoweo, ni amwail alehdier kadehde tohto, eri, I peki rehmwail kumwail en dehr kasakasaula rahn en amwail koluhla lao lel imwio; pwe mwurin rahn en mour wet, me kohieng kitailehr pwe kitail en kaunopada ong mour soutuk, kilang, ma kitail sohte pahn kamwahwiala atail ahnsou nan mour wet, a pwohng rotoroto ahpw pahn leledo ni ahnsou me solahr doadoahk kak wiawi.

34 Kumwail sohte kak nda, me ni ansou me kumwail pahn pakahrdohng ahnsou apwalo, me I pahn koluhla, pwe I en kak pwuralahng rehn ei Koht. Soh, kumwail sohte kak nda met; pwe ngehnohte me mihlahr nan paliweremwail kan ahnsou me kumwail kohsang nan mour wet, pil ih ngehnohte me pahn ahneki manaman pohn paliweramwail nan sampah soutuko.

35 Pwe kilang, ma kumwail pahn kasakasau rahn en amwail koluhla lao lel mehla, kilang, kumwail pahn mihla pahn manaman en ngehn en tepilo, oh e pahn katengekumwaildi en wiahla nah; eri, Ngehn en Kauno pahn kohsang kumwail, oh e sohla pahn ketiket rehmwail, oh tepilo pahn ahneki manaman koaros pohmwail; oh met pahn wia imwilahn mour en me suwed akan.

36 Oh met I ese, pwehki Kauno ketin mahsanih me e sohte kin ketiket nan tehnpas samin kan, ahpw nan mohngiong en me mour pwung kan me e kin ketiket ie; oh e pil ketin mahsanih me mour pwung kan pahn iang mwohd nan sapwellime wehi, sohla pwurehng pwurala liki; ahpw arail likou kan pahn pwetepwetkihla ntahn Sihmpwulo.

37 Eri met, riei kesempwal ako, I men kumwail en tamataman mepwukat, oh kumwail en koadoahke komourpamwail sang ni lemmwiki Koht, oh kumwail dehr kahmahmki ketidohn Krais;

38 Pwe kumwail en dehr pelian Ngehn Sarawi, ahpw kumwail en alehda, oh alehda mwahr en Krais; pwe kumwail en karakarahkdihla nan pwelpar, oh kaudokiong Koht, nan wasa sohte lipilipil me kumwail mi ie, ni ngehn oh ni mehlel; oh kumwail momouriki kaping kalahngan rahn koaros, sang ni kalahngan tohto oh kapai kan me e ketikiong kumwail.

39 Ei, oh I pil koangoangehkin kumwail, riei kan, me kumwail en tamataman kumwail en kapakap ahnsou koaros, pwe kumwail en dehr lohdi pahn kasongosong kan en tepilo, pwe en dehr ahneki manaman en poweikumwaildi, pwe kumwail en dehr wiahla nah ni imwin rahno; pwe kilang, sohte mehkot mwahu me e pahn kihong kumwail.

40 Eri met, riei kesempwal ko, I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail en ahneki kanangamah, oh kumwail en dadaurete soangen kahpwal kan koaros; oh kumwail en dehr pelian irail akan me kasareikumwailla pwehki amwail semwehmwe, pwe kumwail de duwe irailla me dipan;

41 Ahpw kumwail en kin kanangamah, oh kehlail nan kahpwal akan, iangahki koapworopwor kehlail pwe ehu rahn kumwail pahn kommoal sang amwail kahpwal akan.
alma 35:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 35[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kalohk en mahseno kauwehla ehn Mehn Soram kan ar loalokong widingan—Irail kausala me weliakapwala kan, oh re uhd iangala nein Amon aramas akan nan Terson—Alma pahtoukihla wiewia suwed en aramas akan. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo, mwurin Amulek e kaimwisekala mahsen pwukat, irail kohkohlahsang pokono oh kohla nan sahpw en Terson.

2 Ei, riarail ko koaros, mwurin arail kalohngkier mahseno ong Mehn Soram kan, irail pil kohlahng sahpw en Terson.

3 Kedekedeo, mwurin irail akan me ndand nanpwungen Mehn Soram kan ar wie lamalampene nanpwungarail duwen mahseno me kalohk ong irail, re ahpw lingeringerkihda mahseno, pwehki e kauwehla arail loalokong widingan; eri irail sohte men rong mahsen kan.

4 Oh irail kadarpeseng pakair oh kapokonepene aramas koaros en nan sahpwo, oh wie lamalamkihong irail duwen mahseno me kalohk ong irailehr.

5 Eri, arail kaun kan oh arail samworo kan oh pil sounpadahk kan sohte kehsehki aramas duwen ar ineng kan; eri irail diarada ni rir, ehn aramas koaros ar madamadau kan.

6 Kedekedeo, mwurin arail diaradahr madamadau en aramas koaros, irail akan me pwungki mahsen kan me kalohkda sang Alma oh rie kan pekeussang nan sahpwo; oh irail me tohto; oh irail pil kohdo nan sahpw en Terson.

7 Kedekedeo Alma oh rie kan ahpw pil papah irail.

8 Eri, aramas en Soram kan lingeringerda pahn nein Amon aramas akan me mih nan Terson, oh pwehki kaun lapalapo en Mehn Soram kan eh wia ohl suwed men, e ahpw kadaralahng pakair ong nein Amon aramas akan oh ndaiong irail re en kausasang nan sapwarail kan irail koaros me kohkohla sang rehrail.

9 E aphw kamasangkinirail soahng tohto. A met nein Amon aramas akan sohte masak arail koasoi kan; eri irail sohte kausirailla, ahpw re kasamwo Mehn Soram kan me semwehmwe koaros me kohdo rehrail; oh irail apwalih irail, oh kihong arail likou, kihong irail sapwarail; oh irail sewese irail nin duwen arail anahn akan.

10 Eri, met kamwakidada Mehn Soram kan re en lingeringerda pahn nein Amon aramas akan, oh irail tepida patehng Mehn Leimen kan oh kahrehiong re en pil iang lingeringer pahrail.

11 Mehn Soram kan oh Mehn Leimen kan ahpw tepida kaunopadahng mahwen ong nein Amon aramas akan, oh pil ong Mehn Nihpai kan.

12 A met kaimwisekalahr pahr eisek isuh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

13 Oh nein Amon aramas akan kohkohsang nan sahpw en Terson, oh kohla nan sahpw en Melek, oh kihong sahpw en Terson sounpei en Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re en kak pelian sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan oh sounpei en Mehn Soram kan; oh met tapiadahr mahwen nanpwungen Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Nihpai kan, nan pahr eisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan; oh soipen arail mahwen kan pahn kohdo mwuhr.

14 Oh Alma, oh Amon, oh riarail kan, oh pil nein Alma pwutak riemeno pwurala nan sahpw en Saraemla, mwurin arail wiahier dipwisou en doadoahk nin limen Koht ong kapwurehdo Mehn Soram tohto en koluhla; oh irail koaros me koluhla pekeussang nan sapwarail; ahpw irail sahpwasapwala nan sahpw en Terson, oh irail alehda dipwisou en mahwen pwehn pein doareirailla, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, oh sapwarail kan.

15 Eri pwehki Alma e pahtoukihla dipen nah aramas akan, ei pwehki mahwen kan, oh kakerehdi nta, oh uhpene kan me kin wiawi nanpwungarail; oh pwehki e kalohki mahseno, de pekederla pwe en kalohki mahseno, rehn aramas koaros nan kahnihmw koaros; oh pwehki e kilangehr mohngiong en aramas akan ar keptakailahr, oh me irail tepida lingeringer pwehki mahseno me inen, oh e pahtoukihla mehlel nan kapehde.

16 Eri, e ahpw kihpene nah pwutak kan, pwe en kak kihong emen emen irail eh kehkehlik tohrohr, nin duwen soahng kan me pid mour pwung. Oh audepen eh kehkehlik kan mi rehtail, me e kihong irail nin duwen pein eh poadoapoad.
alma 36:
Ehn Alma Kehkehlik kan ong nah pwutak Ilemen.

Audaudki iralaud 36 oh 37.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 36[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kadehdehiong Ilemen duwen eh wiliakapwala mwurin tohnlengo eh pwarohng—E lokolongki medek en lekdeklahn palingehn; e ahpw eker mwaren Sises, oh e ahpw ipwisang rehn Koht—Palingene direkihla peren mehlel—E kilangada karihs en tohnleng kan kapikapinga Koht—Tohto me wiliakapw mehlel kehnehr oh kilangehr duwen dahme e kehn oh kilang. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Samwa, rong mwahu ei kaweid kan; pwe I ndaionguhk ni mehlel, me nin duwen ahmw pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ke pahn pweida nan sahpw.

2 I men ke en wia duwehte dahme I wiahier, ni ei tamataman mour en kalidu en atail pahpa kahlap ako; pwe irail mih nan lokolok en mour en kalidu, oh sohte me kak doareirailla ihte Koht en Eipraam, oh Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop; oh ni mehlel e ketin doareirailsang nan arail kahpwal akan.

3 Eri, nei pwutak Ilemen, kilang, ke pwulopwulte, eri, I peki rehmw me ke pahn rong ei koasoi kan oh esehla sang ie; pwe I ese me mehmen me pahn koapworopworki Koht pahn ale sawasepe nan arail apwal akan, oh nan arail kapwunod kan, oh nan arail kahpwal kan, oh pahn pwekpwekdahla ni imwilahn rahno.

4 A I sohte men ke en medewe me I pein esehla—kaidehn sang ni paliwar ahpw palingehn, kaidehn sang ni madamadau en ahnepen aramas ahpw sang rehn Koht.

5 Eri, kilang, I ndaiong uhk, ma I sohte ipwisang rehn Koht I sohte kak ese mepwukat; ahpw sang ni ewen sapwellime tohnleng sarawio, Koht ketin kasalehiong ie mepwukat, a kaidehn pwehki I warohng;

6 Pwe I iang nein Mosaia pwutak kan kohkohseli, songosong se en kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht; ahpw kilang, Koht ketin kadaredo sapwellime tohnleng sarawio en kauhkihtdi nan ahlo.

7 Oh kilang, e mahsen ong kiht, rasehngete ngihl en nansapwe, oh pwehlo pwon ahpw rerada pahn neht kan; oh kiht koaros pwupwudi nan pwehlo, pwehki aht lemmwikihda Kauno.

8 Ahpw kilang, ngihlo eri mahsanihong ie: Pwourda. I ahpw pwourda oh kesihnenda, oh kilang tohnlengo.

9 E ahpw mahsanihong ie: Ma ke sohte men iang kamwomwala, a ke dehr songosong en kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht.

10 Kedekedeo, ngehi eri pwupwudi nan pwehlo; oh erein rahn siluh oh pwohng silipwong me I sohte kak kihpeseng eweiet, de pil doadoahngki nehi oh pehi kan.

11 A tohnglengo mahsanihong ie soahng tohto, me riei ko me rong, ahpw I sohte kak rong; pwe ni ahnsou me I rong mahsen pwukat—Ma ke sohte men kamwomwmwomwala, a ke dehr songosong kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht—I pwonkihla ei masepwehk oh pwuriamwei pwe I en de kamwomwmwomwala, kahrehda ei pwupwudi nan pwehlo oh sohla kak rong wasa.

12 I ahpw toutoukihla lokolok soutuk, pwe palingeniet lokolongki nsensuwed kowahlap mehlel oh toutoukilahr dipei kan koaros.

13 Ei, I tamanda dipei oh ei wiewia suwed kan koaros, me kahrehda ei lokolongki medek en ehl; ei, I kilangada me I kahngohdiong ei Koht, oh me I sohte kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned sarawi kan.

14 Ei, oh I kemelahr tohtohn sapwellime seri kan, de kahrehiong irail nan elen kolahng mwomwala; ei, oh ni oaralap, ei wiewia suwed kan me laud mehlel, kahrehda madamadau en patodohte mwohn sihlangin Koht kamasepwehkiehda mehlel.

15 Oh I medewehiong, ma I kak pekeusla oh sohrala ni palingehn oh paliwar, pwe I en dehr wisikdohng mwohn silangin Koht, oh pakadeingkihda ei wiewia kan.

16 Eri, erein rahn siluh oh pwohng silipwohng I wie lokolongki, iei lokolongki medek en ngehn lekdekla.

17 Kedekedeo, ni ahnsou me I wie kalokolongki lokolok wet, sang ni ei medemedengki ei medemedewe dipei kan, kilang, I pil tamanda rong en ei pahpa kohpada ong aramas akan duwen ketidohn Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Koht Iehros, pwe en tomwkihla dipen sampah.

18 Eri met, ni ei medewedahr madamadau wet, sang nan mohngiongi I patohwan: Maing Sises, komwi Sapwellimen Koht, komw ketin kupwure ie, ngehi me mih nan nsensuwed mwuledek, oh sahl mete en mehla kapiliepenehr.

19 A met, kilang, ni ahnsou me I medewe met, I sohla kak taman ei medek kan; ei, sohla lokolongki madamadau en dipei kan.

20 Oh ia uwen peren, oh uwen marain kapwuriamwei me I kilangada; ei, palingeniet direkihla peren kowahlap duwehte ei medeko!

21 Ei, I ndaiong uhk, samwa, sohte mehkot idipek oh kamedek duwehte ei medeko. Ei, oh I pil ndaiong uhk, samwa, ahpw sohte mehkot idipek oh kaperen duwehte ei pereno.

22 Ei, I medewe me I kilangada, dahme atail pahpa Lihai kilangada, Koht ketiket nan mwoale, oh karis en tohnlengkei kapilpene, oh mwomwen wie kokoul oh kapikapinga arail Koht; ei, oh palingeneiet men iang mih mwo.

23 Ahpw kilang, nehikat oh pehikat pwurehng kehlailda, I ahpw kesihnenda, oh kasalehiong aramas akan me I ipwisang rehn Koht.

24 Ei, oh sang ahnsouo kohdo lel met, I wiewia doadoahk sohte uhdi, pwe I en kak sowese aramas en koluhla; pwe I en kak sowese irail en iang song peren kowahlap me I songehr; pwe irail en kak iang ipwisang rehn Koht, oh audaudkihda Ngehn Sarawi.

25 Ei, oh met kilang, samwa, Kauno ketikiong ie peren mehlel nan pweidahn wahn ei doadoahk kan;

26 Pwehki mahseno me e ketikiong ie, kilang, tohto me pil ipwisang rehn Koht, oh songehr duwehte dahme I songehr, oh pil kilangki masarail duwehte dahme I kilangehr; eri irail ese duwen mepwukat me I wie kosokosoia, duwehte ei ese; oh marain me I ahneki pwilisang rehn Koht.

27 Oh Koht kin ketin sewese ie nan ei kasongosong kan oh soangen kerempw koaros, ei, oh nan soangsoangen kahpwal koaros; ei, Koht ketin doareiehsang nan imweteng, oh sang nan selipei, oh sang mehla; ei, oh I kin koapworopworiki ih, oh e pahn ketin doareiehla.

28 Oh I ese me e pahn pwekiehda ni imwin rahno, pwe I en iang patohla reh ni lingan; ei, oh I pahn kapinga ih kohkohlahte, pwe e ketin kahluwahsang atail pahpa kahlap ko nan Isip, oh e ketin kakihrirailla Mehn Isip ko nan Sehd Weitahtao; oh e ketin kahluwa irail kohla nan sapwen inou sang ni sapwellime manaman; ei, oh e kin ketin doareirailsang nan mour en kalidu oh ar kalipilipala ekei ahnsou.

29 Ei, oh e pil ketin kahluwahsang atail pahpa kahlap ko nan sahpw en Serusalem; oh sang ni sapwellime manaman poatopoat, e pil kin ketin doare irail sang nan ar kalidu oh nan ar kalipilipala, nan ekei ahnsou lao lel met; oh I kin kalapw tamataman arail kalipilipalao; ei, oh ke pil anahne tamatamante arail kalipilipalao duwehte ei wiahier.

30 Ahpw kilang, nei pwutak, kaidehn ihte met; pwe ke pahn anahne ese duwehte ei ese, me nin duwen ahmw pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ke pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh ke pil pahn anahne ese, me nin duwen omw sohte pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ke pahn kalipsang mwohn silangi. Met iei duwen sapwellime mahsen.
alma 37:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 37[/font_size][/center]

[i]Pileit pirahs ko oh pil pwuhk sarawi kan kin nekinek pwe en kak sewese aramas akan komourla—Mehn Sared kan kamwomwomwla pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan—Arail kahula oh inou rir kan pahn anahne ekieksang aramas akan—Ale kaweid rehn Kauno nan mehkoaros me ke pahn kin wia—Nin duwen Liaona e kaweid Mehn Nihpai kan, duwehte mahsen en Krais e pahn kahluwa aramas kohlahng mour soutuk. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri met, nei pwutak Ileman, I kehkehlingkionguhk me ke pahn ale poadopoad kan me kohieng ie sang ni likilik;

2 Oh I pil kehkehlingkionguhk me ke pahn wiwiahda poadopoad en aramas pwukat, nin duwen ei wiahier, nan pileit en Nihpai kan, oh kolokol mepwukat koaros sarawi me I wie kolokol, duwehte ei kin wiewia; pwe re kin wie nekidohng kahrepe kesempwal ehu.

3 Oh pileit pirahs pwukat, me audaudkihda nting pwukat, me kololokol poadopoad en pwuhk sarawi kan, me kolokol poadopoad en kadaudok en atail pahpa kahlap ako, iei sangete ni tapio—

4 Kilang, atail pahpa kahlap ako kohpadahr, me prahs pileit puwkat pahn kin wie nekinek oh kadakadaur sang ehu dih kohlahng ehu, oh nin limen Kauno pahn nekinekid oh kolokol lao e pahn kohieng wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros, pwe irail en kak esehda me rir kan koaros en audepe.

5 A met kilang, ma pileit pwukat pahn wie nekinek re uhdahn pahn wie maramarainte; ei, oh re pahn wie maramarainte; ei, oh pil pileit koaros me audaudiki nting sarawi kan.

6 A met mweinele ke pahn medewehda me mwekid pweipwei met me I wia; ahpw kilang I ndaionguhk, me sang ni soahng kan me tikitik oh mengei, soahng kan me lapala kin pweida; oh pak tohto wiepe tikitik kan kin katokihedi me loalokong kan.

7 Oh Kauno Koht kin ketin wia doadoahk sang ni wiepe kan pwe en ketin kupwurehda pweidahn sapwellime koasoandi lap oh poatopoat kan; oh sang ni wiepe tikitik kan Kauno kin ketin katokihedi me loalokong kan oh ketikihdo komour ong aramas tohto.

8 A met, sangete mahs kohdo mepwukat kin nekinek ni keneinei nin duwen sapwellimen Koht erpit; pwe kilang, re katehlapahla madamadau en aramas pwukat, ei, kapwungalahn aramas tohto arail wiewia sapwung kan, oh kahrehiong irail en marainkihla arail Koht pwehn ale komourpen ngenarail kan.

9 Ei, I ndaiong uhk, ma sohte mepwukat me poadopoad pwukat audaudki, me ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat, Amon oh rie kan sohte kak kapwungala kiden Mehn Leimen nan tiahk sapwung kan en arail pahpa kahlap ako; ei, poadopoad pwukat oh arail koasoi kan elehiong irail en koluhla; iei me, re kahrehiong irail en marainkihda Kauno arail Koht, oh perenkihda Sises Krais arail Soundoar.

10 A ihs me ese, ahpw mweinele irail pahn kak wia ehu ahl me pahn wahdo kiden aramas, ei, oh pil kiden riatail Mehn Nihpai kan me keptakailahr, me ahnsou wet arail mohngiong kan kekeluwaklahr nan dihp oh wiewia suwed kan, pwe irail en marainikihla arail Soundoaro?

11 Met me rir pwukat saikinte kasansalohng ie ni unsek; eri I pahn uhdi wasaht.

12 Eri, e pahn itar ma I pahn ndahte me e kin nekinekla ni keneinei ong kahrepe kesempwal ehu, oh kahrepe wet Koht me ketin mwahngih; pwe e kin ketin kaweid sapwellime doadoahk koaros sang ni erpit, oh sapwellime ahl akan me inen, oh sapwellime ahlo kin duweduwehte kohkohlahte.

13 O tamataman, tamataman, nei pwutak Ilemen, ia uwen inen en sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan. Pwe e ketin mahsanih: Ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo—ahpw ma ke pahn sohte kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekidekla sang mwohn silangi.

14 Eri, tamataman, nei pwutak, me Koht ketin likihong uhk mepwukat, me sarawi, me e ketin nekinekid ni wahu oh sarawi, oh me e pahn pil ketin kolokol oh nekinekid ong kahrepe kesempwal ehu ong ih, pwe en kak kasalehwei sapwellime manaman ong dih en mwuhr akan.

15 Pwe kilang, I pahn ndaionguhk sang ni ngehn en kokohp, ma ke pahn kasapwungehla sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, kilang, mepwukat me sarawi pahn kohsanguhk sang ni manaman en Koht, oh ke pahn wisiklahng rehn Sehdan, pwe en koakoahsang uhk duwehte dihpw meng me kisinieng kin ipirseli.

16 Ahpw ma ke pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh apwalih mepwukat me sarawi nin duwen dahme Kauno ketin mahsanihong uhk, (pwe ke pahn anahne peki rehn Kauno soahng koaros me ke pahn wiahiong mepwukat) kilang, sohte manaman pohn sampah de ehl kak kihsang uhk, pwe Koht sapwellimanki manaman en kapwaiada sapwellime mahsen kan koaros.

17 Pwe e pahn ketin kapwaiada sapwellime inou kan koaros me e pahn ketin inoukihong uhk, pwe e ketin kapwaiadahr sapwellime inou kan me e ketin inoukihongehr atail pahpa kahlap ako.

18 Pwe e ketin inoukihong irail me e pahn ketin nekidala mepwukat ong kahrepe kesempwal ehu ong ih, pwe en ketin kasalehda sapwellime manaman ong dih en mwuhr akan.

19 Eri met kilang, e ketin kapwaiadahr ehu kahrepe, iei kopwurupwurdohn Mehn Leimen kid kei me kahrehiong ar marainkihda mehlelo; oh e ketin kasalehda sapwellime manaman rehrail, oh e pahn pil ketin kasalehdahte sapwellime manaman rehrail ong dih en mwuhr akan; eri re pahn nekinekla ni keneinei.

20 Eri I kehkehlingkihong uhk, nei pwutak Ilemen, me ke en loalopwoat ong omw pahn idawehn ei koasoi kan, oh me ke en loalopwoat ong omw pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan nin duwen e ntingdi.

21 Eri, met I pahn koasoi ong uhk duwen pileit rieisek pahieu, me ke pahn kolokol, pwe me rir kan oh wiewiahn rotorot akan, oh arail wiewia rir kan, de en aramas me kamwomwalahr ko arail wiewia rir kan, en kak sansalohng aramas pwukat; iei, ar kin kamaramas koaros, oh pirap, oh arail kin kulih aramas akan, oh arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan koaros, en kak sansalohng aramas pwukat; ei, oh me ke pahn nekidala mehn kawehwe pwukat.

22 Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanihada sapwellime aramas akan ar tepidahr wiewia rotorot kan, ei, kamaramas oh tiahk suwed kan me wiawi ni rir; eri Kauno ketin mahsanih, ma re sohte pahn koluhla re pahn kamwomwasang pohn sampah.

23 Kauno ahpw ketin mahsanih: I pahn kaunopadahng nei laduo Keislem, takai ehu, me pahn kamarainihada wasa rotorot en marainda, pwe I en kak kadierekada ong nei aramas ihs me kin papah ie, pwe I en kak kasalehiong irail wiewiahn riarail kan, ei, arail wiewia rir kan, arail wiewiahn rotorot kan, oh arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan.

24 A met, samwa, mehn kawehwe pwukat kaunopda pwe mahsen en Koht en kak pweida, me e ketin mahsanih:

25 I pahn kapwarehda arail wiewia rir kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan koaros sang nan rotorot ong nan marain; oh ma re sohte pahn koluhla I pahn kamwomwirailla sang nin sampah; oh I pahn kasalehda nan marain arail tiahk rir oh suwed kan koaros, ong wehi koaros me pahn sapwaniki sahpw wet mwuhr.

26 Oh met, samwa, kitail kilang me re sohte koluhla; eri re kamwomwomwlahr, oh iei mahsen en Koht pweidahr; ei, arail tiahk suwed rir kan pwarada sang nan rotoroto oh kasansalohng kitailehr.

27 Oh met, samwa, I kehkehlingkihong uhk me ke pahn ekihla arail kahula kan, oh arail inou kan, oh arail koasondi en inou rir suwed kan; ei, oh arail sain kan oh mwekid kapwuriamwei kan ke pahn sohte kasalehiong aramas pwukat, pwe irail de esehda, pwe irail de pil iang pwupwudi oh kamwomwala.

28 Pwe kilang, mie keria ehu pohn sahpwet, me kamwomwomwla pahn lelohng aramas koaros me kin iang wiewiahn rotorot akan, nin duwen manaman en Koht, ni ahnsou me irail suwedlahr; eri I mentehn aramas pwukat en dehr kamwomwala.

29 Eri ke sohte pahn kasalehiong aramas pwukat arail kauhla kan oh inou kan en arail koasoandi rir kan, ahpw ihte me ke pahn kasalehiong irail iei arail wiewia suwed oh arail kamaramas oh arail tiahk suwed kan; oh ke pahn padahkihong irail en kailongki soangen wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan oh kamaramas kan; oh kumwail pahn pil padahkihong irail me aramas pwukat kamwomwomwla pwehki arail wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan oh arail kamaramas kan.

30 Pwe kilang, irail kemehla sapwellimen Kauno soukohp kan koaros me kohdo nanpwungarail pwe re en padahkihong irail duwen ar wiewia suwed kan; oh ntahn irail me re kemehla kan pahn kedipa irail rehn Kauno pwe en dupukiong me kamaramas akan; oh met sapwellimen Koht kadeik lellohngehr irail me wiewia tiahk en rotorot oh pwihn mwersuwed rir pwukat.

31 Ei, oh sahpwo pahn riahla kohkohlahte oh pil irail me wiewia tiahk en rotorot oh pwihn suwed rir kan, iei re lao kamwomwomwla, ihte ma re pahn kohluhla mwohn arail pahn suwedla.

32 Oh met, samwa, tamataman koasoi kan me I ndaionguhkehr; dehr likihong aramas pwukat koasoandi rir kan, ahpw padahkihong irail re en kailongki douluhl dihp oh wiewia suwed.

33 Kalohkiong irail koluhla, oh pwoson Kauno Sises Krais; padahkihong irail en pein karakarahkala oh mpai oh aktikitikla; padahkihong irail en powehdi kasongosong en tepilo, sang ni arail pwoson Kauno Sises Krais.

34 Padahkihong irail re en dehr pwangahki wiewia mwahu kan, ahpw re en mpai oh aktikitikla; pwe irail en kak diar kommoalpen ngenirail kan.

35 Eri, tamataman samwa, oh nantihong esehla erpit ni ahmw pwulopwul; ei, nantihong esehla kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ni ahmw pwulopwul.

36 Ei, oh peki rehn Koht en ketin seweseiuk nan mehkoaros; ei, mweidohng Kauno ahmw wiewia kan koaros, oh sohte lipilipil wasa ke pahn kohla ie, ke pahn tengeteng rehn Kauno; ei, mweidohng ahmw madmadau kan en uhlahng rehn Kauno; ei, mweidohng audepen mohngiongamwail en tengeteng rehn Kauno kohkohlahte.

37 Ale kaweid rehn Kauno nan mehkoaros me ke pahn kin wia, oh e pahn ketin kahluwaiuk ong me mwahu; ei, ahnsou me ke pahn meirla, ke pahn wendi rehn Kauno, pwe en ketin sinsileiuhk nan ahmw meir; oh ahnsou me ke pahn pwourda ni menseng mweidohng ahmw mohngiong en diren kaping kalahngan ong Koht; oh ma ke pahn wia mepwukat, ke pahn pwekpwekdahla ni imwin rahno.

38 Eri met, nei pwutak, I men ekis koasoia duwen dipwisou me atail pahpa kahlap ako kahdaniki impweio, de mehn kaweido—de atail pahpa kahlap ako kahdaniki Liaona, me wehwehki, kampos; oh Kauno me ketin kaunopada.

39 Kilang, sohte aramas emen kak wiahda dipwisou en doadoahk ni soangen mwomw en doadoahk lingan wet. Oh kilang, dipwisou wet kaunopadahr pwe en kahluwahki atail pahpa kahlap ko ahl me irail pahn keid loale nan sapwtehno.

40 Oh e kin doadoahk ong irail nin duwen arail pwoson Koht; eri, ma irail kin pwoson sang ni arail kamehlele me Koht kak ketin kamwakid arep ko en idih wasa me re pahn kohla ie, kilang, e kin wiawi; eri irail kilang manaman kapwuriamwei wet, oh pil manaman kapwuriamwei tohto wiawi sang ni manaman en Koht, rahn koaros.

41 Ahpw, pwehki manaman kapwuriamwei pwukat kin pweida sang ni wiepe tikitik kan e kin kasalehiong irail doadoahk kapwuriamwei. Irail kin pohnkahke oh manokehla doadoahngki arail pwoson oh loalopwoat eri doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan kin uhdi, oh irail sohte kin doula nan arail seiloak;

42 Eri, irail mihmihte nan sapwtehno, de re sohte kin seiloak nan ahl inen, oh re lokolongki ar men mwenge oh men nimpil, pwehki arail wiewia sapwung kan.

43 A met, samwa, I men ke en wehwehki me mepwukat kin kasalehda dahme pahn wiawi; pwe ahnsou me atail pahpa kahlap ako kin pohnkahkehnn idawehn kampos wet (eri mepwukat me pid paliwar) irail sohte kin pweida; iei pil duwehte soahng kan me pid palingehn.

44 Pwe kilang, e mengei ke en rong mahsen en Krais, me pahn ketin idihong uhk ahl inen kolahng peren soutuk, duwehte atail pahpa kahlap ako arail pahn idawehn kampos wet, me pahn idihong irail ahl inen kolahng sapwen inouo.

45 A met I kalelapak, ma mie karasaras nan soahng wet? Pwe ni mehlel nin duwen mehn kaweido eh kahluwahdo atail pahpa kahlap ako, sang ni ar idawehn eh kaweid, kolahng nan sahpw en inou, e pil pahn duwehte mahsen kan en Krais, ma kitail pahn idawehn kaweidpe, e pahn ketin kahluwa kitail daulih mour en pahtou wet kolahng nan sahpw en inou ehu me ienen mwahusang met.

46 Eri samwa, kitail en dehr pohnkahke pwehki ahlo e mengei; pwehki ih mwomwen atail pahpa kahlap ako; pwe e pil kaunopadahng irail, ma irail pahn kilang irail pahn mourla; iei pil duwehte kitail. Ahlo kaunopadahr, oh ma kitail pahn kilang kitail pahn mour kohkohlahte.

47 Samwa, kilang me ke pahn apwalih mwahu dipwisou sarawi pwukat, ei, tehk me ke kilenglahng Koht oh mourla. Kohwei rehn aramas pwukat oh kalohkihong irail mahseno, oh ke en wia aramas maledek men. Ei rahnmwahu ong uhk samwa.
alma 38:
Ehn Alma Kehkehlik kan ong nah pwutak Siplon.

Audaudki iralaud 38.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 38[/font_size][/center]

[i]Siplon lokolongki eh mour pwung—Komourla kin kohsang Krais, me iei mour oh marain en sampah—Kaunda amwail ineng kan koaros. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Samwa, rong mwahu dahme I pahn nda, pwe I ndaiong uhk, duwehte dahme I ndaiong Ilemen, me nin duwen ahmw pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ke pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh nin duwen ahmw sohte pahn kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ke pahn lekidekla sang mwohn silangi.

2 A met, samwa, I koapworopworki me ke pahn kahrehiong ie peren mehlel, pwehki ahmw tengeteng oh loalopwoat ong Koht; pwehki sangete ni omw pwulopwul ke kin kilenglahng Kauno omw Koht, iei I pil koapworopworki me ke pahn usehlahte kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan; pwe meid pahi aramas me pahn dadaurete lel imwi.

3 I ndaionguhk, samwa, ke kahrehiongieier peren mehlel, pwehki ahmw loalopwoat oh ahmw pwerisek, oh ahmw kanengamah oh ahmw nannanti nan apwal nanpwungen aramas en Soram ko.

4 Pwe I ese me ke selidi; ei, oh I ese me ke kostakaidi pwehki mahseno; oh ke wiewia mepwukat koaros ni ahmw kanengamah pwehki Kauno ketin ieianguhk; oh met ke esehier me Kauno me ketin doareiukala.

5 Eri met nei pwutak, Siplon, I men ke en tamataman, me nin duwen ahmw pahn koapworopworiki Koht iei ke uhdahn pahn pitila sang nan ahmw songosong kan, oh ahmw kapwunod kan, oh ahmw kahpwal akan, oh ke pahn pwekpwekdahla ni imwin rahno.

6 Eri, samwa, I sohte men ke en medewe me I pein ese mepwukat, ahpw sang Ngehn en Koht me mihmi loalei me kin kasalehiong ie mepwukat; pwe ma I sohte ipwisang rehn Koht I sohte pahn kak wehwehki mepwukat.

7 Ahpw kilang, Kauno, sang ni sapwellime kalahngan lapalap, ketin kadarodo sapwellime tohnleng pwe en kalohkihongie me I pahn anahne tokedihsang wia doadoahk en kamwomwamwla sapwellime aramas akan; ei, oh I tuhwongehr emen tohnleng, oh e mahseniong ie, oh ngile rasehng ngilen nansapwe, oh e itikada nanpwehlo pwon.

8 Kedekedeo erein rahn siluh oh pwohng silipwong ngeniet weirek laud oh pwunod mehlel; oh I sohte alehdi mahkpen dipei kan lao I peki rehn Kauno Sises Krais sapwellime kalahngan. Ahpw kilang, I kapakapohng oh ngeniet ahpw diar popohl.

9 A met, samwa, I padahkihong uhk met pwe ke en esehla erpit, pwe ke en kak esehsang ie me sohte ehu ahl de wiepe me aramas kak komourkihla, ihte sang rehn Krais. Kilang, iei ih me mour oh marain en sampah. Kilang, iei ih me mahsen en mehlel oh mour pwung.

10 Eri met, ni ahmw tepida padahngki mahseno iei I men ke en usehlahte wiewia padahk; oh I men ke en pwerisek oh kanahieng ni soahng koaros.

11 Kaleke ke direki pohnmwahso; ei, kaleke ke suweiki pein ahmw eripit, de ahmw kehlail.

12 Ke pahn eimah, ahpw kaidehn koasoi limeidihd; oh ke en kaunda ahmw ineng kan koaros, pwe ke en kak direkihla limpoak; kaleke pwe ke en dehr pohnkahke.

13 Dehr kapakapak duwehte Mehn Soram ko, pwe ke kilangehr me irail kin kapakap pwe aramas en kak rong oh kapinga arail erpit.

14 Ke dehr nda: Maing Koht, I kapingki aht mwahu sang riat akan; ahpw ke pahn nda: Maing Kaun, komw ketin kupwure ei souwar, oh tamataman riei kan nan sapwellimomwi kalahngan—ei, pohnese duwen omw souwar mwohn silangin Koht ahnsou koaros.

15 Eri, Kauno en ketin kupwuramwahwih ngenomw, oh ni imwin rahno en ketin kasamwoiuhkolong nan sapwellime wehi, pwe ke en mwohndi nan deumw ni popohl. Met kohwei, samwa, oh padahngki mahseno ong aramas pwukat. Wia aramas maledek men. Samwa, ei rahnmwahu ong uhk.
alma 39:
Ehn Alma Kehkehlik kan ong nah pwutak Korianton.

Audaudki iralaud 39 lel 42.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 39[/font_size][/center]

[i]Dipen nenek iei tiahk suwed ehu—Dipen Korianton kahrehda Mehn Soram kan ar sohte men alehda mahseno—Sapwellime Krais poadoandoaro pahn kamourla aramas loalopwoat akan me kohdo mwowe. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, nei pwutak, I men ndaionguhk soahng tohto sang uwen dahme I ndaiong riomw pwutako; pwe kilang, ke sohte kasawih mwahu duwen lelepek en riomw pwutako, eh loalopwoat, oh eh ngoangki kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan? Kilang, e sou kasalehiong uhk karasaras mwahu?

2 Pwe ke sohte rong mwahu ei kaweid kan duwehte riomw pwutako, nanpwungen aramas en Soram kan. Iet dahme I men ndaionguhk; ke kohla susuweiki ahmw kehlail oh ahmw erpit.

3 Oh kaidehn ihte met, samwa. Dahme ke wiadahro kansensuwed ih ie; pwe ke moanokehla doadoahk sarawio, oh kohla nan sahpw en Sairon ni irepen sahpw en Mehn Leimen ko, pwe en tuhwong Isapel, lihen netiki paliwar.

4 Ei, e pitihedi mohngiong en [ohl] tohto; ahpw sohte peikidpomw, samwa. E uhdahn pahn konehng me ke pahn loalopwoat nan doadoahk sarawio me kohienguhkhr ni likilik.

5 Samwa, ke sehse me mepwukat iei mwekid suwed mwohn silangin Kauno; ei, me keieu mwekid suwed sang dihp koaros likin kakerehdi nta mwakelekel de lahlahwe Ngehn Sarawi?

6 Pwe kilang, ma ke pahn kahmahmkihla Ngehn Sarawi mwurin eh ketier rehmw mwowe, oh ke ese me ke kahmahmki, kilang, met iei dihp me sohte mahkpe; ei, mehmen me pahn kamaramas ni eh marainkier oh wehwehki Koht, e pahn apwal ong ih en alehdi mahkpen dipe; ei, I ndaionguhk, samwa, me e sohte pahn mengei ong ih en alehdi mahkpen dipe.

7 Oh met, samwa, I mentehn me ke sohte wiahda dihp laud wet mwohn Koht. I sohte pahn kosokosoia dipomw kan pwe en panginda ngenomw, ma e sohte pahn mwahu ong uhk.

8 Ahpw kilang, ke sohte kak ekihsang Koht dipomw kan; oh ma ke sohte pahn koluhla, dipomw kan pahn wia kadeikpomw ni imwin rahno.

9 Eri samwa, I men ke en koluhla oh manokehla dipomw kan, oh dehr idawehn ineng suwed me tepsang dahme ke kilangki mesemwen, ahpw kadohwanewei sang uhk soangen suwed pwukat koaros; pwe ma ke sohte pahn wia met ke sohte pahn kak sohsohki wehin Koht. Menlau tamataman, oh pilohng pein uhk en kadohwanewei sang uhk mepwukat.

10 Oh I kaweidkin uhk ke en pilohng pein uhk en ale kaweid sang rehn riomw pwutak laud kan nan omw wiewia kan; pwe kilang, ke pwulpwulopwulte, oh ke anahne sawas en riomw pwutak kan. Oh rong mwahu ara kaweid kan.

11 Dehr mweidohng soahng kan me mwahl oh sohte katepe en kaunuhkada; dehr mweidohng tepilo en pwurehng kahrehiong ahmw mohngiong en lohdi pahn lihen netiki paliwere suwed kan. Kilang, samwa, kowe me kahrehda Mehn Soram kan wiahda dihp laud; pwe ni ahnsou me re kilangada ahmw wiewia kan irail sohte men kamehlele ei koasoi kan.

12 Oh met Ngehn en Kauno ketin mahsanih ong ie: Kaweidki noumw seri kan re en wia me mwahu, pwe irail de kahhrehiong mohngiong en aramas tohto en kamwomwomwala; eri I kaweidkin uhk, samwa, pwehki ei lemmwiki Koht, me ke anahne uhdihsang ahmw wiewia suwed kan;

13 Ke anahne sohpeiong Kauno sang ni ahmw madamadau unsek, ahmw kak unsek, oh ahmw kehl unsek; pwe ke en dehr kahrehiong mohngiong en aramas akan en wiahda me suwed; ahpw ke en pwurala rehrail, oh kasalehda omw sapwung kan oh sapwungo me ke wiadahr.

14 Dehr rapahki kepwe kan de soahng mwahl akan en sampah wet; pwe kilang, ke sohte pahn kak wahda.

15 Eri met, samwa, I pahn ndaiong uhk ekis duwen ketidohn Krais. Kilang, I ndaiong uhk, me iei ih me uhdahn pahn ketido pwehn lapwahsang dipen sampah; ei, e pahn ketido pwehn kalohki rongamwahu en komour ong sapwellime aramas akan.

16 Eri met, samwa, met iei doadoahk en papah me ke pwukoahkihdi, pwe ke en kalohki rongamwahu ong aramas pwukat, pwe en kaunopada arail lamalam kan; de komour en kak kowohngirail, pwe irail en kak kaunopada lamalam en neirail seri kan en rong mahseno ni ahnsou me e pahn ketido.

17 Oh met I pahn kameleileidi ahmw pwunod me pid duwen ire wet. Kilang, ke pwuriamweiki dahme kahrehda mepwukat anahne kasansalda mwohn e pahn wiawi. Kilang, I ndaiong uhk, ngehn en aramas ahnsou wet soh pil kesempwal ong Koht duwehte ngehn en aramas ni ahnsou me e pahn ketido?

18 E soh pahn konehng me koasoandi en poadoandoarlao anahne kasansalohng aramas pwukat pil duwehte ong neirail seri kan?

19 E soh pahn mengei ahnsou wet ong Kauno en ketin kadarodo sapwellime tohnleng en kalohngki rongamwahu ong kitail pil duwehte ong neitail seri kan, de mwurin e pahn ketido?
alma 40:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 40[/font_size][/center]

[i]Krais me ketikihda iasadahn aramas koaros—Aramas mwahu me mehla pahn kohla nan paradais oh me suwed kan pahn kohla nan wasa rotorot mosul pwe re en awih rahn en arail iasadao—Soahng koaros pahn pwuralahng ni pwungen dewe oh kakon unsek ni ahnsou en iasadao. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri samwa, iet ekei me I pil men ndaionguhk; pwe I kasawih me ahmw madamadau pwunodki duwen iasadahn me melahr akan.

2 Kilang, I ndaionguhk, me iasadao sohte pahn wiawi—de, I pahn nda, met wehwehki, me paliwar en sampah wet sohte pahn kieweklahng paliwar poatopoat, ei paliwar me pahn mwerpeseng wet, e sohte pahn kieweklahng me sohte pahn mwerepeseng—lao lel mwurin ketidohn Krais.

3 Kilang, ih me pahn ketikihda iasadahn me melahr akan. Ahpw kilang, samwa, iasadao saikinte wiawi. Met, I pahn kasalehionguhk ehu padahk rir; ahpw, mie padahk rir tohto me wie nekinek, me sohte me ese ihte pein Koht me ketin mwahngih. Ahpw I pahn kasalehionguhk mehkot me I peki ni ngidingid rehn Koht pwe I en kak ese—me pid duwen iasadao.

4 Kilang, mie ahnsou ehu me kileldier, me aramas koaros pahn iasada sang mehla. Ahnsou wet sohte me ese iahd; ahpw Koht me ketin mwahngih ahnsou me kileldiero me e pahn wiawi.

5 Eri, sohte mwahn katepe ma e pahn wiawi pak ehu, de pak riau, de pak siluh, me aramas akan pahn iasada sang mehla; pwe Koht mwahngih mepwukat koaros; oh I itariki ei ese me iet dahme pahn wiawi—me mie ahnsou ehu me kileldier me aramas koaros pahn iasada sang mehla.

6 Eri e pahn konehng en mie ahnsou ehu nanpwungen ansou me aramas mehla oh ansou me re pahn iasada.

7 Oh met I pahn kalelapak dahme pahn wiawi ong ngenen aramas akan mwurin ahnsou me re mehla lel ahnsou me koasoandi ong iasadao?

8 Eri, mehndahte ma e tohto sang pak ehu me kileldier ong aramas kan re en iasada; pwe koaros sohte pahn mehla ahnsoutehkis, oh met sohte katepe; pwehki soahng koaros duwehte rahn teieu rehn Koht, oh sosohngpen ahnsou kin wiawi ongete aramas.

9 Eri, mie ahnsou ehu me kileldier ong aramas akan me re pahn iasada sang mehla; oh mie ahnsou ehu nanpwungen ahnsou me aramas mehla oh iasada. Oh met, pid duwen ahnsouo, dahme kin wiawihong ngehn en aramas kan iei ih met me I peki ni ngidingid rehn Kauno pwe I en ese; oh iet dahme I eseier.

10 Oh ni ahnsouo e pahn leledo me aramas koaros pahn iasada, eri irail pahn esehda me Koht ketin mwahngih koasoandi en ahnsou kan koaros me kileldier ong aramas.

11 Eri, me pid duwen ngehno nanpwungen mehla oh iasada—Kilang, tohnleng men kasalehiong ie, me ngehn en aramas koaros, ni ahnsouohte me irail kin mweselsang nan paliwar en mour wet, ei, ngehn en aramas koaros, mehndahte ma re mwahu de suwed, re kin kopwurupwurla rehn Koht me ketikihong irail mour.

12 Oh e ahpw pahn wiawi, me ngehn en irail akan me mwahu pahn kasamwolong nan mour peren, me kahdaniki paradais, mour en kommoal, mour en popohl, wasa me re pahn kommoal sang arail kahpwal kan oh sang kapwunod koaros, oh pahtou koaros.

13 Oh e ahpw pahn wiawi, me ngehn en me suwed kan, ei, irail me suwed—pwe kilang, sohte kisehn Ngehn en Kauno rehrail; pwe kilang, irail pilada wia doadoahk suwed kan sang wia me mwahu; eri ngehn en tepilo pidelong loalerail, oh kousoanla nan imwarail—oh re pahn lekdeklahng nan wasa rotorot mosul; oh re pahn sengiseng, oh weriwer, oh ngihrail kan tehtehrek, oh met pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan, pwehki arail idawehnla ineng en tepilo.

14 Met iei duwen ngehn en me suwed kan, ei, nan rotorot, oh irair apwal, kasikasik ni ar masak, engieng en Koht me rasohng karakar en kisiniei pohrail; eri re pahn mihmi nan soungen irair wet, oh me mwahu ko nan paradais pahn mihmihte nan irairo, lao lel ahnsou en iasadao.

15 Met, mie ekei me kin kawehwe me irair en peren oh irair en pahtou wet en ngehno, mwohn eh iasadao, iei keieu en iasada. Ei, I pohnese me e kakete kahdaniki iasada, me iei kodahn ngehno de palingehno oh koasoandi en ar peren de pahtou, nin duwen mahsen kan me sansalehr.

16 Oh kilang, e pil sansalehr, me mie keieu en iasada, iasadahn irail koaros me melahr, de me momour met, de me pahn ipwidi, lao lel ni ahnsou me Krais pahn iasada sang mehla.

17 Met, kitail sohte lemeleme me keieu en iasada wet, nin duwen me sansalehr ni mwohmw wet, kak en wia iasadahn palingehn kan oh koasoandi en ar peren de pahtou. Kitail sohte kak lemeleme me ih wehwehn met.

18 Kilang, I ndaionguhk, Soh; ahpw e wehwehki pwurpenehn palingehn oh paliwar, ong irail akan sang ni ahnsoun Adam kohdo lel iasadahn Krais.

19 Met, I sohte nda ma palingehn oh paliwar en irail akan me koasoiepe sansalehr, me suwed oh me mwahu, pahn pwurpene ahnsou teieu; E itar I en nda me irail koaros pahn pedoisang nan arail sousou kan; de met wehwehki, arail iasadao pahn wiawi mwohn iasadahn irail akan me mehla mwurin iasadahn Krais.

20 Eri, samwa, I sohte nda me arail iasadao pahn wiawi ni ahnsoun iasadahn Kraiso; ahpw kilang, sang pein ei lamalam, I nda me palingehn oh paliwar en me mwahu kan pahn pwurpene ni ahnsoun iasadahn Krais, oh ni eh pahn ketidahla nanleng.

21 Ahpw I sohte nda ma e pahn wiawi ni e pahn ketin iasadao de mwuhr; ahpw iet uwen dahme I pahn nda, me mie ahnsou ehu nanpwungen mehla oh iasadahn paliwar, oh irair en peren de pahtou en ngehno lao lel ahnsou me Koht ketin kilelehdi me melahro pahn pedoisang nan arail sousou kan, oh ngehno oh paliwaro pwurpene, oh pakahrdohng mwohn silangin Koht, oh pakadeingkihda arail wiewia kan.

22 Ei, met pahn elehiong kopwurupwurdohng soahng kan me soukohp akan lohkidahr.

23 Pali ngehno pahn pwuralahng paliwaro, oh paliwaro pwuralahng pali ngehno; ei, peh oh neh oh kakon kan koaros pahn kopwurupwuralahng ni paliwaro; ei, iei sohte apwoat pitenmoange pahn salongala; ahpw soahng koaros pahn kopwurupwuralahng ni pwungen dewe oh kakon unsek.

24 Eri, samwa, iei met kopwurupwurdo me soukohp akan koasoiaier—

25 Oh me mwahu kan ahpw pahn lingalingla nan wehin Koht.

26 Ahpw kilang, mehla kamasepwehk ehu pahn kohdohng me suwed kan; pwehki irail pahn mehkihla soang kan me pid duwen mour pwung; pwe irail samin, oh sohte mehkot samin kak sohsohki wehin Koht; ahpw irail pahn lekdekla, oh kohlahng ale wahn arail doadoahk kan de arail wiewia kan, me iei doadoahk suwed; oh irail pahn nimala mwoarok en kep katiko.
alma 41:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 41[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nan Iasadao aramas akan pahn iasadahng nan mour en peren poatopoat de pahtou poatopoat—Mour suwed sohte kin elehiong peren—Aramas me kin momourki mour en sampah sohte iang ahneki Koht nan sampah—Nan Kopwurupwurdohu aramas koaros pahn pwurehng alehdi mwomwen arail mour me re koadoahkehda nan mour wet. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri met, samwa, I men koasoia ekis duwen kopwurupwurdo me koasoiepe wiawiher; pwe kilang, ekei wekidalahr wehwehn iren pwuhk sarawi kan, oh re salongalahr pwehki soahng wet. Oh I kasawih me nan ahmw madamadau ke pil pwunodki duwen met. Ahpw kilang, I pahn kawehwehiong uhk.

2 I pahn ndaionguhk, samwa, me koasoandi en kopwurupwurdohu e kesempwal nan sapwellimen Koht pwuhngo; pwe e kesempwal me soahng koaros pahn kopwurupwurlahng nin duwen koasoandiparail. Kilang, met wia koasoandi kesempwal oh pwung, nin duwen sapwellimen Krais manaman oh iasadao, ngehn en aramaso pahn kopwurupwurlahng paliwereo, oh paliwereo unsek pahn pwurpenehng nan dewe.

3 Oh met kesempwal ong sapwellimen Koht pwuhngo me aramas koaros pahn pakadeingkihda arail wiewia kan; oh ma arail wiewia kan mwahu nan mour wet, oh ma ineng kan en mohngiongirail kan mwahu, eri ni imwin rahno irail pahn pil kopwurupwurlahng dahme mwahwo.

4 Oh ma arail wiewia kan suwed re pahn kopwurupwurlahng me suwed.
