Eri, soahng koaros pahn kopwurupwurlahng nin duwen pwungipen koasoandiparail, soahng koaros kohlahng ni pwungen dewe—mour me kin mehla iasadahng mour poatopoat, paliwar me kak mwerpeseng pahn iasadahng me sohte kak mwerpeseng—iasadahng peren poatopoat ong sohsohki wehin Koht, de iasadahng pahtou poatopoat ong sohsohki wehin tepil, irair ehu mi apali, a irair teio mi apali—

5 Mehmeno me pahn iasadahng peren nin duwen eh kin inangih peren, de mwahu nin duwen eh kin inangih me mwahu; oh mehteio pahn iasadahng me suwed nin duwen eh kin inangih me suwed; pwehki eh inangih wia me suwed rahno pwon iei e pil pahn alehdi pwaisen eh wiewia suwedo ahnsou me pwohngo pahn leledo.

6 Oh iei met pil duwehte apali irairo. Ma e pahn koluhkihla dipe kan, oh inangih mour pwung lao lel imwin eh rahn akan, iei e pil pahn ale pwaisen mour pwung.

7 Irail pwukat me pahn poadoandoarla rehn Kauno; ei, irail pwukat me pahn kapitasang, me pahn poadoandoarasang pwohng rotorot poatopoato; oh irail pahn kesikesihnen de pwupwudi; pwe kilang, irail me pahn pein kadeik pein irail, ma re pahn wia me mwahu de wia me suwed.

8 Eri met, sapwellimen Koht koasoandi kan sohte kin wekidekla; eri, ahlo kaunopdahr pwe mehmen me men keid loale e pahn komourla.

9 Oh met kilang, samwa, ke dehr pwurehng wiahda dihp ong Koht nin duwen iren padahk en kosonned pwukat, me sang ahnsouo lel met ke wiahkihda dihp.

10 Pwehki eh koasoia duwen kopwurupwurdo, ke dehr lemeleme me ke pahn kopwurupwurdo sang dihp kohlang peren. Kilang, I ndaionguhk, mour suwed sohte mwahn kin elehiong peren.

11 Oh met, samwa, aramas koaros me momouriki ahnepen aramas, de I pahn nda, mour en sampah, irail mihmier nan nsensuwed mwuledek oh senselki dihp; re kin kousoan nin sampah ahpw sohte iang ahneki Koht, oh arail mour kin uhwong ieias en Koht; eri, irail mihmi nan irairen mour me kin uhwong mour peren.

12 Eri met kilang, dah, ke wiahki me lepin mahsen kopwurupwurdo wehwehki en wekidala mwomwen ahnepen mour oh wekidiong ehu soangen mour tohrohr, de kihong nan soangen mour ehu me wekisang dahme eh ahnlahr?

13 O, samwa, kaidehn ih wehwehn met; ahpw uhdahn wehwehn lepin mahsen kopwurupwurdou iei en pwurehng kapwurehdo me suwedo ong me suwed, de mour en sampah ong mour en sampah, de mour en tepilo ong mour en tepil—mwahu ong dahme mwahu; mour pwung ong me mour pwung; pwung ong me pwung; kalahngan ong me kalahngan.

14 Eri, samwa, ke en kin mahk ong riomw kan; ehuwong mehteikan ni pwung, tenek pwung, oh wia mwahu ahnsou koaros; oh ma ke pahn wia mepwukat koaros eri ke pahn ale ketingpomw; ei, ke pahn pwurehng alehdi mahk; kadeik pwung pahn kopwurupwurieng uhk; keting mwahu pahn pwurehng kohieng uhk.

15 Pwe dahme ke pahn kihwei pahn pwurehng wiawihong uhk, oh kopwurupwurdo; eri, lepin mahsen kopwurupwurodo kin uhdahn kadeikada me dipano, oh sohte mwahn kin doarehla.
alma 42:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 42[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nan mour wet iei ahnsou en songosong me mweidohng aramas en kak koluhla oh papah Koht—Pwupwudio kahrehda mehlahn paliwar oh palingehn ong aramas koaros—Koluhla me kahrehiong aramas kak komourla—Koht pein tomwkihla dipen sampah—Kupwurkalahngan pahn kohieng irail akan me pahn koluhla—Koaros me pahn luhwehdi pahn mihla pahn manaman en sapwellimen Koht pwuhng—Mie kupwurkalahngan pwehki Tomwo—Ihte irail me koluhla mehlel me pahn komourla. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, samwa, I kasawiadahr me miehte mehkot laud me kapwunode nan ahmw madamadau, me ke sohte kak wehwehki—me pid duwen sapwellimen Koht pwung ong kalokepen me dipan; pwe ke wie medemedewe me e sohte pwung irail akan me dipan en kilelehdiong nan mour pahtou.

2 Met kilang, samwa, I pahn kawehwehionguhk duwen met. Pwe kilang, mwurin Kauno Koht eh ketin kasarehla tepin atail pahpa oh nohno sang nan mwetuwel en Ihden, pwe ira en koadoahki pwelen sampah me ira kepikipikdahsang ie—ei, e ketikihieisang ohlo, oh e ketikihong ni palimesehn mwetuwel en Ihden, serepim, oh kedlahs kisiniei pwoat me mpwul sirangarang pali koaros, pwehn sinsile tuhkehn komouro—

3 Met, kitail kilang me ohlo duwehlahr Koht, pwehki eh ese me mwahu oh me suwed; oh pwe en dehr kihla peh, oh pil ale wahntuhkehn komouro, oh tungoale oh momour kohkohlahte, Kauno Koht ketikihong serepim oh kedlahs kisinieio, pwe en dehr tungoale wahntuhkeo—

4 Oh met kitail kilang, mie ahnsou ehu me mweimweiongehr aramas pwe re en koluhla, ei, ahnsou en songosong ehu, ahnsou en koluhla oh papah Koht.

5 Pwe kilang, ma Adam mwadangete kihla peh, oh tungoalehda wahntuhkehn komouro, e pahn momour kohkohlahte, nin duwen sapwellimen Koht mahseno, oh e sohte pahn mie ahnsou en eh koluhla; ei, oh pil sapwellimen Koht mahseno pahn sohla pweida, oh koasoandi lap en komouro sohte pahn pweida.

6 Pwe kilang, e koasoanehdier me aramas pahn mehla—eri, pwehki arail kalipilipasang tuhkehn komouro irail pahn kalipilipasang pohn sampah—oh aramas salongalahr kohkohlahte, ei, irail wiahla aramas pwupwudi kei.

7 Eri met, kitail kilangehr me sang ni koasoandi wet, tepin atail pahpa oh nohno kalipilipalahr ni paliwar oh palingehn sang mwohn silangin Kauno; oh met kitail kilangehr me pein nsenara me uhd kakaunira.

8 Met kilang, e sohte konehng me aramas pahn poadoandoarasang mehlahn paliwar wet, pwe e pahn kauwehla koasoandi lap en pereno.

9 Eri, pwehki ngehno e sohte kak mehla, oh pwupwudio kahrehda aramas koaros arail mehla ni palingehn oh pil ni paliwar, met wehwehki, irail kalipiliplasangehr mwohn silangin Kauno, oh e konehng me aramas pahn poadoandoarasang mehlahn palingehn wet.

10 Eri, pwehki arail mour eh wialahr mour en sampah, mour en ar ineng kan, oh mour en tepil, pwehki sang ni ahnepen aramas, ahnsou en songosong wet wialahr ahnsou me re pahn kaunopada; e wialahr ahnsou en kaunop ehu.

11 A met tamataman, samwa, ma sohte koasoandi en poadoandoaro, (ma kitail kihsang) ni ahnsowohte me ira mehla ngenira pahn pahtoula, pwehki ara kalipilipasangehr mwohn silangin Kauno.

12 Oh met, sohte ehu wiepe me aramas akan pahn kak poadoandoarasang mour pwupwudi wet, me aramas pein kihongehr pein ih pwehki pein eh sapeik;

13 Eri, nin duwen pwuhngo, koasoandi en poadoandoaro sohte kak wiawi, ihte ma aramas akan idawehn koasoandi en koluhla nan ahnsou en songosong wet, ei, ahnsou en kaunopada wet; pwe ma sohte koasoandi pwukat, sohte kupwurkalahngan ihte e pahn kauwehla doadoahk en pwuhngo. Eri doadoahk en pwuhngo sohte kak ohla; ma iei, Koht pahn ketin uhdihsang wia Koht.

14 Eri met kitail kilang me aramas koaros pwupwudier, oh re mihlahr pahn manaman en pwuhngo; ei, sapwellimen Koht pwuhngo, me pahn koasoanehdi irail en kalipilipasang mwohn silangi kohkohlahte.

15 Eri met, koasoandi en kupwurkalahngano sohte kak wiawi ihte ma mie tomw ehu pahn wiawi; eri pein Koht tomwkilahr dipen sampah, pwe en ketikihdo koasoandi en kalahngano, pwe en kapwaiada kosonned en pwuhngo, pwe Koht en kak wia Koht unsek, Koht pwung, oh pil Koht kalahngan.

16 Eri, koluhla sohte kak wiawihong aramas akan ihte ma mie kalokolok, me pil poatoapoat duwehte mour en ngehno, me uhwong koasoandi en pereno, me pil poatoapoat duwehte mour en ngehno.

17 Eri, ia mwomwen aramas pahn koluhla ma sohte dipe? Ia mwomwen eh pahn dihp ma sohte kosonned? Ia mwomwen eh pahn mie kosonned ma sohte kalokolok?

18 Eri, mieier koasoandi en kalokolok, oh kosonned pwung wiawihda, me kin kahrehda nan kapehd nsensuwed ong aramas.

19 Eri, ma sohte kosonned wiawihda—ma aramas men kamaramas e pahn anahne mehla—ke medewe e pahn kak masak mehla ma e kamaramas?

20 Oh pil, ma sohte kosonned wiawihda ong dihp, aramas akan sohte pahn masak wiahda dihp.

21 Oh ma sohte kosonned wiawihda, ma aramas akan wiada dihp dahme pwuhng pahn wia, de pil kupwurkalahngan, pwe re sohte pahn apwalih aramaso?

22 Ahpw mie kosonned ehu wiawihda, oh kalokolok koasoandier, oh koluhla mweimweidahr; kalahngano kin apwalih koluhla wet; ma soh, a pwuhngo kin apwalih aramaso oh kin kapwaiada kosonnedo, oh kosonnedo kin kihong kalokepe; ma soh, a doadoahk en pwuhngo pahn ohla, oh Koht pahn ketin udihsang wia Koht.

23 Ahpw Koht sohte pahn udihsang wia Koht, oh kalahngan kin apwalih me koluhlao, oh mie kalahngano pwehki tomwo; oh tomwo me kahrehda iasadahn me mehla; oh iasadahn me mehla kin kapwurehdo aramaso mwohn silangin Koht; eri irail kin kopwurupwurdo mwohn silangi, pwe re en pakadeingki arail wiewia kan, nin duwen kosonnedo oh pwuhngo.

24 Pwe kilang, pwuhngo kin doadoahngki eh manaman koaros, oh pil kalahngano kin apwalih dahme pein ah; eri, ihte me koluhla mehlel kan me pahn komourla.

25 Dah, ke medewe me mahk kak pirapa de kauwehla pwuhngo? I ndaionguhk, Soh; sohte kisin wasa ehu. Ma iei, Koht pahn ketin uhdihsang wia Koht.

26 Eri Koht kin ketikidahr sapwellime koasoandi lap oh soutuk kan, me kaunopdahr sangete ni tepin sampah. Oh met kahredahr komour oh poadoandoaralahn aramas akan, oh pil arail kamwomwala oh pahtou.

27 Eri, samwa, mehmen me pahn kohdo, en kohdo oh tungoale pihl en komour ni saledek; oh mehmen me sohte pahn kohdo, e sohte pahn idihdiong en kohdo; ahpw ni imwin rahno e pahn kopwurupwuriong ih nin duwen eh wiewia kan.

28 Ma e pahn inangih wia me suwed, oh sohte koluhla nan eh rahn akan, kilang, me suwed pahn pil wiawihong ih, nin duwen sapwellimen Koht koasoandi en kopwurupwurdohu.

29 Oh met, samwa, I men ke en dehr mweidohng mepwukat en pwurehng kapwunodeiuk, oh mweidohngete dipomw kan en kapwunodeiuk, sang ni kapwunod wet me pahn kahrehda omw aktikitikla oh koluhla.

30 Oh samwa, I men ke en dehr kahmahmki sapwellimen Koht pwuhng. Dehr rapahki ke en pitsang ire tikitik pwukat pwehki dipomw kan, sang ni omw kahmahmkihla sapwellimen Koht pwuhng; ahpw ke en kin mweidohng sapwellimen Koht pwuhng, oh sapwellime kalahngan, oh sapwellime kanangamah en kin kamwakid mohngiongomw unsek; oh mweidohng en kaatikitikihukala.

31 Oh met, samwa, Koht ketin malipeiukehr ke en kalohkihong aramas pwukat mahseno. Oh met, samwa, kohkohwei, kalohki mahseno ni mehlel oh maledek, pwe ke en kak kahrehiong aramas tohto en koluhla, pwe koasoandi lap en kalahngano en kak apwalihirailda. Oh Kohto en ketin kupwureiukala nin duwen ei koasoi kan. Amen.
alma 43:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 43[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma oh nah pwutak kan kalohki mahseno—Mehn Soram kan oh ekei Mehn Nihpai me kahngohdi kan iangala Mehn Leimen kan—Men Leimen ko kohdohng mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan—Moronai kihong Mehn Nihpai kan tehtehn mahwen—Kauno ketin kasalehiong Alma en Mehn Leimen ar koasoandi en mahwen kan—Mehn Nihpai kan doare imwarail akan, arail saledek, arail peneinei kan, oh arail pelien lamalam—Nein Moronai oh Lihai sounpei ko kapilpene Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 74 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri met kedekedeo nein Alma pwutak ko kolahng nanpwungen aramas akan, kalohkihong irail mahseno. Oh pil pein Alma, sohte kak kommoal, oh e pil iang kohkohseli.

2 Met kitail sohlahr pahn koasoia duwen arail kalohk kan, ihte me irail kalohkier mahseno, oh me mehlelo, nin duwen ngehn en kokohp oh kaudiahl; oh irail kalohk nin duwen sapwellimen Koht koasoandi sarawio me irail malipilipiongehr.

3 Oh met I pwuralahng koasoiepen mahwen kan nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan, ni kaeisek waluhn sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

4 Pwe kilang, kedekedeo Mehn Soram ko iangala Mehn Leimen ko; eri, ni tepin kaeisek waluhn sounparo, Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw kilangada Mehn Leimen kan kohkohdohng irail; eri irail ahpw kaunopadahngehr mahwen; ei, irail kapokonepene neirail sounpei kan nan sahpw en Terson.

5 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen ko iangahki kiden neirail sounpei kan kohkohdo; oh irail kohdo nan sahpw en Andeionum, me wia sahpw en Mehn Soram kan; oh ohl emen me kahdaniki Saraemna me wia arail kaun.

6 Eri met, pwehki Mehn Amelek kan ar inenen sekineken oh loallap suwed sang Mehn Lemen kan, eri, Saraemna idihada re en wia kaun en sounpei ong Mehn Lemen kan, oh irail koaros Mehn Amelek oh Mehn Soram kei.

7 Eri e wia met pwe re en kak kadakadaurete arail kailongki Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe en kak kolokol irail pahn eh manaman pwe eh koasoandi kan en kak pweida.

8 Pwe kilang, eh koasoandi kan iei en kamwakidada Mehn Lemen kan pwe irail en lingeringer oh uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan; e kin wia met pwe en kak ahneki manaman kehlail pohrail, oh pwe en pil kalowehdiong Mehn Nihpai kan pahn eh manaman sang ni eh pahn kaliduweirailla.

9 Oh met en Mehn Nihpai kan koasoandio iei re en apwalih sapwarail kan, oh imwarail kan, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, pwe re en kak doareirailsang ar imwintihti kan; oh pwe re en pil kak kolokolete arail pwuhng kan oh arail kapai kan, ei, oh pil ar mour saledek, pwe re en kak kaudokiong Koht nin duwen nsenarail.

10 Pwe re eseier ma re pahn lohdiong pahn manaman en Mehn Lemen ko, a Mehn Leimen ko pahn kemehla mehmen me pahn kaudokiong Koht ni ngehn oh mehlel, iei Koht mehlel oh ieiaso.

11 Ei, oh irail pil ese duwen Mehn Leimen kan arail kailongki mehlel riarail ko, me iei aramas en Andai-Nihpai-Lihai kan, me kahdanikihla aramas en Amon—oh irail sohte men doadoahngki dipwisou en mahwen, ei, irail wiadahr inou ehu oh irail sohte kak kauwehla—eri, ma re pahn lohdiong pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan irail uhdahn pahn kamakamala.

12 Oh Mehn Nihpai kan sohte kak mweidohng irail en kamwomwmwomwla; eri re kihong irail sapw me re pahn sapwenikihla.

13 Oh nein Amon aramas akan kin kihong Mehn Nihpai kan pali laud en arail dipwisou kan pwe en sewese neirail sounpei kan; eri Mehn Nihpai kan idihdiong, re en kelehpwki pelian Mehn Leimen kan, me kapatapene kadaudok en Leimen oh Lemuel, oh nein Ismael pwutak kan, oh Mehn Nihpai kahngohdi kan koaros, me iei Mehn Amelek kan oh Mehn Soram kan, oh pil kadaudok en samworohn Noha ko.

14 Eri kadaudok pwuko kereniong duwehte uwen tohtohn Mehn Nihpai ko; eri ih me Mehn Nihpai kan kin itoitkiheng re en peiong riarail kan oh mehnda ma pil kakerehdi nta.

15 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me sounpei en Leimen kan kohpenehr nan sahpw en Andeionum, kilang, sounpei en Nihpai kan onopadahr re en tuhwong irail nan sahpw en Terson.

16 Eri, kaun en Mehn Nihpai kan, de ohl me idihdida pwe en wia kaun lapalap en sounpei ong Mehn Nihpai kan—eri kaun lapalap en sounpei menet uhd pwukoahki sounpei en Mehn Nihpai koaruhsie—oh ede Moronai;

17 Oh Moronai uhd pwukoahkier manaman unsek, oh wiepen doadoahk en arail mahwen kan. A e sounparte rieisek limau ahnsou me e idihdahr en wia kaun lapalap en sounpei en Mehn Nihpai kan.

18 Kedekedeo e ahpw tuhwongidi Mehn Leimen kan ni irepen sahpw en Terson, oh nah aramas akan weuwa neirail kedlahs, oh naipokos kan, oh soangsoangen dipwisou en mahwen kan koaros.

19 Oh ahnsou me nein mehn Leimen sounpei kan kilangadahr me aramas en Nihpai kan, de Moronai, kalikawihkihda nah aramas akan likou mete mehn pere nan mwaramwararail akan oh pil mehn sansar, ei, oh pil lisoarop en perehla moangerail kan, oh irail pil likauwih likou mosul kan—

20 Eri nein Saraemna sounpei kan sohte kaunopada soangen dipwisou pwuko; irail weuwahte neirail kedlahs kan oh neirail naipokos kan, neirail kesik ketieu kan oh arep kan, neirail takai kan oh pahi kan; oh irail sohte likou, ihte irail pirehkipene lukeparail kan kateng me wiawihkihda kilin mahn; ei, irail koaros kilisou, ihte Mehn Soram kan oh Mehn Amelek kan me soh;

21 Ahpw re sohte likawih mehn perehpen nan mwaremwararail kan, de mehn sansar kan—eri, irail masakada mehlel sounpei en Mehn Nihpai ko pwehki arail tehtehn mahwen kan, mehndahte arail inenen tohto sang Mehn Nihpai kan.

22 Kilang, kedekedeo irail sohte men kohdo peiong Mehn Nihpai ko ni irepen sahpw en Terson; eri irail mweselsang sahpw en Andeionum kolahng nan sapwtehno, oh irail pidekla palio nan sapwtehno ni tepin pillap en Saidon, pwe irail en kak kohlahng nan sahpw en Mandai oh kalowehdi sahpwo; pwehki irail sohte medewe me nein Moronai sounpei ko pahn ese wasa me re kohla ie.

23 Ahpw kedekedeo, ni ahnsowohte me irail mwesellahngehr nan sapwtehno, Moronai kadaralahng nan sapwtehno lipoahrok kei pwe re en mwasahn ar kahnimwpwalo; oh Moronai, pwehki e pil ese duwen kokohp en Alma kan, e ahpw kadarala ohl ekei reh, oh peki reh en kalelapak rehn Kauno duwen wasa me sounpei en Mehn Nihpai ko pahn kohla ie pwe re en doare pein irail sang Mehn Leimen ko.

24 Kedekedeo mahsen en Kauno ahpw leledohng rehn Alma, oh Alma ahpw pakairkihong nein Moronai meninkeder ko, me sounpei en Mehn Leimen ko karikaris pidek kohla nan sapwtehno, pwe irail en kak kohla nan sahpw en Mandai, pwe re en kak tepida mahweniong wasao me aramas ako mwomwen luwet. Oh meninkeder ko ahpw pwurala oh patohwanohng Moronai pakairo.

25 Eri mwurin Moronai eh pwilikihdi ekei nah sounpei ko nan sahpw en Terson, pwe ekei sounpei en Mehn Leimen ko de kohdo nan sahpwo oh kalowehdi kahnihmwo, e ahpw wahda luhwen nah sounpei kan oh karis kohla nan sahpw en Mandai.

26 Oh e ahpw kapokonepene aramas koaros me mih nan sahpwo pwe irail en mahweniong Mehn Leimen ko, pwe re en doare sapwarail kan oh arail wehi, arail pwuhng kan oh arail mour saledek; eri irail onopadahr ong ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pahn kohdohng irail.

27 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw kupwurehda nah sounpei ko re en rukula nan wahu me mi ni keilen pillap Saidon, me mi palikapi en pillap Saidon nan sapwtehno.

28 Oh Moronai kadarala lipoahrok kei nan sahpwo, pwe en kak ese ahnsou me karis en Mehn Leimen kan pahn kohdo.

29 Oh met, pwehki Moronai eh wehwehkier koasoandi en Mehn Leimen kan, oh ar koasoandi me iei en kamwomwala riarail kan, de kaloweiraildi pahn ar manaman oh kaliduwihirailla pwe re en kak wiakihla sahpwo pwon arail wehi.

30 Oh e pil wehwehki me ihte me Mehn Nihpai kan kin inengieng wia iei en doandoarete sapwarail kan, oh arail mour saledek, oh arail mwomwohdiso, eri e medewe me e sohte pahn wia dihp ma e pahn doadoahngki koasoandi en lidip kan pwe en doare irail; eri, e diarada sang nah lipoahrok kan wasa me Mehn Leimen ko pahn keid ie.

31 Eri, e ahpw katohrepeseng nah sounpei kan oh kahrehla ekei irail nan wahuo, oh karukihirailla ni palimese, oh palieir en dohl en Ripla;

32 Oh me luhwe ko e karukihala ni palikapi en wahuo, ni palikapi en pillap Saidon, oh kohdihla ni irepen sahpw en Mandai kan.

33 Oh pwehki e koasoanehdier nah sounpei kan nin duwen dahme e mwahuki, e onopadahr en tuhwong irail.

34 Kedekedeo Mehn Lemein ko ahpw kohdahdo ni paliepeng en dohlo, wasa me ekei nein Moronai sounpei ko wie rukuruk ie.

35 Oh ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen ko daulihdo dohl en Ripla, oh leledo nan wahuo, oh ni ar kotehdo pillap en Saidon, wasa me sounpei ko wie rukuruk ni palieir en dohlo, iei ohl me kaun pwihn wet mware Lihai. E kahluwahla nah sounpei kan oh kapilpene Mehn Leimen kan ni palimese sang ni tihnsewerail.

36 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen ko kilangada Mehn Nihpai ko ar wie kohkohdohng irail sang ni tihnsewerail, irail pirekek oh tepida peiong nein Lihai sounpei ko.

37 Oh aramas tepida kamakamala pali koaros, ahpw mehlahn Mehn Leimen kan doar mehlel, pwehki arail kilisou a sohte perehparail sang nein Mehn Nihpai kedlahs kan oh naipokos kan, me kin kahrehda ar kamakamkihla ni kereniong pal koaros.

38 A ekei pak mie me kin pwupwudi rehn Mehn Nihpai kan, sang ni ar palkihdi kedlahs oh keredi en nta laud, pwehki arail perehla wasa kesempwal ni paliwararail kan, de wasa me kesempwal ni paliwarerail kan re perehsang ehn Mehn Leimen ko arail pahn peleiraildi, sang ni arail mehn perehpen nan mwaremwararail kan, oh neirail mehn sansar kan, oh arail lisoarop mete kan; oh met kahrehda Mehn Nihpai kan kemehla Mehn Leimen kan.

39 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan masepwehkada, pwehki kamwomwala me wiawihong irail, lao re tepida sopohlahng ni pillap en Saidon.

40 Oh Lihai oh nah ohl akan pwakih irail; oh Lihai pwakihirailla nan pillap en Saidon, oh irail kotehla pillap en Saidon. Oh Lihai oh nah sounpei kan mihmihte ni keilen pillap Saidon pwe re en dehr kotehla.

41 Kedekedeo Moronai oh nah sounpei kan tuhwong Mehn Leimen ko nan wahuo, apali pillap en Saidon, oh tepida mahweniong irail oh kemeirailla.

42 Oh Mehn Leimen kan pwurehng tepida tangasang irail, kohlahng nan sahpw en Mandai; oh re pil tuhwong nein Moronai sounpei kan.

43 A met mehn Leimen ko peiki uwen ar kehlail koaros; ei, soangen pei kehlail oh kommwad mehlel wet sohte kin wiawi sang mahs kohdo, sangete ni tapio rehn Mehn Leimen ko.

44 Oh Mehn Soram kan oh Mehn Amelek kan me kamwakidada irail, Mehn Soram oh Amelek kan me wia arail sounkaweid oh kaunen sounpeikan, oh Saraemna, me wia arail kaunen sounpei, de arail kaun lapalap me kin katanga mwekid en sounpei; ei, re pei duwehte drahken kei, oh Mehn Nihpai tohto kamakamala pahrail, ei, pwe re pelepeseng arail lisoarop mete kan, oh re koapwoare ar mehn perehpen nan mwarmwararail kan, oh re pelehsang pehrail tohto; oh met Mehn Leimen ko peiki ar lingeringer mehlel.

45 Ahpw, dahme kin kamwakidada Mehn Nihpai kan me siksang mehlel dahme kin kamwakidada Mehn Leimen ko, pwe irail sohte pepeiki wehin nanmwariki de pil manaman ahpw irail pepeiki imwarail kan oh arail mour saledek, arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan, oh soahng koaros me arail, ei, arail pwuhng en kaudok oh arail mwomwohdiso.

46 Oh re kapwaiada dahme re wiahki me ar pwukoa me re anahne wia ong arail Koht; pwe Kauno ketin mahsanih ong irail oh pil ong arail pahpa kahlap ako, ketihtihki: Nin duwen amwail sohte pahn tapiada keieu en pingiping, de pil keriauo, kumwail sohte pahn mweidohng kumwail en kamakamala pahn amwail imwintihti kan.

47 Oh Kauno pil pwurehng mahsanih: Kumwail pahn doarehla amwail peneinei kan lao lel kakerehdi nta. Eri iei kahrepe wet me Mehn Nihpai kan kin pelianki Mehn Leimen kan, pwe re en doarehsang pein irail, oh arail peneinei kan, oh sapwarail kan, arail wehi, oh arail pwuhng kan, oh arail pelien lamalam.

48 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nein Moronai ohl akan kilangada en Mehn Leimen kan ar loallap oh lingeringer, irail masepwehkada kerenion oh tangasang irail. Oh Moronai, kasawiada arail pepehm, e ahpw kadarala kaweid pwukat oh kakehlakahki mohngiongarail kan—ei, re en medewe sapwarail akan, arail mour saledek, ei, arail saledek sang mour en lidu.

49 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pirekekiong Mehn Leimen ko, oh re wiahkiteieu lukwerkihong Kauno arail Koht, pwehki arail mour saledek oh arail saledek sang mour en lidu.

50 Oh sang ni manaman re ahpw tepida pelianki Mehn Leimen kan; oh ni ahnsowohte me irail lukwerkihong Kauno ong arail saledek, Mehn Leimen kan tepida tangasang mwohrail; oh irail tangdoaui ni pillap en Saidon.

51 Eri, Mehn Leimen ko tohtohsang irail, ei, pahn pak riau re tohtohkihsang Mehn Nihpai ko; ahpw, re pakahrla lao re kohpene wiahda pokon ehu nan wahuo, ni keilen pillap en Saidon.

52 Eri, nein Moronai sounpei kan kapilirailpene, ei, pali koaros en pillapo, pwe kilang, nein Lihai ohl akan mi palimese.

53 Eri ahnsou me Saraemna kilangada me nein Lihai ohl akan mi palimese en pillap Saidon, oh nein Moronai sounpei kan mi palikapi en pillap Saidon, me Mehn Nihpai kan kapilirailpenehr, irail pwonkilahr ar masepwehk.

54 Eri Moronai, ni e kilangadahr ar masepwehkada kowahlap, e ahpw ruwese nah ohl akan re en tokedihsang kakerehdi nta.
alma 44:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 44[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai ndaiong Mehn Leimen ko re en wiahda inou en popohl de ma soh re pahn kamakamala—Saraemna soikala eh pekipeko, oh mahweno ahpw doula—Nein Moronai sounpei ko kalowehdi Mehn Leimen ko. Ele Sounpar 74–73 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo irail ahpw uhdi oh ekis pweieksang irail. Oh Moronai ndaiong Saraemna: Kilang, Saraemna, se sohte men kamaramas. Kumwail ese me kumwail mihmi pahn at manaman, ahpw se sohte men kemeikumwailla.

2 Kilang, se sohte kohdohng mahweniong kumwail oh kakerehdi nta pwe se en ahneki manaman pohmwail; se sohte pil inengieng kaliduwih aramas. Ahpw iei ih met kahrepen ahmw kohkidohng kiht; ei, oh kumwail lingeringer paht pwehki at pelien lamalam.

3 Ahpw met, ke kilang me Kauno ieiang kiht; oh ke kilang me e ketin pangkumwaillahng pahn aht manaman. Oh met I men ke en wehwehki me met wiawihong kiht pwehki at pelien lamalam oh at pwoson Krais. Oh met ke kilang me ke sohte kak kauwehla at pwoson.

4 Eri ke kilang me iei met pwoson mehlel en Koht; ei, ke kilang me kupwuren Koht kin utung, oh kolokol, oh doarei kiht, ma se pahn kin loalopwoat ong ih, oh at pwoson, oh at pelien lamalam; oh Kauno sohte mwahn pahn mweidohng kiht se en kamwomwomwla ihte ma se pahn pwupwudiong nan dihp oh kahmahmkihla at pwoson.

5 Eri met, Saraemna, I ndaiong uhk, ni mwaren Koht me roson kowalahpie, me ketin kakehleikitada me kahrehda at kak kaloweikumwaildi, sang ni at pwoson, sang at pelian lamalam, oh sang ni at pwuhng en kaudok, oh sang aht mwomwohdiso, oh sang ni utuht sarawi me se pweipwandkihong aht pwoud kan oh nait seri kan, sang ni mour saledek me katengeikihtpene ong nan sapwat oh aht wehi; ei, oh pil sang ni nekinekid en mahsen sarawi en Koht, me iei kahrepen aht peren koaros; oh sang mehkoaros me keieu kesempwal ong kiht—

6 Ei, oh kaidehn ihte met; I ndaionguhk sang ni omw koapworopwor unsek en mourla, wahdohng kiht noumw dipwisou en mahwen kan, oh se solahr pahn kakerehdi ntahmwail, ahpw se pahn kapitkumwailla, ma kumwail pahn kohkohla oh sohte pwurehng kodohng mahweniong kiht.

7 Eri, ma ke sohte pahn wia met, kilang, kumwail lohdier paht, oh I pahn ruwese nei ohl akan re en mahweniong kumwail, oh kalokehkin kumwail mehla, pwe kumwail en kak sohrala; oh kitail ahpw pahn kilang ihs me pahn ahneki manaman pohn aramas pwukat; ei, kitail pahn kilang ihs me pahn mihla nan mouren lidu.

8 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Saraemna rongehr koasoi pwukat e ahpw wahdo nah kedlahs oh naipokos oh nah kesik ketieu oh kihong nan pehn Moronai, oh ndaiong ih: Kilang, iet nait dipwisou en mahwen kan; se pahn kihong kumwail, ahpw se sohte mwahn pahn wiahda inou ong kumwail, me se eseier me se pahn kauwehla, oh pil nait seri kan; ahpw ale nait dipwisou en mahwen kan, oh mweidohng kiht se en kohkohla nan sapwtehno; mah soh a se pahn kolokolete nait kedlahs kan, oh se pahn kamwomwala de kaloweikumwaildi.

9 Kilang, se sohte kamehlele amwail pwoson; se sohte kamehlele me Koht me ketin pangkitalahng pahn amwail manaman; ahpw se kamehlele me amwail widing me doareikumwail sang nait kedlahs kan. Kilang, iei amwail perehpen mwaremware kan oh noumwail mehn sansar kan me doareikumwailla.

10 Eri met ahnsou me Saraemna kaimwiseklahr koasoi pwukat, Moronai kapwurehiong Saraemna kedlahs oh dipwisou en mahwen kan me e ale, oh nda: Kilang, kitail pahn kaimwisekehla uhpene wet.

11 Met I sohte kak kapwurehsang dahme I ndahier, eri nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, kumwail sohte pahn mweselda ihte ma kumwail pahn kahukihla me kumwail sohte pahn pwurodohng mahweniong kiht. A pwehki amwail mihmi pahn at manamana se pahn kakerehdi ntahmwail nan pwehl, de kumwail pahn idawehn koasoandi me I kasaledahr.

12 Eri met ahnsou me Moronai koasoia mahsen pwukat, Saraemna ale nah kedlahso, oh e lingeringer pahn Moronai, oh e mwadangete tangalahng Moronai pwehn kemehla; ahpw ni ahnsou me e kihda nah kedlahs, kilang, emen nein Moronai sounpei ko pelehdiong kedlahso nan pwehlo, oh tupwasang mangileo; oh e pil rerehsang kilin moangen Saraeman oh e pwupwudi nan pwehlo. Oh Saraemna pweiekisang irail kohlongala nanpwungen nah sounpei ko.

13 Kedekedeo sounpeio me kesihnen karani mwo, me rerehsang kilin moangen Saraemna, kolada kilin piten moangeo sang nan pwehlo, oh kihong ni imwin nah kedlahso, oh kasalehiong irail, ndindahiong irail ni ngihl laud:

14 Pwe duwen kilin moahnget me pwupwudi nan pwehl, me wia kilin moangen amwail kaun, iei duwen kumwail pahn pil pwupwudi ihte ma kumwail pahn wahdo noumwail dipwisou en mahwen kan oh kohkohla ni amwail wiahda inou en popohl.

15 Met irail me tohto, ahnsou me re rongehr koasoi pwukat oh kilang kilin moangeo ni kedlahso, re masepwehkada; oh irail me tohto kohdo oh pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwen ko mwohn Moronai, oh wiahda inou en popohl. Oh irail koaros me wiahda inouo mweimweida pwe re en kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

16 Eri kedekedeo Saraemna uhdahn lingeringerda, oh e kamwakidada luhwen sounpei ko re en lingeringerda, a sang ni ar kehl koaros re peliankihda Mehn Nihpai kan.

17 Eri Moronai ahpw lingeringerda, pwehki en Mehn Leimen kan ar keptakai; eri e ruwesehki nah aramas akan pwe re en mahweniong irail oh kemeirailla. Kedekedeo irail ahpw tepida kemeirailla; ei, oh Mehn Leimen ko pelianki neirail kedlahs kan oh arail kehl.

18 Ahpw kilang, sohte perehpen paliwararail oh moangerail akan sang nein Mehn Nihpai kedlahs keng kan; ei, kilang irail dokdi oh paldi, ei, oh mwadang pwupwukihdi nein Mehn Nihpai kedlahs kan; oh re tepda pwupwudi, duwen me nein Moronai sounpeio kohpkidahr.

19 Eri ni ahnsou me Saraemna kilangada me irail koaros nektehn pahn kamakamala, e werikilahng Moronai oh inoukihong me ih oh nah aramas akan pahn wiahda inou ma re pahn mweidala irail me luhwe kan en mourla, oh me re sohte pahn pwurodohng mahweniong irail.

20 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw pwurehng katokehdi ar kemekemeirailla. Oh e ahpw kihsang nein Mehn Leimen dipwisou en mahwen kan; oh mwurin arail wiadahr inou en popohl ong ih re ahpw mweidohng irail en kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

21 Eri uwen tohtohn arail mehla kan, sohte me kak wadekedi pwehki uwen tohto ieu; ei, aramas ngedehrie sang rehn Mehn Nihpai ko oh pil Mehn Leimen ko mehla.

22 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kesehdiong paliwar en me mehla kan nan pihl en Saidon, oh re peila oh seridi wasa loal en nan kepin sehd.

23 Oh sounpei en Nihpai kan, de nein Moronai sounpei kan, pwurala ni imwarail akan oh sapwarail akan.

24 A met kaimwiseklahr kaeisek waluhn sounpahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan. Eri met kaimwiseklahr poadopoad en Alma, me ntingdi pohn pileit en Nihpai kan.
alma 45:
Duwen aramas en Nihpai kan, oh arail mahwen kan oh pingiping kan, nan mwehin Ilemen, nin duwen poadoapoad en Ilemen, me e ntingihda nan eh mwehi.

Audaudki iralaud 45 lel 62.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 45[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ilemen kamehlele mahsen en Alma kan—Alma kohpada duwen kamwomwomwlahn Mehn Nihpai kan—E kapaiada oh keriahla sahpwo—Mweinele Ngehno ketikihdahla Alma nanleng, duwehte Moses—Pingiping parpeseng nan mwomwohdiso. Ele Sounpar 73 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan peren kowahlap, pwehki Kauno ketin doareirailsangehr arail imwintihti kan; eri irail kapingkalahngan ong Kauno arail Koht; ei, oh irail kaisihsol oh kapakap laud, oh irail kaudokiong Koht sang ni peren kowahlapie.

2 Kedekedeo nan kaeisek duwaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Alma kohdo rehn nah pwutak Ilemen oh idek reh: Ke kamehlele dahme I ndaionguhkehr pid duwen poadopoad kan me wie nekinek?

3 Oh Ilemen sapeng patohwan: Ei, I kamehlele.

4 Oh Alma ahpw pwurehng nda: Ke kamehlele Sises Krais, me pahn ketido?

5 Oh e sapengki: Ei, I kamehlele mahsen kan koaros me ke koasoiadahr.

6 Oh Alma pwurehng ndahiong: Ke pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan?

7 Oh e patohwan sapeng: Ei, I pahn kapwaiada omw kosonned kan sang nan mohngiongi unsek.

8 Alma ahpw ndaiong: Meid pai kowe; oh Kauno en ketin kapaiaiuhkada nan sahpw wet.

9 Kilang, mie mehkot me I pahn kohpadahng uhk; ahpw ke sohte pahn mweseiseiki dahme I pahn kohpadahng uhk; ei, dahme I pahn kohpehng uhk sohte pahn kasansalada lao kokohp wet pweida; eri ntingihedi mahsen pwukat me I pahn nda.

10 Oh iet mahsen pwukat: Kilang, nin duwen ngehn en kaudiahl me mi rehi, I kasawiadahr me aramas pwukat, iei Mehn Nihpai kan, sounpar pahpwiki mwurin Sises Krais pahn ketin pwarohng irail, re pahn pwupwudiong nan soupwoson.

11 Ei, oh re ahpw pahn dehdehki mahwen kan oh soumwahu kan, ei, lehk oh kamaramas, iei lao aramas en Mehn Nihpa kan ahpw pahn sohrala—

12 Ei, oh met pahn wiawi pwehki arail pahn pwupwudiong nan soupwoson oh pwupwudiong nan wiewiahn rotorot kan, oh tiahk en nenek, oh soangen wiewia suwed kan koaros; ei, I ndaionguhk, me pwehki arail pahn wiahda dihp mehndahte arail marain lapalap oh loalokong, ei, I ndaionguhk, me sang rahno, iei mwohn dih kapahieu koaros pahn mehla, wiewia suwed kowahlap wet pahn leledo.

13 Oh ahnsou me rahn lapalapo pahn leledo, kilang, ahnsowo nektehn leledo me irail aramas en ahnsou wet, de kadaudok kan me iang wadawadohng aramas en Nihpai kan, pahn solahr iang wadawadohng aramas en Nihpai kan.

14 Ahpw mehmen me pahn luwehdi, oh sohte kamwomwomwla ni rahn lapalap oh kamasepwehko, re pahn iang wadawadohng Mehn Leimen ko, oh irail koaros pahn duweirailla ihte ekei me pahn kahdaniki tohnpadahk en Kauno; oh Mehn Leimen kan pahn pwakih irail lao re pahn sohrala. Oh met, pwehki wiewia suwed, me kokohp wet pahn pweikihda.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin Alma e mahsanihongehr Ilemen soahng pwukat, e kapaiada ih oh pil rie pwutak kan; oh e pil kapaiada sampah ong kamwahupen aramas me mour pwung kan.

16 Oh e ahpw nda: Kauno Koht ketin mahsaniher—Sahpwo pahn keriahla, ei, sahpw wet, ong wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros pahn kamwomwala ni ar pahn dipkihda ar wiewia me suwed; oh e pahn uhdahn wiawi nin duwen dahme I koasoia; pwe iei met keria oh kapai en Koht me pahn lelohng nan sahpwo, pwe Kauno sohte kin kupwurki kisin dihp en mweimweida.

17 Eri mwurin Alma eh koasoiahda mahsen pwukat e ahpw kapaiada mwomwohdiso, ei, koaros me pahn kehlail nan ar lamalam sang ahnsowo kohla.

18 Eri ni en Alma eh wiahier met e ahpw mweseldasang nan sahpw en Saraemla, ni mwomwen me e pahn kohlongala nan sahpw en Melek. Kedekedeo sohla ronge; duwen eh mehla de seridi se sohte ese duwe.

19 Kilang, ih met me se wehwehki duwen ih, me ih ohl poadidi men; oh koasoiepe kohseli nan mwomwohdiso me Ngehno me ketikihdahla nanleng, de Kauno me ketin sarepidi, duwehte Moses. Ahpw kilang, pwuhk sarawi mahsanih me Kauno pein ale Moses; oh se medewe me e ketin alehdahr Alma sang ni ngehno, eri, ih me se sohte eseki duwen eh mehla de duwen eh seridi.

20 Kedekedeo ni tepin pahr kaeisek duwaun mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Ilemen pwarala oh kalohki mahseno rehn aramas ako.

21 Pwe kilang, pwehki arail mahwen kan ong Mehn Leimen kan oh kisin uhpene kan oh pingiping kan me kin wiawi nanpwungen aramas ako, e kin kesempwal me mahsen en Koht pahn kin pwurehng kalohkihong irail, ei, oh me doadoahk en mwomwohdiso pwurehng koasoansoandi.

22 Eri, Ilemen oh rie kan pwurehng kohkohseli oh pwurehng koasoanehdi mwomwohdiso nan sahpwo, ei, nan kahnihmw koaros nan sahpwo me aramas en Nihpai kan sapwasapw ie. Kedekedeo irail ahpw idihada samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan nan sahpwo pwon, nan mwomwohdiso kan koaros.

23 Kedekedeo mwurin Ilemen oh rie ko idiadahr samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan ong nan mwomwodiso kan a mie pingiping ehu ahpw pwarada nanpwungarail, oh irail sohte men rong en Ileman oh rie ko arail kaweid kan;

24 Ahpw re pohnmwahsola, re mwohnkihte pein irail, pwehki arail inenen kepwehpwe; eri irail kepwehpwehla nan pein meserail kan, oh sohte men rong arail padahk kan pwehn momouriki mour pwung mwohn Koht.
alma 46:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 46[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amelekaia song en wiahla nanmwarki—Moronai kauwada pilaik en saledek—E kihpene aramas akan pwe re en doare arail pelien lamalam—Aramas pwoson mehlel kan kin adaniki Kristian—Luhwen kadaudok en Sosep pahn mourla—Amelekaia oh me kahngohdi kan sopohla nan sahpw en Nihpai—Irail akan me sohte pahn uhpalihki doadoahk en mour saledek pahn kamakamala. Ele Sounpar 73–72 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo koaros me sohte men rong en Ilemen oh rie kan ar kaweid kan kohpene pwe re en uhwong riarail ko.

2 A met kilang, re uhdahn lingeringer kowahlap, kahrehda re koasoanedier me re pahn kemeirailla.

3 Eri ohl me kakaun irail akan me lingeringerda pahn riarail akan, e wia ohl lapala oh kehlail men; oh ede iei Amelekaia.

4 Oh Amelekaia men wiahla nanmwarki men; oh aramas akan me lingeringer pil mwahuki me e pahn wiahla arail nanmwarki; oh pali moron en irail wia sounkopwung tikitik kei en nan sahpwo, oh re men kalaudehla arail manaman.

5 Oh re kin rong lokaiahn widing en Amelekaia, ma re pahn utungada ih oh koasoanehdi en wiahla arail nanmwarki, e pahn uhd kihong irail en wiahla kaun kei en aramas akan.

6 Eri irail idawehnlahr Amelekaia nan arail kahngohdi, mehndahte Ilemen oh rie kan ar kalokalohkihong irail, ei, mehndahte ar apwalih mwahu mwomwohdiso, pwe re wia samworo lapalap kei nan mwomwohdiso.

7 Oh tohto nan mwomwohdiso me kamehlele lokaiahn widing en Amelekaia, eri re pil kahngohdiong mwomwohdiso; oh met iei mwekid en aramas en Nihpai kan me uhdahn keper oh kamasepwehk, mehndahte arail pweida mehlel ni ar powehdi Mehn Leimen kan, oh peren mehlel me irail ahneki pwehki arail poadoandoarala sang nin limen Kauno.

8 Eri kitail kilangehr uwen aramas ar kin mwadang en manokehla Kauno arail Koht, ei, re kin mwadangete wiewia me suwed, oh idawehnla me suwedo.

9 Ei, oh kitail pil kilang wiewia suwed kowahlap me aramas suwed men kak kahrehiong aramas akan en wiahda.

10 Ei, Kitail kilang me Amelekaia, pwehki e wia aramas widing mwersuwed men oh wia ohl kadek koasoi en widing, kahrehda e kahluwahsangehr mohngiong en aramas tohto re en wia me suwed; ei, oh en song en kauwehla mwomwohdiso en Koht, oh kauwehla poahsoan en saledek me Koht ketikihong irail, de kapai me Koht ketikidohr pohn sahpwo pwehki me mour pwung kan.

11 Eri met kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai, me wia kaun lapalap en sounpei en Mehn Nihpai kan, rongadahr duwen ar kahngohdi, e uhdahn lingeringer pahn Amelekaia.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw tehrpeseng eh sekido; oh e ale kisin likou me teisang eh sekido, oh ntingihedi powe—Ong katamanpen atail Koht, atail pelien lamalam, oh mour saledek, oh atail popohl, atail pwoud kan, oh neitail serikan—oh e katengehdi ni imwin tuhke pwoat.

13 Oh e ahpw katengehdi ah lisoaropo, oh perehpen mwaremwareo, oh nah mehn sansaro, oh katengehdi tehtehn mahwen nin lukopeo; oh e ahpw wahda tuhkeo, me e katengehdiong eh likouo, (oh e kahdaneki pilaik en mour saledek) oh e ahpw itiekidi nan pwehlo, oh kapakap ong Koht ni ngidingid pwe en ketikihong rie ko kapai en mour saledek, erein aramas Kristian kan ar pahn mihmihte nan sahpwo—

14 Pwe iei met me irail akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht kin ekerki koaros me kamehlele Krais.

15 Oh koaros me iang mwomwohdiso kin loalopwoat; ei, irail koaros me kamehlele Krais ni mehlel pereniki alehda mwaren Krais, de Kristian me irail kin adaneki, pwehki arail kamehlele Krais me pahn ketido.

16 Eri, ahnsou wet, Moronai kapakap pwe doadoahk en mour en Kristian kan, oh saledek en nan sahpwo en kak pweida.

17 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e ngidingidkier eh kapakap ong Koht, e ahpw kahdaneki sahpw koaros me mi paleir en sahpw en Tehnla, ei, oh ni mehlel, sahpw koaros, me mi paliepeng oh palieir en adaneki—Sahpw pilipil ehu, oh sahpw en mour saledek.

18 Oh e ahpw patohwan: Mehlel Koht sohte pahn mweidohng kitail, me aramas kin kauwe pwehki atail alehda mwaren Krais, en tiatihdi oh kamwomwmwomwla, ihte ma kitail pahn pwupwukihdi dipatail kan.

19 Oh mwurin Moronai eh patohwan mahsen pwukat, e ahpw kohla rehn aramas akan, oh kauwada nan wehwe eh likou me e tehrasang ni eh likowo, pwe koaros en kak kilang nting me e ntingihedi pohn likou teio, oh e ahpw ngihl laudida, patohwan:

20 Kilang, mehmen me pahn lirohrohki oaralap en nting pwukat nan sahpw wet, a en patohdo sang ni roson lapalap en Kauno, oh inoukihda me re pahn lirohrohki arail pwuhng kan, oh arail pelien lamalam, pwe Kauno Koht en ketin kupwuramwahwih irail.

21 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Moronai kalohkier mahsen pwukat, kilang, aramas akan tangpene ni ar katengehdiong arail tehtehn mahwen nin lukoparail kan, oh tetehrasang arail likou kan pwe en wia kilel, de inou, me re sohte pahn manokehla Kauno arail Koht; eri, met wehwehki, ma re pahn kauwehla kosonned akan en Koht, de pwupwudi nan dihp, oh namenengki alehda mwaren Krais, Kauno pahn tehrirailpeseng duwehte arail tehrasang ar likou kan.

22 Met iei inouo me re wiahdahr, oh re kesehdi arail likou kan mwohn nehn Moronai, ndinda: Se inoukihong aht Koht, ma se pahn pwupwudi nan dihp, a se pahn kamwomwmwomwala, iei duwehte riat ko nan sahpw en paliepeng; ei, e kak ketin keseikitala mwohn nehn aht imwintihti kan, duwehte aht kesehdier aht likou kan mwohn nehmw kan pwe en tiatipeseng, ma se pahn pwupwudi nan dihp.

23 Moronai ahpw patohwanohng irail: Kilang, kitail wia luhwen kadaudok en Seikop; ei, kitail wia luhwen kadaudok en Sosep, me rie ko tehrpeseng eh sekido; ei, eri met kilang, kitail anahne kolokol kosonned akan en Koht, ma soh, a riatail kan pahn tehrpeseng atail likou kan, oh kitail pahn lekdekiong nan imweteng, de netila, de kamakamala.

24 Ei, kitail doarehla atail mour saledek nin duwen atail wia luhwen kadaudok en Sosep; ei, kitail tamataman mahsen kan en Seikop, mwohn eh kapilsalehdala, pwe kilang, e kilangada wasa kis me luhwehdi ni ehn Sosep sekido me mwamwahute oh sohte ohla. Oh e ahpw mahsanih—Nin duwen wasa me sohte ohla ni ehn nei pwutak likou wet, ih pil pahn mwomwen luhwen kadaudok en nei pwutak eh pahn poadoandoarala nin limen Koht, oh pein ih me pahn ketin aleirailda, oh me luhwehdi en kadaudok en Sosep kan pahn mwomwala, iei duwehte wasa me ohla kan ni eh likouo.

25 Eri kilang, me wet katoutouwihala ngeni; ahpw, ngeniet pereniki nei pwutaket, pwehki palien kadaudoke kan me Koht pahn ketin alehda.

26 Eri kilang, iei met duwen sapwellimen Seikop mahseno.

27 Eri mweinele luhwen kadaudoken en Sosep, me pahn mwomwala rasehng eh likouwo, iei irail akan me kahngohdiong kitail? Ei, oh kitail kakete kahngohdi ma kitail sohte pahn tengediong atail pwoson Krais.

28 Eri kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai patohwan mahsen pwukat e ahpw kohwei, oh pil kadarpeseng wasa koaros nin sahpwo ong towe me kahngohdi kan, oh kapokonepene irail koaros me men lirohrohki arail mour saledek, en pelianda Amelekaia oh irail koaros me kahngohdi kan, me kahdaneki Mehn Amelek.

29 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Amelekaia dehdehki me nein Moronai aramas akan tohtohsang Mehn Amelek kan—oh pwehki e pil kilang me nah aramas akan peikasalki duwen pwuhng en mwekid me re tapiada—eri, pwehki eh perki me ar mwekido de pweida, e ahpw kahrehiong nah aramas ako me men iangih kohkolahng nan sahpw en Nihpai.

30 Met Moronai medewehda me e sohte mwahu ma Mehn Leimen ko pahn wie kehkehlailla; eri e medewehda en sopukala nein Amelekaia aramas akan, de koliraildi oh kapwureiraildo, oh kemehla Amelekaia; ei, pwehki e wehwehki me Amelekaia pahn kamwakidada Mehn Leimen kan pwe re en lingeringer pahrail, oh kahrehiong ar pahn kohdo mahweniong irail; oh e wehwehkier me Amelekaia pahn wia met pwe en kak kapwaiada eh koasoandi kan.

31 Eri Moronai medemedewe e pahn mwahu ma e pahn kahrehiong nah sounpei kan, me pokonpenehr, oh kalikawihkinirailda ar tehtehn mahwen kan, oh inoukidahr en doandoare meleilei—kedekedeo e ahpw kahrehda nah sounpei ko oh wahda arail impwal kan karis kohla nan sapwtehno, pwe irail en sopukala Amelekaia wasa me re keid ie nan sapwtehno.

32 Kedekedeo e ahpw wiahier nin duwen ah pepehm kan, oh karis kohla nan sapwtehno, oh nantihong en sopukala nein Amelekaia sounpei kan.

33 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw sopohla iangahki ekei nah ohl ako, oh irail me luhwehdi kolkoldi oh wisikdohng pahn manaman en Moronai oh kopwurupwurla nan sahpw en Saraemla.

34 Eri, pwehki sounkopwung lapalap kan idiadahr Moronai oh e pilipiladahr rehn aramas akan, eri e ahneki manaman en kamwakid sounpei en Nihpai kan nin duwen nsene, pwe en kak ahneki manaman en koasoanehdi oh kaun irail.

35 Kedekedeo mehn Amelek kan me sohte pahn inoukihda me re pahn utungada doadoahk en mour saledek, pwe irail en kak kolokolete kopworment me saledek, e pahn kamakamala; oh irail me kasohwe inou en saledeko me malaulau.

36 Kedekedeo e ahpw pil koasoanehdi me pilaik en oaralap en mour saledeko pahn epida pohn wasahn doulik koaros me mi nan sahpwo, me Mehn Nihpai kan sapwahneki; oh met Moronai poadokedier koasoandi en mour saledeko rehn Mehn Nihpai kan.

37 Oh irail tepida pwurehng ahneki popohl nan sahpwo; oh met irail kolokolete popohl nan sahpwo lao ni imwin keisek duwaun sounpahr en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

38 Oh Ilemen oh samworo lapalap kan pil kolokolete koasoandi mwahu nan mwomwohdiso; ei, nan erein sounpar pahieu re ahneki popohl laud oh pereperen nan mwomwohdiso.

39 Kedekedeo irail tohto me mehlahr, ni arail tengediong ar kamehlele me Kauno Sises Krais ketin doarelahr ngenirail kan; eri irail mweseldahsangehr pohn sampah ni ar pereperen.

40 Oh mie ekei me mehkihla soumwahu karakar, me kin kalapw wiawi nan sahpwo nan ekei ahnsou nan ehu pahr—ahpw re sohte kin kalapw mehkihla soumwahu karakar, pwehki tohtohn tuhke kan oh kalowe kan me inenen kaselel mehlel me Koht ketin kaunopadahr pwe en kak kamwahuwihala soumwahu kan, me aramas akan kin iangada pwehki iren ahnsou—

41 Ahpw tohto me mehla ni ar mahlahr; oh duwen me kitail pahn medemedewe, irail akan me mehla ni ar pwoson Krais ahneki peren reh.
alma 47:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 47[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amelekaia doadoahngki koasoandi en mwersuwed, kamaramas, oh likamw pwe en kak wiahla nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan—Mehn Nihpai me kahngohdi kan kin mour suwed oh keper sang Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 72 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kitail pahn pwuralahng nan neitail poadopoad en Amelekaia oh irail akan me iang ih sopohla nan sapwtehno; pwe, kilang, e kahrehiong irail akan me iang ih, oh kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai rehn Mehn Leimen kan, oh kamwakidadahr Mehn Leimen kan pwe re en lingeringerda pahn aramas en Nihpai kan, kahrehda nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan kadarpesengehr kalohk ehu nan sahpwo pwon, nanpwungen sapwellime aramas koaros, pwe irail en pwurehng pokonpene pwe re en kohla mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

2 Kedekedeo ahnsou me kalohko lelpesengehr nanpwungarail, re uhdahn masepwehk mehlel; ei, irail masak kansensuwedi nanmwarkio, oh re pil masak kohla mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan pwe re de mehla. Kedekedeo irail koasoanehdi me irail sohte pahn iang, de pali laud en irail sohte men iang, peikiong sapwellimen nanmwarkio poahngoko.

3 Eri met kedekedeo nanmwarkio ahpw engiengkihda arail sapeik; eri e ahpw ketin mweidohng Amelekaia en kaunda sapwellime sounpei teiko me peikiong sapwellime poahngok, oh mahseniong ih en kohla oh idingohng irail en doadoahngki neirail dipwisou en mahwen.

4 Eri kilang, met iei dahme Amelekaia mwahuki; pwehki eh wia ohl me kadek doadoahk en mwersuwed eri e koasoanehdier nan eh mohngiong me e pahn kasapwildi nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen ko.

5 Oh met e alehier pwukoan kaunda Mehn Leimen kan me uhpalihki nanmwarkio; oh e nantiheng kenikenla rehn irail me sapeik ko; eri e kohla wasa me re kahdaniki Onaida, pwe iei wasao me Mehn Leimen kan koaros tangala ie; pwe re diarada me sounpei ko kohkohdo, oh, irail wiahki me re pahn kohdohng kemeirailla, eri irail tangala Onaida, wasahn dipwisou en mwahwen.

6 Oh re idihada emen ohl me pahn wia arail nanmwarki oh arail kaun, pwehki arail ngoangkier koasoandi ehu me re sohte pahn idihdiong kohla peiong Mehn Nihpai kan.

7 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pokonpenehr pohn kumwukumw en nahna ehu me kahdaniki Andipas, pwe irail en kaunopadahng mahwen.

8 Eri Amelekaia sohte men mahweniong irail nin duwen sapwellimen nanmwarikio poahngoko; ahpw dahme e men wia iei e men kenikenla rehn sounpei en Mehn Leimen ko, pwe en kak wiahla arail kaun oh kasapwilidihsang nanmwarkio nan dewe oh kaunda wehio.

9 Oh kilang, kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong nah sounpei ko re en kauwada imwarail impwal kan nan wahu me karanih nahna Andipas.

10 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me wasa pwongier e ahpw kadaradahla meninkeder pohn nahna Andipas ni rir, oh e mwahuki kaun en irail ako me mih pohn nahnao, me adaniki Liondai, en kohdihdo nin tepin nahnao, pwe e men tuhwong ih.

11 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Liondai alehdi rohng wet e sohte men kohdihla nin tepin nahnao. Kedekedeo Amelekaia pwurehng ileklahng reh keriapak, oh peki reh en kohdihdo. Kedekedeo Liondai sohte men wia; oh e pwurehng ileklahng reh kesilipak.

12 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Amelekaia diarada me e sohte kak kahrehiong Liondai en kohdido sang pohn nahnao, e ahpw kohdahla ni nahnao, karanih en Liondai kahnihmpwalo; oh e pwurehng kadarala ah pekipeko rehn Lihondai, oh peki en kohdihdo, oh kahre nah soun silasil kan.

13 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Liondai iangahki nah soun silasil kan kohdihdo rehn Amelekaia, a Amelekaia peki reh ma e kak kahrehdihdo nah sounpei kan nihpwong, oh kapilpene ohl akan nan kahnimpwalo me nanmwarkio ketkihong en kaunda, oh e pahn mweidohng irail pahn manaman en Liondai, ma e pahn kak wiahiong ih (Amelekaia) en wia keriau en kaun en sounpei ko pwon.

14 Kedekedeo Liondai iangahki nah ohl akan ahpw kohdihdo oh kapilpene nein Amelekaia ohl akan, pwe mwohn arail pahn pirida madahn rahno nein Liondai sounpei kan kapilirailpenehr.

15 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail tehkadahr me re kapiliraildier, re ahpw peki rehn Amelekaia en mweidohng irail en iangala riarail ko, pwe re en dehr kamwomwala. Eri ih met me Amelekaia mwahuki en wiawi.

16 Kedekedeo e ahpw mweidala nah ohl akan, ni eh uhwong sapwellimen nanmwarikio poahngok. Ih met me Amelekaia men en wiawi, pwe en kak kapwaiada eh koasoandi en kasapwildi nanmwarkio.

17 Eri nan ehn Mehn Leimen kan tiahk, ma arail kaun lapalap kin mehla, a re kin idihada keriau en kauno en uhd wiahla arail kaun lapalap.

18 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ndaiong emen nah ladu ko en kihong pwoisin ekis ekis rehn Liondai, e lao mehla.

19 Eri, ni ahnsou me Lihondai mehla, Mehn Leimen kan idihada Amelekaia en uhd kaunirailda oh wiahla arail kaun en sounpei.

20 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw kahluwa nah sounpei kan (pwehki dahme e mwahuki pweidahr) oh karis kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai, kohla nan kahnihmw en Nihpai, me wia kahnimw lapalap.

21 Oh nanmwarkio iangahki silepe ko ahpw kohieido pwe en tuhwong ih, pwe e medewe me Amelekaia kapwaiadahr sapwellime poahngoko, oh me Amelekaia kihpenehier lapalahn karis en sounpei ehu pwe re en kohlahng peiong Mehn Nihpai kan.

22 Ahpw kilang, ni ahnsou me nanmwarkio ketieido pwe en tuhwong ih, Amelekaia ndaiong nah ladu ko re en kohla oh tuhwong nanmwarkio. Irail ahpw kohla oh poaridi mwohn nanmwarkio, ni ar mwomwehda wauneki pwehki eh lapalap.

23 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nanmwarkio ketin kapahla limeo pwe en kasihnenihirailda, nin duwen tiahk en Mehn Leimen kan, me wia kilel en popohl, me wia tiahk me irail alasang Mehn Nihpai kan.

24 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e ketin kasihnenihada me tihengo sang nan pwehlo, kilang e ahpw doakoahdi mohngiong en nanmwarkio; oh e ahpw pwupwudi nan pwehlo.

25 Eri sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu ko tang; a nein Amelekaia ladu ko ahpw werikihla, ndinda:

26 Kilang, sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu ko doakoahdi mohngiongeo, oh e melahr oh irail tangdoaui; kilang, kumwail kohdo oh tehk.

27 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw ruwesehki nah sounpei kan irail en kohla oh tehk dahme wiawihong nanmwarkio; oh ahnsou me irail kohla wasao, oh diarada me nanmwarkio wonohn nan ntah, Amelekaia ahpw mwomwehda me e lingeringer, oh nda: Mehmen me poakepoake nanmwarkio, en kohla, oh pwakihala sapwellime ladu ko pwe re en kamakamala.

28 Kedekedeo irail koaros me poakepoake nanmwarkio, ahnsou me irail rongada koasoi pwukat, irail ahpw kohla oh pwakih sapwellimen nanmwarkio ladu ko.

29 Eri ni ahnsou me sapwellimen nanmwarikio ladu ko kilangadahr sounpei kan pwakpwakih irail, re pwurehng masepwehkada, oh sopolahng nan sapwtehno, oh lellahng sahpw en Saraemla oh iangala nein Amon aramas akan.

30 Oh sounpei kan me pwakih irail pwurala, mwurin arail pwakiher irail ni soh katepe; a met sang ni ehn Amelekaia mwersuwed aramas akan koapworopworkilahr.

31 Kedekedeo mandahsang rahno e ahpw pidelong nan kahnimw en Nihpai iangahki nah sounpei ko, oh kaunda kahnihmwo.

32 Eri likendo, ni ahnsou me e rongada me nanmwarkio kamakamala—pwe Amelekaia kadarala pakair ehu rehn likendo kawehwehiong me sapwellimen mwohnsapwoko ladu ko kemehla, oh me nah sounpei kan pwaki irail, ahpw sohte koliraidi, oh irail pitila—

33 Eri, ahnsou me likendo rong mepwukat e ahpw ilekla rehn Amelekaia, oh peki re en kupwurehla aramas en kahnihmwo; oh e pil peki ma e kak kohdo reh; oh e pil peki ma e kak wahdo soun kadehde kei pwe re en kadehdehda duwen pwoulahn mwohnsapwoko.

34 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw kahrehda laduohte me kemehla nanmwarkio, oh irail koaros me iang ih, oh patohla rehn likendo, wasa me e kin ketiket ie; oh irail koaros kadehdehiong ih me nanmwarkio kamakamala rehn pein sapwellime ladu kan; oh re pil patohwan: Irail tangehrdoaui; met sou kadeikiraildahr? Oh met irail kamehlelehiongehr likendo duwen pwoulahn nanmwarkio.

35 Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw nantihong en kenikenla rehn likendo, oh alehda en wiahla eh pwoud; oh met sang ni eh widing, oh sang ni sawas en nah ladu mwerisuwed kan, e alehdier wehio; ei, e wiahlahr nanmwarki en sahpwo pwon, aramas en Mehn Leimen pwon, me wiawihkihda Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Lemuel kan oh Mehn Ismael kan, oh Mehn Nihpai koaros me kahngohdi kan, sangete mwehin Nihpai kohdo lel ansou wet.

36 Eri irail pwukat me kahngohdi, alehier kaweid oh padahk duwehte Mehn Nihpai kan, ei, irail alehier kaweid ni wiepen kamarain en Kauno, ahpw, me kapwuriamwei, e sohte kin werei mwurinte arail kin kahngohdi irail ahpw kin keptakaila oh kekeluwakala, oh re inenen ketihwo, suwed mehlel oh kamasepwehk sang Mehn Leimen ko—me rasohng irail niminimala tiahk en Mehn Leimen kan; re wialahr aramas pohnkahke kei, oh aramas me direki soangen mour suwed koaros; ei, re uhdahn manokehla mehlel Kauno arail Koht.
alma 48:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 48[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amelekaia kamwarongehda Mehn Leimen kan en uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan—Moronai kaunopada nah aramas akan pwe re en doare doadoahk en aramas Kristian kan—E kin perenki mour saledek oh mour maiau oh e wia ohlen Koht kehlail men. Ele Sounpar 72 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo, mwurinte Amelekaia eh alehdier wehio, e ahpw tepida kamwakid mohngiong en Mehn Leimen kan en uhwong aramas en Nihpai kan; ei, e idihada aramas akan me pahn kin koasoiong Mehn Leimen kan sang pohn arail wasahn doulik kan, oh uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan.

2 Oh met e kamwakidadahr mohngiongirail kan en uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan, kahrehda ni imwin keisek duwaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan, eh koasoandi suwed kan pweidahr, ei, e wialahr nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan, oh e pil songosong en kaunda sahpw koaros, ei, aramas koaros me mi nan sahpwo, Mehn Nihpai kan oh pil Mehn Leimen kan.

3 Eri e kapwaiada eh koasoandio, pwe e kahrehiong mohngiong en Mehn Leimen kan en keptakaila oh e karotongeirailla, oh kamwakidada nan kapehdirail kan en lingeringerda, lao e kapokonepenehr pokon kalaimwun ehu pwe re en kohla mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

4 Pwehki uwen tohtohn nah aramas akan, e koasoakoasoane en kalowehdi Mehn Nihpai kan oh kaliduweirailla.

5 Oh met e idiadahr Mehn Soram kan en wia kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, pwehki irail me keieun wehwehki kehlail en Mehn Nihpai kan, oh wasahn arail rukula kan, oh wasa me keieu luwet nan arail kahnihmw kan; eri e idihiraildahr en wia kaun lapalap en nah karis en sounpei kan.

6 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kahrehda neirail sounpei kan, oh karis kohla nan sapwtehno kohlahng nan sahpw en Saraemla.

7 Eri kedekedeo nindokon Amelekaia wie kalakalaudehla eh manaman sang ni widing oh mwersuwed, a Moronai, e wie kaukaunopada lamalam en aramas akan en loalopwoat ong Kauno arail Koht.

8 Ei, e wie kakehlakahla karis en Mehn Nihpai kan, oh kaukauwada kehl tikitik kei, de wasa me re kak rukula ie; re koasoakehda pwehl pwe en kapilpene nah karis en sounpei kan, oh pil wiewiahda kehl takai pwe en kapilirailpene, kapilpene arail kahnihmw kan oh irepen sapwarail kan; ei, kapilpene sahpwo pwon.

9 Oh arail kehl me keieu luwet kan e kin kihong pali laud en nah ohl akan; oh met e wiahda kehl kehlail oh kakehlakahla sahpwo me Mehn Nihpai kan sapweniki.

10 Oh met e wie kaukaunop pwe en utung arail mour saledek, sapwarail kan, arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, oh arail popohl, oh irail en kin momour pwehki Kauno arail Koht, oh pwe re en kak dadaurete soangen doadoahko me arail imwintihti kan kin nda doadoahk en aramas Kristian.

11 Oh Moronai wia ohl roson oh kehlail men; e wia ohl me audaudki kupwurokong unsek; ei, ohl emen me sohte pereniki kamaramas; ohl men me palingene kin perenki mour saledek oh mour maiau, oh saledek en rie kan sang pahn kehnaudek oh mour en lidu;

12 Ei, ohl me eh mohngiong kin direkihla kalahngan ong eh Koht, pwehki pai oh kupwuramwahu tohto me e ketikihong sapwellime aramas akan; ohl me kin doadoahk laud mehlel ong ni kamwahupen nah aramas akan oh pereparail.

13 Ei, oh ih ohl emen me tengeteng nan eh pwoson Krais, oh e kahukilahr me e pahn doare nah aramas akan, eh pwung kan, oh eh wehi, oh pil eh pelien lamalam, mehndahte ma pein ntah kerkihla.

14 Met Mehn Nihpai kan alehdier kaweid me re pahn pein doareirailsang ar imwintihti kan, oh ma mie anahnepen kakerehdi nta, ihme re pahn wia; ei, re pil alehdi kaweid me re sohte mwahn pahn tapihada mahwen, ei, dehr ngapkihda kedlahs ihte ma re pahn pelian ar imwintihti, oh ihte ma e pahn doarehla pein arail mour kan.

15 Oh met iei arail pwoson, ma re pahn wia met Koht pahn kapaiairailda nan sahpwo, eri met wehwehki, ma re pahn loalopwoatohng kapwaiada kosonned en Koht akan e pahn ketin kapaiairailda nan sahpwo; ei, e pahn ketin kaparkin irail ma re anahne sopohla, de kaunopada ong mahwen, nin duwen keperpen arail kahpwal;

16 Oh pil, me Koht pahn ketin kasalehiong irail wasa re pahn kohla ie pwe re en kak pein doare irail sang arail imwintihti kan, oh sang ar pahn wia met, Kauno kin ketin doareirailla; oh iei met en Moronai pwoson, oh e kin perenki nan eh mohngiong; kaidehn kakerehdi nta ahpw wiewia mwahu, pwe en doandoare nah aramas akan, ei, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, ei, oh liksang wiewia suwed kan.

17 Ei, mehlel, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, ma aramas koaros sangete mahs kohdo, oh sang met kohla, pahn duwehte Moronai, kilang, manaman en ehl pahn rerrada kohkohlahte; ei, mohngiong en aramas akan sohte pahn mi pahn manaman en tepilo.

18 Kilang, ih ohl emen me duwehte Amon, sapwellimen Mosaia pwutako, iei, oh pil sapwellimen Mosaia pwutak teiko, ei, oh pil Alma oh pil nah pwutak ko, pwe irail koaros ohl en Koht kei.

19 Eri kilang, Ileman oh rie ko pil wiewia doadoahk katapan duwehte Moronai; pwe re kalohki mahsen en Koht, oh re papidaisihala aramas koaros me koluhla oh men rong arail padahk kan.

20 Oh met re kohwei, oh aramas akan karakarahkala pwehki ar padahk kan, kahrehda irail kenikenla mehlel rehn Kauno, iei, erein sounpar pahieu re piseksang mahwen oh pingiping kan nanpwungarail.

21 Ahpw, nin duwen ei koasoiaier, ni imwin kaeisek duwaun sounpar, ei, mehndahte ar ahneki popohl nanpwungarail, re idihdiong pelian riarail, Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw ni ar sohte inangih.

22 Ei, oh ni mehlel, arail mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan sohte uhdi erein sounpar tohto, mehndahte ar sohte inangih.

23 Eri, irail pahtoukihla ar pahn mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki irail sohte perenki kakerehdi nta; ei, oh kaidehn ihte met—irail pil pahtouhla pwehki irail me kahrehda me riarail tohto kohkohsang pohn sampah wet kohlahng nan sampah soutuko, ni ar sohte onopadahng tuhwong ar Koht.

24 Ahpw, irail sohte kak mweidala arail mour kan, pwehki arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan pahn kamakamala ni tiahk suwed pahn irail akan me wia kisehrail mahs, ei, oh kahngohdiong arail mwomwohdiso, oh kohkohsang irail oh kohlahng kamwomwirailla sang ni ar iangala Mehn Leimen ko.

25 Ei, re sohte kakohng riarail ko en perenki kakerehdi ntahn Mehn Nihpai kan ma miehte aramas akan me kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, pwe Kauno ketin inoukidahr ma re pahn kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan re pahn pweida nan sahpwo.
alma 49:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 49[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen kan me kodohn mahwen sohte kak kalowehdi kahnihmw kehlail en Amonaia oh Noha—Amelekaia lahlahwe Koht oh kahukihla me e pahn nim ntahn Moronai—Ilemen oh rie ko usehla kakehlakahda Mwomwohdiso. Ele Sounpar 72 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni keisek ehu en sounpwong en nan keisek duwau en pahro, nan rahn keisek en sounpwungo karis en Mehn Leimen ko dierekda me re kohkohdohng sahpw en Amonaia.

2 A kilang, kahnimwo onohnsapahlda, oh Moronai kihdihong ni irepen kahnimwo karis en sounpei ehu, oh re koasoakehda pwehl kapilpene kahnihmwo pwe en pere irail sang nein Mehn Leimen arep kan oh takai kan, pwe kilang, re kin peiki takai oh arep.

3 Kilang, I nda me kahnimw en Amonaia onohnsapahlda. Ei, I ndaiong kumwail, me ekei wasa me onohnda sapahl; oh pwehki Mehn Leimen kan kauwelahr wasao mwoweo pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas oko, re medewe me wasou pahn mengei ong irail en pwurehng kauwehla.

4 Ahpw kilang, ia uwen ar nsensuwedla mehlel; pwe kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan koasoakehda uluhl en pwehl kapilpene wasa re mi ie, pwehki eh inenen ileile kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan sohte kak katehkiniraildi neirail takai kan oh neirail arep kan, oh re pil sohte kak kohdohng irail ihte ni ewen kehlo.

5 Eri ahnsou wet, kaun lapalap en sounpei en Mehn Leimen ko pwuriamwei mehlel, pwehki loalokong en Mehn Nihpai kan ni ar kaunopada arail wasahn rukula kan.

6 Eri kaun en Mehn Leimen ko medewe, pwehki arail pokon kalaimwun, ei, re medewe me re pahn kak wiahiong irail duwehte mwoweo; ei, oh re pil pein kaunopada neirail mehn sansar akan, oh iangahki perehpen mweremarerail kan; oh re pil likawih kilin mahn kan, ei, likou mosul kan pwe en perehla ar kilisou.

7 Oh pwehki arail onopadahr re medewe me e pahn mengei ong irail en kalowehdi riarail ko oh kaliduwihirailla, de kamaramas oh kemeirailla nin duwen nsenarail.

8 Ahpw kilang, re uhdahn pwuriamweikihla, ar kaunopadahng irail, ni wiepe me sohte kin wiawi rehn kadaudoken Lihai kan. Eri re onopadahr ong Mehn Leimen ko, pwe re en mahwen ni wiepe me Moronai padahkiong irail.

9 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen ko, de Mehn Amelekaia ko, pwuriamweikihla mehlel wiepen ar kaunopadahng mahwen.

10 Eri met, ma nanmwarki Amelekaia ketdihdo sang nan sahpw en Nihpai, oh tiengla mwohn sapwellime karis en sounpei kan, mwein ele e pahn kak kahrehiong Mehn Leimen kan re en tapiada mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan ni kahnimw en Amonaia; pwe kilang, e sohte katapaniki ma sapwellime aramas akan pahn kamakamala.

11 Ahpw kilang, Amelekaia sohte iang ketdihdo mahwen. Oh kilang, sapwellime kaun lapalap en sounpei kan sohte men tapiada mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan nan kahnimw en Amonaia, pwe Moronai wekidala wiepen katanga koasoandi en Mehn Nihpai kan, met kahrehda Mehn Leimen ko nsensuwedkihla ar pweiekla sang wasao oh re sohte kak kohdohng irail.

12 Eri, re ahpw pwurala nan sapwtehno, oh kahrehda neirail sounpei ko oh karis kohlahng sahpw en Noha, ni ar medemedewe me wasao pahn keieu mwahu ong irail en mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

13 Pwe re sohte ese me Moronai pil kakehlakahda, de kauwadahr kelen wasahn rukula kei, ong kahnimw koaros nan sahpwo pwon; eri, ni ngoang mehlel re karikaris kohla nan sahpw en Noha; ei, ar kaun lapalap en sounpei kan kohdo mwohrail oh re kahukihla me re uhdahn pahn kamwomwala aramas en kahnimwo.

14 Ahpw kilang, irail pwuriamweikihla, pwe kahnimw en Noha, me wia wasa luwet ehu mwoweo, ahpw met, sang ni wiepen koasoandien Moronai, e kehlaillahr, iei, kehlailsang kahnimw en Amonaia.

15 Oh met, kilang, doadoahk loalokong ehu me Moronai wia; pwe e medewe me re pahn masepwehkada ni kahnimw en Amonaia; oh pwehki kahnimw en Noha me keieu luwet nan sahpwo, eri irail pahn kohla pwe re en mahweniong; oh met iei duwen me e mwahuki en wiawi.

16 Oh kilang, Moronai idihada Lihai en wia kaun lapalap en sounpei en e kahnimwo; oh iei ih Lihai me mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan nan wahuo ni palimesen pillap Saidon.

17 Eri met kilang, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan diarada me Lihai me kaunda kahnimwo re pwurehng nsensuwedla, pwe re masak kowahlap Lihai; ahpw arail kaun lapalap en sounpei kan kahukilahr me re pahn mahweniong kahnihmwo; eri, re wahdo neirail karis en sounpei kan.

18 Met kilang, Mehn Leimen ko sohte kak pidelong ni arail kelen wasahn rukula kan ihte ni ewen kehlo, pwehki ilehn wasa me re koasoakehda pwehl, oh loal en warawar me re weirada kapilpene, ihte ni ewen kehlo me re kak pidelong.

19 Oh met Mehn Nihpai kan kaunopadahr en kamwomwala koaros me pahn song en douda pwe re en pidelong nan arail kehlo ni ehu wiepe, sang ni arail pahn katehkinirail takai oh kaskihkin irail neirail arep kan.

20 Eri irail onopadahr, ei, neirail pwihn en ohl kehlail kan, iangahki neirail kedlahs oh neirail pahi kan, pwe re en poakiedi koaros me pahn song en pidelong nan arail wasahn rukula kan sang ni ewen kehlo; eri met me irail kaunopadahr pwe irail en doareirailsang Mehn Leimen ko.

21 Kedekedeo nein Mehn Leimen kaun en sounpei kan ahpw wahdohng neirail karis en sounpei kan mwohn ewen kehlo, oh tepida pelian Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re en kak pidelong nan arail wasahn rukula kan; ahpw kilang, re kin kapweiekla nan ehu ehu ansou, lao irail kamakamkihla kamakam laud ehu.

22 Met kilang re diarada me re sohte kak powehdi Mehn Nihpai kan ni ewen kehlo, re ahpw tepida song en karengehdi koasoakoasoak en pwehlo pwe re en kak wiahda ahl me neirail sounpei kan pahn pidelong, pwe re en kak pei pahrek; ahpw kilang, ni arail kin songosong en wia met re kin kamakamkihla ar kostakaidi oh arep kan me kin lel irail; oh re sohte kak audehkihda warawaro pwehlo, ahpw e audaudkihda paliweren ar mehla kan oh me ohla kan.

23 Met Mehn Nihpai kan ahneki manaman koaros pohn arail imwintihti kan; oh met Mehn Leimen kan song en kauwehla Mehn Nihpai kan lao arail kaun lapalap en sounpei kan koaros kamakamala; ei, aramas kid samwa rehn Mehn Leimen kan kamakamala; ahpw, sohte emen Mehn Nihpai ko me iang mehla.

24 Me limehk me ohla, me nein Mehn Leimen ko arep kan lel irail ni ewen kehlo, ahpw re silasilkihdi neirail mehn sansar kan, oh perehpen mwaremararail kan, oh arail lisoarop kan, kahrehda arail ohla kan mi ni nehrail kan, a palilaud en ar ohla ko me ohla laud.

25 Kedekedeo, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr me arail kaun lapalap en sounpei koaros kamakamalahr re tangdoaui pwurala nan sapwtehno. Kedekedeo irail pwurala nan sahpw en Nihpai, pwe re en kehsehkihong arail nanmwarkio, Amelekaia, me wia Mehn Nihpai men ni eh ipwidi, duwen arail sohte pweida.

26 Kedekedeo e ahpw engiengida kowahlap pahn nah aramas akan, pwehki dahme e kupwurki en wiahiong Mehn Nihpai kan sohte pweida; e sohte kaloweiraildi pahn mour en lidu.

27 Ei, e engiengda kowahlap, oh e lahlahwe Koht, oh pil Moronai, oh e kahukihla me e pahn nim ntahn Moronai; oh met pwehki Moronai kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan ni eh kin kaukaunopada silepen nah aramas akan.

28 Kedekedeo, ahpw aramas en Nihpai kan kapingkihong Kauno arail Koht, pwehki sapwellime manaman kowahlap me kin doareirailsang ar imwintihti kan.

29 Oh met kaimwiseklahr kaeisek duwaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

30 Ei, oh re ahneki popohl erein ahnsowo, oh nan mwomwohdiso inenen pweida mehlel pwehki arail kin rong oh loalopwoatohng mahsen en Koht, me Ilemen, oh Siplon, oh Korianton, oh Amon oh rie ko kalohkiong irail, ei, oh irail koaros me kasarawihong nan koasoandi sarawi en Koht, papidaisla sang ni koluhla, oh re pekederala pwe re en kalohkiong aramas akan.
alma 50:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 50[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai wiahda kehl kehlail nan sahpw en Mehn Nihpai kan—Irail kauwada kahnihmw tohto—Mahwen kan oh kamwomwomwla kan wiawihong Mehn Nihpai kan ni ahnsoun ar wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan—Dienkomw kalowehdi Morianton oh nah aramas me kahngohdi kan—Nihpaia mehla, oh nah pwutak Paoran me uhd wiliandi wiahla sounkopwungo. Ele Sounpar 72–67 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo Moronai sohte kommoal sang eh kaunopadahng mahwen, de sinsile nah aramas akan sang Mehn Leimen ko; pwe e koasoanediong nah sounpei ko, irail en tapiada ni tepin kerieisek en sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan, re en tepida koasoakehda pwehl pwe en kapilpene kahnimw koaros, nan sahpwo pwon me Mehn Nihpai kan sapweniki.

2 Oh e koasoanediong irail en wiahda kehl tuhke pohn koasoakoasoak en pwehl, ei, e pahn ilehki uwen reirei en ohl emen, kapilpene kahnimw kan.

3 Oh e koasoanediong irail en kairekala lepin tuhke kengkeng kei pohn kehl tuhke ko kapilpene; oh lepin tuhke kengkeng pwuko kehlail oh ile.

4 Oh e koasoanediong irail en kauwada wasahn doulik ile kei me pahn ilehsang lepin tuhke kengkeng kan, oh e koasoanediong irail en wiahda wasahn rukula ni wasahn doulik kan, pwe nein Mehn Leimen takai kan oh arep kan sohte pahn kak kamedekeirailla.

5 Oh irail kaunopadahr pwe re en kak koski takai sang powe, nin duwen nsenarail oh arail kehlail, oh kemehla aramas me pahn song en keihdo limwahn kehl en kahnimwo.

6 Eri Moronai kaunopadahr ar wasa kehlail kan ni kahnihmw koaros nan sahpwo pwon, pwe re en pelian ar imwintihti kan ni ar pahn kohdo.

7 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw koasoanediong nah sounpei kan me re pahn kohla ni palimesen sapwtehno; ei, oh kohla oh kasarehla Mehn Leimen koaros me mi ni palimesen sapwtehno oh pekeuslahng nan uhdakarail kan, me mi ni palieir en sahpw en Saraemla.

8 Oh irepen sahpw en Nihpai inen sang ni sehd en palimese kohlahng palikapi.

9 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai kasarehla Mehn Leimen koaros sang ni palimese en sapwtehno, me mi paliepeng en sahpw kan me re sapweniki, e ahpw koasoanediong aramas akan me mi nan sahpw en Saraemla oh nan sahpw me kapilpene, en kohla palimesen sapwtehno, iei ni irepen sapwo ni keilen oaroahro, oh kousoanla nan sahpwo.

10 Oh e pil kihdiong sounpei kei ni palieir, ni irepen wasa me re sapweniki, oh koasoanediong irail re en kauwada kelen mahwen kei pwe re en kak doarehla neirail sounpei kan oh neirail aramas akan sang arail imwintihti kan.

11 Oh met e lupukasangehr en Mehn Leimen ko ar wasa kehlail koaros ni palimesen sapwtehno, ei, oh pil ni palikapi, wiewiahda kehl kehlail ni irepen sahpw en Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan, nanpwungen sahpw en Saraemla oh sahpw en Nihpai, sang ni sehd palikapi, me peianla tepin pillap en Saidon—Mehn Nihpai kan sapwaneki sahpw en paliepeng koaros, iei, sahpw koaros me mi ni paliepeng en sahpwen Rahk, nin duwen nsenarail.

12 Eri Moronai, iangahki nah sounpei kan, me kin wie tohtohla rahn koaros pwehki ar kin koapworopworki silasil en doadoahk me e kin wia ong irail, re kin nantihong en lupukala kehl oh manaman en Mehn Leimen kan sang nan sapwarail kan, pwe re en dehr ahneki manaman pohn sapwarail kan.

13 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan tepda wiahda poahsoan en kahnimw ehu, oh re kahdaniki kahnimwo Moronai; oh e karanih sehd en palimese; oh e mi ni paliepeng limwahn irepen sapwen Mehn Leimen kan.

14 Oh re pil tepda wiahda poahsoan en kahnimw nanpwungen kahnimw en Moronai oh kahnimw en Aron, a met kadokepene sahpw en Aron oh Moronai; oh re kahdaniki kahnimwo, de sahpwo, Nihpaia.

15 Oh nan pahrohte irail tepida kauwada kahnimw tohto ni paliepeng, a mie ehu soangen kahnimw me re kahdaniki Lihai, me mi paliepeng en ni keilen oaroahro.

16 Oh met kaimwiseklahr pahr kerieisek.

17 Oh nan irair en paiamwahu pwukat me aramas en Nihpai kan tepkihda kerieisek ehun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

18 Oh irail pweida mehlel, oh irail kepwehpwehla mehlel; ei, oh re kaparaparala oh kehlailla nan sahpwo.

19 Oh met kitail kilang ia uwen kalahngan oh pwung en sapwellimen Kauno wiewia kan koaros, ong pweidahn sapwellime mahsen kan koaros ong aramas akan; ei, kitail kak kilang me sapwellime mahsen kan pweidahr ahnsou wet, me e ketin mahsanihong Lihai, ketihtihki:

20 Meid pai kowe oh noumw seri kan; oh re pahn ale kupwuramwahu, nin duwen ar pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan re pahn pweida nan sahpwo. Ahpw tamataman, nin duwen ar sohte pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan re pahn kalipilipsang mwohn silangin Kauno.

21 Oh kitail kilang me inou pwukat pweidahr rehn aramas en Nihpai kan; pwe e kin sang ni arail akamai kan oh arail pingiping kan, ei, arail kamaramas kan, oh arail pirap kan, arail pwongih dikedik en eni kan, arail tiahk en nenek kan, oh arail tiahk suwed kan, me kin wiawi nanpwungarail, me kin kahrehda ar mahwen kan oh ar kamwomwala kan.

22 Oh irail akan me loalopwoatohng kapwaiada kosonned akan en Kauno kin poadoandoarla ahnsou koaros, nindokon kiden riarail me suwed kan me kilelehdiong nan mour en lidu, de mehkihla kedlahs, de pwupwudi nan soupwoson, oh iangala Mehn Leimen kan.

23 Ahpw kilang sangete ni mwehin Nihpaio, sohte ehu mwehi kaperen nanpwungen aramas en Nihpai kan me duwehte mwehin Moronai, iei, ahnsou wet, ni kerieisek ehun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

24 Kedekedeo ni kerieisek riaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan pil imwiseklahr ni popohl; ei, oh pil pahr kerieisek siluho.

25 Kedekedeo nan tepin kerieisek pahieu en sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan, e pahn mie popohl nanpwungen aramas en Nihpai kan ma sohte pingiping ehu me wiawihda nanpwungarail me pid duwen sahpw en Lihai, oh sahpw en Moriandon, me mihte limwahn irepen sahpw en Lihai; a wasa pwuko koaros mi ni keilen oaroahro.

26 Pwe kilang, aramas akan me sapwasapw nan sahpw en Moriandon kin kosekose me sapwarail ekis sahpw en Lihai; eri irail ahpw tepida nanpwungsuwedpene, lao aramas en Moriandon kan ale neirail tehtehn mahwen kan pwe re en peiong riarail ko, oh re koasoanehdi me re pahn kemehkinirailla kedlahs.

27 Ahpw kilang, aramas me sapwasapw nan sahpw en Lihai tangdaoui tangalahng ni kahnimpwal en Moronai, oh peki sawas reh; pwe kilang sohte ar sapwung.

28 Kedekedeo ahnsou me aramas en Moriandon, me mi pahn kaweid en ohl emen me kahdaneki Moriandon, esehda me aramas en Lihai kan sopolahng ni kahnimpwal en Moronai, re uhdahn masepwehkada mehlel pwe nein Moronai sounpei kan de kohdo oh kamwomwirailla.

29 Eri, Moriandon kamwakidada nan kapehdirail kan me re anahne tangdaoui tangalahng nan sahpw en paliepeng, me direki lapalahn leh kei, oh sapwenikihla sahpw me mi paliepeng.

30 Oh kilang, re pahn kapwaiadahr ar koasoandio, (me pahn kansensuwed mehlel) ahpw kilang, pwehki Moriandon soangen ohl me kin ahng kehlail, kahrehda e lingeringerda pahn emen nah lidu ko, oh e ahpw keme oh kaloke.

31 Kedekedeo liduo ahpw tangasang, oh kohdo ni kahnimpwal en Moronai, oh ndaiong Moronai soahng koaros duwen dahme wiawi, oh pil duwen arail koasoandi en tangdaoui kohla nan sahpw en paliepeng.

32 Met kilang, aramas akan me mihmi nan sahpw en Rahk, de pwehki Moronai, perki re de pahn rong ehn Moriandon koasoi kan oh miniminiong nah aramas akan, oh met pahn elehiong eh pahn sapwenkihla sahpw oko, me pahn kahrehda poahsoan en kahpwal laud ong aramas en Nihpai kan, ei, soangen kahpwal me pahn kakete kalowehdi ar mour saledek.

33 Eri Moronai kadarala karis en sounpei ehu, iangahki arail dipwisou kan, pwe re en kak koanoahdi aramas en Moriandon kan, pwe re en kauhdi ar pahn tangalahng nan sahpw en paliepeng.

34 Kedekedeo re sohte koanoairaildi lao re lel ni irepen sahpw en Tehnla; oh re koanoairaildi wasao, ni sahpw tehtiko me peian sehdo kohdahla nan sahpw en paliepeng, ei, kohla nanpwungen sehd en palikapi oh palimese.

35 Kedekedeo sounpei kan me Moronai kadarala, me mi pahn kaweid en ohl me adaneki Dienkom, tuhwongidi nein Moriandon aramas akan; oh pwehki keptakai en nein Morianton aramas akan, (pwehki ar audaudiki en Moriandon kaweid suwed oh koasoi likamw kan) mahwen ahpw tepida nanpwungarail, oh Dienkom kemehla Moriandon oh kalowehdi nah sounpei kan, oh salihiraildi, oh pwurala ni kahnimpwal en Moronai. Oh met kaimwiseklahr kerieisek pahieun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

36 Oh aramas en Moriandon kan kopwurupwurdohr. Oh sang ni arail inoukidahr me re pahn kolokol meleilei irail kopwurupwurlahng nan sapwen Moriandon, oh miniminpene wiawi nanpwungarail oh aramas en Lihai kan; oh irail pil pwurala nan sapwarail kan.

37 Kedekedeo nan pahrohte aramas en Nihpai kan pwurehng ahneki meleilei, Nihpaia, me wie sounkopwung lapalap kerimen, kapilsalehdala, ni eh kapwaiadahr pwukoahn sounkopwungo ni pwung mehlel mwohn Koht.

38 Ahpw, e soikala alehda pwukoahn koledi poadopoad kan oh soahng kan me Alma oh eh pahpa ko kin wiahki me keieu sarawi; eri Alma kihong rehn nah pwutak, Ilemen.

39 Kilang, kedekedeo nein Nihpaia pwutak idihada en uhd wiliandi eh pahpao, wiahla sounkopwungo; ei, e pilipildahr en wia sounkopwung lapalap oh kepinahn aramas akan, a sang ni inou oh tiahk sarawi me e pahn wia kadeik pwung, oh kolokol meleilei oh saledek en aramas akan, oh mweidohng irail ar kapai sarawi en kaudokiong Kauno arail Koht, ei, en utungada oh kapwaiada doadoahk en Koht erein eh mwehio, oh en kapwungala aramas suwed kan nin duwen diparail kan.

40 Met kilang, mware iei Paoran. Oh Paoran uhd wiliandi eh pahpao, oh tapihada eh mwehi en kakaun aramas en Nihpai kan, ni imwilahn pahr karieisek pahieu.
alma 51:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 51[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki song en wekidala kosonnedo oh koasoanehdi en mie nanmwarki—Sang ni usuhs aramas akan utungada Paoran oh aramas me kin uhpalihki saledek—Moronai idingki aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki irail en doarehla arail wehi, ma soh, irail pahn kamakamala—Amelekaia oh Mehn Leimen ko kalowehdi kahnimw kehlail tohto—Dienkom peiong Mehn Leimen kan oh kemehla Amelekia nan sapwellime impwalo. Ele Sounpar 67–66 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni tepin pahr kerieisek limau en mwehin sounkopwung kan en aramas en Nihpai kan, a re koasoanehdier popohl nanpwungen aramas en Lihai oh aramas en Moriandon duwen sapwarail kan, oh kerieisek pahieu en sounpar tepier ni popohl;

2 Ahpw, re sohte ahneki popohl werei nan sahpwo, pwe aramas akan tepida akamaiki duwen sounkopwung lapalap Paoran; pwe kilang, ekei aramas oko mwahuki re en wekidala ire kei nan kosonnedo.

3 Ahpw kilang, Paoran sohte men wekidala kosonnedo de mweidohng en wekidekla; eri, e sohte rong irail akan me kapidelong arail pekipek kan duwen wekideklahn kosonnedo.

4 Eri, irail akan me mwahuki kosonnedo en wekidekla lingeringerda pah, oh re mwahuki me e solahr pahn wia sounkopwung lapalap en sahpwo; eri pwehki ire wet nanpwungsuwed ehu pwarada, ahpw re sohte kakerehdi nta.

5 Kedekedeo irail akan me mwahuki Paoran en kesepwildihsang nan pwukoahn sounkopwungo, irail kin adaneki aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki, pwe irail mwahuki kosonnedo en wekidekla pwe en kauwehla koapworment saledeko oh koasoanehdi nanmwarki en kaunda sahpwo.

6 Oh irail kan me pwungki Paoran en wiwiahte sounkopwung lapalap en nan sahpwo adanekihla aramas me kin uhpalihki saledek; oh irail eri liaktohrohrpeseng nanpwungarail, pwe aramas me kin uhpalihki seledek kan kahukihla oh inoukidahr me re pahn kolokolete arail pwuhng kan oh pai kan en arail pelien lamalam sang ni koapwoarment saledek.

7 Kedekedeo irair en arail pingiping wet ahpw kameleileidi sang ni en aramas akan ar usuhs. Kedekedeo palimoron en aramas akan pwungki aramas me kin uhpalihki saledek, oh Paoran mihmihte nan pwukoahn sounkopwungo, me kahrehda peren laud rehn kempoakepahn Paoran kan oh pil rehn aramas tohto me utung mour saledek, me pil katokehdi aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki, kehrehda re sohte uhwong ahpw idihdiong re en ideidawehnte doadoahk en mour saledek.

8 Met irail akan me pwungki en mie nanmwarki kan, irail wia serihn soupeidi kei, oh re kin nantihong pwe re en kak wiahla nanmwarki kei; oh irail kin alehdi sawas sang rehn aramas akan me kin nannantihong irail en kak ahneki manaman oh mweimwei en kaunda aramas akan.

9 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou wet e wia ansou apwal ong soangen pingiping pwukat en wiawi nanpwungen aramas en Nihpai kan; pwe kilang, Amelekaia pwurehng kamwakidada nan kapehd en mehn Leimen ko pwehn uhwong mehn Nihpai kan, oh e kapokonepene sounpei kan sang wasa koaros nan sapwarail kan, oh kihkihong irail dipwisou en mahwen, oh re ngoangki kaunopadahng mahwen; pwe e kahukilahr me e pahn nim ntahn Moronai.

10 Ahpw kilang, kitail pahn kasawiada me eh inouo me e wiahda sohte katepe; ahpw, e kaunopada pein ih oh nah sounpei kan pwe re en kohdo mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

11 Met nah sounpei kan sohla nohn dir duwehte rahnteio, pwehki kid kei me kamakamala rehn Mehn Nihpai kan; ahpw mehndahte ar malaulaula, Amelekaia kapokonepene lapalahn karis en sounpei ehu, kahrehda e sohte masak kohdihla nan sahpw en Saraemla.
