12 Iei, Amelekaia pein iang kohdihla, tiheng mwohn Mehn Leimen ko. Oh met iei nan kerieisek limaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan; oh iei ahnsouo me re tepida kameleileidi pingiping kan me pid duwen sounkopwung lapalap, Paoran.

13 Kedekedeo ahnsou me aramas akan me kin adaneki aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki rongada me Mehn Leimen ko kohkohdihdohng mahwen ong irail, re peren nan kapehdiral kan; oh re kahng alehda dipwisou en mahwen kan, pwehki ar inenen lingeringer pahn sounkopwung laplapo, oh pil aramas me utung mour saledek, kahrehda re sohte men alehda dipwisou en mahwen pwe re en doarehla arail wehi.

14 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai kasawiada met, oh pil kilangada me Mehn Leimen ko wie kohkohdo ni irepen sahpwo, e ahpw lingeringer kowahlap pwehki keptakai en aramas akan me e kin nantihong doandoare; ei, e lingeringer kowahlap; nan kapehde nsensuwed pahrail.

15 Kedekedeo e ahpw kadarala pekipek ehu ong kepinahn sahpwo, sang ni utuht en aramas akan, e peki ma kepinao en wadek, oh kihong ih (Moronai) manaman en idingkin irail me kahngohdi kan re en iang doarehla arail wehi, ma soh, irail pahn kamakamala.

16 Pwe ih me e pahn keieu kesempwalki iei, en kauhdi pingiping oh akamai kan nanpwungen aramas akan; pwe kilang, ih met me kin kahrehda arail kamwomwomwla kan. Kedekedeo, sang ni utuht en aramas akan, e ahpw alehdi manamano.

17 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw ruweseiong nah sounpei kan me re pahn kolahng aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki pwe re en kalowehdi ar pohnmwahso kan oh ar aklapalap oh kapahrekihong irail nan pwehl, de re en alehda dipwisou en mahwen kan oh utungada doadoahk en mour saledek.

18 Kedekedeo nah sounpei ko ahpw karis kolahng irail; oh re kalowehdi ar pohnmwahso oh aklapalap, kahrehda ni ansou me re ngapkipeseng neirail dipwisoun mahwen pwe re en peiong nein Moronai aramas akan, irail kamakamkihla kedlahs oh kapahrekiong nanpwel.

19 Kedekedeo uwen irail akan me kahngohdi tohtohki aramas pahkid me mehkihla kedlahs; oh arail kaun akan me sohte kamakamala nan mahwen ahpw kolkoldi oh lekdekiong nan imweteng, pwe sohte ahnsoun kopwung ahnsou wet.

20 Oh luhwen irail akan me kahngohdi, re sohte iang palidieng nan pwehlo, ahpw irail alehda koasoandi en mour saledek, oh idihdiong re en apiada pilaik en mour saledek pohn arail wasahn doulik kan, oh nan arail kahnimw kan, oh alehda dipwisou en mahwen oh iang doarehla arail wehi.

21 Oh met Moronai katokihedier aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki, kahrehda solahr me adaneki aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwariki; oh met e kaimwisekalahr keptakai oh pohnmwahso en aramas akan me kin kose me re ntahn soupeidi; ahpw re karakarahkala duwehte riarail ko, oh pwe re en kommwad en iang mahwenki arail mour saledek sang mour en lidu.

22 Kilang, kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai wie katokatokihedi mahwen kan oh pingiping kan rehn ienge tohn wehi kan, oh kahkahrehiong irail nan popohl oh onepek, oh wiewia koansoandi en kaunopadahng mahwen ong Mehn Leimen ko, kilang, Mehn Leimen ko kohdo nan sahpw en Moronai, me mi ni irepen sahpwo ni oaroahro.

23 Kedekedeo ahnsouo Mehn Nihpai kan sohte nohn kehlail nan kahnimw en Moronai; eri Amelekaia pwakihrailla, kemekemehla aramas tohto. Kedekedeo Amelekaia ahpw kalowehdi kahnimwo, ei, kalowehdi arail kehl kan koaros.

24 Oh irail akan me tangasang kahnimw en Moronai kohdo nan kahnimw en Nihpaia; oh pil aramas en kahnimw en Lihai kohpene, oh kaunopadahng mahwen oh onopohngehr mahweniong Mehn Leimen kan.

25 Ahpw kedekedeo Amelekaia sohte men mweidohng Mehn Leimen kan en kohla ni kahnimw en Nihpaia oh mahwen, ahpw e koasoanediong irail en mihmihte ni oaroahro, kihdiong sounpei kei nan kahnimw koaros pwe re en apwahpwalih oh sinsile.

26 Eri e ahpw uselahte, kalkalowehdi kahnimw tohto, kahnimw en Nihpaia, oh kahnimw en Lihai, oh kahnimw en Moriandon, oh kahnimw en Omner, oh kahnimw en Kid, oh kahnimw en Mulek, kahnimw pwuko koaros mi ni oaroahr en palimese.

27 Oh met Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdier kahnimw tohto, sang ni en Amelekaia widing, sang neirail karis en sounpei ngedehrie, a kahnimw ko koaros inenen kelpene mwahu nin duwen ehn Moronai koasoanehdi; ahpw met koaros wiahla kakehlepen Mehn Leimen ko.

28 Kedekedeo re ahpw karis kohla ni irepen sahpw en Rahk, pwakipwakih Mehn Nihpai kan oh kemekemeirailla.

29 Ahpw kedekedeo irail ahpw tuhwong Dienkom, me kemehla Moriandon oh sopukala nah aramas akan nan eh tangdaoui.

30 Kedekedeo e ahpw sopukala Amelekaia, ni eh wie karkariskihwei sapwellime pokon en sounpei kan pwe en kak kalowehdi sahpw en Rahk, oh pil sahpw en paliepeng.

31 Ahpw kilang e nsensuwedla ni eh kapweiekidi pahn Dienkom oh nah sounpei kan, pwe irail wia sounpei wadawad kei; pwe emen emen nein Dienkom ohl akan kehlail oh koahiek en mahwen sang Mehn Leimen kan, kahrehda irail kehlail sang Mehn Leimen kan.

32 Kedekedeo re ahpw mahweniong irail, oh kemekemeirailla lao lel nihpwong. Kedekedeo Dienkom oh nah ohl akan kauwada imwarail impwal akan ni irepen sahpw en Rahk; oh Amelekaia kauwahda sapwellime impwal kan ni keilen oaroahro, oh iei ih mwomwen arail pweiekla.

33 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e nin soutikpene, Dienkom oh nah ladu ko waila oh kohla nipwongo, oh pidelong nan sapwellimen Amelekaia kahnimpwalo; oh kilang re meirkelikla pwehki arail pwangada, pwehki sang ni arail doadoahk en mahwen oh karakar en ni rahno.

34 Kedekedeo Dienkom ahpw wailong nan sapwellimen nanmwarkio impwalo, oh doakoahki eh mohngiong ketieu pwoat; oh e mwadangete kemehla nanmwarkio kahrehda e sohte kapirida sapwellime ladu ko.

35 Oh e pwurala ni pein ah wasa ni rir, oh kilang, nah sounpei kan pil memeir, oh e kapirirailda oh ndaiong irail soahng koaros me e wiahier.

36 Oh e koasoanediong nah sounpei ko re en onoapada, pwe Mehn Leimen ko de pirida oh kohdohng irail.

37 Oh met kaimwisekala kerieisek limaun sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan; oh met kaimwisekalahr mwehin Amelekaia.
alma 52:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 52[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amoron wiliandi Amelekaia wiahla nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan—Moronai, Dienkom, oh Lihai kaunda Mehn Nihpai kan ni ar powehdi Mehn Leimen kan nan mahwen—Kahnimw en Miulek pwurehng lohdi, oh Seikop, Mehn Sorom kamakamala. Ele Sounpar 66–64 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri met, kedekedeo nan pahr kerieisek wenou en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, kilang, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pwourda ni keieun menseng en tepin sounpwongo, kilang, re diarada me Amelekaia mehla nan sapwellime impwalo; oh re kilang me Dienkomw onopadahngehr mahweniong irail ni rahno.

2 Eri met, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen ko kilangadahr met re masepwehkada; oh re pweieksangehr arail koasoandi en kohdahla nan sahpw en paliepeng, oh irail pwurala nan kahnimw en Mulek, oh rapahki perehparail nan kelen kahnimwo.

3 Kedekedeo rien Amelekaia ohlo ahpw pilipilda en wiahla nanmwarki en aramas oko; oh ede iei Amoron; eri nanmwarki Amoron, rien nanmwarki Amelekaia, pilipildahr en uhd wiliandi wiahla nanmwaki.

4 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihong nah aramas akan re en koledi kahnimw kan, me re kalowehdier sang ni ar kakerehdi nta; pwe neirail aramas tohto kamakamkihla kahnimw koaros me re kin kalohwehdi.

5 Oh met, Dienkom kilang me Mehn Leimen ko koasoanehdier me re pahn kolokol kahnimw kan me re kalowehdi, oh sahpw akan me re koledier; oh pwehki Dienkom eh kilang uwen ar tohto, e ahpw medewehda me e sohte konehng en song mahweniong irail nan ar kehl kan.

6 Ahpw nah ohl akan kapilpene wasao, duwehte me re kaukaunopohng mahwen; ei, a ni mehlel e kaukaunopadahng doare pein ih sang irail, a e wia met sang ni arail kaukauwada kehl kan oh kaukaunopada wasahn rukula kan.

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw wie kaukaunop ong mahwen lao lel ahnsou me Moronai kadarodo ohl tohto pwe re en kakehlakahla nah sounpei kan.

8 Oh Moronai pil kadaralahng Dienkom ilek ehu me e pahn kolokolete aramas selidi kan koaros me e koledier; pwe nin duwen Mehn Leimen ko ar salihedier kiden neirail aramas kan, e pahn pil koledi Mehn Leimen me selidi ko pwe en kak kawilialiki irail akan me Mehn Leimen ko koledi.

9 Oh e pil kadaralahng ilek ehu me e anahne kelehdi sahpw en Rahk, oh silehdi ahl tehtiko wasa me kohdahla nan sahpw en paliepeng, pwe Mehn Leimen ko de kalowehdi wasao oh ahneki manaman en kahpwalih irail ni pali koaros.

10 Oh Moronai pil kadarala reh, pekpeki en loalopwoatohng ahpwapwalih wasa pwuko, oh en wia uwen eh kak koaros en kaloke Mehn Leimen kan wasao ahnsou koaros, pwe e en kak pwurehng kalowehdi kahnimw kan me kohsang irail, sang ni koasoandi me pahn kapingirailda de wiepe teikan; oh me en pil kelepene oh kakehlakahla kahnimw kan me kapilpene, me sohte lohdi pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen.

11 Oh e pil ndaiong ih, I pahn kohwei rehmw, ahpw kilang, Mehn Leimen ko pil kohdohn peiong kiht ni irepen sahpw me mi limwahn sehd en palikapi; oh kilang, I pahn mahweniong irail, eri I sohte kak kohwei rehmw.

12 Met, nanmwarki (Amoron) ahpw ketketlahsang nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh ketin mahsanihong lih nanmwarkio duwen pwoulahn rie ohlo, oh kapokonepenehr kiden ohl kei, oh kolahng mahweniong Mehn Nihpai kan me mi ni irepen sahpwo limwahn sehd en palikapi.

13 Oh e nannantihong pwe en kahpwalih Mehn Nihpai ko, oh en kak pahnehla ekei neirail sounpei ko nan sahpwo, a ahnsowohte e ahpw kileleiong irail akan me mihmihte nan kahnimw kan me irail kalowehdi, me re pahn kahpwalih Mehn Nihpai ko nan sahpw me mi ni sehd en palimese, oh re en sapwenkihla sapwarail koaros ma re kak, nin duwen kehlail en neirail karis en sounpei kan.

14 Oh iei met irair keper me Mehn Nihpai kan mihmi loale ni imwiseklahn kerieisek weneu en sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

15 Ahpw kilang, kedekedeo ni kerieisek isuh en sounpar en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Moronai ruwese Dienkom—en koasoanehdi sounpei kan pwe re en sile palieir oh palikapi en irepen sahpwo, e ahpw tepida karis kohla nan sahpw en Rahk, pwe nah ohl akan en kak sewese Dienkom kapwurehsang kahnimw kan me kohsang irail—

16 Kedekedeo Dienkom ahpw ale pakair en mahweniong kahnimw en Miulek, oh song kalowehdi ma e kak.

17 Kedekedeo Dienkom ahpw kaunopada pwe en mahweniong kahnimw en Mulek, oh e ahpw iang nah sounpei kan karis kolahng Mehn Leimen ko; ahpw e kilang me e pahn apwal en kak kaloweiraildi ma re pahn mihmihte nan kehl; eri e ahpw pweieksang eh koasoandio oh pwurala nan kahnimw en Rahk, pwe en awih Moronai eh pahn kohdo, pwe en kak kakehlakahla nah sounpei kan.

18 Kedekedeo Moronai oh nah sounpei kan ahpw lella reh nan sahpw en Rahk, ni imwin pahr kerieisek isuh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

19 Oh ni tepin kerieisek waluhn sounparo, Moronai oh Dienkom oh kaun lapalap en sounpei tohto ahpw wie lamalamki mahwen—dahme re pahn wia pwe en kahrehiong Mehn Leimen ko en kohieido mahweniong irail; de mehkot me pahn pitihiraildi en pedoisang nan arail kehl kehlail kan, pwe re en kak poweiraildi oh kapwurehsang kahnimw en Mulek.

20 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kadaralahng karis en Mehn Leimen ko, me kin sinsile kahnimw en Mulek, meninkeder kei ong arail kauno, me kahdaneki Seikop, oh peki reh en pedoido iangahki nah sounpei kan pwe irail en tuhpene wasa patapat kis nanpwungen kahnimw riauo. Ahpw kilang, Seikop, Mehn Soram, sohte men kahluwaiei nah sounpei kan pwe irail en tuhpene wasa patapato.

21 Kedekedeo Moronai, pwehki e sohte koapworopworki me irail pahn kak tuhpene wasa kis me pahn pahrek ong irail koaros, eri, e koasoanehdi koasoandi ehu pwe en kak pitihedi Mehn Leimen ko en pedoisang nan kahnimwo.

22 Eri e ahpw koasoanehdi me Dienkom pahn kahluwa ekei sounpei oh kohdihla ni oaroahro; oh nihpwong, Moronai oh nah sounpei kan pahn kohla nan sapwtehno ni palikapi en kahnimw en Mulek; oh mandahn rahno, ahnsou me sounsilasil en Mehn Leimen ko kilangada Dienkom, irail ahpw tangala oh pakairkihong Seikop, arail kauno.

23 Kedekedeo karis en Mehn Leimen ko ahpw kohieilahng Dienkom, oh uwen arail tohto re kihkihong me re pahn powehdi Dienkom pwehki nah sounpei ko me malaulau. A ni ahnsou me Dienkom kilangada karis en Mehn Leimen ko kohkodohn peiong irail e ahpw pweiekla oh tangalahng ni oaroahr me mi ni paliepeng.

24 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen ko kilangada me e tepida tang, re nan kapehd kehlailda oh wia uwen arail kak en pwakih irail. Oh ahnsou me Dienkom wie kakahluwahsang Mehn Leimen ko me pwakipwakih irail ni sohte katepe, kilang, Moronai ruwesehiong ekei nah sounpei ko me iangih, me re pahn kohlongala nan kahnimwo, oh kalowehdi.

25 Eri ih me re wia, oh re kemehla irail koaros me mihmihte pwe en sile kahnimwo, ei, irail koaros me sohte men pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan.

26 Eri Moronai kalowehkihdier kahnimw en Mulek ekei nah sounpei ko, nindokon ih oh me luhwe ko karis kohla pwe re en tuhwong Mehn Leimen ko ahnsou me re pahn pwurasang ar pwakih Dienkom.

27 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen ko pwakih Dienkom lao re karanih kahnimw en Rahk, oh re tuhwong Lihai oh sounpei kei, me mihmihte pwe re en sinsile kahnimw en Rahk.

28 Oh met kilang, ni ahnsou me kaun lapalap en sounpei en Mehn Leimen ko kilangada me Lihai iangahki nah sounpei ko kohkohdohn mahweniong irail, re tangdoaui ni ar pingida, pwe Lihai e de koanoairaildi mwohn ar pahn lellahng kahnimw en Mulek; pwe re pwangada pwehki ar pwakpwakih irail, oh nein Lihai ohl akan kehlail.

29 Met Mehn Leimen ko sohte ese me Moronai oh nah sounpei ko mi mwurirail; oh ihte me irail masak Lihai oh nah ohl akan.

30 Met Lihai sohte men koliraildi lao re tuhwong Moronai oh nah sounpei ko.

31 Kedekedeo mwohn Mehn Leimen kan ar pahn kak pwurala wasa doh Mehn Nihpai kan kapilirailpenehr, nein Moronai ohl akan mi apali, oh nein Lihai ohl akan mi ni pali teio, irail koaros me roson oh kehlail; ahpw Mehn Leimen ko luwetalahr pwehki ar alialu reirei.

32 Oh Moronai ndaiong nah ohl akan me irail pahn peiong irail lao re pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan.

33 Kedekedeo Seikop, pwehki eh wia arail kaun, oh pwehki ih Mehn Soram, oh pwehki eh inenen keptakai, lapalahn pei ehu ahpw wiawi ni e kahrehiong Mehn Leimen ko en mahweniong Moronai.

34 Pwehki Moronai eh perehla wasa me re pahn keid ie, eri Seikop koasoanehdi me e pahn kemeirailla oh douluhllahng kahnimw en Mulek. Ahpw kilang, Moronai oh nah sounpei kan kehlailsang irail; eri re sohte lohdiong pahn Mehn Leimen ko.

35 Kedekedeo peio ahpw inenen mwuledek nan pali koaros; oh tohto sang nan pali riauo mehla; ei, oh Moronai ohla oh Seikop kamakamala.

36 Oh pwehki Lihai oh nah sounpei kehlail ko ar peiong irail sang mwuri me nohn uk, kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan me mi mwurio pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan; oh irail me luhwe ko, pwehki ar pingida, re sohte ese wasa re pahn kohla ia de wasa re pahn pei.

37 Met pwehki Moronai eh kilang me re pingidahr, e ahpw ndaiong irail: Ma kumwail pahn wahdo noumwail dipwisou en mahwen kan oh pwilikihdi, kilang se pahn tokedihsang at kakerehdi ntahmwail.

38 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan rongehr lokaia pwukat, arail kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, irail koaros me sohte kamakamala, kohdo oh pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan ni nehn Moronai, oh ndaiong neirail sounpei kan re en pil wia soahngohte.

39 Ahpw kilang, me tohto rehrail me kahng; oh irail akan me sohte men pwilikihdi neirail kedlahs kan kolkoldi oh pirapirdi, oh neirail dipwisou en mahwen kan pehdsang irail, oh re idihdiong en iang riarail ko alu kohla nan sahpw en Rahk.

40 Oh met uwen irail tohto me re salihedi tohtohsang irail me kamakamala, ei, tohtohsang irail akan me kamakamala ni pali koaros.
alma 53:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 53[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen me selidi kan wia doadoahk en kakehlaka kahnihmw en Rahk—Pingiping nan pwungen Mehn Nihpai kan kahrehda Mehn Leimen er ik kin pweida—Ileman er ik nein Amon aramas akan neirail pwutak pwulopwul riekido. Ele Sounpar 64–63 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo re ahpw koasonehdi soun silasil kan re en sile Mehn Leimen me selidi kan, oh idingkin irail en kohla saripidi arail mehlah kan, ei, oh pil ahn Mehn Nihpai mehla kan me kamakamala; oh Moronai koasonehdi ohl akan me pahn sile irail nan ahnsou me re wie doadoahk.

2 Oh Moronai kohla nan kahnihmw en Mulek iangahki Lihai, oh er ik kahnihmwo oh kihong Lihai en apwali. Met kilang, Lihai wia ohl men me kin ieiang Moronai ni pali laud en eh mahwin kan; oh e wia ohl men me duwehte Moronai, oh emente kin nsenohki silepen emen; ei, ira kin poakpene, oh aramas en Nihpai kan koaros pil poakehng ira.

3 Kedekedeo mwurin Mehn Leimen er ikan kanekehla saripidi arail mehla kan oh pil ehn Mehn Nihpai kan mehla kan, re ahpw pwurehng pwurala nan sahpw en Rahk; oh Dienkom, sang pahn kaweid en Moronai, ndaiong irail me pahn tepida doadoahk en weirada warawar kapilpene sahpwo, de kahnihmw en Rahk.

4 Oh e pil ndahiong irail me re pahn wiahda kehl tuhkeh kan ni masloalehn warawar akan; oh irail kesehda pwehl sang nan warawaro kohda ni kehl tuhke ko; oh met re wiahiong Mehn Leimen kan irail en doadoahk lao irail kapilkipene kahnihmw en Rahk kehl tuhke kehlail oh pwehl, me ileile mehlel.

5 Oh kahnihmw wet wiahla wasa kehlail kowahlap sang ahnsouo kohla; oh nan kahnihmw wet re kin er ika Mehn Leimen me selidi kan; iei, nan kehl me re wiahiong irail en wiahda sang pein pehrail kan. Met Moronai idihdieng en wiahiong Mehn Leimen kan en doadoahk, pwehki e kin mengei re en sile irail ni ahnsou me re wie doadoahk; oh e anahne nah sounpei kan koaros ahnsou me e pahn kin mahwiniong Mehn Leimen kan.

6 Kedekedeo Moronai powehdier ehu nein Mehn Leimen kan pwihn en soupei kehlail, oh kalowehdier kahnihmw en Mulek, me wia ehu wasa me keieu kehlail me Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi nan sapwen Nihpai; oh me e pil wiadahr ehu wasa kehlail pwe en koledi me selidi kan.

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw uhdi sang song mahwiniong Mehn Leimen kan nan pahro, ahpw koadoadoahke nah ohl akan re en kaukaunop ong mahwin, ei, oh kaukaunopada wasahn sileparail kan pwe re en kak perehsang irail Mehn Leimen kan, ei, oh pil kapitasang neirail lih akan oh er ikan nan lehk oh kahpwal, oh sowesehki neirail sounpei kan kenerail mwonge.

8 Kedekedeo nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan, me mih palieir ni irepen sehd en palikapi, pwehki Moronai e sohte mih mwo ekei mehn Nihpai kan wiahda mwekid sapairair, me kahrehda pingiping nan pwungarail, me kahrehda arail kalowehdi ekei Mehn Nihpai, ei, lao irail kalowehdi ekei kahnihmw nan sahpwo.

9 Oh met pwehki wiewia suwed nan pwungarail, ei, pwehki arail kin pingiping oh sohte loaloapwoatpene nan pwungarail re kihong irail nan irair keper mehle.

10 Oh met kilang, mie mehkot me I men koasoia duwen aramas en Amon kan, me ni tapio re wia Mehn Leimen; ahpw sang Amon oh riehkan, de sang ni manaman oh mahsen en Koht, re weliakapwala ong Kauno; oh re kohdihdo nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh sang ahnsou kohdo Mehn Nihpai kan kin sinsile irail.

11 Oh pwehki arail inou re sohte kin alehda dipwisou en mahwin kan pwe re en pelian riarail kan; pwe re wiahda inou ehu me re sohte pahn pwurehng kakerehdi nta; oh nin duwen arail inouo re pahn mehla; ei, re udahn pahn mweidala pein irail re en pwupwidiong nan pehn riarial kan, ma sohte Amon oh riehkan ar poakeirailla oh ahneki limpoak kowahlap ong irail.

12 Oh iei kahrepe wet me re kohkihdihdo nan sahpw en Saraemla; oh Mehn Nihpai kan kin sinsile irail.

13 Ahpw kedekedeo ahnsou me re kilangada keper, oh kahpwal tohto oh lokolok kan me Mehn Nihpai kan ahneki pwehki irail, re mwekidiki ni ar poakehla oh inangihda alehda dipwisou en mahwin pwe re en doare arail wehi.

14 Ahpw kilang, ni ahnsou me re pahn alehda neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, irail meleileidi sang ni kaweid en kangong en Ilemen oh riehkan, pwe kereniong re pahn kawehla inouo me re wiahda.

15 Oh Ilemen periki pwe ma re pahn wia a re pahn kakete ohkihla ni palingehn; eri irail koaros me wiahda inou wet idihdieng en kilang riarail kan ar mih nan arail lokolok kan, nan irair keper en ahnsou wet.

16 Ahpw kilang, kedekedeo mie neirail diren pwutak pwulopwul kei, me sohte iang inouokihda me re sohte pahn alehda dipwisou en mahwin kan pwe re en doarehla pein irail sang ar imwin tihti kan; eri re pokonpene ahnsou wet, koaros me kak alehda dipwisou en mahwin, oh re kin ndahki irail Mehn Nihpai.

17 Oh alehda inou me re pahn peiki mour saledek en Mehn Nihpai kan, ei, en doare sahpwo sang tohnmeteikihla arail mour kan; iei, re inoukihda me re sohte pahn mweidala arail mour saledek, ahpw re pahn pei nan irair koaros pwe re en doarehla Mehn Nihpai kan oh pein irail sang nan kalidu.

18 Met kilang, irail pwutak pwulopwulko meh riekid, me wiahda inou wet oh alehda dipwisou en mahwin pwe re en doare arail wehi.

19 Oh met kilang, irail sohte wia aramas soh katepe ong Mehn Nihpai kan mwowe, pil duwehte ahnsou wet irail wia sawas laud; pwe re alehda neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh re men Ilemen en wia arail kaun.

20 Oh re wia pwutak pwulopwul kei, oh re kin kasalehda arail eimah mehlel, oh pil kehlail oh pwersek; ahpw kilang, kaidehng ihte met—re wia mwahnakapw me kin mehlel ahnsou koaros nan soahng koaros me kelikilikiong irail.

21 Ei, re wia mwahnakapw me kin mehlel oh marain, pwe re kaweidkihda re en kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan oh weweidiki mour pwung mwohn sihlangi.

22 Kedekedeo Ilemen kahre nah sounpei mwahnakapw pwulopwul riekid ko oh karihs kohla, pwe re en sowese aramas en ni irepen sahpw en palieir limwahn sehd en palikapi.

23 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr rieisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.
alma 54:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 54[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amoron oh Moronai pehngidkipene re en kaweliali neirail me selidi kan—Moronai ruwesehki Mehn Leimen kan re en pweiekla oh uhdihsang arail kamaramas suwed kan—Amoron ruwesehki Mehn Nihpai kan re en pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan oh mih pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 63 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr kerieisek duwau en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Amoron ahpw kadarala rehn Moronai ah ineng en kaweliali me selidi kan.

2 Kedekedeo Moronai men peren kowahlap pwehki pekipek wet, pwe e inangih me sawas en mwenge kan me kin kohieng Mehn Leimen me selidi kan en kohieng pein nah aramas; oh e pil inangih pein nah aramas en kakehlaka nah sounpei kan.

3 Met Mehn Leimen kan alehier lih oh seri tohto, oh sohte emente lih de seri men nan pwungen irail akan me selidi rehn Moronai, de me selidi kan me Moronai koledi; eri Moronai koasonehdi koasondi ehu pwe en kak kapwurehdo Mehn Nihpai me selidi kan sang rehn Mehn Leimen kan ni eh pahn kak.

4 Eri e ntingihda kisinlikou ehu, oh kadarala sang rehn nein Amoron laduo, laduohte me wahdo kisinlikouo rehn Moronai. Met iei mahsen kan me e ntingihla rehn Amoron, ndinda:

5 Kilang, Amoron, I ntingwei rehm ekis me pid duwen mahwin wet me kumwail wiahiongehr nei aramas akan, de me riomw ohlo wiahiong kihtehr, oh me ke pil koasonehdi me ke pahn uhsehlahte mwurin eh mehla.

6 Kilang, I pahn ekis ndaionguhk duwen kopwung en Koht, oh kedlahs en sapwellime engieng manamano, me tentenek pohmw ma ke sohte pahn koluhla oh kapweiekwei noumw sounpei kan nan pein sapwemwail kan, de nan sahpw en amwail sohso kan, me iei sahpw en Nihpai.

7 Ei, I pahn ndaionguhk mepwukat ma ke pahn kak kapwaiada; ei, I pahn ndaionguhk duwen ehl kepero me awiawih pwe en alehdi soangen soun kamaramas duwehte kowe oh riomwo me kumwa wiahier, ihte ma ke koluhla oh kapweiekwei ahmw mwekid en kamaramas suwed kan, oh pwurowei iangahki noum sounpei kan nan pein sapwemwail kan.

8 Ahpw pwehki pak ehu ahmw kasohwehier mepwukat, oh mahwiniong aramas en Kauno, iei I pil kasik me ke pahn pwurehng wia met.

9 Oh met kilang, se kaunopadahr sen alehiukidi; ei, oh ma ke sohte pahn kapweiekwei ahmw koasondi kan, kilang, ke pahn waikidi pohmw engieng en Koht me ke kasohwehu, iei pwe en kamwomwuhkala.

10 Ahpw, nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias, nait sounpei kan pahn kohwehnguhk ihte ma ke pahn pweiekwei, oh ahnsou keren mehla pahn pwerekuhk, pwe se pahn kapwurehdo aht kahnihmw kan oh sapwat akan; ei, oh se pahn kolokolete aht pelien lamalam oh doadoahk en aht Koht.

11 Ahpw kilang, ong ie e mwomwen me I wie koasoakoasoiwei ni sohte katepe; de ong ie e mwomwen me ke wia seri en ehl; eri I pahn ritingidi nei kisin likou wet ni ei pahn ndaionguhk me I sohte pahn kaweliali me selidi, ihte sang ni koasondi ma ke pahn mweidedo ohl emen oh ah pwoud oh nah seri kan, ong emen me selidi; ma iei ih wiepehn me ke pahn wia, a I pahn kaweliali.

12 Oh kilang, ma ke sohte pahn wia met, I pahn kohdonguhk iangahki nei sounpei kan; ei, iei I pahn pil kihong nei lih akan oh seri kan dipwisou en mahwin, oh I pahn kohwehnguhk, oh I pahn idawehnuhk lao lel nan pein sapwomw, me iei tepin sahpw en atail sohso; ei, oh e pahn nta ong nta, ei, mour ong mour; oh I pahn mahwinionguhk lao ke pahn kamwomwala sang pohn sampah.

13 Kilang, I mih nan ei lingeringer, oh pil nei aramas akan; kumwail rapahki en kemeikihtala, ah kiht se kin rapahkihte sen doareikihtla. Ahpw kilang, ma ke pahn rapahki ke en kaweikihtla laud se pahn rapahki sen kamwomwuhkala; ei, oh se pahn rapahkihwei sahpwato, sahpwatail tepin sahpw en sohsohu.

14 Met I ritingidi nei kisin likouwet. Ngehi Moronai; I wia emen kaun en aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan.

15 Met kedekedeo Amoron, ahnsou me e alehdi kisin likou wet, e lingeringerkihda; oh e ntingihda pil ehu kisin likou ong Moronai, oh iet koasoi kan me e ntingihdi, ndinda:

16 Ngehi iei Amoron, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan; ngehi iei rien Amelekaia pwutak me ke kemehla. Kilang, I pahn dupukehnguhk eh mehla, ei, oh I pahn kohwehnguhk iangahki nei sounpei kan pwe I sohte masak ahmw koasoi en kamasepwehk kan.

17 Pwe kilang, ahmw pahpahko wiahda sapwung ong riarail ohl kan, lao re pirapahsang arail pwuhng en koapwoarment ni eh koasondi irail me pwukoaki.

18 Oh met kilang, ma ke pahn pwilikihdi noumwail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh mweidehng kumwail pahn manaman ong irail me ahneki pwuhng en koapwoarment, ma met pahn wiawi I pahn wiahda nei aramas akan re en pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan oh pahn uhdihsang mahwin.

19 Kilang, ke wia koasoi en kamasepwehk ong ngehi oh nei aramas akan; ahpw kilang, se sohte masak ahmw koasoi kan.

20 Ahpw, I pahn mweidada kaweliali en me selidi nin duwen ahmw peki, sang ni peren, pwehki I men kanaidi kanat mwongehka ong nei ohl en mahwin kan; oh se pahn wia mahwin me pahn poatoapoat, pwe sen kak kiheng Mehn Nihpai pahn aht manaman de ong arail sohrala poatoapoat.

21 Oh nin duwen Kohto me kumwail nda me se kasohwe, kilang, se sohte ese soahng aramas sarawien; de pil kumwail; ahpw ma mie soahngen aramas sarawien, se sohte ese ahpw mwein e kapikada kumwail oh pil kiht.

22 Oh ma e pahn mehlel me mie tepel oh ehl, kilang e sou pahn kadaruhkala ke en iang mih wasahu rehn riei pwutak me ke kemehlahu, me ke kosoia me e kohla nan soangen wasahn? Ahpw kilang mepwukat sohte katepe.

23 Ngehi Amoron, oh I wia kadaudok en Soram, me ahmwail pahpako iding oh wahsang nan Serusalem.

24 Oh kilang met, Ngehi emen mehn Leimen me loalap; kilang, mahwin wet e wiawi pwe sen dupuk sapwung kan me re lokolok ki, oh en kolokolete oh alehdi arail pwuhng en koapwoarment; oh I kaimwsekala nei kisin likou ong Moronai.
alma 55:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 55[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai soikala kaweliali en me selidi kan—Nein Mehn Leimen soun silasil kan lohdieng nan kasakaula, oh Mehn Nihpai me sensel kan saledekla—Kahnihmw en Kid lohdi ni sohte nta keredi. Ele Sounpar 62–63 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai alehdi kisin likou wet e udahn lingeringerda, pwehki e ese me Amoron wehwehki unsek eh mwersuwed; ei, e ese me Amoron wehwehki me e sohte wia koasondi pwung ehu me re kohkihdo mahwin ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

2 Oh e ahpw nda: Kilang, I sohte pahn kaweliali me selidi ong Amoron ihte ma e pahn kapweiekwei ah koasondi, nin duwen ei koasoia nan nei kisin likouo; pwe I sohte pahn mweidehng en ahneki manaman laudsang dahme e ahnekier met.

3 Kilang, I ese wasa me Mehn Leimen kan kin sinsile nei aramas me re saliedi kan; oh pwehki Amoron sohte men kapwaiodo nin duwen nei kisin likouo, kilang, I pahn wiahiong ih nin duwen ei koasoi kan; ei, I pahn rapahkihong irail mehla lao re pahn peki popohl.

4 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai ndahier koasoi pwukat, e ahpw ndaiong iraile en rapahki nan pwungen nah ohl akan, ma e pahn kak diar emen aramas me wia kadaudoken Leimen rehrail.

5 Kedekedeo re ahpw kilangada emen, me kahdaniki Leimen; oh e wia emen ladu en nanmwarkio me Amelekaia kemehlahu.

6 Met Moronai ahpw ndaiong Leimen oh ekei nah ohl akan re en kohla rehn sounpei kan me sinsile Mehn Nihpai kan.

7 Met Mehn Nihpai kan silasildi nan kahnihmw en Kid; eri Moronai kihong Leimen oh kapatahieng ekei nah ohl akan re en iangih.

8 Oh ahnsou me e soutikpene Leimen kohla rehn sounsilasil kan me kin sinsile Mehn Nihpai kan, oh kilang, re kilangada eh kohkohdo oh re ahpw eker ih; ahpw e ndaiong irail: Kumwail dehr masak; kilang, ngehi emen Mehn Leimen. Kilang se tangasang Mehn Nihpai kan, oh re memeir; oh kilang se tangahkihsang nimarail wain kan oh wahdo.

9 Met ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan rongadahr koasoi pwukat re perenda nan ar kasamwo; oh re ndaiong ih: Kihiong kiht wain en, pwe se kak nim; se pereniki ahmw wahdo wain pwe kilang se pwangadahr.

10 Ahpw Leimen nda ong irail: Kitail koledi nimatail wain ka lao kitail pahn kohlahng mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan. Ahpw koasoi wet kahrehda arail inangihda laud re en nim waino;

11 Pwe, re nda: Se pwangada, eri mweidehng kiht sen nim wainen, oh mwurin ahnsou kis a kitail pahn alehdi sawasepatail kan, me pahn kakehlakahla kitail en kohlahng Mehn Nihpai kan.

12 Oh Leimen ahpw ndaiong irail: Kumwail kak wia nin duwen nsenamwail kan.

13 Kedekedeo re ahpw ale waino ni saledek; oh nemeneme udahn iou ong irail, eri re ale laud; oh e udahn kehlail, pwehki ar kaunopada en kehlail.

14 Kedekedeo irail ahpw niminim oh wie pereperen, oh mwurin ahnsou kis re ahpw sakaula.

15 Oh met ahnsou me Leimen oh ienge ohl akan kilangehr me irail koaros sakaulahr, oh re meirkeliklahr, re ahpw pwurala rehn Moronai oh ndaiong ih soahng koaros me wiawiher.

16 Oh met iei duwen koasondi en Moronai. Oh Moronai kaunopada nah ohl akan iangahki neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan; oh e ahpw kohla nan kahnimw en Kid, ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan wie memeirkelik oh sakaula, oh kihong dipwisou en mahwin me sensel kan, lao irail koaros koledier dipwisou en mahwin;

17 Iei, ong neirail lih akan, oh neirail seri kan koaros, koaros irail me kak doadoahngki dipwisou en mahwin, ahnsou me Moronai kihongehr me sensel kan dipwisou en mahwin; oh mepwukat koaros wiawi ni meleilei mehlel.

18 Ahpw ma re kapirada Mehn Leimen kan, kilang irail sakau oh Mehn Nihpai kan kakete kemeirailla.

19 Ahpw kilang, met kaidehn ihme Moronai inangih en wiawi; e sohte kin pereniki kamaramas de kakerehdi nta, ahpw pereniki kamaurala aramas sang kamwomwala; oh kahrepe wet pwe en dehr wiahiong pein ih mwekid sapwung, kahrehda e sohte men peiong Mehn Leimen kan oh kemeirailla nan arail sakaula.

20 Ahpw e kapwaiada eh inengo; pwe e kihongehr dipwisou en mahwin ong mehn Nihpai me selidi kan me mihmi nan kehl en kahnihmwo, oh kihong irail manaman en ahnekihla soahng kan me mihmi nan kehlo.

21 Oh e ahpw wiahiong ohl akan me iang ih re en ekis keisang irail, oh kapilpene sounpei en Mehn Leimen kan.

22 Kilang met e wiawi nihpwongo, kahrehda ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pwourda nimensengo re kilangada me Mehn Nihapi kan kapilirailpenehr, oh me neirail me selidi kan kolokolehr dipwisou en mahwin loale.

23 Oh met re kilangadahr me re milahr pahn manaman en Mehn Nihpai kan; oh nan soangen irair pwukat re pehm me e sohte konehng re en peiong Mehn Nihpai kan; eri arail kaun lapalap en sounpei kan ruwese ren ale neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh re ahpw wahdo oh kesehdi ni nehn Mehn Nihpai kan, oh pekipeki mahk.

24 Kilang, met iei ineng me Moronai ahneki. E alehdi me selidi sang mahwin kan, oh kalowehdi kahnihmwo, oh kahrehda me selidi koaros pahn saledekla, me wia Mehn Nihpai kan; oh re patehng nein Moronai sounpei kan, oh kakehlakahla nah sounpei ko.

25 Kedekedeo e ahpw kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan, me e salidier kan, me re pahn tepida wia doadoahk en kakehlakahla wasahn silasil kan me kapilpene kahnihmw en Kid.

26 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e kakehlakahla kahnihmw en Kid, nin duwen eh ineng kan, e ahpw koasonehdi me selidi ko pahn wisikla nan kahnimw en Rahk; oh e pil silehkihdi kahnihmwo pwihn en sounpei kehlail kowahlap.

27 Kedekedeo mehndahte Mehn Leimen kan ar kin songosong en keteweirail, ahpw re kin kolokol oh sinsile me lohdi kaoros me re kin koledi, oh sinsilehte wasa koaros me irail pwurehng kalowehdi oh paiamwahukihda.

28 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan pwurehng tepida pweida, oh pwurehng alehdi arail pwuhng kan oh arail saledek en pai kan.

29 Pak tohto Mehn Leimen kan kin song en kapilirailpene nihpwong, ahpw ahnsou koaros me re kin song tohto irail kin lohdi.

30 Oh pak tohto re kin song en kihong nimarail wain kan rehn Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe re en kak kaweirailla sang ni poisin de sakaula.

31 Ahpw kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan sohte kin pwand en tamataman Kauno arail Koht nan arail ahnsou apwal wet. Re sohte kak pitida nan arail lidip kan; ei, re sohte kin alehda arail wain kan, ihte ma re kin tepte kihong mahs ekei Mehn Leimen me senselko.

32 Oh re kin kanaiehng pwe sohte poisin pahn kohieng rehrail; pwe ma arail wain kan pahn poisinihdi emen Mehn Leimen e pahn pil poisinihdi Mehn Nihpai; oh ih mwomwen arail kin song arail sakau kan koaros.

33 Oh met kedekedeo e konehng Moronai en kaukaunop en mahwiniong kahnihmw en Moriandon; pwe kilang, Mehn Leimen kan, sang ni arail doadoahk, re kakehlakalahr kahnihmw en Moriandon lao e wiahla ehu wasa kehlail.

34 Oh re wie wahwahdo pwihn en sounpei kapw nan kahnihmwo, oh pil iangahki arail dipwisou en sawas akan.

35 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr rieisek duwau en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.
alma 56:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 56[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ilemen kadarala kisin likou ehu rehn Moronai, soiahda duwen irair en mahwin ong Mehn Leimen kan—Andipus oh Ilemen kalowehdi Mehn Leimen kan—Nein Ilemen pwutak mwahnakapw riekido mahwin sang ni manaman kapwuriamwei, oh sohte emen rehrail mehla. Ire tikitik 1, Ele Sounpar 62 Mwohn Krais; ire tikitik 2–19, Ele Sounpar 66 Mwohn Krais; oh ire tikitik 20–57, Ele Sounpar 65–64 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr silihsek en mwehin sounkopwung kan, ni keriau en rahn en keieu en sounpungo, Moronai alehdi kisin likou ehu sang rehn Ilemen, me koasoiahda irair en aramas akan ni apali sahpwo.

2 Oh iet mahsen akan me e ntingihdi, me mahsanih: Moronai, riei ohl kesempwal rehn Kauno oh pil nan ahnsou apwal en atail mahwin; kilang, riei ohl kesempwal, I men koasoiahionguhk ekis duwen atail mahwin wasaht ni pali en sahpw wet.

3 Kilang, pwutak riekid me wia nein aramas me Amon kahrehdo sang nan sahpw en Nihpai—eri ke wehwehkier me irail wia kadaudok en Leimen, me wia nein atail pahpa Lihai pwutak keieu laud;

4 Eri I sohte anahne pwurehng koasoiahionguhk duwen arail tiahk de arail soupwoson, pwe ke wehwehkier duwen mepwukat koaros—

5 Eri e itarete I en ndahwei me mwahnakapw riekid pwukat alehdahr neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh irail men I en wia arail kaun; oh se kohdo iang doare atail wehi.

6 Oh met ke pil wehwehkier duwen inou me arail pahpa kan wiadahr, me re sohte pahn alehda dipwisou en mahwin kan pwe re en kakerehdi ntahn riarail kan.

7 Ahpw nan pahr rieisek wenou, ahnsou me re kilangada atail lokolok kan oh atail kahpwal akan pwehki irail, re apwtehn pahn kawehla inouo me re wiahda oh alehda neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan pwe re en doare iang kitail.

8 Ahpw I sohte men mweidehng irail en kawehla inou wet me re wiahda, pwehki I medewe me Koht pahn kakehlakahla kitail, me pahn kahrehda kitail sohte pahn lokolok laud pwehki pweidahn inouo me re wiahda.

9 Ahpw kilang, iet ehu mehkot me kitail kak perenki mehlel. Pwe kilang, nan pahr rieisek wenouo, ngehi, Ilemen, kahrehda karihs en mwahnakapw riekido kohla nan kahnihmw en Sudia, pwe sen sowese Andipus, me ke idiada en kaun aramas akan ni pali en sahpwo.

10 Oh I kapatahiong nei pwutak riekido, (pwe re warohng I en ekerkinirail nei pwutak) nein Andipus sounpei kan, me kakehlakahda Andipus ni eh peren mehlel; pwe kilang, nah sounpei ko malaulaulahr pwehki Mehn Leimen kan kemehlahr tohto neitail ohl akan, me kahrehda kitail pahn mwahieiki.

11 Ahpw, kitail kak ahneki popohl nan irair wet, pwe irail mehkihla doadoahk en arail wehi oh arail Koht, ei, oh irail peren.

12 Oh Mehn Leimen kan saliedier tohto irail, koaros me wia kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, pwe sohte likin irail me re kamaurala. Oh se medewe me ahnsou wet re mihmiher nan sahpw en Nihpai; iei met mehlel ma re sohte kamakamala.

13 Oh met iet kahnihmw kan me Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi sang ni arail kemehkihla tohto neitail ohl komwad kan:

14 Sahpw en Mandai, de kahnihmw en Mandai, oh kahnihmw en Sihesrom, oh kahnihmw en Kumenai, oh kahnihmw en Andipara.

15 Oh ih kahnihmw pwukat me re kalohwehdi ahnsou me I lelledo nan kahnihmw en Sudia; oh I diarada Andipus oh nah ohl akan ar nannantihong nan arail doadoahk en kakehlakahla kahnihmwo.

16 Ei, oh irail pwangahdahr ni paliwar oh pil ni palingehn, pwe irail komwad en pei nan ehu ehu rahn oh nihpwong irail loaloapwoat en doadoahk pwe irail en kak kolokolete arail kahnihmw kan; oh met kahrehda ar lokolongki soangen kahpwal lap kan.

17 Eri met re koasonehdi me re pahn pweida wasahu de mehla; eri kitail kak medewe me kisin pwihn me I wahdohu, ei, nei pwutak ko, kihong irail koapworopwor laud oh peren mehlel.

18 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr Andipus alehdier kakehlepen nah sounpei kan, a re alehdi ruwes sang Amoron me re sohte pahn kohdohng kiht nan kahnihm en Sudia, de kodo mahwiniong kiht.

19 Oh met se ahpw kenikenla rehn Kauno; pwe ma re pahn kohdohng kiht nan aht luwet irail mwein kakete kawehla nait kisin sounpei ka; ahpw iei se poadoandoarla.

20 Re alehdi ruwes sang rehn Amoron me re pahn koledihte kahnihmw kan me re kalowehdi. Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr rieisek wenou. Oh ni tepidahn pahr rieisek isuho se ahpw kaunopada aht kahnihmwo oh pein kiht pwe sen doare.

21 Met se inangih me Mehn Leimen kan en kohdohng kiht; pwe se sohte inangih mahwiniong irail ni ar pahn mihmi nan wasahn sileparail kehlail kan.

22 Kedekedeo se ahpw kadarpeseng soun lipoahrok kan kapilpene wasahu, pwe re en tetehk mwekmwekid en Mehn Leimen kan, pwe re sohte pahn koteikihtla nihpwong de nihrahn pwe re en mahwiniong aht kahnihmw teikan me mihmih paliepeng.

23 Pwe se wehwehki me nan kahnihmw ko, irail sohte ahneki kehlail me pahn itar en pelian irail; eri se inangih mahwiniong irail mwurirail oh pil ni ansouohte mwohrail, ma irail pahn kohdo daulih kiht. Se medewe me se kak poweiraildi; ahpw kilang, se insensuwedkihla ineng wet e sohte pweida.

24 Irail sohte men neirail sounpei kan pwon en kohdo daulih kiht, de pil ekei irail, pwe re de sohte itar oh lohdi.

25 De pil men karihsdihla nan kahnihmw en Saraemla; de pil kotehla wasa me Saidon keredohsang, kohtehla lel kahnihmw en Nihpaia.

26 Oh met re koasonehdi me re pahn koledihte kahnihmw kan me re kalowehkihdi neirail sounpei kan.

27 Oh met kedekedeo ni keriau en sounpwung en pahro, mie sawas kei me wisikdohng kiht sang rehn nei pwutak riekido arail pahpah kan.

28 Oh pil sounpei meh riekid kohdo sang nan sahpw en Saraemla. Oh met se kaunopadahr nait ohl meh nen, oh kenerail mwonge kan, oh pil ong arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan.

29 Oh Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki ar kilikilang nait sounpei kan arail wie tohtohla rahn koaros, oh sawaseparail kan kin kohdong irail, re tepida masepwehkada, oh tepida kin kohdohng kiht, ma e pahn kak re en kauhdihsang kiht alehdi aht sawas kan oh kakehlail kan.

30 Eri ahnsou me se kilangadahr me Mehn Leimen kan tepidahr soansuwedki mwekid wet, se ahpw medewehda wiahda koasondi ehu me pahn mie lipwe rehrail; eri Andipus ndaiong ie me I pahn karehda nei pwutak pwulopwulko oh kohla ni ehu kahnihmw me mih mpat ni aht pahn mwomwen me se wewa sawasepen kahnihmwo.

31 Oh se pahn keid limwahn kahnihmw en Antipara, mwomwen me se pahn kohla ni kahnihmw me mih palio, ni keilen oaroahro.

32 Oh kedekedeo se ahpw karihs kohla nan kahnihmwo, ni mwomwen me se wa aht sawas akan.

33 Kedekedeo Andipus ahpw kahrehdahr ekei nah sounpei ko oh karihs kohla, a luhwehko mihmih nan kahnihmwo. Ahpw e sohte kohla lao nei kisin sounpei ko tihengla, oh kohla karanih kahnihmw en Andipara.

34 Eri met, nan kahnihmw en Andipara nein Mehn Leimen pwihn en sounpei keieu kehlail kin sinsile mwo; ei, me keieu pokon.

35 Kedekedeo ahnsou me neirail lipoahrok kan ndahiong irail, irail ahpw kohieido iangahki neirail sounpei ko oh pwakih kiht.

36 Kedekedeo se ahpw tangasang irail, kohla paliepeng. Oh met se ahpw kahluwahsangehr nein Mehn Leimen pwihn sounpei me keieu kehlail;

37 Ei, uwen dohlahieu, kahrehda ahnsou me re kilangada nein Andipus sounpei kan wia arail kak koaros en pwakipwakih irail, irail sohte pirekekla pali koahiek de pali soakoahiek, ahpw re kohweite nan ar pwepwekio nan ahl inen mwurit; oh, se medewe, me re inangih re en kemeikihtla mwohn Andipus pahn koliraildi, pwe nait aramas kan dehr kapil irailpene.

38 Eri met pwehki Andipus eh kilangadahr keper me se mih loale, e ahpw kamwadangahieng nah sounpei kan. Ahpw kilang, e nihpwongdi; eri re sohte kolkihtdi, oh pil Andipus sohte koliraildi; eri se ahpw pweidi nihsoutuko.

39 Kedekedeo mwohn e pahn nimensengda, kilang, Mehn Leimen kan ahpw tepida pwakpwakih kiht. Eri se sohte pahn kak pelian irail; ei, oh I sohte men mweidehng nei pwutak tikitik kan en pwupwidi nan pehrail kan, eri se peusehla aht tango, oh se ahpw kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

40 Eri re sohte men sohpeila pali koahiek de pil pali soakoahiek pwe re de lohdi; oh I pil sohte men sohpeila pali koahiek de pil pali soakoahiek pwe irail de kolkihtdi, oh se sohte pahn kak pelian irail, ahpw se pahn kamakamala, oh irail pahn kak pitila; oh se ahpw tangatang rahno pwon nan sapwtehno, lao e rotorotala.

41 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e pwurehng marainpeseng se kilangada Mehn Leimen kan kohkohdohng kiht, oh se pwurehng tangasang irail.

42 Ahpw kedekedeo re uhdi pwakih kiht ahnsou werei; oh met iei ni menseng en kesiluh en rahn en keisuhn sounpwungo.

43 Oh met, ma Andipus koliraildier se sohte ese, ahpw I ndaiong nei ohl akan: Kilang, kitail sohte ese ma irail sou uhdi pwe re men kitail en pwuralahng irail, pwe irail en kaloweikitaildi nan arail lidip;

44 Eri dahme kumwail pahn nda, nei pwutangko, kumwail pahn kak kohla oh mahwiniong irail?

45 Oh met I ndaionguhk, riei ohl kesempwal Moronai, me I sohte kin kilang soangen eimah lap wet, soh, sohte rehn Mehn Nihpai kan koaros.

46 Pwe ni ei kin kalapw ekerkin irail nei pwukat kan (pwe irail koaros me pwulopwul) iei re ahpw pil ndaiong ie: Pahpa, kilang atail Koht ieiang kitail, oh e sohte pahn mweidehng kitail en pwupwidi; eri kitail kohwei; kitail sohte pahn kemehla riatail akan ma re pahn uhdihsang kedirapwa kitail; eri kitail kohwei, pwe re de kalowehdi nein Andipus sounpei kan.

47 Eri re saikinte iang mahwin pak ehu, ahpw re sohte masak mehla; oh re kesempwaliki saledek en arail pahpa kan sang pein arail mour; ei, arail nohno kan kaweidkinirail, ma re pahn sohte peikasal, Koht pahn doareirailla.

48 Oh re kin kapwkapwurehiong ehn arail nohno kan koasoi, ndinda: Se sohte peikasal, aht nohno kan ese.

49 Kedekedeo ngehi eri pwurala iangahki nei sounpei riekido pwe sen pelian Mehn Leimen kan me pwakipwakih kiht. Eri kilang, nein Andipus sounpei kan konoiraildier, oh mahwin keper ehu apw tepida.

50 Oh nein Andipus sounpei kan pwehki arail pwangadahr, sang ni arail pwakih iraildo sang wasa doh nan erein ahnsou mwotomwot, re kereniong lohdieng pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan; oh ma I sohte pwurikihdo nei sounpei riekido irail pahn pahn pweidahr nan dahme re mwahuki.

51 Pwe Andipus kamakamkilahr kedlahs, oh tohto nah kaun en sounpei kan, pwehki arail pwangada, sang ni ar seimek nan ar pwepwekio—eri nein Andipus ohl akan, pwehki ar pingkidahr arail kaun kan ar mehla, re tepida pweiek mwohn Mehn Leimen kan.

52 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw loalapada, oh tepida pwaki irail; eri met Mehn Leimen kan pwakipwakihkin irail ar kehlail ni ahnsou me Ilemen pwarada mwurirail iangahki nah meh riekido, Oh tepida kemeirailla ni mehlel, kahrehda nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei ko pwon uhdi oh sohpeidohng Ilemen.

53 Met ahnsou me nein Andipus aramas akan kilangada me Mehn Leimen kan pwuralahr mwuri, re ahpw kihpene neirail ohl akan oh kohdohng mwurin Mehn Leimen kan.

54 Oh met kedekedeo kiht, aramas en Nihpai kan, nein Andipus aramas akan, oh ngehi iangahki nei sounpei riekido, kapilpenehr Mehn Leimen kan, oh kemeirailla; ei, lao re idihdiong en pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan oh pil wiahla aramas selidi sang nan mahwin.

55 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me irail mweidala re en mih pahn aht manaman, kilang, I wadekedi irail mwahnakapw kan me iangie mahwin, pwehki ei salohki me tohto irail mwein kamakamala.

56 Ahpw kilang, I perenda mehlel, pwehki sohte emen irail me pwupwidi nan pwehl; ei, oh irail pei duwehte sapwellimen Koht roson ketiket rehrail; ei, sohte ohl men me dehdehki eh mwahwin duwehte soangen roson kapwuriamwei wet; oh soangen manaman kehlail re peikihong Mehn Leimen kan, kahrehda irail kamasakada irail; oh met kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan lohdieng re en wia aramas selidi nan mahwin.

57 Oh sohte dowen nait me selidi kan, pwe sen kak sile irail pwe irail en dehr pwurala rehn nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan, eri se kin kadarirailla nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh ekei nein Andipus ohl akan me sohte kamakamala, en iangirail; oh luhwehkan I ale irail oh kapatahieng nei mwahnakapw en Mehn Amon kan, oh pwurehng karihs kohla nan kahnihmw en Sudia.
alma 57:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 57[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ilemen koasoiahda arail kalowehdi Andipara oh lohdi en Kumenai oh mwuhr poadoandoarepe—Nah mwahnakapw en Mehn Amon kan loaloapwotiong mahwin; koaros ohla, ahpw sohte emen mehla—Kid pakairkihdo duwen kamakamalahn Mehn Leimen me selidi kan oh arail pitila. Ele Sounpar 63 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo I alehdi kisin likou ehu sang rehn Amoron, nanmwarkio, me mahsanih ma se pahn mweidala sounpei me se kalowehdih kan re pahn mweidehng kiht kahnihmw en Andipara.

2 Ahpw I kadaralahng nanmwarkio kisin likou ehu, me kasalehiong me se kamehlele me nait sounpei kan kak kalowehdi kahnihmw en Andipara nan mahwin; oh ma se pahn mweidala sounpei selidi kan met e sohte wia mwekid marain, oh ihte ma se pahn mweidala ma se pahn kaweliali.

3 Oh Amoron kasohwe nei kisin likouo, pwe e sohte men kaweliali me selidi kan; eri se tepida kaunopada sen kohlahng kahnihmw en Andipara.

4 Ahpw aramas en Andipara tangasang nan kahnihmwo, oh kohla nan ekei arail kahnihmw kan, me re kolokolete, pwe re en kakehlakahla; oh met kahnihmw en Andipara lohdiengehr pahn aht manaman.

5 Oh met keimwsekala pahr rieisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

6 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr rieisek duwauo, se alehdi aht sawas akan, oh pil kapatahieng ekei nait sounpei, sang nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh sang nan sahpw akan me kapilpene, uwen tohtohn ohl meh wenekid, likin pwutak meh wenehk sang Mehn Amon kan me pil iang kohdo patehng riarail kan, nei kisin pwihn riekido. Oh met kilang, se kehlail, ei, oh tohto sawasapat oh aht dipwisou me wisikdohng kiht.

7 Kedekedeo se inangih sen mahweniong sounpei kan me sinsile kahnihmw en Kumenai.

8 Oh met kilang, I pahn kasalehionguhk me aht ineng wet pahn pweida; ei, sang nait sounpei kehlail, de ekei nait sounpei kehlail kan, se kapilkinirailpene nihpwong, nan kahnihmw en Kumenai, mwohnte arail pahn alehdi arail sawas akan.

9 Kedekedeo se ahpw kapilpene kahnihmwo oh pweidi erein pwohng kei; ahpw se kin meir nait kedilahs kan karanih kiht, oh mie nait soun silasil kan, kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan sohte kak kohdohng kiht nihpwong oh kemeikihtla, ahpw irail kin song pak tohto; ahpw pak tohto me re kin song wia ntahrail kin keredi.

10 Arail sawas akan ahpw lelledo, oh re aptehn pahn pidelong nan kahnihmwo nihpwohngo. Oh pwehki kaidehn kiht Mehn Leimen, se wia Mehn Nihpai kei; eri, se koliraildi oh kihsang arail sawas akan.

11 Oh mehndahte Mehn Leimen kan ar lipsangehr arail wasa akan ni mwohmw wet, re pil koasoanehdihte me re pahn kolokolete kahnihmwo; eri e konehng me se pahn ale arail mehn sawas ko oh kadarala nan Sudia, oh me se saliedi kan nan sahpw en Saraemla.

12 Kedekedeo e sohte pwandasang rahn kei mwohn Mehn Leimen kan tepida sohla koapworopworki me re kak alehdi ar sawas kan; eri irail mweidala kahnihmwo ong pahn aht manaman; oh met aht koasoandi en alehdi kahnihmw en Kumenai pweidahr.

13 Ahpw kedekedeo irail akan me se saliedi kan uwen arail pokon, mehndahte uwen tohtohn kiht, se kin itoitieng en doadoahngki nait sounpei kan en sinsile irail, de kemeirailla.

14 Pwe kilang, re kin song en tang ni ar pokon, oh re kin peiki takai kan, oh iangahki lepin tuhke, de soahng kan me re kin kak koledi nan pehrail kan, kahrehda se kemehla uwen tohtohn irail meh riekid mwurin arail mweidala re en wiahla aramas selidi sang nan mahwin.

15 Eri e konehng ong kiht, me se pahn kemeirailla, de sile irail, ni aht kolokol nait kedlahs, kohdihla nan sahpw en Saraemla; oh pil kanat mwonge de sawas kan sohte itar ong pein nait aramas akan, mehndahte aht kihsang kenen Mehn Leimen kan.

16 Oh met, nan irair kesempwal ko, e wiahla mehkot kesempwal sen koasonehdi duwen aramas me selidi kan nan mahwin; ahpw, se pilada me se pahn kadarirailla nan sahpw en Saraemla; eri se pilada ekei nait ohl akan, oh kihong irail pwukoa en wahdihla me selidi kan nan sahpw en Saraemla.

17 Ahpw kedekedeo mandahn rahno irail pwurehng pwurodo. Oh met kilang, se sohte kalelapak duwen me selidi ko; pwe kilang, Mehn Leimen kan kohkohdohng kiht, oh re pwurodo nan ahnsou mwau pwe re en sawas doareikiht sang pahn arail manaman. Pwe kilang, Amoron kadaralahng irail arail sawas oh pil pokon en ohl sounpei kei.

18 Kedekedeo ohl akan me se kadarala re en kahrehla me selidi ko pwurodo nan ahnsou mwahu en tehk irail, ni arail kereniong kaloweikihtdi.

19 Ahpw kilang, nei kisin pwihn riekid wenehko pei ni sohte masepwehk; ei, irail kehlail mwohn Mehn Leimen kan, oh kemehla koaros me pelian irail.

20 Oh ni luhwen nait sounpei kan ar kereniongehr pweiek sang mwohn Mehn Leimen kan, kilang, irail meh riekid wenehko tengedi oh sohte pweiek.

21 Ei, oh irail kapwaiada oh nantihong idawehn mahsen koaros ni pwung; ei, oh nin duwen arail pwoson e kin wiawihong irail; oh I kin tamatamante koasoi kan me irail kin ndaiong ie me arail nohno kan padahkihong irail.

22 Oh met kilang, iei nei pwutak pwukat, oh irail ohl oko me pilipilda pwe re en wahla me selidi ko, iei irail me kitail kapingkihong irail pweidahn mahwen lap wet; pwe iei irail me kemehda Mehn Leimen kan; kahrehda irail pweiekla wasa re kohsang ie nan kahnihmw en Mandai.

23 Oh se kalowehdi atail kahnihmw en Kumenai, oh pali laud sohte ohkihla kedlahs; ahpw, se lokolongki ohla laud.

24 Kedekedeo mwurin Mehn Leimen kan ar tang, I mwadangete ruwesehiong irail me nei ohl akan me ohla re en kihsang nan pwungen me mehla kan, oh kidimpene arail ohla kan.

25 Kedekedeo irail meh riepwuki, sang nan nei sounpei riekid wenehko, me lipwongmaskihla nta kerasang irail; ahpw, nin duwen kalahngan en Koht, oh me kapwuriamwei mehlel ong kitail, oh pil kaperen ong neitail sounpei kan koaros, pwehki sohte emen irail me mehla; ei, oh sohte emen nan pwungarail me sohte ohla.

26 Oh met, arail komourla udahn kapwuriamwei ong nait sounpei kan koaros, ei, pwehki irail kin mourla a kid en riatail kan me kin mehla. Oh se kamehlele me kapwuriamwei wet sang ni manaman en Koht, pwehki arail pwoson kowahlap dahme irail kaweidkihda re en kamehlele—me mie Koht pwung men, oh mehmen me sohte pahn peikasalki, me re pahn poadoandoarala sang ni sapwellime manaman kapwuriamwei.

27 Met iei pwoson me irail ahneki me I koasokosoia; irail pwulopwul, oh arail madamadau kehlail, oh re kin koapworopworiki Koht ahnsou koaros.

28 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin aht apwaliadahr nait ohl akan me ohla, oh sarepidier aht mehla kan oh pil ahn Mehn Leimen kan mehla kan, me tohto, kilang, se ahpw kalelapak rehn Kid duwen me selidi kan me irail wie kahkarehdila nan sahpw en Saraemla.

29 Eri Kid me wia kaun lapalap en pwihn en sounpei me pwukoahki sile irail kohdihla nan sahpwo.

30 Eri met, iet duwen dahme Kid ndaiong ie: Kilang, se tepida kahrehdila neitail aramas selidi kan nan sahpw en Saraemla. Kedekedeo se ahpw tuhwong lipoahrok en nait sounpei kan, me se kadarewei pwe re en tehk wasa Mehn Leimen kan mih ie.

31 Oh re ahpw werikihdohngkiht, ndinda—Kilang, nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan karkarihs kohlahng kahnihmw en Kumenai; oh kilang, re pahn mahwiniong irail, ei, oh kamwomwala neitail aramas kan.

32 Kedekedeo aramas me se saliedi ko ahpw rongada arail weriweriki, me kahrehda arail loallapada; oh re ahpw peiong kiht.

33 Kedekedeo pwehki arail peiong kiht, se ahpw pelehkin iraildi nait kedlahs kan. Kedekedeo ni arail pwonte tangodong nait kedlahs kan, me kahrehda, pali laud en irail kamakamala; oh luwen irail pitila oh tangasang kiht.

34 Oh kilang, ahnsou me re tang oh se sohte kak koliraildi, se ahpw pwurodo ni kahnihmw en Kumenai; oh kilang, se lelledo ni ahnsou mwahu pwe sen kak sowese riat akan doarehla kahnihmw wet.

35 Oh kilang, kitail pwurehng poadoandoarala sang nan pehn atail imwintihtih kan. Oh meid pai mwaren atail Koht; pwe kilang iei ih me ketin doarei kitaila; ei, me ketin wiahiong kitailehr doadoahk lap wet.

36 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me ngehi, Ilemen, rongehr koasoi pwukat sang Kid, I direkihla peren kowahlap pwehki sapwellimen Koht kupwur kalahngan en doandoarei kiht, pwe kiht koaros en dehr mehla; ei, oh I koapworopworiki me ngenin irail akan koaros me mehla pwuralahng wasahn komoal rehn arail Koht.
alma 58:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 58[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ilemen, Kid, oh Diomner kalowehdi kahnihmw en Mandai sang ni wiepen koasondi ehu—Mehn Leimen kan pweiekla—Nein aramas en Amon pwutak ko poadoandoarala ni ar kehlail en doare arail saledek en mour oh pwoson. Ele Sounpar 63–62 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh kilang, kedekedeo aht koasondi mwurin met iei sen kalowehdi kahnihmw en Mandai; ahpw kilang, e apwal se en kahluwahsang irail nan kahnihmwo sang ni aht pahn doadoahngki nait pwihn tikitik wet. Pwe kilang, re tamatamante dahme se wiahiong irailehro; eri se sohte kak pahne irail sang nan sileparail kan.

2 Oh irail me pokon mehlel sang nait sounpei kan kahrehda se sohte men kohla oh peiong irail nan wasahn sileparail kan.

3 Ei, oh e konehng se pahn koadoadoahkih nait ohl akan pwe irail en apwahpwalih sahpw akan me se pwurehng kalowehdi; eri e konehng se pahn awihte, pwe se en kak alehdi kakehlapat sang sahpw en Saraemla oh pil ekei aht sawas me kapw.

4 Kedekedeo I ahpw kadaralahng kepinahn sapwetailet pakair ehu, pwe se en kairehki duwen irair akan en nait aramas akan. Kedekedeo se ahpw awih pwe se en alehdi sawas oh kakehlail sang sahpw en Saraemla.

5 Ahpw kilang, met sohte nohn mie katepehiong kiht; pwe Mehn Leimen kan pil kin alialehdi kakehlail nan ehu ehu rahn, oh pil tohto sawas akan; oh iei met irair me se mih loale ahnsou wet.

6 Oh Mehn Leimen kan kin kohdo mahwiniong kiht ekei pak, oh songosong re en kaweikihtla sang ar koasondi en lidip kan; ahpw se sohte kak kohla mahwiniong irail, pwehki arail kin pweieklahng nan ar wasa oh nan sileparail kan.

7 Kedekedeo se kin wie awih nan irair en ahnsou apwal pwukat erein sounpwung kei, lao se kereniong mehkila aht anahne mwonge.

8 Ahpw kedekedeo se ahpw alehdi mwonge, me pil iangahki sounpei meh riekid me sinsile kohdo pwe en soweseikiht; oh iei ihte sawas me se alehdi met, pwe se en kak doarei kitail oh atail wehi sang lohdieng nan pehn atail imwintihtih kan, ei, pwe se en pelian imwintihti me pokon mehlel.

9 Eri met se sohte wehwehki ia kahrepen kapwal kanamenek pwukat, de kahrepen arail sohte kadaredo sawas en kakehlail ong kiht; eri se insensued oh pil ahneki saloh, pwe e de pahn sapwellimen Koht kalokolok me pahn kohdong nan sapwatail, pwe kitail en lekidekla oh kamwomwala.

10 Eri se loalloapwoatieng kapakap ong Koht, pwe en kak kakehlakahla kiht oh doarehsang kiht nan pehn aht imwintihtih kan, ei, oh pil ketikihong kiht roson pwe se en kak kolokolete aht kahnihmw kan, oh sapwat kan, oh aht dipwisou kan, pwe en kak sowese nait aramas akan.

11 Ei, oh kedekedeo Kauno atail Koht ketin ketikihong kiht koapworopwor me e pahn ketin doareikihtla; ei, lao e ketin mahsani popohl ong palingenat, oh ketikihong kiht pwoson laud, oh ahpw kahrehiong kiht se en koapworopworki e pahn doareikihtla.

12 Oh se ahneki eimah iangahki nait sounpei malaulau me se alehdi, oh koasonehdi me se pahn kalowehdi aht imwintihti kan, oh kolokolete sahpwat kan, oh aht dipwisou kan, oh aht pwoud kan, oh nait seri kan, oh atail doadoahk saledek en momour.

13 Oh met se ahpw kohlahng ni aht kehl unsek Mehn Leimen kan, me mih nan kahnihmw en Mandai; oh se kauada imwat impwal akan ni pali me sallahng sapwtehno, me karanih kahnihmwo.

14 Kedekedeo mandahsang rahno, ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr me se mihmi ni irepen sapwtehno me karanih kahnihmwo, re ahpw kadareieido neirail lipoahrok kan pwe re en kak diarada uwen tohtohn kiht oh kehlail en nait sounpei kan.

15 Kedekedeo ahnsou me re kilangada me se sohte kehlail, nin duwen uwen tohtohn kiht, oh pwehki ar periki se de pahn supukedihsang arail sawas kan ihte ma re pahn pidohi oh mahwiniong kiht oh kemeikihtla, oh pil re medewe me re pahn kak mengei en kemehkinkihtla neirail karis en sounpeio, eri re ahpw tepida kaunopada pwe re en kohdohng mahwiniong kiht.

16 Oh ahnsou me se kilang me irail kaukaunop en kohieido mahwiniong kiht, kilang, I ndaiong Kid, iangahki ekei ohl, me re pahn rukila nan sapwtehno, oh pil Diomner oh ekei ohl pahn pil rukila nan sapwtehno.

17 Met Kid oh nah ohl akan mih pali koahiek oh mehteiko ni pali soakoahiek; oh ahnsou me re rukila, kilang, ngehi I mihmihte, iangahki luhwen nei sounpei kan, wasahute me se wiahda aht impwal akan ni ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pahn kohieido mahwen.

18 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohieido iangahki neirail karis en sounpei pwe re en peiong kiht. Oh ahnsou me re kohdo oh pahn mahwinkihong kiht kedlahs, I ndaiong nei ohl akan, me mihmi rehi, se en pweiekila nan sapwtehno.

19 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw pwakihkihtdo ni ar marahra koaros, pwe re inangih kowahlap me re pahn kaloweikihtdi pwe re en kak kemeikihtla; eri re idawehn kiht kohla nan sapwtehno; oh se daulih nan pwungen Kid oh Diomner, kahrehda re sohte kak dierek pahn Mehn Leimen ko.

20 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan daulih kiht, de ahnsou me sounpei kan daulih, Kid oh Diomner pwaradahsang nan wasahn arail rukila kan, oh kemehla nein Mehn Leimen lipoahrok kan pwe re de pwurala nan kahnihmwo.

21 Kedekedeo ahnsou me re kemeirailla, re ahpw tangala ni kahnihmwo oh kemehla soun silasil kan me mihmi oh sinsile kahnihmwo, lao re kemeirailla oh kalowehdi kahnihmwo.

22 Met e wiawi pwehki Mehn Leimen kan mweidala neirail sounpeiko pwon en kohla nan sapwtehno, ihte ekeite me sinsile.

23 Kedekedeo Kid oh Diomner sang ni wiepe wet re kalowehdi wasahn sileparailo kan. Kedekedeo se ahpw kainenehla wasa se kohkohla, mwurin aht tangatang nan sapwtehno kolahng nan sahpw en Saraemla.

24 Oh ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr me re wie kohkohlahng sahpw en Saraemla, re udahn masepwehkada, pwe e de pahn mie koasondi en kahluwairaillahng nan kamwomwala; eri re tepida pwurehng pwurala nan sapwtehno, iei, pwuralahte nan ahl me re kohdo loalle.

25 Oh kilang, e nihpwongdi oh re wiahda imwarail impwal akan, pwe kaun lapalap en sounpei kan en Mehn Leimen kan medewe me Mehn Nihpai kan pwangadahr pwehki arail tango; oh ni ar medemedewe me re pwakialahr neirail sounpei ko pwon eri re sohte medewe duwen kahnihmw en Mandai.

26 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me e nipwongidi, I ndaiong nei ohl akan me re sohte pahn meir, ahpw se pahn keid nan ehu ahl pwurala ni kahnihmw en Mandai.

27 Oh pwehki aht karis pwurala nihpwongo, kilang, madahn rahno se daulihlahr Mehn Leimen kan, kahrehda se lella mwohrail nan kahnihmw en Mandai.

28 Eri kedekedeo, sang ni koasondi wet se kalowehdi kahnihmw en Mandai ni sohte nta keredi.

29 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nien Mehn Leimen sounpei kan lelledo ni kahnihmwo, oh kilangada me se onopadahr tuhwong irail, re pwuriamwei kowahlap oh udahn masepwehkada, kahrehda re tang pwurala nan sapwtehno.

30 Ei, kedekedeo nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan ahpw tangasang nan sahpwet pwon. Ahpw kilang, re tangahki lih tohto oh seri tohto sang nan sahpwet.

31 Oh kahnihmw kan me Mehn Leimen kan koledi, koaros ahnsou wet mihmi pahn aht manaman; oh aht pahpa kan oh aht pwoud kan oh nait seri kan pwurupwuralahng ni imwarail akan, koaros ihte irail akan me Mehn Leimen kan koledi oh wahsang.

32 Ahpw kilang, nait sounpei kat malaulau ong sinsile kahnihmw tohto pwukat oh soahng kan me mih pahn aht manaman.

33 Ahpw kilang, se koapworopworki Koht me ketikihong kiht pweida nan sahpw pwukat, me kahrehda aht kak kalowehdi kahnihmw kan oh sahpw akan, me iei udahn atail.

34 Eri se sohte wehwehki kahrepen koapworment e sohte kadaredohngkiht kakehlail; de pil irail ohl akan me kohdado reht re sohte wehwehki dahme se sohte alehkidi sawas en kakehlail.

35 Kilang, se sohte ese ma e sou pwehki ahmw sohte pweida palien, oh kowe kihwei sounpei kan nan sahpw teikan; ma iei met me wiawi, a se sohte pahn kaulimki.

36 Ma iei met soh, kilang, se periki e de pahn mie mehkot sapwung nan koapworment, me kahrehda ar sohte kadaredo ekei ohl en sawas; pwe se ese me re tohtohsang uwen me irail kadaredo kan.

37 Ahpw, kilang, e sohte katepe—se liki me Koht pahn ketin doarekihtla, mehndahte luwet en nait sounpei kan, ei, oh doarehsang kiht nan pehn aht imwintihtih kan.

38 Kilang, met iei imwilahn pahr kerieisek duwau, oh se kolokolehr sapwatail kan; oh Mehn Leimen kan tangasangehr nan sahpw en Mehn Nihpai.

39 Oh nein aramas en Amon pwutak ko, me I kepingairail mehlel, re ieiang ie nan kahnihmw en Mandai; oh Kauno ketin utungirailda, ei, oh doandoare irail sang mehkihla kedlahs, lao sohte emen irail mehla.

40 Ahpw kilang, re alehdi diren ohla; ahpw re kehkehlailiki saledek en momour me Koht ketin ketikihong irail re en saledengki; oh re loalloapwoatieng tamataman Kauno arail Koht nan ehu ehu rahn; ei, re kin nantihong kapwaiada sapwellime koasondi kan, oh sapwellime kopwung kan, oh sapwellime kosonned akan ahnsou koaros; oh irail pwoson kehlail kokohp kan en soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

41 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal, Moronai, Kauno atail Koht, me ketin kamourkitailla oh kasaledekeikitailla, mwoale en ketin ieiang komwi; ei, oh en ketin kenikeniki aramas pwukat, iei pwe ke en kak pweida nan kalowehdi sapwatail kan me Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi sang kitail, me wia sawasepetail. Oh met, kilang, I kaimwseklahr nei kisin likou wet. Ngehi Ilemen, nein Alma pwutak.
alma 59:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 59[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai ndaiong Paoran en kakehlakahla nein Ilemen sounpei kan—Mehn Leimen kan kalowehdi Nihpaia—Moronai lingeringer pahn koapworment. Ele Sounpar 62 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Eri kedekedeo nan pahr kesilihsek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, mwurin Moronai eh alehdier oh wadekehr nein Ilemen kisin likouo, e ahpw perenda mehlel pwehki soanerail, ei, pwehki pweida mehlel me Ilemen wia, ni ah kalowehdi sahpw akan me kohsang irail.

2 Ei, oh e kasalehiong nah aramas akan koaros, nan sahpwo pwon ni pali me e wie mihmih ie, pwe re en pil kak iang peren.

3 Kedekedeo e ahpw mwadangete kadarala kisin likou ehu ong Paoran, oh peki en kihpene ohl akan me pahn kohla oh kakehlaka Ilemen, de nein Ilemen sounpei kan, pwe en kak mengei en kolokol pelien sahpw me e kalowehdi sang ni manaman kapwuriamwei.

4 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai kadaralahr kisin likou wet nan sahpw en Saraemla, e ahpw tepida wiahda pilahn pwe en kak pwurehng kalowehdi sapwarail akan oh arail kahnihmw kan me Mehn Leimen kan kihsang irail.

5 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Moronai wie kaukaunop en kohla mahwiniong Mehn Leimen kan, kilang, Mehn Leimen kan kohdohr oh mahwiniong aramas en Nihpaia kan, me kohpene sang nan kahnihmw en Moronai oh nan kahnihmw en Lihai oh nan kahnihmw en Moriandon.

6 Iei, irail [Mehn Leimen kan] me tangasang nan sahpw en Mandai, oh nan sahpwo pwon, re kohdohr oh patehng Mehn Leimen kan ni palien sahpw wet.

7 Oh pwehki arail pokon kowahlap, ei, oh pwehki arail kehkehlaila nan ehu ehu rahn, sang pahn kaweid en Amoron, re ahpw kohdohng aramas en Nihpaia kan, oh re tepida kemehkinirailla kamakamala lap ehu.

8 Oh pwehki neirail sounpei kan e pokon mehlel, aramas en Nihpaia kan me luhwehdi ahpw tangasang mwohrail; oh re kohdo oh patehng nein Moronai sounpei kan.

9 Oh met nin duwen Moronai eh medemedewe me e pahn konehng ohl akan re en kohla nan kahnihmw en Nihpaia, pwe re en sowese aramasoko doare kahnihmwo, oh pwehki e wehwehki me e pahn mengei ma re pahn doarehsang kahnihmwo en dehr lohdi nan pehn Mehn Leimen kan sang ma re pahn song en kihsang irail, e medewe me irail pahn mengeiki kolokolete kahnihmwo.

10 Eri e kin kihdiengete nah sounpei koaros re en apwalih wasah kan me re kin pwurehng kalowehdi.

11 Oh met, ahnsou me Moronai kilangada kahnihmw en Nihpaia kohsang irail e ahpw pahtoula kowahlap, oh tepida peikasal ma re sohte pahn kak lohdi nan pehn riarail akan pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas akan.

12 Eri iei pil pepehm en nah kaun lapalap en sounpei kan koaros. Irail peikasal oh pil pwuriamwei pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas akan, oh met pwehki pweidahn Mehn Leimen kan rehrail.

13 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw lingeringerda pahn koapworment, pwehki arail soukautihong doandoare saledek en arail wehi.
alma 60:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 60[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai kaulimkihong Paoran duwen koapworment ar soukautihong apwalih sounpei kan—Kauno kin mweidala me pwung kan re en kamakamala—Mehn Nihpai kan anahne wia uwen arail kak koaros oh wiepe koaros pwe re en doareirailsang arail imwintihti kan—Moronai kamasangki koapworment me e pahn mahweniong irail ma re sohte pahn sewese nah sounpei kan. Ele Sounpar 62 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo e ahpw pwurehng ntinglahng kepinahn sahpwo, me iei Paoran, oh iet koasoi kan me e ntingihedi, ketihtihki: Kilang, I ntingihada kisin likou kiset ong Paoran, me ketiket nan kahnihmw en Saraemla, me wia sounkopwung lapalap oh kepinahn sahpwet pwon, oh pil irail koaros me aramas pwukat piladahr pwe re en apwalih oh katanga doadoahk en mahwin wet.

2 Pwe kilang, mie mehkot me I men ndaiong irail me pid kadeik; pwe kilang, kumwail wehwehkier me kumwail pilipilda pwe kumwail en kapokonepene ohl akan, oh kihong irail neirail kedlahs kan, naipokos kan, oh soangsoangen dipwisou en mahwin koaros, oh kadariraildohng Mehn Leimen ko pwe en peiong, wasa koaros me re pahn pwarada nan sapwetailet.

3 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me pein ngehi, oh pil nei ohl akan, oh pil Ilemen oh pil nah ohl akan, lokolongkier lokolok laud kowahlap; iei, se men mwenge, se men nimpil, oh sohla angi, oh se lokolongki soangen lokolok kan koaros.

4 Ahpw kilang, ma ihte met me se wie lokolongki se sohte pahn kaulimki de akupwungki.

5 Ahpw kilang, aramas tohto kamakamala nanpwungen neitail aramas akan; ei, kid kei kamakamkihla kedlahs, ahpw mweinele met sohte pahn wiawi ma kumwail kadarodo ekei sounpei me pahn itar ong at karis en sounpei kan oh me kak sewese irail. Ei, lapalahn amwail soukautihong kiht.

6 Oh met kilang, se men ese ia kahrepen soukauti kowahlap wet; ei, se men ese ia kahrepen amwail ahneki lamalam soukauti wet.

7 Kumwail kak medemedewe mwomwohd mwahl nan deumwail kan, ni amwail imwintihti kan ar kemekemehla aramas akan? Ei, ni ar kemekemehla kid en riomwail akan—

8 Iei, irail akan me koapworopworiki me kumwail pahn sinsileirail, ei, re kihong kumwail amwail pwukoa pwe kumwail en kak sewese irail, ei, kumwail en kak kadarodohng irail soupei kan, pwe en kakehleirailda, oh doarehla kidalap en irail me mehkilahr kedlahs.

9 Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ihte met—kumwail sohla kadaralahng irail kanarail kisin mwenge, kahrehda me tohto mahmahwenier oh mehkila kakerehdien nta pwehki ar nsenohki mehlel kamwahupen aramas pwukat; ei, oh re wiahier met ni ahnsou me re pahn nektehn mehkihla ar duhpek, pwehki amwail soukauti kowahlap ong irail.

10 Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal akan—pwe kumwail uhdahn kesempwal; ei, oh e konehng kumwail en kin kamwakidada nan kapehdimwail ong ni kamwahupen aramas pwukat oh ar saledek; ahpw kilang, kumwail soukauti mehlel kahrehda amwail pahn pakadeingkihda ntahn aramas kid kei; ei, pwe Koht ketin mwahngi arail sengiseng koaros, oh arail lokolok kan koaros—

11 Kilang, kumwail medemedewe me kumwail kak mwomwohdte nan deumwail kan, oh pwehki kalahngan en Koht a kumwail pahn sohte anahne wia mehkot oh e pahn doareikumwailla? Kilang, ma kumwail ahneki soangen madamadau wet e wia madamadau mwahl.

12 Kumwail medemedewe me, pwehki uwen tohtohn riamwail kan ar kamakamalahr eh wiawi pwehki ar wiewia suwed kan? I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail ahneki soangen madamadau wet e wia madamdau mwahl; pwe I ndaiong kumwail, tohto me mehkihla kedlahs; oh kilang met kumwail ahpw pahn pakadeingkihda;

13 Pwe Kauno kin mweidala me mour pwung kan en kamakamala pwe sapwellime pwuhng oh kadeik en kak wiawihong me suwed kan; eri kumwail dehr medemedewe me aramas pwung kan salongala pwehki ar kamakamala; ahpw kilang, re pidelong oh kommoal rehn Kauno arail Koht.

14 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, I salohki mehlel pwehki kadeik en Koht pahn lelohng aramas pwukat, pwehki arail pohnkahke mehlel, iei, pohnkahkehn arail koapworment, oh arail sohte mwahn nsenohki riarail kan, ei, irail akan me kamakamalahr.

15 Pwehki ma sohte wiewia suwed me tepidahsang rehn atail kaun kan, kitail kak powehdi atail imwintihti kan pwe re en dehr ahneki manaman pohtail.

16 Ei, ma mahweno me tepida nanpwungatail sohte wiawi; ei, ma irail akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki, me kahrehda lapalahn kamaramas nanpwungatail sohte pweida; ei, ni ahnsou me pingiping wiewiawi nanpwungatail, ma kitail ehukipene atail kehl koaros duwen me kitail kin wia mwoweo; ei, ma aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwariki sohte men ahneki manaman oh pwuhng en kaunkitailda; ma re mehlel ong doadoahk en mour saledek, oh iang kitail ehupene, oh uhwong atail imwintihti kan, oh sohte peliankin kitail neirail kedlahs kan, me kahrehda lapalahn kamaramas nanpwungatail; ei, ma kitail peliankinirail roson en Kauno, kitail pahn pwakihpesengehr atail imwintihti kan, pwe e pahn pweida, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellime mahseno.

17 Ahpw kilang, met Mehn Leimen ko kohkohdong kitail, kikihsang sapwatail kan, oh kemekemehkihla neitail aramas akan kedlahs, ei, neitail lih kan oh seri kan, oh pil salihraildi oh wairailsang, kahrehda ar lokolongki soangen kalokolok koaros, oh met pwehki wiewia suwed laud en irail akan me kin nannantihong re en ahneki manaman oh pwung en kaunda wasa, mehlel, aramas me kin uhpalihki nanmwariki.

18 Ahpw ia kahrepen I pahn nohn koasoia duwen met? Pwe se sohte wehwehki ma pein kumwail pil wie nannantihong en ahneki manaman. Se sohte wehwehki ma kumwail soh pil pangalahr amwail wehi.

19 De kumwail sohte nsenohkin kiht pwehki amwail mi nanwerengen atail wehi oh kumwail silasildi mwahu, kahrehda kumwail sohte kadarodo kisin mwenge reht, oh pil ohl ekei pwe re en kakehlakahda neitail sounpei kan?

20 Kumwail manokelahr kosonned akan en Kauno amwail Koht? Ei, kumwail manokehla kalidu en amwail pahpa kahlap ako? Kumwail manokehla pak tohto me kitail poadoandoarasang atail imwintihti kan?

21 De kumwail medemedewe me Kaun pahn pwurehng doareikitailla, ni atail pahn mwomwohd pohn deutail kan oh sohte doadoahngki soahng kan me Kauno ketikihong kitail?

22 Ei, kumwail pahn mwomwohd sohte wia mehkot nindokon aramas kid kei, ei, oh aramas nen kei kapilukpene me pil iang mwomwohd sohte wia mehkot, ah kidalap en irail kan me mihmi ni irepen sahpwet ar kamakamkihla kedlahs, ei, re soahn oh ntahrail kerekeredi?

23 Kumwail medemedewe me Koht pahn ketin wiahkinkumwail aramas sohte dipe ni amwail mwomwohd oh kilikilang mepwukat? Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh. Met I men kumwail en tamataman me Koht ketin mahsanih me masloale pahn anahne kamwakel mahs, a mwuri masliki ahpw pahn pil kamwakel.

24 Oh met, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhkihla soahng kan me kumwail wiadahr, oh kesihnenda oh tepida mwekid, oh kadarodohng kiht kanat kisin mwenge oh ohl ekei, oh pil kadaralahng Ilemen, pwe en kak apwalih wasa pwuko me wia kisehn atail wehi me e pwurehng kalowehdi, oh pwe kitail en kak pwurehng kapwurehdo luhwen sapwatail kan wasa pwukat, kilang e pahn konehng kitail en tokedihsang atail peiong mehn Leimen ko lao kitail kamwakelehda mahs loaletail, iei, tapwin atail koapworment.

25 Oh ma kumwail sohte pahn kapwaiada pekipek en nei kisin likou kiset, oh kohdo oh kasalehda mehlel mwomwen aramas me uhki mour saledek, oh nantihong kakehlaka oh sewesehda neitail sounpei kan, oh kihong irail kanarail kisin mwenge pwe en utung irail, kilang I pahn pwilikihdi ekei nei ohl pwukat me kin uhki saledek re en apwalih sahpwet, oh I pahn pwilikihdiong irail sapwellimen Koht roson oh kapai, pwe sohte ehu soangen manaman en kak poweiraildi—

26 Oh met pwehki arail pwoson kehlail, oh arail kanengamahiong arail kahpwal kan—

27 Oh I pahn kohwei rehmwail, oh ma mie nanpwungamwail me inangihmour saledek, ei, ma pil miehte ekiste ineng en mour saledek, kilang I pahn tapihada moromor kei nanpwungamwail, iei lao irail akan me men ahneki manaman oh pwung en kaunda wasa re ahpw sohrala douluhl.

28 Ei, kilang I sohte masak amwail manaman de pil amwail pwung en kaunda wasa, ahpw ei Koht me I lemwiki; oh sang nin duwen sapwellime kosonned kan me I alehki nei kedlahs pwe I en doarehla pwung en ei wehi, oh pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan me kahrehda kitail lokolongki laud.

29 Kilang e lelehr ahnsou, ei, ahnsowo leledohr, ma kumwail sohte pahn pangenkinkumwailda en doarehla amwail wehi oh noumwail seri kan, kedlahs en pwuhng pahn kohieng kumwail; ei, oh e pahn lelohng kumwail lao kumwail pahn kamwomwomwla douluhl.

30 Kilang, I awiawih sawas sang rehmwail; oh, ma kumwail sohte pahn apwalih at anahn, kilang, I pahn kohwei rehmwail, iei nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh pelehkin kumwail kedlahs, lao kumwail solahr pahn ahneki manaman en kerempwahla kekeirdahn aramas pwukat nan doadoahk en arail mour saledek.

31 Pwe kilang, Kauno sohte pahn mweidohng kumwail en momour oh kehkehlailla nan amwail wiewia suwed kan pwe en kauwehla sapwellime aramas mour pwung kan.

32 Kilang, kumwail kin medemedewe me Kauno pahn ketin mahkohng kumwail oh kadeikada Mehn Leimen ko, ni ar kailok eh pwilisang tiahk en arail pahpa kahlap ako, ei, oh irail akan me kahngohdiong kitail me kalaudehla, ahpw amwail wiewia suwed kan e kohsang ni amwail kesempwalki kaping oh soahng kan me sohte katepe en sampah?

33 Kumwail wehwehki me kumwail kauwelahr kosonned akan en Koht, oh kumwail pil wehwehki me kumwail tiakedier kosonned akan. Kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie: Ma irail akan me kumwail piladahr pwe re en wia amwail kepina kan sohte pahn koluhkihla diparail kan oh arail wiewia suwed kan, kumwail pahn mahweniong irail.

34 Oh met kilang, ngehi, Moronai, itoitehng [mwekid], nin duwen inou me I wiadahr pwe I en kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan; eri I men kumwail en idawehn mahsen en Koht, oh mwadangete kadarodohng ie amwail sawas en mwenge kan oh noumwail ohl akan, oh pil kadaralahng Ilemen.

35 Oh kilang, ma kumwail sohte pahn wia met I pahn mwadangete kohwei rehmwail; pwe kilang, Koht sohte pahn ketin mweidohng se en mehkihla at duhpek; eri e pahn ketikihong kiht kanamwail mwenge ko, mehnda ma ma se anahne idingkin kumwail nait kedlahs. Eri kumwail kanahieng kapwaiada mahsen en Koht.

36 Kilang, ngehi Moronai, noumwail kaun lapalap en sounpei. I sohte pein rapahki manaman, ahpw I songen waikedi. I sohte rapahki wauwi me pwilisang sampah, ahpw I rapahki kalinganpen ei Koht, oh saledek oh onepek mwahu en ei wehi. Oh met I kaimwisekalahr nei kisin likou wet.
alma 61:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 61[/font_size][/center]

[i]Paoran koasoiahiong Moronai duwen aramas moromorada oh kahngohdiong koapworment—Aramas ako me uhpalihki nanmwarki kalowehdi Saraemla oh ehuong Mehn Leimen kan—Paoran peki sawas en sounpei en pelian me uhwong irail kan. Ele Sounpar 62 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekedeo mwurinte Moronai e kadaralahr nah kisin likowo ong kepina lapalapo, e ahpw alehdi kisin likou ehu sang rehn Paoran, me wia kepina lapalap. Oh iet me e ketihtihki:

2 Ngehi, Paoran, me wia kepina lapalap en sahpwet, kadaralahng Moronai, kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, koasoi pwukat. Kilang, I ndaionguhk, Moronai, me I sohte perenki omw kahpwal akan, ei, palingeniet pahtoukihla.

3 Ahpw kilang, mie ekei irail me perenki omw kahpwal akan, ei, re pil kahngohdiong ie, oh re pil kahngohgiong aramas me kin uhki saledek, ei, oh irail akan me uhwong kiht re inenen ngeder.

4 Oh iei irail akan me nannantihong en kihsang ie nan dewei ni mwoalen kopwungo me kahrehda soangen suwed laud wet; pwe re kin kadek koasoi, oh re kahluwahsang mohngiong en aramas tohto, me pahn kahrehiong atail mihla nan apwal mwuledek; irail sohte men sewesekin kitail kanatail mwenge, oh re kin kamakamasak neitail aramas akan me kin uhpalihki saledek kahrehda irail sohte kohwei rehmw.

5 Oh kilang, re kausiehla sang rehrail, oh I tangodo nan sahpw en Kidion, iangahki ohl koaros me pahn idawehn ie.

6 Oh kilang, I kadarpeseng kalohk ehu nan sahpwet pwon; oh kilang, irail kohkohpene reht rahn koaros, pwe re en iang mahwen, pwe re en doare arail wehi oh arail saledek, oh en ikihong sapwung kan me wiawihong kitail.

7 Oh irail kohdo reht, kahrehda irail akan me kahngohdiong kiht pweiek, ei, kahrehda ar masangkihtada oh sohte men kohdo mahweniong kiht.

8 Irail koledier sahpwo, de kahnimwo, en Saraemla; irail idiadahr emen nanmwarki en kaunirailda, oh e ntinglahng nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan, me e pahn miniminiong ih; ni ara miniminpeneo e pwungkihda me e pahn apwalih kahnimw en Saraemla, ni eh medemedewe me e pahn kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan ar pahn kalowehdi luhwen sahpw kan, oh e pahn wiahla nanmwarki en aramas pwukat ahnsou me re pahn mihla pahn manaman en Mehn Leimen kan.

9 Oh met, nan noumw kisin likouo ke lipwoare ie, ahpw e sohte mehkot; I sohte nsensuwedki, ahpw I perenki omw mohngiong mwahu. Ngehi, Paoran, sohte rapahki manaman, ihte I en kolokol dewei ni mwoalen kopwungo pwe I en kak doandoare pwuhng oh mour saledek en nei aramas akan. Palingeniet tengediong saledek me Koht ketikihong kitail en saledengki.

10 Oh met, kilang, kitail pahn peliankihda me suwed kakerehdi nta. Kitail sohte pahn kemehla Mehn Leimen kan ma re pahn mihmihte nan uhdakarailo.

11 Kitail sohte pahn kemehla riatail ko ma re sohte pahn uhwong kitail oh peikihong kitail nair kedlahs akan.

12 Kitail pahn wie liduhla ma ih me konehng pwehki sapwellimen Koht pwuhng, de ma ih me e pahn mahsanihong kitail en wia.

13 Ahpw kilang e sohte kin mahsanihong kitail me kitail pahn mihla pahn manaman en atail imwintihti kan, ahpw kitail en koapworopworki ih, oh e pahn doareikitailla.

14 Eri, riei ohl kesempwal, Moronai, kitail en pelianda me suwed, oh soangen suwed me kitail sohte kak peliankihda atail mahsen kan, ei, me rasehng mwekid en kahngohdi oh pingiping kan, kitail en peliankinirailda kedlahs, pwe kitail en kak kolokolete atail saledek, pwe kitail en kak pereperen nan atail pwuhng en nsanamwahuki atail mwomwohdiso, oh nan doadoahk en atail Soundoaro oh atail Koht.

15 Eri, mwadangete kohdo rehi iangahki ekei noumw ohl akan, oh pwilikihdi luwe kan rehn Lihai oh Dienkom; kihong ira manaman en apwalih mahwen nan wasahn, nin duwen Ngehn en Koht, me iei ngehn en saledek me kin ieiang ira.

16 Kilang I kadaralahng irail ekis kanarail mwonge, pwe re en dehr mehla lao ke pahn kak kohdo rehi.

17 Kihpene sounpei kan me ke kak ni ahmw pahn kohdo, oh kita pahn mwadangete kohla mahweniong aramas kahngohdi kan, ni roson en atail Koht nin duwen ata pwoson.
