18 Oh kita pahn kapwurehsang kahnimw en Saraemla, pwe kitail en kak kalaudehla uwen mwenge me kitail pahn kadaralahng Lihai oh Dienkom; ei, kitail pahn mahweniong irail ni roson en Kauno, oh kitail pahn katokehdi soangen suwed laud wet.

19 Oh met, Moronai, I perenki ei alehdi noumw kisin likowo, pwe I pwunodki duwen dahme kitail pahn wia, ma e pahn pwung kitail en mahweniong riatail ko.

20 Apw ke koasoiahier, ma re sohte pahn koluhla Kauno ketin mahsanihonguhk me ke pahn kohla mahweniong irail.

21 Ke en kakehlaka Lihai oh Dienkom rehn Kauno; ndaiong ira en dehr masak, pwe Koht pahn doareirailla, ei, oh pil irail koaros me tengediong saledek me Koht ketikihong irail en saledengki. Oh met I kaimwiseklahr nei kisin likou ong riei ohl kesempwal, Moronai.
alma 62:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 62[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai kohla nan sahpw en Kidion pwe en sowese Paoran—Aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki me sohte men doare arail wehi kamakamala—Paoran oh Moronai pwurehng kalowehdi Nihpaia—Tohto Mehn Leimen iangala nein Amon aramas akan—Dienkom kemehla Amoron oh mwuri kamakamala—Mehn Leimen kan pakasarasang nan sahpwo, oh popohl miehda—Ilemen pwuralahng doadoahk en kalohk oh koasoanehdi Mwomwohdiso. Ele Sounpar 62–57 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Moronai alehdier kisin likou wet e ahpw kehlailkihda nan eh mohngiong, oh direkihla peren kowahlap pwehki Paoran eh loaloapwoat, ni eh sohte pil iang pangala arail saledek oh doadoahk en arail wehi.

2 Ahpw e pil pahtoukihla mehlel pwehki wiewia suwed en irail akan me kihsang Paoran nan sehr en kopwungo, ei, ni mehlel pwehki irail akan me uhwongada arail wehi oh pil arail Koht.

3 Kedekedeo Moronai wahda ekei ohl, nin duwen dahme Paoran inangih, oh kihong Lihai oh Dienkom re en apwalih luhwen nah sounpei kan, oh kohla nan sahpw en Kidion.

4 Oh e ahpw kihda pilaik en mour saledek nan wasa koaros me e kin pidelong, oh kihkihpene uwen sounpei me e kak nan ah kohkohlahng nan sahpw en Kidion.

5 Kedekedeo [aramas] meh kid kei kohdo patehng ah koasoandio, oh alehda neirail kedlahs kan pwe re en doare arail saledek, pwe irail en dehr mihla nan kalidu.

6 Oh met, ahnsou me Moronai kihpenehier uwen ohl akan me e kak nan ah kohkohla, e ahpw kohdo nan sahpw en Kidion; oh kapatahiong nah sounpei kan nein Paoran irail ahpw kehlailla mehlel, iei kehlailsang nein Pakus ohl akan, me wia nanmwarki en irail me kahngohdi kan me pwakiasang aramas saledek kan nan sahpw en Saraemla oh kaunda sahpwo.

7 Kedekedeo Moronai oh Paoran iahngahki neira sounpei kan ahpw kohdihla nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kohla nan kahnihmwo, oh tuhwongidi nein Pakus ohl akan, eri irail tepida mahwin.

8 Oh kilang, Pakus kamakamala oh nah ohl akan selidi, oh Paoran kopwurupwurieng nan ah sehren-sounkopwungo.

9 Oh nein Pakus ohl kan ahpw kohieng nan kopwung, nin duwen kosonnedo, oh pil irail aramas akan me kin uhpalihki nanmwarki me kolkoldi oh lekideklong nan imweteng; oh re kamakamala nin duwen kosonnedo; ei, nein Pakus ohl akan oh aramas me uhpalihki nanmwarki, mehmen me sohte pahn alehda dipwisou en mahwin oh doare arail wehi, ahpw uhwong, pahn kamakamala.

10 Oh met e ahpw tepida kesempwal me kosonnedo irail pahn anahne kapwaiada ni inen ong perepen arail wehi; ei, oh mehmen me pahn dierekda lahlahwe arail saledeko pahn mwadangete kamakamala nin duwen kosonnedo.

11 Oh met kaimwsekala pahr silihsek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai; Moronai oh Paoran ni ar kapwuredohr popohl nan sahpw en Saraemla, rehn neirail aramas, oh kemehlahier koaros irail me sohte mehleliong doadoahk en saledek.

12 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn kesilisek ehu en pahr nan mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Moronai mwadangete ruwesehiong irail en kadarala sawas en mwonge, oh pil sounpei meh wenekid pekederlahng Ilemen, pwe en sowese doandoare apali sahpwo.

13 Oh e pil ruwesehiong sounpei meh wenekid, iangahki uwen tohto mwonge me itar, en pekederla rehn sounpei kan en Lihai oh Dienkom. Kedekedeo met ahpw wiawi pwe en silehdi sahpwo sang Mehn Leimen kan.

14 Kedekedeo Moronai oh Paoran, kihdi pokon en ohl kei nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kahrehda pokon en ohl kei kohla nan sahpw en Nihpaia, pwehki re koasonehdi me re pahn pwakiasang Mehn Leimen kan nan kahnihmwo.

15 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me re kohkohla nan sahpwo, re ahpw kalowehdi nein Mehn Leimen kan pokon en ohl kei, oh kemehla tohto irail, oh kihsang kenerail mwonge kan oh neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan.

16 Kedekedeo mwurin arail kaloweiraildi, re wiahiong irail en wiahda inou me re sohte pahn pwurehng alehda dipwisou en mahwin oh uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan.

17 Oh ahnsou me re wiadahr inou wet re ahpw kadarirailahng re en kousoan rehn nein Amon aramas akan, oh uwen tohtohn irail meh pahkid me sohte kamakamala.

18 Kedekedeo ahnsou me re kadarirailla, re ahpw doula kohla nan sahpw en Nihpaia. Kedekedeo ahnsou me re kohla ni kahnihmw en Nihpaia, re ahpw wiahda arail impwal akan nan patapat en Nihpaia, me karanihte kahnihmw en Nihpaia.

19 Met Moronai inangih me Mehn Leimen kan pahn kohdo oh mahwiniong irail, nan patapato; ahpw Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki ar wehwehki me re ahneki eimah mehlel, oh pwehki ar kilang uwen arail tohto, eri re sohte men kohieidohng irail; eri re sohte kohiei oh mahwin rahno.

20 Oh ahnsou me e soutikpene, Moronai kohieila nihpwongo, oh douda pohn kehlo pwe en lipoahroke dehnen nan kahnihmwo me Mehn Leimen kan kapweidi neirail sounpei kan.

21 Kedekedeo e ahpw diarada me re mihmi ni palimese, nimwahn ewen kehlo; oh irail koaros memeir. Oh met Moronai pwurala rehn nah sounpei kan, oh ndaiong irail re en kaunopada sahl kehlail kan oh kehndake kan, pwe en kak doukihdi sang pohn kehlo ni masloalen kehlo.

22 Kedekedeo Moronai ahpw kahrehda nah ohl kan re en kohla oh douda pohn kehlo, oh doudihla nan kahnihmwo, iei, wasa me salahng palikapi, wasa me Mehn Leimen kan sohte kapweidi neirail sounpei kan.

23 Kedekedeo irail koaros ahpw doudihla nan kahnihmwo nihpwongo, sang ni neirail sahl kehlail kan oh arail kehndake kan; eri ahnsou me e wasarahnpeseng irail koaros mihmi nan kahnihmwo.

24 Oh met, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pwourda oh kilangada me nein Moronai sounpei kan mihmi nan kehlo, re ahpw masepwehkda mehlel, kahrehda re tangeiei ni ewen kehlo.

25 Oh met ahnsou me Moronai kilang me re wie tangatangasang mwohrail, e ahpw ruwesehiong nah ohl akan re en mahwiniong irail, oh kemehla tohto, oh koledi tohto irail, oh saliedi irail; oh irail akan me luhwehdi tang kohla nan sahpw en Moronai, me karahnih irepen sahpwo ni oaroahro.

26 Eri met Moronai oh Paoran kalowehdier kahnihmw en Nihpaia ni sohte emen irail mehla; oh tohto Mehn Leimen kan me kamakamala.

27 Met kedekedeo tohto Mehn Leimen kan me selidi ko inangih re en iangala nein Amon aramas akan oh wiahla aramas saledek.

28 Kedekedeo koaros me kin inangih, e kin mweimweiong irail nin duwen arail ineng.

29 Eri, me selidi koaros me wia Mehn Leimen kan iangala nein Amon aramas akan, oh tepida doadoahk mehlel, koadoahke wahn sahpw, padokedi soangen werentuhke koaros, oh apwali pelen sihpw kan oh kou kan koaros; oh met kahrehda Mehn Nihpai kan ar kasaledeksang katoutou lap ehu; ei, kahrehda irail kasaledek sang neirail Mehn Leimen me selidi kan koaros.

30 Kedekedeo Moronai, mwurinte e kalowehdi kahnihmw en Nihpaia, mwurin eh saliedier tohto, me katikala nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei kan kowahlap, oh mwurin eh kapitalahr tohto Mehn Nihpai me selidi kan, me pil kakehlakahla nein Moronai sounpei kan kowahlap; eri Moronai ahpw kohwei sang nan sahpw en Nihpaia kohla nan sahpw en Lihai.

31 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan kilangadahr Moronai kohkohdohng irail, re ahpw pwurehng masepwehkada oh tangasang mwohn nein Moronai sounpei kan.

32 Kedekedeo Moronai oh nah sounpei kan ahpw pwakih irail sang nan ehu kahnihmw kohla nan ehu, lao re tuhwongidi Lihai oh Dienkom; oh Mehn Leimen kan tangasang Lihai oh Dienkom, iei kohdihla ni irepen sahpwo ni oaroahro, lao re kohdo nan sahpw en Moronai.

33 Oh nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan koaros pokonpenehr, kahrehda irail koaros wiahda ehu pokon nan sahpw en Moronai. Met Amoron, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan, pil iang irail.

34 Kedekedeo Moronai oh Lihai oh Dienkom kapweidi neirail sounpei kan kapilpene irepen sahpw en Moronai, kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan mihla nanpwungarail ni irepen sapwtehno palier, oh irepen sapwtehno ni palimese.

35 Oh met irail pweidi pwohngo. Pwe kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan oh pil Mehn Leimen kan pwangada pwehki arail wie pwepwekiseli; eri re sohte wiahda koasondi nihsoutiko, ihte Dienkom; pwe e udahn lingeringer pahn Amoron, kahrehda e keinahki me Amoron, oh Amelekaia riehu, me kahrehda mahwin lap oh werei wet nan pwungarail oh Mehn Leimen kan, me kahrehda mahwin tohto oh nta kerala, ei, oh lehk lap.

36 Kedekedeo Dienkom ni eh lingeringer e ahpw kohla wasa me Mehn Leimen kan pweidi, ih eri douda oh doudi nan kehl en kahnihmwo. Oh e kohkihla sahl ehu, oh e kohwei nan ehu ehu wasa, lao e diar nanmwarkio; oh e ahpw katehki ketieu ehu, me doakoahdi karanih eh mohngiongo. Ahpw kilang, nanmwarkio kapwourada nah ladu ko mwohn e mehla, kahrehda re pwakihdi Dienkom, oh kemehla.

37 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me Lihai oh Moronai esehda me Dienkom mehla re pahtoukihla kowahlap; pwe kilang, e wia ohl emen me kin loalloapwoat mahwinki eh wehi, ei, kompoakepah mehlel en mour saledek; oh e pil lokolongkier kahpwal kalok mehlel tohto. Ahpw kilang, e mehlahr, oh seridier nan pwehl wasa me koaros pahn kohla.

38 Met kedekedeo mandahn rahno Moronai ahpw karihswei, oh kohlahng Mehn Leimen kan, kahrehda e kemehkinirailla kamakamala lap ehu; oh re pwakiasang irail nan sahpwo; oh re tang, kahrehda irail sohte pwurehng pwurodohng Mehn Nihpai kan ahnsouo.

39 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silihsek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai; oh iei mwomwen arail mahwin kan, oh kamaramas kan, oh lehk, oh kahpwal, nan erein sounpar tohto.

40 Oh kamaramas, oh pingiping, oh pwupwila kan wiawi, oh soahngen wiewia suwed koaros rehn aramas en Nihpai; ahpw pwehki memour en me pwung kan, ei, pwehki ahn me pwung kan kapakap, kahrehda re komourla.

41 Ahpw kilang, pwehki uwen werei en ahnsou en mahwino nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan tohto keptakaikihla, pwehki werei en ahnsou en mahwino; oh tohto me mwuterekda pwehki arail kahpwal akan, kahrehda re karakarahkala mwohn Koht, iei ni mehlel en ohpampap.

42 Kedekedeo mwurin Moronai e kakehlakahla silepen sahpwo me keieu karanih Mehn Leimen kan, lao kakehleparail itar, e ahpw pwurala nan kahnihmw en Saraemla; oh pil Ilemen pwuralahng wasahn eh sohso; oh popohl pwurehng miehda rehn aramas en Nihpai kan.

43 Oh Moronai kasapwilieng pwukoahn kaweid sounpei kan nah pwutak, me adaniki Moronaia; oh e ahpw komoaldi ni pein imwe pwe en kak mihmi nan popohl erein luhwen ah rahn kan.

44 Oh Paoran pwurehng pwuralahng nan ah sehr en sounkopwung; oh Ilemen pwurehng alehda pwukoahn kalohk ong aramas akan mahsen en Koht; pwehki mahwin tohto oh pingiping kan e konehng koasondi kan pahn pwurehng wiawihda nan mwomwohdiso.

45 Eri, Ilemen oh riehkan kohwei, oh kalohngki mahsen en Koht sang ni manaman ong kasalehiong aramas akan arail wiewia suwed kan, me kahrehda arail koluhkihla diparail kan oh pepdaisla ong Kauno arail Koht.

46 Kedekedeo re ahpw pwurehng wiahda mwomwohdiso en Koht, nan sahpwo pwon.

47 Ei, oh koasondi kan wiawihda nin duwen kosonnedo. Oh arail sounkopwung kan, oh arail sounkopwung lapalap kan pilipilda.

48 Oh aramas en Nihpai kan tepida pwurehng keirda nan sahpwo, oh tepida kaparaparala oh pwurehng kehlaila kowahlap nan sahpwo. Oh re pwurehng tepida kepwepwehla mehlel.

49 Ahpw mehndahte ar kepwehpwe, de nan ar kehlail, de ar pweida, re sohte pohnmwahsohla nan masarail kan; oh re pil sohte pwand en tamataman Kauno arail Koht; ahpw re karakarahkala mehlel mwohwe.

50 Ei, re tamataman uwen soahng kapwuriamwei kan me Kauno ketin wiahiong irail, me e ketin doarehsang irail mehla, oh sang pirapirdi, oh sang selidi, oh sang soangen kahpwal kan koaros, oh e doarehsang irail nan pehn arail imwintihti kan.

51 Oh re kin kalapw kapakap ong Kauno arail Koht, kahrehda Kauno ketin kapai irail, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen, kahrehda re kehlaila oh pweida nan sahpwo.

52 Kedekedeo mepwukat koaros wiawiher. Oh Ilemen kapilsalehdala, nan pahr silihsek limau en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai.
alma 63:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 63[/font_size][/center]

[i]Siplon oh mwurin Ilemen alehdi poadoapoad sarawi ko—Tohto Mehn Nihpai kan seiloakla nan sahpw en paliepeng—Eikod wiahda sohp kan, me seiloakla nan sehd palikapi—Moronaia powehdi Mehn Leimen kan nan mahwin. Ele Sounpar 56–52 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr silihsek wenou en mwein sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Siplon alehdier pwukoahn apwalih soahng sarawi kan me kohiong Ilemen sang rehn Alma.

2 Oh e wia ohl pwung men, oh e kin weweid mwohn Kauno ni pwung; oh e kin nantihong wia me mwahu ahnsou koaros, ni eh kapwaiada kosonned en Kauno eh Koht; oh pil iangahki rie pwutako.

3 Kedekedeo Moronai pil kapilsalehdala. Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silihsek wenou en mwein sounkopwung kan.

4 Kedekedeo nan pahr silihsek isuh en mwein sounkopwung kan, mie pwihn en ohl kei, ie me tohtohki uwen ohl limekid pahpwiki, iangahki arail pwoudkan oh neirail seri kan, mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla kohlahng nan sahpw me mih paliepeng.

5 Kedekedeo Eikod, pwehki eh wia aramas me kin men esehla mehkot kapw, e ahpw kohwei oh wiahda lepelepen wahr ehu, ni irepen sahpw en Rahk, nimwahn sahpw en Tehnla, oh kihdi nan sehd en palikapi, nimwahn sahpw tehkik me kohdahla nan sahpw en paliepeng.

6 Oh kilang, tohto Mehn Nihpai kan me pidelong nan wahro oh seiloakwei iangahki kenerail mwonge tohto, oh pil tohto lih akan oh seri kan; oh re seiloakwei paliepeng. Oh met kaimsekalahr pahr silihsek isuh.

7 Oh nan pahr silihsek waluho, ohl menet pil wiahda wahr kei. Oh tepin wahro pil pwurodo, oh aramas tohto pil iangada; oh re wahda mwonge tohto, oh pwurehng seiloakla nan sahpw en paliepeng.

8 Kedekedeo e ahpw sohla mie rongeparail. Oh se medewe me re duhla wasa loal nan sehd. Kedekedeo ehu sohpko pil seiloakwei; oh wasa me e kohla se sohte ese.

9 Kedekedeo nan pahr wet aramas tohto kohwei nan sahpw en paliepeng. Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silihsek waluh.

10 Kedekedeo nan pahr silihsek duwau en mwein soukopwung kan, Siplon pil kapilsalehdala, oh Koriandon iangehr ehu sohpo kohkohla nan sahpw en paliepeng, pwe en wahla mwongeh kan ong aramas kan me kohwei nan sahpwo.

11 Eri e konehng Siplon en kihong emen soahng sarawi kan, mwohn eh mehla, ong nein Ilemen pwutak, me pil adaniki Ilemen, me adiki eden eh pahpa.

12 Met kilang, nting kan koaros me Ilemen wie kolokol intingdi oh pekederiong aramas akan koaros nan sahpwo pwon, ihte ireh kan me Alma ndaiong irail me re sohte pahn kihla.

13 Ahpw, mepwukat pahn wie nekinek ni keneinei, oh kasakasapwilwei nan ehu ehu dih; eri, nan pahr wet, re pahn kohieng Ilemen, mwohn Siplon eh pahn mehla.

14 Kedekedeo pil nan pahret mie ekei me pil pwupwidi kan kolahr nan sahpw en Mehn Leimen kan; oh re tepidar mwekidada re en uhwong Mehn Nihpai kan.

15 Oh pil nan pahrohte re kohdihdo iangahki karihs en sounpei ehu pwe re en uhwong aramas en Moronaia, de uhwong nein Moronaia sounpei kan, ahpw re kamakam oh pwurehng pwepwekihla nan pein sapwarail kan, oh re lokolongki ohla laud.

16 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silihsek duwau en mwein sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

17 Oh met kaimwsekalahr poadepen Alma, oh Ilemen nah pwutak, oh pil Siplon, me wia nah pwutak.
hel 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Ilemen[/font_size][/center]

Duwen Mehn Nihpai kan. Arail mahwin kan oh pingiping kan, oh arail pwupwidi kan. Oh pil kokohp kan en soukohp akan, mwohn ketidohn Krais, nin duwen poadoapoad en Ilemen, me wia nein Ilemen pwutak, oh pil nin duwen poadoapoad en nah pwutak kan, lao lel ni ketidohn Krais. Oh pil tohtohn Mehn Leimen kan wiliakapwala. Duwen arail wiliakapw. Duwen mour pwung en Mehn Leimen kan, oh wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan en Mehn Nihpai kan, nin duwen poadoapoad en Ilemen oh nah pwutak kan, lao lel ni ketidohn Krais, me kahdaniki pwuhk en Ilemen, oh soahng teikan.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Keriau en Paoran wiahla sounkopwung lapalap oh Kiskumen kemehla—Pakumenai wiliandi nan sehr en sounkopwungo—Koriandumer kaunda nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan, kalowehdi Saraemla, oh kemehla Pakumenai—Moronaia kalowehdi Mehn Leimen kan oh kapwurehsang Saraemla, oh kemehla Koriandumer. Ele Sounpar 52–50 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kilang, kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr kapahisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, mie kahpwal laud me tepida wiawi rehn aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan.

2 Pwe kilang, Paoran kapilsalehdalahr, oh seridier nan pwehl wasa me koaros pahn kohla; eri pingiping mehlel ahpw tepida wiawi me pid duwen ihs nan pwungen nein Paoran pwutak kan me pahn wiliandi nan sehr en sounkopwungo.

3 Eri iet ederail kan me akamaiki sehr en sounkopwungo, me kahrehda aramas akan ar pil pingida: Paoran, Pahnti, oh Pakumenai.

4 Eri, kaidehn ihte nein Paoran pwutak kan (pwe tohto nah), ahpw irail pwukat me wie akamaiki sehr en sounkopwungo; eri, re kahrehda pali siluh katohrohrpeseng nanpwungen aramas akan.

5 Ahpw, kedekedeo Paoran me pilipilda sang ni usuhs en aramas akan en wiahla sounkopwung oh kepinahn aramas en Nihpai.

6 Kedekedeo Pakumenai, ahnsou me e kilangada me e sohte pahn kak alehdi sehr en sounkopwungo, e ahpw utungada pilipil en aramas akan.

7 Ahpw kilang, Pahnti, oh pali en aramas kan me inangih me ih me pahn wiahla arail kepina, lingeringerda mehlel; eri, e kereniong en ndaiong aramas akan re en uhwongada riarail akan.

8 Kedekedeo ni e kereniong en wia met, kilang, e kolkoldi, oh pakadeikda nin duwen pilipil en aramas akan, oh kamakamkihla; pwehki eh uhwongadahr koasoandio oh song en kawehla saledek en aramas kan.

9 Met ahnsou me aramas kan me inangih en wiahla arail kepina kilangada me e kamakamala, irail ahpw lingeringerkihda, oh kilang, irail kadarala emen me adaniki Kiskumen, pwe en kohla ni sehr en sounkopwung en Paoran, oh kemehla Paoran ni eh mwomwohd nan dowe sehr en sounkopwungo.

10 Oh nein Paoran laduo pwakih; ahpw kilang, pwehki Kiskumen eh marahra sohte me kak koledi.

11 Oh e ahpw kohla rehn irail me kadarala, oh irail koaros wiahda inou, ei, kahukihla ni mwaren arail Sounwiepe poatoapoato, me re sohte pahn ndaiong emen aramas me Kiskumen me kemehla Paoran.

12 Eri, Kiskumen sohte sansal ong aramas en Nihpai kan, pwe e kawekala ih ni ahnsou me e kemehla Paorano. Oh Kiskumen oh ienge kan, me wiahiong ih inouo, kin patehng aramas kan, ni mwomwe me re sohte kak dierekda; ahpw koaros me kin dierekida kin kamakamala.

13 Oh met kilang, Pakumenai pilipilda, nin duwen pilipil en aramas akan, en wia sounkopwung lapalap oh kepina ong aramas kan, en uhsehla kaun mwurin rie pwutak Paoran; oh e pahn sang nin duwen eh pwuhng. Oh mepwukat koaros wiawiher nan pahr pahisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan; oh e imwisekilahr.

14 Kedekedeo nan pahr pahisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kapokonpenehr polohn sounpei en ohl kei, oh kihong neirail kedlahs kan, oh iangahki naipokos kan oh iangahki kesik ketieu kan, oh iangahki arep kan, oh iangahki lisoarop kan, oh iangahki tehtehn mwaremware kan, oh iangahki soangsoahngen mehn sansar kan koaros.

15 Oh re pwurehng pwuredihdo pwe re en tapiahda mahwin ong Mehn Nihpai kan. Oh ohl men me adaniki Koriandumer me kahre irail; oh e wia kadaudoken Saraemla; oh e wia emen me pwipwidi sang rehn Mehn Nihpai kan; oh e wia ohl paliwar laud oh kehlail men.

16 Eri, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan, me adaniki Dupalod, me wia nein Amoron pwutak, medewehiong pwehki Koriandumer eh wia aramas kehlail, kak pelianda Mehn Nihpai kan, sang ni eh kehlail oh pil ah erpit, kahrehda sang ni eh pahn kadarewei ih, e pahn kak alehdi manaman pohn Mehn Nihpai kan—

17 Eri e kamwakidirailda pwe re en lingeringerda, oh e kihpene nah sounpei kan, oh e pilada Koriandumer en wia arail kaun, oh wiahda re en karisdihla nan sahpw en Saraemla pwe re en mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

18 Kedekedeo pwehki pingping laud oh kahpwal laud me wiwiawi nan koapworment, kahrehda re sohte kihong itar sounsilasil kan nan sahpw en Saraemla; pwe re medewe me Mehn Leimen kan sohte pahn men kohdo nan mohngiong en sapwarail oh mahwiniong kahnihmw lap en Saraemla.

19 Ahpw kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw tihengki kahre nah sounpei ngedero, oh kohdohng tohn nan kahnihmwo, oh arail karis kohdo me mwadang mehlel kahrehda Mehn Nihpai kan sohte ahniki ahnsou mwahu en kihpene neirail sounpei kan.

20 Eri Koriandumer ahpw pelehdi sounsile kehlo ni ewen kehl en kahnihmwo, oh kariskihlongala nah sounpei ko pwon nan kahnihmwo, oh re kemehla aramas koaros me uhwong irail, kahrehda re kalowehdi kahnihmwo pwon.

21 Kedekedeo Pakumenai, me wia sounkopwung lapalap, ahpw tangasang mwohn Koriandumer, kohlahng ni kehl en kahnihmwo. Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw kemehiong ni kehlo, lao e ahpw mehla. Oh met kaimwisekalahr mwehin Pakumenai.

22 Oh met ahnsou me Koriadumer kilangadahr me e kalowehdier kahnihmw en Saraemla, oh kilangadahr me Mehn Nihpai kan tangasang rehrail, oh kamakamala, oh kolkoldi, oh lekideklong nan imweteng, oh me e kalowedier wasa me keieu kehlail nan sahpwo pwon, ah mohngiong ahpw loallapkihda kahrehda e pahn kohla peiong sahpw kan koaros.

23 Oh met e sohte mihmihte nan sahpw en Saraemla, ahpw e kariskihwei nah pokon en sounpei iei kohlahng kahnihmw en Rahk; pwe e koasoanehdi me e pahn wiahkihwei ahl nah kedlahso, pwe en kak alehdi paliepeng en sahpwo.

24 Oh, pwehki e medemedewe me arail kehlail koaros mihmi nan werengen sahpwo, eri e ahpw kariswei, oh sohte kiheng irail ahnsou en kohpene ihte ni kisin pwihn tikitik; oh ni mwomw wet me re kolahng irail oh pelehkiniraildi nan pwehl.

25 Ahpw kilang, karis wet me Koriandumer wiahdo nan werengen sahpwo elehiong Moronaia en kak kaloweiraildi, mehndahte arail pokon mehlel en Mehn Nihpai kan me kamakamala.

26 Pwe kilang, Moronaia medewe me Mehn Leimen kan sohte pahn men kohdo nan werengen sahpwo, ahpw re pahn kin mahwiniong mahs kahnihmw me mih ni irepen sahpwo nin duwen arail kin kalapw wia; eri Moronaia kahrehda neirail sounpei kehlail kan pahn kin tetehk wasahko ni irepen sahpwo kan.

27 Ahpw kilang, Mehn Leimen kan sohte masepwehk nin duwen ehineng, ahpw re kohdo nan werengen sahpwo, oh kalowehdi kahnihmw lapo me iei kanihmw en Saraemla, oh karkariskohwei nan sahpw me keieu kesempwal kan, kemekemehla aramas akan, koaros ohl, lih, oh seri kan, kalkalowehdi kahnihmw tohto oh wasa kehlail tohto.

28 Ahpw ahnsou me Moronaia esehlahr met, e mwadangete kadarala Lihai iangahki sounpei kei kohpeseng pwe re en supuk irail mwohn arail pahn lel nan sahpwen Rahk.

29 Oh e ahpw wia met; oh e supuk irail mwohn arail pahn lel nan sahpwen Rahk, oh mahwiniong irail, kahrehda irail tepida pweiekla mwurirail nan sahpw en Saraemla.

30 Kedekedeo Moronaia ahpw supuk irail nan arail pwurupwur, oh mahwiniong irail, kahrehda e wiahla mahwin me mehla laud; ei, tohto me kamakamala, oh nanpwungen irail me mehla Koriandumer dierekda.

31 Oh met, kilang, Mehn Leimen kan sohla kak pwurala wasahieu, sohte kak paliepeng, de palieir, de palimese, de palikapi, pwe Mehn Nihpai kan kapidak irailpene ni pali koaros.

32 Oh met Koriandumer kihongehr Mehn Leimen kan nan pwungen Mehn Nihpai kan, kahrehda re mihla pahn manaman en Mehn Nihpai kan, oh pein ih kamakamala, oh Mehn Leimen kan mweidirailehng nan pehn Mehn Nihpai kan.

33 Kedekedeo Moronaia ahpw pwurehng kalowehdi kahnihmw en Saraemla, oh wiahda me Mehn Leimen kan me selidi ko re en mweselsang nan sahpwo ni popohl.

34 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr pahisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan.
hel 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ilemen, nein Ilemen pwutako, wiahla sounkopwung lapalap—Kadiendon kaunda pwihn en Kiskumen—Nein Ilemen laduo kemehla Kiskumen, oh pwihn en Kadiendon ko tang kohla nan sapwtehno. Ele Sounpar 50–49 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan pahr pahisek riau en mwehin sounkopwung kan, mwurin Moronaia eh pwurehng wiahda popohl nan pwungen Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan, kilang sohte emen me pahn alehda sehr sounkopwungo; eri e ahpw pwurehng tepida mie pingiping nan pwungen aramas ko nin duwen ihs me pahn mih nan sehr en sounkopwungo.

2 Kedekedeo Ilemen, me wia nein Ilemen pwutak, pilipilda en mih nan sehr en sounkopwungo, sang ni pilipil en aramas kan.

3 Ahpw kilang, Kiskumen, me kemehla Paoran, kaukaunop pwe en pil kemehla Ilemen; oh ah pwihno kin utung, irail]me wiahda inou me sohte emen pahn ese ah wiewia suwed kan.

4 Pwe emen adanki Kadiendon, me kadek koasoai kowahlap, oh pil nan ah doadoahk en widing, pwe en peusehla wiewia doadoahk rir en kam aramas oh pirap; eri e wiahla kaun en pwihn en Kiskumen.

5 Eri e widingehkin irail, oh pil Kiskumen, ma re pahn kihong nan sehr en sounkopwungo e pahn kihong irail me wia tohn arail pwihno me re pahn kohieng nan pwukoah en ahniki manaman oh mweimwei pohn aramas akan; eri Kiskumen song en kemehla Ilemen.

6 Kedekedeo ni eh kohkohwei ni sehr en sounkopwungo pwe en kemehla Ilemen, kilang emen nein Ilemen ladu ko, ni eh mihmi likio pwohngo, oh alehdi, ni rir, duwen koasoandi kan me kaunopdahr sang pwihn wet re en kemehla Ilemen—

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw tuhwong Kiskumen, oh e kasalehiong kilel ehu; eri Kiskumen kasalehiong ih koasoandi en ah inangiho, oh e inangih en kahrehla ni sehr en sounkpwungo pwe en kak kemehla Ilemen.

8 Oh ahnsou me nein Ilemen laduo wehwehkier ineng en mohngiong en Kiskumen, oh me ah koasoandi iei en kam aramas, oh pil ih koasoandi en koaros me wia tohn ah pwihno iei en kam aramas, oh pirap, oh alehdi manaman, (oh met iei arail koasoandi rir, oh arail pwihn) laduo en Ilemen ahpw ndaiong Kiskumen: Kita pahn kohla ni sehr en sounkopwung.

9 Oh met kapereniada Kiskumen mehlel, pwe e medewe me e pahn kapwaiadahr ah koasoandio; ahpw kilang, nein Ilemen laduo, ni ar wia kohkohla ni sehr en sounkopwungo, ahpw doakoahdi Kiskumen lel ni ah mohngiong, kahrehda e pwupwidi mehla ni sohte ngihle. Oh e ahpw tangala oh ndaiong Ilemen soahng koaros me e kilangehr, oh rongehr, oh wiahier.

10 Kedekedeo Ilemen ahpw kadarala arama en koledi pwihn en pirap kan oh kam aramas rir kan, pwe re en kak kamakamala nin duwen kosonnedo.

11 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou me Kadiendon diaradahr me Kiskumen sohte pwurodo e masak pwe ede pil iang kamakamala; eri e kahrehda pwihno re en idawehn. Oh re tangasang nan sahpwo, ni ahl rir ehu, kohla nan sapwtehno; oh met ni ahnsou me Ilemen kadarala aramas en koliraildi, re sohte kak dierekda wasahieu.

12 Oh tohto duwen Kadiendon wet koasoaiepe pahn wiawi mwuhr. Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr pahisek riau en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai.

13 Oh kilang, ni imwin pwuhk wet kumwail pahn kilang me pwihn en Kadiendon wet kasaledahr pwupwidien, ei, kereniong kamwomwalahn aramas en Nihpai kan koaros.

14 Kilang I sohte nda ni imwin pwuhk en Ilemen, ahpw I nda imwin pwuhk en Nihpai, me I kihsang poadoapoad kan koaros me I ntingdier.
hel 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Dir en Mehn Nihpai kan keseula nan sahpw en paliepeng—Re wiahda ihmw me wiawihkihda siment oh wiahda poadoapoad tohto—Aramas kide kei wiliakapwala oh papidaisla—Mahsen en Koht kin kahluwahieng aramas re en komourla—Nihpai nein Ilemen pwutak wiliandi nan sehr en sounkopwung. Ele Sounpar 49–39 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr pahisek siluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan, sohte pingiping nanpwungen aramas akan en Nihpai ihte mie kisin pohnmwahso kis me pwarada nan mwomwohdiso, me kahrehda mie kisin pwupwidi kei rehn aramas kan, me wia irair me kameleileidihte ni imwin pahr pahisek siluho.

2 Oh sohte pingiping rehn aramas akan nan pahr pahisek pahieuo; de pil mie pingiping laud nan pahr pahisek limauo.

3 Kedekedeo nan pahr pahisek weneu, ei, mie pingiping laud oh pwupwidi tohto; me kahrehda aramas tohto mehlel kohkohlahsang sahpw en Saraemla, oh kohwei nan sahpw en paliepeng pwe re en sohsohki sahpwo.

4 Oh re seiloak wei wasa doh mehlel, lao re lel ni lehn pihl lap kei oh pilap tohto.

5 Iei, oh re kohpeseng wasa kan koaros nan sahpwo, wasa kan me saikinte wiahla sahpw tehnla oh sohte tuhke, pwehki aramas tohto me sohsohki sahpwo mwowe.

6 Oh met sohte wasa nan sahpwo me tehnla, ihte tuhke me apwal; ahpw pwehki kamwomwala lap en aramas kan me tepin sohsohki sahpwo e kahdankihla sahpw tehnla.

7 Oh mehndahte eh malaulau tuhke me mih nan sahpwo, ahpw aramas me kohla wasahko maila wiewia doadoahk en siment; Eri re wiahda ihmw siment kan, me re kin kousoan loale.

8 Kedekedeo re ahpw kaparaparala oh parpeseng, oh kohsang nan sahpw en palieir kohlahng nan sahpw en paliepeng, oh parpeseng lao re ahpw tohtohla pohn sahpwo pwon, sang ni sehd en palieir kohla lel sehd en paliepeng, sang ni sehd en palikapi kohla lel palimese.

9 Oh aramas akan me mihmi nan sahpw paliepeng kin kousoan nan impwal kan, oh nan ihmw siment kan, oh re kin mweidehng tuhke sohte lipilipil en oseda nan sahpwo pwe en keirda, pwe mwurin ahnsouo re en kak alehdi tuhke me re pahn wiahkihda ihmwarail kan, ei, arail kahnihmw kan, oh arail tehnpas sarawi kan, oh arail sinokoke kan, oh arail wasahn kaudok kan, oh soahngen ihmw kan koaros.

10 Kedekedeo pwehki tuhke ah kin apwal nan sahpw en paliepeng, re kin kadarala rehrail sang ni ar doadoahngki weren nansed.

11 Oh met re kahrehda aramas akan nan sahpw paliepeng ar kak wiahkihda tuhke oh siment tohtohn kahnihmw kan.

12 Kedekedeotohtohn aramas en Amon, me wia ntahn Mehn Leimen sang ni ipwidi, pil iang kohla nan sahpw wet.

13 Oh met poadoapoad tohto me ntingda ong wiewia kan en aramas pwukat, sang tohtohn aramas pwukat, me pisetik oh reirei, duwen irail.

14 Ahpw kilang, pali epwiki en poadoapoad en wiewia kan en aramas pwukat, ei, soaipen Mehn Leimen kan oh Nihpai kan, oh arail mahwin kan, oh pingiping kan, oh pwupwidi kan, oh arail kalohngkan, oh arail kokohp kan, oh arail doadoahngki sohp oh wiahda sohp kan, oh arail kauwada tehnpas sarawi kan, oh sinokoke kan oh arail wasahn kaudok kan, oh arail mour pwung kan, oh arail wiewia suwed kan, oh arail kam aramas kan, oh arail pirap kan, oh arail kulih kan, oh soahngen tiahk suwed kan oh tiahk en nenek kan, sohte kak audehda doadoahk wet.

15 Ahpw kilang, mie soahngen pwuhk tohto oh poadoapoad tohto kan, oh Mehn Nihpai kan me kin keieu kolokol.

16 Oh Mehn Nihpai kan kin kadakadaur kohdo sang ehu dih kohla rehn pil ehu dih, lao re kin pwupwidiong nan dihp oh kamakamala, kuhliasang, oh pwepweki en kamala, oh pekousla, oh kamala, oh mwerpeseng nan sahpwo, oh doaloahda Mehn Leimen kan lao re sohla kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki ar suwedla, oh lawalohla, oh lemeila, iei, pwehki ar wiahla Mehn Leimen.

17 Oh met I pahn pwurodohng ei poadoapoadet; eri, dahme I koasoaiaier wiawiher mwurin pingiping lap kan, oh akamai kan, oh mahwin kan, oh pwupwidi kan, rehn aramas en Nihpai kan.

18 Pahr pahisek weneu en mwehin sounkopwung kan imwisekilahr;

19 Kedekedeo pingiping lap pil wiwiawihte nan sahpwo, ei, nan pahr pahisek isuh, oh pil nan pahr pahisek waluh.

20 Ahpw Ilemen wiliandi nan sehr en sounkopwung ni pwung oh pahrek; ei, e nsenohki kapwaiada koasoandi kan, oh kopwung kan, oh sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan; oh e kin wia me pwung mwohn silangin Koht ahnsou koaros; oh e kin weweidki koasoandi en ah pahpao, kahrehda e pweida nan sahpwo.

21 Kedekedeo e ahpw nainkihda pwutak riemen. E ahpw kihong me laudo eden Nihpai, oh ong me tikitiko, eden Lihai. Oh re ahpw tepida kekeirda ong Kauno.

22 Kedekedeo mahwin kan oh pingiping kan ahpw tepida ekis uhdi, rehn aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan, ni imwilahn pahr pahisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

23 Kedekedeo nan pahr pahisek duwauo en mwehin sounkopwung kan, meleilei mimihehte nan sahpwo, koaros ihte pwihn rir me Kadiendon lipirapo koasoanehdier nan sahpw me mie kousoan ie, me ni ahnsouo irail kaun en koapworment kan sohte wehwehki; kahrehda re sohte kamwomwasang nan sahpwo.

24 Kedekedeo nan pahrete mie keirida lap mehlel nan mwomwohdiso, kahrehda mie aramas kid kei me towehla nan mwomwohdiso oh papidaisla sang ni koluhla.

25 Oh keiridahn nan mwomwohdiso udahn lap, oh kapai tohto me mweredieng pohn aramas akan, me kahrehda samworo lapalap kan oh sounpadahk kan iang pein pwuriamweikihla mehlel.

26 Kedekedeo sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk ahpw pweida ong papidais oh utuhtpenehn mwomwohdisohn Koht, aramas tohto, iei, nen kei.

27 Met kitail kak kilang me Kauno kin ketin kupwurkalahngan ong irail koaros me pahn, nan mohngiongirail ni mehlel, eker ni mware sarawio.

28 Ei, met kitail kilang me ewenkel en nanleng ritidahng koaros, iei ong irail kan me pahn kamehlele mwaren Sises Krais, me iei Sapwellimen Kohto.

29 Ei, kitail kilang me mehmen me pahn koledi teng mahsen en Koht, me ieias oh manaman, me pahn pwalangpeseng koaros widing oh lidip kan oh mwersuwed en tepilo, oh kahluwa aramas en Krais nan ahl inen oh tehtiko kotehla wahu en pahtou poatoapoat me kaunopadahr en kapwonehla me suwed kan—

30 Oh wahla palingehnarail kan, ei, palingehnarail poatoapoat kan, ni palimaun en Koht nan wein nanleng, pwe re en iang mwohndi rehn Eipraam, oh Aisek, oh rehn Seikop, oh rehn atail pahpa sawari kan koaros, oh sohla pwurasang mwo.

31 Oh nan pahr wet pereperen wiwiawihte nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh nan sahpw kan me kapilpene, iei nan sahpw kaoros me Mehn Nihpai kan sapwaniki.

32 Kedekedeo mie popohl oh peren lap mehlel nan luhwen pahr pahisek duwauo; ei, oh pil mie popohl oh peren lap nan pahr limeisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

33 Oh nan pahr limeisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan pil mie popohl, ihte pohnmwahso me tepida doulong nan mwomwohdiso—kaidehn nan mwomwohdiso en Koht, ahpw nan mohngiong en aramas me kin nda re wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht—

34 Oh re pohnmwasolahr, kahrehda ar kaloke riarail me tohto. Met e wia suwed lap ehu, me kahrehda aramas akan me opampap ar lokolongki kalokolok lap kan, oh lelohng kahpwal tohto.

35 Ahpw re kin kalapw kaisihsol oh kapakap, oh kehkehlaila nan arail opampap, tengetengedi nan pwoson Krais, kahrehda palingehnarail kan direkihla peren oh popohl, iei, lao mohngiongarail kan mwakelekelkihla oh sarawikihla, oh sarawihla wet kohdo pwehki ar mweidala mohngiongarail kan ong Koht.

36 Kedekedeo pahr limeisek riauo pil imwisekla nan popohl, ihte pohnmwahso lap me pidelongehr nan mohngiong en aramas kan; oh met pwehki ar kepwehpwehla mehlel oh arail pweida nan sahpwo; oh e wie lalaudla rehrail nan ehu ehu rahn.

37 Kedekedeo nan pahr limeisek siluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Ilemen ahpw kapilsalehdala, oh nah pwutak me keieu laud, Nihpai, weiiandi tepida kakaun. Kedekedeo e ahpw wiahla sounkopwung me pwung oh pahrek; ei, e ahpw kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh idawehn koasoandi en ah pahpao.
hel 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai me pwupwidi kan oh Mehn Leimen kan patpene oh kihsang sahpw en Saraemla—Mehn Nihpai kan ar lohdi kohdo sang ni ar wiewia suwed kan—Mwomwohdiso pweiek, oh aramas kan luwetala duwehte Mehn Leimen kan. Ele Sounpar 38–30 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan pahr kelimeisek pahieu mie kahngohdi tohto nan mwomwohdiso, oh pil mie pingiping nan pwungen aramas kan, kahrehda aramas tohto kamakamala.

2 Oh pwihn en aramas me kapingada wasa ko ahpw kamakamala oh pwepwekihsang nan sahpwo, oh re kohla rehn nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan.

3 Kedekedeo re ahpw nantihong kamwekidada Mehn Leimen kan pwe re en kohdo mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan; ahpw kilang, Mehn Leimen kan masak mehlel, kahrehda re sohte men rong ngilen aramas kahngohdi kan.

4 Ahpw kedekedeo nan pahr limeisek keweneu en mwehin sounkopwung kan, mie ekei me pwupwidi kan me kohsang Mehn Nihpai kan kohla rehn Mehn Leimen kan; oh re pweida ni ar iang irail kan me songosong kamwekid re en lingeringerdohng Mehn Nihpai kan; oh nan pahro irail koaros kaukaunop ong mahwin.

5 Oh nan pahr kelimeisek isuh re ahpw kohdihdohng mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan, oh re ahpw tapiada doadoahk en mehla; ei, kahrehda nan pahr limeisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan re pweida ni ar kalowehdi sahpw en Saraemla; ei, oh pil sahpw kan koaros, iei lao lel sahpw me karanih sahpw en Rahk.

6 Oh Mehn Nihpai kan oh nein Moronaia sounpei kan kapweiekla lel nan sahpw en Rahk;

7 Oh wasao re ahpw kakehlakahla sileparail kan ong Mehn Leimen kan, sang ni sehd en palikapi, iei kohkohla palimese; Mehn Nihpai kan kin aluhki rahn ehu, nan ahl me wia irepen wasa me re kakehlakahla oh kihong neirail sounpei kan re en kin sinsile arail wehi en paliepeng.

8 Oh met Mehn Nihpai me pwupwidi kan, iangahki sawas en nein Mehn Leimen sounpei ngeder kan, kalowehdier Mehn Nihpai kan koaros me mih nan sahpw en palikapi. Oh soahng pwukat koaros wiawiehr nan pahr limeisek waluh oh duwauo en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

9 Kedekedeo nan pahr weneisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Moronaia iangahki nah sounpei kan pweida ni ar kalowehdi tohto sapwarail kan; ei, pwurehng kalowehdi kahnihmw kan me lohdi nan pehn Mehn Leimen kan.

10 Kedekedeo nan pahr weneisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan re pweida nan ar pwurehng kalowehdi elep en sapwarail kan koaros.

11 Met ahn Mehn Nihpai kahpwal lap wet, oh kamakamala lap me wiawihong irail, sohte pahn kak wiawi ma sohte arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan me kin wiawi nanpwungarail; ei, oh e kin sang irail me kin keinahki me re wia tohn mwomwohdiso en Koht.

12 Oh met pwehki pohnmwahsohn nan mohngiongarail kan, pwehki ar kepwehpwehla mehlel, ei, pwehki arail kin kaloke me semwemwe kan, ni ar sohte kin kamwenge me mehn mwenge kan, sohte kin kalikawihda me kilisou kan, oh popohr pohn mesen irail akan me opampap, pwehki ar kin mwamwaliki soahng kan me sarawi, lahlahwe ngehn en kokohp oh kaudiahl, kamkamaramas, kulkulih, likilikamw, piripirap, kamkamwahl, kalaudehla pingiping kan, oh tangatangala nan sahpw en Nihpai, rehn Mehn Leimen kan—

13 Oh pwehki arail wiewia suwed lap wet, oh arail kin aklapalapki pein arail kehlail, re kin kelehpwla nan pein arail kehl; eri re kin sohla pweida, ahpw kin kalokolok oh kamakam, pwepweki mwohn Mehn Leimen kan, lao sapwarail kan koaros kin kereniong kohsang.

14 Ahpw kilang, Moronaia kalohngki soahng tohto ong aramas kan pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan, oh Nihpai oh Lihai, me wia nein Ilemen pwutak kan, pil kalohngki soahng tohto ong aramas kan, ei, oh re kohpada soahng tohto ong irail duwen diparail kan, oh dahme pahn kohieng irail ma re sohte pahn koluhkihla diparail kan.

15 Kedekedeo re ahpw koluhla, oh ni ar kin koluhla re ahpw kin pwurehng tepida kekeirda.

16 Pwe ahnsou me Moronaia kilangada me re koluhlahr e ahpw song kahluwa irail sang ehu wasa lel ehu wasa, oh sang ehu kahnihmw kohla nan ehu kahnihmw, lao irail pwurehng kalowehdi elep en arail dipwisou kan oh elep en sapwarail kan koaros.

17 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr weneisek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

18 Kedekedeo nan pahr weneisek riau en mwehin sounkopwung kan, Moronaia sohla kak kalowehdi luhwen sapwarail kan sang Mehn Leimen kan.

19 Eri re pweieksang arail koasoandi en kalowehdi luhwen sapwarail kan, pwe Mehn Leimen kan me pokon mehlel kahrehda e apwal Mehn Nihpai kan re en kalowehiraildi; eri Moronaia ahpw kadoadoangki nah sounpei kan koaros re en kolokolete wasa kan me eh kalowehdier.

20 Kedekedeo, pwehki Mehn Leimen kan ar tohto mehlel, Mehn Nihpai kan masak mehlel, pwe re de lohdi pahn arail manaman, oh tiakiraildi, oh kemeirailla, oh kamwomwirailla.

21 Ei, re tepida tamanda ahn Alma kokohp kan, oh pil mahsen kan en Mosaia; oh re kasawihadahr me re wia aramas keptakai kei, oh me re sohla kesempwaliki sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan;

22 Oh me re wikidalahr oh mwamwalikilahr kosonned kan en Mosaia, de soahng kan me Kauno mahsanihong ih en kihong rehn aramas akan; oh re kasawihadahr me arail kosonned kan sapwungalahr, oh me re wialahr aramas suwed kei, kahrehda re suwedlahr duwehte Mehn Leimen kan.

23 Oh pwehki diparail kan mwomwohdiso tepida pweiek; oh re tepida sohla kamehlele ngehn en kokop oh ngehn en kaudiahl; oh sapwellimen Koht kadeik kan kangkakil meserail kan.

24 Oh re kasawihadahr me re luwetalahr, duwehte riarail Mehn Leimen kan, oh me Ngehn en Kauno solahr doare irail; ei, e pweieksang irailehr pwehki Ngehn en Kauno sohte kin ketiket nan tehnpas samin kan—

25 Eri Kauno ketin uhdihsang doarehkinirail sapwellime manaman kapwuriamwei me sohte pelie, pwe re pwupwidier nan irair en soupwoson oh kahpwal en arail suwed; oh re kasawihadahr me Mehn Leimen kan tohtohsang irail mehlel, oh ma re sohte pahn loaloapwoationg Kauno re pahn udahn mehla.

26 Pwe kilang, re kasawihadahr me kehlail en Mehn Leimen kan pil duwehte arail kehlail, iei kehlail en emen ohl pahrekiong emen. Oh met re pwupwidiengehr nan dihp lap wet; ei, kahrehda re luwetkihla, pwehki diparail, nan ahnsou mwotomwot.
hel 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai oh Lihai loaloapwoatieng kalkalohk—Edera kan lukehiong ira en kapahrekihong ara mour duwehteara pahpa kahlapoko—Krais kin ketin komourala me kin koluhla kan—Nihpai oh Lihai wikidala aramas tohto oh selidi, oh kisiniei kapilirahdi—depwek rotorot ehu perehla aramas silipwiki—Sampah rerrer, oh kepitie ieu mahsanih aramas kan en koluhla—Nihpai oh Lihai koasoaiong tohnleng kan, oh kisiniei ahpw kapilpene pokono. Ele Sounpar 30 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan pahrohte, kilang, Nihpai kihong pwukoahn sehr en sounkopwungo rehn ohl emen me adaniki Sesoram.

2 Pwe nin duwen arail kosonned kan oh arail koapworment e kin koasoandi sang ni pilipil en aramas akan, oh irail kan me kin pilada suwed tohtohsang me kin pilada me mwahu, eri kerkereniong re pahn kamwomwala, pwe kosonned kan sapwungalahr.

3 Ei, oh kaidehn ih koaros met; re wialahr aramas keptakai, kahrehda re sohte kak mih pahn manaman en kosonnedo de nan kopwung, ihte ong kamwomwarail.

4 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw luwetkihla pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; oh e mweidala sehr en sounkopwungo, oh alehda pwukoahn kalohngki mahsen en Koht nan erein luhwen ah rahn akan koaros, oh pil iangahki rie pwutako Lihai, nan erein luhwen ah rahn akan koaros;

5 Pwe re tamatamante mahsen kan me ara pahpa Ilemen ndaiong ira. Oh iet mahsen kan me e ndaiong ira:

6 Kilang, nei pwutak kan, I men kumwa en tamataman kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan; oh I men kumwa en kalohngkihong aramas kan mahsen pwukat. Kilang, I kihongedemwa kan eden tepin atail pahpahko me kohsang nan sahpw en Serusalem; oh met I wiahier pwe ni ahnsou me kumwa pahn tamanda edemwa kan a kumwa pahn tamanda irail; oh ni ahnsou me kumwa pahn tamanda irail kumwa pahn tamanda arail doadoahk mwahu kan; oh ni ahnsou me kumwa pahn tamanda arail doadoahk mwahu kan a kumwa pahn ese duwen koasoiperail, oh pil ntingdi, duwen ar mwahu.

7 Eri, nei pwutak ko, I men kumwa en wia dahme mwahu, pwe en pil kak mie koasoipemwa, oh pil ntingdi, duwehte koasoiparail oh me ntingdier duwen irail.

8 Oh met nei pwutak ko, kilang I men kumwa en pil wia mehkot laud, me iei, kumwa en wia mepwukat kaidehn pwe kumwa en kalahki, ahpw kumwa en wia mepwukat pwe kumwa en kepwehpwehkihla pai en nanleng, ei, me poatoapoat, oh sohte kak sohrala; ei, pwe kumwa en kak alehdi kisakis kesempwal en mour soutuk, me kitail kak kamehlele me e kohieng atail pahpa kahlapoko.

9 Oh tamataman, tamataman, nei pwutak ko, mahsen kan me nanmwarki Pensamin mahsanihong sapwellime aramas akan; ei, tamataman me sohte ehu ahl de wiepe me aramas kak komourkihla, ihte sang ni ntahn tomwpen Sises Krais, me pahn ketido; ei, tamataman me e pahn ketido pwe en komourala sampah.

10 Oh pil tamataman mahsen kan en Amulek me e ndaiong Siesrom, nan kahnihmw en Amonaia; pwe e ndaiong ih Kauno udahn pahn ketido komourala sapwellime aramas, ahpw e sohte pahn ketido komourirailla nan diparail kan, ahpw komourirailla sang diparail kan.

11 Oh e ketin sapwellimanki manaman sang rehn Sahmo pwe en komourirailla sang diparail kan pwehki koluhla; eri e kadarewei tohnleng kan pwe re en kalohngki rongamwahu en koasoandi en koluhla, me kin kahrehiongmanaman en Soundoaro, ong komourpen palingenarail kan.

12 Oh met, nei pwutak ko, tamataman, tamataman me pohn paip en atail Soundoaro, me iei Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, me kumwa pahn kauwada amwa poahsoan powe; pwe ahnsou me tepilo pahn kadaredo ah kisinieng kehlail kan, ei, piripir en ah elipipo, ei, ni ahnsou me ah keteu ais pahn pwupwidiong pohmwa oh kisinieng kehlail pahn ipidohngkumwa, e sohte pahn ahneki manaman en waik kumwadi nan wahu en pahtou oh kahpwal soutuk, pwehki paip me kumwa kokouda powe, me wia poahsoan kehlail, poahsoan ehu ma aramas pahn kokouda powe re sohte pahn kak pwupwidi.

13 Kedekedeo ih mahsen pwukat me Ilemen padahkihong nah pwutak ko: ei, e padahkihong ira soahng tohto me sohte ntingdiehr, oh pil soahng tohto me ntingdiehr.

14 Oh re tamataman ah mahsen kan; oh re ahpw kohwei, kapwkapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, en padahngki mahsen en Koht ong aramas en Nihpai koaros, tepida nan kahnihmw en Rahk;

15 Oh sang mwo kohla nan kahnihmw en Kid; oh sang kahnihmw en Kid kohla nan kahnihmw en Mulek;

16 Oh iei sang nan ehu kahnihmw kohla nan pil ehu, lao re kohwei rehn aramas en Nihpai koaros me mih nan sahpw en palieir; oh sang mwo kohla nan sahpw en Saraemla, rehn Mehn Leimen kan.

17 Kedekedeo re ahpw kalohk sang ni manaman kehlail, kahrehda re katokehdi tohto irail akan me kahngohdi kan me kohkohsang Mehn Nihpai kan, kahrehda arail kohdo oh wehkada diparail kan oh papidaisla sang ni koluhla, oh mwadangete pwurala rehn Mehn Nihpai kan pwe re en song kapwungala sapwung kan me re wiahiong irail.

18 Kedekedeo Nihpai oh Lihai ahpw kalohk ong Mehn Leimen kan sang ni manaman oh mweimwei kehlail, pwe re ahniki manaman oh mweimwei kohieng ira pwe re en kak koasoai, oh soahng kan me re pahn anahne koasoaia pil kin kohieng ira—

19 Eri re koasoaiong Mehn Leimen kan me kahrehda arail pwuriamwei mehlel, oh kamehlele, kahrehda me welikid Mehn Leimen me mihmi nan sahpw en Saraemla oh wasa kapilpene kan ar papidaisla sang ni koluhla, oh kamehlelehda wiewia suwed en tiahk en arail pahpa ko.

20 Kedekedeo Nihpai oh Lihai ahpw uhsehla sang wasao kohla nan sahpw en Nihpai.

21 Kedekedeo re ahpw kolkoldi rehn nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan oh lekideklong nan imweteng; iei, nan imwetengohte me Amon oh rie ohl akan selidi sang ladu en Limai kan.

22 Oh mwurin ara lekideklong nan imweteng sohte mwengehki erein rahn kei, kilang, re ahpw kohla nan imwetengo pwe re en ale ira oh kemeirahla.

23 Kedekedeo e mwomwen kisiniei ehu ahpw kapilpene Nihpai oh Lihai, kahrehda re sohte men doahke ira pwe re masak re de mwasikala. Ahpw, Nihpai oh Lihai sohte mwasikala; oh re mwomwen keskesihnen nan werengen kisiniei oh sohte mwasikala.

24 Oh ahnsou me re kasawihda me uhr en kisiniei ehu kapilirapene, oh me e sohte kamwasikahla ira, ara mohngiong ahpw kehlailkihda.

25 Pwe re kilang me Mehn Leimen kan sohte men doahke ira; de kohdo karanih ira, ahpw irail kesihnen duwehte re lohtengkihla ar pwuriamwei.

26 Kedekedeo Nihpai oh Lihai ahpw kesihnenda oh tepida koasoaiong irail, ndinda: Kumwail dehr masak, pwe kilang, Koht me ketin kasalehiong kumwail soahng kapwuriamwei wet, ni e kasalehiong kumwailehr me kumwail sohte kak kohkihtdi pwe en kemeikihtla.

27 Oh kilang, ni ahnsou me re ndahier koasoai pwukat, sampah rerrer mehlel, oh dihd en imwetengo rerrada ni mwomwen me e pahn rengkidi nan pwehlo; ahpw kilang, re sohte pwupw. Oh kilang, irail kan me mih nan imwetengo re wia Mehn Leimen oh Mehn Nihpai me pwupwidi kan.

28 Kedekedeo depwek rotorot ehu ahpw pereirailla, oh pepehm en masepwehk mehlel lelohng irail.

29 Kedekedeo mie ngihl ehu ahpw peido mwomwen me sang pohn depweko, ketihtihki: Kumwail koluhla, kumwail koluhla, oh uhdihsang songosong kawehla nei ladu kan me I kin kadarewehng kumwail pwe re en kalohngki rongamwahu.

30 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me irail rongada ngihl wet, oh wehwehkihda me e sohte wia ngihlen nahnsapwe, de pil ngihlen mwoaroang, ahpw, e wia ngihl meleilei unsek ehu, mwomwen me e mwenginingin, oh e sair nan palingehn ni mehlel—

31 Oh mehndahte ngihl meleilei wet, kilang sampah rerrer mehlel, oh dihd en imwetengo pwurehng rerrada, mwomwen me e pahn pwupwidi nan pwehlo; oh kilang depwek rotoroto, me pereirailla, sohte sohrala—

32 Oh kilang ngihlo pwurehng peido, ketihtihki: Kumwail koluhla, kumwail koluhla, pwe wehin nanleng kerendohr; oh uhdihsang songosong kawehla nei ladu kan. Kedekedeo sampah pwurehng rerrer, oh dihd ko rerrada.

33 Oh pil pak kesiluh ngihlo e pwurehng peido, oh mahsanihong irail mahsen kapwuriamwei kei me aramas sohte kak koasoai; oh dihdo pwurehng rerrada, oh sampah rerrer mwomwen me e pahn pwalpeseng.

34 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan sohte kak tang pwehki depwek rotoroto me kipeiraildi; ei, oh re pil sohte kak mwekid pwehki masepwehk me lelohng irail.

35 Met mie emen rehrail me wia Mehn Nihpai sang ni ah ipwidi, me wia emen tohn mwomwohdisohn Koht mahs ahpw kohkohlasang irail.

36 Kedekedeo e ahpw sohpeila, oh kilang, e ahpw kilangada nan depwek rotorot mesen Nihpai oh Lihai; oh kilang, re udahn marain mehlel, duwehte mesen tohnleng kan. Oh e kilangada me re kilikilengdahla nanleng; oh re mwomwen koasoakoasoai de lokolokaiong aramas men me re kilengdahng ni ngihl laud.

37 Kedekedeo ohl menet ahpw eker pokono, pwe re en sohpeila oh kilang. Oh kilang, mie manaman me kohieng irail pwe re en kak sohpeila oh kilang; oh re ahpw kilangada mesen Nihpai oh Lihai kan.

38 Oh irail ahpw kalelapak rehn ohlo: Kilang, ia wehwehn mepwukat koaros, oh ihs me ohl riemenet wie koasoakoasoaiong?

39 Met eden ohl menet iei Aminadap. Oh Aminadap sapengkinirail: Ira wie koasoakoasoaiong tohngleng kan en Koht.

40 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw idek reh: Dahme se pahn wia, pwe depwek rotorot wet en kak kohsang poht?

41 Oh Aminadap sapengkinirail: Kumwail anahne koluhla, oh peki rehn ngihlo, lao kumwail pahn pwosonla Krais, me Alma, Amulek, oh Siesrom padahkiong kumwailehr; oh ni ahnsou me kumwail pahn wia met, depwek rotorot wet pahn kohsang pohmwail.

42 Kedekedeo irail koaros ahpw tepida peki rehn ngihl en ih me itikada sampah; ei, irail ahpw pekipeki lao depwek rotoroto kohsang.

43 Kedekedeo ahnsou me re kilangseli, oh kilangada me depwek rotoroto kohsangehr pohrail, kilang, irail kilangada me uhr en kisiniei ehu kapilpenehr emenemen irail koaros.

44 Oh Nihpai oh Lihai mihmi nanpwungarail: ei, re kapilkipene; ei, re mwomwen mihmi nan werengen kisiniei, ahpw e sohte kamedekeirahla, de pil isikada dihd en imwetengo; oh re direkihla peren me apwal en kawehwehda oh diren lingan.

45 Oh kilang, Ngehn Sarawi en Koht ahpw ketidihdo sang nanleng, oh ahpw ketilong nan mohngiongarail kan, oh re direkihla ni mwomwen kisiniei, oh re kak koasoaikihwei mahsen kapwuriamwei kan.

46 Kedekedeo mie ngihl ehu ahpw kohdohng irail, ei, ngihl mwahu ehu, ni eh mwomwen mwenginingin, ndinda:

47 Popohl, popohl ong kumwail, pwehki amwail pwoson nei Pwutak Kempoakeo, me sangete ni kepikipikdahn sampah.

48 Oh met, ahnsou me re rongada re ahpw kilengdahla pwe re en kilang wasa me ngihlo peidohsang ia; oh kilang, re ahpw kilangada nanleng ritpeseng; oh tohnleng kan kohkohdihdo sang nanleng oh kalohkiong irail.

49 Oh irail aramas me silipwiki me kilangada oh rongehr mepwukat; oh re kaweidki re en kohwei oh dehr pwuriamweiki, de pil peikasalki.

50 Kedekedeo re ahpw kohwei, oh kalohk ong aramas akan, padapadahngki wasa koaros duwen soahng kan koaros me irail rongehr ohkilangadahr, kahrehda pali laud en Mehn Leimen kan kamehlelehda irail, pwehki kadehde kesempwal kan me re alehdi.

51 Oh koaros me kamehlelehda irail ahpw pwilikihdi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh pil arail kailok oh tiahk en arail pahpah ko.

52 Kedekedeo re ahpw mweidalang Mehn Nihpai kan sapwerail kan me re kihsang.
hel 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen me mwahu kan kalohk ong Mehn Nihpai me suwed kan—Irail koaros pweida nan mwehin popohl oh tohto dipwisou—Lusiper, sounwiahda dihp, kamwakidada mohngiong en me suwed kan oh pwihn en Kadiendon lipirapko re en kam aramas oh wia tiahk suwed kan—Lipirapko kalowehdi koapworment en Mehn Nihpai kan. Ele Sounpar 29–23 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ahnsou me pahr weneisek riau en mwehin sounkopwung kan nekier, mepwukat koaros wiawiher oh pali laud en Mehn Leimen kan wialahr aramas mwahu kei, kahrehda arail wiewia mwahu kan siksang ahn Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki arail kehlail oh arail tengediong nan pwosono.

2 Pwe kilang, Mehn Nihpai tohto me keptakailahr oh apwal en koluhla oh suwed mehlel, kahrehda re soikala mahsen en Koht oh pakahk kan oh kokohp kan koaros me kin kohieng irail.

3 Ahpw, aramas en mwomwohdiso ahniki peren laud pwehki wiliakapwalahn Mehn Leimen kan, ei, pwehki mwomwohdisohn Koht, me wiawihdahr rehrail. Oh re kin miniminpene nanpwungarail, oh kin pereperenpene, oh kin ahniki peren laud.

4 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen tohto kohdihdo nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kalohngkihong aramas en Nihpai kan ia mwomwen arail wiliakapwala, oh koangoangehkinirail re en ahniki pwoson oh koluhla.

5 Ei, oh tohto me kalohk ni manaman oh mweimwei kowahlap, pwe en karakarahkihla tohto irail, pwe re en kak idawehn Koht oh Sihmpwulo ni karakarahk.

6 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen tohto ahpw kohla nan sahpw en paliepeng; oh pil Nihpai oh Lihai kohla nan sahpw en paliepeng, pwe re en kalohk ong aramas akan. Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr weneisek siluh.

7 Oh kilang, mie popohl nan sahpwo pwon, kahrehda Mehn Nihpai kan kohwei nan sahpw sohte lipilipil kan me re men kohla, rehn Mehn Nihpai kan de Mehn Leimen kan.

8 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan pil kohwei wasa sohte lipilipil me re men kohwei, rehn Mehn Leimen kan de rehn Mehn Nihpai kan; oh met re ahnikier saledek en patpene nanpwungarail, ong pwainda de netiki, oh kalaudehla arail dipwisou, nin duwen me re inangih.

9 Kedekedeo re kepwehpwehla kowahlap, Mehn Leimen oh Mehn Nihpai kan; oh re nainki kohl tohto, oh silper, oh soahngen mete kesempwal koaros, pali koaros sahpw en palieir oh sahpw en paliepeng.

10 Met sahpw en palieir kin kahdaniki Lihai, oh sahpw en paliepeng kin kahdaniki Miulek, me iei eden nein Sedekaia pwutak; pwe Kauno ketin wahdo Miulek nan sahpw en paliepeng, oh Lihai nan sahpw en palieir.

11 Oh kilang, mie soahngen kohl koaros nan pali koaros en sahpw pwukat, oh silper, oh soahngen mete kesempwal koaros; oh pil mie aramas semen nan doadoahk, me kin wiahda soahngen mete kan koaros oh kamwahuiala; oh met kahrehda ar kepwehpwehla.

12 Re kin mwetiwelih werentuhke tohto, pali koaros nan paliepeng oh nan palieir; oh re keirda mehlel, ni paliepeng oh palieir. Oh re kaparaparala oh kehlail mehlel nan sahpwo. Oh re apwalihda pelin sihpw oh kou tohto, ei, nahi mworourou tohto.

13 Kilang neirail lih akan kin pwerisek oh wiahda dereht, oh dehkada soahngen likou koaros, likou linen kaselel oh soahngen likou koaros, pwe en kalikauwihkin irail. Oh met pahr keweneisek pahieu imwisekla nan popohl.

14 Oh nan pahr weneisek limauo re ahpw pil ahniki peren oh popohl mehlel, ei, kalkalohk laud oh kokohp tohto duwen dahme pahn kohdo. Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr weneisek weneuo.

15 Kedekedeo nan pahr keweneisek weneu en mwehin sounkopwung kan, kilang, mie emen me kemehla Sesoram ni sohte sansal ahnsou me e mwomwohd nan sehr en sounkopwungo. Kedekedeo nan pahrohte aramas akan ahpw pilada nah pwutako en wiliandi, e pil kamakamala. Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr keweneisek weneu.

16 Oh ni tepidahn pahr weneisek isuho aramas akan pwurehng tepida susuwedla mehlel.

17 Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin kapaiahkinirail kepweh kan en sampah ahnsou reirei kahrehda re sohte mwekidkihda lingeringer, mahwin kan, de kamaramas; eri re tepida poakehng arail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan; ei, re tepida rapahki en kepwehpwehla pwe re en aklapalapkipene; eri re tepida kamaramas ni rir, oh pirap oh kulih, pwe re en kak kepwepwehla.

18 Oh met kilang, sounkamaramas oh sounkulih ko re wia pwihn me Kiskumen oh Kadiendon wiahdahr. Oh met kedekedeo pwihn en Kadiendon me tohtohla, mehlel rehn mehn Nihpai kan. Ahpw kilang, re pokon rehn Mehn Leimen kan me suwed mehlel ko. Oh re kin kahdaniki sounpirap oh sounkamaramas en Kadiendon kan.

19 Oh iei irail me kemehla sounkopwung Sesoram, oh nah pwutako, ni ar mihmi nan sehr en sounkopwung; oh kilang, re sohte dierek.

20 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan diarada mie sounpirap rehrail, re pahtoula mehlel; oh re nantihong doadoahngki wiepe koaros me re kak pwe re en kamwomwirailla sang nin sampah.

21 Ahpw kilang, Sehdan kamwakidada nan mohngiong en Mehn Nihpai kan, kahrehda re miniminiong pwihn en pirap ko, oh alehda arail inou kesempwal kan oh kahula kan, me re pahn doarehla emen emen irail nan arail apwal sohte lipilipil kan me re pahn kin lelohng, pwe re sohte pahn kin kalokolongki arail kamaramas kan, oh arail kulih kan, oh arail pirap kan.

22 Kedekedeo mie kilel kan me re kin wehwehkipene, ei, arail kilel rir kan, oh arail koasoai rir kan; oh met pwe re en kak kasawihada riarail ohl men me iangehr wiahda inouo, pwe sohte lipilipil soahngen tiahk suwed me riarail men pahn wiahda e sohte pahn ohkihla rehn rie mehteio, de pil rehn irail kan me iangehr ah pwihno, me wiahdahr inou wet.

23 Oh met pwe re en kak kamaramas, oh kulih, oh pirap, oh wia tiahk en nenek kan oh soahngen tiahk suwed kan koaros, me uhwong kosonned en arail wehi oh pil kosonned kan en arail Koht.

24 Oh mehmen me iang arail pwihn wet ahpw kasalehiong sampah arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan, pahn kopwungki, kaidehn nin duwen kosonned en arail wehi, ahpw nin duwen kosonned en arail wiewia suwed kan, me Kadiendon oh Kiskumen koasoanehdier.

25 Met kilang, iei ih kahula oh inou rir pwukat me Alma kehkehlingkihong nah pwutako en dehr mweidehng en kohieng sampah, pwe re de elehiong kamwomwalahn aramas pwukat.

26 Met kilang, kahula oh inou rir pwukat sohte kohieng Kadiendon sang nan poadoapoad ko me kohieng Ilemen; ahpw kilang, re kohieng nan mohngiong en Kadiendon sang aramasohte me kasongehdi tepin atail pahpa oh nohno re en tungoale wahntuhke keinepwio—

27 Ei, aramasohte me wiahiong Kein koasoandio, ma e pahn kemehla rie pwutak Eipel sampah sohte pahn ese. Oh e ahpw kihong Kein koasoandi wet oh irail kan me kin idawehn sang ahnsouo kohla.

28 Oh pil iei aramasohte me kihong nan mohngiong en aramas kan ma re pahn kauwada douliko ileile re kak leldahla nanleng. Oh iei aramasohte me elehiong aramas ko me kohsang ni douliko kohdo nan sahpw wet; me kadaurpeseng doadoahk rotorot oh tiahk suwed kan pohn sahpwet pwon, lao e waikidihong aramas ko nan kamwomwala, oh nan ehl poatoapoat.

29 Ei, iei aramasohte me kihongehr nan mohngiong en Kadiendon en peusehla wiewia doadoahk rotoroto, oh pil kamarams rir; oh e kadkadauredo sangete ni tepin aramas e miehda lelledo ahnsou wet.

30 Oh kilang, iei ih me wia sounwiahda dihp koaros. Oh kilang, e kin wiewiahte ah doadoahk rotorot oh kamaramas rir, oh kin kadaurehdo arail koasoandi kan, oh arail kahula kan, oh arail inou kan, oh arail koasoandi en wiewia suwed kan, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih nin duwen me e kak kalowehdi mohngiong en aramas akan.

31 Oh met kilang, e kalowehdier mohngiong en Mehn Nihpai kan; ei, kahrehda re suwedlahr mehlel; ei, pali laud en irail sohpeisangehr ahl en mour pwung kan, oh sohlahr kesempwaliki sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh sohpeiohng pein arail koahiek, oh ahpw wiahiong irail dikadik en arail kohl oh arail silper kan.

32 Kedekedeo wiewia suwed pwukat koaros kohdohng irail nan erein ahnsou mwotomwot, kahrehda pali laud en mepwukat ahpw lelohng irail nan pahr keweneisek isuh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

33 Oh re pil laudla nan arail wiewia suwed kan nan pahr keweneisek waluh, me elehiong pahtou laud oh mwahiei rehn me mwahu kan.

34 Oh met kitail kilang me Mehn Nihpai kan arail pwoson tepidahr tikitikila, oh arail wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan lalaudla, aMehn Leimen kan tepidahr kekeirda mehlel nan marain en arail Koht; ei, re tepidahr kapwaiada sapwellime koasoandi kan oh kosonned kan, oh weweidki mehlel oh mour pwung nin duwen sapwellime koasoandi kan.

35 Oh met kitail kilang me Ngehn en Kauno tepida pweieksang Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki wiewia suwed kan oh keptakailahn mohngiongarail kan.

36 Oh met kitail kilang me Kauno ketin tepidahr ketikihong sapwellime Ngehno rehn Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki arail mpahi oh inangih kamehlele sapwellime mahsen kan.

37 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw rapahki pwihn en Kadiendon lipirap kan; oh re kalohngkihong irail mahsen en Koht rehn irail me keieu suwed, kahrehda pwihn en pirap wet kamwomwasang mehlel rehn Mehn Leimen kan.

38 Kedekedeo ah Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw kakehlakairailda oh utungirailda, tepida rehn irail me keieu suwedkan, lao re kohpeseng nan sahpw en Mehn Nihpai koaros, oh kasongehdier irail kan me kin mour pwung lao re iang kamehlele arail doadoahk kan oh alehda wahn arail kul kan, oh patehng irail nan arail kamaramas rir oh pwihn suwed kan.

39 Oh met re ahpw alehdier udahn pwukoahn apwalih koapworment, kahrehda irail tiahkidi pahn nehrail kan oh pohr oh kaloke oh sohpeisang aramas me semwehmwe oh mpahi, oh opampap me kin idawehn Koht.

40 Oh met kitail kilang me irail miher nan irair suwed mehlel oh irail kereniongehr kamwomwala soutuk.

41 Kedekedeo met ahpw kaimwisekala pahr weneisek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.
hel 7:
Kokohp En Nihpai, Nein Ilemen Pwutak—Koht kamasak aramas en Nihpai kan me e pahn ketidohng irail nan sapwellime engieng, me pahn elehiong irail en kamwomwala ihte ma re pahn koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan. Koht kalokehki aramas en Nihpai kan soumwahu; irail koluhla oh sohpeilahng ih. Samuel, Mehn Leimen, kokohp ong Mehn Nihpai kan.

Audaudki iralaud 7 lel 16.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai lekidekla nan paliepeng oh pwurala Saraemla—E kapakap nan doulik en ah mwetuwelo oh likuweriong aramas akan re en koluhla de mehla. Ele Sounpar 23–21 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekedeo nan pahr weneisek duwau en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, Nihpai, nein Ilemen pwutako, pwurala nan sahpw en Saraemla sang sahpw en paliepeng.

2 Pwe e kohwei rehn aramas akan me mih nan sahpw en paliepeng, oh kalohngkihong irail mahsen en Koht, oh kokohpehng irail soahng tohto;

3 Oh re soikala ah padahk kan koaros, kahrehda e sohte kak mihmi rehrail, ahpw pwurehng pwurodo nan uhdaken sapwe.

4 Oh nan ahnsouo e kilikilang aramas akan mihmi nan irair en mour suwed apwal, oh pwihn en Kadiendon lipirap kan me mihmihla nan sehr en sounkopwung kan—pwehki ar kalowehdier manaman oh mweimwei nan sahpwo; pwilikihdi sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh ni sohte ekiste pwung mwohn Koht; sohte wia doadoahk pwuhng ong aramas akan;

5 Kaloke me pwung kan pwehki ar mour pwung; mweidala me sapwung kan oh me suwed kan ar sohte kalokolok pwehki neirail mwohni; oh kapatahiong en kolokol pwukoahn kaun nan koapworment, pwe en kaunda oh wia nin duwen nsenarail kan, pwe re en kak kepwehpwehla oh sampah en kepinga irail, oh, kapatahiong, pwe irail en kak mengeiong wie tiahk en kamwahl, oh pirap, oh kamaramas, oh wia nin duwen pein nsenarail kan—

6 Met e sohte lel sounpar kei a dihp lap wet lelohngehr Mehn Nihpai kan; oh ahnsou me Nihpai kilangadahr, ah mohngiong udahn pahtoukihla mehlel; oh e ahpw werikihla ni ah palingehn eh lokolok:

7 Oh, ma ei ahnsou duwehte ahnsou me ei pahpa Nihpai tepin kohdo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwe I en kak iang ih pereperen nan sahpw en inou; ahnsouo nah aramas kan kin mengei en alehdi kaweid, kehlail en kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, oh pwand en lohdi nan dihp; oh re kin mwadang en rong mahsen kan en Kauno—

8 Ei, ma ei ahnsou duwehte ahnsou pwuko, eri ei palingehn pahn ahneki peren nan mour pwung en riei kan.

9 Ahpw kilang, e koasoandi me ei ahnsou iei rahn pwukat, oh me ei palingehn pahn direkihla pahtou pwehki wiewia suwed en riei kan.

10 Oh kilang, kedekedeo met wiawi pohn doulik ehu, me mih nan ahn Nihpai mwetuwelo, me karanih ahl lap me kohla nan wasahn netinet laud, me mih nan kahnihmw en Saraemla; eri, Nihpai poaridi pohn doulik nan ah mwetuwelo, doulik wet pil karanihte kehl en mwetuwelo me ahl lapo tang nihmwah.

11 Kedekedeo mie ohl kei me alialu wasaho oh kilangada Nihpai ni eh wie kapaka ngidingid ong Koht pohn douliko; oh re tangala oh ndaiong aramas kan dahme re kilangehr, oh aramas kan ahpw kapokonpenehr pwe re en kak esehda dah kahrepen mwahiei lap ong wiewia suwed en aramas ko.

12 Oh met, ahnsou me Nihpai kesihnenda e ahpw kilangada pokon en aramas kan me pokonpenehr.

13 Kedekedeo e ahpw kihpeseng ewe oh ndaiong irail: Kilang, dahme kumwail pokonkipene? Pwe I en ndaiong kumwail duwen amwail wiewia suwed kan?

14 Ei, pwehki ei douda pohn ei doulik pwe I en kak poadidiong ei kapakap ong ei Koht, pwehki pahtou mehlel en ei mohngiong, pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan!

15 Oh pwehki ei wie sengiseng oh mwamwahiei me kumwail pokonkipenehr, oh pwuriamweiki; ei, oh kumwail udahn anahne pwuriamwei; ei, kumwail anahne pwuriamwei pwehki kumwail mweidehngehr tepilo en koledi amwail mohngiong kan.

16 Ei, ia mwomwen amwail kak dukiong kasongosong en ih me songosong en kesehdihla palingehnemwail kan nan pahtou poatoapoat oh kahpwal soutuk?

17 Oh kumwail koluhla, kumwail koluhla! Dahme kumwail pahn mehkihla? Kumwail sohpeila, kumwail sohpeilahng Kauno amwail Koht. Dahme e ketin likidmeliekinkumwailla?

18 Met pwehki amwail mohngiong kan keptakailahr; ei, kumwail sohte men rong kepitien silepen sihpw mwahuo; ei, kumwail kahrehiongehr e ketin engiengdahng kumwail.

19 Oh kilang, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla, e sohte pahn kihkumwailpene ahpw e pahn kamwereikumwailpeseng oh kumwail pahn wiahla kenen kidi oh mahn lawalo sali.

20 Oh, ia mwomwen amwail kak manokehla amwail Koht nan rahnohte me e ketin doareikumwailla?

21 Ahpw kilang, met kin wiawi pwe kumwail en kin kepwehpwehla, pwe aramas en kin kepinga kumwail, ei, oh pwe kumwail en kak alehdi kohl oh silper. Oh kumwail katengedier amwail mohngiong kan pohn dipwisou en kepwehpwe kan oh soahng mwahl en sampah, me kahrehda amwail kamaramas, oh kulih, oh pirap, oh karaun likamwih mehn mpamwail, oh wia soahngen dihp koaros.

22 Oh pwehki kahrepe wet keriah pahn kohieng kumwail ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla. Pwe ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla, kilang, kahnihmw lap wet, oh pil kahnihmw lap koaros me kapilpene, me mih nan sapwatail, pahn kohsang kumwail me pahn kahrehda kumwail en sohla kak kousoan loalle; pwe kilang, Kauno sohte pahn ketikihong kumwail kehlail, nin duwen eh ketin wiahier, pwe kumwail en kak powehdi amwail imwintihtih kan.

23 Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih: I sohte pahn kasalehiong me suwed kan ei kehlail, ong ehu pwihn de pil ehu, ihte ong irail kan me pahn koluhkihla diparail kan, oh rong ei mahsen kan. Eri met, I men kumwail en kilang, riei ko, me e pahn mwahu ong Mehn Leimen kan sang kumwail ihte ma kumwail pahn koluhla.

24 Pwe kilang, re kin momourki mour pwung mwahu sang kumwail, pwe re sohte wiahda dihp nan ar wehwehki dahme kumwail alehdier; eri Kauno pahn kupwur kalahngan ong irail; ei, e pahn ketin kareireiala arail rahn akan oh katohtowehla kadaudokerail kan, mehlel nan ahnsouo me kumwail pahn kamwomwala mehlel ihte ma kumwail pahn koluhla.

25 Ei, meid suwed ong kumwail pwehki tiahk suwed lap me kohieng kumwailehr; oh kumwail patehngehr, ei, ong pwihn mwersuwed rir me Kadiendon wiahdahr!

26 Ei, meid suwed pahn kohieng kumwail pwehki pohnmwahso me kumwail mweidengehr en pidolong nan amwail mohngiong kan me kihkumwaildahr daulih dahme mwahuo pwehki amwail kepwehpwehla mehlel!

27 Ei, meid suwed ong kumwail pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan!

28 Oh ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla kumwail pahn mehla; ei, mehlel sapwamwail kan pahn kohsang kumwail, oh kumwail pahn kamwomwasang pohn pwelen sampah.

29 Kilang met, I sohte pein wie koaskoasoaiahki mepwukat pahn wiawi, pwe dene sang ei pein ese mepwukat; ahpw kilang, I ese mepwukat mehlel pwehki Kauno Koht ketin kasalehiong ie, eri I kadehdehki me re pahn wiawi.
hel 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sounkopwung likamw kan song kapingada aramas kan re en uhwong Nihpai—Eipraam, Moses, Sihnos, Sihnok, Isaias, Aiseia, Seremaia, Lihai, oh Nihpai irail koaros kadehdehki Krais—Sang ni kamarain me Nihpai alehdi, e pakairki kamakamlahn sounkopwung lapalapo. Ele Sounpar 23–21 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Nihpai ndahier koasoai pwukat, kilang, mie ohl kei me wia sounkopwung kan, me pil iang wia pwihn en Kadiendon rir ko, oh re lingeringerda, oh re ahpw uhwongada ih oh koasoai ngihl laudida, ndindaiong aramas kan: Dahme kumwail sohte kolkihdi ohl menet oh wahdo, pwe en kak kopwungki nin duwen dihp me e wiadahr?

2 Dahme kumwail kilikilangki ohl menet, oh rongorongki eh lahlahwe aramas pwukat oh atail kosonned?

3 Pwe kilang, Nihpai koasoaiahiong irail duwen arail kosonned ah sapwungalahr; ei, soahng tohto me Nihpai koasoaiahiong irail me sohte kak ntingdi; oh sohte mehkot me e koasoaia uhwongada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.

4 Oh sounkopwung kan lingeringer pahn Nihpai pwehki e koasoaiahda duwen arail doadoahk rotorot rir kan ni sansal; ahpw, re sohte men koledi ih, pwe re masak aramas kan de lahlahwe irail.

5 Eri re ahpw weriwerkihong aramas akan, ndinda: Dahme kumwail mweidehng ohl menet e wie lahlahwe kitail? Pwe kilang e keriahla aramas pwukat, me re pahn kamwomwala; ei, oh pil me atail kahnihmw lap kan pahn kohsang kitail, me pahn kahrehda kitail pahn sohla kak kousoan loalle.

6 Oh met kitail ese me e sohte kak wiawi, pwe kilang, kitail udahn kehlail, oh atail kahnihmw kan kehlail, eri atail imwintihtih kan sohte kak poweikitaildi.

7 Kedekedeo re ahpw kamwakidadahr aramas kan re en lingeringer ong Nihpai, oh akamaipene nanpwungarail; pwe mie ekei me werikihla: Kumwail dehr kedirepwe ohl menet, pwe e wia ohl mwahu men, oh soahng kan me e kin nda udahn pahn wiawi ma kitail sohte koluhla;

8 Ei, kilang, kopwung kan koaros pahn kohieng kitail me e kadehdehkiong kitailehr; pwe kitail ese me e kadehdehkidahr mehlel ong kitail duwen atail wiewia suwed kan. Oh kilang re tohto, oh e kin ese mehlel soahng kan me pahn lelohng kitail duwehte eh kin ese atail wiewia suwed kan;

9 Ei, oh kilang, ma kaidehn ih soukohp men e sohte kak kadehdehki duwen soahng pwuko.

10 Kedekedeo aramas ako me song en kawehla Nihpai re ahpw uhdier pwehki ar masepwehk, me kahrehda re sohte doahke ih; eri e ahpw pwurehng tepida koasoaiong irail, ni ah kilikilang me ekei irail pwungkidahr, kahrehda luhwehko masepwehkada.

11 Eri e idihdiong en koasoaiahiong irail pil ekei, ni eh ndinda: Kilang, rieiko, kumwail sohte wadek me Koht ketikihong emen ohl manaman, iei Moses, en kihpeseng pihl en Sehd Weitahtao, oh pwalpeseng, kahrehda Mehn Israel kan, me wia atail pahpa kahlapko, kak keid nan pwehl ngalangal, oh pihlo pwurpenehng pohn sounpei en Mehn Isip ko oh kaduhirailla?

12 Oh met kilang, ma Koht ketkihong ohl menet soahngen manaman wet, eri dahme kumwail pahn mwoaroamwoarongki nan pwungamwail, oh nda me e sohte ketkihongie manaman pwe I en kak wehwehki duwen kopwung kan me pahn kohieng kumwail ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla?

13 Ahpw, kilang, kumwail sohte kahmahmkihte ei mahsen kan, ahpw kumwail pil kahmahmki mahsen kan koaros me atail pahpahko koasoaia, oh pil mahsen kan me ohl menet, Moses, koasoaiahier, me manaman lap kohieng ih, ei, mahsen kan me e koasoaiahier duwen ketidohn Mesaia.

14 Ei, e sou kadehdedahr me Sapwellimen Kohto pahn ketido? Oh nin duwen e ketin langahda sineik meteo nan sapwtehno, iei pil duwehte ih me pahn ketido e pahn ketin langada.

15 Oh koaros me pahn kilenglahng sineiko pahn komourla, iei pil duwehte koaros me pahn kilenglahng Sapwellimen Kohto ni pwoson, ahniki ngehn peik, pahn komourla, mehlel ong mouro me soutuk.

16 Oh met kilang, kaidehn Moses kelehpw me kadehdehki mepwukat, ahpw pil soukohp sarawi koaros, sangete ah mwehi kohla lel mwehin Eipraam.

17 Ei, oh kilang, Eipraam kilangada e pahn ketido, oh direkihla popohl oh pereperenki.

18 Ei, oh kilang I ndaiong kumwail, me kaidehn Eipraam kelehpw me wehwehki mepwukat, ahpw mie tohto mwohn mwehin Eipraam me malipilipda sang ni koasoandi en Koht; iei, nin duwen koasoandi en Sapwellimeho; oh met pwe en kak kasalehiong aramas akan, sounpar kid kei mwohn eh pahn ketido, pwe komourla en kak kohdohng irail.

19 Oh met I men kumwail en ese, me pil mwurin mwehin Eipraam mie soukohp tohto me kadehdehkier mepwukat; ei, kilang, soukohp Sihnos kadehdehki ni eimah; me kahrehda e kamakamkihla.

20 Oh kilang, pil Sihnok, oh pil Isaias, oh pil Aiseia, oh Seremaia, (Seremaia me wia soukohp ohte me pil kadehdehki kamwomwalahn Serusalem) oh met kitail esehier me Serusalem kamwomwalahr nin duwen mahsen kan en Seremaia. Oh dahme Sapwellimen Kohto sohte pahn ketidohki, nin duwen ah kokohpo?

21 Oh met kumwail pahn peikasalki me Serusalem kamwomwalahr? Kumwail pahn nda me nein Sedekaia pwutak ko sohte kamakamala, koaros ahpw ihte Mulek? Ei, oh kumwail sohte kilang me mie kadaudoken Sedekaia rehtail, oh re pwepwekihsang nan sahpw en Serusalem? Ahpw kilang, kaidehn koaros met—

22 Atail pahpa Lihai pwepwekihsang nan Serusalem pwehki e kadehdehki mepwukat. Nihpai pil kadehdehki mepwukat, oh pil kereniong atail pahpahko koaros, iei lao lel ahnsou wet; ei, re kadehdehki ketidohn Krais, oh wie kasikasik, oh pereperenki sapwellime rahno me pahn kohdo.

23 Oh kilang, ih iei Koht, oh e ketiket rehrail, oh e ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih, kahrehda re komourkihla ih; oh re kalinganahla ih, pwehki mehkan me pahn kohdo.

24 Oh met, pwehki amwail esehier mepwukat oh sohte kak kahmahmki ihte ma kumwail likamw, eri met kumwail wiadahr dihp, pwehki amwail soikalahr mepwukat koaros, mehndahte amwail alehdier kadehde tohto; iei, kumwail alehdier soahng koaros, sang nanleng, oh soahng koaros me mih pohn sampah, me kadehdehki me mepwukat mehlel.

25 Ahpw kilang, kumwail kasohwe mehlelo, oh uhwongadahr amwail Koht sarawio; oh iei pil ahnsou wet, kumwail sohte kin nahkpene pai en nanleng, wasa me sohte mehkot kak kawehla, oh wasa me sohte mehkot samin kak kohla, ahpw kumwail kapkaposokehda engieng me pahn kohieng kumwail ni rahn en kopwungo.

26 Iei pil ahnsou wet kumwail kereniongehr kamwomwala soutuk, pwehki amwail kam aramas kan oh amwail tiahk en nenek kan oh wiewia suwed kan; ei, oh ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla e pahn wiawihong kumwail ahnsou keren.

27 Ei, kilang ahnsou wet e mihmi ni amwail wenihmw kan; ei, kumwail kohwei ni sehr en sounkopwungo, oh rapahki; oh kilang, amwail sounkopwung kamakamalahr, oh e wie wonohn nan ah nta; oh rie ohl kemelahr, me songosong en alehdi sehr en sounkopwungo.

28 Oh kilang, ira koaros wia kisehn amwail pwihn rir, me Kadiendon oh me suwedo wiahda me raparapahki en kawehla palingehn en aramas.
hel 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Meninkeder kan diarada me sounkopwungo mehla ni sehr en sounkopwungo—Re selidi oh mwuri kasaledekla—Sang ni kamarain Nihpai kasalehda Siendum me wia kamaramaso—Ekei kamehlelehda me Nihpai wia soukohp. Ele Sounpar 23–21 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekedeo ahnsou me Nihpai koasoaiadahr mahsen pwukat, ekei ohloko me mihmi rehrail ahpw tangala ni sehr en sounkopwungo; iei, irail meh limen me kohla, oh re nda nanpwungarail, ni arail kohkohla:

2 Kilang, met kitail pahn ese ni mehlel ma ohl menet wia soukohp oh Koht mahsanihong en kohpada soahng kapwuriamwei pwukat ong kitail. Kilang, kitail sohte kamehlele e ketin mahsanihong; ei, kitail sohte kamehlele me e wia soukohp men; ahpw, ma dahme e koasoaiahki sounkopwungo mehlel, me e mehla, eri kitail pahn kamehlele me koasoai teikan me e koasoaiahier mehlel.

3 Kedekedeo re ahpw tang marahra kohla, oh kohla ni sehr en sounkopwungo; oh kilang, sounkopwungo pwupwidier nan pwehlo, oh wie wonohn nan ah nta.

4 Oh met kilang, ahnsou me re kilangada met re ahpw pwuriamweikihla mehlel, lao re ahpw pwupwidi nan pwehlo; pwe re sohte kamehlele mahsen kan me Nihpai koasoaiahier nin duwen sounkopwungo.

5 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou me re kilangada re ahpw kamehlelehda, oh re ahpw masepwehkada pwe pakadeik kan koaros me Nihpai koasoaia pahn lelohng aramas akan; eri re ahpw rerrer, oh pwupwidi nan pwehlo.

6 Met, mwurinte ahnsou me sounkopwungo kamakamala—pwehki rie ohl me likou rir doakoahdi, oh e mwadangete tangasang, oh ladu ko tangala oh ndaiong aramas akan, ni ar weriwerikihla me mie kamaramas me wiawi rehrail;

7 Oh kilang aramas akan ahpw kapokonpenehr ni sehr en sounkopwungo—oh kilang, re ahpw pwuriamweikihla arail kilangada ohl limen me pwupwidier nan pwehlo.

8 Oh met kilang, aramasoko sohte wehwehki duwen pokon me kohpene ni ahn Nihpai mwetuwelo; eri re nda nanpwungarail: Ohl pwukat iei irail me kemehlasounkopwungo, oh Koht ketin kaloke irail pwe re en sohte kak tangasang kitail.

9 Kedekedeo re ahpw koledi irail, oh salihdi irail oh kesehlong irail nan imweteng. Oh mie pakair ehu me pekederpeseng me sounkopwungo kamakamalahr, oh me aramas kan me kemehla kolkoldier oh lekideklong nan imweteng.

10 Kedekedeo me mandahsang rahno aramas akan ahpw pokonpene pwe re en mwahiei oh kaisihsol, ni seridien sounkopwung lap me kamakamalahro.

11 Oh met irail sounkopwung ko me iang mih ni ahn Nihpai mwetuwelo, oh rong ah mahsen kan, pil iang pokonpene ni seridio.

12 Kedekedeo re ahpw kalelapak rehn aramas akan, ndinda: Ia wasa irail aramas limen me se kadaredo pwe re en kilang ma sounkopwungo mehla? Oh re sapengki oh nda: Duwen aramas limen me kumwail nda me kumwail kadaredohn, se sohte ese; ahpw mie aramas limen me wia kamaramaso, me se kesehlong nan imweteng.

13 Kedekedeo sounkopwung kan ahpw peki re en wisikdo; oh re ahpw wisikdo, oh kilang irail iei aramas limen me pekederdo; oh kilang sounkopwung kan ahpw kalelapak rehrail duwen dahme wiawi, oh re ahpw koasoaiahiong irail soahng koaros me re wia, ni ar ndinda:

14 Se tangedo oh kohdo ni sehr en sounkopwungo, oh ahnsou me se kilangada soahng koaros me Nihpai kadehdehkier, se ahpw pwuriamweikihla mehlel kahrehda se pwupwidi nan pwehlo; oh ahnsou me se kehnda sang aht pwuriamweio, kilang re keseikihtlong nan imweteng.

15 Met, nin duwen kamakamalahn ohl menet, se sohte ese ihs me wia; oh ihte uwen me se ese, se tangedo oh kohdo nin duwen amwail kadarkihtdo, oh kilang e mehlahr, nin duwen mahsen kan en Nihpai.

16 Oh met kedekedeo sounkopwung kan ahpw kasalehiong aramas akan irairo, oh ahpw kedipahki Nihpai, ndinda: Kilang, kitail ese me Nihpai menet udahn wehwehiong emen aramas en kemehla sounkopwungo, oh pwe en kak ndaiong kitail, pwe en kak kamwakidkitailohng nan ah lamalam, pwe en kak kihda me e wia aramas lapalap, me Koht pilada, oh wia soukohp men.

17 Oh met kilang, kitail pahn kadierekehda ohl menet, oh e pahn wehkada ah sapwung oh kasalehiong kitail ihs me udahn kemehla sounkopwungo.

18 Kedekedeo aramas limeno ahpw kasaledekla ni rahn en seridio. Ahpw, re kasapwunge sounkopwungoko nan ar koasoai kan me re uhkihong Nihpai, oh kapwungala emen emen irail, lao re katokeiraildi.

19 Ahpw, re karehda Nihpai eh pahn kolkoldi oh selidi oh wisikdo mwohn pokono, oh re ahpw tepida kalelapak reh ni soahngen wiepe tohto pwe re en kak kasapwungehla, pwe re en kak kedipahki en kamala—

20 Ndindaiong ih: Ke ehukiongehr emen; ihs aramas menet me wiadahr kamaramas wet? Met ndaiong kiht, oh kasalehda ahmw sapwung; ndinda, Kilang iet mwohni; oh se pil pahn mweidala ahmw mour ma ke pahn ndaiong kiht, oh kasalehda inou me ke wiahiong ih.

21 Ahpw Nihpai ndaiong irail: Kumwail pweipwei kei, amwail mohngiong kan sohte sirkumsais, kumwail maskun, kumwail aramas keptakai, kumwail ese ia uwen werei Kauno amwail Koht e pahn ketin mweidehng kumwail en doudoulahte nan dipamwailet?

22 Oh kumwail anahne tepida sengiseng oh mwahiei, pwehki kamwomwala lap me kin awiawih kumail nan ahnsou wet, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla.
