23 Kilang kumwail nda me I inouieng emen aramas me e pahn kemehla Sihsoram, atail sounkopwungo. Ahpw kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me met pwehki ei kadehdehiong kumwail duwen soahng wet; iei, pwe en wia kadehde ong kumwail, me I ese duwen wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan me mih rehmwail.

24 Oh pwehki ei wiahier met, kumwail nda me I inoukihong emen aramas en wia soahng wet; ei, pwehki I kasalehiong kumwail kilel wet kumwail lingeringer pahi, oh rapahki en kawehla ei mour.

25 Oh met kilang, I pahn kasalehiong kumwail pil ehu kilel, oh mwuri kitail pahn kilang ma kumwail pahn song en kawehkiniehla.

26 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail: Kohwei ni ihmwen Siendum, me wia rien Sihsoram ohl, oh idek reh—

27 Nihpai, soukohp likamwo, me kohpadahr soahng suwed laud duwen aramas pwukat, koasoandier rehmw, me ke en kemehla Sihsoram, riomw ohl?

28 Oh kilang, e pahn ndaiong kumwail, Soh.

29 Oh kumwail pahn kalelapak reh: Kowe me kemehla riomw ohlo?

30 Oh e pahn kesihnen ni masepwehk, oh sohte pahn ese dahme e pahn nda. Oh kilang, e pahn kahmahm ong kumwail; oh e pahn mwomwehda me e pwuriamwei; ahpw, e pahn ndaiong kumwail me sohte dipe.

31 Ahpw kilang, kumwail pahn tehk mwahu ih, oh kumwail pahn diarada nta pohn ah likouo.

32 Oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn kilang met, kumwail pahn nda: Nta kohsang ia? Se sohte ese ma e sou ntahn riomw ohlo?

33 Oh e ahpw pahn salohda, oh pahn pwetepwetala pohn mese, duwehte me pahn mehlahr.

34 Oh kumwail ahpw pahn ndaiong: Pwehki masepwehk oh pwetepwetalahn pohn mesemwen, kilang, se ese me kowe me dipahniki.

35 Oh e pahn masepwehkada mehlel; oh ahpw pahn wehkadahng kumwail, oh sohla kahmahmki me ih me wia kamaramaso.

36 Oh e ahpw pahn ndaiong kumwail, me ngehi, Nihpai, sohte ese duwen irair wet ihte ma e kohiengie sang ni manaman en Koht. Oh kumwail pahn ese me ngehi wia ohl mehlel men, oh me I pekederdo sang rehn Koht.

37 Kedekedeo re ahpw kohla oh wia, nin duwen dahme Nihpai ndaiong irail. Oh kilang, mahsen kan me e mahsanih mehlel; pwe nin duwen ah mahsen kan e kahmahmki; oh pil nin duwen ah mahsen kan e wehkada.

38 Oh e kahrehiong en kasalehda me ih me wia kamaramaso, me kahrehda aramas limeno saledekla, oh pil Nihpai.

39 Oh mie ekei Mehn Nihpai kan me kamehlelehda mahsen kan en Nihpai; oh mie ekei me pil kamehlele pwehki kadehde en aramas limeno, pwe re wiliakapwala ni ar mihmi nan imweteng.

40 Oh met mie ekei rehn aramasoko, me nda me Nihpai wia soukohp men.

41 Oh mie ekei me nda: Kilang, ih koht men, pwe koht kelehpw me kak ese soahng kan koaros. Pwe kilang, e ndaiong kitail madamadau en mohngiongatail kan, oh pil ndaiong kitail soahng kan; oh e kasalehiong kitail ni mehlel ihs me udahn kemehla atail sounkopwungo.
hel 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno ketikihong Nihpai manaman en katengetehng—E alehdi manaman en keinapwihdi oh mweidada pohn sampah oh nanleng—E mahsanihong aramas akan en koluhla de mehla—Ngehno ketikihda ih sang ehu pokon kohlahng ehu pokon. Ele Sounpar 21–20 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo aramas kan ahpw tohrohrpeseng, kahrehda re kohpeseng oh ekei kohkohla nan ar ahl kan, Nihpai ahpw kelehpwala, ni eh wie keskesihnen nanpwungarail.

2 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw kohla nan ahl me kohlahng pein ihmwehu, ni eh medemedewe soahng kan me Kauno ketin kasalehiong ih.

3 Kedekedeo ni eh wie medemedewe—eh pahtou pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas en Nihpai kan, arail doadoahk rotorot rir kan, oh arail kamaramas kan, oh arail kulih kan, oh soahngen wiewia suwed kan koaros—kedekedeo ni eh wie medemedewe nan ah mohngiong, kilang, ngihl ehu ahpw kohdohng ih ketihtihki:

4 Meid pai kowe, Nihpai, pwehki soahng kan me ke wiadahr; pwe I kilangadahr ia uwen ahmw sohte kin pwangahkihda kalohngki mahseno, me I kihonguhkehr, ong aramas pwukat. Oh ke sohte kin masak irail, oh ke sohte rapahki pein ahmw mour, ahpw ke rapahki insenei, oh kapwaiada ei kosonned kan.

5 Oh met, pwehki ahmw wiahier met ni ahmw sohte pwangahki, kilang, I pahn kapaiuhk kohkohlahte; oh I pahn wiahionguhk ke en ahneki manaman laud ni koasoai oh wia me mwahu, nan pwoson oh nan doadoahk kan; iei, soahng koaros pahnwiawihonguhk nin duwen ei mahsen, pwe ke sohte pahn peki mehkot me uhwong insenei.

6 Kilang, kowe me Nihpai, oh Ngehi me Koht. Kilang, I mahsanihonguhk mwohn nei tohnleng kan, me ke pahn ahneki manaman pohn aramas pwukat, oh pahn kalokehki sampah lehk, oh iangahki soumwahu, oh kamwomwala, nin duwen wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat.

7 Kilang, I kihonguhk manaman, me soahng koaros me ke pahn katengehdi pohn sampah pahn katengetengehdi nanleng; oh soahng koaros me ke pahn mweidada pohn sampah pahn mweimweida nanleng; oh pwehki met me ke pahn ahneki manaman rehn aramas pwukat.

8 Oh met, ma ke pahn ndaiong tehnpas sarawi wet en pwalpeseng wiahda riau, e pahn wiawi.

9 Oh ma ke pahn ndaiong nahna wet, Rengkidi oh patapatala, e pahn wiawi.

10 Oh kilang, ma ke pahn nda me Koht pahn ketin kaloke aramas pwukat, e pahn pweida.

11 Oh met kilang, Ipahngokionguhk, me ke pahn kohwei oh kalohngkihong aramas pwukat, me Kauno Koht Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih: Ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla kumwail pahn kalokolok, lao kumwail kamwomwala.

12 Oh kilang, met kedekedeo ahnsou me kauno ketin mahsanihongehr Nihpai mahsen pwukat, e ahpw uhdi oh sohte kohla ni pein ihmwehu, ahpw pwuralahng pokon en aramas me kohpeseng nan sahpwo, oh tepida kalohngkihong irail mahsen en Kauno me e ketin mahsanihongehr, duwen arail pahn kamwomwala ma re sohte pahn koluhla.

13 Met kilang, mehndahte manaman kapwuriamwei me Nihpai wiadahr ni eh ndaiong irail duwen mehlahn sounkopungo, mohngiongarail kan keptakailahte oh sohte men rong mahsen kan en Kauno.

14 Eri Nihpai ahpw kalohngkihong irail mahsen en Kauno, ketihtihki: Kauno ketin mahsanih, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla kumwail pahn kalokolok lao kumwail kamwomwala.

15 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Nihpai kalohngkihongirailehr mahseno, kilang, mohngiongarail kan keptakaite oh sohte men rong ah koasoi kan; eri re ahpw lahlahwe ih, oh song en salihedipwe re en kak kesehlong nan imweteng.

16 Ahpw kilang, manaman en Koht ketin ieiang ih, oh re sohte kak salihedi ih oh kesehlong nan imweteng, pwe Ngehno kin ketikihda oh ketikihlahsang nanpwungarail.

17 Kedekedeo Ngehno ahpw kin ketikihwei ih, sang ehu pokon kolahng ehu pokon, kalkalohngki mahsen en Koht, lao e ahpw kalohngkihong irail koaros, de kadarewei rehn aramas koaros.

18 Kedekedeo re ahpw sohte men rong ah koasoi kan; oh mie pingiping me tepida wiawi, kahrehda ar tohrohrpeseng nanpwungarail oh tepida kamaramaski kedlahs nanpwungarail.

19 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr isihsek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.
hel 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai peki rehn Kauno en ketin wiliankihdi lehk arail mahwin kan—Aramas tohto mehla—Irail koluhla, oh Nihpai ahpw peki ni ngidingid rehn Kauno en ketikihdo keteu—Nihpai oh Lihai alehdi kaudiahl tohto—Pwihn lipirap en Kadienden ko koasoneiraildier nan sahpwo. Ele Sounpar 20–6 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr isihsek riau en mwehin sounkopwung kan pingiping kan wie kekeirda, kahrehda mie mahwin kei me wiwiawi nan sahpwo pwon rehn aramas en Nihpai kan.

2 Oh iei pwehki pwihn en pirap rir ko me peusehla wiewia doadoahk en kamwomwala oh wiewia suwed wet. Oh mahwin wet wiawi erein pahro; oh pil wiawihte nan pahr isihsek siluho.

3 Kedekedeo nan pahr wet Nihpai ahpw kapakapkiong Kauno, ndinda:

4 Maing Kaun, komw dehr mweidehng aramas pwukat en kamwomwkihla kedlahs; ahpw Maing Kaun komw mweidehng en mie lehk nan sahpwe, pwe en kamwakidiarailda en tamanda Kauno arail Koht, oh mwein re pahn kak koluhla oh sohpeilahng komwi.

5 Oh e ahpw pweida, nin duwen ahn Nihpai koasoi kan. Oh mie lehk lapalap ehu me wiawi nan sahpwo, rehn aramas en Nihpai kan koaros. Oh met nan pahr isihsek pahieu lehko pil wiwiawihte, oh doadoahk en kamwomwkihla kedlahs uhdi ahpw kahpwal en lehko laudla.

6 Oh doadoahk wet en kamwomwala pil doulahte nan pahr keisihsek limauo. Pwe sahpwo keriahla me kahrehda e ngalangal, oh sohte kaosehda werentuhke nan ahnsou en werentuhke; oh sahpwo pwon lokolok, rehn Mehn Leimen kan oh pil rehn Mehn Nihpai kan, eri irail kalokolok me kahrehda kid en irail me suwed kan nan sahpwo mehla.

7 Kedekedeo aramas kan ahpw kilangada me re kereniongehr mehkihla lehko, oh re ahpw tepida tamanda Kauno arail Koht; oh re ahpw tepida tamanda mahsen kan en Nihpai.

8 Oh aramas akan tepida peki rehn arail sounkopwung kan oh arail kaun kan, me re en ndaiong Nihpai: Kilang, se wehwehki me ke wia ohl en Koht men, eri peki rehn Kauno atail Koht en ketkihsang kitail lehk wet, pwe mahsen kan koaros me komw mahsanih nin duwen atail pahn kamwomwala de pweida.

9 Kedekedeo sounkopwung kan ahpw ndaiong Nihpai, nin duwen mahsen kan me re inangih. Kedekedeo ahnsou me Nihpai kilang me aramas akan koluhlahr oh pwurehng likoun nsensuwed oh karakarahkalahr, e ahpw pwurehng kapakapkiong Kauno, ndinda:

10 Maing Kaun, kilang aramas pwukat kolulahr; oh re koahkoahsangehr pwihn en Kadiendon rehrail me kahrehda re sohralahr, oh re sarepidier arail koasoandi rir kan nan pwehl.

11 Met, Maing Kaun, pwehki arail karakarahkala komw kak ketikihwei sapwellimahr engieng, oh komw ketin mweidehng sapwellimahr engieng en meleileidi nan kamwomwalahn ohl suwed ko me komw ketin kamwomwalahr.

12 Maing Kaun, komw kak ketikihwei sapwellimahr engieng, ei, sapwellimahr engieng mwuledek, oh kauhdi lehk wet nan sahpwet.

13 Maing Kaun, komw kak ketin karonge ie, oh ketin wiahda me e pahn pweida nin duwen ei koasoi kan, oh ketikihdo keteu pohn pwel en sampah, pwe en kak kaosehda wah kan, oh ah werentuhke kan nan ahnsou en werentuhke.

14 Maing Kaun, komw ketin karongehier ei koasoi kan ahnsou me I nda, Mweidehng lehk en wiawi, pwe kamakamkihla kedlahs en kak uhdi; oh I ese me komw pahn pil karonge ei koasoi kan nan ahnsou wet, pwe komw ketin mahsanih: Ma aramas pwukat koluhla I pahn doareirailla.

15 Ei, Maing Kaun, oh komw kak mahsani me re kolulahr, pwehki lehk oh soumwahu oh kamwomwala me wiawihongirailehr.

16 Oh met, Maing Kaun, komw kak ketikihwei sapwellimahr engieng, oh pwurehng song ma re pahn papah komwi? Oh ma iei, Maing Kaun, komw ketin kapai irail nin duwen sapwellimahr mahsen kan me komw ketin mahsaniher.

17 Kedekedeo nan pahr isihsek weneuo Kauno ahpw ketikihsang sapwellime engieng rehn aramas akan, oh ahpw ketikihdo keteu pohn sahpwo, kahrehda e kaosehda wah nan ahnsou en rahk. Kedekedeo e ahpw kaosehda werentuhke kan nan ahnsou me werentuhke kin osada.

18 Oh kilang, aramas kan ahpw perenda oh kepinga Koht, oh sahpwo pwon direkihla pereperen; oh re uhdihsang songesong en kawehla Nihpai, ahpw re kin wiahki ih soukohp lap men, oh ohl en Koht men, me ahneki manaman oh mweimwei kohieng ih sang Koht.

19 Oh kilang, Lihai, rie pwutako, sohte mih pahnangi nin duwen soahng kan me pid mour pwung.

20 Oh met kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan pwurehng tepida pweida nan sahpwo, oh tepida onehda arail wasahn kousoan me tehnlahr kan, oh tepida kaparaparala oh kohpeseng, lao re kadirehla nan sahpwo, koaros sahpw en paliepeng oh palieir, sang ni sehd en palikapi kohla lel sehd en palimese.

21 Kedekedeo me pahr isihsek weneu ahpw imwisekla nan popohl. Oh pahr isihsek isuh tepida nan popohl; oh mwomwohdiso ahpw kohpeseng pohn sahpwo pwon; oh pali laud en aramas akan, koaros Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan, wia tohn mwomwohdiso; oh re ahneki popohl laud nan sahpwo; oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr isihsek isuh.

22 Oh re pil ahneki popohl nan pahr isihsek waluh, ihte mie ekei me akamaiki duwen iren padahk kan me soukohp akan koasoanehdier.

23 Oh nan pahr isihsek duwauo mie akupwung laud me tepida wiawi. Ahpw kedekedeo Nihpai oh Lihai, oh riarail ohl tohto me ese duwen mehlel en iren padahk kan, pwehki ar kin alehdi kaudiahl tohto kan rahn koaros, kahrehda re kalohk ong aramas akan, lao re katokehdi arail akupwung kan nan pahrohte.

24 Kedekedeo nan pahr welihsek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan, mie ekei me pwupwidi sang rehn aramas en Nihpai kan, me nan pahr kei mwowe irail kohla rehn Mehn Leimen kan, oh alehda ahd en Mehn Leimen kan, oh pil ekei me udahn wia kadaudok en Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki irail Mehn Nihpai kan oh me kahngohdi kan me kin kahrehda ar lingeringer, eri irail tepida mahwin ong riarail kan.

25 Oh re ahpw kin kamaramas oh kulih; oh re ahpw kin tang pwuralahng ni nahna kan, oh nan sapwtehn oh wasa rir kan, rukuruk nan wasa kan me re sohte kak dierek, oh pwehki me kahngohdi kan me kohla rehrail, kahrehda re kin alialehdi iengarail rahn koaros.

26 Oh met mwurin ahnsou mwotomwot, ei, e sohte lel sounpar kei oh re wiahla pwihn en pirap kehlail mehlel; oh irail rapahki ahn Kadiendon koasoandi rir kan koaros; oh met re ahpw wiahla pwihn lipirap en Kadiendon.

27 Met kilang, pwihn lipirap wet wiahda kahpwal lap, iei, kamwomwala lap rehn aramas en Nihpai kan, oh pil rehn aramas en Leimen kan.

28 Kedekedeo e konehng me re pahn kauhdi doadoahk wet en kamwomwala; eri re kadarala sounpei en ohl kehlail kei nan sapwtehno oh pohn nahna kan pwe re en rapahki pwihn en pirap wet, oh kemeirailla.

29 Ahpw kilang, kedekedeo nan pahrohte re pwepwekihdo nan pein sapwarail kan. Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr welihsek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai kan.

30 Kedekedeo nan tepidahn pahr welihsek ehuo re pwurehng kohlahng pwihn en pirap ko, oh re kemehla tohto; oh kamwomwala lap kohieng irail.

31 Oh re pwurehng idihdiong en pwuralahsang nan sapwtehno oh sang pohn nahna kan kohla nan pein sapwarail kan, pwehki uwen tohto mehlel en pwihn lipirap ko me koukousoan pohn nahna kan oh nan sapwtehno.

32 Kedekedeo met kaimwisekalahr pahret. Oh pwihn lipirap ko wie tohtohlahte oh kehlaila, kahrehda re sohte lohdi pahn nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan pwon, oh pil nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan; oh re pil kahrehda aramas akan ar masepwehkada nan sahpwo pwon.

33 Ei, pwe re kohla wasa tohto nan sahpwo, oh wiahda kamwomwala lap ong irail; ei, irail kemehla tohto, oh wahsang ekei kohla nan sapwtehno, ei, mehlel arail pwoud kan oh seri kan.

34 Met suwed lap wet, me kohdohng aramas akan pwehki arail wiewia suwed, ahpw pwurehng kamwakidirailda en tamanda Kauno arail Koht.

35 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr welihsek ehu en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

36 Oh nan pahr welihsek riauo re pwurehng tepida manokehla Kauno arail Koht. Oh nan pahr welihsek siluho re pwurehng kehlaila nan arail wiewia suwed. Oh nan pahr welihsek pahieuo re sohte kamwahuila arail wiewia kan.

37 Kedekedeo nan pahr welihsek limauo re kehkehlailla nan arail pohnmwahso, oh nan arail mour suwed kan; oh met pwurehng kerkereniong re pahn kamwomwala.

38 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr welihsek limauo.
hel 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aramas kin koweikohdo oh pweipwei oh kin mwadangete wiewia suwed—Kauno kin ketin kaloke Sapwellime aramas pwe re en mwahula—Ahn aramas akan ar sohte karasarasiong manaman en Koht—Nan rahn en kadeiko, aramas pahn alehdi mour poatoapoat de kamwomwala poatoapoat. Ele Sounpar 6 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kitail kak kilang ia uwen likamw, oh pil wikiwikidek en mohngiong en aramas akan; ei, kitail kak kilang me Kauno nan sapwellime kupwuramwahu poatoapoat e kin ketin kapaiada oh kekeirda irail akan me kin koapwoaroapwoarki ih.

2 Ei, oh kitail kak kilang ahnsou wet ni eh ketin kapai sapwellime aramas, ei, re keirda nan arail mwetuel kan, neirail pelen mahn tikitik oh laud kan, oh nan kohl, oh nan silper, oh nan soahngen dipwisou kesempwal koaros; doarehla arail mour kan, oh ketin doareirailla sang pahn manaman en ar imwintihti kan; kameleileidi mohngiong en arail imwintihti kan pwe re dehr mahwiniong irail; ei, oh ni mehlel, wiewia soahng koaros ong kamwahupen mour oh peren en sapwellime aramas; ei, ih ahnsouo me mohngiongarail kan kin keptakaila, oh re kin manokehla Kauno arail Koht, oh kin tiakidi pahn patehn nehrail kan me Keieu Sarawio—ei, oh met pwehki arail nsenamwahu, oh arail kepwehpwehla mehlel.

3 Oh met kitail kak kilang ma Kauno sohte pahn kalokehki sapwellime aramas kahpwal tohto, ei, ma e sohte pahn ketin pwarengkinirail mehla oh soahng kamasepwehk kan, oh iangahki lehk oh soahngen soumwahu kan koaros, re sohte pahn tamataman ih.

4 Oh ia uwen aramas akan ar pweipwei, oh ia uwen ar likamw, oh ia uwen ar suwed, oh ia uwen ar kin mwadangete wiewia suwed, oh ia uwen ar kin pwand en wiewia me mwahu; ei, ia uwen ar kin mwadangete rong koasoai kan en me suwedo, oh kin koasoanehdi mohngiongarail kan pohn soahng mwahl kan en sampah!

5 Ei, ia uwen mwadangete ar kin aklapalapla; ei, ia uwen ar kin madangete pohnmwahsola, oh kin wia soangsoahngen dihp kan koaros; oh ia uwen pwand en arail tamataman Kauno arail Koht, oh kin rong sapwellime kaweid kan, ei, ia uwen pwand en arail kin keid nan ahl en erpit!

6 Kilang, re sohte kin inangih Kauno arail Koht, me kapikirailda, en kaunirailda oh apwalih irail; mehndahte sapwellime kupwuramwahu oh sapwellime kupwurkalahngan ong irail, re sohte kin kesempwaliki sapwellime kaweid kan, oh re kin sohte men en wia arail sounkaweid.

7 Oh ia uwen ahn aramas akan ar sohte; ei, re pahnangin pwehl en sampah.

8 Pwe kilang, pwehl en sampah kin mwekid oh pwalpeseng, sang ni pahngok en atail Koht soutuk wasalapalap.

9 Ei, kilang kepitie kin kamwakidada oh itikada dohl kan oh nahna kan.

10 Oh sang ni manaman en kepitie re kin pwalpeseng, oh patapatala, iei, duwehte nan wahu.

11 Ei, sang ni manaman en kepitie sampah pwon kin rerrer;

12 Ei, sang ni manaman en kepitie, poahsoan kan en sampah kin mwekid, lel nan werenge.

13 Ei, oh ma e kin mahsanihong sampah—Mwekid—e pahn mwekid.

14 Ei, ma e pahn mahsanihong sampah—Ke pahn pwurala mwuri, pwe en kareireila awahn rahno—e pahn wiawi;

15 Oh met, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen sampah kin pwurala, oh e mwomwen sansalohng aramas me ketipin uhdi; ei, oh kilang, met mehlel; pwe kilang sampah me kin mwekid oh kaidehn ketipino.

16 Oh pil kilang, ma e pahn mahsanihong pihl en nan madau kan—Ngalangalada—e pahn wiawi.

17 Kilang, ma e pahn mahsanihong nahna wet—Patohda, oh kohla oh pwupwidi pohn kahnihmwo, pwe en sarepidi—e pahn wiawi.

18 Oh kilang, ma aramas men pahn nekidala e pai kan nan sampah, oh Kauno pahn mahsanih—Mweidehng en riahla, pwehki dipen me nekidalao—kilang, e pahn riahla.

19 Oh ma Kauno pahn mahsanih—Ke en riahla, pwe sohte aramas men pahn kak diaruhk sang ahnsou wet kohkohla—kilang, sohte aramas pahn diar sang ahnsouo kohkohla.

20 Oh kilang, ma Kauno pahn mahsanihong aramas men—Pwehki dipomw kan, ke pahn riahla kohkohlahte—e pahn wiawi.

21 Oh ma Kauno pahn mahsanih—Pwehki dipomw kan ke pahn lekidek sang mwohn sihlangi—e pahn ketin wiahda pwe en wiawi.

22 Oh meid suwediong aramaso me e pahn ketin mahsanihong koasoi wet, pwe e pahn wiawihong ih me pahn wia dihpo, oh e sohte pahn kak komourla; eri, pwehki kahrepe wet, me kalohk en koluhla wiawiher, pwe aramas en kak komourla.

23 Eri, meid pai irail me pahn koluhla oh rong kepitien Kauno arail Koht; pwe iei irail me pahn komourla.

24 Oh Koht en ketin mweidehng, nin duwen sapwellime lapalap unsek, pwe aramas akan en kak koluhla oh wia doadoahk mwahu kan, pwe re en kak kapwuropwuriong kalahngan ong kalahngan, nin duwen arail doadoahk kan.

25 Oh I men aramas koaros en komourla. Ahpw kitail wadekehr me nan imwilahn rahn lapo mie ekei me pahn lekidekla, ei, me pahn lekideksang mwohn silangin Kauno;

26 Ei, me pahn koasoandieng en mih nan irair en pahtou kohkohlahte, me pahn kapwaiada mahseno me mahsanih: Irail me wiahda mwahu pahn alehdi mour poatoapoat; oh irail me wiahda suwed pahn alehdi lokolok poatoapoat. Oh iei met duwen me pahn wiawi. Ahmen.
hel 13:
Kokohp en Samuel, Mehn Leimen, ong Mehn Nihpai kan.

Audaudki iralaud 13 lel 15.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Samuel Mehn Leimen kohpada kamwomwalahn Mehn Nihpai kan ma re sohte pahn koluhla—Irail oh arail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan riahla—Irail soikala oh katehki takai soukohp kan, tepil kan kapiliraildi, oh irail kin rapahki peren nan wiewia suwed. Ele Sounpar 6 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr kawelihsek weneu, Mehn Nihpai kan doulahte nan arail wiewia suwed kan, ei, nan suwed mehlel, ah Mehn Leimen kan ahpw nanantihong enkapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, nin duwen kosonned en Moses.

2 Kedekedeo nan pahrohte mie emen me adaniki Samuel, Mehn Leimen, ahpw kohdo nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh tepida kalohk ong aramas kan. Kedekedeo e ahpw kalohkiong aramas akan erein rahn tohto, re en koluha, oh re kausehla, oh e kereniong en pwuralahng nan pein sapwe.

3 Ahpw kilang, kepitien Kauno ahpw peidohng ih, me e anahne pwurehng pwurala, oh kokohp ong aramas soahng kan me pahn kohieng nan ah mohngiong.

4 Kedekedeo re ahpw sohte mweidehng en pidolong nan kahnihmwo; eri e kohla oh douda pohn kehlo, oh kapahwei peh kan oh werkihla ni ngihl laud, oh kokohp ong aramas kan soahng kan me Kauno ketikihong nan ah mohngiong.

5 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, ngehi, Samuel, Mehn Leimen men, pahn ndaiong kumwail mahsen en Kauno me e ketikihong nan ei mohngiong; oh kilang e ketikihongehr nan ei mohngiong I en ndaiong aramas pwukat me kedilahs en kopwungo tentenek pohn aramas pwukat; oh e sohte pahn lel sounpar pahpwiki oh kedilahs en kopwungo pahn pwupwidiong pohn aramas pwukat.

6 Ei, kamwomwala lap awiawih aramas pwukat, oh e udahn pahn wiawihongaramas pwukat, oh sohte mehkot me kak komourala aramas pwukat ihte koluhla oh pwoson Kauno Sises Krais, me udahn pahn ketido pohn sampah, oh pahn ketin lokolongki soahng tohto oh pwoukihla aramas akan.

7 Oh kilang, tohnleng en Kauno pakairkihong ie, oh e wahdo rohng kaperen ong ei palingehn. Oh kilang, I pekederdo rehmwail pwe I en pil pakairkihong kumwail, pwe kumwail en pil iang ahneki rohng kaperen; ahpw kumwail sohte men aleiehda.

8 Eri, Kauno ketin mahsanih: Pwehki keptakai en mohngiong en aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan, ma re sohte pahn koluhla I pahn ketikihsang irail ei mahsen, oh I pahn ketikihsang rehrail Ngehniet, oh I sohla pahn kanengamahiong irail, oh I pahn kamwakidada mohngiong en riarail kan en kailongkin irail.

9 Oh e sohte pahn lel sounpar pahpwiki a I pahn wiahdairail en kamakam; ei, I pahn pwarengkinirail kedlahs oh iangahki lehk oh soumwahu.

10 Ei, I pahn pwarek irail nan ei engieng, oh e pahn mie dih kapahieu me pahn momour de e pahn mie dih kapahieu me pahn momour sang amwail imwintihtih kan me pahn kilang amwail kamwomwala; oh met udahn pahn wiawi ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla, Kauno ketin mahsanih; oh irail dih kapahieuo me pahn kahrehda amwail kamwomwalao.

11 Kauno ketin mahsanih, ahpw ma kumwail pahn koluhla oh pwurala rehn Kauno amwail Koht I pahn kauhdi ei engieng, ei, met Kauno me ketin mahsanih, meid pai irail akan me pahn koluhla oh sohpeidohng ie, ahpw meid suwediong mehmen me sohte pahn koluhla.

12 Ei, meid suwediong kahnihmw lap en Saraemla; pwe kilang, iei pwehki irail akan me mwahu e pahn doarehla; ei, meid suwediong kahnihmw lap wet, pwe I kasawihadahr, Kauno ketin mahsanih, me tohto, iei, pali laud en kahnihmw wet, me mohngiongarail kan pahn keptakaila ong ie, Kauno ketin mahsanih.

13 Ahpw meid pai irail kan me pahn koluhla, pwe irail me I pahn doarehla. Ahpw kilang, ma sohte aramas mwahu kan me mih nan kahnihmw lap wet, kilang, I pahn wiahda kisiniei en kohdihdosang nanleng oh kamwomwala.

14 Ahpw kilang, iei pwehki mour en aramas mwahu kan me kahrehda re poadoandoarla. Ahpw kilang, ahnsouo pahn kohdo, Kauno ketin mahsanih, me ni ahnsou me kumwail pahn kausehla aramas mwahu kan sang rehmwail, eri kumwail pahn lel ahnsou en kamwomwala; ei, meid suwediong kahnihmw lap wet, pwehki wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan me kin wiawi loale.

15 Ei, oh meid suwediong kahnihmw en Kidion, pwehki wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan me kin wiawi reh.

16 Ei, oh meid suwediong kahnihmw koaros me kapilpene sahpwet, me Mehn Nihpai kan sapwaniki, pwehki wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan me kin wiawi rehrail.

17 Oh kilang, keriah ehu pahn kohdo pohn sahpwe, Kauno Wasalapalap mahsanih, pwehki mour en aramas pwukat pohn sahpwet, ei, pwehki arail wiewia suwed oh arail tiahk suwed kan.

18 Oh e pahn wiawi, Kauno Wasalapalap mahsanih, ei, atail Koht mehlel oh me lapalap, me mehmen me pahn ekihla ah pai kan nan sampah e sohte pahn pwurehng diarada, pwehki keriah lap en sahpwet, ihte ma e wia aramas mwahu men oh pahn ekihla rehn Kauno.

19 Pwe, Kauno ketin mahsanih, I men re en ekihla arail pai kan rehi; oh meid suwediong irail akan me sohte pahn ekihla arail pai kan rehi; pwe sohte me ekihla ah pai kan rehi ihte me mwahu kan; oh mehmen me sohte pahn ekihla rehi, meid suwediong ih, oh pil ah pai kan, oh sohte me pahn kak pwurehng alehdi pwehki keriahn sahpwet.

20 Oh rahno pahn lelledo me re pahn ekihla arail pai kan, pwehki mohngiongarail kan kin noahroke dipwisou kan; oh pwehki mohngiongarail kan tengedi pohn arail dipwisou kan, oh pahn ekihla arail pai kan ahnsou me re pahn tangasang arail imwintihti kan; pwehki arail sohte ekihla rehi, meid suwediong irail oh arail pai kan; oh ni rahno re pahn kalokolok, Kauno ketin mahsanih.

21 Kilang kumwail, aramas kan nan kahnihmw lap wet, oh rong mwahu ei koasoi kan; ei, rong mwahu mahsen kan me Kauno ketin mahsanih; pwe kilang, e mahsanih me kumwail riahla pwehki amwail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan, oh pil amwail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan riahla pwehki amwail noahroke amwail dipwisou kan oh sohte men rong mahsen en ih me ketikihong kumwail.

22 Kumwail sohte kin tamatamanKauno amwail Koht nan soahng kan me e ketin kapaiahkinkumwail, ahpw kumwail kin tamataman amwail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan, oh sohte kapingkihong Kauno amwail Koht; ei, mohngiongamwail kan sohte karanih Kauno, ahpw re direkihla pohnmwahso laud, kahrehda aklapalap, oh kala mehlel, noahrok, akupwung, oh lamalam oh ineng en kawehla meteikan, kailok, oh kam aramas, oh soahngen wiewia suwed kan kaoros.

23 Pwehki kahrepe wet me Kauno Koht ketikidohr keriah pohn sahpwet, oh pil keriahla amwail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan, oh met wiawi pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan.

24 Ei, meid suwediong aramas pwukat, pwehki ahnsou wet lelledohr, me kumwail kesehieisang soukohp kan, oh kumwail kawe irail, oh katehki takai irail, oh kemeirailla, oh wiahiong irail soahngen wiewia suwed kan koaros, duwehte irail mehn mahs ko.

25 Oh met ahnsou me kumwail kin koasoai, kumwail kin nda: Ma se iang momour nan mwehin aht pahpahn kawahko, se sohte pahn kemehla soukohp kan; se sohte pahn katehki takai irail, oh kausirailla.

26 Kilang kumwail suwedsang irail; pwe nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, ma soukohp men pahn ketido rehmwail oh mahsanihong kumwail mahsen en Kauno, me pahn kadehdehki amwail dihp kan oh wiewia suwed kan, kumwail lingeringerda pah, oh kesehieila oh rapahki soahngen wiepe koaros pwe en kawehla ih; ei, kumwail pahn nda me e wia soukohp likamw, oh me e wia aramas dipan men, oh sang tepilo, pwehki eh kadehdehki me amwail wiewia kan suwed.

27 Ahpw kilang, ma aramas men pahn kohdo rehmwail oh nda: Kumwail wia met, pwe e sohte suwed; kumwail wia mwo pwe kumwail sohte pahn lokolok; ei, e pahn nda: Kumwail idawehn ineng en pein amwail mohngiong kan; ei, kumwail idawehn ineng en nan masamwail kan, oh wia dahme amwail mohngiong kan inangih—oh ma aramas men pahn kohdo rehmwail oh nda met, kumwail pahn alehda, oh nda me e wia soukohp men.

28 Ei, kumwail pahn wahuneki, oh kumwail pahn kihong amwail dipwisou kan; kumwail pahn kihong noumwail kohl, oh noumwail silper, oh kumwail pahn kalikawihki likou pweilaud; oh pwehki eh widingehkin kumwail koasoai kan, oh e pahn nda me koaros mwahu, kumwail sohte pahn kilang eh sapwung.

29 Oh kumwail dih suwed oh kahngohdi; kumwail kekeluwakalahr oh kumwail wia aramas keptakai, ia uwen werei en amwailmedewe me Kauno pahn ketin kanengamahiong kumwail? Ei, ia uwen werei en amwail pahn mweidehng pein kumwail en idawehn kaweid likamw oh maskun kan? Ei, ia uwen werei en amwail pahn pilada rotorot sang marain?

30 Ei, kilang, engieng en Kauno lelohngehr kumwail; kilang, e ketin kerialahr sahpwet pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan.

31 Oh kilang, ahnsouo pahn kohdo me e pahn ketin keriahla amwail dipwisou kepwehpweh kan, pwe re en likekirisla, pwe kumwail en sohte kak koliraildi; oh nan ahnsou me kumwail pahn semwehmwehla kumwail sohte pahn kak koliraildi.

32 Oh nan ahnsou me kumwail pahn semwehmwehla kumwail pahn pekipek rehn Kauno; oh amwail pekipek pahn sohte katepe, pwehki tehnla lelohngehr kumwail, oh amwail kamwomwala udahn pahn wiawi; oh kumwail udahn pahn sengiseng oh wie weriwer nan rahno, Kauno Wasalapalap ketin mahsanih. Oh kumwail ahpw pahn mwahiei, oh nda:

33 Oh ma I koluhlahtehu, oh sohte kemehla soukohp kan, oh kostakaiih irail, oh kausirailla. Ei, nan rahno kumwail pahn nda: Oh ma kitail tamatamante Kauno atail Koht nan ahnsou me e ketikihong kitail atail pai kan, oh pai kan sohte pahn likekirisla oh salongasang kitail; pwe kilang, atail pai kan kohsangkitailehr.

34 Kilang, kitail kin pwil dipwisou en doadoahk oh manda e kin salongala; oh kilang, neitail kedlahs kan kin kohsang kitail nan ahnsou me kitail kin rapahki ong mahwin.

35 Ei, kitail nekidalahr atail pai kan oh re kin salongasang kitail, pwehki keriahn sahpwet.

36 Oh ma kitail koluhlahtehu nan rahno me mahsen en Kauno kohieng kitail; pwe kilang sahpwe rialahr, oh soahng koaros likekirislahr, oh kitail sohte kak koliraildi.

37 Kilang, tepil kan kin kapilkitailpenehr, ei, ih me songosong en kawehla palingenatail kan, nah tohnleng kan kin kapilkitailpene. Kilang, atail wiewia suwed kan me laud. Maing Kaun, komw sohte kak kasohpeiwei sapwellimomwi engieng sang reht? Oh met pahn mwomwen amwail koasoi nan ahnsou ko.

38 Ahpw kilang, amwail ahnsou en kaunopada dauliher; kumwail wie kasakasaula ahnsou en amwail komourla lao e udahn pwandala mehlel, oh amwail kamwomwala udahn pahn wiawi; ei, pwe kumwail rapahki erein amwail mour me kumwail sohte kak alehdi; oh kumwail rapahki peren nan wiewia suwed, me kin uhwong ahnepen mour pwung me wia sapwellimen atail lapalap oh Kaun Soutuk.

39 Oh kumwail aramas en sahpwet, I men kumwail en rong ei koasoi kan! Oh I kapakapki me engieng en Kauno pahn sohpeisang kumwail, oh me kumwail pahn koluhla oh komourla.
hel 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Samuel kohpada me pwohng me Krais pahn ketin ipwidi marain oh usu kapw ehu pahn pwarada—Krais pahn doarehla aramas kan sang mehlahn paliwar oh palingehn—Kilel en Sapwellime pwoulao iangahki erein rahn siluh e pahn rotorot, pwalpeseng en paip akan, oh mwekid kamasepwehk lap pahn wiawi. Ele Sounpar 6 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo me Samuel, Mehn Leimeno, ahpw kohpada soahng tohto me sohte kak ntingidi.

2 Oh kilang, e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, I kihong kumwail kilel ehu; pwe sounpar limau pahn kohdo, oh kilang, Sapwellimen Kohto ahpw pahn ketido pwe en doarehla koaros me pahn kamehlele mware.

3 Oh kilang, met I pahn kihong kumwail ong kilel en ahnsou me e pahn ketido; pwe kilang, e pahn mie marain lap nanleng, kahrehda pwohngo me e pahn ketin ipwidi e sohte pahn rotorot, kahrehda e pahn mwomwen me e wia rahn ehu ong aramas.

4 Eri, e pahn mie rahn ehu oh pwohng oh rahn, me pahn mwomwen rahn ehu oh sohte pwohng; oh met pahn wia kilel ehu ong kumwail; pwe kumwail pahn ese ahnsou me ketipin kin dakada oh pil kihrila; eri kumwail udahn pahn ese me mie rahn riau oh pwohng ehu; ahpw pwohngo sohte pahn rotorotala; oh e pahn wia pwohngo mwohn eh pahn ipwidi.

5 Oh kilang, mie usu kapw ehu me pahn pwarada, soahng ehu me kumwail saikinte kilang; oh met pil pahn wia kilel ehu ong kumwail.

6 Oh kilang kaidehn ihte koaros met, mie kilel oh manaman kapwuriamwei tohto nanleng me pahn wiawi.

7 Oh ahnsouo pahn kohdo me kumwail koaros pahn pwuriamweikihla, kahrehda kumwail pahn pwupwidi nan pwehl.

8 Oh ahnsouo pahn kohdo me koaros me pahn kamehlele Sapwellimen Kohto, iei irail me pahn alehdi mour poatoapoat.

9 Oh kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie, sang ni sapwellime tohnleng, me I pahn kohdo oh ndaiong kumwail; ei, e mahsanihong ie me I pahn kohpada mepwukat ong kumwail; ei, e ketin mahsanihong ie: Kalohngkiong aramas pwukat, re en koluhla oh kaunopada ahl en Kauno.

10 Oh met, pwehki ei wia Mehn Leimen, oh ndaiong kumwail mahsen kan me Kauno ketin mahsaniong ie, oh pwehki e ahpwal ong kumwail, kumwail lingeringerda pahi oh song en kaweiehla, oh kausiehla sang rehmwail.

11 Oh kumwail pahn rong ei koasoai kan, pwehki kahrepe wet me I kohkihdo oh douda pohn kehl en kahnihmw wet, pwe kumwail en kak rong oh ese kopwung en Koht me awiawih kumwail pwehki amwail wiewia suwed kan, oh pil pwe kumwail en kak ese koasoandi kan en koluhla;

12 Oh pil pwe kumwail en kak ese duwen ketidohn Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, Sahm en nanleng oh sampah, Sounkepikipik en soahng koaros sangete ni tapio; oh pwe kumwail en kak ese duwen kilel en sapwellime ketido, pwe kumwail en kak kamehlele mwarehu.

13 Oh ma kumwail pahn kamehlele mwarehu kumwail pahn koluhkihla dipamwail kan, pwe kumwail en kak alehda lapwapen dipamwail kan sang ni kapai kan me kohsang sapwellime wiewia pwung kan.

14 Oh kilang, pil ehu kilel I pahn kihong kumwail, ei, kilel en sapwellime pwoulao.

15 Pwe kilang, e udahn pahn pwoula pwe komour en kak wiawi; ei, e koasoandi ong ih oh e konehng me e pahn pwoula, pwe en kak ketikihda iasadahn me mehlahr kan, pwe aramas akan en kak mweimweiong mwohn silangin Kauno.

16 Ei, kilang, pwoula wet me elehiong iasada, oh doarehla aramas koaros sang keieu en mehlao—mehlahn palingehno; ong aramas koaros, pwehki i pwupwidien Adam irail kalipesang mwohn silangin Kauno, me duwehte re mehla, pali koaros nin duwen mour en paliwar oh mour en palingehn.

17 Ahpw kilang, iasadahn Krais doarehla aramas, iei, aramas koaros, oh kapwureiraildohng mwohn silangin Kauno.

18 Ei, oh e kahrehda koasoandi en koluhla en wiawi, me kahrehiong mehmen me pahn koluhla e sohte pahn palidi oh lekidekla nan kisiniei; ahpw mehmen me sohte pahn koluhla e pahn palidi oh lekidekla nan kisiniei; oh mehlahn palingehno pahn pwurehng wiawihong irail, ei, keriau en mehla, pwe re pwurehng kalipesang nin duwen mour pwung.

19 Eri kumwail koluhla, kumwail koluhla, pwe ni amwail wehwehkier mepwukat oh sohte pahn kapwaiada, kumwail pahn elehiong kumwail en kalokolok, oh kumwail pahn lohdiong nan keriau en mehla wet.

20 Ahpw kilang, nin duwen ei koasoaiahong kumwail pil ehu kilel, kilel en sapwellime pwoulao, kilang, nan rahno me e pahn ketin lokolongki mehla ketipin pahn rotorotla oh sohte pahn kihong kumwail marain; oh pil maram oh usu kan; oh sohte marain pahn mie pohn sahpwet, iei sangete ahnsou me e pahn lokolongki mehla, erein rahn siluh, kohla lel ahnsou me e pahn pwurehng iasadahsang mehla.

21 Ei, ni ahnsou me e pahn ketin mweidala ngeni nansapwe pahn posopos oh lioal piripir erein awa tohto, oh sampah pahn rerrer oh itikek; oh paip akan me mih pohn sampah, koaros me mih pohn pwehl oh pahn pwehl, me kumwail ese me re pwon ahnsou wet, de pali laudih pwon itpene, pahn pwalpeseng;

22 Ei, re pahn pwalpeseng wiahda riau, oh pahn dierek nan elenpwal oh lipwenpwal, oh me pwalasang kan me mihseli pohn sampah pwon, ei, koaros pohn pwehl oh pahn pwehl.

23 Oh kilang, mie kisinieng kehlail kan me pahn wiawi, oh tohto nahna kan pahn rengkidi patapatala, duwehte wahu, oh tohto wasahkan me ahnsou wet kahdaniki wahu kan pahn wiahla nahna kan, me ileilehi pahn ileile mehlel.

24 Oh tohto ahl lap akan pahn ohla, oh tohto kahnihmw kan pahn tehnla.

25 Oh sousou tohto pahn ritida, oh pahn mweidala tohto me mehla kan; oh souleng tohto pahn pwarehng aramas tohto.

26 Oh kilang, met me tohnlengo mahsanihong ie; pwe e mahsanih me nansapwe pahn posopos oh lioal piripir erein awa tohto.

27 Oh e mahsanihong ie me nan erein ahnsouo me nansapwe pahn posopos oh lioal piripir, oh kisinieng kehlail, me mepwukat pahn wiawi, oh me rotorot pahn kipehdi sampah pwon erein rahn siluh.

28 Oh tohnlengo mahsanihong ie me tohto me pahn kilangada soahng kan me lapasang mepwukat, me pahn kahrehiong re en kamehlele me kilel pwukat oh kapwuriamwei pwukat pahn wiawi pohn sapwet pwon, me pahn kahrehda sohte kahrepen re soupwoson rehn aramas akan.

29 Oh met me pahn kahrehda mehmen me pahn kamehlele pahn komourla, oh mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele, kopwung pwung pahn kohieng ih; oh pil ma re pahn lekidekla irail me pein elehiong arail lekidekla.

30 Oh met tamataman, tamataman, rieiko, me mehmen me pahn mehla, mehkihla pein ih; oh mehmen me pahn wiewia suwed, wiahiong pein ih; pwe kilang, kumwail saledek; kumwail mweimweiong en wia pein amwail pilipil; pwe kilang, Koht ketikihong kumwail marain oh kasaledekiala kumwail.

31 E ketikihong kumwail pwe kumwail en kak ese me mwahu sang me suwed, oh ketikihong kumwail pwe kumwail en kak pilada mour de mehla; oh kumwail kak wia me mwahu oh kopwurupwurieng me mwahu, de alehdi me mwahuo kopwurupwuriong kumwail; de kumwail kak wia me suwed, oh alehdi me suwedo kopwurupwurieng kumwail.
hel 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kauno kin ketin kaloke Mehn Nihpai kan pwehki E ketin poakehng irail—Mehn Leimen me wiliakapwala kan kehlail oh tengeteng nan arail pwoson—Kauno pahn kupwurehla Mehn Leimen kan ni imwin rahn akan. Ele Sounpar 6 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, riei kempoakepahi ko, kilang, I ndaiong kumwail ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla ihmwamwail kan pahn tehnla.

2 Ei, ma kumwail sohte koluhla, amwail pwoud kan pahn wie sengiseng nan ahnsou me re pahn kadihdi neirail seri kan; pwe kumwail pahn song en tang oh sohte pahn diar wasahn keiru; ei, oh meid suwediong me pahn wewa seri, pwe re pahn toutoula oh sohte kak tang; eri, re pahn tiatipeseng oh pahn kamakamala.

3 Ei, meid suwediong aramas pwukat me kahdaniki aramas en Nihpai ma re sohte pahn koluhla, ahnsou me re pahn kilang kilel pwukat koaros oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan me pahn kasansalohng irail; pwe kilang, irail wia aramas pilipil kei ong Kauno; ei, aramas en Nihpai me e ketin poakehng, oh e pil ketin kaloke irail; ei, nan ahnsou me re kin wia me suwed e kin ketin kaloke irail pwehki eh ketin poakehng irail.

4 Ahpw kilang riei kempoakepahi ko, Mehn Leimen kan e ketin kailongki pwehki arail wiewia kan me suwed ahnsou koaros, oh met pwehki wiewia suwed en tiahk en arail pahpa ko. Ahpw kilang, komour kohdohng irail sang ni kalkalohk en Mehn Nihpai kan; oh pwehki kahrepe wet me Kauno ketin kareireila arail ahnsou.

5 Oh I men kumwail en ese me pali laud en irail re wie ideidawehn arail pwukoah, oh re kin kanakanaiehng kohwei mwohn Koht, oh re kin nantihong en kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned kan oh sapwellime koasoandi kan, oh sapwellime koasoandi en kopwung kan nin duwen kosonned en Moses.

6 Ei, I ndaiong kumwail, me pali laud en irail wiewia met, or re kin nannantihong ni ar sohte pwangahkida loaloapwoat pwe re en kak wahdo luhwen riarail kan re en wehwehkihda mehlelo; eri mie me tohto me kin iangirailla nan ehu ehu rahn.

7 Oh kilang, kumwail pein esehier, pwe kumwail kadehdehier, me irail koaros me kin wehwehkihda mehlelo, oh esehda mour suwed oh tiahk suwed en arail pahpa ko, oh kamehlelehda pwuhk sarawi kan, ei, kokohp kan en soukohp sarawi kan, me ntingdi, me kin kahluwahiong irail en pwoson Kauno, oh koluhla, iei pwoson oh koluhla me kin elehiong wiliakapw en mohngiongarail—

8 Eri, nin duwen irail koaros me marainkidahr met, kumwail pein esehier me re kehlail oh tengeteng nan pwoson, oh nan dahme irail saledengkihla.

9 Oh kumwail pil ese me irail saripidi neirail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh re masak pwurehng alehda pwe re de pahn dipikihda; ei, kumwail kak kilang me re masak wiahda dihp—pwe kilang re pahn kin mweidala re en tiatihdi oh kamakamala rehn arail imwintihti kan, oh sohte pahn peliankin irail neirail kedlahs kan, oh met pwehki arail pwoson Krais.

10 Oh met, pwehki arail tengeteng ni ahnsou me re kamehlele dahme irail kamehlelehu, pwehki arail kehlail ni ahnsou me re tepin marainkihda, kilang, Kauno pahn ketin kapai irail oh kareireila arail ahnsou, mehndahte arail wiewia suwed—

11 Ei, mehndahte ma arail pwoson tikitikila, Kauno pahn ketin kareireila arail ahnsou, lao lel ahnsouo pahn kohdo me atail pahpako koasoaiahda, oh pil soukohp Sihnos, oh soukohp tohto teikan, nin duwen kopwurupwurdohn riatail, Mehn Leimen, en pwurehng wehwehkihda mehlelo—

12 Ei, I ndaiong kumwail, me ni imwin ahnsou kan sapwellimen Kauno inou kan pahn kohieng riatail, Mehn Leimen kan; oh mehndahte lokolok tohto me pahn lelohng irail, oh mehndahte arail imwintihti pahn pwakihrailseli pohn sampah, oh rapahkinirail, oh kemeirail oh katangirailpeseng, oh sohla wasahn arail keiru, Kauno pahn kupwurkalahngih irail.

13 Oh met duwen kokohpo, me re pahn pwurehng kopwurupwurdohng marain mehlelo, me iei marainkihda arail Soundoaro, oh arail silepen sihpw lapalap oh mehlelo, oh iang wadawadiong sapwellime sihp kan.

14 Eri I ndaiong kumwail, me e pahn mwahu ong irail sang kumwail ihte ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhla.

15 Pwe kilang, ma doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan me kumwail kilangehr sansalohng irail, ei, ong irail me arail pwoson tikitikla pwehki tiahk en arail pahpako, kumwail kak pein ese me arail pwoson sohte pahn pwurehng tikitikila.

16 Eri, Kauno ketin mahsani: I sohte pahn udahn kamwomwirailla, ahpw I pahn wiahda me ni ahnsou me I pahn kupwuriki re pahn pwurehng pwurodohng ie, Kauno ketin mahsanih.

17 Oh met kilang, Kauno ketin mahsanih, duwen aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan: Ma re sohte pahn koluhla, oh nantihong en wia kupwurei, I pahn udahn kamwomwirailla, Kauno ketin mahsanih, pwehki arail pwoson tikitikla mehndahte doadoahk kapwuriamwei tohto me I wiahiong irailehr; oh ni mehlel nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias mepwukat pahn wiawi, Kauno ketin mahsanih.
hel 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan me kamehlele Samuel papidaisla rehn Nihpai—Mehn Nihpai kan me sohte koluhla neirail arep kan oh takai kan sohte kak kemehla Samuel—Ekei mohngiongarail kan keptakaila, oh ekei kilangada tohnleng kan—Me soupwoson kan kin nda me e kasapwurupwur re en kamehlele Krais oh Sapwellime ketido nan Serusalem. Ele Sounpar 6–1 Mwohn Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kedekedeo mie tohto me rong mahsen kan en Samuel, Mehn Leimen, me e kalohngki pohn kehl en kahnihmwo. Oh koaros me kamehlele ah mahsen kan kohla oh rapahki Nihpai; oh ahnsou me re kohla oh diarada ih, irail ahpw wehkadahng ih diparail kan oh sohte kahmahmki, oh inangih me re papidaisla ong Kauno.

2 Ahpw koaros me sohte kamehlele mahsen kan en Samuel lingeringerda pah; oh kostakai ih pohn kehlo, oh tohto me pil kasikihki arep kan ni e keskesihnen pohn kehlo; ahpw Ngehn en Kauno ketiket reh, kahrehda re sohte kak lel katehkihdi neirail takai kan de pil neirail arep kan.

3 Met ni ahnsou me re kilang me re sohte kak katehdi, mie tohto me kamehlelehda ah mahsen kan, kahrehda re kohkohla rehn Nihpai pwe re en papidaisla.

4 Pwe kilang, Nihpai wiewia papidais, oh wiewia kokohp, oh wie padapadahk, oh kalkalongkihong aramas akan koluhla, kasakasalehiong irail kilel oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan, wiewia doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan rehn aramas kan, pwe re en kak ese me ketidohn Krais kereniongehr—

5 Ndindaiong irail soahng kan me kereniongehr pahn kohda pwe re en kak ese oh tamataman nan ahnsouo me soahng pwukat pahn kohdo mepwukat kasansalohng irailehr mwowe, pwe re en kak kamehlele; eri koaros me kamehlele mahsen kan en Samuel ahpw kohla reh pwe re en papidaisla, pwe irail kohla oh kolkoluhkihla oh wewehkada diparail kan.

6 Ahpw pali laud en irail sohte kamehlele mahsen kan en Samuel; eri ahnsou me re kilangada me re sohte kak katehkihdi neirail takai kan oh neirail arep kan, re werikilahng neirail kaun en sounpei kan, ndinda: Koledi aramas menet oh salihdi, pwe kilang mie tepil me mih reh; oh pwehki manaman en tepil me mih reh kitail sohte kak katehkihdi neitail takai kan oh arep kan; eri koledi oh salihdi, oh wahlahsang ih me.

7 Oh ni arail kokolahng pwe en koledi ih, kilang, e ahpw lusdihsang pohn kehlo, oh tangasang nan sahpwo, iei, pwuralahng pein ah wehi, oh tepida kalohk oh kokohp rehn pein nah aramas akan.

8 Oh kilang, sohte mie ronge rehn Mehn Nihpai kan; oh met iei irair kan en aramas kan.

9 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr kawelihsek weneu en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai.

10 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr kawelihsek isuh en mwehin sounkopwung kan, pali laud en aramas akan mihmihte nan arail pohnmwahso oh mour suwed, oh malaulau irail me kin kanakanaiehng kohwei mwohn Koht.

11 Oh mepwukat iei pil irair kan, nan pahr kawelihsek waluh en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

12 Oh mie kisin wekidekla tikitik nan irair kan rehn aramas kan, ahpw ihte aramas tepida keptakaila nan wiewia suwed, oh kalakalaudehla nan wiewia soahng kan me kin uhwong sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan, nan pahr kawelihsek duwau en mwehin sounkopwung kan.

13 Ahpw kedekedeo nan pahr keduweisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan, mie kilel kapwuriamwei kan kasansalehng aramas kan, oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan; oh mahsen en soukohp kan tepida pweida.

14 Oh tohnleng kan pwarehng aramas kan, ohl loalokong kan, oh pakairkihong irail rongamwahu en popohl mehlel; eri nan pahrwet pwuhk sarawi kan tepida pweida.

15 Ahpw, mohngiong en aramas akan tepida keptakaila, koaros ihte pwihn me keieu kamehlele, sang Mehn Nihpai kan oh pil Mehn Leimen kan, oh re tepida likih pein arail kehlail oh pein arail erpit, ndinda:

16 Ekei mehkot re mwein kasariki pwung, nanpwungen me tohto; ahpw kilang, se wehwehki me doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei pwukat koaros sohte kak pweida, me kokohpdahr.

17 Oh re tepida wie lamalamki oh akamaipene nanpwungarail, ndinda:

18 Me e kasapwurupwur me Krais menet pahn ketido; ma iei, oh ma e wia Sapwellimen Kohto, Sahm en nanleng oh sampah, nin duwen me kokohpda, dahme kahrehda e sohte pahn pwarehng kitail duwehte irail me mih nan Serusalem?

19 Ei, dahme e sohte pahn pwaredo nan sahpw wet duwehte nan sahpw en Serusalem?

20 Ahpw kilang, kitail wehwehki me met iei tiahk likamw, me wie kadakadaukohdo lel rehtail sang atail pahpa ko, pwe en kahrehiong kitail en kamehlele soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei me pahn kohdo, ahpw kaidehn rehtail, ahpw nan sahpw me doh, nan sahpw ehu me kitail sohte wehwehki; pwe re en kolokol kitail nan rotorot, pwe kitail sohte kak kadehdehki pein mesatail kan me re mehlel.

21 Oh re pahn, wia doadoahk rirsang ni widing oh doadoak rir en me suwedo me kitail sohte kak wehwehki, me pahn kihong kitail en wia lidu en arail koasoi kan, oh pil wia lidu ong irail, pwe kitail kin koapwoaroapwoarki me re pahn padahkihong kitail mahseno; oh met re pahn kolokol kitail nan rotorot ma kitail pahn mweidkitailla rehrail, erein atail mour.

22 Oh soahng tohto me aramas akan medewe nan mohngiongarail kan, me wia mehkot mwahl oh likamw; oh re ahneki kapwunod laud, pwe Sehdan kamwakidirailda re en wiewia suwed ahnsou koaros; ei, e kohseli oh kamwakamwoaronge oh kapkapingada wasa koaros nan sahpwo, pwe mohngiong en aramas en kak keptakaila ong me mwahu oh ong me pahn kohdo.

23 Oh mehndahte kilel kan oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan me wiawihongehr aramas en Kauno, oh doadoahk kapwuriamwei tohto me re wiahda, Sehdan koledier mohngiong en aramas akan pohn sahpwo pwon.

24 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pahr keduweisek en mwehin sounkopwung kan ong aramas en Nihpai.

25 Oh met kaimwisekalahr pwuhk en Ilemen, nin duwen poadoapoad en Ilemen oh nah pwutak kan.
3-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Kesiluh en Nihpai[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Nihpai Nein Nihpai Pwutak, Me Wia Nein Ilemen Pwutak[/font_size][/center]

Oh Ilemen iei nein Ilemen, me wia nein Alma, me pahpaki Alma, me wia kadaudoken Nihpai me Lihai nainki, me kohdohsang nan Serusalem ni tepin pahr en mwein Sedekaia, nanmwarki en Suda.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nihpai, nein Ilemen, pwutak, mweselsang nan sahpwo, oh nah pwutak Nihpai alehdi poadoapoad kan—Mehndahte kilel kan oh soang kapwuriamwei kan wiwiawi, me suwed kan koasonehdi me re pahn kemehla me pwung kan—Pwohng en ipwidi en Krais ahpw lelledo—Kilel kan ahpw wiawi, oh usu kapw ehu pwarada—Likamw oh mwersuwed laudla, oh Pwihn en Kadiendon lipirap ko kemehla tohto. Ele Sounpar 1–4 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Met kedekedeo sounpar pahr duweisek ehu imwiseklahr oh sounparehr wenopwuki sang ahnsou me Lihai mwesel sang nan Serusalem; oh nan pahro me Lakonies me wia sounkopwung lapalap oh kepinahn sahpwo.

2 Oh Nihpai, me wia nein Ilemen pwutak, mweselsang nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh kasapwiliong nah pwutak Nihpai, me keieu laud, pwukoahn prahs pileit ko, oh poadoapoad kan koaros me wie nekinek, oh soahng koaros me kesempwal me re wie kolokol sangeteahnsou me Lihai mweselsang nan Serusalem.

3 E ahpw mweselsang nan sahpwo, oh wasa me e kohla, sohte aramas wehwehki; oh nah pwutak Nihpai ahpw weliandi oh tepida apwalih poadoapoad kan, ei, poadoapoad en aramas kan.

4 Kedekedeo ni tepidahn pahr duweisek riauo, kilang, kokohp en soukohp kan tepida pweida ni mehlel; pwe e tepida mie kilel kesempwal oh manaman kapwuriamwei wiawi rehn aramas kan.

5 Ahpw mie ekei me tepida nda me ahnsou me mahsen ko pahn pweida daulilahr, [mahsen kan] me Samuel, Mehn Leimen kohpadaho.

6 Oh re tepida kouruhrki riarail kan, ndinda: Kilang ahnsouo daulilahr, oh mahsen kan en Samuel sohte pweida; eri, amwail peren oh amwail pwoson duwen soahng wet sohte katepe.

7 Kedekedeo irail ahpw wiahda moromor lap nan sahpwo; oh aramas kan me kamehleleko tepida pahtoula mehlel, pwe e de pahn soahng ko me kokohpdahr sohte pweida.

8 Ahpw kilang, irail loaloapwoationg mwasamwasahn rahno oh pwohngo oh rahno me pahn wia rahntehieu duwehte sohte pwohng, pwe re kak ese me arail pwoson sohte likamw.

9 Met kedekedeo mie ah nehu me pwihn soupwoson ko koasoanehdi, me koaros me kamehlele tiahk [kokohp ko] pahn kamakamala ihte ma kilelo pahn pwarada, me soukohp Samuel kohpadao.

10 Met kedekedeo ahnsou me Nihpai, nein Nihpai pwutako, kilangadahr wiewia suwed en nah aramas akan, mohngiongi pahtoula mehlel.

11 Kedekedeo e ahpw pidohila oh poaridi nan pwehlo, oh weliandi nah aramas akan kapakap kehlail ong Koht, ei, kapakapki irail akan me pahn kamakamalahr pwehki arail pwoson tiahk en arail pahpa ko.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw kapakap kehlail ong Kauno rahno pwon; oh kilang, kepitien Kauno ahpw kohdohng ih, mahmahsanih:

13 Kilengida oh ahneki koapworopwor; pwe kilang, ahnsouo lelehr, oh soutik wet kilelo pahn pwarada, oh lakapw I pahn ketdihwei pohn sampah, pwe en kasalehiong sampah me I pahn kapwaiada soahng koaros me I kahrehda nei soukohp sarawi kan en kohpada.

14 Kilang, I kohdo rehn pein nei aramas, pwe en kapwaiada soahng koaros me I kasalehiong aramas akan sangete ni poahson en sampah, oh wia kupwuren Sahmo oh Sapwellimehu—Sahmo pwehki ngehi, oh Sapwellimehu pwehki paliwereiet. Oh kilang, ahnsouo lelehr, oh soutik wet kilelo pahn pwarada.

15 Kedekedeo mahsen kan me kohieng Nihpai ahpw pweida, nin duwen eh mahsendahr; pwe kilang, ni ahnsou me ketipino wie kikihrla e sohte rotorotala; oh aramas akan tepida pwuriamwei pwehki e sohte rotorot ahnsou me pwohngo lel.

16 Oh mie me tohto, me sohte kamehlele mahsen kan en soukohp kan, me pwupwidi nan pwehlo duwehte re mehla, pwe re ese me koasoandi lap en kamakamala me re koasonehdiong irail me kamehlele mahsen en soukohp kan sohte pweida; pwe kilelo me kohieng irail lelehr.

17 Oh re tepier wehwehki me Sapwellimen Kohto udahn pahn ketido; eri, ni oaralap, aramas koaros me mih pohn sahpwo pwon sang palikapi kohla palimese, nan sahpw en paliepeng oh nan sahpw en palieir koaros, pwuriamweikihla mehlel kahrehda re pwupwidi nan pwehlo.

18 Pwe re ese me soukohp kan kadehdehkiermepwukat sounpar tohto kei, oh kilel me kohieng irailehro lelledohr; oh re tepida masak pwehki arail wiewia suwed oh arail soupwoson.

19 Kedekedeo sohte rotorot pwohngo pwon, ahpw e marain duwehte nan wereng souwas. Kedekedeo ketipino ahpw pwurehng dakada ni mensengo, nin duwen koasondi en dakada; oh re ese me iei rahno me Kauno pahn ketin ipwidi, pwehki kilelo eh ketin wiawiher.

20 Oh e wiawiher, ei, soahng koaros, ni pisetik, nin duwen mahsen akan en soukohp kan.

21 Kedekedeo pil ehu usu kapw pwarada, nin duwen mahseno.

22 Kedekedeo sang ahnsouo kohla likam akan tepida kohseli rehn aramas akan, sang Sehdan, pwe kakeluwakala mohngiongarail kan, kahrepehu pwe re en kak sohte kamehlele kilel ko oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan me re kilangehr; ahpw mehndahte likamw oh widing pwukat pali laud en aramas akan kamehlelehte oh weliakapwla ong Kauno.

23 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw kohla rehn aramas kan, oh pil ekei me tohto, papidaisihla me koluhla, me kahrehda mie kamwakelpen dihp laud. Oh met kahrehda aramas akan pwurehng tepida ahneki popohl nan sahpwo.

24 Oh sohte pingiping ahnsouo, ihte ekei me tepida padahngki, nannantihong kasalehda sang pwuhksarawi kan me e solahr konehng kapwaiada kosonned en Moseso. Met nan soahng wet re sapwungalahr, pwehki re sohte wehwehki pwuhksarawi kan.

25 Ahpw kedekedeo re tepida weliakapwala, oh kopwungupwungla nan sapwung me re mih loale, pwe e kasansalohng irail me kosonnedo saikinte unsekla, oh me e pahn pweida nan mehkoaros; ei, mahseno kohieng irail me e udahn pahn pweida; ei, me sohte ehu pahn imwisekla loa koaros mehngihtikpe pahn pweida; eri nan pahrohte irail wehwehkihda arail sapwungala oh ahpw wehkada arail sapwung kan.

26 Oh met pahr duweisek riauo ahpw imwisekla, ni e wadohr rongamwahu ong aramas kan pwehki kilel kan me pwaradahr, nin duwen mahsen en kokohp kan en soukohp sarawi koaros.

27 Kedekedeo me nan pahr duweisek siluho ahpw pil imwisekla nan popohl, ihte pwihn en Kadienden lipirap ko, me kin koukousoan pohn nahna kan, me rekla nan sahpwo; pwehki wasahn ar rukila oh kouson rir kan me kehlail kahrehda aramas kan sohte kak powehdi irail; eri re kin kam aramas tohto, oh ahpw kehmehla pokon en aramas.

28 Kedekedeo nan pahr duweisek pahieu re ahpw tepida kekeirda laud mehlel, pwehki tohto me pwupwidi sang Mehn Nihpai kan me kin kohkohla iangala irail, me kin elehiong pahtou laud rehn irail Mehn Nihpai kan me kin mihmihte nan sahpwo.

29 Oh pil mie pahtou laud rehn Mehn Leimen kan; pwe kilang, mie neirail seri tohto me kekeirda oh tepida mahmahla nan arail sounpar, karehda irail uhtohrla, oh idawehnla ekei Mehn Soromai kan, sang ni arail koasoi likamw oh arail widing kan, re en iangala pwihn en Kadienden lipirap ko.

30 Oh met kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan pili ang lokolok, oh tepida tikitikla nan arail pwoson oh mour pwung, pwehki wiewia suwed en dih me kohkohda.
3-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan laudla rehn aramas kan—Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan ehupene oh doarehsang irail pwihn en Kadienden lipirap ko—Mehn Leimen kan me weliakapwala pwetepwetla oh adanikihla Mehn Nihpai. Ele Sounpar 5–16 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo pahr keduweisek limao ahpw pil imwisekla, oh aramas kan ahpw tepida manokehla kilel kan oh soahng kapwuriamwei kan me irail rongehr, oh tepida sohla pwuriamweiki kilel de soahng kapwuriamwei me sang nanleng, kahrehda nan mohngiongarail kan tepida kekeluwakala, oh masukunla nan arail madamadau kan, oh tepida sohla kamehlele soahng koaros me re rongehr oh kilangehr—

2 Medmedewehda soahngen mehkot likamw kan nan mohngiongarail kan, me dene aramas oh sang ni manaman en tepilo me elehiong, pwe en kahluwahsang oh pitihdi mohngiong en aramas kan; oh met iei me Sehdan pwurehng kolkihdier mohngiong en aramas akan, kahrehda e kamaskunialahr masarail kan oh kahluwahlang irail en kamehlele me padahk mehlel en Krais kan likamw oh sohte katepe.

3 Kedekedeo aramas kan ahpw kehkehlaila nan arail wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed kan; oh irail sohte kamehlele me pahn miehte ekei kilel de soahng kapwuriamwei kan wiawi; oh Sehdan ahpw kohseli, kakaluwahsang mohngiong en aramas kan, kaskasongosongih irail oh kahkahrehiong irail en wia mwekid suwed kan nan sahpwo.

4 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr duweisek wenouo; oh pil pahr duweisek isuh; oh pil pahr duweisek waluho; oh pil pahr duweisek duwao;

5 Oh pil sounpar epwiki daulihlahr mwein Mosaia, me wia nanmwarki en aramas en Nihpai kan.

6 Oh sounpar wenepwiki duwao daulihlahr ahnsou me Lihai mweselsang Serusalem.

7 Oh sounpar duwao daulihlahr ahnsou me kilelo pwaradao, me soukohp kan kohpada, me Krais pahn ketdihdo pohn sampah.

8 Met Mehn Nihpai kan tepida wadek ahnsou sang ni ahnsou me kilelo pwarada, de sang ni ipwidi en Krais; eri, sounpar duwao dauliher.

9 Oh Nihpai, me wia semen Nihpai, me pwukoahki poadoapoad ko, sohte pwurala nan sahpw en Saraemla, oh e sohte kak dierek nan sahpwo pwon.

10 Kedekedeo aramas kan pil duduwehte nan arail mour suwed kan, mendahte kalkalohk oh kokohp me pekederdohng irail; oh me pil kaimwsekalahr pahr eiseko; oh pahr eisek ehuo pil imwisekla nan arail dihpan.

11 Kedekedeo nan pahr keisek siluho mahwin oh pingiping tepida wiawi nan sahpwo pwon; pwe pwihn en Kadienden lipirap ko wie tohtohla, oh ahpw kemehla aramas tohto, oh kawehla kahnihmw tohto, oh wiwiahda mehla oh kamaramas nan sahpwo pwon, me kahrehda anahnepen aramas koaros, Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan koaros, re en alehda neirail dipwisou en mwahwin kan pwe re en doare irail.

12 Eri, Mehn Leimen kan koaros me weliakapwehng Kauno ahpw ehupenehng riarail kan, Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki anahnepen, pererehn arail mour oh arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan, me karehda re alehda dipwisou en mahwin pwe re en pelian pwihn en Kadienden lipirap kan, ei, oh pwe re en pil doandoare arail pwuhng, oh arail kapai en ahneki mwomwohdiso oh arail kaudok, oh arail saledek oh saledek en momour.

13 Kedekedeo mwohn pahr keisek siluh eh imwisekla Mehn Nihpai kan kereniong re pahn kamwomwala pwehki mahwin wet, me kapahtoula mehlel.

14 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan me miniminiongehr Mehn Nihpai kan iang wadawadiongehr rehn Mehn Nihpai kan;

15 Oh arail keriau kohsang rehrail, oh kilirail kan pwetepwetala duwehte Mehn Nihpai kan;

16 Oh neirail mwahnakapw kan oh peinakapw kan pil linganla mehlel, oh re wadawadiongehr mehn Nihpai kan, oh adanikihla Mehn Nihpai. Oh met kaimwsekala pahr eiseksiluh.

17 Kedekedeo ni tepin pahr keisek pahieuo, mahwin nanpwungen lipirap ko oh aramas en Nihpai kan ahpw doudoulahte oh kapahtoula mehlel; ahpw, aramas en Nihpai kan ekis paiamwahu sang lipirap ko, kahrehda re pwakirailsang nan sapwarail sahpw kan kohla nan nahna kan oh nan wasahn arail rukula kan.

18 Oh met kaimwsekala pahr eisek pahieu. Oh nan pahr eisek limauo re pwurehng kohdohng aramas en Nihpai kan; oh pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas en Nihpai, oh pwehki arail pingiping tohto kan oh pwupwidi kan, pwihn en Kadienden lipirap ko kin kaloweiraildi wasah kei.

19 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr eisek limau, oh met aramas kan mihmi nan irair en kahpwal tohto; oh kedlahs en kamwomwala wie tentenek pohrail, kahrehda kereniong irail pahn kamakamkihla, oh met pwehki diparail kan.
3-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kidienai, kaun en pwihn en Kadienden ko, ruwese me Lakonius oh Mehn Nihpai kan re en mweidehng irail pahn eh manaman oh sapwarail kan—Lakonius pilada Kidkidonai en wia kaun lapalap en sounpei kan—Mehn Nihpai kan kohpene nan Saraemla oh Sapwen Rahk pwe re en doare pein irail. Ele Sounpar 16–18 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr keisek wenou sang mwurin ipwidi en Krais, Lakonius, kepinahn sahpwo, alehdi kisin likou ehu sang kaun oh kepinahn pwihn en lipirap ko; oh iet nting kan me ntingdi, me mahsanih:

2 Maing Lakonius, kepina lapalap en sahpwet, kilang, I ntingihwei kisin likou wet ong komwi, oh kepingaiuk mehlel pwehki ahmw kehlail, oh pil kehlail en noumw aramas kan, nan kolokolete dahme kumwail kin medewe me amwail pwuhng oh saledek en momour; ei, kumwail kehkehlail, mwomwen me limen koht me sowese kumwail, nan amwail doare amwail saledek em mour, oh amwail dipwisou kan, oh amwail wehi, de me kumwail kin ndahki.

3 Oh e kansensuwed ong ie, maing Lakonius, me komw pahn sohte marain oh idawehn pein nsenomw ni omw pahn medewe me kumwail kak pelian ohl komwad tohto me I kin ruwese, me ahnsou wet onopadahr nan arail tehtehn mahwin, oh awiawih ni ar kasikasik mehlel ruwes me pahn mahsanih—Kohdihlahng Mehn Nihpai kan oh kemeirailla.

4 Oh pwehki I ese arail komwad, pwehki I songehr irail nan mahwin, oh pwehki I ese kailok poatoapoat me re ahneki ong kumwail pwehki sapwung tohto me kumwail wiahiong irail, eri ma re pahn kohwehng kumwail re pahn kohwei oh kamwomwala kumwail.

5 Eri I ntingiada kisin likou wet, katengehkihdi pein pehi, pwehki ei pwunodki amwail mour, pwehki amwail tengedieng dahme kumwail kamehlele me pwung, oh amwail eimah nan mahwin.

6 Eri I ntingwei rehmwail, pwehki I mwahuki kumwail pahn mweidehng nei aramas kan, amwail kahnihmw kan, sapwamwail kan, oh amwail dipwisou kan, mwahusang arail pahn kohwehng kumwail wa kedlahs oh kamwomwala kumwail.

7 De ni ehu koasoi, kumwail mweidehng kumwail pahn aht manaman, oh patehng kiht oh esehla aht doadoahk rir kan, oh wiahla riat pwe kumwail en kak duweikihtla—kaidehng nait lidu, ahpw riat oh iangaht nan soahng koaros me aht.

8 Oh kilang, I kahukihonguhk, ma ke pahn wia met, ni ahmw kahula, ke sohte pahn kamakamala; ahpw ma ke sohte pahn wia met, I kahukihonguhk, me nan sounpwung pahn wad I pahn ruwesehiong nei sounpei kan re en kohdihwehnguhk, oh re sohte pahn uhdi de kamaurala, ahpw pahn kemeikukala, oh pahn mweidehng kedlahs en peleiukedi lao ke mehla.

9 Oh kilang, ngehi me Kidianai; oh ngehi me wia kepina en pwihn rir en Kadienden; me wia pwihn oh doadoahk me I ese me mwahu; oh e sangete mahs oh e pepous kohdo lel reht.

10 Oh I ntingihwei kisin likou wet rehmw, Lakonius, oh I kasik me ke pahn mweidehng kiht sapwamwail kan oh amwail dipwisou kan, ni sohte kakerehdi nta, pwe nei aramas kan re en kak pwurehng arail pwuhng oh koapworment, oh ma ke sohte pahn wia me, I pahn dupuk sapwung me wiawihong irail. Ngehi iei Kidianai.

11 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Lakonius alehdier kisin likou wet e udahn pwuriamwei mehlel, pwehki loalap en Kidianai eh kak nda re en mweidehng sahpwen Mehn Nihpai kan, oh kamkamasak aramas kan oh dipuk sapwung ong irail akan me sohte sapwung wiawihong irail, ihte irail me pein wiahiong irail sapwung ni arail pwupwidi oh iangala pwihn lipirap suwed oh sakanakan.

12 Met kilang, Lakonius, me wia kepinao, wia ohl pwung men, oh sohte kak masakada ruwes oh kamasepwehk en lipirap men; eri e sohte rong nein Kidianai kisin likouo, me wia kepinahn pwihn lipirapoko, ahpw e kahrehiong nah aramas kan re en peki rehn Kauno en ketin ketikihong irail kehlail ni ahnsou me pwihn lipirap kan pahn kohdohng irail.

13 Ei, e ahpw kadarpeseng pakair ehu rehn aramas koaros, me irail en kihpene arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, neirail pelin sihpw kan oh neirail pelin kou kan, oh arail dipwisou kan wasahte ieu, ihte me soh sapwerail kan.

14 Oh e ahpw wiahda me re pahn wiahda wasahn rukulah kan en wiahwihda kapilirailpene, oh e pahn anahne kehlail mehlel. Oh e ahpw wiahda me sounpei kan, sang pali koaros en Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan, de irail koaros me wadawadiong rehn Mehn Nihpai kan, pahn kiheng soun silasil en tetehk irail, oh sile irail sang pwihn lipirap kan pwohng oh rahn.

15 Ei, e ahpw ndaiong irail: Nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, ma kumwail sohte pahn koluhkihla dipamwail kan, oh peki rehn Kauno, kumwail sohte pahn poadoandoarasang nan pehn pwihn en Kadienden lipirap kan.

16 Oh ahn Lakonius mahsen kan oh kokohp kan me kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei me kahrehda aramas kan ar lemwkihda; oh re nantihong nan arail kehlail en wia nin duwen mahsen kan en Lakonius.

17 Kedekedeo me Lakonius ahpw pilada emen kaun lapalap en sounpei kan en Mehn Nihpai kan koaros, pwe en kaweid irail ni ahnsou me pwihn lipirap kan pahn kohdihdo sang nan sapwtehn pwe en uhwong irail.

18 Met me keieu lapalap nan pwungen kaun lapalap en sounpei kan oh kaun lap en sounpei pwon en Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw pilipilda, oh ede iei Kidkiddonai.

19 Met iei tiahk en Mehn Nihpai kan koaros me re kin pilada neirail kaun lapalap en sounpei kan, (ihte kaidehn ahnsou me re kin suwedla) emen me ahneki ngehn en kaudihal oh pil kokohp; eri, Kidkiddonai mentet wia soukohp men rehrail, pil iangahki arail sounkopwungo.

20 Met aramas kan ndaiong Kidkidonai: Kapakapiong Kauno, oh mweidehng kitail en kohdahla pohn nahna kan oh nan sapwtehno, pwe kitail en kak kemehla pwihn lipirap kan oh kamwomwirailla nan pein sapwarail kan.

21 Ahpw Kidkidonai ndaiong irail: Kauno sohte mweidada; pwe ma kitail pahn kohdalahng irail Kauno pahn ketin mweidkitailla nan pehrail kan; eri kitail pahn kaunopada kitail nan wereneng sapwatail kan, oh kitail pahn kihpene neitail sounpei kan koaros, oh kitail sohte pahn kohlahng irail, ahpw kitail pahn awih lao irail kohdohng kitail; eri nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias, ma kitail pahn wia met e pahn ketikiniraildo nan pehtail kan.

22 Kedekedeo nan pahr keisek isuho, nan imwin pahro, ahn Lakonius pakairo ahpw lelohngehr wasa koaros nan sahpwo, oh irail alehier werarail oahs kan, oh weren nan sapwakan, oh neirail pelin kou kan, oh pelin mahn tikitik kan, oh neirail sihp kan, oh arail werentuhke, oh arail dipwisou kan, oh mwekimwekid kohwei nan meh kid kan oh nan meh nen kan, lao irail koaros kohwei wasa me re koasonehdi me re pahn kohpene ie, pwe re en doarehsang irail arail imwintihtih kan.

23 Oh sahpwo me re koasonehdi iei sahpw en Saraemla, oh sahpw me mih nan pwungen sahpw en Saraemla oh sahpw en Sapwenrahk, ei, kohla lel irepen nan pwungen Sapwenrahk oh Sapwentehnla.

24 Oh mie aramas kid kei me kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai kan, me kapokonpene nan sahpw wet. Met Lakonius ahpw wiahda re en kapokonpene nan sahpw me mih palier, pwehki keriah lap me mih nan sahpw en paliepeng.

25 Oh irail sileirailsang arail imwintihtih kan; oh irail mihmi nan sahpwtehiu, oh nan pwihn ehute, oh irail lemwiki mahsen kan me Lakonius mahsanihong irail, kahrehda irail koluhkihla diparail kan; oh irail kin wia arail kapakap ong Kauno arail Koht, pwe en kak doareirailla nan ahnsou me arail imwintihti kan pahn kohdohng irail nan mahwin.

26 Oh irail ahpw pahtoula mehlel pwehki arail imwintihti kan. Oh Kidkidonai ahpw kupwurehda me irail pahn wiahda dipwisou en mahwin koaros, oh re pahn kehlail iangahki tehtehn mahwin, oh iangahki mehn sansar kan, oh mehn sansar tikitik kan, nin duwen sapwellime kaweid.
3-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nein Mehn Nihpai kan sounpei kan kalowehdi Kadienden lipirap kan—Kidianai kamakamala, oh weliepehu, Semnaraia, kalusiamala—Mehn Nihpai kan kepinga Kauno pwehki arail pweida kan. Ele Sounpar 19–22 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni eh kerenlahng imwin pahr eisek waluho, sounpei en pwihn lipirap ko kaunopadahngehr mahwin, oh tepida kohdihdo oh mwadangete kohsang ni aul akan, oh sang pohn nahna kan, oh nan sapwtehno, oh sang nan wasahn arail rukla kehlail kan, oh arail wasahn rukla rir kan, oh tepida sapwankihla sahpw kan, koaros me mih palieir oh me mih paliepeng, oh tepida sapwankihla sahpw kan me Mehn Nihpai kan kohkohlahsang, oh kahnihmw kan me tehnda.

2 Ahpw kilang, sohte mahn lawalo de mahn me re kak kaskihdi nan sahpw kan me Mehn Nihpai kan mweselsangehr, oh sohte mahn me pwihn lipirap kan kak kaskihdi ihte mahn me mih nan sapwtehno.

3 Oh pwihn lipirap ko sohte kak momour ihte ma re mih nan sapwtehno, pwehki anahn en mwonge; pwe Mehn Nihpai kan kohkohlahsang sapwarail kan ni eh tehnda, oh kihpene neirail pelin sihp kan oh neirail pelin kou kan oh arail dipwisou koaros, oh irail miniminpene wiahla pwihn ehu.

4 Eri, sohte ahnsou en pwihn lipirap ko arail pahn kak kulih oh alehdi mwonge, ihte re en kohdo mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan ni sansal; oh pwehki Mehn Nihpai arail wiahla pwihn ehu, oh pwehki arail pokon, oh pwehki arail nekidalahr kenerail mwonge kan oh soahng teikan ong arail anahn kan, oh oahs akan oh pelin kou kan, oh peli mahn tikitik koaros, pwe re en kak momouriki erein sounpar isuh, nan ahnsou me re kasik irail pahn kamwomwala sang pwihn lipirap ko sang nan sahpwo; oh met pahr keisek waluho imwiseklahr.

5 Kedekedeo nan pahr keisek duwao Kidianai diaradahr me e pahn konehng en kohdahla mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan, pwe sohte ehu wiepe me re kak wie momouriki ihte re en kulih oh pirap oh kamaramas.

6 Oh re sohte men kohpeseng nan sahpwo pwe re en kak padokedi oh kakairada werentuhke, pwe Mehn Nihpai kan de pahn kohdohng irail oh kemeirailla; eri Kidianai ruwesehiong nah sounpei kan me nan pahret irail pahn kohdahla mahwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan.

7 Kedekedeo re ahpw kohdahdo mahwin; oh met iei nan keweneu en sounpwung; oh kilang, rahno me irail kohdahdohng mahwin e wia rahn apwal oh kamasepwehk; oh irail likauwih likou en sounpirap kan; oh kilin sihpw me pire likoparail kan, oh re kaweitahtahki nta, oh mongarail kan seiseila, oh irail lisoaropki lisoarop mete; oh mas kamasepwehk oh keper mwomwen nein Kidianai sounpei kan arail pwarada, pwehki mwomwen arail tehtehn mahwin, oh pwehki mwomwen arail kaweitahtahki nta.

8 Kedekedeo nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan, mwurin arail kilangadahr mwomwen nein Kidianai sounpei ko, re ahpw poaridi nan pwehlo, oh ahpw kapakapiong Kauno arail Koht, pwe en kak kamaurirailla oh doarehsang irail nan pehn arail imwintihti kan.

9 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nein Kidianai sounpei kan kilangada met irail tepida weriwer ngihl laud, pwehki arail peren, pwe irail wiaki me Mehn Nihpai kan poaridi pwe irail masak neirail sounpei kan.

10 Ahpw nan irair wet irail nsensuwedla, pwe Mehn Nihpai kan sohte masak irail; ahpw irail masak arail Koht oh peki sapwellime sawas; eri, ahnsou me nein Kidianai sounpei kan tangedohng irail, irail onopadahng pelian irail; ei, sang ni kehl en Kaun irail aleiraildi.

11 Oh mahwino tepida nan kewenou en sounpwungo; oh e wia mahwin lap oh kamasepwehk ehu, ei, kamakamala lap oh kamasepwehk ehu, sang ni ahnsou me Lihai kohkohsang Serusalem saikinte soangen kamakamala lap wet wiawi.

12 Oh mendahte ehn Kidianai kin kamasak oh kahula, kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan kemeirail, lao irail pweieklahsang mwohrail.

13 Kedekedeo Kidkidonai ahpw ndaiong nah sounpei kan re en pwakih irail lao lel ni irepen sapwtehno, oh me re sohte pahn kamaurla emen me pahn lohdi nan pehrail kan mwohrail; oh met re ahpw pwakih irail oh kemeirailla, kohla lel ni irepen sapwtehno, lao irail kapwaiada kosonned en Kidkidonai.

14 Kedekedeo Kidianai, me kesihnen oh pepeiki eh loalap, pwepweki ni eh tang; oh pwehki e pwangada sang ni e pepei laud e kolkoldi oh kamakamala. Oh met kaimwsekala Kidianai lipirapo.

15 Kedekedeo nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan ahpw pwurehng pwurala wasahn pereparail kan. Kedekedeo pahr eisek duwao ahpw imwisekla, oh pwihn lipirap kan sohte pwurehng pwurodo mahwin; de re pil sohte kohdo nan pahr rieiseko.

16 Oh nan pahr rieisek ehuo re sohte kohdo mahwin, ahpw re kohdo pali koaros pwe re en kapildi aramas en Nihpai kan; pwe re medewe ma irail pahn kak kauhdi aramas en Nihpai kan en dehr kohiei nan sapwarail kan, oh katengeiraildi pali koaros, oh ma re pahn kak kauhdisang irail elen pai en liki kan, me pahn kakete kahrehda arail pahn mweidala pein irail ong dahme pwihn lipirap kan mwahuki kan.

17 Met irail pwurehng pilada emen arail kaun, me adaniki Semnaraia; eri Semnaraia me kahrehda irail en wiahda koasondi wet en wiawi.

18 Ahpw kilang, met e wia kamwahupen Mehn Nihpai kan; pwe e apwalehng pwihn lipirap kan re en wiahda arail koasondi ahnsou reirei pwe en kak doadoahk ong Mehn Nihpai kan, pwehki kenarail mwonge tohto me irail nekidala,

19 Oh pwehki sohitar en mwonge rehn pwihn lipirap wet; pwe kilang, sohte arail mehkot ihte Sali me irail kin kangkang, me wia sali me re koledi nan sapwtehno;

20 Kedekedeo mahn me re kin kasikihdi pil apwala nan sapwtehno kahrehda pwihn en pirap wet kereniong re pahn mehkihla mehn mwonge.

21 Oh Mehn Nihpai kan kin usehla arail karihsieila nihpwong oh nihrahn, oh pepeiong neirail sounpei kan, oh kemekemehla kid kei oh nen kei.

22 Oh met nein Semnaria aramas kan ahpw medewehda re en pweieksang arail koasondio, pwehki kamwomwala lap me kin wiawihong irail nihpwong on nihrahn.

23 Kedekedeo Semnaraia ahpw ruwesehiong nah aramas kan re pahn pweieksang arail koasondio, oh karihs kohla nan wasa keieu dohsang aramas nan sahpw en paliepeng.

24 Oh met, pwehki Kidkidonai eh ese arail koasondio, oh pwehki eh wehwehki arail luwetalahr pwe arail anahne mwonge, oh kamakamala laud me wiawihong irail, eri e ahpw kadarala nah sounpei kan ahnsou me nihpwong, oh supukidi wasa re pahn pwurala, oh ahpw kihong nah sounpei kan mwohn wasa re pahn pwurala.

25 Oh met re wia ahnsou me e nihpwong, oh tihengila mwohn pwihn lipirap ko, pwe mandahsang rahno, ahnsou me pwihn lipirap ko pahn tepida kohwei, irail pahn tuhwong nein Mehn Nihpai kan sounpei kan mwohrail oh mwurirail.

26 Oh pwihn lipirap ko me mih paleir pil supukidier wasa re pahn pwurala. Oh mepwukat koaros wiawiher pahn kaweid en Kidkidonai.

27 Oh meh kid kei me mweidehng Mehn Nihpai kan re en salihdi irail, oh me luhwehdi kan kamakamala.

28 Oh arail kauno, Semnaraia, kolkoldi oh kalusiamala pohn tuhkehieu, iei, wasa me ileile nan tuhkehu lao e mehla. Oh mwurin arail kalusiamihla lao e mehla re ahpw karaukehdi tuhkehu nan pwehlo, oh weriwerkihla, ndinda:

29 Kauno e ketin doandoare sapwellime aramas nan mour pwung oh nan mohngiong sarawi, pwe re en kak karaukehdi nan pwehl koaros me pahn song rapahki re en kemeirailla pwehki manaman oh tiahk suwed rir kan, duwehte ohl menet me pwupwidier nan pwehl.

30 Oh re ahpw perenda oh pwurehng werikihla ni ngihl ehute, ndinda: Koht en Eipraam, oh Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, en ketin doarehla aramas pwukat nan mour pwung, ma irail pahn kin eker mwaren arail Kohto ong doareparail.

31 Kedekedeo re ahpw ehupene tepida kokoul, oh kepikepinga Koht pwehki me kesempwal me e ketin wiahiongirailehr, sang ni eh ketin doandoare irail sang pwupwidi nan pehn arail imwintihti kan.

32 Ei, irail weriweriki: Kepinga Koht Wasalapalap. Oh irail weriweriki: Meid pai mwaren Kauno Koht Lapalap, Koht Wasalapalahpie.

33 Oh mohngiongarail kan direkihla peren, kahrehda pilenmesarail kerekerkihdi, pwehki kupwurkalahngan en Koht nan doarehsang irail nan pehn arail imwintihti kan; oh irail ese pwehki arail koluhlao oh karakarahkala me kahrehda arail poadoandoarasang nan kamwomwala poatoapoat.
3-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan koluhla oh moanokehla diparail kan—Mormon ntingihdi poadoapoad en nah aramas kan oh kalohngki mahsen poatoapoat ong irail—Israel pahn kopwurupwurpene sang wasairail salongalaie ahnsou werei. Ele Sounpar 22–26 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kilang, sohte emen aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan me momour me peikasaliki ekis mahsen kan me soukohp sarawi koaros mahsaniher; pwe irail ese me e udahn pahn pweida.

2 Oh irail ese me e udahn pahn konehng me Krais pahn ketido, pwehki kilel tohto kan me pwaradahr, nin duwen mahsen kan en soukohp kan; oh pwehki soahng kan me pweidahr irail wehwehkier me udahn soahng koaros pahn pweida nin duwen dahme mahsendahr.

3 Eri irail monokehla diparail kan, oh arail tiahk suwed kan, oh arail nenek kan, oh ahpw loaloapwoatieng papah Koht nihrahn oh nihpwong.

4 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me re koledier oh saliedi pwihn lipirap ko, kahrehda koaros me sohte kamala sohte emen pitila, irail kesehlong neirail me selidi ko nan imweteng, oh ahpw kehrehd mahsen en Koht en kalohk ong irail; oh koaros me men koluhkihla diparail kan oh wiahda inou me re sohla pahn kamaramas re kin kasaledekla.

5 Ahpw koaros me sohte men wiahda inouo, oh me kin men uhsehlahte kolokol tiahk riri en kamaramas nan mohngiongarail kan, ei, koaros me kin dierekda kamakamasak riarail kan kin pakadeikda oh kalokolok nin duwen kosonnedo.

6 Oh met irail ahpw kauhdi suwed, oh riri, oh tiahk en mour suwed koaros, me kin kahrehda suwedlaud, oh kamaramas tohto wiawi.

7 Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr rieisek riau, oh pil pahr rieisek siluh, oh rieisek pahieuo, oh rieisek limauo; oh met kaimwsekala pahr rieisek limao.

8 Oh soahng tohto wiawiher me, ekei aramas pahn wiahki me, e udahn kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei; ahpw, koaros sohte kak ntingdi nan pwuhk wet; ei, pwuhk wet sohte kak audaukihda pali epwiki en dahme wiawiher rehn aramas tohto nan erein sounpar rieisek limao;

9 Ahpw kilang mie poadoapoad kan me audaudkihda wiewia koaros en aramas pwukat; oh soi mwotomwot ahpw mehlel me Nihpai wiahda.

10 Eri I ntingihda ei poadoapoad en mepwukat nin duwen poadoapoad en Nihpai, me ntingdi pohn pileit kan me adaniki pileit en Nihpai.

11 Oh kilang, I wiahda poadoapoad pohn pileit me I pein wiahda sang pehi kat.

12 Oh kilang, edei Mormon, pwehki edeiet kohsang eden sahpw en Mormon, nan sahpw me Alma wiahda mwomwohdiso rehn aramas akan, ei, tepin mwomwohdiso me wiawihda rehrail mwurin arail dipada.

13 Kilang, ngehi tohnpadahk en Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto. I malipilipda sang ih pwe en kalohngki sapwellime mahsen rehn sapwellime aramas, pwe irail en kak alehdi mour poatoapoat.

14 Oh e pahn konehng me ngehi, nin duwen kupwur en Koht, me kapakap en irail akan me melahr, me wia aramas sarawi kan, pahn pweida nin duwen arail pwoson, pahn wiahda poadoapoad en mepwukat me wiawiher—

15 Ei, poadoapoad tikitik ehu me wiawihda sang ni ahnsou me Lihai mwesel sang Serusalem, lao lel ahnsou wet.

16 Eri I pahn wiahda ei poadoapoad sang soi kan me wiawihda sang irail kan me tiengdohr mwohi, lao lel tepidahn ei ahnsou;

17 Oh ngehi ahpw pahn wiahda poadoapoad en soahng kan me I pein kilangki mesei kat.

18 Oh I ese me poadoapoad kan me I wiahda wia poadoapoad pwung oh mehlel; ahpw mie soahng tohto m, nin duwen aht lokai, se sohte kak ntingihdi.

19 Oh met I pahn uhdi koasoakoasoia duwen pein ngehi, oh doula wiahda soi en soahng kan me mihmi mwohi.

20 Ngehi Mormon, oh I wia udahn kadaudok en Lihai. Mie kahrepen ei pahn kepinga ei Koht oh ei Sounkomour Sises Krais, pwehki eh ketin wahdo atail pahpa ko sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, (oh sohte me ese ihte pein ih oh irail kan me e ketin wahdosang nan sahpwo) oh me e ketikihong ie oh nei aramas kan kamarain laud ong komourpen palingenatail kan.

21 Mehlel e ketin kapaiada peneinei en Seikop, oh ketin kupwuramwahi kadaudok en Sosep kan.

22 Oh ni ahnsou me nein Lihai seri kan kin kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned kan e kin ketin kapaiada irail oh ketikihong irail pai nin duwen sapwellime mahsen.

23 Ei, oh ni mehlel e pahn ketin pwurehng kapwurehdo luhwen kadaudok en Sosep ong marain en Kauno arail Koht.

24 Oh ni mehlel Kauno e ketin ieias, e pahn ketin kapwurepene luhwen kadaudok en Seikop koaros sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah, me mwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah.

25 Oh pwehki e ketin inouwehng peneinei en Seikop koaros, eri inouo me e ketin inoukihongehr peneinei en Seikop udahn pahn pweida nin duwen sapwellime ahnsou, ong kopwurupwurdohn peneinei en Seikop koaros ong marain en inou me e ketin inoukihongehr irail.

26 Oh re ahpw pahn esehda arail Soundoaro, me iei Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto; oh re ahpw pahn kopwurupwurdohng pein sapwarail sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah, sang wasa me irail kohla ie; ei, nin duwen Kauno e ketin ieias e udahn pahn wiawi. Ahmen.
3-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan pweida—Pohnmwahso, kepwehpwe, oh katohrohrpeseng en aramas akan wiawi—Mwomwohdiso pwalpeseng pwehki me pwupwidi kan—Sehdan kahluwa aramas kan nan kapingiping—Soukohp tohto kalohngki koluhla oh kamakamkihla—Me kamaramas kan koasonehdi me re pahn wilianda koapworment. Ele Sounpar 26–27 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr rieisek wenouo aramas en Nihpai kan koaros ahpw pwurehng pwurala nan pein sapwarail kan, ohl koaros, iangahki eh peneinei, nah pelin sihpw oh nah pelin kou kan, nah oahs kan oh nah kou kan, oh soahng koaros me irail ahneki.

2 Kedekedeo irail sohte kangala kenarail mwonge kan koaros me irail nekidala; eri irail wahda koaros me re sohte kangala, soangsoangen kenarail werentuhke koaros, oh neirail kohl, oh neirail silper, oh arail dipwisou kesempwal koaros, oh pwurehng pwurala nan sapwarail oh arail wasa kan, wasa koaros ni paliepeng oh palieir, nan sahpw en paliepeng oh nan sahpw en palier.
