3 Oh irail kihong sahpw kan pwihn lipirap ko me weliakapwala alehda inouo en kolokol popohl nan sahpwo, me inangih re en wiahte Mehn Leimen, nin duwen tohtohn irail, pwe irail en kak ahneki mehkot, sang ni arail doadoahk kan, pwe re en kak kamaurki irail; oh met kaimwsekala popohl en nan sahpwo.

4 Oh irail tepida pwurehng pweida oh kehlailla; oh pahr rieisek wenou oh isuho ahpw imwisekla, oh onepek mwahu nan sahpwo; oh irail wiahda arail kosonned kan nin duwen mour pwung oh pahrek.

5 Oh met sohte mehkot nan sahpwo me kak kauhdi kekeirdahn aramas akan, ihte ma irail pwupwidi nan dihp.

6 Oh met iei Kidkidonai, oh sounkopwung, Lakonius, oh kaun kan koaros me pilipilda, me wiahda popohl lap wet nan sahpwe.

7 Kedekedeo mie kahnihmw tohto me wiawihda, oh mie kahnihmw tohto me pwurehn wiawihda.

8 Oh tohto ahl lap akan kokouda, oh tohto ahl kan me wiawihda, me kohsang ni ehu kahnihmw kohla ni ehu, oh sang ni ehu sahpw kohla ni ehu, oh ehu wasa kohla ehu wasa.

9 Oh met kaimwsekala pahr rieisek waluh, oh aramas kan ahneki popohl kohkohwei.

10 Ahpw kedekedeo nan pahr rieisek duwao pingiping tepida wiawi rehn aramas akan; oh ekei tepida aklapalap oh pohnmwahso pwehki arail kepwehpwehla mehlel, iei, kahrehda ar kin kaloke mehtei kan;

11 Pwe tohto sounnetinet nan sahpwo, oh pil tohto sounsawas en kosonned kan, oh tohto kaun en kosonned kan.

12 Oh aramas akan tepida katohrohrpeseng sang pwihn, nin duwen arail kepwehpwe kan oh arail duwen kaskuhl me re kin alehdi; ei, ekei sohte marain pwehki arail semwehmwe, oh ekei alehdi kaskuhl laud pwehki arail kepwehpwe.

13 Ekei pohnmwahsohla, oh ekei karakarahk mehlel; ekei kin dupuk koasoi suwed kan me kin wiawihong irail, ah ekei kin alehdi alehdi koasoi suwed oh kailok oh soangen kalokolok kan, oh sohte kin pwurehn kapwungehn irail, ahpw karakarahk oh koluhla mwohn Koht.

14 Oh met mie sapahrek laud nan sahpwo pwon, kahrehd mwomwohdiso tepida katohrohrpeseng; ei, kahrehda nan pahr silihseko mwomwohdiso mwerpeseng nan sahpwo pwon ihte ekei Mehn Leimen kan me weliakapwala ong lamalam mehlelo; oh re sohte men kohkohsang, pwehki arail kehlail, oh tengeteng, oh sohte pweiek, inangih nan loaloapwoat koaros en kapwaiada kosonned kan en Kauno.

15 Kahrepen wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat iei met—Sehdan ahneki manaman laud, en kamwakidada aramas kan re wia soangen wiewia suwed koaros, oh kihda arail pohnmwahso, kaskasongosonge irail en rapahki manaman, oh mweimwei, oh kepwehpwe, oh mehkot mwahl akan en sampah.

16 Oh met mwomwen Sehdan eh kakahluwahsang mohngiong en aramas akan re en wia soangsoangen wiewia suwed kan; eri irail ahneki popohl erein sounparte depe.

17 Oh met, nan tepidahn pahr silihseko—aramas akan ahpw mweidirailahr ahnsou reirei pahn kasongosong en tepilo wasa sohte lipilipil me e inangih wairailla, oh wiahiong irail en wiahda dihp me en inangih re en wiahda—oh met nan tepidahn pahr silihsek wet, re mihmi nan irair en mour suwed apwal.

18 Met irail sohte wiahda dihp ni arail sohte wehwehki, pwe irail ese kupwur en Koht ong irail, pwe e kaskuhliong irailehr; eri irail uhwong Koht sang pein nsenarail.

19 Oh met iei nan mwein Lakonius, nein Lakonius pwutak, pwe Lakonius me weliandi eh pahpa oh kaunda aramas kan nan pahro.

20 Oh e ahpw tepda mie ohl kei me alehdi kamarain sang nanleng oh kohwei, keskesihnen nan pwungen aramas akan nan sahpwo, kalkalohngki oh kadkadehdehki ni eimah dip oh wiewia suwed kan en aramas akan, oh kadehdehiong irail duwen kamwakelda me Kauno pahn ketin wiahiong sapwellime aramas, de ni ehu koasoi, iasadahn Krais; oh irail eimah kadehdehki sapwallime pwoulao oh lokolok kan.

21 Met mie aramas tohto me lingeringerda mehlel pwehki irail kan me kadehdehki soang pwukat; oh irail akan me lingeringer iei lapalap kan me wia sounkopwung kan, oh irail akan me wia samworo lapalap kan oh sounsawas en kosonned kan; ei, irail koaros me wia sounsawas en kosonned kan lingeringer pahn irail akan me kadehdehda mepwukat.

22 Met sohte sounsawas en kosonned de sounkopwung de samworo lapalap men me ahneki manaman en kamanahla kamakamalahn aramas ihte ma kepinahn sahpwo pahn sain.

23 Eri met tohto irail akan me kadehdehki soahng kan me pid Krais me kadehdehki ni eimah, me sounkopwung kan koliraildi oh kemeirailla ni rir, eri duwen arail mehlao sohte sansalohng kepinahn sahpwo lao lel mwurin arail mehla.

24 Met kilang, wiewia wet uhwong kosonned en sahpwo, me aramas men pahn kamakamala ihte ma re alehdi manaman sang kepinahn sahpwo—

25 Eri mie repenpwung ehu kohdo nan sahpw en Saraemla, ong kepinahn sahpwo, kadipa sounkopwung kan me kemehla soukohp kan en Kauno, ni ar sohte idawehn koasondi en kosonned.

26 Met kedekedeo irail ahpw kolkoldi oh wisikdohng mwohng sounkopwungo, pwe re en kopwungki dihp me re wiahda, nin duwen kosonned me aramas akan wiahda.

27 Met kedekedeo kompoakepah oh peneinei en sounkopwung kan me tohto; oh me luhweh kan, iei, kereniong koaros sounsawas en kosonned kan oh samworo lapalap kan, ahpw pokonpene, oh utungada peneinei en sounkopwung kan me pahn kopwungki duwen kosonnedo.

28 Oh irail ahpw wiahda inou ehu nanpwungarail, iei, inouo me wiahwihda sang mehn kawa ko, me wia inou me kohdo oh wiawihda sang tepilo, pwe re en ehupene uhwong mour pwung koaros.

29 Eri irail ehupene uhwong aramas en Kauno, oh wiahda inou ehu re en kemeirailla, oh doarehla me dipaniki ar kamaramas sang nan kalokolok en kopwung, me re ahpwtehn pahn wia nin duwen kosonnedo.

30 Oh irail soikala kosonnedo oh pwuhng en arail wehi; oh irail ahpw wiahda inou nan pwungarail me re pahn kemehla kepinahu, oh wiahda nanmwarki nan sahpwo, pwe sahpwo sohla pahn wia sahpw en saledek ahpw pahn mih pahn manaman en nanmwarki kan.
3-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sounkopwung lapalapo kamakamala, koapwormeto ohla, oh aramas akan katohrohrpeseng nan keinek—Seikop, imwintihtien Krais, wiahla nanmwarki en pwihn suwed riro—Nihpai kalohngki koluhla oh pwoson Krais—Tohnleng kan kin kalohkehng ih rahn koaros, oh e kamaurada rie pwutak sang mehla—Tohto me koluhla oh papidaisla. Ele Sounpar 30–33 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Met kilang, I pahn kasalehionguhk me irail sohte wiahda nanmwarki pohn sahpwo; ahpw nan pahrohte, ei, pahr silihseko, irail kawehla sehr en sounkopwungo, ei, irail kemehla sounkopwung lapalap en sahpwo.

2 Oh aramas akan katohrohrpeseng nanpwungarail; oh irail tohrohrpesenge wiahda ehu ehu keinek, emen emen ohl nin duwen eh peneinei oh ah peneinei laud oh kompoakepah kan; oh met irail kawehla koapwormet en sahpwo.

3 Oh ehu ehu keinek pilada arail kaun de me pahn kaunda irail; oh met irail wiahla keinek kan oh kaun kan en keinek kan.

4 Met kilang, ohl koaros tohn eh kisin peneinei me laud oh tohto peinei laud oh kempoakepah; eri arail keinek kan kehlail mehlel.

5 Met soahng pwukat koaros wiawiher, oh saikinte mahwin wiawi nanpwungarail; oh wiewia suwed pwukat koaros wiawihongehr aramas pwukat pwehki arail mweidehng irail pahn manaman en Sehdan.

6 Oh petehkpen koapworment ohla, pwehki pwihn suwed rir en kepoakepah oh peneinei en irail kan me kemehla soukohp kan.

7 Oh irail wiahda pingping laud nan sahpwo, me kahrehda pali laud en aramas me mwahu kan kereniong koaros suwedla; ei, miehte aramas mwahu ahpw nan pwungarail ahpw malaulau.

8 Oh met saikinte lel sounpar wenou ahpw pali laud en aramas akan sohpeisangehr mour pwung, duwehte kidi me kin pwurehng ah mwus, de pwihk duhduwer pwurehng tapwur nan pwelmatak.

9 Met pwihn suwed rir wet, me kahreda wiewia suwed laud rehn aramas kan, ahpw pokonpene nanpwungarail, oh pilada emen ohl arail kaun me re kin ekeriki Seikop;

10 Oh irail ekeriki arail nanmwarki; eri e wiahla nanmwarki en pwihn suwed pwukat; oh e wia emen me keieu en iang uhwong soukohp kan me kadehdehki Sises.

11 Kedekedeo irail sohte dir duwehte keinek kan en aramas akan, me ehupene ihte arail kaun kan me kin koasonehdi arail kosonned kan, emen emen nin duwen eh keinek; ahpw irail imwintihti; mehndahte arail sohte wia aramas pwung, ahpw irail ehupene ni arail kailongki irail kan me wiahda inou en kawehla koapworment.

12 Eri, pwehki Seikop e kilang me arail imwintihti kan tohtohsang irail, pwehki e wia nanmwarki en pwihn wet, e ahpw ruwesehiong nah aramas kan me irail pahn tangala nan sahpw me keieu mih paliepeng, oh wasahu re pahn wiahda arail wehi, lao me pwupwidih kan pahn kin iangirailla, (pwe e pitikinirail me tohto me pahn pwipwidi) oh re ahpw pahn kak kehlaila pwe re en pelian keinek kan en aramas kan; oh irail ahpw wia met.

13 Oh arail tango me mwadang kahreda e sohte kak kauhdi lao irail dohla oh aramas akan sohte kak koledi irail. Oh met kaimwsekala pahr silihseko; oh met iei wiewiahn aramas en Nihpai.

14 Kedekedeo nan pahr silihsek ehuo irail katohrohrpeseng nan keinek kan, emen emen ohl nin duwen eh peneinei tikitik, peneinei laud oh kempoakepah; ahpw irail pwungkipene me irail sohte pahn mahwinpene nanpwungarail; ahpw arail kosonned kan tohrohrpeseng, oh wiepen arail koapworment, pwe e kin wiawihda nin duwen madamadau en arail soumas kan oh arail kaun kan. Ahpw irail wiahda kosonned kehlail me ehu keinek sohte pahn kotelain ong ehu, kahrehda irail kak ahneki popohl nan sahpwo; ahpw, mohngiongarail kan sohpeisangehr Kauno arail Koht, oh irail kostakaihdi soukohpw kan oh kesehieisang irail nan pwungarail.

15 Kedekedeo me Nihpai—pwehki tohnleng kan ar kin pwarohng oh pil kepitien Kauno, eri pwehki e kilangehr tohnleng kan, oh pwehki e pein kilangki mese, oh pwehki manaman kohiengehr ih pwe en kak wehwehki duwen sapwellimen Krais doadoahk en kalohk, oh pwehki e pil pein kilangki mese arail mwadahng en pwurasang mour pwung pwuralahng wiewia suwed oh mour suwed kan;

16 Eri, pwehki e nsensuwedkihla kekeluwak en mohngiongarail kan oh maskun en arail madamadau kan—nan pahrohte e ahpw kohwei nanpwungarail, oh tepida kadehdehki, ni eimah, duwen koluhla oh kamwakel en dihp kan sang pwoson Kauno Sises Krais.

17 Oh e ahpw kalohngkihong irail soahng tohto; oh koaros sohte kak ntingdi, oh ekeite e sohte pahn itar, eri e sohte pahn ntingdi an pwuhk wet. Oh Nihpai ahpw kalohk sang ni manaman oh mweimwei kehlail.

18 Kedekedeo irail ahpw lingeringer pah, iei pwehki e ahneki manaman laudsang irail, pwe apwal irail en kasapwunge ah koasoi kan, pwehki eh pwoson kehlail Kauno Sises Krais tohnleng kan kin kalohkehng ih rahn koaros.

19 Oh sang ni mwaren Sises e kin kausala tepil kan oh ngehn saut kan; oh mehlel e pil kamaurada rie pwutak sang mehla, mwurin eh kostakaidi oh lokolongki mehla sang aramas kan.

20 Oh aramas akan kilangidi, oh kadehdehdi, oh lingeringer pah pwehki ah manaman; oh e ahpw pil wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei tohto, mwohn meseng aramas akan, sang ni mwaren Sises.

21 Kedekedeo pahr silihsek ehuo ahpw imwisekla, oh mie me malaulau me weliakapwehng Kauno; ahpw koaros me weliakapwala kasalehda ni mehlel ong aramas kan me manaman oh Ngehn en Koht lelohng irail, me sang rehn Sises Krais, me irail kamehlele.

22 Oh koaros me tepil kan kohsang irail, oh maiaudahsang nan arail soumwahu kan oh arail kahpwal kan, kasalehda ni mehlel ong aramas akan me Ngehn en Koht sair irail, oh irail kamaiauda; oh irail pil kasalehda kilel kan oh ahpw wia ekei doadoahk kapwuriamwei rehn aramas kan.

23 Met pil kaimwsekala pahr silihsek riauo. Oh Nihpai ahpw kalohk ong aramas akan nan tepin pahr silihsek siluho; oh e kalohngkihong irail koluhla oh kamwakelpen dihp kan.

24 Met I men pil katamankin kumwail, me sohte emen me kin koluhla me sohte kin papidaiskihla pihl.

25 Eri, mie ohl kei me Nihpai kasarawihong nan pwukoa wet, me koaros me pahn kohdo rehrail pahn papidaikihla pihl, oh met en wia mehn kadehde oh kedehde mwohn Koht, oh ong aramas kan, me irail koluhlahr oh alehdi kamwakelpen diparail kan.

26 Oh nan tepin pahr wet mie me tohto me papidaisla sang koluhla; oh met pali laud en pahro imwiseklahr.
3-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Melimel, rerrer en sahpw, kisiniei, elipip, oh kahpwal lauden nan sahpw kan kadehdehda kalohpwualahn Krais—Aramas tohto mehla—Rotorot kipehdi sahpwo erein rahn siluh—Irail me momourte mwahieiki irair en arail mour. Ele Sounpar 33–34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nin duwen aht poadoapoad, oh se ese me aht poadoapoad mehlel, pwe kilang, ohl pwung men me kin nekinekid poadoapoad pwukat—pwe ni mehlel e wia manaman kapwuriamwei tohto ni mwaren Sises; oh sohte emen aramas kak wia manaman kapwuriamwei ni mwaren Sises ma e sohte mwakelekelsang eh wiewia suwed kan—

2 Oh met kedekedeo, ma sohte sapwungala wiawi sang rehn ohl menet nan wadawad en aht ahnsou, pahr silihsek siluh imwiseklahr;

3 Oh aramas akan tepida ngoangki mehlel kilikilang kilel me soukohp Samuel, Mehn Leimen, kohpada, ei, ong ahnsou me e pahn rotorotki erein rahn siluh pohn sahpwo.

4 Oh e tepida mie peikasal oh akamai nan pwungen aramas akan, mehndahte kilel tohto kan me kohieng irailehr.

5 Kedekedeo nan pahr silihsek pahieuo, nan tepin sounpwungo, ni kapahieu en rahn en sounpwungo, kisinieng kehlail ehu wiawihda, me sohte pak ehu wiawi nan sahpwo pwon.

6 Oh pil mie melimel kamasepwehk oh kehlail ehu; oh pos en nansapwe me kamasepwehk, me kahrehda sahpwo pwon rerrer duwehte e pahn pwalpeseng.

7 Oh lioal piripir kehlail mehlel, me sohte pak ehu wiawi nan sahpwo pwon.

8 Oh kahnihmw en Saraemla lulida.

9 Oh kahnihmw en Moronai ahpw kihrla wasa loal en nan sehd, oh towe kan duhla.

10 Oh pwehl rengkidi pohn kahnihmw en Moronaia, oh wasa me kahnihmwo mih ie wiahla nahna lap ehu.

11 Oh kamwomwala kamasepwehk oh kehlail ehu wiawi nan sahpw en palieir.

12 Ahpw kilang, kamwomwala kamasepwehk oh kehlail laud wiawi nan sahpw en paliepeng; pwe kilang, pohn sahpwo pwon wekidekla, pwehki melimel oh elipip kan, oh pos en nansapwe oh piripir en lioal kan, oh mehlel rerrer kehlail en sahpwo pwon;

13 Oh ahl lap kan ohla, ahl patapat kan ohla, oh wasa medendel tohto mwangaingaila.

14 Oh kahnihmw kesempwal oh kehlail tohto pahn suhrla, oh tohto pahn isihsla, oh tohto me pahn rerrer lao ihmw kan mweredi nan pwehl, oh towe kan pahn kamala, oh wasa kan pahn tehnla.

15 Oh ekei kahnihmw kan pahn mihmihte; ahpw ohlao pahn laud mehlel, oh tohto me pahn kamala loale.

16 Oh ekei pahn wisiksang nan elipipo; oh wasa re pahn kohla sohte aramas wehwehki, ihte irail ese me re wisiksang.

17 Oh met pohn sahpwo pwon wekidekla, pwehki kisinieng kehlailo, oh posopos en nansapwe, oh piripir en lioal, oh rerrer en sahpwo.

18 Oh kilang, takai kan pwalpeseng; re pwalpeseng pohn sahpwo pwon, kahrehda e kak dierek me pwalasang, oh me elenpwal oh lipwenpwal, pohn sahpwo pwon.

19 Kedekedeo ahnsou me posopos en nansapwe, oh piripir en lioal kan, oh melimel, oh kisinieng kehlail, oh rerrer en sahpwo uhdi—pwe kilang, e wiawihki erein awa siluh; oh ekei nda me ahnsouo laudsang; ahpw, soahng kamasepwehk oh kehlail pwukat koaros wiawi nan erein awa siluh—oh kilang, mie rotorot ehu pohn sahpwo.

20 Kedekedeo mie rotorot mesul ehu kohda nan sahpwo pwon, kahrehda tohn sahpwo pwon me sohte mehla kak kehn edied en rotoroto;

21 Oh sohte marain kak pwarada, pwehki rotoroto, de pil kandel kan, de pil mehn ser kan; oh sohte kisiniei kak lulikihda arail tuwi meng oh kaselel mehlel, kahrehda sohte marain kak mie nan ahnsouo pwon;

22 Oh sohte marain kak sansal, de kisiniei, de kisin marain, de ketipino, de maram, de usu, pwehki kehlail en rotorot mosulo me kohda nan sahpwo.

23 Kedekedeo e ahpw wiawihki erein rahn siluh me sohte marail kak sansal; oh mie ngileng mwahmwahiei oh wie weriwer oh wie sengiseng nan pwungen aramas akan; ei, ahn aramas akan arail mwahiei me kehlail mehlel, pwehki rotorot oh kamwomwala lap me wiawihong irail.

24 Oh nan ehu wasa irail rong sengiseng, me ndinda: Oh ma kitail koluhla mwohn rahn kamasepwehk oh kehlail wet, oh mwein riatail kan pahn kakete komourla, oh irail sohte pahn isihsla nan kahnihmw en Saraemla.

25 Oh nan ehu wasa irail rong sengiseng oh mwahiei, ndinda: Oh ma kitail koluhla mwohn rahn kamasepwehk oh kehlail wet, oh sohte kemehla oh katehdi soukohp kan, oh keseirailla; eri mwein atail nohno kan oh neitail serepein masamwahu kan, oh neitail seri kan pahn komourla, oh sohte seridi nan kahnihmw lap en Moronaia. Oh met ahn aramas akan arail weriwer me kamasepwehk oh kehlail.
3-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nan rotoroto, kepitien Krais ahpw kalohngki kamwomwalahn aramas akan oh kahnihmw kan pwehki arail wiewia suwed—E pil ketin kalohngki e wia Sapwellimen Koht, ketin pakairki me kosonned en Moseso pweidahr, oh luke aramas koaros en kohdo Reh oh komourla. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo tohn sahpwo pwon ahpw rongada kepitie ieu, ong pohn sahpwo pwon, me mahmahsanih:

2 Meid suwed, meid suwed, meid suwed ong aramas pwukat; meid suwed ong tohn shapwet pwon ma irail sohte pahn koluhla; pwe tepilo wie kokouruhr, oh nah tohnleng kan pereperen, pwehki kamakamalahn pwutak oh serepein masamwahu en nei aramas kan; oh pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan me irail pwupwikihdier!

3 Kilang, kahnihmw en Saraemla kehlailo I isikadahr, oh toweh kan.

4 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Moronai kehlailo I kakihrala wasa loal en nan sehd, oh toweh kan kadula irail.

5 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Moronaia kehlailo I saripidi pahn pwehl, oh toweh kan, pwehn ekihla arail wiewia suwed oh arail tiahk suwed kan sang mwohn meseiet, pwe ntahn soukohp kan oh souleng kan en uhdihsang kohdahdo oh kadipairail rehi.

6 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Kilkal I kakihrala, oh toweh kan seridi wasa loal nan pwehl;

7 Ei, oh kahnihmw en Onaia oh toweh kan, oh kahnihmw en Mokum oh toweh kan, oh kahnihmw en Serusalem oh toweh kan; oh pihl akan I wiahda en kohda, oh pwaindi arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan sang mwohn meseiet, pwe ntahn soukohp kan oh souleng kan pahn uhdisang kohdahdo ohkadipairail rehi.

8 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Kadiandai, oh kahnihmw en Kadiomna, oh kahnihmw en Seikop, oh kahnihmw en Kimkimno, koaros I kakihrala, oh wiahda dohl kan oh wahu kan nan dowarail ko; oh toweh kan I saripidi wasa loal nan pwehl, pwe en ekihla arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan sang mwohn meseiet, pwe ntahn soukohp kan oh souleng kan pahn uhdihsang kohdahdo oh kedipairail rehi.

9 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Seikopokad kehlailo, me aramas en nanmwarki Seikop kin kousoan ie, I wiahda en isihsda pwehki diparail kan oh arail wiewia suwed kan, me keieu suwed sang wiewia suwed kan koaros nan sampah, pwehki arail kamaramas rir oh tiahk en mwersuwed riri kan; pweki irail me kawehla popohl en nei aramas akan oh koapworment en sahpwet; eri I wiahda re en isihsla, oh kamwomwasang mwohn meseiet, pwe intahn soukohp kan oh souleng kan pahn uhdihsang kohdahdo oh kadipairail rehi.

10 Oh kilang, kahnihmw en Leimen, oh kahnihmw en Sohs, oh kahnihmw en Kad, oh kahnihmw en Kiskumen, I wiahda re en isihsla, oh toweh kan, pwehki arail wiewia suwed en kausala soukohp kan, oh kostakaih irail kan me I kadarewei pwe re en kalohngkihong irail duwen arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan.

11 Oh pwehki arail kauseiei irail koaros, me kahrehda sohng me mwahu mih rehrail, I kadaridihdo kisiniei oh kamwomwala irail, pwe arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan en kak ekieksang mwohn meseiet, pwe ntahn soukohp kan oh souleng kan me I kadarewei rehrail en dehr weriwersang nan pwehl on kadipairail.

12 Oh kamwomwala lap tohto me I wiahda en kohdo nan sahpwet, oh rehn aramas pwukat, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan.

13 Oh kumwail koaros me mourla pwehki amwail mour mwahusang irail, kumwail sohte pahn pwurodo rehi, oh koluhkihla dipamwail kan, oh weliakapwala, pwe I en kak kamwahuihkumwailla?

14 Ei, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, ma kumwail pahn kohdo rehi kumwail pahn alehda mour soutuk. Kilang, sang ni kalahngan en limei kat I kapahwehng kumwail, oh mehmen me pahn kohdo, ih me I pahn alehda; oh meid pai irail kan me pahn kohdo rehi.

15 Kilang, Ngehi iei Sises Krais Sapwellimen Kohto. Ngehi me ketin kapikada nanleng oh sampah, oh audaparah kan koaros. I mih rehn Sahmo sangete nintapio. I kin mihmi nan kupwur en Sahmo, oh Sahme kin ketiket rehi; oh Sahmo pahn ketin kalinganahla mwareo pwehki ngehi.

16 I kohdo rehn pein nei aramas, oh pein nei aramas sohte aleiehda. Oh pwuhksarawi kan me koasoia duwen ei pahn kohdo pweidahr.

17 Oh koaros me aleiehda, ong irail I pahn wiahiong irail en wiahla sapwellimen Koht; oh iei me I pahn pil wiahiong irail koaros me pahn kamehlele mwarei, pwe kilang, sang rehi poadoandor pahn kohdo, oh sang rehi kosonned en Moses pweidahr.

18 Ngehi me marain oh mour en sampah. Ngehi me Alpa oh Omeka, tepin oh imwilahn mehkoaros.

19 Oh kumwail pahn uhdisang wia meirong en kakerehdi nta; ei, amwail meirong kan oh amwail meirong isihs kan pahn uhdier, pwe I sohlahr pahn alehda amwail meirong kan oh meirong isihs kan.

20 Oh kumwail pahn meirongkihong ie mohngiong karakarahk oh ngehn peik. Oh mehmen me pahn kohkihdo rehi mohngiong karakarahk oh ngehn peik, ih me I pahn papidaisihki kisiniei oh iangahki Ngehn Sarawi, iei duwehte Mehn Leimen kan, pwehki arail pwoson ie nan ahnsoume irail weliakapwala, re papidaiskihla kisiniei oh iangahki Ngehn Sarawi, oh irail sohte wehwehki.

21 Kilang, I kohdo pohn sampah pwe I en wahdo poadoandoar ong sampah, pwe en kamourala sampah sang dihp.

22 Eri, mehmen me pahn koluhla oh kohdo rehi nin duwen seri men, ih me I pahn alehda, pwe iei arail wehi, wehin Koht. Kilang, pwe irail me I pwilikihdiki ei mour, oh pwurehng alehda; eri koluhla, oh kohdo rehi kumwail koaros me mih ni keimw en sampah, oh komourla.
3-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mie meleilei ieu nan sahpwo erein awah kei—Kepitien Krais inoukihda me e pahn kapokonepene Sapwellime aramas kan duwehte litok men me kin koampwoalepene nah kisin pwurok kan—Pali laud en aramas mwahu kan me mourla. Ele Sounpar 34–35 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kilang, kedekedeo aramas koaros nan sahpwo ahpw rongada mahsenpwukat, oh kadehdehdi. Oh mwurin mahsen pwukat mie meleilei ieu nan sahpwo erein awah kei;

2 Pwehki aramas akan ar pwuriamwei mehlel irail uhdihsang sengisengki oh weriwerki mehlahn arail peneinei kan; eri mie melielei ieu nan sahpwo pwon erein awah kei.

3 Kedekedeo kepitiehu pwurehng peidohng aramas akan, oh aramas koaros ahpw rong, oh kadehdeh, me mahmahsanih:

4 Oh kumwail aramas en kahnihmw kehlail me pwupwidier, me wia kadaudoken Seikop, ei, me wia peneinei en Israel, pak depe me I kin pwoaleikumwailpene duwehte litok men me kin koampwoalepene nah kisin pwurok kan pahn peh kan, oh apwalih kumwail.

5 Oh pil ehu, pak depe me I kin pwoaleikumwailpene duwehte litok men me kin koampwoalepene nah kisin pwurok kan pahn peh kan, ei, Oh kumwail aramas en peneinei en Israel, me pwupwidier; ei, Oh kumwail aramas en peneinei en Israel, kumwail me kin mihmi nan Serusalem, nin duwen amwail pwupwidier; ei, pak depe me I pahn pwoaleikumwailpene duwehte litok men me kin koampwoalepene nah kisin pwurok kan pahn peh kan, oh kumwail sohte mwahuki.

6 Oh kumwail peneinei en Israel me I doarehlahr, pak depe me I pahn pwoaleikumwailpene duwehte litok men me kin koampwoalepene nah kisin pwurok kan pahn peh kan, ma kumwail pahn koluhla oh pwurodo rehi sang nan mohngiong mehlel unsek.

7 Ahpw ma soh, Oh peneinei en Israel, wasahn amwail kousoan kan pahn tehnla lao lel ahnsou me inou en amwail pahpa ko pahn pweida.

8 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin aramas kan ar rongehr mahsen pwukat, kilang, irail tepida pwurehng sengiseng oh weriwer pwehki arail peneinei oh kempoakepahrail kan me mehla.

9 Kedekedeo met kaimwsekalahr kesiluhn rahno. Oh iei nimenseng ehu, oh rotoroto ahpw sohrasang pohn sahpwo, oh sahpwo uhdisang rerrer, oh takai kan uhdisang pwalpeseng, oh mwahiei kelomwo ahpw uhdi, oh ngihl katairong koaros imwisekla.

10 Oh pwehlo pwurehng pwurpene, kahrehde e kehlail; ahn aramas me momour kan arail mwahiei, oh sengiseng, oh weriwer kan uhdi; oh arail mwahiei wekidekiong peren, oh arail lengiseng kan wekidekiong kaping oh kepikepinga Kauno Sises Krais, arail Soundoar.

11 Oh iei met me pweidahn pwuhksarawi kan me soukohp kan kohpadahr.

12 Oh iei pali laud en aramas mwahu kan me mourla, oh iei irail me alehda soukohp kan oh sohte kostakai irail; oh iei irail me sohte kakerehdi ntahn souleng kan, me mour poadoandoarla—

13 Oh irail poadoandoarla oh sohte kakihrla oh seridi pahn pwehl; oh irail sohte kaduhla wasa loal en nan sehd; oh irail sohte isihsla, de pil mehkot pwupwidi pohrail oh idangirailpene; oh irail sohte wisiksang nan elipipo; de lohdi pahn ediniei oh rotorot mosulo.

14 Oh met, mehmen me pahn wadek, en wehwehki; ih me mie nah pwuhksarawi kan, en rapahki loale, oh kadehde oh kilang ma soahngen mehla oh kamwomwala sang kisiniei, oh ediniei, oh sang kisinieng kehlail, oh elipip, oh pwalpeseng en pwehl pwe en aleiraildi, oh mepwukat koaros sou wia pweidahn kokohp kan en soukohp sarawi tohto.

15 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, Ei, tohto me kadehdehki mepwukat ni ketidohn Krais, oh kamakamkihla pwehki arail kadehdehki mepwukat.

16 Ei, soukohp Sihnos kadehdehkier mepwukat, oh pil Sihnok koasoia duwen mepwukat, ahpw mehlel pwehki arail kadehdehki duwen kitail, me wia kisehn kadaudokerail.

17 Kilang, atail pahpa Seikop pil kadehdehki duwen kisehn kadaudoken Sosep. Oh kilang, kitail sou wia kisehn kadaudok en Sosep? Oh mepwukat me kadehdehki duwen kitail, e sou ntingdi nan pileit en prahs me atail pahpa Lihai wahsang nan Serusalem?

18 Kedekedeo ni kerenlahng imwilahn pahr silihsek pahieuo, kilang, I pahn kasalehiong kumwail me aramas en Nihpai kan me mourla, oh pil irail kan me kahdaniki Mehn Leimen kan, me pil mourla, alehdi kupwuramwahu ong irail, oh kapai laud kohieng pohrail, kahrehda mwurinte ketdahlahn Krais nanleng e ahpw ketin pwarohng irail ni mehlel—

19 E ahpw ketin kasalehiong irail kahlape, oh ahpw kalohkehng irail; oh soiepen ah doadoahk en kalohk pahn kohdo mwuhr. Eri ahnsou wet I pahn kaimwsekala ei koasoi kan.
3-ne 11:
Sises Krais ketin kasalehiong aramas en Nihpai kan pein ih, ni ahnsou me pokono kapokonpene nan sahpw en Sapwen Rahk, oh kalohk ong irail; oh ni mwohmw wet me e ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih.

Audaudki iralaud 11 lel 26.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sahmo ketin kadehdehki Sapwellime Iehros Kempoakeo—Krais pwarada oh kalohngki Sapwellime Tomwo—Aramas akan kehn lipwen ohla kan nin lime kan oh alualuwe oh pengepenge—Irail ahpw weriweriki Kepinga Kauno—E ketin kasalehiong irail koasondi oh weipen papidais—Ngehn en akamai sang rehn tepilo—Rongamwahu en Krais iei aramas en kamehlele oh papidaisla oh alehdi Ngehn Sarawi. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo mie pokon lap ehu kohpene, sang aramas en Nihpai kan, me kin mih limwahn tehnpas sarawi me mih nan sahpw en Sapwen Rahk; oh irail wie pwurupwuriamweiki oh medemedewe nan pwungarail, oh wie kasakasalepene nan pwungarail wekidekla lap oh kapwuriamwei me wiawihong wasahu.

2 Oh irail pil wie koasokoasoia duwen Sises Krais menet, me kilel kan kasaledahr sapwellime pwoulao.

3 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me irail wie koasoakoasoipene nanpwungarail, irail rongada ngihl ieu peido sang nanleng; oh irail kilengseli, pwehki irail sohte wehwehki ngihlo me irail rongadahr; oh e sohte wia ngihlen lemei, de pil ngihl laud; ahpw, oh mendahte e wia ngihl tikitik e pwarirail oh sair nan loalerail, kahrehda sohte wasa nan paliwerarail me sohte mwekidkihda; ei, e sair palingenarail ni mehlel, oh kahrehiong mohngiongarail kan karakarkihda.

4 Kedekedeo irail pwurehng rong ngihlo, oh irail sohte wehwehki.

5 Oh kesilipak en ahnsou, irail ahpw rongada ngihlo, oh irail kihpeseng salengarail kan pwe irail en kak rongada; oh masarail kan kilenglahng wasa ngihlo peidohsang; oh irail kilikilengdahla nanleng, wasa me ngihlo kohdosang.

6 Oh kilang, kesilipak en ahnsouo, irail ahpw wehwehkida ngihl me irail rongadao; oh e mahsanihong irail:

7 Kilang nei Pwutak Kempoake, me I kin popohlki, me I kalinganahkihla edei—kumwail rong ih.

8 Kedekedeo, ni ahnsou me irail wehwehkihda irail pwurehng kilengdahla nanleng; oh kilang, irail kilangada Ohl men ketketkohdi sang nanleng; oh e ketin likawih likou pwupw pwetepwet ehu; oh e ketidihdo oh ninlengihda nan pwungarail; oh mesen pokono pwon sohpeilahng, oh sohte emen irail men koasoi, de pil koasoipene nanpwungarail, sohte ese ia wehweh, pwe irail wiahki me tohnleng men me pwarohng irail.

9 Kedekedeo e ahpw kapahwei limeh kan oh mahsanihong aramas kan, ketihtihki:

10 Kilang, Ngehi iei Sises Krais, me soukohp kan kadehdehki pahn ketido sampah.

11 Oh kilang, Ngehi me marain oh mour en sampah; oh I tungoalehr sang nan dahl katiko me Sahmo ketikihong ie, oh kalinganalahr Sahmo nan ei patohwandahr dihp akan en sampah, me I lokolongki kupwuren Sahmo nan soahng koaros sangete nin tapio.

12 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat pokono pwonte pwupwidi nan pwehlo; pwe irail tamanda me e kokohpda rehrail me Krais pahn ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih mwurin e pahn ketdahla nanleng.

13 Kedekedeo Kauno mahseniong irail ketihtihki:

14 Kesihnenda oh kohdo rehi, pwe kumwail en kak doahkehdi pehmwail kan pengepengeiet, oh kumwail en pil kak kehn lipwen mete kan nan pehi kat oh pohn nehi, pwe kumwail en kak ese me Ngehi iei Koht en Israel, oh Koht en sampah pwon, oh kamakamalahr pwehki dihp akan en sampah.

15 Kedekedeo pokono ahpw kohla, oh doahkehki pehrail kan ni pengepengehu, oh kehn lipwen mete kan nin lime kan oh ni alualuwe kan; oh met irail wia, ni arail kohwei wad emen lao irail koaros kohla, oh kilangki mesarail kan oh dehmki pehrail kan, oh ese ni mehlel oh kadehdehki, me iei ih, me soukohp kan ntingihdi duwen ih me pahn ketido.

16 Oh ahnsou me irail koaros kohlahr oh pein kadehdehier, irail ahpw werikihla ni ngihl ehute, ndinda:

17 Kepinga Kauno! Meid pai mwaren Koht Wasalapap! Oh irail poaridi ni alualuwen Sises ko, oh pwongih ih.

18 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihong Nihpai (pwe Nihpai iang mihmi nanpwungen pokono) oh e mahsanihong ih en patohdo.

19 Oh Nihpai kesihnenda oh kohla, oh poaridi mwohn Kauno oh mitik alualuwe kan.

20 Oh Kauno mahsanihong ih en patohda. Oh e kesihnenda oh uhda mwowe.

21 Oh Kauno mahsanihong ih: I kihong uhk manaman pwe ke en papidaisihla aramas pwukat ahnsou me I pahn pwurehng ketidahla nanleng.

22 Oh Kauno ahpw pwurehng malipe ekei, oh mahsanihong irail duwehte; oh e ketikihong irail manaman en papidais. Oh e mahsanihong irail: Ni wiepe wet me kumwail pahn papidais; oh sohte akupwung pahn wiawi nanpwungamwail.

23 Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, me mehmen me pahn koluhkihla dipe kan sang ni amwail kaweid kan, oh inangih en papidaisla ni mwarei, ni wiepe wet me kumwail pahn papidaisihla irail—Kilang, kumwail pahn kohdihla oh kesihnenda nan pihlo, oh ni mwarei me kumwail pahn papidaisihla irail.

24 Oh met kilang, iet mahsen kan me kumwail pahn nda, ni amwail pahn eker adarail, oh ndinda:

25 Sang ni mweimwei me Sises Krais ketikihong ie, I papidaisihukla ni mwaren Sahm, oh Nah, oh Ngehn Sarawi. Ahmen.

26 Oh kumwail ahpw pahn kaduhdi irail nan pihlo, oh pwurehng kapwurehda sang nan pihlo.

27 Oh ih mwomwen koasondi wet me kumwail pahn papidais ni mwarei; pwe kilang, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, me Sahmo, oh Nah, oh Ngehn Sarawi ehu; oh I mih rehn Sahmo, oh Sahm ketiket rehi, oh Sahmo oh ngehi ehu.

28 Oh nin duwen ei mahsanihong kumwail iei me kumwail pahn wia ni amwail pahn papidaiski. Oh e sohte pahn mie akupwung nan pwungamwail, nin duwen me kin wiawiher; oh e sohte pahn mie akupwung nan pwungamwail duwen padahk kan en ei rongamwahu, nin duwen me kin wiahwiher.

29 Pwe mehlel, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, mehmen me kin ahneki ngehn en akamai kaidehn nei, ahpw nein tepilo, me iei pahpahn akamai, oh e kin kamwakidada mohngiong en aramas akan re en lingeringerda, nanpwungarail.

30 Kilang, met kaidehn ei padahk, en kamwakidada mohngiong en aramas en lingeringer, nanpwungarail; ahpw iet ei padahk, soahng wet en uhdihsang wiawi.

31 Kilang, mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, I pahn padahkihong kumwail ei padahk.

32 Oh iet ei padahken, oh iei ih sapwellimen Sahme padahk me e ketikihong ie; oh kadehdehki Sahmo, oh Sahmo kadehdehkin ie, oh Ngehn Sarawi kadehdehki Sahmo oh ngehi; oh I kadehdehki me Sahmo mahsanihong aramas koaros, wasa koaros, en koluhla oh kamehlele ie.

33 Oh mehmen me pahn kamehlele ie, oh papidaisla, e pahn komourla; oh iei irail me pahn sohsohki wehin Koht.

34 Oh mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele ie, oh sohte papidaisla, e pahn lekidekla.

35 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, me iei met ei padahk, oh I kadehdehki me e sang rehn Sahmo; oh mehmen me pahn kamehlele ie pahn pil kamehlele Sahmo; oh Sahmo pahn ketin kadehdehiong ih duwen ngehi, pwe e pahn ketikihong ih kisiniei oh iangahki Ngehn Sarawi.

36 Oh Sahmo pahn ketin kadehdehkin ie, oh Ngehn Sarawi pahn kadehdehkihong ih duwen Sahmo oh ngehi; pwe Sahmo, oh ngehi, oh Ngehn Sarawi ehu.

37 Oh I pwurehng ndaiong kumwail, kumwail koluhla, oh duwehla kisin seri men, oh papidaisla ni mwarei, ma soh kumwail sohte pahn alehdi mepwukat.

38 Oh I pwurehng ndaiong kumwail, kumwail koluhla, oh papidaisla ni mwarei, oh duwehla kisin seri men, ma soh kumwail sohte pahn sohsoki wehin Koht.

39 Mehlel, mehlel, I pwurehng ndaiong kumwail, me iei met ei padahk, oh mehmen me pahn kokouda powe iei e kokouda pohn ei paip, oh kehl en ehl kan sohte pahn kak kalowehdi irail.

40 Oh mehmen me pahn kalohngki laud sang de tikitik sang met, oh koasonehdi me iei ei padahk, aramaso suwed, oh e sohte kokouda pohn ei paip; ahpw e kokouda pohn poahson en pihk, oh kehl en ehl kan ritidahr pwe en alehdi soahng wet ahnsou me lapake pahn kohdo oh kisinieng pahn ipir irail.

41 Eri, kohwei rehn aramas pwukat, oh kalohngki mahsen kan me I koasoiahier, ong wasa koaros nan sampah.
3-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises padahkihong Mehn Nihpai kan Sapwellimen Kauno kapakapo—Irail en koadoahke pai en nanleng—[Sises] ketin mahsanihong tohnpadahk ehkriemeno me re sohte pahn medemedewe anahn en paliwar nan arail doadoahk en kalohk—Karasahiong Madiu 6.[/i]

1 Mehlel, mehlel, I nda me I men kumwail en kin wia amwail wiewia mwahu ong me semwehmwe kan; ahpw [kumwail] kaleke pwe kumwail dehr kin wia amwail wiewia mwahu kan mwohn mesen aramas akan pwe re en kin kilang; pwe ma iei mwomwehn met, kumwail sohte pahn ale ketingpamwail sang rehn Samamwail me ketiket nanleng.

2 Eri, ahnsou me kumwail pahn wia amwail wiewia mwahu kan, kumwail dehr peuk koronihda mwohmwail, duwehte me mwalaun akan ar kin wia nan arail sinokoke kan oh nanial akan, pwe aramas en kin kapinga irail. Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, irail pahn ale ketingparail.

3 Ahpw ahnsou me kumwail pahn kin wia amwail wiewia mwahu kan, kumwail dehr mweidehng pali meing en pehmw en ese dahme pali maun en pehmw pahn wia;

4 Pwe amwail wiewia mwahuo en wiawi ni rir; oh Samamwail me kin mwahngih amwail wiewia rir kan, pein ihr me pahn ketin katingih kumwail ni sansal.

5 Oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn kin kapakap, kumwail dehr alasang me mwalaun kan, pwe irail kin mwahuki uhda oh wia kapakap akan nan sinokoke kan oh nanial akan, pwe aramas koaros en kin kapinga irail. Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, irail pahn ale katingparail.

6 Ahpw kumwail, ahnsou me kumwail pahn kapakap, kumwail pidelong nan amwail pere, oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn ritingedi, kumwail kapakap ong Samamwail me kin ketiket wasa rir; oh Samamwailo, me ketin mwahngi me rir kan, pahn katingih kumwail ni sansal.

7 Ahpw ahnsou me kumwail kapakap, kumwail dehr doadoahngki lokaia mwahl me kin kopwkopwurupwurieng nan amwail kapakap akan, duwehte me rotorot akan kin wia, pwe irail kin lemeleme me arail kapakap kan pahn pasapeng.

8 Ahpw kumwail dehr alasang irail, pwe Samamwailo ketin mwahngih dahme kumwail anahne mwohn amwail peki reh.

9 Eri iei met duwen amwail pahn kin kapakap: Samat me ketiket nanleng, mwaromwi me sarawi.

10 Kupwuromwi en kin wiawi nin sampah duwen eh kin wiawi nanleng.

11 Komw ketin mahngkihong kiht dipat akan, duwen aht kin mahkong koaros me kin wia dihp ong kiht.

12 Oh dehr ketin mweidohng kiht se en kin lelohng nan songosong, ahpw komw ketin nekid kiht sang me suwed kan.

13 Pwe sapwelimahr iei wehio, oh manamano, oh lingano, kokohlahte. Ahmen.

14 Pwe, ma kumwail pahn mahkikihong mehteikan sapwung kan me re wiahiong kumwail, Samamwail me ketiket nanleng pahn pil ketin mahkikihong kumwail dipamwail kan;

15 Ahpw ma kumwail pahn sohte mahkikihong mehteikan ar sapwung kan ong kumwail, eri Samamwailo sohte pahn pil mahkikihong amwail sapwung kan.

16 Kapatahiong, ahnsou me kumwail pahn kin kaisihsol, kumwail dehr alasang me mwalaun kan, me kin seren pahtou, pwe irail kin kawekala mwomwen masarail kan pwe aramas akan en ese me re kaikaisihsol. Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, irail pahn ale ketingparail.

17 Ahpw kumwail, ahnsou me kumwail kaisihsol, kumwail usoarada, oh epwinekda;

18 Pwe en dehr sansal ong aramas akan me kumwail kaisihsol, ahpw ongete Samamwailo, me kin ketiket wasa rir; oh Samamwailo, me kin ketiket wasa rir, pahn katingih kumwail ni sansal.

19 [Kumwail] dehr nekinekidala amwail pai nan sampah, wasa me mer oh loangenmwet kin kauwehla, oh wasa me lipirap akan kin dapengpeseng ihmw kan oh pirap ie;

20 Ahpw [kumwail] nekidala amwail pai nanleng, wasa me mer oh loangenmwet sohte kin kauwehla, oh wasa me aramas lipirap akan sohte kak dapengpeseng ihmw akan oh pirap ie.

21 Pwe wasa me amwail pai kan mih ie, iei pil wasa me mohngiongamwail pahn mih.

22 Pwoaren masamwail kan iei mehn sere paliwaramwail; eri, ma, pwoaren masamwail pahn mwakelekel, paliwaramwail unsek pahn diren marain.

23 Ahpw ma pwoaren masamwail kan pahn suwed, paliwaramwail unsek pahn diren rotorot. Eri, ma marain me mih rehmwail pahn rotorot, ia uwen lap en rotoroto!

24 Sohte aramas men kak papah soumas riemen; pwe e pahn kailongki emen oh poakehng emen, de e pahn koledi emen oh kailongkihla emen. Kumwail sohte kak papah Koht oh pil kepwehn sampah kan.

25 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw ketin kilang ehkriemen me piladahro, oh ndaiong irail: Kumwail tamataman mahsen kan me I koasoiahier. Pwe kilang, kumwail me I piladahr en wia doadoahk en kalohk ong aramas pwukat. Eri I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail dehr medewe amwail mour, dahme kumwail pahn kang, de dahme kumwail nim; de pil ong paliwaremwail, dahme kumwail pahn likauwih. Pwe ia duwe, mour sou kesempwalasang kisin mwenge, oh paliwar sou kesemwpalasang likou?

26 Kumwial kilang menpihr kan en pahnlahng, pwe irail sohte kin padokedi [wahntuhke], re sohte pil kin dolung de nahkpene nan imwen nekinek kan; Ahpw Samamwail nanleng kin ketin kamwenge irail. A ia duwe, kumwail sou kesempwalasang irail?

27 Ihs rehmwail me kak kareireikihla eh mour kisin ahnsou kis pwunupwungodki eh mour?

28 Oh mehnda kumwail pahn pwunodki likou? Kumwail kilang kiopw en nansapw akan ar kin keirda; re sohte kin doadoahk, re sohte kin pein wiahda ar likou;

29 Ahpw I ndaiong kumwail pwe pil Solomon, nan eh kepwehpwe mehlel, sohte mwahn kawatkihda likou kaselel ehu duwehte apwoat irail.

30 Eri, ma Koht me kin ketin kapwatahda dipwen nansapw akan, me kin mie rahn wet, oh mengila lakapw oh lekidekiong nan kisiniei, eri iei e pahn pil kalikawihkumwail, ma kumwail sohte pahn meid pwoson tikitik.

31 Eri kumwail dehr pwunodki, ndinda, Dahme kitail pahn tungoale? de, Dahme kitail pahn nim? de, Iawasa me kitail pahn diar atail likou?

32 Pwe Samamwail nanleng ketin mwahngih duwen amwail anahne mepwukat koaros.

33 Ahpw kumwail rapahki mahs wehin Koht oh sapwellime koasondi pwung kan, oh mepwukat koaros ahpw pahn kohieng kumwail.

34 Eri kumwail dehr kin pwunodki dahme pahn wiawi lakapw; pwe lakapw pahn pwukoahki pein eh pwunod. Kahpwal en rahno itarehr oh kitail sohte anahne pwunodki ekei.
3-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises mahsanih: Dehr kadeik; peki rehn Koht; kalekeikumwailsang soukohp likamw akan—E ketin inoukihda komourla ong irail akan me pahn kapwaiada kupwur en Sahmo—Karasahiong Madiu 7. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat e ahpw pwurehng sohpeila rehn pokono, oh pwurehng mahsaniong irail, ketihtihki: Mehlel, Mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, dehr kadeik mehteikan, pwe kumwail de pakadeikda.

2 Pwe Koht pahn ketin kadeik kumwail nin duwen amwail pahn kadeik mehteikan; oh e pahn ketin sohngkin kumwail mehn sohngohte me kumwail kin sohngki mehteikan.

3 Oh dahme ke kin tehngki diper me mi nan pwoaren mesen riomwen, a ke ahpw sohte kin nsenohki lepin tuhke me mih nan pwoaren mesomwen?

4 De ia duwen omw kak ndahng riomwo: Mweidehng I en kihsang diperen nan pwoaren mesomwen—ahpw kilang, lepin tuhke pwoat mih nan pwoaren mesomwen?

5 Mwalaun ahmwen, kihsang mahs lepin tuhkehn nan pwoaren mesomwen; oh ke ahpw pahn kak kilang mwahu duwen omw pahn kihsang diperen nan pwoaren mesen riomwo.

6 Kumwail dehr kihong kidi kan mehkot me sarawi, kumwail dehr pil kesehdiong mwohn pwihk kan noumwail kisin takai kesempwal akan, pwe irail pahn tiakpeseng, oh sohpeiong kumwail oh tehrkumwailpeseng.

7 Peki, oh kumwail ahpw pahn ale; rapahki, oh kumwail ahpw pahn diar; letelet, oh e ahpw pahn ritidahng kumwail.

8 Pwe koaros me kin peki, re pahn ale; me kin rapahki, re pahn diar; oh me kin letelet, e pahn ritidahng.

9 De mie aramas men rehmwail me kak kihong nah pwutak takai, ma e peki pilawa?

10 De sinek, ma e peki kisin mwomw?

11 Ma kumwail suwed, ahpw kumwail kin ese kihong noumwail seri kan dahme kin mwahuong irail, eri, ia uwen soahng tohto me mwahu me Samamwail me ketiket nanleng pahn ketikihong irail kan me kin patohwan peki reh?

12 Eri, kumwail wiahiong mehteikan me kumwail kin anahne aramas akan en kin wiahiong kumwail, pwe iei met wehwehn kosonnedo oh mahsen en soukohp akan.

13 Kumwail keid nan ewen kehl wetikitiko; pwe elen kolahng nan ehl me tehlap oh mengei, oh aramas tohto kin keid ie;

14 Ahpw wenihmw me kolahng mour me wetikitik, oh malaulau me kin diar.

15 Kumwail kalekeikumwailsang soukohp likamw akan, me kin pwarodohng kumwail ni mwomwen sihpw, a loalarail re udahn rasehng kidien wel kan.

16 Kumwail pahn esehkin irail arail wiewia kan. Pwe dah, mie aramas kin dolungasang wahn wain ni dihpw tekatek, de wahn pik ni tuhke leles?

17 Iei pahn mwomwe, tuhke mwahu kin wah mwahu; a tuhke sakanakan kin wa suwed.

18 Tuhke mwahu sohte kin kak wa suwed, oh tuhke sakanakan sohte kak wa mwahu.

19 Tuhke koaros me sohte kin wa mwahu kin paldi, oh lekdekiong nan kisiniei.

20 Eri, kumwail pahn kin esehki sang ni arail wiewia kan.

21 Kaidehn aramas koaros me kin likwerih ie, ndinda, Maing Kaun, Maing Kaun, pahn pidelong nan wehin nanleng; ahpw irail kan me kin kapwaiada kupwur en Semei me ketiket nanleng.

22 Me tohto pahn ndahng ie ni rahno: Maing Kaun, Maing Kaun, se sou kohpadahr ni mwaromwi, ni mwaromwi se kausekihsangehr tepil kan, oh se wiadahr manaman tohto ni mwaromwi?

23 Oh ngehi ahpw pahn ndahng irail: I sohte mwahn esei kumwail; kohkohweisang ie, kumwail me mouren tiahk suwed kan.

24 Eri, mehmen me kin rong ei padahk pwukat oh king kapwaiada, I pahn karasahiong ih ohl loalokong men, me kauwada imwe pohn paip ehu—

25 Oh ahnsou me e pahn keteuda oh lapakehda, oh kisinieng ipidohng, oh ipihpir ihmwo; oh e sohte pahn pwupwidi, pwehki e kokoudahr pohn paip ehu.

26 Oh mehmen me kin rong ei padahk pwukat oh sohte kin kapwaiada, pahn rasehng ohl pweipwei men me kauwada imwe pohn pihken ni oaroahr—

27 Oh ahnsou me e pahn keteuda oh lapakehda, oh kisinieng ipidohng, oh ipihpir ihmwo; oh e pahn pwupwidi, oh ia pahn uwen ohla wet.
3-ne 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises ketin pakairki me E ketin kapwaiadahr kosonned en Moseso—Mehn Nihpai kan iei ekei sihp me e ketin mahsanih nan Serusalem—Pwehki wiewia suwed, sapwellimen Kauno aramas kan nan Serusalem sohte wehwehki kamweremwerpeseng en sihpw en Israel kan. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin kaimwsekala mahmahsanih mahsen pwukat, e ahpw sakih pokono, oh mahsanihong irail: Kilang, kumwail rongehr soahng kan me I padahkiong kumwail mwohn ei pahn kohdahla rehn Semeio; eri, mehmen me pahn tamataman ei mahsen kat oh kapwaiada, irail me I pahn kihdahla ni imwin rahno.

2 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw ketin kasawiada me mie ekei me wie pwonopwonki, oh medemedewe dahme kupwurke duwen kosonned en Moseso; pwe irail sohte wehwehki mahseneno me soahng kan mehn kawa imwiseklahr, oh mehkoaros wiliakapwalahr.

3 Oh e mahsanihong irail: Kumwail dehr pwonopwonki ei nda me soahng kan mehn kawa imwiseklahr, oh mehkoaros wiliakapwalahr.

4 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me kosonnedo me Moses kihdo pweidahr.

5 Kilang, Ngehi me kihong kosonnedo, oh ngehi me wiada inou ong nei aramas en Israel kan; eri, kosonnedo pweidahr rehi, pwe I kohdohn kapwaiada kosonnedo; eri e imwiseklahr.

6 Kilang, I sohte kawehla mahsen en soukohp kan, pwe koaros me saikinte pweida rehi, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, koaros udahn pahn pweida.

7 Oh pwehki I ndaiong kumwail me soahng kan mehn kawa imwiseklahr, I sohte kawehla soahng kan me kokohpdahr duwen me pahn kohdo.

8 Pwe kilang, inouo me I wiahiong nei aramas kan, koaros saikinte pweida; ahpw kosonnedo me kohieng Moses me imwiseklahr.

9 Kilang, ngehi me kosonnedo, oh maraino. Kumwail koapworopworkin ie, oh dadaur lel imwi, oh kumwail paohn mourla; pwe mehmen me pahn dadaurete lel imwi iei ih me I pahn kihong mour soutuk.

10 Kilang, I kihong kumwail kosonned kan; eri kapwaiada ei kosonned kan. Oh met iei kosonnedo oh mahsen en soukop kan, pwe koaros kin kadehdehkin ie.

11 Oh me kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihong ehkriemeno, me e ketin piladahr:

12 Kumwail iei nei tohnpadahk kan; oh kumwail wia kamarainpen aramas pwukat, me wia kisehn kadaudok en peneinei en Sosep.

13 Oh kilang, sahpw wet iei sapwamwail sapwen sohso; oh Sahmo ketikihong kumwailehr.

14 Oh sohte ahnsou ehu me Sahmo mahsanihong ie me I pahn ndaiong riomwail ko nan Serusalem.

15 Pil sohte ehu ahnsou me Sahmo mahsaniong ie me I en ndaiong irail duwen ekei keinek en peneinei en Israel kan, me Sahmo ketin kahluwasang nan sahpwo.

16 Iet uwen me Sahme mahsanihong ie, me I en ndaiong irail:

17 Pil mie ekei nei sihpw me sohte mih nan kehl wet; I pahn pil wairaildo, oh irail udahn pahn rong ngilei; oh irail pahn wia pwihn en sihp teieu, oh sileparail pahn metehmen.

18 Oh met, pwehki arail keptakai oh soupwoson irail sohte wehwehki ahn koasoi; eri Sahme mahsanihong ie me I solahr pahn koasoiahiong irail soahng wet.

19 Ahpw, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail me Sahmo mahsanihong ie, oh I ndaiong kumwail, me kumwail tohrohrsang irail pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; eri, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan me irail sohte wehwehki duwen kumwail.

20 Oh mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail me mie ekei keinek me Sahmo katohrehsang irail; oh met pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan me irail sohte wehwehki duwen irail.

21 Oh mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, me kumwail iei pwihn me I nda: Mie ekei nei sihpw me sohte mih nan kehl wet; I pahn pil wairaildo, oh irail udahn pahn rong ngilei; oh irail pahn wia pwihn en sihp teieu, oh sileparail pahn metehmen.

22 Oh irail sohte wehwehki, pwe irail medewe me e pahn Mehn Liki kan; pwe irail sohte wehwehki me Mehn Liki kan pahn weliakapwala sang ni arail kalohk.

23 Oh irail sohte wehwehki me I nda irail udahn pahn rong ngilei; oh irail sohte wehwehki me Mehn Liki kan sohte pahn rongedi ngilei—me I sohte pahn kasalehiong irail pein ngehi ihte sang ni Nehng Sarawi.

24 Ahpw kilang, kumwail rongehr ngileiet, oh pil kilangiehier; oh kumwail iei nei sihpw, oh kumwail iang wadawadiong irail akan me Sahmo ketikihong ie.
3-ne 16:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises pahn ketla rehn ekei sihpw en Israel me salongala—Ni imwin rahn akan rongamwahuo pahn kohwei rehn Mehn Liki kan oh ahpw kohwei rehn peneinei en Israel—Sapwellimen Kauno aramas pahn kilangki mesarail kan ahnsou me E pahn ketin kapwurehdo Saion. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail me mie pil ekei nei sihpw, me sohte mih nan sahpwet, de pil nan sahpw en Serusalem, de pil nan sahpw teikan me kapil sahpw me I wiahier doadoahk en kalohk.

2 Pwe irail akan me I koasoia me saikinte rong ngileiet; oh I pil saikinte kasalehiong irail pein ngehi.

3 Ahpw Sahmo ketin mahsanihong ie me I pahn kohla rehrail, oh irail pahn rong ngilei, oh irail pahn iang wadawadiong rehn nei sihpw kan, pwe en mie pwihn en sihp teieu, oh sileparail pahn metehmen; eri I pahn kohla oh kasalehiong irail pein ngehi.

4 Oh I kihong kumwail kosonned me kumwail pahn ntingihdi mahsen pwukat mwurin ei pahn kohkohla, pwe ma nei aramas akan nan Serusalem, me kilangiehier oh ieiang ie nan ei doadoahk en kalohko, sohte pahn peki rehn Sahmo ni edei, pwe irail en kak wehwehkihda duwen kumwail sang Ngehn Sarawio, oh pil duwen keinek teikan me irail sohte wehwehki, pwe mahsen pwukat me kumwail pahn ntingihdi pahn nekinekla oh pahn kasansaliong Mehn Liki kan, pwe sang ni unseklahn Mehn Liki kan, luhwen kadaudokerail kan, me mwerpesengehr pohn sampah pwehki arail soupwoson, pahn kak kopwurupwurdo, de pahn kak kopwurupwurdo ni arail pahn wehwehkiniehda, arail Soundoar.

5 Eri I ahpw pahn kapwureirailpene sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah; eri I ahpw pahn kapwaiada inou me Sahmo ketin inoukihong aramas en peneinei en Israel koaros.

6 Oh meid pai Mehn Liki kan, pwehki arail kamehlele ie, nan oh sang Ngehn Sarawi, me kadehdehiong irail duwen ngehi oh Sahmo.

7 Kilang, Sahmo ketin mahsanih, pwehki arail kamehlele ie, oh pwehki amwail sohte kamehlele ie, kumwail peneinei en Israel, ni imwin rahn akan mehlelo pahn kohdo rehn Mehn Liki kan, pwe unsek en soahng pwukat pahn kasansaliong irail.

8 Ahpw Sahmo ketin mahsanih meid suwediong sohpwoson en Mehn Liki kan—pwe mendahte arail kohdo pohn sahpwet, oh pwakihpeseng nei aramas me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel; oh nei aramas en Israel kan irail kesehieisang rehrail, oh tiahkiraildi pahn nehrail kan;

9 Oh pwehki sapwellimen Sahmo kalahngan kan ong Mehn Liki kan, oh pil sapwellimen Sahmo kopwung ong nei aramas en Israel, mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, me mwurin soahng pwukat koaros, oh I wiahda nei aramas kan me wia kisehn peneinei en Isael kan pahn kamakam, oh kalokolok, oh kamakamala, oh pahn lekidekla sang rehrail, oh re pahn kailongkin irail, oh re pahn kepitikinirail oh kapailokeirail—

10 Oh Sahmo ketin mahsanih me I pahn ndaiong kumwail: Ni ahnsouo me Mehn Liki kan pahn dipikihda ei rongamwahu, oh pahn kasohwe unsek en ei rongamwahu, oh pahn pohnmwahsohda nan mohngiongarail kan pohn wehi koaros, oh pohn aramas koaros nan sampah pwon, oh pahn direkihla soangsoangen likamw, liap, oh mwersuwed koaros, oh soangsoangen mwalaun koaros, oh kamaramas, oh prihskrap, oh nenek, oh wiewia suwed rir kan; oh ma irail pahn wia soahng pwuko koaros, oh pahn kasohwe ei rongamwahu unseko, kilang, Sahme ketin mahsanih, I pahn ketikihsang rehrail ei rongamwahu unseko.

11 Oh I ahpw pahn tamanda ei inou me I wiahiong nei aramas akan, kumwail peneinei en Israel, oh I pahn ketikihong irail ei rongamwahuo.

12 Oh I pahn kasalehiong kumwail, peneinei en Israel, me Mehn Liki kan sohte pahn ahneki manaman pohmwail; ahpw I pahn tamanda ei inou ong kumwailo, peneinei en Israel, oh kumwail pahn wehwehkihda ei rongamwahu unseko.

13 Ahpw Sahmo ketin mahsanih ma Mehn Liki kan pahn koluhla oh pwurodo rehi, kilang, irail pahn iang wadawadiong rehn nei aramas akan, peneinei en Israel.

14 Oh I sohte pahn mweidehng nei aramas, me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel, en kohla rehrail, oh tiakiraildi, Sahmo ketin mahsanih.

15 Ahpw ma irail sohte pahn sohpeido rehi, oh rong ngilei, I pahn mweidehng irail, ei, I pahn mweidehng nei aramas akan, peneinei en Israel, me irail pahn kohwei rehrail, oh pahn tiakiraildi, oh irail pahn duwehte soahl me sohla neme, me pahn solahr katepe, ahpw e pahn lekdekla oh nei aramas en Israel kan pahn tiahkpeseng.

16 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, Sahmo ketin mahsanihong ie—me I pahn kihong aramas pwukat sahpwet en wia arail sohso.

17 Oh mahsen kan en soukohp Aiseia ahpw pahn pweida, me ketihtihki:

18 Sapwellimomwi silepen kahnimwo kan pahn werkihda; ni ngihl ehu irail pahn koul; pwe irail pahn kilangki pein meserail ahnsou me Kauno pahn pwurehng ketikihdo Saion.

19 Ngisingiski amwail peren; kumwail ehupene koul wasa apwal kan en Serusalem; pwe Kauno ketin kaloalamwahwihala sapwellime aramas akan, e ketin doarehla Serusalem.

20 Kauno pahn ketin doadoahngki lime kan nan mesen wehi kan koaros, oh wasa koaros nan sampah pahn kilang komour en Koht.
3-ne 17:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises mahsanihong aramasoko rehn medemedewe Sapwellime mahsen kan oh kapakapki pwe re en wehwehki—E kamwahuiala me soumwahu kan—E ketin loulouki aramas akan, ni eh ketin doadoahnki koasoi me sohte kak ntingdi—Tohnleng kan kapaiada oh seri kan oh kisiniei kapiliraildi. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang, met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin mahsanih mahsen pwukat e ahpw pwurehng ketin kilang pokono, oh ahpw mahsanihiong irail: Kilang, ei ahnsou leledohr.

2 I kasawih me kumwail luwet, me kumwail sohte kak wehwehki ei kosoai kan me I Sahmo ketin mahsanihong I en ndaiong kumwail ahnsou wet.

3 Eri, kumwail pwurowei ihmwamwail kan, oh medemedewe soahng kan me I kosoaia, oh peki rehn Sahmo, ni edei, pwe kumwail en kak wehwehki, oh kaunopada amwail madamadau kan ong lakapw, oh I pahn pwurehng pwurodo rehmwail.

4 Ahpw me I pahn kohla rehn Sahmo, oh pil pwarohng keinek en Israel me salongala kan, pwe irail sohte salongala rehn Sahmo, pwe e ketin mahngih wasa me e ketikihong irail.

5 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsenier, e ahpw pwurehng ketin kilenglahng pokono, oh kilangada me irail wie sengiseng, oh kilikilang ih mehlel duwehte me irail men peki en ekis mihmi werei rehrail.

6 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, loaleiet direkihla limpoak ong kumwail.

7 Mie me soumwahu rehmwail? Kumwail wahdo wasah. Mie rehmwail me nehtuk, de maskun, de sikel, de sohte kak alu, de toktok, de mwoatoar, de salongopon, de me ahneki soahngen kahpwal sohte lipilipil? Kumwail wahdo wasah oh I pahn kamwahuirailla, pwe I poakpoakei kumwail; loaleiet direkihla kalahngan.

8 Pwe I kasawih me kumwail inangih I en kasalehiong kumwail dahme I wiahiong riomwail ko nan Serusalem, pwe I kilang me amwail pwoson itarehng I en kamwahuihkumwailla.

9 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e mahsenier, pokono pwon, ehupene kohla, oh wahla neirail me soumwahu kan oh me ahneki kahpwal, neirail me nehtuk, neirail me maskun, oh neirail me salongopon, oh irail koaros me ahneki kahpwal sohte lipilipil; oh e kamwahuiala emen emen irail ni arail wisikdohng reh.

10 Oh irail koaros, me maiauda kan oh me sohte soumwahu kan, poaridi ni alualuwe kan, oh ahpw pwongih ih; oh koaros me me kak kohdo, pwe pokono pwon mitik alualuwe kan, me kahrehda irail kauseksekehkihla alualuwe kan pilenmesarail kan.

11 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihong irail me re en wahdo neirail kisin seri kan.

12 Eri irail ahpw wahdo neirail kisin seri kan oh kapidakihpene oh koasoneiraildi nan pwehlo, oh Sises ahpw ninlengihda nan werenge; oh pokono keipeseng lao irail koaros wisikdo reh.

13 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail koaros kodohr, oh Sises ninlengihda nan werenge, e mahsanihong pokono me irail en kilipwikihdi pohn pwehlo.

14 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail kilipwikihdi pohn pwehlo, Sises ahpw ketin mekidkihda loale, oh mahsanih: Maing Sahm, I ahneki pahtou pwehki wiewia suwed kan en aramas en peneinei en Israel.

15 Oh ahnsou me e mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e pil iang kilipwikihdi pohn pwehlo; oh kilang e ahpw loulou ong Sahmo, oh soahng kan me e loulouki sohte kak ntingdi, oh pokono me rong ih kadehdehki.

16 Oh ni mwohmw wet me irail kadehdehki: Soahng kan me mesen aramas saikinte kilang, de salengen aramas saikinte rong, pwe soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan me se kilang oh rong Sises mahsanihiong Sahmo;

17 Oh sohte lowe kak koasoia, oh sohte aramas kak ntingihdi, oh sohte mohngiong en aramas men kak medewehda pwe pwe soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan me se kilang oh rong Sises mahsanihiong; oh sohte emen kak medewehda soangen peren me audehla palingenat ahnsou me se rong eh wie louloukin kiht ong Sahmo.

18 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin kaimwsekalahr loulouieng Sahmo, e ahpw ninlengihda; ahpw ia uwen peren lap me kipehdi pokono.

19 Kedekedeo Sises ahpw mahsen ong irail, ohmahsanih re en kesihnenda.

20 Oh irail ahpw kesihnenda sang nan pwehlo, oh e ahpw mahsaniong irail: Meid pai kumwail pwehki amwail pwoson. Oh met kilang, I ahneki peren mehlel.

21 Oh ahnsou me e ketin mahsanih mahsen pwukat, e ahpw tentenihr, oh pokono kadehdehki, oh e ahpw ale neirail kisin seri kan, wad emen, oh kapaiada irail, kapakapkin irail ong Sahmo.

22 Oh ahnsou me e ketin wiaier met e ahpw pwurehng tentenihr;

23 Oh e ahpw mahsan ong pokono, oh mahsanihong irail: Kilang noumwail me tikitik kan.

24 Oh ni arail kilengla pwe re en kilang, irail kilengdahla nanleng, oh irail kilangada nanleng ritpeseng, oh irail kilangada tohnleng kei kokodido sang nanleng duhwehte nan werengen kisiniei; oh re kohdihdo oh kapilpene seri tikitingko, oh irail kisiniei me kapil irail; oh tohnleng kan ahpw kapaiada irail.

25 Oh pokono ahpw kilang oh rong oh kadehdehki; oh irail ese me arail kadehdehka mehlel pwe irail koaros kilangki mesarail oh rongki salengarail, aramas koaros; oh irail aramas meh riekid limepwiki; oh irail wia ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan.
3-ne 18:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises tapiada kamadipw sarawio rehn Mehn Nihpai kan—E ketin mahsanihong irail re en kin kapakap ahnsou koaros ni Mware—Koaros me pahn tungoale uduke oh nim ntah ni ar sohte warohng pahn lekidekla—E ketikihong tohnpadahk kan manaman en kihla Ngehn Sarawi. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Sises mahsanihong sahpwellime tohnpadahngko me re en patohwandohng ekei pilawa oh wain.

2 Oh ahnsou me irail kohlahng wahdo pilawa oh wain, e ahpw mahsanihong pokon re en mwohndi nan pwehlo.

3 Oh ahnsou me tohnpadahngko wahdo pilawa oh wain, e ahpw ale pilawao oh pilitikihpeseng oh kapaiada; e ahpw ketikihong tohnpadahngko oh mahsanihong irail en tungoale.

4 Oh ahnsou me irail tungoalehier oh medkihla, e ahpw mahsanihong irail re en patohwanong pokono.

5 Oh ahnsou me pokono tungoalehier oh medkihla, e ahpw mahsanihong tohnpadahng kan: Kilang emen rehmwail pahn kasarawihla, oh I pahn kihong ih manaman me e pahn kin pilitikihpeseng pilawa oh kapaiada oh kihong tohn ei mwomwohdiso, ong irail koaros me pahn kamehlele oh papidaisla ni mwarei.

6 Oh met kumwail pahn kin wia ahnsou koaros, ni duwen ei wiahier, ni duwen ei pilitikihpeseng pilawa oh kapaiada oh kihong kumwailehr.

7 Oh met kumwail pahn wiahki mehn katamanpen paliwereiet, me I kasalehiong kumwail. Oh e pahn wia mehn kadehdehiong Sahmo me kumwail kin tamatamanie ahnsou koaros. Oh ma kumwail pahn tamataman ie ahnsou koaros, Ngehnio pahn kin ieiang kumwail.

8 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime tohnpadahng kan me irail en ale kepin waino oh tungoale, oh me irail pahn pil kihong pokono pwe irail en kak iang tungoale.

9 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kapwaiada, oh tungoale oh medkihla; oh irail kihong pokono, oh irail pil tungoale, oh irail medkihla.

10 Oh ahnsou me tohnpadahngkan wiahier met, Sises ahpw mahsanihong irail: Meid pai kumwail pwehki dahme kumwail wiahier, pwe met iei pweidahn ei kosonned kan, oh met kadehdehiong Sahmo me kumwail inangih wia dahme I mahsanihong kumwail.

11 Oh met kumwail pahn kalapw wiahiong me kin koluhla oh papidaisla ni mwarei; oh kumwail pahn wia mehn katamanpen ntahi, me I kepwilipwikidier pwehki kumwail, pwe kumwail en kak kadehdehiong Sahmo me kumwail pahn tamataman ie ahnsou koaros. Oh ma kumwail pahn tamataman ie ahnsou koaros, Ngehnio pahn ieiang kumwail.

12 Oh I kihong kumwail kosonned ehu me kumwail pahn wia mepwukat. Oh meid pai kumwail ma kumwail pahn kalapw wia mepwukat, pwe kumwail wie kokouda pohn ei paip.

13 Ahpw mehmen me pahn wia laud sang de tikitiksang met sohte kokouda pohn ei paip, ahpw e kokouda pohn poahson en pihk, oh ahnsou me e pahn keteuda oh lapakehda, oh kisinieng ipidohng, oh ipihpir ihmwo; oh e pahn pwupwidi, oh ewen kehl en ehl pahn onopada aleiraildi.

14 Eri meid pai kumwail ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada ei kosonned akan, me Sahmo mahsanihong ie me I en kihong kumwail.

15 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail pahn kalapw mwasamwasahn oh kapakap, pwe tepilo de kasongosongih kumwail, oh kumwail lohdi oh idawehla ih.

16 Oh ni duwen ei kapakap rehmwail iei me kumwail pahn wia nan ei mwomwohdiso, rehn nei aramas kan me pahn koluhla oh papidaisla ni mwarei. Kilang ngehi me marain; I kasalehiong kumwailehr karasaras ehu.

17 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat ong sapwellime tohnpadangkan, e ahpw pwurehng pirekeklahng pokono oh mahsanihong irail:

18 Kilang, mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail pahn kalapw mwasamwasahn oh kapakap pwe kumwail de lohdi nan kasongosong; pwe Sehdan inangih kalowekumwaildi, pwe en kak sihpih kumwail duwehte wihd.

19 Eri kumwail pahn kalapw kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwarei;

20 Oh soahng koaros me kumwail pahn peki rehn Sahmo ni mwarei, ma e pwung, ni amwail kamehlele me kumwail pahn alehdi, kilang e pahn ketikihong kumwail.

21 Kapakap nan amwail peneinei kan ong Sahmo, ahnsou koaros ni mwarei, pwe amwail pwoud kan oh noumwail seri kan en kapaida.

22 Oh kilang, kumwail pahn kalapw tuhpene; oh kumwail sohte pahn irehdi emen aramas en kohdo rehmwail ahnsou me kumwail pahn tuhpene, ahpw kumwail pahn mweidehng irail en kohdo rehmwail oh sohte irehdi irail;

23 Ahpw kumwail pahn kapakap kin irail, oh pahn sohte kauirailla; oh ma irail pahn kalapw kohdo rehmwail, kumwail pahn kapakapk irail ong Sahmo, ni mwarei.

24 Eri, kumwail kolada amwail marain pwe en kak kamarainih sampah. Kilang ngehi me maraino me kumwail pahn kolada—me kumwail kilangie I kin wia. Kilang kumwail kilangehr ei kapakap ong Sahmo, oh kumwail koaros kadehdehier.

25 Oh kumwail kilangehr me I sohte mahsanihong emen kumwail en kohkohla, ahpw I mahsanihong kumwail en kohdo rehi, pwe kumwail en kak kehn oh kilang; iei me kumwail pahn wiahiong sampah; oh mehmen me pahn kawehla kosonned wet mweidehngehr pein ih nan kasongosong.

26 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw pwurehng pirekekla rehn nah tohnpadahngko me e piladahr, oh mahsanihong irail:

27 Kilang mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, I kihong kumwail ehu kosonned, oh I ahpw pahn kohkohla rehn Sahmo pwe I en kak kapwaiada kosonned teikan me ketikihong ie.

28 Oh met kilang, met iei kosonnedo me I kihong kumwail, me kumwail sohte pahn mweidehng emen tungoale udukei oh ntahi ni arail sohte warohng, ahsou me kumwail pahn patohwanda;

29 Pwe mehmen me pahn tungoale udukei oh nim ntahi sohte warohng, tungoalehier oh nimilahr lekideklahn palingene; eri ma kumwail ese aramas men me sohte warohng en tungoale udukei oh nim ntahi kumwail pahn ireiraildi.

30 Ahpw, kumwail sohte pahn kausirailsang rehmwail, ahpw kumwail pahn sowese ih oh kapakapkihong sahmo, ni mwarei; oh ma e pahn koluhla oh papidaisla ni marei, eri kumwail pahn alehda ih, oh pahn sowesehkiong udukei oh ntahi.

31 Ahpw ma e sohte pahn koluhla, e sohte pahn ian wadawadiong rehn nei aramas akan, pwe e de pahn kawehla nei aramas akan, pwe kilang I ese nei sihp, oh irail wadawadi.

32 Ahpw, kumwail sohte pahn kausirailsang nan amwail sinokoke kan, de amwail wasahn sarawi kan, pwe ong soangen aramas wet kumwail pahn uhsehla sowese; pwe kumwail sohte ese ma re sou pahn pwurodo oh koluhla, oh kohdo rehi nan mohngiong mehlel, oh I pahn kamaiauirailda; oh kumwail me pahn wia elen sowese wairaildohng komourla.

33 Eri, kumwail kapwaiada mahsen pwukat me I mahsanihong kumwail pwe kumwail de lekidekla; pwe meid suwediong ih me Sahmo pahn lakidala.

34 Oh I kihong kumwail kosonned pwukat pwehki akupwung kan me kin mih rehmwail. Oh meid pai kumwail ma kumwail sohte pahn akupwungpene nanpwungamwail.

35 Oh met I pahn kohla rehn Sahmo, pwe e konehng me I pahn kohla rehn Sahmo pwehki kumwail.

36 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises kaimwsekalahr mahmahsanih mahsen pwukat, e doahkehki lime kan tohnpadahk kang me e pilada, emen emen, lao e ketin doahke irail koaros, oh mahseniong emen emen irail ni e ketin doahke irail.

37 Oh pokono sohte rong mahsen kan me e mahsenih, eri irail sohte kadehdehki; ahpw tohnpadahngko kadehdehki me e ketikihong irail manaman en kihla Ngehn Sarawi. Oh I pahn kasalehiong kumwail mwurin met me kadehdeh wet mehlel.

38 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises doahke irail koaros, depwek ehu pa koh oh kipehdi pokono kahrehda irail sohte kak kilang Sises.

39 Oh ahnsou depweko kihpehdi irail, e ahpw ketilahsang irail, oh ketdahla nanleng. Oh tohnpadahko kilang oh ahpw kadehdehki me e pwurehng ketidahla nanleng.
3-ne 19:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Tohnpadahk ehkriemeno papah aramas oko oh kapakapki Ngehn Sarawi—Tohnpadahko papidaisla oh alehdi Ngehn Sarawio oh doadoahk en tohnleng kan—Sises loulouki mahsen me sohte kak ntingdi—E ketin kadehdehki pwoson kehlail mehlel en Mehn Nihpai pwukat. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketidalahr nanleng, pokono ahpw pwurpeseng, oh emen emen ohl ahpw kahrehda eh pwoud oh nah seri kan oh pwuralahng pein nimwarail.

2 Oh mwohn e soutipene, aramas akan ahpw madangete pakairkiseli me pokono kilangadahr Sises, oh me e ketin papah oh kalohkehng irail, oh lakapw e pahn pwurehng pwaredohng pokono.

3 Ei, oh pwohngo pwon re ahpw pakapakairkiseli duwen Sises; oh irail kadarewei rehn aramas akan kahrehda tohto aramas, ei, tohto mehlel, me doadoahk laud pwohngo, pwe lakapw irail en kak kohdo wasa me Sises ketin kasalehiong pein ih pokono.

4 Kedekedeo mandahn rahno, ahnsou me pokono kapokonpenehr, kilang, Nihpai oh rie ohl me e kamourda sang mehla, me adaniki Dimodi, oh pil nah pwutak, me adaniki Sonas, oh pil Madonai, oh Madonaia, rie ohl, oh Kumen, oh Kumenonai, oh Seremaia, oh Semnon, oh Sonas, oh Sedekaia, oh Aiseia—met iei eden irail tohnpadahk kan me Sises ketin piladahr—kedekedeo irail ahpw kohwei oh kesihnenda nan werengen pokono.

5 Oh kilang, uwen pokono eh laud mehlel irail wiahda re en katohrohrpeseng wiahda pwihn eisek riau.

6 Oh ehkrimeno ahpw padahkih pokono; oh kilang, irail ahpw wiahda me pokono pahn kelipwikidi pohn pwehlo, oh pahn kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Sises.

7 Oh tohnpadahk kan ahpw pil kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Sises. Kedekedeo irail ahpw kesihnenda oh kalohkehng aramas akan.

8 Oh ahnsou me irail kalohngkihongehr irail mahsenko me Sises ketin mahsanih—ni arail sohte wekidala ehute mahsen me Sises mahsanih—kilang, irail kelipwikihdi oh kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Sises.

9 Oh irail kapakapki dahme irail keieu inangih; oh Ngehn Sarawi me irail inangih pahn kohieng irail.

10 Oh ahnsou me irail nek kapakap, irail ahpw kohdihla ni keilen pihlo, oh pokono idawehn irailla.

11 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw kohdihla nan pihlo oh ahpw papidaisla.

12 Oh e kohdahsang nan pihlo oh tepida papidais. Oh e papidaisla koaros me Sises ketin pilada ko.

13 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail koaros papidaisla oh doudahsang nan pihlo, Ngehn Sarawi ahpw ketdohng pohrail, oh irail direkihla Ngehn Sarawi oh iangahki kisiniei.

14 Oh kilang, e mwomwen me kisiniei me kapilirailpene; oh e kohdihdo sang nanleng, oh pokono kilangidi, oh ahpw kadehdehki; oh tohnleng kan ahpw kohdido sang nanleng oh papah irail.

15 Kedekedeo ahnsou me tohnleng kan wie papah tohnpadahk kan, kilang, Sises ahpw ketido oh ninlengihda nanpwungarail oh papah irail.

16 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsaniong pokono, oh mahsanih me irail en pwurehng kelipwikidi pohn pwehlo, oh pil nah tohnpadahngko en pil kelipwikidi pohn pwehlo.

17 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail koaros kelipwikihdi pohn pwehlo, e ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime tohnpadahngko me irail pahn kapakap.

18 Oh kilang, irail tepida kapakap; oh irail kapakap ong Sises, ekeekeriki arail Kaun oh arail Koht.

19 Kedekedeo Sises ahpw ketlahsang nanpwungarail, oh ketla ekis ekis keilahsang irail oh poaridi pohn pwehlo, oh mahsanih:

20 Maing Sahm, I kapingkihong komwi pwehki omwi ketikihong Ngehn Sarawi irail akan me I piladahr; oh pwehki arail kamehlele ie me I pilkinirailda sang nan sampah.

21 Maing Sahm, I peki rehmwi me komwi en ketikihong Ngehn Sarawi rehn irail koaros me kamehlele ei mahsen akan.

22 Maing Sahm, komw ketikihong irailehr Ngehn Sarawio pwehki arail kamehlele ie; oh komw mahsaniher me irail kamehlele ie pwehki omwi karonge irailehr, oh irail kapakap ong ie; oh irail kapakap ong ie pwehki ei ieiang irail.

23 Oh met maing Sahm, I kapakap ong komwi pwehki irail, oh pil irail koaros me pahn kamehlele arail mahsen kan, pwe irail en kak kamehlele ie, pwe I en kak mih rehrail duwehte komwi, maing Sahm, omwi kin ketiket rehi, pwe kitail en kak ehu.

24 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises kasakasiongehr Sahmo, e ahpw sapahldo rehn sapwellime tohnpadahngko, oh kilang, irail doudoulahte, sohte uhdisang kapakap ong ih; oh irail sohte doadoahngki mahsen tohto, pwe e kohieng irail dahme re pahn kapakapki, oh irail ianangih mehlel.

25 Kedekedeo Sises ahpw kapaiada irail ni arail wie kapakap ong ih; oh sihlangi ahpw poloalkin irail, oh marain en sihlangi kamarainirailda, oh kilang irail pil pwetepwetala duwehte sihlangi oh pil ehn Sises likouo; oh kilang pwetepwetiho daulihala pwetepwet koaros, iei, sohte mehkot pohn sampah me pwetepwet duwehte pwetepweti.

26 Oh Sises mahsanihong irail: Kumwail kapakap; oh irail sohte uhdihsang kapakap.

27 Oh e ahpw pwurehng ketin sohpeisang irail, oh ekis ketilahsang wasao oh poaridi nan pwehlo; oh e ahpw pwurehng kasakasiong Sahmo, mahmahsanih:

28 Maing Sahm, I kapingkihong komwi pwehki omwi kamwakehlehda irail akan me I piladahr, pwehki arail pwoson, oh I kapakapkin irail, oh pil irail akan me pahn kamehlele arail mahsen kan, pwe irail en kak mwakelekelda rehi, sang ar pahn pwoson arail mahsen kan, iei duwehte arail mwakelekel rehi.

29 Maing Sahm, I sohte kapakapki sampah, ahpw irail akan me komw ketikihong ie sang nan sampah, pwehki arail pwoson, pwe irail en kak mwakelekelda rehi, pwe I en kak mih rehrail duwehte komwi, maing Sahm, omwi ketiket rehi, pwe kitail en kak ehu, pwe I en kak linganla rehrail.

30 Oh ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat e ahpw pwurehng sapahldo rehn sapwellime tohnpadahngko; oh kilang, irail poadidiong wie kapakapiong ih, oh sohte uhdihsang; oh sihlangi ahpw pwurehng poloulkin irail; oh kilang, irail pwetepwetala iei duwehte Sises.

31 Kedekedeo e ahpw pwurehng ekis ketilahsang wasao oh kasakasiong Sahmo;

32 Oh sohte lowe me kak koasoia mahsen kan me e ketin kasakaski, oh pil sohte aramas me kak ntingihdi mahsen kan me e kasakaski.

33 Oh pokono rongidi oh kadehdehki; oh mohngiongarail kan ritida oh irail ahpw wehwehki nan mohngiongarail kan mahsen kan me e kasakaski.

34 Ahpw, mahsen kan me e ketin kasakaski kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei me kahrehda irail sohte kak ntingdi, de pil aramas sohte kak koasoia.

35 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises kaimwsekala kasakaso, e ahpw pwureng sapahldohng tohnpadahngko, oh mahsanihong irail: I sohte kin kilang pwoson laud rehn Mehn Suhs kan koaros; eri I sohte kak kasalehiong irail manaman kapwuriamwei kan, pwehki arail sohpwoson.

36 Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, sohte emen rehrail me kilangidi soahng kesempwal duwehte me kumwail kilangehr; de pil rongehr soang kesempwal me kumwail rongehr.
3-ne 20:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises ketikihda pilawa oh wain ni manaman kapwuriamwei oh pwurehng wia kamadipw sarawio rehn aramas akan—Luhwen kisehn Seikop kan pahn wehwehkihda Kauno arail Koht oh sohsohki Amerika—Sapwellimen Sises aramas pahn kopwurupwurpene nan Serusalem. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihong pokono me irail pahn uhdihsang kapakap, oh pil sapwellime tohnpadahngko. Oh e mahsanihong irail me irail sohte pahn uhdisang kapakap nan mohngiongarail kan.

2 Oh e mahsanihong irail me irail pahn uhda oh kesihnenda. Oh irail ahpw uhda oh kesihnenda.

3 Kedekedeo e ahpw pwurehng pilitikihpeseng pilawa oh kapaiada, oh ketikihong tohnpadahngko re en tungoale.

4 Oh ahnsou me irail tungoalehier, e ahpw mahsanihong irail me irail pahn pilitikihpeseng pilawa, oh kihong pokono.

5 Oh ahnsou me irail kihongehr pokono, e ahpw pil ketikihong irail wain pwe re en nim, oh mahsanihong irail en kihong pokono.

6 Met, tohnpadahngko oh pil pokono sohte wahdo pilawa, de pil wain;

7 Ahpw ni mehlel e ketikihong irail pilawa pwe re en tungoale, oh pil wain pwe re en nim.

8 Oh e mahsanihong irail: Mehmen me pahn tungoale pilawa wet tungoalehier udukei ong palingeni; oh mehmen me pahn nim wain wet nimalahr ntahi ong palingeni; oh palingeni sohte pahn pwurehng men mwongehda de men nimpilda, ahpw pahn dindir.

9 Met, ahnsou me pokono pwon tungoalehr oh nimpilehr, kilang, irail direkihla Ngehno; oh irail wiahkintehieu werikihla, oh kapinga Sises, me irail kilang oh rong.

10 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail pwon kepingahier Sises, e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang met I pahn kaunsekehla kosonned me Sahmo mahsanihong ie duwen aramas pwukat, me wia kisehn luhwen peneinei en Israel.

11 Kumwail tamataman me I lokaiahng kumwail, oh ndaiong kumwail me ahnsou me mahsen en Aiseia pahn pweida—kilang e ntingdier, kumwail kolokol mwohmwail, eri kumwail rapahki loale—

12 Oh mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, me ahnsou me e pahn pweida eri inouo pahn pweida me Sahmo ketin inoukihong sapwellime aramas, kumwail peneinei en Israel.

13 Oh kisehn luhwe kan, me pahn mwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah, ahpw pahn kopwurupwurpene sang palimese oh sang palikapi, oh sang palieir oh sang paliepeng; oh irail pahn kohdo wehwehkihda Kauno arail Koht, me pahn doareirailla.

14 Oh Sahmo ketin mahsanihong ie me I pahn kihong kumwail sahpwet, pwe en wia amwail sohso.

15 Oh I ndaiong kumwail, ma Mehn Liki kan sohte pahn koluhla mwurin arail alehdi kapai, mwurin arail kamwerepeseng nei aramas akan—

16 Eri kumwail me wia kisehn peneinei en Seikop pahn kohwei rehrail; oh kumwail pahn mih nanwerengarail me pahn tohto; oh kumwail pahn mih nanpwungarail duwehte laion men nan pwungen mahn en nanwel kan, oh duwehte laion pwulopwul men nan pwungen pelin sihpw, me, ma e pahn kohwei e pahn tiakiraildi oh tehrirailpeseng, oh sohte me kak doarehla.

17 Pehmwail kan pahn kohdahng pohn amwail imwintihti kan, oh amwail imwintihti koaros pahn kamala.

18 Oh I pahn kihpene nei aramas akan duwehte aramas men me kin kihpene kapakap en werentuhke kan pohn tato.

19 Pwe I pahn wiahiong nei aramas, me Sahmo ketin inouiong, ei, I pahn wiahong irail kode mete oh I pahn wiahiong neh prahs. Oh kumwail pahn kawehla aramas tohto; oh I pahn kasarawihla arail pai kan ong Kauno, oh arail dipwisou kan ong Kaun en sampah pwon. Oh kilang, ngehi me pahn ketin wia met.

20 Oh e pahn wiawi, Sahmo ketin mahsanih, me kedlahs en ei pwung pahn tenekda pohrail ni rahno; oh ma irail sohte pahn koluhla, e pahn pwupwidi pohrail, Sahmo ketin mahsanih, iei, pohn wehin Mehn Liki kan koaros.

21 Oh e pahn wiawi me I pahn koasonehdi nei aramas, kumwail peneinei en Israel.

22 Oh kilang, aramas pwukat me I pahn koasonehdi nan sahpwet, pwe kapwaiada inouo me I inoukihong samamwail Seikop; oh e pahn wia Serusalem Kapw. Oh manaman en nanleng pahn mih nanpwungen aramas pwukat; iei, I pahn mih nan pwungamwail.

23 Kilang, ngehi iei me Moses koasoia, ndinda: Soukohp men Kauno amwail Koht pahn apwaliada ong riomwail akan, me pahn duwehte ngehi; ih me kumwail pahn rong nan mehkoaros me e pahn mahsanihong kumwail. Oh e pahn wiawi me aramas koaros me sohte pahn rong soukohpo pahn lekideksang rehn aramas akan.

24 Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, ei, oh soukohp kan koaros sangete Samuel oh koaros me kohdo mwuri, koaros me wiaier kokohp, kadehdehkin ie.

25 Oh kilang, kumwail iei seri en soukohp oko; oh kumwail iei peneinei en Israel; oh kumwail iei kisehn inouo me Sahmo ketin inoukihong samamwail ko, mahsanihong Eipraam: Oh sang kadaudokomw kan peneinei en sampah pwon pahn kapaikihda.

26 Sahmo ketin apwaliehda ong kumwail mahs, oh ketin kadariehdohng kumwail pwe I en wekidkumwailsang amwail wiewia suwed kan; oh met pwehki amwail wia serihn inouo—

27 Oh mwurin amwail pahn kapaida, sapwellimen Sahmo inouo ahpw pahn pweida me e ketin inoukihong Eipraam, mahsanih: Sang kadaudokomw kan peneinei en sampah pwon pahn kapaikihda—sang ni ei pahn ketikihong Mehn Liki kan Ngehn Sarawio, me pahn wia kapai me elehiong Mehn Liki kan en kehlailsang koaros, kahrehda kamweremwerpeseng en nei aramas akan, kumwail peneinei en Israel.

28 Oh irail pahn wia kalokepen aramas en pohn sahpwet. Ahpw, ahnsou me irail pahn alehdi ei rongamwahu unseko, irail ahpw keptakaiala mohngongarail akan ong ie, I pahn kapwurehiong pohrail diparail kan, Sahme ketin mahsanih.

29 Oh I pahn tamanda inouo me I wiahiongehr nei aramas akan; oh I inoukihong irail me I pahn kapwureirailpene ni ahnsou me I pahn koasonehdi, me I pahn pwurehng kapwurehiong irail sapwen arail pahpa pwe irail en sohsohki, me iei sahpw en Serusalem, me iei sapwen inou ong irail kohkohlahte, Sahmo ketin mahsanih.

30 Kedekedeo ahnsou ahpw pahn lelledo, ahnsou me unsek en ei rongamwahu pahn kalohk ong irail;

31 Oh irail pahn kamehlele ie, me ngehi iei Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, oh pahn kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwarei.

32 Eri neirail silepen kahnihmwo kan pahn werkihda, oh ni ngihl ehu irail pahn koul; pwe irail pahn kilangki pein meserail.

33 Eri Sahmo ahpw pahn pwurehng kapwureirailpene, oh ketikihong irail Serusalem pwe en wia sapwarail sahpw en sohso.

34 Irail ahpw pahn ngisingiski arail peren—kumwail ehupene koul, kumwail wasa me apwal kan en Serusalem; pwe Sahmo ketin kaloalamwahwihala sapwellime aramas akan, e ketin doarehla Serusalem.

35 Sahmo pahn ketin doadoahnki lime kan nan mesen wehi kan koaros, oh wasa koaros nan sampah pahn kilang komour en Sahmo; oh Sahmo oh ngehi ehute.

36 Oh e ahpw pahn pweida dahme ntingdiero: Saion, pirida, pwourda oh kehlailada; pwurieng nan ahmw likou kaselel kan, kowe Serusalem, kahnimw sarawi, pwe sang met kohla me samin kan solahr pahn pidolong nan omw kahnimw.

37 Serusalem, sipedasang rehmw pwelipar akan; kesihnenda, mwohndieng nan dewemwen; sapwadasang sahl me pire tepinweremwen, kowe serepein lohdi en Saion.

38 Pwe Kauno ketin mahsanih: kumwail netikinkumwailahr ni sohte mehkoht, oh kumwail pahn sohte pahn pweipweikihda mwohni.

39 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, me nei aramas akan pahn ese mwareiet; ei, ni rahno irail pahn ese me ngehi iei ih me mahmahsen.

40 Oh re ahpw pahn nda: Meid lingan oh kaselel pohn nahna kan en paten nehn ih me pahn wahdo rongamwahu ong irail, me kin kalakalohngki popohl; me kin wahdo rongamwahu ong me mwahu, me kin kalohk ki duwen komourla; oh ndaiong Saion: Omwi Koht me ketin kakaun!

41 Oh ngihl ehu ahpw pahn mahsanih: Kumwail mweselda, kumwail mweselda kohkohwei sang met, dehr doahke mehkot me keinapwi kan; kumwail pidohi sang reh; kumwail me kin kolokol sapwellimen Kauno manaman.

42 Pwe kumwail sohte pahn kohwei ni karuaru de sopohla; pwe Kauno pahn ketin tihengwei mwohmwail, oh Koht en Israel pahn sinsile mwurumwail.

43 Kilang, ei laduwo pahn wia doadoahk mwahu; e pahn lapalapala oh pahn waunla kowahlahpie.

44 Aramas tohtohie pwuriamweikihla ar kilangkomwihda—mwomwehu inenen wekila mehlel, lingansang mwomwen aramas koaros, oh wekilahn paliwarehu lingansang aramas koaros—

45 Eri e pahn kamwakelehda wehi tohto; nanmwarki kan pahn pwuriamweikihla uhdiahl ih, nan are pwuriamwei, re sohla pahn kak mahsen, pwe re pahn mahsanihada oh mwahngihada mehkot me re sohte kin karonge oh mwahngih sang mahs kohdo.
