46 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, mepwukat koaros udahn pahn pweida, iei duwen me Sahmo ketin mahsanih ong ie. Eri inouo me Sahmo ketin inoukihong aramwa pwukat ahpw pahn pweida; oh nei aramas akan ahpw pahn pwurehng kousoanla nan Serusalem, oh e pahn wia sapwarail sahpw en sohso.
3-ne 22:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ni imwin rahn akan, Saion oh eh kisin lepin tuhkehn kateng kan pahn wiahwihda, oh Israel pahn kopwurupwurpene sang ni kalahngan oh keneinei—Irail pahn pweida—Karasahiong Aiseia 54. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh dahme ntingdiero ahpw pahn pweida: Koul, komwi me sohte kak nainiki seri; ahpw met, ke kakehr koul oh ngisingiski omw peren, komwi me sohte lokolongki medek en neitik; pwe met ke rasohng lih tehnla me pahn naineki seri tohtohsang lih pwopwoud, Kauno ketin mahsanih.

2 Kalaudehla imwomwi impwal me ke kin kousoan loale, oh mweidehng irail en kadangpeseng omwi kahdeng kan; kareireila selipe kan oh katengehdi kisin lepin tuhkehn kitenge kan;

3 Pwe ke pahn kalaudehla irepen sapwomw ni pali koaros, oh noumw aramas akan pahn sapwanikihla sahpw en Mehn Liki kan oh kadirehla kahnihmw kan me sohte towe.

4 Dehr masak, pwe ke solahr pahn sarohdi; de pil ohla, pwe ke solahr pahn namenekla; pwe ke pahn manokehla kanamenek en ni omwi pwulopwulo, oh pahn sohla taman namenek en ni omw pwulopwulo oh pahn sohla taman namenek en omw wia liohdi men.

5 Pwe ih me ketin kapikuhkada pahn rasehng omw pwoud, mware, iei Kauno Wasa Lapalahpie; oh e pahn kahdaniki omwi Soundoar, Me Sarawi en Israelo—iei ih Koht en sampah pwon.

6 Pwe Kauno ketin karasahionguhk lih pwopwoud men, me eh pwoud keselahr, oh kin wie pahpahtou, oh lih pwopwoud pwulopwul men ni ahnsou me ke likideklahr, omwi Koht me ketin mahsanih.

7 Pwe erein ahnsoutehkis me I manokeiukalahr, ahpw ni ei kupwurkalahng lapalahpie I pahn kapwureiukodo.

8 Ahnsou kis I sohpeisang uhk ni ei engieng, ahpw I pahn kasalehiong uhk ei kadek poatoapoat sang ni ei pahn kupwureiukala, Kauno omwi Soundoar me ketin mahsanih.

9 Pwe met [pahn duwehte], ni mwehin Noha, I kahukilahr oh inoukidahr me I solahr pahn kauwehkihla sampah nohlik lapalap, eri, I pil inoukihda met me I solahr pahn pwurehng engieng pahmw;

10 Pwe nahna kan oh dohl akan katete re en mwerpeseng, ahpw ei kadek limpoak ong uhksohte ka ke en sohrala, pil duwehte ei inoun popohl sohte pahn sohrala, Kauno me ketin kupwureiuk me mahsanih.

11 Oh kowe me kin lokolok, sohte sawasepe, oh sohte koaloalamwahula! Kilang, I pahn onekihda sapahl poahsoan kan en omwi kahnihmw takai kesempwal.

12 Oh I pahn kaukihda omw wasahn iroir kan takai weitahta kesempwal me ede rupi, kehl kan me kapiluhkpene koaros pahn kokoukihda takai kesempwal akan.

13 Oh Kauno me pahn padahkih noumw seri kan koaros; oh arail popohl pahn mwahu mehlel.

14 Ke pahn soahndi nan mour pwung; ke pahn silasil mwahu sang pahn kehnaudek pwe ke sohte pahn masak, oh silasil sang me kamasepwehk pwe e sohte pahn karaniuk.

15 Kilang, irail me pahn uhwong uhk, ke en ese me kaidehn ngehi me mweidohng; oh mehmen me pahn uhwong uhk e pahn pwupwidi.

16 Kilang, ngehi me wiahda sounsuk mete kan me kin saunda kisiniei, oh wiahda dipwisou en eh doadoahk; oh ngehi me pil wiahda sounkawehlao me kin kamwomwala.

17 Sohte dipwisou en mahwin ehu pahn kak kauweiukala; oh koaros me pahn uhwong uhk nan kopwung ke pahn kawehla. Met iei inou me ei laduo pahn sohsohki sang rehn Kauno oh arail mour pwung kan sang rehi, Kauno mahsanih.
3-ne 23:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises kupwuriki mahsen kan en Aiseia—e mahsanihiong aramas akan en rapahki mahsen en soukhop kan—Mahsen kan en Samuel Mehn Leimen me pid duwen Iasadao kapatapationg poadoapoad kan. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, me kumwail anahne rapahki mepwukat. Ei, I kihong kumwail kosonned ehu me kumwail en loaloapwoationg rapahki mepwukat; pwe mahsen kan en Aiseia me kesempwal mehlel.

2 Pwe mehlel e koasoia duwen soahng koaros me pid nei aramas me wia peneinei en Israel; eri e konehng me e pahn pil koasoia duwen Mehn Liki kan.

3 Oh soahng koaros me e koasoia pweidahr oh pahn pweida, iei nin duwen mahsen kan me e koasoiahier.

4 Eri kumwail rong ei mahsen kan; kumwail ntingihdi soahng kan me I pahn ndaiong kumwail; oh nin duwen ahnsou oh kupwuren Sahmo re pahn kohwei rehn Mehn Liki kan.

5 Oh mehmen me pahn rong ei mahsen kan oh koluhla oh papidaisla, iei ih me pahn komourla. Kumwail rapahki mahsen en soukohp kan, pwe tohto irail me kadehdehki mepwukat.

6 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw pwurehng mahsanihong irail, mwurin eh ketin kawehwehiong irail pwuhksarawi kan koaros me irail alehdier, e ahp mahsanihong irail: I men kumwail en ntingihdi ekei iren pwuhksarawi, me kumwail sohte ntingihdi.

7 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihong Nihpai: Patohwando nting kan me kumwail kolokol.

8 Oh ahnsou me Nihpai patohwando nting ko, oh pwilikihdi mwowe, e ahpw kilang ntingko oh mahsanih:

9 Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, I mahsanihong nei ladu Samuel, Mehn Leimeno, me e pahn kadehdehiong aramas pwukat, me ni rahn me Sahmo pahn ketin kalinganehla mwareo pwehki ngehi, tohto souleng kan pahn iasadahsang mehla, oh pahn pwarohng aramas tohto, oh pahn kalohkehng irail. E ahpw mahsanihong irail: Met sou wiawi?

10 Oh sapwellime tohnpadangko sapeng ih oh nda: Ei, maing Kaun, Samuel kohpada nin duwen sapwellimomwi mahsen kan, oh koaros mahsen kan pweida.

11 Oh Sises mahsanihong irail: Dahme kahrehda e soahng wet sohte ntingkihdi, me tohto souleng kan iasada oh pwarohng aramas tohto oh kalohkehng irail?

12 Kedekedeo Nihpai ahpw tamanda me soahng wet sohte ntingdi.

13 Kedekedeo Sises ahpw mahsanihme e pahn anahne ntingdi; eri e ntingdi nin duwen e ketin mahsanih.

14 Oh met kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises oarepene oh kawehwehdahr pwuhksarawi kan koaros, me irail ntingihdi, e ahpw mahsanihong irail me re pahn padahkihong soang kan me e ketin kawehwehiong irail.
3-ne 24:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sapwellimen Kauno meninkedero pahn kaunopada ahlo ong Ketido Keriao—Krais pahn ketiket nan mwoale ni ahnsou en kopwungo—Kauno mahsanihong Mehn Israel kan re en pwain meirong en eisek kis ehu oh meirong en kaisihsol—Pwuhk en kataman wiawihda—Karasahiong Malakai 3. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo e ahpw ketin mahsanihong irail re en ntingihdi mahsen kan me Sahmo ketikihong Malakai, me e pahn ketin mahsanihong irail. Kedekedeo mwurin mahsen ko eh ntingdier, e ahpw ketin kawehwehda mahsen ko. Oh iet mahsen kan me e ketin mahsanihong irail, ketihtihki: Sahmo ahpw mahsanihong Malakai—Kilang, I pahn kadarowei ei meninkeder pwe en kaunopada alei mwohi, oh Kauno me kumwail kin kasikasik ahpw pahn mwadangete ketidohng nan Tehnpese Sarawio, iei meninkeder en inouo, me kumwail inenen kasikasi; kilang, e pahn pwarodo, Kauno Wasa Lapalap mahsanih.

2 Ahpw ihs me pahn kak kanengamah ni rahno me e pahn ketido, oh ihs me pahn kak wie momour ni eh pahn ketido? Pwe e pahn ketin rasehng kisiniei me kin kamwakele mete, oh pil rasehng sohpw kehlail.

3 Oh e pahn ketiket nan mwoale rasehng aramas me kin isik oh kamwakele silper; oh e pahn kamwakelehda nein Lihpai pwutak kan, oh kamwakele duwehte kohl oh silper, pwe irail en kak wiahiong Kauno meirong sang ni mour pwung.

4 Eri Kauno ahpw pahn ketin kupwure meirong en Suda oh Serusalem, duhwehte mahso, oh duwehte sounpar en mwowe ko.

5 Oh I pahn kohdo rehmwail pwe I en kapwung kumwail; I pahn madangete wia kadehdeh me pahn uhwong irail sounwunahni kan, oh me kin kamwahl akan, oh me kin wia kadehde likamw akan, oh me kin pitih nah tohn doadoahk ni sohte isais pwung, me kin kaloke lihodi oh seri sopwoupwou kan, oh me kin sohpeisang mehn liki kan, oh sohte waunekin ie, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

6 Pwe ngehi iei Kauno, I sohte kin wekila; eri kumwail nein Seikop pwutak kan sohte salongala douluhl.

7 Iei sangete mwehin amwail pahpah kahlap ako kumwail salongasangehr ei tiahk sarawihkan, oh solahr kapwaiada. Kumwail pwurodohng rehi oh I pahn sapahlwong rehmwail, Kauno, Wasa Lapalalap me ketin mahsaniher. Ahpw kumwail kin koasoia: Ia mwomwen aht pahn pwurewei?

8 Ia duwe, mie aramas kak pirapa Koht? Mehndahte amwail kin piripirapa ie. Ahpw kumwail kin nda: Ia mwomwen aht kin piripirapa komwi? Sang nan meirong eisek kis ehu oh meirong en kaisihsol.

9 Kumwail riahkilahr keriah ehu, pwehki tohn wehi wet pwon kin piripirapai ie.

10 Kumwail wahdo amwail meirong eisek kis ehu nan wasahn nahko, pwe en mie menge nan tehnpeseio; oh song duwen ei manaman ni mwohmw wet, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, ma I sou pahn ringadahng kumwail wenihmwtok en nanleng, oh kamwerediong kumwail kapai kan ni uwe ieu me dirala sohla dowe.

11 Oh I pahn kauhdi meninkauo pwehki kumwail me kahrehda, oh e sohte pahn kauwehla wahntuhkehn amwail mwetuwelo, de pil wahn amwail wain kan sohte pahn pwupwidi mwohn e pahn mahla, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

12 Oh tohn wehi kan koaros pahn kahdanekin kumwail meid pai, pwehki spwamwail pahn wia sahpw kaselel, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

13 Kauno mahsanih, kumwail kin lokaiahn aklapalap ong ie. Ahpw kumwail kin nda: Soangen lokaiahn aklapalap dah me se kin wiahiong komwi?

14 Kumwail kin nda: Sohte katepen aht pahn papah Koht, oh ia duwe, e kin mie kamwahupe ma kitail kin kapwaiada sapwellime tiahk sarawi kan oh me kitail kin mwahiei oh weweid mwohn Kauno Wasa Lapalap?

15 Oh met kitail kin wiahki aramas pohnmwahso me irail peren; ei, irail akan me kin wia doadoahk suwed kan me re pweida mwahu; ei, irail akan me kin kasongosonge Koht ahpw sohte me kin ale kalokepe.

16 Eri aramas akan me kin lemwwiki Koht ahpw koasoakoasoiapene nanpwungarail, oh Kauno ketin karonge oh kupwure me re koasoia; oh pwuhk en kataman ehu ahpw ntingidi mwohn sihlangi ong irail akan me kin lemmwiki Kauno, oh me kin medemedewe mwarehu.

17 Oh Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih, I pahn sapwellimankinirailla ni rahno ahnsou me kihpene nei kapwat kesempwal akan; oh I pahn doarehla duwehte aramas men mi kin doarehla pein nah pwutak me kin papah ih.

18 Eri irail ahpw pahn pwurodo oh kilang wekpeseng en aramas pwung kan oh aramas suwed kan, me kin papah Koht oh me sohte kin papah ih.
3-ne 25:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ni Ketido Keriauo, me pohnmwahso oh suwed kan pahn isihsla duwehte mwutin dihpw meng—Elias pahn pwurodo mwohn rahn lapalap oh kamasapwehko—Karasahiong Malakai 4. Ele Sounpar 34 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Pwe kilang, rahno pahn kohdo me pahn lulida duwehte uhmw ehu, ei, irail koaros me kin wiahda suwed pahn duwehtla mwuten dihpw meng; rahno pahn pwarodo me re pahn isihla, oh sohte kalowe ehu de rah ehu pahn luhwehdi, Kaun Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

2 Ahpw ong irail me kin lemwiki edei, iei me spawellimen me pwungo me pahn ketin kapwarahda kamwahu kan koaros nan lime kan; oh kumwail pahn kohwei oh kekeirada duwehte kou pwulopwul akan me kin mi nan kehlo.

3 Oh kumwail pahn kin tiahkidi irail me suwed akan; pwe irail pahn wia mwalus pahn nehmwail akan ni rahn me I pahn wia met, Kauno Wasa Lapalap ketin mahsanih.

4 Kumwail tamataman kosonned en Moses, ei laduo, me I kihongehr ih nan Orep ong mehn Israel koaros, iangahki koasondi kan oh kosonned en kopwung kan.

5 Kilang I pahn kadarewei soukohp Elias mwohn rahn kesemwpwal oh kamasepwehk en Kauno;

6 Oh e pahn kapwurehla mohngiong en sahm akan ong neirail seri kan, oh mohngiong en seri kan ong samarail kan, pwe ma soh, I pahn kohdo oh kariahla sampah.
3-ne 26:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises ketin kawehwehda soahng koaros sangete ni tapio lel ni imwio—Seri pwelel akan oh seri kan koaoia me kopwuriamwei kan me sohte kak ntingidi—Irail akan me mih nan mwomwohdiso en Sises Krais kin ahneki soangen dipwisou tehieu nan pwungarail.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Sises ketin padahngkier mepwukat, e ahpw ketin kawehwehiongehr pokono; oh e ketin kawehwehiong irailehr, soahng koaros, me kesempwal akan oh me sohte nohn kesempwal kan.

2 Oh e ketin mahsanih: Pwuhksarawi pwukat, me kumwail saikinte alehdi, Sahmo ketin mahsanihong ie I en kihong kumwail; pwe iei koasondi en sapwellime eripit me e pahn konehng kohieng dih en mwuhr akan.

3 Oh e ahpw ketin kawehwehdar soahng kaoros, me sangete ni tapio lao lel ahnsou me e pahn ketido nan sapwellime lingan—iei, ni mehlel, me mehkoaros me pahn kodohng pohn pwelen sampah, lao pahn peipesengki karakar laud sang mehkan me wia irailda, oh sampah pahn pirapirpene duwehte doaropwe me kin pirapir ong ni lepin tuhke, oh nanleng oh sampah pahn sohrala;

4 Oh me ni rahn lapalapo oh rahn neko, ni aramas koaros, oh keinek koaros, oh wehi koaros, oh sahpw koaros, oh loh koaros pahn uh mwohn Koht, pwe en ale kadeik en arail doadoahngkan, ma irail mwahu de suwed—

5 Ma irail pahn mwahu, irail pahn iasadahn mour poatoapoat; oh ma irail pahn suwed, irail pahn iasadahng kalokolok soutuk sang ni ara sohte kak pahrek pene kohkohlahte, nin duwen mahk, oh pwung, oh sarawi me mih rehn Krais, me ketier mwohn kapikipikdahn sampah.

6 Oh met e sohte kak kilelehdi nan pwhk wet nin duwen epwiki kis ehu en me Sises, ni mehlel, ketin padahkihongehr aramas akan.

7 Ahpw kilang pleit en Nihpai kan audaudikidahr pali laud en mehkan me e ketin padahkihongehr aramas akan.

8 Oh mepwukat me I kilelediher, iei pali tikitik en mehkan me e ketin padahkihongehr aramas akan; oh I kileledier irail ong ni kahrehpen mepwukat en kak pil pwuodohng aramas pwukat, sang rehn mehn liki kan, nin duwen mahsen akan me Sises ketin mahsaniher.

9 Oh ahnsou me irail pahn alehda met, me iei e konehng irail en alehda mahs, pwe en sohngada arail pwoson, oh ma mehlel me re pahn kamehlel mepwukat, eri me inenen kopwuriamwei kan ahpw pahn kin sansal ong irail.

10 Oh ma mehlel me re sohte pahn kamehlele mepwukat, eri me kopwuramwei akan pahn kohsang rehrail pwehn kahrehiong irail en lekdekla.

11 Kilang, I aptehn pahn ntingihdi, koaros ntingkan me ntindi nan pleit en Nihpai, ahpw Kauno keinapwiedi, oh mahsanih: I pahn song pwoson en nei aramas akan.

12 Eri ngehi, Mormon, kileledier mehkan me Kauno ketin poahngokihongiehier. Oh met ngehi, Mormon, pahn uhdihsang ei koasoi, oh doula ntingih soahng kan me I pahngokieng.

13 Eri, I men kumwail en wehwehki ni mehlel me Kauno udahn padahkih aramas akan, erein rahn siluh; oh mwurin mwo e ketin pwarohng irail pak tohto, oh wia pilitikihpeseng kamadipw sarawio, oh kapaiada, oh ketikihong irail.

14 Kedekedeo e ahpw padahkih oh kapaiada seri kan me iang pokono me koasoiepe wiawiher, oh e ketin lapwahdalorail akan, oh irail ahpw koasoiaiong arail pahpah kan soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan, me pil lapasang soahng kan me e ketin kasalehiong aramas akan; oh e ketin lapwadahr lohrail akan pwe irail en kak lokaia.

15 Kedekedeo mwurin eh ketidahla nanleng—keriapak en eh ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih, oh ketidahla rehn Sahmo, mwurin eh ketin kamwahuialahr arail soumwahu kan koaros; neirail me mwator kan, oh ketin kapehd pesengehr me masukun kan, oh ketin kamwahuialahr salengen me salengepon kan, oh e ketin kamwahuialahr soangen soumwahu koaros nanpwungarail, oh ketin kamourada ohl emen sang mehla, oh ketin kasalehiong irailehr sapwellime manaman, oh e ahpw ketidalahr rehn Sahmo.

16 Kilang, kedekedeo mandahsang rahno pokono ahpw kapokoneirailpene, oh irail kilang oh rong seri pwukat; ei, seri pwelel kan koasoida oh ndinda soahng kapwuriamwei kan; oh soahng kan me irail koasoia sohte mweimwei aramas men en ntingihdi.

17 Kedekedeo tohnpadahk kan me Sises ketin pilada tepida sang ahnsou kohla papidais oh padahki koaros me kin kohdo rehrail; koaros me papidaisla ni mwaren Sises direkihla Ngehn Sarawi.

18 Oh irail tohto me kilangada oh rongedi soahng kan me apwal en koasoia, me sohte mweimwei en ntingdi.

19 Oh irail padahk, oh sawaspene nanpwungarail; oh soang koaros me irail ahneki duwepene, aramas koaros wiwia mwahupene nanpwungarail.

20 Kedekedeo irail ahpw wia soahng koaros nin duwen dahme Sises ketin mahsanihong irail.

21 Oh irail akan me papidaisla ni mwaren Sises kin kahdaniki mwomwohdiso en Krais.
3-ne 27:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises ketin mahsanihong irail en ekeriki eden Mwomwohdiso sang ni Mwareo—Sapwellime doadoahk oh meirong en tomwo me wia poahson en rongamwahuo—[Sises mahsanih] me aramas akanp en koluhla oh papidaisla pwe irail en mwakelekeldihda Ngehn Sarawio—Irail en kin duwehte Sises. Ele Sounpar 34–35 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me sapwellimen Sises tohnpadahk kan kohkohseli oh kalkalohngki soahng kan me irail rongehr oh kilangehr, oh wiwia papidais ni mwaren Sises, irail ahpw pokonpene oh ehupene kapakap kehlail oh kaisihsol.

2 Oh Sises ahpw ketin pwurehng pwarohng irail, pwehki arail wie kapakapiong Sahmo ni mware; oh Sises ahpw ketido oh ninlengihda nanpwungarail, oh mahsanihong irail: Dahme kumwail men I en kihong kumwail?

3 Oh irail ahpw ndaiong ih: Maing Kaun, se men komwi en mahsanihong kiht ahd me se pahn kin ekeriki mwomwohdiso wet; pwe aramas akan kin akamaikipene duwen irair wet.

4 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong irail: Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, dahme kahrehda aramas akan pahn akipwung oh akamaiki soahng wet?

5 Irail sohte wadek pwuhksarawi kan, me mahsanih kumwail pahn alehda mwaren Krais, me iei mwarei? Pwe iei ahd wet me kumwail pahn lukuweriki ni imwin rahn akan;

6 Oh mehmen me pahn alehda mwarei, oh dadaurete lel imwi, e pahn komourla ni imwin rahno.

7 Eri, soahng koaros me kumwail pahn wia, kumwail pahn kin wia ni mwarei; eri kumwail pahn ekeriki mwomwohdiso mwarei; oh kumwail pahn kin kapakapiong Sahmo ni mwarei pwe e pahn kapaiada mwomwohdiso pwehki ngehi.

8 Oh ia mwomwen eh pahn wia ei mwomwohdiso ma e sohte adiki mwarei? Pwe ma mwomwohdiso ehu pahn adiki eden Moses eri ahn Moses mwomwohdiso mwo; de ma e pahn adaniki eden aramas men eri e pahn wia ahn aramas; ahpw ma e pahn adaniki mwareiet eri iei ei mwomwohdiso, ma irail poahsoniki ei rongamwahu.

9 Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail poahsoniki ei rongamwahu; eri kumwail pahn ekeriki soahng kan me kumwail kin wia, ni mwarei; eri ma kumwail pahn peki rehn Sahmo, ong mwomwohdiso, ma e pahn sang ni mwarei Sahmo pahn ketin karonge kumwail;

10 Oh ma mwomwohdiso pahn poahsonikihda ei rongamwahu eri Sahmo pahn pein ketin kasalehda sapwellime doadoahk loale.

11 Ahpw ma e sohte poahsonikihda ei rongamwahu, oh poahsoniki ehn aramas doadoahk, de ahn tepilo doadoahk kan, mehlel I ndaiong kumwail me irail pahn ahneki peren ahnsou kis nan arail doadoahko, oh imwin ahnsou ahpw pahn leledo, oh irail pahn palidi oh lekidekla nan kisiniei, wasa me sohte me kin pwurasang ie.

12 Pwe arail doadoahk kan pahn ieiang irail, pwehki arail doadoahk kan me pahn kahrehda arail palidi; eri tamataman soahng kan me I ndaiong kumwail.

13 Kilang I kihong kumwail ei rongamwahu, oh met iei rongamwahu me I kihong kumwail—me I kohdo pohn sampah pwe I en wia kupwur en Semeio; pwehki Semeio me ketin kadariehdo.

14 Oh Semeio ketin kadariehdo pwe I en kalohpwuhla pohn lohpwuo; oh mwurin ei kalohpwulahr pohn lohpwuo, I pahn wahdo aramas koaros rehi, pwe nin duwen ei kalohpwuhlahr rehn aramas akan iei pil duwen Sahmo e pahn ketin langahda aramas akan, re en kesihnen mwohi, pwe re en pakadeingki arail doadoahk kan, ma irail mwahu de irail suwed—

15 Oh kahrepewet me I kalohpwukihla; eri, nin duwen sapwellimen Sahmo manaman I pahn wahdo aramas koaros rehi, pwe irail en pakadeik nin duwen arail doadoahk kan.

16 Oh e ahnsou pahn lelledo, me mehmen me pahn koluhla oh papidaisla ni mwarei pahn dirikihla [Ngehn Sarawi]; oh ma e pahn dadaurete lel imwi, kilang, I pahn doarehla ih mwohn silangin Semeio ni rahno, ahnsou me I pahn kesihnen oh kadeik sampah.

17 Oh mehmen me sohte pahn dadaurete lel imwi, iei aramaso me pahn palidi oh lekidela nan kisiniei, sang wasa me irail sohte kak pwurasang, pwehki kopwung pahrek en Sahmo.

18 Oh iei met mahseno me e ketikihong aramas akan. Oh kahrepe wet me e ketin kapwaikidahr mahsen kan me e ketikihdahr, oh e sohte kin likamw, ahpw e kin ketin kapwaiada sapwellime mahsen akan.

19 Oh sohte mehkot samin kak pidelong nan sapwellime wehi; eri sohte me kak pidelong nan sapwellime wasahn komoal, ihte irail akan me kamwakelehda arail likou kan nan ei nta, pwehki arail pwoson, oh koluhkihla diparail akan, oh loaloapwoat lel imwi.

20 Met iei kosonnedo: Koluhla, kumwail koaros me mih nan sampah, oh kohdo rehi oh papidaisla ni mwarei, pwe kumwail en kak sarawihkihla alahldi en Ngehn Sarawi, pwe kumwail en kak kesihnen mwohi ni imwin rahno.

21 Mehlel, mehlel, I ndaiong kumwail, iei met rongamwahuo; oh kumwail esehier soahng kan me kumwail pahn wia nan ei mwomwohdiso; pwe doadoahk kan me kumwail kilang I kin wia iei ih me kumwail pahn pil wia; pwe dahme kumwail kilang ie I kin wia kumwail pahn wia;

22 Eri, meid pai kumwail ma kumwail pahn wia mepwukat, pwe kumwail pahn pwekpwekdahla ni imwin rahno.

23 Kumwail ntingihdi soang kan me kumwail kilangehr oh rongehr, ihte me sohte mweimwei kan me soht.

24 Kumwail ntingihdi ehn aramas pwukat arail doadoahk kan, me pahn wiawi, duwehte me ntingdier, me wiawiher.

25 Pwe kilang, sang nan pwuhk kan me ntingidier, oh me pahn ntingidi, me aramas pwukat pahn pakadeingki, pwe sang irail arail doadoahk kan pahn sansalada ong aramas akan.

26 Oh kilang, soahng koaros Sahmo ketin ntingihdier; eri sang nan pwuhk kan me pahn ntingidi sampah pahn pakadeikda.

27 Oh kumwail sohte ese me kumwail pahn wia sounkopwung en aramas pwukat, nin duwen kopwung me I pahn kihong kumwail, me pahn pwung pahrek. Eri, soahngen aramas dah me kumwail pahn wia? Mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, kumwail en duweiehte.

28 Oh met I pahn kohla rehn Sahmo. Oh mehlel I ndaiong kumwail, soahng koaros me kumwail pahn peki rehn Sahmo ni mwarei pahn kohieng kumwail.

29 Eri, kumwail peki, oh kumwail pahn ale; kumwail letelet, oh e pahn ritidahng kumwail; pwe mehmen me pahn peki, pahn alehdi; oh me pahn letelet, e udahn pahn ritidahng ih.

30 Oh met, kilang, ei peren unsek mehlel, pwehki kumwail, oh pil dih wet; ei, oh Sahmo pil perenki, oh pil tohnleng sarawi kan, pwehki kumwail oh dih wet; pwe sohte emen irail salongala.

31 Kilang, I men kumwail en wehwehki; pwehki I kosokosoia irail akan me momour nan dih wet; oh sohte emen irail pahn salongala; oh pwehki irail I ahneki peren unsek.

32 Ahpw kilang, I pahtoukihla pwehki kapahieu en dih sang dih wet, pwehki irail lohdi oh salongala rehn [Sehdan] duwehte nein me kamwomwalao; pwe irail pahn pangkiniehla silper oh kohl, oh soang kan me soangenmwet kin kauwehla oh me lipirap akan kak kauwehla oh pirapahla. Oh ni ahnsouo I pahn pwarek irail, iei I pahn dupunkiong irail arail doadoahk kan.

33 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises kaimwseklahr mahsen pwukat e ahpw mahsanihong sapwellime tohnpadahk kan: Kumwail en pidelong nan ewen kehl tehtiko; pwe ewen kehlo me tehtik, oh ahl en komour me tehtik, oh malaulau me pahn diar; ahpw tehlap ewen kehlo me kohlang mehla, oh tohto me pahn keid loale, lao pwohngo kohdo, wasa me sohte aramas kak wia arail doadoahk kan.
3-ne 28:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Meh duwemen sang nan tohnpadahk ehkrimeno inangih oh alehdi inou en sohso nan sapwellimen Krais wehi ahnsou me re pahn mehla—Mehn Nihpai Silimeno inangih oh alehdi manaman en sohte mehla pwe irail en mihmihte pohn sampah lao lel ahnsou me Sises pahn pwurehng ketido—Irail kiewekila oh kilangidi soahng kan me sohte mweimwei en koasoida, oh ahnsouwet irail wie papah aramas akan.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwurin Sises e ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahseniong emen emen sapwellime tohnpadahk kan: Dahme kumwail inangih sang rehi, mwurin ei pahn kohla rehn Sahmo?

2 Oh irail koaros likin meh silimen koasoia: Se inangih me mwurin aht pahn momour lel sounpar en aramas mah, mwurin aht pwukoa me komw ketin malipehkin kiht pahn imwisekla, se pahn mwadangete kohwei rehmwi nan sapwellimahr wehi.

3 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Meid pai kumwail pwehk amwail inangih soahng wet sang rehi; eri, mwurin amwail pahn lel sounpar isihsek riau, kumwail pahn kohdo rehi nan ei wehi; oh kumwail pahn komoal rehi.

4 Oh mwurin eh ketin mahsaniong irail, e ahpw sohpeieng meh silimeno, oh mahsanihong irail: Dahme kumwail inangih I pahn wiahiong kumwail, mwurin ei pahn kohla rehn Sahmo?

5 Oh nan mohngiongarail kan pahtoula, pwe irail sohte men patohwanohng ih dahme irail inangiho.

6 Oh e ahpw mahsanihong irail: Kilang, I wehweki amwail madamadau kan, oh kumwail inangih soahng me Sohn, nei kempoako inangih sang rehi, me iangie nan ei doadoahk en kalohk, mwohn Mehn Suhs akan ar kalohpwuhiela.

7 Eri, meid pai kumwail mehlel, pwe kumwail sohte pahn kehndi mehla; ahpw kumwail pahn momour oh kilangidi sapwellimen Sahmo doadoahk koaros ong aramas akan, lao soahng koaros pahn pweida nin duwen kupwur en Sahmo, ahnsou me I pahn pwurodo ni ei lingan iangahki manaman en nanleng.

8 Oh kumwail sohte pahn kehn medek en mehla; ahpw ahnsou me I pahn pwurodo nan ei lingan kumwail pahn kiewek ni marep tehieu sang ni paliwar me kin mehla ong ni paliwar me kin momour kohkohlahte; oh kumwail ahpw pahn kapaida nan wehin Semeio.

9 Oh pil, kumwail sohte pahn kehn medek ahnsou me kumwail pahn momourki paliwar, de pil pahtou ihte pahtouki dihp akan en sampah; oh soahngkat koaros I pahn wia pwehki dahme kumwail inangih sang rehi, pwehki amwail inangih kumwail en kak wahdo aramas akan rehi, ni erein sampah e pahn mihmiehte.

10 Oh pwehki kahrepe wet kumwail pahn ahneki peren unsek; oh kumwail pahn mwohndi nan wehin Semeio; ei, amwail peren pahn unsek, duwehte Sahmo e ketikihong ie peren unsek; oh kumwail pahn duweiehte, oh ngehi duwehte Sahmo; oh ngehi oh Sahmo ehu;

11 Oh Ngehn Sarawi kin kadehdehki duwen Sahmo oh ngehi; oh Sahmo ketikihong Ngehn Sarawi aramas akan, pwehki ngehi.

12 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sises ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw doahkehki emen emen irail sendinpeh ihte meh silimeno me pahn mihmi me soh, oh e ahpw ketin mweselda.

13 Oh kilang, nanleng ahpw ritpeseng, oh [Kauno] ahpw ketikiniraildahla nanleng, oh irail kilangada oh rongidi soahng kan me sohte kak koasoiahda.

14 Oh e sohte mweimwei ong irail en koasoia; oh irail pil sohte ahneki manaman en kak koasoia soahng kan me irail kilang oh rong;

15 Oh irail sohte kak ese ma irail mihmi nan paliwar de sohte paliwar; pwe e mwomwen me irail kiewekla, kahrehda irail kieweksang nan paliwar en uduk kolahng paliwar me sohte kin mehla, kahrehda irail kak kilang soahng kan me sang Koht.

16 Ahpw kedekedeo irail pwurehng kalohk pohn sampah; ahpw irail sohte kalohngki soahng kan me irail rongehr oh kilangidi, pwehki kosonned me irail alehdi sang nanleng.

17 Oh met, I sohte ese ma irail tungoalenki paliwar me kak mehla de soh mwurin rahn en arail kieweklao;

18 Ahpw ih uwen me I ese met, nin duwen poadoapoad kan me ntingdier—irail kohwei pohn sahpwo, oh kalohk ong aramas koaros, kihkihpene koaros nan mwomwohdiso me kamehlele arail padahk kan; papidaisla irail, oh koaros me papidaisla alehda Ngehn Sarawi.

19 Oh aramas akan me sohte wia tohn mwomwohdiso kesehlong irail nan imweteng. Oh imweteng kan sohte kak koliraildi, pwe re kin mweredi.

20 Oh irail kin lekideklong nan pwoahr; ahpw irail kin kamwakidki pwehlo mahsen en Koht, me kahrehda sang ni sapwellime manaman irail kin kak pitsang wasa loal en nan pwehl; oh re sohte kak weirada pwoahr me loal ong irail.

21 Oh pak siluh irail lekideklong nan kisiniei mwehl oh sohte mwasingkihla.

22 Oh pak riau irail lekideklong nan kelen mahn lawalo; oh kilang irail mwadongehng mahn akan duwehte kisin seri men rehn sihmpwul men, oh re sohte kin ohla.

23 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohwei rehn aramas en Nihpai koaros, oh ahpw kalohngki rongamwahu en Krais ong aramas koaros pohn sahpwo; oh irail weliakapw ong Kauno, oh iangala mwomwohdiso en Krais, oh met aramas en nan diho kapaida mehlel, nin duwen mahsen en Sises.

24 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, kaimwsekala koasokosoia duwen mepwukat ekis ahnsou.

25 Kilang, I apwtehn pahn ntingihdi eden irail ko me sohte pahn kehndi mehla, ahpw Kauno irehdi; eri I sohte ntingihdi ederail ko, pwe irail sohte sansal ong sampah.

26 Ahpw kilang, I kilangirailehr, oh irail kalohkehng ie.

27 Oh kilang irail pahn mih rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh Mehn Liki kan sohte pahn ese irail.

28 Irail pahn pil mih rehn mehn Suhs akan, oh mehn Suhs akan sohte pahn ese irail.

29 Oh ahnsou pahn leledo, ahnsou me Kauno koasoanehdi sang ni sapwellime eripit me e re pahn kalohkehng keinek en Israel me salongala kan, oh ong wehi kan koaros, peneinei lap akan, lokaia kan oh aramas, oh pahn wahdohsang rehrail aramas tohto rehn Krais, pwe arail inengo en kak pweida, oh pil pwehki manaman en Koht kehlail me mih rehrail.

30 Oh irail duwehte tohnleng kan en Koht, oh ma irail pahn kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Sises irail kak pwarohng aramas sohte lipilipil me irail kilang pahn konehng.

31 Eri, doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei irail pahn wiahda, mwohn rahn en ketido lapo ahnsou me aramas koaros pahn kesihnenda mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais;

32 Ei irail pil pahn wia doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwe rehn Mehn Liki kan, mwohn rahn en kopwungo.

33 Oh ma kumwail kolokol pwuhksarawi kan me kasalehda sapwellimen Krais doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan koaros, kumwail pahn ese me mepwukat udahn pahn wiawi, nin duwen mahsen en Krais.

34 Oh meid suwediong ih me sohte pahn rong mwahu mahsen kan en Sises, oh pil mahsen irail akan me e ketin piladahr oh kadaredo rehrail; pwe mehmen me sohte pahn alehda mahsen kan en Sises oh sohte alehda mahsen kan en me e ketin kadaredo; oh eri e sohte pahn alehda irail ni imwin rahno;

35 Oh e pahn mwahu ong irail ma irail sohte ipwidi. Pwe kumwail medewe me kumwial kak soikala kopwung pwung en Koht me kupwure ketin nsensuwedla, me aramas akan tiakidi pahn nehrail kan, me kahrehda komourla kak wiawi?

36 Oh met kilang, nin duwen ei koasoiahier irail akan me Kauno ketin piladahr, iei, meh silimeno me kohdalahr nanlengo, I sohte ese ma irail mwakelekelsang paliwar me kin mehla kohlahng mour me sohte kin mehla—

37 Ahpw kilang, sang ahnsou me I ntingih, I peki rehn Kauno, oh e ketin kasalehiong ie me e pahn konehng mie wekila ehu pohn paliwerarail kan, de ma soh a irail udahn pahn kehn mehla;

38 Eri, pwe irail sohte pahn kehn mehla e udahn mie wekila ehu pohn paliwararail kan, pwe irail en dehr kehn medek de pahtou ihte ong dihp akan en sampah.

39 Eri wekila wet sohte duwehte dahme pahn wiawi ni imwin rahno; ahpw mie wekila ehu wiawihong irail, kahrehda Sehdan sohte ahneki manaman pohrail, me kahrehda e sohte kak kasongosongih irai; oh paliwararail kan sarawihla, kahrehda irail sarawi, oh manaman en sampah sohte kakehng irail.

40 Oh nan koasondi en mwomw en mour wet me irail pahn ieiaski lao lel ni rahn en kopwung en Kraiso; oh ni rahno irail pahn alehdi wekila lap, oh pahn alahlda nan wehin Sahmo oh sohla pwurehng kohla liki, ahpw mihmihla rehn Koht nanleng kokohlahte.
3-ne 29:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kohdohn Pwuhk en Mormon iei kilel ehu me Kauno tepdahr kihpene Israel oh kapwaiada sapwellime inou kan—Irail akan me pahn kasohwe Sapwellime kaudiahl en imwin rahn akan oh kisakis kan pahn riahla. Ele Sounpar 34–35 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me ahnsou me Kauno pahn ketin mwahngih me e konehng, ni duwen sapwellime eripit, me mahsen pwukat pahn kohdo rehn Mehn Liki kan nin duwen sapwellime mahseno, eri kumwail en ese me inouo me Sahmo ketin inoukihong aramas en Israel, duwen kopwurupwurdohn sapwarail sahpw en sohso, tepdahier pweida.

2 Oh kumwail en ese me mahsen kan en Kauno, me soukohp sarawi kan mahsaniher, koaros pahn tepida pweida; oh kumwail sohte anahne nda me Kauno kapwandehla sapwellime ahnsou en ketido rehn aramas en Israel.

3 Oh kumwail sohte anahne medewe nan amwail mohngiong kan me mahsen kan me wie neikinek sohte katepe, pwe kilang, Kauno pahn tamatamante sapwellime inou me ketin wiahiong sapwellime aramas en peneinei en Israel.

4 Oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn kilang mahsen pwukat kohdo rehmwail, eri kumwail sohte konehng kaskasohwehte sapwellimen Kauno wiewia kan, pwe kedlahs en sapwellime kopwung pwungo mihmi nin lime palimaun; oh kilang, rahno, ma kumwail pahn kasohwehte sapwellime wiewia kan, e pahn ketin wiada en poweiukedi ahnsou mwadang.

5 Meid suwediong ih me pahn soikala sapwellimen Kauno wiewia kan; ei, meid suwediong ih me pahn lahlahwe Krais oh sapwellime doadoahk kan!

6 Ei, meid suwediong ih me pahn lahlahwe sapwellimen Kauno kaudiahl akan, oh me pahn nda me Kauno sohlahr kin wiahda doadoahk en kaudiahl, de kokohp, de kisakis kan, de lokaia kan, de kamaiauda, de sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi!

7 Ei, oh meid suwediong ih me pahn nda ni rahno, kepwehpwehla, pwe sohte manaman kapwuriamwei kak wiawi sang Sises Krais; pwe mehmen me pahn wia met e pahn duwehla nein soun kamwomwalao, me ong ih sohte mahkpe, nin duwen mahsen en Krais!

8 Ei, oh kumwail sohte konehng kawe, de soikala, de kepitiki mehn Suhs kan, de pil ekei luhwen kisehn peneinei en Israel; pwe kilang, Kauno kin ketin tamatamante sapwellime inou ong irail, oh e pahn wiahiong irail nin duwen dahme e inoukihda.

9 Eri kumwail dehr medewe me kumwail kak wekidala palimaun en limen Kauno ong palimeing, pwe en dehr kapwaiada sapwellime kopwung ong pweidahn inou me e ketin inoukihong peneinei en Israel.
3-ne 30:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Liki kan en imwin rahn akan en koluhla, kohdo rehn Krais, oh iang wadawadieng peneinei en Israel. Ele Sounpar 34–35 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kumwail rong mwahu, kumwail Mehn Liki kan, oh rong mahsen kan en Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Koht ieiaso, me ketin mahsanihong ie me I pahn koasoia duwen kumwail, pwe, kilang e ketin mahsaniong ie me I pahn ntingihdi, mahsanih:

2 Kumwail Mehn Liki kan koaros, kumwail sohpeisang amwail wiewia suwed kan; oh koluhkihla amwail wiewiahn tepil kan, amwail likam akan oh kewehdi kan, oh amwail wiewiahn nenek kan, oh amwail tiahk rir suwed kan, oh amwail dikadiken ene kan, oh amwail kam aramas kan, oh amwail prihskrap kan, oh amwail noahrek kan, oh amwail aklemei kan, oh sang amwail wiewia suwed koaros oh tiahk suwed koaros, oh kohdo rehi, oh papidaisla ni mwarei, pwe kumwail en kak alehdi kamwakelpen dipamwail kan, oh audaukihda Ngehn Sarawi, pwe kumwail en kaki an wadawadiong rehn nei aramas akan me wia peneinei en Israel.
4-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Kapahieu en Nihpai[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Nihpai Me Wia Nein Nihpai Pwutak—Emen Tohnpadahk en Sises Krais[/font_size][/center]

Duwen aramas en Nihpai kan, nin duwen me eh ntingihdier.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan koaros weliakapwala ong Kauno—Irail ahneki soahng kaoros pahrek, wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan, oh pweida nan sahpwo—Mwurin sounpar riepwiki, liakatohrohr, doadoahk en tepil, mwomwohdisoh likamw kan, oh kailok kan pwarada—Mwurin sounpar silipwiki, Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Liemen koaros suwedla—Amaron ekihla poadoapoad en nting sarawi ko. Ele Sounpar 35–321 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo sounpar silihsek pahieu ahpw imwiseklahr, oh pil sounpar silihsek limau, oh kilang tohnpadahk en Sises kan wiadahr mwomwohdisohn Krais nan sahpwo pwo. Oh koaros me kohdo rehrail, oh koluhkihla mehlel diparail kan, kin papidaisla ni mwaren Sises; oh irail ahpw alehdi Ngehn Sarawio.

2 Kedekedeo nan pahr silihsek wenouo, aramas akan koaros weliakapwalahng Kauno, pohn sahpwo pwon, koaros Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Liemen kan, oh sohte pingiping oh akamai nan pwungarail, oh aramas koaros kin doadoahkpene mwahu.

3 Oh irail ahneki soahng koaros duwepenehte nan pwungarail; eri sohte me kepwehpwe oh semwehmwe, de me kalidu oh saledek, ahpw irail kaoros kasaledeklahr, oh alehdier kisakis en nanleng.

4 Kedekedeo sounpar silihsek isuh ahpw pil imwiseklahr, oh popohl pepeusweite nan sahpwo.

5 Oh sapwellimen Sises tohnpadahngko wiahda doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan, lao irail kamaiauda me soumwahu kan, kamaurada me mehla, oh kahrehda me mwoatoar kan aluhda, oh me maskun kan kilangada wasa, oh me salengepon kan rongada wasa; oh soahngen kapwuriamwei tohto me irail wiahda rehn aramas akan; oh sohte mehkot kapwuriamwai me irail kin wiahda ihte sang ni mwaren Sises.

6 Oh met ahpw pil kaimwsekalahr pahr silihsek waluh, oh pil pahr silihsek duwao, oh pahisek ehu, oh pahisek riau, iei lao le pahisek duwao imwiseklahr, oh pil limeisek ehu, oh limeisek riau; iei, lao lel limeisek duwao en pahr pil imwisekla.

7 Oh Kauno kapaiada irail nan sahpwo ni mehlel; ei, lao irail pwurehng wiahda kahnihmw kan wasa me kahnihmw kan isihsla.

8 Iei, kahnihmw lap en Saraemla irail pwurehn onehdasapahlih.

9 Ahpw tohto kanihmw kan me kihrlahr, oh pihl akan mihla wasa re kokouda ie; eri kahnihmw pwukat sohte kak pwurehn onohnda.

10 Oh met, kilang, kedekedeo aramas en Nihpai kan ahpw kehlailla, oh ahpw kaparaparala mwadang mehlel, oh wiahla aramas masamwahu oh lingan mehlel.

11 Oh irail kin kapwopwoud, oh ale mweimwei en kapwopwoud, oh kapaida nin duwen reken inou kan me Kauno ketin wiahiong irail.

12 Oh irail sohlahr idawehn koasondi kan oh tiahk en kosonned en Moseso; ahpw irail kin weweidiki kosonned kan me irail alehdier sang rehn Kauno oh arail Koht, kin kalapw kaisihsol oh kapakap, oh kalapw ehupene wielamalamki arail kapakap oh rongorongo mahsen en Kauno.

13 Kedekedeo sohte pingiping rehn aramas akan koaros, nan sahpwo pwon; ahpw sapwellimen Sises tohnpadak kan wia manaman kapwuriamwei kei.

14 Kedekedeo pahr isihsek ehu ahpw pil imwiseklahr, oh pil pahr isihsek riauo, ei, oh ni mehlel, lao lel pahr isihsek duwao pil imwiseklahr; iei, sounpar epwiki imwiseklahr, oh sapwellimen Sises tohnpadahngko, me e ketin malipehda ko, koaros samwalahr nan paradais en Koht, ihte meh silimeno me mihmi; oh mie ekei tohnpadahk me kasarawihlo oh welianiraildi; oh pil tohto aramas en diho pil mehlahr.

15 Kedekedeo sohte pingiping nan sahpwo, pwehki limpoak en Koht me mihmi nan mohngiong en aramas kan.

16 Oh sohte noahrok, de aklemei, de moromor, de wiewiahn nenek kan, de likamw kan, de kam aramas kan, de soangen ineng suwed kan; oh mehlel sohte aramas peren nan pwungen aramas koaros me Koht ketin kapikada duwehte irail.

17 Sohte aramas lipirap, de kamaramas, de pil Mehn Leimen kan, de pil ehu pwihn tohrohr; ahpw irail koaros ehute, sapwellimen Krais aramas, oh me pahn sohsohki wehin Koht.

18 Oh ia uwen meid pai me irail ahneki! Pwe Kauno ketin kapaiada irail nan arail wiewia kan koaros; iei, irail kapaida oh keirda loa sounpar epwiki eisek imwiseklahr; oh keieu en dih sang rehn Krais mehlahr, oh sohte pingiping nan sahpwo pwon.

19 Kedekedeo Nihpai, ih me wiahda lahs en intingpwukat, (oh e ntingihdi pohn pilei ten Nihpai) kapilsalehdalahr, oh nah pwukat Eimos weliandi oh ntingih; oh e pil intingih pohn pilei ten Nihpai.

20 Oh e kolokolki sounpar welihsek pahieu, oh popohl mimiehte nan sahpwo, ihte pwihn en aramas ehu me uhwongadahr mwomwohdiso oh alehdahr eden Mehn Leimen kan; eri Mehn Leimen kan tepida mie nan sahpwo.

21 Kedekedeo Eimos pil mehla, (oh sounparehr epweiki duweisek sang ahnsou me Krais ketido) oh nein Eimwos pwutak weliandi kolokol poadoapoad kan; oh e pil nting pohn pileit en Nihpai; oh e pil ntingih nan pwuhk en Nihpai, me iei pwuhk wet.

22 Kedekedeo sounpar riepwiki ahpw imwiseklahr; oh keriau en dih koaros pil mehla ihte ekei me luhwe.

23 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, me kumwail en ese me aramas akan pokonlahr mehlel, lao irail kohpeseng nan sahpwo pwon, oh irail kepwehpwehla mehlel, pwehki arail pweida rehn Krais.

24 Oh met, nan pahr riepwiki ehuo e tepidahr mie nan pwungarail irail akan me pohnmwahsodahr, nan arail likawih likou pweilaud kan, oh soahngen takai kaselel kan koaros, oh soahngen dipwisou en sampah kaselel kan.

25 Oh sang ahnsou kohla irail ahpw tepida wekpeseng nan arail dipwisou kan oh dipwisou teikan me irail ahneki.

26 Oh irail tepidahr katohrohr nan pwungarail; oh irail tepida wiahda mwomwohdiso kan ong pein irail pwe irail en kepwehpwehkihla, oh tepida lahlahwe mwomwohdiso mehlel en Krais.

27 Kedekedeo ahnsou me sounpar riepwiki eisek imwiseklahr, mwomwohdiso tohto wiawihdahr nan sahpwo; ei, mwomwohdiso tohto kin kalohngki me irail ese Krais, ahpw irail lahlahwe pali laud en rongamwahuo, kahrehda irail kin alehda soangen wiewia suwed kan, oh kihong me sarawio rehn irail me sohte mweimwei pwehki arail sohte warohng.

28 Oh mwomwohdiso wet wie tohtohla pwehki wiewia suwed, oh pwehki manaman en Sehdan me koledier mohngiongarail kan.

29 Oh pil, mie ehu mwomwohdiso me lahlahwe Krais; oh irail kin kaloke mwomwohdiso mehlel en Kraiso, pwehki arail akitikitik oh arail kamehlele Krais; oh irail kin kailongkinirail pwehki manaman kapwuriamwei me wiawi rehrarail.

30 Eri irail kin doadoahngki manaman oh mweimwei pohn tohnpadahk kan en Sises me mihmih rehrail ko, oh irail keseiraillong nan imweteng; ahpw sang ni manaman en mahsen en Koht, me mih rehrail, imweteng kan kin mweredi, oh irail kohwei wiwia manaman kapwuriamwei rehn aramas akan.

31 Ahpw, oh mehndahte manamn kapwuriamwei pwukat, mohngiong en aramas akan keptakaila, oh song en kemeirailla, duwehte mehn Suhs akan nan Serusalem arail song en kemehla Sises, nin duwen sahpwellime mahsen.

32 Oh irail kesehlong irail nan kisiniei mwehl, oh irail pidohisang loale sohte mwasikala.

33 Oh irail pil kesehlong irail nan keleen mahn lawalo kan, oh irail mwadongehng mahn akan duwehte kisin seri men rehn sihmpwul men; oh irail kohsang rehrail sohte ohla.

34 Ahpw, mohngiong en aramas akan keptakaila, pwe irail ideidawehn samworo tohto oh soukohp likamw akan pwe re en wiahda mwomwohdiso tohto kan, oh wia soahng wiewia suwed tohto. Oh irail kin pohr sapwellimen Sises aramas akan; ahpw sapwellimen Sises aramas akan sohte kin kapwurehiong irail. Oh met irail pwupwidi nan sohpwoson oh wiewia suwed kan, sang ehu pahr kohlahng ehu pahr, lao sounpar riepwiki silihsek imwisekla.

35 Oh kedekedeo nan pahret, ei, nan pahr riepwiki silihsek ehu, mie tohrohrpeseng laud nan pwungen aramas akan.

36 Kedekedeo nan pahrete mie aramas kei me tepida kahdanikinirail Mehn Nihpai, oh irail kin wia aramas poadidi ong Krais mehlel kei; oh pil mie ekei rehrail ma kahdanikinirail Mehn Leimen—Mehn Seikop, Mehn Sosep, oh Mehn Soram;

37 Eri irail akan me kin poadidi ong Krais ni mehlel, oh irail me kin loaloapwoat en pwongih Krais, (iei irail me tohnpadahk en Sises kan kin mihmi rehrail) me kahdaniki Mehn Nihpai, oh Mehn Seikop, oh Mehn Sosep, oh Mehn Soram.

38 Kedekedeo irail me kin kasohwe rongamwahuo iei me adaniki Mehn Leimen, oh Mehn Lemuel, oh Mehn Ismael; oh irail sohte pwupwidi sang ni arail sohpwoson, ahpw irail uhwong mehlel rongamwahu en Krais; oh irail padahkihong neirail seri kan en dehr kamehlele, duwehte arail pahpa kahlapoko me pwupwidi sangete ni tapio.

39 Oh met pwehki wiewia suwed oh tiahk suwed en arail pahpa kahlapoko, duwehte ni tapio. Oh irail kaiahnkihda re en kailongki sapwellimen Koht aramas akan, duwehte Mehn Leimen kan arail kaiahnkihda re en kailongki aramas en Nihpai sangete ni tapio.

40 Kedekedeo sounpar riepwuki pahisek pahieu ahpw imwiseklahr, oh met iei wiewiah kan en aramas akan. Oh palilaud en aramas suwed akan wie kehkehlaila, oh tohtohla sang sapwellimen Koht aramas akan.

41 Oh irail ahpw doulahte kaukauada mwomwohdiso kan ong pein irail, kapatahkinirail soahngen dipwisou kesempwal akan. Oh met sounpar riepwiki limeisek imwiseklahr, oh pil sounpar riepwiki weneisek imwiseklahr.

42 Kedekedeo pwihn suwed en aramas akan tepida pwurehng kapwurehda kahula oh tiahk suwed rir kan en Kadiendon.

43 Oh pil aramas akan me kahdaniki aramas en Nihpai kan tepida pohnmwahso nan mohngiongarail kan, pwehki arail kepwehpwelahr mehlel, oh tepida likamw duwehte riarail akan, Mehn Leimen kan.

44 Oh sang ahnsou wet tohnpadahk kan tepida pahtoula pwehki dihp akan en sampah.

45 Kedekedeo ahnsou me sounpar silipwiki imwiseklahr, koaros aramas en Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan wialahr aramas suwed mehlel ekeite duwehte ekei.

46 Kedekedeo pwihn lipirap en Kadiendon kan ahpw kohpeseng wasa koaros pohn sahpwo; oh sohte emente me mwahu likin tohnpadahk en Sises ko. Oh kohl oh silper me irail katohtohwehla mehlel, oh kin netinetpene ni soangen wiepen netinet koaros.

47 Kedekedeo mwurin sounpar silipwiki limao imwiseklahr, (oh aramas akan wiwiahte arail wiewia suwed kan) Eimwos ahpw mehla; oh rie pwutak, Amaron, ahpw weliandi kolokol poadoapoad kan.

48 Kedekedeo ahnsou me sounpar silipwiki rieisek imwiseklahr, Amaron, alehdi kaweid en Ngehn Sarawi, en ekihla poadoapoad kan me sarawi—iei, koaros poadoapoad sarawi kan me me kin kadakadaur kohdo sang ehu dih kohdohng ehu, me sarawi—iei lao lel sounpar silipwiki rieisek sang ahnsou me Krais ketidohu.

49 Oh e nekidala ong Kauno, pwe en kak kohdohng irail akan me wia luhwen kisehn peneinei en Seikop, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno kokohp kan oh inou kan. Oh met kaimwsekalahr inting kan en Amaron.
morm 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Mormon[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amaron kaweidkihong Mormon duwen poadoapoad sarawi ko—Mahwin tepida nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan—Mehn Nihpai silimeno kohsang irail—Wiewia suwed, sohpwoson, wunahni kan, oh kosotipw kan wiwiawi. Ele Sounpar 321–326 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, ntingihda duwen soahng kan me I kilangehr oh rongehr, oh kahdaniki Pwuhk en Mormon.

2 Oh ahnsou me Amaron ekihla poadoapoad ko ong Kauno, e ahpw kohdo rehi, (ahnsou me I sounpar eisek, oh I tepida esehla duwen kaskuhl en nting en nei aramas akan) oh Amaron ndaiong ie: I kasawih me ke wia ser mwahu men, oh mwadang en esehla;

3 Eri, ahnsou me ke pahn sounpar rieisek pahieu I men ke en tamataman soahng kan me ke kilang wiawihiong aramas pwukat; oh ahnsou me ke pahn lel sounparo ke pahn kohla nan sahpw en Andem, pohn dohl ehu me adaniki Sim; oh wasahu I nekidala ong Kauno nting sarawi koaros me pid duwen aramas pwukat.

4 Oh kilang, ke pahn kihsang pileit en Nihpai ko ong kowe, oh luhwe kan ke pahn pwilikihdi wasahu; oh ke pahn ntingihdi nan pileit en Nihpai ko soahng koaros me ke kilangehr duwen aramas pwukat.

5 Oh ngehi, Mormon, I emen wia kadaudok en Nihpai, (oh ei pahpa adaniki Mormon) I kilelehdi soahng kan me Amaron ndaiong ie.

6 Kedekedeo ahnsou me I sounpar eisek ehu, ei pahpa waiehla nan sahpw en palieir, iei kohla nan sahpw en Saraemla.

7 Pohn sahpwo pwon direkihla ihmw akan, oh aramas akan udahn tohtohla mehlel kereniong duwehte pihk en pohn oaroahr.

8 Kedekedeo nan pahrete mahwin tepida wiawi nan pwungen Mehn Nihpai kan, me wiawihkihda Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Seikop oh Mehn Sosep oh Mehn Soram; oh mahwin wet wiawi nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai kan, oh Mehn Leiman kan oh Lemuel kan oh Mehn Ismael kan.

9 Met Mehn Leimen kan oh Mehn Lemuel kan oh Mehn Ismael kan adaniki Mehn Leimen, oh pwihn riau wet iei Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen.

10 Kedekedeo mahwino ahpw tepida wiawi nanpwungarail ni irepen sahpw en Saraemla, nimwahn pihl en Saidon.

11 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai ahpw kihpene aramas kei, lao irail tohtohsang meh silinen. Kedekedeo nanpahrohte irail wiahier mahwin kei, oh Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw powehdi Mehn Leimen kan oh kemehla tohto irail.

12 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw pweieksang arail koasondio, oh popohl ahpw miehda nan sahpwo; oh irail ahneki popohl erein sounpar pahieu, me sohte aramas kamakamala.

13 Ahpw wiewia suwed kehlaila pohn sahpwo pwon, kahrehda Kauno ketikihsang sapwellime tohnpadahk kesempwal oko, oh doadoahk en manaman kapwuriamwei kan oh maiauda kan uhdi pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas akan.

14 Oh sohte kisakis sang Kauno, oh Ngehn Sarawi ahpw sohla ketiket rehn emen aramas, pwehki arail wiewia suwed oh sohpwoson.

15 Oh ngehi, pwehki ei sounpar eisek limau oh pwehki ei madamadau mehlel, Kauno eri pwarohng ie, oh I kehnehr oh esehier kupwur kalahngan en Sises.

16 Oh I nantihong kalohk ong aramas pwukat, ahpw eweiet sohla mweimweiong, oh I sohla mweimweiong en kalohk ong irail; pwe kilang irail inangih mehlel en uhwong arail Koht; oh tohnpadahk kesempwal oko kohsang nan sahpwo, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan.

17 Ahpw I mihmihte rehrail, ahpw I sohte mweimwei en kalohkehng irail, pwehki keptakai en mohngiongarail kan; oh pwehki keptakai en mohngiongarail kan sahpwo riahla pwehki irail.

18 Oh pwihn en Kadienden lipirap oko, me mih rehn Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw rekla nan sahpwo, lao tohn sahpwo tepida ekihla arail dipwisou kesempwala akan nan pwehl; oh irail apwal en kolokol, pwehki Kauno keriahla sahpwo, kahrehda irail sohte kak kolokol arail dipwisou kan, de pwurehng alehdi.

19 Kedekedeo mie soununahni kan, oh sounkosetipw kan, oh akmanaman kan; oh manaman en me suwedo kohdohng pohn sahpwo pwon, lao mahsen kan koaros en Apinadai oh pil Samuel Mehn Leimeno pweida.
morm 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon kaunda nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan—kamaramas oh mehla wiawi nan sahpwo—Mehn Nihpai kan sengiseng oh mwahieiki nsensuwed en lekidekla—Arail ahnsou en alehdi mahk dauliher—Mormon alehdi pileit en Nihpai—Mahwin wenwenlahte. Ele Sounpar 327–350 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo nan pahrohte mahwin tepida wiawi nanpwungen Mehn Nihpai oh Mehn Leimen kan. Oh mehndahte ei pwulopwul, ahpw paliwar laud; eri aramas en Nihpai kan piliehda I en wia arail kaun, de kaun en neirail sounpei kan.

2 Eri kedekedeo ni ei sounpar eisek weneu I ahpw kahluwa sounpei en Mehn Nihpai kan, kohlahng Mehn Leimen kan; eri sounpar silipwiki rieisek weneu ahpw imwiseklahr.

3 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki rieisek isuh Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohdo mahwiniong kiht sang ni arail kehlail mehlel, kahrehda irail kamasakada nei sounpei kan; eri irail sohte men pei, oh irail tepida pweieklahng nan sahpw en paliepeng kan.

4 Kedekedeo se ahpw kohla nan kahnihmw en Angkola, oh se mihla nan kahnihmwo, oh kaunopada pwe sen doarehsang kiht Mehn Leimen kan. Kedekedeo se ahpw kakehlakahla kahnihmwo sang aht kehl; ahpw mehndahte aht kakehlakahla Mehn Leimen kan kohdohte oh pwakihsang kiht nan kahnihmwo.

5 Oh irail pil pwakihsang kiht nan sahpw en Depit.

6 Oh se karihs kohla nan sahpw en Sosua, me mih ni irepen palikapi en oaroahro.

7 Kedekedeo se ahpw wia aht kak koaros en kihpene nait aramas ahnsou mwadang, pwe sen kak ehupene wiahda ehu pwihn.

8 Ahpw kilang, sahpwo direkihla pwihn lipirap oh Mehn Leimen kan; oh mehndahte kamwomwala lap me pahn wiawihong nei aramas akan, irail sohte koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan; eri kamaramas oh mehla kohpeseng nan sahpwo pwon, ong mehn Nihpai kan oh pil Mehn Leimen kan; oh aramas koaros uhwong kosonned wasa koaros pohn sahpwo.

9 Oh met, mie nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan men me adaniki Aron; oh e kohdohng mahwinkihong kiht nah sounpei pahnen pahkid. Oh kilang, I pelianki nei meh pahnen riekid. Oh kedekedeo I kemehki ih nei sounpei kan kahrehda e tangasang mwohi. Oh kilang, soahng pwukat koaros wiawi, oh sounpar silipwiki silihsek imwiseklahr.

10 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan tepida koluhkihla diparail kan, oh tepida kaulim duwehte dahme Samuel kohpadao; pwe kilang sohte aramas men kak koledi dahme pein ah, pwe sounkulih, oh sounpirap kan, oh sounkamaramas kan, oh soununani, oh sounkosetipw kan me mih nan sahpwo.

11 Eri met tepida mie mwahiei oh sengiseng nan sahpwo pwon pwehki soahng pwukat, ahpw mehlel rehn aramas en Nihpai kan.

12 Kedekedeo ahnsou me ngehi, Mormon, kilangadahr arail wie sengiseng oh arail mwahiei oh arail pahtou mwohn Kauno, nan ei mohngiong tepida peren, pwehki ei ese sapwellimen Kauno kupwur kalahngan kan oh kanengamah, eri I medewe me e pahn ketin kupwureirailla pwe irail en kak pwurehng wiahla arama mwahu.

13 Ahpw kilang ei peren sohte katepe, pwe irail sohte pahtouki arail koluhla, pwehki kupwurkalahngan en Koht; ahpw irail pahtouki arail lekidekla, pwehki Kauno sohte kin mweidehng irail en peren nan dihp.

14 Oh irail sohte kohkihdo rehn Sises pwehki mohngiongarail karakarahk oh ngehn peik, ahpw irail keriah Koht, oh men mehla. Ahpw irail kin nantihong doarehki arail mour neirail kedlahs.

15 Kedekedeo ei pahtou pwurehng pwurodohng ie, oh I kilang me rahn en kalahngan daulih irailehr, nan paliwar oh palingehn; pwe I kilang kid en irail me kamakamala nan arail uhwong arail Koht, oh koasokosokpene duwehte koiasi pohn sahpwo. Oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silipwiki pahisek pahieu.

16 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki pahisek pahieuo, Mehn Nihpai kan tepida tangasang mwohn Mehn Leimen kan; oh irail pwepweki lao irail kohla nan sahpw en Seison, mwohn arail pahn kak kauhdi irail sang tang.

17 Oh met, kahnihmw en Seison karanihte sahpw me Amaron ekihla poadoapoad kan ong Kauno, pwe en dehr ohla. Oh kilang I kohla nin duwen dahme Amaron ndaiong ie, oh ale pileit en Nihpai, oh ahpw ntingihada poadoapoad nin duwen dahme Amaron nda.

18 Oh pohn pileit en Nihpai I ntingihdi ni unsek duwen wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan koaros; ahpw phn pileit pwukat I sohte ntingihda ni unsek duwen arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan, pwe kilang, wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan kalapw wiwiawi mwohn mesei kat sangete ahnsou me I kakehr ese momour en aramas.

19 Oh meid suwed ong ie pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; pwe mohngiongi direkihla pahtou pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan, erein ei mour; ahpw, I ese me I pahn pwekpwekdahla ni imwin rahno.

20 Kedekedeo nan pahret aramas en Nihpai kan pwurehng pwepweki oh tangatang. Kedekedeo se ahpw tangatangala lao se kohla nan sahpw en paliepeng wasa me adaniki Sem.

21 Kedekedeo se ahpw silehdi kahnihmw en Sem, oh se ahpw kihpene nait aramas kan me sek kak, ele pwe sen kak doarehsang irail kamwomwala.

22 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki pahisek pahieuo irail pwurehng tepida kohdohng kiht.

23 Kedekedeo I ahpw koasoieng nei aramas akan, oh kangoangehkin irail sang ni ei ngong mehlel, me irail pahn anahne kesihnen eimah mwohn Mehn Leimen kan oh pei pwehki arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan, oh imwarail kan, oh arail wasahn keiru kan.

24 Oh ei koasoi kan ekis kihong irail kehlail, kahrehda irail sohte tang mwohn Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw irail kesihnen eimah oh pelian irail.

25 Kedekedeo se ahpw peliankinirail sounpei meh silinen ah neirail sounpei meh limenen. Kedekedeo se ahpw kesihnen kehlail mwohrail kahrehda irail tangasang mwoht.

26 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail tang nait sounpei kan ahpw pwakih irail, oh pwurehng tuhwong irail, oh keme irail; ahpw kehl en Kauno sohte ieiang kiht; ei, se pein wiwia aht, kahrehda Ngehn en Kauno sohte ieiang kiht; eri se luwetala duwehte riat akan.

27 Oh mohngiongi pahtoula pwehki kahpwal lap en nei aramas akan, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh arail tiahk suwed kan. Ahpw kilang, se kohwehng Mehn Leimen kan oh pwihn en Kadiendon lipirap ko, lao se pwurehng kalowehdi sapwat sahpw en sohso kan.

28 Oh pahr silipwiki pahisek duwao ahpw imwiseklahr. Oh nan pahr silipwiki limeiseko se ahpw wiahda inou ong Mehn Leimen kan oh pwihn en Kadiendon lipirap ko, me elehiong aht katohrepeseng sapwat sahpw en sohsou.

29 Oh Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kihong kiht sahpw en paliepeng, iei, wasa me tehtik kahluwahla nan sahpw en palieir. Oh se kihong Mehn Leimen kan sahpw me mih palieir koaros.
morm 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon kalohngki koluhla ong Mehn Nihpai kan—Irail alehdi arail pweida oh lingan laud sang pein kehlparail—Mormon soikala kahluwa irail, oh eh kapakap ki irail sohte pwoson—Pwuhk en Mormon luke keinek eisek riau en Israel en kamehlele rongamwahu. Ele Sounpar 360–362 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan sohte pwurehng kohdo mahwin lao sounpar eisek dauliher. Oh kilang, I kadoadoahkih nei aramas kan, Mehn Nihpai kan, re en kaukaunop sapwarail akan oh neirail mehn mahwin kan ong ahnsou en mahwin.

2 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ie: Kalohkehng aramas pwukat—Kumwail koluhla, oh kohdo rehi, oh papidaisla, oh pwurehng kauada ei mwomwohdiso, oh kumwail pahn mourla.

3 Oh I ahpw kalohkehng aramas pwukat, ahpw sohla katepe; oh irail sohte medewe me Kauno me ketin doareirailla, oh ketikihong irail ahnsou mwahu en koluhla. Oh irail keptakaiala mohngiongarail kan ong Kauno arail Koht.

4 Kedekedeo mwurin sounpar eisek eh imwiseklahr, me patpenehier wiahda, sounpar silipwiki weneisek sang ni ahnsou me Krais ketido, nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kadaredo kisin likou ehu ong ie, me kasalehiong ie me irail kaukaunop en kohdo mahwiniong kiht.

5 Kedekedeo I ahpw wiahiong nei aramas akan irail en kohpene nan sahpw en Tehnla, ni kahnihmw ehu me mih ni irepen sahpw, wasa me tehtik kohla nan sahpw en palieir.

6 Oh wasahu se kiheng nait sounpei kan, pwe sen kak kauhdi nein Mehn Leimen sounpei kan, pwe irail en dehr kalowehdi sapwat sahpw akan; eri se silehsang irail wasao ni aht kihong nait sounpei kan kaoros.

7 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki weneisek ehuo Mehn Leimen kan kohdihdohng mahwiniong kiht nan kahnihmw en Tehnla; oh kedekedeo nan pahro se ahpw kemeirail, lao irail pwurehng pwuralahng nan pein sapwarail.

8 Oh nan pahr silipwiki weneisek riauo irail pwurehng pwuredihdo mahwiniong kiht. Oh se pwurehng kemeirail, oh kemehla tohto irail, oh arail mehlahkan lekidekdihla nan sehdo.

9 Oh met, pwehki pweida lap wet me nei aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan wiadahr, irail tepida pohnmwahsohki pein arail kehlail, oh tepida kahukihla nanleng me irail pahn dupuk mehlahn riarail kan me arail imwintihti kan kemehla.

10 Oh irail kahkihla nanleng, oh pil mwoalen Koht, me irail pahn kohdahla mahwiniong arail imwintihti kan, oh pahn karirirailsang pohn sahpwo.

11 Kedekedeo ngehi, Mormon, ahpw soikala ni mehlel wia arail kaun en sounpei oh kaun en sang ahnsou kohla, pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan.

12 Kilang, I kahluwa irail, mehndahte arail wiewia suwed kan I kahluwa irail pak tohto nan mahwin, oh poakpoake irail, nin duwen limpoak en Koht me mih rehi, sang nan ei mohngiong unsek; oh loalleiet kin poaden kapakap ong Koht rahn koaros pwehki irail; ahpw, e sohte pwoson, pwehki keptakain mohngiongarail kan.

13 Oh pak siluh me I doarehsang irail nan pehn arail imwintihti kan, oh irail sohte koluhkihla diparail kan.

14 Oh ahnsou me irail kahukihla soahng kan me sohte mweimwei ong irail sang Kauno oh Sounkomour Sises Krais, me irail pahn kohlahng mahwiniong arail imwintihti kan, oh dupuk mehlahn riarail kan, kilang kepitien Kauno ahpw kohdohng ie, mahmahsanih:

15 Ngehi me pahn kin dupuk, oh I pahn kapwung; oh pwehki aramas pwukat sohte koluhla mwurin ei doareirailla, kilang, irail pahn karirasang pohn sampah.

16 Kedekedeo I soikala ni mehlel iang kohla mahwiniong ei imwintihti kan; oh I kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno mahsen ong ie; oh I wia sounkadehde me kilangete oh pahn kasalehiong sampah soang kan me I kilangehr oh rongehr, nin duwen dahme Ngehno ketin kadehdehki soahng kan me pahn kohdo.

17 Eri I ntingwehng kumwail, Mehn Liki kan, oh pil kumwail, peneinei en Israel, ahnsou me doadoahko pahn tepida, kumwail pahn tepida kaunopada pwuralahng sapwamwail sahpw en sohsohu;

18 Ei, kilang, I ntingwehng koaros pohn sampah; ei, ong kumwail, keinek eisek riau en Israel, me pahn pakadeikda nin duwen amwail doadoahk kan sang ehkriemen me Sises malipe re en wia sapwellime tohnpadahk kan nan sahpw en Serusalem.

19 Oh I ntingwehng kumwail kisehn aramas pwukat, me pahn pil pakadeikda sang ehkriemenme Sises malipe nan sahpwet; oh irail pahn pahn pakadeik rehn ehkriemeno me Sises malipe nan sahpw en Serusalem.

20 Oh mepwukat Ngehno ketin kasalehiong ie; eri I ntingihdi ong kumwail koaros. Oh kahrepe wet me kahrehda ei ntingwei rehmwail, pwe kumwail en kak ese me kumwail koaros pahn kesihnen mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais, ei, ngehn koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Adam; oh kumwail pahn kesihnenda oh pakadeingki amwail doadoahk kan, ma e mwahu de suwed;

21 Oh pil pwe kumwail en kak kamehlele rongamwahu en Sises Krais, me pahn mih rehmwail; oh pil pwe Mehn Suhs akan, sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inou kan, pahn mie ekei sounkadehde likin Sises me irail kilang oh rong, me irail kemehla, me iei udahn Kraiso oh udahn Kohto.

22 Oh I men kangoangehki kumwail koaros pohn sampah en koluhla oh kaunopadahng kesihnen mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais.
morm 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mahwin oh mehla doudoulahte—Me suwed kaloke me suwed—Wiewia suwed lalaudla oh doarasang mwehi koaros nan Israel—Lih kan oh seri kan wiahla meirong ong dikadik en eni kan—Mehn Leimen kan pwakiala Mehn Nihpai kan sang mwohrail. Ele Sounpar 363–375 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki weneisek siluho nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan ahpw kohdahla mahwiniong Mehn Leimen kan, likin sahpw en Tehnla.

2 Kedekedeo nein Mehn Nihpai sounpei kan pwurehng pweiekido nan sahpw en Tehnla. Oh ni arail wie luluwet, a nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei kapw kei ahpw kohdohng irail; mahwin kehlail ehu ahpw wiawi nanpwungarail, kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kalowehdi kahnihmw en Tehnla, oh kemehla Mehn Nihpai tohto, oh saliedi oh wahsang tohto irail.

3 Oh me luhwehdi kan ahpw tang oh kohla patehng tohn kahnihmw en Dienkom. Met kahnihmw en Dienkom kin mih ni mwahn oaroahro; oh e pil karanih kahnihmw en Tehnla.

4 Oh met pwehki nein Mehn Nihpai kan sounpei kan kohdahlahng Mehn Leimen kan me kahrehda arail tepida kamakam; pwe ma re sohte wia met, Mehn Leimen kan sohte kak powehdi irail.

5 Ahpw, kilang, sapwellimen Koht kopwung kan pahn kalowehdi me suwed kan; oh me suwed kan kin kamakam rehn me suwed kan; pwe me suwed kan me kin kamwakidada nan mohngiong en aramas akan re en kamaramas.

6 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kaukaunop en kohdohng kahnihmw en Dienkom.

7 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki weneisek pahieuo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohdohng kahnihmw en Dienkom, pwe irail en kak pil kalowehdi kahnihmw en Dienkom.

8 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohdo mahwin oh Mehn Nihpai kan pwakihirailla. Oh ahnsou me Mehn Nihpai kan kilangada me Mehn Leimen kan pweiekla irail ahpw pwurehng tepida pohnmwahsohki pein arail kehlail; oh irail kohkihwei pein arail kehl, oh pwurehng kalowehdi kahnihmw en Tehnla.

9 Oh met mepwukat koaros wiawiher, oh uwen aramas kei kamakamala pali koaros, koaros Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan.

10 Kedekedeo pahr silipwiki weneisek weneu ahpw imwiseklahr, oh Mehn Leimen kan pwurehng pwurodo mahnwiniong Mehn Nihpai kan; ahpw Mehn Nihpai kan sohte koluhkihla arail suwed me irail wiadahr, ahpw wenlahte wiwia arail wiewia suwed kan.

11 Oh e apwal lokaia en kak kawehwehda, de aramas en kawehwehda unsek ni nting soangen kamasepwehk en mwomwen kamaramas oh mehla me kin wiawi rehn aramas, en Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan koaros; oh mohngiong koaros keptakaila, kahrehda irail wenwenlahte pereniki kemehla aramas.

12 Oh saikinte pak ehu soangen wiewia suwed lap wet wiawi rehn nein Lihai seri kan koaros, de pil nan peneinei en Israel koaros, nin duwen mahsen kan en Kauno, me rasehng dahme wiawi rehn aramas pwukat.

13 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kalowehdi kahnihmw en Tehnla, oh met pwehki arail tohtohsang Mehn Nihpai kan.

14 Oh irail ahpw pil karihs kohwehng kahnihmw en Dienkom, oh pwakihsang tohn kahnihmwo, oh saliedi oh wahsang lih oh seri tohto, oh kin wihkinirail arail mehn meiroang ong arail koht dikadik en eni kan.

15 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki weneisek isuho, pwehki Mehn Nihpai kan ar lingeringerki Mehn Leimen kan arail meirongkihla neiral lih akan oh seri kan, kahrehda irail kohwehng Mehn Leimen kan nan arail lingeringer mehlel, kahrehda irail kemehda Mehn Leimen kan, oh pwakihsang irail nan sapwaraillo.

16 Oh Mehn Leimen kan sohte pwurehng kohdohng Mehn Nihpai kan lao le nan pahr silipwiki isihsek limao.

17 Oh nan pahret irail ahpw kohdihdohng Mehn Nihpai kan ni arail kehlail koaros; oh irail sohte kak wadawadi pwehki uwen tohtohn irail.

18 Oh sang ahnsou wet kohla Mehn Nihpai kan sohte kak powehdi Mehn Leimen kan, ahpw re tepida kamwakidsang mwohrail duwehte pwoaik mwohn ketipino.

19 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohdihdohng kahnihmw en Tehnla; oh mahwin kehlail ehu ahpw wiawi nan sahpw en Tehnla, oh nan mahwino irail kemehda Mehn Nihpai kan.

20 Oh irail pwurehng tangasang mwohrail, oh irail kohdohng kahnihmw en Pwuas; oh wasahu irail pelianda Mehn Leimen kan nan arail eimah mehlel, kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan sohte keme irail wasahu lao lel keriapak en arail pwurodohng irail.

21 Oh ahnsou me irail pwurodohng irail keriapako, Mehn Nihpai kan pwepwekihsang oh kamakamkihla kamakam laud mehlel; neirail lih kan oh seri kan pwurehng wiahla meirong ong dikadik en eni kan.

22 Kedekedeo Mehn Nihpai kan ahpw pwurehng tangasang mwohrail, wahsang towehkan koaros, nan kahnihmw oh kousapw akan.

23 Oh met ngehi, Mormon, pwehki ei kilangadahr Mehn Leimen kan arail pahn kalowehdier sahpwo, eri I ahpw kohla ni dohl en Sim, oh alehda poadoapoad kan koaros me Amaron ekihla ong Kauno.
morm 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon pwurehng kaweid nein Mehn Nihpai kan sounpei kan nan mahwin en kamaramas oh mehla—Pwuhk en Mormon pahn kohdo pwe en kadehdehiong mehn Israel koaros me Sises iei Krais—Pwehki arail sohpwoson, Mehn Leimen kan pahn kamweremwerpeseng, oh Ngehno pahn ketin sohla ieiang irail—Irail pahn alehdi rongamwahuo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan ni imwin rahn akan. Ele Sounpar 375–383 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo I ahpw kohwei rehn Mehn Nihpai kan, oh peki mahngki kahula me I wiahda me sohte pahn pwurehng sowese irail; oh irail kihong ie I en pwurehng kaunda neirail sounpei kan, pwe irail kilang ie duwehte me I pahn kak doarehsang irail nan arail kahpwal kan.

2 Ahpw kilang, I sohla ahneki koapworopwor, pwe I ese me sapwellimen Kauno kopwung me pahn kohdohng irail; pwe irail sohte koluhkihla diparail akan, ahpw wie nannantihong nan arail mour ni arail sohte peki rehn Kauno me kapikada irail.

3 Kedekedeo Mehn Leimen kan ahpw kohdohng kiht ni aht tang kohla nan kahnihmw en Sordan; pwe kilang, irail pwepwekihla kahrehda irail sohte kihsang kahnihmwo ahnsouo.

4 Kedekedeo irail pwurehng kohdohng kiht, oh se katengetengdi nan kahnihmwo. Oh pil mie ekei kahnihmw me mehn Nihpai kan kolokolete, me silepe kan kauhdi irail sang re en pidelong nan wehio me mih mwoht, pwe en kawehla tohn sapwato.

5 Ahpw kedekedeo sahpw koaros me se daulih, oh toweh kan sohte kohpene, Mehn Leimen kan kamwomwala irail, oh arail kousoan kan, oh kousapw kan, kahnihmw kan isihsla; oh met kaimwsekalahr pahr silipwiki isihsek duwao.

6 Kedekedeo nan pahr silipwiki welihseko Mehn Leimen kan ahpw pwurehng kohdohng mahwiniong kiht, oh se peliankinirail aht eimah; ahpw e sohte katepe, pwehki uwen tohtohn irail irail tiakpene aramas en Nihpai kan pahn nehrail kan.

7 Kedekedeo se ahpw pwurehng tang, oh irail kan me tang mwadang sang Mehn Leimen kan irail pitila, oh irail kan me tang pwand sang Mehn Leimen kan irail palidi oh kamwomwala.

8 Oh met kilang, ngehi, Mormon, sohte inangih I en kalokehki loallen aramas ni ei pahn kasalehda mwohrail kilel en kamaramas oh mehla me mih mwohn meseiet; ahpw pwehki ei wehwehki me mepwukat udahn pahn sansalada, oh me soahng koaros me ekiekla udahn pahn sansalada pohn ihmw kan—

9 Oh me pil wehwehn mepwukat udahn pahn kohdohng kisehng aramas pwukat, oh pil ong Mehn Liki kan, me Kauno ketin mahsanih pahn kamwerepeseng aramas pwukat, oh aramas pwukat pahn sohte katepe ong irail—eri I pahn ntingihda ekiste oarelap, oh sohte pahn udahn sair ni unsek soahng kan me I kilang, pwehki kosonned me I alehdi, oh pil me kumwail sohte pahn ahneki pahtou laud pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat.

10 Oh met kilang, I koasoieng kadaudokerail kan, oh pil Mehn Liki kan me kesempwaliki peneinei en Israel, me wehwehkihda oh ese sang iawasa arail kapai kohsang.

11 Pwe I ese me met pahn kahrehda arail pahtouki kahpwal me pahn kohieng peneinei en Israel, ei, irail pahn pahtoukihla kamwomwala aramas pwukat; irail pahn pahtouki aramas pwukat arail sohte koluhkihla pwe Sises en kak aleirailda nin lime kan.

12 Met mepwukat ntingwehng luhwen peneinei en Seikop; oh e ntingdi ni mwohmw wet, pwehki Koht ketin mwahngi me wiwia suwed sohte pahn kahluwahdo mepwukat ong irail; oh mepwukat pahn nekinekla ong Kauno pwe sang pein sapwellime ahnsou mepwukat pahn kohdo.

13 Oh met iei kosonned me I alehdi; oh kilang, mepwukat pahn kohdo nin duwen sapwellimen kauno kosonned, ahnsou me e pahn ketin mwahngi me e konehng, sang ni sapwellime eripit.

14 Oh kilang, mepwukat pahn kohwei rehn mehn Suhs me sohte kamehlele kan; oh iei kahrepe wet mepwukat pahn kohwei—pwe irail en kak esehda me Sises iei Krais, Sapwellimen Koht ieiaso; me Sahmo pahn ketikihda, sang rehn sapwellime keieu Kempoako, sapwellime koasoandi lap oh soutuk, ong kapwurehdo mehn Suhs kan, de peneinei en Israel koaros, ong nan sapwarail sahpw en sohso, me Kauno arail Koht ketikihong irail, pwe sapwellime inouo en pweida;

15 Oh pil pwe kadaudok en aramas pwukat en kamehlelehda ni unsek sapwellime rongamwahu, me pahn kohwei sang rehrail ong Mehn Liki kan; pwe aramas pwukat pahn mwerpeseng, oh pahn wiahla aramas rotorot, samin, oh kailok, me pahn siksang me wiawihong kitailehr, iei, dahme wiawihiong Mehn Leimen kan, oh me pwehki arail sohpwoson oh kin pwongi dikadik en eni.

16 Pwe kilang, Ngehn en Kauno solahr ieiang arail pahpa ko; oh sohte Krais oh Koht rehrail nan sampah; oh irail pwepwekihwei duwehte dihpw kisinieng eh kin ipirseli dihpw meng.

17 Irail wia aramas mwahu ahnsou ehu, oh irail kin wiahki Krais silaparail; ei, Koht Sahm kin kahluwa irail.

18 Ahpw met, kilang, Sehdan me kakahluwa irail, iei duwehte kisinineng eh kin ipirseli dihpw meng, de duwehte wahr ieu me kin lekidekseli nan ilok kan, ni eh sohte serek de angke, de sohte mehkot kak kainene; oh nin duwen met, iei pil pahn mwomwarail.

19 Oh kilang, Kauno ketin koledi arail kapai kan, me irail kakete alehdi nan sahpwo, pwe Mehn Liki kan me pahn kousoanla nan sahpwo.

20 Ahpw kilang, ahnsou pahn lelledo me Mehn Liki kan pahn pwakih irail oh kamwereirailpeseng; oh mwurin Mehn Liki kan ar pahn pwakih irail oh kamwereirailpeseng, kilang, Kauno ahpw pahn tamanda inou me ketin inoukihong Eipraam oh ong peneinei en Israel koaros.

21 Oh pil Kauno pahn tamataman kapakap en me mwahu kan, me kohlahngehr ih sang irail.

22 Oh eri, kumwail Mehn Liki kan, ia mwomwen amwail pahn kak kesihnen mwohn manaman en Koht, ma kumwail sohte koluhla oh sohpeisang amwail wiwia suwed kan?

23 Kumwail sohte ese me Koht me ketin doandoare kumwail? Kumwail sohte ese me e ketin sapwellimaniki manaman koaros, oh sang ni sapwellime pahngok sampah pahn kohpene duwehte doaropwe ehu me weliwelpene?

24 Eri, kumwail koluhla, oh karakarahkala mwowe, pwe e de pahn kohdohng kumwail nan kopwung pwung—pwe luhwen kadaudok en Seikop pahn kohwei nanpwungamwail rasohng laion, oh tehr kumwailpeseng, oh sohte me pahn kak doarehla.
morm 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Nihpai kan pokonpene nan sahpw en Komora ong arail lahs en mahwin—Mormon ekihla poadoapoad sarawi ko ni dohl en Komora—Mehn Leimen kan pweida nan mahwino, oh wehin Mehn Nihpai kan kamwomwala—Aramas en Nihpai kid kei kamakamkihla kedlahs. Ele Sounpar 385 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met I kanekehlahr ei ntingih duwen kamwomwalahn nei aramas en, Mehn Nihpai kan. Kedekedeo se ahpw karihs kohwei mwohn Mehn Leimen kan.

2 Oh ngehi, Mormon, ntingihla ehu kisin likou ong nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan, oh peki reh en mweidehng kiht ma se kak kihpene nait aramas akan ong nan sahpw en Komora, ni dohl ehu me adaniki Komora, oh wasahu se pahn mahwiniong irail.

3 Kedekedeo nanmwarki en Mehn Leimen kan ahpw mweidehng ie dahme I peki rehu.

4 Kedekedeo se ahpw karihs kohla nan sahpw en Komora, oh se ahpw kihda aht impwal akan kapilpene dohl en Komora; oh e wia sahpw me diren pihl, pil lap kan, oh utuhnpil kan; oh wasa se kasik me se pahn kak powehdi Mehn Leimen kan.

5 Oh ahnsou me pahr silipwiki welihsek pahieu imwiseklahr, se ahpw kihpenehier luhwen nait aramas koaros nan sahpw en Komora.

6 Kedekedeo ahnsou me se kihpenehier nait aramas koaros nan sahpw en Komora, kilang ngehi, Mormon, tepier mahla; oh pwehki ei ese me ih lahs en nei aramas ar pahn wia arail kak koaros, oh pwehki Kauno eh ketin mahsanihong ie me I sohte pahn mweidehng poadoapoad sarawi ko me aht pahpa kahlapoko kadakadaurkohdo en kohieng nan pehn Mehn Leimen kan, (pwe Mehn Leimen kan pahn kawehla) eri I ntinihda poadoapoadwet sang nan pileit en Nihpai, oh ekihla koaros poadoapoad kan me Kauno ketin likihkiong ie, ihte ekei me I kihong nei pwukat Moronai.

7 Kedekedeo nei aramas akan, iangahki arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan, ahpw kilangada nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei kan ar karkarihskohdohng irail; oh irail awiawih irail nan arail ahneki lemw me kin sansal pohn aramas koaros me me dipan ahpw masak mehla.

8 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohdohng mahwiniong kiht, oh aramas koaros direkihla masepwehk pwehki uwen tohtohn irail.

9 Kedekedeo irail ahpw mahwinkihong nei aramas akan kedlahs, oh kesik ketieu, oh arep, oh sile, oh soangsoangen dipwisou en mahwin kan.

10 Kedekedeo nei ohl akan kamakamala, iei, nei meh nen me iangie, oh I pwupwidi nanpwungarail ohla; oh irail daulih ie oh sohte kemeiehla.

11 Oh ahnsou me irail kohlahr oh kemehla nei aramas akan koaros ihte kiht meh riehk pahmen, (emen iei nei pwutak Moronai) oh pwehki aht mourla sang nait aramas akan, se ahpw kilangidi mandahu, ahnsou me Mehn Leimen kan pwuralahr wasahn arail komoalo, sang pohn dohl en Komora, pwehki ei tiehngkihla mwowehu nei aramas meh kido irail kamakamala.

12 Oh se pil kilangidi nein Moronai aramas meh nen me e kahluwahu.

13 Oh kilang, nein Kidkiddona meh nen pil mehla, oh pil iangahki ih nanpwungarail.

14 Oh Leima pil mehla iangahki nah meh nen; oh Kilkal pil mehla iangahki nah meh nen; oh Limah pil mehla iangahki nah meh nen; Seneium pil mehla iangahki nah meh nen; oh Kumenaia, Moronaia, oh Andionum, oh Siplom, oh Sem, oh Sohs, koaros mehla iangahki neirail meh nen kan.

15 Kedekedeo mie ekei meh ehk me pil kamakamkihla kedlahs, iangahki meh nen kan me emen emen irail kin nainki; iei, koaros nei aramas akan mehla, ihte meh riehk pahmeno me iangie, oh pil ekei me pitila oh tangala nan wehin palieir kan, oh ekei me iangala mehn Leimen kan; oh uduken me mehla kan, oh tihrail kan, oh ntahrail mihseli pohn pwehl, pwe irail me kemeirailla kohkohlahsang oh paliwar akan mwoasoahngotpene pohn sahpwo, oh mwerpeseng oh pwuralahng pwehl.

16 Oh palingeniet ohkilahr lokolok, pwehki kamakamalahn nei aramas akan, oh I ahpw werikihla:

17 Oh kumwail me kaselel akan, ia duwen amwail kak kohsang nan sapwellimen Kauno ahl akan! Oh kumwail me kaselel akan, ia duwen amwail kak soikala Sises, me ketin kesikesihnen nin lime kan onopadahr en ale kumwail!

18 Kilang, ma kumwail sohte wia met, kumwail sohte pahn pwupwidi. Ahpw kilang, kumwail pwupwidier, oh I sengisengki amwail melahr.

19 Oh kumwail pwutak oh serepein kaselel kan, kumwail pahpa kan oh nohno kan, kumwail ohl oh lih pwopwoud kan, kumwail me kaselel kan, ia duwen amwail kak pwupwidi!

20 Ahpw kilang, kumwail solahr mie, oh ei pahtou kan sohte kak kapwureikumwaildo.

21 Oh rahno pahn kereniong leledo me amwail mour pahn mour poatoapoat, oh paliwar pwukat me ahnsou wet mweremwerkipeseng eh mwoasoahngot pahn alehda paliwar me pahn sohte kak mwerpeseng; oh kumwail ahpw pahn kesihnen mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais, pwe en pakadeingki duwen amwail doadoahk kan; oh ma kumwail mour pwung, eri kumwail pahn meid pai iang amwail pahpa ko me tihenglahr mwomwail.

22 Oh ma kumwail koluhlahte mwohn kamwomwala lap wet eh kohieng kumwail. Ahpw kilang, kumwail solahr mie, oh Sahmo, ei, Sahme Soutuk en nanleng, ketin mwahngih irair en amwail mour; oh e pahn ketin wiahiong kumwail nin duwen sapwellime kopwung pwung oh kumwur kalahngan.
morm 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mormon luke Mehn Leimen kan en imwin rahn akan en kamehlele Krais, alehda Sapwellime rongamwahu, oh komourla—Koaros me pahn kamehlele Paipel pahn pil kamehlele Pwuhk en Mormon. Ele Sounpar 385 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met, kilang, I pahn koasoi ong kisehn luhwen aramas pwukat me pahn mourla, ma Koht pahn ketin ketikihong irail ei koasoi kan, pwe irail en kak ese soahng kan duwen arail pahpa kahlapoko; ei, I koasoi ong kumwail, kumwail kisehn luhwen peneinei en Israel; oh iet akan koasoi kan me I pahn koasoia:

2 I men kumwail en ese me kumwail iei kisehn peneinei en Israel.

3 I men kumwail en ese me kumwail anahne koluhla, ma soh, kumwail sohte kak komourla.

4 I men kumwail en ese me kumwail anahne pwilikihdi noumwail dipwisou en mahwin kan, oh dehr pereniki kamaramas, oh dehr pwurehng alehda, ihta ma Koht ketin mahsanihong kumwail.

5 I men kumwail en ese me kumwail anahne wehwehkihda duwen amwail pahpa kahlapoko, oh koluhkihla dipamwail oh amwail wiewia suwed koaros, oh kamehlele Sises Krais, me ih iei Sapwellimen Kohto, oh me e kamakamala rehn mehn Suhs akan, oh sang ni manaman en Sahmo e ketin iasadahr, me elehiong eh ketin powehdi mehla; oh pil sang ih en kasohrehla medek en mehla.

6 Oh e ahpw ketikihda iasadahn me mehla kan, me elehiong aramas pahn iasada oh kesihnen mwohn sapwellime mwoalen kopwungo.

7 Oh e ketin ketikihdo komourpen sampah, me elehiong mehmen me pahn dierek mwakelekel mwowe ni rahn en kopwungo pahn mweimweiong en iang kousoan mwohn silangin Koht nan sapwellime wehi, en iang pwihn en koul nanleng kokoulki kaping sohte uhdi ong Sahmo, oh ong Sapwellimehu, oh ong Ngehn Sarawi, me wia Kohtehmen, nan mour peren me sohte imwi.

8 Eri koluhla, oh papidaisla ni mwaren Sises, oh koledi rongamwahu en Krais, me pahn mih mwohmwail, kaidehnte sang nan pwuhk wet ahpw pil sang nan pwuhk me pahn kohdo rehn Mehn Liki kan sang rehn mehn Suhs kan, me wia pwuhk me pahn kohsang Mehn Liki kan kohdohng kumwail.

9 Pwe kilang, kahrepen met e wie ntintingdi pwe kumwail en kak kamehlele mwo; oh ma kumwail kamehlele mwo a kumwail pahn pil kamehlele met; oh ma kumwail kamehlele met kumwail pahn wehwehki duwen amwail pahpa kahlapoko, oh pil doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan me wiawi rehrail sang ni manaman en Koht.

10 Oh kumwail pahn pil ese me kumwail wia kisehn luhwen peneinei en Seikop; eri kumwail iang wadawadiong rehn aramas en tepin inouo; oh ma kumwail kamehlele Krais, oh papidaila, nan pihl mahs, mwuri a kisiniei oh iangahki Ngehn Sarawi, ideidawehn karasaras en atail Sounkomouro, nin duwen dahme e ketin mahsaniong kitail, e pahn mwahu ong kumwail ni rahn en kopwungo. Ahmen.
morm 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Leimen akan rapahki oh kamwomwala Mehn Nihpai kan—Pwuhk en Mormon pahn kohdo sang ni manaman en Koht—Meid suwediong irail akan me pahn akamaiong oh uhwong doadoahk en Kauno—Poadoapoad en Mehn Nihpai kan pahn kohdo nan ahnsou me wiewia suwed wiwiawi, aramas wie susuwedla, oh pwupwila wiwiawi. Ele Sounpar 400–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kilang ngehi, Moronai, kanekelahr ehn ei pahap, Mormon, eh nting. Kilang, mie ekei mehkot me I pahn ntingih, me ei pahpa ndahiongie I en wia.

2 Oh met kedekedeo mwurin mahwin lap oh kapwuriamwei me wiawi Komora, kilang, Mehn Nihpai kan me pitila oh kohla nan wehin palieir kan Mehn Leimen kan rapahkin irail, lao irail koaros kamwomwala.

3 Oh ei pahpa pil kamakamala rehrail, oh ngehi kelehpw me luwehdi pwe I en ntingih soi en kamwomwalahn nei aramas akan. Ahpw kilang, irail solahr mie, oh I pahn kanekehla kehkehlik en ei pahpao. Oh I sohte ese ma irail pahn kemeiehla.

4 Eri I pahn ntingih oh ekihla poadoapoad kan nan pwehl; oh e sohte katepe wasa I pahn kohla.

5 Kilang, ei pahpao wiahda poadoapoad wet, oh e ntingihdier kahrepehu. Oh kilang, ma mie dewe pohn pileit wet I pil pahn ntingihdi, ahpw solahr dewe; oh solahr met rehi, pwehki I kelehpwlahr. Ei pahpao kamakamala nan mahwin, oh ei peneinei koaros, oh solahr kempoakepahi de pil wasa I kak kohla; oh I sohte ese ia uwen werei me Kauno pahn mweidehng ien momour.

6 Kilang, sounparehr pahpwiki dauliher ketidohn atail Kaun oh Sounkomouro.
