7 Oh kilang, Mehn Leimen akan pwakihdier oh kemehla nei aramas akan, Mehn Nihpai kan, sang nan ehu kahnihmw kohla nan ehu oh sang ehu wasa kohla nan ehu wasa, lao irail sohrala; oh arail pwupwidi me lap mehlel; ei, kamwomwalahn nei aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan me lap oh kapwuriamwei.

8 Oh kilang, ie limen Kauno me ketin wiahier met. Oh pil kilang, Mehn Leimen akan pil mahwinpenehr nan pwungarail; oh pohn sahpwo pwohn kin kapwkapwurehiong kamaramas oh mahwin; oh sohte me ese imwin mahwin.

9 Oh met, kilang, I solahr pahn kosoia duwen irail, pwe sohlahr ekei aramas ihte Mehn Leimen akan oh pwihn lipirap akan me mihmi pohn sahpwo.

10 Oh sohte me ese duwen Koht mehlelo ihte tohn padahk en Sises ko, me mihmi nan sahpwo lao wiewia suwed en aramas akan laudla me kahrehda Kauno sohte mweidehng irail en mihmi rehn aramas akan; oh sohte me ese ma irail mihmi pohn sahpwet.

11 Ahpw kilang, ei pahpao oh ngehi kilang irailehr, oh irail soweseikihtehr.

12 Oh mehmen me pahn alehdi nting pwukat, oh sohte pahn kauwe pwehki sohitar akan me mih loale, iei ih me pahn esehla soahng kan me lapasang mepwukat. Kilang, ngehi Moronai; ma e kak, I pahn kasalehiong kumwail soahng koaros.

13 Kilang, I kaimwsekalahr ei koskosoia duwen aramas pwukat. Ngehi nein Mormon pwutak, oh ei pahpao wia emen kadaudok en Nihpai.

14 Oh ngehite me ekihla poadoapoad pwukat ong Kauno; pileit ko sohte kesempwal, pwehki kosonned en Kauno. Pwe mehlel e ketin mahsanihier me sohte emen pahn alehda pileitko pwe en kepwehpwehkihla; ahpw nting kan kesempwal mehlel; oh mehmen me pahn kapwarahda, Kauno pahn ketin kapaiada ih.

15 Pwe sohte emen kak ahneki manaman en kapwarahda nan marain ihte ma Koht ketin ketikihong ih; pwe Koht ketin kupwuriki me e pahn wiawi sang ni loaloapwoat ong sapwellime klohri, de ong sawasepen sapwellimen Kauno aramas me wiahda inou mahs oh salongala ahnsou werei.

16 Oh meid pai ih me pahn kapwarahda nan marain; pwe e pahn kohdohsang nan rotorot ong nan marain, nin duwen mahsen en Koht; ei, e pahn kohsang nan pwehl, oh e pahn marain sang nan rotorot, oh aramas akan pahn wehwehkihda; oh e pahn wiawi sang ni manaman en Koht.

17 Oh ma mie sohitar kan e wia sohitar en aramas. Ahpw kilang, se sohte ese wasa sohitar; eri Koht me ketin mwahngih soahng koaros; eri, mehmen me pahn kauwe, mweidehng en tehk mwahu pwe e de pahn mihmi nan keper en nan kisiniei en ehl.

18 Oh mehmen me pahn nda: Kasalehiong ie, ma soh, ke pahn kamakam—en ahpw kanaiehng pwe e de ruwese dahme Kauno sohte mweidada.

19 Pwe kilang, aramas me pahn kadeik ni sohte madamadau pahn pwurehng kadeiko; pwe nin duwen eh doadoahk kan e pahn ale pweipweiki; eri, mehmen me pahn kaloke emen pahn alehdi kalokepe sang Kauno.

20 Kilang dahme pwuhk sarawi mahsanih—aramas sohte pahn kaloke, de pahn kadeik; pwe Kauno mahsanih, ei pwukoa kadeik oh dupuk, oh I pahn kapwungala.

21 Oh mehmen me pahn akamaiong oh uhwong sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk, oh uhwong sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inou me wia peneinei en Israel, oh pahn nda: Se pahn kawehla sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk, oh Kauno sohte pahn tamataman sapwellime inou me e ketin wiahiong peneinei en Israel—aramaso mihmi nan keper en palidi oh lekidekla nan kisiniei;

22 Pwe sapwellimen Kauno koasondi poatoapoat kan pahn kohkohwei, lao sapwellime inou kan koaros pahn pweida.

23 Rapahki kokohp en Aiseia kan. Kilang, I sohte kak ntingihdi. Ei, kilang I ndaiong kumwail, me souleng kan me tihenglahr mwohi, me sapwasapw pohn sahpwet, pahn peki, iei pahn peki rehn Kauno sang nan pwehl; oh nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias e pahn ketin tamataman inou me e ketin wiahiong irailehr.

24 Oh e ketin mwahngih arail kapakap kan, me irail kapakapki riarail akan. Oh e ketin mwahngih arail pwoson, pwehki ni mware irail kak kamwakid nahna kan; oh ni mware irail kak wiada rer en sahpw; oh sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahsen irail kahrehiong imweteng kan rengkidi nan pwehl; iei, kisiniei mwehl kan sohte kak kaweirailla, de pil mahn lawalo kan de pil sineik poisin kan, pwehki manaman en sapwellime mahseno.

25 Oh kilang, arail kapakap kan pil ong ih me Kauno pahn ketin mweidehng en kapwarahda mepwukat.

26 Oh sohte me anahne nda soahng pwukat sohte pahn pweida, pwe e udahn pahn pweida, pwe Kauno me ketin mahsanih; pwe e pahn kohsang nan pwehl, sang nin limen Kauno, oh sohte me kak kauhdi; oh e pahn wiawi ni ahnsou me aramas pahn nda me doadoahk kapwuriamwei solahr wiawi; oh e pahn kohdo rasehng aramas men me koasoakoasoi sang rehn me mehlahr.

27 Oh e pahn kohdo ni ahnsou me ntahng souleng kan pahn pekipek rehn Kauno, pwehki pwihn suwed rir kan oh doadoahk en rotorot kan.

28 Ei, e pahn kohdo ahnsou me aramas pahn lahlahwe manaman en Koht, oh mwomwohdiso kan pahn saminla oh aklapalapkihla pohnmwahsohn nan mohngiongarail kan; iei, ahnsou me kaun en mwomwohdiso kan oh sounpadahk kan pahn kohkihda arail pohnmwahso nan mohngiongarail kan, me kahrehda arail noahroke irail akan me kin iang arail mwomwohdiso kan.

29 Ei, e pahn kohdo ahnsou me pahn mie rohng en kisiniei, oh kisinieng kehlail, oh edied en samin nan wehwe nan sahpw en liki kan;

30 Oh aramas pahn rong duwen mahwin kan, rohng en mahwin kan, oh rerrer en sahpw kan.

31 Ei, e pahn kohdo ahnsou me samin laud pahn mih pohn sampah; kamaramas pahn wiawi, oh pirap, oh likamw, oh mwekid en ketewehdi kan, oh nenek kan, oh soangsoangen wiewia suwed kan; ahnsou me aramas tohto pahn nda, E sohte wiada mehkot ma ke wia me, de wia mwo, pwe Kauno pahn utunguhkada ni imwin rahno. Ahpw meid suwediong soangen aramaso, pwe irail mihmier nan kahpwal en pahtou oh nan sahl en dihp kan.

32 Ei, e pahn kohdo ahnsou me mwomwohdiso kan me pahn wiawihda pahn nda: Kumwail kohdo rehi oh kumwail kak pwainkihda dipamwail kan noumwail mohni kan.

33 Oh kumwail aramas suwed oh apwal oh keptakai, dahme kumwail wiahkihda mwomwohdiso ong pein kumwail pwe kumwail en kepwehpwehkihla? Dahme kumwail wekidalahki mahsen sarawi en Koht, pwe kumwail en kihong palingenomwail kan kahpwal en lekidekla? Kilang, kumwail kilang kaudiahl kan en Koht; pwe kilang, ahnsou pahn kohdo ni rahn me mepwukat koaros pahn pweida.

34 Kilang, Kauno ketin kasalehiong ie soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan me pid duwen dahme pahn kereniongehr kohdo, ni rahno me mepwukat pahn kohdo rehmwail.

35 Kilang, I koasoi ong kumwail duwehte me kumwail mihmi rehi, ahpw met soh. Ahpw kilang, Sises Krais ketin kasalehiong ie kumwail, oh I ese amwail wiewia kan.

36 Oh I ese me kumwail kekeid nan pohnmwahsohn mohngiongamwail kan; oh sohte ihte ekeite me sohte pohnmwahsohla nan mohngiongarail akan, ong ni likawih likou kaselel kan, ong noahrok, oh akamai, oh aklemei, oh kailok kan, oh soangsoangen wiewia suwed kan; oh amwail mwomwohdiso kan, iei, emen emen kumwail, saminlahr pwehki pohnmwahsohn nan mohngiongamwail kan.

37 Pwe kilang, kumwail poakehng mohni, oh amwail dipwisou kan, oh amwail likou kaselel kan, oh kalinganpen amwail mwomwohdiso kan, laud sang amwail poakehng me semwehmwe kan oh anahn akan, me soumwahu kan oh apwal akan.

38 Oh kumwail me saminlahr kan, kumwail me liksansalamwahu kan, kumwail sounpadahk kan, me kin netikinkumwailahng soang kan me pahn kaweikumwailla, dahme kumwail kasaminehkihla mwomwohdiso sarawi en Koht? Dahme kumwail namenengki alehda mwaren Krais? Dahme kumwail sohte kin medewehki kamwahupe lap en peren poatoapoat sang lokolok sohte imwi—pwehki kepingahkan en sampah?

39 Dahme kumwail kin perenki dahme sohte mourih, oh mweidala me mehn mwonge kan, oh me apwal kan, oh me sohte arail likou kan, oh me soumwahu oh me apwal akan en daulihuk, oh sohte pohnese irail?

40 Ei, dahme kumwail kin wiahkihda amwail pwihn suwed rir kan pwe kumwail en kepwepwehkihla, oh kahrehda lihodi kan pen mwahiei mwohn Kauno, oh pil seri sopwoupwou kan en mwahiei mwohn Kauno, oh pil ntahn arail pahpa kan oh arail pwoud kan en pekipek ong Kauno sang nan pwehl, pwe en dupukiong pohmwail?

41 Kilang, kedlahs en dupuk tentenek pohmwail; oh ahnsou kerendohr me e pahn dupukiong kumwail ntahn souleng kan, pwe e sohte pahn mweidehng arail pekipek en doudoulahte.
morm 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai luke irail akan me sohte kamehlele Krais en koluhla—E kalohngki Koht en doadoahk manaman, me kin ketikihda kaudiahl akan oh ketin kapwilewei kisakis akan oh kilel akan ong me pwoson akan—manaman akan uhdi pwehki soupwoson—Kilel akan idawehn irail akan me kin kamehlel—Aramas akan en kin ale kaweid pwe irail en marainla oh kolokol kosonned akan.[/i]

1 Oh met, I pahn koasoia duwen irail akan me sohte kin kamehlel Krais.

2 Kilng dah kumwail pahn kamehlele ni rahno me e pahn kedidohng kumwail—kilang, ni ahnsou me Kauno pahn ketido, iei, rahn lapalapome sampah pahn welpene duwehte tehn doaropwe ieu, oh mehkan me wiahda sampah pahn peikihpeseng karakar laud, ei, ni rahn lap me kumwail pahn wisikido pwehn kesihnen mwohn simpwul en Koht—eri dah, kumwail pahn koasoia me sohte Koht?

3 Eri ia duwe, kumwail pahn kin kasohwehte Krais, de dah, kumwail kak kilang simpwul en Koht? Dah, kumwail leme me kumwail pahn mihla reh ma kumwail ese duwen dipamwail akan? Dah, kumwail leme me kumwail kak pereniki mihla rehn Koht Sarawio, ni ahnsou me kumwail ohkilahr amwail ese duwen amwail dipaniki amwail kasapwungelahr sapwellime kosonned akan?

4 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me e pahn inenen kansensuwed en mihla rehn Koht sarawi oh pwung, ni amwail ese amwail samin mwohwe sang amwail en mihla rehn irail akan me lekdeklahr nan ehlo.

5 Pwe kilang, ahnsou me kumwail pahn wehwehkihda amwail sapwung kan mwohn Koht, oh pil kilang duwen klohri en Koht, oh duwen sarawi en Sises Krais, me pahn isikada kisiniei me sohte kak tukedi rehmwail.

6 Oh eri kumwail me kin sohte kamehlel kan, kumwail en sohpeiong Kauno; kehlail likiwer ong Sahmo ni mwaren Sises, pwe mweinele kumwail en kak dierek sohte dihp, mwakelekel, mwahu, oh pwetepwet, sang ni kamwakelkihda ntahn Sihmpwulo, ni imwin rahn lapo.

7 Oh I pil ndaiong kumwail me kin kasohwe kaudiahl en Koht akan, oh kin nda me irail solahr pahn wiawi, pwe solahr kaudiahl akan, de pil kokohp akan, de pil kisakis akan, de pil kamwahuiala soumwahu akan, de pil kisakis akan, de pil kamwahuiala soumwahu akan, de pil lokaiahki mahsen tohrohr akan, oh wehwehki mahsen akan.

8 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, mehmen me kin kasohwe mepwukat sohte kin ese rongamwahu en Krais; ei, e saikinte wadek pwuhk sarawihkan; ma iei, e sohte kin wehwehki.

9 Pwe kitail sou kin wadek me Koht kin ketin duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh pahn kohkohlahte, oh kaidehn reh me sohte kin wekila de pil sohte mwetehn wekila ieu kin mie?

10 Oh met, ma kumwail medewedahr pein amwail koht emen me kin wekila, oh me pahn mie mwetehn wekila reh, eri kumwail pein medewedahr koht emen me kaidehn Koht en doadoahk manaman.

11 Ahpw kilang, I pahn kasalehiong kumwail Koht manaman emen, Koht en Eipraam, oh Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop; oh iei Kohtohte me ketin kapidadahr nanleng kan oh sampah, oh mehkoaros me mih nanleng oh sampah.

12 Kilang, e ketin kapikadahr Adam, oh sang ni Adan pwupwilahn aramas eri wiawiher. Oh pwehki pwupwilahn aramas, Sises Krais ketidohr, iei Sahmo oh Sapwellimehu; pwehki ketidohn Sises Krais, komourepen aramas ahpw wiawiher.

13 Oh pwehki komourepen aramas, me Sises Krais ketikidohr, iei me kapwurehdo irailehr rehn Kauno; ei, met iei me araman koaros komourkilahr, pwehki matalahn Krais kahrehda iasada, me kahrehda komourla sang ni meir soutuk, sang soangen meirlao me aramas koaros pahn pirikihda manaman en Koht ni ahnsou me sewi pahn pepeuk; oh irail pahn iasada, me tikitik oh me lapalap koaros, oh koaros pahn kesihnen mwohn sapwellime mwoahlo, sang ni arail komourla oh mweisangehr ni arail selidiong mehla kohkohlahte, mehla me wia mehlahn paliwar.

14 Oh eri kopwung en Koht Sarawio pahn wiawi ong irail; oh eri ahnsouo pahn kohdo me mehmen me kin samin pahn kin samisaminte; oh mehmen me kin pwung pahn kin pwungipwungte; mehmen me kin peren pahn pereperente; oh mehmen me kin nsensuwed pahn kin insensuwedte.

15 Oh met, oh kumwail koaros me kin pein medewehda koht emen me sohte kak wiahda manaman akan, I pahn idek rehmwail, dah, mepwukat nekilahr, me I koasoiadahr? Ia duwen, e lelehr ni imwio? Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail, soh; oh Koht sohte ketin kukidihsang wia Koht manaman men.

16 Kilang, kaidehn mehkan me Koht ketin wiadahr me kin kowpuriamwei ong nan masatail akan? Ei, oh ihs me kak wehwehkila doadoahk kapwuriamwei akan en Koht?

17 His me pahn koasoia me kaidehn manaman ehu me sang ni sapwellime mahseno me nanleng oh sampah en duwehla met; oh sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahseno me aramas en kapikipikadahsang pwehl; oh sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahseno me manaman kin wiawi?

18 Oh ihs me pahn kosoia me Sises Krais sohte ketin wiadahr manaman laud tohto? Oh mie manaman laud tohto me wiawi sangehr ni pehn wahnpoaron akan.

19 Oh ma mie manaman akan me wiawiher mahso, dahme kahrehda Koht en ketin tukedihsang wia Koht manaman emen oh ahpw kin ketin wia mehmen me sohte kin ketin wekila? Oh kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me e sohte kin ketin wekila; ma mehlel e pahn solahr ketin wial Koht emen; oh e sohte kin ketin tukedihsang wia Koht, oh ih iei Koht manaman men.

20 Oh kahrepen e ketin tukedihsang wia manaman akan rehn aramas akan pwehki sang ni ar soupwoson, oh re kohsangehr nan ahl pwungo, oh solahr ese Kohto me irail en kin liki.

21 Kilang, I ndaiong kumwail me mehmen me kamehlele Krais, sohte peikasal, dahme e pahn peki rehn Sahmo ni mwaren Sises Krais pahn kin pweiong ih; oh inou wet kohieng koaros, iei aramas koaros nan sampah.

22 Pwe kilang, iet me Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, ketin mahsanihongehr sapwellime tohnpadahko me pahn mihmihte, ei, oh pil koaros sapwellime tohnpadahk kan, ni en pokono wie karokaronge: Kumwail kohwei wasa koaros nan sampah, oh padahkihong aramas koaros rongamwahuo.

23 Oh mehmen me kamehlele oh papidaisla pahn komourla, oh mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele pahn kin lekidekla;

24 Oh iet kilel akan me pahn kin idawehn irail akan me kin kamehlele—ni edei irail pahn kin kauskihla tepil akan; oh irail pahn koasoiki mahsen kapw akan; irail pahn kin pwekada sinek kan; oh ma irail pahn kin nimada mehkot me pahn kemehla irail, e sohte pahn kauwe irailla; irail pahn kin kihwei pehrail akan pohn me soumwahu akan oh re pahn kehlailda.

25 Oh mehmen me pahn kamehlele edei, ni sohte peikasal, ong ih I pahn kamanahiong ei mahsen akan, pil duwehte aramas koaros nan sampah.

26 Oh met, kilang, ihs me kak pelianda doadoahngkan en Kauno? Ihs me kak kasohwe sapwellime mahsen akan? Ihs me pahn pelianda manaman kauwalahpie en Kauno? Ihs me pahn lailongki doadoahk kan en Kauno? Ihs me pahn kailongki seri en Krais kan? Kilang, kumwail koaros me kin kailongki sapwellimen Kauno doadoahng kan pahn kin sohte kamehlele oh salongala kohkohlahte.

27 Oh eri dehr kin kailongki, oh dehr kin sohte kamehlele, ahpw kin karonge mahsen akan en Kauno, oh kin peki Sahmo ni mwaren Sises mehkoaros me kumwail pahn kin anahne. Dehr peikasal, a en kin kamehlele, tapihada wia duwehte mahso, oh kohkidohng Kauno amwail mohngiong unsek, oh koadoahkehda pein amwail mour sang ni masak oh rerrer mwowe.

28 Kumwail en kin marain ni ahnsou en amwail kasongosong kan; sipedalahsangrehmwail samin koaros; dehr kin peki pwe kumwail pahn doadoahngki ong amwail noahrok kan, ahpw kehlail tengediong amwail pekipek pwe kumwail dehr lohdi ong nan songosong, oh me kumwail en papah Koht mehlel oh ieias.

29 Kilang pwe kumwail en dehr papidaisla ni amwail sohte warohng; kilang pwe kumwail en kin warohng ale kamadipw sarawio; ahpw kilang pwe kumwail en wia mehkoaros ni duwen amwail kin warohng, oh kin wiahki ni mwaren Sises Krais; oh kin dadaurete lel imwi, kumwail eri sohte pahn lekdekla.

30 Kilang, I koasoi wei rehmwail, nin duwen I koasoi sang rehn me melahr akan; pwe I ese me kumwail pahn ale mahsen kan sang ie.

31 Dehr kauwe ie pwehki ei sapwung, de pil ei pahpahu pwehki eh sapwung, de pil irail akan me pil ntingehr mwowe; ahpw kumwail en kapinga Koht me ketin kasalehiong kumwailehr aht sapwung kan, pwe kumwail en kak esehla duwen maraino laud sang kiht.

32 Oh met, kilang, se ntingidier poadoapoad wet nin duwen aht ese, ni mwomwen nting kan me se kin kahdaniki wekidelahn nting en Mehn Isip, me se alehier oh wekidalahngehr nin duwen mwomwen aht mahsen.

33 Oh ma nait pileit akan pahn laud oh itar, se pahn ntingihdi ni lokaiahn Ipru; ahpw se pil wekidalahr lakaiahn Ipru; oh ma se kak ntingihdi ni mahsen en Ipru, kilang, kumwail pahn sohte ahneki sapwung sang nan aht nting kan.

34 Ahpw Kauno ketin mwahngih mehkan me se ntingihdier, oh pil sohte aramas ese aht mahseno oh pwehki sohte aramas me ese aht mahseno, ihme kahrehda e ketin kaunopada mehn kawehwehpe.

35 Oh mepwukat ntingdier pwe sen kak aht likou kan me kolokol ntiahn riat akan, me pwupkilahr arail soupwoson.

36 Oh kilang, mepwukat koaros me se kin anahne me pid riat akan, ei, pwe irail en pwurehng esehla duwen Krais, iei me sang nin duwen kapakap akan en souleng kan koaros me miher nan sahpwo.

37 Oh Kauno Sises Krais en ketikihong irail pasapeng en arail kapakap kan me pahn sang ni duwen arail pwoson; oh Koht Sahme en ketin kupwukupwure inouo me e ketin wiahiongehr mehn Israel akan, oh en ketin kapai irailda kohkohlahte sang ni arail pwoson mwaren Sises Krais. Ahmen.
ether 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Ihder[/font_size][/center]

Poadoapoad en Mehn Sared kan, kohsang nan pileit rieisek pahieu me nein Limai aramas akan diarada nan mwein nanmwarki Mosaia.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai ntingiada ni mwotomwot nting kan en Ihder—Poadoapoad en kadaudoken Ihder ntingdi—Ehn Mehn Sared kan arail lokaia sohte ian pingida ni Doulik en Palilono—Kauno ketin inoukihda en kahluwa irailahng nan sahpw pilipil ehu oh wiahiong irail en wiahla wehi kehlail ehu.[/i]

1 Oh met, ngehi, Moronai, pahn doula kasalehda poadoapoad en irail mehn kawa ko me kousoan ni paliepeng en sahpwet, me kamwomwala sang nin limen Kauno.

2 Oh I pahn kihsang ei poadoapoad sang pileit rieisek pahieu me nein Limai aramas akan diarada, me kahdanihki Pwuhk en Ihder.

3 Oh pwehki I medewe me tepin poadoapoad wet, me koasoia duwen kepikipikdahn sampah, oh pil Adam, oh duwen ahnsouo kohdo lel ni ahnsou en doulik lapo, oh duwen soahng kan me wiawi rehn aramas akan lao lel ahnsouo, mie rehn mehn Suhs akan—

4 Eri I sohte pahn ntingihdi soahng ko me wiawi sang nan mwein Adam lao lao lel ahnsouo; ahpw re ntingdi nan pileit kan; oh mehmen me pahn diarada, e pahn alehdi manaman pwe en kak alehdi ni unsek poadoapoado.

5 Ahpw kilang, I sohte pahn kihda ni unsek poadoapoado, ahpw iengen poadoapoado me I pahn kihwei, sang ni douliko kohdo lao irail kamwomwala.

6 Oh ni wiepe wet me I pahn poadokada. Ihder me ntingihda poadoapoad wet, oh e wia kadaudoken Koriandor.

7 Koriandor nein Moron pwutak.

8 Oh Moron nein Ihdem pwutak.

9 Oh Ihdem nein Eiah pwutak.

10 Oh Eiah nein Sed pwutak.

11 Oh Sed nein Siplon pwutak.

12 Oh Siplon nein Kom pwutak.

13 Oh Kom nein Koriandom pwutak.

14 Oh Koriandon nein Amnikadah pwutak.

15 Oh Amnikadah nein Aron pwutak.

16 Oh Aron wia kadaudoken Ed, me wia nein Erdom pwutak.

17 Oh Erdom nein Lip pwutak.

18 Oh Lip nein Kis pwutak.

19 Oh Kis nein Korom pwutak.

20 Oh Korom nein Lihpai pwutak.

21 Oh Lihpai nein Kim pwutak.

22 Oh Kim nein Moriandon pwutak.

23 Oh Morianton wia kadaudoken Riplakis.

24 Oh Riplakis nein Ses pwutak.

25 Oh Ses nein Ed pwutak.

26 Oh Ed nein Kom pwutak.

27 Oh Kom nein Koriandom pwutak.

28 Oh Koriandom nein Ihmer pwutak.

29 Oh Ihmer nein Omer pwutak.

30 Oh Omer nein Suhl pwutak.

31 Oh Suhl nein Kip pwutak.

32 Oh Kip nein Oraiah pwutak, me wia nein Sared pwutak;

33 Sared me iang rie pwutako oh arail peneinei kan kohdo, iangahki ekei oh arail peneinei kan, sang ni doulik lapo, ni ahnsou me Kauno ketin kapingada ehn aramas lokaia, oh engiengda oh kahkihla me irail pahn mwerpeseng pohn sampah pwon; oh nin duwen mahsen en Kauno aramas akan mwerpeseng.

34 Oh pwehki rien Saredo eh wia ohl lapalahmen oh kehlail, oh ohl keniken rehn Kauno, Sared, rie pwutako, ahpw ndaiong ih: Kapakapiong Kauno, pwe en dehr ketin kapingada kitail pwe kitail de sohla kak wehwehki atail koasoi kan.

35 Kedekedeo rien Saredo ahpw kapakapiong Kauno, oh Kauno ahpw poakehla Sared; eri e sohte kapingada ehn Sared lokaia; oh Sared oh rie pwutako sohte pingida.

36 Eri Sared ahpw ndaiong rie pwutako: Kapakapiong Kauno, oh ma e kak a sapwellime engieng en kohsang irail akan me wia kempoakepahtail, pwe en dehr kapingada arail lokaia.

37 Kedekedeo rien Saredo ahpw kapakapiong Kauno, oh Kauno ahpw poakehla kempoakepahrail kan oh pil arail peneinei kan, kahrehda irail sohte pingida.

38 Kedekedeo Sared ahpw pwurehng koasoiong rie pwutako, ndinda: Kohla oh kalelapak rehn Kauno ma e pahn kihsang kitail nan sahpwet, oh ma e pahn kihsang kitail nan sahpwet, a kalelapak ia wasa me kitail pahn kohla. Oh sohte me ese ahpw Kauno kakete kihkitailahng nan sahpw me keieu kesempwal nan sampah? Oh ma iei met, a kitail loaloapwoatieng Kauno, pwe kitail en alehdi oh wiahla atail sohso.

39 Kedekedeo rien Sared pwutako ahpw kapakapiong Kauno nin duwen me Sared ndaiong sang nan ewe.

40 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw karonge rien Sared pwutako, oh poakehla ih, oh ndaiong ih:

41 Kohwei oh kihpene noumw soahngen mahn akan koaros, me ohl oh lih; oh pil weren tuhkehn sampah koaros; oh ahmw peneinei kan; oh pil Sared riomw pwutako oh eh peneinei; oh pil kempoakepahmm kan oh arail peneinei kan, oh kempoakepahn Sared oh arail peneinei kan.

42 Oh ahnsou me ke pahn kanekehla met ke pahn kahluwahwei irail nan wahu me mih paliepeng. Oh wasahu I pahn tuhwonguhk, oh I pahn kahluwa kumwail kohla nan sahpw me pilipilda sang sahpw koaros nan sampah.

43 Oh I pahn kapaiada kumwail oh kadaudokemw kan wasahu, oh wiahda wehi kehlail ehu sang ni kadaudokem kan oh kadaudoken riomw pwutako, oh irail akan me pahn iang kumwail. Oh sohte me pahn kehlailsang wehi me I pahn wiahda ong ie sang ni kadaudokemw kan, nan sampah pwon. Oh met I pahn wiahionguhk pwehk ahnsou reirei me ke wie kapakapki ong ie.
ether 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Sared kan kaunopada ong arail pahn seiloaklahng nan sahpwen inou—E wia sahpw pilipida ehu wasa me aramas anahne papah Krais ma soh re pahn kamwakel sang—Kauno ketin mahseniong rien Sared pwutako erein awa siluh—Mehn Sared kan wiahda wahr en nansed kei—Kauno mahsanihong rien Sared pwutako en medewehda ia mwomwen eh pahn mie mehn ser nan wahr en nansed ko.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Sared oh rie pwutako, oh arail peneinei kan, oh pil kempoakepahn Sared oh rie pwutako oh arail peneinei kan, ahpw kohdihla nan wahu en paliepeng, (oh eden wahuo iei Nimrod, ahdo kohsang ni eden sounkesik kehlailo) iangahki neirail mahn kan me irail kihpene, mahn ohl oh lih en soangen mahn koaros.

2 Oh irail pil wiahda lidip kan oh koledi menpihr kan; oh irail ahpw pil kaunopada dewen mwahmw ehu me irail wahkihda mwahmw en nan pihl kan.

3 Oh irail ahpw pil wahda desured, me, wehwehki, sukehn longalap; eri met irail wahdahier simwisimw en longalap, oh soangsoang dipwisou koaros me mih pohn sahpwo, soangen weren tuhke koaros.

4 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail kohdihdo nan wahu en Nimrod, Kauno ahpw ketidihdo oh mahseniong rien Sared ohlo; oh e ketiket nan dipwek ehu, oh rien Sared ohlo sohte kilang ih.

5 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsaniong irail me re pahn kohla nan sapwtehno, ei, wasa me saikinte pak ehu aramas kohla ie. Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw ketin kahluwa irail, oh ni eh ketiket nan depwek ieu e ahpw kin mahseniong irail, oh ketikihong irail kaweid en wasa me re pahn seiloakla ie.

6 Kedekedeo irail ahpw seiloak nan sapwtehno, oh wiahda wahr kei, me irail kotehkihla pihl tohto kei, oh limen Kauno kin wie kaukaweid irail ahnsou koaros.

7 Oh Kauno sohte mweidada me irail pahn uhdi palio sehdo nan sapwtehno, ahpw e ketin kupwuriki me irail pahn kohdohng nan sahpw en inouo, me pilipilda sang sahpw koaros, me Kauno Koht ketin nekinekid ong pwihn en aramas mour pwung.

8 Oh e ketin kahukihla nan sapwellime engieng ong rien Sared ohlo, me mehmen me pahn sapwasapw nan sahpw en inouo, sang ni ahnsouo kohkohlahte, pahn anahne papah ih, me wia Koht mehlel oh ihte, ma soh irail pahn kamwakel sang ahnsou me e pahn ketin engiengda unsek pahrail.

9 Oh met, kitail kak kilang kupwur en Koht ong sahpwet, me e wia sahpw en inou; oh sohte lipilipil wehi me pahn sapwaniki pahn anahne papah Koht, ma soh irail pahn kamwakel sang ahnsou me e pahn ketin engiengda unsek pahrail. Oh e pahn engiengda unsek pahrail ahnsou me irail pahn dipanla mehlel.

10 Pwe kilang, sahpw wet iei sahpw pilipilda sang sahpw koaros; eri mehmen me pahn sapwaniki pahn anahne papah Koht ma soh e pahn kamwakel sang; pwe iei kupwur poatoapoat en Koht. Oh aramas en sahpwo pahn kin lao dipanla unsek, re ahpw pahn kin kamwakel sang.

11 Oh met en kohieng kumwail, kumwail Mehn Liki kan, pwe kumwail en kak ese kupwur en Koht—pwe kumwail en koluhla, oh dehr usehla amwail wiewia suwed kan lao e doarala, pwe kumwail de pahn kihong pohmwail engieng unsek en Koht duwehte irail akan me kousoanehr pohn sahpwet arail wiahier.

12 Kilang, sahpwet iei sahpw pilipil ehu, oh sohte lipilipil wehi me pahn sapwaniki e pahn saledek sang kalidu, oh sang sensel, oh sang pahn wehi teikan koaros me mih pahn lahng, ma re pahn papahte Koht en sahpwet, me iei Sises Krais, me kasansaladahr sang ni soahng kan me se ntingihdier.

13 Oh met I pahn uhsehla ei ntingih poadoapoado; pwe kilang, kedekedeo Kauno ahpw ketin wahdo Sared oh riehko iei ni sehd lapo me irepeseng sahpw kan. Oh ahnsou me irail kohdo ni sehdo irail ahpw kauada imwarail impwal kan; oh irail kahdanihki wasahu Moriankumer; oh irail kin koukousoan nan impwal kan, oh koukousoan nan impwal kan pohn oaroahro erein sounpar pahieu.

14 Kedekedeo ni imwin pahr pahieuo Kauno ahpw pwurehng ketido rehn rien Sared ohlo, oh uh nan depwek ieu oh mahseniong ih. Oh Kauno ahpw mahseniong rien Sared ohlo erein awa siluh, oh ketin kapwkapwung ih pwehki eh sohte tamataman eker ni mwaren Kauno.

15 Oh rien Saren ohlo ahpw koluhkihla suwed me e wiadahro, oh ahpw eker ni mwaren Kauno ong rieh kan me ieiang ih. Oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ih: I pahn mahkehnguhk oh dipen riomw kan; ahpw kumwail sohte pahn pwurehng wiahda dihp, pwe kumwail pahn tamataman me Ngehnio sohte pahn ketin ieiang aramas ahnsou koaros; eri, ma kumwail pahn wia dihp lao kumwail direkihla dihp kumwail pahn kalipilipsang mwohn silangin Kauno. Oh ih ei kaweid kan met pohn sahpwo me I pahn kihong kumwail pwe en wia amwail sohso; pwe e pahn wia sahpw pilipilda sang sahpw koaros.

16 Oh Kauno mahsanih: Kohwei doadoahk oh wiahda, wahr kan ni wiepe me kumwail wiadahro. Kedekedeo rien Sared ohlo ahpw kohla doadoahk, oh pil rieh kan, oh wiahda wahr kan ni wiepe me irail wiadahro, nin duwen me Kauno kaweid kin irail. Oh wahrko tikitik, oh marahra pohn pihlo, duwehte marahrahn mehnpihr ni e peipei pohn pihl.

17 Oh wahrko wiawihda ni wiepe me teng mehlel, iei e kak kol pihl duwehte dahl; oh pah pil teng duwehte dahl; pengpengeh kan pil teng duwehte dahl; oh koadoke kan kengkengda; oh powe pil teng duwehte dahl; oh uwen reireiih, reireiihte tuhke pwoat; oh ahnsou me wenenihmwih kin ritidi, e pahn teng duwehte dahl.

18 Kedekedeo rien Sared ohlo ahpw kapakapiong Kauno, ndinda: Maing Kaun, I wiahier doadoahk me komwi ketin mahsanihong ie, oh I wiadahr wahr kan ni duwen kaweid me komwi mahsanihong ie.

19 Oh kilang, Maing Kaun, sohte marain nan wahroko; iawasa me se pahn kin katanga ie? Oh se pahn pil mehla, pwe se sohte kak esingek loale, ihte kisinieng me mih loale; eri se pahn mehla.

20 Oh Kauno mahsanihong rien Sared ohlo: Kilang, ke pahn wiahda pwoahr powe, oh pil pah; oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn anahne kisinieng a kumwail pahn kihsang pweinen pwoahro oh alehdi kisinieng. Oh ma pihlo pahn kohda pohmwail, kilang, kumwail pahn pwaindi pwoaro, pwe kumwail de mehla nan pihl me pahn lapakehlong.

21 Kedekedeo rien Sared ohlo ahpw kapwaiada, nin duwen mahsen en Kauno.

22 Oh e pwurehng eker Kauno ndinda: Maing Kaun, kilang I wiadahr ni duwen dahme komwi mahsenihnong ie; oh I kaunopadahr wahr kan ong neir aramas kan, oh kilang sohte e rotorot loale. Kilang, Maing Kaun, ia duwe komwi pahn mweidehng kiht sen kotehla pihl lap wet nan rotorot?

23 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong rien Sared ohlo: Dahme ke men I pahn wia pwe en mie marain nan wahr akan? Pwe kilang, kumwail sohte pahn kak ahneki wenihmwtok kan, pwe e pahn mwerpene; de pil wahda kisiniei, pwe kumwail sohte pahn kohwei sang ni marain en kisiniei.

24 Pwe kilang, kumwail pahn duwehte roahs nan werengen sehdo; pwe lapalahn ilok kan pahn sawasawa pohmwail. Ahpw, I pahn kapwureikumwaildahsang nan wasa loal en sehdo; pwe kisinieng kan kin ipisang nan eweiet, oh pil kotou kan oh lapake kan ngehi me kin kadarewei.

25 Oh kilang, I pahn kaunopuhkada ong mepwukat; pwe kumwail sohte pahn kak kotehla wasa loal wet, ihte ma I pahn kaunopada kumwail ong ilok en nansedo, oh kisinieng kan me pahn kohdo, oh lapakeh kan me pahn kohdo. Eri dahme ke men I pahn kaunopkinkumwail pwe en kak mie marain rehmwail ahnsou me kumwail pahn duhla wasa loal en nan sehdo?
ether 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Rien Sared ohlo kilangada rekenleng en Kauno ni E ketin doahke takai eisek weneuo—Krais ketin kasalehiong Sapwellime paliwar ngehn ong rien Sared ohlo—Irail akan me alehdi marain unsek udahn pahn kilangidi palio kahdengo—Mehn kawehweh kan kaunopada pwe re en kasalehda poadoapoad en Mehn Sared kan nan marain.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo rien Sared ohlo, (met uwen tohtohn wahr akan me irail kaunopada meh waluh) ahpw kohdahla pohn nahnahu, me re kahdaniki nahna Selem, pwehki eh ileile mehlel, oh e ahpw inimasang ni paip ieu takai tikitik eisek weneu; oh takaiko pwetepwet oh marain, duwehte klahs me ke kak kilengla pwar; oh e ahpw wahda kohdahla pohn nahnahu, oh pwurehng eker Kauno, ndinda:

2 Maing Kaun, komwi ketin mahsaniher me se pahn kin duhla wasa loal kan. Oh kilang, maing Kaun, oh komw dehr engiengda pahn sapwellimomwi ladu pwehki eh luwet mwohmwi; pwe se wehwehki me komwi sarawi oh kin ketiket nanleng, oh me se sohte warohng mwohmwi; pwehki pwupwidio, aht mour kin kalapw wiahda me suwed; ahpw, Maing Kaun, komwi ketikihongehr kiht kosonned ehu me se pahn kin eker komwi, pwe sang komwi se en kak alehdi nin duwen aht ineng kan.

3 Kilang, maing Kaun, komwi ketin kalokeikihtehr pwehki aht wiewia suwed, oh ketin kamwakamwakid kiht kohdo, oh erein sounpar tohtoh pwukat se wie mihmihki nan sapwtehn; ahpw, komwi kin ketin kupwurei kiht. Maing Kaun, komw mahsanih ie oh kupwureiehla, oh ketikihsang sapwellimahr engieng rehn sapwellimahr aramas pwukat, oh dehr mweidehng irail en kotehla wasa loal oh angin nan rotorot; ahpw kilang mepwukat me I inimasang ni paip.

4 Oh I ese, maing Kaun, me komwi sapwellimaniki manaman koaros, oh kak ketin wia soahng koaros me komw kupwuriki ong kamwahupen aramas; eri, maing Kaun, komw ketin doahkehki sapwellimahr rekenleng takai pwukat, oh kaunopada pwe re en kak kamarainih nan rot; oh re pahn wia mehn ser marain ong kiht nan wahr akan me se kaunopadahr, pwe sen kak ahneki marain ni ahnsou me se pahn kotehla sehdo.

5 Kilang, maing Kaun, komwi kak ketin wia met. Se ese me komwi kak ketin kasalehda manaman lap, me pahn mwomwen tikitik ong marain en aramas akan.

6 Kedekedeo ahnsou me rien Sared ohlo mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, kilang, Kauno ahpw ketikihwei limehu oh ketin doahkehki rekenlenge ehu ehu takai ko. Oh kahdengo ahpw kohsang ni mesen rien Sared ohlo, oh e ahpw kilangada rekenleng en Kauno; oh e mwomwen sendinpehn aramas, duwehte mie uduk oh nta; oh rien Sared ohlo ahpw pwupwidi mwohn Kauno, pwehki e masepwehngkihda eh pwuriamwei.

7 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsaniada me rien Sared ohlo pwupwidi nan pwehlo; oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ih: Kesihnenda, dahme ke pwupwikihdi?

8 Oh e ahpw ndaiong Kauno: I kilangada rekenleng en Kauno, oh I masakada pwe e de kaloke ie; pwe I sohte ese me Kauno sapwellimaniki paliwar uduk oh nta.

9 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ih: Pwehki ahmw pwoson ke kilangehr me I pahn alehda paliwar uduk oh nta; oh sohte pak ehu aramas men kohdo mwohi oh ahneki soang pwoson mehlel me ke ahneki; pwe ma soh ke sohte pahn kak kilang sendinpehi. Ke kilang laudsang met?

10 Oh e sapengki: Soh; maing Kaun, komw ketin kasalehiong ie pein komwi.

11 Oh Kauno ketin mahsanihong ih: Ke kamehlele mahsen kan me I pahn koasoia?

12 Oh e sapengki: Ei, maing Kaun, I ese me komwi kin mahsanih me mehlel, pwehki komw Koht en mehlel, oh sohte kak likamw.

13 Oh ahnsou me ketin mahsanih mahsen pwukat, kilang, Kauno ahpw ketin kasalehiong pein ih reh, oh mahsanih: Pwehki ahmw esehier mepwukat ke poadoandoarsangehr pwupwidio; eri ke kopwurupwurdohngehr mwohi; eri I kasalehionguhk pein ngehi.

14 Kilang, Ih ngehi me kaunopdahr sangehte ni kepikipikdahn sampah pwe en doarehla nei aramas akan. Kilang, ngehi me Sises Krais. Ngehi me Sahmo oh Sapwellimehu. Aramas koaros pahn alehdi mour pwehki ngehi, oh me mour soutuk ong irail kan me pahn kamehlel mwahrei; oh iral pahn wiahla nei pwutak kan oh serepein kan.

15 Oh saikinte pak ehu I kasalehiong pein ngehi rehn aramas me I wiahda, pwe saikinte pak ehu aramas kamehlele ie duwehte kowe. Ke kilang me ke wiawihda rasehng ie? Iei, ni tapio aramas koaros wiawihda rasehng ie.

16 Kilang, paliwar wet, me ahnsou wet ke kilang, iei paliwar en ngeni; oh I wiahda aramas rasehng paliwar en ngeni; oh iei nin duwen ei sansalehnguhk ni ngehn I pahn mwomwen ei pahn sansalehng aramas ni paliwar.

17 Oh met, pwehki ngehi, Moronai, nda me I sohte kak wiahda ni unsek poadepen mepwukat me ntingdi, eri e pahn itar I en ndahte me Sises kasalehiong pein ih ohl menet ni ngehn, iei ni wiepen mour wet oh mwohmw en paliwarohte duwehte e kasalehiong pein ih ong Mehn Nihpai kan.

18 Oh e ketin papah ih duwehte e ketin papah Mehn Nihpai kan; oh [e wia] mepwukat koaros, pwe ohl menet e ese me iei ih Koht, pwehki doadoahk lap tohto me Kauno ketin kasalehiong ih.

19 Oh pwehki marain en ohl menet e sohte kak irairdihsang kilang palio kahdengo; oh e kilangada rekenleng en Sises, oh ahnsou me e kilangada, e pwupwikihdi eh masepwehk; pwe e esehda me iei rekenleng en Kauno mwo; oh e sohla anahne pwoson, pwe e wehwehkier, ni sohte peikasal.

20 Eri, pwehki e alehdier marain unsek en Koht, e sohte kak irairdihsang palio kahdengo; eri e kilangada Sises; oh e ahpw ketin papah ih.

21 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsanihong rien Sared ohlo: Kilang, ke sohte pahn mweidehng mepwukat me ke kilangehr oh rongehr en kohwei nan sampah, lao lel ahnsou me I pahn kalinganahla edei nan paliwar; eri, ke pahn kesempwaliki oh nekidala soahng kan me ke kilangehr oh rongehr, oh sohte kasalehiong emen aramas.

22 Oh kilang, ahnsou me ke pahn kohdo rehi, ke pahn ntingihdi oh katengepene, pwe sohte me pahn kak kawehwehda; pwe ke pahn ntingihdi ni lokaia me irail sohte pahn kak wadek.

23 Oh kilang, takai riau wet I pahn kihienguhk, oh ke pil pahn katengehdi iangahki soahng kan me ke pahn ntingihdi.

24 Pwe kilang, lokaia me ke pahn ntingkio I kapingadahr; eri I pahn wiahda ni ahnsou me I pahn koasonehdi me takai pwukat pahn kasalehda ong mesen aramas akan mepwukat me ke pahn ntingihdi.

25 Oh ahnsou me Kauno ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw kasalehiong rien Sared ohlo aramas koaros pohn sampah me ipwidier, oh me pil pahn ipwidi koaros; oh e sohte koledihsang en kilang, lao lel ni imwin sampah.

26 Pwe e ketin mahsanihong ih mwowe, ma e pahn kamehlele ih e pahn ketin kasalehiong ih soahng koaros—e pahn kasansal ong ih; eri Kauno sohte kak koledihsang ih ehu mehkot, pwe e ese me Kauno kak kasalehiong ih soahng koaros.

27 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsaniong ih: Ntingihdi mepwukat oh katengepene; oh I pahn kapwarehda ni ahnsou me I pahn koasonehdi ong aramas akan.

28 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ih me e pahn katengepene takai riauo me alehdi, oh dehr kasalehda, lao lel ahnsou me Kauno pahn ketin kasalehiong aramas akan.
ether 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai pahngokieng en katengepene ntingkan en rien Sared ohlo—E sohte pahn kasansalada lao aramas akan ahneki pwoson duwehte rien Sared ohlo—Krais mahsanihong aramas akan en kamehlele sapwellime mahsen kan oh mahsen en Sapwellime tohnpadahk kan—Aramas akan pahngokieng en koluhla, kamehlele rongamwahuo, oh komourla.[/i]

1 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsanihong rien Sared ohlo en kohdihla sang pohn nahnao sang mwohn silangin Kauno, oh ntingihdi soang kan me e kilangehr; oh e sohte pahn mweimweiong en kohieng aramas akan lao lel mwurin eh pahn langada pohn lohpwuo; oh iei kahrepe wet me nanmwarki Mosaia nekinekidki, pwe e sohte pahn kohdo ong sampah lao lel mwurin Krais e pahn kasalehiong pein ih sapwellime aramas kan.

2 Oh mwurin Krais e ketin kasalehiongehr pein ih, ni mehlel, rehn sapwellime aramas akan, e mahsanih me ntingko en sansalada.

3 Oh met, mwurin mwo, irail koaros pwupwidi nan peikasal; oh sohte emen ihte Mehn Leimen kan, oh irail soikalahr rongamwahu en Krais; eri I pahngokieng me I pahn pwurehng ekihla nan pwehl.

4 Kilang, I ntingihdier pohn pileit pwukat udahn dahme rien Sared ohlo kilangada; oh saik pak ehu mehkot laud kasansalada duwehte soahng kan me kasansalehng rien Sared ohlo.

5 Eri Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie I en ntihngihdi; oh I ntingihdier. Oh e ketin mahsanihong ie I en katengepene; oh e pil ketin mahsanihong ie me pahn tangepene mehn kawehwehko; eri I katengepenehier mehn kawehwehko, nin duwen kosonned en Kauno.

6 Pwe Kauno ketin mahsaniong ie: E sohte pahn kohwei rehn Mehn Liki kan lao lel rahno me irail pahn koluhkihla diparail kan, oh mwakelekella mwohn Kauno.

7 Oh Kauno mahsanih, ni rahno me irail pahn pwoson ie duwehte rien Sared ohlo, pwe irail en kak mwakelekela rehi, eri I ahpw pahn kasalehiong irail soahng kan me rien Sared ohlo kilangada, iei kapwkapwarahda ong irail ei kaudiahl akan koaros, Sises Krais, Sapwellimen Kohto, Sahm en nanleng oh sampah, oh audaparah kan koaros me ketin mahsanih.

8 Oh mehmen me pahn uhwong mahsen en Kauno, e konehng en riahla; oh mehmen me pahn kahmahmki mepwukat, e konehng en riahla; pwe I sohte pahn kasalehiong ih mehkot laudsang, Sises Krais ketin mahsanih; pwe iei ngehi me ketin mahsanih.

9 Oh sang ni ei pahngok nanleng kan kin ritida oh ritidi; oh sang ni ei mahsen sampah kin rerrer; oh sang ni ei pahngok towe kan pahn mehla, iei sang ni kisiniei.

10 Oh mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele ei mahsen kan e pil sohte pahn kamehlele nei tohnpadahk kan; oh kumwail medewe ma mehlel ngehi me koasoi; pwe kumwail pahn ese me ngehi me koasoakoasoi, ni imwin rahno.

11 Ahpw mehmen me pahn kamehlele mepwukat me I koasoia, iei ih me I pahn pwarengki kaudiahl akan en Ngehnio, oh e pahn ese oh kadehdehki. Pwehki sang ni Ngehnio e pahn esehki mepwukat mehlel; pwe e pahn kangongehki aramas akan en wia me mwahu.

12 Oh mehkoaros me kin kangoange aramas akan en wia me mwahu kin sang rehi; pwe sohte me mwahu kin kohsang ekei ihte sang rehi. Ih ngehi me kin kahluwa aramas akan ong mwahu koaros; mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele ei mahsen akan e sohte pahn kamehlele ie—me ngehi iei ih; oh mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele ie, e sohte pahn kamehlele Sahmo me ketin kadariehdo. Pwe kilang, ngehi iei Sahmo, ngehi iei maraino, oh mouro, oh mehlelo en sampah.

13 Kohdo rehi, kumwail Mehn Liki kan, oh I pahn kasalehiong kumwail soahng kesempwal akan, eripito me ekiekla pwehki sohpwoson.

14 Kohdo rehi, kumwail peneinei en Israel, oh e pahn kasansal ong kumwail uwen kesempwal en soahng kan me Sahmo ketin kaunopadahng kumwail, sangete ni kepikipikdahn sampah; oh e saikinte kohdohng kumwail, pwehki sohpwoson.

15 Kilang, ahnsou me kumwail pahn tehrpeseng kahdeng en sohpwoson me kin kahrehiong amwail mour suwed kan en duduwehte, oh keptakai en mohngiong, oh maskun en madamadau, eri soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan me ekieksang kumwail sangete ni poahsondahn sampah—ei, ahnsou me kumwail pahn eker Sahmo ni mwarei, nan mohngiong karakarahk oh ngehn peik, eri kumwail pahn ese me Sahmo ketin tamatamante inouo me ketin wiahiongehr amwail pahpa ko, kumwail peneinei en Israel.

16 Oh eri ei kaudiahl kan me I elehda Sohn nei laduo en ntingihdi pahn pwarpwarada mwohn mesen aramas koaros. Tamataman, ahnsou me kumwail pahn kilang mepwukat, kumwail pahn ese me ahnsouo kerendohr me re pahn sansalada ni mwekid.

17 Eri, ahnsou me kumwail pahn alehdi poadoapoad wet kumwail en ese me doadoahk en Sahmo tepier wasa koaros pohn sahpwo.

18 Eri, koluhla kumwail koaros me mih ni keimw en sampah, oh kohdo rehi, oh kamehlele ei rongamwahu, oh papidaisla ni mwarei; pwe mehmen me pahn kamehlele oh papidaisla pahn komourla; ahpw mehmen me sohte pahn kamehlele pahn lekidekla; oh kilel akan pahn kin ieiang irail me kamehlele mwareiet.

19 Oh meid pai mehmen me pahn kin loaloapwoat ong mwareie ni imwin rahno, pwe e pahn kohdahla oh kousoan nan wehio me kaunopadahng ih sangete ni poahsondahn sampah. Oh kilang iei ngehi me koasoiahier. Ahmen.
ether 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sounkadehde silimen oh pein doadoahko pahn wia ehu kadehdehpen mehlele en Pwuhk en Mormon.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, ntingihdier mahsen kan me pahngokiong ie, nin duwen ei tamataman; oh I ndaiong kumwail soahng kan me I ketengepenehr; eri kumwail dehr medewe doahke pwe kumwail en kawehwehda; pwe e sohte mweimwei ong kumwail, ihte ahnsou me e pahn sang ni eripit en Koht.

2 Oh kilang, e pahn wia kapai ong kowe ni omw pahn kasalehiong piliet kan ong irail me pahn sowese doadoahk wet en pweida;

3 Oh e pahn kasansalohng meh silimen sang ni manaman en Koht; eri irail pahn ese ni mehlel me mepwukat mehlel.

4 Oh sang nan ewen sounkadehde silimen mepwukat pahn kohwei; oh kadehdehn meh silimeno, oh doadoahk wet, me pahn kasalehda manaman en Koht oh pil sapwellime mahsen, me Sahmo oh Sapwellimehu, oh Ngehn Sarawi kin kadehdehki—oh mehkan koaros pahn wia ehu kadehde me pahn uhwong sampah ni imwin rahno.

5 Oh ma irail pahn koluhla oh kohdo rehn Sahmo ni mwaren Sises, irail pahn alahlda nan wehin Koht.

6 Oh met, kumwail tenekih ma I sohte ahneki mweimwei ong mepwukat; pwe kumwail udahn pahn ese me I ahneki mweimwei ahnsou me kumwail pahn kilang ie, oh kitail pahn uh mwohn Koht ni imwin rahno. Ahmen.
ether 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kisinieng kan ipirala weren Mehn Sared kan wahroko nan sahpw en inouo—Aramasoko kepinga Kauno pwehki Sapwellime kalahngan kan—Oraia pilipilda en wiahla arail nanmwarki—Sared oh rie ohlo mehla.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, pahn uhsehla ntingihdi poadoapoad en Sared oh rie ohlo.

2 Pwe kedekedeo mwurin Kauno e ketin kaunopadahr takai kan me rien Sared ohlo wahdahla pohn nahnao, rien Sared ohlo ahpw kohdihdosang pohn nahnao, oh e ahpw kihong takai ko nan wahroko me kaunopdahr, ehu nan ehu pwelengen wahroko; oh kilang, re kamarainihda nan wahroko.

3 Oh met Kauno ketin elehdahier takai kan en marain nan rot, pwe en kamarainih ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan, pwe irail en dehr kotehla pihl lap akan nan rot.

4 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail kaunopadahr soangsoangen mwonge kan koaros, pwe irail en kak momouriki pohn pihlo, oh pil mwonge ong neirail pelin kou kan oh sihp kan, oh sohte lipilipil soangen mahn laud de mahn de men pihr me irail pahn wahda—kedekedeo ahnsou me irail wiahier mepwukat irail ahpw doulong nan werarail wahr akan, oh seiloakwei nan sehdo, liklikih Kauno arail Koht ong pein arail.

5 Kedekedeo Kauno Koht ahpw ketin elehda kisineng kehlail ehu en ipir pohn mesen pihlo, kohlahng nan sahpw en inouo; oh met irail ahpw lekilekidek kohwei pohn ilok en nan sehdo mwohn kisiniengo.

6 Kedekedeo pak tohto irail kin serdi wasa loal pahn sehdo, pwehki nahnahn ilok kan me kin sawasawa pohrail, oh pil pwehki angin kisinieng kehlail oh kamasepwehk me kin kohsang ni kehlail en kisiniengo.

7 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail kin seridi wasa loal sohte pihl kak kaweirailla, pwehki wararail wahroko me teng duwehte dahl ieu, oh pil re teng duwehte weren Noha warihmwo; eri ahnsou me irail kin mihla pahn pihl irail kin eker Kauno, oh e ahpw kin ketin pwurehng kapwureirailda pohn pihlo.

8 Kedekedeo kisiningo sohte uhdihsang ipir irail kohlahng nan sahpw en inouo erein arail mihmi pohn pihlo; oh met kisiniengo wie ipihpir irail kohwei.

9 Oh irail ahpw kin kokouliki kaping ong Kauno; ei, rien Sared ohl ahpw kin koulki kaping ong Kauno, oh e ahpw kapingkihong oh kepinga Kauno rahno pwohn; oh ahnsou me e soutikpene, irail sohte uhdihsang kepkepinga Kauno.

10 Oh met irail wie kohkohwei; oh sohte mahn kamasepwehk en nan sed kak kawehla irail, de pil roahs me kak kawehla irail; oh mie marain rehrail ahnsou koaros, mehnda ma irail mih pohn pihlo de pil pahn pihlo.

11 Oh met irail wie kohkohwei; rahn silipwiki pahisek pahieu irail mihmihki pohn pihlo.

12 Oh irail ahpw serada pohn oaroahr en sahpw en inouo. Oh ahnsou me irail sokedi pohn oaroahr en sahpw en inouo irail poaridi pohn sahpwo, oh karakarahkiala pein irail mwohn Kauno, oh ahpw sengisengki arail peren mwohn Kauno, pwehki reken sapwellime kupwur kalahngan akan ong irail.

13 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohwei pohn sahpwo, oh tepida kaunopada en mwetuwelih pwehlo.

14 Oh Sared nainiki pwutak pahmen; oh edarail iei Seikom, oh Kilkah, oh Meia, oh Oraia.

15 Oh rien Sared ohlo pil nainikihda pwutak kan oh serepein kan.

16 Oh kempoakepahn Sared oh rie ohlo uwen tohtohn irail meh riehk riemen; oh irail pil nanikihda pwutak kan oh serepein kan mwohn arail kohdo nan sahpw en inouo; oh eri irail tepida wie tohtohla.

17 Oh irail padahngkihda weweidiki karakarahk mwohn Kauno; oh irail pil alehdi padahk sang powe.

18 Kedekedeo irail ahpw tepida parpeseng pohn sahpwo, oh kaparaparala oh kaunopada mwetuwelih pwehlo; oh irail kehlailla nan sahpwo.

19 Oh rien Sared ohlo tepida mahmahla, oh e kilang me e pahn kereniongehr mehla oh seridi; eri e ahpw ndaiong Sared; Kitail kihpene neitail aramas akan pwe kitail en wadekidi irail meh depe, pwe kitail en kak esehsang irail dahme irail mwahuki sang kita mwohn ata pahn mehla oh seridi.

20 Oh aramas akan ahpw kapokonpene nin duwen dahme e nda. Met uwen tohtohn nein rien Sared ohlo pwutak kan oh serepein kan meh riehk riemen; oh uwen tohtohn nein Sared pwutak oh serepein kan meh ehk riemen, oh e nainiki pwutak pahmen.

21 Kedekedeo ira ahpw wadekidi uwen tohtohn neira aramas; oh mwurin ara wedekidier irail meh depe, ira ahpw kalelapak rehrail soahng kan me irail men re en wia mwohn ara pahn mehla oh seridi.

22 Kedekedeo aramasoko ahpw inangih me ira en kasarawiala emen neira pwutak ko en wia arail nanmwarki.

23 Oh met kilang, e kansensuwed ong ira. Oh rien Sared ohlo ahpw ndaiong irail: Ni mehlel soahng wet kin elehiong kalidu.

24 Ahpw Sared ndaiong rie ohlo: Mweidehng irail re en ahnekki nanmwarki. Oh eri e ahpw ndaiong irail: Kumwail pilada emen sang nan nait pwutak kan emen nanmwarki, iei me kumwail pwungki.

25 Kedekedeo irail pilada nein rien Sared ohlo nah meseniho; oh ede iei Peikak. Kedekedeo e ahpw kasohwe oh sohte men wia arail nanmwarki. Oh aramasoko men eh pahpa en idingkihong, ahpw eh pahpa sohte men wia; oh e kehkehlingkihong irail me irail sohte pahn idingki emen en wia arail nanmwarki.

26 Kedekedeo irail pilada rien Peikak pwutangko koaros, oh irail sohte men wia.

27 Kedekedeo pil sohte nein Sared pwutangko me men wia, irail koaros ihte emen me soh; oh Oraiah ahpw kasarawiala en wiahla nanmwarki en aramas kan.

28 Oh e tepida kakaun, oh aramas akan tepida pweida; oh irail kepwehpwehla mehlel.

29 Kedekedeo Sared ahpw mehla, oh pil rie ohlo.

30 Kedekedeo Oraia ahpw weweid ni karakarahk mwohn Kauno, oh ahpw tamataman soahng kesempwal akan men Kauno ketin wiahiongehr eh pahpao, oh pil padahkihong sapwellime aramas soahng kesempwal akan me Kauno ketin wiahiongehr arail pahpa ko.
ether 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Oraia kakaun ni mour pwung—Nan ahnsou me pingiping oh akamai, wehi kan en Shule oh Kouor me kin uhpene wiawihda—Soukohp kan keriahla aramas akan me kin wiwia suwed oh pwongih dikadik en eni, re ahpw koluhla.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Oraia ahpw kin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung nan sahpwo erein eh ahnsou kan, me wia ahnsou reirie mehlel.

2 Oh e nainkihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; ei, e nainkihda meh siliakan emen, sang nan pwungarail nah pwutak meh riehk silimen.

3 Kedekedeo e ahpw pil nainikihda Kip ni eh likeilapalahr. Kedekedeo Kip ahpw weliandi oh kakaun; oh Kip nainikihda Korior.

4 Oh ahnsou me Korior sounpar silihsek riau e ahpw uhwongada semehu, eri ahpw kohla oh kousoanla nan sahpw en Neior; oh e nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto, oh irail wiahla aramas lingan mehlel; eri Korior wiahda aramas tohto idawehnla ih.

5 Oh ahnsou me e kihpene pwihn en sounpei ehu e ahpw kohdahdo nan sahpw en Moron wasa me nanmwarikio ketiket ie, oh kalowehdi ih, me elehdahier pweidahn mahsen en rien Sared ohlo me ndahki me irail pahn lohdieng nan kalidu.

6 Met sahpw en Moron, wasa me nanmwarikio kin ketiket ie, karanihte sahpw me Mehn Nihpai kan kin kahdaniki Tehnlahr.

7 Kedekedeo Kip ahpw kin mihmi nan kalidu, oh sapwellime aramas akan pahn manaman en nah pwutak Korior, lao e likeilapalahr mehlel; ahpw Kib nainikihda Suhl nan eh likeilapalahr, ni eh wie mihmihte nan kalidu.

8 Kedekedeo Suhl ahpw lingeringerida pahn rie ohlo; oh Suhl kehlaila, oh rosonla nin duwen roson en aramas; oh e pil koaiek en wia tenek pwung.

9 Eri, e kohdo ni dohl en Ihpram, oh e ahpw inimasang ni aulo mete sdihl, oh wiahkihda kedlahs kei ong irail kan me e kahluwahla re en idawehn ih; oh mwurin eh kihong irailehr kedlahs kan e ahpw pwurala nan kahnihmw en Neior, oh mahwiniong rie ohlo Korior, sang met e ahpw kalowehdier wehio oh kapwurehiong semehu Kip.

10 Oh met pwehki dahme Suhl wiadahro, semehu eri ketikihong ih wehio; eri e ahpw tepida weliandi eh pahpao oh kakaun.

11 Kedekedeo e ahpw kin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung; oh e katehlapahla eh wehi pohn sahpwo pwon, pwe aramas akan pokonla mehlel.

12 Kedekedeo Suhl pil nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto.

13 Oh Korior kaluhkihla wiewia suwed tohto me e wiahda; eri Suhl kihong ih manaman nan eh wehio.

14 Kedekedeo Korior nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto. Oh nan nein Korior pwutangkan mie emen me adaniki Noha.

15 Kedekedeo Noha uhwongada nanmwarki Suhl, oh pil eh pahpao Korior, oh kahluwahsang rie ohl me adaniki Kouor, oh pil riehkan oh aramas tohto.

16 Oh e mahwiniong nanmwarki Suhl, me kahrehda e kalowehdi sahpw me irail tepin sohsohkio; oh e wiahla nanmwarki en pali en sahpwo.

17 Kedekedeo e ahpw pwurehng mahwiniong nanmwarki Suhl; oh e kalowehdi nanmwarki Suhl, oh saliedi oh wahlang nan Moron.

18 Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me e pahn kemehla ih, nein Suhl pwutak kan wailong nan imwen Noha nihpwongo oh kemehla ih, oh kawehla wenihmw en imwetengo oh wahieido semerailo, oh kihong ih pohn mwoalehu nan pein eh wehi.

19 Eri, nein Noha pwutak kan ahpw weliandi oh kaukawada eh wehio; ahpw irail sohte powehdi nanmwarki Suhl, oh aramas akan me mih pahn manaman en nanmwarki Suhl ahpw kekeirida mehlel oh kehlaila.

20 Oh wehio pwalpeseng; oh wehi riau mie, wehin Suhl, oh wehin Kouor, nein Noha pwutak.

21 Oh Kouor, nein Noha pwutako, ahpw wiahda nah aramas akan en mahwiniong Suhl, oh Suhl ahpw kemeirail oh ahpw kemehla Kouor.

22 Oh met Kouor naineki pwutak emen me adaniki Nimrod; oh Nimrod mweidala wehin Kouor ong Suhl, oh e ahpw kenikenla rehn Suhl; eri Suhl ahpw ketikihong ih mweimwei laud, oh e ahpw kin kak wia nsene nan wehin Suhl nin duwen eh ineng kan.

23 Oh pil nan mwein Suhlo mie soukohp kei kohdo rehn aramas akan, me Kauno ketin kadaredo, kokohpiki me ehn aramas akan arail wiewia suwed kan oh pwongih dikadiken eni kan kahkahrehdiong keria pohn sahpwo, oh irail pahn kamwomwala ma irail sohte pahn koluhla.

24 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw uhwongada soukohp kan, oh kapailoke irail. Kedekedeo nanmwarki Suhl ahpw ketin kadeikada ni pwung irail koaros me uhwongada soukohp kan.

25 Oh e ahpw ketin kamanahla kosonned ehu nan sahpwo pwon, me kihong soukohp kan manaman en kohwei sohte lipilipil wasa me irail men; oh sang wiepe wet aramas akan wisikdohng koluhla.

26 Oh pwehki aramas akan ar koluhkihlahr diparail akan oh arail pwongih dikadiken eni kan, Kauno ahpw ketin kupwureirailla, oh irail pwurehng tepida pweida nan sahpwo. Kedekedeo Suhl nainikihda pwutak oh serepein kei nan eh likeilapalahr.

27 Oh sohla mahwin wiawi nan mwein Suhl; oh e kin tamataman soahng kesempwal akan me Kauno ketin wiahiong eh pahpa ko ni e ketin wairaildo oh kohla wasa loal kohdohng nan sahpw en inou; eri e kin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung erein eh ahnsou.
ether 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mie akamai oh pingiping nan wehio—Akis wiahda pwihn suwed rir ehu me ehukipene arail kauhla en kemehla nanmwarikio—Pwihn suwed rir kan iei ehn tepilo oh kin elehiong kamwomwalahn wehi kan—Mehn Liki kan en mwei wet pahn kaparikin irail pwihn suwed rir me pahn song en kawehla saledek en sahpw koaros, wehi kan, oh wehin sahpw koaros.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo e ahpw nainikihda Omer, oh Omer weliandi oh kakaun. Oh Omer nainikihda Sared; oh Sared nainikihda pwutak oh serepein kei.

2 Oh Sared uhwongada eh pahpao, oh kohla oh kousoanla nan sahpw en Ehd. Kedekedeo e ahpw ketewehdi aramas tohto, pwehki e koasoi en widing kan, lao elep en tohn wehio idawehnla.

3 Oh ahnsou me e kalowedier elep en wehio e ahpw mahwiniong eh pahpao, oh e ahpw kalowehdi oh wahsang eh pahpao, oh wiahiong en papah nan kalidu;

4 Oh met, nan erein rahn akan en mwein Omer e mihmihki nan kalidu elepin eh rahn akan. Kedekedeo e ahpw nainikihda pwutak oh serepein kei, sang nan pwungarail Esrom oh Koriandumer;

5 Oh irail udahn lingeringer pwehki wiewiahn kan en riarail ohl Sared, kahrehda irail kihpene pwihn en sounpei ehu oh kohla mahwiniong Sared. Kedekedeo irail ahpw mahwiniong ih nihpwong.

6 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail kemehla nein Sared sounpei kan oh ni ahnsou me irail pahn pil kemehla ih; e ahpw peki rehrail me irail en dehr kemehla ih, oh e pahn mweidala wehio ong eh pahpao. Kedekedeo irail ahpw mweidehng en mourla.

7 Oh met Sared pahtoula mehlel pwehki lohdi en eh wehio, pwe eh mohngiong inangih kolokolete eh wehio oh lingan en sampah.

8 Met nein Sared serepein me koaiek mehlel, oh pwehki e kilang pahtou me eh pahpa tungoaleniki, e ahpw medewehda en wiahda koasoandi ehu me e pahn kak kapwurehiong wehio rehn eh pahpao.

9 Met nein Sared serepeino me lingan mehlel. Kedekedeo e ahpw koasoieng eh pahpao, oh ndaiong ih: Dahme kahrehda ei pahpa pahtouki? E saikinte wadek poadoapoad kan me atail pahpa ko wa kohdo kotehkihdo wasa loal? Kilang, e sou mie poadepen irail mehn mahs oko, me sang ni arail koasondi rir kan irail kin kalowehdi wehi kan oh ling lap?

10 Oh met, eri, ei pahpa pahn lukehdo Akis, nein Kimnor pwutak; oh kilang, I me kaselel, oh I pahn kahlek mwowe, oh kapereniada, kahrehda e pahn inangih I en wiahla eh pwoud; eri ma e pahn inangih me ke pahn mweidada I en wiahla eh pwoud, a ke pahn ndaiong: I pahn mweidehnguhk ma ke pahn wahdo mongen ei pahpa, nanmwarikio.

11 Oh met Omer wia kepoakepahn Akis; eri, ahnsou me Sared lukehdo Akis, nein Sared serepeino ahpw kahlek mwowe oh e kapereniada, kahrehda e inangiada me en wiahla eh pwoud. Kedekedeo e ahpw ndaiong Sared: Mweidehng en wiahla ei pwoud.

12 Oh Sared ndaiong ih: I pahn mweidehng uhk, ma ke pahn wahdo moangen ei pahpao, nanmwarikio.

13 Kedekedeo Akis ahpw kapokonepene peneinei en Sared, eh peneinei koaros, oh ndaiong irail: Kumwail kahukihong ie me kumwail pahn loaloapwoatohng dahme I pahn anahne sang kumwail?

14 Kedekedeo irail koaros ahpw kahukihong ih, sang Koht en nanleng, oh pil sang nanleng kan, oh pil sang sampah, oh sang moangerail kan, me mehmen me pahn kasapwungehla koasondi me Akis inangih e pahn lupsang moange; mehmen me pahn kadila sohte lipilipil dahme Akis kasalehiong irail, e pahn kamasang eh mour.

15 Kedekedeo irail ahpw pwungkihda ehn Akis koasoandio. Oh Akis ahpw kihong irail kahula kan me kin kohieng irail mehn mahs oko me kin rapahki manaman, me kin wie pepeusdo sang rehn Kein, me wia en sounkamaramas sangete ni tapio.

16 Oh irail kin wie kolokol sang ni manaman en tepilo pwe en kihong kahula pwukat rehn aramas akan, pwe en kolokol irail nan rotorot, pwe en sowese me rapahki manaman en alehdi manaman, oh kamaramas, oh kulih, oh likamw, oh wiahda soangen wiewia suwed kan oh nenek koaros.

17 Oh iei nein Sared serepeino me karehda e kihong nan eh mohngiong en rapahkihda mepwukat sang mehn mahs oko; oh Sared kihong nan mohngiong en Akis; eri, Akis kihong eh peneinei oh kepoakepah kan, kakahluwahsang irail sang ni eh inou kan pwe en wia sohte lipilipil dahme e inangih.

18 Kedekedeo irail ahpw wiahda pwihn suwed rir ehu, duwehte irail mehn mahs oko; me wia pwihn me keieu sakanakan oh suwed sang koaros, mwohn silangin Koht;

19 Pwe Kauno sohte kin ketin doadoahk ni wiepen pwihn suwed rir kan, de pil mahsanih me aramas en kakerehdi nta, ahpw nan soahng koaros e kin ketin irehdi, sangete ni tepin aramas.

20 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, sohte pahn ntingihdi mwomwen arail kahula kan oh wiepen arail pwihn, pwe e sansalohng ie me e mie rehn aramas koaros, oh e pil mih rehn Mehn Leimen kan.

21 Oh e kahrehda kamwomwalahn aramas pwukat me ahnsou wet I wie kosokosoia, oh pil kamwomwalahn araman en Nihpai.

22 Oh sohte lipilipil wehi me pahn utungada soangen pwihn suwed rir wet, pwe re en alehdi manaman oh kekeirki, loa irail doupeseng nan wehio pwon, kilang, re pahn kamwomwala; pwe Kauno sohte pahn mweidehng ntahn sapwellime souleng kan, me pahn kamakamala pahrail, en ahnsou koaros eker ih sang nan pwehl pwe en dupukiong irail oh ahpw e sohte kin dupukiong irail.

23 Eri, Kumwail Mehn Liki kan, e wia sapwellimen Koht eripit me mepwukat en sansalohng kumwail, pwe kumwail en kak koluhkihla dipamwail kan, oh dehr mweidehng mwekid en pwihn en kamaramas pwukat en kohla pohmwail, me kin wiawihda pwe en alehdi manaman oh kekeirki—oh doadoahko, iei, doadoahk en kamwomwala kohieng kumwail, iei, kedlahs en kopwung en Koht Soutuk pahn pwupwidi pohmwail, pwe en keseikumwaildi oh kamwomwkumwailla ma kumwail pahn mweidehng mepwukat en pweida.

24 Eri, Kauno ketin mahsanihonguhk, ahnsou me ke pahn kilang mepwukat wiawihong kumwail pahn kehnda irair keper me kumwail mih loale, pwehki pwihn suwed rir wet me mih rehmwail; oh meid suwediong, pwehki ntahn irail me kin kamakamala; pwe re kin sengiseng sang nan pwelpar pwe en dupukiong, oh pil irail kan me poahsonkihda.

25 Pwe ahnsou pahn kohdo me mehmen me pahn poahsonkihda pahn rapahki en kawehla saledek en sahpw koaros, wehi koaros, oh wehin sahpw koaros; oh e kin elehda kamwomwalahn aramas koaros, pwe tepilo me wia poahsonpe, me iei pahpahn likamw koaros; iei ihte soun wie likamw me ketewehdi tepin atail pahpa oh nohno, iei, ihte ihte soun wie likamw me kahrehda aramas e kamaramas sangete ni tapio; me kahrehda mohngiong en aramas akan keptakaila oh kemehla soukohp kan, oh kostakaih irail, oh keseirailla sangete ni tapio.

26 Eri, ngehi, Moronai, alehdier kehkehlik me I pahn ntingihdi mepwukat pwe suwed en kak imwisekla, oh me ahnsouo pahn kohdo me Sehdan sohte pahn ahneki manaman nan mohngiong en aramas akan, ahpw irail pahn ngoangki wiewia mwahu ahnsou koaros, pwe irail en kak kohdo ni pwarer en mour pwung koaros oh komourla.
ether 9:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wehio kohsang emen kohlahng emen sang ni sohso, pitidi ni rir, oh kamaramas—Ihmer kilangada Sapwellimen Mourpwung—Soukohp tohto padapadahngki koluhla—Lehk ehu oh sneik poisin kei kaloke aramas akan.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, pwurehng uhsehla ei nting kan. Eri, kilang, kedekedeo pwehki pwihn suwed rir en Akis oh kepoakepah kan, kilang, irail kawehla wehin Omer.

2 Ahpw, Kauno ketin kupwur kalahngan ong Omer, oh pil sapwellime pwutak kan oh sapwellime serepein kan me sohte rapahki re en kemehla.

3 Oh Kauno ketin kapariki Omer nan eh ouraman me e pahn mweselsang nan sahpwo; eri Omer ahpw ketin mweselsang nan sahpwo iangahki eh peneinei, oh seiloangki erein rahn kei, oh kohdo oh daulih dohl en Sim, oh kohdo wasa me Mehn Nihpai kan kamwomwala ie, oh sang wasahu re ahpw kohla palimese, oh kohdohng wasa me kahdaniki Aplom, ni oaroahro, oh wasahu e kawada imwe impwalo, oh pil nah pwutak kan oh serepein kan, oh pil tohn imwe koaros, ihte Sared oh e peneinei me soh.

4 Kedekedeo Sared ahpw keidi en wiahla nanmwarki en aramas akan, sang ni wiewia suwed kan; oh e ahpw kihong Akis nah serepeino en wiahla eh pwoud.

5 Kedekedeo Akis ahpw song en kemehla ehn eh pwoud pahpa; oh e wiahiong irail ko me me kahukihla sang ni kahulahn mahso, oh irail alehdi moangen ehn eh pwoud pahpa, ni eh wie mwomwohd nan mwoale, mahmahseniong sapwellime aramas kan.

6 Tohtohlahn pwihn suwed oh rir wet me lap mehlel kahrehda e kawehla nan mohngiong en aramas koaros; ihme kahreda Sared kamakamala nan mwoale, oh Akis weliandi oh kakaun.

7 Kedekedeo Akis ahpw tepida luwangki nah pwutako, kahrehda e saliedi nan imweteng, oh kin kamwengehki kisin mwenge de sohte douluhl lao e mehkihla.

8 Oh met rien pwutako me mehlao, (oh ede iei Nimrah) udahn lingeringer pahn eh pahpao pwehki dahme eh pahpao wiahiong rie pwutako.

9 Kedekedeo Nimrah kihpene kisin pwihn en ohl kei, oh sepohsang nan sahpwo, oh kohla oh koukousoan rehn Omer.

10 Kedekedeo Akis nainkihda pwutak kei, oh aramas akan koapworopworikin irail, mehndahte arail kahukihong ih me irail pahn kin wia soangen wiewia suwed koaros nin duwen me pahn mwahuki.

11 Met nein Akis aramas akan kin inangih irail en kepwehpwehla, duwehte Akis e inangih kolokol manaman; eri, nein Akis pwutangkan kin kihong irail mwohni, me kahrehda irail kahluwahsang pali laud en aramas en idawehn irail.

12 Oh mahwin tepida wiawi nan pwungen nein Akis pwutak kan oh Akis, me reireiki erein pahr tohto kei, ei, me kahrehda kereniong aramas koaros en wehio re en kamwomwala, iei, koaros, ihte meh siliakan me luhwehdi, oh irail me iangala peneinei en Omer.

13 Eri, Omer pwurehng pwuralahng nan sapwe sahpw en sohsou.

14 Kedekedeo Omer tepida mahla; ahpw, nan eh mahlahr e ahpw nainikihda Emer; oh e ahpw keiehdi Emer en wia nanmwarki oh wiliandi kakaun.

15 Oh mwurin eh keiehdi Emer en wiahla nanmwarki e ahpw kilang popohl nan sahpwo erein sounpar riau, oh ih ahpw mehla, ni eh momourikier rahn tohto, me direki pahtou. Kedekedeo Emer ahpw weliandi oh kakaun, oh ahpw idawehnte wiewiahn pwukoahn eh pahpao.

16 Oh Kauno pwurehng tepida kihsang keriao pohn sahpwo, oh peneinei en Emer ahpw pweida mehlel pahn kaweid en Emer; oh nan erein sounpar weneisek riau irail ahpw kehlailla mehlel, kahrehda irail kepwehpwehla mehlel—

17 Oh irail ahneki soangsoangen wahn tuhke, oh werentuhke, oh silik kan, oh likou kaselel, oh kohl, oh silper, oh soang kesempwal koaros;

18 Oh pil soangen pelin akan, oh kou lekelek kan, oh kou kan, oh sihpw, oh pwihk, oh kuht kan, oh pil ekei soangen mahn tohto me kin mwahu ong en doadoahngki.

19 Oh irail pil naineki oahs kan, oh ahs kan, oh mie elepant kan oh kiurelem kan oh kumom kan; koaros kin mwahu ong aramas en doadoahki, ahpw mehlel elepant kan oh kiurelem kan oh kumom kan.

20 Oh met Kauno ahpw ketin kamwerehdi kapai kan pohn sahpwo, me wia sahpw pilipilda nan pwungen sahpw koaros; oh e mahsanih me mehmen me pahn kousoan nan sahpwo pahn kousoanki ong Kauno, ma soh irail pahn kamwomwala ahnsou me irail pahn wiewia suwed laudla; pwe soahng wet, Kauno ketin mahsanih: I pahn kamwerehdiong ei engieng ni unsek.

21 Oh Emer ahpw kin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung erein eh rahn akan, oh e nainekihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; oh e nainkihda Koriandom, oh e ahpw keiehdi Koriandom en weliandi oh kakaun.

22 Oh mwurin eh keiehdi Koriantom en weliandi oh kakaun e ahpw momouriki sounpar pahieu, oh e kilang popohl nan sahpwo; ei, oh e pil kilangidi Sapwellimen Mourpwungo, oh e ahpw pereperen oh lapalapala nan eh ahnsou; oh e ahpw mehla nan popohl.

23 Kedekedeo Koriantom ahpw ideidawehn pwukoahn eh pahpao, oh ahpw kauada kahnihmw kehlail tohto, oh ahpw kihong sapwellime aramas me mwahu erein eh ahnsou. Kedekedeo e sohte nainikihda seri lao e likeilapala mehlel.

24 Kedekedeo eh pwoudo ahpw kepinsalehdala, ni eh sounpar epwiki riau. Kedekedeo Koriantom ahpw pwoudkihda peinakapw pwulopwul men, nan eh likeilapalahr, oh nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; eri e momour lao e sounpar epwiki pahisek riau.

25 Kedekedeo e ahpw nainkikihda Kom, oh Kom ahpw weliandi oh kakaun; oh e ahpw kakauniki sounpar pahisek duwahu, oh e nainikihda Ehd; oh e pil nainikihda ekei pwutak oh serepein kei.

26 Oh aramas akan pwurehng tohtohla pohn sahpwo pwon, oh suwed pwurehng tepida wie kehkehlaila pohn sahpwo pwon, oh Ehd pwurehng tepida perenikihda koasondi rir kan en mahs, pwe en kawehla eh pahpao.

27 Kedekedeo e ahpw kihsang eh pahpao nan dowe, pwehki e kemehkihla pein nah kedlahs; oh e weliandi oh kakaun.

28 Oh mie soukohp kei ahpw pwurehng pwurodo nan sahpwo, kalkalohngkihong irail koluhla—me irail en kaunopada Mwohn Kauno, ma soh, keriah ehu pahn kohdo pohn sahpwo; iei, e pahn mie lehk lapalap ehu, me irail pahn kamwomwkihla ma irail sohte pahn koluhla.

29 Ahpw aramas akan sohte kamehlele mahsen en soukohp kan, ahpw irail kausirailla; oh ekei kesehlong nan pwoahr oh lao irail mehla. Kedekedeo irail wia soahng pwukat koaros nin duwen pahngok en nanmwarki, Ehd.

30 Kedekedeo lehk lapalap eh tepida wiawi nan sahpwo, oh aramas akan tepida kamwomwala mwadang sang nan sahpwo pwehki lehko, pwe sohte kotou pohn sahpwo pwon.

31 Oh sineik pwoisin kei ahpw kohdo pohn sahpwo pwon, oh pwoisiniedi aramas tohto. Kedekedeo neirail pelin mahn akan ahpw tepida tangasang sineik pwoisin kan, kohlahng nan sahpw en palieir, me Mehn Nihpai kan kin kahdaniki Saraemla.

32 Kedekedeo mie tohto irail me mehla nan ahlo; ahpw, mie ekei me tang kohdihla nan sahpw en palieir.

33 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw elehda sineik kan re en uhdisang pwakih irail, ahpw re en irehdi ahlo sang aramas akan re en dehr daulih, me mehmen me pahn song en daulih e pahn mehla sang ni pwoisin en sineik kan.

34 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw dauwih lipwen mahn akan, oh ahpw kangala me kin mehla kan nan ahlo, lao irail kangala koaros. Met ahnsou me aramas akan kilangada me irail pahn mehla irail ahpw tepida koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan oh kapakap ong Kauno.

35 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail karakarahkala mehlel mwohn Kauno, e ahpw ketin kamwerehdi kotou pohn sahpwo; oh aramas ahpw tepida pwurehng kehlailda, oh tepida pwurehng miehda wahn sahpw nan wehin paliepeng kan, oh nan wehi kan koaros kapilpene. Oh Kauno ahpw kasalehiong irail sapwellime manaman ong doarehsang irail lehko.
ether 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Emen nanmwarki wiliandi emen—Ekei nanmwarki ko kin mwahu; ekei kin suwed—Ahnsou me mour pwung kin mie, Kauno kin ketin kapaida oh kekeirida aramas akan.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo Ses, me wia kadaudoken Ehd—pwehki Ehd mehla sang ni lehko, oh tohn imwe kan koaros ihte Ses me soh—eri, Ses pwurehng tepida kakehlakahla aramas luwetala kan.

2 Kedekedeo Ses ahpw tamataman kamwomwalahn eh pahpa ko, oh e ahpw wiahda wehi mwahu; pwe e tamataman dahme Kauno ketin wiahiong Sared oh rie ohlo ni e eh ketin wairail oh kotehla wasa loal; oh e ahpw kin idawehn sapwellien Kauno ahl akan; oh e nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto.

3 Oh nah pwutak me keieu laud, adaniki Ses, e ahpw uhwongada ih; ahpw, lipirap men kaloke Ses, pwehki e kepwehpwe mehlel, me kahrehda eh pahpao pwurehng alehdi popohl.

4 Kedekedeo eh pahpao ahpw wiahda kahnihmw tohto pohn sahpwo, oh aramas akan pwurehng kohpeseng pohn sahpwo pwon. Oh Ses ahpw momour lao e mahla mehlel; oh e nainikihda Riplakis. Oh e ahpw pwoula, oh Riplakish weliandi oh kakaun.

5 Kedekedeo Riplakis ahpw sohte wia me mwahu mwohn silangin Kauno, pwehki e pwoudiki lih tohto oh pekehi tohto, oh ahpw kihong pohn aramas akan dahme irail kin kalongkio; ei, e kihong irail en pwain daksis me katoutou; oh sang ni daksiso e ahpw wiahda ihmw lapala tohto.

6 Oh e ahpw wiahda mwoale me kaselel mehlel; oh e ahpw wiahda imweteng tohto, oh oh mehmen me sohte pahn kapwaiada koasondi en daksis, e kin lakidelong nan imweteng; oh mehmen me sohte kak pwain arail daksis kan, e ahpw kin lakidelong nan imweteng; oh e wiahiongirail en doadoahk ahnsou koaros ong sawaseparail; oh mehmen me sohte pahn doadoahk, e ahpw kin elehda irail en kamakamala.

7 Eri e ahpw alehdi pai en doadoahk kaselel koaros, iei, kohl kaselel e wiahda en wiawihda nan imweteng; oh soangen doadoahng lingan koaros e wiahda en wiawihda nan imweteng. Kedekedeo e ahpw kaloke nah aramas kan sang ni eh mour en kamwahl kan oh tiahk suwed kan.

8 Oh ahnsou me e kakaunikier erein sounpar pahisek riau aramas akan ahpw uhwongada ih; oh mahwin tepida wiawi nan sahpwo, lao Riplakis kamakamala, oh kadaudoke kan ahpw pwepwekihsang nan sahpwo.

9 Kedekedeo erein mwurin erein sounpar tohto kei, Moriandon, (ni eh wia kadaudoken Riplakis) kihpene sounpei kei sang irail me pokousla kan, oh kohla oh mahwiniong aramas akan; oh e kalowehdi kahnimw tohto; oh mahwino kahrehda kahpwal laud mehlel, oh wiwiawihki erein sounpar tohto kei; oh e ahpw alehdi manaman nan sahpwo pwon, oh koasonehdi en wiahla nanmwarki en sahpwo pwon.

10 Oh mwurin eh koasonehdi en wiahla nanmwarki, e ahpw kamarahrahda toutou en aramas akan, me kahrehda e kenikenla nan mesen aramas akan, oh irail keiehdi en wiahla arail nanmwarki.

11 Oh e ahpw kapwung pahrek aramas akan, ahpw kaidehn ong pein ih pwehki eh kamwahl tohto; eri e lipasang mwohn silangin Kauno.

12 Kedekedeo Moriandon ahpw wiahda kahnihmw tohto, oh aramas akan kepwehpwehla mehlel nan eh mwehi, ong wiahda ihmw kan, oh nainiki kohl oh silper, oh poadokedi werentuhke, oh oh nainiki pelin sihpw kan, oh kou kan, oh soang kan me kopwurupwuriong irail.

13 Oh Moriandon ahpw momour lao e mahla mehlel, oh e ahpw nainikihda Kim; oh Kim ahpw weliandi eh pahpa oh kakaun; oh e kakauniki sounpar waluh, oh eh pahpao ahpw mehla. Kedekedeo Kim ahpw sohte kakauniki mour pwung, eri e sohte keniken rehn Kauno.

14 Oh rie ohlo ahpw uhwongadi ih, me kahrehda eh kalowehdi ih nan kalidu; oh mihmi nan kalidu erein eh rahn akan koaros; oh e nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto nan eh kalidu, oh nan eh mahlahr e ahpw nainikihda Lihpai; oh e ahpw mehla.

15 Kedekedeo Lihpai ahpw wie papah nan kalidu mwurin eh pahpao eh mehla, erein sounpar pahisek riau. Oh e ahpw mahwiniong nanmwarki en sahpwo, me kehrehda e pein kalowehdiong ih wehio.

16 Oh mwurin eh kalowehdiong pein ih wehio e ahpw wia dahme mwahu mwohn silangin Kauno; oh aramas akan ahpw pweida nan sahpwo; oh e ahpw momour lao e mahla mehlel, oh e nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; oh e pil nainikihda Korom, me e keiehdi en weliandi ih wiahla nanmwarki.

17 Kedekedeo Korom ahpw wia dahme mwahu mwohng silangin Kauno erein eh rahn akan koaros; oh e nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; oh mwurin eh kilangehr rahn tohto e ahpw mehla, oh duhwehte koaros me mih pohn sampah; oh Kis ahpw weliandi ih oh kakaun.

18 Kedekedeo Kis ahpw pil mehla, oh Lip weliandi ih oh kakaun.

19 Kedekedeo Lip ahpw pil wia me mwahu mwohn silangin Kauno. Oh nan mwein Lipo sineik pwoisin kan kamwomwala. Eri irail kohdihla nan sahpw en palieir, pwe re en rapahki kenerail mwonge ong aramas en sahpwo, pwe sahpwo direkihla mahn en nanwelo. Oh pein Lip pil wiahla emen mai en sounkesik.

20 Oh irail wiahda kahnihmw ehu limwahn sahpw tehtiko, wasa me sehdo irepeseng sahpwo.

21 Oh irail wiahkihla sahpw en palieiro en wia sapwtehn, ong kesik mahn. Oh pohn sahpw en paliepeng pwon direkihla kousoan en aramas akan.

22 Oh irail pwersek en doadoahk mehlel, oh irail kin pwainda oh netikihla oh kin netinetpene nanpwungarail, pwe irail en kak kepwehpwehla.

23 Oh irail ahpw koadoahke soangen pwehl en mete koaros, oh irail wiahda kohl, oh silper, oh mete, oh prahs, oh soangen mete koaros; oh irail weiradahsang nan pwehl; eri, irail weirada pwehl laud pwe re en kak alehdi pwehl en mete, en kohl, oh silper, oh mete, oh kapa. Oh irail koadoahkehda soangen doadoahk kaselel koaros.

24 Oh mie arail likou sililik kan, oh likou kaselel kan; oh irail koadoahke soang likou koaros, pwe irail en kak perehkihla paliwararail akan.

25 Oh irail wiahda soangen dipwisou en doadoahk koaros pwe re en kamwakidki pwehl, ong uhpwel oh poadoak [wahn sahpw], ong mehn nahk [wahn sahpw] oh ong popoki pwehl, oh pil mehn kamwakelehki werentuhke kan.

26 Oh irail wiahda soangen dipwisou en doadoahk koaros sang ni arail doadoahngki neirail mahn lapala kan.

27 Oh irail wiahda soangen dipwisou en mahwin koaros. Oh irail wiahda soangsoangen dipwisou en doadoahk kaselel kei.

28 Oh sohte pwihn en aramas me pai mehlel duwehte irail, oh pweida sang nin limen Kauno. Oh irail mihmi nan sahpw me pilipilda sang sahpw koaros, pwe Kauno ketin mahsaniher.

29 Kedekedeo Lip ahpw momouriki pahr tohto kei, oh nainikihda pwutak oh serepein tohto; oh e ahpw pil nainikihda Ardom.

30 Kedekedeo Ardom ahpw weliandi eh pahpao oh kakaun. Oh ahnsou me Ardom kakaunikier sounpar rieisek pahieu, kilang, wehio kohsang ih. Oh e papah erein pahr tohto nan kalidu, iei, erein luhwen eh rahn akan.

31 Oh e nainikihda Ehd, oh Ehd momour nan kalidu erein eh mour. Oh Ehd nainikihda Aron, oh Aron momour nan kalidu erein eh mour; oh e nainikihda Amnikada, oh Amnikada pil momour erein eh mour nan kalidu; oh e nainikihda Koriandom, oh Koriandom momour nan kalidu erein eh mour; oh e nainikihda Kom.

32 Kedekedeo Kom ahpw kahluwahsang elep tohn wehio. Oh e kaunda elep tohn wehio erein pahr pahisek riau; oh e ahpw kohla mahwiniong nanmwarki, Amkid, oh irail pepeiki erein sounpar tohto kei, me kahrehda Kom powehdi Amkid, oh alehdi manaman en kaunda luhwen wehio pwon.

33 Oh nan mwein Kom e tepida mie pwihn lipirap nan sahpwo; oh irail kapwurehda koasondi en mahso, oh wiahda kahula kan duwehte mehn mahsoko, oh pwurehn rapahki re en kawehla wehio.

34 Met Kom ahpw kehlail en peiong irail; ahpw, e sohte kak powehdi irail.
ether 11:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mahwin kan, pwupwidi kan, oh wiewia suwed kan kaunda momour en Mehn Sared kan—Soukohp kan kohpada kamwomwala mehlel en Mehn Sared kan ma irail sohte pahn koluhla—Aramas akan kasohwe mahsen akan en soukohp kan.[/i]

1 Oh tohto soukohp kan kohdo nan mwein Kom, oh kohpada kamwomwalahn aramas akan me irail sohte pahn koluhla, oh sohpeilahng Kauno, oh uhdihsang arail kamaramas kan oh wiewia suwed kan.

2 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw soikalap soukohp kan, oh irail tangala rehn Kom pwe en doareirail, pwe aramas akan rapahki re en kemehla irail.

3 Oh irail kohpada ong Kom soahng tohto kei; oh e kapaikihda nan erein luhwen eh rahn akan.

4 Oh e momour lao e mahla mehlel, oh nainikihda Siplom; oh Siplom weliandi oh kakaun. Oh rien Siplom uhwongada ih, oh pwurehng tapiada mahwin lap mehlel nan sahpwo pwon.

5 Kedekedeo rien Siplom ohl ahpw kahrehda me soukohp koaros me kohpada kamwomwalahn aramas akan pahn kamakamala;

6 Oh mie kahpwal lap ehu nan sahpwo pwon, pwe irail kadehdehki me kariah lap ehu pahn kohdo nan sahpwo, oh pil ong aramas akan, oh me e pahn mie kamwomwala lap ehu rehrail, me sohte kin wiawi pohn sahpwo, oh tihrail kan pahn koaskoasoakda nan pwehl pohn sahpwo ma irail sohte pahn koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan.

7 Oh irail sohte rong mwahu kepitien Kauno, pwehki suwed en arail pwihn suwed kan; eri, mahwin oh pingiping tepida wiawi nan sahpwo pwon, oh pil tohto lehk kan oh soumwahu kan, kahrehda kamwomwala lap ehu wiawi, me sohte kin wiawi pohn sampah; oh mepwukat koaros wiawier nan mwein Siplom.

8 Oh aramas akan tepida koluhkihla diparail akan; oh ni ahnsou me irail wia met Kauno ahpw mahkehng irail.

9 Kedekedeo Siplom ahpw kamakamala, oh Sed ahpw lohdi nan kalidu, oh ahpw momour nan kalidu erein eh rahn akan.

10 Kedekedeo Eiah, nah pwutak, ahpw kalowehdi wehio; oh e ahpw kaunda aramas akan erein eh rahn akan. Oh e ahpw wia soangsoangen suwed koaros nan eh rahn akan, sang met e kakerehda kamaramas laud; oh eh rahn akan me mwotomwot.

11 Oh Ihdem, pwehki e wia kadaudoken Eiah, ahpw alehdi wehio; oh e pil wia me suwed erein eh rahn akan.

12 Kedekedeo nan mwehin Ihdem mie soukohp tohto ahpw kohdo, oh pwurehng kokohp ong aramas akan; ei, irail kohpada me Kauno pahn ketin kamwomwala mehlel irail sang pohn sampah ma irail sohte pahn koluhkihla diparail akan.

13 Kedekedeo mohngiong aramas akan ahpw keptakaila, oh sohte men rong arail mahsen akan; oh soukohp kan mwahieikihla oh pwurasang rehn aramas akan.

14 Kedekedeo Ihdem ahpw wia kopwung suwed erein eh rahn akan; oh e nainikihda Moron. Kedekedeo Moron ahpw weliandi oh kakaun; oh Moron ahpw wia me suwed mwohn Kauno.

15 Kedekedeo mie pingiping ehu wiawihda rehn aramas akan, pwehki pwihn suwed rir kan me wiawihda pwe re en alehdi manaman oh kepwehpwehla; oh ohl suwed kehlail men pwarada nan pwungarail, oh mahwiniong Moron, me kahrehda e kalowehdi elep en wehio; oh kolokol elep en wehio erein sounpar tohto kei.

16 Kedekedeo Moron ahpw kalowehdi ih, oh ahpw pwurehng alehdi wehio.

17 Kedekedeo pil emen ohl kehlail pwarada; oh e wia emen kadaudoken rien Sared ohlo.

18 Kedekedeo e ahpw kalowehdi Moron oh alehdi wehio; eri, Moron momour nan kalidu erein luwen eh rahn akan; oh e nainikihda Koriandor.

19 Kedekedeo Koriandor ahpw momour nan kalidu erein eh rahn akan.

20 Oh nan ahnsou en Koriandor mie pil soukohp tohto me kohdo, oh kohpada duwen soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan, oh kalkalohngki koluhla ong aramas akan, oh ma irail sohte pahn koluhla Kauno Koht pahn kadeik irail ong arail pahn kamwomwala mehlel;

21 Oh me Kauno Koht pahn ketin kadaredo de ketin wahdo ekei pwihn me pahn sapwankihla sahpwo, sang ni sapwellime manaman, ni wiepe me e ketin wahkihdo arail pahpahko.

22 Oh irail ahpw kasohwe mahsen koaros en soukohp akan, pwehki arail pwihn rir oh suwed en arail pwihn akan.

23 Kedekedeo Koriandon ahpw nainikihda Ihder, oh e ahpw mehla, ni eh momour nan kalidu erein eh rahn akan.
ether 12:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Soukohp Ihder kangoangehki aramas akan en kamehlele Koht—Moronai pwurehng koasoia duwen doadoahk manaman oh kapwuriamwei kan me kin pweida sang ni pwoson—Pwoson me elehda rien Sared ohlo en kilang Krais—Kauno kin ketikihong aramas akan luwet pwe irail en karakarahkala—Rien Sared ohl kamwakid Nahna Serin sang ni pwoson—Pwoson, koapworopwor, oh limpoak unsek kesempwal ong komourla—Moronai kilangangki mese Sises.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo mwehin Ihder e mih nan mwehin Koriandumer; oh Koriandumer me wia nanmwarki en sahpwo pwon.

2 Oh Ihder wia soukohp en Kauno; eri Ihder ahpw kohdo nan mwehin Koriandumer, oh tepida kokohp ong aramas akan, pwe e sohte kak kapweiek pwehki Ngehn en Kauno me ketin ieiang.

3 Pwe e kalkalohk sang nimenseng, lao lel ahnsou me ketipino kikihrla, kangkangoangehki aramas akan en kamehlele Koht ni ar pahn koluhla pwe irail de kamwomwala, ndindahiong irail me sang ni pwoson mehkoaros pahn pweida—

4 Eri, mehmen me pahn kamehlele Koht kak koapworopworiki mehlel ehu sampah mwahu, iei, ni pali maun en Koht, koapworopwor wet kohdo sang ni pwoson, me kin wiahla angkehn palingehn en aramas akan, me kak wiahiong irail en kehlail oh tengeteng, kalapw wiwia doadoahk mwahu kan, oh pahn kaluwahlang en kalingana Koht.

5 Kedekedeo Ihder ahpw kohpada soang kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan ong aramas akan, me irail sohte kamehlele, pwehki irail sohte kilang.

6 Oh met, ngehi, Moronai, pahn koasoia ekis duwen mepwukat; I pahn kasalehiong sampah me pwoson iei soahng kan me [kitail] kin koapworopworki oh sohte kilang; eri, dehr peikasal pwehki ke sohte kilang, pwe ke sohte pahn alehdi kadehdehu lao lel mwurin songosong en ahmw pwoson.

7 Pwe sang ni pwoson me Krais ketin kasalehiong pein ih atail pahpa kahlapoko, mwurin eh iasadahsang mehla; oh e sohte ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih lao irail pwoson ih; eri, e udahn anahnepe me ekei pwoson ih, pwe e sohte ketin kasalehiong sampah pein ih.
