8 Ahpw pwehki ehn aramas akan ar pwoson me e ketin kasalehiong sampah pein ih, oh kalinganahla maren semehu, oh kaunopada ahlo pwe mehtei kan en kak tungoale kisakis en nanleng, pwe irail en kak koapworopworki soang kan me re sohte kin kilang.

9 Eri, kumwail en pil ahneki koapworopwor, oh tungoale kisakiso, ma kumwail pahn ahneki pwoson.

10 Kilang sang ni pwoson me irail mehn mahs oko malipilipiong nan koasondi sarawi en Kohto.

11 Eri, sang ni pwoson me kosonned en Moseso kohkihdo. Ahpw sang ni kisakis en Sapwellime Iehroso, Koht ketin kaunopadahr ahl me kaselel sang; oh sang ni pwoson me e ketin pwekidahr.

12 Pwe ma sohte pwoson rehn aramas akan, Koht sohte kak wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei rehrail; eri, e sohte kin kasalehiong irail pein ih lao irail pwoson.

13 Kilang, iei sang ni ehn Alma oh Amulek ara pwoson me elehda imwetengo en mweredi nan pwehl.

14 Kilang, iei sang ni ehn Nihpai oh Lihai ara pwoson me kahrehda Mehn Leimen kan wekila, me kahrehda irail papidaiskihla kisiniei oh Ngehn Sarawi.

15 Kilang, iei sang ni ehn Amon oh rieh kan arail pwoson me kahrehiong arail wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei lap akan rehn Mehn Leimen kan.

16 Ei, oh irail koaros me wiahda doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan wia sang ni pwoson, iei irail kan me kohdo mwohn Krais oh pil irail kan me kohdo mwuri.

17 Oh iei sang ni pwoson me tohnpadahk silimeno alehdi inou ehu me irail sohte pahn kehndi mehla; oh irail sohte alehdi lao mwurin irail pwosonla.

18 Oh sohte pak ehu me aramas emen wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan lao mwurin irail pwosonla; eri irail kamehlele mahs Sapwellimen Kohto.

19 Oh mie me tohto me arail pwoson udahn kehlail, iei mwohn Krais eh ketido, irail sohte kak kolkoldi palie kahdengo, ahpw ni mehlel kilangkihdi mesarail kan soahng kan me irail kilangki arail pwoson, oh irail peren.

20 Oh kilang, se kilangehr nan poadoapoad wet me emen irail iei rien Sared ohlo; pwe e pwoson Koht me lap mehlel, me ni ahnsou me Koht ketikihwei sapwellime rekenlengo e sohte kak ekihsang rien Sared ohlo en kilang, pwehki sapwellime mahsen me e ketin mahsaniong ih, mahseno me e alehdi sang ni pwoson.

21 Oh mwurin rien Sared ohlo e kilangadahr rekenleng en Kauno, pwehki inou me rien Sared ohlo alehdi sang ni pwoson, Kauno sohte kak koledihsang ih en kilang mehkoaros; eri e ketin kasalehiong ih soahng koaros, pwe e sohlahr kak kolokolete palio kahdengo.

22 Oh iei sang ni pwoson me ei pahpa ko alehkihdi inou me mepwukat udahn pahn kohdo rehn riarail kan sang Mehn Liki kan; eri Kauno, Sises Krais, me ketin mahsanihong ie.

23 Oh I patohwanong ih: Maing Kaun, Mehn Liki kan pahn kauwe mepwukat, pwehki aht luwet nan nting; Maing Kaun, pwehki omwi ketin wiahiong kiht sen koaiek nan koasokosoi sang ni pwoson, ahpw komwi sohte ketin wiahiong kiht sen koaiek nan nting; pwe komwi ketin wiahiong aramas pwukat koaros en kak koasoi kehlail, pwehki Ngehn Sarawi me komwi ketikihong irailehr;

24 Oh komwi ketin wiahiong kiht sen kak ekiste nting, pwehki soakoaiek en peht kan. Kilang, komwi sohte ketin wiahiong kiht sen koahiek nan nting duwehte rien Sared ohlo, pwe komwi ketin wiahiong ih en kak ntingihdi soahng kan ni koahiek duwehte pein komwi, kahrehda e kin manaman ong aramas en wadek.

25 Komwi pil ketin wiahiong aht koasoai kan en manaman oh kehlail, iei kahrehda se sohte kak ntingihdi; eri, ahnsou me se kin nting se kin kilang aht luwet, oh sapwungala pwehki koasoanepen aht koasoai kan; oh I periki pwe Mehn Liki kan deh pahn kauwe aht koasoai kan.

26 Oh ahnsou me I ndahier met, Kauno ketin mahsanihong ie, ndinda: Me pweipwei kan me kin kauwe, ahpw irail pahn mwahiei; oh ei kalahngan pahn itarohng me mpai kan, kahrehda arail sohte pahn kak doadoahngki amwail luwet oh kawehkin kumwail;

27 Oh ma aramas akan kohdo rehi, I pahn kasalehiong irail arail luwet kan. I kihong aramas akan luwet pwe irail en kak karakarahkala; oh ei kalahngan itarohng aramas akan koaros me pahn karakarahkala mwohi; pwe ma irail pahn karakarahkala mwohi, oh pwosoniehla, I ahpw pahn wiahiong soahng kan me luwet en wiahla mehkot kehlail ong irail.

28 Kilang, I pahn kasalehiong Mehn Liki kan arail luwet kan, oh I pahn kasalehiong irail pwoson, koapwoaroapwoar oh limpoak unsek me kin wahdohng ie—utuhnpil en mour pwung koaros.

29 Oh ngehi, Moronai, mwurin ei rongehr mahsen pwukat, alehdier popohl, oh nda: Maing Kaun, kupwuromwi me pwung en pweida, pwe I ese me komwi kin ketin wia sapwellimomwi doadoahk ong aramas akan nin duwen arail pwoson;

30 Pwe rien Sared ohlo mahsanihong nahnahn Serin, Mwekid—oh e ahpw mwekida. Oh ma e sohte ahneki pwoson e sohte pahn kak mwekida; eri komwi kin ketin doadoahk mwurin aramas akan arail kin ahneki pwoson.

31 Pwe ih mwomwen omwi kasalehiong pein komwi ong sapwellimomwi tohnpadahk kan; pwe mwurin arail pwoson, oh ahpw koasoaiki mwaromwi, komwi ahpw ketin kasalehiong irail pein komwi ni manaman laud.

32 Oh I pil tamataman me komwi ketin mahsanih me komwi kaunopadahr wasahn kousoan ong aramas, iei, sang nan tehnpas akan en Sahmo, wasa me aramas akan kak koapwoaroapwoariki mehlel; eri aramas anahne koapwoaroapwoar, ma soh e sohte kak alehdi sohsohn wasa me komwi ketin kaunopadahr.

33 Oh pil, I tamataman me komwi ketin mahsani me komwi ketin poakehng sampah, me kahrehda omwi ketin pwilikihdier omwi mour pwehki sampah, pwe komwi en kak pwurehng alehda ong kaunopada dowen aramas akan.

34 Oh met I ese me limpoak wet me komwi sapwellimaniki ong aramas akan iei limpoak unsek; eri, ma aramas akan sohte pahn ahneki limpoak unsek irail sohte pahn kak sohsohki wasa me komwi ketin kaunopadahr nan tehnpas akan en Sememwio.

35 Eri, I ese sang met me komwi ketin mahsani, ma mehn Liki kan sohte pahn ahneki limpoak unsek, pwehki aht luwet, komwi pahn ketin song irail, oh ketikihsang irail arail koaiek, iei, dahme irail alehdiero, oh ketikihong irail akan me pahn ahneki laud.

36 Kedekedeo I ahpw kapakap ong Kauno pwe en ketikihong Mehn Liki kan kupwur kalahngan, pwe irail en kak ahneki limpoak unsek.

37 Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsanihong ie: Ma irail sohte pahn ahneki limpoak unsek e sohte pahn katapan ong komwi, pwehki kowe ke loaloapwoat; eri, ahmw likou karmend pahn mwakelekela. Oh pwehki ahmw kilangehr ahmw luwet ke pahn kehlaila, kahrehda ke pahn mwomwohd wasa me I kaunopadahr nan tehnpas akan en Semeio.

38 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, rahnmwahuihala Mehn Liki kan, ei, oh pil riei kan me I poakpoake, lao lel ahnsou me kitail pahn tuhpene mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Krais, wasa me aramas koaros pahn ese me ei likou karmend sohte mwahi en amwail nta powe.

39 Oh kumwail ahpw pahn ese me I kilangehr Sises, oh me e ketin koasoai ong ie ni aht kilengpene, oh me e ketin mahsanihong ie ni sansal oh karakarahk, mehlel duwehte aramas eh koasoaieng emen nan pein ei lokaia, duwen mepwukat;

40 Oh ekeite me I ntingihdi, pwehki ei luwet nan nting.

41 Oh met, I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail en rapahki Sises menet me soukohp kan oh wahnpoaron kan ntingihdier, pwe kalahngan en Koht Sahmo, oh pil Kauno Sises Krais, oh Ngehn Sarawio, me kadehdehki ira, en kak oh ieianguhk kohkohlahte. Ahmen.
ether 13:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ihder koasoaiahda duwen Serusalem Kapw ehu me pahn kokouda nan Amerika sang ni kadaudoken Sosep—E wia kokohp kan, oh lekidekla, ntingihda poadoapoad en Mehn Sared kan, oh kohpada kamwomwalahn Mehn Sared kan—Mahwin wiawi nan sahpwo pwon.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, pahn uhsehla kanekehla ei ntingih duwen kamwomwalahn aramas akan me I ntintingih.

2 Pwe kilang, irail kasohwehier ehn Ihder mahsen kan koaros; pwe e ndahiong irail soahng koaros ni mehlel, sangete ni tepin aramas; oh me mwurin pihl akan eh pwuredihsang pohn sahpw koaros e wiahla sahpw pilipilda ehu sang sahpw koaros, sahpw me Kauno ketin pilada; eri Kauno ketin kupwuriki me aramas koaros me pahn kousoan pohn sahpwo pahn papah ih;

3 Oh me e pahn wia wasa me Serusalem Kapwo pahn mih, me pahn kohdihdo sang nanleng, oh pahn wia sapwellimen Kauno tehnpas sarawi.

4 Kilang, Ihder kilangada sapwellimen Krais rahn akan, oh e koasoia duwen Serusalem Kapwo pohn sahpwet.

5 Oh e pil koasoaia duwen peneinei en Israel, oh Serusalemo wasa me Lihai pahn kohsang ie—mwurin e pahn kamwomwala e pahn pwurehng wiawihda, kahnihmw sarawi ong Kauno; eri, e sohte kak wia Serusalem kapw pwehki e sang mahs; ahpw e pahn pwurehng wiawihda, oh wiahla kahnihmw sarawi ong Kauno; oh e pahn wiawihda ong peneinei en Israel—

6 Oh me Serusalem Kapw pahn wiawihda pohn sahpwet, ong luhwen kadaudok en Sosep, me soahng pwukat wia karasepe ehu.

7 Pwe nin duwen Sosep eh wahlahng semehu nan sahpw en Isip, iei e ahpw kepinsalehdala wasahu; eri, Kauno ketin wahdosang luhwen kadaudok en Sosep sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwe en kak ketin kupwurehla kadaudoken Sosep kan pwe irail en dehr mehla, duwehte e ketin kupwurehla semen Sosepo pwe e dehr mehla.

8 Eri, luhwen peneinei en Sosep kan pahn kokouda pohn sahpw wet; oh e pahn wia sahpwarail sahpw en sohso; oh irail pahn wiahda kahnihmw sarawi ehu ong Kauno, duwehte Serusalem en mahso; oh irail sohla pahn namenekla, lao lel ni imwilahn ahnsou me sampah pahn imwisekla.

9 Oh e pahn mie nanleng kapw ehu oh sampah kapw ehu; oh re pahn duwehte mehn mahso ahpw mehn mahso pahn imwisekla, oh soahng koaros pahn kapwala.

10 Oh Serusalem Kapwo ahpw pahn kohdo; oh meid pahi irail me pahn kousoan wasahu, pwe iei irail me arail likou karmend kan pwetepwetala sang ni ntahn Sihmpwulo; oh irail me pahn wadawadiong rehn luhwen kadaudok en Sosep kan, me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel.

11 Oh Serusalem en mahso ahpw pil pahn kohdo; oh toweh kan, meid pai irail, pwe irail kamwakeldahr nan ntahn Sihmpwulo; oh irail iei me mwerpesengehr oh kopwurupwurpenehr sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah, oh sang ni wehi kan en paliepeng, oh alehdier pweidahn inouo me Koht ketin inoukihong samarail, Eipraam.

12 Oh ahnsou me soahng pwukat pahn kohdo, pwuhk sarawio pahn pweida me ketihtihki, me irail kan me pahn tiheng, pahn mwurihla; oh me pahn mwurih kan, pahn tihengla.

13 Oh I ahptehn pahn ntingih ekei, ahpw I sohte mweimweiong; ahpw ehn Ihder kokohp kan me kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei; ahpw re sohte kin wiahki ih mehkot, oh kausala ih; oh e kin rukuruk nan pwoar en paip ehu ni rahn, oh nihpwong e kin kowei oh kilikilang soahng kan me pahn kohdohng aramas akan.

14 Oh ni eh wie koukousoan nan pwoar en paip ehu, e ahpw wiahda luhwen poadoapoad wet, kilikilang kamwomwala kan me kohdohng aramas akan, nihpwong.

15 Kedekedeo me nan pahrohte me e pekousang rehn aramas akan mie mahwin lap ehu wiawihda rehn aramas akan, pwe me tohto me uhda, me wia ohl kehlail kei, oh rapahki re en kemehla Koriandumer sang ni arail koasondi en wiewia suwed rir kan, me kosoiepe wiawiher.

16 Oh met Koriandumer, pein onopkier, wiepen mahwin koaros oh widing en sampah pwong, eri e mahwiniong irail kan me rapahki re en kemehla ih.

17 Ahpw e sohte koluhla, pil iangahki nah pwutak oh serepein kaselel kan; de pil nein Kohor pwutak oh serepein kaselel kan; de pil nein Korior pwutak oh serepein kaselel kan; oh ni mehlel, sohte pwutak oh serepein kaselel men pohn sampah me koluhkihla diparail kan.

18 Eri, kedekedeo me ni tepin pahr me Ihder koukousoan nan pwoar en paipo, mie aramas tohto me kamakamala pahn nein pwihn suwed rir kan neirail kedlahs kan, me pepeiong Koriandumer pwe re en kak alehdi wehio.

19 Kedekedeo nein Koriandumer pwutangkan pei kehlail oh nta kusila laud.

20 Oh nan keriau en pahro mahsen en Kauno ahpw kohdohng Ihder, me e pahn kohla oh kohpehng Koriandumer me, ma e pahn koluhla, oh tohn imwe koaros, Kauno pahn ketikihong ih sapwellime wehio oh doarehla aramas akan—

21 Ma soh re pahn kamwomwala, oh tohn imwe pwon ihte ih me pahn luhwehdi. Oh e pahn momour oh kilangidi pweidahn kokohp kan me kohpadahr duwen ekei aramas me pahn alehdi sahpwo pwe en wia arail sohso; oh irail pahn sarepidi Koriandumer; oh koaros pahn kamwomwala ihte Koriandumer.

22 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw sohte koluhla, de pil tohn imwehu, de pil aramas akan; oh mahwino sohte uhdi; oh irail rapahki re en kemehla Ihder, ahpw e kin sepohsang mworail oh pwurehng rukila nan pwoaren paipo.

23 Kedekedeo Sahred ahpw pil uhda, oh e pil mahwiniong Koriandumer; oh e keme ih, kahrehda ni rahn kesiluhwo e ahpw kalowehdi ih nan kalidu.

24 Oh nan pahr kapahieu, nein Koriandumer pwutak kan ahpw keme Sahred, oh ahpw pwurehng alehdi wehio ong arail pahpao.

25 Met mahwing pwurehng tepida wiawi pohn sahpwo pwon, aramas koaros iang eh pwihn mahmahwinki dahme e inangih.

26 Oh mie lipirap kei, oh ni mehlel, soangen wiewia suwed koaros mih pohn sahpwo pwon.

27 Kedekedeo Koriandumer udahn lingeringer pahn Sahred, oh kohlahng mahwinkihong ih nah sounpei kan; oh irail tuhpene nan arail lingeringer laud, oh irail tuhpene nan wahu en Kilkal; oh mahwino doarala mehlel.

28 Kedekedeo Sahred ahpw mahwiniong ih erein rahn siluh. Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw kemehda, oh ahpw pwakih ih lao e kohla nan patapat en Eslon.

29 Kedekedeo Sahred ahpw mahwiniong ih nan wasa patapat kan; oh kilang, e ahpw kemehda Koriandumer, oh pwurehng pwakiala ih nan wahu en Kilkal.

30 Oh Koriandumer ahpw pwurehng mahwiniong Sared nan wahu en Kilkal, wasa me e keme Sahred oh kemehla ih.

31 Oh Sahred kauwehla dengen Koriandumero, oh e sohte pwurehng mahwinki erein sounpar riau, nan ahnsou me aramas kan koaros pohn sahpwo wie kamkamaramas, oh sohte emen me kak kauhdi irail.
ether 14:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wiewia suwed en aramas akan kahrehda keriah ehu pohn sahpwo—Koriandumer tapiada mahwin ong Kiliad, mwuri Lip, oh mwuri Sihs—Nta oh kamaramas laud kipehdi sahpwo.[/i]

1 Oh met keriah lap ehu tepida pohn sahpwo pwon pwehki wiewia suwed en aramas akan, me iei, ma aramas men pahn pwilikihda nah dipwisou de nah kedlahs pohn eh pasapas, de nan wasa me e kin nekidala, kilang, madahsang rahno, e sohte pahn kak diar, pwehki keriah lap wet pohn sahpwo.

2 Eri emen emen arams ahpw kolkihdi pehkan dahme pein ah, oh sohte men peki de pil kihla; oh emen emen aramas kin kolokolki pali maun en peh kan wasahn kolkol en nah kedlahs, pwe en doarehki pein ah dipwisou oh pein ah mour oh ah pwoud kan oh nah seri kan.

3 Oh met, mwurin erein sounpar riau, oh mwurin Sahred eh mehla, kilang, rien Sahred ohl pil pwarada oh mahwiniong Koriandumer, oh Koriandumer ahpw keme ih oh pwakialahng nan sapwtehn en Eikis.

4 Kedekedeo riehn Sahred ohlo ahpw mahwiniong ih nan sapwtehn en Eikis; oh mahwino doarala mehlel, oh kid kei mehkihla kedlahs.

5 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw kapildi sapwtehno; oh rien Sahred ohlo ahpw karihsdo sang nan sapwtehno nihpwong, oh kemehla ekei pali nein Koriandumer sounpei kan, ni arail sakaulahr.

6 Oh e ahpw kohdo nan sahpw en Moron, oh koasonehdi pein ih nan mwoalen Koriandumer.

7 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw koukousoan rehn nah sounpei kan nan sapwtehno erein sounpar riau, me kahrehda nan ahnsouo e ahpw alehdi kakehlail laud ong nah sounpei kan.

8 Met rien Sahred ohlo, me adaniki Kiliad, pil alehdier kakehlail ong nah sounpei kan, pwehki pwihn suwed rir kan.

9 Kedekedeo nah samworo lapalap kemehla ih ni eh ketiket nan mwolehu.

10 Kedekedeo emen pwihn suwed rir ko me kemehla ih sang ni ahl rir pwot, oh kalowehdi ong pein ih wehio; oh ede iei Lip; oh Lip wia ohl paliwar laud men, lapalahsang ohl koaros en nanpwungen aramas ko pwon.

11 Kedekedeo nan tepin pahr en Lip, Koriandumer ahpw kohdo nan sahpw en Moron, oh mahwingiong Lip.

12 Kedekedeo e ahpw mahwiniong Lip, me kahrehda Lip eh pelehdi pehu oh kawehla; ahpw, nein Koriandumer sounpei kan kohwei kehlail ong Lip, kahrehda eh tangala ni irepen sahpwo pohn oaroahro.

13 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw pwakih ih; oh Lip ahpw mahwiniong ih pohn oaroahro.

14 Kedekedeo Lip ahpw mahwiniongada nein Koraindumer sounpei kan, kahrehda irail pwurehng tangala nan sapwtehn en Eikis.

15 Kedekedeo Lip ahpw pwakih ih lao e kohdo nan patapat en Eikohs. Oh Kiraindumer kahrehsang aramas kan koaros ni eh tangatangasang Lip nan pali en sahpwo me e kin tangala.

16 Oh ahnsou me e kohdo nan patapat en Eikohs e ahpw mahwiniong Lip, oh e palapaliong ih lao e mehla; ahpw, rien Lip ohl ahpw weliandi ih oh kohdohng Koriandumer, oh mahwino doarala mehlele, me kahrehda Koriandumer pwurehng tangasang mwohn nein rien Lip ohlo sounpei kan.

17 Met eden rien Lip ohlo iei Sihs. Kedekedeo Sihs ahpw pwakiala mwurin Koriandumer, oh e kawehla kahnihmw tohto, oh e kemehla koaros lih akan oh seri kan, oh e ahpw kin isikala kahnihmw kan.

18 Oh rohng kamasepwehk en Sihs kohwei wasa koaros nan sahpwo; ei, pakair ehu kohwei nan sahpwo—Ihs me kak uh mwohn nein Sihs sounpei kan? Kilang, e kin koahkoa sampah mwowe!

19 Kedekedeo aramas akan ahpw tepida kohpene nan sounpei kan, wasa koaros pohn sahpwo.

20 Oh irail pwalpeseng; oh ekei irail kohla iangala nein Sihs sounpei kan, oh ekei irail kohla iangala nein Koriandumer sounpei kan.

21 Oh mahwino me laud oh werei mehlel, oh ahnsou reirei kilel en nta oh kamaramas wiwiawi, me kahrehda pohn sahpwo pwon direkihla paliwar en me mehla kan.

22 Oh mahwino kin karuwaru oh wuk mehlel kahrehda sohte me luhwehdi pwe en saripedi mehla kan, ahpw irail kin karihswei sang ni nta keredi kohlahng nta keredi, pwilipwilikihdi paliwar en ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan mihseli pohn sahpwo, pwe en wiahla kenen mwahs me kin kangala uduk.

23 Oh pwowehu kohpeseng pohn sahpwo, iei pohn sahpwo pwon; eri aramas akan soansuwedkihda ni rahn oh nihpwong, pwehki pwowehu.

24 Ahpw, Sihs sohte uhdihsang pwakih Koriandumer; pwe e kahukihla me e pahn dupukiong Koriandumer eh ntahn rie ohlo, me kamakamalahr, oh mahsen en Kauno me kohieng Ihder me Koriandumer sohte pahn mehkihla kedlahs.

25 Oh met kitail kilang me Kauno ketin pwarengkinirail sapwellime engieng unsek, oh arail wiewia suwed kan oh tiahk suwed kan me kaunopadahr arail kamwomwala poatoapoat.

26 Kedekedeo Sihs ahpw pwakih Koriandumer kohla palimese, lao lel ni irepen sahpwo ni oaroahro, oh wasahu e mahwiniong Sihs erein rahn siluh.

27 Oh wen kamasepwehk en kamwomwalahn nein Sihs sounpei kan kahrehda aramas akan tepida masepwehk, oh tepida tang mwohn nein Koriandumer sounpei kan; oh irail tang kohla nan sahpw en Korior, oh kemehla toweh kan mwohrail, oh koaros me sohte iangirailla.

28 Oh irail kauwada imwarail impwal akan nan wahu en Korior; oh Koriandumer kauwada imwe impwal akan nan wahu en Suhr. Met wahu en Suhr karanihte dohl en Komnor; eri, Koriandumer ahpw kihpene nah sounpei kan pohn dohl en Komnor, oh ahpw pouk souwi ong nein Sihs sounpei kan pwe en luke iraildohng en mahwin.

29 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kohdo, ahpw pwurehng pwepwekihla; oh irail pwuredo keriapak, oh irail pwurehng pwepwekihla keriapak. Kedekedeo irail pwurehng pwurodo kesilipak en ahnsou, oh mahwino doarala mehlel.

30 Kedekedeo Sihs ahpw palapaliong Koriandumer oh kihong diren ohla kan; oh Koriandumer, lupungmaskihla pwehki nta laud kohsang, oh wisiksang duwehte me e mehla.

31 Met uwen ohl akan, lih akan oh seri kan me mehla pali koaros udahn laud kahrehda Sihs ruwesehki nah aramas akan me irail sohte pahn pwakih nein Koriandumer sounpei kan; eri, irail pwuralahng arail wasahn pweidi.
ether 15:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mehn Sared Miliohn kei kamakamala nan mahwin—Sihs oh Koriandumer kihpene aramas koaros oh ong mahwin lao mehla—Ngehn en Kauno uhdihsang ieiang irail—Wehin Mehn Sared kan kamwomwala mehlel—Ihte Koriandumer me luwehdi.[/i]

1 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Koriandumer maiaudahsang eh ohla kan, e ahpw tepida tamanda mahsen kan me Ihder mahsanihong ih.

2 E kilangehr me nah aramas akan me kamakamkihlahr kedlahs kereniongehr lel aramas riarar, oh e tepida pahtou nan eh mohiong; iei, ohl kehlail akan, oh arail pwoud kan, oh neirail seri kan me kamakamala meh riarar.

3 E tepida koluhkihla suwed me e wiahdahr; e tepida tamanda mahsen kan me soukohp kan koaros mahsaniher, oh e kilangehr me pwonte pweidahr, ni pisetikpe; oh palingeni mwahieiki oh sohte men nsanamwahla.

4 Kedekedeo e ahpw ntingihda kisin likou ehu ong Sihs, ni eh inangih en kamourala aramas kan, oh en mweidala wehio pwe en doarehla ehn aramas kan mour.

5 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Sihs alehdier nah kisin likouo e ahpw ntingihda ehu kisin likou ong Koriandumer, ma e pahn mweidala pein ih, pwe en kak kemehkihla ih pein nah kedlahs, ih met me e pahn mweidikihla aramas akan en mourla.

6 Kedekedeo aramas akan sohte koluhkihla diparail akan; oh nein Koriandumer aramas akan mwekidikihda arail lingeringer pahn nein Sihs aramas akan; oh nein Sihs aramas akan mwekidikihda arail lengeringer pahn nein Koriandumer aramas akan; eri, nein Sihs aramas akan mahwiniong nein Koriandumer aramas akan.

7 Oh ahnsou me Koriandumer kilangada me e pahn kereniongehr pwupwidi e ahpw pwurehng tangasang mwohn nein Sihs aramas akan.

8 Kedekedeo e ahpw kohdo ni pihl akan en Riplienkum, me, wehwehki, lapala, de lapalahsang koaros; eri, ahnsou me irail kohdo ni pihl pwukat irail kauwada imwarail impwal akan; oh Sihs pil kauwada impwal akan karanih irail; oh eri mandahsang rahno irail ahpw kohdo mahwin.

9 Kedekedeo irail pei nan mahwin doar mehlel ehu, me kahrehda Koriandumer pwurehng alehdi ohla, oh e lupungmaskihla nta e kerasang.

10 Kedekedeo nein Koriandumer sounpei kan ahpw nantihong mahwin kehlailiong nein Sihs sounpei kan kahrehda irail keme irail, kahrehda arail tangasang mwohrail; oh irail tang kohla palieir, oh ahpw kauwada imwarail impwal kan wasa me adaniki Okad.

11 Kedekedeo nein Koriandumer sounpei kan ahpw kauwada imwarail impwal akan karanih ni dohl en Rama; oh iei ih dohlo me ei pahpa Mormon ekihla poadoapoad kan ong Kauno, me sarawi.

12 Kedekedeo irail ahpw kihpene aramas koaros me mih pohn sahpwo pwon, me saikinte kamakamala, ihte Ihder me soh.

13 Kedekedeo Ihder ahpw kilang wiewia kan koaros en aramas akan; oh e kilang me aramas akan me uhki Koriandumer kohpene iangala nein Koriandumer sounpei kan; oh aramas akan me uhki Sihs kohpene iangala nein Sihs sounpei kan.

14 Eri, erein sounpar pahieu me ira kihkihpene aramas akan, pwe ira en kak alehdi koaros me mih pohn sahpwo, oh pwe ira en kak alehdi kakehlail koaros me ira kak alehdi.

15 Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail koaros kohpene, emen emen ong pwihn en sounpei me irail men iang, iangahki arail pwoud kan oh neirail seri kan—koaros ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan alehda dipwisou en mahwin kan, mehn sansar kan, tehtehn mwarmware kan, lisoarop kan, oh likouki likoun mahwin kan—irail ahpw emente karihsehng emen pwe en mahwin; oh irail mahwin rahno pwon, oh sohte me pweida.

16 Kedekedeo ahnsou me e nihpwongdi irail pwangada, oh pwuralahng wasahn arail komoal; oh mwurin arail pwuralahng wasahn arail komoal kan irail kin weriwer oh sengisengki neirail aramas me mehla kan; oh arail weriwer kan me kehlail mehlel, oh sengiseng oh mwahiei kan, kahrehda re katohrepeseng nan wehwe ni mehlel.

17 Kedekedeo mandahsang rahno irail ahpw pwurehng pwurala mahwin, oh rahno me kamasepwehk mehlel; ahpw, irail sohte pweida, ahnsou me e nihsoutikdi irail pwurehng katohrehkipeseng nan wehweh arail weriwer kan, oh sengiseng kan, oh mwahiei kan, pwehki kamakamalahn neirail aramas kan.

18 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw pwurehng ntingihda kisin likou ehu ong Sihs, me e inangih en dehr pwurehng kohdo mahwin, ahpw me en ale wehio, oh mweidehng aramas akan en mourla.

19 Ahpw kilang, Ngehn en Kauno uhdihsang ieiang irail, oh Sehdan ahneki manaman unsek pohn mohngiong en aramas akan; pwe irail mweidala mohngiongarail kan en keptakaila, oh maskunlahn arail madamadau kan kahrehda irail pahn kamwomwala; eri irail pwurehng kohla mahwin.

20 Kedekedeo irail pei rahno pwon, oh ahnsou me e nihpwongdi irail meir pohn neirail kedlahs kan.

21 Oh mandahsang rahno irail pei lao lel nihpwong.

22 Oh ahnsou me e nihpwongdi irail sakaukihla arail lingeringer, duwehte aramas men me sakaukihla wain; oh irail meirla pohn neirail kedlahs kan.

23 Oh mandahsang rahno irail pwurehng peipene; oh ahnsou me e nihpwongidi irail koaros mehkihla kedlahs ihte meh limehk riemen nein Koriandumer arams, oh meh wenehk duwemen nein Sihs aramas.

24 Kedekedeo irail meirla pohn neirail kedlahs kan nihpwongo, oh manda rahno irail pwurehng peipene, oh irail peikipene neirail kedlahs kan oh iangahki arail mehn sansar kan ni kehlail ni rahno pwon.

25 Oh ahnsou me e nihpwongidi nein Sihs aramas mehte siliakan riemen, oh nein Koriandumer aramas mehn riehk isimen.

26 Kedekedeo irail ahpw mwonge oh meir, oh kaunopadahng mehla lakapw. Oh irail wia ohl lapalap oh kehlail kei nin duwen kehlail en ohl akan.

27 Kedekedeo irail ahpw peiki erein awa siluh, oh irail lupungmaskihla nta eh kerasang irail.

28 Kedekedeo ahnsou me nein Koriandumer ohl akan alehdi kehlail me itarehng re en kak alu, irail ahpwtehn pahn tang pwe re en mourla; ahpw kilang, Sihs kesihnenda, oh pil nah ohl akan, oh e kahukihla ni eh lingeringer me e pahn kemehla Koriandumer de e pahn mehkihla kedlahso.

29 Eri, e ahpw pwakih irail, oh madahsang rahno e koliraildi; oh irail pwurehng peikipene kedlahs. Kedekedeo ahnsou me irail koaros pwupwikihdier kedlahs, ihte Koriandumer oh Sihs, kilang Sihs lupungmaskihla nta eh kerasang.

30 Kedekedeo ahnsou me Koriandumer idengeklahr pohn nah kedlahso, e ahpw ekis komoal, e ahpw lupukasang moangen Sihs.

31 Kedekedeo mwurin e lupukasangehr moangen Sihs, Sihs ahpw kihda pehko oh pwupwidi; oh mwuri e ahpw song en esingek, e ahpw mehla.

32 Kedekedeo Koriandumer ahpw pwupwidi pohn pwehlo, oh duwehla me sohte eh mour.

33 Oh Kauno ahpw mahsaniong Ihder, oh mahsanihong ih: Kohwei. Oh e ahpw kohla, oh kilang me mahsen kan koaros en Kauno pweidahr; oh e ahpw kanekehla eh ntingih poadoapoad; (oh pali epwiki kei I sohte ntingihdi) oh e ekihla ni mwohmw ehu me nein Limai aramas akan diarada.

34 Met kaimwseklahn mahsen kan me Ihder ntingihdi iei mepwukat: Ma Kauno ketin kupwuriki me I en kiewekla, de I en mihmihte nan paliwar wet oh lokolongki dahme Kauno kupwuriki, e sohte katepe, dahme kesempwal ma I pahn kemourla nan wehin Koht. Ahmen.
moro 1:
[center][font_size=26]Pwuhk en Moronai[/font_size][/center]

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Moronai nting ong kamwahupen Mehn Leimen kan—Mehn Nihpai kan me sohte kahmahmki Krais kamakamala. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Met ngehi, Moronai, mwurin ei kaimwsekalahr oaralapiadahr poadoapoad en nein Sared aramas akan, I sohte medewe I pil ntingih ekei, ahpw I saikinte mehla; oh I sohte pwarohng Mehn Leimen kan pwe irail de kemeiehla.

2 Pwe kilang, arail mahwin kan me keper mehlel nanpwungarail; oh pwehki arail kailok irail kemehla Mehn Nihpai koaros me sohte pahn kahmahmkihla Krais.

3 Oh ngehi, Moronai, sohte pahn kahmahmkihla Krais; eri, I kin kokohseli wasa I kak kohla pwe en mie pererehn pein ei mour.

4 Eri, I pahn ntingih ekeite mehkot, me I medewe I sohte pahn wia; pwe I medewe me I pahn solahr nting; ahpw I pahn ntingih ekeite mehkoat, pwe ele e pahn kak mie katepe ong riei kan, Mehn Leimen kan, ehu rahn me pahn kohdo, nin duwen kupwur en Kauno.
moro 2:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Sises ketikihong tohnpadahk en Mehn Nihpai ehkriemeno manaman en kihla kisakis en Ngehn Sarawio. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Mahsen kan en Krais, me e ketin mahsanihong tohnpadahk kan, ehkriemeno me e ketin piladahr, ni eh ketin pwilikihdier lime kan pohrail—

2 Oh e eker irail ni edarail, ketihtihki: Kumwail pahn eker Sahmo ni mwarei, nan kapakapw kehlail; oh mwurin amwail wiahier met kumwail pahn ahneki manaman me ong ih me kumwail pahn pwilikihdi pehmwail kan, kumwail pahn kihla Ngehn Sarawi; oh ni mwarei kumwail pahn kihla, pwe iei me nei wahnpoaron kan kin wia.

3 Met Krais ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat ong irail ni eh tepin pwarohng irail; oh pokono sohte rong, ahpw tohnpadahngko me rong; oh koaros me irail pwilikihdi pehrail kan powe, Ngehn Sarawi tiada pohrail.
moro 3:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Elder kan pahn kasarawihla samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan sang ni pwilidien peh kan. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Wiepen tohnpadahk kan, me malipilipieng wia elder kan en mwomwohdiso, kasarawihla samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan—

2 Mwurin arail pahn kapakap ong Sahmwo ni mwaren Krais, irail pahn pwilikihdi pehrail kan pohrail, oh nda:

3 Sang ni mwaren Sises Krais I kasarawihukala en wia samworo (de ma e pahn wia sounpadahk men, I kasarawihukala en wia sounpadahk) en kalohngki koluhla oh kamwakelpen dihp akan sang rehn Sises Krais, sang ni dadaurete pwosono ni mware lao lel imwi. Ahmen.

4 Oh mwurin wiepe wet irail kin kasarawihla samworo kan oh sounpadahk kan, nin duwen kisakis oh malipilip en Koht ong aramas akan; oh irail kin kasarawihla sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, me mih rehrail.
moro 4:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kawehwehdahn koasondi en elder kan oh samworo kan ar pahnkasarawi kamadipw sarawi en pilawahu. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Wiepen neirail elder kan oh samworo kan ar kin kasarawi uduk oh ntahn Krais ong mwomwohdiso; oh irail kin kasarawih nin duwen sapwellimen Krais kosonned kan; eri se ese me wiepehu me mehlel; oh elder oh samworo papahki—

2 Oh irail kin iang mwomwohdiso kelepwukihdi, oh kapakap ong Sahmo ni mwaren Krais, ndinda:

3 Maing Koht, Sahmw Soutuk, se patohwan peki rehmwi ni mwaren sapwellimomwi Iehros, Sises Krais, en ketin kapaiada oh kasarawiala pilawa wet ong war koaros me pahn patohwan tungoale; pwe en wia mehn katamanpen war en sapwellimomwi Iehroso, oh kadehdehiong komwi, Maing Koht, Sahm Soutuk, me pein irail men patohwan ale mwaren sapwellimomwi Iehroso, oh patohwan tamatamaniki ih ahnsou koaros oh kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan me e ketikihong irailehr, pwe sapwellime Ngehn en ketiket rehrail ahnsou koaros. Ahmen.
moro 5:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wiepen kasarawiala kamadipw sarawi en waino kawehwehda. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Weiepen kasarawiala waino—Kilang, irail kin alehda kepo, oh nda:

2 Maing Koht, Sahm Soutuk, se patohwan peki rehmwi ni mwaren sapwellimomwi Iehros, Sises Krais, en ketin kapaiada oh kasarawiala wain wet ong war koaros me pahn patohwan tungoale, pwe re en wia ong mehn katamanpen ntahn sapwellimomwi Iehroso, me kepwilipwilkidier pwehki irail; pwe irail en patohwan kadehdehiong komwi, Maing Koht, Sahm Soutuk, me re pahn patohwan tamatamaniki ih ahnsou koaros, pwe sapwellime Ngehn en ketiket rehrail. Ahmen.
moro 6:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aramas akan me kin koluhla kin papidaisla oh utuhda—Towe kan Mwomwohdisoh me kin koluhla kin alehdi mahk—Wielamalam kan kin wiawi pahn kaweid en manaman en Ngehn Sarawi. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met I pahn koasoia duwen papidais. Kilang, elder kan, samworo kan, oh sounpadahk kan papidaislahr; oh irail sohte kin papidaisla lao irail kasalehda wah me irail warohngehr.

2 Irail pil sohte kin alehda emen ong papidais lao irail pahn kohkihdo mohngiongarail karakarahk oh ngehn peik, oh kadehdehiong mwomwohdiso me irail kaluhkihla mehlel diparail akan koaros.

3 Oh sohte emen irail alahlda nan papidais lao irail alehda mwaren Krais, oh koasonehdi me re pahn papah ih lao lel imwi.

4 Oh mwurin arail kin alahlda nan papidais, oh manaman en Ngehn Sarawi sair irail oh kamwakeleirailda, irail iang wadawadieng rehn aramas en mwomwohdiso en Krais; oh adarail akan kin alahldi, pwe [tohn mwomwohdiso] en kak tamataman irail oh apwalih kin irail mahsen en Koht mwahuo, en kolokol irail nan ahl pwungo, en kin kapkapakapkin irail ahnsou koaros, koapwkoapworopworikihte kapai kan me kohsang wiewia pwung kan en Krais me wia tepin atail pwoson oh kaunsekpen atail pwoson.

5 Oh mwomwohdiso kin kalapw tuhpene, kaisihsol oh kapakap, oh koasoiapene duwen arail momour kan.

6 Oh irail kin kalapw tuhpene tungoale pilawa oh waino, ong katamanpen Kauno Sises.

7 Oh irail kin kanaiehng mehlel en dehr mie wiewia suwed rehrail; oh mehmen me kin dierek wiadahr wiewia suwed, oh soun kadehdeh silimen en mwomwohdiso ahpw pahn kedipa irail mwohn elder kan, oh ma irail sohte koluhla, oh sohte wehkada, edarail kan kin kohsang, oh irail sohte kin wadawadiong rehn aramas en Kira.

8 Ahpw ahnsou koaros me irail koluhla oh peki mahk, ni mehlel, irail kin alehdi mahk.

9 Oh arail wielamalam kan kin wiawi pahn kaweid en mwomwohdiso ni wiepen doadoahk kan en Ngeho, oh sang manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; pwe manaman en Ngehn Sarawio kin kaweid kin irail ma irail pahn padahk, de wia kaweid en kangong, de kapakap, pekipek sawas, de koul, a e kin pweida.
moro 7:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Luhk ehu lukehiong [aramas] en pidelong nan wasahn komoal en Kauno—Kapakap sang ni ineng mehlel—Ngehn en Krais me elehda aramas akan kak ese mwahu sang suwed—Sehdan kin kangoangehki aramas akan en kahmahmkihla Krais oh wia me suwed—Sounkohp akan kasalehda ketidohn Krais—Sang ni pwoson, manaman kapwuriamwei kan kin pwarada oh tohnlengkan kin papah—Aramas akan anahne koapworopworiki mour soutuk oh koledi teng limpoak unsek. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Oh met ngehi, Moronai, ntingih ekei kaweid kan en ei pahpa Mormon, me e koasoia duwen pwoson, koapworopwor, oh limpoak unsek; pwe ni mwohmw wet me e koasoiong aramas akan, ni e padahkih irail nan sinokoke me irail wiahda ong wasahn kaudok.

2 Oh met, ngehi, Mormon, koasoieng kumwail, riei kesempwal oko; oh iei pwehki kalahngan en Koht Sahm, oh atail Kaun Sises Krais, oh sapwellime kupwur sarawi, pwehki kisakis en sapwellime malipipil ong ie, me elehda ei kak mweimweida en koasoi ong kumwail ahnsou wet.

3 Eri, I pahn koasoi ong kumwail me towe mwomwohdiso, me kin wie ideidawehn Krais nan popohl, oh me alehdier koapworopwor me itar me kumwail kak pidekihlong nan wasahn komoal en Kauno, sang ahnsou wet kohla lao lel amwail pahn komoaldi reh nanleng.

4 Oh met riei ko, I tenekih mepwukat ong kumwail pwehki amwail kin ieiang aramas akan nan popohl.

5 Pwe I taman mahsen en Koht me ketin mahsanih sang ni arail doadoahk kan kumwail pahn ese irail; pwe ma arail doadoahk kan mwahu, eri re pahn pil mwahu.

6 Pwe kilang, Koht ketin mahsanih me aramas suwed men sohte kak wia me mwahu; pwe ma e pahn kihla kisakis ehu, de kapakap ong Koht ma e sohte pahn wia ni ineng mehlel e sohte pahn mie katepe.

7 Pwe kilang, e sohte pahn wadiki mour pwung ong ih.

8 Pwe kilang, ma aramas men loalsuwed ahpw kihla kisakis ehu, e pahn wia ni eh sohte inangih; eri e pahn wadiki me duwehte ma e koledihte kisakiso; eri e pahn wadiki suwed mwohn Koht.

9 Oh pil duwehte aramas men pahn wadiki suwed, ma e pahn kapakap oh sohte inangih mehlel sang nan mohngiongi; ei, oh e sohte pahn mie katepe ong ih, pwe Koht sohte kin alehda soahng wet.

10 Eri, aramas suwed me sohte kak wia me mwahu; de pil kihla kisakis mwahu.

11 Pwe kilang, utuhnpihl sakanakan sohte kak kihdo pihl mwahu; de pil utuhnpihl mwahu sohte kak kihdo pihl sakanakan; eri, aramas me kin papah tepilo sohte kak idawehn Krais; oh ma e pahn idawehn Krais e sohte pahn kak papah tepilo.

12 Eri, soang koaros me mwahu kohsang rehn Koht; oh me suwed kin kohsang tepilo; pwe tepilo iei imwintihti ong Koht, oh kin wie pepeiong ih ahnsou koaros, oh lukluke oh pahpahne aramas en wia dihp, oh wia me suwed ahnsou koaros.

13 Ahpw kilang, me kin sang rehn Koht kin lukluke oh pahpahne aramas en wia me mwahu ahnsou koaros; eri, soang koaros me kin lukluke oh pahpahne en wia me mwahu, oh poakehng Koht, oh papah ih, iei kamarain en Koht.

14 Eri, kanaiehng mwahu, riei kesempwal oko, pwe kumwail dehr tenekih oh medewehki me mehkot suwed kohsang rehn Koht, de medewehki mehkot mwahu oh sang rehn Koht kohsang rehn tepilo.

15 Pwe kilang, riei ko, e mweimweiong kumwail en tenekih, pwe kumwail en ese mwahu sang me suwed; oh wiepen teneko e mengei, pwe kumwail en kak ese sang ni marain unsek, duwehte marain en rahn sang rotorot en pwohn.

16 Pwe kilang, Ngehn en Krais kohiengehr rehn aramas koaros, pwe en kak ese mwahu sang me suwed; eri, I kasalehiong kumwail wiepen teneko; pwe soahng koaros me kin lukluke en wia mwahu, oh kangonge en kamehlele Krais, e kohsang ni manaman oh kisakis en Krais; eri kumwail en ese sang ni marain unsek me e sang rehn Koht.

17 Ahpw soahng kan me kin kangongehki aramas akan en wia me suwed, oh sohte kamehlele Krais, oh kahmahmkihla ih, oh sohte papah Koht, kumwail en ese sang ni marain unsek me e sang rehn tepilo; pwe iei soangen wiepe wet me tepilo kin doadoahk, pwe sohte aramas me e kin kangongehki en wia me mwahu, soh, sohte emen; pil iangahki nah tohnleng kan; oh pil irail akan me mih pahn eh manaman.

18 Oh met, riei ko, pwehki amwail ese maraino me kumwail pahn kadeingki, maraino me iei marain en Krais, kumwail kanaiehng pwe kumwail de kadeik sapwung; pwe kadeikohte me kumwail pahn kadeingki ih me pahn pil pakadeingki.

19 Eri, I peki rehmwail, riei ko, me kumwail en loaloapwoatieng rapahki nan marain en Krais pwe kumwail en kak esehla mwahu sang me suwed; oh ma kumwail pahn koledi soahng me mwahu koaros, oh sohte kesehla, kumwail udahn pahn wia seri en Krais.

20 Oh met, riei ko, ia mwomwen amwail pahn kak koledi soahng koaros me mwahu?

21 Oh met I pahn koasoi pwosono, me I nda me I pahn koasoia; oh I pahn ndaiong kumwail wiepen amwail pahn koledi soahng koaros me mwahu.

22 Pwe kilang, Koht ketin mwahngih mehkoaros, pwehki iei ih me poatoapoat kohkohlahte, kilang, e ketin kadaredo tohnleng kan pwe re en papah aramas akan, en kasalehda duwen ketidohn Krais; oh sang Krais mehkot mwahu koaros pahn kohdo.

23 Oh Koht pil ketin mahsanihongehr soukohp akan, sang pein dauwase, me Krais pahn ketido.

24 Oh kilang, mie soangen wiepe tohto me e ketin kasalehiong soang kan rehn aramas akan, me mwahu; oh soahng kaoros me mwahu kohdo sang rehn Krais; ma soh aramas pwupwilahr, oh sohte mehkot mwahu kak kohsang irail.

25 Eri, sang ni doadoahk en tohnleng kan, oh sang ni mahsen kaoros me ketin pwilido sang nan dauwasen Koht, aramas akan tepida mwekidki arail pwoson Krais; oh met sang ni pwoson, irail koledier soahng koaros me mwahu; oh met iei lao lel ketidohn Krais.

26 Oh mwurin eh ketido, aramas akan pil komourla sang ni ar pwoson mwarehu; oh sang ni pwoson, irail wiahla sapwellimen Koht pwutak akan. Oh ni mehlel nin duwen Krais eh ketin ieias, e ketin mahsaniher mahsen pwukat ong aht pahpa kahlapoko, ketihtihki: Ma kumwail pahn peki rehn Sahmo ni mwarei sohte lipilip mehkot me mwahu, sang ni pwoson oh kamkamehlel me kumwail pahn alehdi, kilang, e pahn udahn pweida ong kumwil.

27 Eri, riei kesempwal oko, dah, manaman kapwuriamwei kan uhdier pwehki Krais eh ketidalahr nanleng, oh ketidier ni palimaun en Koht, pwe en alehdi sang rehn Sahmwo sapwellime pwuhng en kupwur kalahngan me e ketin kupwurehki aramas akan?

28 Pwe e ketin kapwaiadahr kaimwseklahn kosonnedo, oh e ketin sapwellimankilahr koaros me pwoson ih; oh irail kan me pwoson ih pahn koledi soahng koaros me mwahu; eri e ketin weliandi aramas akan; oh e ketiket nanleng kohkohlahte.

29 Oh pwehki e ketin wiahier met, riei kesempwal oko, manaman kapwuriamwei kan uhdier? Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; pil duwehte tohnleng kan sohte uhdisang pwarohng aramas akan.

30 Pwe kilang, re mih pahn eh manaman, ong papah nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e pahn ketin pahngok, kaskasalehiong irail ong irail kan me pwoson kehlail oh ahneki madamadau kehlail nan mour en Koht.

31 Oh pwukoahn ohpis en arail doadoahk iei en ekerehng aramas akan re en koluhla, oh kapwaiada inou kan oh wia doadoahk en inou kan en Sahmo, me e ketin wiahiongehr aramas akan, en kaunopada ahlo rehn aramas akan, sang ni kalikalohngki mahsen en Krais ong sapwellimen Kauno aramas pilipilda kan, pwe re en kak kadehdehdi ih.

32 Oh sang ni wiewia pwukat, Kauno Koht pahn ketin kaunopada ahl me aramas teikan pahn kak pwoson Krais, pwe en kak mie dowen Ngehn Sarawi nan mohngiongarail kan, nin duwen sapwellime manaman; oh ni wiepe wet me Sahmo pahn ketikihdo, inou kan me e ketin wiahiongehr aramas akan.

33 Oh Krais ketin mahsanih: Ma kumwail pahn pwoson ie kumwail pahn ahneki manaman en wia soahng koaros me kesempwal ong ie.

34 Oh e ketin mahsanih: Koluhla, kumwail koaros me mih nan sampah, oh kohdo rehi, oh papidaisla ni mwarei, oh pwoson ie, pwe kumwail en komourla.

35 Oh met, riei kesempwal oko, ma iei duwehn met, me mepwukat me I ahpwtehn koasoiahiong kumwail mehlel, oh Koht pahn kasalehiong kumwil, sang ni manaman oh lingan lap ni imwin rahno, me re mehlel, oh ma re mehlel, eri dah, rahn en manaman kapwuriamwei uhdier?

36 De dah, tohnleng kan uhdisangehr pwarohng aramas akan? De e ketin kauhdihsangehr manaman en Ngehn Sarawi rehrail? De e pahn ketin wia, erein ahnsou pahn mimiehte, de sampah pahn mimiehte, de aramastemen pohn sampah en komourla?

37 Kilang I ndaiong kumwail, Soh; pwe manaman kapwuriamwei kan kin kohdo sang ni pwoson; oh iei sang ni pwoson me tohnleng kan kin pwarada oh kalohkehng aramas akan; eri, ma mepwukat uhdier meid suwediong aramas akan, pwehki met sang ni peikasal, oh soahng koaros sohte katepe.

38 Pwe sohte aramas men kak komourla, nin duwen mahsen kan en Krais, ihte ma pwoson mwarehu; eri, ma mepwukat uhdier, eri pwoson pil uhdier; oh aramas mihmi nan mour apwal, pwe e duwehte me sohte komourparail wiawi.

39 Ahpw kilang, riei kesempwal oko, medewe mehkot mwahu ong kumwail, pwe I medewe me kumwail pwoson Krais pwehki amwail mpai; pwe ma kumwail sohte pwoson ih eri kumwail sohte kak iang wadawadiong rehn aramas akan en sapwellime mwomwohdiso.

40 Oh pil, riei kesempwal oko, I men koasoiaiong kumwail duwen koapworopwor. Ia mwomwen amwail pahn kak alehdi pwoson, ma kumwail sohte ahneki koapworopwor?

41 Oh dahme kumwail pahn koapworopworki? Kilang I ndaiong kumwail me kumwail pahn koapworopworki tom uwen Krais oh manaman en sapwellime iasadao, en alehdi mour soutuk, oh met pwehki amwail pwoson ih nin duwen inouo.

42 Eri, ma aramas men ahneki pwoson e udahn pahn anahne koapworopwor; pwe ma sohte pwoson e sohte kak en mie koapworopwor.

43 Oh pil, kilang I ndaiong kumwail me ke sohte kak ahneki pwoson oh koapworopwor, ma ke sohte mpai, oh mohngiong karakarahk.

44 Ma soh, eh pwoson oh koapworopworo sohte katepe, pwe Koht sohte pahn kupwure, ihte me mpai oh mohngiong karakarahk; oh ma aramas men pahn mpai oh mohngiong karakarahk, oh wehkada sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi me Sises iei Krais, e pahn anahne ahneki limpoak unsek; pwe ma e sohte ahneki limpoak unsek e sohte mehkot; eri e pahn anahne ahneki limpoak unsek.

45 Oh limpoak unsek kin kanengamah, oh kin kadek, oh sohte kin noarok, oh sohte kin aklemei, sohte kin mehwo, sohte kin mwadang lingeringer, e sohte kin medewe me suwed, oh sohte kin perenikihda me suwed ahpw kin perenikite me mehlelo, kin alehda mehkoaros, kamehlele mehkoaros, koapworopworiki mehkoaros, oh kanengamahiong mehkoaros.

46 Eri, riei kesempwal oko, ma kumwail sohte ahneki limpoak unsek, kumwail sohte mehkot, pwe limpoak unsek me poatoapoat sohte imwi. Eri, koledi limpoak unsek, me keieu lapalapasang koaros, pwe mehkoaros mie imwi—

47 Ahpw limpoak unsek iei limpoak mwakelekel en Krais, oh e poatoapoat sohte imwi; oh mehmen me pahn dierek e ahneki ni imwin rahno, e pahn mwahu ong ih.

48 Eri, riei kesempwal oko, kapakapiong Sahmo sang nan mohngiong kehlail unsek, pwe kumwail en kak audaudikihla limpoak wet, me e ketikihongehr irail koaros me kin idawehn ni mehlel sapwellime Iehros, Sises Krais; pwe kumwail en kak wiahla sapwellimen Koht; pwe ahnsou me kumwail pahn pwarada kumwail pahn duwehte ih, pwe kitail pahn kilang ih ni udahn mwomwe; pwe kitail en ahneki koapworopwor wet; pwe kitail en mwakelekela duwehte ih me ketin mwakelekel. Ahmen.
moro 8:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Papidais en kisin seri kan iei tiahk en doadoahk suwed—Kisin seri kan ieiasiki Krais pwehki Tomwo—Pwoson, koluhla, mpai oh mohngiong karakarak, alahldi en Ngehn Sarawi, oh dadaurete lel imwi kin elehda komourla. Ele Sounpar 401–421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Kisin likou ehu sang ei pahpa Mormon, ntingdohng ie, Moronai; oh e ntingdohng ie mwurite ei malipilipdahng nan pwukoa sarawio. Oh ni mwohmw wet e ntingdohng ie, ndinda:

2 Moronai, nei pwutak kempoake, I peren mehlel pwehki ahmw Kaun Sises Krais ketin medemedeweiuk, oh ketin malipehienguhk nan sapwallime pwukoa sarawi, oh sapwellime doadoahk sarawio.

3 I kin medemedeweiuk nan ei kapakap ahnsou koaros, oh I kin wie kapakapikihong Koht Sahm ni mwaren sapwellime Seri Sarawio, Sises, pwe en kak, sang ni sapwellime kupwur sapan oh kalahngan poatoapoat, en ketin kolokoluhk sang ni dadaur pwoson ni mwarehu lao lel imwi.

4 Oh met, nei pwutak, I pahn ndaiong uhk duwen dahme kansensuwedihe mehlel; pwe e kansensuwed ong ie ma mie pingiping pwarada nanpwungamwail.

5 Pwe, ma I esehla me mehlelo, mie pingiping wiawi rehmwail me pid duwen papidaislahn noumwail kisin seri kan.

6 Oh met, nei pwutak, I inangih me kumwail pahn loaloapwoatieng doadoahk, pwe sapwung mehlel wet en kohsang rehmwail; pwehki kahrepe wet me I inangihki ntingihda kisin likou wet.

7 Pwe ahnsouohte mwurin ei esehda mepwukat sang kowe, I ahpw kalelapak rehn Kauno duwen irair wet. Oh mahsen en Kauno ahpw kohdohng ie sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawio, ketihtihki:

8 Rong mahsen kan en Krais, ahmw Soundoar, ahmw Kaun oh ahmw Koht. Kilang, I sohte patohdo nan sampah pwe I en eker me mwahu kan ahpw me dipan akan en koluhla; me unsek sohte anahne sounwini, ahpw irail akan me soumwahu; eri, kisin seri kan irail unsek, pwe irail sohte kak pein wiahda dihp; eri dipen Adamo kohsang irailehr pwehki ngehi, kahrehda e sohte ahneki manaman pohrail; oh kosonned en serkumsais imwiseklahr pwehki ngehi.

9 Oh ni mwohmw wet me Ngehn Sarawi kasalehiong ie mahsen en Koht; eri, nei pwutak kempoake, I ese me e wia dihp laud mwohn Koht, ma kumwail pahn papidaisla kisin seri kan.

10 Kilang I ndaiong uhk me kumwail pahn padahngki met—irail kan me ese wiahda dihp oh pwukoaki me pahn koluhla oh papidaisla; ei, padahkihong pahpa oh nohno kan me irail anahne koluhla oh papidaisla, oh karakarahkala duwehte neirail kisin seri kan, oh irail koaros ahpw pahn iang neirail kisin seri kan komourla.

11 Oh neirail kisin seri kan sohte anahne koluhla, de pil papidaisla. Kilang, papidais kin wiawi sang ni koluhla pwe en kak kapwaiada kosonned kan me kin kahrehda mwakelekelsang dihp.

12 Ahpw kisin seri kan ieiaski Krais, sangete ni poahsondahn sampah; ma soh, a Koht iei Koht sapahrek, oh pil Koht kohweikohdo, oh lipilipilki aramas kan; pwe kisin seri depeh kei mehla ahpw sohte papidaisla?

13 Eri, ma kisin seri kan sohte kak komourla ni ar sohte papidais, irail udahn mwein kohlahr nan ehl poatoapoat.

14 Kilang I ndaiong uhk, me mehmen me medewe me kisin seri kan anahne papidaisla, iei aramaso mihmi nan kalokolok en pahtou mehlel oh selidi en dihp; pwe e sohte ahneki pwoson, koapworopwor, de limpoak unsek; eri, ma e pahn mehla ni eh ahneki madamadau wet, e udahn pahn kohdihla nan ehl.

15 Pwe suwed wet me keper, en medewe me Koht pahn kamaurala emen seri pwe e papidaisla, oh mehteio pahn mehla pwehki e sohte papidaisla.

16 Meid suwediong irail akan me pahn wekidala sapwellime Kauno koasondi kan ong ni wiepe wet, pwe irail pahn mehla ma irail sohte pahn koluhla. Kilang, I eimahki ei koasoi, pwehki I ahneki mweimwei sang rehn Koht; oh I sohte masak dahme aramas kak wia; pwe limpoak me unsek kin kesehieisang masak koaros.

17 Oh I direkihlahr limpoak unsek, me iei limpoak poatoapoat; eri, ong ie seri kan koaros duwepenehte; eri, I poakehng kisin seri kan sang ni limpoak me unseko; oh irail koaros duwepenehte oh pahn komourla.

18 Pwe I ese me Koht sohte wia Koht sapahrek, de pil kin wekiwekidek; ahpw e sohte kin ketin wekiwekidek sangete wasa sohte imwi lel wasa sohte imwi.

19 Kisin seri kan sohte kak koluhla; eri, e wia suwed keper, en kahmahmki kalahngan mwakelekel en Koht ong irail, pwe irail koaros ieiasiki ih pwehki sapwellime kalahngan.

20 Oh mehmen me pahn nda kisin seri kan anahne papidaisla kahmahmkilahr kalahngan en Kraiso, oh sohte wiahki mehkot sapwellime tomwo oh manaman en sapwellime komouro.

21 Meid suwediong soahngen aramaso, pwe irail mihmi nan mehla keper, iei ehl, oh lokolok sohte imwi. I koasoia ni eimah; Koht me ketin mahsaniong ie. Rong mahsen pwukat oh kapwaiada, ma soh e pah kadeikuhkada ni mwoalen kopwung en Kraiso.

22 Pwe kilang kisin seri kan koaros ieiasiki Krais, oh pil irail koaros me sohte wehwehki kosonnedo. Pwe manaman en komouro pahn kohieng irail koaros me sohte wehwehki kosonnedo; eri, mehmen me sohte dipada, de e sohte mih pahn manaman en dihp, e sohte kak koluhla; oh papidais sohte pahn mie katepehieng—

23 Ahpw e wia dihp laud mwohn Koht, kahmahmki kalahngan en Krais, oh manaman en sapwellime Ngehn Sarawi, oh koapwkoapworopworki doadoahk mehla kan.

24 Kilang, nei pwutak, soahng wet sohte konehng en wiawi; pwe koluhla ongete irail me mih pahn manaman en dihp oh pahn manaman en riahlahn kawehla kosonned.

25 Oh tepin wahn koluhla iei papidais; oh papidais kin wiawi sang ni pwoson en kapwaiada kosonned akan; oh kapwaiadahn kosonned akan me kin wahdo kamwakelpen dihp akan;

26 Oh kamwakelpen dihp akan me kin elehda impai, oh mohngiong karakarahk; oh pwehki mpai oh mohngiong karakarahk kahrehda pwaredohn Ngehn Sarawi, Sounkaloalamwahu me kin audehkihla koapworopwor oh limpoak me unsek, limpoak me kin poatoapoat sang ni kapakap loaloapwoat, lao lel imwi, ahnsou me souleng kan koaros pahn kousoanla rehn Koht.

27 Kilang, nei pwutak, I pahn pwurehng ntingwei rehmw ma I sohte pahn mwadang kohlahng Mehn Leimen kan. Kilang, pohnmwahsohn wehi wet, de aramas en Mehn Nihpai kan, kasaledahr arail pahn kamwomwala ma irail sohte pahn koluhla.

28 Kapakapkin irail, nei pwutak, pwe irail en kak koluhla. Ahpw kilang, I salohki me Ngehno solahr ieiang irail; oh nan pali en sahpwet irail pil raparapahki irail en kauhdi manaman oh mweimwei koaros me kohsang rehn Koht; oh irail kahkahmahmkihla Ngehn Sarawi.

29 Oh mwurin arail kasohwehier marain lap wet, nei pwutak, irail udahn pahn kereniong mehla, me pahn kahrehda pweidahn kokohp akan me soukohp kan kohpadahr, iangahi pein mahsen kan en atail Sounkomouro.

30 Kaselel, nei pwutak, lao I pahn pwurehng nting wei rehmw, de pwurehng tuhweng uhk. Ahmen.
moro 9:
Keriau en kisin likou sang Mormon ong nah pwutak Moronai.

Audaudki iralaud 9.

[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Koaros Mehn Nihpai kan oh Mehn Leimen kan suwedlahr oh sakanakanlahr—Irail kin kaloke oh kamaramas nanpwungarail—Mormon kapakapiki me kalahngan oh me mwahu en ieiang Moronai kohkohlahte. Ele Sounpar 401 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Nei pwutak kesempwal, I pwurehng ntingwei pwe ke en kak ese me I wie momourite; ahpw I ntingih duwen me kansensuwed.

2 Pwe kilang, I iang mahwin doar ehu ong Mehn Leimen kan, me se sohte pweida; oh Arkiandus kamakamkilahr kedlahs, oh pil Luhram oh Emron; ei, oh tohto nait ohl kesempwal akan mehla.

3 Oh met kilang, nei pwutak, I periki me Mehn Leimen kan pahn kamwomwala aramas pwukat; pwe irail sohte kin koluhla, oh Sehdan kamwakidadahr irail en kin lingeringerpene nanpwungarail ahnsou koaros.

4 Kilang, I kin wie nannantihong doadoahk ong irail; oh ahnsou me I koasoia mahsen en Koht ni inen irail kin masepwehkda oh lingeringer pahi; oh ahnsou me I sohte kin koasoi ineniong irail a mohngiongarail kan kin keptakaila ong mahseno; eri, I masak me Ngehno en Kauno pahn sohlahr ieiang irail.

5 Pwe irail kin lingeringer mehlel me kahrehda e mwomwen me irail solahr masak mehla; oh sohlahr arail limpoakpene; oh irail kin mehn nimpilki kamaramas oh dupwuk ahnsou koaros.

6 Oh met, nei pwutak kempoake, mehndahte arail keptakai, kita loaloapwoationg doadoahk; pwe ma kitail pahn uhdihsang doadoahk, kita pahn mihla pahn manaman en dihp; pwe mie ata doadoahk me kita anahne wia nan erein ieiasiki paliwar en mour wet, pwe kita en kak powehdi imwintihti en mour pwung koaros, oh kakomoalehdi palingeneta nan wehin Koht.

7 Oh met I ntihngih ekis duwen lokolok en aramas pwukat. Pwe nin duwen ei wehwehkihda sang rehn Amoron, kilang, Mehn Leimen kan koledi tohto me re salihdi, me irail koledihsang ni doulik en Serisah; oh mie ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan.

8 Oh irail kemehla ehn lih akan arail pwoud kan oh ehn seri kana rail pahpa kan; oh irail kin kamwengehki lih akan uduk en arail pwoud kan, oh seri kan uduk en arail pahpa kan; oh sohte pihl, ihte ekiste, me irail kin kiheng irail.

9 Oh mehndahte tiahk suwed lap wet me Mehn Leimen kan kin wia, e sohte doar duwehte me neitail aramas akan kin wia nan Moriandum. Pwe kilang, tohto nein Mehn Leimen kan serepein kan me irail saliedi; oh mwurin arail kawelahr dahme keieu mwahu oh kesempwal sang soahng koaros, me iei [kosonned en] mour mwakelekel—

10 Oh mwurin arail wiahier soahng wet, irail kin kemeirailla ni wiepe keieu sohte mwahu, kalkaloke paliwarerail akan lao mehla; oh mwurin arail wia met, irail kin kangala udukarail kan duwehte mahn lawalo kan, pwehki mohngiongarail kan eh keptakailahr; oh irail kin wia met pwe dene kilel en komwad.

11 Oh nei pwutak kempoake, ia mwomwen soangen aramas pwukat, me sohte ahneki onepek—

12 (Oh sounparte depe doupowe, ahnsou me irail wia aramas onepek oh mwahu kei)

13 Ahpw, Oh nei pwutak, ia mwomwen soangen aramaw pwukat, me kin pereniki laud tiahk suwed—

14 Ia mwomwen atail pahn kasik me limen Koht sohte pahn ketin kadeikada kitail?

15 Kilang, mohngiongi weriweriki: Meid suwediong aramas pwukat. Maing Koht, komw ketin kadeikirailda oh ketin karukihla diparail kan, oh wiewia suwed kan, oh tiahk suwed kan sang mwohn sihlangihr!

16 Oh pil ehu, nei pwutak, tohto lihodi oh neirail serepein kan me mihmihte nan Serisah; oh mwongehkan me Mehn Leimen kan sohte wahsang, kilang, nein Sihnepai sounpei kan wahsang, oh kohkohsang irail eri irail raparapahkiseli mwonge; oh lih likeilap tohto lupungimasala nan ahlo oh mehla.

17 Oh sounpei kan me ieiang ie luwet; oh nein Mehn Leimen kan sounpei kan mihmi nanpwungen Serisah oh ngehi; oh koaros me tangala rehn nein Aron sounpei kan lohdieng nan arail mehla.

18 Oh kapwuriamwei en nei aramas ar pwupwidi! Sohte koasondi rehrail oh sohte mahk. Kilang, ngehi aramas men, oh I ahneki kehlail en aramas men, oh I sohlahr kak ruwesehkin irail ei koasoi kan.

19 Oh irail kehlailla nan arail wiewia sapwung; irail duwepenehte nan arail lemei, sohte kin mahkehng me mah oh pwulopwul; oh irail kin pereniki soahng koaros ihte me mwahu soh; oh lokolok me nait lih akan oh nait seri kan ahneki pohn sahpwet doarasang soang koaros; ei, sohte loakaia kak kawehwehda, de pil ntingdi.

20 Oh met, nei pwutak, I solahr pahn koasoia irair sapwung wet. Kilang, ke esehier wiewia suwed en aramas pwukat; ke esehier me irail solahr momouriki padahk, oh solahr kehn wasa; oh arail wiewia suwed kan suwedsangehr ehn Mehn Leimen kan.

21 Kilang, nei pwutak, I sohte kak peksawaskin irail rehn Koht pwe e de pahn kaloke ie.

22 Ahpw kilang, nei pwutak, I kak peksawaskinuhk rehn Koht, oh I koapworopworiki rehn Krais me ke pahn komourla; oh I kapakapikihong Koht me en doarehla ahmw mour, pwe ke en kadehdeh sapwellime aramas ar pahn pwuralahng, de arail pahn kamwomwala; pwe I ese me irail udahn pahn mehla ma irail sohte pahn koluhla oh pwurala reh.

23 Oh ma irail pahn mehla e pahn duwehte Mehn Sared ko, pwehki arail ineng en mohngiongarail kan, ar raparapahki kamaramas oh dupuk suwed.

24 Oh ma irail pahn mehla, kitail ese me tohto riatail akan iangala Mehn Leimen kan, oh pil tohto irail pahn pil iangala irail; eri, ntingihdi ekis duwen mepwukat, ma ke mourla oh I pahn mehla oh sohte kilangki mesei; ahpw I koapworopworiki me I pahn pwurehng kilang uhk ahnsou mwadang; pwe mie poadoapoad sarawi kan me I pahn kihong uhk.

25 Nei pwutak, loaloapwoationg Krais; oh soahng kan me I ntingihdi en dehr kansensuwedihuk, katoutouihuk ong mehla; ahpw Krais en ketin pwokuhkada, oh sapwellime lokolok oh pwoula, oh eh ketin kasalehiong kahlape atail pahpako, oh sapwellime kalahngan oh kanengamah, oh koapworopwor en sapwellime lingan oh mour soutuk, en mihmi nan ahmw madamadau kohkohlahte.

26 Oh kupwur kalahngan en Koht Sahmo, me mwoale ketiket wasa ile nanleng, oh atail Kaun Sises Krais, me ketiket ni palimaun en sapwellime manaman, lao soahng koaros pahn mihla pahn eh manaman, en mihmi, oh ieiang uhk kohkohlahte. Ahmen.
moro 10:
[center][font_size=26]Iralaud 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kadehdehn Pwuhk en Mormon kin kohsang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi—Kisakis kan en Ngehno kin kohieng me loaloapwoat kan—Kisakis en palingehn kin iangahki pwoson ahnsou koaros—Mahsen en Moronai kan koasoi sang nan pwehl—Kohdo rehn Krais, unsekla Reh, oh palingenamwail kan en sarawihla. Ele Sounpar 421 Mwurin Ipwidi en Krais.[/i]

1 Met ngehi, Moronai, ntingih ekis mehkot me I medewe me kesempwal; oh I ntingwehng riei kan, Mehn Leimen kan; oh I men irail en ese me sounparehr epwiki rieisek dauliher ahnsou me kilel en ketidohng Kraiso wiawi.

2 Oh I pahn katengepene poadoapoad pwukat, mwurin ei pahn kangoangehkin kumwail ekei kisin koasoia kan.

3 Kilang, I pahn kangoangehki kumwail me ahnsou me kumwail pahn wadek mepwukat, ma iei eripit en Koht me kumwail pahn wadengki, me kumwail pahn tamataman ia uwen kupwurkalahngan en Kauno ong aramas akan, sangete ni kepikipikdahn Adam kohdo lao lel ahnsou me kumwail alehier mepwukat, oh medemedewe nan amwail mohngiong kan.

4 Oh ahnsou me kumwail pahn alehdi mepwukat, I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail en peki rehn Koht, Sahm Soutuk, ni mwaren Krais, ma mepwukat sohte mehlel; oh ma kumwail pahn peki sang nan mohngiong mehlel, ineng mehlel, pwoson Krais, e pahn ketin kasalehiong kumwail mehlelo, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi.

5 Oh sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi kumwail pahn esehla mehlel en soahng kaoros.

6 Oh soahng koaros me mwahu e pwung oh mehlel; eri, sohte mehkot mwahu kin kahmahmki Krais, ahpw e kin pohnese me e ketin ieias.

7 Oh kumwail en ese sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi me e ketin ieias; eri I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail en dehr kahmahmki manaman en Koht; pwe e kin ketin doadoahk sang ni manaman, nin duwen ehn aramas akan pwoson, iei ihte mwomwe rahn wet oh lakapw, oh kohkohlahte.

8 Oh I pil kangoangehkin kumwail, riei ko, me kumwail en dehr kahmahmki sapwellimen Koht kisakis kan, pwe kisakis kan me tohto; oh e kohsang rehn Kohtohte. Oh soangen wiepe tohto me kisakis pwukat kin kohda; ahpw ihte Kohto me kin ketikihda nan mehkoaros ong aramas koaros; oh Ngehn en Koht me kin ketikihong kisakis pwukat ong aramas akan, pween wia kamwahuparail.

9 Pwe kilang, Ngehn en Koht ketikihong emen kisakis en kak padahngki mahsen en eripit;

10 Oh ong emen, Ngehnohte ketikihong en kak padahngki mahsen en kupwurokong;

11 Oh ong emen, Ngehnohte ketikihong pwoson kehlail mehlel; oh ong emen, kisakis kan en kamwahuiala;

12 Oh pil, ong emen, en kak wia doadoahk manaman kapwuriamwei kan;

13 Oh pil, ong emen, en kak kohpada duwen soahng koaros;

14 Oh pil, ong emen, en kilangada tohnleng kan oh ngehn en papah kan;

15 Oh pil, ong emen, en kak lokaiahki soangsoangen lokaia kan;

16 Oh pil, ong emen, en kak kawehwehda mahsen kan oh soangsoangen lokaia kan.

17 Oh kisakis pwukat koaros kohdo sang rehn Ngehn en Krais; oh e kin kohdo ong emen emen aramas, nin duwen me e kin ketin kupwuriki.

18 Oh I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail, riei kesempwal akan, me kumwail en tamataman me kisakis mwahu koaros kohdo sang rehn Krais.

19 Oh I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail, riei kesempwal oko, me kumwail en tamataman me en kin ketin duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte, oh kisakis pwukat koaros me I koasoiahier, me sang palingehn, sohte pahn uhdi, iei erein sampah eh pahn mihmihte, ihte ma aramas akan soupwoson.

20 Eri, pwoson udahn anahnepe; oh ma pwoson anahnepe mie eri koapworopwor pahn anahnepe mie; oh ma koapworopwor pahn anahnepe mie eri limpoak unsek pahn pil anahnepe mie.

21 Oh ma kumwail sohte pahn ahneki limpoak unsek kumwail sohte kak komourla nan wehin Koht; pil kumwail sohte kak komourla nan wehin Koht ma kumwail sohte ahneki pwoson; de pil kumwail sohte ahneki koapworopwor.

22 Oh ma kumwail sohte ahneki koapworopwor eri kumwail udahn pahn mih nan irair en soukoapworopwor; soukoapworopwor kin kohdo sang ni wiewia suwed.

23 Oh ni mehlel Krais ketin mahsanihong atail pahpah ko: Ma kumwail pahn ahneki pwoson kumwail pahn kak wia soahng koaros me kesempwal ong ie.

24 Oh met I koasoi ong sampah pwon—ma rahn pahn kohdo me sapwellimen Koht manaman oh kisakis kan uhdi sang kumwail, e pahn sang pwehki sohpwoson.

25 Oh meid suwediong aramas akan ma iei met pahn wiawi; pwe sohte emen rehmwail me pahn wia mwahu, sohte emente. Pwe ma e pahn mie emen rehmwail me wia mwahu, e pahn wia doadoahk sang ni sapwellimen Koht manaman oh kisakis kan.

26 Oh meid suwediong irail me pahn wia mepwukat oh mehla, pwe irail mehla nan diparail, oh irail sohte kak komourla nan wehin Koht; oh I koasoia nin duwen mahsen en Krais; oh I sohte likamw.

27 Oh I kangoangehkin kumwail en tamataman mepwukat; pwe ahnsou pahn mwadangete kohdo me kumwail pahn ese me I sohte likamw, pwe kumwail pahn kilang ie ni mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Koht; Oh Kauno Koht pahn ketin mahsanihong kumwail: Dah, I sou kalohkihong kumwail ei mahsen kan, me ntingidi sang rehn ohl menet, rasohng emen me lukulukuwer sang rehn me melahr akan, iei, duwehte emen me koaskoasoi sang nan pwehl?

28 I kalohngki mepwukat pwe en kapwaiada kokohp akan. Oh kilang, e pahn kohwei sang nan dauwasen Koht poatoapoato; oh sapwellime mahsen pahn kohwei sang ehu dih kohlahng ehu.

29 Oh Koht pahn ketin kasalehiong kumwail, me dahme I ntingihdi e mehlel.

30 Oh pil I pahn kangoangehkin kumwail en kohdo rehn Krais, koledi kisakis mwahu koaros, oh dehr doahke kisakis suwed, de mehkot samin.

31 Oh pirida, oh pwourda sang nan pwehl, kowe Serusalem; ei, oh pwurieng nan ahmw likou kaselel kan, kowe serepein en Saion; oh kakehlakahla amwail lepin tuhkehn kateng kan oh katehlapahla irepeh kan kohkohlahte, pwe kumwail en sohla pwurehng namenekla, pwe inou me Sahm Soutuk ketin wiahiong kumwail, peneinei en Israel, en kak pweida.

32 Ei, kohdo rehn Krais, oh unsekla reh, oh soikasang kumwail soahng koaros me sohte wia mour en Koht; oh ma kumwail pahn soikasang kumwail soahng koaros me sohte wia mour en Koht, oh poakehng Koht sang ni amwail kehl unsek, madamadau unsek oh roson unsek, eri sapwellime kalahngan ahpw pahn itarehng uhk, me kahrehda sang ni sapwellime kalahngan kumwail pahn kak unsekla rehn Krais; oh ma sang ni kalahngan en Koht kumwail pahn unsekla rehn Krais, kumwail sohte pahn kak soikala manaman en Koht.

33 Oh pil, ma sang ni kalahngan en Koht kumwail unsekla rehn Krais, oh sohte soikala sapwellime manaman, eri kumwail pahn sarawihkihla Krais sang ni kalahngan en Koht, sang ni kakerehdi en ntahn Krais, me mih nan inou en Sahmo ong kamwakelpen dihparail kan, pwe kumwail en kak sarawihla, oh sohte samin en mwahi.

34 Oh met I rahnmwahuiala kumwail koaros. I kereniongehr pahn kohla komoaldi nan paradais en Koht, lao lel ahnsou me palingeniet oh paliwereiet pahn pwurehng pwurpene, oh ngehn kohdo pereperen nan wehwe, pwe I en tuhwong kumwail mwohn wasahn kopwung mwahu en Siowa lapo, Sounkopwung Soutuko ong me momour oh mehla kan. Ahmen.

Eralahr
